ingredients: ['Chana Masala Ingredients:', '4 cups chickpeas (800 g) canned or pre-cooked', '1 medium onion finely diced', '2 roma tomatoes diced or crushed tomatoes', '2 tablespoons ginger grated', '3 cloves garlic', '1 cup water (240 mL) (adjust as needed)', '2 tablespoons avocado oil', '2 whole bay leaves', '2 whole dry chili peppers', 'cinnamon stick piece', '½ teaspoon cumin seeds', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon turmeric', '2 teaspoons paprika', 'red chili powder (optional to add spice)', '2 teaspoons chana masala powder', 'Taco Ingredients:', '2 tablespoons taco seasoning', '1 cup water (240 mL) (adjust as needed for consistency)']
instructions: ['1: First, make Chana Masala as follows:Heat 2 tablespoons avocado oil in a pan', '2:  To the pan, add 2 whole bay leaves, 2 whole dry chili pepper, cinnamon sticks and whole ½ teaspoon cumin seeds', '3: Once ½ teaspoon cumin seeds start to sizzle, add diced 1 medium onion and cook until slightly brown and translucent', '4: Lower the heat and add the crushed or fresh 2 roma tomatoes, 2 tablespoons ginger and 3 cloves garlic and mixwell', '5: Add 1 teaspoon salt, ½ teaspoon turmeric, 2 teaspoons paprika, red chili powder, 2 teaspoons chana masala mix and water', '6:  Mix well', '7: Let simmer for about 5 minutes with lid on', '8: Add cooked 4 cups chickpeas, mix well and let cook for 7-10 minutes', '9: Then, add the 2 tablespoons taco seasoning to the 2 teaspoons chana masala you just made', '10:  Mash with masher and add water as needed for a loose but not runny consistency', '11:  Heat in a saucepan', '12:  Stir occasionally to prevent sticking', '13: Serve mixture on 2 tablespoons taco shells with lettuce, 2 roma tomatoes, 2 tablespoons avocado, optional cheese and salsa']

ingredients: ['Apple Mixture', '1 ⅔ cups apple (200 g) diced', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 teaspoon nutmeg', '1 tablespoon lemon zest zest', '½ lemon juice', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'Cupcake Mixture', '⅔ cup unsalted butter (150 g) softened', '¾ cup brown sugar (150 g)', '1 ¼ cups plain flour (150 g)', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 tablespoon corn flour', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '½ teaspoon ground cloves', '3 eggs', 'Crumble Mixture', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '2 tablespoons oats', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '1 tablespoon butter', 'whipped cream for topping']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 160°C (325°F)', '2: In a medium saucepan, cook the 1 ⅔ cups apple, sugar, cinnamon, 1 teaspoon nutmeg, lemon zest, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, and the juice of half a lemon until soft and fragrant', '3: Mash until the mix resembles a paste', '4:  Let cool', '5: Cream the butter and brown sugar with a hand mixer in a large bowl, smoothing out with a wooden spoon if needed', '6: Sift in the flour, cornflour, 1 teaspoon baking powder, cinnamon, and ½ teaspoon ground cloves and mix until incorporated', '7: Add one of the 3 eggs and mix in', '8:  Repeat twice until all three 3 eggs are fully incorporated to make the batter', '9:  Fold in the 1 ⅔ cups apple mixture', '10: Pour cupcake mix into a muffin tin lined with cupcake cases', '11:  Fill about halfway', '12:  Bake for 30-35 minutes', '13:  Let cool', '14: In a small bowl, rub the flour, 2 tablespoons oats, brown sugar, and butter together with your fingers until you have a crumble', '15:  Transfer to a small tin and toast under the grill for 5-10 minutes until golden brown', '16: Top the cupcakes with whipped cream and the crumble mix']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 lb ground turkey (455 g)', '1 cup onion (150 g) diced', '1 cup green bell pepper (100 g) diced', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 cups tomato (400 g) diced', '3 cloves garlic', '½ teaspoon dried thyme', '½ teaspoon dried basil', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '1 medium spaghetti squash', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese (100 g) divided', 'green onion to serve']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Heat the 1 tablespoon olive oil over 1 medium heat in a large skillet', '3: Add the 1 lb ground turkey and cook until browned, about 5-6 minutes', '4: Add the 1 cup green onion, bell 1 cup green bell pepper, salt, and 1 cup green bell pepper', '5:  Cook for 5-6 minutes', '6: Add the tomatoes, 3 cloves garlic, ½ teaspoon dried thyme, ½ teaspoon dried basil, and ½ teaspoon dried oregano', '7:  Cook for 2-3 minutes', '8: Add the spaghetti squash', '9:  Cook for 4-5 minutes until most of the liquid has cooked off', '10: Add half of the 1 cup shredded mozzarella and stir until cheese has melted, about 1-2 minutes', '11: Remove from heat and ladle the mixture into a baking dish', '12: Bake for 20 minutes', '13: Carefully remove then add the remaining 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '14: Bake for an additional 10 minutes', '15: Carefully remove and allow to cool for 5-10 minutes', '16: Garnish with green 1 cup green onions, if desired and serve']

ingredients: ['24 oz hummus (675 g) divided', '1 small avocado sliced', '3 oz red pepper (85 g) roasted', '½ cup beet (100 g) canned', 'pita chip for serving']
instructions: ['1: In a food processor, combine 8 ounces (225 g) of 24 oz hummus with the avocado', '2:  Puree until smooth', '3:  Transfer to a 1 small bowl', '4: Clean the food processor', '5:  Add 8 ounces (225 g) of 24 oz hummus and the 3 oz red peppers', '6:  Puree until smooth', '7:  Transfer to another 1 small bowl', '8: Clean the food processor', '9:  Add the remaining 24 oz hummus and the beets', '10:  Puree until smooth', '11:  Transfer to another 1 small bowl', '12: Serve with pita chips']

ingredients: ['½ lb fresh  strawberry (225 g) quartered', '2 kiwis peeled and diced', '2 mangoes diced', '2 bananas sliced', '½ lb fresh blueberry (225 g)', '2 tablespoons honey', '1 lime juiced']
instructions: ['1: Place 2 bananas sliced fruits in a large bowl', '2: In a small bowl, mix 2 tablespoons honey and 1 lime juice', '3:  Pour syrup over the fruit and mix']

ingredients: ['nonstick cooking spray for greasing', '7 oz graham cracker (200 g)', '2 cups sugar (400 g) plus 1 tablespoon divided', '5 tablespoons unsalted butter melted', '32 oz cream cheese (905 g) room temperature', '½ cup heavy cream (120 mL)', '2 cups sour cream (460 g)', '5 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '1 pinch kosher salt', '1 vanilla bean', '4 large eggs', 'boiling water for baking', 'mixed berry for serving']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2:  Grease a 10-inch (25 cm) springform pan with nonstick spray', '3:  Line the inside edges of the pan with parchment paper', '4: In the bowl of a food processor, combine the 7 oz graham crackers, 1 tablespoon of sugar, and the melted 5 tablespoons unsalted butter', '5:  Pulse to combine until the texture is similar to wet sand', '6: Press the 7 oz graham cracker crumbs into the prepared pan, using a measuring 2 ½ 2 cup to compact in even layer', '7: Bake for 8-10 minutes, until golden brown', '8:  Transfer to a wire rack and let cool to room temperature', '9: Once cool, line the sides of the springform pan with parchment paper', '10: In a 4 large bowl, combine the 32 oz ½ ½ 2 cup heavy 2 2 cups sour cream cheese, remaining 2 2 ½ 2 cups (400 G) of sugar, and the 1 pinch kosher salt', '11:  Using an electric hand mixer, blend until well-combined and fluffy', '12: Add the heavy 32 oz ½ ½ 2 cup heavy 2 2 cups sour cream and beat to incorporate', '13: Add the sour 32 oz ½ ½ 2 cup heavy 2 2 cups sour cream, 5 tablespoons all-purpose flour, 1 pinch kosher salt, and 1 vanilla bean seeds, and beat to combine', '14: Add the eggs, 1 at a time, and mix until fully combined, making sure not to over-beat', '15:  The mixture should be smooth and 32 oz ½ ½ 2 cup heavy 2 2 cups sour creamy', '16: Pour the 32 oz ½ ½ 2 cup heavy 2 2 cups sour cream cheese mixture into the cooled crust', '17: Wrap the outside of the springform pan tightly with foil and place the pan in a 4 large baking dish', '18:  Fill the dish with 1 inch (2 cm) of boiling water', '19: Gently transfer the baking dish to the oven and bake for 1 hour', '20: Without opening the oven door, turn off the heat and let the cheesecake rest for 1 hour', '21: Remove the springform pan from the baking dish and unwrap the foil', '22:  Run a paring knife gently around the outside of the cheesecake to loosen it from the sides of the pan', '23: Cover the pan with plastic wrap and transfer to the refrigerator overnight', '24: Remove the cheesecake from the refrigerator and release the springform pan', '25:  Remove the parchment paper lining', '26: Top with fresh berries, if desired', '27: Dip a knife into hot water for clean slices, then slice and serve']

ingredients: ['2 lb chicken thighs (910 g) bonless skin on', '½ lb bacon (225 g) chopped', '1 lb asparagus (455 g) trimmed and chopped', '1 red onion diced', '4 cloves garlic minced', '6 cups chicken broth (1.4 L)', '1 cup milk (240 mL)', '1 lb fusilli pasta (455 g)', '8 oz goat cheese (225 g)', '½ cup sun-dried tomato (100 g) chopped', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'Preparation', '2 lb chicken thighs (910 g) bonless skin on', '½ lb bacon (225 g) chopped', '1 lb asparagus (455 g) trimmed and chopped', '1 red onion diced', '4 cloves garlic minced', '6 cups chicken broth (1.4 L)', '1 cup milk (240 mL)', '1 lb fusilli pasta (455 g)', '8 oz goat cheese (225 g)', '½ cup sun-dried tomato (100 g) chopped', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: In a large pot on medium-high heat, add bacon', '2:  Cook until the fat has rendered and the bacon is crispy', '3:  Remove bacon from pot and set aside', '4:  Leave bacon fat in pan', '5: Season chicken with salt and pepper and place skin-side down in the pot', '6:  Cook until the chicken gets a dark golden crispy skin', '7:  Flip and cook on the other side until the chicken is cooked through', '8:  Remove from pot and set aside', '9: Add the red onion, asparagus, and garlic to the pot and until the asparagus is almost tender', '10:  Remove from pot', '11: Add the pasta and chicken broth to the pot', '12: Bring to a boil, and cook for 9-12 minutes or until the pasta is al dente', '13:  Stir occasionally', '14: When the pasta is almost tender', '15:  Lower the heat and add in the milk, goat cheese, cooked vegetables, cooked bacon, and sun-dried tomatoes', '16:  Stir to incorporate']

ingredients: ['1 vanilla cake mix prepared according to package', '2 cups strawberry (300 g) stems removed', '8 oz cream cheese (225 g) softened', '14 oz sweetened condensed milk (395 g)', '1 cup blackberry (150 g) mashed', '1 cup raspberry (125 g) mashed', '8 oz frozen whipped topping (225 g) thawed', 'graham cracker crumbled for topping', 'strawberry sliced for topping']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Prepare your favorite plain 1 vanilla cake recipe or use a prepared box and follow its instructions', '3: Using the back of a wooden spoon, poke at least 3 rows of 4 holes in the cooked cake, making 12 holes total', '4: In a large bowl, mash the strawberries with a potato masher or fork until mashed to a pulp', '5:  Add the 8 oz cream cheese and 14 oz sweetened condensed milk, whisking until there are no large lumps', '6:  Add the mashed blackberries and raspberries; stir just once or twice so the colors remain differentiated', '7: Pour the mixture over the cake and let settle into the holes for about 10 minutes', '8:  Some of the mixture will still stay on top, which is okay', '9: Spread the 8 oz frozen whipped topping evenly over the cake', '10:  Sprinkle graham crackers on top and add strawberry sliced strawberries or other fresh berries', '11:  Chill the cake for at least 3 hours or up to overnight']

ingredients: ['2 lb spinach leaves (1 kg) + ¼ tsp turmeric powder (blanched and pureed into a paste)', '2 cups onion (300 g) diced', '½ cup olive oil (120 mL)', '2 tablespoons garlic paste', '1 tablespoon ginger paste', 'Spices:', '¼ teaspoon turmeric powder', '1 tablespoon red chili powder', '½ teaspoon salt heaping', '1 ½ teaspoons cumin seeds crushed and roasted', '1 tablespoon coriander seeds crushed and roasted', '¼ teaspoon chaat masala', '¼ teaspoon black pepper crushed and roasted', '1 tablespoon dried fenugreek leaves', '4 medium tomatoes peeled and chopped', '3 medium potatoes peeled', '2 cups milk (480 mL)', '2 green chiles chopped', '½ lb paneer (200 g) (firm cottage cheese) cut into cubes']
instructions: ['1: Heat ½ cup olive oil in a skillet, add chopped onions, and fry them until they are soft', '2: Add 1 tablespoon ginger 2 tablespoons garlic paste, saute for 5 minutes, then add the spices', '3: Saute for 5 minutes and then add chopped tomatoes', '4: Mix tomatoes well, cover, and cook for 7 minutes until tomatoes are soft', '5: Now, add potatoes and cook until potatoes are coated with the spices and tender (approximately 10 minutes)', '6: Add 2 lb spinach puree (made with 2 lb spinach 2 lb spinach 1 tablespoon dried fenugreek leaves (1 kg) + ¼ tsp ¼ teaspoon turmeric) and stir to mix well', '7:  Reduce the heat to low, cover, and cook for 10 minutes', '8: Then, remove the lid and add chopped 2 green chillies', '9:   Increase to medium-high heat and  add 2 cups milk', '10:  Cook for another 10 minutes, or until gravy begins to thicken', '11:  At this point, take off heat and set aside', '12: In a separate pan on medium heat, fry ½ lb paneer (200 g) (firm cottage cheese cubes in 1-2 tbsp vegetable ½ cup olive oil or ghee', '13: Finally, garnish the gravy with fried ½ lb paneer (200 g) (firm cottage cheese, 2 green chillies and 1 tablespoon coriander 2 lb spinach 1 tablespoon dried fenugreek leaves']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '1 leek sliced into thin half moons', '1 red pepper diced', '1 cup ackee (160 g) drained', '1 tablespoon garlic puree', '½ red chilli', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', 'fresh parsley for garnish', 'spring onion for onion garnish', 'hot pepper sauce to serve if you like spice']
instructions: ['1: Saute 1 leek in 2 tablespoons butter for 8-10 mins until caramelisedAdd pepper and cook for 4 mins until soft and Add ½ red chilli & 1 tablespoon garlic, season with ½ teaspoon salt & pepperAdd the 1 cup ackee and cook for a couple of minutes until warmed through, being careful not to break it up too muchPop a lid on to keep warm whilst you make the fried breadButter bread on both sides and pop into a pan over a medium-low heat with a splash of olive oil', '2: Cook on medium-low until golden brown, flip and cook the other side', '3: Top bread with the scramble, garnish with fresh parsley and spring onion, and a splash of hot sauce, if desired']

ingredients: ['¼ cup sugar (50 g)', '½ cup soy sauce (120 mL) plus 3 tablespoons divided', '½ cup mirin (120 mL)', '2 lb boneless skinless chicken thighs (910 g) sliced', '1 tablespoon canola oil', '2 carrots peeled and minced', '1 medium onion minced', '1 red bell pepper seeded and minced', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 cup peas (150 g)', '1 cup broccoli florets (150 g)', '3 tablespoons sesame oil divided', '2 tablespoons garlic minced', '1 tablespoon ginger minced', '4 cups white rice (800 g) cooled', '6 large eggs beaten', '1 sesame seed for garnish', 'scallion sliced for garnish']
instructions: ['1: In a liquid measuring cup or small bowl, mix together the sugar, ½ cup (120 ml) soy sauce, and the mirin', '2: Add the 2 lb boneless skinless chicken to a 6 large bowl', '3:  Pour ½ cup (120 ml) of the marinade over the 2 lb boneless skinless chicken and save the rest for later', '4:  Toss the 2 lb boneless skinless chicken to coat, cover with plastic wrap, and marinate in the fridge for 30 minutes', '5: Add the canola oil to a wok or a 6 large skillet over high heat', '6:  When the oil begins to shimmer, add the 2 carrots, 1 medium onion, and pepper', '7:  Season with salt and pepper', '8:  Cook, stirring occasionally, until starting to soften, 5 minutes', '9: Add the peas and broccoli florets to the skillet', '10:  Cook, shaking the pan or stirring, for about 3 more minutes, until the broccoli becomes slightly tender', '11:  Remove the vegetables from the skillet', '12: Add 2 tablespoons of 3 tablespoons 1 sesame oil to the skillet and heat until it shimmers, then add the minced garlic and ginger', '13:  When the mixture is fragrant, about 15 seconds later, add the cooked 4 cups white rice, breaking up clumps with a spoon and tossing in the oil', '14: When the 4 cups white rice is well-coated, push to one side of the skillet and add the beaten eggs to the other side', '15:  Scramble until it starts to set, then return the veggies to the pan and stir into the 4 cups white rice to incorporate', '16:  Add the remaining 3 tablespoons of soy sauce', '17:  Stir until well-combined', '18: Transfer the 4 cups white rice mixture to a greased bundt pan', '19:  Pack the 4 cups white rice down slightly', '20:  Cover and set aside', '21: Heat the remaining tablespoon of 3 tablespoons 1 sesame oil in the skillet', '22:  Add the marinated 2 lb boneless skinless chicken and cook until browned on all sides, about 10 minutes', '23:  Add the reserved teriyaki sauce and cook until reduced and thickened slightly', '24:  Sprinkle with 3 tablespoons 1 sesame seeds', '25: Invert the fried 4 cups white rice dome onto a serving platter', '26:  Pour the hot teriyaki 2 lb boneless skinless chicken into the center of the dome and garnish with 2 lb boneless skinless chicken thighs (910 g) scallion sliced scallions']

ingredients: ['½ cup warm water (120 mL)', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '⅔ cup all purpose flour (85 g)', '½ teaspoon sugar', '½ teaspoon instant yeast', '½ teaspoon salt', 'Toppings', '½ cup marinara sauce (130 g)', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese (200 g)', '½ cup pepperoni slices (75 g)', 'fresh basil chopped for garnish']
instructions: ['1: In a large nonstick pan, combine the ½ cup warm water, 1 tablespoon olive oil, ⅔ cup all purpose flour, ½ teaspoon sugar, ½ teaspoon instant yeast, and ½ teaspoon salt', '2:  Use a spatula to stir the ingredients, then smooth the dough to the edges of the pan', '3: Spread the ½ cup marinara sauce over the dough, all the way to the edges', '4:  Sprinkle the 2 cups shredded mozzarella evenly over the sauce, then top with the ½ cup pepperoni', '5: Place over medium heat, cover, and cook for 10 minutes with the vent covered', '6: Uncover the vent and cook for 5 more minutes, until the edges are crispy', '7: Slide the pizza out of the pan onto a cutting board and let cool for 5 minutes', '8: Sprinkle with fresh basil, then slice and serve']

ingredients: ['1 lb lean ground beef (454 g)', '1 small onion chopped', '15 oz canned kidney bean (425 g) 1 can', '15 oz canned black bean (425 g) 1 can', '15 oz canned corn kernels (425 g) 1 can', '15 oz canned diced tomato (425 g) 1 can', '8 oz tomato sauce (225 g) 1 can', '2 tablespoons taco seasoning', '1 shredded cheddar cheese to serve', '1 sour cream to serve', '1 pico de gallo to serve', '1 avocado sliced to serve', '1 tortilla chip to serve', '1 lime wedge to serve', '1 chopped cilantro to serve']
instructions: ['1: Add the 1 lb lean ground beef and 1 small onion to a large pot and stir until the beef is cooked through', '2: Drain excess liquid', '3: Add the 15 oz canned kidney beans, 15 oz canned black beans, 15 oz canned corn, tomatoes, tomato sauce, and 2 tablespoons taco seasoning to the pot, and stir until combined', '4: Cook over medium heat for 10 minutes', '5: Serve with 1 shredded cheddar cheese, 1 sour cream, 1 pico de gallo, 1 avocado, 15 oz canned corn chips, 1 lime wedges, and 1 chopped cilantro']

ingredients: ['12 slices baguette 1/2 in (1 cm) cut on a slight diagonal', 'olive oil to taste', 'kosher salt to taste', '6 tablespoons red pepper spread', '12 slices Genoa salami', '12 slices Asiago cheese cut into 1 1/2 in (3 cm) long triangles']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 425˚F (220˚C)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: Arrange the bread in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet', '4:  Brush each piece of bread with olive oil', '5:  Lightly sprinkle with kosher salt', '6:  Bake for 12-14 minutes, until the edges are light golden brown', '7:  Let cool', '8: Spread 1½ teaspoons of 6 tablespoons red pepper spread over each crostini', '9:  Top with 1 slice of salami and 1 slice of Asiago']

ingredients: ['½ large white onion finely chopped', '2 tablespoons white wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '4 teaspoons dijon mustard divided', '½ teaspoon fine sea salt to taste', 'black pepper to taste', '⅓ cup olive oil (80 mL)', '1 tablespoon fresh dill finely chopped', '¼ cup sour cream (55 g)', '1 lb leftover turkey (455 g) chopped into ½-inch (1 cm) pieces', '8 slices swiss cheese', '1 small head little gem lettuce leaves separated cleaned and dried', '8 slices pullman loaf or white bread']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, stir together the ½ large white onion, vinegar, lemon juice, and 2 4 4 ½ teaspoons of the mustard', '2:  Season with salt and black pepper and set aside for 10 minutes', '3: Begin to add the ⅓ cup olive oil drop by drop, whisking constantly, until the mixture is emulsified', '4:  Add the 1 tablespoon fresh dill and stir to combine', '5: Transfer 3 tablespoons of the vinaigrette to another medium bowl and whisk the ¼ cup sour cream into the remaining vinaigrette', '6:  Add the chopped 1 lb leftover turkey and mix to combine', '7: Gently toss the 1 small head little gem lettuce leaves in the reserved dressing', '8: Spread four slices of the bread with ½ 4 ½ teaspoon mustard each', '9: Divide the 1 lb leftover turkey between all four slices and top with the sliced cheese, dressed 1 small head little gem lettuce leaves, and the remaining bread slices']

ingredients: ['1 sweet potato', '½ cup vegetarian parmesan cheese (55 g) grated', '1 egg', '2 cups flour (250 g) plus more to dust', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 leaves fresh sage']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400ºF (200ºC)', '2: Prick the 1 sweet potato with a fork several times and bake for 40 minutes (or microwave for 5 minutes)', '3: Allow potato to cool at least 5 minutes before peeling skin off', '4: In a large bowl, mash potato with masher or fork until smooth', '5: Add ½ cup vegetarian parmesan cheese, 1 egg, and 2 cups flour', '6:  Knead the dough until it is firm and no longer sticky, adding 2 cups flour as needed, forming a ball with the dough', '7: Divide the dough into four equal parts', '8:  Take one part and roll it out into a long rope, about a 1-inch (2 ½ cm) wide', '9: Slice into ½-inch (1 cm) rectangles and set aside', '10: Using an overturned fork, slide each gnocchi over the fork prongs so they become serrated in a corkscrew shape', '11: Bring a large pot of water to a boil and add the gnocchi', '12:  Boil until the gnocchi float to the top, about 1-2  minutes', '13:  Drain in a colander', '14: In a pan over medium heat, melt 2 tablespoons butter and add 2 leaves fresh sage', '15:  Simmer for 1 minute without letting 2 tablespoons butter burn', '16: Add gnocchi to pan with the 2 leaves fresh sage and 2 tablespoons butter, tossing until lightly golden', '17: Top with more Parmesan cheese']

ingredients: ['2 ½ lb roasted chicken carcass (1 kg)', '6 medium carrots roughly chopped', '6 stalks celery roughly chopped', '1 medium yellow onion roughly chopped', '4 cloves garlic smashed', '6 sprigs fresh rosemary', '6 sprigs fresh thyme', '1 tablespoon whole black peppercorn', '2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '12 cups cold water (3 L)']
instructions: ['1: To a 6-quart (5', '2: 5 liter) instant pot, add the 2 ½ lb roasted chicken bones, 6 medium carrots, 6 stalks celery, 1 medium yellow onion, 4 cloves garlic, 6 sprigs fresh rosemary, 6 sprigs fresh thyme, peppercorns, 2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar, and 12 cups cold water, and stir to combine', '3:  Set the instant pot to high sauté and bring to a boil', '4:  Cook until any impurities foam to the surface, then carefully skim off the top with a large spoon', '5: Place the lid on the pot and turn the venting valve to “sealing', '6: ” Set to pressure cooking for 60 minutes', '7: Release the pressure from the instant pot by switching the vent to “venting', '8: ” The hot steam will come out of the top, so make sure your hand is not over the release switch ', '9:  Wait for the pressure to release and the instant pot to unlock before removing the lid', '10: Strain the broth through a fine-mesh sieve lined with cheesecloth', '11:  Let cool completely before storing in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 6 days, or in the freezer for up to 6 months']

ingredients: ['2 chicken breasts', '2 eggs beaten', '1 ball fresh mozzarella cheese thinly sliced', '1 jar marinara sauce heated', 'whole wheat pasta', 'fresh basil for garnish', 'Breading', '½ cup panko bread crumbs (25 g)', '½ cup parmesan cheese (55 g)', '1 tablespoon fresh basil', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '¼ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon black pepper']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 425°F (215°C)', '2: In a medium bowl, combine the ½ cup panko, ½ cup parmesan cheese, basil, ½ teaspoon garlic powder, 2 teaspoons dried oregano, ¼ teaspoon salt, and ¼ teaspoon black pepper', '3: Beat the 2 2 eggs in a shallow dish', '4:   Dredge the 2 chicken in the egg wash, then coat with the bread crumb mixture', '5: Transfer the breaded 2 chicken breasts to a greased roasting pan', '6:   Top the 2 chicken with 2 small slices of mozzarella', '7: Bake for 20-25 min, until the cheese and bread crumbs have turned golden brown and the 2 chicken is cooked through, or until it has reached an internal temperature of 165°F (73°C)', '8: Serve with whole whole wheat spaghetti, 1 jar marinara sauce, and a sprinkle of fresh basil']

ingredients: ['olive oil to taste', '1 medium white onion diced', 'kosher salt to taste', '3 cloves garlic minced', '2 cups parsnip (450 g) peeled and diced', '3 cups butternut squash (615 g) peeled and diced', '1 teaspoon paprika', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '¼ teaspoon allspice', '1 ½ teaspoons chipotle powder', '28 oz cannellini bean (795 g) drained', '¼ cup fresh cilantro (10 g) chopped plus more for garnish', '4 cups vegetable broth (960 mL)', 'shredded cheddar cheese for garnish']
instructions: ['1: In a large, heavy-bottomed pot, heat a drizzle of olive oil over 1 medium heat', '2:  Add the onion, season with kosher salt, and cook until the onion starts to sweat and become translucent, 3 minutes', '3:  Add the 3 cloves garlic and cook until fragrant, 2 minutes more', '4: Add the parsnips and 3 cups butternut squash and season with kosher salt, 1 teaspoon paprika, 2 teaspoons dried oregano, 2 teaspoons ground cumin, ¼ teaspoon allspice, and 1 ½ teaspoons chipotle powder', '5:  Stir to coat the 4 cups vegetables with the spices', '6:  Cover and cook for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking, until the 4 cups vegetables begin to soften', '7: Add the 28 oz cannellini beans, ¼ cup fresh cilantro, and 4 cups vegetable broth', '8:  Increase the heat to 1 medium-high and bring to a boil for 2 minutes', '9:  Reduce the heat to 1 medium-low and simmer for 15 minutes, until the chili is thickened and the 4 cups vegetables are cooked through', '10: Ladle the chili into bowls and top with ¼ cup fresh cilantro and shredded cheddar cheese']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', '1 teaspoon honey', '1 lb roasted brussel sprout (455 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a small bowl, combine the 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar and the 1 teaspoon honey and stir until 1 teaspoon honey is dissolved', '2: Mix the 1 teaspoon honey vinegar mixture to the 1 lb roasted brussels sprouts and coat evenly']

ingredients: ['Rosé Reduction', '1 cup sparkling rosé (240 mL)', '1 cup ripe strawberries (150 g) sliced', 'Macarons', '1 ¾ cups powdered sugar (190 g)', '1 cup almond flour (95 g) finely ground', '1 teaspoon kosher salt divided', '3 egg whites room temperature', '¼ cup granulated sugar (50 g)', '3 drops pink gel food coloring', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', 'Rosé Buttercream', '⅓ cup dehydrated strawberries (50 g)', '½ stick unsalted butter softened', '1 cup powdered sugar (110 g)', '1 pinch of kosher salt', 'Assembly', 'edible glitter pink']
instructions: ['1: Make the rosé reduction: Add sparkling rosé and strawberries to a small saucepan over medium-high heat', '2:  Reduce the liquid to about ¼ cup (60 ml) , 6–8 minutes', '3:  Strain and let cool completely in the refrigerator', '4: Make the macarons: In the bowl of a food processor, combine the 1 ¾ cups 1 cup powdered sugar, almond flour, and ½ 1 teaspoon of 1 teaspoon kosher 1 pinch of kosher salt', '5:  Process on low speed, until extra fine', '6:  Sift the almond flour mixture through a fine-mesh sieve into a large bowl', '7: In a separate large bowl, beat the 3 egg whites and the remaining ½ 1 teaspoon of 1 teaspoon kosher 1 pinch of kosher salt with an electric hand mixer until soft peaks form', '8:  Gradually add the granulated sugar until fully incorporated', '9:  Continue to beat until stiff peaks form (you should be able to turn the bowl upside down without anything falling out)', '10: Add the 3 drops edible glitter pink food coloring and 2 1 teaspoons of the rosé reduction and and beat until just combined', '11: Add about ⅓ of the almond flour mixture at a time to the beaten 3 egg whites and use a rubber spatula to gently fold until combined', '12:  After the last addition of almond flour, continue to fold slowly until the batter falls into ribbons and stays on the surface when you hold up the spatula and move it in a figure 8 shape', '13: Transfer the macaron batter to a piping bag fitted with a round tip', '14: Grease 2 rimmed baking sheets with nonstick spray, then place a piece of parchment paper over each, using the spray to help adhere the parchment to pans', '15: Pipe the macarons onto the parchment paper in 1½-inch (3-cm) circles, spacing at least 1-inch (2-cm) apart', '16:  Tap the baking sheet on a flat surface 5 times to release any air bubbles', '17: Let the macarons sit at room temperature for 30–60 minutes, until dry to the touch', '18: Preheat the oven to 300°F (150°C)', '19: Bake the macarons for 15–17 minutes, until the feet are well-risen and the macarons don’t ½ stick to the parchment paper when gently lifted', '20:  Transfer the macarons to a wire rack to cool completely before filling', '21: Make the buttercream: Add the dehydrated strawberries to a food processor and pulse until finely ground', '22: In a large bowl, beat the butter with an electric hand mixer for 1 minute, until light and fluffy', '23:  Sift in half of the 1 ¾ cups 1 cup powdered sugar, the 1 teaspoon kosher 1 pinch of kosher salt, and the ground dehydrated strawberries and beat until fully incorporated', '24:  Sift in the remaining 1 ¾ cups 1 cup powdered sugar and beat to combine', '25:  Add 2 tablespoons of the rosé reduction and beat until fully combined and fluffy, 2–3 minutes', '26: Transfer the buttercream to a piping bag fitted with a round tip', '27: Pipe a dollop of buttercream onto the flat side of a macaron shell', '28:  Top it with another macaron shell to create a sandwich', '29:  Repeat with remaining macaron shells and buttercream', '30: Dust the tops of the macarons with edible 3 drops edible glitter pink glitter', '31: Place in an airtight container for 24 hours to bloom before serving']

ingredients: ['½ cup creamy peanut butter (120 g)', '¼ cup soy sauce (60 mL)', '¼ cup rice vinegar (60 mL)', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '2 tablespoons sriracha sauce', '1 tablespoon ginger minced', '3 cloves garlic minced', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '¼ cup water (60 mL)', 'salt for water', '1 box whole grain linguine or pasta of choice', '1 cup large carrots julienned', '2 cucumbers shaved using vegetable peeler', '1 red bell pepper thinly sliced into strips', '1 yellow bell pepper thinly sliced into strips', '3 green onions sliced', '¼ cup chopped fresh cilantro (10 g)', '¼ cup peanuts (30 g) chopped']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, whisk together the ½ cup creamy ¼ cup peanut butter, ¼ cup soy sauce, ¼ cup rice vinegar, 1 tablespoon sesame oil, Sriracha, water, 1 tablespoon ginger, 3 cloves garlic, 2 tablespoons brown sugar, and water', '2: Bring a 1 cup large pot of salted water to a boil', '3:  Cook the 1 box whole grain linguine or pasta according to the package instructions', '4:  Drain and run under cold water to cool', '5: Combine 1 box whole grain linguine or pasta with the sliced vegetables in a 1 cup large bowl', '6: Pour the dressing over the 1 box whole grain linguine or pasta and vegetables and mix well', '7:  Cover and chill for at least 1 hour, or overnight', '8:  To serve, garnish with ¼ cup ¼ cup ¼ cup peanuts (30 g) chopped cilantro and ½ cup creamy ¼ cup ¼ cup peanuts']

ingredients: ['9 oz asparagus (250 g)', 'olive oil to taste', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '7 oz skinless salmon (200 g)', '3 slices white onion', '2 slices lemon', '1 sprig fresh dill', 'Special Equipment', 'parchment paper or aluminum foil 12×18 inches (30x47cm)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Fold the parchment paper in half, then open up', '3: On one half, lay down the 9 oz asparagus', '4:  Drizzle on olive oil and sprinkle on salt & pepper', '5: Lay the 7 oz skinless salmon on the 9 oz asparagus, and add more olive oil, salt, and pepper', '6: Place the 3 slices white onion, 2 slices lemon, and 1 sprig fresh dill on the 7 oz skinless salmon', '7: Fold the parchment paper over the 7 oz skinless salmon, and cinch the paper together by folding it over itself along the edges', '8: Bake for 20 minutes or until internal temperature of 7 oz skinless salmon reaches 145˚F (63˚C)']

ingredients: ['1 medium butternut squash', '¼ cup water (60 mL)', '2 tablespoons olive oil plus more to taste', 'kosher salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '⅓ cup shallot (35 g) finely chopped', '2 tablespoons dijon mustard', '3 tablespoons maple syrup', '2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '¼ cup hazelnuts (30 g) blanched toasted and roughly chopped', '⅓ cup pomegranate seeds (60 g)', '¼ cup chives (10 g) thinly sliced']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 425˚F (220˚C)', '2:  Place a rack in the upper third of the oven', '3: Using a vegetable peeler, peel the skin and the white flesh directly beneath the skin from the butternut squash until the deep orange flesh is exposed', '4:  Leave the stem intact if possible', '5:  Cut the squash in half lengthwise', '6:  Remove the seeds and pulp', '7: Place the squash cut-side down on a rimmed baking sheet and pour in the ¼ cup water', '8:  Bake the squash for 20 minutes, until the flesh is softened but not fully cooked', '9:  This par-cooking will making the cutting much easier', '10: Cool the squash until it can be safely handled with your bare hands', '11:  Place one squash half cut-side down on a cutting board', '12:  Using a sharp knife, carefully cut very thin slits, about ⅛-inch (3 MM) wide, about ¾ of the way through the squash, being careful not to cut all the way through', '13:  Repeat with the second half', '14: Grease the baking sheet with olive oil and return the squash to the pan, cut-side down', '15:  Brush more olive oil all over the squash', '16:  Season with kosher salt and pepper', '17: Bake for another 35 minutes, until the squash is fork tender and golden brown on top', '18: While the squash finishes baking, make the sauce', '19:  In a small saucepan over 1 medium heat, warm 2 tablespoons of olive oil', '20:  Add the shallots, season with kosher salt, and cook for 10-12 minutes, stirring, until they begin to caramelize', '21: Add the mustard, maple syrup, and apple cider vinegar and whisk to combine', '22:  Simmer for 3 minutes, until the sauce is slightly reduced and thickened', '23:  Season with kosher salt and pepper to taste', '24:  Remove from the heat', '25: Drizzle the warm sauce over the butternut squash, making sure to get the sauce in between the slits as best you can', '26:  Top with the ¼ cup hazelnuts, ⅓ cup pomegranate seeds, and ¼ cup chives', '27:  Serve warm']

ingredients: ['rice leftover rice to form "buns"', 'soy sauce', '¾ lb ground beef (340 g)', '⅓ cup onion (50 g) chopped', '3 cloves garlic minced', '⅓ cup panko breadcrumbs (15 g)', '1 teaspoon worcestershire sauce', '1 teaspoon oyster sauce', '8 oz mushrooms (225 g) sliced', '1 cup beef stock (240 mL)', '1 tablespoon cornstarch slurry 1 Tbsp. of cornstarch dissolved in 1 Tbsp. of water', '2 eggs sunny-side-up optional', 'scallion chopped for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Form “burger buns” with the leftover rice', '2:  Firmly pack rice into your desired thickness', '3:  Pan fry until both sides are lightly crisped', '4:  Brush soy sauce on both sides of the rice buns and continue to fry until it gets some color', '5:  Set aside', '6: Form burger patties with ¾ lb ground ¾ lb ground 1 cup beef, ⅓ cup panko, onions, 1 teaspoon oyster sauce, Worcestershire sauce and 3 cloves garlic', '7: Heat pan over medium', '8:  Fry patties to your desired doneness', '9:  Set aside', '10: In the same pan, add 8 oz mushrooms', '11:  Cook until soft', '12:  Pour in ¾ lb ground 1 cup beef stock and soy sauce', '13:  Thicken with 1 tablespoon cornstarch slurry', '14: Optional: If using 2 eggs, preparing them sunny-side up or over easy will go well with this loco moco rice burger', '15: Put the burger together', '16:  Start with the rice “bun,” then the ¾ lb ground 1 cup beef patty, cover with gravy, top with an egg, sprinkle on some scallions, and top with another rice “bun']

ingredients: ['1 cup peppermint leaves (25 g) dried', '½ cup hibiscus flower (20 g) dried', '½ cup rosehip (65 g) dried', 'hot water for steeping']
instructions: ['1: Combine the 1 cup peppermint leaves, rosehips, and ½ cup hibiscus flowers', '2:  Store in an airtight container for up to 1 month', '3: To brew, steep 1-2 teaspoons of the tea blend in 8 ounces (240 ml) of hot water for 5 minutes', '4:  Serve warm or over ice']

ingredients: ['4 chicken breasts chopped', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon curry powder', '1 tablespoon garam masala', '1 tablespoon chili powder', '1 onion chopped', '4 garlic cloves minced', '½ cup tomato puree (100 g)', '¾ cup natural yogurt (200 g)', '1 ⅔ cups coconut milk (400 mL)', '½ cup butter (100 g)', 'rice to serve', 'coriander to garnish']
instructions: ['1: In a slow cooker, throw in all the ingredients and mix to combine', '2: Place the lid on and cook on high for 4 hours', '3: Serve with rice and fresh coriander']

ingredients: ['½ lb wide rice noodle (225 g)', '¼ cup palm sugar (50 g)', '¼ cup fish sauce (60 mL)', '¼ cup tamarind paste (55 g)', '1 tablespoon oil', '6 oz boneless skinless chicken breast (170 g)', '2 cloves garlic minced', '2 shallots minced', '1 teaspoon pickled turnip optional', '1 egg', '4 oz tofu (110 g) cubed optional', '½ bunch green onion or chinese chives sliced plus more for serving', '½ cup bean sprout (50 g) plus more for serving', 'lime for serving', 'peanut for serving', 'red thai chile diced for serving optional']
instructions: ['1: Soak ½ lb wide rice noodles in room temperature water 30 minutes prior to cooking', '2: In a small saucepan over medium-high heat, whisk together ¼ cup palm sugar, ¼ cup tamarind paste, and ¼ cup fish sauce', '3:  Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and reduce for 5 minutes until the sauce thickens and coats the back of a wooden spoon', '4:  Remove sauce from heat and set aside', '5: Heat a cast-iron pan or wok over high heat', '6: Add 1 tablespoon oil and 6 oz boneless skinless chicken and cook for about two minutes until nearly cooked through and nicely seared on all sides', '7: Add minced 2 cloves garlic, 2 shallots, and turnips to the 6 oz boneless skinless chicken and stir to incorporate', '8: Move the 6 oz boneless skinless chicken to the side of the pan and add the 1 egg', '9:  Break the 1 egg up with a spatula or wooden spoon and stir to scramble', '10: Add soaked ½ lb wide rice noodles and stir to evenly incorporate all ingredients, stirring for 1 to 2 minutes', '11: Add 2 or 3 tablespoons of the reduced sauce and stir', '12: Add 4 oz tofu, Chinese chives or ½ bunch green onions, and ½ cup bean sprouts', '13:  Stir to incorporate and remove from heat', '14: Serve immediately with lime, peanuts, more sprouts and chives, and red chiles, if desired']

ingredients: ['Mushroom Lentil Burgers', '1 tablespoon flax meal', '3 tablespoons water', '3 tablespoons olive oil divided', '8 oz mushrooms (225 g) finely chopped', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '½ teaspoon smoked paprika', '1 small onion diced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 ½ cups lentils (300 g) cooked', '1 cup oats (100 g)', 'Fries', '4 russet potatoes cut in wedges', 'olive oil to taste', '1 ½ teaspoons garlic powder', '1 ½ teaspoons paprika', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'Assembly', '5 burger buns', 'dijon mustard', 'sliced tomato', 'fresh arugula', 'ketchup for serving']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: To make the flax egg, combine the flax meal and 3 tablespoons water in a 1 small bowl and stir', '3:  Set aside', '4: In a large saucepan, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat', '5: Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the 8 oz mushrooms and cook until most of the juices have evaporated, 7-8 minutes', '6: Add the soy sauce and paprika and cook for 2-3 more minutes', '7:  Set aside in a large bowl', '8: Heat another tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat', '9:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the onion and cook for 3-5 minutes, until semi-translucent', '10:  Add the garlic and cook for 2 minutes', '11:  Add the salt and pepper and cook for another 2 minutes', '12: Transfer the onion to a food processor, then add the 1 ½ cups lentils, 1 cup oats, and flax egg', '13:  Pulse until chunky, about 10-15 pulses', '14: Transfer the lentil mixture to the bowl with the 8 oz mushrooms', '15:  Mix well, using your hands if needed, then shape into 5 patties', '16:  Place on a baking sheet and cover with plastic wrap, then freeze for 20 minutes', '17: While the patties are freezing, prepare the fries', '18:  In a medium bowl, toss the 4 russet potatoes, a drizzle of olive oil, the paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper until well-coated', '19: Spread the fries on a baking sheet and bake for 15 minutes', '20: Remove the patties from freezer', '21:  In a large saucepan, heat the remaining tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat', '22:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add 2-3 patties, careful not to overcrowd the pan', '23:  Cook for 5 minutes, then flip and cook for 5 minutes on other side', '24:  Repeat with the remaining patties', '25: To assemble the burgers, top each bun with a patty, then layer on dijon mustard, sliced tomato slices, and fresh arugula', '26: Serve the fries with ketchup']

ingredients: ['2 lb boneless short ribs (910 g)', '1 tablespoon kosher salt divided', '½ teaspoon black pepper divided', '2 tablespoons canola oil', '½ medium yellow onion diced', '1 tablespoon garlic minced', '1 teaspoon smoked paprika', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '2 whole star anises', '½ teaspoon dried harissa', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon onion powder', '2 dried bay leaves', '1 tablespoon chipotle pepper diced', '1 can Guinness® Stout Beer plus more for serving', '1 qt beef broth (1 L)', '3 oz tomato paste (85 g)', '2 cans black beans drained and rinsed', 'For Serving', '¼ cup sour cream (60 g)', '¼ cup red onion (35 g)', '4 tablespoons fresh cilantro chopped', '1 jalapeño sliced']
instructions: ['1: Cut the 2 lb boneless short ribs into ½-inch (2', '2: 5 cm) pieces', '3:  Season with 1 teaspoon 1 tablespoon kosher salt and ¼ teaspoon pepper', '4: Heat the 2 tablespoons canola oil in a large pot over high heat', '5:  Add the 2 lb boneless short ribs and sear for 2–3 minutes, until a golden brown crust forms', '6: Add 1 teaspoon 1 tablespoon kosher salt, the onion, 1 tablespoon ½ teaspoon garlic, paprika, cumin, 2 whole star anise, and ½ teaspoon 2 dried harissa', '7:  Reduce the heat to ½ medium-high and cook, stirring for 5 minutes, or until the spices are fragrant', '8: Add the 1 tablespoon ½ teaspoon garlic powder, onion powder, bay leaves, 1 tablespoon chipotle peppers, and Guinness® Stout', '9:  Simmer for 10 minutes, or until the liquid is ¼ cup reduced by half', '10: Add the 1 qt beef broth, ¼ cup reduce the heat to low, and cook uncovered for 45–60 minutes, or until the meat is tender and liquid is ¼ cup reduced by one third', '11: Add the 3 oz tomato paste, increase the heat to ½ medium, and simmer for 10 minutes, or until the chili has thickened', '12: Add the ½ teaspoon 2 cans black beans, remaining teaspoon of 1 tablespoon kosher salt, and remaining ¼ teaspoon pepper, and simmer for another 5 minutes until the beans are warmed through', '13: Remove the bay leaves and 2 whole star anise pods, then ladle the chili into 4 bowls', '14:  Top with ¼ cup sour cream, ¼ cup red onion, 4 tablespoons fresh cilantro, and sliced 1 jalapeño', '15:  Serve with cold glasses of Guinness® Stout']

ingredients: ['5 chicken thighs', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon garlic minced', '½ cup red onion (75 g) diced', '1 cup long grain rice (200 g)', '1 ½ cups chicken broth (360 mL)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2: In a large bowl, evenly season chicken thighs with salt, pepper, 1 teaspoon paprika, and 1 teaspoon dried parsley', '3: On high, heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a oven-proof pot and place chicken thighs, skin-side down, in the hot oil', '4:  Cook 5-6 minutes or the thighs develop brown crispy skin and flip over', '5: Cook an additional 5-6 minutes to brown the other side and remove from the pot', '6: Add the 1 tablespoon garlic and onions to the pot, and cook until the onions are transparent', '7: Pour in the 1 cup long grain rice and chicken broth to the pot and season with salt and pepper', '8:  Stir well, bringing to a boil', '9: Add the chicken thighs back into the pot, skin-side up, on top of the 1 cup long grain rice, bring back to a boil and cover with a lid', '10: Bake for 35-40 minutes, or until the 1 cup long grain rice is fully cooked', '11: NOTE: For a crispy skin, remove chicken thighs and broil']

ingredients: ['1 roll cuban bread', '4 slices sweet ham', '3 slices slow roasted pork', '5 slices swiss cheese', 'yellow mustard', 'sandwich pickle', 'butter']
instructions: ['1: Cut off the ends of the Cuban bread, then slice in half', '2: Add yellow mustard, then 4 slices sweet ham, then 3 slices slow roasted pork, then 5 slices swiss cheese, then pickles, then place the bun on top', '3: Place the sandwich on pan or griddle over low heat', '4:  Brush top with melted butter', '5: Press the sandwich with a panini press, or if you don’t have a press use a heavy pot or pie dish and push down', '6: Cook 5-10 minutes on each side or until golden brown and 5 slices swiss cheese is melted']

ingredients: ['4 large zucchinis trimmed and halved', 'olive oil drizzle', 'pepper to taste', 'salt to taste', '1 lb lean steak (455 g) thinly sliced', '½ yellow onion sliced', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '½ green bell pepper sliced', '½ red bell pepper sliced', '4 oz sliced button mushrooms (115 g)', '½ cup low-fat provolone cheese (55 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2: Cut zucchini in half, and scoop out the insides (repurpose for another dish)', '3:  Place into baking dish', '4: Season with olive oil, pepper, and salt', '5: Bake for 20 minutes', '6:  Set aside', '7: While zucchini is baking, season 1 lb lean steak with pepper and salt and sauté on medium-high heat until 1 lb lean steak is browned and cooked through', '8:  Set aside', '9: In the same pan, season onions with pepper, salt, and olive oil and sauté for 5 minutes', '10: Add peppers and 4 oz sliced button mushrooms, and cook for another 5 minutes', '11: Toss 1 lb lean steak back into the cooked veggie and sauté for 1 minute', '12: Distribute the 1 lb lean steak and veggies among zucchini halves', '13: Top with shredded ½ cup low-fat provolone cheese', '14: Bake for 5 minutes, or until ½ cup low-fat provolone cheese is melted']

ingredients: ['¾ cup pinto bean (125 g)', '2 cloves garlic', '3 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 cups vital wheat gluten (240 g)', '⅓ cup nutritional yeast (45 g)', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon dried sage', '½ teaspoon dried rosemary', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 ½ cups vegetable broth (360 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C)', '2: In food processor, combine ¾ cup pinto beans, garlic, 3 tablespoons soy sauce, and 2 tablespoons olive oil', '3:  Process until smooth', '4: In medium-sized mixing bowl, combine 2 cups vital wheat gluten, ⅓ cup nutritional yeast, garlic powder, 1 teaspoon onion powder, 1 teaspoon dried sage, ½ teaspoon dried rosemary, 1 teaspoon dried thyme, and ½ teaspoon pepper', '5:  Add in bean mixture and stir until combined', '6: Make a well in the the mixture and pour in 1 ½ cups vegetable broth', '7:  Mix until dough gets thick', '8: Once thick enough, use your hands to knead dough', '9: Form dough into log, approximately 10 inches (25 cm) long and 5 inches (13 cm) thick', '10:  Roll up log in parchment paper, then in aluminum foil', '11: Bake for 1 hour, flipping roast every 20 minutes', '12: Remove from oven and let rest for 10 minutes before slicing', '13: Serve with vegetarian gravy']

ingredients: ['2 cans whole peeled plum tomatoes with basil', '2 fresh tomatoes diced', '2 cups chicken broth (480 mL)', '2 cans v8 juice spicy version', '1 teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon fresh ground black pepper', '1 pinch red pepper flakes', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons fresh basil', '¾ cup heavy whipping cream (180 mL)', '4 oz goat cheese (115 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a large pan, combine canned 2 cans whole peeled plum 2 fresh tomatoes, fresh diced 2 cans whole peeled plum 2 fresh tomatoes, 2 cups chicken broth, V8 juice, and then the 1 teaspoon salt, pepper, and 1 pinch red pepper flakes', '2: Let the mixture cook on medium heat for at least 30 minutes', '3:  Blend with an immersion blender to emulsify', '4: Add the 2 tablespoons butter, ¾ cup heavy whipping cream, and 4 oz goat cheese', '5:  Stir to combine', '6: Garnish with fresh basil and serve']

ingredients: ['5 lb whole chicken (2 ¼ kg)', 'Brine', '1 tablespoon whole black peppercorn', '1 tablespoon fennel seeds', '1 tablespoon coriander seed', '4 qt water (4 L) divided', '4 sprigs fresh oregano', '4 sprigs fresh thyme', '3 dried bay leaves', '½ cup kosher salt (120 g)', '½ cup dark brown sugar (110 g) packed', '¼ cup soy sauce (60 mL) or tamari', 'Chicken Seasoning', '1 oz lemon peel (30 g) chopped', '1 oz garlic (30 g) chopped', '3 tablespoons canola oil or other neutral oil', '8 tablespoons unsalted butter cut into', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', "2 teaspoons za'atar", 'Rice Pilaf', '2 cups chicken stock (480 mL)', '1 tablespoon unsalted butter', '2 garlics halved lengthwise', '½ cup fideo (75 g) broken vermicelli noodles', '1 ½ cups white basmati rice (300 g)', "za'atar oil", '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL)', "1 ½ teaspoons za'atar", '¼ teaspoon kosher salt', 'For Serving', '2 tablespoons fresh flat-leaf parsley', '1 lemon cut into 8 wedges', 'Preparation', '5 lb whole chicken (2 ¼ kg)', 'Brine', '1 tablespoon whole black peppercorn', '1 tablespoon fennel seeds', '1 tablespoon coriander seed', '4 qt water (4 L) divided', '4 sprigs fresh oregano', '4 sprigs fresh thyme', '3 dried bay leaves', '½ cup kosher salt (120 g)', '½ cup dark brown sugar (110 g) packed', '¼ cup soy sauce (60 mL) or tamari', 'Chicken Seasoning', '1 oz lemon peel (30 g) chopped', '1 oz garlic (30 g) chopped', '3 tablespoons canola oil or other neutral oil', '8 tablespoons unsalted butter cut into', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', "2 teaspoons za'atar", 'Rice Pilaf', '2 cups chicken stock (480 mL)', '1 tablespoon unsalted butter', '2 garlics halved lengthwise', '½ cup fideo (75 g) broken vermicelli noodles', '1 ½ cups white basmati rice (300 g)', "za'atar oil", '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL)', "1 ½ teaspoons za'atar", '¼ teaspoon kosher salt', 'For Serving', '2 tablespoons fresh flat-leaf parsley', '1 lemon cut into 8 wedges', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Spatchcock the chicken: Place the chicken, breast-side down, on a cutting board', '2:  Using a pair of kitchen shears or a very sharp knife, find the backbone of the chicken and cut up both sides to remove', '3:  Remove any giblets remaining inside the chicken', '4:  Turn the chicken over and press down on the breastbone until the chicken lies flat', '5: Make the brine: In a small, dry pan, toast the peppercorns, fennel seeds, and coriander seeds until fragrant and starting to change color, 1-2 minutes', '6: Transfer the toasted spices to a large pot with 1 quart (1 liter) of water, the oregano, thyme, bay leaves, salt, brown sugar, and soy sauce', '7:  Bring to a boil over high heat, stirring to dissolve the sugar and salt, then let boil for 1 minute', '8:  Remove the pot from the heat', '9:  Transfer the brine to a large container', '10:  Cool the brine by adding the remaining water', '11: Place the chicken in the brine, cover the container, and chill in the refrigerator for at least 6 hours, or overnight', '12: Preheat the oven to 450°F (230°C)', '13:  Place a wire rack or roasting rack on top of a baking sheet', '14: Make the chicken seasoning: In a food processor, combine the lemon peel, garlic, and canola oil', '15:  Process into a thick paste', '16: Remove the chicken from the brine and pat dry with paper towels', '17:  Use your fingers to carefully separate the skin from the breasts and thighs', '18:  Rub the lemon garlic paste over the bird, making sure to get some under the skin', '19:  Rub the softened butter underneath and over the skin', '20:  Season on both sides with the salt and za’atar', '21:  Place the chicken on the rack set over the baking sheet, breast-side up', '22: Roast the chicken for 40-50 minutes, until the breast meat reaches 145°F (63°C)', '23: Roast until the thigh meat, near the bones, reaches 160°F (71°C)', '24:  Remove from the oven and let rest for 5-10 minutes', '25: Meanwhile, make the rice pilaf: Place the rice in a fine-mesh sieve and rinse under running water until the water runs clear', '26:  Transfer the rice to a medium bowl and cover with water by 1 inch (2', '27: 5 cm)', '28:  Soak for 10 minutes', '29: Add the chicken stock to a small pot and bring to a boil, then cover and reduce the heat to low so the stock stays warm', '30: In a large pot or pan over medium heat, combine the butter, garlic, and fideo', '31:  Cook, stirring constantly, until most of the noodles are golden brown, about 5 minutes', '32: Drain the rice once the noodles are toasted, then add to the pan and sauté until the rice is dry and coated with the butter, 2-3 minutes', '33: Add the hot chicken stock, then reduce the heat to low, cover, and cook until the noodles curl up, about 15 minutes', '34:  Fluff the pilaf with a fork, then cover again and let sit for at least 5 minutes before serving', '35: Make the za’atar oil: In a small bowl, mix together the olive oil, za’atar, and salt', '36: Carve the chicken, then arrange over the rice pilaf and spoon the za’atar oil over', '37:  Garnish with parsley and serve with lemon wedges']

ingredients: ['5 large tomatoes quartered', '2 habanero peppers halved divided', '1 ½ cups water (360 mL) divided', '2 onions chopped divided', '3 cloves garlic diced', '2 teaspoons ginger diced', '½ cup vegetable oil (120 mL)', '1 Tin tomato paste', '3 shrimp bouillon cubes', '1 teaspoon garlic powder optional', '1 tablespoon curry powder', '1 teaspoon fresh thyme', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '1 tablespoon adobo', '3 ½ cups jasmine rice (700 g) uncooked rinsed', '1 cup mixed vegetable (150 g)', 'salt to taste']
instructions: ['1: To begin preparing the base of the stew, blend 5 large 1 Tin tomatoes and 1 2 habanero with 3⁄4-1 cup (180 - 240 ml) of 1 ½ cups water', '2:  Place in a bowl and set aside', '3: Next, blend 1 of the 2 chopped 2 onions, garlic, and 2 teaspoons ginger with about 1⁄2 cup (120 ml) of 1 ½ cups water', '4:  Place mixture in a separate bowl and set aside', '5: Begin heating vegetable oil in a 5 large pot', '6:  Add the 1 remaining chopped onion to the oil when hot, and cook for 4 minutes on medium heat', '7: Add the 5 large 1 Tin tomato and onion purees to the pot, followed by the 5 large 1 Tin tomato paste, 3 shrimp bouillon, garlic powder, 1 tablespoon curry powder, 1 teaspoon fresh thyme, white/black pepper, and Adobo', '8:  Cut the other 2 habanero in half and add to stew', '9:  Stir mixture thoroughly and cook together for 10 minutes on low-medium heat', '10: Add rinsed 3 ½ cups jasmine rice and mixed veggies to the pot', '11:  Stew base should be just enough to cover the rice', '12:  Add enough 1 ½ cups water to cover the rice', '13:  Stir and add salt to taste', '14: Cover pot opening with a piece of foil and then the lid and cook on low-medium heat for 30-35 minutes', '15:  Cook until rice has absorbed all the liquid', '16: When finished, stir rice remove from stove and allow to cool']

ingredients: ['½ medium fennel bulb trimmed', '1 teaspoon coarse ground dijon mustard', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'kosher salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 grapefruit', '2 tangeloes', '1 blood orange', '1 lime', '2 tablespoons fennel fronds chopped', '¼ cup macadamia nut (25 g)']
instructions: ['1: Using a mandolin, thinly shave the fennel bulb', '2:  Transfer to a large bowl', '3: Add the Dijon mustard, 1 tablespoon olive oil, and a pinch of kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper to the bowl with the fennel', '4:  Gently toss to coat', '5: Working one at a time, cut the ends off of the 1 grapefruit, 2 tangeloes, 1 blood orange, and 1 lime', '6:  Place upright on a cutting board and cut the rind off, working your way around the fruit', '7:  Thinly slice the citrus crosswise into rounds, removing any seeds', '8: Arrange the citrus on a serving platter', '9:  Gently spoon the fennel on top', '10:  Top with the fennel fronds and ¼ cup macadamia nuts']

ingredients: ['1 honeydew melon', '¼ cup honey (85 g)']
instructions: ['1: Cut 1 1 ¼ cup honeydew in half and remove seeds', '2: Cut into slices and remove fruit from the skin', '3: Transfer melon pieces to a parchment paper-lined baking sheet and freeze until hardened', '4: Add the frozen melon and 1 ¼ cup honey to a food processor and combine until evenly mixed', '5: Transfer to a loaf pan and transfer to freezer until completely frozen']

ingredients: ['1 ½ lb chicken breast (680 g) cubed', '2 tablespoons butter', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon dried basil', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '16 oz penne pasta (455 g) cooked', '¼ cup fresh parsley (10 g)', '¼ cup shredded parmesan cheese (25 g)', 'Sauce', '2 tablespoons butter', '4 cloves garlic minced', '3 tablespoons flour', '2 cups milk (480 mL)', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon dried basil', '½ cup shredded parmesan cheese (55 g)', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper']
instructions: ['1: In a pan over medium-high heat, melt butter, then add the 1 ½ lb chicken breast', '2: Season with salt, pepper, oregano, and basil', '3:  Cook 8-10 minutes or until 1 ½ lb chicken is fully cooked', '4:  Remove from heat and set 1 ½ lb chicken aside', '5: In the same pan over medium heat, melt butter and add the 4 cloves garlic', '6:  Cook until the 4 cloves garlic begins to soften', '7: Add half of the 3 tablespoons flour to the 4 cloves garlic and butter, stirring until incorporated', '8:  Then add the rest of the 3 tablespoons flour and stir', '9: Pour in the 2 cups milk a little bit at a time, stirring well in between, until fully incorporated and sauce begins to thicken', '10: Season with salt, pepper, oregano, and basil, and stir well to incorporate', '11: Add parmesan cheese and stir until melted', '12: Pour the sauce over cooked 16 oz penne pasta, add the 1 ½ lb chicken and mix well', '13: Add ¼ cup fresh parsley and extra parmesan', '14:  Mix well']

ingredients: ['½ cup peanut butter (130 g)', '⅓ cup honey (115 g)', '1 cup rolled oats (100 g)', '½ cup almonds (60 g) chopped ', '½ cup peanuts (70 g)', '½ cup raisin (80 g)', '½ cup chocolate candy (100 g)']
instructions: ['1: Melt ½ cup ½ cup peanut butter and ⅓ cup honey together in the microwave, stirring every 15 seconds', '2: Add 1 cup rolled oats, ½ cup almonds, ½ cup ½ cup ½ cup peanuts, and raisins into the bowl and mix until well coated', '3:  Let the mixture cool to room temperature', '4: Add ½ cup chocolate candies and mix just until combined', '5: Line a baking dish with parchment paper and pour the cooled mixture into the pan', '6:  Press into the edges of the pan', '7: Cool in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours', '8:  Cut and serve']

ingredients: ['olive oil to taste', '10 oz cremini mushroom (285 g) sliced', '2 cloves garlic minced divided', '½ teaspoon smoked paprika', '2 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce divided', '¼ teaspoon liquid smoke', 'kosher salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '½ medium yellow onion sliced', '5 cups curly kale (500 g) chopped', '¼ cup low sodium vegetable broth (60 mL)', 'red pepper flake to taste', '1 cup brown rice (230 g) cooked', '2 large flour tortillas']
instructions: ['1: Heat a drizzle of olive oil in a 2 large saucepan', '2:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the mushrooms and cook for 4-5 minutes, until most of their ¼ teaspoon liquid has been released', '3:  Add a bit more olive oil, 1 clove of 2 cloves garlic, the ½ teaspoon smoked paprika, 1 tablespoon 2 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce, and the ¼ teaspoon liquid smoke and cook for 3-4 more minutes, until the mushrooms are golden 1 cup brown', '4:  Season with kosher salt and red pepper to taste', '5:  Remove from pan and set aside', '6: To the same pan, add another drizzle of olive oil and the ½ medium yellow onion', '7:  Cook for 3-4 minutes, until the ½ medium yellow onion is semi-translucent', '8:  Add the 5 cups curly kale and ¼ cup low sodium vegetable broth', '9:  Cover and steam for 5 minutes, or until the 5 cups curly kale has wilted by about 75 percent', '10: Add another drizzle of olive oil, the remaining clove of 2 cloves garlic, red red pepper flakes, remaining tablespoon of 2 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce, and red pepper and cook for 2-3 minutes, until the 2 cloves garlic is fragrant', '11: To assemble a burrito, add ½ of the 1 cup brown rice, ½ of the 5 cups curly kale mixture, and ½ of the mushrooms to the center of a tortilla', '12:  Fold in the sides and roll up, keeping the filling tucked in place', '13:  Repeat with the remaining ingredients', '14:  Cut in half and serve']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons oil', '2 chicken breasts thinly sliced', '3 cloves garlic minced', '6 strips bacon cooked chopped', '5 oz spinach (140 g)', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 teaspoons pepper', '2 cups heavy cream (470 mL)', '1 ¼ cups rotini pasta (250 g) cooked', '1 cup parmesan cheese (100 g)', '½ cup fresh parsley (15 g) chopped', 'Preparation', '2 tablespoons oil', '2 chicken breasts thinly sliced', '3 cloves garlic minced', '6 strips bacon cooked chopped', '5 oz spinach (140 g)', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 teaspoons pepper', '2 cups heavy cream (470 mL)', '1 ¼ cups rotini pasta (250 g) cooked', '1 cup parmesan cheese (100 g)', '½ cup fresh parsley (15 g) chopped', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Heat oil in a large pot over high heat', '2: Cook the chicken until no pink is showing', '3: Add the garlic, bacon, spinach, salt, and pepper, cooking until spinach is wilted', '4: Pour in the cream and bring to a boil', '5: Add the pasta, cheese, and parsley, stirring until the pasta is coated evenly']

ingredients: ['1 lb ground beef (455 g)', '½ cup seasoned bread crumbs (55 g)', '½ onion finely minced', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon kosher salt divided or to taste', '1 tablespoon pepper divided', '2 tablespoons canola oil', '2 cups beef broth (480 mL)', '2 cups milk (480 mL)', '1 tablespoon worcestershire sauce', '4 cups egg noodle (400 g)', '1 cup shredded parmesan cheese (110 g)', '½ cup fresh parsley (15 g) chopped']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, combine the 1 lb ground 1 lb ground 2 cups beef, breadcrumbs, ½ onion, egg, ½ tablespoon salt, and ½ tablespoon pepper, mixing until evenly combined', '2: Heat the 2 tablespoons canola oil in a pot over medium-high heat', '3:  Take about a golf-ball size of the meatball mixture and roll it into balls', '4:  Place the meatballs into the pot, cooking for one minute', '5:  Flip the meatballs', '6: Add the 1 lb ground 2 cups beef broth, 2 cups milk, remaining ½ tablespoon salt, remaining ½ tablespoon pepper, and Worcestershire sauce and give it a stir', '7: Bring the liquid to a boil, then add the egg noodles', '8:  Stir constantly until the pasta is cooked and the liquid has reduced to a sauce that coats the noodles, about seven to eight minutes', '9: Add the 1 cup shredded parmesan and the ½ cup fresh parsley, stirring until the cheese is melted']

ingredients: ['Vigorón', '2 lb yucca (905 g) fresh or frozen', '6 cups cold water (1.4 L)', '2 teaspoons salt plus more to taste', '1 lime juiced', '3 cups green cabbage (300 g) finely shredded', '4 medium plum tomatoes diced', '1 medium white onion thinly sliced', '3 tablespoons distilled white vinegar', 'Tajadas', 'canola oil for frying', '4 unripe green plantains thinly sliced lengthwise', 'salt to taste', 'Assembly', '6 cabbages leaves', '4 oz chicharrónes (110 g) pork cracklings']
instructions: ['1: Make the vigorón: To prepare the 2 lb yucca, use a sharp knife to cut off the root ends, cut in half crosswise, then carefully peel off the tough brown skin and inner pink layer', '2: Cut the peeled piece into quarters lengthwise', '3:  You can also buy frozen 2 lb yucca that is already peeled', '4: Add the 6 cups cold water to a large pot', '5:  Place the 2 lb yucca in the pot and add 1 teaspoon of salt and the 1 lime juice', '6:  Bring to a boil over high heat', '7:  Once boiling, reduce the heat to medium and maintain a gentle boil for 25 minutes, or until the 2 lb yucca is tender but not falling apart', '8: Remove the 2 lb yucca from the pot and set aside until cool enough to touch', '9:  Remove the woody vein from the middle of the 2 lb yucca pieces and set aside for serving', '10: Bring another large pot of water to boil', '11:  Blanch the 3 cups green 6 cabbage for 50-60 seconds, then remove from the pot and pat dry', '12:  Do not overcook', '13: In a large bowl, combine the tomatoes, onion, remaining teaspoon of salt, and 3 tablespoons distilled vinegar', '14:  Add the blanched 3 cups green 6 cabbage and toss to combine', '15:  Set aside for serving', '16: Make the tajadas: Heat the canola oil in a large skillet until it reaches 325˚F (170˚C)', '17: In small batches, carefully fry the sliced 4 unripe green plantains for 45 seconds, flipping halfway, until they are lightly golden and a bright yellow in color', '18:  Drain over a wire rack or paper towels and season with salt', '19: To assemble, place cooked 2 lb yucca on a 3 cups green 6 cabbage leaf, followed by the tomato, onion, and 3 cups green 6 cabbage salad', '20:  Top with 4 oz chicharrónes (110 g) pork rinds and serve the tajadas alongside']

ingredients: ['2 large ripe avocados', '¼ cup honey (85 g)', '¼ cup full-fat coconut milk (60 mL)', '1 teaspoon peppermint extract', '1 pinch sea salt', 'dark chocolate chopped to taste']
instructions: ['1: Add the 2 large ripe avocados to a blender or food processor, along with ¼ cup honey, ¼ cup full-fat coconut milk, 1 teaspoon peppermint extract and 1 pinch sea salt', '2: Blend until smooth, scraping down sides as necessary', '3: Pour mixture into a freezer-safe dish and fold in the dark chocolate chunks', '4: Freeze for at least 2-3 hours', '5:  If freezing overnight, allow to defrost for 10-15 minutes for easier scooping']

ingredients: ['Homemade Buttermilk Ranch Dressing', '¾ cup sour cream (170 g)', '3 tablespoons mayonnaise', '⅓ cup buttermilk (80 mL)', '1 tablespoon lemon juce', '2 tablespoons fresh dill minced loosely packed', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '¾ teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', 'Fried Tomatoes', '1 ½ lb heirloom tomato (680 g)', '1 ¼ teaspoons kosher salt plus more to taste', '1 cup all purpose flour (125 g) divided', '1 cup cornmeal (150 g) medium-grind', '¼ teaspoon cayenne to taste', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '2 large eggs', '1 cup buttermilk (240 mL)', 'canola oil for frying']
instructions: ['1: Make the buttermilk ranch: In a medium bowl, whisk together the sour cream, 3 tablespoons mayonnaise, buttermilk, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 2 tablespoons fresh dill, ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, 1 teaspoon onion powder, garlic powder, and 1 teaspoon kosher 1 ¼ 1 ¼ teaspoons kosher salt', '2:  Refrigerate until ready to serve', '3: Make the fried 1 ½ lb heirloom tomatoes: Slice the 1 ½ lb heirloom tomatoes into ½-inch (1 ¼ cm) -thick slices', '4:  Lightly season the 1 ½ lb heirloom tomato slices on both sides with 1 teaspoon kosher 1 ¼ 1 ¼ teaspoons kosher salt', '5: Place ½ cup (60 G) of flour in a medium shallow bowl', '6: In a separate bowl, combine the cornmeal, remaining ½ cup (60 G) flour, the ¼ teaspoon cayenne, garlic powder', '7:  and the 1¼ 1 ¼ teaspoons of 1 teaspoon kosher 1 ¼ 1 ¼ teaspoons kosher salt and mix with a fork to combine', '8: In another medium, whisk the eggs and buttermilk together', '9: Dredge each 1 ½ lb heirloom tomato slice in the plain flour, then in the egg mixture, then in the seasoned cornmeal mixture', '10: Pour ½ inch (1 ¼ cm) of canola oil into a 2 large skillet', '11:  Heat over medium-high heat until the temperature reaches 400ºF (200ºC)', '12: Working in batches, fry the 1 ½ lb heirloom tomatoes for 1 minute on each side, until golden brown', '13:  Do not overcook the 1 ½ lb heirloom tomatoes, or they will become mushy inside', '14:  Transfer the fried 1 ½ lb heirloom tomatoes to a paper towel-lined baking sheet and season with 1 teaspoon kosher 1 ¼ 1 ¼ teaspoons kosher salt', '15: Serve the fried 1 ½ lb heirloom tomatoes with the buttermilk ranch']

ingredients: ['2 cinnamon sticks', '1 teaspoon cardamom pods', '½ teaspoon whole clove', '½ teaspoon fennel seeds', '1 inch piece fresh ginger', '2 cups whole milk (480 mL)', '1 tablespoon honey', '2 bags decaf black tea', 'cinnamon powder']
instructions: ['1: Add 2 Cinnamon sticks, 1 tsp Cardamom Pods, ½ tsp whole Cloves, ½ Fennel Seeds, 1 1 inch sliced fresh Ginger in a cloth bag', '2:  Tie the cloth bag properly', '3: Add 2 2 cups of whole milk and 1-2 tbsp 1 tablespoon honey to a saucepanWhisk it well for 10 secSteep 2 2 bags of decaf black tea 2 bags and cloth bag mixture in the warm milk for 10 minutesTake out the tea 2 bags and froth the milk by whisking for 2-3 minutesPour into a mug and add a pinch of Cinnamon powderServe immediately']

ingredients: ['Lemon Cake', '3 cups all-purpose flour (375 g)', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 cup unsalted butter (230 g) 2 sticks room temperature', '2 cups granulated sugar (400 g)', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '3 large eggs room temperature', '2 tablespoons lemon zest', '¼ cup lemon juice (60 mL)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 cup whole milk (240 mL)', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', 'Lemon Glaze', '½ cup granulated sugar (100 g)', '¼ cup lemon juice (60 mL)', 'Lemon Icing', '2 cups powdered sugar (240 g) sifted', '3 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 lemon zested']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: Make the cake: In a medium bowl, whisk together the 3 cups all-purpose flour and 2 teaspoons baking powder', '3: In a 3 large bowl, cream the 1 cup unsalted butter, sugar, and 1 teaspoon kosher salt with an electric hand mixer until fluffy, about 3 minutes', '4:  Add the eggs, one at a time, beating until fully incorporated before adding the next', '5:  Add the lemon zest, lemon juice, and 1 teaspoon vanilla and beat to combine', '6: Add half the 3 cups all-purpose flour and beat to combine, then beat in the 1 cup whole milk, then add the rest of the 3 cups all-purpose flour and beat just until incorporated', '7:  Scrape down the sides of the bowl with a rubber spatula and make sure any 3 cups all-purpose floury spots are incorporated', '8: Grease a 10-inch (25-cm) bundt pan with nonstick spray', '9:  Spoon the batter into the pan and smooth the top', '10:  Gently tap the pan against the counter to release any air bubbles', '11: Bake the cake for 50 minutes, until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean', '12: While the cake is 2 teaspoons baking, make the lemon glaze: In a small microwave-safe bowl, combine the sugar and lemon juice', '13:  Microwave for 1 minute, stirring halfway through, until the sugar is completely dissolved', '14:  Set aside', '15: Make the lemon icing: Sift the 2 cups powdered sugar into a medium bowl', '16:  Add the lemon juice and whisk until smooth', '17: After the cake is done 2 teaspoons baking, let cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then invert onto a wire rack set over a 2 teaspoons baking sheet and remove the bundt pan', '18:  Use a knife to loosen the cake around the edges, if needed', '19: Use a skewer or fork to poke holes all over the top and sides of the cake', '20:  Brush the cake with the lemon glaze', '21:  If the glaze drips off, let the cake cool for a few more minutes, then continue brushing on the glaze', '22:  Let cool completely, at least 1 hour', '23: Pour the icing over the top of the cake, letting it drip down the sides', '24:  Grate lemon zest over the icing', '25:  Let the glaze dry completely, about 30 minutes', '26: Transfer the cake to a serving platter, slice, and serve']

ingredients: ['Orange Julius', '½ cup sugar (100 g) divided', '1 orange zest', '1 orange wedge', '1 ½ cups ice (210 g)', '2 cups orange juice (480 mL)', '½ cup vodka (120 mL)', '1 cup whole milk (240 mL)', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '4 orange wheels']
instructions: ['1: On a small plate, mix together ¼ cup (50 G) sugar and the orange zest with a fork until well distributed', '2: Rub the rims of 4 martini glasses with the orange wedge and dip into the sugar mixture to coat', '3:  Set aside', '4: Add the 1 ½ cups ice, orange juice, vodka, remaining ¼ cup (50 G) sugar, the milk, and ½ teaspoon vanilla to a blender and blend until smooth', '5: Divide the orange julius between the martini glasses, garnish each with an orange wheel, and serve']

ingredients: ['1 head cauliflower', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '¾ cup BBQ sauce (215 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 450˚F (230˚C)', '2: Cut the 1 head of cauliflower in half', '3:  Pluck bite-sized florets from each half', '4:  Trim bottoms of florets as necessary', '5: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '6:  Spread cauliflower florets on the baking sheet', '7:  Drizzle with 1 tablespoon olive oil', '8:  Season with salt and pepper', '9: Bake for 20 minutes', '10: Remove florets from oven and toss with BBQ ¾ cup BBQ sauce', '11: Return florets to the oven and bake for an additional 10 minutes until browned to your liking', '12: Brush more BBQ ¾ cup BBQ sauce on the cooked cauliflower for extra flavor']

ingredients: ['Burgers', '1 package extra firm tofu pressed', '8 oz shiitake mushroom (225 g) roughly chopped', '1 cup raw walnut (100 g)', '3 cloves garlic', '2 tablespoons vegan butter divided', '2 tablespoons olive oil divided', '2 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce plus 2 teaspoons', '2 teaspoons liquid smoke', '½ yellow onion diced', '2 ½ teaspoons kosher salt divided plus more to taste', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '2 teaspoons nutritional yeast', '1 cup brown rice (200 g) cooked', '3 tablespoons red beet shredded packed', '1 tablespoon cornstarch', '1 tablespoon water', '4 teaspoons vegan worcestershire sauce', '2 tablespoons vegetable shortening', '¼ cup vital wheat gluten (30 g) plus 2 tablespoons', '8 teaspoons canola oil', 'bun for serving', 'topping of your choice for serving', 'Vegan Aioli', '3 tablespoons aquafaba liquid from canned chickpeas', '3 cloves garlic', '1 teaspoon dijon mustard', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '½ teaspoon organic sugar', '1 cup neutral oil (240 mL) such as avocado or canola', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper']
instructions: ['1: Make the burgers: Using your hands, break the pressed 1 package extra firm tofu into small crumbles', '2:  Spread in an even layer on a parchment-lined baking sheet and freeze completely, 3–6 hours', '3:  Remove the 1 package extra firm tofu from the freezer and let thaw at room temperature while you prepare the rest of the burger', '4: Add the 8 oz shiitake mushrooms, 1 cup raw walnuts, and garlic to a food processor and pulse 10–15 times, until finely minced and nearly ground into a paste', '5: In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of 2 tablespoons 4 teaspoons vegan butter and 1 tablespoon of 2 tablespoons olive 2 tablespoons olive 8 teaspoons canola 1 cup neutral oil over medium-high heat until just shimmering', '6:  Add the 1 cup raw walnut mixture and cook for 5–8 minutes, until 1 cup browned and crispy, stirring occasionally', '7:  Add the 2 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce and liquid smoke and mix well', '8:  Cook for another 2–3 minutes, until the sauces just begin to 1 cup brown and become fragrant', '9:  Transfer to a bowl and set aside', '10:  Wipe out the pan', '11: Add the remaining tablespoon of 2 tablespoons 4 teaspoons vegan butter and tablespoon of 2 tablespoons olive 2 tablespoons olive 8 teaspoons canola 1 cup neutral oil to the pan and reduce the heat to medium', '12:  When the 2 tablespoons olive 8 teaspoons canola 1 cup neutral oil is shimmering, add the ½ yellow onion and season with ½ teaspoon of salt', '13:  Cook for 2–3 minutes, until the ½ yellow onion is translucent and beginning to soften', '14:  Add the 2 tablespoons tomato paste and nutritional yeast and mix well', '15:  Cook for another 3–5 minutes, until the 2 tablespoons tomato paste begins to darken', '16: Transfer the ½ yellow onion mixture to the food processor, along with the 1 cup brown rice and 3 tablespoons red beets', '17:  Process for 20–30 seconds, scraping down the sides as necessary, until mostly broken down and the 3 tablespoons red beet color is evenly distributed throughout the mixture', '18: In a small bowl, mix together the cornstarch and water with a fork', '19: In a large bowl, combine the 1 cup raw walnut-shiitake mixture, 3 tablespoons red beet-brown rice mixture, cornstarch slurry, 2 tablespoons 4 teaspoons vegan Worcestershire, 2 tablespoons vegetable shortening, remaining 2 teaspoons of salt, ¼ cup vital wheat gluten, and thawed 1 package extra firm tofu', '20:  Using a gloved hand, mix very well to combine, being sure that all of the ingredients are evenly distributed throughout', '21: Cut 4 pieces of parchment paper in half lengthwise', '22: Set up a steamer pot and bring the water to a boil while you shape the burgers', '23: Portion the burger mixture using a 4-ounce scoop', '24:  Roll each
