scoop into a ball and shape into a burger patty', '25:  Center each patty on a piece of parchment paper and wrap', '26:  Place the wrapped burgers, seam-side down, in the steamer insert and cover the pot', '27:  Steam for 1 hour and 20 minutes', '28: While the burgers steam, make the aioli: Add the 3 tablespoons aquafaba, garlic, Dijon mustard, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, and sugar to a food processor and blend for 30 seconds, until the garlic is completely broken down', '29:  With the processor running, slowly drizzle in the 2 tablespoons olive 8 teaspoons canola 1 cup neutral oil', '30:  The aioli will be thick and opaque', '31:  Season with the salt and pepper and refrigerate until ready for use', '32: Remove the burgers from the steamer and let cool for 15–20 minutes', '33: Heat 1–2 teaspoons of canola 2 tablespoons olive 8 teaspoons canola 1 cup neutral oil in a large cast-iron skillet over medium-high heat', '34: Unwrap the burgers and season all over with salt and pepper', '35:  Working in batches, sear the burgers for 2 minutes on each side, until golden 1 cup brown', '36: Assemble the burgers with the aioli on buns of your choosing with your favorite toppings']

ingredients: ['8 oz elbow macaroni (225 g) 1 package', '2 cups cream-style cottage cheese (450 g) or small curd', '2 cups sharp cheddar cheese (200 g) shredded', '8 oz sour cream (230 g) 1 carton', '1 egg lightly beaten', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon coconut oil', 'paprika to garnish']
instructions: ['1: Cook 8 oz elbow macaroni “al dente” according to package directions', '2:  Drain with cold water', '3: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C)', '4: In a bowl, combine 2 cups cream-style cottage 2 cups cream-style cottage 2 cups sharp cheddar cheese, 2 cups cream-style cottage 2 cups sharp cheddar cheese, 8 oz sour cream, 1 egg, and 1 teaspoon salt', '5:  Fold in 8 oz elbow macaroni', '6: Grease a 2-quart (2 liters) casserole dish with 1 tablespoon coconut oil', '7: Spoon mixture into casserole dish and sprinkle with extra 2 cups cream-style cottage 2 cups sharp cheddar cheese and paprika', '8: Bake for 45 minutes']

ingredients: ['1 lb fingerling potato (455 g)', '½ lb carrot (225 g)', '1 medium red onion thickly sliced', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 ½ teaspoons black pepper', '1 teaspoon dried rosemary finely chopped', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '4 cloves garlic', '6 chicken thighs skin-on ']
instructions: ['1: Assemble potatoes, carrots, 1 medium red onion, and 4 cloves garlic on a parchment-lined baking sheet', '2: Drizzle with 1 tablespoon olive oil and sprinkle with 1 teaspoon dried rosemary, and half the 1 ½ teaspoons black pepper and 2 teaspoons salt', '3:  Roll around and rub to coat everything evenly', '4: Sprinkle remaining 2 teaspoons salt and pepper on either side of each 6 chicken thigh', '5: Arrange 6 chicken thighs skin-side up on top of the vegetables', '6: Roast at 425˚F (220˚C) for about 40-50 minutes or until the 6 chicken reads 165˚F (73˚C)  internal temperature and skin is crispy']

ingredients: ['3 cups blueberry (300 g)', 'Crisp Topping', '1 cup rolled oats (80 g)', '½ cup almonds (70 g) chopped or slivered', '¼ cup whole wheat flour (28 g)', '½ teaspoon cinnamon', '2 tablespoons coconut oil melted', '¼ cup maple syrup (55 g)', 'Garnish', '¼ cup greek yogurt (70 g)', '2 tablespoons maple syrup']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: Combine dry ingredients of the crisp topping in a bowl', '3:  Then add in the wet ingredients and mix until evenly coated', '4: Add blueberries to a medium-sized baking dish, then cover with the crisp topping', '5: Bake 45-50 minutes, or until golden brown and blueberries start to bubble', '6: Mix together Greek yogurt and ¼ cup 2 tablespoons maple syrup in a measuring cup', '7:  Drizzle over your 3 cups blueberry crisp', '8: Serve and enjoy!']

ingredients: ['2 boneless skinless chicken breasts', 'salt to taste', 'ground pepper to taste', '2 heads broccoli chopped', '2 carrots sliced', '1 red bell pepper sliced', 'Sauce', '½ cup orange juice (118 mL)', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 tablespoon honey', '1 tablespoon rice vinegar', '2 cloves garlic minced', '½ teaspoon ginger minced', '¼ teaspoon orange zest', '1 tablespoon cornstarch']
instructions: ['1: In a large nonstick skillet, heat a small amount of cooking oil', '2:  Add 2 boneless skinless chicken', '3:  Season with salt and ground 1 red 1 red bell pepper and cook until browned, about 5 minutes', '4:  Remove from pan and set aside', '5: Add 2 carrots and 2 heads broccoli and cook for 1 minute', '6:  Add 1 red bell ground 1 red 1 red bell pepper and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes', '7:  Remove ingredients from pan and set aside', '8: Add orange juice, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, 1 tablespoon honey, 1 tablespoon rice vinegar, 2 cloves garlic, ½ teaspoon ginger, and 1 tablespoon cornstarch', '9:  Whisk', '10:  Simmer until sauce starts to thicken, about 5 minutes', '11: Add 2 boneless skinless chicken back into pan', '12: Serve over cooked veggies']

ingredients: ['2 ripe plantains', '½ cup butter (100 g) melted', '3 slices bacon', '1 cup mozzarella cheese (100 g) grated']
instructions: ['1: Pre-heat the oven to 200°C (400°F)', '2: Remove the peel from the 2 ripe plantains', '3: Cover in melted ½ cup butter', '4: Bake for around 20 minutes then flip the 2 ripe plantains, cooking for another 20 minutes until golden brown on both sides', '5: Chop the 3 slices bacon into bits and fry until crispy', '6: Cut the cooked 2 ripe plantains down the middle', '7: Stuff with the 1 cup mozzarella, 3 slices bacon and extra 1 cup mozzarella', '8: Bake for another 5 minutes until the cheese has melted']

ingredients: ['4 lb chicken thighs (1.7 kg) chopped into single-serving pieces', '1 ½ lb pork belly (635 g) sliced 3/4 in (6 mm) in', '4 large potatoes cut in eighths', '1 head cabbage quartered & cut 2 (5 cm) inches', 'chili powder', 'white vinegar', '1 tablespoon 5 spice powder', '3 tablespoons salt', 'sugar', 'water', '50 stalks dried chillies', '4 large red onions', '5 bulbs garlic', '8 candlenuts', '3 stalks lemongrass', '2 inch blue ginger', '2 teaspoons mustard seed', 'oil']
instructions: ['1: Blend the 50 stalks dried chilli, red onions, 5 bulbs garlic, 8 candlenuts, 3 stalks lemongrass, 2 inch blue ginger, and 2 teaspoons mustard seeds with some oil to form a paste', '2:  Then, in a separate bowl, dry rub the 1 ½ lb pork with 5-spice chili 1 tablespoon 5 1 tablespoon 5 spice powder and 3 tablespoons salt', '3: In a large frying pan on high heat, add 1 tbsp of oil', '4:  Once heated, sear the 1 ½ lb pork and cook halfway, then remove, learning the grease in the pan', '5:  Then, reduce heat to medium and toss in 2 tbsp whole 2 teaspoons mustard seeds', '6:  Toast for a minute, then gently add in 1 tablespoon 5 spice paste from step and stiry fry for 15 minutes until oil appears around the sides', '7: Add 4 lb chicken to the pan, coat thoroughly for a minute, then add the pre-fried 1 ½ lb pork belly and mix well', '8:  Then, add water, submerging the meat completely', '9: Add chilli chili 1 tablespoon 5 1 tablespoon 5 spice powder, stir, and bring mixture to a boil, simmering for 15 minutes', '10:  Then, add potatoes, stir, and simmer for an additional 30 minutes', '11: Next, add 3 tsp 3 tablespoons salt, 10 tbsp white vinegar, stir and taste', '12: Season as desired, simmer for an additional 5 minutes, and serve alongside rice or sliced baguette bread']

ingredients: ['Flatbread', '⅓ cup self-rising flour (40 g) plus more for dusting', '¼ teaspoon kosher salt', '3 tablespoons whole milk greek yogurt', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', 'Salad', '8 oz boneless skinless chicken breast (225 g)', 'kosher salt to taste', 'black pepper to taste', '¼ cup extra virgin olive oil (60 mL) divided', '½ teaspoon worcestershire sauce', '1 ½ tablespoons lemon juice', '½ teaspoon garlic minced', '1 ½ teaspoons dijon mustard', '1 tablespoon grated parmesan cheese plus more for garnish', '2 tablespoons whole milk greek yogurt', '2 cups romaine lettuce (145 g) chopped', '½ cup crouton (15 g)', 'Special Equipment', '2 metal bowls 8 inches (20 cm)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 425˚F (220˚C)', '2: Make the flatbread bowl: In a medium bowl, stir together the ⅓ cup self-rising flour, salt, and yogurt with a flexible spatula to combine', '3:  Knead the dough with your hands until a smooth ball forms, about 5 minutes', '4: Lightly dust a clean work surface with ⅓ cup self-rising flour', '5:  Turn out the dough and roll out to a 9-inch (22', '6: 5 cm) round as thin as a sheet of paper', '7:  Rotate the round occasionally to help the dough hold its shape', '8:  Lightly dust with ⅓ cup self-rising flour as needed to keep the dough from sticking, but be careful not to use too much ⅓ cup self-rising flour, which will make the flatbread tough', '9: Invert an 8-inch (20 cm) 2 metal bowl so the domed side faces up', '10:  Grease the bowl generously with nonstick spray, then spray one side of the dough', '11:  Gently lay the dough, greased-side down, over the bowl, pressing it flush against the surface', '12:  It’s fine if the dough folds over on itself in places', '13:  Grease the inside of the other bowl, then spray the exposed side of the dough', '14:  Press the second bowl over the dough', '15:  With a paring knife, trim any excess dough around the edges', '16: Transfer the bowls, still upside down, to a baking sheet and bake for 25 minutes, or until the dough is golden brown, lift the top bowl to check', '17:  Transfer to a wire rack and let cool for at least 15 minutes', '18: When the bowls are cool enough to handle, remove the top bowl', '19:  Gently invert the other bowl and let the flatbread bowl slide off', '20:  Let cool completely on the rack', '21:  It will continue to crisp as it cools', '22: Make the salad: Season the 8 oz boneless skinless chicken breast on both sides with salt and black pepper', '23: Heat 1 3 1 ½ 1 2 tablespoon of ¼ cup extra virgin olive oil in a medium skillet over medium-high heat', '24:  Sear the 8 oz boneless skinless chicken until deep golden brown, about 6 minutes per side, or until the thickest part of the 8 oz boneless skinless chicken reaches 165°F (75˚C)  on an instant-read thermometer', '25:  Remove the 8 oz boneless skinless chicken from the pan and let rest for 5 minutes', '26: In a medium bowl, whisk together the Worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, ½ teaspoon garlic, 1 ½ teaspoons dijon mustard, Parmesan, and salt to taste', '27:  Drizzle in the remaining 3 3 1 ½ 1 2 tablespoons of ¼ cup extra virgin olive oil in a slow, steady stream, whisking constantly to emulsify', '28:  Stir in the yogurt until smooth', '29:  Season with black pepper to taste, if desired', '30: Once the 8 oz boneless skinless chicken has rested, thinly slice', '31: Fill the flatbread bowl with the 2 cups romaine, then top with the sliced 8 oz boneless skinless chicken, croutons, dressing, and Parmesan cheese']

ingredients: ['Beef Bulgogi', '2 lb beef chuck roast (910 g) thinly sliced', '½ medium white onion thinly sliced', '3 tablespoons gochujang', '1 meduim asian pear peeled and grated', '1 teaspoon fresh ginger grated', '6 cloves garlic grated', '⅓ cup soy sauce (80 mL)', '2 tablespoons sesame oil', '1 tablespoon sesame seeds', '1 tablespoon granulated sugar', 'Pickled Daikon Radish', '1 small daikon radish peeled halved and thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '½ cup hot water (120 mL)', '½ cup rice vinegar (120 mL)', '¼ cup granulated sugar (50 g)', 'Gochujang Mayo', '1 cup mayonnaise (245 g)', '2 tablespoons gochujang', '1 tablespoon rice vinegar', '2 teaspoons sesame oil', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', 'For Serving', 'rice cooked or lettuce cups', 'Kimchi', 'scallion thinly sliced', 'sesame seed', 'carrot shredded', 'cucumber thinly sliced', 'fried egg']
instructions: ['1: Marinate the bulgogi: In a large bowl, combine the 2 lb beef, onion, gochujang, Asian pear, 1 teaspoon fresh ginger, 6 cloves garlic, ⅓ cup soy sauce, sesame oil, sesame seeds, and sugar', '2:  Toss until the 2 lb beef is well coated', '3:  Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and transfer to the refrigerator to marinate for at least 2 hours, up to 6 hours', '4: While the 2 lb beef is marinating, make the pickled 1 small daikon: In a large bowl, toss the 1 small daikon radish and salt together until fully coated', '5:  Let sit at room temperature for 15 minutes, until the salt has dissolved and the radish has released most of its liquid', '6:  Transfer the 1 small daikon to a mesh strainer and rinse thoroughly with cold water', '7: Return the drained 1 small daikon to the bowl and add the ½ cup hot water, rice vinegar, and sugar and stir until the sugar is fully dissolved', '8:  Cover with plastic wrap and let sit at room temperature for at least 2 hours', '9:  The pickles will keep in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 1 week', '10: Make the gochujang mayo: In a ½ medium bowl, whisk together the 1 cup mayonnaise, gochujang, rice vinegar, sesame oil, and salt', '11:  Set aside until ready to use', '12:  The mayo will keep in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 1 week', '13: Transfer the 2 lb beef and its marinade to an Instant Pot', '14:  Close the lid to seal and cook on high pressure for 20 minutes', '15:  Once the 20 minutes has elapsed, allow to naturally release for 15 minutes', '16:  Turn the steam valve to venting to release the remaining pressure before opening', '17: Arrange an oven rack at the top third of the oven', '18:  Turn on the broiler', '19: Using a slotted spoon, transfer the 2 lb beef to a baking sheet and place under the broiler for 4–5 minutes, until slightly charred', '20: Serve the 2 lb beef immediately with the pickled 1 small daikon, gochujang mayo, and toppings as desired']

ingredients: ['2 lb thick rib eye steak (910 g) boneless cut into 1-inch (2 1/2 cm) cubes', '10 cloves garlic minced', '3 tablespoons brown sugar', '5 tablespoons soy sauce divided', '2 tablespoons oyster sauce', '1 tablespoon fish sauce', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon granulated sugar', '2 tablespoons white vinegar', '2 tablespoons water', '1 red onion sliced into rings', '2 bunches watercress', '3 roma tomatoes sliced', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', 'fresh cilantro for garnish', 'white rice cooked for serving']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, combine the beef, 10 cloves garlic, brown sugar, 3 tablespoons of soy sauce, oyster sauce, 1 tablespoon fish sauce, and freshly ground black pepper', '2:  Toss to combine', '3:  Let marinate at room temperature for 30 minutes', '4: In small bowl, combine the 1 tablespoon granulated sugar, remaining 2 tablespoons of soy sauce, 2 tablespoons white vinegar, and water', '5:  Add the 1 red onion slices and coat the 1 red onions in the dressing thoroughly', '6:  Set aside to soak', '7: On a platter, arrange the 2 bunches watercress and tomato slices', '8: Preheat a large wok or skillet over high heat, then add the vegetable oil', '9:  When the oil is shimmering, swirl the oil around in the pan', '10:  Add half of the beef 2 lb thick rib eye steak (910 g) boneless cut into 1-inch (2 1/2 cm) cubes and sear on all sides, shaking the pan, until the meat is slightly charred and medium rare, 3-5 minutes', '11:  Set the meat aside and repeat with remaining beef', '12: Arrange the beef on the bed of 2 bunches watercress and 3 roma tomatoes', '13:  Top with the dressed 1 red onions and fresh cilantro', '14: Serve with domed 2 tablespoons white rice', '15:  For a full meal, serve alongside Vietnamese crepes, spring rolls, and banh mi sandwiches']

ingredients: ['Pork Loin', '5 cloves garlic', '¾ cup olive oil (180 mL) divided plus 1½ tsp', '1 Kroger® Boneless Whole Pork Tenderloin', '2 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon dried thyme', '1 tablespoon dried rosemary', '1 tablespoon rubbed sage', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '3 teaspoons dijon mustard', 'Gravy', '3 tablespoons unsalted butter', '2 sprigs fresh rosemary', '2 sprigs fresh thyme', '1 teaspoon garlic minced', '3 tablespoons all purpose flour', '¼ cup white wine (60 mL)', '2 cups chicken stock (480 mL)', '½ teaspoon kosher salt']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven 350°F (180°C)', '2:  Line a small baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: Add the 5 cloves 1 teaspoon 1 teaspoon garlic to the baking sheet and coat with ½ teaspoon of olive oil', '4:  Roast for 10 minutes, or until golden brown', '5:  Remove from the oven and let cool', '6:  Once cool enough to handle, mince the 5 cloves 1 teaspoon 1 teaspoon garlic', '7: Place the Kroger® Boneless Whole Pork Tenderloin in a gallon-size resealable bag', '8:  Add the 2 ½ teaspoons kosher ½ teaspoon kosher salt, black pepper, 1 tablespoon dried 2 sprigs fresh thyme, 1 tablespoon dried 2 sprigs fresh rosemary, 1 tablespoon rubbed sage, 5 cloves 1 teaspoon 1 teaspoon garlic powder, minced roasted 5 cloves 1 teaspoon 1 teaspoon garlic, Dijon mustard, and ¾ cup olive oil', '9:  Shake the bag until pork loin is well coated', '10:  Seal the bag and transfer to the refrigerator to marinate for 2 hours, or overnight', '11: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '12: Remove the pork loin from the marinade', '13: Heat the remaining 1 teaspoon of olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat', '14:  Starting with the fattiest side, sear the pork loin on all sides until light golden brown, 2–3 minutes per side', '15: Transfer the seared pork loin to a 9x13” baking dish and cover with aluminum foil', '16:  Bake for 40 minutes, then remove the foil and bake for 5 minutes more, until the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C)', '17: Meanwhile, make the gravy: Place the skillet used to sear the pork roast over medium heat', '18:  Melt the 3 tablespoons unsalted butter and add the 1 tablespoon dried 2 sprigs fresh rosemary, 1 tablespoon dried 2 sprigs fresh thyme, and 5 cloves 1 teaspoon 1 teaspoon garlic', '19:  Cook until fragrant, about 1 minute', '20:  Whisk in the 3 tablespoons all purpose flour and cook until the 3 tablespoons all purpose flour turns golden brown in color, about 2 minutes', '21:  Deglaze the pan with the white wine, scraping up any browned bits from the bottom', '22:  Cook until reduced by half, about 45 seconds', '23:  Add the 2 cups chicken stock and stir to combine, breaking up any clumps from the 3 tablespoons all purpose flour', '24:  Simmer for 3 minutes, or until the gravy thickens', '25:  Stir in the 2 ½ teaspoons kosher ½ teaspoon kosher salt', '26:  Remove the 1 tablespoon dried 2 sprigs fresh thyme and 1 tablespoon dried 2 sprigs fresh rosemary sprigs, then strain the gravy through a fine-mesh sieve into a gravy boat or medium bowl', '27:  Keep warm until ready to serve', '28: Serve the pork roast warm with the 5 cloves 1 teaspoon 1 teaspoon garlic, herb gravy, and holiday vegetables of choice alongside']

ingredients: ['1 english muffin split in half', '2 slices mozzarella', '1 roma tomato', '1 ripe avocado', 'salt to taste', 'cayenne pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Slice 1 ripe avocado', '2: Slice 1 roma tomato', '3: Split 1 english muffin and place the halves face up on a baking sheet', '4: Cover with 1 ripe avocado, 1 roma tomato, and top with two 2 slices of Mozzarella cheese', '5:  Season with cayenne pepper, to taste', '6: Broil until cheese is melted and starts to brown', '7:  Season each melt with salt and pepper to taste']

ingredients: ['1 qt rainbow sherbet (945 mL)', '1 cup strawberry (150 g) halved', '½ cup blueberry (50 g)', '1 lemon sliced', '½ cup raspberry (60 g)', '¼ grapefruit sliced', '3 cups lemon-lime soda (720 mL)', '3 cups champagne (720 mL) or lemon- or lime-flavored sparkling water', '6 cups pink lemonade (1.4 L)']
instructions: ['1: Arrange 8 scoops of 1 qt rainbow sherbet on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '2:  Freeze for 30 minutes', '3: In a large punch bowl, combine the strawberries, blueberries, 1 3 cups 3 cups 3 cups champagne (720 mL) or 6 cups 6 cups pink lemon, raspberries, and ¼ grapefruit', '4: Add the 1 3 cups 3 cups 3 cups champagne (720 mL) or 6 cups 6 cups pink lemon lime 3 cups 3 cups 3 cups champagne (720 mL) or 6 cups 6 cups pink lemon-lime soda, 3 cups champagne, and 6 cups pink 1 3 cups 3 cups 3 cups champagne (720 mL) or 6 cups 6 cups pink lemonade', '5:  Stir to combine', '6: Remove the 1 qt rainbow sherbet scoops from the freezer and use a spoon to place in the punch bowl']

ingredients: ['4 chicken breasts', '5 cups fresh spinach (200 g)', '¾ cup artichoke heart (100 g) drained rinsed and roughly chopped', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ cup cream cheese (55 g)', '⅓ cup grated mozzarella cheese (35 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Slice into the 4 chicken several times, about ½ cm (¼ inch) apart, but only cut about 85% of the way through, leaving the bottom intact', '3: Cook the 5 cups fresh spinach on a medium heat until it is slightly wilted, then add the ¾ cup artichoke', '4: Stir in the garlic powder and ¼ cup cream cheese, and cook for a minute or two', '5: Sprinkle over the ⅓ cup grated mozzarella and stir until melted', '6: Allow to cool to the touch and then fill each segment of the 4 chicken breast with about 1 1 teaspoon of the mixture', '7: Bake in the centre of the oven for 18-22 minutes until the 4 chicken is cooked through and the juices run clear']

ingredients: ['Tart Dough', '½ cup unsalted butter (115 g) 1 stick softened', '½ cup powdered sugar (80 g)', '1 large egg room temperature', '1 ½ cups all-purpose flour (185 g)', '2 tablespoons cocoa powder', '¼ teaspoon salt', 'Filling', '⅓ cup water (80 g)', '½ cup butter (115 g) 1 stick', '1 teaspoon instant coffee', '1 cup dark chocolate (170 g) chopped', '⅓ cup sugar (65 g)', '1 tablespoon vanilla', '1 pinch salt', '3 large eggs', '1 pt fresh raspberry (250 g) for serving', 'powdered sugar for serving']
instructions: ['1: Make the tart dough: add the butter to a medium bowl and sift in the powdered ½ cup powdered ⅓ cup powdered sugar through a fine-mesh sieve', '2:  Using an electric hand mixer, beat until smooth', '3: Beat the 1 large 3 large egg and add half at a time to the butter mixture, beating well to incorporate between additions', '4: Sift in the 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour and 2 tablespoons cocoa powder, and add the salt', '5:  Using a rubber spatula, mix the dough until the 2 tablespoons cocoa powder is evenly distributed', '6:  Wrap the dough in plastic wrap', '7: Chill in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes, or overnight (if you chill the dough overnight, let it sit at room temperature for 15-30 minutes before rolling out)', '8: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '9: Grease a 9-inch (23-cm) tart pan and roll out the chilled dough to an 11-inch (28-cm) circle', '10:  Roll the dough around the rolling pin, then unroll the dough over the pan', '11: Press the dough against the bottom and sides of the pan, then use the rolling pin to roll over the top of the pan, cutting off any excess dough (re-roll any excess dough and bake into cookies, if desired)', '12:  Press the dough gently against the pan once more', '13:  Using a folk, prick some holes in the bottom of the crust so it doesn’t puff up', '14: Bake for 15 minutes, then remove the tart shell from the oven and reduce the temperature to 300˚F (150˚C)Make the filling: in a medium saucepan, heat the pan over high heat', '15:  Combine the ⅓ cup water and butter, and bring to a boil', '16:  Add the 1 teaspoon instant coffee and stir until dissolved', '17: Add the 1 cup dark chocolate, ½ cup powdered ⅓ cup powdered sugar, and 1 tablespoon vanilla to a medium bowl and pour the hot butter mixture over', '18:  Whisk until the 1 cup dark chocolate is melted and the mixture is glossy', '19: Add the 1 large 3 large 3 large eggs and whisk well to combine', '20:  Pour the filling into the par-baked shell', '21:   Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until 1 cup dark chocolate is mostly set but the center jiggles slightly', '22: Cool the tart for at least 30 minutes, or until cool to touch', '23:  Garnish with raspberries and sift powdered ½ cup powdered ⅓ cup powdered sugar over the top', '24:  Slice and serve']

ingredients: ['1 ½ lb brussels sprouts (680 g)', '2 tablespoons oil', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '2 teaspoons honey', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 425°F (220ºC)', '2: Slice the stem off of the Brussels sprouts and then halve them', '3: On a prepared baking sheet, combine Brussels sprouts and remaining ingredients', '4:  Mix evenly', '5: Bake for 15-20 minutes', '6: Allow to cool for 5 minutes']

ingredients: ['Dough', '¾ cup warm water (180 mL) plus 2 tablespoons', '1 ½ teaspoons instant yeast', '1 cup all purpose flour (125 g) plus more for dusting', '1 cup whole wheat flour (130 g)', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '1 teaspoon olive oil plus more for brushing', 'Toppings', '2 ½ tablespoons olive oil divided', '1 medium yellow onion thinly sliced', '¾ teaspoon kosher salt divided', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '1 teaspoon balsamic vinegar', '6 cups fresh arugula (120 g)', '2 medium peaches thinly sliced', '4 oz goat cheese (115 g) crumbled ', '2 tablespoons balsamic glaze']
instructions: ['1: Make the dough: In a large bowl, combine the ¾ cup warm water, 1 ½ teaspoons instant yeast, all-purpose and whole 1 cup whole wheat flours, and 1 ½ teaspoons kosher ¾ teaspoon kosher salt', '2:  Mix with a rubber spatula until well-combined and the dough comes together into a ball', '3: Lightly dust a clean surface with flour, then turn the dough out and knead for 1–2 minutes to smooth and encourage gluten development', '4:  Shape the dough into a ball', '5: Drizzle the olive oil in the bowl', '6:  Add the dough and turn to coat in the oil', '7:  Cover with a kitchen towel and let rise for 1 hour, or until doubled in size', '8: Caramelize the onions: Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a large pan over medium heat', '9:  Add the onion, ½ teaspoon 1 ½ teaspoons kosher ¾ teaspoon kosher salt, and the pepper', '10:  Sauté for 5 minutes, until slightly softened', '11:  Add the balsamic vinegar, stir, and reduce the heat to low', '12:  Cook for about 25 minutes more, until the onions are tender and caramelized', '13:  Remove the pan from the heat and set aside to cool', '14: Punch down the dough, then divide into 4 pieces', '15:  On a lightly floured surface, roll out each piece to an 8-inch (20 cm) round, about ⅛ inch (3 mm) thick', '16: Heat a grill pan over medium-high heat', '17:  Brush each side of the dough lightly with olive oil', '18:  One at a time, grill each flatbread for about 4 minutes on each side, until grill marks appear and the dough is cooked through', '19: Add the 6 cups fresh arugula to a medium bowl, along with the caramelized onions, remaining ½ tablespoon olive oil, and remaining ¼ teaspoon 1 ½ teaspoons kosher ¾ teaspoon kosher salt', '20:  Toss well', '21: Top each flatbread with some of the 6 cups fresh arugula mixture, 6 peach slices, and 1 ounce of crumbled 4 oz goat cheese', '22:  Drizzle with the balsamic glaze']

ingredients: ['2 lb beef tenderloin (910 g)', 'pepper to taste', '3 lb kosher salt (360 g)', '2 tablespoons fresh rosemary', '1 cup water (240 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Liberally pepper the 2 lb beef tenderloin on all sides', '2: Brown all sides of the 2 lb beef tenderloin, set aside so its comes to room temperature', '3: In a large mixing bowl, combine the 3 lb kosher salt, 2 tablespoons fresh rosemary and 1 cup water', '4:  You want the consistency of wet, packable sand', '5: Spread a thin layer of the 3 lb kosher salt on your baking sheet', '6: Place the 2 lb beef tenderloin on top and cover the with remaining 3 lb kosher salt', '7:  Make sure the entire 2 lb beef tenderloin is covered in the 3 lb kosher salt mix', '8: Bake at 250°F (120°C) for 45-60 minutes or until the internal temperature is about 120°F (48°C) for medium rare', '9: Remove and let it rest in the 3 lb kosher salt crust for 15 minutes', '10: Using the back of the spoon, crack the 3 lb kosher salt crust and remove', '11:  Brush away any excess 3 lb kosher salt and remove the 2 lb beef tenderloin', '12: Slice and serve with roasted vegetables']

ingredients: ['2 cups sweet potato (280 g) cut into 1/2 (1/4 cm) ', '2 cups poblano pepper (300 g) cut into 1/2 in pieces (1/4 cm)', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL)', '1 oz McCormick® Original Taco Seasoning 1 packet', '½ cup black beans (60 g) drained and rinsed', '10 corn tortillas warmed', '½ cup cotija cheese (110 g) crumbled', '1 cup shredded lettuce (100 g)', 'Pickled Onions', '½ medium red onion thinly sliced', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '½ cup white vinegar (120 mL)', '2 tablespoons sugar', 'Avocado Crema', '1 medium avocado pitted and peeled', '¼ cup plain yogurt (60 g)', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '½ lime juice']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 450°F (230°C)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: In a large bowl, combine the 2 cups sweet potatoes and poblanos', '4:  Drizzle over olive oil and add the McCormick® Original Taco Seasoning 1 oz McCormick® Original Taco Seasoning 1 packet', '5:  Mix together', '6: Spread the vegetables in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet and roast for 25 minutes, stirring halfway, until soft and browned', '7: Meanwhile, make the pickled onions: Add the onion to a medium heatproof bowl', '8: Add the water, vinegar, and sugar to a medium saucepan and bring to a simmer, stirring until the sugar is dissolved', '9: Pour the pickling liquid over the onion to submerge', '10:  Let cool', '11: Make the avocado crema: Add the avocado, yogurt, ½ teaspoon kosher salt, and ½ lime juice to a blender or food processor, and blend on high speed until smooth', '12: When the vegetables have finished roasting, remove from the oven and immediately transfer to a large bowl, then toss with the black beans', '13: To assemble the tacos, spread 1–2 2 tablespoons of avocado crema in the center of a warm tortilla and top with about ⅓ cup of the roasted 2 cups sweet potato mixture, 1 tablespoon pickled onions, ½ tablespoon crumbled Cotija cheese, and a small bunch of microgreens', '14:  Repeat with the remaining ingredients']

ingredients: ['Custard filling', '4 eggs beaten reserve 2 tablespoons for your pastry dough', '¾ cup water (180 mL) hot', '6 tablespoons sugar', '⅛ teaspoon salt pinch', '¼ cup evaporated milk (60 mL)', 'vanilla extract a dash optional', 'Pastry dough', '2 cups cake flour (200 g) plus extra for dusting', '115 g unsalted butter (115 g) room temperature', '¼ cup powdered sugar (40 g)', '2 tablespoons egg beaten', '⅛ teaspoon salt', 'vanilla extract a dash optional']
instructions: ['1: For the pastry, in a large bowl, sift 2 cups cake flour, 6 tablespoons ¼ cup powdered sugar, and salt', '2:  Then add softened 115 g unsalted butter', '3:  Bring the mixture together with your hands, careful not to knead the pastry 4 eggs 2 tablespoons egg beaten reserve 2 tablespoons for your pastry Pastry dough too much or you will make the pastry tough', '4: Whisk the egg yolks and add the 2 tablespoons of 4 eggs 2 tablespoons egg beaten yolk to the 2 cups cake flour mixture', '5:  Bring together until smooth', '6:  If the 4 eggs 2 tablespoons egg beaten reserve 2 tablespoons for your pastry Pastry dough is too sticky, coating your hands with 2 cups cake flour will help', '7:  Cover with plastic wrap and then refrigerate for 30 minutes, or until the 4 eggs 2 tablespoons egg beaten reserve 2 tablespoons for your pastry Pastry dough is firm', '8: To make the custard Custard filling, melt 6 tablespoons ¼ cup powdered sugar and salt with hot ¾ cup water', '9:  Mix until dissolved then let cool', '10: Add the rest of the 4 eggs 2 tablespoons egg beaten egg yolk', '11:  Stir in 6 tablespoons ¼ cup powdered sugar ¾ cup water and also ¼ cup evaporated milk (if adding vanilla, add now)', '12:  Stir and combine everything well', '13: Strain the Custard filling to ensure no lumps', '14:  Chill in the refrigerator', '15: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C', '16: )Take the 4 eggs 2 tablespoons egg beaten reserve 2 tablespoons for your pastry Pastry dough out and divide into 16 equal portions', '17:  Spray the tart pan with a light coating of oil', '18:  Take one portion of your 4 eggs 2 tablespoons egg beaten reserve 2 tablespoons for your pastry Pastry dough and roll it into a ball and place in your tart shell', '19:  Press the shell into the pan with your fingers', '20:  Try to make the wrapper uniform in thickness and avoid a thick bottom', '21:  Repeat to finish all', '22: Pour the custard Custard filling into the shells until it is about 80% full', '23:  Bake for 15 to 20 minutes until the surface becomes golden brown and a toothpick can stand in the egg tart', '24: Cool down for several minutes and then take the egg tarts out of the pan', '25:  Serve while still warm']

ingredients: ['1 cup milk (240 mL)', '½ cup sugar (100 g) plus 1 tablespoon divided', '1 teaspoon saffron thread', '¼ oz active dry yeast', '4 ½ cups all-purpose flour (560 g)', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon ground cardamom', '3 large eggs divided', '¼ cup sour cream (60 g)', '6 tablespoons unsalted butter softened', 'raisin or chocolate chips']
instructions: ['1: In a small saucepan, combine the 1 cup milk, 1 tablespoon of ½ cup sugar, and the 1 teaspoon saffron threads', '2:  Heat over medium-low heat, stirring to dissolve the ½ cup sugar', '3:  Once the 1 cup milk is steaming, remove from the heat and let cool to 110˚F (43˚C)', '4: Sprinkle the ¼ oz active dry yeast over the 1 cup milk and let bubble, about 5 minutes', '5: In a 3 large bowl, whisk together the 4 ½ cups all-purpose flour, remaining ½ cup sugar, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, and 1 teaspoon ground cardamom', '6: Make a well in the center of the 4 ½ cups all-purpose flour and pour in the 1 cup milk, 2 eggs, ¼ cup sour cream, and 6 tablespoons unsalted butter', '7:  Stir to combine, then, once the dough starts to come together, use your hands to incorporate fully', '8: Turn the dough out onto a clean surface and knead until the dough is springy, about 5 minutes', '9: Place the dough in a 3 large bowl and cover with plastic wrap', '10:  Let rise in a warm place for 1 hour, or until doubled in size', '11: Punch down the dough and flip onto a clean surface', '12: Divide the dough into 12 equal pieces', '13:  Form each piece into a ball about 2 inches (5 cm) wide, then roll into a cylinder about 12-14 inches (30 cm) longSwirl the dough into a S shape starting at one end until the middle and then the other end', '14: Transfer the dough to a parchment paper-lined baking sheet, cover with plastic wrap, and let rise for 30 minutes, until doubled in size', '15: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '16: Beat the remaining egg and brush over the dough swirls', '17:  Place a single raisin or chocolate chip in the center of the swirls on each end', '18: Bake the buns for 10-12 minutes, or until golden brown and cooked through']

ingredients: ['2 french breads large wide loaves halved', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL)', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'Meat Lovers Pizza Party Boat', 'marinara sauce', 'fresh mozzarella cheese sliced', 'pepperoni', 'sausage crumbled', 'ham diced', 'bacon cooked chopped', 'Alfredo Veggie Pizza Party Boat', '¼ cup alfredo sauce (60 g)', 'fresh spinach', 'artichoke', 'mushroom sliced', 'freshly grated parmesan cheese', 'sundried tomato', 'Barbecue Chicken Pizza Party Boat', 'barbecue sauce', '4 oz chicken (115 g) cooked sliced', 'shredded pepper jack  cheese', 'bell pepper sliced', 'red onion sliced', 'Pesto Prosciutto Pizza Party Boat', 'pesto sauce', 'prosciutto sliced', 'red pepper roasted', 'freshly grated parmesan cheese', 'large egg', 'black pepper']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 450°F (230°C)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: Place the 2 french breads large wide loaves of bread cut-side up on the prepared baking sheet', '4: In a small bowl, combine the the ¼ cup olive oil, 1 tablespoon garlic powder, salt, and pepper', '5:  Brush over the bread', '6: Bake for 10 minutes, or until the bread is golden brown and dried out', '7: Top the bread with the toppings of your choice', '8:  You can mix and match any flavor combinations you prefer!For Meat Lovers pizza, add marinara sauce, fresh mozzarella, fresh mozzarella, pepperoni, sausage, ham, and bacon', '9: For Alfredo Veggie pizza, add ¼ cup alfredo sauce, fresh spinach, artichokes, mushrooms, Parmesan, and sun-dried tomatoes', '10: For Barbecue Chicken Pizza, add barbecue sauce, 4 oz chicken, pepper Jack, bell pepper, and red onion', '11: For Prosciutto Pesto Pizza, add pesto, prosciutto, roasted red pepper, Parmesan, eggs, and pepper', '12: Bake the pizza party boats for 15 minutes, or until the ingredients are heated through and the cheese is fully melted', '13: Slice and serve!']

ingredients: ['Crust', '½ cup raw pecan (60 g)', '½ cup almond flour (50 g)', '2 pitted dates', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '2 tablespoons coconut oil', 'salt to taste', 'Filling', '2 cups raw cashew (260 g)', 'cold water for soaking', '½ cup canned coconut milk (120 mL) mixed', '2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '¼ cup coconut oil (60 mL) melted and cooled', '⅓ cup maple syrup (75 g)', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '½ cup strawberry (75 g) fresh or frozen', 'strawberry sliced for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Place the 2 cups raw cashews in a medium bowl and cover with cold water', '2:  Let the 2 cups raw cashews soak for at least for 4 hours, or overnight, until soft', '3: Make the crust: Using a food processor, pulse together the pecans, ½ cup almond flour, 2 pitted dates, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, coconut oil, and a pinch of salt', '4:  Pulse until the pecans have been broken down into crumbs and the crust begins to stick together', '5: Transfer the crust to a greased and parchment paper-lined 8-inch (20 cm) springform pan', '6:  Use your fingers to press the crust into the bottom of the pan in an even layer', '7: Make the filling: Drain the soaked 2 cups raw cashews and place them in the bowl of the food processor', '8:  Add the coconut milk, 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice, coconut oil, ⅓ cup maple syrup, and 1 tablespoon vanilla', '9:  Blend until very smooth, 5-7 minutes', '10: Pour roughly ⅔ of the 2 cups raw cashew filling over the crust', '11:  Use a spatula to gently spread the mixture to the sides, then tap and shake the pan on the counter to achieve a smooth, even layer', '12: Freeze the pan while preparing the strawberry layer, about 10 minutes', '13: Add the strawberries into the remaining 2 cups raw cashew mixture in the food processor and puree until smooth, scraping down the sides of the bowl as needed, about 5 minutes', '14: Scrape the strawberry filling over the first layer', '15:  Use a spatula to gently push the layer out to the sides of the pan and tap and shake the pan on the counter to achieve a smooth, even layer', '16: Top the cheesecake with sliced strawberries', '17: Freeze the cheesecake until solid, at least 4 hours', '18: To serve, let the cheesecake thaw at room temperature for at least 10 minutes before slicing']

ingredients: ['2 zucchinis', '1 cup grated parmesan cheese (110 g)', 'Sauce', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '½ large white onion', '2 cloves garlic', '1 lb ground turkey (455 g)', '28 oz crushed tomato (795 g)', '2 teaspoons dried basil', '2 teaspoons dried parsley', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 tablespoon tomato paste', '1 bay leaf', 'Cheese Mixture', '16 oz ricotta cheese (455 g)', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon fresh parsley minced', '¼ cup grated parmesan cheese (30 g)', '¼ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper']
instructions: ['1: Cut the ends off of the zucchini, and cut in half, lengthwise', '2: Using a vegetable peeler, peel long strips of zucchini (these will be your “noodles”) and set on a baking sheet lined with paper towels', '3: Dab zucchini strips with a paper towel to absorb the excess moisture', '4: In a ½ large pot, add 2 tablespoons olive oil, onions, and 2 cloves garlic', '5:  Cook until translucent, about 4-5 minutes', '6: Add 1 lb ground turkey, and cook for another 4-5 minutes, or until the turkey has browned slightly', '7: Pour in 28 oz crushed 28 oz crushed 1 tablespoon tomatoes, 2 teaspoons dried basil, parsley, 2 teaspoons dried oregano, salt, pepper, 28 oz crushed 1 tablespoon tomato paste, and a 1 bay leaf', '8:  Cover and let simmer for 30 minutes', '9: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '10: In a bowl, combine 16 oz ricotta cheese, 1 egg, parsley, parmesan, salt, and pepper', '11:  Mix until well combined', '12: Using a baking dish, layer turkey sauce, zucchini strips, 16 oz ricotta mixture, and parmesan', '13:  Repeat until there are 3 layers total, ending with the turkey sauce and topping that with parmesan cheese', '14: Bake for 50 minutes (times and temperatures may vary depending on the oven)', '15: Let rest for at least 20 minutes']

ingredients: ['½ cup strawberry (75 g)', '½ cup raspberry (60 g)', '1 cup blackberry (55 g)', '1 banana sliced', '½ cup greek yogurt (140 g)', '¼ cup almond milk (60 mL) or soy milk', '¼ cup peanut butter (60 g)', 'Top with whatever you like! We used:', 'strawberry sliced to taste', 'banana sliced to taste', 'slivered almond to taste', '¼ cup blueberries (25 g) to taste', 'shredded coconut to taste', 'sunflower seed to taste', '2 tablespoons chia seeds to taste']
instructions: ['1: Add the berries, banana, Greek yogurt, almond milk, and ¼ cup peanut butter to a blender and blend until smooth', '2: Top with your favorite toppings', '3: Nutrition  Calories: 1709 Fat: 130 grams  Carbs: 108 grams Fiber: 37 grams  Sugars: 48 grams  Protein: 57 grams']

ingredients: ['1 teaspoon peppermint extract', '5 cups rice cereal (150 g)', '1 cup powdered sugar (110 g)', '¼ cup cocoa powder (30 g)', '½ cup mint chocolate candy (90 g)', 'Chocolate Mix', '1 ½ cups semi sweet chocolate (255 g)', '1 teaspoon coconut oil']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, mix 1 teaspoon coconut oil and ½ cup mint 1 ½ cups semi sweet chocolate', '2:  Melt in microwave for 60 seconds', '3:  Stir every 15 seconds until melted', '4: Add 1 teaspoon peppermint extract into melted ½ cup mint 1 ½ cups semi sweet chocolate', '5: Place 5 cups rice cereal in large bowl', '6:  Mix in melted ½ cup mint 1 ½ cups semi sweet chocolate and stir until evenly coated', '7: In a large plastic bag, add 1 cup powdered sugar and ¼ cup cocoa powder', '8: Close and shake until each 5 cups rice cereal is coated with sugar', '9:  Add in ½ cup mint ½ cup mint 1 ½ cups semi sweet chocolate candies']

ingredients: ['Cupcakes', '⅔ cup brown sugar (145 g) packed', '⅓ cup granulated sugar (65 g)', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '½ cup olive oil (120 mL)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 large eggs', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 ½ teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 ½ cups all purpose flour (185 g)', '¾ cup apple cider (180 mL) see recipe or use store-bought', 'Frosting', '½ cup unsalted butter (115 g) 1 stick room temperature', '8 oz cream cheese (225 g) room temperature', '2 cups powdered sugar (240 g) sifted', '½ teaspoon cinnamon plus more for topping', '2 tablespoons apple cider see recipe or use store-bought', '2 teaspoons vanilla']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: In a 2 large bowl, whisk together the brown sugar, granulated sugar, ½ teaspoon kosher salt, olive oil, and vanilla', '3: Whisk in the eggs, 1 at a time, until fully incorporated', '4: Add the 1 teaspoon baking soda, cinnamon, half of the 1 ½ cups all purpose flour, and half of the cider and whisk to combine', '5: Add the remaining 1 ½ cups all purpose flour and the rest of the cider and whisk until completely combined', '6: Line a 12-cup muffin tin with paper liners', '7:  Pour the batter into the muffin tin, filling each cup about ⅔ full', '8: Bake for 20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center of a cupcake comes out clean', '9:  Let cool', '10: Make the frosting: In a 2 large bowl, 8 oz cream the butter and 8 oz cream cheese together with an electric hand mixer until light and fluffy, about 5 minutes', '11: Add the 2 cups powdered sugar in 3 to 4 additions, mixing in between each until incorporated', '12: Add the cinnamon, ¾ cup 2 tablespoons apple cider, and vanilla and mix to combine', '13: Transfer the frosting to a piping bag or zip-top bag', '14: Pipe the frosting onto the cupcakes', '15:  Top with a sprinkle of cinnamon']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '¼ cup butter (50 g)', '1 medium onion finely diced', '1 large carrot finely diced', '1 stalk celery finely diced', '4 oz pancetta (100 g) diced', '7 oz lean beef (200 g) minced', '5 ⅓ oz lean pork (150 g) minced', '¾ cup red wine (200 mL)', '2 tablespoons double concentrated tomato puree', '2 cups chicken stock (500 mL)', 'To serve', '2 cups tagliatelle (400 g) cooked', 'parmesan cheese grated']
instructions: ['1: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil and ¼ cup butter in a 1 large pan over 1 medium heat', '2:  Add onion, carrot, 1 stalk celery, and 4 oz pancetta', '3:  Cook for around 10 minutes until the onions start to look translucent', '4: Add the minced meats and brown all over, ensure the meat is fully broken up and no 1 large chunks remain', '5: Add salt and pepper to taste', '6:  Increase the heat, add the ¾ cup red wine, and allow to evaporate for around 2-3 minutes', '7: In a 1 large jug, dilute the 2 tablespoons double concentrated tomato puree into the 2 cups chicken stock and add to the pan, stir well', '8: Reduce to a low heat, then cover and simmer for 2 hours', '9:  Check from time to time to ensure the sauce is not drying out', '10:  If this occurs, add a small amount of stock', '11: Cook desired pasta and toss in the bolognese', '12: Top with parmesan cheese and To serve']

ingredients: ['Broth', '5 lb bone-in chuck beef short ribs (2 ¼ kg)', '1 lb beef shin bones (455 g) or any knee joint', '2 lb oxtail (910 g)', '1 white onion halved', '2 carrots halved crosswise', '5 large tomatoes halved', '1 red apple halved', '1 stalk celery halved crosswise', '½ cup garlic (65 g) peeled', '1 piece fresh ginger 2 in (5 cm) sliced ', '3 bunches scallions divided', '1 cup rice wine (240 mL)', '1 tablespoon star anise', '1 tablespoon sichuan peppercorns', '1 tablespoon coriander seeds', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil divided plus 1 teaspoon ', '5 tablespoons doubanjiang broad bean chili sauce', '1 cup soy sauce (240 mL)', '¼ cup dark soy sauce (60 mL)', '2 tablespoons rock sugar', '2 tablespoons kosher salt plus more to taste', '4 tablespoons granulated sugar plus more to taste', '3 ¼ lb fresh noodles (1.4 g) of choice', '1 head baby bok choy leaves separated', 'mustard green picked for serving (optional)', 'Preparation', 'Broth', '5 lb bone-in chuck beef short ribs (2 ¼ kg)', '1 lb beef shin bones (455 g) or any knee joint', '2 lb oxtail (910 g)', '1 white onion halved', '2 carrots halved crosswise', '5 large tomatoes halved', '1 red apple halved', '1 stalk celery halved crosswise', '½ cup garlic (65 g) peeled', '1 piece fresh ginger 2 in (5 cm) sliced ', '3 bunches scallions divided', '1 cup rice wine (240 mL)', '1 tablespoon star anise', '1 tablespoon sichuan peppercorns', '1 tablespoon coriander seeds', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil divided plus 1 teaspoon ', '5 tablespoons doubanjiang broad bean chili sauce', '1 cup soy sauce (240 mL)', '¼ cup dark soy sauce (60 mL)', '2 tablespoons rock sugar', '2 tablespoons kosher salt plus more to taste', '4 tablespoons granulated sugar plus more to taste', '3 ¼ lb fresh noodles (1.4 g) of choice', '1 head baby bok choy leaves separated', 'mustard green picked for serving (optional)', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Bring a large pot of water to a boil', '2:  Add the short ribs, beef shin bones, and oxtail and boil for 30 minutes to remove any impurities', '3:  Drain and rinse the meat and bones under cold running water', '4: Add the meat and bones to a clean large pot with the onion, carrots, tomatoes, apple, celery, garlic, ginger, rice wine and scallions (set 2 aside for garnish)', '5:  Add enough water to cover and bring to a boil', '6: Meanwhile, in a small, dry pan over high heat, toast the star anise, Sichuan peppercorns, and coriander until fragrant, about 2 minutes', '7:  Add the toasted spices to the boiling broth', '8: In the same small pan, heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil over high heat', '9:  When the oil is shimmering, add the doubanjiang and cook until fragrant and caramelized, about 30 seconds', '10: Add the caramelized doubanjiang to the boiling broth, along with the soy sauce, dark soy sauce, and rock sugar', '11: Reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer the meat and bones for 3 hours', '12:  Remove the short ribs from the broth and let cool slightly, then wrap in foil and let rest in the refrigerator overnight', '13: Cook the broth for another 3 hours, adding more water as needed to keep the solids covered', '14:  Remove the broth from the heat and stir in the salt and sugar', '15:  Adjust the seasoning to taste', '16:  Transfer the broth and solids to an airtight container and refrigerate overnight', '17: When ready to assemble, skim the solidified fat from the top of the broth and reserve', '18:  Return the broth and solids to a large pot and heat over medium heat until bubbling', '19:  Strain the broth into a clean pot, discarding the solids', '20: Add the bok choy to the hot broth and blanch for 30 seconds, then remove from the pot and set aside', '21: Cook the noodles according to the package instructions, then drain', '22: Cut the short ribs into bite-size cubes', '23:  Heat the remaining teaspoon of vegetable oil in a medium pan over high heat', '24:  Add the short ribs and sear until the outside is crispy, 2-3 minutes', '25:  Remove the pan from the heat', '26: Thinly slice the remaining 2 scallions', '27: To serve, add 1 tablespoon of reserved fat to a bowl', '28:  Add the noodles', '29:  Pour in the broth, then top with short rib cubes, scallions, bok choy, and cooked salted mustard']

ingredients: ['12 oz spaghetti (340 g)', '3 cups shiitake mushroom cap (225 g) thinly sliced', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '½ teaspoon smoked paprika', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '½ cup cashews (65 g) soaked overnight', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL)', '⅓ cup unsweetened non-dairy milk (80 mL)', '3 cloves garlic chopped', '1 ½ tablespoons nutritional yeast', '1 ½ tablespoons lemon juice', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon paprika', 'fresh parsley for serving']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)', '2: Cook pasta according to package instructions', '3: Toss 3 cups shiitake mushrooms, oil, ½ teaspoon smoked ½ teaspoon smoked ¼ teaspoon paprika, salt, and pepper in a medium bowl', '4: Arrange mixture on parchment paper-lined baking sheet and bake for 7 minutes', '5:  Flip the mushrooms and continue baking for 7-8 minutes, or until mushrooms are crispy and brown', '6: Cool mushroom slices on baking sheet', '7: For the sauce, combine ½ cup cashews, olive oil, garlic 3 cloves, 1 ½ tablespoons nutritional yeast, ⅓ cup unsweetened non-dairy milk, 1 ½ tablespoons lemon juice, pepper, salt, and ½ teaspoon smoked ¼ teaspoon paprika in a blender or food processor', '8:  Blend until smooth and creamy', '9: Drain water from pasta and return pasta to pot', '10: Add the sauce and stir until pasta is well-coated', '11: Mix in mushroom bacon', '12: Top with fresh parsley']

ingredients: ['1 lb ziti pasta (455 g)', '2 chicken breasts', '25 oz tomato sauce (705 g)', '2 cups mozarella (200 g)', '1 cup parmesan cheese (110 g)', '¼ cup fresh basil (10 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)', '2: Boil 1 lb ziti pasta for 10 minutes, then drain', '3: Dice 2 chicken breasts and cook thoroughly', '4:  Add 25 oz tomato sauce, then add cooked 1 lb ziti pasta and mix until the 1 lb ziti pasta is coated with sauce', '5: Pour half of the 1 lb ziti pasta into a greased 11x7-inch (27x17 cm) or 9x13 inch (22x33 cm) baking dish', '6:  Sprinkle evenly with 1 cup (100 G) of mozzarella cheese, ½ cup (55 G) of parmesan, ⅛th cup of basil', '7:  Layer the remaining half of the 1 lb ziti pasta evenly on top', '8:  Sprinkle evenly with the remaining cheese and basil', '9: Bake for 20 minutes, remove and sprinkle immediately with additional Parmesan cheese and fresh basil']

ingredients: ['2 cups medjool date (340 g) pits removed', '½ cup roasted almond (70 g)', '½ cup almond butter (120 g)', '½ cup unsweetened shredded coconut (30 g) divided', '1 pinch salt']
instructions: ['1: Combine dates, almonds, almond butter, 1 pinch salt, and half of the coconut in a food processor and blend until a sticky dough forms', '2:  (If dough is not coming together, add one tablespoon of water and continue blending', '3: )Wet your hands and form dough into 2 tablespoon-sized ball', '4:  Roll in remaining ½ cup unsweetened shredded coconut', '5: Let dry at room temperature for 2 hours before serving', '6:  Store in an airtight container']

ingredients: ['1 lb basmati rice (500 g)', '1 lb chicken (500 g) washed and cleaned', '1 cup yogurt (250 g)', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds crushed', '2 onions finely chopped', '5 mint leaves', '5 green chiles', '1 teaspoon coriander seed crushed', '½ tablespoon chili flakes', '½ teaspoon turmeric', 'salt as required', '½ tablespoon ginger minced', '½ tablespoon garlic minced', 'Preparation', '1 lb basmati rice (500 g)', '1 lb chicken (500 g) washed and cleaned', '1 cup yogurt (250 g)', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds crushed', '2 onions finely chopped', '5 mint leaves', '5 green chiles', '1 teaspoon coriander seed crushed', '½ tablespoon chili flakes', '½ teaspoon turmeric', 'salt as required', '½ tablespoon ginger minced', '½ tablespoon garlic minced', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Fry onions in a shallow skillet until light brown', '2:  Set aside a few bits for garnishing and once the remaining is golden brown, add When the onion turns golden brown add chicken and fry until golden', '3: To this, add ginger and garlic and saute', '4:  Once combined, add salt, cumin seed, coriander seed, chili flakes and turmeric', '5:  Once the oil starts to appear along the top, add 1 cup water and let boil', '6: To this, add green chilies and mint leaves', '7:  Then add the soaked rice in the pot once the quantity of water is enough for the rice to get cooked', '8:  Cook on high flame until the water is reduced', '9: Cover the lid and let the rice cook on low flame for about 15 minutes', '10: Serve warm alongside fresh vegetables and yogurt']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons avocado oil', '½ small onion chopped', '1 green pepper chopped', '2 teaspoons garlic minced', '5 cups chicken broth (1.2 L)', '2 tablespoons butter', '3 chicken breasts boneless and skinless', '1 can Rotel Tomatoes & Green Chilies', '1 can whole sweet corn drained', '2 cups Mexican Blend shredded cheese (200 g)', '1 cup heavy whipping cream (240 mL)', '8 oz cream cheese (225 g)', '1 teaspoon garlic pepper', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon dried sage', '3 teaspoons chili powder', '2 teaspoons cumin', '2 teaspoons paprika', '2 teaspoons pink salt', '1 teaspoon oregano', '1 teaspoon dried chive', '½ teaspoon garlic powder']
instructions: ['1: Sauté onions and 1 green 1 green 1 teaspoon garlic 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper in 2 tablespoons avocado oil in a large pot', '2:  Then, add minced garlic and sauté for 1 minute', '3: Add chicken broth and 2 tablespoons butter and bring to a boil', '4: Add chicken breasts and boil until cooked through, about 10-15 minutes', '5: Remove chicken and shred or cut into bite sized pieces, set aside', '6: Remove 1 5 2 1 cup broth and place in a blender with 1 cup heavy whipping 8 oz cream cheese; blend until 1 cup heavy whipping 8 oz creamy', '7: Add 1 cup heavy whipping 8 oz creamy cheese mixture and 2 2 1 cups Mexican Blend shredded chicken back to soup', '8:  Then, stir in all remaining ingredients', '9: Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 5-10 minutes', '10: Serve over cooked white rice, cauliflower rice, or tortilla chips']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon cooking oil of preference', '½ white onion diced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes optional', '½ teaspoon dried sage', '1 ½ cups almond milk (360 mL)', '15 oz pumpkin puree (425 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '¼ teaspoon nutmeg', '½ box whole wheat pasta cooked']
instructions: ['1: Heat the 1 tablespoon cooking oil in a medium pot over medium heat', '2:  Add the ½ white onion, 2 cloves garlic, ½ teaspoon red ½ teaspoon red 1 teaspoon pepper flakes, and ½ teaspoon dried sage and cook until ½ white onions are translucent, stirring occasionally', '3: Add the 1 ½ cups almond milk, 15 oz pumpkin puree, 1 teaspoon salt, ½ teaspoon red 1 teaspoon pepper, and ¼ teaspoon nutmeg', '4:  Stir until a smooth, creamy sauce forms', '5:  Heat through', '6: Add the cooked ½ box whole wheat pasta and and stir to coat', '7: Serve warm']

ingredients: ['1 pork loin 3 pound (1.3 kilograms)', '2 tablespoons olive oil divided', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '3 tablespoons McCormick® Hearty Spice Blend divided', '3 cups brussels sprouts (300 g) (about 12 ounces) ends trimmed and halved lengthwise', '3 cups butternut squash (about 12 ounces-360 grams) cut into ½-inch (1.24 cm) pieces', '1 large red onion cut into 1 in (2.54 cm) pieces']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C)', '2: Using a sharp knife, score the fat cap of the 1 pork loin in a crosshatch pattern', '3:  Do not cut through to the meat', '4: Using your hands, rub 2 2 1 3 tablespoon olive oil all over the 1 pork', '5:  Liberally season all over with 1 2 1 3 tablespoon salt, plus more as needed', '6:  Rub 2 2 1 3 tablespoons of the McCormick® Savoury Spice Blend all over the 1 pork', '7: Transfer the 1 pork to a 9 x 13-inch (22 x 33 cm) baking sheet', '8:  Roast for 10 minutes, until the fat is beginning to render and brown', '9: Meanwhile in a 1 large bowl add the Brussels sprouts, 3 cups butternut squash, and red onion, 2 2 1 3 tablespoons olive oil, and 1 2 1 3 tablespoon McCormick® Savoury Spice Blend and toss to coat', '10: Remove the 1 pork from the oven', '11:  Reduce the oven temperature to 375°F (190°C)', '12: Evenly spread the vegetables on the baking sheet, turning the Brussels sprouts cut-side down', '13:  Clear a space in the center of the pan, then return the 1 pork to the pan', '14:  It is okay if some of the vegetables are underneath the 1 pork', '15: Return to the oven and cook for 35–50 minutes, depending on the size of the 1 pork loin, until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (75°C)', '16: Remove from the oven and let rest for 10–15 minutes before carving the 1 pork and serving with the vegetables']

ingredients: ['unsalted butter softened for greasing', 'Option 1: Prepared Mix', '18 oz brownie mix (510 g) prepared according to package instructions', 'Option 2: From Scratch', '2 ¼ cups granulated sugar (450 g)', '1 ¼ cups dutch processed cocoa  powder (150 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 ½ cups all purpose flour (190 g)', '1 cup vegetable oil (240 mL)', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '3 large eggs', '¼ cup water (60 mL)', 'Additions', '1 ½ cups chocolate chunks (260 g)', '½ cup peanut butter (120 g)', 'vanilla ice cream for serving', 'rainbow sprinkle for topping']
instructions: ['1: Position a rack in the center of the oven and preheat to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Grease a 9-by-13-inch (23-by-33-cm) dark metal pan with softened unsalted ½ cup ½ cup peanut butter, then line with parchment paper, leaving overhang on all sides', '3:  Grease the parchment with more unsalted ½ cup ½ cup peanut butter', '4: OPTION 1: If using prepared mix, make the 18 oz brownie batter according to the package instructions', '5: OPTION 2: If making the 18 oz brownie batter from scratch, in a 3 large bowl, whisk together the 2 ¼ cups granulated sugar, 1 ¼ cups dutch processed cocoa powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon baking powder, and 1 ½ cups all purpose flour', '6:  Add the 1 cup vegetable oil, vanilla, eggs, and ¼ cup water and whisk to combine', '7: Stir in the 1 ½ cups chocolate chunks', '8: Pour the 18 oz brownie batter into the prepared 1 teaspoon baking pan and smooth the top with a spatula', '9: Pour the ½ cup peanut unsalted ½ cup ½ cup peanut butter over the top and swirl into the batter with a knife or skewer', '10: Bake until lightly puffed on top, about 20 minutes', '11:  Transfer the 18 oz brownie pan to a wire rack and let cool completely, about 30 minutes', '12: Use the parchment paper to lift the cooled 18 oz brownies out of the pan and cut into 12 bars', '13: Serve with a scoop of vanilla ice cream and a pinch of sprinkles']

ingredients: ['3 tablespoons canola oil divided', '2 lb boneless pork tenderloin (910 g) trimmed of excess fat and silverskin', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 tablespoon freshly ground black pepper', '3 tablespoons canola oil', '1 large red onion sliced', '4 cloves garlic crushed', '2 medium apples sliced', '1 cup hard cider (240 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Pat the 2 lb boneless pork tenderloin dry and generously season with salt and pepper on all sides', '2: Heat 2 tablespoons of canola oil in a 1 large cast iron skillet over 2 medium-high heat, until the oil is shimmering and just starting to smoke', '3: Place 2 lb boneless pork in the hot skillet and sear until well browned, about 1½-2 minutes', '4:  Flip and repeat searing on all sides', '5: Remove the 2 lb boneless pork from the skillet and set aside', '6: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '7: Heat the remaining tablespoon of oil in the skillet', '8: Add the onion to hot skillet and toss to coat in the oil', '9:  Add the 4 cloves garlic and apples and cook until the apples and onion begin to soften', '10: Pour the 1 cup hard cider over apples and onion and bring to a simmer', '11: Return the 2 lb boneless pork to the skillet, on top of the apple and onion mixture', '12:  Spoon the cooking liquid over the 2 lb boneless pork and transfer the entire skillet to the oven', '13: Bake for 15-20 minutes, until the internal temperature of the 2 lb boneless pork reaches 145˚F (62˚C', '14: )Remove the skillet from the oven and let the 2 lb boneless pork rest for 10 minutes before slicing', '15:  Serve the sliced 2 lb boneless pork over a bed of the apples and onions']

ingredients: ['1 lb ground beef (455 g)', '1 lb hot italian sausage (455 g)', '4 cloves garlic minced', '½ cup fresh parsley (10 g) chopped', '½ cup parmesan cheese (55 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 cup italian bread crumbs (115 g)', '2 eggs', '1 cup milk (240 mL)', '24 oz marinara sauce (680 mL)', '2 cups mozzarella cheese (200 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a large mixing bowl, combine 1 lb ground beef, Italian sausage, 4 cloves garlic, ½ cup fresh parsley, ½ cup parmesan cheese, 1 teaspoon salt, ½ teaspoon pepper,  bread crumbs, 2 eggs, and 1 cup milk', '2:  Mix until everything is fully infused together', '3: Roll into 4-5 ounce (113-142 g) meatballs', '4:  For even amounts, use a medium-sized ice cream scooper', '5: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C)', '6: Over medium heat, add 1 tablespoon of olive oil to a pan, and brown the meatballs on both sides for about 2-3 minutes or until you create a nice crispy sear', '7:  Cook about half way through', '8:  They will finish cooking in the oven', '9: In a casserole dish, spread a few tablespoons of 24 oz marinara sauce to the bottom of the pan to help prevent sticking', '10:  Then place meatballs in the casserole dish and add the remaining jar of 24 oz marinara sauce', '11:  Top with 2 2 cups of shredded mozzarella cheese', '12: Cover in foil and bake at 425°F (220°C) for 25 minutes or until the cheese is fully melted and the meatballs are fully cooked', '13: Serve and garnish with ½ cup fresh parsley']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 chicken breasts diced', '2 cloves garlic crushed', '1 jalapeño diced', '1 cup quinoa (170 g)', '1 cup vegetable broth (235 mL)', '15 oz black beans (400 g) 1 can', '15 oz fire-roasted diced tomato (400 g) 1 can', '1 cup corn (175 g)', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '½ teaspoon cumin', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 avocado diced', '1 lime juiced', '2 tablespoons fresh cilantro chopped extra for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet over medium high heat', '2:  Dice 2 chicken breasts and cook thoroughly', '3:  Add salt and pepper to taste', '4: Add crushed 2 cloves garlic and a 2 chicken breasts 1 jalapeño 15 oz fire-roasted 1 1 avocado diced 1 jalapeño pepper (leave the 1 jalapeño seeds in for extra spice)', '5: Stir in 1 cup quinoa, 1 cup vegetable broth, 15 oz black beans, tomatoes, 1 cup corn, 1 teaspoon chili powder and ½ teaspoon cumin; season with salt and pepper to taste', '6: Cover and simmer until 1 cup quinoa is cooked through, roughly 30 minutes', '7: Stir in 2 chicken breasts 1 jalapeño 15 oz fire-roasted 1 1 avocado diced 1 avocado, 2 tablespoons fresh cilantro, and 1 lime juice', '8: Serve garnished with extra 2 tablespoons fresh cilantro']

ingredients: ['2 lb chicken (1 kg)', '2 lb basmati rice (1 kg)', '5 onions', '6 tablespoons oil', '3 tablespoons ghee', 'For Marinating The Chicken', 'salt to taste', '1 lemon', '1 teaspoon red chili powder', '1 teaspoon coriander powder', '2 teaspoons pepper powder', '1 ½ tablespoons caraway seed', '2 cloves', '1 cardamom', '1 piece cinnamon stick 2 in (5 cm)', '1 piece ginger 1 in (2.54 cm)', '4 cloves garlic', '6 green chiles', '12 pudina leaves', 'coriander leaf', '1 pinch saffron', '¾ cup curd (75 g)', '4 fried onions', '1 tablespoon oil and ghee', 'For Cooking The Rice', '2 lb basmati rice (1 kg)', '2 tablespoons caraway seed', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 pinch saffron', 'salt to taste', 'For Cooking On Dum', '10 pudina leaves', 'coriander leaf', 'fried onion', '5 hard-boiled eggs', 'saffron milk', '½ cup rice water (120 mL) hot', '3 green chiles', 'Preparation', '2 lb chicken (1 kg)', '2 lb basmati rice (1 kg)', '5 onions', '6 tablespoons oil', '3 tablespoons ghee', 'For Marinating The Chicken', 'salt to taste', '1 lemon', '1 teaspoon red chili powder', '1 teaspoon coriander powder', '2 teaspoons pepper powder', '1 ½ tablespoons caraway seed', '2 cloves', '1 cardamom', '1 piece cinnamon stick 2 in (5 cm)', '1 piece ginger 1 in (2.54 cm)', '4 cloves garlic', '6 green chiles', '12 pudina leaves', 'coriander leaf', '1 pinch saffron', '¾ cup curd (75 g)', '4 fried onions', '1 tablespoon oil and ghee', 'For Cooking The Rice', '2 lb basmati rice (1 kg)', '2 tablespoons caraway seed', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 pinch saffron', 'salt to taste', 'For Cooking On Dum', '10 pudina leaves', 'coriander leaf', 'fried onion', '5 hard-boiled eggs', 'saffron milk', '½ cup rice water (120 mL) hot', '3 green chiles', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: A', '2:  For Marinating The Chicken:Slice the onions and fry in oil & ghee mixture until golden brown color', '3:  Reserve one of these onions for cooking on dum', '4: Reserve this oil that was used for frying the onions for cooking on dum (C)', '5: For making the Hyderabad masala powder, take a mixture jar, add caraway seeds, cinnamon stick, cloves, cardamom and grind it into a fine powder', '6: Take the mixer jar, add ginger, garlic, pudina leaves, coriander leaves, green chilies, a Tsp', '7:  of curd, a pinch of salt and grind it into a smooth paste', '8: In a large bowl, add the chicken, lemon juice, salt and mix well', '9:  Then add masala powder, the grinded paste, red chilli powder, coriander powder, pepper powder, fried onion, curd, mix well', '10: Add 3-4 Tbsp', '11:  reserved oil (A', '12:  Step 1) and saffron', '13:  Mix and set aside for at least 1 hour', '14: B', '15:  For Cooking The Rice:Wash and soak the Basmati rice for 30 minutes', '16: In a pot, take around 2', '17: 5 L of water to cook the rice', '18:  Place it on a high heat', '19: When the water is near to boil, add caraway seeds, vegetable oil and salt', '20:  Stir it well to dissolve the salt', '21:  The water must be very salty', '22: During boiling, add the strained basmati rice and stir it well', '23: Continue to boil it on high heat', '24:  Stir a few times very gently and make sure not to break the rice', '25: Once the rice is hal- cooked (should take about 7 minutes on high flame) strain the rice and set aside', '26: C', '27:  For Cooking On Dum:Take the heavy bottom pot, place it on low flame, add half the oil & ghee (reserved) that was used for frying the onions', '28:  Then arrange the marinated chicken pieces in one layer, and pour the entire marinade as well', '29: Sprinkle some chopped coriander, mint leaves and fried onions above', '30:  Then spread half of the cooked rice on the arranged chicken in the pot', '31: Sprinkle half of the fried onions, half of the chopped mint leaves and coriander leaves', '32: Spread out the balanced rice as the second layer on top of the first layer of rice', '33: Place the boiled eggs on top of it and also some green chilies', '34:  Then sprinkle the remaining fried onions, chopped mint leaves and coriander leaves', '35: Now sprinkle the remaining oil & ghee on the rice in a circular motion', '36:  In the same way sprinkle a handful of saffron milk on the rice', '37: Now close the lid and cook for 30 minutes on low flame', '38: After 30 minutes, turn off the flame and let the biryani rest for 15 minutes before opening', '39: Serve it with tomato chutney and raita']

ingredients: ['3 ears corn hulled', '3 wooden skewers', '¼ cup melted butter (55 g)', '½ cup mayonnaise (120 g)', '2 cups cotija cheese (225 g)', '3 teaspoons chili powder']
instructions: ['1: Boil the 3 ears corn for about 5 minutes', '2: Push a skewer through the middle of each ear of 3 ears corn', '3: Drain, then brush them evenly with the ¼ cup melted butter', '4: Spread a bit of mayo all over each ear of 3 ears corn', '5: Scoop the 2 cups cotija cheese generously on the 3 ears corn, making sure it covers all sides', '6: Sprinkle a little bit of the 3 teaspoons chili powder evenly across the 3 ears corn', '7: Serve!']

ingredients: ['Strawberry Syrup', '2 cups strawberry (300 g) quartered', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '1 cup sugar (200 g)', '1 tablespoon cornstarch optional', '1 tablespoon water optional', 'Buttermilk Pancakes', '1 egg', '3 tablespoons butter melted', '1 ½ cups buttermilk (360 mL)', '1 ½ cups all-purpose flour (185 g)', '2 tablespoons sugar', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '⅛ teaspoon salt', 'butter', 'whipped cream optional']
instructions: ['1: In a saucepan over medium heat, add the quartered strawberries, water, and 1 cup 2 tablespoons sugar', '2:  Stir until combined and bring to a boil', '3: Turn down the heat and simmer for 10 minutes', '4:  If the syrup is too thin, mix together the cornstarch and water and add it to the strawberries', '5:  Stir again and cook until thickened about 5 minutes', '6:  Set aside', '7: In a medium bowl, mix together the wet ingredients', '8: In a large bowl, mix together the dry ingredients', '9: Slowly add the wet ingredients to the dry and gently mix until just incorporated', '10:  Do not over-mix!Heat 1 tablespoon of butter on a skillet over medium heat', '11: Add ½ cup (145 g) of batter to the skillet and cook until bubbles form on the surface of the pancake', '12:  Flip and set aside', '13: Stack the pancakes and top with 2 cups strawberry syrup and a dollop of whipped cream']

ingredients: ['1 lb flank steak (455 g)', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '4 cloves garlic chopped', '1 yellow onion chopped', '3 bell peppers seeded diced', '9 medium flour tortillas', '3 cups shredded mexican cheese blend (300 g)', '8 oz monterey jack cheese (250 g) sliced into 1-inch (2 1/2 cm) pieces', '18 tortilla chips', '2 tablespoons fresh cilantro chopped']
instructions: ['1: Season 1 lb flank steak with 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon 3 3 bell pepper, 1 teaspoon cumin and 1 teaspoon chili powder', '2: Heat a pan over high heat', '3:  Add the 1 lb flank steak and cook for 3 minutes on each side', '4: Remove the 1 lb flank steak from the pan and let rest for 10 minutes', '5: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C)', '6: Turn heat down to 9 medium', '7:  Add oil, 4 cloves garlic and 1 yellow onion to the pan', '8:  Cook until 1 yellow onions are translucent', '9: Add the 3 bell 1 teaspoon 3 3 bell peppers, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1 teaspoon 3 3 bell pepper, and cook for 5 minutes, until softened', '10: Slice steak into ¼-inch (1 cm) cubes', '11: Add the cubed steak and stir to combine', '12:  Remove from heat', '13: Lay out one 9 medium 9 medium flour 18 tortilla', '14:  Sprinkle Mexican cheese in the center, place two 9 medium flour 18 tortilla chips side by side over it, place a 1-inch chunk of 8 oz monterey jack cheese over the 9 medium flour 18 tortilla chips and finally, add roughy two spoonfuls of fajita mix on top', '15: Fold the top part of the 9 medium flour 18 tortilla over the mix and towards yourself, rotate the 9 medium flour 18 tortilla and repeat, creating folds as you go', '16:  Continue until the entire 9 medium flour 18 tortilla is folded towards the center', '17:  Flip over and place on a small baking pan', '18: Cover with 3 cups shredded mexican blend cheese and bake for 25 minutes', '19: Top with 2 tablespoons fresh cilantro, serve']

ingredients: ['¼ cup orange juice (60 mL)', '1 orange peeled sliced', '1 mango peeled sliced', '3 large carrots peeled shredded', '1 ½ cups ice (225 g)']
instructions: ['1: Place the orange juice, orange, 1 mango, and 3 large carrots in a blender or food processor and blend until just combined', '2: Add in the 1 ½ cups ice and continue to blend until the mixture is smooth', '3: Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['3 ripe bananas', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '¾ cup peanut butter (180 g)']
instructions: ['1: Peel the 3 ripe bananas and slice into 1-inch (2 cm) slices', '2: Spread the 3 ripe bananas on a parchment-lined baking sheet and freeze for 2 hours', '3: Blend the frozen banana slices in a high-speed blender until they reach a smooth consistency', '4: Add the 1 tablespoon vanilla and ¾ cup peanut butter and blend to combine', '5: Transfer to a bowl or container and freeze for 1 hour, or until ready to serve', '6: Scoop out ice cream']

ingredients: ['½ cup low sodium soy sauce (120 mL)', '3 tablespoons water', '½ tablespoon garlic minced', '1 tablespoon cornstarch', '4 tablespoons honey', '3 skinless chicken breasts', '½ bell pepper sliced', '1 cup broccoli floret (250 g)', '1 cup baby carrot (120 g)', '1 cup green beans (360 g) trimmed', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 cups cooked brown rice (460 g) for serving', 'sesame seed for garnish', 'green onion for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400º F (200ºC)', '2: In a medium saucepan over medium heat, whisk together the ½ cup low sodium soy sauce, 3 tablespoons water, ½ tablespoon garlic, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, and 4 tablespoons honey', '3:  Allow the sauce to begin bubbling, then stir until sauce thickens', '4:  Remove from the heat', '5: Spoon a little of the teriyaki sauce onto the center of a large parchment-lined baking sheet', '6:  Lay the 3 skinless chicken on top of the sauce', '7:  Arrange the ½ bell ½ bell pepper, 1 cup broccoli, green beans, and carrots out on either side of the 3 skinless chicken', '8: Season the vegetables and 3 skinless chicken with salt and ½ bell pepper to taste', '9:  Coat everything well with teriyaki sauce, reserving some for later', '10: Bake for 20 minutes or until the 3 skinless chicken is 2 cups cooked through and juices run clear', '11: Remove the pan from oven and let cool', '12:  Slice the 3 skinless chicken into strips', '13: Distribute the 3 skinless chicken and vegetables evenly between 4 resealable containers filled with brown rice, separating vegetables for 4 different dishes, if desired', '14: Drizzle the remaining sauce over 3 skinless chicken and garnish with sesame seeds and green onion', '15: Refrigerate up to 4 days']

ingredients: ['Hummus', '15 oz chickpeas (425 g) 2 cans drained and rinsed', '3 cloves garlic', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL) plus more for serving', '1 lemon juiced', '2 tablespoons tahini sauce', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', 'salt to taste', 'Burger', '1 eggplant', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL)', '1 teaspoon paprika', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '2 hamburger buns', 'lettuce to serve', 'red onion sliced to serve']
instructions: ['1: Combine 15 oz chickpeas, garlic, 1 lemon juice, 2 tablespoons tahini, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, and salt in a blender and blend until smooth', '2: Slice 1 eggplants into four 1-inch (2 ½ cm) slices', '3:  Sprinkle 1 eggplant slices with salt and let sit for 20-30 minutes, then pat dry', '4: In a small bowl, stir together oil, 1 teaspoon paprika, garlic powder, red ½ teaspoon red ½ teaspoon pepper flakes, salt, and ½ teaspoon red ½ teaspoon pepper', '5: Brush each side of the 1 eggplant slices with the oil and spice mixture', '6: Heat a pan or grill on medium-high heat and cook each 1 eggplant slice for 3-4 minutes per side', '7: Build your burger with the hummus sandwiched between two 1 eggplant slices']

ingredients: ['¼ cup flour (30 g)', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '2 tablespoons sugar', '2 tablespoons cocoa powder', '⅛ teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons oil', '2 tablespoons milk', '1 chocolate truffle', '1 scoop ice cream optional']
instructions: ['1: In a bowl, add ¼ cup flour, 1 tsp 1 teaspoon baking powder, 2 tbsp 2 tablespoons sugar, 2 tbsp 2 tablespoons cocoa powder, and ⅛ tsp ⅛ teaspoon salt', '2:  Mix well', '3: Then, add 2 tbsp 2 tablespoons oil and 2 tbsp 2 tablespoons milk and mix to paste', '4:  Transfer this mix to a microwave-friendly bowl and add a 1 chocolate truffle in the middle', '5: Heat in the microwave for about 70 seconds and then top it off with 1 scoop ice cream (optional)']

ingredients: ['Rabbit', '1 egg hard-boiled', '1 carrot', '2 black sesame seeds', 'Hedgehog', '1 egg hard-boiled', '2 black sesame seeds', '1 black peppercorn', '1 straw', 'Owl', '1 egg hard-boiled', '1 stuffed olive', 'Mouse', '1 egg hard-boiled', '1 carrot', '2 black sesame seeds', '1 pink peppercorn', 'Preparation', 'Rabbit', '1 egg hard-boiled', '1 carrot', '2 black sesame seeds', 'Hedgehog', '1 egg hard-boiled', '2 black sesame seeds', '1 black peppercorn', '1 straw', 'Owl', '1 egg hard-boiled', '1 stuffed olive', 'Mouse', '1 egg hard-boiled', '1 carrot', '2 black sesame seeds', '1 pink peppercorn', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: To make the rabbit: Julienne the carrot and set aside', '2: Slice one side of the boiled egg so it sits longways', '3:  Chop the sliced egg white into tiny cubes and set aside', '4: To create the ears, use a paring knife and make two slits touching at one end', '5:  Do not slit too deep', '6:  Prop up the ears by stuffing the egg white cubes under the slits', '7: For the nose, poke a hole and place a piece of the julienned carrot', '8:  Place the black sesame seeds for eyes', '9: To make the hedgehog: Cut the tip of the straw on a diagonal', '10: Slice one side of the
