from the heat and bring back to temperature before serving', '51: Carve the 1 ½ teaspoon kosher ½ teaspoon kosher salt per pound (455g) of turkey: Transfer the 1 ½ teaspoon kosher ½ teaspoon kosher salt per pound (455g) of turkey to a 1 large cutting board with a lip to catch any juices', '52:  First, release the legs to make carving the rest of the bird easier', '53:  Using a sharp knife, cut along where the legs meets the breasts, being careful not to cut all the way through', '54:  Then, use your hands to pull the legs and thigh away from the carcass and tuck them under the wings to keep them in place', '55: Cut straight down along both sides of the breast bone until you can’t cut any further, then cut horizontally near the wing to release the breasts from the carcass', '56: Cut all the way through the legs to release from the hip joint', '57: Find where the shoulder meets the breast, then cut through that joint to remove the wings, using your hands to pull the wing away if the joint is tough to find', '58: Set the carcass aside--you can pick off any remaining meat for leftovers, or make stock from the whole carcass', '59: Slice the breasts crosswise, against the grain, then transfer to a serving platter', '60:  Cut the drumsticks from the thighs through the joint, wiggling the knife to find an easy release or pulling apart with your hands', '61:  Add the drumsticks to the platter', '62:  Cut the thigh meat away from the bone, then into bite-size pieces, and add to the platter', '63:  Release the flats from the wings by cutting through the joint, pulling apart with your hands if necessary, then add to the platter', '64: Rearrange the meat on the platter so the 1 larger pieces of meat with crispy, browned skin are on top', '65:  Garnish the platter with sage leaves and ½ lemon wedges, if desired', '66: Serve with the warm gravy']

ingredients: ['1 banana', '1 cup frozen pineapple (245 g)', '1 cup frozen peach (225 g)', '1 cup unsweetened almond milk (240 mL)', '3 cups kale (200 g) chopped']
instructions: ['1: Add 1 banana, 1 cup frozen pineapple, peaches, 1 cup unsweetened almond milk, and 3 cups kale to a blender and blend on high until smooth']

ingredients: ['2 lb ground beef (905 g)', '2 tablespoons kosher salt', '1 tablespoon black pepper', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '1 tablespoon chilli powder', '1 tablespoon smoked paprika ground', '1 teaspoon cayenne', '1 large onion chopped', '1 red bell pepper chopped', '6 cloves garlic minced', '2 chipotle peppers in adobo sauce chopped', '12 oz tomato paste (340 g)', '2 cups beef broth (480 mL)', '12 oz chopped tomato (340 g) 1 can', '15 oz black beans (425 g) 1 can', '15 oz red kidney bean (425 g) 1 can', '1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar optional', 'Cornbread Dumplings', '1 cup cornmeal (120 g)', '1 cup flour (125 g)', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 pinch salt', '2 eggs', '¼ cup honey (85 g)', '½ cup buttermilk (120 mL)']
instructions: ['1: In a 1 large bowl, mix the 1 cup flour, 1 cup cornmeal, 1 teaspoon baking 1 tablespoon chilli 1 teaspoon 1 teaspoon baking powder, and 2 tablespoons kosher 1 1 pinch salt', '2:  Mix and make a little well in the center', '3: Add the milk, 2 eggs, ¼ cup honey into the well, beat the 2 eggs and liquid first, and then combine with the rest of the dry ingredients', '4:  Set aside until chili is almost finished', '5: In a 1 large pot at medium high heat, add the beef, season with 2 tablespoons kosher 1 1 pinch salt, pepper, 1 tablespoon ground cumin, chili 1 tablespoon chilli 1 teaspoon 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1 tablespoon smoked paprika, 1 teaspoon cayenne, and cook until it is a deep brown color', '6: Add the onion, red bell 2 chipotle peppers 6 cloves garlic, and 1 large onion 1 red bell pepper 2 chipotle peppers in adobo sauce 12 oz chopped chipotles, and a 1 pinch of 2 tablespoons kosher 1 1 pinch salt', '7:  Cook until caramelized and soft, about 10 minutes', '8: Add the 12 oz 12 oz 12 oz chopped tomato paste and cook until the 12 oz 12 oz 12 oz chopped tomato paste gets dark and starts sticking to the bottom slightly', '9: Add in the canned diced 12 oz 12 oz 12 oz chopped tomatoes, beef broth, black beans, kidney beans, and 1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar (optional)', '10:  Stir until all is well incorporated', '11:  Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low to a simmer,Scoop and shape the cornbread batter into golf ball sized dumplings and place in the simmering chili', '12: Put a lid on the Chili and steam/simmer the dumplings 20 minutes or until the dumplings are cooked through', '13: Serve with cheddar cheese, sour cream, and sliced scallions']

ingredients: ['1 ⅓ lb ravioli (600 g)', '2 ¼ cups bolognese sauce (600 g)', 'shredded cheddar cheese']
instructions: ['1: NOTE: We used about 600g of each, Ravioli (1 ⅓lb) and Bolognese sauce (2 ¼cup)', '2:  Depending on your pan size this will vary', '3: Cover the base of a deep dish baking tray with a layer of 1 ⅓ lb ravioli', '4: Cover this with a thin layer of 2 ¼ cups bolognese sauce, use the back of a spoon to spread it around evenly', '5: Sprinkle a thin layer of grated shredded cheddar over the 2 ¼ cups bolognese sauce', '6: Put down another layer of 1 ⅓ lb ravioli, followed by another layer of 2 ¼ cups bolognese sauce', '7: Cover all of this with a generous topping of more grated cheese', '8: Cover the tray with tin foil and bake in the center of a pre-heated oven for 35 mins', '9:  200°C (400°F) Gas Mark 6', '10: Remove the tin foil and bake for a further 8-10 minutes, or until the cheese on top has melted and browned a bit']

ingredients: ['2 ½ cups raw almonds (350 g)', '1 ½ cups pitted date (255 g)', '⅓ cup pretzel (15 g)', '1 pinch salt', '3 tablespoons milk or water', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'greek yogurt for drizzling']
instructions: ['1: Line an 8-inch (20 cm) square baking dish with parchment paper', '2: Add the 2 ½ cups raw almonds, dates, pretzels, 1 pinch salt, 3 tablespoons milk, and 1 teaspoon vanilla to a food processor and pulse until the mixture starts to clump together', '3: Transfer the mixture to the prepared baking dish and press into an even layer', '4: Drizzle the top with Greek yogurt, if desired', '5: Chill for 1 hour', '6: Remove the bars from the baking dish by lifting the parchment paper', '7:  Cut into 12 individual bars', '8: Serve immediately or store in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 1 week']

ingredients: ['Totchos', '2 lb frozen tater tot (910 g)', '4 boneless skinless chicken thighs', '1 tablespoon whole grain mustard', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '½ red  onion sliced', '1 cup cheddar cheese (100 g)', '1 cup monterey jack cheese (100 g)', 'Honey Mustard Sauce', '2 tablespoons honey', '1 tablespoon whole grain mustard', '1 tablespoon dijon mustard', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'Optional Toppings', '½ cup cherry tomato (100 g) or grape tomato halved', '1 avocado sliced', 'sour cream', '2 scallions sliced']
instructions: ['1: Place 2 lb frozen tater tots on a baking sheet and bake at 450˚F (230˚C) for 20 minutes, or until crispy', '2:  Set aside', '3: In a large bowl, toss 4 boneless skinless chicken thighs with 1 tablespoon whole grain mustard, salt, pepper, and 1 tablespoon 2 tablespoons 1 tablespoon olive oil', '4: In a cast iron skillet, cook on high heat until there is a nice brown sear on the surface of the 4 boneless skinless chicken, and the inside is no longer pink', '5:  Roughly four minutes each side', '6:  Set 4 boneless skinless chicken aside', '7: Cook ½ red  onions until caramelized', '8:  Set ½ red  onions aside', '9: Cut the 4 boneless skinless chicken into bite-size cubes', '10: Wipe the skillet of excess fat', '11: Layer with cooked tater tots', '12:  Top with 4 boneless skinless chicken', '13: In a small bowl, combine all ingredients for 2 tablespoons honey mustard dressing', '14: Pour the dressing on the 4 boneless skinless chicken and tots', '15:  Top with ½ red  onion, then 1 cup cheddar and 1 cup monterey jack cheese', '16: Broil from 5-10 minutes, or until cheese is melted', '17: Load the dish with tomatoes, avocados, sour cream, and 2 scallions', '18:  Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['Beet Compound Butter', '1 beet steam and leaves removed', '18 tablespoons unsalted butter 2 1/4 sticks softened', 'Beet-Colored Dough', '2 cups flour (250 g)', '2 tablespoons sugar', '½ teaspoon salt', '6 tablespoons beet juice ice cold', 'Plain Dough', '1 cup flour (125 g)', '1 tablespoon sugar', '¼ teaspoon salt', '10 tablespoons unsalted butter 1 1/4 sticks cubed cold', '3 tablespoons water ice cold', 'Filling', '3 ½ cups blueberry (350 g)', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '¾ cup sugar (150 g)', '½ teaspoon salt', '3 tablespoons tapioca starch', '1 large egg beaten', '1 teaspoon water', '2 tablespoons turbinado sugar']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2: Wrap the 1 6 6 1 10 3 3 2 tablespoons beet in tin foil and place on a baking sheet', '3: Roast for 1 hour, until fork-tender', '4: Wearing gloves, peel the 1 6 6 1 10 3 3 2 tablespoons beet skin', '5: Add the 1 6 6 1 10 3 3 2 tablespoons beet to the bowl of a food processor and pulse until smooth', '6: In a medium bowl, add 3 18 2 6 1 10 3 3 2 tablespoons of the 1 6 6 1 10 3 3 2 tablespoons beet puree to the butter and use a spatula to mix until evenly colored', '7: Transfer the 1 6 6 1 10 3 3 2 tablespoons beet compound butter to plastic wrap, and refrigerate for at least 2 hours, or until very cold', '8: Make the Beet-Colored Dough: in the bowl of a food processor, add the flour, 2 6 1 10 3 3 2 tablespoons 1 10 3 3 2 tablespoon ¾ cup 2 tablespoons turbinado sugar, and salt, and pulse 2-3 times', '9: Add the cold, cubed 1 6 6 1 10 3 3 2 tablespoons beet compound butter and pulse 8-10 times until butter is pea-sized', '10: Transfer the dough to a 1 large mixing bowl, and gradually add the 1 6 6 1 10 3 3 2 tablespoons beet juice, 1 18 2 6 1 10 3 3 2 tablespoon at a time, mixing with your hands until the dough comes together', '11: Knead the dough on a work surface, and divide into two even discs', '12:  Wrap in plastic wrap and chill in the refrigerator overnight', '13: Make the Dough: in the bowl of a food processor, add the flour, 2 6 1 10 3 3 2 tablespoons 1 10 3 3 2 tablespoon ¾ cup 2 tablespoons turbinado sugar, and salt, and pulse 2-3 times', '14: Add the cold, cubed butter and pulse 8-10 times until butter is pea-sized', '15: Transfer the dough to a 1 large mixing bowl, and gradually add the ice 3 3 2 tablespoons 1 teaspoon water, 1 18 2 6 1 10 3 3 2 tablespoon at a time, mixing with your hands until the dough comes together', '16: Knead the dough on a work surface', '17:  Wrap in plastic wrap and chill in the refrigerator overnight', '18: Add the blueberries, 2 teaspoons lemon juice, 2 6 1 10 3 3 2 tablespoons 1 10 3 3 2 tablespoon ¾ cup 2 tablespoons turbinado sugar, salt, and tapioca starch to 1 large bowl and stir to combine', '19: Remove one 1 6 6 1 10 3 3 2 tablespoons beet dough disc from the refrigerator and place on a lightly floured work surface', '20:  Using a rolling pin, roll the dough into a 12-inch (30-cm) circle, adding more flour to the dough as necessary', '21: Place the rolled out dough in a 9-inch (23-cm) pie dish, trimming any excess dough to fit the dish', '22: Add the 3 ½ cups blueberry mixture to the pie dish', '23: Remove the other 1 6 6 1 10 3 3 2 tablespoons beet dough disc from the refrigerator and place on a lightly floured work surface', '24:  Using a rolling pin, roll the dough into a 12-inch (30-cm) circle, adding more flour to the dough as necessary', '25: Remove the plain dough disc from the refrigerator and place on a lightly floured work surface', '26:  Using a rolling pin, roll the dough into a 12-inch (30-cm) circle, adding more flour to the dough as necessary', '27: Using a ruler, cut the 1 6 6 1 10 3 3 2 tablespoons beet and plain dough into ½-inch (1-cm) strips, and create a lattice pattern of choice', '28:  Trim any excess dough', '29: Refrigerate the pie for 1 hour', '30: Preheat the oven to 425˚F (220˚C)', '31: In a bowl, whisk the beaten egg and 3 3 2 tablespoons 1 teaspoon water', '32: Using a pastry brush, brush the top of the crust with egg wash', '33:  Sprinkle the turbinado 2 6 1 10 3 3 2 tablespoons 1 10 3 3 2 tablespoon ¾ cup 2 tablespoons turbinado sugar on top', '34:  Cover the edges of the crust with a pie shield or tin foil', '35: Bake for 10-15 minutes, until the top is golden brown', '36: Reduce the oven temperature to 375˚F (190˚F)', '37: Continue baking for 40-45 minutes, until the crust is cooked through and filling is bubbling', '38: Let the pie rest at room temperature for at least one hour']

ingredients: ['INGREDIENTS TO SEASON THE CHICKEN:', '2 lb boneless skinless chicken thighs (1 kg) skin removed de-boned and cut into thick strips', '1 clove garlic minced', '¾ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon cumin powder', '¼ teaspoon pepper powder', '1 tablespoon fresh oregano chopped', '1 tablespoon fresh thyme chopped', 'INGREDIENTS FOR RICE:', '¼ cup vegetable oil (60 mL)', '½ cup onion (75 g) diced', '⅔ cup carrot (100 g) diced', '1 lb chorizo sausage (425 g) sliced', '2 cups basmati rice (400 g)', '⅔ cup red bell pepper (65 g) diced', '⅔ cup green bell pepper (65 g)', '2 cups chicken broth (480 mL)', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon saffron', '1 cup beer (240 mL)', '2 tablespoons caper vinaigre', '¼ cup small capers (30 g)', '1 cup green pea (100 g) cooked', '½ cup pimento-stuffed green olives (90 g)', '⅓ cup fresh cilantro (15 g) chopped']
instructions: ['1: Place the chicken bones in a pot with water to cook for 20 minutes and strain the liquid', '2:  Add the salt and 1 teaspoon saffron to the water so that it releases the color', '3: Mix the spices in a bowl and season the chicken', '4:  Brown the chicken and set aside', '5:  Then, in the same pan, brown the ½ cup onion with carrots and chorizos', '6:  Add the 2 cups basmati rice and stir together, browning', '7: Add green peppers, ⅔ cup red peppers, chicken, and boiling chicken broth with 1 teaspoon saffron and 1 cup beer', '8:  Cover the pan and simmer for 17 minutes', '9: After 17 minutes add  peas, olives, 2 tablespoons ¼ cup small ¼ cup small capers and 2 tablespoons ¼ cup small caper vinaigrette to the top of the dish', '10:  Cover and cook for 3 more minutes', '11:  Uncover, add the coriander and stir', '12: Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['2 cups cream cheese (450 g) softened', '½ cup sour cream (115 g)', '3 cups shredded mozzarella cheese (300 g) divided', '½ cup grated parmesan cheese (55 g)', '6 garlic cloves minced', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '12 oz frozen spinach (340 g) thawed and well drained', '10 oz artichoke heart (285 g) drained and chopped', '1 loaf french bread sliced in half lengthwise', '2 tablespoons fresh parsley for serving']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: In a medium bowl, mix together the cream cheese, sour cream, 1 cup mozzarella, the Parmesan, 6 garlic, ½ teaspoon red pepper flakes, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, and ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '4:  Fold in the 12 oz frozen spinach and artichoke hearts', '5: Set the French bread on the prepared baking sheet, cut side up', '6:  Spread the 12 oz frozen spinach artichoke mixture over both halves of the bread', '7:  Top with the remaining 2 cups of mozzarella', '8: Bake the 6 garlic bread for 8–10 minutes, until the cheese is melted', '9:  Turn the broiler to high and broil for 1–2 minutes, until golden and bubbling', '10: Let the 6 garlic bread cool for about 5 minutes, then slice and serve']

ingredients: ['Steamed Bao Buns', '1 cup warm water (240 mL)', '2 tablespoons organic sugar', '1 tablespoon instant yeast', '3 cups all purpose flour (375 g) plus more for dusting', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 tablespoons sesame oil divided', 'Seared Glazed Tofu', '1 cup scallion (100 g) sliced', '¼ cup fresh ginger (15 g) minced', '5 cloves garlic minced', '¼ cup organic sugar (50 g)', '2 tablespoons chinese 5 spice', '¼ cup soy sauce (60 mL)', '¼ cup shaoxing rice wine (60 mL)', '¼ cup dark soy sauce (60 mL)', '12 oz firm tofu (340 g) pressed and sliced', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', 'Pickled Vegetables', '1 cup cucumber julienned', '1 red pepper seeded and julienned', '1 cup daikon radish (150 g) julienned', '1 cup carrot (120 g) julienned ', '1 yellow pepper seeded and julienned ', '2 jalepenoes sliced', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '½ cup organic sugar (100 g)', '1 cup rice vinegar (240 mL)', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', 'For Serving', 'hoisin sauce', 'scallion sliced', 'sesame seed', 'Special Equipment', 'small rolling pin or wooden dowel', '12 small squares parchment papers']
instructions: ['1: Make the bao buns: Add the warm water, 2 tablespoons organic ¼ cup organic ½ cup organic sugar, and yeast to a liquid measuring cup', '2:  Whisk to combine, then set aside to bloom, five minutes', '3: In a large bowl, whisk together the 3 cups all purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking powder, and 1 teaspoon kosher 1 tablespoon kosher salt', '4:  Make a well in the center', '5:  Add the yeast mixture and vegetable oil to the well and stir with a wooden spoon until a soft dough begins to form', '6:  Transfer the dough to a clean surface and knead until smooth and elastic, about 3 minutes', '7:  Keep extra 3 cups all purpose flour nearby in case the dough sticks to the surface or your hands', '8:  Shape into a ball', '9: Lightly grease a clean large bowl with 1 tablespoon of sesame oil', '10:  Place the dough in the bowl, cover with plastic wrap, and let rise in a warm place until doubled in size, about 2 hours', '11: Meanwhile marinate the 12 oz firm tofu: In a medium bowl, whisk together the scallions, ginger, 5 cloves garlic, 2 tablespoons organic ¼ cup organic ½ cup organic sugar, five-spice, soy sauce, rice wine, and dark soy sauce', '12: Add the 12 oz firm tofu to a separate medium bowl and pour the marinade over', '13:  Cover with plastic wrap and marinate in the refrigerator for 1 hour', '14: Make the pickled vegetables: Prepare the cucumber, 1 red pepper, daikon, carrot, 1 yellow pepper, and jalapeños and set aside while you make the brine', '15: In a large pot or deep pan over high heat, combine the water, 2 tablespoons organic ¼ cup organic ½ cup organic sugar, rice vinegar, and 1 teaspoon kosher 1 tablespoon kosher salt', '16:  Stir until the 2 tablespoons organic ¼ cup organic ½ cup organic sugar dissolves, then bring the mixture to a boil', '17: Add the vegetables the brine', '18:  Stir to submerge, then remove the pot from the heat', '19:  Let sit while you sear the 12 oz firm tofu and bake the buns, about 1 hour, then drain', '20: Once the bao dough has risen, turn it out onto a 3 cups all purpose floured surface', '21:  Divide the dough in half, then cut each half into 2 ounce pieces', '22:  Roll each piece into a ball', '23: Working 1 at a time, flatten a ball with your palm on a lightly 3 cups all purpose floured surface', '24:  Use a small rolling pin or wooden dowel to roll the dough out to a 5-inch round', '25:  Brush the top with sesame oil, fold it in half, and transfer it to a square of parchment paper set on a 1 teaspoon baking sheet', '26:  Repeat with the remaining dough', '27:  Cover the bao buns with a kitchen towel and let rest for 10 minutes', '28: Bring a pot of water to a boil and set a bamboo steamer on top', '29:  Working in batches, transfer a few of the folded dough rounds at a time to the steamer, making sure the buns are not too crowded', '30:  Cover the steamer and steam the buns for 8-10 minutes, until the buns puff up and form a skin on the outside', '31:  Very carefully, lift the lid and remove the buns from the steamer', '32:  Repeat with the rest of the buns, keeping the steamed buns warm as they finish by covering with a towel', '33: Sear the 12 oz firm tofu: Remove the 12 oz firm tofu from the marinade and pat dry with paper towels', '34:  Reserve the marinade', '35: Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over high heat', '36:  Add the 12 oz firm tofu and sear on one side until deep brown in color, about 5 minutes', '37:  Flip and cook on the other side until deep brown, 5 minutes more', '38:  Remove the 12 oz firm tofu from the pan', '39: Pour the reserved marinade into the skillet on medium heat and 1 reduce until thick and syrupy, about 5 minutes', '40:  Return the 12 oz firm tofu to the pan and stir to coat with the glaze', '41:  Remove the pan from the heat', '42: To serve, slather the inside of the bao buns with hoisin sauce, then add the pickled vegetables, glazed 12 oz firm tofu, sliced scallions, and sesame seeds']

ingredients: ['⅓ cup chickpeas (65 g)', '⅓ cup cherry tomato (65 g) halved', '1 tablespoon feta cheese', '1 teaspoon pesto']
instructions: ['1: Combine all ingredients in a small bowl', '2: Mix thoroughly', '3:  Serve']

ingredients: ['Crust', '1 ½ cups walnuts (150 g) chopped', '1 cup shredded coconut (75 g) or coconut flakes', '1 cup pitted date (175 g)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 splash water', '1 pinch sea salt', 'Key Lime Layer', '2 ¼ cups raw cashew (295 g)', '½ cup key lime juice (120 mL)', '¼ cup maple syrup (55 g)', '2 tablespoons vanilla extract', 'lime zest', '⅓ cup coconut oil (70 g)', 'shredded coconut or coconut flakes for garnish']
instructions: ['1: The night before you intend to make your ½ cup key ½ cup key lime bars, place cashews in a bowl of 1 splash water and let soak overnight', '2: Add 1 ½ cups walnuts, coconut, dates, vanilla extract, 1 splash water, and 1 pinch sea salt to a food processor or blender and pulse until sticky mounds begin to form', '3: Press the crust into an 8x8-inch (20x20-cm) freezer-safe, parchment paper-lined pan', '4: Drain the cashews well and add to the food processor', '5:  Blend until smooth', '6: Scrape down the sides of the processor and add ½ cup key lime juice, ¼ cup maple syrup, vanilla extract, and ½ cup key lime zest', '7: Blend until smooth, adding the coconut oil halfway', '8: Spread the mixture on top of your crust and garnish with more ½ cup key lime zest and coconut', '9: Cover with foil and freeze for 3 hours or until set', '10: Remove from freezer, slice, and serve']

ingredients: ['1 lb farfalle pasta (455 g) or any short pasta', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '3 hot italian sausages', '3 sweet italian sausages', '1 red bell pepper large diced', '1 green bell pepper large diced', '1 yellow bell pepper large diced', '½ white onion sliced', '2 cloves garlic sliced', '28 oz diced tomato (795 g)', '1 teaspoon oregano', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon black ground pepper']
instructions: ['1: Bring a large pot of water to a rolling boil, add a generous amount of 1 teaspoon salt, and cook 1 lb farfalle pasta 2 minutes less than the package instructions', '2: Strain 1 lb farfalle pasta and set aside', '3:  Toss with a small amount of oil to prevent stickingIn the same pot, heat 1 tbsp of 1 tablespoon olive oil and fry sausages, working in batches as needed, until deeply browned on all sides', '4: Remove sausages, slice in ¾-inch (2 cm) rings, and set aside', '5: Sauté all of the bell peppers, ½ white onion, and 2 cloves garlic for about 2 minutes', '6: Add the canned tomatoes, all of the spices, and the sausage slices to the pot', '7: Simmer about 10 minutes', '8: Add the 1 lb farfalle pasta back to the pot and stir gently until all the ingredients are coated in the sauce', '9:  Continue simmering until 1 lb farfalle pasta is al dente', '10: Serve with grated parmesan']

ingredients: ['4 cups white rice (920 g) cooked', 'Pork Cutlet', '4 boneless pork chops', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '4 shiso leaves', '4 slices mozzarella cheese', '½ cup flour (60 g)', '3 eggs', '3 cups panko breadcrumbs (150 g)', 'oil for frying', 'Japanese Curry', '1 tablespoon oil', '½ onion sliced', '2 medium potatoes cubed', '1 medium carrot diced', '3 cups water (720 mL)', '⅓ cup japanese curry paste (75 g)']
instructions: ['1: Season the 4 boneless pork chops on both sides with salt and pepper', '2: Cut a large slit through the side of the 4 boneless pork chops', '3: Place the cheese in the pocket of the 4 boneless pork chop', '4:  Place a slice of mozzarella on top of a 4 shiso leaf, then fold it in half', '5: Repeat with the remaining 4 boneless pork chops', '6: Dredge the 4 boneless pork in the ½ cup flour, shaking off excess', '7:  Dip the 4 boneless pork in the egg, then roll evenly in the bread crumbs then back into the egg, then back into the bread crumbs', '8: Repeat with the other 4 boneless pork chops', '9: Heat oil over medium-high heat until about 360°F (185˚C)', '10: Fry the 4 boneless pork chops one at a time until golden brown, then drain on a paper towel', '11: Sauté the onions until translucent, then add the potatoes and carrots', '12:  Cook for about 1 minute, then add the 3 cups water, bringing to a boil', '13: Lower the heat and simmer for about 10 minutes', '14: Add the ⅓ cup japanese curry paste, then stir until dissolved', '15: Cook for another 10 minutes on low heat, then set aside', '16: Slice the 4 boneless pork cutlets into ½-inch (1-cm) 4 slices', '17: To serve, place the 4 boneless pork cutlet 4 slices over the 4 cups white rice, then pour a generous serving of ⅓ cup japanese curry on half of the 4 boneless pork']

ingredients: ['1 ¾ cups buttermilk (400 mL)', '2 eggs', '8 chicken drumsticks', '8 ½ cups vegetable oil (2 L)', 'Herbs and Spices Mix', '2 cups flour (250 g)', '2 teaspoons salt', '½ tablespoon dried thyme', '½ tablespoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon celery salt', '½ tablespoon black pepper', '1 tablespoon mustard powder', '2 tablespoons paprika', '2 tablespoons garlic salt', '1 tablespoon powdered ginger', '1 tablespoon white pepper', 'Preparation', '1 ¾ cups buttermilk (400 mL)', '2 eggs', '8 chicken drumsticks', '8 ½ cups vegetable oil (2 L)', 'Herbs and Spices Mix', '2 cups flour (250 g)', '2 teaspoons salt', '½ tablespoon dried thyme', '½ tablespoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon celery salt', '½ tablespoon black pepper', '1 tablespoon mustard powder', '2 tablespoons paprika', '2 tablespoons garlic salt', '1 tablespoon powdered ginger', '1 tablespoon white pepper', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Beat the eggs into the buttermilk', '2: Add the chicken pieces to the buttermilk mixture and chill for an hour', '3: In a large mixing bowl, mix the flour with all the herbs and spices', '4: Coat the soaked chicken pieces in the herbed flour mixture, shaking off any excess', '5: Heat oil in a large sauce pan to 325˚F (170°C), then turn to low heat', '6: Fry the chicken in batches for 15 minutes until the chicken is cooked and the skins turn golden brown', '7: Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate']

ingredients: ['2 chicken breasts', 'Marinade', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', '½ teaspoon pepper', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 garlic clove sliced', '1 tablespoon ginger chopped', 'Dressing', '¼ cup rice vinegar (60 mL)', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 tablespoon sugar', '1 garlic clove grated', '1 teaspoon ginger grated', 'Salad', '2 romaine lettuces chopped', '1 cup red cabbage (100 g)', '½ cup carrots (55 g) grated', '¼ cup green onion (25 g) chopped', '¼ cup cilantro (10 g) chopped', '¼ cup almond slice (25 g)', '¼ cup fried wonton chip (20 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, combine marinade ingredients', '2: Add 2 chicken into the bowl, coat the 2 chicken, and marinate for 30 minutes in the fridge', '3: Fully cook 2 chicken', '4: Cut into cubes', '5: In a mason jar, combine ingredients for the dressing', '6:  Shake and set aside', '7: Prep the salad', '8:  Add all of the salad ingredients into a large bowl and add the cubed 2 chicken and dressing', '9:  Toss']

ingredients: ['2 medium sweet potatoes', '3 tablespoons avocado oil', '½ teaspoon pepper optional', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 cup dry quinoa (175 g)', '1 teaspoon coconut amino', '8 oz fresh goat cheese (225 g) (equal to one small log)', '2 tablespoons milk', '1 teaspoon apple cider vinegar', '⅛ teaspoon sweet paprika optional', '2 sprigs fresh tarragon or herb of choice', '8 kale chips optional', '4 eggs optional']
instructions: ['1: PREPARE THE POTATOES:Preheat the oven to 375°F', '2:  Line a sheet tray with parchment paper', '3: Wash and cut the potatoes lengthwise into ¾-inch slices', '4:  Rub with 2 tablespoons of avocado oil', '5:  Dust with ½ teaspoon pepper and a pinch of salt', '6: Evenly space the toasts on the sheet tray', '7:  Roast until lightly browned, about 15 minutes', '8:  Remove from the oven and let cool', '9: PREPARE THE QUINOA:Rinse the 1 cup dry quinoa in a fine-mesh strainer', '10: Add 2 tablespoons of olive oil to a pot with a tight-fitting lid set on 2 medium heat', '11:  When the oil is shimmering, add the 1 cup dry quinoa', '12:  Stir to coat, then cook until fragrant and lightly toasted, about 2 minutes', '13: Add 2 cups (480 ml) of water and a pinch of salt to the pot, then increase the heat and cover', '14:  As soon as the liquid comes to a boil, turn down the heat to create a gentle simmer', '15: Cook until the water is absorbed, about 20 minutes', '16:  Remove from the heat, uncover, and add the 1 teaspoon coconut aminos, using a fork to fluff and stir the 1 cup dry quinoa', '17: Heat the remaining avocado oil in a skillet set on 2 medium heat', '18:  When the oil is shimmering, add half the 1 cup dry quinoa and stir to coat', '19:  Cook, stirring occasionally, until golden brown and crispy, about 15 minutes', '20:  Transfer to a plate lined with a paper towel', '21:  Then, repeat the process with the remaining 1 cup dry quinoa', '22: PREPARE THE CHEESE:Add the 8 oz fresh goat cheese, milk, and 1 teaspoon apple cider vinegar to a small food processor', '23:  To this, add the ⅛ teaspoon sweet paprika', '24: Wash and chop the herbs, including any delicate stems, then add to the food processor', '25:  Blend until smooth', '26: TO SERVE:Heat the “toasts” and place one or two slices on each plate', '27: Crumble a spoonful or two of the cheese spread on top of each serving', '28: Fry one egg per person and place it on top of each serving of toast', '29:  Crumble more cheese spread on top of the fried 4 eggs', '30: Sprinkle each serving generously with the crispy 1 cup dry quinoa', '31: Crush the 8 kale chips and sprinkle on top of each serving', '32: Plate and serve']

ingredients: ['3 large russet potatoes', '⅓ cup olive oil (80 mL)', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon paprika', '½ cup vegetarian parmesan cheese (55 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Thoroughly wash 3 large russet potatoes, cut in half, and slice into wedges', '3: Toss wedges in ⅓ cup olive oil and seasonings', '4: Place on a baking sheet, skin side down', '5: Bake 40-50 minutes']

ingredients: ['8 oz cream cheese (225 g)', '1 ½ cups shredded mozzarella cheese (150 g)', '5 oz spinach (25 g) cooked and chopped', '16 oz artichoke heart (455 g)', '½ cup grated parmesan cheese (55 g)', '¾ cup sour cream (170 g)', '1 cup milk (240 mL)', '20 oz frozen ravioli (570 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 375ºF (190ºC)', '2: In a large bowl, mix together the 8 oz ¾ cup ¾ cup sour cream cheese, 1 ½ cups shredded mozzarella, 5 oz spinach, 16 oz artichoke hearts, Parmesan cheese, ¾ cup sour 8 oz ¾ cup ¾ cup sour cream, and 1 cup milk', '3: Pour a third of the 5 oz spinach 16 oz artichoke mixture in a large glass baking dish and spread it evenly over the bottom', '4: Line the tray with half of the 20 oz frozen ravioli, spread more sauce over the top, then add the rest of the ravioli and cover with the remaining sauce', '5: Bake for 30–35 minutes, or until browned']

ingredients: ['Patties', '1 lb ground turkey (455 g)', '⅓ cup red onion (50 g) minced', '1 jalapeño pepper minced', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 ½ teaspoons cumin', '1 teaspoon smoked paprika', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil for cooking', 'Toppings', 'sesame seed bun', 'shredded lettuce', 'sliced tomato', 'pepper jack cheese', 'avocado', 'Chipotle Mayo', '½ cup mayonnaise (120 g)', '2 tablespoons canned chilies in adobo', '½ lime juiced']
instructions: ['1: Place 1 lb ground turkey, ⅓ cup red onion, 1 jalapeño, and spices together in a large bowl and mix together until all the ingredients are incorporated', '2: Lightly wet your hands and use them to shape 4 circular patties about 4 inches (10 cm) in diameter', '3: Heat up about 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil in a pan over medium heat', '4: Cook burgers for 2 minutes on the first side, then flip, lower heat to low, and cook them for an additional 5-6 minutes', '5:  Top with pepper jack cheese during the last minute', '6: NOTE: The 1 lb ground turkey burgers must be cooked through', '7:  Use a meat thermometer to check each patty for an internal temperature of at least 165˚F (75˚C) before removing from pan', '8: Assemble the burgers as desired with sesame seed bun, chipotle ½ cup mayonnaise,  shredded lettuce, sliced tomato, avocado, and preferred condiments']

ingredients: ['For the Dough', '1 ½ cups warm water (360 mL)', '2 teaspoons caster sugar', '1 teaspoon dried yeast (5 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '¼ cup olive oil (40 mL)', '1 lb white bread flour (500 g)', 'For the BBQ Sauce', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 red onion diced', '2 garlic cloves peeled and crushed', '2 teaspoons smoked paprika', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '½ teaspoon ground ginger', '½ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ cup ketchup (120 g)', '6 tablespoons rice vinegar (30 mL)', '¼ cup light brown sugar (70 g)', 'Knorr Vegetable Stock Pot', '2 ½ cups jackfruit (400 g)', '1 red onion sliced', '1 green pepper sliced', '1 cup passata (200 g)', '1 cup pineapple (150 g) choppedd', '3 cups mozzarella cheese (300 g) grated', 'dried oregano', 'rocket']
instructions: ['1: Start by making the pizza dough', '2:  Add the 2 teaspoons caster ¼ cup ¼ cup light brown sugar to your 1 ½ cups warm water and stir to dissolve', '3:  Next add the yeast, stir to combine and leave to activate for 10 minutes', '4: Meanwhile, add the strong 1 lb white bread flour and salt to a large bowl and stir to combine', '5:  Once your yeast is bubbly and alive add to your dry ingredients along with your ¼ cup olive ¼ cup olive 1 tablespoon oil', '6: Bring together into a dough and turn out onto a floured work surface', '7:  Knead for 10-15 minutes or until nice and elastic', '8: Lightly grease a large bowl and place your kneaded dough in the bowl', '9:  Cover and leave to prove for 1 hour or until doubled in size', '10: Whilst you are waiting for that lovely dough to rise, get on with your BBQ sauce', '11:  Place a saucepan over a medium heat and add the ¼ cup olive 1 tablespoon oil, red onion and 2 garlic', '12:  Cook for 5-6 minutes stirring occasionally', '13: Next add the 2 tsp 2 teaspoons smoked paprika, ½ tsp ½ teaspoon cayenne pepper, ½ tsp ground ginger, ½ tsp ground cinnamon, 1 tsp salt', '14:  Stir and toast the spices for 1-2 minutes', '15: Add the ½ cup ketchup, 6 tablespoons rice vinegar, ¼ cup light brown 2 teaspoons caster ¼ cup ¼ cup light brown sugar, Knorr Vegatable Stock Pot and 300ml of hot water', '16:  Stir, bring to a simmer and cook for 20 minutes', '17:  Once cooked, puree in a blender', '18:  Set aside', '19: Preheat the oven to 190C', '20: Place your 2 ½ cups jackfruit, red onion, 1 green pepper on a baking tray along with 6 tbsp of your BBQ sauce', '21:  Stir until your veggies are nicely coated with your BBQ sauce', '22:  Roast in the oven for 25 minutes', '23:  Once starting to char and nicely roasted pull the 2 ½ cups jackfruit, give everything a good stir and place into a bowl', '24: When you are ready to cook your pizzas turn your oven up as high as it will go!  Next simply remove your dough from the bowl, stretch into a rough sausage shape and divide the dough into four', '25: Stretch the dough out thin into a pizza shape and top with 1 cup passata, your 2 ½ cups jackfruit mix, 1 cup pineapple chunks and lashings of 3 cups mozzarella cheese', '26:  Place onto a baking tray and bake for 8-10 minutes or until the bottom is crispy, the 3 cups mozzarella cheese is bubbling and the crust is charring', '27: Once cooked top an extra drizzle of BBQ sauce, dried oregano and rocket', '28:  Serve & enjoy!']

ingredients: ['2 ripe bananas sliced', '2 tablespoons honey', '1 teaspoon almond extract', '1 ¼ cups rolled oats (125 g)', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '2 cups full-fat yogurt (490 g) as needed', 'Topping Options', 'raspberry as desired', 'blueberry as desired', 'strawberry as desired', 'sliced almond as desired']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C', '2: )In a medium bowl, mash the 2 ripe bananas into a paste', '3: Pour in the 2 tablespoons honey and almond extract, and mix until well combined', '4: Sprinkle on the rolled oats and 1 teaspoon cinnamon and mix until incorporated', '5: Evenly divide the oats into a greased 12-cup muffin tin', '6: Use your fingers to mold the oats into a cup shape in each of the muffin cups', '7: Bake for 15 minutes, until the oatmeal cups have set', '8: Remove the oatmeal cups from the muffin tin and place them on a serving plate', '9: Place a spoonful of yogurt in each cup and top with your choice of toppings']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '3 large leeks chopped', '3 cloves garlic minced', '2 lb potato (910 g) cubed', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '6 cups vegetable broth (1.5 L)', '2 cups water (480 mL)', '2 sprigs fresh thyme', '1 bay leaf', '¼ cup fresh chives (10 g) chopped', 'hot sauce to taste']
instructions: ['1: Melt 2 tablespoons butter on medium heat in a 3 large pot', '2:  Add the chopped leeks and stir until coated with 2 tablespoons butter', '3: Cover the pot and lower heat, cook for around 10 minutes until the leeks have softened', '4: Increase to medium-high', '5:  Add 3 cloves garlic, potatoes, salt, and pepper', '6:  Cook for 1 minute, then add 6 cups vegetable broth, 2 cups water, 2 sprigs fresh thyme, and 1 bay leaf', '7:  Bring to a boil', '8: Lower heat and cover pot with a lid and simmer for 15 minutes, or until potatoes are tender and easily speared by a fork', '9: Uncover and remove 2 sprigs fresh thyme and 1 bay leaf', '10: Use an immersion or countertop blender to blend the soup until smooth', '11: Stir in ¼ cup fresh chives and hot sauce (optional)', '12: Allow to cool 2 minutes and serve']

ingredients: ['1 cup shredded chicken (125 g) leftover', '1 cup enchilada sauce (250 g) divided', '1 cup cheese blend (100 g) divided', '5 tortillas', 'sour cream to serve', 'fresh cilantro to serve']
instructions: ['1: Mix the 1 cup shredded chicken, half of the 1 cup enchilada sauce, and half of the 1 cup cheese blend in a bowl', '2: Wrap the 5 tortillas in a paper towel and microwave for 30 seconds', '3: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C)', '4: Place the 1 cup shredded chicken on the tortilla and roll tightly', '5: Place the 1 cup enchiladas in a baking pan and top with remaining sauce and 1 cup cheese', '6: Bake for 15 minutes, or until 1 cup cheese has melted', '7: Top with sour cream and fresh cilantro']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons salted butter', '1 cup medium yellow onion (150 g) chopped', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 cup white button mushroom (75 g) chopped', '1 cup cremini mushroom (75 g) chopped', '1 cup shiitake mushroom (75 g) chopped', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '¼ cup white wine (60 mg)', '4 cups vegetable stock (960 mL)', '⅓ cup heavy cream (80 mL)', '1 sprig fresh parsley for garnish']
instructions: ['1: In a large saucepan over 1 cup medium-high heat, melt the 2 tablespoons 2 tablespoons 1 teaspoon salted butter, then add the onion and saute until translucent, 3 minutes', '2:  Add the 2 cloves garlic and stir, then cook for 1 more minute', '3: Add the mushrooms, 2 tablespoons 1 teaspoon salt, and 1 teaspoon pepper and cook until they begin to turn golden brown, about 5 minutes', '4: Add the 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour and stir to coat the mushrooms, until combined', '5: Add the white wine, stir, and cook until combined, about 1 minute', '6: Add the 4 cups vegetable stock, stir, and simmer for 15 minutes', '7: Add the ⅓ cup heavy cream and stir to combine', '8: Blend soup to your desired consistency with an immersion blender or standing blender', '9: Serve hot, garnished with 1 sprig fresh parsley']

ingredients: ['Filling', '1 cup raspberry (125 g)', '1 cup blackberry (125 g)', '2 tablespoons maple syrup divided', '1 tablespoon black raspberry liqueur', '4 oz cream cheese (115 g) softened', 'French Toast', '4 slices brioche bread', '½ cup whole milk (120 mL)', '1 large egg beaten', '2 tablespoons black raspberry liqueur', '½ teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons butter', 'Whipped Cream', '½ cup heavy cream (120 mL)', '1 tablespoon maple syrup']
instructions: ['1: Make the filling: Add the raspberries, 1 cup 1 tablespoon 2 tablespoons blackberries, 1 cup 1 tablespoon 2 tablespoons black 1 cup 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon 2 tablespoons black 2 tablespoons 2 tablespoons black raspberry liqueur, and 1 tablespoon of 2 tablespoons 1 tablespoon maple syrup to a 1 large bowl', '2:  Stir and let sit for 10 minutes for the berries to macerate', '3: In a medium bowl, mix together the 4 oz ½ cup ½ cup heavy cream cheese and remaining tablespoon of 2 tablespoons 1 tablespoon maple syrup until smooth', '4: Spread the filling evenly over the 4 4 slices of bread', '5:  Arrange some of the berries on 2 4 slices of the bread and top with the other 4 slices of bread', '6:  Press to seal the pieces together', '7: In a shallow dish, whisk together the ½ cup whole milk, egg, 1 cup 1 tablespoon 2 tablespoons black 1 cup 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon 2 tablespoons black 2 tablespoons 2 tablespoons black raspberry liqueur, and ½ teaspoon salt', '8: Melt the 2 tablespoons butter on a griddle or in a 1 large skillet over medium heat', '9:  Quickly dip both sides of the bread pockets in the ½ cup whole milk mixture, then transfer to the pan and fry on each side for about 3 minutes, until golden brown', '10: In a 1 large bowl, beat the ½ cup heavy 4 oz ½ cup ½ cup heavy cream until soft peaks form', '11:  Add the 2 tablespoons 1 tablespoon maple syrup and continue beating until the 4 oz ½ cup ½ cup heavy cream holds medium peaks', '12: Serve the stuffed French toast with a dollop of 2 tablespoons 1 tablespoon maple whipped 4 oz ½ cup ½ cup heavy cream and a scoop of macerated berries with their soaking liquid']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil divided', '1 medium yellow onion diced', '12 oz cremini mushroom (340 g) sliced', '3 cloves garlic', '½ teaspoon dried thyme', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ cup dry white wine (60 mL)', '½ tablespoon vegan worcestershire', '¼ cup flour (30 g)', '2 cups vegetable broth (480 mL)', '1 ½ cups almond milk (360 mL)', '8 oz fusilli pasta (225 g) uncooked', 'fresh parsley chopped for serving garnish']
instructions: ['1: In a large pot, heat 1 2 ½ tablespoon of 2 2 ½ tablespoons olive oil over 1 medium heat', '2:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the onion and cook for 3-4 minutes, until semi-translucent', '3: Add the mushrooms and cook until most of the juices have evaporated', '4: With your spoon, make a space in the center of the pot', '5:  Drizzle in the remaining 2 ½ tablespoon of 2 2 ½ tablespoons olive oil and add the 3 cloves garlic, ½ teaspoon dried thyme, ¼ teaspoon pepper, and ½ teaspoon salt', '6: Cook for 2-3 minutes, until fragrant', '7:  Then, add the ¼ cup dry white wine and vegan Worcestershire sauce and stir until incorporated', '8: Add ¼ cup flour and stir until fully combined', '9:  Then add the 2 cups vegetable broth, 1 ½ cups almond milk, and 8 oz fusilli pasta, and stir until well-combined', '10: Cover and increase the heat to 1 medium-high', '11:  Let cook for 10-15 minutes, or until the liquid is creamy and 8 oz fusilli pasta is cooked', '12: Serve immediately, garnished with fresh parsley']

ingredients: ['8 slices frozen garlic toast', 'Pepperoni Garlic Bread Pizza', '2 tablespoons pizza sauce', '¼ cup shredded mozzarella cheese (25 g)', '6 pepperonis', 'Veggie Lovers Garlic Bread Pizza', '2 tablespoons pizza sauce', '¼ cup shredded mozzarella cheese (25 g)', '2 teaspoons bell pepper diced', '3 slices zucchini cut intro halves', '4 slices button mushroom', '6 slices black olive', 'Bacon Jalapeño Garlic Bread Pizza', '2 tablespoons ranch dressing', '¼ cup shredded mozzarella cheese (25 g)', '¼ cup bacon (60 g) cooked and crumbled', 'pickled jalapenos', 'Margherita Garlic Bread Pizza', '4 slices roma tomato', '¼ cup shredded mozzarella cheese (25 g)', '1 teaspoon fresh basil leaf']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 450°F (230°C)', '2: Arrange the frozen garlic toast on the prepared baking sheet', '3: Make the pepperoni garlic bread pizza: Top 2 slices of garlic toast with the pizza sauce, mozzarella, and pepperoni', '4: Make the veggie lovers garlic bread pizza: Top 2 slices of garlic toast with the pizza sauce, mozzarella, 2 teaspoons bell pepper, zucchini, mushrooms, and olives', '5: Make the ¼ cup bacon jalapeño garlic bread pizza: Top 2 slices of garlic toast with the 2 tablespoons ranch, mozzarella, crumbled ¼ cup bacon, and pickled jalapeño slices', '6: Make the margherita garlic bread pizza: Top 2 slices of garlic toast with the tomato slices and mozzarella', '7: Bake for 8–12 minutes, until the bread is crispy and warmed through and the cheese is melted', '8:  Garnish the margherita garlic bread pizzas with the 1 teaspoon fresh basil']

ingredients: ['2 ½ cups rolled oats (250 g)', '4 large eggs room temperature', '1 cup full-fat greek yogurt (285 g)', '¾ cup honey (255 g)', '¼ cup lemon juice (60 mL)', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', '¼ cup poppy seeds (30 g)', '2 ¼ teaspoons baking powder', '1 pinch salt']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C', '2: )Using a food processor, grind the 2 ½ cups rolled oats until they have become a fine powder', '3:   Set aside', '4: In a 4 large bowl, whisk the eggs until pale and foamy', '5: Add the Greek yogurt to the eggs and whisk until the mixture is smooth', '6: Add in the ¾ cup honey, lemon juice, and lemon zest and whisk until well combined', '7: Sprinkle the oat flour, ¼ cup poppy seeds, 2 ¼ teaspoons baking powder, and 1 pinch salt', '8:  Fold the ingredients together until no dry oat flour appears', '9: Pour the batter into a greased loaf pan', '10: Bake for 30-35 minutes, until a golden-brown crust has started to form and the loaf springs back when touched', '11: Let the loaf cool for 15 minute before removing it from the pan', '12: Slice and serve']

ingredients: ['1 head cauliflower divided into florets', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 teaspoons cumin', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '½ teaspoon chili powder', '1 teaspoon salt']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 450˚F (220˚C)', '2: In a mixing bowl combine the 1 head cauliflower, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 2 teaspoons cumin, 1 teaspoon turmeric, ½ teaspoon chili powder, and 1 teaspoon salt and mix with tongs until evenly coated', '3: Place seasoned 1 head cauliflower on parchment lined baking sheet and roast in preheated oven for 15 minutes or until lightly browned']

ingredients: ['puff pastry store bought', '4 large potatoes Russet', '1 large onion', '3 green chili peppers optional', '½ green pepper', '½ yellow pepper', '1 bunch fresh cilantro', '1 teaspoon turmeric powder', '2 teaspoons coriander seeds', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon red chili powder', '½ teaspoon asafetida', '2 teaspoons coriander powder', '2 teaspoons amchur powder', '2 teaspoons chaat masala', 'salt to taste', '1 tablespoon oil']
instructions: ['1: Defrost puff pastry according to package instructions', '2: Make stuffing:Boil 4 large potatoes till fork tender', '3:  Let cool', '4:  Then, in a saucepan over medium heat, add 1 tablespoon oil', '5: When 1 tablespoon oil is hot, add roughly crushed coriander seeds, 1 teaspoon cumin, and ½ teaspoon asafetida', '6:  When 1 teaspoon cumin crackles, add 1 large onions and green chili peppers', '7: Let 1 large onions become translucent, then add the green and ½ yellow peppers, followed by 1 teaspoon turmeric 1 teaspoon turmeric 1 teaspoon red chili 2 teaspoons coriander 2 teaspoons amchur powder, and 1 teaspoon red chilly 1 teaspoon turmeric 1 teaspoon red chili 2 teaspoons coriander 2 teaspoons amchur powder', '8: Let the vegetables sweat a little, roughly 4-5 minutes', '9:  Take the mix off the heat', '10: In a different bowl, peel and mash 4 large potatoes', '11: Add the 1 large onion-pepper mix to the boiled 4 large potatoes, and add rest of the spices and salt', '12:  Add 1 bunch fresh cilantro', '13:  Mix well', '14:  The stuffing is ready', '15: To assemble:Take one puff pastry sheet and roll it out a little', '16: Add the stuffing to half the side and roll it up like a barrel, making sure the edges are sealed', '17:  Use a little water (or egg) to help seal the edges', '18: Using dental flow (or sharp knife), cut discs from the barrel and lay them flat on your parchment lined baking sheet', '19: Repeat with another puff pastry sheet', '20: Bake in a preheated 400°F oven for 18-20 minutes', '21: Serve hot with chutneys of choice']

ingredients: ['Cake', '1 ¼ cups hot water (300 mL)', '4 earl grey teabags', '2 ¾ cups medjool date (500 g) pitted', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '½ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '¾ cup butter (170 g) room temperature', '¾ cup caster sugar (170 g)', '¾ cup dark brown sugar (170 g)', '3 eggs', '2 ¾ cups self-raising flour (350 g)', 'Caramel Sauce', '1 cup butter (250 g)', '⅔ cup golden caster sugar (125 g)', '¾ cup dark brown sugar (125 g)', '½ cup dark rum (100 mL)', '1 ¼ cups double cream (300 mL)', 'Preparation', 'Cake', '1 ¼ cups hot water (300 mL)', '4 earl grey teabags', '2 ¾ cups medjool date (500 g) pitted', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '½ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '¾ cup butter (170 g) room temperature', '¾ cup caster sugar (170 g)', '¾ cup dark brown sugar (170 g)', '3 eggs', '2 ¾ cups self-raising flour (350 g)', 'Caramel Sauce', '1 cup butter (250 g)', '⅔ cup golden caster sugar (125 g)', '¾ cup dark brown sugar (125 g)', '½ cup dark rum (100 mL)', '1 ¼ cups double cream (300 mL)', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: In a small bowl, steep the teabags in the hot water for about 5-10 minutes', '2: Let cool and take the teabags out, keeping the water', '3: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C (350°F)', '4: In a blender, blend the the medjool dates, cinnamon, nutmeg and teabag water to a smooth puree', '5: For the cake, in a large bowl add the butter and both sugars, cream together using a wooden spoon until light and fluffy', '6: Next, beat in the eggs one by one, using a metal spoon', '7: Fold in the flour, followed by the puree', '8: Pour into a thoroughly greased bundt cake tin and smooth out the top', '9: Bake in the oven for about 45 minutes, until golden brown and cooked through', '10: Prepare the caramel sauce by melting the butter and two sugars together in a saucepan over a low-medium heat', '11: Stir in the rum and double cream', '12: Bring to the boil and simmer for about 5 minutes', '13: Pour into a jug and leave to cool', '14: Once the cake is ready, flip onto a cooling rack', '15: Using a pastry brush, gently brush some of the caramel sauce all over the bundt cake so that it is completely covered', '16:  This will help keep the cake nice and moist', '17: Pour what’s left of the caramel over the top of the cake']

ingredients: ['3 lb chicken (1.3 kg) cubed', 'Marinade', '¼ medium white onion diced', '¼ cup fresh scallion (25 g) chopped', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 tablespoon fresh cilantro chopped', '3 tablespoons curry powder', '4 sprigs fresh thyme', '2 tablespoons fresh parsley chopped', '2 teaspoons salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '2 tablespoons oil', '½ medium white onion diced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '2 tablespoons curry powder', '¼ cup fresh scallion (25 g) chopped', '13.5 oz coconut milk (890 mL) 1 can', 'pepper to taste', '1 ½ cups chicken broth (360 mL)', 'fresh cilantro for garnish']
instructions: ['1: In a large mixing bowl, combine the chicken with the onion, scallions, garlic, cilantro, curry powder, 4 sprigs fresh thyme, 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, 2 teaspoons salt, and pepper', '2:   Mix and let marinate for at least 1 hour in the refrigerator', '3: Heat the 2 tablespoons oil in a medium skillet over medium heat until shimmering, and add the onion and garlic', '4:  Cook for 1-2 minutes, until fragrant', '5: Add the curry powder and stir well, cooking for 3-4 minutes more', '6: Add the scallions and 13', '7: 5 oz coconut milk, increase the heat to medium-high, and cook for 8-10 minutes, until the 13', '8: 5 oz coconut milk is boiling and begins to thicken', '9: Add the marinated chicken and stir well', '10:  Cook the chicken for 5 minutes, or until starting to brown', '11:  Season with pepper', '12: Add the chicken broth to the pot and stir', '13: Bring to a rolling boil and cover the pot', '14:  Simmer for 30 minutes, until the sauce thickens into a gravy', '15: Garnish with cilantro']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 cup green onion (100 g) chopped', '15 oz fresh spinach (420 g)', '4 cloves garlic chopped', '1 cup feta cheese (225 g)', '½ cup ricotta cheese (110 g)', '¼ cup fresh dill (10 g) chopped', '¼ cup fresh parsley (5 g) chopped', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '8 sheets phyllo dough']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: In a large pan over medium heat, cook the 1 cup green onions and 4 cloves garlic in the 2 tablespoons olive oil until soft', '3: Add half the 15 oz fresh spinach, giving time for some to cook down before adding the rest', '4: Once the 15 oz fresh spinach has cooked down, transfer to a medium mixing bowl to cool slightly', '5: Add the 1 cup feta, ½ cup ricotta, egg, ¼ cup fresh dill, ¼ cup fresh parsley, 1 teaspoon salt and 1 teaspoon pepper, and mix until evenly spread', '6: Set in refrigerator', '7: Lay out one sheet of phyllo dough on a dry surface', '8:  Using a pastry brush, coat evenly with 2 tablespoons olive oil', '9: Add another sheet of phyllo dough on top of the oiled sheet and repeat the oiling process', '10:  Continue until there is a stack of 4 oiled 8 sheets', '11:  Repeat process on a new stack with remaining 4 8 sheets', '12: Cut your dough into 4 sections using a pizza cutter', '13: With a single section, add a spoonful of your 15 oz fresh spinach mix and begin folding over your pastry, brushing each fold with oil', '14:  Repeat this process for the remaining sections', '15: Bake in a preheated oven for 25-30 minutes or until golden brown']

ingredients: ['5 lb boneless pork shoulder (2 kg)', '3 tablespoons achiote paste', '2 tablespoons guajillo chili powder', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon cumin', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 tablespoon pepper', '¾ cup white vinegar (175 mL)', '1 cup pineapple juice (240 mL)', '1 pineapple skinned and sliced into 1-inch (2 cm) rounds', 'For Serving', '10 small corn tortillas', '1 white onion finely chopped', '1 cup fresh cilantro (40 g) finely chopped', '1 cup salsa (260 g)', '1 avocado diced', '2 limes cut into wedges', 'Special Equipment', '1 thick wooden skewer trimmed to the height of your oven']
instructions: ['1: Slice the 5 lb boneless pork shoulder into about 1-centimeter (¼ in) slices, then transfer to a large dish or bowl', '2:  In a medium bowl, combine the 3 tablespoons achiote paste, 2 tablespoons guajillo chili powder, 1 tablespoon garlic powder, 1 tablespoon dried oregano, 1 tablespoon cumin, 1 tablespoon salt, 1 tablespoon pepper, ¾ cup white vinegar, and pineapple juice, mashing and stirring until smooth with no lumps', '3:  Pour the marinade over the 5 lb boneless pork slices, then toss to make sure they are coated on all sides', '4:  Cover the bowl with plastic wrap, then refrigerate for at least 2 hours or up to 3 days', '5: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '6:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil', '7: Place a slice or two of the pineapple on the baking sheet', '8:  Take a 1 thick wooden skewer and push it directly in the middle of the pineapple', '9:  Remove the 5 lb boneless pork from the fridge and push the slices through the skewer, layering one after the other until there is a 1-inch (2 ½ cm) gap at the top', '10:  Push another pineapple slice on top', '11: Bake for about 1½ hours, until the 5 lb boneless pork is slightly charred on the outside and deep red', '12:  Rest the meat for about 10 minutes, then carve off thin slices of 5 lb boneless pork and roasted pineapple', '13: To assemble, place some 5 lb boneless pork on the tortillas, followed by a few pieces of pineapple, a sprinkling of 1 white onion, a pinch of 1 cup fresh cilantro, and a spoonful of 1 cup salsa, and some diced 1 avocado', '14:  Serve with lime 2 limes cut into wedges']

ingredients: ['20 oz apple pie filling (565 g) 2 cans', '1 box spice cake mix', '8 oz butter (225 g)', 'vanilla ice cream optional for serving']
instructions: ['1: Combine the Apple Pie filling, 1 box spice cake mix, and 8 oz butter in the slow cookerBake on High for 2 to 2', '2: 5 hoursServer a la mode with vanilla ice cream or your favorite whipped cream']

ingredients: ['7 ½ cups water (1.8 kg)', '1 medium yellow onion cut into large wedges', '2 medium plum tomatoes quartered', '3 salmon steaks', '3 green serrano peppers', '1 packet tamarind soup sinigang sa sampalok - mix as knorr', '½ lb tiger prawns (225 g) headless shells and tails on', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '6 okra pods', '8 green beans trimmed and cut into 2 in (5 cm) pieces', '1 japanese eggplant or chinese eggplant cut into ½-inch-thick rounds then quartered', '6 bok choys', '2 tablespoons fish sauce', '1 cup fresh spinach (40 g)', 'jasmine rice cooked for serving']
instructions: ['1: Add the 7 ½ cups water to a large pot and bring to a boil over medium heat', '2:  Add the onion and tomatoes', '3:  Cover and cook until softened, 20 minutes', '4: Add the 3 salmon steaks, cover again, and cook for 8 minutes, until the 2 tablespoons fish is starting to flake (or 5 minutes, if using fillets)', '5: Add the serrano peppers and 1 packet tamarind soup mix and bring to a boil', '6:  Cover, reduce the heat to medium-low, and simmer for 5 minutes', '7: Add the ½ lb tiger prawns and ½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '8:  Cover and cook for 3 minutes, until the ½ lb tiger prawns are cooked through', '9: Add the 6 okra, green beans, 1 japanese eggplant, and 6 bok choy', '10:  Cover and simmer for 10 minutes, until the vegetables are tender', '11: Add the 2 tablespoons fish sauce', '12:  Cover again and simmer for 2 minutes, until the flavors have blended', '13: Add the 1 cup fresh spinach, turn off the heat, and cover the pot until the 1 cup fresh spinach has wilted, 2–3 minutes', '14: Serve the 3 salmon sinigang with jasmine rice']

ingredients: ['10 cups water (2.5 L)', '3 whole star anise', '6 cinnamon sticks', '½ cup piloncillo (100 g) plus more to taste', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '3 tablespoons raisin', '10 red crab apples', '1 bag sugar cane pre-cut', '6 guavas halved', '10 tejocotes', '3 cups apple juice (720 mL) plus more to taste']
instructions: ['1: In a medium pot, bring the 10 cups water to a rolling boil over high heat', '2:  Add the 3 whole star anise, 6 cinnamon, ½ cup piloncillo, and 1 teaspoon sea salt and stir to dissolve the 1 teaspoon sea salt and ½ cup piloncillo', '3:  Add the raisins, 10 red crab 10 red crab 3 cups apples, 1 bag sugar cane, 6 guavas, and tejocote', '4:  Boil for 5–6 minutes, then remove the pot from the heat', '5: Cover the pot and steep for about 30 minutes, until the flavors have melded', '6: Return the mixture to a boil', '7:  Add the 10 red crab 3 cups apple juice and stir to combine', '8:  Adjust the sweetness and 10 red crab 3 cups apple flavor by adding more 10 red crab 3 cups apple juice or ½ cup piloncillo, if needed', '9: Serve warm']

ingredients: ['8 chicken wings', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'potato starch to dredge', 'frying oil as needed', 'Sweet Soy Glaze', '½ cup soy sauce (100 mL)', '¼ cup mirin (50 mL)', '¼ cup sugar (50 g)', '¼ cup sake (50 mL)', '1 clove garlic grated', 'Garnish', 'toasted white sesame seed']
instructions: ['1: Preheat frying oil to about 160˚C (320˚F)', '2: Season both sides of the 8 chicken wings with salt and pepper', '3:  Coat with potato starch', '4: Fry the wings at 160˚C (320˚F) approximately 7 minutes', '5: Heat frying oil to about 180˚C (350˚F)', '6:  Fry the wings until golden brown, about 3 minutes', '7:  Drain them on paper towels', '8:  Set aside', '9: Make the glaze', '10:  Combine all the glaze ingredients in a shallow pan and bring it to a simmer', '11:  Reduce until thick', '12:  Toss in the wings', '13: Sprinkle toasted white sesame', '14: Nutrition  Calories: 3085 Fat: 255 grams  Carbs: 189 grams Fiber: 12 grams  Sugars: 25 grams  Protein: 22 grams']

ingredients: ['1 package extra firm tofu drained and pressed', 'Crema Sauce', '⅓ cup mayonnaise (80 g)', '⅓ cup mexican crema (110 g)', '1 tablespoon lime juice', '½ teaspoon ancho chile powder', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', 'Fried Tofu', '⅓ cup rice wine vinegar (80 mL)', '6 ¼ cups canola oil (1.5 L) divided', '1 lemon juiced', '1 lemon zest', '¼ cup caper brine (60 mL)', '1 nori sheet roughly chopped', '2 teaspoons sugar', '½ teaspoon kosher salt plus more to taste', '1 ½ cups all purpose flour (185 g) divided', '1 ¼ cups dark Mexican lager beer (300 mL)', 'For Serving', '8 flour tortillas', 'pico de gallo', 'red cabbage finely shredded', 'lime wedges', 'Preparation', '1 package extra firm tofu drained and pressed', 'Crema Sauce', '⅓ cup mayonnaise (80 g)', '⅓ cup mexican crema (110 g)', '1 tablespoon lime juice', '½ teaspoon ancho chile powder', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', 'Fried Tofu', '⅓ cup rice wine vinegar (80 mL)', '6 ¼ cups canola oil (1.5 L) divided', '1 lemon juiced', '1 lemon zest', '¼ cup caper brine (60 mL)', '1 nori sheet roughly chopped', '2 teaspoons sugar', '½ teaspoon kosher salt plus more to taste', '1 ½ cups all purpose flour (185 g) divided', '1 ¼ cups dark Mexican lager beer (300 mL)', 'For Serving', '8 flour tortillas', 'pico de gallo', 'red cabbage finely shredded', 'lime wedges', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Set the pressed tofu on a baking sheet and freeze for at least 4 hours, up to overnight', '2:  Let thaw completely, then cut into 8 ½-inch-thick strips', '3:  (Freezing is optional, but will give the tofu a meatier texture', '4: )Meanwhile, make the crema sauce: In a medium bowl, whisk together the mayonnaise, crema, lime juice, ancho chile powder, and salt', '5:  Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve', '6: In a wide, shallow dish, whisk together the rice wine vinegar, ¼ cup canola oil, lemon juice and zest, caper brine, nori, sugar, and salt', '7:  Add the tofu to the marinade and turn to coat', '8:  Cover and refrigerate for 30–60 minutes, flipping once halfway through', '9: Heat the remaining 6 cups of canola oil in a wide, shallow pan over medium-high heat until the temperature reaches 375°F (190°C)', '10: Add ½ cup flour to a medium plate', '11:  In a medium bowl, whisk together the remaining cup of flour and the beer until a thick, but pourable, batter (similar to pancake batter) forms', '12: Working in batches of 4–5 strips at a time, remove the tofu from the marinade and dredge in the flour, shaking off any excess, then dip in the beer batter', '13:  Transfer to the hot oil and fry for 5–7 minutes, until golden brown on all sides', '14:  Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate and immediately sprinkle with salt', '15: Assemble the tacos: Add 1 piece of fried tofu to each tortilla, then top with 2–3 tablespoons of pico de gallo and a handful of shredded cabbage and drizzle with 1–2 tablespoons of the crema sauce', '16:  Serve immediately with lime wedges alongside']

ingredients: ['2 cups unsweetened dessicated coconut (200 g)', '1 can sweetened condensed milk', '½ teaspoon ground cardamom', '¾ cup unsweetened finely shredded coconut (75 g)', 'ghee or coconut oil for greasing', '1 tablespoon pistachio finely crushed for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Add the 2 cups unsweetened dessicated coconut to a large nonstick skillet over low heat', '2:  Cook, stirring frequently, until lightly toasted and aromatic, about 2 minutes', '3: Add the 1 can sweetened condensed milk and stir until well combined', '4:  Turn off the heat and keep stirring until it forms a soft, cohesive dough, 3–5 minutes', '5:  Add the ½ teaspoon ground cardamom and stir to incorporate', '6: Transfer the dough to a bowl and place in the fridge for 5 minutes, until firm and cooled', '7: Add the finely shredded coconut to a shallow dish', '8: Grease your hands with ghee or coconut oil', '9:  Scoop about 1½ tablespoons of the ladoo mixture into your hands at a time and roll in rounds', '10: Roll the balls in the shredded coconut to coat evenly', '11: Arrange the ladoos on a plate and refrigerate for about 5 minutes to harden', '12: Garnish with the crushed pistachios, then serve', '13: Enjoy!RECIPE BY: Kamana Bhaskaran']

ingredients: ['½ cup cold water (120 mL)', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '½ cup fresh sage leaf (15 g) roughly chopped plus whole leaves for garnish', '2 oz gin (60 mL)', '1 ½ oz grapefruit juice (45 g)']
instructions: ['1: Make the ½ cup fresh sage simple syrup: In a small saucepan over medium heat, combine the ½ cup cold water, ½ cup sugar, and chopped ½ cup fresh sage leaves', '2:  Bring to a low boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes, until the ½ cup sugar is fully dissolved and the ½ cup fresh sage is fragrant', '3:  Remove from the heat and let cool for 5-10 minutes', '4:  Strain through a fine-mesh sieve', '5:  Store remaining ½ cup fresh sage syrup in the refrigerator for up to 1 month', '6: In a cocktail shaker filled halfway with ice, combine the 2 oz gin, 1 ½ oz grapefruit juice, and 1 tablespoon of ½ cup fresh sage simple syrup', '7:  Shake vigorously for 30 seconds', '8:  Strain into a coupe glass', '9: Garnish with ½ cup fresh sage leaves']

ingredients: ['2 cups fresh basil (80 g) packed', '2 cups fresh arugula (40 g) packed', '⅓ cup olive oil (80 mL) plus 1 tablespoon divided', '⅓ cup walnuts (30 g)', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '¾ teaspoon salt plus more to taste', '2 cloves garlic quartered', '¼ teaspoon pepper plus more to taste', '2 tablespoons water', '1 medium zucchini sliced', '15 oz white bean (425 g) 1 can drained and rinsed', '¾ cup sun-dried tomato (40 g)', '¼ cup pine nuts (30 g)', '3 ½ cups quinoa (595 g) cooked']
instructions: ['1: In a food processor, combine the 2 cups fresh basil, 2 cups fresh arugula, ⅓ cup (80 ml) olive oil, the walnuts, lemon juice, ¾ teaspoon salt, the 2 cloves garlic, ¼ teaspoon pepper, and the 2 tablespoons water, and pulse until smooth', '2:  Set aside', '3: Heat the remaining ⅓ cup olive oil (80 mL) plus 1 1 2 tablespoon of olive oil in a large skillet over 1 medium heat', '4:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the zucchini and cook for 3-4 minutes, until slightly tender', '5:  Season with salt and pepper and cook for another 2 minutes, until lightly browned', '6: Add the 15 oz white beans and sun-dried tomatoes and cook for 3-4 more minutes, until the beans begin to crisp', '7:  Add the pine nuts and cook for 2-3 more minutes, until toasted', '8: Transfer the zucchini mixture to a 1 medium bowl with the 3 ½ cups quinoa', '9:  Add the pesto and stir until well-combined', '10: Distribute the 3 ½ cups quinoa between 4 airtight containers and refrigerate for up to 5 days', '11: Nutrition  Calories: 1407 Fat: 109 grams  Carbs: 135 grams Fiber:  23 grams  Sugars: 18 grams  Protein: 39 grams']

ingredients: ['1 head cauliflower', '2 pork chops diced', '4 cloves garlic finely diced', '½ onion sliced', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '¼ cup honey (85 g)', '3 eggs beaten', '½ cup green onion (50 g) sliced']
instructions: ['1: Remove all leaves and cut the 1 head cauliflower into small florets', '2: Place the florets in a food processor and blend until they are a rice-like texture', '3:  Be careful not to over process or it may turn mushy', '4:  Set aside, and drain excess moisture with a towel, if desired', '5: In a large saucepan over medium-high heat, cook the 2 pork until no pink is showing, then add the 4 cloves garlic, onions, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon pepper, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, and ¼ cup honey, stirring until the sauce has started to brown', '6: Stir until most of the liquid has reduced, then add the 1 head cauliflower rice', '7:  Cook for about 3-4 minutes until the 2 pork is incorporated evenly into the 1 head cauliflower', '8: Spread the rice towards the edge of the pan, creating a well in the center', '9: Pour the beaten 3 eggs into the well, stirring only the 3 eggs until they are cooked', '10: Fold the 3 eggs into the rice, then mix in the ½ cup green onions']

ingredients: ['2 lb frozen tater tot (910 g)', 'Buffalo Chicken', '2 ½ cups rotisserie chicken (310 g) shredded bones and skin discarded', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '¾ cup buffalo sauce (215 g)', '2 green onions thinly sliced', 'Cheese Sauce', '1 ½ cups shredded sharp cheddar cheese (150 g)', '1 tablespoon cornstarch', '1 cup evaporated milk (240 mL)', '1 tablespoon buffalo sauce', 'Garnish', '6 strips smoked bacon cooked and diced', '¼ cup blue cheese dressing (60 g)', '1 green onion thinly sliced', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C)', '2: Arrange 2 lb frozen tater tots on a 11x17 inch (28x43 cm) nonstick baking sheet', '3: Place 6 strips of bacon on a separate baking sheet, and bake along with the 2 lb frozen tater tots', '4: Bake the 2 lb frozen tater tots according to package directions, about 20-25 minutes, flipping halfway', '5: While the bacon and 2 lb frozen tater tots cook, prepare your buffalo mixture and cheese sauce', '6: In a mixing bowl, season 2 ½ cups rotisserie chicken lightly with a pinch of salt and pepper', '7:  Add the green onions and buffalo sauce', '8:  Mix well and keep warm', '9: In a pot, combine 1 ½ cups shredded sharp cheddar cheese and 1 tablespoon cornstarch', '10:  Stir until cheese is well coated with the 1 tablespoon cornstarch', '11:  Set the saucepan set over medium heat, adding in 1 cup evaporated milk and buffalo sauce', '12: Bring sauce to simmer, whisking constantly until cheese has melted and sauce has thickened, about 5-8 minutes', '13:  Set aside and keep warm over very low heat', '14:  Stirring occasionally to prevent burning', '15: Once crispy, remove bacon from oven', '16:  Place 6 strips on top of a paper towel to strain excess fat', '17:  Chop 6 strips into a rough dice', '18:  Set asideRemove 2 lb frozen tater tots from the oven once lightly browned on the bottom', '19:  Lightly season with a pinch of salt and pepper', '20: To assemble totchos, layer 2 lb frozen tater tots followed by the cheese sauce and buffalo 2 ½ cups rotisserie chicken onto your serving platter', '21: Garnish with ¼ cup blue cheese dressing, remaining buffalo sauce, bacon and remaining green onions']

ingredients: ['Salad', '20 brussels sprouts shaved', '1 avocado diced', '6 green onions diced', '1 cup fresh spinach (40 g)', '7 slices bacon cooked and cut into 1/2 inch (1 cm) pieces', '⅓ cup parmesan cheese (35 g)', '¼ cup dried cranberries (30 g)', '¼ cup sliced almonds (35 g)', 'Lemon Vinaigrette', '4 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 tablespoon dijon mustard', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon pepper', '½ tablespoon salt', '4 tablespoons olive oil']
instructions: ['1: Slice the stems off the Brussels sprouts and cut each one in half, then thinly slice', '2:  Transfer the shaved sprouts to a medium bowl and break apart with your hands', '3: To prepare the vinaigrette, 4 tablespoons lemon juice the lemons into a small bowl and remove the seeds', '4: Add the 1 tablespoon dijon mustard, 1 tablespoon dried oregano, 1 tablespoon pepper, and ½ tablespoon salt', '5:  Whisk to combine', '6: Slowly add the 4 tablespoons olive oil while continuing to whisk until evenly blended', '7: Slice the 1 avocado and remove the pit, then dice', '8: Trim the ends of the scallions, then dice', '9: In a large bowl, combine the Brussels sprouts and 1 cup fresh spinach', '10: Add the 1 avocado, 7 slices bacon, scallions, Parmesan cheese, ¼ cup dried cranberries, and ¼ cup sliced almonds', '11: Pour the dressing evenly over the salad', '12: Toss thoroughly until well mixed']

ingredients: ['1 banana', '¼ cup oat flour (20 g)', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '2 tablespoons honey', '1 egg white', '½ teaspoon cinnamon']
instructions: ['1: Mix together 1 egg white and 2 tablespoons honey in a greased coffee mug', '2: Add ¼ cup oat flour, ½ teaspoon baking powder, and ½ teaspoon cinnamon, and mix until combined', '3: Add in fresh bananas', '4: Microwave on high for 90 seconds (times may vary)']

ingredients: ['Muffins', '1 ¾ cups all-purpose flour (215 g)', '2 teaspoons cinnamon', '½ teaspoon ground ginger', '½ teaspoon ground cardamom', '½ teaspoon nutmeg', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '½ teaspoon salt', '2 cups applesauce (520 g)', '1 ¼ cups brown sugar (275 g)', '2 large eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '½ cup vegetable oil (120 mL)', 'Cheesecake Filling', '8 oz cream cheese (225 g) room temperature', '¼ cup granulated sugar (50 g)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '2: Make the muffin batter: In a 2 large bowl, whisk together the 1 ¾ cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons cinnamon, ginger, cardamom, nutmeg, baking soda, and salt with a fork', '3: In a separate 2 large bowl, combine the 2 cups applesauce, 1 ¼ cups brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, and vegetable oil', '4:  Mix with a fork, then gradually incorporate the dry ingredients until the batter is thick and smooth', '5: Make the cheesecake filling: In a medium bowl, use a fork to mix together the 8 oz cream cheese, sugar, and vanilla until fluffy and smooth', '6: Grease a 2 12-cup muffin tin with nonstick spray', '7: Scoop about ¼ cup (30 g) of muffin batter into each cup', '8:  Add a teaspoon of cheesecake filling to the center of each cup', '9:  Use a toothpick to swirl the cheesecake into the batter', '10: Bake for 18 minutes, or until the muffins are springy and lightly 1 ¼ cups browned around the edges', '11: Let cool for 5 minutes before serving']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 medium onion sliced', '3 cloves garlic minced', '3 cups jackfruit (450 g) fresh or canned', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '1 teaspoon paprika', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon vegan worcestershire', '1 teaspoon liquid smoke', '2 cups vegetable stock (480 mL)', '½ cup vegan bbq sauce (120 g)', 'Serving', '6 vegan buns', 'vegan coleslaw']
instructions: ['1: Preheat your oven to 350ºF (180ºC)', '2: Oil a large knife and cut the 3 cups jackfruit in half', '3: NOTE: If using fresh 3 cups jackfruit, line your work surface with plastic wrapCarefully remove the core of the 3 cups jackfruit by cutting into it at an angle', '4: Pull each fruit out and remove its seeds and outer coating', '5:  Rinse the fruit thoroughly then dry', '6: NOTE: You can save the seeds to roast', '7: Heat the 2 tablespoons olive oil over 1 medium heat in a large pan or Dutch oven', '8: Add the onions and 3 cloves garlic, and cook until translucent', '9: Add the 3 cups jackfruit, spices, Worcestershire, and 1 teaspoon liquid smoke', '10:  Stir to coat evenly', '11: Add the 2 cups vegetable stock and bring to a simmer', '12:  Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 45 minutes, until the 1 teaspoon liquid is mostly absorbed and the fruit has broken down', '13: Spread the 3 cups jackfruit on a prepared baking sheet', '14: Bake for 75 minutes, until the 1 teaspoon liquid has baked out and the 3 cups jackfruit has a deeper brown color', '15: Pour the vegan barbecue sauce over the 3 cups jackfruit', '16: Mix and return to the oven for 15 minutes', '17: Serve warm on vegan buns with vegan coleslaw']

ingredients: ['1 lb frozen blackberry (455 g)', '¼ cup honey (85 g) or preferred sweetener']
instructions: ['1: In the bowl of a food processor or high-speed blender, blend the blackberries and ¼ cup honey until thoroughly combined', '2:  Pour into a rectangular loaf pan and smooth into an even layer', '3: Freeze for 2 hours, or until 1 lb frozen but still soft enough for scooping', '4:  If freezing overnight, cover with a lid or plastic wrap, and let it sit out at room temperature for 5-10 minutes before serving']

ingredients: ['3 tablespoons butter', '1 lb shrimp (455 g) deveined with tails removed', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '3 cloves garlic minced', '½ teaspoon red chili flakes', '1 tablespoon fresh parsley chopped', '3 tablespoons lemon juice']
instructions: ['1: Melt 3 tablespoons butter in a pan over medium heat', '2: Spread the 1 lb shrimp around in the pan in a single layer, sprinkling the 1 teaspoon salt and ½ teaspoon pepper on top, then cook until the 3 tablespoons butter is starting to turn a dark brown', '3:  Flip the 1 lb shrimp, add the 3 cloves garlic and ½ teaspoon red chili flakes, and cook for about 15-30 seconds', '4: Add the 1 tablespoon fresh parsley and 3 tablespoons lemon juice, reducing the 3 tablespoons lemon juice down to a sauce, then remove from heat', '5: Serve and enjoy!']

ingredients: ['neutral oil for greasing', '1 tablespoon whole grain mustard', '1 tablespoon honey', '3 cloves large garlic thinly sliced', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 ½ lb salmon fillet (680 g) center-cut']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C)', '2:  Grease a rimmed baking sheet with neutral oil', '3: In a small bowl, stir together the 1 tablespoon whole grain mustard, 1 tablespoon honey, 3 cloves large garlic, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, and ½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '4: On a cutting board, pat the 1 ½ lb salmon dry with paper towels', '5:  Transfer the 1 ½ lb salmon to the prepared baking sheet and rub all over with the 1 tablespoon whole grain mustard mixture', '6: Bake the 1 ½ lb salmon for 14 minutes', '7:  Turn the oven to broil and continue cooking until the top has caramelized and the internal temperature of the 1 ½ lb salmon reaches 145°F (60°C), about 5 minutes', '8: Let the 1 ½ lb salmon rest for 5 minutes on the baking sheet before serving']

ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil divided', '4 cups whole wheat bread (140 g) day-old can use multigrain or rye bread cut into 1-inch (2 cm) cubes', '1 yellow onion thinly sliced', '2 cloves garlic finely chopped', '6 cups fresh spinach (240 g) stems removed', '½ lemon lemon  zest', '1 pinch red pepper flakes', 'fine sea salt to taste', '½ teaspoon fresh ground black pepper to taste', '4 eggs', '4 egg whites', '1 ½ cups whole milk (360 mL)', '1 ½ teaspoons whole grain mustard', '¼ cup grated parmesan cheese (30 g) plus 2 tbsp divided', '3 tablespoons fresh chives finely chopped']
