instructions: ['1: Oil a 9x9-inch (23x23-cm) baking dish with 1 tablespoon of the olive oil and add the 4 4 6 1 ½ ¼ cups whole wheat bread cubes in a single layer', '2: In a large skillet set over medium heat, add the remaining 2 tablespoons of the olive oil', '3:  Add the onions and 2 cloves garlic and cook until tender and starting to turn golden, 10-15 minutes', '4: In 2-3 batches, add the 6 6 1 ½ ¼ cups fresh spinach and cook, tossing to wilt, 1-2 minutes', '5: Stir in the ½ lemon zest and 1 pinch red 1 pinch red ½ teaspoon fresh ground black pepper flakes and season with fine sea salt and 1 pinch red ½ teaspoon fresh ground black pepper', '6:  Cook another 30 seconds then remove the pan from the heat and set aside to cool slightly', '7: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180˚C)', '8: In a large bowl, whisk together the 4 4 4 eggs, 4 4 egg whites, 1 ½ 1 ½ ¼ cups whole milk, and 1 ½ teaspoons whole grain mustard', '9:  Season with fine sea salt and 1 pinch red ½ teaspoon fresh ground black pepper and stir in ¼ 4 6 1 ½ ¼ cup (30 g) of the Parmesan', '10: Add the 6 6 1 ½ ¼ cups fresh spinach mixture into the 4 4 4 eggs', '11:  Stir in chives', '12: Transfer to the baking dish and mix gently to combine making sure the mixture is in an even layer', '13:  Top with remaining Parmesan', '14: Bake until the 4 4 4 eggs are just set and the mixture doesn’t jiggle when you gently shake the pan, 35-40 minutes', '15: Serve warm or at room temperature']

ingredients: ['Creamy Shallot Potato Puree', '4 tablespoons butter divided', '2 shallots thinly sliced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '½ cup whole milk (120 mL)', '1 ½ teaspoons white  pepper', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 lb yellow potato (905 g) peeled quartered and boiled until tender', 'Sautéed Vegetables', 'olive oil to taste', '1 cup porcini mushroom (75 g) trimmed and quartered', '1 bunch asparagus ends trimmed', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'Crispy Skin Herb-Crusted Salmon', '2 skin-on salmon fillets', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'fresh thyme to taste', 'olive oil to taste', '2 tablespoons butter cubed', '3 cloves garlic crushed']
instructions: ['1: Make the creamy shallot 2 lb yellow potato puree: Melt 3 tablespoons of butter in a medium pan over medium-high heat', '2:  Add the 2 shallots and cook for 3-4 minutes, until softened', '3: Add the garlic and another tablespoon of butter and continue to cook for another 3-4 minutes, stirring frequently, until the 2 shallots are browned', '4: Add the ½ cup whole milk, 1 ½ teaspoons white pepper, and salt and stir to incorporate', '5: Transfer the shallot mixture to a food processor and process until smooth', '6: Mash 2 lb yellow potatoes in a large bowl', '7:  Add the shallot puree and continue to mash until fully incorporated', '8:  Set aside', '9: Make the sautéed vegetables: Heat a drizzle of olive oil in a large pan over medium heat', '10:  Add the mushrooms and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until starting to soften', '11: Push the mushrooms to one side of the pan and add a bit more oil', '12:  Add the 1 bunch asparagus and season everything with salt and pepper', '13:  Cook for 5 minutes, until the vegetables are tender', '14:  Remove from the heat and set aside', '15: Make the 2 skin-on salmon: On a cutting board, cut 4 slits in the 2 skin-on salmon skin, roughly ¼-inch (6 mm) apart and ½-inch (12 mm) into the 2 skin-on salmon flesh', '16:  Season with salt, pepper, and fresh thyme leaves', '17: Heat a drizzle of olive oil in a medium pan over medium-high heat', '18:  Add the 2 skin-on salmon, skin-side down', '19:  Cook for 3-4 minutes, or until a lighter pink color has reached ⅓-½ of the way up the side of the 2 skin-on salmon', '20: Flip the 2 skin-on salmon and immediately add the butter, garlic, and a few sprigs of fresh thyme', '21:  Stir the garlic and fresh thyme around the pan to infuse the flavors and spoon the butter over the 2 skin-on salmon for 2 minutes more, until the 2 skin-on salmon is cooked through', '22:  Remove the 2 skin-on salmon from the pan', '23: Add the 2 lb yellow potato puree to plates and top with the sautéed vegetables and 2 skin-on salmon']

ingredients: ['1 cup Great Value® Nonfat Milk (240 mL)', '1 ½ cups Great Value® Mixed Fruit (260 g)', '¼ cup dried apricot (50 g) diced', '¼ cup coconut chips (20 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a blender, combine the milk, fruit, apricots, and ¼ cup coconut chips', '2:  Blend on high speed until smooth']

ingredients: ['½ cup honey (170 g)', '¼ cup peanut butter (60 g)', '3 cups toasted oat cereal (150 g)', '1 cup yogurt chip (245 g) save 1/2 cup (120 g) for melting', '½ cup unsalted toasted almonds (70 g) chopped', '½ cup dried cranberries (65 g)', '1 teaspoon coconut oil optional']
instructions: ['1: In a bowl, mix ½ cup honey with ¼ cup peanut butter', '2: Microwave for 45 seconds, stirring every 15 seconds, or until melted', '3: In a large bowl, combine 3 cups toasted oat cereal, ½ of the 1 cup yogurt chips (save the other half for later), chopped ½ cup unsalted toasted almonds, and ½ cup dried cranberries', '4: Pour the melted ½ cup honey mixture into the bowl and stir until well mixed', '5: Pour into an 8x8 (20x20 cm) baking pan lined with parchment paper, and gently flatten the mixture evenly around the pan', '6: Freeze for 30 minutes', '7: Once the mixture has hardened enough, cut it into 8 pieces', '8: Melt the other half of the 1 cup yogurt chips in the microwave for 15 seconds at a time, until melted', '9:  (Optional: adding 1 tsp of 1 teaspoon coconut oil will help with the melting process)Dip the bottom of the bars in the melted 1 cup yogurt chips and place on a piece of parchment paper', '10:  Freeze for another 15 minutes', '11: Wrap each bar in parchment paper & store in the refrigerator or freezer for up to 3 months']

ingredients: ['1 loaf french bread 16 in (40 cm) long 5 in (12 cm) wide', '¼ cup yellow mustard (60 g)', '10 slices swiss cheese', '2 dill pickles sliced lengthwise', '10 slices honey ham', '1 ½ cups pulled pork (225 g)']
instructions: ['1: Heat a grill or campfire to medium heatSlice the French 1 loaf almost all the way in half lengthwise, leaving a long side still attached like a hot dog bun', '2: Open the bread and spread ¼ cup yellow mustard liberally on both sides', '3:  Lay the Swiss cheese slices on both sides of the bread', '4:  Lay the 2 dill pickles over the Swiss slices on the bottom half of the bread', '5:  Layer the ham slices and 1 ½ cups pulled pork over the 2 dill pickles, then gently lift the top side of the bread to close the sandwich', '6:  Double wrap the sandwich in aluminum foil', '7: Set the sandwich on the grill over medium heat', '8:  Place a cast-iron or other heavy skillet on top to press down', '9:  Cook the sandwich for 5 minutes, then flip and cook for 5 minutes more, until the outside of the bread is crisp and the cheese is melted', '10: Let sandwich cool for a few minutes before carefully unwrapping', '11:  Slice and serve']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons coconut oil or avocado oil', '1 teaspoon black mustard seeds', '12 fresh curry leaves', '2 green chiles halved lengthwise', '2 small red onions thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon fresh ginger', '4 garlic cloves minced', '2 teaspoons tandoori masala', '1 cup crushed tomato (200 g)', '1 lb boneless skinless chicken breast (455 g) diced', 'kosher salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 cup full-fat coconut milk (240 mL)', '2 teaspoons tamarind paste or lime juice', '1 teaspoon sugar', 'steamed rice for serving', '2 tablespoons fresh cilantro chopped', 'kashmiri chile powder for garnish']
instructions: ['1: In a wide-bottomed pot or Dutch oven, heat the coconut oil over medium heat until shimmering', '2:  Add the 1 teaspoon black mustard seeds and cook until just beginning to pop, 30–60 seconds', '3:  Add the 12 fresh curry leaves and let crisp for 30 seconds, then add the 2 green 2 green kashmiri chiles and sauté for 30 seconds more, until fragrant', '4: Add the 2 small red onions and cook for about 5 minutes, until softened', '5:  Add the 1 tablespoon fresh ginger and 4 garlic and cook for 1 minute, until fragrant', '6: Add the 2 teaspoons tandoori masala and cook for 1 minute, until lightly toasted', '7: Stir in the 1 cup crushed tomatoes and cook for 3 minutes, until well combined', '8: Add the 1 lb boneless skinless chicken and season with kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper', '9:  Stir to coat the 1 lb boneless skinless chicken well with the spiced 1 cup crushed tomato mixture and cook until no longer pink', '10: Add the coconut milk, 2 teaspoons tamarind paste, and 1 teaspoon sugar and stir well', '11:  Reduce the heat to medium-low, cover, and cook for 15 minutes, or until the 1 lb boneless skinless chicken is cooked through and the oil begins to separate from the sauce', '12: Spoon the 12 fresh curry over steamed rice', '13:  Garnish with 2 tablespoons fresh cilantro and a sprinkle of 2 green kashmiri chile powder, if desired']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon unsalted butter', '1 medium white onion thinly sliced', '26 oz pizza dough (735 g)', '½ cup bacon (110 g) chopped', '4 tablespoons unsalted butter 1/2 stick melted', '8 oz brie cheese (225 g) 1 wheel', '1 fresh chive chopped for garnish', 'broccoli floret steamed for serving', '1.5 lb baby potato (680 g) boiled halved for serving', 'mushroom sauteed for serving']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2:   Prepare a 9-inch (22 cm) round cake pan with a 3½- inch (8 cm) ramekin in the center and set nearby', '3: Melt the butter in a large pan over 1 medium-low heat', '4:  Add the onion and sauté until caramelized, stirring occasionally for about 15 minutes', '5:  Remove the pan from the heat', '6: Take a golf ball-sized piece of 26 oz pizza dough and flatten it out with your fingers', '7:  Stuff the dough with about a teaspoon of caramelized onions and cooked ½ cup bacon', '8:  Close the dough ball by pinching at the seam and roll into a ball in your hands', '9:  Repeat with the remaining dough and fillings', '10: Dip each stuffed ball in the melted butter', '11:  Place the stuffed balls in the prepared cake pan, stacking them around the ramekin', '12: Bake for 30 minutes, or until golden brown', '13:  Remove from the oven and reduce the oven temperature to 350˚F (180°C)', '14:   Remove the ramekin with tongs (it will be hot!)', '15: Place the wheel of 8 oz brie in the center', '16:  Return the pan to the oven for 10 minutes more, or until the 8 oz brie is soft', '17: Brush the monkey bread with more melted butter and sprinkle the bread and cheese with chives', '18:   Serve with vegetables like broccoli, potatoes, and mushrooms for dipping']

ingredients: ['2 chapatis cooked', '1 tablespoon cream cheese', '1 tablespoon jam', '1 tablespoon ghee', '2 tablespoons butter']
instructions: ['1: On a chapati, generously spread 1 tablespoon cream cheese and 1 tablespoon jam', '2:  Cover with the other chapati', '3: Add 1 tablespoon ghee on a hot pan and cook the chapati sandwich on both sides', '4:  Cut and serve']

ingredients: ['Overnight Spiced Vodka', '2 cups vodka (240 mL)', '1 cinnamon stick', '1 whole star anise', '5 whole cloves', 'Cocktail', '10 dried cranberries divided', '5 fresh mint leaves', '½ oz lime juice (15 mL)', '1 ½ oz cranberry juice (45 mL)', 'ice', '2 ½ oz ginger beer (75 mL) or as needed', '1 lime wedge for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Make the overnight spiced 2 cups vodka: In a glass jar, combine the 2 cups vodka, 1 cinnamon stick, 1 whole star anise pod, and 5 whole cloves', '2:  Seal the jar tightly and give it a quick shake, then let infuse at room temperature for at least 24 hours, or up to 3 months', '3:  Strain out the whole spices before using', '4: Make the cocktail: Add 5 10 dried cranberries and the mint to a cocktail shaker and muddle for 30 seconds', '5:  Add 1½ ounces of the spiced 2 cups vodka, the lime juice, 1 ½ oz cranberry juice, and ice to fill the shaker', '6:  Shake vigorously for 1 minute, or until very cold', '7: Add a handful of 5 fresh ice to a copper mug, then strain the cocktail into the mug', '8:  Fill the rest of the way with 2 ½ oz ginger beer', '9:  Float the remaining 5 10 dried cranberries on top and garnish with lime wedge', '10: Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ cup mushrooms (40 g) sliced', '2 cloves garlic', '3 cups fresh spinach (120 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '3 eggs', '2 large flour tortillas', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese (100 g) double for 2 quesadillas', '½ cup shredded parmesan cheese (60 g) double for 2 quesadillas', 'Garnish', 'fresh parsley', 'salsa']
instructions: ['1: Let the 1 tablespoon olive oil heat up in the skillet and add the 2 cloves garlic followed by the ½ cup mushrooms', '2:  Cook until the ½ cup mushrooms have softened and caramelized a bit', '3: Add the spinach and cook until spinach has wilted', '4: Crack in the 3 eggs and scramble with the veggies', '5:  Season with salt and pepper, and stir until fully cooked', '6:  Remove from the pan and set aside', '7: Place the tortilla in the skillet and add a layer of both cheeses on half of the tortilla', '8: Add the scramble, top with more cheese and fold the tortilla in half', '9: Cook for 6 minutes over medium heat, flipping half way', '10: Serve with salsa and garnish with fresh parsley']

ingredients: ['Ssamjang', '3 tablespoons soybean paste doenjang', '1 tablespoon korean chili paste gochujang', '1 tablespoon mirin', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '2 teaspoons garlic minced', '1 teaspoon sugar', 'Salt & Pepper Sesame Oil', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '2 tablespoons sesame oil', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'Pork Belly', '1 lb fresh pork belly (455 g)', 'perilla leaf', 'red leaf lettuce', '3 jalapeñoes sliced into rounds', '10 cloves garlic thinly sliced']
instructions: ['1: Make the ssamjang: In a medium bowl, stir together the 3 tablespoons soybean paste, chile paste, 1 tablespoon mirin, sesame oil, garlic, and 1 teaspoon sugar', '2: Make the 1 teaspoon sea salt & freshly ground black pepper sesame oil: In a small bowl, stir together the 1 teaspoon sea salt, sesame oil, and freshly ground black pepper', '3: Heat a Korean barbecue griddle or large pan over medium-high heat', '4:  When the pan is hot, rub a piece of 1 lb fresh pork belly around the pan to grease with the melted fat, then arrange the 1 lb fresh pork belly in the pan in a single layer, working in batches to avoid overcrowding the pan', '5:  Cook until the 1 lb fresh pork belly is golden brown and crispy and the internal temperature reaches at least 145°F (63°C), 2–3 minutes per side', '6: Cut the 1 lb fresh pork belly into bite-size pieces using kitchen shears, then arrange on a plate with the perilla leaves, red leaf lettuce, jalapeños, and garlic', '7:  Serve with the ssamjang and 1 teaspoon sea salt & freshly ground black pepper sesame oil']

ingredients: ['1 cup pineapple (245 g) cubed', '1 orange sliced', '1 mango cubed', '1 ½ cups milk (360 mL) of choice', '1 cup plain greek yogurt (285 g)']
instructions: ['1: Put fruit in a freezer bag', '2:  Seal and store in freezer for up to 3 months', '3: When ready to use, put 1 ½ cups milk, Greek yogurt, and frozen fruit into a blender and mix until consistency is smooth']

ingredients: ['1 pineapple', '1 cup coconut cream (240 g)', '¼ cup coconut milk (60 mL)', '1 cup white rum (240 mL)', '3 cups ice (420 g)', '1 lime juiced', 'Special Equipment', '1 pineapple corer']
instructions: ['1: Using a pineapple corer, core the pineapple and slice the pineapple into chunks', '2: Place the pineapple chunks flat on a baking sheet and freeze solid, about 2 hours', '3: In a blender, add the frozen pineapple, coconut cream, coconut milk, 1 cup white rum, 3 cups ice, and 1 lime juice', '4: Place the blender back in the freezer for 20 minutes or until thickened', '5: Blend one more time until fully incorporated', '6: Pour piña colada back into the pineapple', '7: Top with a maraschino cherry']

ingredients: ['1 cup Great Value® Almond Milk (240 mL)', '1 ½ cups Great Value® Berry Medley (260 g)', '¼ cup dried apricot (50 g) diced', '¼ cup coconut chips (20 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a blender, combine the almond milk, berries, apricots, and ¼ cup coconut chips', '2:  Blend on high speed until smooth']

ingredients: ['2 boneless skinless chicken breasts', '1 large sweet potato diced', '1 head broccoli or large bag of broccoli florets', '4 cloves garlic minced', '2 tablespoons fresh rosemary', '1 tablespoon paprika', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons olive oil']
instructions: ['1: Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil', '2:  Lay out the 1 large sweet potato, 2 boneless skinless chicken breasts, and 1 head broccoli', '3: Evenly distribute the 4 cloves garlic, 2 tablespoons fresh rosemary, 1 tablespoon paprika, salt, and pepper over the entire pan', '4:  Drizzle with 2 tablespoons olive oil', '5: Bake at 400°F (200°C) for 35-40 minutes (or until the internal temperature of the 2 boneless skinless chicken reaches 165°F (75°C) and the juices run clear)', '6: Serve up and dinner’s ready! For an easy cleanup, just carefully toss the aluminum foil and you’re good to go']

ingredients: ['Hummus', '15 oz chickpeas (425 g) 1 can drained and rinsed', '1 clove garlic minced', '¼ teaspoon paprika', 'sea salt to taste', '¼ teaspoon cumin', '½ lemon juiced', '3 tablespoons olive oil divided', '2 tablespoons water', 'red pepper flake to taste', 'Mediterranean Bowl', '2 tablespoons olive oil divided', '1 cup quinoa (170 g) uncooked rinsed and drained', '2 cups vegetable broth (480 mL)', '¼ teaspoon dried thyme', '¼ teaspoon dried tarragon', '¼ teaspoon dried parsley', '2 lemons juiced divided', 'salt to taste', '2 persian cucumbers', '½ cup grape tomato (100 g)', 'kalamata olive to taste', '½ red onion', 'fresh parsley leaf to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'feta cheese crumbled to taste']
instructions: ['1: Make the hummus: Add the chickpeas to a food processor with the 1 clove garlic, ¼ teaspoon paprika, salt, ¼ teaspoon cumin, ½ 2 lemon juice, 2 tablespoons of 3 tablespoons 2 tablespoons kalamata olive oil, and the water', '2:  Pulse until creamy', '3: Transfer the hummus to a container and top with more 3 tablespoons 2 tablespoons kalamata olive oil and red red pepper flakes', '4:  The hummus will keep in the refrigerator for up to 4 days', '5: Make the Mediterranean bowl: Heat a large skillet over medium heat', '6:  Once hot, add 1 tablespoon of 3 tablespoons 2 tablespoons kalamata olive oil', '7:  Pour the 1 cup quinoa into the skillet and toast for 3-4 minutes, or until light golden brown', '8: Add the 2 cups vegetable broth, ¼ teaspoon dried thyme, ¼ teaspoon dried tarragon, parsley, juice of 1 ½ 2 lemon, and salt and stir to combine', '9:  Bring to a boil, then cover, reduce the heat to low, and simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until the liquid is absorbed and the 1 cup quinoa is fluffy', '10:  Remove the pan from the heat', '11: Slice the 2 persian cucumbers, halve the tomatoes, chop the 3 tablespoons 2 tablespoons kalamata olives, and dice the onion', '12: Place all of the 2 cups vegetables in a medium bowl', '13:  Add the parsley, remaining tablespoon of 3 tablespoons 2 tablespoons kalamata olive oil, ½ 2 lemon juice, salt, and red pepper', '14:  Stir to combine', '15: To assemble a bowl, add ¼ of the 1 cup quinoa, ¼ of the 2 cups vegetables, and ¼ of the hummus to a resealable container', '16:  Top the 2 cups vegetables with crumbled feta', '17: Store the bowls in the refrigerator for up to 3 days']

ingredients: ['Ribs', '1 rack baby back ribs membrane removed', "⅓ cup French's honey mustard (85 g)", 'Glaze', '2 tablespoons butter', '¼ cup honey (85 g)', "1 tablespoon French's honey mustard", '½ tablespoon cayenne', '½ tablespoon McCormick ® Paprika', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon salt']
instructions: ['1: Preheat grill for medium-low heat', '2:  The thermometer should reach about 300ºF (150°C)Place ribs on a foil-covered sheet tray', '3:  Rub both sides of the ribs with olive oil and 1 teaspoon salt', '4: Brush French’s Honey Mustard on both sides, covering all areas', '5:  Fold foil over ribs to form an enclosed packet', '6:  Use a knife to poke a few venting slits in each foil pack', '7: Place foil-wrapped 1 rack on grill, close lid, and cook for 1–2 hours, until ribs are tender but not falling apart', '8: Glaze: Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a small saucepan over low heat', '9:  Add in the rest of the ingredients and whisk well', '10:  Let glaze simmer for 2–3 minutes', '11:  Remove from heat', '12: Unwrap the foil and spread the glaze all over the ribs', '13: Oil the grill and turn the heat up to high', '14:  Grill ribs on both sides until ribs become caramelized, 10–15 minutes', '15: Remove from grill, then let cool for 10 minutes before slicing and serving']

ingredients: ['1 package white cake mix', '1 tablespoon cinnamon', '⅓ cup oil (80 mL)', '2 eggs', 'cinnamon sugar']
instructions: ['1: Combine 1 package white cake mix, cinnamon, ⅓ cup oil, and 2 eggs in a mixing bowl', '2: Using an ice cream scoop or your hand, form golf ball-sized balls of cookie dough and transfer to a bowl of cinnamon sugar', '3: Cover dough ball in cinnamon sugar and transfer to a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '4: Bake at 350°F (180°C) for 10-12 minutes']

ingredients: ['3 lb boneless pork shoulder (1 kg)', '1 tablespoon sea salt', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '½ tablespoon liquid smoke', '8 strips bacon', 'Coleslaw', '½ cup mayonnaise (120 g)', '1 tablespoon sugar', '2 teaspoons mustard', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '2 cups shredded red cabbage (200 g)', '2 cups shredded cabbage (200 g)', '1 cup shredded carrot (110 g)']
instructions: ['1: Quarter 3 lb boneless pork to portion into approximately ½-pound (225 gram) pieces', '2:  This will cut down cooking time', '3: Place 3 lb boneless pork into a large bowl', '4:  Add salt, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, and ½ tablespoon liquid smoke, and mix until each piece of 3 lb boneless pork is evenly covered', '5: Wrap each 3 lb boneless pork with 2 8 strips of bacon', '6: Place 3 lb boneless pork into the slow cooker and cook for 6 hours on low', '7: In a small bowl, combine ½ cup mayonnaise, 1 tablespoon sugar, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar, salt, and 1 teaspoon black pepper, and mix well', '8: In a large bowl, add the vegetables and pour over the dressing and mix until the slaw is fully coated', '9: Take 3 lb boneless pork out onto a baking sheet', '10:  With 2 forks, pull apart the meat into desired size', '11: Broil on high for a few minutes to until the ends of the 3 lb boneless pork start to crisp up', '12: Serve on a bun with slaw']

ingredients: ['4 tablespoons olive oil', '1 lb raw shrimp (455 g)', '1 lb asparagus (455 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon crushed red pepper', '1 teaspoon garlic minced', '1 teaspoon ginger mince', '1 tablespoon low sodium soy sauce', '2 tablespoons lemon juice']
instructions: ['1: In a large frying pan, heat 2 tablespoons olive oil over medium-high heat', '2: Add 1 lb raw shrimp to the pan, then season with ½ teaspoon of salt and ½ teaspoon crushed red pepper', '3:  Cook until the 1 lb raw shrimp is pink', '4:  Remove the 1 lb raw shrimp from the pan and set aside', '5: In the same pan, heat 2 tablespoons olive oil and add 1 lb asparagus', '6: Add ginger and garlic, then season with ½ teaspoon of salt', '7:  Stir frequently and cook until the 1 lb asparagus is tender-crisp', '8: Return the 1 lb raw shrimp to the pan, then add 1 tablespoon low sodium soy sauce', '9:  Stir until the ingredients are well combined', '10:  Just before the dish is ready, add lemon juice, stir once more, then serve while hot']

ingredients: ['3 bananas cut into coins and frozen', '¼ cup milk (60 mL) of choice', '1 teaspoon vanilla bean']
instructions: ['1: Cut 3 bananas into coins and place in freezer in a sealable bag', '2:  Freeze overnight or until solid', '3: Place all ingredients into a food processor or blender and blend until smooth', '4: Pour contents into a loaf or small pan', '5: Freeze one hour or until solid']

ingredients: ['Churros', 'canola oil', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '½ cup milk (120 mL)', '½ cup sugar (100 g) divided plus 1 tablespoon', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '½ stick unsalted butter', '½ vanilla bean seeds scraped', '1 cup all purpose flour (125 g)', '3 large eggs', '1 teaspoon ground ceylon cinnamon', 'Chocolate Dipping Sauce', '6 oz semisweet chocolate chip (175 g)', '½ cup heavy cream (120 mL)', '⅛ teaspoon cayenne', '¼ teaspoon ground ceylon cinnamon']
instructions: ['1: Make the 6 oz semisweet chocolate dipping sauce: Add the 6 oz semisweet chocolate chips to a medium bowl and set aside', '2: In a small saucepan, heat the cream over medium heat until beginning gently simmer', '3:  Add the ⅛ teaspoon cayenne and cinnamon, then remove the pot from the heat', '4: Pour the hot cream mixture over the 6 oz semisweet chocolate, then let sit for 2–3 minutes to soften the 6 oz semisweet chocolate', '5:  Whisk until the 6 oz semisweet chocolate is completely melted and smooth', '6:  Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and keep warm until ready to serve', '7: Make the churros: Fill a 12-inch cast iron skillet with 1½ inches of canola oil', '8:  Heat over medium heat until the temperature reaches 370°F (188°C)', '9:  Line a baking sheet with 2 layers of paper towels and set a wire rack on top', '10: Meanwhile, in a small stainless steel saucepan, combine the water, milk, 1 tablespoon sugar, the 1 teaspoon kosher salt, ½ stick unsalted butter, and ½ vanilla bean seeds and pod', '11:  Bring to a boil over medium heat', '12: Once boiling, remove the ½ vanilla bean pod, then add the flour all at once', '13:  Reduce the heat to medium-low and stir with a wooden spoon until the dough comes together in a ball and no longer sticks to the pan, about 5 minutes', '14: Immediately transfer the dough to the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment and let cool for 5 minutes', '15: With the mixer running on medium speed, add the 3 large eggs, 1 at a time, and beat until  completely incorporated before adding the next, scraping down the sides and bottom of the bowl as needed', '16:  The dough should be smooth and creamy, like a thick custard', '17: Transfer the dough to a piping bag fitted with a 6B open star tip', '18:  Let the dough rest for 5 minutes', '19: In a medium bowl, mix together the remaining ½ cup sugar and the cinnamon', '20: Working in batches of about 4 churros at a time to avoid overcrowding the pan, pipe the dough into the hot oil in 5–6-inch lengths, using a pair of kitchen scissors to snip off the dough at the end of the piping tip', '21:  Cook, turning the churros frequently, until golden brown all over, 3–4 minutes', '22:  Transfer to the wire rack to drain for about 15 seconds, then toss in the cinnamon sugar until well coated', '23:  Transfer to a serving dish', '24:  Repeat with the remaining churros, letting the oil return to temperature between batches', '25: Serve the churros immediately with the 6 oz semisweet chocolate sauce for dipping']

ingredients: ['1 slice bread toasted', 'peanut butter to taste', '½ banana sliced', 'cinnamon to taste']
instructions: ['1: Spread peanut butter on the toast and top with sliced ½ banana', '2:  Sprinkle with cinnamon']

ingredients: ['2 lb boneless skinless chicken breast (910 g) cubed', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 teaspoons chili powder divided', '½ teaspoon turmeric', '6 tablespoons butter divided ', '1 ½ cups yellow onion (225 g) diced', '3 teaspoons garam masala', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 tablespoon ginger grated', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 cinnamon 3 inch (8 cm) stick', '14 oz tomato sauce (395 g)', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '1 cup heavy cream (240 mL)', 'rice for serving', 'fresh cilantro chopped for garnish']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, season the 2 lb boneless skinless chicken breast with salt, 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 1 teaspoon of 2 teaspoons chili powder, and the teaspoon of turmeric', '2:  Let sit for 15 minutes to marinate', '3: Melt 2 6 tablespoons of butter in a large pot over medium heat', '4:  Brown the 2 lb boneless skinless chicken, then remove from the pot', '5: Melt another 2 6 tablespoons of butter in the pot, then add the 1 ½ cups yellow onion, 3 teaspoons garam masala, remaining teaspoon of 2 teaspoons chili powder, the cumin, 1 tablespoon ginger, 3 cloves garlic, cayenne, 1 cinnamon, salt and 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '6:  Cook until fragrant', '7: Add the 14 oz tomato sauce and bring to a simmer', '8: Add the 1 cup water and 1 cup heavy cream and return to a simmer', '9: Return the 2 lb boneless skinless chicken to the pot, cover, and simmer for another 10-15 minutes', '10: Stir in the last 2 6 tablespoons of butter and season with more salt and 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper to taste', '11: Serve the 2 lb boneless skinless chicken over rice and garnish with fresh cilantro']

ingredients: ['2 ½ cups raw pecans (310 g)', '1 ½ cups pitted date (255 g)', '⅓ cup dried cranberries (40 g)', '1 pinch salt', '3 tablespoons milk or water', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
instructions: ['1: Line an 8-inch (20 cm) square baking dish with parchment paper', '2: Add the 2 ½ cups raw pecans, dates, ⅓ cup dried cranberries, 1 pinch salt, 3 tablespoons milk, and 1 teaspoon vanilla to a food processor and pulse until the mixture starts to clump together', '3: Transfer the mixture to the prepared baking dish and press into an even layer', '4: Chill for 1 hour', '5: Remove the bars from the baking dish by lifting the parchment paper', '6:  Cut into 12 individual bars', '7: Serve immediately or store in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 1 week']

ingredients: ['1 head garlic halved crosswise', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 ½ teaspoons freshly ground black pepper divided', '2 teaspoons kosher salt divided', '3 large eggs beaten', '2 cups panko breadcrumbs (100 g)', '2 boneless skinless chicken breasts halved and pounded thin', '6 tablespoons vegetable oil divided', '6 large shrimps peeled and deveined', 'Whiskey Glaze', '1 cup pineapple juice (240 mL)', '⅔ cup water (160 mL)', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '¼ cup teriyaki sauce (60 mL)', '1 ¼ cups brown sugar (250 g)', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', '3 tablespoons lemon juice', '¼ cup white onion (35 g) minced', '2 tablespoons pineapple crushed', '2 tablespoons whiskey', '½ teaspoon cayenne', '3 tablespoons fresh parsley chopped', 'Mashed Potatoes', '6 medium red skin potatoes quartered', 'cold water as needed', '3 tablespoons unsalted butter', '1 cup heavy cream (240 mL)', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', 'Preparation', '1 head garlic halved crosswise', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 ½ teaspoons freshly ground black pepper divided', '2 teaspoons kosher salt divided', '3 large eggs beaten', '2 cups panko breadcrumbs (100 g)', '2 boneless skinless chicken breasts halved and pounded thin', '6 tablespoons vegetable oil divided', '6 large shrimps peeled and deveined', 'Whiskey Glaze', '1 cup pineapple juice (240 mL)', '⅔ cup water (160 mL)', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '¼ cup teriyaki sauce (60 mL)', '1 ¼ cups brown sugar (250 g)', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', '3 tablespoons lemon juice', '¼ cup white onion (35 g) minced', '2 tablespoons pineapple crushed', '2 tablespoons whiskey', '½ teaspoon cayenne', '3 tablespoons fresh parsley chopped', 'Mashed Potatoes', '6 medium red skin potatoes quartered', 'cold water as needed', '3 tablespoons unsalted butter', '1 cup heavy cream (240 mL)', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Drizzle the halved head of garlic with the olive oil and season with ½ teaspoon salt and ¼  teaspoon pepper', '3:  Wrap the garlic in foil', '4: Bake for 40–50 minutes, until the garlic cloves are golden and tender', '5:  Set aside to cool', '6: Season the chicken on both sides with 1 teaspoon salt and 1 teaspoon pepper', '7: Add the eggs and panko to 2 shallow dishes', '8: Coat the chicken breasts in the eggs, then dredge in the bread crumbs, making sure bread crumbs adhere to the chicken', '9: Heat 3 tablespoons of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat until shimmering', '10:  Working in batches to avoid overcrowding the pan, add the chicken to the hot oil and cook until golden brown on both sides and cooked through, 5–8 minutes', '11:   Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside', '12:  Wipe out the pan to remove any remaining oil and bread crumbs', '13: Season the shrimp with ¼ teaspoon pepper and ½ teaspoon salt', '14:  Coat the shrimp in the eggs, then dredge in the bread crumbs, making sure the bread crumbs adhere to the shrimp', '15: Heat the remaining 3 tablespoons of oil in the same pan over medium heat', '16:  When the oil is shimmering, add the shrimp to the skillet and cook for 2–3 minutes per side, or until golden brown', '17:  Remove the shrimp from the pan and set aside', '18:  Wipe out the pan to remove any remaining oil and bread crumbs', '19: Make the whiskey glaze: Squeeze the cloves from one half of the roasted garlic head into a medium bowl', '20:  Using the back of a fork, mash the garlic cloves into a paste', '21:  Add the pineapple juice, water, soy sauce, teriyaki sauce, and brown sugar', '22:  Whisk until the sugar dissolves', '23: Pour the sauce into the same skillet and bring to a simmer over medium heat', '24:  Once simmering, whisk in the lemon zest and juice, onion, crushed pineapple, whiskey, and cayenne', '25:  Gently simmer for 20–30 minutes, or until the sauce is thick and syrupy', '26: While sauce is cooking, make the mashed potatoes: Add the potatoes to a large pot and cover with cold water by 1 inch (2 ½ cm)', '27:  Bring to a boil over high heat and cook until fork-tender, about 20 minutes', '28: Drain the potatoes and return to the warm pot', '29:  Add the remaining half head of roasted garlic cloves', '30:  Mash into the potatoes with a potato masher or wooden spoon', '31:  Add the butter and cream and stir to incorporate', '32:  Season with the remaining salt and pepper', '33: Return the chicken and shrimp to the skillet and turn to coat in the sauce', '34:  Transfer the chicken and shrimp to plates with a few spoonfuls of the mashed potatoes and garnish with the parsley']

ingredients: ['Topping', '1 cup almond meal (95 g)', '½ cup brown sugar (110 g)', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 cup gluten-free rolled oats (80 g)', '1 stick unsalted butter cubed and chilled', '½ cup almond (70 g) sliced', 'Apple Filling', '½ cup granulated sugar (100 g)', '½ cup brown sugar (110 g)', '2 teaspoons cornstarch', '½ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '4 granny smith apples cored and thinly sliced', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', 'For Serving', 'vanilla ice cream']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C)', '2: Make the topping: In a medium bowl, mix together the almond meal, brown sugar, cinnamon, ½ teaspoon kosher salt, and 1 cup gluten-free rolled oats with a fork until combined', '3: Add the 1 stick unsalted butter and use your hands to work it into the dry ingredients, leaving large chunks', '4:  Add the sliced almonds and lightly toss to combine', '5:  Set aside', '6: Make the apple filling: In a small bowl, combine the ½ cup granulated sugar, brown sugar, 2 teaspoons cornstarch, and cinnamon', '7: In a large bowl, sprinkle the 2 tablespoons lemon juice over the sliced 4 granny smith apples', '8:  Toss until coated', '9:  Add the sugar mixture and toss until well distributed', '10: Transfer the mixture to a an 11-inch (27', '11: 5 cm) gratin pan or a 9-inch (22', '12: 5 cm) square glass baking dish', '13:  Sprinkle the crumb topping evenly over the 4 granny smith apples', '14: Bake the crisp for 45–50 minutes, until the edges are carmelized', '15:  Cover with foil after 30 minutes if the topping is browning too quickly', '16:  Remove from the oven and let cool for at least 30 minutes', '17: Serve the crisp with vanilla ice cream']

ingredients: ['1 cup chickpea flour (125 g)', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '1 teaspoon salt', '3 tablespoons olive oil divided', '½ cup marinara sauce (130 g)', '½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese (50 g)', '¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '½ teaspoon flaky sea salt', '¼ cup fresh basil (10 g) thinly sliced']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 450˚F (230˚C)', '2: Place a 12-inch (30 cm) cast iron pan in the oven and let heat up until ready to use', '3: In a bowl, add the 1 cup chickpea flour, 1 cup water, 2 3 tablespoons of olive oil, 1 teaspoon ½ teaspoon ½ teaspoon flaky sea salt, and whisk to combine', '4: Cover the bowl with a towel or plastic wrap and let rest at room temperature for at least 30 minutes', '5: Preheat the oven to broil', '6: Carefully remove the hot cast iron pan from the oven, and pour in the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil, swirling the pan so that the bottom is fully coated', '7: Gently pour in the 1 cup chickpea flour batter into the pan, swirling the pan so that the batter covers the entire pan', '8: Place the cast iron pan in the oven and broil for 5 minutes', '9: Remove the cast iron pan and top with ½ cup marinara sauce, leaving a 1-inch (2 cm) border of the crust', '10:  Top with ½ cup shredded mozzarella and ¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '11: Broil for 2-3 more minutes, until the cheese has melted', '12: Sprinkle with ½ teaspoon flaky sea 1 teaspoon ½ teaspoon ½ teaspoon flaky sea salt and ¼ cup fresh basil']

ingredients: ['1 medium sweet potato peeled and cubed', '14 oz cauliflower florets (395 g)', '8 oz brussels sprouts (225 g) halved', '3 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '5 oz mixed greens (140 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Add 1 medium sweet potatoes, 14 oz cauliflower, and Brussels sprouts to a baking tray', '3: Sprinkle with 3 tablespoons olive oil, salt, pepper, and 1 teaspoon garlic powder', '4:  Mix until well coated', '5: Bake for 25-30 minutes', '6: Serve with 5 oz mixed greens now or refrigerate in airtight container up to 3-5 days']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 cups mushrooms (150 g) sliced', '½ cup onion (75 g)', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 lb ground beef (455 g)', '2 teaspoons paprika', '4 cups beef stock (945 mL)', '8 oz egg noodles uncooked', '½ cup sour cream (115 g)', '1 tablespoon cornstarch slurry', 'fresh parsley for garnish', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: In a 6-quart (5 L) Dutch oven, heat 2 tablespoons olive oil', '2:  Add 2 cups mushrooms and season with salt and pepper', '3: Add the onions and 2 cloves garlic', '4:  Cook until onions are translucent', '5: Add the 1 lb ground 1 lb ground 4 cups beef and cook until brown', '6:  Stir in the 2 teaspoons paprika', '7: Add 1 lb ground 4 cups beef stock and 8 oz egg noodles', '8:  Give it a stir and cover', '9:  Simmer for 15-20 minutes', '10:  Lower the heat', '11: Add the ½ cup sour cream and 1 tablespoon cornstarch slurry', '12:  Stir until thickened', '13: Serve and garnish with fresh parsley']

ingredients: ['15 oz chickpeas (400 g) 1 can drained and rinsed', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon italian herb', '2 tablespoons grated parmesan cheese']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Carefully dry the chickpeas', '3:  Removing the skins is optional and they will come off easily', '4:  The drier you get them, the crunchier they’ll be!In a medium bowl, add dried chickpeas, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 2 cloves garlic powder, herbs and 2 tablespoons grated parmesan', '5:  Toss well to coat evenly', '6: Spread chickpeas out on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '7: Roast for 15-20 minutes', '8: Mix around on baking sheet and roast for additional 15-20 minutes, or until golden', '9: Cool for 5-10 minutes']

ingredients: ['3 chicken breasts', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 cup all-purpose flour (125 g)', '5 eggs divided', '2 cups italian bread crumbs (230 g)', 'vegetable oil for frying', '2 cups ricotta cheese', '24 oz marinara sauce (680 g)', '8 lasagna noodles', '1 ½ cups shredded mozzarella cheese (150 g)', '1 ½ cups shredded parmesan cheese (160 g)', 'fresh basil to garnish']
instructions: ['1: Cut 3 chicken breasts in half (pound thin if necessary) and season with salt and pepper', '2: Add the flour, 4 5 eggs, and 2 2 1 ½ 1 ½ cups italian bread crumbs to 3 separate shallow dishes', '3:  Beat the 5 eggs', '4:  Coat the 3 chicken in the flour, then the 5 eggs, and finally in the 2 2 1 ½ 1 ½ cups italian bread crumbs', '5: Heat the vegetable oil in a cast iron skillet over medium heat', '6:  Fry the 3 chicken on both sides until golden brown, about 4 minutes  on each side', '7:  Let drain on paper towels', '8: In a medium bowl, combine the 2 1 ½ 1 ½ cups ricotta cheese and the remaining egg', '9: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '10: Spread about ⅓ of the 24 oz marinara sauce over the bottom of a casserole dish', '11:  Top with 4 8 lasagna noodles, ½ of the 2 1 ½ 1 ½ cups ricotta mixture, and 3 3 chicken cutlets', '12:  Sprinkle with ½ 1 2 2 1 ½ 1 ½ cup of 1 ½ 1 ½ cups shredded mozzarella and ½ 1 2 2 1 ½ 1 ½ cup of Parmesan cheese', '13:  Repeat to make another layer, then finish with the remaining sauce and 1 ½ 1 ½ cups shredded mozzarella and Parmesan cheeses', '14: Cover with foil and bake for 45-60 minutes, uncovering the 8 lasagna for the last 10 minutes of baking', '15: Serve with a sprinkle of fresh basil']

ingredients: ['¼ cup olive oil (60 mL)', '1 large onion chopped', '3 large carrots sliced', '4 stalks celery chopped', 'kosher salt to taste', 'black pepper to taste', '3 cloves garlic chopped', '8 cups chicken broth (2 L)', '8 oz egg noodles (225 g)', '4 cups shredded chicken breast (500 g)', '½ cup fresh parsley (10 g) chopped', 'parmesan cheese shredded to taste', 'Preparation', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL)', '1 large onion chopped', '3 large carrots sliced', '4 stalks celery chopped', 'kosher salt to taste', 'black pepper to taste', '3 cloves garlic chopped', '8 cups chicken broth (2 L)', '8 oz egg noodles (225 g)', '4 cups shredded chicken breast (500 g)', '½ cup fresh parsley (10 g) chopped', 'parmesan cheese shredded to taste', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Heat the olive oil until shimmering over medium heat in a large soup pot', '2:  Add the onion, carrots, celery, and 1 teaspoon each salt and pepper', '3:  Cooking, stirring frequently, until the vegetables are very soft, about 15 minutes', '4: Add the garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute', '5:  Add the stock and bring to a boil', '6: MAKE AHEAD: Do not add the noodles or parsley', '7:  Cool and refrigerate the soup in an airtight container for four days, or in the freezer for up to two months', '8:  Reheat on the stove and add the noodles and parsley just before serving', '9: Add the noodles and cook 6 minutes, then add the chicken and cook about 2 minutes more, until the noodles are cooked through and the chicken is warmed through', '10: Season to taste with salt and pepper, then stir in the parsley', '11: Serve topped with Parmesan', '12: Enjoy! ']

ingredients: ['4 tablespoons flour', '3 tablespoons sugar', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '2 strawberries diced', '3 tablespoons milk', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 strawberry for topping optional', 'whipped topping for topping optional']
instructions: ['1: In a 12-ounce (375 ml) mug or larger, mix all ingredients until just combined', '2: Microwave on high for 90 seconds to 2 minutes, watching to make sure it doesn’t spill over (depending on the size of the mug)', '3: Let cool one minute before eating', '4:  Top with whipped topping and a 1 strawberry (optional)']

ingredients: ['¼ cup quinoa (40 g) cooked', '¼ cup black beans (40 g)', '¼ cup red onion (35 g) diced', '2 tablespoons corn', '1 tablespoon fresh cilantro', '1 teaspoon lime juice', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Combine all ingredients in a small bowl', '2: Mix until combined and serve']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 white onion sliced', '1 red bell pepper seeded and sliced', 'green bell pepper seeded and sliced', '1 tablespoon kosher salt plus 2 teaspoons divided', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 tablespoon pepper plus 1 teaspoon divided', '2 lb flank steak (910 g)', '14 slices provolone cheese divided']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C)', '2: Heat the vegetable oil in a large pan over high heat', '3:  Add the 1 white onion and cook for 10 minutes, until translucent and the edges start to brown', '4: Push the 1 white onion to one side of the pan and add the 1 red and green bell peppers to the pan', '5:  Season with 2 1 tablespoon kosher salt plus 2 1 1 tablespoon pepper plus 1 teaspoons of salt, 1 1 tablespoon kosher salt plus 2 1 1 tablespoon pepper plus 1 teaspoon of garlic powder, and 1 1 tablespoon kosher salt plus 2 1 1 tablespoon pepper plus 1 teaspoon of pepper, and cook until the peppers soften, about 5 minutes', '6:  Remove from the pan and set aside', '7: Place the 2 lb flank steak on the cutting board, and cover with a piece of plastic wrap', '8:  Pound with a meat mallet or rolling pin to about ½-inch (1 ¼ cm) thick', '9: Remove the plastic wrap and season the 2 lb flank steak on both sides with 1 tablespoon of salt and 1 tablespoon of pepper', '10: Line 7 14 slices of Provolone cheese along the bottom edge of the 2 lb flank steak', '11:  Place the sautéed vegetables on top', '12: Starting from the bottom, roll up the 2 lb flank steak, encasing the cheese and vegetables inside', '13: Top with the remaining 7 14 slices of Provolone and secure with skewers or toothpicks', '14: Transfer the 2 lb flank steak roll to a baking sheet and bake for 30 minutes, until cheese is melty and the 2 lb flank steak is cooked through to your preference', '15: Rest for 10 minutes before slicing between the skewers and serving']

ingredients: ['2 teaspoons oil', '½ cup onion (75 g) diced', '1 tablespoon garlic minced', '½ cup carrot (60 g) diced', '½ cup bell pepper (50 g) diced', '½ cup ham (75 g) diced', '3 eggs beaten', '3 cups brown rice (600 g) cooked', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', 'pepper to taste', '1 cup pineapple (245 g) diced']
instructions: ['1: In a wok or deep skillet, heat up the 2 teaspoons oil over high heat and cook ½ cup onion, 1 tablespoon garlic, carrots, ½ cup bell ½ cup bell peppers, and ½ cup ham until ½ cup onions are translucent and ½ cup ham is slightly browned', '2:  Push all of the cooked ½ cup ham and vegetables to the side of the pan', '3: Beat the 3 eggs and pour into the cleared half of the pan', '4:  Scramble the 3 eggs and mix with the rest of the vegetables', '5: Add 3 cups brown rice, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, ½ cup bell pepper, and 1 cup pineapple', '6:  Mix well and let the 3 cups brown rice cook until slightly crispy']

ingredients: ['Cornbread', '3 boxes cornbread mix', '3 large eggs', '1 cup milk (240 mL)', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', 'Dressing', '10 sea scallops', '10 medium shrimps peeled and deveined', '12 oz shredded crab meat (340 g) drained', '4 cups low sodium chicken stock (960 mL)', '2 large eggs beaten', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '1 tablespoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon poultry seasoning', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '2 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '2 teaspoons black pepper', '2 teaspoons fresh thyme divided', '½ cup store bought cranberry sauce (130 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: In a large bowl, combine the 3 boxes cornbread mix, eggs, and 1 cup milk', '3:  Whisk until the batter is smooth', '4: Grease a 9 x 13-inch baking dish with nonstick spray', '5:  Transfer the batter to the prepared baking dish', '6: Bake the 3 boxes cornbread for 20–25 minutes, or until golden brown and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean', '7:  Remove from the oven and let rest until cool enough to handle, about 30 minutes', '8: Remove the 3 boxes cornbread from the baking dish and crumble by hand into a large bowl', '9: Quarter the 10 sea scallops and add to a 10 medium bowl', '10:  Cut the shrimp into thirds and add to the same bowl', '11: Add the 10 sea scallops and shrimp to the crumbled 3 boxes cornbread, along with the 12 oz shredded crab meat, 4 cups low sodium chicken stock, eggs, 1 tablespoon garlic powder, 1 tablespoon onion powder, poultry seasoning, dried thyme, 2 ½ teaspoons kosher salt, 2 teaspoons black pepper, and 1 teaspoon 2 teaspoons fresh thyme', '12:  Mix until combined', '13: Grease the dish used to bake the 3 boxes cornbread with more nonstick spray, then spread the stuffing in the dish in an even layer', '14:  Sprinkle the top with the remaining teaspoon of 2 teaspoons fresh thyme', '15: Bake until the stuffing is set and firm to the touch, 40–50 minutes', '16: Serve warm']

ingredients: ['3 lb chicken wings (1.3 g) wings and drumettes separated', '¼ cup fish sauce (60 mL)', '¼ cup low sodium soy sauce (60 mL)', '¼ cup dark soy sauce (60 mL)', '½ cup palm sugar (100 g)', '2 stalks lemongrass split in half and cracked to release aromatics', '½ cup fresh cilantro leaves (20 g) torn', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '20 cloves garlic peeled and smashed', 'thai chili-lime sauce store bought', 'sticky rice and assorted crunchy vegetables for serving']
instructions: ['1: Add the 3 lb chicken wings, 2 stalks lemongrass, ½ cup fresh cilantro, 20 cloves garlic, 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, ¼ cup low sodium ¼ cup dark soy ¼ cup fish ¼ cup low sodium ¼ cup dark soy ¼ cup dark soy thai chili-lime sauce, ¼ cup fish ¼ cup fish ¼ cup low sodium ¼ cup dark soy ¼ cup dark soy thai chili-lime sauce, ¼ cup low-sodium ¼ cup low sodium ¼ cup dark soy ¼ cup fish ¼ cup low sodium ¼ cup dark soy ¼ cup dark soy thai chili-lime sauce, and ½ cup palm sugar to a large zip-top bag', '2:  Seal the bag and massage the 3 lb chicken to coat', '3:  Marinate in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours, up to overnight', '4: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '5:  Place your oven rack on the upper third of the oven and place a metal cooling rack inside a rimmed baking sheet', '6: Arrange the marinated 3 lb chicken wings on the rack', '7:  Transfer to the oven and bake for 15 minutes, until browned and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (75°C)', '8:  Turn the oven to broil and broil the wings until the skin starts to char slightly, about 2 minutes', '9:  Transfer to a platter and serve immediately with sticky rice and crunchy vegetables']

ingredients: ['Pear Butter', '3 barlett pears peeled cored and cut into ½-inch(1.2 cm) cubes', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '½ tablespoon cinnamon', '½ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '¼ teaspoon ground allspice', '¼ teaspoon ground cloves', '¾ cup sugar (150 g)', 'Waffles', '2 cups all purpose flour (250 g)', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '¼ teaspoon kosher salt', '4 teaspoons baking powder', '½ cup vegetable oil (120 mL)', '¾ cup heavy cream (180 mL)', '1 cup milk (240 mL)', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '2 large eggs beaten', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', 'Whipped Cream', '1 cup heavy cream (240 mL)', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 ½ tablespoons powdered sugar', 'fresh mint sprig for garnish', 'Chicken', '6 cups neutral oil (1.4 L) such as vegetable oil for frying', '4 boneless skinless chicken breasts cut into 2-inch (5 cm) wide strips', '1 ½ teaspoons lemon pepper', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '1 teaspoon Ac’cent® seasoning', '1 ½ cups all purpose flour (185 g)', 'Special Equipment', 'waffle iron', 'Preparation', 'Pear Butter', '3 barlett pears peeled cored and cut into ½-inch(1.2 cm) cubes', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '½ tablespoon cinnamon', '½ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '¼ teaspoon ground allspice', '¼ teaspoon ground cloves', '¾ cup sugar (150 g)', 'Waffles', '2 cups all purpose flour (250 g)', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '¼ teaspoon kosher salt', '4 teaspoons baking powder', '½ cup vegetable oil (120 mL)', '¾ cup heavy cream (180 mL)', '1 cup milk (240 mL)', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '2 large eggs beaten', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', 'Whipped Cream', '1 cup heavy cream (240 mL)', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 ½ tablespoons powdered sugar', 'fresh mint sprig for garnish', 'Chicken', '6 cups neutral oil (1.4 L) such as vegetable oil for frying', '4 boneless skinless chicken breasts cut into 2-inch (5 cm) wide strips', '1 ½ teaspoons lemon pepper', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '1 teaspoon Ac’cent® seasoning', '1 ½ cups all purpose flour (185 g)', 'Special Equipment', 'waffle iron', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Make the pear butter: Add the pears, water, cinnamon, nutmeg, allspice, cloves, and sugar to a medium saucepan and stir to coat the pears', '2:  Bring to a simmer over medium-high heat, then reduce the heat to medium-low and cook, stirring occasionally, until the pears are tender, 35–40 minutes', '3:  Remove the pot from the heat', '4:  Using a potato masher, mash the pears until broken down to the consistency of a chunky applesauce', '5:  Set aside', '6: Make the waffles: Preheat a waffle iron according to the manufacturer’s instructions', '7: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, salt, baking powder, oil, cream, milk, and vanilla until smooth', '8:  Mix in the beaten eggs', '9: Ladle a scant ½ cup (55 G) of the waffle batter per waffle into the preheated waffle iron', '10:  Cook for 3–4 minutes, or until golden brown and cooked through', '11:  Repeat with the remaining batter', '12:  Keep the waffles warm in a low-heated oven until ready to use', '13: Make the whipped cream: Add the heavy cream, cinnamon, and powdered sugar to a large bowl', '14:  Whip with an electric hand mixer on medium speed until stiff peaks form, about 2 minutes', '15:  Refrigerate until ready to use', '16: Make the chicken: Heat the vegetable oil in a large, high-walled skillet over medium-high heat until it reaches 350°F (180°C)', '17: In a large bowl, season the chicken with the lemon pepper, salt, and Ac’cent seasoning, tossing to coat well', '18:  Add the flour to a medium bowl', '19:  Dredge the chicken in the flour, shaking off any excess', '20: Working in batches, gently lower the chicken into the hot oil and fry until golden brown, 6–8 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (75°C)', '21:  Remove from the oil using tongs or a slotted spoon and transfer to a paper-towel lined plate to drain while you fry the remaining chicken', '22: Cut the waffles into triangles and arrange 3 on each plate', '23:  Top with 2 tablespoons of pear butter, 3 fried chicken strips, and a dollop of whipped cream', '24:  Garnish with a sprig of mint']

ingredients: ['Chili', '1 lb ground turkey (455 g)', '1 medium yellow onion diced', '1 red bell pepper seeded and diced', '1 yellow bell pepper seeded and diced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '28 oz tomato sauce (795 g) 1 can', '15 oz black beans (425 g) 1 can drained and rinsed', '15 oz pinto bean (425 g) 1 can drained and rinsed', '1 cup frozen corn (175 g) thawed', '2 teaspoons chili powder', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', 'Dumplings', '2 large eggs', '3 tablespoons unsalted butter melted', '3 tablespoons whole milk', '2 tablespoons light brown sugar', '1 cup all-purpose flour (125 g)', '1 cup yellow cornmeal (150 g) fine', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '¼ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 cup shredded cheddar cheese (100 g)', 'Optional Garnishes', '1 jalapeño sliced', '¼ cup fresh cilantro (10 g) chopped', '2 tablespoons green onion sliced']
instructions: ['1: Combine the ground turkey, 1 medium yellow 2 tablespoons 2 tablespoons green onion, bell peppers, 2 cloves garlic, crushed tomatoes, 15 oz 1 teaspoon ground black and 15 oz pinto beans, 1 cup frozen 1 cup yellow corn, 2 teaspoons chili powder, pepper, and salt in the bowl of a slow cooker', '2: Cook on low for 6-8 hours or high for 4 hours', '3: Once the 2 teaspoons chili has cooked for 6-8 hours, make the dumplings: Combine the eggs, melted 3 tablespoons unsalted butter, 3 tablespoons whole milk, and 2 tablespoons light brown sugar in a 2 large bowl', '4: Add the 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1 cup frozen 1 cup yellow 1 cup yellow cornmeal, 2 teaspoons baking powder, and salt and stir until smooth', '5:  Fold in the 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese', '6: Using a small ice cream scoop, dollop the batter on top of the 2 teaspoons chili and cook for 2 more hours on low or 1 hour on high, until the dumplings are puffed and tender', '7: If using, garnish the 2 teaspoons chili with 1 jalapeño, ¼ cup fresh cilantro, and 2 tablespoons green 1 medium yellow 2 tablespoons 2 tablespoons green onions']

ingredients: ['Birria', '¼ cup kosher salt (25 g) plus 1 tablespoon', '2 lb beef chuck roast (910 g) cut into 1 in (2.54 cm) pieces', '1 lb bone in beef short ribs (425 g)', '5 dried ancho chiles', '5 dried guajillo chiles', '2 dried morita chiles', 'warm water for soaking', '1 whole cinnamon stick', '1 tablespoon whole coriander seeds', '1 tablespoon whole black peppercorn', '4 whole allspice berries', '2 whole cloves', '6 dried bay leaves', '1 teaspoon mexican oregano', '¼ cup canola oil (60 mL) plus 1 tablespoon plus more as needed', '1 large yellow onion chopped', '4 roma tomatoes quartered', '8 cloves garlic roughly chopped', '¼ cup apple cider vinegar (60 mL)', '8 cups water (2 L)', '1 package frozen banana leaves thawed', 'Tacos', '12 corn tortillas', '1 lb shredded queso oaxaca (450 g)', 'red onion pickled', 'Radish sliced', 'fresh cilantro chopped', 'Lime wedge', 'Preparation', 'Birria', '¼ cup kosher salt (25 g) plus 1 tablespoon', '2 lb beef chuck roast (910 g) cut into 1 in (2.54 cm) pieces', '1 lb bone in beef short ribs (425 g)', '5 dried ancho chiles', '5 dried guajillo chiles', '2 dried morita chiles', 'warm water for soaking', '1 whole cinnamon stick', '1 tablespoon whole coriander seeds', '1 tablespoon whole black peppercorn', '4 whole allspice berries', '2 whole cloves', '6 dried bay leaves', '1 teaspoon mexican oregano', '¼ cup canola oil (60 mL) plus 1 tablespoon plus more as needed', '1 large yellow onion chopped', '4 roma tomatoes quartered', '8 cloves garlic roughly chopped', '¼ cup apple cider vinegar (60 mL)', '8 cups water (2 L)', '1 package frozen banana leaves thawed', 'Tacos', '12 corn tortillas', '1 lb shredded queso oaxaca (450 g)', 'red onion pickled', 'Radish sliced', 'fresh cilantro chopped', 'Lime wedge', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Make the birria: Line a baking sheet with parchment paperArrange the chuck roast and short ribs on the prepared baking sheet', '2:  Sprinkle ¼ cup salt all over the beef, making sure to coat each piece completely', '3:  Refrigerate for at least 4 hours and up to overnight', '4: Add the ancho, guajillo and morita chiles to a medium heatproof bowl', '5:  Cover with warm water and soak until starting to soften, about 5 minutes', '6:  Remove the seeds and stems and set chiles aside', '7: In a medium skillet over medium heat, toast the cinnamon stick, coriander, black pepper, allspice, and cloves until fragrant, about 2 minutes', '8:  Transfer the toasted spices, bay leaves, and oregano to a spice grinder or high-powered blender and grind into a fine powder', '9: Preheat the oven to 300°F (150°C)', '10: Remove the seasoned meat from the refrigerator and use paper towels to pat dry', '11: In a large Dutch oven or heavy-bottomed pot with a tight fitting lid, heat ¼ cup canola oil over medium-high heat', '12:  When the oil is shimmering, sear the seasoned meat on all sides until golden brown, working in batches if needed to avoid overcrowding the pot, about 20 minutes', '13:  Remove the meat from the pot and set aside', '14:  If the oil looks dark and burnt, discard and add ¼ cup fresh canola oil to the pot and return to medium-high heat', '15: Add the yellow onion, tomatoes, and remaining tablespoon of salt to the hot oil and cook until the onion begins to sweat, 5–7 minutes', '16:  Add the garlic and cook until fragrant, about 3 minutes', '17: Add the ground spices and continue cooking until aromatic, about 2 minutes', '18: Add the apple cider vinegar, water, seared meat, and chiles', '19:  Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to medium-low and cover', '20:  Simmer until the stew begins to thicken and the chiles are completely softened, about 30 minutes', '21: Remove the chiles from the stew and transfer to a high-powered blender with about 2 cups of the broth', '22:  Blend until smooth, then pour back into the pot and stir to combine', '23:  Cover the stew with the banana leaves, then place the lid on top', '24:  Transfer the stew to the oven and continue cooking until the meat easily pulls away from the short ribs bones, about 90 minutes', '25:  If the meat has some resistance, cover and cook longer, until very tender', '26: Remove the stew from the oven and discard the banana leaves, then remove the meat from the pot and transfer to a large bowl', '27:  Use a pair of tongs and a fork to shred the meat to your desired texture', '28:  Reserve the broth (consomé)', '29: Make the tacos: Heat the remaining tablespoon of canola oil in a large cast iron skillet over medium heat until shimmering', '30:  Dip a tortilla in the warm consomé, then lay flat in the hot oil', '31:  Add 2 tablespoons of queso Oaxaca to one half of the tortilla and about ¼ cup of the shredded beef to the other half', '32:   Fold the quesadilla shut and cook until the cheese begins to melt, about 1 minute', '33:  Flip the quesadilla and continue cooking until the tortilla is golden brown and crispy and the cheese is oozing from the edges, about 1 minute', '34:  Repeat with the remaining tortillas, cheese and birria', '35: Serve the tacos with the consomé alongside for dipping as well as pickled onions, sliced radishes, chopped fresh cilantro, and lime wedges']

ingredients: ['2 cups almond flour (190 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 tablespoon sesame seeds plus more for sprinkling', '2 tablespoons avocado oil or olive oil', '3 tablespoons ice water']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: Combine the 2 cups almond flour, 1 teaspoon salt, ½ teaspoon pepper, and sesame seeds in a large bowl', '3: Add the 2 3 tablespoons avocado oil and mix thoroughly with a fork', '4: Add the 3 tablespoons ice water, 1 1 2 3 tablespoon at a time, and mix thoroughly, until small clumps form and the dough holds together when squeezed', '5: Form the dough into a round, flattening the top and bottom as evenly as possible', '6: Place the dough on a sheet of parchment paper and add another piece of parchment on top', '7:  Roll out the dough as evenly as possible, to between ¼- and ⅛-inch (6- and 3-mm) thick', '8: Remove the top layer of parchment paper and place on a baking sheet', '9:  You may need to press the edges of the dough to form an even rectangle', '10: Using a cookie cutter or pizza cutter, slice the dough to desired size', '11:  If using a cookie cutter, re-roll the excess dough and cut out more crackers', '12: If desired, use the blunt end of a skewer to poke holes in each of the crackers', '13: Carefully place the crackers on the baking sheet', '14:  If the dough is too warm, the crackers will break as you attempt to transfer them', '15:  Chill in the freezer for 10 minutes before proceeding if this happens', '16: Bake for 15-20 minutes, flipping halfway, until golden brown', '17: Let the crackers cool completely and serve as desired', '18:  Store up to 1 week at room temperature in an airtight container']

ingredients: ['1 cup white long grain rice (200 g)', '2 dried bay leaves or fresh bay leaves', '1 ½ cups water (360 mL)', '2 tablespoons lime juice', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', 'kosher salt to taste', '½ cup fresh cilantro (20 g) finely chopped']
instructions: ['1: In a medium saucepan, add the 1 cup white long grain rice, 2 dried bay leaves, and 1 ½ cups water and bring to a boil over high heat', '2: Once boiling, reduce the heat to low, cover, and simmer for 18 minutes', '3: Remove the lid, fluff the 1 cup white long grain rice with a fork, and cover', '4:  Let rest and absorb any steam for 10 minutes', '5: Remove the 2 dried bay leaves, then add the 2 tablespoons lime juice, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, kosher salt, and ½ cup fresh cilantro', '6:  Stir to combine']

ingredients: ['1 cup Great Value® Almond Milk (240 mL)', '1 ½ cups Great Value® Berry Medley (260 g)', '¼ cup dried apricot (50 g) diced', '½ teaspoon fresh ginger']
instructions: ['1: In a blender, combine the almond milk, berries, apricots, and ½ teaspoon fresh ginger', '2:  Blend on high speed until smooth']

ingredients: ['1 clove garlic', '¼ cup fresh parsley (10 g) chopped', '¼ cup scallions (25 g) chopped', '¼ cup apple cider vinegar (60 mL)', '2 tablespoons honey', '¼ cup orange juice (60 mL) reserved from supreming oranges if desired.', '1 tablespoon dijon mustard', '2 tablespoons tahini', 'kosher salt to taste', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '3 cups tuscan kale (300 g) thinly sliced (1 bunch)', '1 cup red cabbage (100 g) thinly sliced', '1 large fuji apple cored and thinly sliced', '1 cup brussels sprouts (115 g) thinly sliced (4 ounces 115 G)', '3 oranges supremed', '¼ cup pepitas (30 g) toasted', '¼ cup pomegranate seeds (20 g)']
instructions: ['1: To make the dressing, add the 1 clove garlic, ¼ cup fresh parsley, ¼ cup scallions, ¼ cup 1 1 large fuji apple cider vinegar, 2 tablespoons honey, ¼ cup 3 orange juice, Dijon mustard, 2 tablespoons tahini, and kosher salt to a blender', '2:  Blend until smooth', '3:  With the blender running, slowly drizzle in the 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil until the dressing is easily pourable', '4:   Set aside until ready to use', '5: minutes prior to serving the salad, add the 3 cups tuscan kale to a 1 large bowl and season with kosher salt', '6:  Gently massage with your hands to break down the tough fibers and 1 cup reduce bitterness', '7: Add the 1 cup red cabbage, ¼ cup 1 1 large fuji apple, Brussels sprouts, ¼ cup 3 orange segments, ¼ cup pepitas, and ¼ cup pomegranate seeds', '8:  Toss well to combine', '9:  Serve in a bowl or plate and drizzle with dressing to taste']

ingredients: ['1 tube saltines 40 crackers +', '1 cup butter (225 g) 2 sticks either salted or unsalted; do not use margarine', '1 ⅛ cups brown sugar (245 g) firmly packed we prefer light', '1 bag chocolate chips we like semi-sweet', '½ cup chopped pecan (60 g) toasted or toasted chopped almond']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C) degrees', '2: Line cookie sheet with foil & spray with non-stick cooking spray', '3:  Line 1 tube saltines 40 crackers end to end on sheet, breaking 1 tube saltines 40 crackers to fit the end if necessary', '4: In a saucepan, melt 1 cup butter on low heat', '5:  Once melted, add 1 ⅛ cups brown sugar and turn heat to medium', '6:  Continue stirring until boiling – then boil for 3 minutes (set timer)', '7: Pour over 1 tube saltines 40 crackers, spread evenly working quickly', '8: Put sheet into oven – bake for 5 minutes', '9: Remove – pour 1 bag chocolate chips over top – place a sheet of foil over and let melt for 3 minutes', '10: Spread melted 1 bag chocolate over the top evenly', '11:  Add nuts to top – replace foil and refrigerate until set', '12:  (Can be frozen', '13: )Break up into pieces', '14: Nutrition  Calories: 2589 Fat: 229 grams  Carbs: 142 grams Fiber: 0 grams  Sugars: 137 grams  Protein: 2 grams']

ingredients: ['12 shells jumbo pasta shell', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ cup white onion (75 g) chopped', '¼ cup green chile (40 g)', '1 cup chicken (125 g) shredded', '½ teaspoon cumin', '½ tablespoon garlic', 'pepper to taste', 'salt to taste', '1 cup ricotta cheese (250 g)', '½ cup queso fresco (60 g)', '½ cup monterey jack cheese (50 g) shredded', '1 tablespoon fresh scallions for garnish', '10 oz green enchilada sauce (285 g)']
instructions: ['1: Bring water to a boil', '2:  Cook the pasta 12 shells until al dente', '3:  Drain, rinse with cold water, and set aside to cool', '4: Pour the 1 tablespoon olive oil in a pan, then add the onions and cook on medium heat until softened', '5:  Add the green chiles, 1 cup chicken, and spices and stir to combine', '6:  Cook on low heat for an additional 3-4 minutes', '7: Place 1 cup chicken mixture in a bowl', '8:  Add 1 cup ricotta, ½ cup queso fresco, and ½ cup monterey jack and stir until all ingredients are well combined', '9: Stuff each shell with a large spoonful of the mixture', '10: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C)', '11: Coat the bottom of a baking dish with a thin layer of green enchilada sauce', '12:  Place the pasta 12 shells in the dish in a single layer', '13: Cover with the rest of the enchilada sauce and some additional ½ cup queso fresco and ½ cup monterey jack', '14: Bake for 30 minutes (or until the cheese has melted and the sauce begins to bubble around the edges)', '15:  Top with 1 tablespoon fresh scallions']

ingredients: ['4 cups carrot (480 g) chopped', '4 cups turnip (650 g) chopped', '4 cups parsnip (400 g) peeled and chopped', '2 teaspoons extra virgin olive oil', '2 teaspoons kosher salt plus more to taste', '1 teaspoon Schwartz® ground black pepper', '6 cups fresh arugula (600 g)', '½ lb bacon (225 g) cooked and crumbled', '¼ cup crumbled goat cheese (30 g)', 'Black Onion Seed Vinaigrette', '1 teaspoon Schwartz® Black Onion Seeds', '1 teaspoon Schwartz® Mustard Seeds', '¼ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 tablespoon dijon mustard', '¼ cup apple cider vinegar (60 mL)', '2 tablespoons honey', '¼ cup extra virgin olive oil (60 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 425˚F (220˚C)', '2: Cut up the vegetables and on a baking sheet, toss together the carrots, turnips, parsnips, 2 teaspoons extra virgin ¼ cup extra virgin olive oil, salt, and pepper', '3: Roast the vegetables until crispy and tender, 30-35 minutes', '4: Make the vinaigrette: In a small pan over medium-high heat, combine the Schwartz Black Onion Seeds and Schwartz Mustard Seeds and toast, stirring continuously, until fragrant, about 3 minutes', '5: In a blender, combine the toasted spices, salt, 1 tablespoon dijon mustard, apple cider vinegar, and 2 tablespoons honey', '6:  Blend on high speed until the spices are fully 1 teaspoon Schwartz® ground and the mixture is smooth', '7:  With the blender running, slowly drizzle in the 2 teaspoons extra virgin ¼ cup extra virgin olive oil until emulsified', '8: Transfer the roasted vegetables to a large bowl and pour in ⅓ cup (80 ml) of the dressing', '9:  Toss to coat', '10: In a separate large bowl, combine the 6 cups fresh arugula, ½ lb bacon, and goat cheese', '11:  Drizzle with more dressing to taste, reserving the remaining dressing for another use, and toss to combine', '12:  Add the roasted vegetables and toss again', '13: Divide between plates and serve']

ingredients: ['¼ cup fresh spinach (50 g)', '¼ cup ricotta cheese (50 g)', '2 chicken breasts', '¼ cup cheddar cheese (20 g)', '1 teaspoon paprika', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Cook the ¼ cup fresh spinach on a medium heat in a splash of oil for 3-5 minutes until it is slightly wilted', '2: Stir in the ¼ cup ricotta and cook for a further 30-60 seconds', '3:  Allow to cool', '4: Cut slits into the 2 chicken breasts about 1cm (½ inch) apart but don’t cut all the way through - about 75% of the way down is what you should aim for', '5: Stuff all of the ¼ cup fresh spinach and ¼ cup ricotta mixture into the slits', '6: Season the 2 chicken with salt and pepper', '7: Grate the ¼ cup cheddar and sprinkle it generously on top', '8: Shake the ground 1 teaspoon paprika over the 2 chicken to add some colour and flavour', '9: Bake in the centre of a pre-heated oven for 20-25 minutes 400°F (200°C) until the cheese has melted and the juices are clear']

ingredients: ['4 cups fresh basil (160 g)', '1 cup grated parmesan cheese (110 g)', '½ cup pine nuts (65 g)', '2 cloves garlic', '½ lemon juiced', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '½ cup olive oil (120 mL)', 'oil', '3 zucchinis', '1 cup cherry tomato (200 g)', '2 boneless skinless chicken breasts chopped']
instructions: ['1: In a food processor, combine the 4 cups fresh basil, Parmesan, ½ cup pine nuts, 2 cloves garlic, ½ lemon juice, salt, pepper, and ½ cup olive ½ cup olive oil', '2:  Pulse until smooth texture', '3:  Set aside', '4: With a vegetable peeler, shave ribbons of the zucchini until you reach the seeds', '5:  Set aside', '6: Slice the 1 cup cherry tomatoes and set aside', '7: Heat a 4-quart jumbo cooker over medium-high', '8:  Add a little ½ cup olive oil, the 2 boneless skinless chicken breasts, and sprinkle with salt and pepper', '9:  Cook until the 2 boneless skinless chicken is cooked through and browned on all surfaces', '10: Turn off the heat and add the 1 cup cherry tomatoes, pesto, and zucchini ribbons', '11:  Toss until well combined and heated through']

ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 large onion chopped finely', '1 zucchini chopped', '1 yellow squash chopped', '10 sugar plum tomatoes chopped in halves', '¾ cup heavy cream (180 mL)', '½ cup milk (120 mL)', '1 cup shredded mexican cheese blend (100 g)', '4 tablespoons lime juice', '3 tablespoons fresh cilantro chopped', '8 oz gemeli pasta (225 g)', 'paprika to taste', 'salt to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 375°F', '2: Heat oil in a 1 large pot over medium-high heat', '3:  Add onions and 3 cloves garlic andsauté, stirring frequently, until onions become translucent (about 6-7 minutes)', '4: Add in 1 zucchini and 1 yellow squash and cook until tender and soft', '5:  Then, add in paprika and salt and stir', '6: Once preheated, line a baking tray with aluminum foil and place the 10 sugar plum tomatoes on itwith the flat side facing down', '7:  Drizzle 3 tablespoons olive oil on top of the 10 sugar plum tomatoes and place in the oven for 15-20 minutes', '8:  Remember to check on the 10 sugar plum tomatoes frequently', '9: Bring water in another pot to a boil, and pour in the uncooked 8 oz gemeli pasta', '10:  Cook according to the directions on the box', '11: Once the veggies are tender and cooked, pour in the heavy cream and milk and bring to a boil', '12: Reduce heat to a simmer and stir in the cheese, half-cup at a time', '13:  Add more cheese as needed if the mixture is not thick enough', '14:  If the mixture is too thick, add more milk as needed', '15: Stir in the 4 tablespoons lime juice and 3 tablespoons fresh cilantro and turn off the heat if the crema has reached the desired consistency (about 15-20 minutes)', '16:  Add more paprika and salt if desired', '17: Drain the 8 oz gemeli pasta, and reserve some 8 oz gemeli pasta water', '18:  Mix in the 8 oz gemeli pasta and 8 oz gemeli pasta water with the crema', '19: Once the 10 sugar plum tomatoes are roasted, place the 10 sugar plum tomatoes on the top of the 8 oz gemeli pasta as a garnish']

ingredients: ['Red Chicken Curry', '2 tablespoons salt', '1 tablespoon ground pepper', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '1 tablespoon smoked paprika', '1 tablespoon ground turmeric', '1 tablespoon coriander', '1 teaspoon ground cardamom', '1 teaspoon dry mustard', '1 teaspoon cayenne', '½ teaspoon allspice', '3 lb boneless skinless chicken thighs (1.5 g) cut into 2 in (5 cm) cubes ', '5 tablespoons full-fat yogurt divided plus more for serving', '9 cloves garlic minced divided', '1 tablespoon fresh ginger minced', '3 tablespoons olive oil plus more as needed', '3 carrots chopped', '1 white onion chopped', '1 lb yukon gold potato (455 g) chopped', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '28 oz crushed tomatoes (795 g) 1 can', '2 cups chicken broth (480 mL)', '2 cups basmati rice (460 g) or long-grain jasmine cooked for serving', '1 fresh cilantro for serving', 'Lime wedge for serving', 'Naan Bowls', '½ cup warm water (120 mL)', '2 tablespoons sugar', '1 tablespoon active dry yeast', '4 cups all-purpose flour (500 g) plus more for dusting', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 tablespoon kosher salt plus more to taste', '1 cup full-fat yogurt (245 g)', '1 cup whole milk (240 mL) room temperature', 'olive oil for greasing', '½ cup unsalted butter (115 g) 1 stick melted']
instructions: ['1: In a small bowl, combine the 2 tablespoons 1 tablespoon kosher salt, 1 tablespoon ground pepper, 1 tablespoon ground cumin, 1 tablespoon smoked paprika, 1 tablespoon ground turmeric, 1 tablespoon coriander, 1 teaspoon ground cardamom, dry mustard, 1 teaspoon cayenne, and ½ teaspoon allspice', '2:  Stir to combine', '3: In a large bowl, add the cubed chicken thighs, 2 tablespoons of yogurt, 4 9 cloves of minced garlic, the 1 tablespoon fresh ginger, and half of the spice mixture', '4:  Toss the chicken until it is fully coated', '5:  Cover the bowl with plastic wrap, and marinate in the fridge for 2 hours or overnight', '6: Make the naan bowls: In a liquid measuring cup, combine the warm water, sugar, and yeast', '7:  Set aside to bloom for 10 minutes', '8: In the meantime, mix the 4 cups all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, and 2 tablespoons 1 tablespoon kosher salt together in a large bowl', '9: To the yeast mixture, add the yogurt and milk', '10:  Stir until smooth, then pour into the dry ingredients', '11:  Stir to combine, then dump the dough out onto a 4 cups all-purpose floured surface and knead with your hands until it forms a smooth, soft ball, about 2 minutes', '12: Place the dough in a clean large bowl greased with 3 tablespoons olive oil and cover with a clean kitchen towel or plastic wrap', '13:  Let rise at room temperature until doubled in size, about 2 hours', '14: Heat the 3 tablespoons olive oil in a large Dutch oven over medium-high heat', '15:  Working in batches to avoid overcrowding the pot, cook the marinated chicken on all sides until cooked through and browned, about 20 minutes', '16:  Drizzle in more oil, as needed, to prevent the meat from sticking to the bottom of the pot', '17:  Transfer the browned meat to a plate as it finishes cooking and set aside', '18: Add the 3 carrots, 1 white onion, potatoes, remaining 5 9 cloves of minced garlic, and reserved spice mixture, Stir and cook until the vegetables brown slightly and start to soften, 15 minutes', '19: Stir in the tomato paste and cook until aromatic, about 3 minutes', '20: Add the 28 oz crushed tomatoes and chicken broth', '21:  Stir to combine', '22:  Bring to a simmer', '23: Add the chicken, stir, and return to a simmer', '24:  Cover and cook for 30 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender and the chicken is cooked through', '25: Stir in the remaining 3 tablespoons of yogurt, then cover and keep warm', '26: Once the naan dough has risen, dump onto a 4 cups all-purpose floured surface, and divide into 6 equal portions', '27:  Roll each portion into a ¼-inch (1 /2 cm) thick circle, approximately 10 inches (25 cm) in diameter', '28: Heat a large cast-iron skillet over medium-high heat', '29:  Place a disc of naan dough in the skillet', '30:  Cook for about 2 minutes, until the dough puffs up, then flip and cook on the other side until browned, 1 minute', '31:  Transfer the naan to a medium bowl and place
