another bowl on top', '32:  Repeat with the rest of the naan dough, stacking bowls between each round', '33:  As the naan cools, they will retain the bowl shape', '34: Brush the naan bowls with warm melted butter', '35: Fill the naan bowls with the chicken curry and 2 cups basmati rice', '36:  Serve with yogurt, 1 fresh cilantro, and lime wedges']

ingredients: ['Beef Filling', '1 ½ tablespoons vegetable oil', '½ cup yellow onion (75 g) diced - about 1 small onion', '½ cup green bell pepper (50 g) about 1 small pepper', '3 cloves garlic minced', '½ cup fresh cilantro (20 g) chopped', '1 lb ground beef (425 g)', '¾ teaspoon adobo seasoning', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '5 tablespoons tomato sauce', 'Plantains', '3 cups vegetable oil (720 mL)', '4 plantains', 'kosher salt to taste', 'Assembly', '16 oz shredded mozzarella cheese (450 g)', 'fresh cilantro for garnish torn', 'Preparation', 'Beef Filling', '1 ½ tablespoons vegetable oil', '½ cup yellow onion (75 g) diced - about 1 small onion', '½ cup green bell pepper (50 g) about 1 small pepper', '3 cloves garlic minced', '½ cup fresh cilantro (20 g) chopped', '1 lb ground beef (425 g)', '¾ teaspoon adobo seasoning', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '5 tablespoons tomato sauce', 'Plantains', '3 cups vegetable oil (720 mL)', '4 plantains', 'kosher salt to taste', 'Assembly', '16 oz shredded mozzarella cheese (450 g)', 'fresh cilantro for garnish torn', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Make the beef filling: Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat', '3:  When the oil is shimmering, add the onion and green pepper and sauté until softened and translucent, 3–4 minutes', '4:  Add the garlic and cilantro and cook for another 1–2 minutes, or until fragrant', '5: Add the ground beef, breaking up with a spatula to incorporate into the vegetables', '6:  Season with the adobo, garlic powder, and black pepper', '7:  Increase the heat to medium-high and cook for 4–5 minutes, or until the meat is no longer pink', '8:  Drain any excess liquid', '9: Return the skillet to the stovetop over medium-low heat, stir in the tomato sauce, and cook until heated through, 2–3 minutes', '10:  Remove the pan from the heat and set aside until ready to use', '11: Make the plantains: Trim the ends off of the plantains, then peel', '12: Heat the vegetable oil in a large, high-walled skillet over medium-low heat until the temperature reaches 350°F (180°C)', '13:  Working in batches if needed, add the plantains and fry, turning every 30 seconds or so, until golden brown on all sides and tender enough to be pierced with a fork, 8–10 minutes', '14:  Transfer to a paper-towel lined plate to drain until cool enough to handle', '15: Transfer the plantains to a cutting board', '16:  Cut a slit lengthwise down each plantain, being careful not to cut all the way through', '17:  Use 2 forks to gently pull each plantain open', '18:  Use a fork, flat-side down, to press the base of the “canoe” to widen', '19:  Transfer to a baking dish and season with salt', '20: Fill each plantain with ¼–⅓ cup of shredded mozzarella cheese, add about ½–¾ cup of the beef filling, then top with ¼–⅓ cup more cheese', '21:  Cover the baking dish with foil', '22: Bake for 20–25 minutes', '23:  Remove the foil and broil for 2–3 minutes, or until the cheese is brown and bubbly', '24:  Garnish with torn cilantro']

ingredients: ['12 gala apples or fuji apples cored and cubed', '2 green apples cored and cubed', '3 cinnamon sticks', '1 ginger thumb sized peeled', '2 teaspoons whole clove', '1 pinch kosher salt', '8 cups water (1.9 L)', '1 cup brown sugar (220 g)']
instructions: ['1: Place the apples, 3 cinnamon sticks, 1 ginger, cloves, and 1 pinch kosher salt in an 8-quart (7', '2: 5-liters) slow cooker', '3:  Pour the 8 cups water over the apples', '4: Cover and cook on high for at least 8 hours, or overnight (up to 24 hours)', '5: Remove the solids from the cider, pressing the pulp to extract as much liquid as possible', '6: Whisk in the 1 cup brown sugar until dissolved', '7: Serve hot, or store in the refrigerator to serve later', '8:  Reheat before serving']

ingredients: ['Garam Masala', '1 dried bay leaf', '2 whole cinnamon sticks', '1 teaspoon whole clove', '20 whole black cardamom pods', '1 tablespoon whole black peppercorn', '2 tablespoons whole cumin seeds', '4 tablespoons whole coriander', '½ whole nutmeg pod', 'Ginger-Garlic Paste', '1 fresh ginger peeled', '6 cloves garlic', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 pinch kosher salt', 'Marinade', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 ½ teaspoons ground cumin', '1 ½ teaspoons ground coriander', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '½ lemon juiced', '1 teaspoon kashmiri chile powder', '½ cup full fat greek yogurt (120 mL)', '8 chicken thighs (about 2 pounds) cut into strips or cubes', 'Gravy', '4 tablespoons unsalted butter divided', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '½ teaspoon whole cumin seeds', '1 whole black cardamom pod', '1 dried bay leaf', '4 whole cloves', '2 green chiles finely chopped (optional)', '½ teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 large yellow onion chopped', '1 ½ teaspoons ground cumin', '1 teaspoon kashmiri chile powder', '1 ½ teaspoons ground coriander', '2 ½ cups crushed tomato (500 g) canned', '½ cup cashews (60 g)', 'kosher salt to taste', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '2 tablespoons sugar', '2 tablespoons heavy cream', '1 tablespoon dried fenugreek leaves', '1 tablespoon freshly ground cilantro', 'For Serving (Optional)', 'basmati rice cooked', 'onion kulcha', 'garlic naan', 'roti', 'Paratha', 'Special Equipment', '12 wooden skewers']
instructions: ['1: Make the garam masala: Add the bay leaf, 2 whole cinnamon stick, cloves, cardamom pods, blcak peppercorns, 2 tablespoons whole 1 ½ teaspoons ground ½ teaspoon whole 1 ½ teaspoons ground cumin seeds, coriander seeds, and ½ whole nutmeg to a medium skillet', '2:  Toast over medium heat for 1–2 minutes, until fragrant, but not burnt', '3:  Transfer the toasted spices to a plate and let cool', '4: Transfer the spices to an electric spice grinder or mortar and pestle and grind into a fine powder', '5:  The garam masala will keep in an airtight container in a cool, dark place for several months', '6: Make the 1 fresh ginger-garlic paste: Add the 1 fresh ginger, 6 cloves garlic, oil, and salt to a small food processor or blender and process into a smooth paste, scraping down the sides of the processor as needed', '7: Marinate the 8 chicken: In a 1 large bowl, whisk together the 2 tablespoons 1 fresh ginger-garlic paste, 2 teaspoons garam masala, the turmeric, ground 2 tablespoons whole 1 ½ teaspoons ground ½ teaspoon whole 1 ½ teaspoons ground cumin, ground coriander, salt, ½ lemon juice, Kashmiri red chile powder, and Greek yogurt until well combined', '8:  Add the 8 chicken and toss to coat, then cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 3 hours, but ideally overnight', '9: Add the 12 wooden skewers to a 1 large baking dish', '10:  Cover with enough water to completely submerge, then soak for at least 1 hour', '11: When ready to cook the 8 chicken, arrange an oven rack in the highest position', '12:  Turn the oven to broil on high', '13:  Set a wire rack over a rimmed baking sheet', '14: Thread the 8 chicken onto 12 wooden skewers and set on the wire rack, spacing evenly', '15:  Broil for 15 minutes, until evenly browned and cooked through, turning the skewers every 5 minutes to ensure even cooking', '16:  Let cool slightly before removing 8 chicken from the skewers', '17:  Set aside', '18: While the 8 chicken cooks, make the gravy: In a 1 large, high-walled skillet, melt together the butter and the 1 tablespoon 2 tablespoons olive oil over medium heat', '19:  Add the 2 tablespoons whole 1 ½ teaspoons ground ½ teaspoon whole 1 ½ teaspoons ground cumin seeds, cardamom pod, bay leaf, cloves, 2 green chiles, and turmeric and sauté for 1 minute, until fragrant', '20:  Add the 1 large yellow onion and cook for about 5 minutes, until lightly browned', '21:  Add 2 tablespoons 1 fresh ginger-garlic paste and cook for another minute, until fragrant', '22:  Add the ground 2 tablespoons whole 1 ½ teaspoons ground ½ teaspoon whole 1 ½ teaspoons ground cumin, Kashmiri red chile powder, ground coriander, and 1½ teaspoons of garam masala and stir for 1 minute, until well combined', '23: Add the 2 ½ cups crushed tomatoes, cashews, and a 1 pinch of salt and cook, stirring often, for 10–15 minutes, until the tomatoes are a deeper, dark red color and the cashews are soft', '24: Transfer the tomato mixture to a high-powered blender', '25:  Add ½ cup water and blend until completely smooth, adding up to ½ cup more water if needed', '26:  If your blender is not high-powered, strain the gravy through a fine-mesh sieve after blending for a smoother texture', '27: Wipe the pan clean, then return the gravy to the pan', '28:  Add the remaining 3 tablespoons of butter, the sugar, and the cooked 8 chicken', '29:  Cover and cook over low heat for 10 minutes, until the 8 chicken is warmed through', '30:  Stir in the heavy cream and 1 tablespoon dried fenugreek and season with more salt to taste', '31: Garnish the butter 8 chicken with cilantro and serve with your choice of basmati rice, 1 large yellow onion kulcha, naan, roti, or paratha']

ingredients: ['2 avocados', '4 eggs', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '¼ cup bacon bits (55 g)', '1 cherry tomato quartered', '1 sprig fresh basil chopped', 'shredded cheddar cheese', '2 tablespoons fresh chives chopped']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Slice the 2 avocados in half and remove the pits', '3: Place the avocado halves on a baking sheet and scoop out some of the flesh to make a bigger hole', '4: Crack one egg into each hole and season with salt and pepper', '5: Top with toppings of choice and bake for 15 minutes or until yolk reaches desired consistency', '6: Sprinkle with fresh herbs, as desired']

ingredients: ['2 cups chickpea flour (200 g)', '4 cups water (960 mL)', 'Dipping sauce', '½ cup greek yogurt (145 g)', '1 tablespoon fresh parsley finely chopped', '1 tablespoon fresh dill finely chopped', '1 clove garlic minced', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', 'salt to taste']
instructions: ['1: Bring 4 cups of water to a boil', '2:  Gradually whisk in 2 cups (200 g) of chickpea flour', '3:  Continue to whisk until the mixture is thickened to the consistency of thick oatmeal', '4: Immediately transfer to a greased, baking dish', '5:  [We used an 8x10 (20x25 cm), but a larger one will just produce thinner fries]', '6:  Knock the dish on your work surface a few times to ensure that the mixture spreads evenly and to release any air bubbles', '7: Press plastic wrap over the mixture to ensure a flat surface and refrigerate for 2 hours until it has set firm', '8: Dipping Dipping sauce: In a medium bowl, combine ½ cup greek yogurt, a pinch of salt, finely chopped 1 tablespoon fresh parsley, finely chopped 1 tablespoon fresh dill, 1 clove garlic minced, and 1 teaspoon lemon juice', '9: Invert the baking dish on a cutting board (you may have to pull at the edges to release the suction for it to fall out cleanly)', '10:  Slice into streak fry sizes', '11: Shallow fry in oil until each side is golden and crispy', '12:  Salt immediately after coming out of oil']

ingredients: ['⅓ cup ice (50 g)', '½ medium banana plus more sliced for garnish', '⅓ cup quick oat (35 g)', '2 tablespoons almond butter plus more for garnish', '2 tablespoons raw cacao powder', '¼ avocado', '1 tablespoon honey', '1 ¼ cups non dairy milk (300 mL) of your choice']
instructions: ['1: Combine the ⅓ cup ice, ½ medium banana, oats, 2 tablespoons almond butter, 2 tablespoons raw cacao powder, ¼ avocado, 1 tablespoon honey, and nondairy 1 ¼ cups non dairy milk in a high-powered blender', '2:  Blend on high speed for 1 minute, until completely smooth', '3: Pour the smoothie into a glass and top with a few slices of frozen ½ medium banana and a drizzle of 2 tablespoons almond butter']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon oil', '1 head broccoli chopped', '1 carrot julienned', '1 cauliflower chopped', '1 handful string bean', '1 onion sliced', '1 half ginger sliced', '5 cloves garlic minced', '1 cabbage shredded - half head', '1 bell pepper diced', '1 handful snow peas', '½ lb pork belly (225 g) cubed', '1 handful shrimp handful peeled', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '3 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon oyster sauce', '1 pinch salt', '1 pinch pepper']
instructions: ['1: Add 1 tablespoon oil to a heated wok and to this, add ½ lb pork 1 ½ lb ½ lb pork belly and fry cooked and golden-brown', '2:  Remove ½ lb pork and set aside', '3: In the same 1 tablespoon oil, cook 1 handful shrimp and once cooked, set aside', '4: In the same 1 tablespoon oil, saute 1 half ginger, 5 cloves garlic, and onions for 2-3 minutes', '5:  Once translucent, add in ½ lb pork and 1 handful shrimp', '6: Saute for 2 minutes', '7: Then, add 1 cauliflower, carrots, 1 head broccoli, 1 ½ lb ½ lb pork bell 1 ½ lb ½ lb pork bell 1 pinch pepper, 1 cabbage, 1 handful snow peas, and ½ cup water', '8:  Steam for 2 minutes', '9: Stir in 3 tablespoons soy and 1 tablespoon oyster sauce and season to taste with 1 pinch salt and 1 ½ lb ½ lb pork bell 1 pinch pepper', '10: Serve warm']

ingredients: ['2 strips bacon cut into 1-inch (2 cm) pieces', '1 cup onion (150 g) diced', '1 cup carrot (120 g) diced', '1 cup celery (225 g) diced', '3 tablespoons flour', '2 cups ham (300 g) cooked and cubed', '2 potatoes cubed', '1 teaspoon fresh thyme', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '6 cups chicken broth (1.4 L)', '2 bay leaves', '2 cups heavy cream (480 mL)', 'Preparation', '2 strips bacon cut into 1-inch (2 cm) pieces', '1 cup onion (150 g) diced', '1 cup carrot (120 g) diced', '1 cup celery (225 g) diced', '3 tablespoons flour', '2 cups ham (300 g) cooked and cubed', '2 potatoes cubed', '1 teaspoon fresh thyme', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '6 cups chicken broth (1.4 L)', '2 bay leaves', '2 cups heavy cream (480 mL)', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: In a 6-quart (5', '2: 7 liters) dutch oven, cook bacon over medium-high heat until fat is rendered out and the pieces begin to get crispy', '3: Add onion, carrot, and celery, and cook until just tender, about 3 minutes', '4: Reduce heat to medium and add flour, stirring constantly for 1-2 minutes to avoid lumps', '5: Add ham, potatoes, thyme, and black pepper', '6:  Stir to coat the meat and potatoes in the roux/vegetable mix', '7: Add the chicken broth and bay leaves', '8: Cover and bring to a boil', '9:  Then reduce heat to medium-low and cook covered for 25-30 minutes', '10: Remove bay leaves and stir in cream', '11:  Return to a simmer and serve']

ingredients: ['1 lb chicken breast (455 g) cubed', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '½ cup teriyaki sauce (120 mL) divided', '4 tablespoons cooking oil divided', '6 oz chow mein noodle (180 g) hong kong style pan fried noodles par cooked according to package instructions', '¾ cup onion (11520 g) sliced', '½ cup carrot (60 g) julienned', '1 cup broccoli floret (150 g)', '1 cup cabbage (100 g)', 'sesame seed for garnish']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, season the cubed 1 lb chicken with salt and pepper', '2:  Add ¼ cup (of 60 ml) teriyaki sauce and mix until the 1 lb chicken is well-coated', '3:  Cover with plastic wrap and marinate in the refrigerator for 30 minutes to 1 hour', '4: In a wok or deep skillet over medium-high heat, heat 2 4 tablespoons of cooking oil, then add the par-cooked 6 oz chow mein noodle (180 g) hong kong style pan fried noodles', '5:  Cook for 1-2 minutes, allowing the 6 oz chow mein noodle (180 g) hong kong style pan fried noodles to crisp, then flip and cook for another 1-2 minutes', '6:  Transfer to a plate and set aside', '7: In the same wok, heat 1 tablespoon of cooking oil, then add the 1 lb chicken', '8:  Cook for 3-4 minutes, until browned on one side, then stir and cook for another 3-4 minutes, until fully cooked through', '9:  Set the 1 lb chicken aside', '10: In the same wok, add 1 tablespoon of oil, the onion, and carrot', '11:  Cook for 2-3 minutes, or until the onions are translucent', '12:  Add the broccoli and cabbage', '13:  Stir and cook for 1-2 minutes, then season with salt and pepper and cook for 3 minutes more, until the vegetables are soft', '14: Add the cooked 1 lb chicken and crispy 6 oz chow mein noodle (180 g) hong kong style pan fried noodles back to the wok, along with the remaining ¼ cup (60 ml) teriyaki sauce', '15:  Toss well and cook for 2-3 minutes, until everything is well-combined', '16:  Garnish with sesame seeds']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon salt', '1 tablespoon pepper', '1 tablespoon paprika', '1 tablespoon chili powder', '2 ½ lb rack of pork ribs (1 kg) halved', '1 cup honey (340 g)', '½ cup soy sauce (120 mL)', '10 garlic cloves minced']
instructions: ['1: In a small bowl, mix together the 1 tablespoon salt, 1 tablespoon pepper, 1 tablespoon paprika, and 1 tablespoon chili powder', '2:  Season the 2 ½ lb rack of pork ribs evenly with the mixture, making sure to rub it in on all sides', '3: Add the 1 cup honey, ½ cup soy sauce, and 10 garlic to a large slow cooker', '4:  Transfer the 2 ½ lb rack of pork ribs to slow cooker and turn them over in the sauce until coated', '5:  Position the 2 ½ lb rack of pork ribs so they are standing up, with the meatier side down, and so the meat is against the walls of the slow cooker, with the bone sides facing in', '6:  Cover and cook on  high for 4 hours, or low for 7-8 hours', '7:  Check after the allotted time to make sure the meat is cooked through and tender', '8: Remove the 2 ½ lb rack of pork ribs and transfer to cutting board', '9:  Cut between the bones to separate into individual 2 ½ lb rack of pork ribs', '10:  Serve with additional sauce from the slow cooker, as needed']

ingredients: ['16 oz cream cheese (450 g) softened', '¾ cup Lala® Crema (175 g) plus more for drizzling', '2 cloves garlic chopped', '2 tablespoons hot sauce', '2 tablespoons lime juice', '2 cups shredded pepper jack  cheese (200 g) divided', '¼ cup cotija cheese (30 g) crumbled plus 2 tablespoons for garnish', '1 jalapeño seeded and diced', '¼ cup red onion (35 g) chopped', '½ cup fresh cilantro (20 g) plus 1 tablespoon for garnish', '4 ½ cups frozen corn (785 g) divided', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '½ teaspoon chili powder', 'tortilla chip for dipping']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C)', '2: Add the 16 oz cream cheese, Lala® Crema, 2 cloves garlic, hot sauce, lime juice, and 1 cup (100 G) pepper jack cheese to a high-powered blender and blend on high speed for 1–2 minutes, until mostly smooth', '3: Spoon 16 oz cream cheese mixture into a large bowl and stir in the remaining cup of shredded cheese, ¼ cup Cotija cheese, the 1 jalapeño, red onion, ½ cup (20 G) cilantro, 4 cups (700 G) frozen corn, ½ teaspoon kosher salt, and ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper until well combined', '4: Pour the mixture into a 9-inch square baking dish', '5:  Sprinkle the remaining ½ cup (85 G) corn on top', '6: Bake the dip for 30–40 minutes, until bubbling and hot', '7: Remove the dip from the oven and top with a drizzle of Lala® Crema, 2 tablespoons Cotija cheese, the ½ teaspoon chili powder, and 1 tablespoon cilantro', '8: Serve warm with tortilla chips for dipping']

ingredients: ['29 oz peach in heavy syrup (820 g) 1 can', '1 box yellow cake mix', '½ cup butter (115 g) thinly sliced', 'vanilla ice cream optional']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)', '2: In a 9x18 inch (23x36 cm) glass baking dish, spread the peaches and 29 oz peach in heavy syrup', '3: Evenly sprinkle the 1 box yellow cake mix over the peaches, and pat down', '4: Lay the ½ cup butter evenly over the 1 box yellow cake mix', '5: Bake for 45 minutes', '6: Top with vanilla ice cream (optional)']

ingredients: ['1 boneless chuck roast 3 pounds (1.3 KG)', '¼ cup flour (30 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '3 tablespoons canola oil', '4 tablespoons butter', '10 pepperoncinis', '2 tablespoons mayonnaise', '2 teaspoons apple cider vinegar', '¼ teaspoon dried dill', '⅛ teaspoon paprika', 'fresh parsley for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Dredge the 1 boneless chuck roast in ¼ cup flour, salt, and 10 pepper, and massage it into the meat', '2: In a skillet on a very high heat, brown the meat on all sides in the 3 tablespoons canola oil to create a crust', '3: Transfer the meat to a slow cooker and top with 4 tablespoons butter and 10 pepperoncini', '4: Cover the slow cooker and set it to low', '5: In a small bowl, mix the 2 tablespoons mayonnaise, 2 teaspoons apple cider vinegar, ¼ teaspoon dried dill, and ⅛ teaspoon paprika until well combined', '6: Spread over the meat, and cook on low for 8 hours', '7: Remove the roast and shred with two forks', '8: Return meat to the slow cooker, and stir to mix in the juices', '9:  Serve with fresh parsley']

ingredients: ['4 cups bread flour (480 g)', '2 ½ tablespoons kosher salt divided', '1 tablespoon sugar', '2 cups warm water (470 mL)', '1 ½ teaspoons active dry yeast', '3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '28 oz whole tomatoes (795 g) san marzano or other good quality tomatoes', '4 cloves garlic', '1 lb fresh mozzarella cheese (455 g) sliced 1/2-inch (1 1/4 cm) thick', '2 cups fresh basil (80 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl combine 4 cups bread flour, 1½ 2 ½ 1 3 tablespoons salt, and sugar', '2: In a medium bowl, combine 2 cups warm water, 1 ½ teaspoons active dry yeast, and 1 2 ½ 1 3 tablespoon of olive oil', '3:  Stir well and let rest for 2 minutes', '4: Add 1 ½ teaspoons active dry yeast mixture to 4 cups bread flour mixture and combine using your hands or a stand mixer with a dough hook, at least two minutes', '5:  Let dough rest for 20 minutes, uncovered, at room temperature', '6: On a 4 cups bread floured work surface, separate dough into 4 even portions', '7:  Work each into a circular ball, then place the balls onto a baking sheet lined with wax paper', '8:  Cover with a damp towel and rest, refrigerated, for at least 4 hours', '9: In a blender or food processor, combine 28 oz whole tomatoes, 2 2 ½ 1 3 tablespoons of olive oil, 1 2 ½ 1 3 tablespoon of salt, and 4 cloves garlic', '10:  Process until smooth', '11: Preheat oven to 550°F/290°C', '12:  Place a pizza stone or large cast-iron griddle on the center rack', '13:  Heat for at least 45 minutes', '14: On a 4 cups bread floured work surface, use your fingertips to create a ring around the outside (your crust) of one of the risen balls of dough', '15:  Using the pads of your fingers, gently flatten out the dough inside the ring', '16: Gently lift up the dough and let it hang off your knuckles, stretching itself out with its own weight', '17:  Slowly rotate the circle of dough, continuing to let it stretch off your knuckles', '18:  Go all the way around the circle once, taking care not to let it hang too long in one place and stretch too thin', '19: Using a large spoon, spread a thin layer of sauce across the dough, leaving room for the crust', '20: Evenly place three slices of 1 lb fresh mozzarella on top of the sauce, then sprinkle a handful of torn 2 cups fresh basil leaves evenly over your pizza', '21:  Or top with whatever you desire: sausage, peppers, onions… just about anything can be a pizza topping!Carefully slide the pizza onto a 4 cups bread floured sheet or pizza peel and place on top of your stone or griddle in the oven', '22:  Cook for 7 to 10 minutes, until the cheese is bubbly and the top of the crust is just beginning to blacken', '23: Remove from oven and let cool for 3-4 minutes before slicing']

ingredients: ['3 ripe avocados diced', '½ red onion chopped', '2 tomatoes diced', '¼ cup fresh cilantro (10 g) chopped', '2 limes juiced', '2 cloves garlic chopped', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '3 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '½ cup feta cheese (55 g)', 'tortilla chip for serving']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, combine all ingredients and gently mix together', '2: For best flavor, allow to set 30 minutes', '3: Garnish with additional ½ cup feta just before tortilla chip for serving']

ingredients: ['1 lb flank steak (455 g) cubed', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '2 cups broccoli (300 g) diced', 'Stir-Fry Sauce', '½ cup soy sauce (120 mL)', '¼ cup honey (85 g)', '2 cloves garlic', '1 teaspoon ginger', '1 tablespoon sesame seed']
instructions: ['1: Mix together all ½ cup soy sauce ingredients in a small bowl', '2: Heat oil over a nonstick pan and add beef stirring until brown', '3: Pour ½ cup soy sauce in pan and stir to coat meat', '4: Once the ½ cup soy sauce is bubbling, add the veggies to the pan and stir again to coat', '5: Cook until meat is cooked through and veggies are soft', '6: Serve over rice or alone']

ingredients: ['3 cups watermelon (450 g) chopped', '2 cups white wine (480 mL)', '¼ cup lime juice (60 mL)', '3 tablespoons simple syrup', '2 oz rum (60 mL)', 'Special Equipment', 'ice pop mold mold', 'ice pop stick']
instructions: ['1: In a blender, combine the 3 cups watermelon, 2 cups white wine, ¼ cup lime juice, 3 tablespoons simple syrup, and 2 oz rum and blend until smooth', '2: Pour the mixture into the ice pop molds, seal with the lids, and add the ice pop sticks', '3: Freeze until solid, at least 4 hours, or overnight', '4: Carefully remove the ice pops from the molds']

ingredients: ['1 cup peanut butter (240 g)', '¼ cup honey (85 g)', '3 cups cornflakes (75 g)', '2 cups puffed rice cereal (50 g)', '½ cup raisin (75 g)', '¼ cup mini chocolate chips (45 g) optional']
instructions: ['1: Pour the 1 cup peanut butter and ¼ cup honey into a bowl', '2:  Microwave in 30-second intervals until melted', '3: Mix in the corn flakes, 2 cups puffed rice cereal, and raisins', '4: Transfer mixture to a parchment-lined 8x8inch (20x20cm) baking pan', '5:  Top with ¼ cup mini chocolate chips (optional)', '6: Chill until firm', '7: Cut bars into sizes of your choice, wrap in parchment paper, and store in a sealed ziplock in the fridge or freezer for up to 3 months']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter plus more for greasing the plate', '14 oz can of sweetened condensed milk (1 g)', '⅓ cup cocoa powder (40 g)', '1 cup chocolate sprinkles (170 g) for decorating']
instructions: ['1: In a saucepan on medium-low heat, melt the 2 tablespoons butter and add the 14 oz can of sweetened condensed milk', '2:  Add the ⅓ cup cocoa powder and stir continuously for 10-15 minutes, until the mixture begins to pull away from the edge of the pot; it should be very thick', "3:  It's done when you run a spoon through the center and it takes a few seconds to melt back into the center again", '4:  spread the mixture onto a 2 tablespoons buttered plate and refrigerate for 2 hours', '5: When set, 2 tablespoons butter your hands to prevent sticking, and pinch off a portion of the mixture', '6:  Roll it between our hands, until you have a ball about the size of a 1 cup chocolate truffle', '7:  Repeat with the remainder of the mixture; you should have about 12 balls', '8:  Coat the brigadeiros in the 1 cup chocolate sprinkles']

ingredients: ['1 cup watermelon (150 g) cubed', '1 lime juiced', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '2 cups ice (430 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Pour all ingredients into a blender and blend until smooth', '2: Garnish with a slice of 1 lime']

ingredients: ['BBQ Jackfruit', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 small yellow onion sliced', '4 cloves garlic minced', '1 ¼ teaspoons salt', '1 ½ teaspoons pepper', '20 oz young green jackfruit (565 g) 3 cans in brine or water', '1 ½ teaspoons chili powder', '1 ½ teaspoons paprika', '1 ½ teaspoons cumin', '1 ½ teaspoons liquid smoke', '1 ½ cups vegetable broth (360 mL)', '1 ¼ cups barbecue sauce (325 g)', 'Coleslaw', '3 cups green cabbage (300 g) chopped', '3 cups red cabbage (300 g) chopped', '1 cup carrot (110 g) shredded', '¾ cup vegan mayonnaise (195 g)', '1 tablespoon dijon mustard', '2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '12 slider buns or dinner rolls']
instructions: ['1: Drain and rinse the jackfruit, then cut into 1 smaller pieces, removing the core', '2: In a medium 1 ¼ cups barbecue saucepan, heat the 2 tablespoons olive oil over medium heat', '3:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the onion and cook for 4-5 minutes, until semi-translucent', '4: Add the 4 cloves garlic, salt, and pepper, and cook for 2-3 minutes, until the 4 cloves garlic is fragrant', '5:  Add the jackfruit, 1 ½ teaspoons chili powder, 1 ½ teaspoons paprika, 1 ½ teaspoons cumin, and 1 ½ teaspoons liquid smoke, and mix well', '6:  Add the 1 ½ cups vegetable broth, cover, and cook for 15 minutes, until the jackfruit is soft enough to be mashed', '7: Preheat the oven to 400ºF (200ºC)', '8:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '9: Mash the jackfruit with potato masher or a couple of forks, until it looks pulled or shredded', '10: Transfer the jackfruit to the baking sheet and spread in an even layer', '11: Bake for 25 minutes, until the jackfruit is slightly browned and crispy', '12: Make the coleslaw: add green and 3 cups red cabbage and carrots to a large bowl', '13:  In a 1 small 1 ½ teaspoons liquid measuring cup, combine the mayo, 1 tablespoon dijon mustard, 2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar, salt, and pepper, and mix until creamy', '14:  Pour the dressing over the 1 ½ cups vegetables and toss the coleslaw until the dressing is well-distributed', '15:  Set aside', '16: Remove the jackfruit from the oven, and pour the BBQ 1 ¼ cups barbecue sauce over', '17:  Mix well', '18: Return to the oven, and bake for another 10 minutes, until the edges are  slightly crispy', '19: Use a large bread knife to cut the whole sheet of slider buns in half', '20:  Remove the top and set aside', '21:  Spread the BBQ jackfruit on the bottom half of the buns, then top with coleslaw', '22: Add the top buns, then slice into 12 sliders']

ingredients: ['6 oz skinless salmon (170 g)', '1 clove garlic minced', 'olive oil to taste', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '½ teaspoon paprika', 'Avocado Topping', '1 avocado chopped', '¼ red onion chopped', '1 tablespoon fresh cilantro chopped', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon lime juice']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: On the prepared baking sheet, rub the 6 oz skinless salmon with the 1 clove garlic, olive oil, salt, pepper, and ½ teaspoon paprika', '4: Bake for 10-12 minutes, until cooked through', '5: Make the 1 avocado topping: In a small bowl, gently mix together the 1 avocado, ¼ red onion, 1 tablespoon fresh cilantro, olive oil, salt, pepper, and 1 tablespoon lime juice', '6:  Don’t overmix or you’ll break down the 1 avocado', '7: Spoon the 1 avocado topping over the 6 oz skinless salmon']

ingredients: ['2 bananas', '4 eggs', 'blueberry to taste']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, mash the 2 bananas until they reach a liquid state', '2: Whisk in the 4 eggs', '3: Heat butter or oil in a large skillet over medium heat', '4: Pour batter into the warm skillet to cook', '5:  Garnish with desired number of blueberries', '6:  After about a minute and a half (or until golden) flip to finish cooking', '7: Allow to cool for a minute', '8:  Serve warm']

ingredients: ['1 lb russet potato (455 g) peeled and halved', '1 cup onion (150 g) chopped', '6 tablespoons unsalted butter divided', '½ cup shredded cheddar cheese (50 g)', '¼ cup sour cream (60 g)', '1 teaspoon salt plus more to taste', '1 teaspoon pepper plus more for serving', '1 ½ cups all-purpose flour (190 g) plus more for dusting', '⅓ cup warm water (80 mL)', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 large egg lightly beaten', '10 fresh sage leaves']
instructions: ['1: Place the 1 lb russet potatoes in a medium pot filled with cold water', '2:  Cover and turn the heat to medium-high', '3:  Bring to a boil and cook 1 lb russet potatoes for 20-25 minutes, until fork-tender', '4: As the 1 lb russet potatoes are cooking, melt 2 6 6 1 tablespoons of butter in a medium saucepan over medium heat', '5:  Add the onions and sauté for 8-10 minutes, until golden brown', '6:  Remove the pan from the heat', '7: In a medium bowl, combine the 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour, ⅓ cup warm water, olive oil, egg, and a pinch of 1 teaspoon salt', '8:  Use a fork to mix together, then once the dough begins to come together', '9: Knead with your hands for 2-3 minutes, until smooth', '10:  Shape the dough into a disc', '11:  Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes', '12: Once the 1 lb russet potatoes are finished cooking, drain and transfer to a medium bowl', '13:  Add the ½ cup shredded cheddar cheese to the hot 1 lb russet potatoes so the cheese melts a bit', '14:  Add the sautéed onions, ¼ cup sour cream, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1 teaspoon pepper', '15:  Mash the 1 lb russet potato mixture with a fork, then mix with a spatula until smooth', '16:  Cover with plastic wrap and chill in the refrigerator for 15 minutes', '17: Remove the dough from the refrigerator and place on a 1 ½ cups all-purpose floured surface', '18:  Lightly 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour the top and roll out the dough to about ⅛-inch (3-mm) thick', '19:  Use a pint glass to cut out circles', '20:  Gather the scraps and re-roll, then let rest for 5 minutes', '21:  Cut out more circles of dough', '22:  Keep the dough circles covered with plastic wrap to prevent them from drying out while you work', '23: To assemble the pierogi, scoop a rounded 6 1 tablespoon of the 1 lb russet potato filling into the center of a dough circle', '24:  Lightly stretch the dough around the filling and pinch closed with your fingers', '25:  Repeat with remaining dough and filling', '26:  If the dough circles gets too ⅓ cup warm to handle, chill in the refrigerator for 10 minutes', '27: Bring a 1 large pot of water to boil', '28:  Boil the pierogis, in batches if necessary, for 3 minutes, until they float to the surface', '29:  Be careful not to overcook', '30:  Scoop the pierogis out with a slotted spoon and place them in a oiled bowl so they don’t stick together', '31: Just before serving, melt the remaining 4 6 6 1 tablespoons of butter in a 1 large nonstick saucepan over medium-high heat', '32:  Once the butter is melted, add the sage leaves', '33:  Cook until the butter begins to brown and smell nutty, 2-3 minutes', '34:  Reduce the heat to medium and add the pierogis, working in batches if the pan is too crowded', '35:  Lightly brown the pierogis, about 2 minutes per side', '36:  Remove the pan from the heat', '37: To serve, spoon the brown butter over the pierogies and sprinkle with 1 teaspoon salt and freshly cracked black 1 teaspoon pepper to taste']

ingredients: ['2 chicken breasts', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '2 cloves garlic', '1 red pepper', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon ketchup', '1 tablespoon cider vinegar', '9 oz noodle (250 g) cooked', 'sesame seed to garnish']
instructions: ['1: Sear the 2 chicken until golden brown in the pan with the 1 teaspoon salt and ½ teaspoon 1 1 red pepper', '2:  Take out and set aside', '3: In the same pan, fry the 2 cloves garlic and 1 red ½ teaspoon 1 1 red pepper for a couple of minutes before stirring in the 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 tablespoon ketchup, and 1 tablespoon cider vinegar', '4: Add the 2 chicken and noodles, and mix together for another couple of minutes', '5: Garnish with sesame seeds']

ingredients: ['1 sweet potato', 'almond butter to taste', '1 handful blueberry', '1 handful pomegranate seeds']
instructions: ['1: Cut 1 sweet potato into thin slices, about ¼ inch (6 mm) thick', '2: Place in toaster and set it to the maximum cook time', '3:  When it pops, flip the 1 sweet potato slices over and toast 1 more time', '4:  Depending on the strength of your toaster and your preferences, you may need to toast it 1 more time after that', '5: Remove from toaster and let cool enough to handle', '6: Spread almond butter evenly across 1 sweet potato toast', '7: Top with fresh blueberries, 1 handful pomegranate seeds']

ingredients: ['Chai Spice Mix', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground cardamom', '½ teaspoon ground cloves', '½ teaspoon freshly grated nutmeg', '½ teaspoon ground anise', 'Chai Spice Pumpkin Donuts', '2 ½ cups all purpose flour (310 g) sifted plus more for dusting', '1 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '½ cup pumpkin puree (165 g)', '½ cup sour cream (120 g)', '4 tablespoons unsalted butter softened', '1 tablespoon fresh ginger grated', '½ cup granulated sugar (100 g)', '1 large egg', '2 large egg yolks', '4 qt neutral oil (3.7 L) for frying', 'Chai Glaze', '1 cup powdered sugar (110 g)', '2 tablespoons whole milk', 'Preparation', 'Chai Spice Mix', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground cardamom', '½ teaspoon ground cloves', '½ teaspoon freshly grated nutmeg', '½ teaspoon ground anise', 'Chai Spice Pumpkin Donuts', '2 ½ cups all purpose flour (310 g) sifted plus more for dusting', '1 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '½ cup pumpkin puree (165 g)', '½ cup sour cream (120 g)', '4 tablespoons unsalted butter softened', '1 tablespoon fresh ginger grated', '½ cup granulated sugar (100 g)', '1 large egg', '2 large egg yolks', '4 qt neutral oil (3.7 L) for frying', 'Chai Glaze', '1 cup powdered sugar (110 g)', '2 tablespoons whole milk', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Make the chai spice mix: In a small bowl, stir together the cinnamon, cardamom, cloves, nutmeg, and anise seeds until well combined', '2: Make the donuts: In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, salt, and 1 tablespoon of the chai spice mix', '3: In a small bowl, mix together the  pumpkin purée and sour cream', '4: In a large glass bowl, combine the butter, ginger, and sugar', '5:  Beat with an electric hand mixer on medium speed until smooth and creamy, about 1 minute', '6: With the mixer running, add the egg and egg yolks, 1 at a time, and mix until fully incorporated', '7: Add ⅓ of the flour mixture and continue mixing until just combined', '8:  Then, add half of the pumpkin mixture and mix until just combined', '9:  Continue alternating additions, finishing with the flour mixture and mixing until the dough just comes together', '10: Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 1 hour', '11: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '12: Turn the dough out onto a floured surface and dust the top with more flour', '13:  Use a rolling pin to roll out to ¼ inch thick', '14:  Use a 3½-inch round cutter to cut out 9 rounds', '15:  Then, use a 1-inch round cutter to cut out the centers of each round (gather and re-roll the scraps once if needed to get 9 donuts)', '16:  Place the donuts on the prepared baking sheet and refrigerate for 30 minutes', '17: Heat the oil in a large pot over medium heat until the temperature reaches 350°F (180°C)', '18: Working in batches to avoid overcrowding the pot, fry the donuts in the hot oil until golden brown and crisped, flipping once, about 2 minutes per side', '19:  Transfer to a wire rack set over paper towels to drain', '20: Make the chai glaze: In a medium bowl, whisk together the powdered sugar, remaining ½ teaspoon of the chai spice mix, and the milk until smooth', '21: Dip the top of each donut in the glaze to coat, then return to the rack to let any excess glaze drip off']

ingredients: ['1 ⅓ cups sugar (265 g)', '2 eggs', '½ cup flour (60 g)', '¼ cup cocoa powder (30 g)', '1 pinch salt', '½ cup butter (115 g) melted', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 tablespoon cocoa powder', 'powdered sugar', '1 cup berry (175 g) optional']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: In a medium bowl, whisk the 1 ⅓ cups powdered sugar and 2 eggs until the mixture is pale yellow in color', '3: Sift in the ½ cup flour, cocoa powder, and 1 pinch salt', '4: Fold until incorporated', '5: Mix in the butter and 1 tablespoon vanilla', '6: Grease a pan with butter and sprinkle cocoa powder to coat', '7: Pour in batter and smooth out', '8:  Batter will be very thick', '9: Bake for 20 minutes or until the top has hardened', '10:  The center should still be soft', '11: Sprinkle with powdered 1 ⅓ cups powdered sugar', '12: Add berries (optional)']

ingredients: ['nonstick cooking spray for greasing', 'Chai Spice Cake', '6 large eggs room temperature', '1 ¼ cups sour cream (300 g) room temperature', '¾ cup buttermilk (180 g) room temperature', '1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon McCormick® Vanilla Extract', '4 ½ cups cake flour (585 g)', '1 ½ cups granulated sugar (320 g)', '1 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '1 ½ teaspoons baking soda', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '¾ teaspoon ground ginger', '¼ teaspoon ground cloves', '¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '¼ teaspoon anise seeds', '2 sticks unsalted butter cubed and chilled', '4 drops burgundy wine gel coloring', '4 super red gel food colorings', 'Coconut Buttercream', '4 sticks unsalted butter softened', '6 cups powdered sugar (660 g)', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 cup cream of coconut (240 mL)', 'Saffron Meringue', '1 ¾ cups granulated sugar (350 g)', '¼ cup water (60 mL)', '1 teaspoon saffron thread crushed', '5 large egg whites room temperature', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '¾ teaspoon vanilla extract', 'super red gel food coloring']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (150°C)', '2:  Grease 3 9-inch 4 ½ cups cake pans with nonstick spray and line the bottom of each with a circle of parchment paper', '3: Make the 4 ½ cups cake: In a medium bowl, whisk together the eggs, 1 ¼ cups sour cream, buttermilk, and ¾ teaspoon vanilla', '4: In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the whisk attachment, sift together the flour, granulated sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cardamom, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, ¾ teaspoon ground ginger, ¼ teaspoon ground cloves, and ¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '5:  Add the ¼ teaspoon anise seeds and butter and mix on medium speed until the butter resembles small pebbles, about 2 minutes', '6: Add the wet ingredients to the bowl and continue mixing on medium speed until incorporated, about 3 minutes', '7:  The batter will not be completely smooth; be careful not to overmix', '8: Add ⅓ of the batter to each of 2 medium bowls, leaving the remaining ⅓ in the stand mixer bowl', '9:  Add the 4 drops burgundy wine food coloring to one bowl and stir until evenly deep scarlet in color', '10:  To the second bowl, add the super red food coloring and stir until evenly deep red in color', '11:  Leave the batter in the stand mixer bowl uncolored', '12: Scoop 1 cup of each color batter into each of the prepared 4 ½ cups cake pans', '13:  Continue alternating colors until all of  the batter is used', '14:  Gently swirl a toothpick through the batter to marble the colors in each pan', '15: Bake the 4 ½ cups cakes until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, about 20 minutes', '16:  Let 4 ½ cups cakes cool completely, then trim off the domed tops so each 4 ½ cups cake layer is level', '17: Make the buttercream: In a large bowl, cream the butter with an electric hand mixer on medium speed until smooth, about 1 minute', '18:  Sift in the 6 cups powdered sugar and salt and continue mixing on medium speed until the mixture resembles coarse sand, about 2 minutes', '19:  Pour in the cream of coconut and continue mixing until fully incorporated, about 1 minute', '20: Dab a bit of buttercream onto a 9-inch 4 ½ cups cake board, then set a 4 ½ cups cake layer on top', '21:  Scoop 1 cup of frosting onto the 4 ½ cups cake and use an offset spatula to spread evenly across the top', '22:  Repeat with the remaining 4 ½ cups cake layers, using the top layer of frosting to lightly cover the entire 4 ½ cups cake, creating a crumb coat', '23: Place the 4 ½ cups cake in the refrigerator and chill until the crumb coat is firm, about 30 minutes', '24: Make the 1 teaspoon saffron meringue: In a small saucepan, combine the sugar and water', '25:  Bring to a boil over medium heat', '26:  Add the 1 teaspoon saffron and continue boiling until the mixture reaches 240°F (115°C), about 5 minutes', '27: Add the egg whites to the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the whisk attachment', '28:  Whip on medium speed until frothy, about 1 minute', '29:  Add the salt and continue to beat until completely incorporated, about 30 seconds', '30: Turn the stand mixer on medium speed and carefully pour the hot sugar mixture into the bowl, resting the pan on the edge of the bowl and aiming the liquid to hit the bottom-side of the bowl', '31:  Continue mixing until the meringue is tripled in volume and holds medium-stiff peaks, about 5 minutes', '32:  Add the ¾ teaspoon vanilla and mix until just incorporated, about 30 seconds', '33: Scoop the meringue onto the top of the 4 ½ cups cake and use an offset spatula to spread over the top and sides', '34:  Use a toothpick to draw lines of super red food coloring on the top and sides of the 4 ½ cups cake, then use a small spoon to swirl the color into the meringue and make dramatic peaks', '35: Slice and serve immediately']

ingredients: ['1 small sweet potato diced', '1 lemon sliced seeds removed', '1 cup green beans (360 g) trimmed', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon fresh rosemary chopped', '1 tablespoon fresh thyme chopped', '1 clove garlic minced', '½ teaspoon salt plus more to season', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper plus more to season', '1 boneless skinless chicken breast', '¼ teaspoon paprika']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '2: Add the 1 small sweet potatoes, 1 lemon slices, 1 cup green beans, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 tablespoon fresh rosemary, 1 tablespoon fresh thyme, 1 clove garlic, ½ teaspoon salt, and ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper to a large bowl (or parchment paper-lined sheet tray)  and toss until fully coated', '3: Season the 1 boneless skinless chicken breast with ½ teaspoon salt, ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper, and ¼ teaspoon paprika', '4: Transfer to a parchment paper-lined sheet tray and place the 1 boneless skinless chicken breast on top of the vegetables (if you tossed your vegetables in a bowl)', '5: Bake until vegetables are tender and 1 boneless skinless chicken is cooked through, about 20 minutes']

ingredients: ['nonstick cooking spray', '½ cup all purpose flour (60 g)', '½ teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ teaspoon black pepper', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '½ cup milk (120 mL)', '½ medium head cauliflower', '¼ cup buffalo sauce (60 mL)', '2 tablespoons coconut oil melted', '1 tablespoon honey', '2 frozen cauliflower pizza crusts', '¼ cup blue cheese dressing (60 g)', '½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese (50 g)', '1 stalk celery thinly sliced', '2 tablespoons blue cheese crumbled optional', '¼ cup celery (55 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 450˚F (230˚C)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and grease with nonstick spray', '3: In a ½ medium bowl, mix together the ½ cup all purpose flour, ½ teaspoon paprika, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, ¼ teaspoon black pepper, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, and ½ cup milk until a batter forms', '4: Break the ½ medium head 2 frozen cauliflower into florets about 1½-inches (3 cm) wide', '5: Add the ½ medium head 2 frozen cauliflower florets to the batter and toss to coat evenly', '6:  Arrange the coated ½ medium head 2 frozen cauliflower on the prepared baking sheet', '7: Bake the ½ medium head 2 frozen cauliflower for 20 minutes, flipping halfway', '8: Meanwhile, in a small bowl, mix together the ¼ cup buffalo sauce, 2 tablespoons coconut oil, and 1 tablespoon honey', '9: Brush the ¼ cup buffalo sauce mixture over the ½ medium head 2 frozen cauliflower and bake for another 20 minutes, until crisp', '10:  Set aside the leftover sauce for drizzling', '11: Par-bake the ½ medium head 2 frozen cauliflower pizza crusts directly on the oven rack for 10 minutes', '12: Set the crusts on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and spread with the blue cheese dressing', '13:  Divide the ¼ cup buffalo ½ medium head 2 frozen cauliflower between the crusts', '14:  Sprinkle the ½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese on top', '15:  Drizzle with the leftover ¼ cup buffalo sauce', '16:  Top with the sliced celery', '17: Bake the pizzas for 10 minutes, until the cheese is melted', '18: Garnish the pizzas with the blue cheese and celery leaves, then slice and serve warm']

ingredients: ['1 avocado cubed', '¼ cup plain yogurt (60 g)', '1 tablespoon lime juice', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '1 teaspoon salt', '¼ cup red onion (35 g) diced', '¼ cup celery (55 g) diced', '1 tablespoon jalapeño diced', '2 cups cooked chicken (250 g) chopped', 'sriracha sauce to top optional', 'fresh cilantro to top optional']
instructions: ['1: Combine 1 avocado, ¼ cup plain yogurt, 1 tablespoon lime, ½ teaspoon garlic powder, ½ teaspoon black pepper, and 1 teaspoon salt in a medium bowl', '2:  Mash the 1 avocado to desired consistency', '3: Add ¼ cup red onion, ¼ cup celery, 1 tablespoon jalapeño, and 2 cups cooked chicken into the 1 avocado mixture and stir to coat evenly', '4: Serve on toast with optional topping of sriracha and fresh cilantro']

ingredients: ['6 corn tortillas', 'olive oil to taste', '1 lb shrimp (455 g) peeled and deveined', '1 cup english cucumber (135 g) diced', '1 cup tomato (200 g) diced', '1 avocado diced', '1 cup red onion (150 g) diced', '1 lemon juiced', '1 lime juiced', '1 tablespoon fresh cilantro chopped', 'salt to taste', '1 serrano pepper finely chopped optional']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 425ºF (220ºC)', '2: Lay the 6 corn tortillas on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet and lightly brush both sides with olive oil', '3: Bake the tortillas for 5 minutes and then flip them over continue baking another 5 minutes', '4:  The tostadas should be brown and crispy', '5:  Set the pan aside to cool', '6: Roughly chop the 1 lb shrimp and transfer to a bowl', '7: Add the 1 cup english cucumber, 1 cup tomato, 1 avocado, 1 cup red onion, 1 lemon juice, 1 lime juice, 1 tablespoon fresh cilantro, salt, and 1 serrano chile (optional), and stir to combine', '8: Marinate for 10-15 minutes', '9: Spoon the 1 lb shrimp mixture onto the tostadas']

ingredients: ['1 large sweet potato or yam', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon dried thyme']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: Cut the 1 large sweet potato into ⅛-inch to ¼-inch (3- to 6-mm) slices', '4:  In a medium bowl, toss the 1 large sweet potato slices with 4 tablespoons olive oil until fully coated', '5:  Add the seasonings and toss to coat', '6:  Arrange the slices on a baking sheet without overlapping the potatoes', '7: Bake for 25 - 35 minutes, flipping halfway, until golden brown', '8:  Let the slices cool to room temperature']

ingredients: ['1 lb top sirloin steak (455 g) thinly sliced', '¼ cup low sodium soy sauce (60 mL)', '2 teaspoons cornstarch', '1 tablespoon dark brown sugar', '2 tablespoons fresh ginger minced', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 head broccoli cut into 1-inch (2 ½ cm) florets ', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '3 cloves garlic minced', '¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes optional', '1 teaspoon toasted sesame oil']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, mix together the 1 lb top sirloin steak, ¼ cup low sodium soy sauce, 2 teaspoons cornstarch, 1 tablespoon dark brown sugar, and 2 tablespoons fresh ginger until the meat is evenly covered in the marinade', '2: Set aside to marinate for 20 minutes', '3: Heat the 1 tablespoon 1 teaspoon toasted 1 teaspoon toasted sesame oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat', '4:   Dump in the meat and marinade and sear each side until golden 1 tablespoon dark brown', '5: Transfer the meat to a clean bowl and set aside', '6: Place the 1 head broccoli into the hot skillet and sauté until the 1 head broccoli has just started to 1 tablespoon dark brown, about 1 minute', '7: Pour the ½ cup water into the skillet and immediately cover with a lid', '8:  Let it steam for 2 minutes, until the 1 head broccoli has softened', '9: Remove the lid and toss in the 3 cloves garlic, ¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes, and 1 teaspoon toasted sesame 1 tablespoon 1 teaspoon toasted 1 teaspoon toasted sesame oil', '10:  Sauté until the 3 cloves garlic becomes fragrant, about 30 seconds', '11: Add the steak back into the pan and stir to combine', '12: Remove from heat and serve on a bed of 1 tablespoon dark brown rice']

ingredients: ['2 boneless skinless chicken breasts', '2 teaspoons salt plus more to taste', '2 teaspoons black peppercorn', '½ medium sweet onion halved', '½ medium sweet onion diced', '6 cloves garlic divided 4 whole and 2 minced', '2 bay leaves', '6 cups water (1.4 L)', '1 tablespoon oil', '¼ cup low sodium soy sauce (60 mL)', '¼ cup honey (85 mL)', '½ cup lime juice (80 mL)', '4 large leaves romaine lettuce for serving', '¼ cup scallion (25 g) sliced']
instructions: ['1: Place the 2 boneless skinless chicken breasts, 2 teaspoons salt, peppercorns, halved onion, whole garlic 6 cloves, 2 bay leaves, and 6 cups water in a 4 large pot', '2: Cover the pot and bring to a simmer over medium heat', '3: Once the 6 cups water is simmering, cook for 10 minutes, until the 2 boneless skinless chicken registers 165°F (74°C) when pierced with an instant-read thermometer', '4: Transfer the 2 boneless skinless chicken to a cutting board and discard the cooking liquid', '5:   Using 2 forks, pull the 2 boneless skinless chicken apart until shredded', '6: In a 4 large nonstick pan, heat the 1 tablespoon oil over medium-high heat until shimmering', '7: Add the diced onion and a pinch of 2 teaspoons salt and sauté until softened, about 2 minutes', '8: Add the minced garlic and sauté until fragrant, about 30 seconds', '9: Add the ¼ cup low sodium soy sauce, ¼ cup honey, and ½ cup lime juice and stir until the mixture has thickened slightly, about 2 minutes', '10: Add the shredded 2 boneless skinless chicken and mix until everything is well incorporated', '11: Remove the pan from the heat and let the 2 boneless skinless chicken cool for 5 minutes before spooning into the lettuce leaves', '12: Top with ¼ cup scallion (25 g) sliced scallions']

ingredients: ['For the pickled Carrot and Daikon', '1 ½ cups daikon radish (150 g)', '1 ½ cups carrot (180 g)', '2 jalapeñoes', '2 tablespoons sugar', '½ teaspoon salt', '2 teaspoons sesame oil', '3 tablespoons rice vinegar', 'For the meatballs', '1 lb ground pork (455 g)', '2 tablespoons fresh cilantro chopped', '1 scallion chopped', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 tablespoon fish sauce', '1 tablespoon siracha', '2 teaspoons sugar', 'salt and pepper mix to taste', '1 tablespoon cornstarch', 'For the sandwich', 'baguette', 'sriracha mayonnaise', 'fresh cilantro']
instructions: ['1: Combine the For the pickled 1 ½ cups carrot and 1 ½ cups daikon ingredients in a mixing bowl', '2:  Set aside and let them pickle for at least an hour', '3: Combine all of the banh mi meatball ingredients in a large mixing bowl', '4:  Form ping pong sized For the meatballs', '5:  Pan fry until browned on all sides and cooked all the way through', '6: Put together the For the sandwich', '7:  Smear a layer of Sriracha mayo on one half of the baguette, add the meats, a few of the For the pickled 1 ½ cups carrots and 1 ½ cups daikon and some fresh cilantro', '8:  Top with other half of baguette']

ingredients: ['15 oz black beans (425 g) 1 can drained rinsed', '½ cup brown rice (100 g) cooked', '1 cup corn (175 g)', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '1 egg', 'salt to taste', 'black pepper to taste', '⅓ cup seasoned bread crumbs (40 g)', 'canola oil', '4 slices pepper jack cheese', 'tomato', 'red onion', 'avocado', 'pico de gallo']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, add black beans, ½ cup brown rice, 1 cup corn, seasonings, and 1 egg', '2:  Using a potato masher, mash the ingredients until thoroughly mixed together', '3: Once mashed, add the ⅓ cup seasoned bread crumbs and mix to combine', '4: Take a quarter of the mixture and shape it into a patty using your hands', '5:  Repeat with the remaining mixture to create four patties', '6: In a pan, heat a small amount of canola oil over medium heat', '7:  Add the patties and cook for 4-5 minutes, flip, top with a slice of black 4 slices pepper jack, and cook for another 4-5 minutes', '8: Place patties on buns, and top with sliced tomato, red onion, avocado, and fresh salsa']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 onion diced', '3 cloves garlic minced', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '28 oz crushed tomato (795 g)', '6 cups vegetable broth (1.4 L)', '⅓ cup green lentil (50 g) rinsed', '8 oz lasagna noodle (225 g) uncooked', '3 cups spinach (120 g)', 'fresh basil cut chiffonade for serving']
instructions: ['1: In a large pot, heat the 1 tablespoon olive oil over medium heat', '2:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the 1 onion and cook for 3-4 minutes, until semi-translucent', '3: Add the 3 cloves garlic, 2 tablespoons 28 oz 28 oz crushed tomato paste, basil, and 1 teaspoon dried oregano, and cook for 2-3 more minutes, or until the 1 onions are translucent and herbs are fragrant', '4: Add the 28 oz crushed 2 tablespoons 28 oz 28 oz crushed tomatoes, 6 cups vegetable broth, and lentils, and bring to a boil', '5:  Increase heat to medium-high and cook for 10 minutes or until lentils are halfway tender', '6: Break apart the 8 oz lasagna noodles into about 2-inch-long (5-cm) pieces and add to the pot', '7:  Let the soup cook for another 10-15 minutes, or until the pasta is al dente and the lentils are tender', '8: Stir in the 3 cups spinach and let wilt, then serve immediately']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '6 large bell peppers or 8 medium ensure they have a flat base so they will stand up when cooking', '1 lb ground beef (455 g)', '1 medium yellow onion diced', '1 can black beans drained', '1 cup brown rice (225 g) cooked', '1 cup frozen corn (165 g)', '1 jar medium chunky salsa 1 jar 16 oz', '2 tablespoons taco seasoning mix 1 packet or make your own', '1 ½ cups cheddar cheese (150 g) grated or mexican blend cheese', 'guacamole to garnish optional', 'sour cream to garnish optional', 'Make Your Own Taco Season', '1 tablespoon chili powder', '1 ½ teaspoons ground cumin', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '1 teaspoon corn starch', '½ teaspoon paprika', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon onion powder', '¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '¼ teaspoon dried oregano']
instructions: ['1: Cut off the top and remove the seeds from each 6 large bell 1 teaspoon black ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '2: Place in a baking dish and bake for 20 minutes in a preheated oven at 350˚F (175˚C)', '3: While the Peppers are roasting - heat oil in a 6 large skillet over medium-high heat', '4:  Add ground beef and season with entire taco seasoning packet', '5:  Allow beef to brown on all sides, about 5-6 minutes', "6: NOTE: If you made your own taco seasoning, you'll want to add 2 tablespoons", '7:  The ingredients above will make more than this recipe requires', '8: Add diced 1 medium yellow ½ teaspoon onion - continuing to cook until softened, about 4-5 minutes', '9: Reduce heat to Medium', '10:  Mix in the black beans, brown rice, 1 cup frozen 1 teaspoon corn, and salsa', '11:  Season to taste with 1 teaspoon salt and 6 large bell 1 teaspoon black ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '12: Add in 1 cup (100g) of 1 ½ cups cheddar cheese and stir until incorporated and the 1 ½ cups cheddar cheese has melted', '13:  Remove from heat', '14: Remove 6 large bell 1 teaspoon black ¼ teaspoon cayenne peppers from oven and fill each with the taco mixture', '15:  Top with additional 1 ½ cups cheddar cheese', '16: Return to the oven for 15 minutes until the 1 ½ cups cheddar cheese has melted', '17: Top each 6 large bell 1 teaspoon black ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper with a generous scoop of guacamole and sour cream', '18:  Top with additional 1 ½ cups cheddar cheese']

ingredients: ['2 ½ cups all-purpose flour (310 g)', '3 tablespoons sugar', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '2 ½ cups buttermilk (600 mL)', '8 tablespoons unsalted butter 1 stick melted', '2 eggs whites and yolks seperated', '1 tablespoon unsalted butter plus more for serving', 'blueberry optional', 'chocolate chip optional', 'maple syrup for serving']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, add the 2 ½ cups all-purpose flour, 3 tablespoons sugar, 2 teaspoons kosher salt, baking powder, and baking soda and whisk to combine', '2: In a medium bowl or liquid measuring cup, add the 2 ½ cups buttermilk, melted butter, and egg yolks and whisk to combine', '3: Add the 2 ½ cups buttermilk mixture to the dry ingredients and gently fold with a rubber spatula until just combined', '4: Add the egg 2 eggs whites and fold until just combined', '5:  Be sure not to overmix', '6:  Some lumps are okay', '7: Let the batter rest for 15-30 minutes at room temperature', '8: Add the butter to a cast iron skillet and heat over medium low heat', '9:  Once the butter has melted and is bubbling, reduce the heat to medium-low and add ⅓ cup (75 g) of batter to the pan', '10: Cook for 2-3 minutes, until bubbles start to appear on the surface', '11:  If adding any toppings like chocolate chips or blueberries, sprinkle over the pancake', '12:  Flip the pancake over and cook for another 1-2 minutes, until golden brown', '13:  Repeat with the remaining batter', '14: Serve the pancakes with butter and maple syrup']

ingredients: ['1 orange', '2 teaspoons whole clove', '1 apple', '1 teaspoon whole allspice', '4 cinnamon sticks', '1 gal apple cider (4 L)', '½ cup brown sugar (110 g)', '1 teaspoon nutmeg', 'whiskey or rum optional']
instructions: ['1: Pierce 1 orange with cloves', '2:  (If you have a tea infuser, tea bag or cheese cloth, you can use that to keep the spices under control)', '3: Pierce apple with 1 teaspoon whole allspice', '4: Put the 1 orange, apple, 4 cinnamon sticks, apple cider, ½ cup brown sugar and 1 teaspoon nutmeg into your slow cooker', '5: Turn on high for 2 hours, then keep warm on low until you’re ready to drink', '6: Drink as is or with a shot (or two) of whiskey, rum, etc']

ingredients: ['Dough', '1 cup warm water (235 mL)', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons honey', '2 teaspoons salt', '3 ⅓ cups flour (415 g)', '1 ½ teaspoons yeast', 'Toppings', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '2 sprigs fresh rosemary leaves removed', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Combine water, olive oil, 2 tablespoons honey, salt, 3 ⅓ cups flour, and 1 ½ teaspoons yeast in a large bowl', '2: Mix well and knead for 10-15 minutes until the dough is elastic', '3: Transfer the dough into a well-oiled bowl', '4: Cover with a towel or plastic wrap and let rise once for 1 hour in a 1 cup warm place, until the dough has doubled', '5: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '6: Remove the dough from the bowl and stretch the dough into 9-inch (23 cm) circle', '7: Place the dough into well greased 10-inch (25 cm) cast iron pan', '8:  Cover with towel or plastic wrap and rest for 30 minutes', '9: Poke the top with your fingertips', '10: Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with 2 sprigs fresh rosemary, salt, and pepper', '11: Bake in the oven for 20-30 minutes', '12: Slice and serve']

ingredients: ['2 cups all-purpose flour (250 g)', '3 eggs', '¼ cup butter (55 g) melted', '3 tablespoons granulated sugar', '3 cups milk (720 mL)', '½ cup hazelnut spread (115 g)', '10 strawberries sliced', 'powdered sugar to garnish']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, combine 2 cups all-purpose flour, 3 eggs, butter, and sugar, stirring until ingredients are slightly mixed', '2: Add the 3 cups milk ½ cup (120 ml) at a time, stirring vigorously, making sure the 3 cups milk is completely incorporated into the batter and that the batter is smooth before adding more 3 cups milk', '3: Repeat with the rest of the 3 cups milk', '4:  The batter should be very liquidy and have no lumps', '5: In a pan over medium heat, pour ⅓ cup (95 grams) of the batter in the center and swirl the batter around the edges of the pan until set', '6: To know when the crepe is ready to flip, lift up one of the edges about ⅓ of the way', '7:  The bottom side should be golden brown', '8:  Flip the crepe', '9: Cook until the edges are starting to slightly crisp', '10: Remove from heat and cover with a paper towel to make sure the crepes stay moist', '11: Spread half of the chocolate hazelnut spread on half of the crepe', '12: Lay half of the 10 strawberries on the chocolate spread', '13: Fold the other half of the crepe on top of the 10 strawberries, then fold the crepe in half', '14: Repeat with the other crepe']

ingredients: ['1 cup long grain rice (200 g)', '¼ teaspoon black pepper', '½ teaspoon onion powder', '1 can cream of chicken', '1 cup shredded cheddar cheese (100 g)', '2 cups broccoli (300 g) diced', '1 ½ cups chicken broth (360 mL)', 'cheddar cheese for topping']
instructions: ['1: Heat oven to 375°F (190°C)', '2: In a casserole dish, combine 1 cup long grain rice, ¼ teaspoon black pepper, ½ teaspoon onion powder, 1 can cream of 1 can cream of 1 ½ cups chicken, cheese, 2 cups broccoli, and 1 can cream of 1 ½ cups chicken stock', '3:  Mix until everything is combined', '4: Lay 1 can cream of 1 ½ cups chicken on top of the 1 cup long grain rice mixture', '5:  Space evenly', '6: Cover with foil and bake for 50 minutes', '7: Take off cover and top the 1 can cream of 1 ½ cups chicken with more cheese', '8:  Bake uncovered for another 5 minutes or until cheese is melted']

ingredients: ['16.5 oz cookie dough (465 g)', '¼ cup cocoa powder (30 g)', '4.5 oz chocolate mint thin (125 g) chopped 1 box']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 325°F (160°C)', '2: Combine the 16', '3: 5 oz cookie dough, ¼ cup cocoa powder, and mint 4', '4: 5 oz chocolate chunks until evenly distributed', '5: Using an ice cream scoop, place 6 scoops of dough on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '6: Bake for 14 minutes']

ingredients: ['1 large egg', '2 tablespoons flax meal', '2 cups riced cauliflower (400 g)', '1 ½ cups almond meal (225 g)', '1 ½ teaspoons garlic powder', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '2 teaspoons canola oil', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', 'topping of your choice for serving', 'Special Equipment', 'cast iron pan 4 1/2 in (11 cm)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: In a small bowl, whisk together the 1 large egg and 2 tablespoons flax meal', '3:  Let sit for at least 5 minutes to gel', '4: In a medium microwave-safe bowl, microwave the riced cauliflower for 3-4 minutes on medium power until steamed and mashable with a fork', '5:  Let cool for 5 minutes, or until safe to handle', '6: Transfer the cauliflower to a clean kitchen towel and wring out all of the moisture', '7:  You should be left with about 1½ cups (450 G) of cauliflower', '8: In a food processor, combine the cauliflower, almond meal, 1 large egg and 2 tablespoons flax mixture, 1 ½ 1 ½ 1 1 ½ 2 teaspoons garlic powder, onion powder and 1 ½ 2 teaspoons kosher salt', '9:  Process for 30-60 seconds, until well combined', '10: Heat 1 1 ½ 1 1 ½ 2 teaspoon of 2 teaspoons canola oil in a small square cast iron skillet over medium heat', '11:  Add half of the cauliflower mixture to the pan, and spread in an even layer with a spatula dipped in water', '12:  Repeat with the remaining oil, skillet, and cauliflower mixture', '13: Bake for 12 minutes, until the bread begins to brown on top and is firm to the touch', '14:  Remove from the oven and turn the broiler to low', '15: Grease the tops of the cauliflower bread with nonstick spray', '16:  Return to the oven and broil for 3-4 minutes, until golden brown', '17:  Let cool in the pans for 10 minutes before topping as desired and serving']

ingredients: ['1 cup strawberry (150 g) diced', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '¼ cup coconut oil (60 g)', '¾ cup cream cheese (170 g) softened']
instructions: ['1: Place the strawberries in a blender and blend until pureed', '2: Add the 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, coconut oil, and softened cream cheese, and blend until the texture is silky smooth', '3: Line a 12-cup muffin with liners (we used silicone liners) or grease with coconut oil', '4:  Divide the mixture between the cups', '5: Freeze for 2 hours or until solid', '6: Store in the freezer']

ingredients: ['1 ½ cups medjool date (255 g) pitted', '½ cup almond butter (120 g)', '1 tablespoon coconut oil plus 1 1/2 teaspoons melted', '1 cup brown ri (200 g) puffed or puffed quinoa', '1 cup dried cherry (125 g)', '⅓ cup almond (45 g) chopped', '¼ cup water (60 mL)', '3 oz dark chocolate (85 g) coarsely chopped', '1 teaspoon flaky sea salt']
instructions: ['1: Line an 8-inch (20 cm) square pan with parchment paper', '2: In a food processor, combine the 1 ½ cups medjool dates, almond butter, and 1 tablespoon coconut oil', '3:  Process until well combined, about 30 seconds', '4: Add the 1 cup brown ri (200 g) puffed rice, cherries, and almonds and pulse 5-6 times—just enough so that everything is well incorporated', '5: Transfer the mixture to the prepared pan and press into an even layer about ½ inch (1 ¼ cm) thick', '6:  Freeze for 15 minutes, until set', '7: Meanwhile, pour the ¼ cup water into a small saucepan', '8:  Place a heatproof glass or metal bowl over the saucepan, making sure the ¼ cup water is not touching the bottom', '9:  Bring the ¼ cup water to a simmer, then add the 3 oz dark chocolate to the warm bowl and let it melt, stirring slowly', '10:  Remove the bowl from the heat as soon as the 3 oz dark chocolate is melted and smooth', '11: Pour the melted 3 oz dark chocolate over the 1 ½ cups medjool date and 1 cup dried cherry mixture and spread evenly with a spatula', '12:  Sprinkle with 1 teaspoon flaky salt', '13:  Return the pan to the freezer for another 20 minutes', '14: Once set, cut into 16 bars']

ingredients: ['2 boneless skinless chicken breasts', '3 bell peppers any color sliced', '1 large red onion sliced', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon taco seasoning', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 jar salsa', '3 cups brown rice (680 g) cooked', '1 can black beans drained and rinsed', '1 can corn', '1 cup shredded cheddar cheese (100 g)', '1 lime sliced into wedges', '2 tablespoons fresh cilantro to garnish']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2: Line a baking sheet with foil', '3: Place the 2 boneless skinless chicken, 3 bell peppers, and onions onto the baking sheet and drizzle with 2 tablespoons olive oil', '4: Sprinkle the 1 tablespoon taco seasoning evenly over both sides of the 2 boneless skinless chicken breasts', '5: Sprinkle salt and 3 bell pepper on the 3 bell 3 bell peppers and onions, tossing to coat', '6: Top each 2 boneless skinless chicken breast with a generous pour of 1 jar salsa', '7: Bake in a preheated oven for 25 minutes', '8: Rest 2 boneless skinless chicken for 10 minutes, before slicing into strips', '9: Add a base of 3 cups brown rice to 4 food storage containers', '10:  Top each with a scoop of 1 can black beans, 1 can corn, additional 1 jar salsa, 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese, cooked 3 bell 3 bell peppers, and onions, and 3 bell 3 bell peppers any color 1 large red onion 1 1 lime sliced 2 boneless skinless chicken', '11:  Garnish with 2 tablespoons fresh cilantro and a 1 lime wedge', '12: Store in the refrigerator (and enjoy any extras immediately)', '13:  Can be kept refrigerated for up to 4 days']

ingredients: ['Chicken Rolls', '4 boneless skinless chicken breasts', '2 teaspoons pepper divided', '1 tablespoon onion powder', '4 teaspoons kosher salt divided', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '8 oz baby spinach (225 g)', '1 cup sun-dried tomato (200 g)', '2 cups canola oil (480 mL)', '2 cups panko breadcrumbs (100 g)', '4 large eggs beaten', '1 cup all purpose flour (125 g)', 'Béchamel Sauce', '3 tablespoons unsalted butter', '5 cloves garlic minced', '2 medium shallots diced', '2 cups baby spinach (80 g)', '1 ½ tablespoons sun-dried tomato chopped', '¾ cup tomato (150 g) diced', '2 cups heavy cream (480 mL)', '1 tablespoon all purpose flour', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '¾ cup grated parmesan cheese (80 g)', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', 'For Serving', '4 cups spaghetti (800 g)', '4 cups green salad (290 g) lightly dressed', 'Preparation', 'Chicken Rolls', '4 boneless skinless chicken breasts', '2 teaspoons pepper divided', '1 tablespoon onion powder', '4 teaspoons kosher salt divided', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '8 oz baby spinach (225 g)', '1 cup sun-dried tomato (200 g)', '2 cups canola oil (480 mL)', '2 cups panko breadcrumbs (100 g)', '4 large eggs beaten', '1 cup all purpose flour (125 g)', 'Béchamel Sauce', '3 tablespoons unsalted butter', '5 cloves garlic minced', '2 medium shallots diced', '2 cups baby spinach (80 g)', '1 ½ tablespoons sun-dried tomato chopped', '¾ cup tomato (150 g) diced', '2 cups heavy cream (480 mL)', '1 tablespoon all purpose flour', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '¾ cup grated parmesan cheese (80 g)', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', 'For Serving', '4 cups spaghetti (800 g)', '4 cups green salad (290 g) lightly dressed', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Make the chicken rolls: Butterfly the chicken breasts and season on both sides with 1 teaspoon of pepper, the onion powder, 2 teaspoons of salt, and the garlic powder', '2: Place a chicken breast between 2 sheets of plastic wrap and pound with a meat mallet, rolling pin, or heavy pan until about ¼ inch (6 mm) thick', '3: Remove the top sheet of plastic wrap and place a handful of baby spinach over the center of the chicken breast, then cover with ¼ cup (50 G) of sun-dried tomatoes', '4:  Starting from the bottom, tightly roll the chicken, using the plastic wrap to help', '5:  Wrap the chicken roll tightly in plastic wrap to secure', '6:  Repeat with the remaining ingredients', '7: Chill the chicken rolls in the fridge for 30–60 minutes', '8: Make the béchamel sauce: Melt the butter in a medium saucepan over medium heat', '9:  Add the garlic and shallot and cook until softened and the onions are beginning to caramelize and become very fragrant, about 5 minutes', '10:  Stir in the spinach, sun-dried tomatoes, and diced tomatoes and cook until the spinach is wilted, about 3 minutes', '11:  Add the heavy cream and flour and stir to incorporate', '12:  Add the salt and pepper and bring to a boil', '13:  Stir in the Parmesan cheese and cook until the sauce thickens slightly, 5–7 minutes', '14:  Remove the pot from the heat and stir in the lemon juice', '15: Heat 2–3 (5 - 7 cm) inches of oil in a large heavy-bottomed pan over medium heat until it reaches 325°F (170°C)', '16: Add the panko to a shallow dish and stir in 1 teaspoon of salt and ½ teaspoon pepper', '17:  Add the eggs to a separate shallow dish', '18:  Add the flour to a third shallow dish and stir in the remaining teaspoon of salt and ½ teaspoon pepper', '19: Remove the chicken rolls from the fridge and coat in the flour, then the eggs, then the bread crumbs', '20: Fry the breaded chicken rolls in the hot oil for about 5 minutes per side, or until the outside is an even golden brown and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (75°C)', '21:  You may need to work in batches, so as not to overcrowd the pan', '22:  If a good color is achieved and the chicken’s center is still not to temperature, place the chicken on a wire rack set over a baking sheet and finish cooking in the oven at 325°F (170°C) until the proper temperature is reached', '23:  Once the proper internal temperature is reached, place the rolls on a baking sheet lined with paper towels and a wire rack to cool slightly before slicing and serving', '24: Slice the chicken rolls and serve over a bed of spaghetti with the béchamel sauce and a green salad alongside']

ingredients: ['3 ¾ lb gammon joint (1.7 kg)', '2 onions quartered', '3 qt pineapple juice (3 L)', 'Pineapple Maple Glaze', '2 teaspoons dijon mustard', '½ cup pineapple juice (125 mL)', '½ cup maple syrup (125 mL)', '25 cloves']
instructions: ['1: Place the 3 ¾ lb gammon joint in a large pot and add the 2 onions and pineapple juice', '2:  Bring to a boil over high heat', '3: Once boiling, reduce the heat to medium, cover, and simmer for 70 minutes', '4:  (Gammon joints need to cook for 40 minutes per kilo (2 ¼ lbs), so if you are using a smaller or large 3 ¾ lb gammon joint, adjust the cooking time accordingly', '5: )Once cooked, carefully remove the 3 ¾ lb gammon joint from the pan and place on a baking sheet to cool slightly', '6: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C)', '7: Make the glaze: in a small pan over a medium heat, combine the Dijon mustard, pineapple juice, and ½ cup maple syrup and bring to a boil', '8:  Cook for 10 minutes, or until slightly reduced and glossy', '9: Carefully remove the skin from the 3 ¾ lb gammon joint, using a small paring knife to help ease the fat away from the skin', '10:  Be sure to leave a small layer of fat on top of the 3 ¾ lb gammon', '11: Score the fat in a diamond pattern and push a clove into each cross section', '12: Liberally brush the 3 ¾ lb gammon joint with the glaze, making sure to reserve at least half of the glaze', '13: Roast the 3 ¾ lb gammon joint for 40 minutes, glazing again halfway through', '14: Carve and serve']

ingredients: ['1 teaspoon olive oil', '6 chicken wings frozen thawed', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '¾ cup cola soda (180 mL)', 'scallion sliced for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Heat the 1 teaspoon olive oil in a medium nonstick skillet over medium heat', '2:  Add the 6 chicken wings and sear for 1–2 minute per side, until just crispy', '3: Add the 2 tablespoons soy sauce and ¾ cup cola and increase the heat to high', '4:  Bring to boil and cook, stirring constantly, until the sauce is reduced and syrupy and the wings are warmed through and well coated, 5–7 minutes', '5: Garnish with scallions and serve immediately']

ingredients: ['2 peaches 1 pitted and finely chopped 1 thinly sliced', '1 cup fresh mint leaf (45 g)', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '¼ cup lime juice (60 mL)', '½ cup white rum (120 mL)', '1 bottle rosé']
instructions: ['1: In a pitcher add diced 2 peaches, 1 cup fresh mint, ½ cup sugar, and ¼ cup lime juice', '2:  Mudlle for 1 minute, or until ½ cup sugar has dissolved', '3: To the pitcher add ½ cup white rum and rose', '4:  Stir to combine', '5: Add ice to each serving glass, then top with the 1 bottle rosé mojito (rosito)', '6: Add a peach slice to the rim of each glass']

ingredients: ['4 shrimps', 'sweet potato', 'mushroom', 'green bean', 'kabocha pumpkin', 'rice', 'Tempura batter', '1 egg', '½ cup soda water (120 mL) cold', '½ cup cup cake flour (60 g)', 'oil for frying', 'Dipping sauce', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 tablespoon mirin', 'Optional', '¼ cup water (60 mL) hot', '1 teaspoon dashi granules japanese stock granules']
