instructions: ['1: Prepare shrimp by taking off shell and deveining', '2: Make 4 slits down the stomach', '3:  Flip shrimp on the side and diagonally slice 4 more slits on each side', '4:  (This will keep the shrimp straight when cooked', '5: )In a medium bowl, beat 1 egg and ½ cup soda ½ cup soda ¼ cup water', '6: Heat a pot of oil to 350˚F (180˚C)', '7: Then add ½ cup cup cake flour and mix, but keep it clumpy', '8:  Do NOT over-mix', '9: Dredge shrimp up to the tail and carefully place into frying oil', '10:  Fry for 2-3 minutes or until shrimp is fully cooked', '11:  Place tempura on paper towel to absorb oil or a wired rack to drain excess oil', '12: For the dipping Dipping 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon soy sauce, combine 1 tablespoon soy Dipping 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon soy sauce and 1 tablespoon mirin', '13:  If using, dissolve 1 teaspoon dashi in the hot ½ cup soda ¼ cup water and add to the 1 tablespoon soy Dipping 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon soy sauce and 1 tablespoon mirin', '14: Arrange assorted tempura on a bowl of rice', '15: Nutrition  Calories: 2792 Fat: 253 grams  Carbs: 128 grams Fiber: 15 grams  Sugars: 19 grams  Protein: 17 grams']

ingredients: ['Curry Paste', '1 teaspoon whole coriander', '1 teaspoon whole white peppercorns', '1 teaspoon whole cumin seeds', '8 cloves garlic', '¼ cup shallot (35 g) diced', '¼ cup galangal (35 g) peeled and diced', '1 stalk lemongrass thinly sliced', '4 oz fresh thai basil stems and leaves separated thinly sliced divided', '2 oz fresh cilantro (60 g) leaves and tender stems separated chopped divided', '6 Makrut lime leaves ribs removed thinly sliced', '2 oz palm sugar (60 g)', '2 tablespoons fresh lime juice', '1 ½ tablespoons shrimp paste', '4 serrano peppers thinly sliced', '8 green thai chiles stemmed and chopped', 'Thai Green Curry', '2 tablespoons neutral oil such as grapeseed or canola', '¼ cup green curry paste (55 g)', '1 lb boneless skinless chicken thighs (455 g) sliced', '2 cups chicken stock (480 mL)', '2 tablespoons fish sauce', '12 oz bamboo shoots (350 g) drained', '12 thai eggplants quartered', '2 cups coconut cream (480 mL)', '4 oz fresh thai basil (100 g) plus more for serving', '4 fresh red thai chiles', 'rice noodle or rice for serving cooked', 'Preparation', 'Curry Paste', '1 teaspoon whole coriander', '1 teaspoon whole white peppercorns', '1 teaspoon whole cumin seeds', '8 cloves garlic', '¼ cup shallot (35 g) diced', '¼ cup galangal (35 g) peeled and diced', '1 stalk lemongrass thinly sliced', '4 oz fresh thai basil stems and leaves separated thinly sliced divided', '2 oz fresh cilantro (60 g) leaves and tender stems separated chopped divided', '6 Makrut lime leaves ribs removed thinly sliced', '2 oz palm sugar (60 g)', '2 tablespoons fresh lime juice', '1 ½ tablespoons shrimp paste', '4 serrano peppers thinly sliced', '8 green thai chiles stemmed and chopped', 'Thai Green Curry', '2 tablespoons neutral oil such as grapeseed or canola', '¼ cup green curry paste (55 g)', '1 lb boneless skinless chicken thighs (455 g) sliced', '2 cups chicken stock (480 mL)', '2 tablespoons fish sauce', '12 oz bamboo shoots (350 g) drained', '12 thai eggplants quartered', '2 cups coconut cream (480 mL)', '4 oz fresh thai basil (100 g) plus more for serving', '4 fresh red thai chiles', 'rice noodle or rice for serving cooked', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Make the curry paste: Add the coriander seeds, white peppercorns, and cumin seeds to a large mortar bowl and grind with the pestle until coarsely ground', '2:  Add the garlic and shallot and break down with the pestle, then add the galangal and pound to incorporate', '3:  Add the lemongrass, basil and cilantro stems, and the Makrut lime leaves and continue pounding with the pestle until the mixture starts to form a paste', '4:  Add the palm sugar and pound to dissolve', '5:  Add half of the Thai basil and cilantro leaves and the lime juice and pound with the pestle until the ingredients have blended together', '6:  Add the remaining Thai basil and cilantro, the serrano peppers, and green Thai chiles, and pound until broken down and well incorporated, but still bright green', '7:  Add the shrimp paste and continue pounding into a smooth, homogenous paste', '8:  The curry paste will keep in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks', '9: Make the green curry: In a large pot, heat the oil over medium heat until shimmering', '10:  Add ¼ cup (55 g) of the green curry paste and fry to bloom the flavors, 2–3 minutes', '11: Add the chicken, ½ cup (120 ml) chicken stock, and the fish sauce and cook until opaque on the outside, but still pink in the center, 4–5 minutes', '12: Add the bamboo shoots, Thai eggplant, and the remaining 1½ cups (360 ml) chicken stock and simmer until the chicken is fully cooked, 8–10 minutes', '13: Reduce the heat to low, add the coconut cream, and stir to incorporate', '14:  Add the Thai basil and red Thai chiles and simmer for 2–3 minutes, until aromatic', '15: Serve the green curry over rice noodles or rice and garnish with more Thai basil']

ingredients: ['Lemon Curd', '16 large egg yolks', '1 cup fresh lemon juice (240 mL)', '2 ⅔ cups granulated sugar (535 g)', '4 tablespoons lemon zest (from about 4 lemons)', '1 ½ cups unsalted butter (185 g) softened', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', 'Beignets', '¾ cup lukewarm water (180 mL)', '3 ½ teaspoons active dry yeast', '6 tablespoons granulated sugar divided plus 1 teaspoon', '4 cups bread flour (500 g) plus more for dusting', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '½ cup whole milk', '2 large eggs', '3 tablespoons unsalted butter melted', '8 cups canola oil (1.9 L) for frying plus more for greasing', 'powdered sugar for dusting']
instructions: ['1: Make the lemon curd: Fill the bottom of a double boiler with 1–2 inches of water and bring to a boil over medium-high heat', '2:  Add the egg yolks, lemon juice, 2 ⅔ cups 6 tablespoons granulated sugar, and lemon zest to the top of the double boiler or a large heatproof bowl', '3:  Set over the boiling water, increase the heat to high, and whisk with a silicone whisk for 10–15 minutes, or until the mixture thickens and looks like Hollandaise sauce', '4:  Remove the top of the double boiler from the heat and whisk in the 1 ½ cups unsalted 3 tablespoons unsalted butter and salt until melted and fully incorporated', '5: Transfer the curd to a clean heatproof bowl or a jar and cover with plastic wrap, pressing directly against the surface to prevent a skin from forming', '6:   Chill the lemon curd in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour, or until set', '7: Make the beignets: Pour the water into a medium bowl or large liquid measuring cup and sprinkle the yeast and 1 teaspoon sugar over the top', '8:   Stir to combine', '9:  Let stand for about 5 minutes, until foamy', '10: In a large bowl, whisk together the 4 cups bread flour and salt', '11:  Add the milk, eggs, melted 1 ½ cups unsalted 3 tablespoons unsalted butter, and remaining 6 tablespoons sugar to the yeast mixture and whisk to combine', '12:  Pour the 3 ½ teaspoons active dry ingredients into the wet ingredients and stir with a rubber spatula until a shaggy dough forms', '13:  Turn the dough out onto a clean surface and knead with your hands until it comes together in a smooth ball, about 2 minutes', '14: Grease a clean large bowl with 8 cups canola oil', '15:  Transfer the dough to the greased bowl and cover tightly with plastic wrap', '16:  Let the dough rise in a warm place until doubled in size, about 1 hour', '17: Heat the 8 cups canola oil in a large pot over medium-high heat until it reaches 350°F (180°C)', '18:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '19:  Set a wire rack nearby', '20: Punch the dough down with your fist, then turn it out onto a lightly 4 cups bread floured surface', '21:  Roll the dough into a large rectangle, about ¼ inch thick', '22:  With a sharp knife, cut the dough into about 35 2-inch squares, then transfer the squares to the prepared baking sheetWorking with 3–4 at a time, gently lower the dough squares into the hot oil', '23:  As soon as the beignets puff up, about 2 minutes, use tongs or a spider to gently flip over', '24:  Fry until golden brown on both sides, flipping as needed, 2–3 minutes more', '25:  Transfer the beignets to a wire rack to drain and cool completely', '26: Transfer the lemon curd to a piping bag fitted with a metal star tip', '27: Cut a small “x” with a paring knife in the side of each beignet, then fill with a small amount of lemon curd', '28: Dust the beignets with powdered sugar']

ingredients: ['2 lb boneless skinless chicken thighs (905 g)', '2 lb skirt steak (905 g)', '2 lb boneless pork shoulder (905 g) thinly sliced', '2 ½ tablespoons salt divided', '1 ½ tablespoons black pepper divided', '2 tablespoons paprika', '2 tablespoons chili powder', '2 tablespoons cumin', '6 cloves garlic minced', '½ cup lime juice (120 mL) plus more for serving', '2 large white onions halved', '1 large white onion sliced', '1 green bell pepper sliced', '1 red bell pepper sliced', '1 yellow bell pepper sliced', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '10 corn tortillas medium', '1 cup guacamole (230 g)', '1 cup sour cream (230 g)', '1 cup pico de gallo (240 g)', 'Special Equipment', '3 wooden skewers']
instructions: ['1: Slice the 2 lb skirt steak into roughly 3-inch (7-cm) pieces', '2:  Transfer the pieces to a medium bowl', '3: Thinly slice the 2 lb boneless pork shoulder, then transfer the pieces to a separate medium bowl', '4: Pound the 2 lb boneless skinless chicken thighs flat, then slice them in quarters', '5:  Transfer the pieces to a third medium bowl', '6: In a small bowl, combine 2 tablespoons salt, 1 tablespoon pepper, paprika, chili powder, cumin, 6 cloves garlic, and ½ cup lime juice', '7:  Stir until there are no lumps', '8: Evenly divide the marinade among the 3 bowls of 2 lb boneless skinless chicken, steak, and 2 lb boneless pork', '9: Toss the meats until they are evenly coated, then refrigerate for at least 30 minutes', '10: Preheat the oven to 300°F (150°C)', '11:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '12: Place 3 2 large white 1 large white onion halves in the middle of the baking sheet, then insert a skewer in each 2 large white 1 large white onion, evenly spaced, near the inner edges', '13: Thread a piece of 2 lb boneless skinless chicken onto one skewer, then a piece of steak onto the second, followed by a piece of 2 lb boneless pork onto the third', '14:  Repeat with the rest of the meat', '15: Secure another 2 large white 1 large white onion half onto the tops of the 3 wooden skewers to hold the towers together', '16: Bake for about 1½ hours, until the meat is slightly brown on the edges', '17: Increase the oven temperature to 450°F (230°C)', '18: On one side of the baking sheet, toss the bell peppers and sliced 2 large white 1 large white onion with the remaining ½ tablespoon of salt, remaining ½ tablespoon of pepper, and the oil', '19: On the other side of the baking sheet, spread out the 10 corn tortillas', '20:  Cover the tortilla side with foil', '21: Bake for 15 minutes, until the edges of the meat and the vegetables are slightly charred', '22: Slice your meat of choice into a tortilla, add vegetables, and top with 1 cup guacamole, 1 cup sour cream, 1 cup pico de gallo, and a squeeze of ½ cup lime']

ingredients: ['4 mangoes diced', '½ cup honey (170 g)', '½ cup water (120 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Cut 4 mangoes into ½-inch (1', '2: 3 cm) cubes and put on baking sheet', '3:  Cover and freeze for a minimum of 4 hours', '4: In a food processor, add the frozen mango, ½ cup water, and ½ cup honey', '5:  Mix until the mixture is smooth', '6: Remove from food processor and scoop into tray', '7: Freeze for one additional hour']

ingredients: ['6 egg whites', "1 ¾ cups baker's sugar (350 g)", '2 tablespoons cornstarch', '2 cups heavy whipping cream (480 g)', '⅓ cup sugar (70 g)', 'Garnish', 'plum', 'rasberry', 'strawberry']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 280°F (135°C)', '2: In a large bowl, whip 6 egg whites until stiff peaks form', '3: In a small bowl, combine baker’s sugar and 2 tablespoons cornstarch and mix well', '4: Gradually (split into 5 portions) add sugar into the 6 egg whites', '5:  Once the 6 egg whites form a stiff peak with a sheen gloss, set aside', '6: Bake for 1 hour', '7:  Then turn oven off and let cloud cakes sit in hot oven for another hour or two until the oven is totally cool', '8: Whip the 2 cups heavy cream and sugar together until the cream is set', '9: Carefully place each layer of cake with cream and berries']

ingredients: ['Filling', '1 cup napa cabbage (100 g) chopped', '2 teaspoons salt divided', '1 lb ground pork (455 g)', '3 shiitake mushrooms finely chopped', '8 scallions thinly sliced', '2 tablespoons sesame oil', '1 tablespoon ginger minced', '1 teaspoon white pepper', '30 large round dumpling wrappers', '4 tablespoons canola oil', '1 cup water (240 mL)', 'dipping sauce optional', '⅓ cup soy sauce (80 mL)', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', '1 teaspoon rice wine vinegar']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, combine the cabbage and 2 teaspoons salt', '2:  Toss lightly', '3:  Let sit for 10 minutes to withdraw some moisture', '4:  Place a colander over a separate bowl', '5:  Transfer the cabbage to the colander squeeze out any moisture from the cabbage', '6:  Discard the water', '7: In a 30 large bowl, combine the drained napa cabbage, 1 lb ground pork, 3 shiitake, 8 scallions, 2 2 1 4 tablespoons 1 teaspoon sesame 2 1 4 tablespoons 1 teaspoon sesame 4 tablespoons canola 1 teaspoon sesame oil, ginger, remaining teaspoon of 2 teaspoons salt, and white pepper', '8:  Mix well with your hands', '9: Put a 2 1 4 tablespoon of filling in the middle of a dumpling wrapper', '10:  Using your finger, lightly wet half of the outer rim with water', '11: Fold the wrapper in half', '12:  Using your fingertips, make pleats to seal the dumpling', '13:  Repeat with the remaining wrappers and filling', '14: In a 30 large non-stick pan, heat the 2 1 4 tablespoons 1 teaspoon sesame 4 tablespoons canola 1 teaspoon sesame oil over medium heat', '15:  Place 8 dumplings in the pan and fry until the bottoms turn golden brown, about 5 minutes', '16:   Add ¼ cup water (60 ml) and cover', '17:  Cook for 7-10 minutes, or until the filling is cooked through', '18:  Repeat with the remaining dumplings', '19: Serve immediately with dipping sauce']

ingredients: ['2 cups water (470 mL)', '1 cup coarse kosher salt (240 g)', '6 cups cold ice water (1 ½ L)', '4 chicken thighs', '4 chicken drumsticks', '2 cups buttermilk (470 mL)', '¾ cup coconut milk (175 mL)', '2 cloves garlic minced', '2 cups all-purpose flour (250 g)', '¼ cup semolina flour (40 g)', '2 tablespoons cornstarch', '1 tablespoon white pepper', '3 cups peanut oil for frying', 'Chicken Shake', '¼ cup berbere (30 g)', '¼ cup hot smoked paprika (30 g)', '2 tablespoons ground cumin', '2 tablespoons white pepper', '2 tablespoons celery salt', '1 ½ teaspoons granulated garlic', '1 ½ teaspoons coarse kosher salt']
instructions: ['1: In a medium saucepan over high heat, add 2 cups (470 ml) of water and the salt', '2:  Bring to a simmer, stirring to dissolve all the salt', '3:  Remove from heat and pour into a larger pot/container', '4: Add the ice water into the pot to cool', '5:  Add the chicken, cover, and refrigerate for 1 ½ hours', '6: Prepare the chicken shake', '7:  In a small bowl, whisk together all the chicken shake ingredients', '8: NOTE: Makes about 1 cup (110g) that will keep for 6 months', '9:  Store in a jar out of the light', '10: In a 9x13-inch (23x33 cm) baking dish, add buttermilk, coconut milk, and garlic', '11: Add 1 2 1 2 2 2 tablespoon of chicken shake and whisk together', '12: Remove the chicken from the saltwater, dab on paper towels to remove excess liquid, then add into the buttermilk marinade', '13:  Roll to coat each piece', '14:  Cover and refrigerate overnight', '15: Fill a large cast iron pan ⅔-full with peanut oil over medium-high heat', '16:  Heat to 360˚F (182˚C)', '17: While the oil is heating, coat the marinated chicken', '18:  In a large bowl, whisk together the all-purpose flour, semolina flour, 2 2 1 2 2 2 tablespoons cornstarch, and 1 2 2 2 tablespoon 2 2 tablespoons white pepper', '19: Remove the chicken from the marinade, allowing any excess to drip off, then roll in the flour mixture, packing it on so the chicken is completely coated', '20: Set coated chicken on a wire rack over a baking sheet', '21:  If the coating looks damp, roll it in the flour mixture again', '22: Working in batches, fry the chicken until it is brown and golden on both sides and reaches an internal temperature of 165˚F (73˚C), about 10 minutes per batch', '23:  NOTE: Adjust heat to keep the oil between 350-375˚F (180-190˚C)', '24: Drain on a rack set over a baking sheet', '25:  Rest 8-10 minutes', '26: Fry the chicken a second time, only for about 3 minutes, to really crisp up the skin', '27:  Drain on a rack', '28: Sprinkle with additional chicken shake']

ingredients: ['½ cup unsalted butter (115 g) softened', "¼ cup French's Dijon Mustard (60 g)", '1 italian bread  loaf', '16 oz monterey jack cheese (455 g)', '12 oz deli ham (340 g)', '5 oz gruyère cheese (140 g) shredded', 'fresh parsley chopped for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375°F (190 C)', '2: In a small bowl, combine French’s Dijon Mustard and softened ½ cup unsalted butter', '3: Using a serrated knife, cut ¾-inch (2 cm) slices in the 1 italian bread without cutting all the way through so the bottom of the loaf stays intact (similar to a Hasselback potato)', '4: Using about half the mixture, brush dijon ½ cup unsalted butter between each 1 italian bread slice', '5:  Reserve the rest of the ½ cup unsalted butter for later', '6: Stack a slice of 12 oz deli ham on top of a slice of 16 oz monterey jack 5 oz 5 oz gruyère cheese, fold stack in half, and wedge it in between each 1 italian bread slice so the 16 oz monterey jack 5 oz 5 oz gruyère cheese is against the 1 italian bread', '7:  Repeat with remaining 16 oz monterey jack 5 oz 5 oz gruyère cheese and 12 oz deli ham slices', '8: Brush remaining dijon ½ cup unsalted butter over loaf and top with shredded Gruyère', '9: Wrap loaf in aluminum foil', '10:  Bake for 15 minutes, then unwrap the foil and bake for another 5 minutes', '11:  Remove from oven, garnish with chopped fresh parsley, and serve immediately']

ingredients: ['Crust', '20 graham crackers crushed plus 4 whole', '2 tablespoons sugar', '10 tablespoons unsalted butter melted', 'Cheesecake Fillings', '2 tablespoons gelatin powder 2 packets', '4 tablespoons water', '24 oz cream cheese (680 mg)', '1 cup sugar (200 g)', '3 cups heavy whipping cream (720 mL) divided', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '⅔ cup lemon curd (165 g) divided', '½ cup dulce de leche (150 g) warmed plus more for garnish', '½ cup chocolate hazelnut spread (145 g)', '1 tablespoon raspberry jam', '8 fresh raspberries for garnish', '5 chocolate hazelnut truffles for garnish', '10 pecans roughly charged for garnish', '5 candied lemon slice optional halved garnish']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, mix together the 20 graham cracker crumbs, 2 tablespoons 1 cup sugar, and melted butter until combined', '2: Pour the crust mixture into a 9-inch (23 cm) springform cake pan', '3:  Press crumbs down firmly with the bottom of a small ramekin or glass to form an even base', '4: Carefully break the remaining 20 graham crackers in half, so that you have 8 squares', '5: Push the 20 graham crackers into the crust with the split line facing upwards to form an X shape, dividing the crust into four equal sections', '6: Press down on the crust one more time to ensure the 20 graham crackers are secure', '7:  Cover and chill in the freezer for at least 10 minutes while preparing the fillings', '8: In a small bowl, dissolve the 2 tablespoons gelatin in the 4 tablespoons water', '9:  Set aside to bloom', '10: In a large bowl, beat together the 24 oz 3 3 cups heavy whipping cream cheese and 2 tablespoons 1 cup sugar until smooth', '11: Add 2½ 3 cups (720 ml) whipping 24 oz 3 3 cups heavy whipping cream and beat until the batter is light and fluffy', '12: Warm the 2 tablespoons gelatin in the microwave for about 15 seconds so that it’s fluid, and incorporate into the batter', '13: Divide the cheesecake batter evenly between 4 medium bowls', '14: In the first bowl, whisk in the ½ teaspoon vanilla extract and remaining whipping 24 oz 3 3 cups heavy whipping cream', '15: In the second bowl, whisk in ⅓ cup (80 grams) lemon curd', '16: In the third bowl, whisk in the dulce de leche', '17: In the fourth bowl, whisk in the ½ cup 5 chocolate hazelnut spread', '18: To assemble the cheesecake, slowly pour the contents of bowl #1 into a quarter of the pan', '19:  Repeat with remaining flavors', '20:  Use a spatula to smooth the tops', '21: Carefully dollop the 1 tablespoon raspberry jam in small circles on top of the ½ teaspoon vanilla cheesecake', '22:  Use a toothpick or knife to carefully swirl it into the filling', '23:  Garnish the outer border with 8 fresh raspberries', '24: Garnish the outer border of the ½ cup 5 chocolate hazelnut cheesecake with the ½ cup 5 chocolate hazelnut truffles', '25: Garnish the outer border of the dulce de leche cheesecake with the chopped pecans and drizzle with dulce de lechePour the remaining lemon curd on top of the lemon cheesecake and smooth with an offset spatula or spoon', '26:  Garnish the outer border with 5 candied lemon slices', '27: Cover the top of the pan tightly with plastic wrap and chill for 4 hours or overnight in the fridge before slicing and serving']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '½ teaspoon cayenne', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '2 teaspoons garlic powder', '2 lb baby back ribs (910 g)', '20 oz diced pineapple (565 g) 1 can', '28 oz barbecue sauce (795 g) 1 bottle']
instructions: ['1: In a small bowl, combine the 1 tablespoon salt, 1 teaspoon pepper, 1 teaspoon onion powder, ½ teaspoon cayenne, 2 teaspoons ground cumin, 1 teaspoon chili powder, and 2 teaspoons garlic powder', '2: Rub the spice mix all over the 2 lb baby back ribs', '3: Drain the juice from the can of pineapple and add to the slow cooker, along with the 28 oz barbecue sauce', '4:  Stir to combine', '5: Add the 20 oz diced pineapple and ribs to the slow cooker and cover with the sauce', '6: Cover and cook on high for 4 hours', '7:  Halfway through, flip the racks of ribs so the one that was previously on the bottom is now on top', '8:  Cover with more sauce', '9: Remove the ribs from the slow cooker and cut into individual pieces', '10:  Serve with the leftover sauce and pineapple chunks']

ingredients: ['Mexican Patty', '1 lb ground beef (455 g) 80% lean', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon chili powder', '⅓ lb ground chorizo (150 g)', '1 tablespoon oil', '3 hamburger buns', 'Toppings', '3 oz manchego cheese (85 g) sliced', '½ cup guacamole (130 g)', '⅓ cup pico de gallo (70 g)', '⅓ cup cotija cheese (35 g)', '¼ cup sour cream (60 g)']
instructions: ['1: Mix together the patty ingredients until combined', '2: Form the 1 lb ground beef mixture into 3 round patties', '3: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a pan over medium heat', '4: Cook the burgers for 3 minutes on the first side, flip, and place a slice of 3 oz manchego cheese on top', '5: Cook for 6 more minutes until the cheese is melted', '6: Assemble the burgers on the 3 hamburger buns with ½ cup guacamole, ⅓ cup cotija, ⅓ cup pico de gallo, and ¼ cup sour cream']

ingredients: ['½ cup wheat flour (60 g)', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '2 large eggs', '1 ½ cups whole wheat bread crumb (170 g)', '½ teaspoon paprika', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon cumin', '2 avocados', '¾ cup plain yogurt (185 g)', '¾ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '3 cloves fresh garlic finely minced', '1 lime juiced', '½ cup green cabbage (50 g) finely sliced', '½ cup red cabbage (50 g) finely sliced', '½ cup shredded carrot (55 g)', '1 pack corn tortilla']
instructions: ['1: Add the ½ cup wheat flour, salt, and pepper to a bowl and whisk to combine', '2: In a separate bowl, crack the eggs and whisk', '3: In a third bowl, add the 1 ½ cups whole wheat bread crumbs, garlic powder, ½ teaspoon cumin, and ½ teaspoon paprika, and whisk to combine', '4: Halve the 2 avocados, cutting from the stem to the base', '5: Preheat an oven to 350°F (180°C)Remove and discard the pits', '6:  Cut each half into ½ inch (1 ¼ cm) wide slices then remove and discard the skin', '7: Working with one avocado slice at a time, dip in the ½ cup wheat flour mixture, then egg, and finally 1 ½ cups whole wheat bread crumbs, making sure each are fully coated', '8: Place the avocado slices 1-inch (2 ½ cm) apart on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '9: Transfer the baking sheet to the oven and bake for 10 minutes', '10:  Flip the 2 avocados and continue baking until golden brown, 10 to 15 more minutes', '11: In a medium bowl, mix together the ¾ cup plain yogurt, salt, pepper, garlic, and 1 lime juice', '12:  Cover and refrigerate until you’re ready to serve', '13: Add the ½ cup red and ½ cup green cabbage and the carrots to a 2 large bowl, then stir in half of the ¾ cup plain yogurt sauce until well combined', '14: Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let the avocado slices cool 2 to 3 minutes before serving', '15: Place three avocado slices on a single 1 pack corn tortilla and top with slaw and toppings of your choice']

ingredients: ['9 red potatoes', '½ cup ranch dressing (120 g)', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 cup shredded cheddar cheese (100 g)', '¼ cup fresh chives (10 g) chopped']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200˚C)', '2: Slice the 9 red potatoes in half, lengthwise, then slice each half lengthwise three times and across four times, to cube', '3: Bring a large pot of water to a boil and drop in chopped 9 red potatoes, cook 10 minutes', '4: Drain 9 red potatoes and mix in ½ cup ranch, 1 tablespoon garlic powder, 1 teaspoon paprika, 1 teaspoon salt, and ½ teaspoon pepper', '5: Transfer to a 9x13-inch (23x33 cm) baking dish', '6: Bake for 30-35 minutes, or until nicely browned', '7: While still hot, mix in 1 cup shredded cheddar and ¼ cup fresh chives', '8: Allow to cool for 5 minutes']

ingredients: ['1 pear', '1 cup apple cider (250 mL)', '⅔ cup orange juice (150 mL)', '2 star anises', '1 cinnamon stick', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 tablespoons greek yogurt', '⅓ cup almond (50 g) a handful']
instructions: ['1: Peel the 1 pear, cut in half and core', '2: Add the 1 cup apple cider, ⅔ cup orange juice, 2 star anise, 1 cinnamon stick and 1 teaspoon vanilla extract to a small to medium pan', '3: Bring to boil, then reduce to a simmer', '4: Add the 1 pear halves and poach at a low-medium heat for 10-20 minutes (until you can stick a knife through with no resistance)', '5: Remove the 1 pear halves when cooked', '6: Reduce the rest of the mixture over a medium heat until it is a thicker glaze', '7: Serve the 1 pears with a dollop of 2 tablespoons greek yogurt, a ⅓ cup almond (50 g) a handful of toasted almonds and the glaze']

ingredients: ['4 boneless skinless chicken breasts', '1 salt to taste', '1 pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '1 tablespoon onion powder', '16 slices swiss cheese', '½ lb ham (225 g) sliced', '2 sheets puff pastry thawed if frozen', '¼ cup english mustard (60 g)', '1 egg beaten']
instructions: ['1: Sprinkle the 4 boneless skinless chicken breasts with 1 salt, 1 pepper, 1 tablespoon garlic powder, and 1 tablespoon onion powder, tossing to coat evenly', '2: On a cutting board, place a 4 boneless skinless chicken breast between two 2 sheets of plastic wrap and pound until about ½-inch (1 cm) thick with a meat mallet, rolling pin, or heavy pan', '3: Remove the plastic wrap and place a layer of Swiss cheese, then ½ lb ham, then one more layer of Swiss cheese', '4: Evenly roll the 4 boneless skinless chicken, and place onto a new sheet of plastic wrap', '5: Wrap the 4 boneless skinless chicken in the plastic wrap, twist the excess plastic, and roll the 4 boneless skinless chicken while twisting the sides in to tighten and firm up the roll of 4 boneless skinless chicken cordon bleu', '6:  Tie the excess and chill in the fridge to set for 30 minutes', '7: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '8: Cut the puff pastry 2 sheets in half and gently roll out width-wise', '9: Brush the pastry with ¼ cup english mustard and place the 4 boneless skinless chicken on to the bottom edge of the pastry', '10: Tightly roll the 4 boneless skinless chicken in the puff pastry, pinching the seams together to close and folding the sides under the bottom', '11: Place the 4 boneless skinless chickens rolls on a greased baking sheet and brush all sides with 1 egg wash', '12: With a fork, score a decorative design onto the surface of the puff pastry', '13: Sprinkle with 1 salt', '14: Bake for 35-40 minutes or until the puff pastry is a dark golden brown and the internal temperature of the 4 boneless skinless chicken is 165°F (75°C)']

ingredients: ['½ cup ghee (60 g)', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '1 ½ cups milk (360 mL)', '1 cup chickpea flour (125 g)', 'cardamom powder of two pods']
instructions: ['1: In a heavy bottom pan, heat ½ cup ghee', '2: Add 1 cup chickpea flour', '3:  Roast the 1 cup chickpea flour for about 5-7 minutes until it is medium brown - color and consistency to peanut butter', '4: Add 1 ½ cups milk and ½ cup sugar and whisk until the fudge leaves the sides of the pan and forms into a ball', '5: Add cardamom powder', '6:  Stir well', '7: Spread the fudge on a greased plate', '8:  Garnish with sliced almonds, pistachios, hemp hearts and/or dried rose petals', '9: Allow to cool', '10:  Cut into squares and store in an airtight container']

ingredients: ['1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken thighs (680 g)', '1 teaspoon sea salt divided', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper divided', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon garlic minced', '2 teaspoons dried thyme', '1 teaspoon dried rosemary', '½ cup chicken stock (120 mL)', '⅓ cup sun-dried tomato (65 g) chopped', '1 cup heavy cream (240 mL)', '½ cup grated parmesan cheese (60 g)', '2 tablespoons fresh parsley for garnish', 'steam cauliflower rice for serving']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Season the chicken thighs on both sides with ½ teaspoon salt and ¼ teaspoon black pepper', '3: Heat a 10-inch cast iron skillet over high heat', '4:  Once the skillet is hot, add the 1 tablespoon olive oil and the chicken thighs', '5:   Cook for 3–4 minutes, or until the edges are seared', '6:   Remove the chicken from the skillet and transfer to a clean plate', '7: Reduce the heat to medium-low', '8:   Add the 1 tablespoon garlic thyme, and rosemary to the pan and sauté for 2–3 minutes, until fragrant', '9: Pour in the chicken stock, then add the sun-dried tomatoes and 1 cup heavy cream', '10:  Season with the remaining ½ teaspoon salt and ¼ teaspoon pepper', '11:  Bring to a simmer and cook for 1–2 minutes, to let the flavors meld, then add the Parmesan cheese and stir until melted', '12: Return the chicken thighs to the skillet, nestling into the sauce', '13:  Drizzle some of the sauce over the chicken', '14: Transfer the skillet to the oven and bake for 15 minutes until the chicken is cooked through', '15: Remove from the oven and let sit for 5 minutes, until cooled slightly and the sauce thickens', '16: Garnish with the 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, then serve the chicken over steam cauliflower rice with more sauce spooned on top']

ingredients: ['1 cup frozen blackberry (150 g)', '1 cup frozen blueberry (100 g)', '1 pt raspberry sorbet (390 g)', '1 ½ cups lemonade (355 mL)']
instructions: ['1: To a blender add the blackberries, blueberries, 1 pt raspberry sorbet, and 1 ½ cups lemonade', '2: Blend until smooth', '3: Serve immediately to drink or freeze for 30 minutes to eat with a spoon']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons salt', '3 tablespoons black pepper', '2 tablespoons onion powder', '2 tablespoons garlic powder', '3 tablespoons paprika', '2 tablespoons ground cumin', '2 tablespoons dried oregano', '2 teaspoons cayenne powder', '3 cups all-purpose flour (375 g)', '4 bone-in skin-on chicken drumsticks', '4 bone-in skin-on chicken thighs', '3 cups buttermilk (720 mL)', 'peanut or vegetable oil for frying', 'honey for serving']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, add the 2 tablespoons salt, 3 tablespoons black pepper, 2 tablespoons onion powder, 2 tablespoons garlic powder, 3 tablespoons paprika, 2 tablespoons ground cumin, 2 tablespoons dried oregano, and 2 teaspoons cayenne and mix until combined', '2:  In a another medium bowl, combine half of the spice mix with the 3 cups all-purpose flour, mixing until the spices are evenly distributed', '3: Add the chicken to a large bowl and sprinkle with the remaining spice blend', '4:  Mix until all the chicken pieces are evenly coated', '5: Pour the 3 cups buttermilk over the chicken and stir until the residual spices from the chicken have blended in with the 3 cups buttermilk to create a light orange color', '6:  Marinate the chicken in the fridge for 2 hours, or overnight', '7: Heat the peanut or vegetable oil to about 325°F (160°C) in a large cast-iron skillet', '8: Dredge each piece of chicken in the 3 cups all-purpose flour, shaking off any excess', '9:  Dip them back into the 3 cups buttermilk mixture, then back into the 3 cups all-purpose flour', '10:  Make sure to shake off excess 3 cups all-purpose flour or it’ll burn while frying', '11: Fry 3-4 chicken pieces at a time, occasionally turning them over', '12:  Cook for 10-12 minutes, until golden brown, crispy, and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (75°C)', '13:  Rest the cooked chicken pieces on a wire rack to let excess peanut or vegetable oil drain off', '14: Drizzle the chicken with honey, then serve']

ingredients: ['10 saffron threads plus more for garnish', '1 tablespoon hot water', '1 cup heavy cream (240 mL) cold', '½ cup sweetened condensed milk (120 mL) chilled', '½ cup mango purée (120 g) canned', '½ teaspoon ground cardamom', 'dried rose petal for garnish (optional)']
instructions: ['1: Add the 10 saffron to a small bowl', '2:  Pour the 1 tablespoon hot water over the threads and soak for 5 minutes', '3: Add the 1 cup heavy cream to a large bowl', '4:  Beat with an electric hand mixer on high speed until soft peaks form, 3–5 minutes', '5: Gently fold the ½ cup sweetened condensed milk into the whipped cream with a rubber spatula', '6:  Fold in the ½ cup mango purée, then the ½ teaspoon ground cardamom and bloomed 10 saffron with its soaking liquid, until incorporated', '7: Pour the mixture into a glass container', '8:   Freeze for at least 8 hours, preferably overnight, until frozen solid', '9: Scoop the ½ cup mango kulfi into small bowls and top with dried rose petals and more 10 saffron threads, if desired']

ingredients: ['14 oz cranberry sauce (395 g)', '21 oz apple pie filling (595 g) 1 can', '1 box yellow cake mix', '½ cup butter (115 g)', 'vanilla ice cream optional for serving']
instructions: ['1: Pour 14 oz cranberry sauce and 21 oz apple pie filling into a slow cooker and evenly spread across the bottom', '2: Pour 1 box yellow cake mix into slow cooker in an even layer over 21 oz apples and 14 oz cranberry', '3: Slice stick of ½ cup butter into 8 slices and evenly distribute over 1 box yellow cake mix', '4: Cover and cook on high for 2 ½ hours', '5: Server a la mode with vanilla ice cream or your favorite whipped cream']

ingredients: ['2 cups almond milk (480 mL) or other non-dairy milk', '1 tablespoon ground turmeric', '¼ teaspoon ground ginger', '4 black peppercorns', '1 stick cinnamon', '1 star anise', '1 pinch whole clove', '1 teaspoon agave or sweetener of your choice optional']
instructions: ['1: Add the 2 cups almond milk to a small pot over medium heat', '2: Add the 1 tablespoon ground turmeric, ¼ teaspoon ground ginger, 4 black peppercorns, cinnamon 1 stick, 1 star anise, and cloves', '3:  Whisk to combine', '4: Heat the milk for 4-5 minutes, until steaming, but do not let it come to a boil', '5: Serve warm or over ice and sweeten to taste']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '5 links hot italian sausage', '1 large yellow onion chopped', '5 cloves garlic minced', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon dried basil', '1 tablespoon dried parsley', '12 oz tomato paste (340 g)', '15 oz diced tomato (425 g)', '2 cups grated parmesan cheese (220 g) divided', '2 cups spinach (80 g)', '1 lb rigatoni (455 g) cooked', '1 cup ricotta cheese (245 g)', 'fresh basil to garnish']
instructions: ['1: To a 1 large dutch oven on medium heat, add the 1 tablespoon olive oil and heat it until it shimmers', '2: Add the 5 links hot Italian sausage, cook until the the first side browns deeply, flip and cook on the other side until the sausage is fully 1 lb rigatoni (455 g) cooked, 15 minutes', '3:  Remove the sausages from the pan and slice when they cool down', '4: To the leftover pan drippings, add the chopped yellow onion, minced 5 cloves garlic, salt, pepper, dried basil, dried oregano, and dried parsley', '5:  Cook until the onions are caramelized and soft', '6:  About 10 minutes', '7: Add the 12 oz 15 oz diced tomato paste and cook until the 12 oz 15 oz diced tomato paste darkens slightly', '8: Add in the diced 12 oz 15 oz diced tomatoes and the sausage slices into the pan, stir, and let the sauce come to a simmer', '9: Add in half the 2 cups grated parmesan, 2 cups spinach, the 1 lb rigatoni (455 g) cooked pasta, and stir to combine', '10: Spoon in fresh dollaps of the 1 cup ricotta cheese, garnish with fresh basil, more 2 cups grated parmesan, and serve!']

ingredients: ['1 teaspoon vegetable oil', '1 green chilli chopped', '1 ginger chopped', '6 cloves garlic chopped', '2 onions roughly chopped', '1 cup tomato (250 g) chopped', '¼ cup water (60 mL) plus 6 tablespoons divided', '¼ cup cashews (30 g) soaked in water', '1 teaspoon kashmiri chili powder', '1 butter small knob', '1 teaspoon coriander powder', '2 tablespoons heavy cream', '½ teaspoon garam masala powder', '2 ½ cups paneer (250 g)', '1 teaspoon dried fenugreek leaves', 'salt to taste', 'coriander leaf chopped to taste', 'flatbread or rice for serving']
instructions: ['1: Heat a pan and add the 1 teaspoon vegetable oil', '2:  Add the cinnamon stick, 1 green chili, 1 ginger, 6 cloves garlic, and 2 onions then cook it until 2 onions are little translucent on medium flame', '3: Then add in your tomatoes and cook it for 3-5 minutes, or until tomatoes are tender, then turn the flame off and put a lid on it for 5 minutes', '4: Put the tomatoes and onion mixture in a blender and blitz the mixture with 1 tablespoon water into a smooth paste', '5: Strain the tomato purée and set it aside, then add in your soaked cashews in same blender with 5 ¼ cup water (60 mL) plus 6 2 tablespoons of water and blend it into a creamy cashew paste', '6: Heat the same pan with a knob of 1 butter, melt It, and add in your Kashmiri chili powder (stir it) and cook it for 10 seconds', '7:  Add in your tomato onion purée in it and mix properly and bring it to a boil', '8: Add your coriander powder in it, mix it, and cover the pot and cook it for 3 minutes on medium flame', '9: Then add in your cashews paste with ¼ cup of water mix it properly and cook it for 3 minutes', '10: Stir in your cream and ½ teaspoon garam masala', '11:  Then add in your 2 ½ cups paneer cubes mix it and cook the curry for 5 minutes on low flame', '12: Add in your 1 teaspoon dried fenugreek leaves and mix it', '13:  Season with salt to taste', '14: Lastly garnish the dish with little cream on top with coriander leaves and serve it with flatbreads or flatbread or rice']

ingredients: ['1 ¾ cups self-rising flour (220 g) plus more for dusting', '1 cup greek yogurt (245 g)', '1 egg beaten', '4 tablespoons everything seasoning to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F(200°C)', '2: In a large bowl, mix the self-rising 1 ¾ cups self-rising flour and 1 cup greek yogurt until it comes together to form a ball', '3: Transfer the dough ball to a lightly 1 ¾ cups self-rising floured work surface and use your hands to begin flattening and shaping the rough into a roughly 8-inch (20 cm) disk', '4: Using a bench scraper or knife, cut the dough into 4 equal pieces', '5: One at a time, roll each piece of dough into a log roughly 8 inches (20 cm) long', '6:  Shape the log into a ring and transfer to a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '7: Brush the tops of the bagels with 1 egg wash and sprinkle generously with everything 4 tablespoons everything seasoning', '8: Bake for 20-25 minutes, until the bagels are golden brown']

ingredients: ['Cake', '3 cups all purpose flour (375 g)', '1 teaspoon nutmeg', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '2 teaspoons cinnamon', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 cup pecan (125 g) chopped', '3 ripe bananas', '2 cups granulated sugar (400 g)', '20 oz diced pineapple (565 g) 1 can drained', '1 cup canola oil (240 mL)', '3 large eggs', 'Frosting', '16 oz cream cheese (455 g)', '4 oz unsalted butter (115 g)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '½ teaspoon salt', '6 cups powdered sugar (720 g)', '½ cup pecan (60 g) chopped for decorating', 'Preparation', 'Cake', '3 cups all purpose flour (375 g)', '1 teaspoon nutmeg', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '2 teaspoons cinnamon', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 cup pecan (125 g) chopped', '3 ripe bananas', '2 cups granulated sugar (400 g)', '20 oz diced pineapple (565 g) 1 can drained', '1 cup canola oil (240 mL)', '3 large eggs', 'Frosting', '16 oz cream cheese (455 g)', '4 oz unsalted butter (115 g)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '½ teaspoon salt', '6 cups powdered sugar (720 g)', '½ cup pecan (60 g) chopped for decorating', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2:  Grease and line two 10-inch (25 cm) spring form pans with parchment paper', '3: In a large bowl, combine the flour, nutmeg, ginger, cinnamon, baking soda, salt, and pecan', '4:  Whisk well', '5: In a separate large bowl, mash the bananas until smooth', '6:  Add the sugar, pineapple, oil, and eggs, and whisk until smooth', '7: Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients in two additions', '8:  Whisk to combine', '9: Divide the cake batter between the prepared cake pans', '10: Bake for 50 minutes, or until toothpick inserted in the middle of the cakes comes out clean', '11: Make the frosting: In a medium bowl, beat the cream cheese until smooth', '12:  Add the butter, vanilla, salt and salt and whisk to combine', '13:  Add the powdered sugar and stir until smooth', '14: Release the cakes from the springform pans and remove the parchment paper', '15: Add a dollop of frosting to the center of cake stand and line with parchment paper', '16: Place a layer of Hummingbird Cake on the cake stand', '17:  Spread ⅓ of the frosting over the top of the cake', '18:  Top with the other cake layer and spread with another layer of frosting', '19:  Use the remaining frosting to cover the sides of the cake, then run a bench scraper around the sides to clean off excess frosting', '20: Decorate the border of the cake with chopped pecans', '21: Slice and serve']

ingredients: ['13 russet potatoes cut into 1-inch (2 1/2 cm) pieces', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL)', '2 tablespoons garlic minced', '2 tablespoons fresh rosemary or fresh thyme finely chopped', '1 teaspoon black pepper', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 small handful fresh parsley leaf minced to garnish']
instructions: ['1: Fill a large pot with water and boil', '2:  Add salt, 1 teaspoon baking soda, and 13 russet potatoes, and stir', '3: Return to a boil, reduce to a simmer, and cook for 10 minutes after returning to a boil', '4:  A fork should easily pierce the potato pieces by the end', '5:  Drain and let sit one minute while moisture evaporates', '6: Combine ¼ cup olive oil, 2 tablespoons fresh rosemary (or thyme), 2 tablespoons garlic, and a few grinds of 1 teaspoon black 1 teaspoon black pepper in a 1 small saucepan and heat over medium heat', '7:  Stir constantly until 2 tablespoons garlic just begins to turn golden, about 2-3 minutes', '8: Immediately strain oil through a fine-mesh strainer over the 13 russet potatoes', '9:  Add salt and 1 teaspoon black pepper to taste, and mix', '10: Shake the pot that the 13 russet potatoes are in so that they slam against all sides of the pot, this will loosen the outer layer of the 13 russet potatoes to form a mashed layer around each potato piece', '11: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C)', '12: Transfer 13 russet potatoes to a large rimmed 1 teaspoon baking sheet and separate them, spreading them out evenly', '13: Transfer to oven and roast, without moving, for 30-35 minutes', '14: Using a thin, flexible metal spatula flip 13 russet potatoes', '15:  Continue roasting until 13 russet potatoes are deep brown and crisp all over, turning and shaking them a few times during cooking, 30 to 40 minutes longer', '16: Transfer 13 russet potatoes to a large bowl and add the 2 tablespoons garlic-rosemary mixture (optional) and minced parsley', '17:  Toss to coat and season with more salt and 1 teaspoon black pepper to taste', '18:  Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['1 english cucumber diced', '4 roma tomatoes diced', '3 ripe avocados diced', '½ red onion diced', '¼ cup fresh cilantro (10 g) chopped', '1 lemon juiced', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil']
instructions: ['1: Slice then dice 1 english cucumber', '2: Slice then dice 4 roma tomatoes', '3: Slice avocado and carefully remove stone', '4:  Scoop out inside and dice', '5: Peel ½ red onion and remove tops', '6:  Then slice', '7: Chop ¼ cup fresh cilantro and place in a large salad bowl with previous ingredients', '8: Toss with 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, 1 lemon juice, salt and pepper', '9:  Serve in a bowl']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons oil', '1 red bell pepper sliced', '1 yellow bell pepper sliced', '1 large red onion sliced', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 lb ground turkey (455 g)', '1 tablespoon taco seasoning 1 packet', '28 oz diced tomato (795 g) 1 can drained', '2 cups rice (460 g) cooked', '1 can black beans drained rinsed', '1 can corn', '1 jar salsa', '1 lime sliced into wedges', 'cheddar cheese', 'fresh cilantro for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a 1 large skillet over medium-high heat', '2: Add the peppers and onions and season with 1 teaspoon salt and pepper, to taste', '3:  Cook, stirring occasionally, until vegetables have softened', '4:  Remove from pan, set aside', '5: Add 1 lb ground turkey to hot skillet', '6:  Break apart with a wooden spoon to separate', '7: Season with 1 tablespoon taco seasoning, stir, cooking until meat has browned and cooked through', '8: Stir in tomatoes', '9:  Bring to a gentle simmer for about 5 minutes', '10:  Remove from heat', '11: To assemble the 1 tablespoon taco bowls, add a base of 2 cups rice to 4 food storage containers', '12:  Top each with a scoop of 1 can black beans, 1 can corn, 1 jar salsa, cheddar cheese, cooked peppers and onions, and 1 tablespoon taco meat', '13:  Garnish with fresh cilantro and a 1 lime wedge', '14: Store in the refrigerator (and enjoy any extras immediately)', '15:  Can be kept refrigerated for up to 4 days']

ingredients: ['Grapefruit Simple Syrup', '¼ cup cold water (60 mL)', '¼ cup sugar (50 g)', '1 grapefruit peel', 'Cocktail', '3 cups mezcal (720 mL)', '¼ cup fresh lime juice (60 mL)', '8 cups grapefruit juice (1.9 L)', '8 cups ice (1.1 kg)', '1 can lemon-lime soda', '1 grapefruit cut into half-wheels']
instructions: ['1: Make the grapefruit simple syrup', '2:  In a small saucepan over medium heat, combine the ¼ cup cold water, ¼ cup sugar, and grapefruit peel', '3:  Bring to a simmer, then cook until the ¼ cup sugar is dissolved, 5–7 minutes', '4:  Remove the pot from heat and let the syrup cool completely', '5:  Transfer to an airtight container and refrigerate for at least 6 hours, or overnight, to let the grapefruit peels infuse the syrup', '6:  After infusing, remove the grapefruit peels and discard', '7: Make the cocktail: In a large glass pitcher, combine the 3 cups mezcal, ¼ cup fresh lime juice, grapefruit simple syrup, and grapefruit juice', '8:  Stir well to combine', '9: Just before serving, add the lemon-lime 1 can lemon-lime soda and 8 cups ice and stir well', '10: Pour into glasses and garnish with the grapefruit half-wheels']

ingredients: ['1 cup brussels sprouts (100 g) trimmed and halved', '5 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil divided', '1 teaspoon kosher salt plus more to taste', '¾ teaspoon pepper plus more to taste', '1 tablespoon brown mustard', '1 salmon fillet wild', '1 cup fresh arugula (20 g)', '½ lemon plus more to taste', '⅛ teaspoon mustard seed powder']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Spread the Brussels sprouts on a small baking sheet', '3:  Drizzle with 2 5 5 1 tablespoons of olive oil and season with ½ teaspoon salt and ½ teaspoon pepper', '4:  Toss to coat', '5: Bake for 45–50 minutes, or until the sprouts are browned and crispy', '6: While the Brussels are roasting, marinate the 1 salmon: In a small bowl, combine 1 5 1 tablespoon of olive oil, ⅛ teaspoon salt, ⅛ teaspoon pepper, and the brown mustard', '7: Place the 1 salmon, skin-side down, in a glass baking dish and pour the mustard mixture over it', '8:  Spread the mixture evenly over the 1 salmon, then marinate at room temperature for 20 minutes', '9: Just before the 1 salmon is finished marinating, prepare the 1 cup fresh arugula salad: In a medium bowl, toss the 1 cup fresh arugula with the ½ lemon juice, 1 5 1 tablespoon of olive oil, and ¼ teaspoon salt, or to taste', '10: Heat the remaining 5 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a medium pan over medium heat', '11:  Pan fry the 1 salmon for about 4 minutes on each side, or until cooked to your desired level of doneness', '12:  Transfer to a serving plate', '13: Sprinkle the Brussels sprouts with the mustard seed powder and plate with the 1 salmon and 1 cup fresh arugula', '14:  Squeeze a bit of ½ lemon juice over the 1 salmon']

ingredients: ['Tea', '8 cups boiling water (2 L)', '7 black tea bags', '1 ½ cups whiskey (360 mL)', 'Peach Simple Syrup', '2 fresh peaches diced', '1 cup sugar (200 g)', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '1 lemon juiced', 'Garnish', '1 fresh peach sliced', '1 lemon sliced', 'fresh mint']
instructions: ['1: In a large pitcher, pour hot water over 7 black tea bags letting steep 5 minutes', '2: Bring syrup ingredients to boil, then reduce heat to medium', '3: Strain syrup through a fine strainer to remove fruit pieces', '4: Add syrup and 1 ½ cups whiskey to 7 black tea, then chill until ready to serve', '5: Serve over ice, with sliced 2 fresh peaches, sliced lemons and a fresh mint sprig']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 chicken breasts cut into 1 inch (2cm) pieces', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '½ cup yellow onion (75 g) about half an onion diced', '2 cloves garlic about 1 tablespoon minced', '2 cups chicken broth (480 mL)', '3 cups water (720 mL)', '16 oz pasta shells (455 g)', '4 cups broccoli (1 kg) or one head of broccoli', '½ teaspoon cayenne powder', '¼ teaspoon nutmeg', '1 cup milk (240 mL)', '2 cups shredded cheddar cheese (200 g)']
instructions: ['1: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil on medium heat in a large pot', '2:  Add chicken breasts, season with salt and pepper, and allow the chicken to brown on one side', '3: Flip chicken, then add onions and 2 cloves garlic as the second side browns', '4: Once the chicken has browned on both sides, add chicken broth, 3 cups water, and 16 oz pasta to the pot', '5: Stir all ingredients, cover the pot with a lid, and bring to a boil', '6:  When it begins to boil, uncover and stir', '7:  Bring the heat to low, stir, then cover and let simmer for 20 minutes', '8: After 20 minutes has passed, uncover and add in the 4 cups broccoli', '9:  Stir continually as the 4 cups broccoli steams until the rest of the liquid evaporates', '10: Add 1 cup milk and 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese and stir until the cheese melts and you have a smooth cheese sauce', '11: Add salt and pepper (to taste), ½ teaspoon cayenne, and ¼ teaspoon nutmeg', '12:  Stir once more, then you’re ready to serve']

ingredients: ['Whole Wheat Sandwiches', 'whole wheat bread', 'mozzarella cheese sliced', 'cheddar cheese sliced', 'deli ham sliced', 'deli turkey sliced', 'condiment packet', 'Dry Snacks', 'wheat cracker', 'pretzel', '2 cups cheese cracker (125 g)', 'Wraps', 'whole wheat tortilla', 'lettuce chopped', 'cheddar cheese sliced', 'deli ham sliced', 'mozzarella cheese sliced', 'deli chicken sliced', 'condiment packet', 'Sides', 'strawberry sliced', 'blueberry', '¼ cup grape (25 g)', 'yellow bell pepper sliced', 'carrot sliced', 'red bell pepper sliced']
instructions: ['1: For the whole wheat sandwiches, assemble your desired combination of cheese and deli meat on slices of whole wheat bread', '2:  Pack the sandwiches in lunch containers with condiment packets', '3: For the wraps, place the lettuce and your desired assortment of cheese and deli meat on the whole wheat tortilla and wrap it closed', '4:  Cut the wrap in half and pack in lunch container with condiment packets', '5: For the dry snacks, store the wheat crackers, pretzels, and cheese crackers in individual snack containers', '6:  Store in the cupboard', '7: To assemble the lunch containers, fill with your desired assortments of sandwiches, wraps, fruit, and vegetables', '8:  Store in the fridge for up to 5 days', '9: To prepare for school in the morning, pack an insulated lunch container with one of the lunch containers, a snack container, and a bottle filled with your little one’s favorite drink']

ingredients: ['1 sheet puff pastry', '3 eggs scrambled', '6 pieces ham', '3 slices cheddar cheese', '1 egg for egg wash']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Cut the 1 sheet puff pastry into six rectangles and place on a nonstick baking tray', '3: On one rectangle, place a slice of 3 slices cheddar, 1 3 3 1 eggs scrambled 3 1 egg, and 2 6 pieces of ham', '4: Place a rectangle of pastry on top and seal the edges with a fork', '5: Repeat with remaining pastry rectangles', '6: Brush with 3 1 egg wash', '7: Bake for 15-20 minutes or until the pastry is flaky and golden']

ingredients: ['unsalted butter softened for greasing', 'Option1: Prepared Mix', '18 oz brownie mix (510 g) prepared according to package instructions', 'OPTION 2: From Scratch', '2 ¼ cups granulated sugar (450 g)', '1 ¼ cups dutch processed cocoa  powder (150 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 ½ cups all-purpose flour (190 g)', '1 cup vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '3 large eggs', '¼ cup water', 'Additions', '1 ½ cups chocolate chips (260 g)', '8 oz cream cheese', '⅓ cup granulated sugar (65 mL)', '1 large egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'vanilla ice cream for serving', 'rainbow sprinkle']
instructions: ['1: Position a rack in the center of the oven and preheat to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Grease a 9-by-13-inch (23-by-33-cm) dark metal pan with softened unsalted butter, then line with parchment paper, leaving overhang on all sides', '3:  Grease the parchment with more unsalted butter', '4: OPTION 1: If using prepared mix, make the 18 oz brownie batter according to the package instructions', '5: OPTION 2: If making the 18 oz brownie batter from scratch, in a large bowl, whisk together the sugar, 1 ¼ cups dutch processed cocoa powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon baking powder, and 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '6:  Add the 1 cup vegetable oil, vanilla, eggs, and ¼ cup water and whisk to combine', '7: Stir in the 1 ½ cups chocolate chunks', '8: In a medium bowl, whisk together the 8 oz vanilla ice cream cheese, sugar, egg, and vanilla', '9: Pour the 18 oz brownie batter into the prepared 1 teaspoon baking pan and smooth the top with a spatula', '10: Pour the 8 oz vanilla ice cream cheese mixture over the top and swirl into the batter with a knife or skewer', '11: Bake until lightly puffed on top, about 20 minutes', '12:  Transfer the 18 oz brownie pan to a wire rack and let cool completely, about 30 minutes', '13: Use the parchment paper to lift the cooled 18 oz brownies out of the pan and cut into 12 bars', '14: Serve with a scoop of ice 8 oz vanilla ice cream and a pinch of sprinkles']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon oil', '4 oz chorizo (110 g) chopped', '½ onion chopped', '1 lb ground beef (455 g)', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 teaspoons pepper', '3 cups tomato sauce (450 g)', '1 ¼ cups rotini pasta (250 g)', '½ cup parmesan cheese (50 g)', '½ cup fresh basil (12 g) chopped']
instructions: ['1: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large pot over medium-high heat', '2: Cook 4 oz chorizo until slightly crispy', '3: Add the onions and cook until translucent', '4: Add the 1 lb ground beef, 2 teaspoons salt, and 2 teaspoons pepper, cooking until no pink is showing', '5: Pour in the 3 cups tomato sauce, and cook until sauce thickens', '6: Add the 1 ¼ cups rotini pasta, ½ cup parmesan, and ½ cup fresh basil, stirring until the 1 ¼ cups rotini pasta is evenly coated']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 lb mushroom (455 g)', '1 tablespoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon salt', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 ½ cups vegetable stock (355 mL)', '1 cup water (235 mL)', '1 cup quinoa (170 g)', 'cheese of choice grated to serve']
instructions: ['1: In a medium-sized frying pan combine 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 lb mushrooms, 1 tablespoon dried thyme, and 1 teaspoon salt, then mix', '2:  Allow to cook about 5 minutes', '3: Add the 3 cloves garlic, cook for 6-8 more minutes minutes until 1 lb mushrooms are sufficiently cooked through and beginning to crisp up', '4:  Set 1 lb mushroom mixture aside', '5: Combine 1 ½ cups vegetable stock and 1 cup water in pan, bring to a boil, then add 1 cup quinoa and cover', '6:  Simmer for 12-15 minutes', '7: Add 1 lb mushroom mixture to 1 cup quinoa and garnish with grated cheese of your choice (optional)']

ingredients: ['Crust', '2 cups pecan (250 g)', '8 medjool dates pitted and skins removed chopped', '3 tablespoons coconut oil melted', '¼ teaspoon kosher salt', 'Pie Filling', '3 lb purple sweet potato (1.3 kg) about 3-4 medium potatoes', '12.2 oz evaporated coconut milk (360 mL) 1 can', '½ cup maple syrup (165 g)', '2 eggs', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 teaspoon nutmeg', '⅛ teaspoon ground cloves', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', 'Coconut Whipped Cream', '1 can coconut cream chilled', '½ tablespoon powdered sugar', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: Using a fork, pierce the 3 lb purple sweet potatoes all over', '4:  Set on the prepared baking sheet', '5: Bake the 3 lb purple sweet potatoes for 45-60 minutes, until very easily pierced with a fork', '6: Reduce the oven temperature to 350°F (180°C)', '7: Transfer the cooked 3 lb purple sweet potatoes to a wire rack', '8:  Let cool at room temperature for 30–60 minutes, then transfer to the refrigerator to cool completely, about 1 hour', '9: While the 3 lb purple sweet potatoes cool, make the crust: In a food processor, pulse the pecans until broken down into pea-sized pieces', '10:  Add the 8 medjool dates, coconut oil, and salt', '11:  Blend for 20–30 seconds, until crumb-like in texture', '12: Transfer the crust to a 9-inch pie dish', '13:  Using your fingers, press the crust into an even layer', '14:  Transfer the pie dish to the refrigerator to cool completely', '15: Once the 3 lb purple sweet potatoes have cooled completely, remove the skins', '16:  You should have about 4 2 cups of 3 lb purple sweet potato flesh', '17: Transfer the 3 lb purple sweet potatoes to a food processor, along with the 12', '18: 2 oz evaporated coconut milk, ½ cup maple syrup, 2 eggs, 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 1 teaspoon nutmeg, ⅛ teaspoon ground cloves, and salt', '19:  Blend for 60–90 seconds, until completely smooth', '20: Pour the filling into the cooled pie crust and use a spatula to smooth the top', '21: Bake the pie for 40–45 minutes, until the filling is set and slightly darkened in color', '22:  If the crust or filling is browning too quickly, cover with foil for the final 15 minutes of baking', '23:  Remove the pie from the oven and place on a wire rack to cool for about 30 minutes', '24:  Transfer to the refrigerator and cool completely, at least 2 hours, up to overnight', '25: While the pie cools, make the coconut whipped cream: Scoop the coconut cream that has solidified at the top of the can into a medium metal bowl, leaving behind any coconut water left in the bottom', '26:  Reserve the coconut water for another use', '27: Add the ½ tablespoon powdered sugar and ½ teaspoon vanilla to the bowl with the coconut cream', '28:  Whip with an electric hand mixer until soft peaks form', '29: Slice the pie and top with the coconut whipped cream']

ingredients: ['8 oz dried pasta (225 g) cooked', '15 oz chickpeas (425 g) 1 can drained and rinsed', '1 cup broccoli floret (150 g) steamed', '½ cup carrot (60 g) shredded', '½ cup red onion (75 g) sliced', '¼ cup fresh parsley (10 g)', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL)', '¼ cup red wine vinegar (60 mL)', '1 clove garlic minced', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 ½ cups cherry tomatoes (300 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a large mixing bowl, combine 8 oz dried pasta, 15 oz chickpeas, grape 1 ½ cups cherry tomatoes, broccoli, carrots, red onion, and parsley', '2: In a small liquid measuring cup, combine olive oil, red wine vinegar, 1 clove garlic,  1 teaspoon dried oregano, salt, and pepper, and whisk to combine', '3: Pour dressing over 8 oz dried pasta salad and stir until evenly distributed', '4: Transfer 8 oz dried pasta salad into 4 containers and refrigerate for up to 5 days']

ingredients: ['Squash', '1 spaghetti squash', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', 'Filling', '1 tablespoon oil', '3 cloves garlic minced', '½ yellow onion diced', '1 cup cherry tomato (200 g) halved', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '8 oz mini mozzarella ball (225 g)', 'fresh basil to garnish']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400ºF (200ºC)', '2: With a sharp knife, slice the squash in half', '3:  If the squash is too tough, puncture in several places forming a dotted line around the squash', '4:  Microwave for 3-5 minutes to soften', '5:  Allow to cool before cutting in half', '6: Scoop out the seeds, brush with oil, and sprinkle with salt, and pepper', '7:  Bake for 40-45 minutes, or until a fork can easily pierce the skin', '8: In a pan over medium heat, add the oil, 3 cloves garlic, and onions, and sautè until onions are translucent', '9: Add the 1 cup cherry tomatoes, salt, and pepper and simmer until they are cooked and begin to become softened', '10: Remove squash from the oven, with a fork pull at the edges to produce that stringy “spaghetti” quality', '11:  Add the squash to the tomato mixture and mix in the pan', '12: Add mixture back to the hollowed out 1 spaghetti squash halves', '13:  Top with 8 oz mini mozzarella balls ans fresh basil', '14: Bake an additional 5-10 minutes, or until cheese melts', '15: Serve in the squash, and top with fresh basil']

ingredients: ['1 lb sirloin steak (455 g) cut into cubes', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds', '1 tablespoon canola oil divided', '2 cups yellow onion (300 g)', '2 teaspoons pureed garlic', '1 tablespoon aji amarillo paste', '2 cups golden potato (450 g) diced', '1 cup carrot (120 g) diced', '2 cups water (480 mL)', '1 teaspoon chicken bouillon powder', '1 cup green peas (150 g)', '1 cup peruvian corn (175 g) choclo fresh or frozen', 'For Serving', 'peruvian-style rice or other cooked white rice', 'egg cooked sunny-side up', 'fresh parsley chopped']
instructions: ['1: Season the 1 lb sirloin steak with salt, pepper, and 1 teaspoon cumin', '2: Heat 1 tablespoon of canola oil in a medium pot over medium-high heat', '3:  Add the 1 lb sirloin steak and cook until browned, about 5-6 minutes', '4:  Remove the 1 lb sirloin steak from the pot and set aside', '5: Add the remaining tablespoon of oil to the pot, then add the 2 cups yellow onion and sauté until translucent, about 5-6 minutes', '6:   Add the 2 teaspoons pureed garlic and ají amarillo, and sauté for 3 minutes, until fragrant', '7: Return the 1 lb sirloin steak to the pot, then add the 2 cups water and 1 teaspoon chicken bouillon', '8:  Mix to dissolve the 1 teaspoon chicken bouillon powder', '9: Add the 2 cups golden potatoes and 1 cup carrots', '10:  Bring the stew to a simmer, cover, and cook for 10 minutes, or until the 2 cups golden potato and 1 cup carrot are peruvian-style rice or other egg cooked through', '11: Add the 1 cup green peas and Peruvian corn', '12:  Cook for another 5 minutes, or until the 1 cup green peas and corn are peruvian-style rice or other egg cooked through', '13: Serve the picante de carne with peruvian-style rice and sunny-side up eggs', '14:  Sprinkle chopped fresh parsley on top']

ingredients: ['3 cups cauliflower florets (450 g)', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', '3 carrots diced', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 lb large shrimp (455 g) peeled and deveined', '1 cup frozen peas (150 g) thawed', '2 eggs beaten', '3 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce', '½ teaspoon white pepper', 'green onion for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Pulse 3 cups cauliflower in a food processor until broken into rice-sized pieces', '2: Heat the 1 teaspoon sesame oil in a 1 lb large skillet or wok', '3:  Toss in the 3 carrots and sauté until soft, about 5 minutes', '4: Add in the 3 cloves garlic and shrimp and sautée until the shrimp begin to turn pink, about 2 minutes', '5: Add the 1 cup frozen peas and 3 cups cauliflower rice and mix until the 3 cups cauliflower has warmed through', '6: Move the contents of the pan to the side to create a well in the center', '7:   Pour in the 2 eggs and slowly scraped the cooked bits off the bottom of the pan to scramble the 2 eggs', '8:   Once the 2 eggs are almost finished cooking, mix everything in the pan together', '9: Season the 3 cups cauliflower with ½ teaspoon white pepper and 3 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce, give one last good mix to combine and serve with a garnish of sliced green onion']

ingredients: ['1 lb chicken wings (455 g)', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', 'Garlic Herb Sauce', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons garlic minced', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 tablespoon fresh parsley chopped', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2: Remove excess moisture from 1 lb chicken wings with a paper towel', '3: In a large bowl, stir in 2 teaspoons baking powder and salt until 1 lb chicken is thoroughly coated', '4: Bake on a 2 teaspoons baking rack for 1 hour, or until golden brown and crispy, flipping every 20 minutes', '5:  (For best results, place 2 teaspoons baking rack on a 2 teaspoons baking sheet covered with parchment paper or foil to catch drippings)', '6: In a skillet, heat 3 tablespoons olive oil and 2 tablespoons garlic on medium heat for about 30 seconds, or until 2 tablespoons garlic starts to release its flavor', '7: Stir in remaining herbs and spices', '8: Once combined, add in 1 lb chicken wings and stir until fully coated', '9: Serve with your favorite side dish or dipping sauce']

ingredients: ['6 slices bacon', '4 slices bread toasted', 'mayonnaise to taste', '1 beefsteak tomato sliced', '4 boston lettuces']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2:  Line a rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: Arrange the bacon on the prepared baking sheet and place in the oven', '4:  Bake to your desired level of crispiness, 12–15 minutes', '5:  Transfer the bacon to a paper towel-lined plate to drain', '6: On a cutting board, spread a generous layer of mayonnaise over each slice of bread', '7: Layer the sliced 1 beefsteak tomato, lettuce, and bacon over the mayonnaise on 2 slices of bread', '8:  Place the other slices of bread on top', '9:  Cut the sandwiches in half on the diagonal']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon oil', '1 onion chopped', '1 stalk celery chopped', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '¼ cup fresh basil (10 g)', '28 oz crushed tomato (795 g) 2 cans', '6 cups vegetable broth (1 ½ L)', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '2 sprigs fresh thyme']
instructions: ['1: Combine 1 tablespoon oil, 1 onion, 1 stalk celery, and 3 cloves garlic over medium heat in a large pot', '2:  Sauté for 3 minutes until 1 onions are translucent', '3: Add 1 teaspoon salt, ¼ teaspoon pepper, 2 tablespoons 28 oz 28 oz crushed tomato paste, ¼ cup fresh basil, 28 oz crushed 2 tablespoons 28 oz 28 oz crushed tomatoes, 6 cups vegetable broth, ½ teaspoon baking soda, and 2 sprigs fresh thyme', '4:  Bring to a boil', '5: Lower heat and cover, simmering for 15 minutes', '6: Uncover and remove 2 sprigs fresh thyme', '7: Use an immersion or countertop blender to blend the soup until smooth', '8: Allow to cool 2 minutes and serve topped with ¼ cup fresh basil']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons earl grey tea', '¼ teaspoon culinary lavender', '½ cup hot water (120 mL)', '¾ cup milk (180 mL)', '¼ teaspoon vanilla extract', '½ tablespoon agave nectar optional', 'ground cinnamon for disting']
instructions: ['1: Steep the 2 tablespoons earl grey ¼ ¼ tea and ¼ ¼ teaspoon culinary lavender in the ½ cup hot water for 7 minutes', '2: Froth the ¾ cup milk by adding it to a resealable jar', '3:  Shake vigorously until many bubbles form', '4:  Then, microwave the ¾ cup milk for 45 seconds to 1 minute, which will help create stable bubbles', '5: Remove the 2 tablespoons earl grey ¼ ¼ tea, then stir in the frothed ¾ cup milk, ¼ teaspoon vanilla, and ½ tablespoon agave', '6: Dust with a bit of ground cinnamon, if desired', '7: Enjoy!Nutrition, per serving - Calories: 93, Total fat: 2 grams, Sodium: 69 mg, Total carb: 14 grams, Dietary fiber: 0 gram, Sugars: 6 grams, Protein: 4 grams']

ingredients: ['Marinade', '14 oz extra firm tofu (395 g)', '1 lemon', '1 cup yogurt (245 g)', '6 cloves garlic minced', '1 tablespoon ginger minced', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 teaspoons cumin', '2 teaspoons garam masala', '2 teaspoons paprika', 'Sauce', '3 tablespoons oil', '1 large onion finely chopped', '2 tablespoons ginger minced', '8 cloves garlic minced', '2 teaspoons cumin', '2 teaspoons turmeric', '2 teaspoons coriander powder', '2 teaspoons paprika', '2 teaspoons chili powder', '2 teaspoons garam masala', '3 ½ cups tomato sauce (800 g) or crushed tomatoes', '1 ¼ cups water (300 mL)', '1 cup heavy cream (250 mL) or dairy substitute of your choice', 'fresh coriander chopped to garnish', 'rice to serve', 'naan bread to serve']
instructions: ['1: Remove 14 oz extra firm tofu from packaging and drain', '2: Place 14 oz extra firm tofu on a couple of paper towels and find a 1 cup heavy object to place on top of 14 oz extra firm tofu, leave it there for 20 minutes', '3: Slice the 14 oz extra firm tofu into bite-sized pieces', '4: Combine the marinade ingredients in a bowl then add the 14 oz extra firm tofu', '5: Mix until evenly coated', '6:  Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour', '7: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C)Place the marinated 14 oz extra firm tofu pieces on bamboo skewers, then place them over a baking tray lined with parchment paper', '8:  Make sure there is space underneath the 14 oz extra firm tofu to help distribute the heat more evenly', '9: Bake for about 15 minutes, until slightly dark brown on the edges', '10: Heat 3 tablespoons oil in a 1 large pot over medium heat, and sauté the onions, ginger, and garlic until tender but not browned', '11: Add the spices for about 30 seconds to release their aromatics and flavor, stirring constantly', '12: Add the 3 ½ cups tomato sauce and 1 ¼ cups water, then bring to a boil and cook for about 5 minutes', '13: Pour in the cream and mix in the 14 oz extra firm tofu, cooking for another 1-2 minutes', '14: Serve with rice and naan bread']

ingredients: ['unsalted butter for greasing', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 sweet yellow onion diced', '3 cloves garlic thinly sliced', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 red bell pepper seeded and diced', '1 yellow bell pepper seeded and diced', '2 cups honey ham (300 g) diced', '24 hawaiian sweet rolls cut into 1 in (2 1/2 cm) cubes toasted', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '3 large eggs', '1 cup chicken stock (240 mL)', '4 tablespoons unsalted butter melted', 'Coconut Topping', '½ cup unsweetened coconut flakes (50 g) shredded', '1 tablespoon poppy seeds', '2 oranges juiced', 'For Garnish', '3 scallions thinly sliced', '2 orange zests']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2:  Grease a 9 x 13-inch (22 x 33 cm)  baking dish with butter', '3: In a 3 large skillet, heat the 2 tablespoons vegetable oil over medium heat', '4:  Add the onion and sauté, stirring occasionally, until translucent and starting to caramelize, 15–20 minutes', '5:  Reduce the heat to medium-low if the onion starts to burn', '6: Add the 3 cloves garlic and red ½ teaspoon red 1 red bell 1 yellow bell 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper flakes and continue to cook until the 3 cloves garlic is fragrant, about 5 minutes', '7: Add the red and yellow bell ½ teaspoon red 1 red bell 1 yellow bell 1 teaspoon freshly ground black peppers and 2 cups honey ham to the pan and cook for about 5 minutes, stirring frequently, until the ½ teaspoon red 1 red bell 1 yellow bell 1 teaspoon freshly ground black peppers are tender', '8: Transfer the toasted Hawaiian rolls to a very 3 large bowl', '9:  Pour the onion and 2 cups honey ham mixture over the bread cubes and season with the 2 teaspoons kosher salt and ½ teaspoon red 1 red bell 1 yellow bell 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '10: In a medium bowl or liquid measuring cup, whisk together the eggs, chicken stock, and melted butter until well combined', '11: Pour about ½ cup (120 ml) of the stock mixture at a time over the bread mixture and stir until well combined', '12: Transfer the stuffing mixture to the prepared baking dish', '13:  Gently press the mixture down so the stuffing sits below the rim of the dish', '14:  Cover with foil', '15: Bake the stuffing for 45 minutes', '16: While the stuffing bakes, make the topping: In a small bowl, combine the shredded coconut, 1 tablespoon poppy seeds, and 2 2 orange juice and mix well', '17:  Stir every 10  minutes or so as the stuffing bakes', '18: Uncover the stuffing and top with the soaked coconut mixture, sprinkling evenly over the entire surface', '19:  Leave any excess 2 2 orange juice behind in the bowl', '20: Return the stuffing to the oven and bake until the coconut is light golden brown and crisp, 10–15 minutes', '21: Remove the stuffing from the oven and let rest for 10–15 minutes, then top with the 3 scallions and 2 2 orange zest', '22: Serve warm']

ingredients: ['2 oranges peeled and halved', '12 oz fresh strawberry  (340 g) quartered', '2 mangoes chopped', '4 kiwis peeled and chopped or sliced', 'Dressing', '3 tablespoons lime juice', '1 tablespoon maple syrup']
instructions: ['1: Combine all the ingredients above in a large bowl', '2: Mix the dressing ingredients together and spread over fruit, mix well']

ingredients: ['3 large eggs', '2 cups buttermilk (480 mL)', '2 ¼ cups all-purpose flour (280 g)', '3 cups cornmeal (450 g)', '3 teaspoons salt', '¼ cup sugar', '2 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '2 teaspoons baking soda', '1 cup shredded cheddar cheese (100 g)', '½ cup butter (115 g) plus more for serving', 'honey for serving']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C)', '2:  Place a 3 large cast iron skillet in the oven while it preheats', '3: In a medium bowl, whisk together the eggs and 2 cups 2 cups ½ cup buttermilk until well combined', '4: In a 3 large bowl, whisk together the 2 ¼ cups all-purpose flour, 3 cups cornmeal, 3 teaspoons salt, ¼ cup sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese', '5: Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir with a rubber spatula until just incorporated', '6: Carefully remove the hot skillet from the oven and add the 2 cups ½ cup butter', '7:  Once the 2 cups ½ cup butter melts, add the cornbread batter and spread in an even layer', '8: Bake for 20–25 minutes, until golden brown on top', '9: Slice and top with 2 cups ½ cup butter and honey']

ingredients: ['¼ cup brown rice (50 g)', '1 teaspoon salt divided', '¾ cup water (180 mL)', '4 oz flank steak (115 g) thinly sliced', '1 small red onion thinly sliced', '1 red bell pepper thinly sliced lengthwise', '1 tablespoon lime juice', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '¾ teaspoon chili powder', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 tablespoons fresh cilantro chopped', '1 lime cut into wedges']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 450˚F (230˚C)', '2: Place the ¼ cup brown rice in a sieve and rinse under cold ¾ cup water to remove excess starch', '3: Transfer the ¼ cup brown rice to a 1 small pot with 1 teaspoon salt and ¾ cup water and bring to a boil over high heat', '4:  Reduce to a simmer, put a lid on, and cook until ¾ cup water is absorbed, about 45 minutes', '5: In a bowl, add the skirt 4 oz flank steak, 1 small 1 red 1 small 1 red 1 teaspoon onion, bell pepper, lime juice, 1 small 1 red 1 teaspoon onion powder, ¾ teaspoon chili powder, ½ teaspoon ground black pepper, and remaining 1 teaspoon salt and toss until well combined', '6: Transfer to a parchment paper-lined sheet tray and bake for 12 to 15 minutes', '7: Serve 4 oz flank steak over ¼ cup brown rice and top with 2 tablespoons fresh cilantro and lime wedges']

ingredients: ['1 cup water (240 mL)', '1 tea bag chamomile', '1 teaspoon culinary lavender plus more for garnish', '1 tablespoon honey', '2 oz whiskey (60 mL)', '1 lemon wedge for squeezing plus 1 slice for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Combine the 1 cup water, 1 1 tea bag, and 1 teaspoon culinary lavender buds in a small saucepan over medium-high heat', '2:  Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer for 3-4 minutes, until the liquid is slightly reduced and the 1 teaspoon culinary lavender is fragrant', '3:  Strain to remove 1 teaspoon culinary lavender buds', '4: In a mug, stir to combine the strained 1 1 tea, 1 tablespoon honey, and 2 oz whiskey', '5:  Finish with a squeeze of 1 lemon and garnish with a 1 lemon slice and a few 1 teaspoon culinary lavender buds']
