a paste', '8:  Add the goat cheese and stir to combine, then add the vegetables and toss to coat', '9:  Season with salt and pepper', '10: Use immediately to fill the crepes, or store in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 3 days', '11: If making the sweet filling: In a small bowl, stir together the ricotta, strawberries, blackberries, lemon zest, and 1 tablespoon honey', '12: Use immediately to fill crepes, or store in an airtight container in the refrigerator up to 3 days', '13: Make the crepes: In a 6 large bowl, combine the eggs, coconut milk, coconut flour, coconut oil, and salt', '14: Using an immersion blender, blend the ingredients to form a smooth batter, scraping down the sides of the bowl as needed', '15: Preheat a 9-inch (22 cm) nonstick skillet or crepe pan over medium heat', '16:  Add just enough oil to coat the pan, about ½ teaspoon', '17:  Swirl the pan to coat evenly', '18: Add ½ cup batter to the hot pan and swirl the pan around again until the batter evenly coats the bottom all the way to the edges', '19:  Cook for 4-5 minutes, or until the bottom of the crepe is golden brown in spots and the top is completely cooked through with no raw batter on the surface', '20: Add ¼ cup of your preferred filling to the top left quarter of the crepe', '21:  Using a small spatula or spoon, evenly spread the filling over that section, leaving a ½-inch (1 ¼ cm) border along the outside edge', '22: Fold the bottom half of the crepe over the top half, then fold the right (unfilled) side over the left side to form a triangle', '23:  Use a rubber spatula to gently transfer the crepe to a plate', '24:  Repeat with the remaining batter and filling', '25: Garnish the savory crepes with more 2 teaspoons fresh thyme and the sweet crepes with whipped cream, quartered strawberries, blackberries, and 1 tablespoon honey']

ingredients: ['Donut', '1 ½ cups milk (360 mL) warm to the touch', '1 cup sugar (200 g)', '½ oz yeast (15 g)', '1 stick unsalted butter soft ', '3 eggs', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '5 cups flour (625 g) sifted', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', 'shortening for frying', 'Glaze', '3 cups powdered sugar (360 g)', '1 cup dry milk powder (70 g)', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '½ cup water (120 mL) hot']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, add the 1 ½ cups 1 cup 1 cup dry milk, 1 cup 3 cups 3 cups powdered sugar, and ½ oz yeast, stirring to combine', '2: In a separate medium bowl, add the 1 stick unsalted butter, 3 eggs, and vanilla extract, stirring to combine', '3: Add the 1 ½ cups 1 cup 1 cup dry milk mixture to the egg mixture and whisk to combine', '4:  Transfer to a large bowl and add the 5 cups flour in thirds, stirring between each addition', '5: Dump the dough onto a lightly 5 cups floured surface and knead for 5 minutes, until smooth', '6:  Gently poke the dough with a finger--the dough should bounce back up from the indentation', '7: Place the dough in a large bowl, and lightly coat the dough with 1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '8:  Cover the bowl with plastic wrap', '9: Let the dough rise in a warm place for an hour, or until doubled in size', '10: Take the dough out and knead on a 5 cups floured surface for 5 minutes until smooth', '11:  Place the dough in an 1 tablespoon vegetable oiled bowl and repeat with rise overnight in refrigerator', '12: Roll out the dough on a 5 cups floured surface until ¼ inch (6 mm) thick', '13: Cut out the doughnuts and donut holes with a cookie cutter and piping tip', '14: Melt enough shortening over medium heat to come up just 2 inches (5 cm) up on the side of a heavy frying pan', '15:  Heat the shortening to 375°F (190°C)Fry the donuts and donut holes for 45 seconds on each side, or until golden brown', '16: In a bowl, combine the 3 cups powdered 1 cup 3 cups 3 cups powdered sugar, 1 cup dry 1 ½ cups 1 cup 1 cup dry milk powder, vanilla extract and hot ½ cup water until smooth', '17: Strain the glaze through a fine-mesh sieve to remove any lumps', '18: Dunk the donuts in the glaze or drizzle the glaze on top']

ingredients: ['parchment paper or aluminium foil 12x18 inches (30.5 x 46 cm)', '1 chicken breast', '½ zucchini sliced', '1 clove garlic minced', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons Parmesan', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Fold the parchment paper in half, then open up', '3: Slice the ½ zucchini into rounds and lay them on one half of the parchment paper', '4: Mix the minced 1 clove garlic and 2 tablespoons butter in a small bowl and spoon half of the 1 clove garlic 2 tablespoons butter on top of the ½ zucchini', '5:  Sprinkle with salt and pepper', '6: Lay the 1 chicken on the ½ zucchini, season with salt and pepper and spoon on the rest of the 1 clove garlic 2 tablespoons butter', '7:  Top with parmesan', '8: Fold the parchment paper over the 1 chicken, and cinch the paper together by folding it over itself along the edges', '9: Bake for 25-30 minutes or until internal temperature of 1 chicken reaches 165˚F (75˚C)']

ingredients: ['4 cups watermelon (700 g)', '3 stalks celery cut into 6-inch (15 cm) pieces ', '½ lime', 'blackberry enough to cover bottom half of watermelon as "charcoal"', 'assorted fruit', 'Special Equipment', '10 wooden skewers', 'Preparation', '4 cups watermelon (700 g)', '3 stalks celery cut into 6-inch (15 cm) pieces ', '½ lime', 'blackberry enough to cover bottom half of watermelon as "charcoal"', 'assorted fruit', 'Special Equipment', '10 wooden skewers', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Using a melon baller or half teaspoon, make three divots in the bottom of the watermelon that are slightly smaller than the circumference of the celery stalks', '2: Cut the watermelon in half, with the bottom side of the “grill” being slightly larger than the “lid” side', '3: Hollow out the watermelon halves using either a melon baller or spoon', '4:  Save the pieces for the fruit skewers', '5: Insert the celery into each divot on the bottom half of the watermelon and secure with a toothpick if needed', '6: Insert 3 wooden skewers into the watermelon half along its top edge to start assembling the “grill”, spacing about ½-inch (1 ½ cm) apart', '7:  Cut the skewers as needed', '8: Fill the grill with blackberries, which will act as your charcoal', '9: Finish inserting the rest of the skewers to complete the bottom half of the grill', '10: Take the hollowed top half of the watermelon and toothpick a lime half to make the grill lid', '11: Assemble your fruit skewers and get “grilling”!Add two skewers into the rim of the bottom half of the watermelon so that the lid can rest on it']

ingredients: ['Tia’s Cornbread', '¼ cup unsalted butter (55 g) melted', '1 cup yellow cornmeal (140 g)', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '1 tablespoon sugar', '½ teaspoon kosher salt (120 g)', '1 cup buttermilk (240 mL)', '½ cup corn kernel (85 g)', '¼ cup honey (85 g)', '2 large eggs', "1 box cornbread mix optional if you do not want to do Tia's cornbread prepared according to box instructions and cut into cubes.", 'Cornbread Stuffing', '4 cups white bread (140 g) we used an Italian loaf cubed', '4 tablespoons unsalted butter', '1 onion diced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '3 stalks celery diced', '½ head fennel head diced', 'salt to taste', '2 green apples peeled and diced', '½ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 lb Italian sausage (455 g) casing removed', '¼ cup fresh parsley (10 g) minced', '2 tablespoons fresh sage', '3 cups chicken broth (720 mL) or chicken stock']
instructions: ['1: First, make Tia’s Cornbread at least one day before serving the stuffing', '2: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '3:  Generously grease a 9-inch (23 cm) baking pan with 1 tablespoon of ¼ cup unsalted 1 cup 4 tablespoons unsalted butter', '4: In a small bowl, mix the 1 cup yellow 1 cup yellow ½ cup  "1 box cornmeal, flour, baking powder, sugar and salt', '5:  In another bowl, whisk together the melted ¼ cup unsalted 1 cup 4 tablespoons unsalted butter, ¼ cup unsalted 1 cup 1 cup 4 tablespoons unsalted buttermilk, 1 cup yellow ½ cup  "1 box corn, ¼ cup honey and eggs', '6:  Using a rubber spatula, add the wet ingredients to the dry and mix just until combined', '7:  Do not overmix', '8: Pour the batter into the prepared pan', '9:  Bake until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, 20 to 22 minutes', '10:  Let cool for at least 1 hour, then cut into 1-inch cubes for the stuffing', '11: For the stuffing, start by cutting the 1 cup yellow ½ cup  "1 box  "1 box cornbread into cubes', '12: Spread 4 cups of white bread cubes and 4 cups of the 1 cup yellow ½ cup  "1 box  "1 box cornbread cubes in a single layer on a baking sheet and leave out overnight to dry out', '13: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '14:  Grease a 13x9x2-inch (33x23x2 cm) baking dish with ¼ cup unsalted 1 cup 4 tablespoons unsalted butter and set aside', '15: Transfer the bread cubes to a 2 large bowl', '16: In a 2 large sauté pan set over medium-high heat, melt 2 tablespoons ¼ cup unsalted 1 cup 4 tablespoons unsalted butter', '17:  Add the 1 onion, 2 cloves garlic, 3 stalks celery, ½ head fennel and sprinkle with the salt and cook until the vegetables are translucent, about 5 minutes', '18: Add the mixture to the bowl of bread and mix', '19: In the same sauté pan, add the remaining 2 tablespoons ¼ cup unsalted 1 cup 4 tablespoons unsalted butter and let brown for 30 seconds', '20:  Add the 2 green apples and ½ teaspoon ground nutmeg and sauté until the 2 green apples are tender, 3 to 4 minutes', '21: Add the 2 green apples to the bread bowl and mix', '22: Add the 1 lb Italian sausage to the pan and cook, breaking it up as it browns, 8 to 10 minutes', '23: Transfer the 1 lb Italian sausage to the bread bowl and mix', '24: Mix in the ¼ cup fresh parsley and sage', '25: Transfer the bread mixture to the ¼ cup unsalted 1 cup 4 tablespoons unsalted buttered baking dish', '26: Pour the chicken stock around the edges of the baking dish', '27: Put the baking dish on the middle oven rack and bake at 400°F (200°C), uncovered for 40 minutes, until golden brown']

ingredients: ['2 lb bacon (910 g) cookedchopped', '3 ½ cups shredded cheddar cheese (350 g) divided', '½ cup green onion (75 g) diced', '1 small onion diced', '2 teaspoons garlic powder', '6 eggs', '1 ½ cups milk (360 mL)', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '8 medium flour tortillas', 'fresh cilantro to serve', 'avocado sliced to serve', '1 cup grape tomato (200 g) halved to serve', 'salsa to serve']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, combine 2 lb bacon, 2 cups (200 grams) of cheese, onions, and 2 teaspoons garlic powder', '2:  Distribute half of the mixture to a 1 small bowl', '3: Spoon a heaping spoonful of 2 lb bacon mixture at the bottom of each tortilla', '4: Fold the ends of the tortilla over the mixture and continue to roll, tightly', '5: Place tortillas seam side down into a greased casserole dish', '6: In 8 medium bowl, whisk together remaining 2 lb bacon mixture, 6 6 eggs, milk, 1 teaspoon salt, and ½ teaspoon pepper', '7: Pour egg mixture over the top of the rolled tortillas', '8: Cover with foil, and store in fridge overnight, or until ready to bake', '9: Preheat oven to 350°F (180˚C)', '10: Bake enchiladas for 35-40 minutes, or until 6 eggs are fully cooked', '11: Remove the foil and top enchiladas with 1 ½ cups (150 grams) of shredded cheese', '12: Bake for an additional 5 minutes, or until cheese is melted', '13: Top with fresh cilantro and avocado, if desired', '14: Serve warm with tomatoes and salsa, if desired']

ingredients: ['Dough', '1 ¼ cups warm water (300 mL)', '2 teaspoons sugar', '2 ¼ teaspoons active dry yeast', '3 ¼ cups all purpose flour (405 g) plus more for dusting', '¾ cup cornmeal (110 g)', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', '¼ cup unsalted butter (55 g) melted and cooled', 'olive oil for greasing', 'Sauce', '2 cans whole San Marzano tomatoes', '2 teaspoons sugar', '¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '4 cloves garlic grated', '¼ cup fresh basil (10 g) sliced', 'Assembly', '1 tablespoon unsalted butter', '8 oz white mushroom (225 g) sliced', 'kosher salt to taste', '¼ teaspoon whole fennel seeds', '4 oz Italian sausage (115 g)', '16 oz shredded low moisture mozzarella cheese (455 g)', '¼ cup shredded parmesan cheese (25 g)']
instructions: ['1: Make the dough: Add the 1 ¼ cups warm water and sugar to a large liquid measuring cup', '2:  Sprinkle in the yeast and let bloom for 5 minutes, until foamy', '3: In a large bowl, whisk together the 3 ¼ cups all purpose flour, cornmeal, and salt', '4:  Add the yeast mixture and melted ¼ cup unsalted 1 tablespoon unsalted butter, and stir with a rubber spatula until a shaggy dough forms', '5: Turn the dough out onto a 3 ¼ cups all purpose floured surface and knead for about 5 minutes, until the dough comes together into a soft ball and bounces back when pressed with a finger', '6:  Grease a large bowl with olive oil', '7:  Then transfer the dough to the bowl, cover with plastic wrap, and let rise in a 1 ¼ cups warm spot until doubled in size, 1–2 hours', '8: Make the sauce: Pour the 2 cans whole San Marzano tomatoes into a fine-mesh sieve set over a bowl', '9:  Let the juices drain', '10:  Then use your hands to gently crush 2 cans whole San Marzano tomatoes and let any excess liquid drip into a bowl', '11:  Discard the juices', '12:  Transfer the crushed 2 cans whole San Marzano tomatoes to a medium saucepan and add the sugar, ¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes, salt, olive oil, and 4 cloves garlic', '13:  Stir to combine', '14:  Bring to 16 oz shredded low boil over medium heat and cook for 15 minutes, until most of the liquid has evaporated', '15:  Remove the pot from the heat and stir in the basil', '16:  Set aside to cool while you prepare the rest of the toppings', '17: Melt the ¼ cup unsalted 1 tablespoon unsalted butter in a medium skillet over medium-high heat', '18:  Add the mushrooms and cook, stirring occasionally, until browned, about 5 minutes', '19:  Season with salt and remove the pan from the heat', '20: Add the ¼ teaspoon whole fennel seeds to a small 2 ¼ teaspoons active dry skillet over medium heat', '21:  Toast until fragrant and starting to brown, 3–4 minutes', '22:  Transfer the ¼ teaspoon whole fennel seeds to a cutting board and coarsely chop', '23: Add the ¼ teaspoon whole fennel seeds to a medium bowl with the Italian 4 oz Italian sausage and mix to incorporate', '24:  Transfer the 4 oz Italian sausage to a large sheet of parchment paper', '25:  Top with another sheet of parchment and roll the 4 oz Italian sausage into a 9-inch patty', '26: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C)', '27: ', '28:  Once the dough has risen, turn out onto a lightly 3 ¼ cups all purpose floured surface', '29:  Cut the dough in half', '30:  Wrap one half in plastic wrap, place in a resealable zip-top bag, and freeze for up to 1 month', '31: Generously grease a 10-inch cast iron skillet with olive oil all over the sides and bottom', '32:  Transfer the remaining dough to the pan and use your hands to press evenly against the bottom and up the sides', '33: Tear the mozzarella into pieces and evenly scatter over the dough', '34:  Top with the sautéed mushrooms, then the tomato sauce', '35:  Use the parchment to place the 4 oz Italian sausage patty on top of the sauce', '36:  Sprinkle with the Parmesan', '37: Place the skillet on a baking sheet to catch any drips', '38:  Then transfer to the oven and bake for 35–40 minutes, until the crust is lightly browned and the 4 oz Italian sausage is cooked through', '39: Let cool slightly', '40:  Then carefully remove the pizza from the skillet, slice, and serve']

ingredients: ['Vanilla Simple Syrup', '½ cup granulated sugar (100 g)', '1 Private Selection® Madagascar Vanilla Bean', '½ cup water (120 mL)', 'London Fog', '8 oz London dry gin (225 g)', '3 cups Private Selection® Cold Brew Blueberry Lavender Black Tea (720 mL)', '1 ½ cups oat milk (360 mL)', 'ice for serving', '4 slices lemon for garnish', '4 lavenders for garnish', 'Preparation', 'Vanilla Simple Syrup', '½ cup granulated sugar (100 g)', '1 Private Selection® Madagascar Vanilla Bean', '½ cup water (120 mL)', 'London Fog', '8 oz London dry gin (225 g)', '3 cups Private Selection® Cold Brew Blueberry Lavender Black Tea (720 mL)', '1 ½ cups oat milk (360 mL)', 'ice for serving', '4 slices lemon for garnish', '4 lavenders for garnish', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Make the vanilla simple syrup: Add the sugar to a small bowl', '2:  Use a paring knife to split the Private Selection® Madagascar Vanilla Bean lengthwise, then scrape out the seeds', '3:  Add the vanilla bean seeds to the sugar and use your fingers to combine', '4: Add the vanilla sugar, scraped vanilla bean, and water to a small saucepan', '5:  Bring to a boil over medium-high heat, then reduce the heat to low and simmer, stirring occasionally, until the sugar has dissolved', '6:  Remove the pot from the heat and let the syrup cool to room temperature before transferring to an airtight container with a lid', '7:  The syrup will keep in the refrigerator for up to 1 month', '8: Make the London fog: In a large pitcher, combine the gin, 2–3 tablespoons vanilla simple syrup, the Private Selection® Cold Brew Blueberry Lavender Black Tea, and oat milk', '9:  Add more simple syrup to taste, if needed', '10: Fill 4 glasses with ice and divide the London fog evenly between the glasses', '11:  Garnish each glass with a lemon slice and a lavender sprig', '12:  Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['1 spaghetti squash', 'olive oil', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '4 cups asparagus (500 g)', '2 cups cherry tomato (400 g)', '3 cloves garlic', '1 tablespoon dried basil', '3 boneless skinless chicken breasts', '¼ cup pesto (60 g)', '½ cup marinara sauce (130 g) divided', '2 oz mozzarella cheese (55 g) sliced and divided', 'fresh basil chopped to serve']
instructions: ['1: Using a fork or sharp knife, carefully poke holes down one side of 1 spaghetti squash', '2: Microwave the 1 spaghetti squash for 5 minutes to soften', '3:  Let cool to room temperature', '4: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '5: Cut the 1 spaghetti squash in half lengthwise and remove seeds using a spoon', '6: Place 1 spaghetti squash on a baking pan face up', '7:  Coat the inside of the squash with olive oil and season with salt and pepper', '8:  Flip the squash over so that the rims are face-down on the pan', '9: Bake for 30-45 minutes, or until squash reaches desired tenderness', '10: While the squash is in the oven, prepare a second baking sheet with 4 cups asparagus, 2 cups cherry tomatoes, olive oil, salt, pepper, 3 cloves garlic and basil', '11:  Combine until vegetables are evenly coated with seasoning', '12: Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until vegetables have reached desired tenderness', '13: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat', '14:  Add the 3 boneless skinless chicken breasts and season with salt and pepper', '15:  Cook the 3 boneless skinless chicken, stirring occasionally, until sides become browned and the center is no longer pink', '16:  Remove from heat and set aside', '17: Once 1 spaghetti squash has cooled down enough to handle, use a fork to shred apart the squash into noodles', '18:  Distribute evenly into four glass containers', '19: Add 2 tablespoons of pesto to two of the containers', '20: Add ¼ cup (65g) of marinara to the other two containers', '21:  Top with 2 oz mozzarella', '22: Distribute cooked vegetables and 3 boneless skinless chicken evenly between all four containers', '23: Seal containers with secure lids and store in the fridge for up to 4 days', '24: When ready to serve, reheat and stir everything together to distribute sauce', '25: Garnish with basil, and enjoy!']

ingredients: ['1 cup sweet potato (200 g) diced', '1 cup red potato (225 g) diced', '1 cup red onion (150 g) chopped', '1 cup brussel sprout (100 g) quartered', '1 cup green beans (360 g) chopped', '1 cup carrot (120 g) chopped', 'olive oil to taste', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '½ tablespoon dried thyme', '1 tablespoon fresh rosemary chopped', '¼ cup dijon mustard (60 g)', '¼ cup honey (85 g)', '3 cloves garlic minced', '4 chicken thighs']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '2: Place the 1 cup sweet potato, red potato, red onion, Brussels sprouts, 1 cup green beans, and carrots on the baking sheet in separate piles', '3:  Drizzle everything with olive oil, then sprinkle with salt, pepper, ½ tablespoon dried thyme, and 1 tablespoon fresh rosemary', '4:  Rub the seasoning into the vegetables until evenly coated and spread flat on the baking sheet, keeping the vegetables separate', '5:  Set aside', '6: In a small bowl, combine the ¼ cup dijon mustard, ¼ cup honey, 3 cloves garlic, salt, and pepper, and whisk until smooth', '7:  Set aside', '8: Place the 4 chicken thighs skin-side down in a greased cast-iron skillet', '9:  Season with salt and pepper, then brush generously with the ¼ cup honey-mustard sauce', '10:  Flip the 4 chicken thighs over and repeat, seasoning with salt and pepper, then brushing with the rest of the ¼ cup honey-mustard sauce', '11: Place the vegetables and the 4 chicken in the oven on separate racks', '12:  Bake for 30 minutes or until 4 chicken reaches an internal temperature of 165°F (75°C) ', '13:  (Optional: Remove the vegetables once cooked and broil the 4 chicken for 1-2 minutes, or until the skin crisps up', '14: )Let everything cool, then distribute into resealable containers, mixing up the combination of vegetables so that you get something a little different each day', '15: Cover and refrigerate for up to 4 days']

ingredients: ['FOR THE SALAD:', '1 head medium napa cabbage', '1 small red onion thinly sliced', '3 vine ripe tomatoes diced into large cubes', '1 persian cucumber sliced', '3 pita breads cut into wedges', '4 oz cow’s milk feta (115 g) crumbled', '6 Radishes sliced', "2 teaspoons za'atar", '1 tablespoon sumac spice', '¼ cup fresh mint (10 g) chopped', '¼ cup fresh parsley (10 g) chopped', '⅛ cup dill (1.5 g) chopped', 'FOR THE DRESSING:', '2 lemons', '2 oz red wine vinegar (55 g)', '2 tablespoons whole grain mustard', '1 teaspoon pink salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '3 oz extra virgin olive oil (75 g)', '1 teaspoon sumac spice', "2 teaspoons za'atar"]
instructions: ['1: Preheat the grill and preheat the oven to 375°F', '2: Cut 1 head medium napa cabbage in half lengthwise, brush lightly with 3 oz extra virgin olive oil, and proceed to grill until deeply charred', '3:  Immediately place in the fridge to avoid cooking the 1 head medium napa cabbage any further', '4: Cut 3 pita bread into 1 small wedges and toss with 2 tbsp 3 oz extra virgin olive oil and 1 teaspoon pink salt', '5:  Place on a cookie sheet pan and place in the oven for about 7-10 minutes, or until crisp and toasted', '6:  Cool on a rack on the counter', '7: Prepare salad ingredients and place all in a 3 vine ripe tomatoes diced into large bowl, including the grilled 1 head medium napa cabbage and toasted 3 pita wedges', '8: Place all dressing ingredients in a glass jar and shake vigorously prior to dressing the salad', '9: Add the amount of desired dressing to the salad and toss', '10:  Taste and adjust seasoning as needed', '11: Serve']

ingredients: ['nonstick cooking spray for greasing', '1 can refrigerated pizza dough', '1 cup cooked chicken (125 g) diced', '¼ cup Frank’s Red Hot® Sauce (60 mL)', '1 cup shredded white cheddar cheese (100 g)', '5 strips bacon cooked and chopped', '⅓ cup crumbled blue cheese (40 g)', '¼ cup scallions (10 g) green parts only']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C)', '2:  Grease a baking sheet with nonstick spray', '3: Roll out the 1 can refrigerated pizza dough and cut in half lengthwise (save the other half for another use)', '4:  Place the dough on the prepared baking sheet and use your fingers to stretch and shape it into an oval', '5: In a small bowl, mix the diced 1 cup cooked chicken with the Frank’s RedHot® until well coated', '6: Top the dough with the 1 cup shredded white cheddar cheese, Frank’s RedHot® 1 cup cooked chicken, and 5 strips bacon', '7: Bake the flatbread for 10–15 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown', '8: Top the flat bread with the ⅓ cup crumbled blue cheese and ¼ cup scallions', '9:  Cut into 8 slices, then serve']

ingredients: ['1 bird-eye chilli chopped', '1 piece fresh ginger peeled', '3 cloves garlic ends trimmed', '⅓ cup fresh cilantro leaves (15 g) and tender stems plus more for garnish', '3 tablespoons neutral oil such as avocado or canola', '1 cinnamon stick', '1 teaspoon whole cumin seeds', '1 medium red onion finely chopped', '1 cup crushed tomato (200 g)', '½ teaspoon red chili powder', '½ teaspoon ground cumin', '½ teaspoon ground turmeric', '½ teaspoon ground coriander', '1 teaspoon himalayan sea salt or to taste', '2 cans red kidney bean', '1 ½ cups water (360 g)', '2 tablespoons plain whole milk yogurt', '½ teaspoon garam masala', '1 teaspoon ghee or butter', 'basmati rice for serving cooked']
instructions: ['1: In a food processor, combine the serrano chile, 1 piece fresh ginger, 3 cloves garlic, and ⅓ cup fresh cilantro', '2:  Process into a chunky paste', '3: Heat the 3 tablespoons neutral oil in a large, high-walled skillet over 1 medium heat', '4:  Add the 1 cinnamon stick and 1 teaspoon whole ½ teaspoon ground cumin seeds and cook until they start to sputter, 1 minute', '5:  Add the onion and cook for 1–2 minutes, until starting to soften', '6:  Stir in the serrano-ginger-garlic-cilantro paste and cook until the onion is translucent, 4–5 minutes', '7: Add the 1 cup crushed tomatoes and cook until they start to release their juices, 3–4 minutes', '8:  Add the red chile powder, ground 1 teaspoon whole ½ teaspoon ground cumin, turmeric, coriander, and 1 teaspoon himalayan sea salt', '9: Add the kidney beans, along with their liquid, and the 1 ½ cups water and mix well to combine', '10:  Cover and bring to a simmer', '11: In a small bowl, temper the 2 tablespoons plain whole milk yogurt with a few spoonfuls of the hot rajma, mixing well', '12:  Add the 2 tablespoons plain whole milk yogurt mixture to the rajma and stir to incorporate', '13: Cover, increase the heat to 1 medium-high, bring to a boil, and cook for 5–10 minutes, until warmed through and the flavors meld', '14:  Season with more 1 teaspoon himalayan sea salt to taste', '15: Add the ½ teaspoon garam masala and 1 teaspoon ghee', '16:  Reduce the heat to low and cook, stirring occasionally, until the gravy thickens to the desired consistency, 5–7 minutes', '17: Garnish with more ⅓ cup fresh cilantro', '18:  Serve hot with chawal (rice)', '19: Enjoy']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '3 cloves garlic chopped', '2 chicken breasts thinly sliced', '2 cups asparagus (250 g) chopped', '1 cup cherry tomato (200 g) halved', '1 cup carrot (120 g) sliced', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon salt', '4 cups penne pasta (400 g)', '1 cup parmesan cheese (110 g)']
instructions: ['1: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large pot over high heat', '2:  Cook 3 cloves garlic and 2 chicken until no pink is showing', '3: Add 2 cups asparagus, tomatoes, carrots, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1 teaspoon pepper, cooking for about 2 minutes', '4: Add 4 cups penne pasta and 1 cup parmesan, stirring until cheese is melted and evenly distributed', '5: Serve']

ingredients: ['1 sheet puff pastry thawed', '6 slices bacon', '12 spears asparagus', '1 egg beaten', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)Slice the 1 sheet puff pastry into ½-inch (1-centimeter) strips', '2: Slice the 6 slices bacon in half lengthwise into thin strips', '3: Wrap a strip of 6 slices bacon around an asparagus spear in a spiral', '4: Wrap a strip of 1 sheet puff pastry around the asparagus, looping it in between the 6 slices bacon spiral', '5: Repeat with the rest of the asparagus', '6: Place the wrapped 12 spears on a baking tray lined with parchment paper', '7: Brush them with 1 egg wash, then sprinkle a pinch of salt & pepper on top', '8: Bake for 18 minutes, until golden brown and 1 sheet puffed']

ingredients: ['8 oz fusilli pasta (225 g)', '8 oz corn (225 g) drained', '8 oz black beans (225 g) drained & rinsed', '2 cups cooked chicken (250 g) shredded', '16 oz alfredo sauce (455 g)', '1 tablespoon taco seasoning', '1 cup monterey jack cheese (100 g)', '1 cup cheddar cheese (100 g)', 'Garnish', 'fresh cilantro chopped']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C)Cook the 8 oz fusilli pasta according to box instructions', '2:  This will make about 4½ 2 cups (900g) of cooked pasta', '3: In a large bowl, mix together cooked pasta, 8 oz corn, 8 oz black beans, cooked chicken, 16 oz alfredo sauce, and 1 tablespoon taco seasoning', '4: Pour into a 9x13-inch (23x33 cm) baking pan and spread evenly around the pan', '5: Sprinkle Monterey Jack and 1 cup cheddar cheese over the top and cover with foil', '6: Bake for 35 minutes, uncovering after 20 minutes to allow the cheese to brown', '7: Garnish with fresh cilantro']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons oil', '2 cups mushrooms (150 g) sliced', '2 cups broccoli (500 g) chopped', '4 cloves garlic chopped', '2 bell peppers sliced', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 teaspoons pepper', '1 ¼ cups rotini pasta (250 g)']
instructions: ['1: Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a large pot over high heat', '2: Cook 2 cups mushrooms, 2 cups broccoli, 4 cloves garlic, 2 bell 2 bell 2 teaspoons peppers, 1 tablespoon dried oregano, 2 teaspoons salt, and 2 bell 2 teaspoons pepper until the vegetables are tender', '3: Add in the 1 ¼ cups rotini pasta and stir until evenly mixed']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon ginger minced', '2 tablespoons garlic minced', '¼ cup soy sauce (60 mL)', '½ cup honey (170 g)', '1 lb jumbo shrimp (455 g) peeled and deveined', '3 tablespoons cooking oil divided', '1 package chow mein noodle hong kong style pan fried noodles par cooked according to package instructions', '1 cup white onion (150 g) sliced', '1 cup broccoli floret (150 g)', '½ cup carrot (60 g) julienned ', '½ cup cabbage (50 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'scallion for garnish']
instructions: ['1: In a 2-cup (480ml) liquid measuring cup, combine the ginger, garlic, soy sauce, and honey', '2: Pour about ⅓ cup (80 ml) of sauce over the 1 lb jumbo shrimp in a medium bowl and toss to coat', '3:  Reserve the rest of the sauce', '4:  Cover the 1 lb jumbo shrimp with plastic wrap and marinate in the refrigerator for 30 minutes to 1 hour', '5: In a wok or deep skillet over medium-high heat, heat 2 1 2 3 tablespoons of cooking oil, then add the par-cooked noodles', '6:  Cook for 1-2 minutes, allowing the noodles to crisp, then flip and cook for another 1-2 minutes', '7:  Transfer to a plate and set aside', '8: In the same wok, heat 1 1 2 3 tablespoon of cooking oil, then add the onion, broccoli, carrots, and ⅓ cup (80 ml) of the sauce', '9:  Cook for 2-3 minutes, or until the onions are translucent', '10: Add the cabbage and season with salt and pepper to taste', '11:  Cook for 2 minutes more, or until the vegetables have softened', '12: Push the vegetables to one side of the wok and add the remaining cooking oil to the empty side, followed by the marinated 1 lb jumbo shrimp', '13:  Cook for 1 minute without disturbing, then flip the 1 lb jumbo shrimp over and cook for another 2 minutes, until the 1 lb jumbo shrimp are pink and their tails have curled in', '14: Mix the cooked 1 lb jumbo shrimp with the vegetables and add the crispy 1 package chow mein noodles and the remaining sauce', '15:  Toss gently and cook for another 2-3 minutes, or until everything is well combined', '16:  Garnish with sliced scallions']

ingredients: ['1 cup vegan chocolate chips (175 g)', '½ teaspoon mint extract', '1 tablespoon vegetable shortening', '24 crackers']
instructions: ['1: In a small mixing bowl, combine 1 cup vegan chocolate chips, ½ teaspoon mint extract, and 1 tablespoon vegetable shortening, and microwave for 1 minute', "2:  Stir often and make sure the 1 cup vegan chocolate doesn't burn", '3: Dip cracker in 1 cup vegan chocolate mixture', '4: Place 1 cup vegan chocolate covered 24 crackers on parchment-lined baking sheet', '5:  Refrigerate or freeze until hard', '6: Refrigerate or freeze until hard']

ingredients: ['4 chicken thighs', 'salt to season', 'pepper to season', 'mixed herb to season', '3 shallots chopped', '40 cloves garlic unpeeled', '½ cup dry vermouth (120 mL) or white wine', '3 sprigs fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon dried tarragon', '¾ cup chicken stock (180 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C (350°F)Season the chicken with the salt, pepper and mixed herbs', '2:  Set aside', '3: Heat some oil in a large pan and sear the chicken for about 10-15 minutes evenly on each side, until golden brown', '4: Take the chicken out and set aside', '5: Add the 3 shallots and cook down in the remaining juices for about 5 minutes over a low-medium heat', '6: Add the garlic 40 cloves and gently cook them for about 2 minutes', '7: Pour in the ½ cup dry vermouth or white wine and gently cook so that it reduces slightly', '8: Add the chicken, parsley 3 sprigs and 1 teaspoon dried tarragon, followed by the chicken stock', '9: Bake in the oven for 20-25 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through', '10: Serve with crusty bread and vegetables of your choice']

ingredients: ['1 lb frozen peach (455 g)', '2 tablespoons honey or preferred sweetener']
instructions: ['1: Blend all ingredients in a food processor or high-speed blender until thoroughly combined', '2: Pour into a rectangular loaf pan and smooth into an even layer', '3: Freeze for 2 hours, or until 1 lb frozen but still a little soft for scooping', '4:  (If freezing overnight, cover with a lid or plastic wrap, but let it sit out at room temperature for about 5-10 minutes before scooping', '5: )Scoop into a bowl']

ingredients: ['Cookie Dough', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 cup butter (230 g) softened', '2 teaspoons vanilla', '1 cup sugar (200 g)', '⅓ cup brown sugar (75 g)', '2 eggs', '3 cups flour (375 g)', '2 teaspoons cream of tartar', '2 teaspoons baking soda', '½ teaspoon salt', 'Cinnamon Sugar Mix', '¼ cup sugar (50 g)', '1 tablespoon cinnamon']
instructions: ['1: In a small bowl, mix together the ingredients for the cinnamon sugar mix until evenly incorporated', '2:  Set aside', '3: Now make the cookie dough, in a large mixing bowl, whip the 1 cup butter with 2 teaspoons vanilla until light and fluffy', '4: Add the sugar and ⅓ cup brown sugar and mix until well incorporated', '5: Add the 2 eggs and stir until thoroughly incorporated', '6: Using a sift add the 3 cups flour, 2 teaspoons cream of tartar, cinnamon, 2 teaspoons baking soda, and ½ teaspoon salt and sift into the dough', '7:  Combine until evenly mixed', '8: Cover with plastic wrap and chill', '9: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '10: Using your hands roll dough into ping pong sized balls', '11: Dip the dough into cinnamon sugar mixture and roll around covering the dough ball completely', '12: Place cookie dough on parchment paper-lined 2 teaspoons baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes', '13: Allow to cool and serve']

ingredients: ['1 cup honey (340 g)', '2 tablespoons dried lavender']
instructions: ['1: Pour the 1 cup honey into a medium, heavy saucepan and place over medium heat', '2:  Be sure to use a large enough pot because the 1 cup honey can easily boil over', '3: Add in the 2 tablespoons dried lavender and let the 1 cup honey come to a boil', '4: Let the 1 cup honey boil for about 5 minutes to let the lavender infuse, then remove from the heat', '5: Pour the 1 cup honey through a mesh sieve into a heat-proof container', '6: Allow the 1 cup honey to cool, uncovered, until room temperature, at least 1 hour']

ingredients: ['2 large onions 1 halved and 1 julienned', '2 chicken breasts', '4 tomatoes', '4 cloves garlic', 'oil of your cooking choice', '1 can chipotle pepper in adobo sauce', 'salt to taste', 'lettuce chopped', 'queso fresco', 'sour cream', '10 tostadas']
instructions: ['1: Add water and 2 chicken breasts to a crockpot with ½ of an onion, 2 garlic 4 cloves, and a pinch of salt', '2:  Turn the crockpot on to a simmer', '3: While 2 chicken is oil of your cooking, in a blender, blend ½ onion, 4 tomatoes, 2 garlic 4 cloves, salt, chipotles, and water', '4:  Once finished, in a skillet over medium heat, saute julienned 2 large onions until transparent', '5: Once cooked, add 2 chicken and 1 can chipotle pepper in adobo sauce and cook for 15 minutes to combine', '6: Lay a tostada shell on a flat surface, top with 2 chicken mixture and desired toppings/garnishes', '7:  Repeat with remaining tostada shells', '8: Serve']

ingredients: ['1 ½ cups soda water (360 mL)', '½ cup orange juice (120 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Combine 1 ½ cups soda water and ½ cup orange juice, and serve']

ingredients: ['Dough', '2 cups whole milk (480 mL) warm to the touch', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '8 tablespoons unsalted butter melted', '2 ¼ teaspoons active dry yeast', '5 cups all-purpose flour (625 g) divided', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', 'Filling', '¾ cup light brown sugar (165 g)', '12 tablespoons unsalted butter softened', '2 tablespoons ground cinnamon', 'Frosting', '4 oz cream cheese (115 g) softened and cubed', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter melted', '4 tablespoons milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 cup powdered sugar (120 g)']
instructions: ['1: Make the dough: In a large bowl, whisk together the warm 2 cups whole 4 tablespoons milk, sugar, and melted butter', '2:  The mixture should be just warm, registering between 100-110˚F (37-43˚C)', '3:  If any warmer, allow to cool slightly', '4: Sprinkle the 2 ¼ teaspoons active dry yeast evenly over the 2 cups whole 4 tablespoons milk mixture, stir, and let sit in a warm place for about 10 minutes until the 2 ¼ teaspoons active dry yeast has bloomed', '5: Add 4 cups (500 g) of flour to the 2 cups whole 4 tablespoons milk mixture and stir with a wooden spoon until just combined', '6: Cover the bowl with a kitchen towel or plastic wrap and let rise in a warm place for 1 hour, until nearly doubled in size', '7: Generously butter 2 9-inch (23 cm) round 1 teaspoon baking pans and set aside', '8: Make the filling: In a medium bowl, combine the brown sugar, butter, and 2 tablespoons ground cinnamon', '9:  Mix well, then set aside', '10: Remove the plastic wrap from the dough and add the remaining cup of flour, 1 teaspoon baking powder, and 2 teaspoons kosher salt', '11:  Stir well, then turn out onto a clean surface', '12:  Leave a bit of flour nearby to use as needed, but try not to incorporate too much', '13: Knead the dough for at least 10 minutes, adding more flour as necessary, until the dough just loses its stickiness and does not stick to the surface or your hands', '14:  The dough should be very smooth and spring back when poked', '15: Roll the dough out into a large rectangle, about ½-inch (1 cm) thick', '16:  Fix the corners with a bench scraper or a spatula to make sure they are sharp and even', '17: Spread the filling evenly over the dough', '18: Starting from one short end, roll up the dough into a log and pinch the seam closed', '19:  Place seam-side down', '20:  Trim any uneven ends', '21: Using unflavored dental floss, cut the log into evenly pieces, about 1½ inches (8cm) thick', '22:  Place the 2 tablespoons ground cinnamon rolls in the prepared pans, 1 in the center and about 5 around the sides', '23:  Cover with a towel and let rise in a warm place for 35-45 minutes, until expanded by about half of their original volume', '24:  If you’re saving the 2 tablespoons ground cinnamon rolls for later, cover with plastic wrap and freeze for up 3 months', '25: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '26: Bake the 2 tablespoons ground cinnamon rolls for 25-30 minutes, until golden brown', '27: While the 2 tablespoons ground cinnamon rolls are 1 teaspoon baking, make the frosting: In a medium bowl, whisk together the 4 oz cream cheese, melted butter, 2 cups whole 4 tablespoons milk, and 1 teaspoon vanilla extract until smooth', '28:  Gradually add the powdered sugar and whisk until homogenous and runny', '29: When the 2 tablespoons ground cinnamon rolls are finished, let cool for about 10 minutes', '30: Drizzle the frosting over the 2 tablespoons ground cinnamon rolls, using the back of a spoon to spread if desired']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons water', '8 tablespoons butter', '2 teaspoons lemon zest', '1 sprig fresh thyme', '½ lb shrimp (230 g)', '2 cloves garlic', '1 shallot', '1 cup orzo (100 g)', '2 cups chicken stock (480 mL)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '4 cups spinach (160 g)', 'fresh parsley for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Over low heat, add water to your saucepan and slowly incorporate the butter, a few tablespoons at a time', '2:  Whisk together to make sure the water and butter combine and doesn’t separate', '3: Add the 2 teaspoons lemon zest and 1 sprig of thyme and give it a stir', '4:  Add the ½ lb shrimp and poach for eight to 10 minutes', '5:  Remove ½ lb shrimp and set aside', '6:  Discard the 1 sprig of thyme', '7: In the same saucepan and over low heat, add 2 cloves garlic, shallots and the 1 cup orzo', '8:  Salt and pepper to taste', '9:  Stir until all the liquid has been absorbed', '10: Pour in the 2 cups chicken stock and cook until the 1 cup orzo is al dente', '11:  Stir occasionally to make sure nothing is sticking to the bottom of the saucepan', '12: Once the 1 cup orzo is al dente, add the 4 cups spinach', '13:  Stir in until just wilted', '14:  Remove from heat', '15: Serve the 4 cups spinach and 1 cup orzo, place a few ½ lb shrimps on top and garnish with chopped fresh parsley']

ingredients: ['1 cup fresh arugula (100 g)', '1 banana sliced', '1 tablespoon almond butter', '¼ cup oats (25 g)', '½ teaspoon cinnamon', '½ teaspoon ground turmeric', '¼ teaspoon kosher salt', '½ cup unsweetened almond milk (120 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Add the 1 cup fresh arugula, 1 banana, almond butter, ¼ cup oats, ½ teaspoon cinnamon, ½ teaspoon ground turmeric, and ¼ teaspoon kosher salt to a resealable container', '2:  Cover and store in the freezer for up to 3 months', '3: When ready to prepare, add the contents from the container and the almond milk to a blender and blend until smooth']

ingredients: ['3 ears corn shucked', '1 tablespoon ghee', '1 lime halved crosswise', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '¼ teaspoon ground cumin', '¼ teaspoon cayenne', '¼ teaspoon garam masala', '1 ½ teaspoons salt']
instructions: ['1: Blanch the 3 ears corn in a large pot of boiling water for 3 minutes', '2:  Remove the 3 ears corn from the pot', '3: Heat the 1 tablespoon ghee in a medium pan over medium-high heat', '4:  Add the 3 ears corn and cook, turning occasionally, until nicely browned on all sides', '5:  Transfer to a serving plate', '6: Squeeze the 1 lime juice all over the 3 ears corn', '7: In a small bowl, combine the 1 teaspoon chili powder, ¼ teaspoon ground cumin, ¼ teaspoon cayenne, ¼ teaspoon garam masala, and 1 ½ teaspoons salt', '8:  Sprinkle all over the 3 ears corn']

ingredients: ['Cheesecake', '2 pie crusts', '24 oz cream cheese (680 g)', '1 cup sugar (200 g)', '1 cup sour cream (230 g)', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '½ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '½ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '3 eggs', 'Apple Pie Filling', '3 medium apples peeled cored and cubed', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '⅓ cup sugar (65 g)', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '½ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '2 tablespoons cornstarch']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 300˚F (150˚C)', '2: Line a springform pan with a 2 pie crust, pressing it around the sides of the pan until smooth', '3: In a 3 medium bowl, beat the 24 oz 1 cup 1 cup sour cream cheese, sugar, ½ teaspoon vanilla, cinnamon, and nutmeg until smooth', '4: Add the 1 cup sour 24 oz 1 cup 1 cup sour cream and mix together', '5:   Add in one egg at a time, whisking until smooth', '6: Pour mixture into the springform pan and bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes', '7: After baking, turn off the oven and let the cheesecake cool inside for 1 hour without opening the oven door', '8: Turn up the oven temperature to 425˚F (220˚C)', '9: In a saucepan, add the apples, sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, 2 tablespoons cornstarch, and 1 cup water over 3 medium-low heat', '10:  Stir occasionally until apples are soft (about 10 minutes), then remove from heat', '11:  Let cool', '12: Once cool, spread apple 2 pie filling over cheesecake', '13: Cut the other 2 pie crust in to ¼-inch (6 mm) strips and make a lattice pattern across the top', '14: Brush with egg wash', '15: Bake for 25 minutes, until golden brown', '16: Chill until set then serve']

ingredients: ['3 ears corn shucked', '1 tablespoon canola oil', '⅓ cup mayonnaise (80 g)', '⅓ cup sour cream (80 g)', '½ lime juiced', '1 teaspoon chipotle powder', '¼ cup cotija cheese (30 g)', 'fresh cilantro to taste']
instructions: ['1: Blanch the 3 ears corn in a large pot of boiling water for 3 minutes', '2:  Remove the 3 ears corn from the pot', '3: Heat the 1 tablespoon canola oil in a medium pan over medium-high heat', '4:  Add the 3 ears corn and cook, turning occasionally, until nicely browned on all sides', '5:  Transfer to a serving plate', '6: In a small bowl, combine the ⅓ cup mayonnaise, ⅓ cup sour cream, and ½ lime juice', '7:  Brush all over the 3 ears corn', '8: Sprinkle the 3 ears corn with the 1 teaspoon chipotle powder, ¼ cup cotija cheese, and fresh cilantro']

ingredients: ["1 box mac 'n' cheese", '1 cup bacon (225 g) cooked', '¼ cup grated monterey jack cheese (30 g)', '¼ cup grated mozzarella cheese (30 g)', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ["1: Prepare 1 1 box of Mac 'N' Cheese according to instructions on 1 box", '2: Add cooked 1 cup bacon, ¼ cup grated monterey jack cheese, ¼ cup grated mozzarella cheese and pepper, stir until fully incorporated', '3: Top with desired garnish', '4:  Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['Pulled Sweet Potatoes', '1 sweet potato', '1 teaspoon oil', '½ onion chopped', '⅓ cup low-sugar bbq sauce (95 g)', 'salt to taste', 'Slaw', '1 head red cabbage shredded', '2 carrots shredded', '2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'Garlic Greek Yogurt Spread', '1 cup greek yogurt (285 g)', '2 cloves garlic chopped', '½ teaspoon fresh dill', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '½ lemon juiced', '7 slider buns']
instructions: ['1: On a cutting board, use a box grater to shred the 1 sweet potato', '2: Heat a large pan with 1 teaspoon oil over medium heat', '3:  Add the 1 sweet potatoes to the hot pan and cook, stirring occasionally, until they begin to soften, about 2-3 minutes', '4: Add the onions to the pan with the shredded 1 sweet potatoes, and cook until golden brown for about 2-3 minutes', '5: Add the BBQ sauce, salt, and pepper to the 1 sweet potatoes and onions, and stir until fully incorporated', '6:  Cook for 3-5  minutes until browned', '7: Add the 1 head red cabbage, 2 carrots, 2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar, salt, and pepper to a bowl and stir to combine', '8:  Refrigerate until ready to serve', '9: Add the Greek yogurt, 2 cloves garlic, ½ lemon juice, ½ teaspoon fresh dill, salt, and pepper to a small bowl and mix to combine', '10:  Refrigerate until ready to serve', '11: Add the Greek yogurt sauce onto the bun, top with the BBQ 1 sweet potatoes and slaw']

ingredients: ['Marinade', '1 ¼ cups chicken breast (150 g) diced', '1 orange zested', '1 teaspoon garlic crushed', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 pinch salt', '1 pinch pepper', 'Chicken', '½ cup plain flour (50 g)', '2 eggs beaten', '1 cup panko breadcrumbs (50 g)', '2 cups oil (500 mL)', 'Orange sauce', '¼ cup chicken stock (50 mL)', '1 orange zested', '2 oranges juiced', '4 tablespoons sugar', '2 tablespoons water', '1 tablespoon corn flour', 'Preparation', 'Marinade', '1 ¼ cups chicken breast (150 g) diced', '1 orange zested', '1 teaspoon garlic crushed', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 pinch salt', '1 pinch pepper', 'Chicken', '½ cup plain flour (50 g)', '2 eggs beaten', '1 cup panko breadcrumbs (50 g)', '2 cups oil (500 mL)', 'Orange sauce', '¼ cup chicken stock (50 mL)', '1 orange zested', '2 oranges juiced', '4 tablespoons sugar', '2 tablespoons water', '1 tablespoon corn flour', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Combine all marinade ingredients with the chicken breast and leave to marinade in the fridge for 20 minutes', '2: Coat the chicken breast first in flour, then eggs, and finally panko breadcrumbs', '3: In a medium-sized saucepan heat the oil to 325˚F (170°C),Deep fry the breaded chicken for about 3-4 minutes until the coating is golden brown and the chicken is cooked through', '4: In a small frying pan, combine the chicken stock, orange zests, orange juice, and sugar, then stir', '5:   Bring the mixture to a boil', '6: Mix the cornflour with the water, then add the mixture to the pan to thicken the sauce', '7: Add the chicken to the frying pan and coat with the orange sauce', '8: Serve on top of rice and add toppings of your choice']

ingredients: ['1 lb sirloin steak (500 g) cut into 1-inch (2 1/2cm) cubes', '2 cloves garlic cloves crushed', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 teaspoons pepper', '⅔ lb new potato (300 g) cooked and halved', '1 red onion chopped', 'Special Equipment', '6 skewers bamboo skewer soaked in water']
instructions: ['1: In a bowl, season the 1 lb sirloin steak with 2 cloves garlic, 2 teaspoons salt, and 2 teaspoons pepper, and stir thoroughly', '2: On soaked bamboo sticks, skewer on the seasoned 1 lb sirloin steak cubes, then potatos and onions', '3: Repeat until the skewer is full', '4: On a coal BBQ, cook the 1 lb sirloin steak 6 skewers for 2-3 minutes a side for medium-rare and 4-5 minutes for well done']

ingredients: ['Tots', '4 medium-sized zucchinis', '¾ cup bread crumbs (70 g)', '¾ cup shredded cheddar cheese (75 g)', '2 eggs', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon pepper', 'salt to pull moisture from the zucchini']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200˚C', '2: )Grate the zucchini into a bowl and salt generously', '3: Allow zucchini to sit for 20 minutes as the salt draws out moisture', '4: Pour zucchini onto a clean dish towel and wring it out over the sink or into a separate bowl', '5: Pour the zucchini back into your bowl and add ¾ cup bread crumbs, ¾ cup shredded cheddar cheese, 2 eggs, garlic powder, and 1 teaspoon pepper', '6:  Mix together until well-blended', '7: Take a 1 tablespoon of mixture and roll it into a tot, repeat for rest of mixture', '8: Place on a greased baking sheet and place in the oven for 20-25 minutes or until tots are crunchy', '9:  Serve warm']

ingredients: ['Crab Mixture', '6 oz fresh lump crab meat (180 g)', '¼ cup mayonnaise (60 g)', '2 tablespoons shallot finely chopped', '1 tablespoon fresh chives finely chopped', '1 serrano pepper seeded and finely chopped', '2 teaspoons McCormick® Paprika', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 lemon zested', 'Beignets', '4 cups vegetable oil (960 g) for frying', '2 large eggs', '1 cup amber lager-style beer (240 mL)', '1 cup all purpose flour (125 g)', '¼ cup cornstarch (25 g)', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', 'lemon wedge for serving', 'Special Equipment', 'deep fry thermometer']
instructions: ['1: Make the 6 oz fresh lump crab mixture: In a medium bowl, combine the 6 oz fresh lump crabmeat, ¼ cup mayonnaise, shallot, 1 tablespoon fresh chives, 1 serrano, McCormick® Paprika, salt, and lemon zest', '2:  Fold gently to combine', '3: Make the beignets: In a 9-inch Dutch oven fitted with a deep-fry thermometer, heat the 4 cups vegetable oil over medium heat until the temperature reaches 375°F (190°C)', '4: In a 2 large bowl, whisk the eggs until frothy', '5:  Gradually add the 1 cup amber lager-style beer and whisk until incorporated', '6: In a medium bowl, whisk together the 1 cup all purpose flour, ¼ cup cornstarch, 2 teaspoons baking powder, and salt', '7: Add the dry ingredients to the 1 cup amber lager-style beer mixture and fold with a rubber spatula until just combined', '8:  Add the 6 oz fresh lump crab mixture to the batter and gently fold to combine', '9: Working in batches of about 4 at a time, carefully drop heaping 2 tablespoons of the beignet batter into the hot oil and fry, turning occasionally, until crisp and deep golden brown, about 4 minutes', '10:  Transfer to a paper towel–lined plate to drain', '11:  Repeat with the remaining beignets, letting the oil return to temperature between batches', '12: Serve the beignets hot with a squeeze of lemon juice']

ingredients: ['1 pt blueberry (200 g)', '2 cups watermelon (305 g) cubed', '1 bag yogurt covered pretzel']
instructions: ['1: Put blueberries in a bowl or square container and place on top of a rectangle food tray', '2: Place 2 cups watermelon in a row, and then the pretzels until you fill up the platter, alternating red and white', '3: Bring to your party, serve and, enjoy!']

ingredients: ['1 whole eggplant chopped', '1 ¼ cups green beans (200 g)', '½ box spring mix', '2 tomatoes chopped', '2 cucumbers chopped', '2 cups firm tofu (200 g) drained and pressed', '2 tablespoons coconut amino', '1 teaspoon rice vinegar', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon avocado oil', '2 tablespoons nutritional yeast', '¼ teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon hummus', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', 'furikake seasoning']
instructions: ['1: Mix 1 whole eggplant with 1 ¼ cups green beans in a bowl and coat with ¼ teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon avocado oil, ¼ teaspoon salt, black pepper and garlic powder', '2:  Place into the oven on an oven-safe sheet pain for 30 minutes for 350’F', '3: In a bowl, mix 2 cups firm tofu with 1 teaspoon avocado oil, 1 teaspoon rice vinegar, 2 tablespoons coconut aminos and spices', '4: Then, add 2 tablespoons nutritional yeast and put into the oven for 20 minutes at 350’F until crispy', '5: On the side, in a bowl, mix ½ box spring mix, 2 tomatoes and 2 cucumbers', '6:  Mix together a dressing of 1 tablespoon hummus, 2 teaspoons lemon juice, and furikake seasoning and top salad with this', '7: Assemble ‘nourish’ bowls using oven ingredients and serve']

ingredients: ['½ stick unsalted butter', '4 medium sweet onions thinly sliced with the grain', '1 ¼ teaspoons kosher salt', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '2 tablespoons sherry wine', '1 cup low sodium beef broth (240 mL)', '3 sprigs fresh thyme leaves only', '1 dried bay leaf', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper plus more to taste', '1 loaf french bread cut in half', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '6 oz shredded fontina cheese (180 g)', '6 oz shredded gruyère cheese (180 g)', '14 oz salami (400 g) thinly sliced', '2 sprigs fresh parsley tough stems trimmed', 'Preparation', '½ stick unsalted butter', '4 medium sweet onions thinly sliced with the grain', '1 ¼ teaspoons kosher salt', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '2 tablespoons sherry wine', '1 cup low sodium beef broth (240 mL)', '3 sprigs fresh thyme leaves only', '1 dried bay leaf', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper plus more to taste', '1 loaf french bread cut in half', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '6 oz shredded fontina cheese (180 g)', '6 oz shredded gruyère cheese (180 g)', '14 oz salami (400 g) thinly sliced', '2 sprigs fresh parsley tough stems trimmed', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: In a large, heavy-bottomed pot, melt the butter over medium heat', '2:  Add the onions and season with the salt', '3:  Cook for about 1 hour and 45 minutes, stirring occasionally, until golden brown', '4:  Around the last 20 minutes of cooking, the onions will begin to caramelize, so watch carefully to ensure they don’t burn', '5:  Remove 3 tablespoons of onions from the pot and set aside', '6: Add the flour to the pot and stir to coat the remaining onions', '7:  Cook until the flour is lightly browned, 1–2 minutes', '8:  Increase the heat to medium-high and deglaze with the sherry, scraping the bottom of the pot to release any browned bits', '9: Add the beef broth, thyme, bay leaf, and pepper and stir to combine', '10:  Simmer for 8–10 minutes, until the broth has reduced by about half', '11:  Remove the bay leaf', '12: Transfer the soup to a liquid measuring cup or tall, narrow glass and use an immersion blender on medium-high speed to blend until completely smooth, about 1 minute', '13: Preheat the oven to 450°F (230°C)', '14: Set the French bread halves, cut-side up, on a baking sheet and drizzle with the olive oil', '15:  Toast in the oven for 5 minutes, until just beginning to brown on the top and sides', '16: Remove the French bread from the oven and top each half with the blended onion soup, the Fontina and Gruyère cheeses, and the reserved caramelized onions, dividing evenly', '17: Return the pizzas to the oven for 8–10 minutes, until the cheese is melted and bubbling', '18:  Turn the broiler on high and broil for 1–2 minutes, until the cheese is golden brown', '19: While the pizzas are baking, make the salami roses: Using a glass with a 2-inch-wide opening, layer 12–14 thinly sliced salami rounds around the edge in a circular pattern, overlapping slightly, until the center of the glass is mostly filled but there is still a small opening', '20:  Flip the glass over to release the “rose” and repeat with the remaining salami to make another', '21: Lay 1 sprig of parsley over each pizza half, then place the roses at the top', '22: Cut the pizza into wedges and serve warm']

ingredients: ['1 cup warm water (240 mL)', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons honey', '2 teaspoons salt', '3 ⅓ cups flour (415 g)', '1 ½ teaspoons yeast', '1 egg for egg wash']
instructions: ['1: Combine water, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 tablespoons honey, 2 teaspoons salt, 3 ⅓ cups flour, 1 ½ teaspoons yeast, and water in a large bowl', '2: Mix well and knead for 10-15 minutes until the dough is elastic', '3: Transfer the dough into a well-oiled bowl', '4: Cover with a towel or plastic wrap and let rise once for 1 hour in a 1 cup warm place, until the dough has doubled', '5: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '6: Cut the dough into 8 portions and shape into balls', '7: Place balls onto greased cast-iron pan and cover for 30 additional minutes with a towel or plastic wrap', '8: Uncover and brush each with 1 egg wash', '9: Bake or 15-20 minutes, or until the tops are golden brown']

ingredients: ['12 chicken mid wings', '2 tablespoons shrimp sauce', '1 tablespoon oyster sauce', '2 tablespoons sugar', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '3 tablespoons chinese wine', '1 teaspoon white pepper', '1 teaspoon salt', 'Batter', '1 cup plain flour (125 g)', '1 cup potato starch (120 g)', '½ teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '¼ teaspoon baking powder', '2 eggs', '1 cup water (200 mL)', 'To Fry:', '4 cups cooking oil (1 L)', 'To Serve:', 'Lime wedge', 'Preparation', '12 chicken mid wings', '2 tablespoons shrimp sauce', '1 tablespoon oyster sauce', '2 tablespoons sugar', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '3 tablespoons chinese wine', '1 teaspoon white pepper', '1 teaspoon salt', 'Batter', '1 cup plain flour (125 g)', '1 cup potato starch (120 g)', '½ teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '¼ teaspoon baking powder', '2 eggs', '1 cup water (200 mL)', 'To Fry:', '4 cups cooking oil (1 L)', 'To Serve:', 'Lime wedge', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: In a large mixing bowl, add chicken wings, shrimp sauce, oyster sauce, sugar, sesame oil, Chinese wine, white pepper and salt', '2:  Stir to combine, ensuring each wing is coated evenly, then cover in cling film and allow to rest in the fridge for up to 2 days', '3: In another large mixing bowl, combine plain flour, potato starch, bicarbonate of soda, baking powder, eggs and water', '4:  Whisk until fully combined, the mixture should be runny but thick enough to hold on the surface of a spoon', '5: Add oil to a wok over medium heat and bring up to temperature', '6: Once the wings have had time to marinade, remove from the fridge then dip in batter', '7:  Place the battered wings in the oil in batches of 4 and cook for 3-4 minutes until the coating crisps up and turns a golden brown', '8:  Be sure to test the chicken to make sure it’s cooked all the way through', '9: Repeat the frying process until all wings are cooked', '10: Plate up and serve with a squeeze of lime juice']

ingredients: ['8 oz cream cheese (225 g) softened', '1 ½ cups shredded sharp cheddar cheese (150 g)', '⅓ cup dried cranberry (40 g)', '⅓ cup chopped pecan (40 g) plus more for coating', '¼ cup sliced green onion (50 g)', '1 package crackers for serving']
instructions: ['1: Mix softened 8 oz cream cheese, 1 ½ cups shredded sharp cheddar, ⅓ cup dried cranberries, pecans, and ¼ cup sliced green onions until well-combined', '2: Form into a ball, then roll in more ⅓ cup chopped pecans to coat', '3: Serve with 1 package crackers of your choice']

ingredients: ['3 cups milk (720 mL)', '3 large eggs', '2 cups all-purpose flour (250 g)', '3 cups yellow cornmeal (450 g)', '3 teaspoons salt', '3 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '10 tablespoons unsalted butter melted', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 large yellow onion diced', '2 lb ground beef (905 g)', '1 tablespoon salt', '2 teaspoons black pepper', '2 teaspoons paprika', '2 teaspoons garlic powder', '2 teaspoons chili powder', '2 teaspoons cumin', '28 oz crushed tomato (795 g) 1 can', '1 cup shredded mexican cheese blend (100 g)', 'sour cream for serving', 'scallion thinly sliced for serving']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: In a liquid measuring 3 2 3 1 cup or medium bowl, whisk the eggs and 3 3 2 3 1 cups milk until well-combined', '3: In a large bowl, add the 2 2 3 1 cups all-purpose flour, 3 3 1 cups yellow cornmeal, salt, baking powder, and baking soda, and whisk to combine', '4: Make a well in the center of the dry ingredients, then pour in the wet ingredients and whisk until smooth', '5:  Add the melted butter and stir to combine', '6: Grease a 9x13-inch (23x33-cm) glass baking dish with nonstick spray and line with parchment paper', '7: Pour the cornbread batter into the pan, smoothing the top with a spatula', '8: Bake for 25 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out clean', '9:  Let cool for about 10 minutes', '10: In a large pan, heat the 2 tablespoons olive oil over medium heat', '11:  Add the onion and cook until softened, stirring frequently, about 5 minutes', '12: Add the 2 lb ground beef and break apart with a wooden spoon into small pieces', '13:  Add the salt, 2 teaspoons black pepper, 2 teaspoons paprika, 2 teaspoons garlic powder, 2 teaspoons chili powder, and 2 teaspoons cumin', '14:  Cook, stirring frequently, until the 2 lb ground beef is cooked through, about 5 minutes', '15:  Add the 28 oz crushed tomatoes and stir', '16:  Simmer for 10 minutes', '17: Using the bottom of a utensil with a handle that is about 1-inch (2 cm) in diameter, poke multiple holes in the cornbread', '18: Pour the 2 teaspoons chili over the cornbread and smooth the top with a spatula', '19:  Sprinkle the cheese over the 2 teaspoons chili', '20: Bake for 3 minutes, or until the cheese is melted', '21: Slice and serve with sour cream, scallions, and cilantro']

ingredients: ['36 chocolate sandwich cookies', '5 tablespoons butter melted', '3 cups cream cheese (800 g)', '⅓ cup sugar (65 g)', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '1 cup milk (240 mL) warm', '1 tablespoon gelatin']
instructions: ['1: Separate the 3 cups cream from the 36 chocolate sandwich cookies into 2 different bowls', '2: Place the 36 chocolate sandwich cookies into a plastic bag and crush them into fine crumbs with a rolling pin', '3:  Set aside ½ cup (50g) of the crumbs for later', '4: Pour the cookie crumbs into a bowl and combine with the melted 5 tablespoons butter, mixing until the texture is like slightly wet sand', '5: Press the cookie crumbs in an even layer into the bottom of a 9-inch (23 cm) springform pan', '6:  Set aside', '7: In a medium pot over low heat, mix together the 3 cups cream cheese, sugar, the 3 cups cream from the 36 chocolate sandwich cookies, and 1 tablespoon vanilla extract, stirring until there are no lumps', '8: In a measuring cup, mix the milk with the 1 tablespoon gelatin until dissolved', '9: Pour the milk into the 3 cups cream cheese mixture, stirring constantly until the mixture starts to bubble slightly', '10:  Remove from heat', '11: Pour the mixture over the cookie crust in the springform pan', '12:  Using a spatula or a spoon, smooth the top', '13: Sift the saved cookie crumbs on top of the cheesecake in an even layer, then refrigerate for at least 4 hours', '14: Unclasp the ring of the springform pan, slice, then serve!']

ingredients: ['Passion Fruit Mexican Mule', '8 limes quartered juice squeezed and reserved for another use', '1 cup granulated sugar (200 g)', '½ cup fresh mint leaf (20 g)', '2 cups passion fruit puree (460 g)', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '½ cup mezcal (120 mL)', 'ice for serving', 'ginger beer for topping', '8 Lime wedges for garnish', 'Mangonada', '¼ cup fresh lime juice (60 mL)', '¼ cup chile lime seasoning (25 g)', '24 oz frozen mango (680 g) diced', '¾ cup mango nectar (180 mL)', '¾ cup fresh tangerine juice (180 mL)', '¾ cup tamarind (180 mL) liquer or water', '½ cup chamoy (85 g)', '1 cup fresh mangoes (150 g) finely diced', 'Cucumber Paloma', '2 cups fresh grapefruit juice (480 mL)', '¼ cup sea salt (30 g)', '½ lb persian cucumber (225 g) sliced into half moons plus 1 peeled into ribbons', '¼ cup granulated sugar (50 g)', '¼ cup fresh lime juice (60 mL)', '1 cup tequila (240 mL)', 'ice for serving', 'seltzer for topping', 'Pineapple Hibiscus Agua Fresca', '1 small pineapple peeled cored and diced', '½ cup brown sugar (100 g)', '¼ teaspoon kosher salt', '½ cup dried hibiscus flowers (20 g)', '4 cups water (960 mL) divided', '¼ cup fresh lime juice (60 mL)', '½ cup gin (120 mL)', 'ice for serving', 'SPECIAL EQUIPMENT', '8 rock glasses 6-ounce', '8 mason jars 6-ounce', '8 highball glass 6-ounce', '8 stemless wine glasses 6-ounce', '8 cocktail picks']
instructions: ['1: Make the passion fruit Mexican mule: In a medium bowl, combine the lime rinds and sugar and stir until the rinds are well coated', '2:  Cover and let sit, stirring every 45 minutes, until the sugar is completely dissolved and there is ½ cup of syrup in the bottom of the bowl, about 4 hours', '3:  Strain the syrup through a fine-mesh sieve and discard the lime rinds', '4: In a 1-quart pitcher, combine the lime syrup and mint and muddle with a wooden spoon', '5:  Add the passion fruit purée, water, and mezcal', '6:  Whisk until completely combined', '7: Fill 8 6-ounce rocks 8 rock 8 8 stemless wine glasses with ice, then fill each ⅔ of the way with the 8 cocktail', '8:  Top each glass with ginger beer and garnish the rims with lime 8 Lime wedges', '9: Make the mangonada: Dip the rims of 8 8-ounce 8 mason jars in the lime 8 limes quartered ¼ cup fresh lime ¾ cup fresh tangerine 2 cups fresh grapefruit ¼ cup fresh lime ¼ cup fresh lime juice, then coat in the chile lime seasoning', '10:  Reserve the remaining lime 8 limes quartered ¼ cup fresh lime ¾ cup fresh tangerine 2 cups fresh grapefruit ¼ cup fresh lime ¼ cup fresh lime juice and chile lime seasoning', '11: In a blender, combine the 24 oz frozen mango, mango nectar, and tangerine 8 limes quartered ¼ cup fresh lime ¾ cup fresh tangerine 2 cups fresh grapefruit ¼ cup fresh lime ¼ cup fresh lime juice', '12:  Blend until smooth, about 2 minutes', '13:  Add the tamarind liqueur and blend to combine, about 30 seconds', '14: Pour the mango mixture into the prepared 8 rock 8 8 stemless wine glasses, filling each halfway', '15:  Drizzle each with about ½ tablespoon of chamoy and top with 1 tablespoon fresh mango', '16:  Fill the 8 rock 8 8 stemless wine glasses the rest of the way with the remaining 24 oz frozen mango mixture and top with the remaining chamoy, fresh mango, and reserved chile lime seasoning', '17: Make the ½ lb persian cucumber paloma: Dip the rims of 8 6-ounce 8 highball 8 rock 8 8 stemless wine glasses in the grapefruit 8 limes quartered ¼ cup fresh lime ¾ cup fresh tangerine 2 cups fresh grapefruit ¼ cup fresh lime ¼ cup fresh lime juice, then coat in the sea ¼ cup sea ¼ teaspoon kosher salt', '18: In a blender, purée the sliced ½ lb persian cucumbers until smooth', '19:  Press the purée through a fine-mesh strainer into a medium bowl or liquid measuring cup, discarding any remaining solids', '20:  You should have about ½ cup (120 ml) of ½ lb persian cucumber 8 limes quartered ¼ cup fresh lime ¾ cup fresh tangerine 2 cups fresh grapefruit ¼ cup fresh lime ¼ cup fresh lime juice', '21: Combine the ½ lb persian cucumber 8 limes quartered ¼ cup fresh lime ¾ cup fresh tangerine 2 cups fresh grapefruit ¼ cup fresh lime ¼ cup fresh lime juice and sugar in a 1 small saucepan over medium heat', '22:  Cook until the sugar has dissolved completely, about 5 minutes', '23:  Remove the pot from the heat and let the syrup cool completely', '24: In a 1-quart pitcher, whisk together the remaining grapefruit 8 limes quartered ¼ cup fresh lime ¾ cup fresh tangerine 2 cups fresh grapefruit ¼ cup fresh lime ¼ cup fresh lime juice, lime 8 limes quartered ¼ cup fresh lime ¾ cup fresh tangerine 2 cups fresh grapefruit ¼ cup fresh lime ¼ cup fresh lime juice, tequila, and ½ lb persian cucumber syrup', '25: Fill the prepared 8 rock 8 8 stemless wine glasses with ice, then fill each ⅔ of the way with the 8 cocktail', '26:  Top each glass with seltzer and garnish with a ½ lb persian cucumber ribbon', '27: Make the pineapple hibiscus agua fresca: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '28: In a 9 x 13-inch (22 x 33 cm) glass baking dish, toss the pineapple with the brown sugar and ¼ cup sea ¼ teaspoon kosher salt', '29:  Roast the pineapple until golden brown and tender, about 30 minutes', '30:  Remove from the oven and let the pineapple and syrup cool completely, then skewer 3 pieces of pineapple onto each of 8 8 cocktail picks', '31:  Reserve the remaining pineapple and syrup', '32: In a 1 small saucepan, combine the hibiscus flowers and 2 cups of water', '33:  Bring to a boil over medium heat', '34:  Remove the pot from the heat and let steep for 30 minutes', '35:  Strain the tea, discarding the flowers', '36: In a 1-quart pitcher, whisk together the lime 8 limes quartered ¼ cup fresh lime ¾ cup fresh tangerine 2 cups fresh grapefruit ¼ cup fresh lime ¼ cup fresh lime juice, gin, roasted pineapple and syrup, hibiscus tea, and remaining 2 cups of water', '37: Fill 8 6-ounce 8 stemless wine 8 rock 8 8 stemless wine glasses with ice, then divide the 8 cocktail evenly between the 8 rock 8 8 stemless wine glasses', '38:  Garnish with the pineapple 8 cocktail picks']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '2 sheets graham cracker', '4 oz cream cheese (115 g) softened', '2 tablespoons sugar', '3 drops vanilla extract', '5 fresh raspberries for serving']
instructions: ['1: Melt the 1 tablespoon butter in a small microwaveable ramekin', '2:  Tilt the ramekin to coat the sides', '3: Crush the 2 sheets graham crackers into fine crumbs, then add to the ramekin with the 1 tablespoon butter and mix well', '4:  With a spoon, press the crust evenly against the bottom of the dish', '5: In a small bowl, combine the 4 oz cream cheese, 2 tablespoons sugar, and 3 drops vanilla, stirring until there are no lumps', '6: Spread the filling on top of the 2 sheets graham cracker crust', '7: Microwave for at least 4 minutes, 45 seconds at a time, at half power', '8:  Make sure the cheesecake does not bubble over the sides of the ramekin', '9: Chill in the freezer for at least 30 minutes, until completely cool to the touch', '10: With a knife, loosen the edges of the cheesecake, then invert onto a plate, or eat straight from the dish', '11: Top with a few 5 fresh raspberries']

ingredients: ['1 head cauliflower', '½ onion diced', '1 red bell pepper diced', '1 green bell pepper diced', '1 yellow bell pepper diced', '2 cups mushroom (150 g) sliced', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '3 eggs beaten']
instructions: ['1: Remove all leaves and cut the 1 head cauliflower into small florets', '2: Place the florets in a food processor and blend until they are a rice-like texture', '3:  Be careful not to over process or it may turn mushy', '4:  Set aside, and drain excess moisture with a towel, if desired', '5: In a large saucepan over medium-high heat, cook onions, bell 1 red bell 1 green bell 1 yellow bell 1 teaspoon peppers, mushrooms, 2 teaspoons salt, and 1 red bell 1 green bell 1 yellow bell 1 teaspoon pepper until vegetables are tender but not soft', '6: Add the 1 head cauliflower rice', '7:  Cook for about 3-4 minutes until the vegetables are incorporated evenly into the 1 head cauliflower', '8: Spread the rice towards the edge of the pan, creating a well in the center', '9:  Pour the beaten 3 eggs into the well, stirring only the 3 eggs until they are cooked', '10: Fold the 3 eggs into the rice']

ingredients: ['1 bunch kale', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '¼ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '¼ teaspoon paprika']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: Remove the 1 bunch kale leaves from the thick stems, then chop into bite-size pieces', '4:  In a medium bowl, top the 1 bunch kale with the 2 tablespoons olive oil', '5:  Mix the seasonings and add to the 1 bunch kale', '6:  Toss until fully coated', "7: Arrange seasoned 1 bunch kale on a baking sheet, ensuring the chips don't overlap", '8:  Bake for 10-15 minutes, until the edges are brown, but not burnt', '9:  Let cool to room temperature']

ingredients: ['½ cup ricotta cheese (125 g)', '¼ cup fresh spinach (10 g) chopped', '2 tablespoons fresh parsley chopped', '2 tablespoons grated parmesan cheese divided', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '¼ cup marinara sauce (65 g)', '4 no-boil lasagna noodles broken in half', '½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese (50 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a small bowl, mix the ½ cup ricotta, ¼ cup fresh spinach, 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, one tablespoon of Parmesan, ½ teaspoon salt, and ¼ teaspoon pepper until combined', '2: In the glass container, spread a layer of tomato ¼ cup marinara sauce', '3:  Top the tomato ¼ cup marinara sauce with the 4 no-boil lasagna noodles', '4: Cover the noodles with a layer of the ½ cup ricotta mixture, then ½ cup shredded mozzarella', '5: Continue with another layer of noodles, ½ cup ricotta, tomato ¼ cup marinara sauce, then ½ cup shredded mozzarella', '6:  Repeat', '7: Cover the top layer of 4 no-boil lasagna noodles with more tomato ¼ cup marinara sauce and a layer of ½ cup shredded mozzarella and Parmesan', '8: Place the lid on the glass container, without sealing it closed', '9: Microwave for 7 minutes or until the cheese is melted through', '10: Remove from the microwave carefully, the container will be hot!Allow to cool and refrigerate, or serve immediately']

ingredients: ['2 lb lean top sirloin steak (905 g)', '1 large white onion quartered', '½ cup low sodium soy sauce (120 mL)', '¼ cup sesame oil (60 mL)', '2 tablespoons fresh ginger minced', '4 cloves garlic minced', '1 lb brussels sprouts (455 g) hulled and halved', '2 red bell peppers diced', '2 large carrots diced', '2 cups brown rice (450 g) cooked']
instructions: ['1: Slice the top 2 lb lean top sirloin steaks into half-inch (1 ¼ cm) thick strips', '2: Place soy sauce, ¼ cup sesame oil, 2 tablespoons fresh ginger, 4 cloves garlic, onion and meat in a large slow cooker and mix thoroughly', '3: Place the lid on top', '4: Set the slow cooker on the ½ cup low setting for 3 hours', '5: Remove the onions from the slow cooker', '6: Pour in the Brussels sprouts, 2 red bell pepper, and carrots', '7:  Mix thoroughly', '8: Cook on ½ cup low for 1 more hour', '9: Serve with a portion of 2 cups brown rice']

ingredients: ['1 rack baby back ribs membrane removed (this is essential for de-boning)', 'Dry Rub', '2 tablespoons paprika', '1 tablespoon pepper', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon chili powder', 'Glaze', '1 cup barbecue sauce (285 g)', '¼ cup honey (85 g)', '1 large loaf bread', '4 tablespoons butter melted', '1 tablespoon sesame seed', '2 large onions sliced and caramelized', '2 tablespoons fresh parsley chopped']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 300°F (150°C)', '2: Lay the 1 rack baby back ribs on a long sheet of aluminum foil', '3:  Combine the 2 tablespoons paprika, 1 tablespoon pepper, 2 tablespoons brown sugar, 2 teaspoons salt, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, 1 teaspoon 2 large onion powder, 1 teaspoon cumin, and 1 teaspoon chili powder in a small bowl, then cover the 1 rack baby back ribs evenly on both sides, pressing the rub into any cracks and smoothing out any large lumps', '4:  Wrap the foil around the 1 rack baby back ribs, making sure they’re completely sealed', '5:  It’s important that the juices of the 1 rack baby back ribs stay inside the foil to keep the 1 rack baby back ribs moist during cooking', '6:  Use more sheets of foil if necessary', '7: Bake the 1 rack baby back ribs for 3-3½ hours, until tender', '8:  Unwrap the 1 rack baby back ribs carefully, then wiggle the bones out slowly', '9:  If you’re having trouble removing the bones, use a knife to make small cuts in the meat to aid their removal', '10:  Preheat the broiler on your oven', '11: Combine the 1 cup barbecue sauce and ¼ cup honey in a small bowl and brush both sides of the deboned slab of 1 rack baby back ribs generously, being sure to carefully handle the 1 rack baby back ribs since the meat will be super tender', '12: Broil the 1 rack baby back ribs for about 5 minutes until the glaze is bubbling and starting to 2 tablespoons brown', '13: Slice the bread loaf in half lengthwise, then 4 tablespoons butter both sides of the bread', '14:  Sprinkle 1 tablespoon sesame seeds on the outside of the bread, then toast under the broiler for a few minutes', '15:  Keep a careful eye on it as they will burn extremely quickly', '16: With two long spatulas or knives, carefully transfer the glazed 1 rack baby back ribs to the bottom bread half, then top with the caramelized 1 teaspoon 2 large onions, 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, and the top half of bread', '17:  Cut into about 8 2-inch (5-cm) sandwiches, and serve']

ingredients: ['1 package lemon cake mix', '⅓ cup oil (80 mL)', '2 eggs', 'powdered sugar']
instructions: ['1: Combine 1 package lemon cake mix, ⅓ cup oil, and 2 eggs in a mixing bowl', '2: Using an ice cream scoop or your hand, form golf ball-sized balls of cookie dough and transfer to a bowl of powdered sugar', '3: Cover dough ball in powdered sugar and transfer to a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '4: Bake at 350°F (180°C) for 10-12 minutes']

ingredients: ['8 ruby red grapefruits', '6 fl oz silver tequila (170 mL)', 'sugar for rim', 'Simple syrup', '¼ cup water (60 mL)', '¼ cup sugar (50 g)']
