instructions: ['1: To make the simple Simple syrup, bring the sugar and ¼ cup water to a boil in a saucepan', '2:  Wait until they’re completely combined, then set aside to cool', '3: Squeeze the juice out of all the 8 ruby red grapefruits, and combine with the 6 fl oz silver tequila and the simple Simple syrup you just made', '4: Wet the rim of your glasses (you can do this with a slice of grapefruit), and dip in sugar', '5:  Serve over ice!']

ingredients: ['2 teaspoons unsalted butter (10 g)', '½ cup milk (120 mL)', '2 teaspoons active dry yeast', '½ teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons sugar', '1 ¼ cups bread flour (150 g)', '½ cup cake flour (50 g)', '1 ½ cups shredded mozzarella cheese (150 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, combine the 2 teaspoons unsalted butter and ½ cup milk and microwave for 50 seconds', '2: Mix with a spatula until the 2 teaspoons unsalted butter is completely melted', '3: Add the 2 teaspoons active dry yeast and mix well', '4:  Add the ½ teaspoon salt and 2 tablespoons sugar and mix well', '5: Fold in the 1 ¼ cups bread flour and ½ cup cake flour until fully incorporated and microwave for 20 seconds', '6: Transfer the dough to a floured surface and divide it into 6 pieces', '7:  Take a piece and roll it into a ball', '8:  Roll it out to a round about ⅛ inch (3-mm) thick using a rolling pin', '9:  Repeat with the remaining dough', '10: Put a third of the 1 ½ cups shredded mozzarella cheese into the center of the dough', '11:  Top with another dough round and crimp the edges to seal', '12:  Repeat with the remaining 1 ½ cups shredded mozzarella cheese and dough', '13: Heat a medium nonstick frying pan over medium heat', '14:  Add a filled naan round and cook for 3 minutes, until lightly browned', '15: Flip the naan 1 ¼ cups bread, then use a spatula to flatten and cook for 3 minutes more', '16:  Cook the remaining naan', '17: Slice into wedges and serve']

ingredients: ['Meatballs', '½ cup bread crumbs (60 g)', '½ cup milk (120 mL)', '1 clove garlic minced', '1 egg', '2 teaspoons salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 lb ground chicken (455 g)', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', 'Sauce', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 yellow onion diced', '3 garlics minced', '1 tablespoon ginger minced', '1 ½ teaspoons McCormick ® Ground Cumin', '1 teaspoon McCormick ® Paprika', '2 ½ teaspoons garam masala divided', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '14 oz crushed tomato (390 g)', '3 tablespoons butter', '½ cup heavy cream (120 mL)', 'fresh cilantro minced for garnish', 'lime wedge for serving', 'rice for serving']
instructions: ['1: Meatballs: In a medium bowl, stir together ½ cup bread crumbs and ½ cup milk', '2:  Let sit for 5 minutes', '3:  Add in 1 clove 3 garlic, 1 egg, salt, and pepper, then stir until well-combined', '4:  Stir in 1 lb ground chicken', '5:  Combine well, but do not overmix', '6:  With oiled hands, roll the meat into golf-size balls', '7: Pour 1 tablespoon vegetable oil into a skillet over medium heat', '8:  Add meatballs and brown on all sides', '9:  Remove meatballs from the pan (meatballs will not be fully cooked through at this time)', '10:  Wipe the pan out to make the sauce', '11: Sauce: Heat vegetable oil and butter in the same skillet over medium heat', '12:  Add onions and sauté until translucent, about 5 minutes', '13:  Add 1 clove 3 garlic and ginger, then let sizzle for a minute or two', '14:  Stir in McCormick Ground Cumin, McCormick Paprika, 1½ teaspoons garam masala, cayenne, and salt', '15:  Let spices heat through until fragrant, about 2 minutes', '16:  Add 14 oz crushed tomatoes and bring sauce to a simmer, then take off the heat', '17: Let the sauce cool for 5–10 minutes', '18:  Blend sauce until smooth, adding a tablespoon or two of water if it is too thick to blend', '19: Pour the sauce back into the skillet', '20:  Whisk in the butter, ½ cup heavy cream, and 1 teaspoon garam masala', '21:  Add the meatballs to the sauce and stir to coat', '22:  Cover and cook for 5 minutes, or until meatballs are fully cooked through', '23: Garnish with fresh cilantro', '24:  Serve with rice and lime wedges']

ingredients: ['Pound Cake', '3 sticks unsalted butter softened', '3 cups granulated sugar (600 g)', '6 large eggs', '8 oz sour cream (225 g) or cream cheese', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '½ teaspoon orange extract', '3 cups self-rising flour (375 g)', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '2 tablespoons all purpose flour', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', 'Citrus Glaze', '2 ½ cups powdered sugar (275 g) sifted', '5 tablespoons milk', '3 tablespoons unsalted butter melted', '1 lemon zested', '1 lime zested', '1 orange zested', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
instructions: ['1: Arrange a rack in the center of the oven', '2:  Preheat the oven to 300°F (150°C)', '3: Make the cake: In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment (or in a 6 large bowl with an electric hand beater), cream the butter and 3 cups granulated 2 ½ cups 2 ½ cups powdered sugar on low speed until smooth, 3–4 minutes', '4:  Scrape down the sides of the bowl, then add the eggs, 1 at a time, beating to incorporate between each addition', '5:  Scrape down the sides of the bowl again, then add the 8 oz sour cream, vanilla, and orange extract and beat to incorporate', '6: Sift the self-rising 3 cups self-rising 2 tablespoons all 2 tablespoons all purpose flour and 1 teaspoon kosher salt into a 6 large bowl', '7: Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, 1 cup at a time, and mix on low speed to incorporate, scraping down the sides of the bowl as needed', '8: Grease a 14½-cup Bundt pan evenly with nonstick spray', '9:  Evenly sprinkle the all-purpose 3 cups self-rising 2 tablespoons all 2 tablespoons all purpose flour into the pan and rotate until evenly coated, then tap out the excess', '10: Pour the batter into the prepared pan', '11:  Shake and drop the pan onto the counter a couple times to release any air bubbles', '12:  Transfer to the oven and bake for 1 hour and 30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean', '13:  Remove from the oven and let cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then invert the cake from the pan and let cool for at least 30 minutes more', '14: Make the glaze: In a 6 large bowl, combine the 2 ½ cups powdered 3 cups granulated 2 ½ cups 2 ½ cups powdered sugar, 5 tablespoons milk, melted butter, vanilla, 1 lemon zest, 1 lime zest, and orange zest and whisk until smooth', '15: Pour the glaze over the cooled cake, then slice and serve']

ingredients: ['Mushroom Walnut Mixture', '½ cup raw walnut (50 g)', '10 oz cremini mushroom (300 g) sliced', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '⅓ cup yellow onion (50 g) finely chopped', '2 cloves garlic minced', '2 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce', '½ teaspoon smoked paprika', '¼ teaspoon fennel seeds', 'kosher salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 lb pizza dough (455 g)', '⅓ cup marinara sauce (85 g)', '½ cup shredded vegan mozzarella cheese (50 g)', '¼ cup black olive (45 g) sliced', '½ red bell pepper sliced']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C)', '2: In a food processor, pulse the ½ cup raw walnuts until mostly crumbly, about 10 pulses', '3:  Add the mushrooms and pulse again until crumbly, but do not to overprocess', '4: Heat the olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat', '5:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the ⅓ cup yellow onion and cook for 3-4 minutes, until semi-translucent', '6:  Add the 2 cloves garlic and cook for another 2-3 minutes, until fragrant', '7:  Add the mushroom ½ cup raw walnut mixture and cook for 5-7 minutes, until most of the liquid from the mushrooms has been released and evaporated', '8:  Add the 2 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce, ½ teaspoon smoked paprika, ¼ teaspoon fennel, kosher salt, and ½ red ½ red bell pepper and cook for 3-4 minutes more, until the mushroom mixture begins crisp slightly', '9:  Remove from the heat', '10: Use your hands to stretch the 1 lb pizza dough into a circle about 14 inches (35 cm) in diameter and ½-inch (1 ¼ cm) thick', '11:  Lay on a sheet of parchment paper', '12: Spread the ⅓ cup marinara sauce over the 1 lb pizza dough in an even layer, then sprinkle with the ½ cup shredded vegan mozzarella', '13:  Top with the mushroom ½ cup raw walnut mixture, olives, and ½ red bell ½ red ½ red bell pepper', '14: Bake for 14-16 minute, until the crust is lightly golden around the edges', '15: Cut into 8 slices and serve']

ingredients: ['4 slices fruit and nut bread or rustic bread of choice', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter room temperature', '2 tablespoons whole-grain Dijon mustard', '1 granny smith apple halved cored and sliced 1/8–1/4-inch-thick', '2 teaspoons honey plus more serving', 'flaky sea salt for sprinkling', '8 oz brie cheese (225 g) rind removed and sliced']
instructions: ['1: Heat a large griddle or skillet over medium-low heat', '2: Spread the 2 tablespoons unsalted butter on one side of each slice of bread', '3:  Flip the bread over and spread the 2 tablespoons whole-grain Dijon mustard on 2 4 slices, then layer the 1 granny smith apple 4 slices on top of the 2 tablespoons whole-grain Dijon mustard', '4:  Drizzle the 2 teaspoons honey over the 1 granny smith apples, then sprinkle with a pinch of flaky salt', '5:  Arrange the Brie on the other 4 slices of bread', '6:  Close the sandwiches', '7: Transfer the sandwiches to the pan and cook until golden brown on each side and the cheese has melted, 7–9 minutes per side', '8: Remove the sandwiches from the pan and cut in half', '9:  Top with another drizzle of 2 teaspoons honey and a sprinkle of flaky salt', '10:  Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['1 cup vegetable broth (240 mL)', '¼ cup apple cider vinegar (60 mL)', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 teaspoon maple syrup', '½ teaspoon liquid smoke', '2 teaspoons mustard powder', '1 tablespoon paprika', '½ teaspoon ground coriander', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '6 carrots washed and peeled (and boiled if grilling)', '1 tablespoon olive oil for grilling', '6 hot dog buns', 'Toppings', 'Classic', 'relish', 'yellow mustard', 'ketchup', 'red onion chopped', 'Chili', 'vegetarian chili', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'fresh cilantro chopped', 'Onions & Peppers', '¼ cup caramelized onions (40 g)', 'green pepper', 'fresh parsley chopped', 'Southwestern', 'black bean', 'corn', 'salsa', 'fresh cilantro chopped']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, combine the 1 cup vegetable broth, ¼ cup apple cider, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 teaspoon maple syrup, ½ teaspoon liquid smoke, mustard powder, 1 tablespoon paprika, ground coriander, ½ teaspoon garlic powder, and 1 teaspoon ground black green pepper', '2: Place the 6 carrots into a baking dish and pour the marinade on top', '3:  Let marinate for at least 30 minutes', '4: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220˚C)', '5: If baking, cover the baking dish with aluminum foil and bake for about 40 minutes', '6:  Remove the foil and bake for another 25 minutes, until the 6 carrots are just tender enough to be poked with a knife', '7: If grilling, heat the 1 tablespoon olive oil on a grill pan on high heat', '8:  Add the marinated 6 carrots to the pan and spoon a bit of the marinade over', '9:  Cook for about 2 minutes on each side, until slightly charred', '10: Place the 6 carrots in 6 hot dog buns and add your desired toppings']

ingredients: ['4 ears corn', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '½ cup mayonnaise (120 g)', '1 tablespoon sriracha sauce', '¼ cup fresh scallion (25 g) sliced', '1 tablespoon toasted sesame seed']
instructions: ['1: Preheat a grill or grill plate to medium heat', '2: Drizzle the corn with 2 tablespoons olive oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper', '3:  Mix to ensure all the 4 ears are evenly coated', '4: Place the corn on the grill', '5:  Close the lid to keep the temperature high, and let the corn cook for about 15 minutes per side, or until slightly charred on all sides', '6: Remove the corn from the heat and set aside', '7: Mix the ½ cup mayonnaise and Sriracha together, and then spread or drizzle onto the corn', '8: Sprinkle the corn with ¼ cup fresh scallion (25 g) sliced scallions and 1 tablespoon toasted sesame seeds']

ingredients: ['Meat Filling:', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 cup onion (150 g) chopped', '2 garlics minced', '1 lb ground beef (455 g)', '2 teaspoons dried parsley', '1 teaspoon dried rosemary', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon worcestershire sauce', '3 tablespoons tomato paste', '2 tablespoons all purpose flour', '1 cup beef broth (240 mL) or red wine', '1 cup mixed peas and carrots (150 g) frozen or canned', '1 cup diced tomato (200 g) canned drained and rinsed', '½ cup frozen corn kernels (75 g) or canned', '½ cup shredded sharp cheddar cheese (50 g)', 'Potato Topping:', '2 cups chicken broth (480 mL)', '4 tablespoons butter', '¼ teaspoon salt', '½ cup sour cream (120 g)', '1 ½ cups potato flakes (150 g)', '2 green onions stems sliced very thin', '½ teaspoon pepper garnish']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F', '2: Melt butter in a skillet over medium-high heat', '3:  Cook the 2 green onions for 5 minutes', '4:  Then, add garlic and cook for 1 minute', '5: Set 2 green onions and garlic aside and in the same skillet, add ground meat', '6:  Cook and stir for 6-8 minutes until thoroughly browned', '7:  Drain & rinse meat in a colander', '8: Add meat back in the skillet over medium-low heat', '9:  Stir in 2 teaspoons dried parsley, 1 teaspoon dried rosemary, 1 teaspoon dried thyme, salt, ½ teaspoon ground black ½ teaspoon pepper, and Worcestershire sauce', '10:  Then, stir in 2 tablespoons all purpose flour, and tomato paste', '11:  Stir until completely well incorporatedStir in broth (or wine), 1 cup mixed peas, carrots, tomatoes and ½ cup frozen corn', '12:  Simmer for 5 minutes', '13: Evenly smooth meat mixture onto bottom of the skillet (or press into the bottom of a 9x9"inch baking dish)', '14:  Sprinkle ½ cup shredded sharp cheddar cheese over the top', '15: Potatoes: Heat broth, butter, and salt in a bowl in the microwave until hot', '16:  Stir in ½ cup sour cream and 1 ½ cups potato flakes and mix with a fork', '17:  Let sit until liquid has been fully absorbed', '18:  (Note: the 1 ½ cups potatoes need to be thick to pipe perfect peaks', '19: Use a "star tip" on a piping bag (or a Ziploc bag with ½ cup frozen corner snipped)', '20:  Fill bag and pipe 1 ½ cups potatoes into skillet or baking dish, covering the meat', '21: Sprinkle 1 cup onion (150 g) chopped 2 green onions & ½ teaspoon ground black ½ teaspoon pepper on top', '22: Bake uncovered for 30 minutes', '23: Serve hot']

ingredients: ['1 lb eggplant peeled and cut into large pieces', '8 oz semisweet chocolate chip (225 g) divided plus more to taste', '2 oz unsweetened chocolate (45 g) chopped', '6 tablespoons maple syrup', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '3 large eggs', '1 cup superfine almond flour (95 g)', '¼ cup dutch processed cocoa  powder (30 g)', '1 teaspoon kosher salt']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: Peel the 1 lb eggplant, then cut in half lengthwise', '3:  Scoop out the seeds, then chop into 1 lb eggplant peeled and cut into 3 large pieces', '4:  Transfer to a steamer basket set over a 1 lb eggplant peeled and cut into 3 large pot of simmering water, cover, and steam for 20 minutes, until the 1 lb eggplant is very soft', '5: Transfer the hot 1 lb eggplant to the bowl of the food processor with 4 ounces (110 g) of 8 oz semisweet chocolate chips, the 2 oz unsweetened chocolate, 6 tablespoons maple syrup, and 1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '6:  The heat from the 1 lb eggplant will melt the chocolate', '7:  Blend on high speed for 2-3 minutes, until very smooth, scraping down the sides of the bowl as needed', '8: In a medium bowl, beat the eggs, then add the 1 cup superfine almond flour, ¼ cup dutch processed cocoa powder, and 1 teaspoon kosher salt, and whisk to combine', '9:  Add the 1 lb eggplant chocolate mixture and fold with a rubber spatula to combine', '10:  Fold in the remaining 8 oz semisweet chocolate chips', '11: Transfer the batter to a greased 8-inch (20-cm) square baking dish and smooth the top', '12:  Top with more chocolate chips, if desired', '13: Bake for 35 minutes, until a toothpick inserted in the center of the brownies comes out clean', '14: Let cool for 20 minutes before slicing']

ingredients: ['2 cans biscuit dough flaky', '3 cups apple slices (360 g)', '2 cups brie cheese (200 g)', '1 tablespoon cinnamon', 'parchment paper', 'nonstick cooking spray', '1 loaf pan 9.5 x 5 in (24 x 12 cm)', 'Preparation', '2 cans biscuit dough flaky', '3 cups apple slices (360 g)', '2 cups brie cheese (200 g)', '1 tablespoon cinnamon', 'parchment paper', 'nonstick cooking spray', '1 loaf pan 9.5 x 5 in (24 x 12 cm)', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C)', '2: Grease loaf pan and line with parchment paper', '3: Separate biscuit dough and flatten slightly', '4: Divide the Brie evenly on biscuit dough', '5: Add fresh apple slices and sprinkle cinnamon on each piece', '6: Place each biscuit in loaf pan until pan is full', '7: Bake for 45 minutes or until golden brown (internal temperature should be 140°F (60°C))']

ingredients: ['4 bananas', '1 tablespoon unsweetened cocoa powder depending on your taste', '¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon', 'strawberry to garnish']
instructions: ['1: Slice 4 bananas and place in an airtight container', '2:  Freeze for at least two hours, preferably overnight', '3: Place frozen banana slices in a food processor and blend until they reach the consistency of soft serve, about 4 minutes', '4: Add 1 tablespoon unsweetened cocoa powder and ¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '5:  Blend until just combined', '6: Serve immediately for soft-serve consistency or transfer to freezer for at least 2 hours for ice cream consistency', '7: Garnish with strawberries']

ingredients: ['15 oz pumpkin puree (425 g) 1 can', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '½ teaspoon nutmeg', '½ teaspoon ground cloves', '½ teaspoon ground ginger', '½ teaspoon salt', '2 eggs', '½ cup maple syrup (170 g)', '1 cup heavy cream (240 mL)', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '1 pie crust prepared', 'Maple Pecan Crumble', '1 ½ cups pecan (185 g)', '¼ cup maple syrup (85 g) plus 1 tablespoon ', '½ teaspoon salt']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 425˚F (215˚C)', '2: In a large mixing bowl, combine pumpkin with 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, ½ teaspoon nutmeg, ½ teaspoon ground cloves, ½ teaspoon ground ginger, and salt and stir until evenly mixed', '3: Add the 2 eggs, maple syrup, 1 cup heavy cream, and 1 teaspoon vanilla', '4:  Slowly stir until evenly incorporated', '5: Place the 1 pie crust in a 9-inch (23 cm) 1 pie pan and shape', '6: Carefully pour 1 pie filling into pan', '7: Bake for 15 minutes at 425˚F (215˚C)', '8: Reduce heat to 350˚F (175˚C) and bake for 40 minutes', '9: For the crumble, combine pecans, maple syrup, and salt', '10:  Stir until well combined', '11: Place pecans on a parchment paper-lined baking tray and bake for 10-12 minutes at 350˚F (175˚C)', '12: Once cooled, crush the caramelized pecans in a plastic bag', '13: Add 1 tablespoon of maple syrup to crushed pecans and top cooled 1 pie']

ingredients: ['2 lb sirloin steak (900 g) cut into 1-inch cubes', '1 tablespoon cumin', '1 tablespoon chili powder', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '2 green bell peppers cut into 1-inch pieces', '2 red bell peppers cut into 1-inch pieces', '1 large white onion cut into 1-inch pieces', 'Equipment', '8 skewers bamboo skewer soaked in water for 20 minutes']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat', '2: Combine the 2 lb sirloin steak, 1 tablespoon cumin, 1 tablespoon chili powder, 1 tablespoon garlic powder, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1 teaspoon 2 2 green bell 2 2 red bell pepper in a medium bowl and mix until the 2 lb sirloin steak is evenly coated', '3: Slide a piece of 2 lb sirloin steak down a skewer, followed by a piece of 2 green 1 teaspoon 2 2 green bell 2 2 red bell pepper, 2 red 1 teaspoon 2 2 green bell 2 2 red bell pepper, and 1 large white onion', '4:  Continue until there is a 1-inch gap on the top of the skewer', '5: Repeat with the remaining 8 skewers', '6: Grease the surface of the grill by rubbing the grates with an oiled paper towel (use tongs to grip!)', '7: Grill the 8 skewers for 10-15 minutes with the lid closed, flipping them halfway through']

ingredients: ['2 medium flour tortillas', '½ cup chicken strip (60 g) or shredded chicken cooked', '½ bell pepper diced', '1 tablespoon taco seasoning', '¼ cup shredded cheddar cheese (25 g)']
instructions: ['1: Microwave the 2 medium flour tortillas on a plate until slightly crispy', '2:  They will dry out a bit as they cool', '3: Mix the ½ cup chicken, peppers, and 1 tablespoon taco seasoning in a bowl until evenly combined, then cook for about 1-2 minutes until the peppers are soft', '4: Spread the mixture evenly on one tortilla, cover evenly with the ¼ cup shredded cheddar cheese, then top with the other tortilla', '5: Cook for another 30 seconds to 1 minute, slice, then serve']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons sesame oil', '1 lb large shrimp (455 g) peeled and deveined', '½ teaspoon salt divided', '2 cups mushroom (150 g) sliced', '1 cup asparagus (125 g) sliced', '1 tablespoon ginger minced', '1 tablespoon low sodium soy sauce']
instructions: ['1: Heat 1 tablespoon of 2 tablespoons sesame oil in a 1 lb large, non-stick skillet over medium heat', '2:  Add the shrimp and season with ¼ ½ teaspoon of salt', '3:  Cook the shrimp for 1 minute on each side, until just pink', '4:  Remove from the pan', '5: Add the remaining tablespoon of oil to the pan', '6:  Toss in the mushrooms, 1 cup asparagus, and remaining ¼ ½ teaspoon of salt and sauté for a few minutes, until the vegetables begin to soften', '7: Add the ginger and soy sauce and sauté until the ginger is fragrant, about 30 seconds', '8: Toss the shrimp back into the pan and mix until everything is well incorporated and the shrimp is fully cooked, about 1 minute', '9: Divide the mixture evenly between 4 bowls']

ingredients: ['Cheesecake:', '8 oz cream cheese (225 g) softened', '¼ cup sugar (50 g)', '1 egg', '½ teaspoon mint extract', '4 drops green food coloring', '1 cup mini chocolate chips (175 g)', 'Brownie:', '½ cup flour (60 g)', '1 cup sugar (200 g)', '⅓ cup dark cocoa powder (40 g)', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '½ cup butter (115 g) melted', '2 eggs']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C)For the cheesecake, in a bowl, beat the 8 oz cream cheese until smooth', '2: Add sugar, 1 2 egg, ½ teaspoon mint extract, and 4 drops green food coloring, and beat until smooth', '3: Fold in the chocolate chips', '4:   Set aside', '5: For the brownie, in a separate bowl, whisk the dry ingredients until combined', '6: Add the butter and 1 2 2 eggs, and beat until smooth', '7: To assemble, fill each cup of a standard, lined muffin tin half full of brownie, then half full of cheesecake mixture', '8: Bake 25 - 30 min']

ingredients: ['3 cups all-purpose flour (375 g)', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ tablespoon sugar', '⅔ cup coconut oil (160 g)', '¾ cup cold water (180 mL)', '1 ½ tablespoons peach preserve', '1 tablespoon butter', '2 peaches diced', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '½ teaspoon cinnamon', '1 egg', '1 cup powdered sugar (200 g)', '2 tablespoons milk']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, combine 3 cups all-purpose flour, ½ teaspoon salt, and sugar', '2: Add the ⅔ cup coconut oil to the dry ingredients and mix together using a fork or your fingers', '3: Add the ¾ cup cold water to the dough, a little at a time, and continue to mix until dough forms a ball', '4: Cut dough into two equal parts and flatten them into 1-inch (2 ½ cm) thick disks', '5:  Wrap the disks in plastic wrap and chill for one hour', '6: Add the 1 ½ tablespoons 2 peach preserves and butter to a small microwave-safe bowl and heat in the microwave for about 20 seconds or until butter has melted', '7:  Stir to combine', '8: Dice the 1 ½ tablespoons 2 2 peaches and put them in a medium bowl', '9: Add the preserve mixture, 2 teaspoons lemon juice, and ½ teaspoon cinnamon to the 1 ½ tablespoons 2 2 peaches and mix until 1 ½ tablespoons 2 2 peaches are well-coated', '10: Remove one of the dough disks from the refrigerator', '11: Lightly 3 cups all-purpose flour your work surface, dough, and rolling pin', '12: Roll out the dough to form a large rectangle about ⅛-inch (3 mm) thick', '13: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)', '14: Cut the dough into an even number of small rectangles', '15: Beat the 1 egg in a small bowl', '16:  Brush the edges of half of the rectangles with the 1 egg wash', '17: Spoon one tablespoon of the 1 ½ tablespoons 2 peach mixture into the center of each brushed rectangle', '18: Place another rectangle of the same size over the one with the filling', '19:  Lightly press down', '20: Use a fork to seal the edges around each rectangle, then lightly poke the tops of each rectangle a few times', '21:  Brush the edges and tops of the dough with the 1 egg wash', '22: Place the pockets on parchment-lined baking sheets and place in the freezer as you repeat the same process with the other dough disk', '23: Bake for 30-35 minutes or until dough is golden brown', '24: For the glaze, mix together 1 cup powdered sugar and 2 tablespoons milk until smooth', '25: Drizzle 1 ½ tablespoons 2 peach pockets with glaze and serve']

ingredients: ['⅔ cup rolled oats (65 g)', '⅔ cup milk (160 mL) of your choice', '½ cup vanilla greek yogurt (120 g)', '1 tablespoon nut butter', '1 teaspoon chia seed optional', '1 tablespoon honey', '½ teaspoon cinnamon', '1 peach diced to serve']
instructions: ['1: In a mason jar or sealable container, add the ⅔ cup rolled oats, ⅔ cup milk, ½ cup vanilla greek yogurt, 1 tablespoon nut butter, 1 tablespoon honey, 1 teaspoon chia seeds, ½ teaspoon cinnamon, and 1 peaches', '2:  Stir together', '3: Seal and place in the refrigerator overnight for up to five days', '4: Top with additional 1 peach slices, if desired']

ingredients: ['18 slices bread white sandwich bread', '3 tablespoons butter softened', '18 slices swiss cheese', '12 slices ham', '4 cups spinach (160 g)', '6 eggs', 'chive chopped to serve', 'Béchamel Sauce', '2 tablespoons butter', '3 tablespoons flour', '2 cups milk', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '2 cups gruyère cheese (220 g) grated', '2 cups grated parmesan cheese (220 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven broiler to high', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: On a cutting board, butter all the sandwich bread and transfer to the prepared baking sheet', '4: Using a glass, cut out the centers of 6 slices of bread', '5: Toast the bread under the broiler for 5 minutes, or until toasted', "6:  Keep a close eye on it so it doesn't burn", '7: Reduce the oven temperature to 350˚F (180˚C)', '8: Make the Béchamel sauce: Melt the butter in a small saucepan over medium heat', '9:  Add the 3 tablespoons flour and whisk until it darkens slightly', '10: Add the milk and whisk to combine', '11:  Reduce the heat to low and simmer until reduced by half', '12: Remove the pot from the heat and add the 1 teaspoon salt, ½ teaspoon pepper, 1 pinch ground nutmeg, Gruyère, and Parmesan and stir until fully incorporated', '13: Line a 9 x 13-inch baking dish with parchment paper', '14: Lay 6 pieces of toast in the bottom of the dish', '15:  Top with 9 slices of Swiss cheese, 6 slices of ham, and 2 cups of spinach', '16:  Repeat to make another layer and top with the hollow-centered toast', '17: Crack an egg into each hole', '18:  Carefully ladle the Béchamel sauce over the bake, leaving the yolks exposed', '19: Cover and bake for 35 minutes, then uncover and bake for 10 minutes more, until the 6 eggs are cooked to your liking and the Béchamel is starting to brown in spots', '20: Slice and chive chopped to serve garnished with chives, if desired', '21: Enjoy! ']

ingredients: ['2 lb kroger beef chuck roast (910 g)', '½ teaspoon kosher salt plus more for taste', '½ teaspoon black pepper plus more to taste', '2 tablespoons canola oil', '2 cups yellow onion (300 g) diced', '2 cups celery (450 g)', '2 cups carrot (240 g) diced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '1 cup red wine (240 mL)', '2 cups beef stock (480 mL)', '28 oz diced tomatoes (425 g)', '1 teaspoon dried rosemary', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 bay leaf', 'egg noodle cooked for serving', 'Preparation', '2 lb kroger beef chuck roast (910 g)', '½ teaspoon kosher salt plus more for taste', '½ teaspoon black pepper plus more to taste', '2 tablespoons canola oil', '2 cups yellow onion (300 g) diced', '2 cups celery (450 g)', '2 cups carrot (240 g) diced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '1 cup red wine (240 mL)', '2 cups beef stock (480 mL)', '28 oz diced tomatoes (425 g)', '1 teaspoon dried rosemary', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 bay leaf', 'egg noodle cooked for serving', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Cut the beef into cubes, then season generously with salt and pepper', '2: Heat the canola oil in a large Dutch oven or pot over medium high  heat', '3:  Working in batches, sear the beef on all sides until well browned', '4:  Do not overcrowd the pan', '5:  Transfer the meat to a plate and set aside', '6: Add the onion, celery, carrots, and garlic to the pan and cook until tender, about 5 minutes', '7: Add the tomato paste to the center of the pot and cook for 1 minute', '8:  Stir the tomato paste into the vegetables and continue cooking until fragrant, about 5 minutes', '9: Pour in the wine to deglaze the pan, scraping up any browned bits from the bottom of the pot with a wooden spoon', '10: Add the beef stock and tomatoes and stir to combine, then add the rosemary, thyme, pepper, salt, and bay leaf', '11:  Return the beef to the pot, making sure it is submerged in the braising liquid', '12: Bring to a boil, then cover, reduce the heat to low, and simmer until the meat is tender, about 3 hours', '13: Shred larger pieces of beef with a fork or tongs', '14:  Serve the braised beef and sauce over cooked egg noodles']

ingredients: ['3 tablespoons oil', '1 lb ground beef (455 g)', '1 tablespoon kosher salt plus more to taste', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '1 tablespoon chili powder', '1 tablespoon smoked paprika', '1 teaspoon cayenne', '1 large yellow onion chopped', '1 red bell pepper seeded and chopped', '6 cloves garlic minced', '2 chipotle peppers in adobo sauce chopped', '12 oz tomato paste (340 g)', '12 oz chopped tomato (340 g) 1 can', '2 cups beef broth (480 mL)', '15 oz black beans (425 g) 1 can drained and rinsed', '15 oz red kidney bean (425 g) 1 can drained and rinsed', '1 lb french fries (455 g) cooked hot', 'shredded cheddar cheese for serving', 'sour cream for serving', 'green onion sliced for serving']
instructions: ['1: Heat the 3 tablespoons oil in a 1 large pot over medium-high heat', '2:  Add the beef and stir to break up', '3:  Season with the 1 tablespoon kosher salt, pepper, 1 tablespoon ground cumin, 1 tablespoon chili powder, 1 tablespoon smoked paprika, and 1 teaspoon cayenne', '4:  Stir and cook until deep brown in color, 10-15 minutes', '5: Add the onion, 1 red bell pepper, 6 cloves garlic, chipotles, and a pinch of 1 tablespoon kosher salt', '6:  Cook until the vegetables are softened, about 10 minutes', '7: Add the 12 oz 12 oz chopped tomato paste and cook until it darkens, becomes aromatic, and starts sticking to the bottom of the pan, 10 minutes', '8: Add the chopped 12 oz 12 oz chopped tomatoes, beef broth, 1 teaspoon 15 oz black beans, and kidney beans', '9:  Stir to incorporate, then bring to a boil', '10:  Cover, reduce the heat to low, and simmer for at least 30 minutes or up to 2 hours', '11: Ladle the 1 tablespoon chili over the 1 lb french fries and top with shredded cheddar cheese, sour cream, and green onions']

ingredients: ['1 banana', '2 eggs', '¼ teaspoon cinnamon', 'maple syrup or honey to serve']
instructions: ['1: In a bowl, mash the 1 banana with a fork', '2: Add 2 eggs and ¼ teaspoon cinnamon', '3:  Mix until combined', '4: Heat a nonstick skillet over medium heat', '5:  Add a spoonful of batter and cook for 3-4 minutes, then flip and cook for an additional 3-4 minutes', '6: Serve with maple syrup or honey']

ingredients: ['1 banana sliced', '1 cup strawberry (150 g)', '1 cup rasberries (125 g)', '2 cups milk (480 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Mix fruits together in a plastic bag', '2: Seal bag and place in freezer for up to 6 months', '3: When ready, mix 2 cups milk and fruit in a blender until consistency is smooth']

ingredients: ['½ lb firm tofu (300 g) crumbled and drained', '½ cup brown onion (50 g) diced', '½ lb pearl oyster mushrooms (200 g) chopped', 'red chili sliced', '5 teaspoons ginger finely chopped', '2 tomatoes diced and deseeded', '1 cup water (200 mL)', '1 bunch fresh thai basil or holy basil', '½ lime juiced', 'Cooking sauce:', '2 tablespoons light soy sauce', '1 tablespoon dark soy sauce', '2 ½ tablespoons vegan oyster sauce', '1 tablespoon coconut sugar', 'More saltIness:', 'vegan fish sauce']
instructions: ['1: Add ½ lb firm tofu and crumble into a hot pan with oil and shallow-fry until it has golden crust outside', '2: Saute onions, 5 teaspoons ginger and red chili until aromatic', '3:  Add 2 tomatoes, ½ lb pearl oyster mushroom, and fried ½ lb firm tofu crumbles', '4: Add 2 tablespoons light 1 tablespoon dark soy sauce, vegan oyster sauce and 1 tablespoon coconut sugar', '5:  Then add 1 cup water, simmer and reduce the sauce by half', '6: Squeeze ½ lime juice in and add Thai basil', '7:  Let basil wilt', '8: Serve warm']

ingredients: ['1 cup almond meal (90 g)', '1 ⅓ cups powdered sugar (160 g)', '90 g large egg white (90 g) cold', '⅓ cup sugar (70 g)', '¼ cup graham cracker (15 g)', '1 cup heavy whipping cream (240 mL) hot to the touch', '2 cups semi-sweet chocolate chips (350 mL)', '18 jumbo marshmallows']
instructions: ['1: Note: This recipe contains higher dry ingredients to wet ingredients ratio, so macarons do not need to form a “shell” before baking into the oven', '2: Preheat the oven to 300˚F (150˚C)', '3: Whisk the 90 g large egg whites until they stick to the bowl', '4: Add the 1 ⅓ cups powdered ⅓ cup sugar to the whipped 90 g large egg whites and beat until stiff peaks form', '5: Sift 1 ⅓ cups powdered 1 ⅓ cups powdered ⅓ cup sugar, 1 cup almond meal, and ¼ cup graham crackers to the whipped 90 g large egg whites', '6:  Gently fold ingredients together', '7: Transfer the batter to a piping bag and pipe directly onto a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '8: Bake for 20 minutes', '9: In a bowl, add the hot 1 cup heavy whipping cream and 2 cups semi-sweet chocolate chips and whisk to combine', '10: Put the 2 cups semi-sweet chocolate filling in a piping bag and refrigerate for 2 hours, until firm', '11: Pipe filling onto the macaron shells', '12: Place a marshmallow between two macaron shells, creating a sandwich', '13: Gently place a skewer into the macarons, then lightly toast with a torch', '14: Refrigerate macarons for another 2 hours before serving']

ingredients: ['Chicken Wings', '1 ½ lb chicken wings (680 g)', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '¼ teaspoon salt', 'Teriyaki Sauce', '½ cup soy sauce (120 mL)', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '2 tablespoons honey', '1 tablespoon sesame seed']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 250˚F (130˚C)', '2: Place 1 ½ lb chicken wings in a large bowl and pat dry', '3: Add the 2 teaspoons baking powder and ¼ teaspoon salt to the 1 ½ lb chicken wings', '4:  Stir to coat', '5: Spray a 2 teaspoons baking rack with nonstick cooking spray and place on top of a foiled sheet pan', '6:  Distribute 1 ½ lb chicken wings evenly on top, making sure none of them touch and they are all face-up', '7: Bake for 35 minutes, then increase the temperature to 425˚F (220˚C) and bake for an additional 45 minutes, or until 1 ½ lb chicken wings are crisp and golden', '8:  (Do not remove the 1 ½ lb chicken wings from the oven when increasing temperature', '9: )For sauce, in a hot pan, bring ½ cup soy sauce to a boil', '10: Stir in 2 tablespoons brown sugar and 2 tablespoons honey', '11: Add in 1 tablespoon sesame seeds and stir until slightly thickened and bubbling', '12: Add 1 ½ lb chicken wings and stir to coat']

ingredients: ['2 apples', '2 eggs', '1 cup full-fat greek yogurt (285 g)', '⅓ cup honey (110 g)', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '2 ½ cups rolled oats (200 g)', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 pinch salt', '1 tablespoon ground cinnamon', '1 cup almond milk (240 mL)', 'Optional Toppings', '¼ cup blueberry (25 g) as desired', '¾ cup dried cranberries (95 g) as desired', 'sliced almond as desired', 'rasberry as desired']
instructions: ['1: Peel the skin from the 2 apples and grate on the coarse side of a cheese grater', '2:  Set aside', '3:  (To prevent browning, place grated 2 apples in a bowl and cover with lemon juice and water', '4:  Drain before adding to the batter', '5: )Preheat oven to 350°F/180°C', '6: In a large bowl, beat the 2 eggs with a whisk until foamy and pale', '7: Add the 1 cup full-fat greek yogurt, ⅓ cup honey, and 2 teaspoons vanilla, to the bowl and whisk until the mixture is thick and well combined', '8: Sprinkle on the rolled oats, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1 pinch salt, 1 tablespoon ground cinnamon, and the grated apple', '9: Use a spatula to fold the wet and dry ingredients together', '10: Pour in the almond milk and continue mixing until everything is well incorporated', '11: Using a medium ice cream scoop, portion the batter into 12 muffin tin 2 ½ cups lined with cupcake liners', '12: Top with your choice of toppings', '13: Bake for 35-40 minutes, until the muffins have set and just started to turn golden brown']

ingredients: ['Filling', '5 apples diced', '½ lemon juiced', '1 ½ cups cranberry (150 g)', '2 tablespoons cornstarch', '3 tablespoons sugar', '¼ cup maple syrup (55 g)', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', 'Topping', '1 cup rolled oats (100 g)', '⅓ cup brown sugar (70 g)', '3 tablespoons flour', '4 tablespoons butter', '½ teaspoon salt', 'ice cream to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: In a large bowl, gently combine 5 apples, ½ lemon juice, cranberries, 2 tablespoons cornstarch, 3 tablespoons ⅓ cup ⅓ cup brown sugar, ¼ cup maple syrup, and 1 teaspoon cinnamon', '3: Pour into a 9x13-inch (23x33cm) baking dish and bake for 30 minutes', '4: In another bowl, combine 1 cup rolled oats, ⅓ cup brown 3 tablespoons ⅓ cup ⅓ cup brown sugar, 3 tablespoons flour, 4 tablespoons butter, and ½ teaspoon salt until well-incorporated', '5: Sprinkle the oat topping evenly over the baked fruit and bake for another 15 minutes, or until the crust is golden ⅓ cup brown', '6: Serve with ice cream on top']

ingredients: ['Pho-Flavored Rice', '½ cup O Organics jasmine rice (100 g)', '1 cup O Organics Beef Flavored Pho Broth (240 mL)', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', 'Marinated Ribeye', '¼ cup O Organics soy sauce (60 mL)', '2 tablespoons fish sauce', '2 tablespoons O Organics honey', '3 O Organics garlic cloves chopped', '¼ teaspoon O Organics cinnamon', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '2 tablespoons rice vinegar', '1 lb O Organics boneless ribeye steak (455 g)', '1 tablespoon canola oil', '3 tablespoons hoisin sauce', 'Rice Bowl', '½ cup O Organics cremini mushrooms (75 g) sliced', '½ cup O Organics rainbow baby carrots (75 g) sliced thin', '5 O Organics baby bell peppers sliced thin', '½ cup bean sprout (50 g) washed', '2 O Organics eggs fried sunny-side up', '2 tablespoons O Organics chives sliced for garnish', '¼ cup O Organics basil (10 g) for garnish chopped', '¼ O Organics mint for garnish chopped', '2 slices lime', '2 fresh thai chili peppers thinly sliced for garnish (optional)']
instructions: ['1: Pho rice: In a small saucepan with lid, combine rice, O Organics Beef Flavored Pho Broth, and salt', '2:  Bring to a boil', '3:  Cover and reduce to a simmer', '4:  Let simmer, covered for 20 minutes or until all liquid has been absorbed by the rice', '5:  Remove from heat, fluff rice with a fork, and set aside', '6: Marinated 1 lb O Organics boneless ribeye: In a medium bowl, mix together ¼ cup O Organics soy sauce, 2 tablespoons fish sauce, 2 tablespoons O Organics honey, chopped 3 O Organics garlic, ¼ teaspoon O Organics cinnamon, kosher salt, and rice vinegar', '7:  Prick holes in the 1 lb O Organics boneless ribeye with a fork and place in marinade for 20 minutes, flipping once after 10 minutes', '8: In a medium cast iron skillet, heat 1 tablespoon canola oil over medium-high heat and sear 1 lb O Organics boneless ribeye for 5 minutes on one side and then 3 minutes on the other side or until desired temperature is reached', '9:  Transfer the 1 lb O Organics boneless ribeye to a plate and brush with 3 tablespoons hoisin sauce and allow to rest', '10: Rice Bowl: In the same skillet as the steak, add mushrooms and cook for 5 minutes, tossing occasionally', '11:  Remove the mushrooms from the skillet and set aside', '12: Slice the rested steak on a bias as thin as possible', '13: In two shallow bowls, evenly divide pho rice', '14:  Top rice with marinated 1 lb O Organics boneless ribeye, ½ cup O Organics cremini mushrooms, ½ cup O Organics rainbow ½ cup O Organics rainbow 5 O Organics baby carrots, ½ cup O Organics rainbow 5 O Organics baby bell peppers, ½ cup bean sprouts, and sunny-side up egg', '15: Garnish with 2 tablespoons O Organics chives, ¼ cup O Organics basil, ¼ O Organics mint, 2 slices lime, and Thai chili peppers', '16: Enjoy! ']

ingredients: ['Salmon', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '¼ cup maple syrup (75 g)', '2 tablespoons orange juice', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 clove garlic minced', 'pepper to taste', 'salt to taste', '4 oz salmon fillet (115 g) 2 fillets', 'fresh parsley for garnish', 'Broccoli', '1 lb broccoli floret (455 g)', 'salt to taste', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 clove garlic minced', '1 teaspoon lemon  zest', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes']
instructions: ['1: For the 4 oz salmon, heat 1 tablespoon vegetable oil on medium-high in a cast-iron skillet', '2: For the 1 lb broccoli, fill a medium pot halfway with water', '3:  Add a dash of salt and start boiling water', '4: In the meantime, whisk together ¼ cup maple syrup, orange juice, 2 tablespoons 1 tablespoon soy sauce, garlic, salt, and 1 teaspoon 1 teaspoon red pepper in a medium bowl', '5: Set aside 2 tablespoons for topping later', '6: Place 4 oz salmon fillets inside the bowl and make sure each side is covered with sauce', '7: Sear the 4 oz salmon 2-3 minutes on each side', '8: Brush the tops with the sauce set aside', '9: With the pot of water boiling, add the 1 lb broccoli and cover lid', '10:  Blanch for 2 minutes', '11: Drain under cold water to stop the cooking', '12: In the drained pot of 1 lb broccoli, stir in butter, 2 tablespoons 1 tablespoon soy sauce, 1 teaspoon red 1 teaspoon 1 teaspoon red pepper flakes, some 1 teaspoon lemon zest, and garlic on low heat', '13:  Mix until 1 lb broccoli is well-coated', '14: On each plate, serve a filet of 4 oz salmon and scoop of 1 lb broccoli', '15: Top with reserved marinade and sprinkle fresh parsley for garnish']

ingredients: ['2 cups rolled oats (200 g)', '½ cup almond (70 g) sliced', '½ teaspoon cinnamon', '¼ teaspoon salt', '3 tablespoons coconut oil melted', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '¼ cup maple syrup (55 g)', '2 tablespoons honey', 'greek yogurt to serve', 'assorted berry to serve']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: In a large bowl, mix together the 2 cups rolled oats, almonds, ½ teaspoon cinnamon, ¼ teaspoon salt, 3 tablespoons coconut oil, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, ¼ cup maple syrup, and 2 tablespoons honey until well combined', '4: Transfer the mixture onto a the prepared baking sheet and spread into an even layer', '5: Bake for 20 minutes', '6: Carefully remove from the oven and allow to cool for 10 minutes', '7: Break up the layer into chunks with your hands', '8: Store in an airtight container for up to 1 month', '9: Serve with Greek yogurt and fresh berries, if desired']

ingredients: ['8 oz reduced fat cream cheese (225 g)', '¼ cup nonfat greek yogurt (70 g)', '2 cups canned artichoke heart (335 g) drained and chopped', '2 cups frozen spinach (310 g)', '1 cup low fat mozzarella cheese (100 g)']
instructions: ['1: Add all ingredients into a slow cooker and stir until combinedCook on high for 4 hours, or until all cheese is melted']

ingredients: ['10 cups red wine (2.5 L)', '5 cups pineapple juice (1 ¼ mL)', '2 cups sugar (400 g)', '2 oranges thinly sliced', '3 cinnamon sticks', '10 cloves', '10 black peppercorns', '2 fresh gingers 1-inch (2-cm)', 'orange sliced into wheels for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Add the 10 cups red wine, 5 cups pineapple juice, and 2 cups sugar to a slow cooker', '2:  Whisk to dissolve the 2 cups sugar', '3: Add the sliced 2 2 oranges, 3 cinnamon sticks, 10 cloves, 10 black peppercorns, and ginger', '4: Turn the heat to high, cover, and warm for 30-60 minutes, until steaming', '5:  Once steaming, 10 cups reduce the heat setting to warm', '6: Ladle into mugs and garnish with 2 orange wheels']

ingredients: ['Sauce', '1 cup sour cream (230 g)', '2 tablespoons lime juice', '1 tablespoon lime zest', '1 teaspoon salt', 'Coleslaw', '1 cup red cabbage (100 g) julienned', '1 cup green cabbage (100 g) julienned', '1 jalapeño minced', '1 lime lime juice', 'Shrimp', '1 lb shrimp (455 g) peeled and deveined', 'salt  to taste', '1 cup flour (125 g)', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon smoked paprika', '¼ teaspoon cayenne', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '1 cup beer (235 mL)', 'oil for frying', 'To Serve', 'corn tortilla to serve', 'guacamole to serve', 'radish sliced', 'fresh cilantro']
instructions: ['1: In a small bowl, combine the 1 cup sour cream, lime juice, lime zest, and salt and mix well', '2: In another bowl, combine the 1 cup red cabbage, 1 cup green cabbage, 1 jalapeño, 2 2 tablespoons of the 1 cup sour cream sauce mix, lime juice and salt', '3:  Mix until fully incorporated', '4: Season the 1 lb shrimp with a big pinch of salt', '5: Combine 1 cup flour, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, 1 teaspoon smoked paprika, ¼ teaspoon cayenne, salt and ½ teaspoon baking powder in a medium size bowl and mix well', '6:  Add 1 cup beer and stir well', '7: Add 1 lb shrimp into the batter, making sure each is fully coated', '8: Heat oil in a pot to 350˚F (180˚C)', '9:  Fry the 1 lb shrimp in batches for 4 - 5 minutes, or until golden brown', '10: Transfer the 1 lb shrimp to a paper towel-lined plate', '11: Top a corn tortilla with guacamole, rainbow coleslaw, fried 1 lb shrimp, a drizzle of 1 cup sour cream sauce, radish sliced radishes, and fresh cilantro', '12: Nutrition  Calories: 3063 Fat: 276 grams  Carbs: 85 grams Fiber: 9 grams  Sugars: 11 grams  Protein: 60 grams']

ingredients: ['12 tablespoons butter divided', '2 ¼ cups flour (280 g) divided', '1 ½ cups chicken stock (355 mL)', 'salt to taste', '1 tablespoon fresh rosemary chopped', '1 tablespoon fresh thyme chopped', '2 cups frozen mixed vegetable (300 g)', '2 cups turkey breast (250 g) cooked and shredded', '1 ½ teaspoons baking soda', '¾ cup buttermilk (175 mL)', '¼ cup heavy cream (60 mL) optional']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '2: In a 10-inch (25 cm) cast iron skillet, melt 4 tablespoons of butter over medium heat', '3:  Add the ¼ cup (30 g) of 2 ¼ cups flour, and cook, stirring constantly, until smooth', '4: Add the 1 ½ cups chicken stock and salt to taste', '5:  Cook until the stock has reduced and thickened', '6: Add in the 1 tablespoon fresh rosemary, 2 cups frozen vegetables, 2 cups turkey, and additional salt, and stir until fully mixed', '7:  Remove from the heat', '8: Add remaining 2 ¼ cups flour, 1 ½ teaspoons baking soda, 8 tablespoons of butter, and pinch of salt to a bowl', '9:  Using a wooden spoon or your hands, mix together until the butter is the size of peas', '10: Add the buttermilk and mix until the dough barely comes together, about 1 minute', '11: Place the dough on a 2 ¼ cups floured countertop and gently form into a 1½-inch (4 cm) thick layer', '12: Use a 3-inch (6 cm) round cutter to cut 10-12 biscuits, rerolling the dough as needed', '13: Place the biscuits on the 2 cups turkey in the cast iron skillet', '14:  Brush the top of the biscuits with heavy cream (optional)', '15:   Bake for 20-25 minutes, until biscuits are golden brown', '16: Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['2 fillets salmon', '2 oz honey (50 g)', '1 handful sesame seed', 'Marinade/Sauce', '½ cup soy sauce (100 mL)', '½ lemon juiced', '1 oz ginger (25 g) chopped', '1 red chili sliced', '4 cloves garlic minced', '1 pinch sea salt', 'Garnish', 'sesame seed to taste', 'spring onion to taste', 'red chili to taste']
instructions: ['1: Cut the 2 fillets salmon into bite-size cubes', '2:  Set aside', '3: Prepare the marinade by mixing the ½ cup soy sauce, ½ lemon juice, 1 oz ginger, chilli, 4 cloves garlic, and 1 pinch sea salt together', '4: Mix the 2 fillets salmon into the marinade, cover, and marinate for 15-30 minutes', '5: In a large pan with a little oil, pour in the marinade and add the 2 oz honey and sesame seeds', '6: Mix together until it starts to bubble and gets thicker/saucier', '7: Add the 2 fillets salmon and fry for a couple of minutes on each side', '8: Take off the heat and garnish with more sesame seeds, spring onion, red chilli, and cocktail sticks']

ingredients: ['25 mini candy canes', '4 cups chocolate chips (700 g)', '½ teaspoon peppermint extract', '3 cups white chocolate chip (525 g)']
instructions: ['1: Place the 25 mini candy canes in a zip top bag and use a rolling pin to crush them into small chunks', '2:  Transfer to a medium bowl', '3: In a separate medium bowl, stir the ½ teaspoon peppermint extract into the melted 4 cups 3 cups 3 cups white chocolate chips', '4:  Pour onto a parchment paper-lined baking sheet and spread evenly with a spatula', '5:  Freeze for 5 minutes', '6: Take the pan out of the freezer and pour the melted 3 cups white 4 cups 3 cups 3 cups white chocolate over the 4 cups 3 cups 3 cups white chocolate, spreading evenly with a spatula', '7: Sprinkle the crushed 25 mini candy canes over the 3 cups white 4 cups 3 cups 3 cups white chocolate', '8: Freeze for at least 1 hour', '9: Remove the bark from the freezer and break into pieces']

ingredients: ['Spring Rolls', 'warm water', '8 rice paper wrappers', '1 cup white mushroom (75 g) sliced', '2 medium carrots sliced', '½ english cucumber sliced', '1 cup red cabbage (100 g) sliced', '½ yellow bell pepper sliced', 'Peanut Sauce', '¼ cup natural peanut butter (60 g)', '½ teaspoon ginger minced optional', '2 tablespoons sesame oil', '2 tablespoons rice wine vinegar', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '2 teaspoons maple syrup', '1 pinch red pepper flakes']
instructions: ['1: Fill a 2 medium shallow bowl with warm water and set near your work station', '2: Dip a rice paper wrapper in the warm water for a few seconds, submerging completely', '3:  Remove and lay flat on a smooth, clean surface, such as a plate', '4: Add your desired combination of 1 cup white mushroom (75 g) 2 2 medium carrots ½ english ½ english cucumber 1 cup red cabbage (100 g) ½ yellow ½ yellow bell pepper sliced mushrooms, 1 cup white mushroom (75 g) 2 2 medium carrots ½ english ½ english cucumber 1 cup red cabbage (100 g) ½ yellow ½ yellow bell pepper sliced carrots, 1 cup white mushroom (75 g) 2 2 medium carrots ½ english ½ english cucumber 1 cup red cabbage (100 g) ½ yellow ½ yellow bell pepper sliced ½ english cucumber, 1 cup white mushroom (75 g) 2 2 medium carrots ½ english ½ english cucumber 1 cup red cabbage (100 g) ½ yellow ½ yellow bell pepper sliced cabbage, and 1 cup white mushroom (75 g) 2 2 medium carrots ½ english ½ english cucumber 1 cup red cabbage (100 g) ½ yellow ½ yellow bell pepper sliced ½ yellow bell pepper to the middle of the wrapper', '5:  Be careful not to overfill, or rolling it will become difficult', '6: Working quickly, before the rice paper dries out, fold both sides of the rice paper over the vegetables to secure', '7: Lift the bottom edge of the rice paper and carefully fold it over the top of the vegetables, tucking it under on the other side, then gently roll until the vegetables are completely covered and the top edge of the wrapper adheres to the spring roll', '8: Set the spring roll aside and cover with a damp paper towel to keep fresh while you repeat with the remaining ingredients', '9:  Once you’ve finished making the spring rolls, chill in the fridge while you make the sauce', '10: Make the Peanut Sauce: Add the ¼ cup natural peanut butter, ½ teaspoon ginger (if using), 2 tablespoons sesame oil, rice wine vinegar, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, and 2 teaspoons maple syrup to a small bowl', '11:  Whisk until combined', '12: Transfer the sauce to a small serving bowl and sprinkle with red pepper flakes', '13: Serve the chilled spring rolls with the sauce']

ingredients: ['6 large eggs', '½ cup baby spinach (20 g) roughly chopped', '¼ cup crumbled feta cheese (40 g)', '¼ cup diced tomato (50 g) about half a Roma tomato', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: Spray a six-cup muffin tray with nonstick spray', '3: In a bowl, add the 6 large eggs, spinach, feta, tomato, ½ teaspoon salt, and ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper, and stir to distribute ingredients', '4: Distribute the mixture evenly between the muffins cups', '5: Bake until the 6 large eggs are set, about 15 minutes']

ingredients: ['3 russet potatoes', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 cup shredded cheddar cheese (100 g) plus more for topping', '½ cup scallions (50 g) chopped', '¾ cup bacon (170 g) chopped divided', '½ cup sour cream (115 g) plus more for topping', '1 tablespoon butter', '¼ cup milk (60 mL)', '1 teaspoon pepper', 'chive to serve']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Carefully pierce 3 russet potatoes with a fork', '3:  On a baking sheet 2 tablespoons olive oil the 3 russet potatoes well and sprinkle with 2 teaspoons salt', '4: Bake for one hour', '5:  If making more 3 russet potatoes, an additional 15 minutes per potato is needed', '6: Once cooled, cut the 3 russet potatoes vertically, scoop out the inside, and transfer to a bowl', '7: In the bowl with the scooped out potato, add the cheese, scallions, ½ cup (110 g) of bacon, sour cream, 1 tablespoon butter, milk, and 1 teaspoon pepper, and mix well', '8: Scoop the potato mixture back into the hollowed-out 3 russet potatoes and top with cheddar cheese and remaining ¼ cup (55 G) of bacon bits', '9: Bake an additional 15 minutes until the cheese is melted', '10: Serve warm with sour cream and chives']

ingredients: ['3 thai eggplants', '6 oz chicken breast (170 g) thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 can coconut milk', '2 tablespoons green curry paste', '3 tablespoons fish sauce', '3 tablespoons granulated sugar', '2 oz bamboo shoot strip (55 g)', '5 kaffir lime leaves', '2 oz red bell pepper (55 g) sliced', '1 can coconut milk', '1 cup fresh thai sweet basil (10 g)', 'white rice cooked for serving', 'Green Curry Paste', '1 teaspoon cumin seed', '1 teaspoon coriander seed', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon white peppercorn', '2 stalks lemongrass trimmed and thinly sliced', '7 cloves garlic sliced', '10 thai green chilis', '5 small shallots sliced', '½ cup fresh cilantro stem (20 g)', '3 oz kaffir lime peel (85 g)', '3 oz galangal (85 g) sliced', '½ cup kaffir lime leaf (5 g)', '1 cup fresh thai sweet basil (10 g)', '2 tablespoons shrimp paste', 'Basil Oil (optional)', '1 cup fresh thai sweet basil (10 g)', '¼ cup vegetable oil (60 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Cut the tops and bottoms off the eggplant and cut into quarters', '2: Thinly slice the 6 oz chicken breast crosswise', '3:  Set aside', '4: Prepare the green curry paste', '5:  In a large skillet over medium heat, toast the 1 teaspoon cumin seeds and 1 teaspoon coriander seeds until golden and fragrant, about 2-3 minutes', '6:  Transfer to a pestle or bowl', '7: Add the 1 teaspoon salt and pound with a mortar until the spices are broken up', '8:  Continue pounding as you add the white peppercorns, 2 stalks lemongrass, kaffir lime peel, 3 oz galangal, 7 cloves garlic, Thai green chilis, ½ cup fresh cilantro stems, Thai basil, kaffir leaves, 5 small shallots, and shrimp paste, until a coarse paste forms', '9: Heat a medium skillet over medium heat', '10:  Add vegetable oil, 2 tablespoons of green curry paste, and 3 tablespoons of basil oil (if using)', '11: Add a splash of the coconut milk, stirring until it forms a paste', '12: Add the sliced 6 oz chicken breast, the rest of the coconut milk, and the eggplant', '13: Season with the fish sauce and sugar', '14:  Increase the heat to medium high and bring to a boil', '15:  Once boiling, cook for 2-3 minutes', '16: Stir in the 2 oz bamboo shoots, kaffir leaves, and 2 oz red bell pepper, cooking for 3-4 minutes until bell peppers have slightly softened', '17: Add the Thai basil', '18:  Remove the curry from the heat and serve with white rice']

ingredients: ['6 full-size chicken wings', '2 cups oil (500 mL) for frying', 'Marinade', '2 teaspoons chilli powder', '2 tablespoons ginger garlic paste', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', 'Batter', '½ cup flour (60 g)', '½ cup cornflour (60 g)', '1 tablespoon chilli powder', '1 egg', '¼ cup water (60 mL)', 'Preparation', '6 full-size chicken wings', '2 cups oil (500 mL) for frying', 'Marinade', '2 teaspoons chilli powder', '2 tablespoons ginger garlic paste', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', 'Batter', '½ cup flour (60 g)', '½ cup cornflour (60 g)', '1 tablespoon chilli powder', '1 egg', '¼ cup water (60 mL)', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Add all the marinade ingredients to a bowl and mix until fully combined, set aside', '2: Slice a full-size chicken wing into three parts along the joints', '3:  Discard the wing-tip (or you can save them for making a chicken stock)', '4: For the drummet (the upper, meaty, one-bone part of the wing), cut along the circumference of the thin end so that the bone and the meat are no longer connected', '5:  Then push down the meat so the drummet becomes a lollipop', '6: For the winglet (the middle, two-bone part of the wing), separate where the two bones join, and also cut along the circumferences of both ends, so the bone and the meat are no longer connected', '7:  Take out the thinner bone, and push down the meat into one end of the thinner bone', '8: Place the prepared chicken lollipops in the marinade', '9:  Stir and cover', '10:  Marinate in the fridge for at least 1 hour', '11: Mix all batter ingredients until smooth without lumps', '12: Dip the meat end of the chicken lollipops into the batter', '13: In a medium-sized pot, heat the oil to 170˚C (340˚F)', '14:  Deep fry the chicken for 5 minutes or until the batter becomes golden brown and the chicken is cooked throughout']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil divided', '½ cup onion (75 g) minced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 cup apple (120 g) minced', '1 cup baby bella mushroom (75 g) minced', '1 teaspoon fennel seeds', '1 teaspoon dried rosemary', '1 teaspoon sage powder', '1 tablespoon maple syrup', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '15 oz cannellini bean (425 g) 1 can drained and rinsed', '½ cup chickpeas (100 g) canned rinsed and drained or cooked', '1 cup vital wheat gluten (125 g) or all-purpose flour']
instructions: ['1: Heat 1 2 1 tablespoon of 2 2 1 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat', '2:  Add the ½ cup onion and 2 cloves garlic and cook for about 4 minutes, until fragrant and the ½ cup onion is translucent', '3: Add the 1 cup apples, 1 cup baby bella mushrooms, 1 teaspoon fennel seeds, 1 teaspoon dried rosemary, 1 teaspoon sage, maple syrup, salt, and pepper and stir to combine', '4:  Reduce the heat to medium-low and cook for about 10 minutes, until the mixture is tender and the liquid released from the 1 cup baby bella mushrooms has evaporated', '5:  Remove from the heat and let cool', '6: Add the 15 oz cannellini beans and ½ cup chickpeas to a food processor and pulse into a smooth paste', '7: Transfer the bean paste to a large bowl and add the 1 cup apple/mushroom mixture and 1 cup vital wheat gluten', '8:  Mix with a spatula and then your hands until well combined', '9: Form the sausage mixture into a loaf, wrap in plastic wrap, and refrigerate for 2 hours', '10: Unwrap the chilled sausage mixture and divide into 10-12 equal pieces, depending on what size sausages you would like', '11:  Roll a piece between your palms into a sausage shape', '12:  Place in the center of a large sheet of plastic wrap and roll the plastic over it so the sausage is completely encased', '13:  Twist the ends of the wrap and knot them together tightly', '14:  Repeat for each sausage', '15: Bring a large pot of water to a simmer', '16:  Plunge the wrapped sausages in the water and simmer for 45-50 minutes, until the sausages are firm', '17:  Remove from the water and let cool for about 5 minutes, then unwrap', '18: Heat the remaining 2 1 tablespoon of 2 2 1 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet over medium-low heat', '19:  Fry the sausages for 1-2 minutes on each side, until golden brown', '20: Serve immediately or keep wrapped in the refrigerator for up to 4 days']

ingredients: ['⅓ cup rolled oats (35 g)', '⅓ cup unsweetened almond milk (80 mL) + ½ cup (120ml) optional', '½ cup plain greek yogurt (140 g)', '1 tablespoon almond butter', '1 teaspoon honey', '½ teaspoon chia seed', '½ teaspoon cinnamon', '½ peach diced']
instructions: ['1: In a mason jar or sealable container, add the ⅓ cup rolled oats, almond milk, ½ cup plain greek yogurt, almond butter, 1 teaspoon honey, ½ teaspoon chia seeds, ½ teaspoon cinnamon, and peaches', '2:  Make sure the ⅓ cup rolled oats and almond milk are at the bottom of the container so that they properly soak', '3: Seal and place in the refrigerator overnight', '4: Enjoy as is, or pour the ingredients into a blender with the additional almond milk and blend until smooth', '5: Pour the mixture back into the mason jar and take your overnight ⅓ cup rolled oats on the go']

ingredients: ['Filling', '3 tablespoons unsalted butter', '¼ cup all-purpose flour (30 g)', '3 cups milk (720 mL)', '1 rotisserie chicken shredded', '1 ½ cups frozen pea and carrot (225 g)', '½ cup frozen pearl onion (75 g)', '1 cup small potato (225 g) diced', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '2 teaspoons black pepper', 'Cheddar Biscuits', '4 cups biscuit flour (500 g) plus more for dusting', '4 teaspoons baking powder', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 cup unsalted butter (230 g) 2 sticks cubed very cold', '1 cup buttermilk (240 mL)', '1 large egg beaten', '1 cup shredded cheddar cheese (100 g)', '¼ cup chives (10 g) chopped']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 375ºF (190ºC)', '2: Make the filling: Melt the butter in a 1 large cast-iron skillet over medium-high heat', '3:  Add the the ¼ cup all-purpose 4 cups 4 cups biscuit flour and whisk until bubbling', '4: Whisk in the 3 cups milk until smooth, then add the 1 rotisserie chicken, 1 ½ cups frozen ½ cup frozen peas and carrots, 1 ½ cups frozen ½ cup frozen ½ cup frozen pearl onions, potato, salt, and 2 teaspoons black pepper ', '5:  Stir until everything is well coated, then continue to cook until the filling is bubbling and the liquid has thickened slightly, 7-10 minutes', '6:  Remove the pan from the heat', '7: Make the 4 cups biscuits: In a 1 large bowl, stir together the ¼ cup all-purpose 4 cups 4 cups biscuit flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt', '8: Using your a fork, your hands, or a pastry cutter, work the butter into the dry ingredients, leaving 1 ½ cups frozen ½ cup frozen pea-sized chunks', '9: Add the 1 cup buttermilk and fold with a rubber spatula until a thick dough comes together', '10: Turn the dough out onto a lightly ¼ cup all-purpose 4 cups 4 cups biscuit floured surface', '11:  Bring the dough together into one 1 large mass, then roll out with a rolling pin to about 1 ½-2 inches (4-5 centimeters) thick', '12: Using a 2-3-inch (5-7 centimeter) 4 cups biscuit cutter or 1 cup small glass dipped in ¼ cup all-purpose 4 cups 4 cups biscuit flour, cut out rounds from the dough', '13:  Cut out all of the rounds, then place on top of the filling so the dough does not warm too much', '14:  Re-roll the dough scraps if needed', '15:  You should have about 10 4 cups biscuits total', '16: Brush tops of the 4 cups biscuits with the beaten egg and top with 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese', '17: Bake for 25-30 minutes, until the 4 cups biscuits are golden brown and cooked through', '18:  Carefully remove from the oven and let cool for 10 minutes', '19:  Garnish with ¼ cup chives before serving']

ingredients: ['2 salmon fillets', '3 tablespoons miso', '1 tablespoon sugar', '2 tablespoons sake', '2 tablespoons mirin']
instructions: ['1: In a small bowl, combine 3 tablespoons miso, 1 tablespoon sugar, 2 tablespoons sake and 2 tablespoons mirin', '2: In a shallow container, combine the marinade and 2 salmon', '3:  Marinate at least 30 minutes in the fridge', '4: Heat the pan over medium low heat', '5:  place a parchment paper in a pan', '6:  Place 2 salmon on top of the parchment paper so 2 salmon doesn’t burn', '7:  Cook 6-7 minutes both side or 2 salmon gets the nice grill mark and color becomes opaque']

ingredients: ['⅔ cup light brown sugar (135 g) packed', '¼ cup vegetable oil (60 mL)', '¾ cup water (180 mL)', '1 ¼ cups self-rising flour (155 g)', '¼ cup rice flour (30 g)', '4 teaspoons double acting baking powder', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', 'Equipment', '8 fluted egg tart molds', '1 steamer basket']
instructions: ['1: Fill a large pot one third of the way with water and bring to a boil over high heat', '2:  Place a 2-tier 1 steamer basket on top', '3:  Grease 8 3-inch 8 fluted egg tart molds with nonstick spray', '4: Add the brown sugar, butter, and water to a small saucepan', '5:  Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the sugar has dissolved, about 5 minutes', '6:  Remove the pot from the heat and let the mixture cool to room temperature, about 10 minutes', '7: In a medium bowl, sift together the self-rising and rice flours and 4 teaspoons double acting baking powder', '8:  Whisk to combine', '9: Slowly fold the sugar syrup into the dry ingredients with a rubber spatula until evenly combined and no dry spots remain', '10: Fill each prepared egg tart mold to the top with batter, about ¼ cup each', '11: Working in batches if needed, place the molds in the 1 steamer basket and cover', '12:  Cook for about 20 minutes, until the cakes rise and crack open', '13:  Do not open the lid while cooking or the cakes will not rise', '14:  Carefully transfer the cakes to a wire rack and let cool to room temperature', '15:  Remove the cakes from the molds before serving']

ingredients: ['Dressing', '2 tablespoons hummus', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '½ teaspoon water', 'Salad', 'nonstick cooking spray', '½ cup broccoli floret (75 g)', '½ cup chickpeas (100 g)', '½ cup brussel sprout (50 g) halved', '½ cup sweet potato (100 g) peeled and chopped', '½ cup tofu (125 g) pressed and chopped', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL)', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 tablespoon chili powder', '1 cup spinach (40 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400℉ (200℃)', '2:  Grease a baking sheet with nonstick spray', '3: Reserve a few ½ cup broccoli florets, then place the remaining ½ cup broccoli, ½ cup chickpeas, Brussels sprouts, ½ cup sweet potato, and ½ cup tofu on the baking sheet in individual piles', '4:  Drizzle with the olive oil and season with salt, pepper, and 1 tablespoon chili powder', '5:  Bake for 25 minutes, until the vegetables are tender and the ½ cup tofu is browned', '6: Make the dressing: In a large mason jar, combine the 2 tablespoons hummus, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, olive oil, 1 teaspoon dried thyme, salt, pepper, and ½ teaspoon water', '7:  Stir to combine', '8: Add the reserved raw ½ cup broccoli, the roasted ½ cup broccoli, ½ cup sweet potato, ½ cup chickpeas, Brussels sprouts, ½ cup tofu, and 1 cup spinach and screw on the lid', '9: Store in the refrigerator until ready to eat, up to 5 days', '10: Give the mason jar a good shake to mix and use a fork or spoon to stir as needed']

ingredients: ['½ rack baby back ribs', '3 tablespoons cajun seasoning', '1 cup BBQ sauce (290 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 250°F (120°C)', '2: Rub the Cajun seasoning evenly over the top and bottom of the ½ rack baby back ribs', '3: Bake for 2 hours, until ½ rack baby back ribs are tender', '4: Increase oven temperature to 500°F (260°C)', '5: Brush the BBQ 1 cup BBQ sauce evenly over the top and the sides', '6: Bake for an additional 15 minutes, until the 1 cup BBQ sauce is bubbly and caramelized', '7: Serve with the extra BBQ 1 cup BBQ sauce!']

ingredients: ['Buns', '1 cup warm water (240 mL)', '2 tablespoons sugar', '1 ½ teaspoons instant dry yeast', '3 cups plain flour (375 g)', '1 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '2 tablespoons sesame oil', 'Pork', '1 lb pork belly (500 g)', '¼ cup spring onion (30 g) Chopped in half', '½ cup ginger (30 g) sliced', '4 tablespoons cooking wine', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '¼ cup garlic (15 g)', '3 tablespoons sugar', '2 tablespoons five spice', '4 tablespoons soy sauce', '4 tablespoons dark soy sauce', '2 cups water (500 mL)', '½ cup pickled cabage (50 g)', '½ cup coriander (30 g) finely chopped', '¼ cup crushed peanut (50 g) finely chopped']
instructions: ['1: The Buns: In a measuring jug, place the sugar and 1 cup warm 1 cup warm 2 cups water', '2:  Stir until the sugar is dissolved', '3: Add the active yeast, then stir and set aside for 10-15 minutes', '4: In a large bowl, mix together the 3 cups plain flour and 1 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '5: Add the yeast mixture to the bowl and stir until nearly combined', '6: Add the oil, then stir until fully incorporated', '7: Turn the dough out onto a 3 cups plain floured work surface and knead for 10-15 minutes', '8: Once the dough is smooth, return it to the bowl, cover with plastic wrap, and leave for 1 hour until the dough has doubled in size', '9: Remove the dough from the bowl and knock it back by kneading for 1 minute', '10: Cut into 10 equal pieces', '11: Roll each piece into a ball, place onto a lined 1 ½ teaspoons baking sheet, cover with plastic wrap and rest for 10 minutes', '12: Onto a 3 cups plain floured work surface, flatten each ball with the palm of your hand', '13: Roll out to 2 millimetres', '14: Lightly brush one side with 2 tablespoons sesame oil, then fold in half and place back onto the 1 ½ teaspoons baking sheet', '15:  Cover and rest for 20 minutes', '16: Set steamer over a high heat, then steam buns for 8-10 minutes', '17: The Pork: Slice the 1 lb pork belly into 1 inch-thick (2 ½ cm) pieces', '18: Fill a large pot with 1 cup warm 2 cups water', '19:  Put in the 1 lb pork, ¼ cup spring onion, ½ cup ginger, and 4 tablespoons cooking wine', '20:  Bring the 1 cup warm 2 cups water to boil', '21: Drain the 1 lb pork and discard the remaining 1 cup warm 2 cups water and vegetables', '22:  Clean and 1 ½ teaspoons instant dry the pot', '23: Return the pot to a high heat and add oil', '24: Fry the 1 lb pork until it browned', '25: Add ¼ cup garlic, ¼ cup spring onion, ½ cup ginger, sugar, five 2 tablespoons five spice, 4 tablespoons cooking wine, and 4 tablespoons dark and light 4 tablespoons 4 tablespoons 4 tablespoons dark soy sauce', '26:  Stir until all the ingredients are well combined', '27: Add the 1 cup warm 2 cups water, stir, and cover', '28: Reduce to a low heat and simmer for about 45 minutes to an hour', '29:  Check and stir every 10 minutes or so and add 1 cup warm 2 cups water if the pot is getting 1 ½ teaspoons instant dry', '30: BaoFill one bun with one slice of 1 lb pork, top with ½ cup coriander, ½ cup pickled cabbage, and roasted ¼ cup crushed peanuts']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons oil', '1 lb medium shrimp (455 g) peeled and deveined', '1 large head romaine lettuce chopped', '4 tomatoes diced', '½ jalapeño deseeded and finely diced\n optional', '¼ red onion finely diced', '2 tablespoons fresh cilantro minced', '1 large avocado diced', '½ teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons lime juice or 1 lime', 'Taco Seasoning', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '¼ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon chili powder']
instructions: ['1: Heat the 2 tablespoons oil in a skillet over 1 lb medium-high heat', '2: Toss in the shrimp and immediately season with the taco seasoning', '3:  Sauté the shrimp just until each piece has started to turn pink, about 2 minutes', '4:  Remove from heat', '5: In a large bowl, combine the lettuce, shrimp, 4 tomatoes, jalpeño, ¼ red onion, 2 tablespoons fresh cilantro, avocado, salt, and 2 tablespoons lime juice, and mix until the salad is well-combined', '6: Serve with tortilla strips, if desired']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 cup yellow onion (150 g) chopped', '1 cup green pepper (100 g) diced', '1 ½ cups fresh cilantro (60 g) chopped plus more for serving', '5 cloves garlic chopped', '½ cup white cooking wine (120 mL)', '14.5 oz diced tomato (410 g) 2 cans', '15 oz tomato sauce (425 g) 1 can', '2 tablespoons sofrito', '2 tablespoons recaito', '3 tablespoons spanish green olive', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 lb chuck roast (455 g) or stew beef', '2 cups chicken broth (480 mL)', '4 cups water (960 mL)', '1 lb chicken drumstick (455 g)', '3 ears corn shucked broken into large pieces', '2 russet potatoes peeled and cubed', '1 yucca peeled and cubed', '2 plantains sliced into 2 in (5 cm) pieces', 'avocado halved for serving', 'white rice cooked for serving', 'lime wedge for serving']
instructions: ['1: Heat the 2 tablespoons 3 tablespoons 3 tablespoons spanish 3 tablespoons 3 tablespoons spanish green olive oil in a large pot over medium heat', '2: Add the 1 cup yellow onion, 1 cup 3 tablespoons 3 tablespoons spanish green 1 cup 3 tablespoons 3 tablespoons spanish green pepper, 1 ½ cups fresh cilantro, and 5 cloves garlic', '3:  Cook until the 1 cup yellow onions are translucent, about 5 minutes', '4: Add the ½ cup white cooking wine, 1 cup 3 tablespoons 3 tablespoons spanish green 1 cup 3 tablespoons 3 tablespoons spanish green pepper (100 g) 14', '5: 5 oz diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, 2 tablespoons sofrito, 2 tablespoons recaito, Spanish 2 tablespoons 3 tablespoons 3 tablespoons spanish 3 tablespoons 3 tablespoons spanish green olives, 2 teaspoons ground cumin, salt, and 1 cup 3 tablespoons 3 tablespoons spanish green pepper', '6:  Stir for 2-3 minutes to allow the flavors to meld', '7: Add the 1 lb chuck roast (455 g) or stew beef', '8:  Increase the heat to high and cook for 2-3 minutes, until the meat is cooked through', '9: Add the chicken broth and 4 cups water', '10:  Stir to combine', '11:  Add the chicken, 3 ears corn, 2 russet potatoes, and yuca', '12:  Stir well', '13:  Cover and cook over medium-high heat for about 45 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the meat is tender and the 2 russet potatoes are softened', '14: Reduce the heat to low and add the 2 plantains', '15:  Simmer uncovered for 15 minutes, until the 2 plantains are tender', '16: Garnish the soup with 1 ½ cups fresh cilantro and serve with avocado halved avocados, white rice, and lime wedges, if desired']

ingredients: ['For the salmon:', '1 ½ lb salmon fillet (600 g)', '2 cups beetroot (250 g) grated', '1 bunch fresh dill finely chopped', '½ lemon grated lemon zest', '15 mL lemon juice (15 mL)', '½ cup sea salt (80 g)', '½ cup caster sugar (130 g)', '40 mL gin (40 mL)', 'For the pickle:', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion onion finely chopped', '½ cup tonic water (100 mL)', '½ cup caster sugar (100 g)', '1 cup fresh coriander (30 g) finely chopped', '¼ cup red chilli (30 g) finely chopped', '¼ cup lime juice (30 mL)', '1 oz white wine vinegar (30 mL)', '20 g fresh ginger (20 g) grated', '2 tablespoons honey', '2 tablespoons corn flour', '1 lime lime zest', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '1 pinch of black pepper']
instructions: ['1: In a mixing bowl, add the sugar, salt, lemon juice, lemon zest, 40 mL 20 g fresh gin, 2 cups beetroot and 1 bunch fresh dill and mix together well', '2: Cover the For the 1 ½ lb salmon with the cure and spread out evenly', '3:  Lay cling-film over the top and refrigerate for 24 hours', '4: In a saucepan add the 4 tablespoons olive oil, 1 onion, 1 cup fresh coriander, 40 mL 20 g fresh ginger, lime juice, lime zest, 2 tablespoons honey, salt, 1 pinch of black pepper, 1 oz white wine vinegar, ½ cup tonic water and cornstarch', '5:  Mix well on a medium heat for 2 minutes, reduce to a low heat and simmer for 20', '6:  Remove from heat and empty into an airtight jar or container', '7: Remove For the 1 ½ lb salmon from fridge and rinse the cure off with cold water, pat dry with kitchen roll and slice thinly at an angle being sure not to include the skin on the slices', '8: Serve with salad and the lime ½ cup tonic pickle ']

ingredients: ['Cookie Dough Layer', '2 cups almond flour (200 g)', '3 tablespoons coconut flour', '¼ cup coconut sugar (35 g)', '3 tablespoons coconut oil melted', '¾ cup nut butter (180 g) creamy', '¼ cup dark chocolate chunk (40 g)', 'Dark Chocolate Layer', '1 cup dark chocolate chip (175 g)', '2 tablespoons coconut oil melted', 'sea salt for topping']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, add 2 cups almond flour, coconut flour, and coconut sugar', '2:  Stir to combine', '3: Add the nut butter and coconut oil', '4:  Combine until the mixture resembles cookie dough', '5: Fold in dark chocolate chunks', '6: Transfer the “cookie dough” into an 8x8-inch (20x20-cm) parchment paper-lined baking dish and mold it with your hands to fit the dish', '7: Transfer to freezer while making the chocolate layer', '8: In a microwave safe bowl or measuring cup, melt chocolate and coconut oil and then pour on top of the cookie dough, making sure to spread it evenly across', '9: Sprinkle with sea salt and freeze', '10: When ready, slice into squares, and serve', '11: Try with different combinations']
