ingredients: ['Shrimp Cakes', '1 lb fresh shrimp (455 g) peeled and deveined', '1 medium shallot minced', '1 jalapeño minced', '2 large eggs beaten', '¾ cup panko bread crumbs (40 g)', '1 tablespoon fresh chives minced', '1 lemon zested', '1 teaspoon smoked paprika', '½ teaspoon cayenne', 'kosher salt to taste', '½ lemon juiced', '1 teaspoon worcestershire sauce', '¼ cup high-heat cooking oil (60 mL) such as peanut or organic canola', 'Roasted Red Pepper Sauce', '8 oz roasted red pepper (225 g) 1 jar drained liquid reserved', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons raw almond', '½ small shallot roughly chopped', '2 cloves garlic', '1 pinch salt', '¼ cup extra virgin olive oil (60 mL)', 'Salad', '4 cups arugula (80 g)', '4 cups watercress (135 g)', '1 drizzle olive oil', '1 lemon juiced', '1 pinch kosher salt', '1 pinch pepper']
instructions: ['1: Make the 1 lb fresh shrimp cakes: Add the 1 lb fresh shrimp to a food processor and pulse 4-5 times, until minced but not mushy', '2: In a 2 large bowl, mix together the 1 lb fresh shrimp, 1 medium ½ small shallot, 1 jalapeño, eggs, panko, 1 tablespoon fresh chives, lemon zest, 1 teaspoon smoked paprika, ½ teaspoon cayenne, a pinch of kosher 1 pinch 1 pinch kosher salt, the lemon juice, and Worcestershire sauce until well combined', '3: Using a 1-ounce (30-g) scoop, portion out the 1 lb fresh shrimp mixture and gently flatten into patties', '4: Heat the oil in a 1 medium skillet over 1 medium heat', '5:  Cook the patties, in batches if necessary, for 2-3 minutes on each side, until golden brown and the internal temperature reaches 145˚F (63˚C)', '6:  Transfer the cooked patties to a paper towel-lined plate to drain and season lightly with kosher 1 pinch 1 pinch kosher salt', '7: Make the 8 oz roasted 8 oz roasted 2 tablespoons red pepper sauce: Add the peppers, 8 oz roasted 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar, almonds, 1 medium ½ small shallot, 2 cloves garlic, and a pinch of kosher 1 pinch 1 pinch kosher salt to a blender', '8:  Blend for 30 seconds, until smooth', '9:  With the blender running, slowly stream in the olive oil to emulsify', '10:  Thin with the reserved 8 oz roasted 2 tablespoons red pepper liquid, if necessary', '11: Assemble the salad: Add the arugula and watercress to a 2 large bowl', '12:  Add a 1 drizzle of olive oil, the lemon juice, and a pinch of kosher 1 pinch 1 pinch kosher salt and pepper', '13:  Toss well', '14: Divide the salad between serving bowls and top with the 1 lb fresh shrimp cakes and 8 oz roasted 8 oz roasted 2 tablespoons red pepper sauce', '15: Enjoy!Nutrition: Shrimp cakes - Per serving: 4 cakes - Calories: 393, Total fat: 20 grams, Sodium: 1419 mg (shrimp is a naturally high source of sodium), Total carb: 21 grams, Dietary fiber: 2 grams, Sugars: 3 grams, Protein: 32 gramsNutrition: Salad - Per serving: 2 cups - Calories: 38, Total fat: 4 grams, Sodium: 39 mg, Total carb: 2 grams, Dietary fiber: 0 grams, Sugars: 1 gram, Protein: 1 gramNutrition: Red Pepper Sauce - Per serving: ~ ¼ cup - Calories: 176, Total fat: 17 grams, Sodium: 36 mg, Total carb: 6 grams, Dietary fiber: 1 gram, Sugars: 3 grams, Protein: 1 gram,Nutrition: Total recipe - Per serving - Calories: 607, Total fat: 41, Sodium: 1535 mg (shrimp is a naturally high source of sodium), Total carb: 29 grams, Dietary fiber: 3 grams, Sugars: 7 grams, Protein: 34 grams']

ingredients: ['½ cup unsalted butter (115 g) melted', '⅔ cup brown sugar (145 g)', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '⅓ cup peanut butter (80 g)', '1 cup all-purpose flour (125 g)', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '1 cup mini peanut butter cup (175 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a bowl, add the ½ cup unsalted ⅓ cup peanut 1 cup mini peanut butter and ⅔ cup brown sugar, and stir to combine', '2: Add the 1 egg and mix until fully incorporated', '3: Stir in the peanut ½ cup unsalted ⅓ cup peanut 1 cup mini peanut butter and 1 teaspoon vanilla', '4: Add the 1 cup all-purpose flour, ½ teaspoon salt, and ½ teaspoon baking soda', '5: Gently fold in the peanut ½ cup unsalted ⅓ cup peanut 1 cup mini peanut butter cups', '6: Chill dough for at least 1 hour', '7: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '8: Once dough is chilled, scoop out a ball about 2 inches (5 cm) wide', '9:  Place on a parchment paper-lined ½ teaspoon baking sheet, leaving about 2-inches (5 cm) in between each ball of dough', '10: Bake for 8 to 10 minutes, until bottom edges of cookies are golden', '11: Let cookies cool', '12:  Can be stored in an airtight container up to 5 days']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 small onion finely diced', '2 carrots finely diced', '2 stalks celery finely diced', '3 cloves garlic minced', '2 italian  sausages casings removed 1 sweet 1 hot', '1 lb ground sirloin (500 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '1 tablespoon italian seasoning', '½ cup red wine (120 mL)', '28 oz crushed tomato (795 g)', '16 oz beef broth (455 mL)', '2 bay leaves', '1 cup parmesan cheese (100 g)', '½ cup heavy cream (120 mL)', '1 lb penne pasta (500 g) cooked to box instructions', 'Garnish', 'parmesan cheese shavings']
instructions: ['1: In a large pot, set on medium heat, add the 1 tablespoon olive oil and sauté the onions, 2 stalks celery, 2 carrots, and 3 cloves garlic until they are soft, about 10-15 minutes', '2: Add 3 cloves garlic and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes', '3: Add the 1 lb ground 16 oz beef and the sausages', '4:  Season with salt and pepper, and break up the meat with a spoon and frying until no longer pink', '5: Next, add the tomato paste, Italian seasoning, and ½ cup red wine', '6:  Stir and ½ cup reduce until the wine has almost completely evaporated', '7: Now add all the remaining ingredients, except the parmesan and ½ cup heavy cream', '8:  Stir to ensure everything is well mixed', '9: Simmer for 30 minutes to 3 hours', '10:  The longer the simmer, the deeper and more concentrated the flavor', '11: Stir in the parmesan and ½ cup heavy cream to the sausage bolognese', '12: Add the cooked 1 lb penne pasta to the sauce', '13: Serve with more parmesan, if desired']

ingredients: ['1 cup wholewheat noodles (60 g) cooked', '1 tablespoon garlic puree', '½ teaspoon chili flakes', '½ teaspoon fennel seeds', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 tablespoon white wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons peanut butter', '4 tablespoons fresh parsley chopped', '¼ cup sesame oil (60 g)', 'Optional toppings:', 'peanut', 'fresh parsley', 'pickled ginger']
instructions: ["1: Add all the ingredients, except the 1 cup wholewheat noodles and ¼ cup sesame oil to a large heatproof bowlHeat the ¼ cup sesame oil in a pan til smokingPour the ¼ cup sesame oil over the ingredients, it'll sizzle! Whisk togetherToss through the 1 cup wholewheat noodles until nicely coatedPut into your favourite bowl and top with peanuts, parsley & pickled gingerDevour, cry with happiness!"]

ingredients: ['1 ⅓ cups water (320 mL) divided', '1 egg beaten', '1 pinch salt', 'chive chopped for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Bring a medium pot with about 1 cup (240 ml) of 1 ⅓ cups water, just enough to cover the bottom of the pan by an inch (2 cm), to a boil', '2: Add the beaten 1 egg to a ramekin and sprinkle in a 1 pinch of salt', '3: While slowly stirring with a fork, pour in the remaining 1 ⅓ cups water', '4: Cover with foil and place the ramekin into the boiling 1 ⅓ cups water', '5:  Cover and steam for 12 minutes', '6:  Uncover, carefully remove the ramekin, and take off the foil', '7: Top with chives if you like']

ingredients: ['¼ cup vegetable oil (60 mL)', '1 lb string bean (450 g)', '1 tablespoon garlic', '1 teaspoon ginger', '3 scallions chopped', '4 oz shiitake mushrooms (115 g)', '½ lb ground pork (230 g)', '4 dried red chilies', '1 tablespoon chili paste', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon rice wine', 'white pepper dash']
instructions: ['1: In a large pan or wok, heat the ¼ cup vegetable oil over high', '2:  Fry the 1 lb string beans until they start blistering', '3:  Remove the 1 lb string beans', '4: In the same pan or wok, add the 1 tablespoon garlic, 1 teaspoon ginger, and 3 scallions', '5:  Fry until fragrant', '6: Add the 4 oz shiitake mushrooms and ½ lb ground pork', '7:  Fry until the pork is mostly done', '8:  Stir in the the 4 dried red 4 dried red 1 tablespoon chilies and 4 dried red 1 tablespoon chili paste', '9: Add the 1 lb string beans back the pan/wok', '10:  Toss to combine everything', '11:  Add the 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 tablespoon rice wine, and a dash of white pepper', '12:  Serve!']

ingredients: ['5 lb bone-in short ribs (2.25 kg) English cut 4-5 inches (10-12 cm) long', 'kosher salt to taste', 'black pepper to taste', '1 lb dried shiitake mushroom (455 g)', 'boiling water', '2 tablespoons canola oil', '1 medium yellow onion chopped', '½ cup pear (115 g) Asian grated', '1 piece fresh ginger 2-inch(5 cm) peeled and sliced', '5 scallions chopped (white parts only)', '3 cloves garlic cloves crushed', '¼ cup rice wine (60 mL)', '3 tablespoons sugar', '½ cup light soy sauce (120 mL)', '½ cup dark soy sauce (120 mL)', '2 tablespoons gochujang Korean', '2 tablespoons mirin', '2 tablespoons sesame oil', 'For Serving', 'cooked white rice', 'kimchi', 'sliced scallion', 'toasted sesame seed']
instructions: ['1: Generously season the 5 lb bone-in short ribs all over with kosher salt and black pepper', '2:  Let sit at room temperature while you prepare the rest of the ingredients', '3: Add the 1 lb dried shiitake mushrooms to a large heatproof bowl and pour in enough boiling water to cover', '4:  Cover with plastic wrap and let soak for 1 hour', '5: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '6: Heat the 2 tablespoons canola oil in a large Dutch oven over 1 medium-high heat until almost smoking', '7:   Working in 2 batches, sear the 5 lb bone-in short ribs on all sides until deeply browned and crispy, about 10 minutes total', '8:  Remove the ribs from the pot and transfer to a plate', '9: To pan with excess oil and beef fat, add the onion, Asian pear, 1 piece fresh ginger, 5 scallions, and 3 cloves garlic, then cook over 1 medium heat, stirring occasionally, until softened and slightly browned, about 10 minutes', '10: Add the ¼ cup cooked white rice wine and stir to scrape up any browned bits from the bottom of the pot', '11: Add the drained shiitake mushrooms, 1 cup (240 ml) of the shiitake soaking liquid, the 3 tablespoons sugar, light and dark soy sauces, 2 tablespoons gochujang, 2 tablespoons mirin, and 2 tablespoons toasted sesame oil', '12:  Stir and bring to a boil', '13: Nestle the 5 lb bone-in short ribs back into the sauce, cover, and braise in the oven for 3 hours, or until the 5 lb bone-in short ribs are tender enough to fall off the bone', '14: Serve the 5 lb bone-in short ribs over ¼ cup cooked white rice with the braising liquid spooned on top', '15:  Top with kimchi, 1 piece fresh ginger 2-inch(5 cm) peeled and sliced 5 scallions, and toasted 2 tablespoons toasted sesame seeds']

ingredients: ['2 frozen bananas', '3 scoops dairy-free vanilla ice cream', '2 tablespoons cocoa powder', '¼ cup mint leaf (10 g)', '⅔ cup dairy-free milk (160 g)', '¼ cup ice cube (50 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a blender, combine 2 frozen bananas, dairy-free ice cream, 2 tablespoons cocoa powder, fresh ¼ cup mint, dairy-free ⅔ cup dairy-free milk, and ice cubes', '2: Blend until combined']

ingredients: ['3 bananas cut into coins and frozen', '2 tablespoons creamy peanut butter', '1 tablespoon cocoa powder', '¼ cup milk (60 mL) of choice']
instructions: ['1: Cut 3 bananas into coins and place in freezer in a sealable bag', '2:  Freeze overnight or until solid', '3: Place all ingredients into a food processor or blender and blend until smooth', '4: Pour contents into a loaf or small pan', '5: Freeze one hour or until solid']

ingredients: ['1 banana', '½ cup cottage cheese (110 g)', '2 tablespoons diced strawberries', '2 tablespoons sliced almonds', '1 tablespoon honey', '1 teaspoon chia seeds', '¼ cup whipped cream (60 mL) optional', '1 cherry optional']
instructions: ['1: Slice the 1 banana in half lengthwise, then place on a plate or in a bowl', '2: Using an ice cream scoop, scoop 2 dollops of ½ cup cottage cheese on top of the 2 tablespoons sliced 1 banana', '3: Sprinkle the 2 tablespoons diced strawberries and almond slices over the ½ cup cottage cheese', '4: Drizzle the 1 tablespoon honey over everything and sprinkle the 1 teaspoon chia seeds on top', '5: Top the whole thing with a dollop of ¼ cup whipped cream and a 1 cherry']

ingredients: ['1 butternut squash peeled and cubed', '½ white onion chopped roughly', 'olive oil to taste', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'nutmeg to taste', '1 cup vegetable broth (235 mL)', '1 cup almond milk (240 mL)', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes optional', '1 teaspoon dried sage', '1 head broccoli steamed', '8 oz whole wheat pasta (225 g) cooked', 'grated parmesan cheese to serve']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Add 1 butternut squash and ½ white onion to a parchment paper-lined baking sheet, and season with olive oil, salt, 1 teaspoon 1 teaspoon red pepper, and nutmeg', '3: Roast for 25-30 minutes, or until tender', '4: Add roasted squash and ½ white onion to a food processor or blender', '5:  Add 1 cup vegetable broth, 1 cup almond milk, and blend until smooth', '6: In a large sauce pot over medium heat, add olive oil, 2 cloves garlic, 1 teaspoon red 1 teaspoon 1 teaspoon red pepper flakes, and 1 teaspoon dried sage', '7:  Cook for about 1 minute, or until fragrant', '8:  Add squash puree and bring to a simmer, stirring occasionally', '9: Add cooked 8 oz whole wheat pasta and steamed 1 head broccoli and stir to combine', '10: Top with Parmesan, and serve']

ingredients: ['7 tablespoons butter', '4 oz cream cheese (100 g)', '½ cup milk (130 mL)', '8 eggs yolk', '¼ cup flour (60 g)', '¼ cup cornstarch (60 g)', '13 large egg whites', '⅔ cup granulated sugar (130 g)', 'hot water for baking', 'powdered sugar for serving', '1 pt Strawberries (340 g) for serving']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 320°F (160°C)', '2: In a small pot over medium heat, whisk together the 7 tablespoons butter, 4 oz cream cheese, and ½ cup milk until melted and smooth', '3:  Remove from the heat and let cool', '4: In a 13 large bowl, whisk the egg 8 eggs yolks until smooth, then slowly drizzle in the 4 oz cream cheese mixture, stirring until evenly combined', '5: Sift in the ¼ cup flour and the ¼ cup cornstarch, whisking to make sure there are no lumps', '6: In another 13 large bowl, beat the egg whites with a hand mixer until soft peaks form', '7:  Gradually add the ⅔ cup granulated powdered sugar while continuing to beat until stiff peaks form', '8: Fold about ¼ of the egg whites and into the 8 eggs yolk mixture, then repeat with the remaining egg whites until the batter is evenly combined', '9: Grease the bottom of a 9 x 3-inch (23 x 7', '10: 5 cm) round cake pan, then line the bottom and sides with parchment paper', '11:  If using a springform pan, make sure to wrap the bottom and sides completely in foil twice to prevent any leakage', '12: Pour the batter into the pan and shake to release any 13 large air bubbles', '13: Place the pan into a 13 larger baking dish lined with 2 paper towels at the bottom', '14:  The paper towels ensure that the heat is distributed evenly along the bottom of the pan', '15:  Fill the 13 larger pan about 1-inch (2-cm) high with hot water', '16: Bake for 25 minutes, then reduce the heat to 285°F (140°C), and bake for another 55 minutes, until the cake has risen to almost double its original height', '17: Remove from oven, and carefully invert the cake onto your dominant hand and peel off the paper', '18:  Be extremely careful, the cake will be hot', '19:  You can also invert the cake onto a plate, but this will cause the cake to deflate more', '20: Dust the top of the cake with powdered ⅔ cup granulated powdered sugar, then slice and serve with strawberries while still warm!']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon salt divided', '¾ teaspoon ground black pepper divided', '1 large egg', '2 tablespoons plain breadcrumbs', '2 teaspoons olive oil', '1 boneless skinless chicken breast', '½ teaspoon minced garlic about 1 small clove', '¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 ½ cups eggplant (540 g) diced (about half a small eggplant)', '1 cup crushed tomato (260 g) with juice', '1 slice fresh mozzarella cheese', '1 tablespoon fresh basil chopped']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375°F (190˚C)', '2: Combine 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour with ½ teaspoon salt and ½ teaspoon pepper in a wide bowl', '3:  Crack 1 large 1 ½ cups egg into another bowl, whisk it, and place 2 tablespoons plain breadcrumbs into a third bowl', '4: Coat 1 boneless skinless chicken in 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour, then 1 large 1 ½ cups egg, then 2 tablespoons plain breadcrumbs', '5: Heat 1½ 2 teaspoons olive oil in a skillet over medium heat', '6:   Cook 1 boneless skinless chicken breast until crispy and golden, about 3 minutes on each side', '7:  Remove 1 boneless skinless chicken from pan and set aside', '8: Add remaining olive oil, garlic, red pepper flakes, and 1 large 1 ½ cups 1 ½ cups eggplant to pan and cook until tender, about 3 minutes', '9: Add remaining salt, pepper, and 1 cup crushed tomatoes', '10:   Remove pan from heat, top with 1 boneless skinless chicken breast, and place 1 slice fresh mozzarella on top', '11: Bake until cheese is melted, about 12 minutes', '12: Garnish with chopped 1 tablespoon fresh basil']

ingredients: ['2 cups cantaloupe (300 g) peeled and cubed', '1 cucumber peeled and cubed', '1 orange bell pepper diced', '1 ¼ teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon red wine vinegar', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL) plus more for drizzling', '1 ¼ cups prosciutto (80 g) thinly sliced', '¼ bunch fresh basil picked', 'freshly cracked pepper for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Preheat your oven to 400 degrees', '2:   On a parchment lined baking sheet, place your 1 ¼ cups prosciutto slices in a single layer', '3:   Bake for 10 - 12 minutes, until the 1 ¼ cups prosciutto crisps, then remove and set aside', '4: In a blender, combine the 2 cups cantaloupe, 1 cucumber, 1 orange bell pepper, 1 ¼ teaspoons salt, 1 teaspoon red wine vinegar, and ¼ cup olive oil', '5:   Blend very well until extremely smooth', '6:   Strain into an air-tight container and allow to chill in the fridge for at least an hour (this can be made the day before serving as well)', '7: When ready to serve, portion the chilled soup evenly into bowls, then garnish with ¼ bunch freshly picked basil, a few pieces of the crisped 1 ¼ cups prosciutto, an extra drizzle of ¼ cup olive oil, and a ¼ bunch fresh crack of black pepper']

ingredients: ['1 cup instant corn masa flour (115 g)', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '4 dried california chiles dried', '2 ½ teaspoons salt divided', '1 clove garlic', '4 medium tomatoes', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ lb skirt steak (225 g) carne asada', '½ teaspoon all-purpose meat seasoning', '2 cups corn oil (480 mL)', 'For Serving', 'refried bean', 'iceberg lettuce shredded', 'mexican crema', 'queso fresco']
instructions: ['1: In a 4 medium bowl, mix the masa flour and ½ cup (120 ml) of water together with your hands', '2:  Once combined, add the rest of the water and knead until the dough forms a smooth ball', '3: Heat a large pan or griddle over 4 medium-high heat', '4: Pat the dough out into 6 flat circles', '5: Fry the dough, turning frequently, until just lightly brown about 5 minutes', '6: Once the dough is cooked, shape the sopes by pinching the sides up to form a wall around the edge', '7:  Set aside to cool', '8: Rip the stems off the 4 ½ teaspoon dried chiles and discard the seeds', '9:  Rinse the chiles, if necessary', '10: Add the chiles to a small pot of water and bring to a boil over high heat', '11:  Once boiling, remove the pot from the heat', '12: Transfer the chiles and their cooking liquid to a blender and add 1 teaspoon of 2 ½ teaspoons salt and the 1 clove garlic', '13:  Blend until smooth', '14:  Set aside', '15: Add the tomatoes to a small pot of water and bring to a boil', '16:  Cook until the tomato skins split, then remove from the heat and drain, reserving ½ cup (120 ml) of the tomato water', '17: Transfer the tomatoes to a blender with the reserved cooking liquid, oregano, and ½ teaspoon of 2 ½ teaspoons salt', '18:  Blend until smooth', '19:  Set aside', '20: Heat a large pan or griddle over 4 medium-high heat', '21:  Add the ½ lb skirt steak and season with the meat seasoning and remaining teaspoon of 2 ½ teaspoons salt', '22:  Cook the meat, flipping frequently until seared and cooked through, about 10 minutes', '23: Transfer the meat to a cutting board and cut into small pieces', '24:  Set aside', '25: Heat the 1 cup instant 2 cups corn oil in a deep, large pan over high heat', '26: Dip the sopes in the chile sauce, turning to coat completely', '27: Once the oil is hot, fry the sopes, flipping frequently, until golden brown, about 5 minutes', '28:  Drain the sopes on paper towels or a wire rack', '29: To serve, fill the sopes with refried beans, carne asada, shredded iceberg lettuce, tomato sauce, Mexican crema, and queso fresco']

ingredients: ['Crab Cakes', '3 tablespoons shallot minced', '½ teaspoon dried parsley', '¼ teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon dijon mustard', '1 large egg yolk', '3 tablespoons mayonnaise', '2 teaspoons fresh lemon juice', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 pinch black pepper', '1 pinch cayenne pepper plus more for garnish optional', '2 cans crab meat drained and picked for shells', '¾ cup panko breadcrumbs (35 g)', '½ cup all purpose flour (60 g) for dusting', '¼ cup canola oil (60 mL)', 'Poached Eggs', '4 large eggs', '1 tablespoon white wine vinegar', 'Hollandaise', '1 large egg yolk', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '¼ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 stick unsalted butter melted']
instructions: ['1: Make the 2 cans crab cakes: In a large bowl, whisk together the 3 tablespoons shallot, ½ teaspoon dried parsley, ¼ teaspoon garlic powder, Dijon mustard, egg yolk, 3 tablespoons mayonnaise, lemon juice, and lemon zest', '2:  salt, 1 pinch black 1 pinch 1 pinch cayenne pepper and 1 pinch cayenne, if using', '3:  Add the 2 cans crabmeat and fold to combine', '4:  Add the ¾ cup panko and mix until just combined', '5:  Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and let sit in the fridge for 1 hour', '6: Shape the 2 cans crab mixture into 4 equal patties', '7:  Dust the cakes with the ½ cup all purpose flour and shake off any excess', '8: Heat a large skillet over medium heat', '9:  Add the ¼ cup canola oil, then fry the 2 cans crab cakes until golden and crisp, 3–4 minutes per side', '10:  Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate to drain', '11: Poach the eggs: Bring a large pot of water to a simmer over medium heat', '12:  Add the vinegar', '13: Crack 1 egg into a small bowl', '14:  With a spoon, stir the water in a clockwise direction to create a whirlpool', '15:  Carefully drop the egg into the center of the whirlpool', '16:  Cover the pot and cook for 3–5 minutes, or until egg 1 tablespoon white is set and yolk is still runny', '17:  Remove the egg from the pot with a slotted spoon and transfer to a container of cold water to stop the cooking process', '18:  Repeat with the remaining eggs', '19: Make the hollandaise: Add the egg yolk, lemon juice, and salt to a tall glass or container', '20:  Use an immersion blender to pulse a few times to blend together', '21:  With the machine running, slowly drizzle in the melted 1 stick unsalted butter', '22:  Continue to blend until the mixture thickens and lightens in color', '23: Top each 2 cans crab cake with a poached egg and drizzle with the hollandaise sauce', '24:  Garnish with 1 pinch cayenne, if desired']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon coconut oil', '1 red onion thinly sliced', '1 medium jalapeno seeded and finely chopped', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 orange bell pepper seeded and cut into thin strips', '1 large eggplant ends trimmed diced', '3 tablespoons red curry paste', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '13.5 oz light coconut milk (400 mL)', '28 oz diced tomato (790 g)', '13.5 oz chickpeas (380 g) drained and rinsed', '5 oz baby spinach (140 g)', '¼ cup fresh cilantro (10 g) chopped', 'cooked brown rice for serving']
instructions:
['1: Melt the coconut oil in a 1 large, high-sided pan over 1 medium heat', '2:  Add the 1 red onion and cook for 2 minutes, until just beginning to sweat', '3:  Add the jalapeño and 3 cloves garlic, and sauté for 1 minute, until just fragrant', '4:  Add the 1 orange bell pepper and eggplant, and cook for 3 minutes, until the eggplant begins to soften', '5: Add the 3 tablespoons red curry paste and brown sugar and stir to coat the vegetables, making sure there are no 1 large clumps of 3 tablespoons red curry paste', '6:  Pour in the coconut milk and stir to combine until the milk is stained from the 3 tablespoons red curry paste', '7:  Stir the in 1 large eggplant ends trimmed 28 oz diced tomatoes and 13', '8: 5 oz chickpeas, and bring to a gentle simmer for 5 minutes', '9: Once the 3 tablespoons red curry is simmering, add the 5 oz baby spinach, half at a time, and stir until wilted', '10:  Remove the pan from the heat', '11: Garnish the 3 tablespoons red curry with ¼ cup fresh cilantro and serve over brown rice', '12: Nutrition
Calories: 212
Total fat: 7 grams 
Sodium: 368
Total carbs: 34 grams 
Dietary fiber: 8 grams 
Sugars: 10 grams 
Protein: 7 grams']

ingredients: ['½ head cauliflower broken into florets', '¾ cup walnuts (75 g)', 'olive oil to taste', '½ medium yellow onion diced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '2 ½ teaspoons chili powder', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '½ teaspoon smoked paprika', '2 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce', '¼ cup low sodium vegetable broth (60 mL)', 'kosher salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '4 large flour tortillas', '2 cups spanish rice (460 g) cooked', 'lettuce chopped for serving', 'tomato diced for serving', 'shredded vegan cheddar cheese for serving', 'guacamole for serving']
instructions: ['1: Add the ½ head cauliflower florets and ¾ cup walnuts to a food processor and pulse until crumbly', '2:  Set aside', '3: Heat a drizzle of olive oil in a 4 large saucepan over ½ medium heat', '4:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the onion and cook for 3-4 minutes, until semi-translucent', '5:  Add the ½ head cauliflower mixture and cook for 4-5 minutes, until the ½ head cauliflower is semi-tender', '6: Add another drizzle of olive oil, the 2 cloves garlic, 2 ½ teaspoons chili powder, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, ½ teaspoon smoked paprika, and 2 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce and cook for 2-3 minutes more, until the spices are fragrant', '7:  Add the ¼ cup low sodium vegetable broth and cook for another 5-6 minutes, until the broth has evaporated and the ½ head cauliflower is tender', '8:  Season with kosher salt and pepper to taste', '9: To assemble a burrito, add ¼ of the Spanish rice, ¼ of the ½ head cauliflower-walnut mixture, some lettuce, tomatoes, shredded vegan cheese, and guacamole to the center of a tortilla', '10:  Fold in the sides and roll up, keeping the filling tucked in place', '11:  Repeat with the remaining ingredients', '12:  Cut in half and serve']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons unsalted butter', "1 ½ tablespoons French's spicy brown mustard", '2 tablespoons maple syrup', '1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar', '1 tablespoon orange juice', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt plus a pinch divided', '½ teaspoon paprika', '1 lb salmon (455 g) cut into fillets', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ peach diced small', '½ avocado diced small', '¼ cup fresh cilantro leaves (10 g)', '½ jalapeño thinly sliced', '1 lime', '1 pinch of salt']
instructions: ['1: Place 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, French’s Spicy Brown Mustard, 2 tablespoons maple syrup, 1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar, 1 tablespoon orange juice, ½ teaspoon 1 ½ teaspoons kosher 1 teaspoon 1 1 pinch of salt, and paprika in a small pot', '2:  Heat over low heat and whisk until 2 tablespoons unsalted butter has fully melted and the sauce starts to simmer', '3:  Continue simmering for a few minutes until sauce reduces to a glaze', '4:  Remove from heat and set aside', '5: Rub 1 lb salmon with olive oil and sprinkle evenly with 1 teaspoon 1 ½ teaspoons kosher 1 teaspoon 1 1 pinch of salt', '6:  Drizzle with a bit of the glaze', '7: Heat an oiled grill pan (or heat up a grill) over high heat', '8:  When hot, place the 1 lb salmon flesh-side down into the pan', '9:  Cook until the 1 lb salmon has clear grill marks, then carefully flip to cook on the other side', '10:  Brush with more glaze', '11:  Once 1 lb salmon is cooked to your liking, remove from pan', '12: For salsa, lightly toss ½ peach, ½ avocado, ½ jalapeño, ¼ cup fresh cilantro, 1 lime juice, and 1 ½ teaspoons kosher 1 teaspoon 1 1 pinch of salt plus a 1 pinch of 1 ½ teaspoons kosher 1 teaspoon 1 1 pinch of salt in bowl', '13: Top the 1 lb salmon fillets with the ½ peach-avocado salsa and serve immediately']

ingredients: ['Garlicky Chicken', '1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken thighs (700 g) cut into 1 in (2.5 cm) pieces', '2 ½ teaspoons Gourmet Garden™ Garlic Stir-In Paste', '1 teaspoon Gourmet Garden™ Jalapeño Stir-In Paste', 'kosher salt', '¾ teaspoon McCormick ground turmeric', '1 lemon zested', '2 ½ teaspoons olive oil', 'Cauliflower Rice', '1 cauliflower small head', '4 teaspoons olive oil', '½ medium yellow onion small diced', '½ teaspoon McCormick ground cardamom', '1 teaspoon McCormick ground coriander', '½ teaspoon McCormick ground cumin', '⅛ teaspoon McCormick Ground Cinnamon', 'kosher salt to taste', '⅓ cup pomegranate seeds (65 g) plus more for garnish', '¼ cup pistachio (30 g) shelled', '⅓ cup dried apricot (60 g) diced into ¼-inch (6 mm) pieces', '2 tablespoons pine nuts', '2 scallions thinly sliced on the bias plus more for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Make the garlicky 1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken: In a large bowl, toss the 1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken with the Gourmet Garden™ Garlic Stir-In Paste, Gourmet Garden™ Jalapeño Stir-In Paste, a generous sprinkle of salt, ¾ teaspoon McCormick ground turmeric, and 1 lemon zest until well coated', '2:  Let sit in the refrigerator for 30 minutes', '3: Meanwhile, prep the 1 cauliflower rice: Cut the 1 cauliflower into quarters', '4:  Grate each quarter on the large holes of a box grater over a large bowl, stopping short of the core', '5:  The 1 cauliflower should be broken down into small pieces the size of rice grains', '6: Once the 1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken has marinated, heat the olive oil in a 10-inch cast iron skillet over ½ medium-high heat', '7:  Add the 1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken in an even layer and sear on all sides, until cooked through, 7–8 minutes total', '8:  Remove from the pan and set aside', '9: Make the 1 cauliflower rice: Heat the olive oil in a wide nonstick skillet over ½ medium-low heat', '10:  Add the onion and cook, stirring occasionally, until softened and translucent, 5–7 minutes', '11:  Add the ½ teaspoon McCormick ground cardamom, 1 teaspoon McCormick ground coriander, ½ teaspoon McCormick ground cumin, and cinnamon', '12:  Let the spices sizzle for 1 minute, until fragrant', '13:  Season with salt', '14: Increase the heat to high and add the 1 cauliflower rice', '15:  Stir to combine, then cook, stirring occasionally, for 6–7 minutes, until the 1 cauliflower rice is tender and lightly browned in places', '16:  Remove the pan from the heat', '17: Stir in the ⅓ cup pomegranate seeds, pistachios, ⅓ cup dried apricots, 2 tablespoons pine nuts, and 2 scallions', '18:  Taste for seasoning and add more salt if necessary', '19: Serve the 1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken over the 1 cauliflower rice and garnish with more ⅓ cup pomegranate seeds and 2 scallions']

ingredients: ['10 oz lean beef (250 g) minced', '1 onion chopped', '4 cloves garlic crushed', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon coriander', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '1 ¼ cups beef stock (300 mL)', '½ can canned chopped tomato', '½ can canned kidney bean rinsed and drained', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 bay leaf', '1 crusty baguette', '3 ½ tablespoons butter (50 g) melted', '1 handful fresh parsley roughly chopped', '½ cup cheddar cheese (50 g) finely grated']
instructions: ['1: In a saucepan, cook the 1 onion and 2 garlic 4 cloves in a little oil', '2: After a minute or so, add the minced 10 oz lean 1 ¼ cups beef, breaking it up with a spoon', '3: When the mince has browned, stir in the chilli powder, cumin, ground coriander, and the 1 tablespoon plain flour', '4: Stir in the 10 oz lean 1 ¼ cups beef stock, tomatoes, tomato purée, ½ can canned kidney beans, oregano, and salt', '5: Place a 1 bay leaf into the mixture, loosely cover and simmer for 30-45 minutes, stirring occasionally', '6:  Allow to cool some so you don’t burn yourself during the next bit!Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F)', '7: Top and tail the 1 crusty baguette, then cut it into 3-4 equal rolls', '8: Hollow out each roll, allowing a thin border of bread around the outside', '9: Stuff each roll with chili using a teaspoon', '10:  Try to really fill them up', '11: Make the garlic 3 ½ tablespoons butter by stirring in 2 4 cloves of crushed garlic and a 1 handful of parsley into the melted 3 ½ tablespoons butter', '12: Coat each stuffed roll with a generous helping of garlic 3 ½ tablespoons butter', '13:  Top with a healthy portion of finely grated ½ cup cheddar', '14: Bake in the centre of the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, until the cheese is bubbly and melted']

ingredients: ['Berbere Spice', '3 tablespoons paprika', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 tablespoon cayenne', '1 teaspoon ground fenugreek', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '½ teaspoon ground cardamom', '½ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ teaspoon ground cloves', '¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '¼ teaspoon allspice', '12 chicken drumettes', '½ cup flour (60 g)', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '1 tablespoon cornstarch', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, combine the paprika, 1 tablespoon salt, 1 tablespoon cayenne, 1 teaspoon ground fenugreek, 1 teaspoon ground ginger, 1 teaspoon onion powder, ½ teaspoon ground cardamom, ½ teaspoon ground nutmeg, ½ teaspoon garlic powder, ¼ teaspoon ground cloves ¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon, and ¼ teaspoon allspice', '2:  Mix well', '3: Save two tablespoons of spice mix', '4:  Set aside', '5: Add the 12 chicken drumettes to the bowl with the spice mixture and toss to coat evenly', '6:  Marinate in the fridge at least 30 minutes, up to overnight', '7: In a small bowl, combine the ½ cup flour, 1 tablespoon baking powder, and 1 tablespoon cornstarch', '8:  Sprinkle the ½ cup flour mixture over the marinated 12 chicken', '9:  Toss them until well-coated', '10: Preheat the oven to 425˚F (220˚C)', '11: Place the 12 chicken on a wire rack set over a parchment paper-lined 1 tablespoon baking sheet', '12:  Bake them for 30-40 minutes or 12 chicken is slightly browned', '13: In a small saucepan, melt the butter', '14:  Once the butter is melted, add the reserved 2 tablespoons spice mix and stir to combine', '15: Drizzle the spice butter mixture over the drumettes']

ingredients: ['Spotted Dick', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter softened', '3 ¾ cups all purpose flour (465 g) plus 2 tablespoons divided', '16 tablespoons unsalted butter frozen for at least 30 minutes', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '1 tablespoon baking powder plus 1 1/2 teaspoons', '¾ cup sugar (150 g)', '½ cup golden raisin (75 g)', '½ cup dried currant (75 g)', '1 tablespoon lemon zest', '½ cup milk (120 mL)', '6 large eggs lightly beaten', 'Crème Anglaise', '4 large egg yolks', '½ cup sugar (100 g) divided', '1 cup milk (240 mL)', '1 cup heavy cream (240 mL)', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract or 1/2 vanilla bean slit down the middle', 'Special Equipment', 'Large stock pot with lid', 'Steamer rack', '2-quart pudding mold with lid']
instructions: ['1: Place a steamer Steamer rack inside a large Large stock pot', '2:  Add enough water so that when placed on the steamer Steamer rack, the 2-quart pudding mold will be about ¾ of the way submerged', '3:  Cover the pot and bring the water to a boil', '4: Grease the 2-quart pudding mold well with the softened butter', '5:  Add 2 tablespoons of flour and turn the mold to coat evenly', '6:   Cut out a 6-inch (12 cm) round of parchment paper and grease with butter', '7: Grate the frozen butter on the large holes of a box grater into a large bowl', '8: Add the remaining 3¾ 3 ¾ cups (465 G) flour, the salt, and 1 tablespoon baking powder', '9:  Mix with a fork until evenly distributed', '10: Add the sugar, raisins, currants, and 1 tablespoon lemon zest', '11:  Stir to combine', '12: Add the milk and eggs', '13:  Stir with a rubber spatula until the batter comes together and there are no dry spots remaining, being careful not to overmix', '14: Transfer to the batter to the prepared 2-quart pudding mold and smooth the top', '15:  Place the parchment round over the batter, greased side down', '16:  Secure the lid to the mold', '17: Carefully lower the 2-quart pudding mold into the steam bath', '18:  Reduce the heat to medium-low', '19:  Cover the pot and steam for 80–90 minutes, until the internal temperature of the 2-quart pudding is at least 180°F (80°C)', '20:  Add more water as needed to maintain the level', '21: While the 2-quart pudding steams, make the crème anglaise: Prepare an ice bath in a large bowl, filling about halfway', '22: In a medium bowl, whisk together the egg yolks and ¼ cup (50 G) sugar', '23:  Set aside', '24: In a small saucepan, combine the milk, heavy cream, remaining ¼ cup (50 G) of sugar, the salt, and the 1 teaspoon vanilla bean (if using 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, stir into the cooled crème anglaise)', '25:  Cook over medium heat for 2-3 minutes, until beginning to steam', '26:  Remove the pan from the heat', '27: Ladle ½ cup (120 ML) of the milk mixture into the egg yolk mixture and whisk well', '28:  This will temper the eggs so they do not curdle when added back to the pot', '29:  Pour the egg yolk mixture back into the pot with the remaining milk mixture', '30: Return the saucepan to medium heat and cook, stirring continuously with a wooden spoon to ensure the egg yolks don’t cook on the bottom of the pot, for about 5 minutes, until the custard coats the back of the spoon', '31: Set a strainer inside a medium bowl, then set the bowl in the ice bath, making sure the water doesn’t come over the sides', '32:  Strain the crème anglaise into the bowl', '33:  Whisk until cool, about 5 minutes', '34:  Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve', '35: Once the 2-quart pudding has cooked through, carefully remove it from the steam Steamer rack and let sit for 15 minutes on a cooling Steamer rack', '36:  Uncover the mold and remove the parchment round', '37:  Run a knife around the edge of the 2-quart pudding to loosen', '38:  Carefully flip onto a serving platter', '39: Slice and serve the spotted dick warm with the crème anglaise alongside']

ingredients: ['1 lb parsnip (425 g) peeled', '1 lb butternut squash (425 g) neck only peeled', '1 lb Yukon Gold potatoes (425 g) scrubbed', '½ lb Kroger Brand Brussels Sprouts (55 g) stemmed', '2 ½ cups heavy cream (600 mL) divided', '6 oz parmesan cheese (175 g) finely grated', '1 ½ teaspoons fresh thyme divided', '1 teaspoon kosher salt plus more to taste', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper plus more to taste', '1 tablespoon unsalted butter', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 large leek white part only finely chopped', '3 oz gruyère cheese (85 g) finely grated', 'Preparation', '1 lb parsnip (425 g) peeled', '1 lb butternut squash (425 g) neck only peeled', '1 lb Yukon Gold potatoes (425 g) scrubbed', '½ lb Kroger Brand Brussels Sprouts (55 g) stemmed', '2 ½ cups heavy cream (600 mL) divided', '6 oz parmesan cheese (175 g) finely grated', '1 ½ teaspoons fresh thyme divided', '1 teaspoon kosher salt plus more to taste', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper plus more to taste', '1 tablespoon unsalted butter', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 large leek white part only finely chopped', '3 oz gruyère cheese (85 g) finely grated', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Thinly slice the parsnips, butternut squash, potatoes, and Kroger Brand Brussels Sprouts on a mandoline or with a very sharp knife', '3:  Transfer each vegetable to a separate medium bowl', '4: Add ½ cup cream, 1 ounce Parmesan cheese, 1 teaspoon thyme, ½ teaspoon salt, and ¼ teaspoon pepper to each bowl, and toss until the vegetables are well coated', '5: Grease a 3-quart baking dish on all sides with the butter', '6:  Pour the remaining ½ cup cream into the bottom of the baking dish', '7:  Stir in the garlic and leek until evenly distributed, then sprinkle with 1 ounce of Parmesan', '8: Arrange the sliced vegetable in the baking dish, alternating between vegetables, by stacking a few slices together and fanning out at an angle in the dish', '9:  Continue arranging in rows until the dish is filled, tucking smaller slices into any gaps', '10:  Sprinkle more salt and pepper and the remaining ounce of Parmesan over the top', '11: Cover the dish with foil, then bake for 25 minutes', '12:  Uncover and bake for another 20 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and the sauce has thickened', '13:  Cover again with foil if the top is browning too quickly', '14: Remove the gratin from the oven and top with the Gruyère cheese', '15: Turn the oven to broil', '16:  Return the gratin to the oven and broil for 3–5 minutes, or until browned and bubbling on top', '17:  Remove from the oven and let sit for 5–10 minutes', '18: Before serving, sprinkle with the remaining ½ teaspoon of thyme']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 small yellow onion diced', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon smoked paprika', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '1 teaspoon mustard powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '½ cup tomato paste (110 g)', '¼ cup maple syrup (85 g)', '3 tablespoons molasses', '2 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce', '3 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '1 teaspoon liquid smoke', '¾ cup low sodium vegetable broth (180 mL)', '15 oz great northern beans (425 g) 3 cans drained and rinsed']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350ºF (180ºC)', '2: In a large saucepan, heat the 2 tablespoons olive oil over medium heat', '3:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the 1 small yellow onion and cook for 4-5 minutes, until semi-translucent', '4: Add the 3 cloves garlic and cook for another 2-3 minutes, until fragrant', '5: Add the 1 teaspoon smoked paprika, 1 teaspoon chili powder, 1 teaspoon mustard powder, ½ teaspoon salt, and ¼ teaspoon pepper and cook for 2 more minutes, until the spices are fragrant', '6: Add the ½ cup tomato paste, ¼ cup maple syrup, 3 tablespoons molasses, 2 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce, 3 tablespoons apple cider vinegar, and 1 teaspoon liquid smoke and stir for 1-2 minutes, until well-combined', '7: Then, add the ¾ cup low sodium vegetable broth and stir until smooth, about 1 minute', '8: Add the 15 oz great northern beans and stir for 1-2 minutes, until evenly coated', '9: Cover and bake for 40 minutes, until the 15 oz great northern beans are bubbling', '10:  Uncover and bake for another 10 minutes, or until desired consistency is reached', '11: Stir well and serve']

ingredients: ['½ cup melted butter (115 g) 1 stick', '2 tablespoons garlic minced', '2 cups parmesan cheese (220 g) grated', '1 teaspoon white pepper', '½ cup sour cream (115 g)', '1 cup heavy cream (240 g)', 'salt to taste']
instructions: ['1: In a large mason jar, combine the ½ cup melted butter, minced 2 tablespoons garlic, grated Parmesan, 1 teaspoon white pepper, ½ cup sour cream, 1 cup heavy cream, and salt', '2:  Shake to combine', '3: Store in the fridge for up to a week', '4:  Add to a hot pan with food as you wish!']

ingredients: ['5 strips bacon', '1 medium yellow onion sliced', '2 cups fresh spinach (80 g)', '5 chicken breasts', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '10 slices ham', '12 slices swiss cheese', '3 cups all-purpose flour (375 g)', '8 large eggs beaten', '3 cups panko breadcrumbs (150 g)', 'fresh parsley chopped for sprinkling', 'Creamy Dijon Sauce', '3 tablespoons butter', '2 cloves garlic minced', '3 tablespoons flour', '2 cups milk (480 mL)', '¼ cup dijon mustard (60 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 cup shredded parmesan cheese (100 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a 1 medium cast iron skillet or pan, cook the 5 strips bacon until almost brown, about 5 minutes', '2: Add the onions and cook, stirring, until caramelized, about 10 minutes', '3: Add the spinach and cook until wilted, about 3 minutes', '4:  Remove the pan from the heat', '5: Place a 5 chicken breast on a piece of plastic wrap', '6:  Cover with more plastic wrap and pound until thin', '7:  Repeat with remaining 5 chicken breasts', '8: Lay out a 8 large piece of plastic wrap and layer the 5 chicken on the plastic so the edges are overlapping slightly', '9: Season with salt and pepper', '10: Layer the ham, Swiss cheese, and 5 strips bacon-carmelized onion mixture over the 5 chicken', '11: Roll the 5 chicken into a log tightly wrap in plastic, twisting the ends to seal', '12: Refrigerate for 1 hour to set', '13: Add the flour, eggs, and 3 cups panko to 3 separate baking sheets or other wide, shallow dishes', '14:  Roll the 5 chicken in the flour, then in the egg, and finally in the 3 cups panko', '15:  Coat once more in the egg, then 3 cups panko', '16: Transfer the 5 chicken roll to a greased baking sheet and bake at 375° (190 celsius) for 40 minutes, until golden brown', '17: Make the creamy Dijon sauce: in a small pot over 1 medium heat, melt the 3 tablespoons butter', '18:  Add the 2 cloves garlic and cook until aromatic', '19:  Add the flour and cook until starting to brown', '20:  Whisk in the 2 cups milk, then add the mustard and season with salt and pepper', '21:  Add the Parmesan and cook until the sauce is thickened', '22: Slice the 5 chicken roll and serve with the sauce and fresh parsley']

ingredients: ['½ cup instant oatmeal (50 g)', '3 tablespoons freeze-dried apple chopped', '1 tablespoon pecan chopped', '1 tablespoon cinnamon', '⅛ teaspoon vanilla bean', '2 teaspoons sugar of choice', '¾ cup water (175 mL) or milk boiled']
instructions: ['1: Add the ½ cup instant oatmeal, freeze-dried apples, pecans, 1 tablespoon cinnamon, ⅛ teaspoon vanilla bean, and 2 teaspoons sugar into a mason jar', '2: Store in a cool, dry place for up to a month', '3: To prepare, pour boiling ¾ cup water or milk over oats', '4:  Stir to combine and let sit for 3 minutes', '5: Serve with fresh chopped apples']

ingredients: ['nonstick cooking spray for greasing', '1 lb ground beef (455 g) cooked and drained of fat', '4 cups marinara sauce (920 g)', '4 cups whole milk ricotta cheese (1 kg)', '2 cups grated parmesan cheese (220 g)', '2 tablespoons fresh parsley chopped', '2 tablespoons fresh basil chopped', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '15 lasagna noodles cooked according to package instrucions', '3 cups shredded mozzarella cheese (300 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350ºF (180ºC)', '2:  Grease a 9 x 13-inch (22 x 33 cm) baking dish lightly with nonstick spray', '3: In a large bowl, mix together the ground beef and marinara sauce', '4: In a separate large bowl, combine the ricotta, Parmesan, 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, 2 tablespoons fresh basil, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, pepper, and 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '5: Spread 1 cup of the meat sauce over the bottom of the prepared baking dish', '6:  Top with 5 cooked 15 lasagna noodles, overlapping as needed to completely cover the sauce', '7:  Spread 2 cups of the ricotta mixture over the noodles', '8:  Top with 1 cup of mozzarella cheese', '9:  Repeat with the remaining meat sauce, noodles, ricotta, and mozzarella to make 2 more layers', '10: Bake the 15 lasagna for 25–30 minutes, until the cheese is melted and the sauce is bubbling up through the layers', '11:  Turn the broiler to high and broil for 1–2 minutes, until the top layer of cheese is bubbly and golden brown', '12: Let the 15 lasagna cool for 30-45 minutes, then serve']

ingredients: ['Dry Rub and Ribs', '4 tablespoons dark brown sugar', '1 ½ tablespoons freshly ground black pepper', '2 teaspoons McCormick® Ground Mustard', '1 tablespoon McCormick® Paprika', '2 teaspoons McCormick® cayenne', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '1 rack ribs membrane removed', '2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '1 cup chicken stock (240 mL)', 'Peach Habanero Sauce', '1 tablespoon neutral oil such as canola', '1 medium yellow onion quatered', '2 small habanero peppers stems removed', '5 ripe peaches halved and pitted', '1 cup dark brown sugar (200 g)', '¾ cup tomato paste (175 g)', '¼ cup honey (85 g)', '1 tablespoon molasses', '2 tablespoons dijon mustard', '¼ cup apple cider vinegar (60 mL)', '1 tablespoon worcestershire sauce', '½ teaspoon liquid smoke', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '½ tablespoon McCormick® Paprika', '1 teaspoon McCormick® cayenne', 'Preparation', 'Dry Rub and Ribs', '4 tablespoons dark brown sugar', '1 ½ tablespoons freshly ground black pepper', '2 teaspoons McCormick® Ground Mustard', '1 tablespoon McCormick® Paprika', '2 teaspoons McCormick® cayenne', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '1 rack ribs membrane removed', '2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '1 cup chicken stock (240 mL)', 'Peach Habanero Sauce', '1 tablespoon neutral oil such as canola', '1 medium yellow onion quatered', '2 small habanero peppers stems removed', '5 ripe peaches halved and pitted', '1 cup dark brown sugar (200 g)', '¾ cup tomato paste (175 g)', '¼ cup honey (85 g)', '1 tablespoon molasses', '2 tablespoons dijon mustard', '¼ cup apple cider vinegar (60 mL)', '1 tablespoon worcestershire sauce', '½ teaspoon liquid smoke', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '½ tablespoon McCormick® Paprika', '1 teaspoon McCormick® cayenne', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Make the dry rub: in a small bowl, whisk together the brown sugar, black pepper, ground mustard, paprika, cayenne, and salt', '2: Place the ribs on a cutting board and generously coat on all sides with the dry rub, pressing it into the meat', '3:  Save any remaining rub in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 1 month', '4: Place the rack insert in the bottom of the Instant Pot, then pour in the apple cider vinegar and chicken stock', '5:  Set the ribs on the rack on their side, spiraling around the inside of the pot', '6:  Secure the lid of the Instant Pot, making sure the vent is set to sealing', '7:  Select manual pressure and set the pressure to high', '8:  Set the timer for 29 minutes', '9:  Allow the pressure to naturally release for 5 minutes, then set to venting to release the remaining pressure', '10: While the ribs cook, make the sauce: Heat a grill pan to medium-high heat and grease with the oil', '11:  Grill the onion, habanero peppers, and peach halves on all sides until charred all over, 5–6 minutes total', '12:  Remove the skin from the peaches and the stems from the onion and peppers, then transfer everything to a blender', '13: Add the brown sugar, tomato paste, honey, molasses, Dijon mustard, apple cider vinegar, Worcestershire sauce, liquid smoke, and water to the blender', '14:  Blend until smooth', '15: Strain the sauce through a fine-mesh sieve into a small pot, discarding the solids', '16:  Add the paprika, cayenne, and salt', '17:  Cook over medium-low heat until the sauce just comes to a boil, 5–7 minutes', '18: When the ribs have about 5 minutes of cooking time left, arrange an oven rack in the upper third of the oven and turn the broiler on high', '19:  Line a baking sheet with foil', '20: Transfer the ribs to the prepared baking sheet and brush liberally on both sides with the sauce', '21:  Broil for 3–5 minutes, until the sauce begins to caramelize', '22: Slice into individual ribs and serve immediately with the remaining sauce alongside']

ingredients: ['1 ½ lb butternut squash (680 g) peeled seeds removed and cubed', '3 oz goat cheese (85 g)', '2 tablespoons milk', '1 tablespoon fresh rosemary minced', 'salt to taste', 'black pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Add 1 ½ lb butternut squash to large pot of boiling water', '2:  Cook until fork-tender, 10-15 minutes', '3: Drain the squash in a colander and add back to the pot', '4: Add in the 3 oz goat cheese, 2 tablespoons milk, 1 tablespoon fresh rosemary, salt, and black pepper', '5:  Mash until desired consistency is reached']

ingredients: ['1 ½ lb chicken thighs (680 g)', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '8 oz mushroom (225 g) sliced', '½ medium onion sliced', '1 red bell pepper sliced', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '4 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon crushed red pepper flake', '½ teaspoon dried rosemary', '½ cup red wine (120 g)', '14 oz canned diced tomato (400 g)', '1 cup chicken stock (240 g)', '¼ cup fresh parsley (10 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Liberally season chicken thighs with salt and 1 red bell ½ teaspoon crushed red pepper', '2: In a 4-quart jumbo cooker, heat 1 tablespoon of 3 tablespoons olive oil over ½ medium-high heat', '3:  Add chicken and cook 3-4 minutes a side, until lightly browned', '4:  Transfer to a plate', '5: Add another tablespoon of 3 tablespoons olive oil to the skillet before adding the mushrooms', '6:  Lightly season with salt and 1 red bell ½ teaspoon crushed red pepper, and cook until mushrooms begin to brown, about 5 minutes', '7: Once browned, remove mushrooms to the same dish with the reserved chicken thighs', '8: Add the final tablespoon of 3 tablespoons olive oil followed by the 8 oz mushroom (225 g) ½ ½ medium onion 1 red bell 1 red bell ½ teaspoon crushed red pepper sliced onion and 1 red bell ½ teaspoon crushed red pepper', '9:  Season with salt and 1 red bell ½ teaspoon crushed red pepper, and cook over ½ medium heat until they begin to brown, about 5-7 minutes', '10: Create a well in the middle of the onion-pepper mixture and add the 2 tablespoons 14 oz canned 14 oz canned diced tomato paste', '11:  Cook out the 2 tablespoons 14 oz canned 14 oz canned diced tomato paste for about 1 minute before mixing it together with the onions and 1 red bell ½ teaspoon crushed red peppers', '12: Add 4 cloves garlic, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, red 1 red bell ½ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes, and ½ teaspoon dried rosemary', '13:  Mix them into the onion and 1 red bell ½ teaspoon crushed red peppers before adding the red wine', '14:  Use the moisture from the red wine to scrape off any stuck-on bits from the bottom of the pan', '15: Let wine reduce by half before adding the 14 oz canned diced 2 tablespoons 14 oz canned 14 oz canned diced tomatoes and chicken stock', '16:  Return to a simmer', '17: Place chicken and mushrooms on top of the simmering sauce, being sure to also add any accumulated juices that may have collected', '18:  Sprinkle with chopped ¼ cup fresh parsley', '19: Cook while covered for 12 minutes or until chicken’s internal temperature reaches 165˚F (75˚C)', '20: Serve chicken and sauce with a side of pasta or bread']

ingredients: ['1 watermelon', '8 oz coconut cream (295 g) whipped', '4 strawberries', '3 kiwis', '3 apricots', 'blueberry', '⅓ cup coconut flakes (25 g)', '½ cup granola (75 g)', '1 tablespoon fresh mint']
instructions: ['1: Cut a ripe 1 watermelon into round discs about 1-2 inches (2-5 cm) thick', '2: Scoop the coconut cream into a bowl', '3:  Use a mixer to whip the cream until it reaches a soft consistency', '4: Cut 3-4 4 strawberries into thin slices', '5:  Set aside', '6: Peel and cut 2-3 3 kiwis into thin slices', '7:  Set aside', '8: Remove pit and cut 2-3 apricot into thin slices', '9:  Set aside', '10: Spread the mixed coconut cream around the top of the 1 watermelon disc', '11: Place the cut 4 strawberries, 3 kiwis and apricot slices on top of the coconut cream', '12: Add in blueberries, coconut flakes and ½ cup granola', '13: Sprinkle a few sprigs of 1 tablespoon fresh mint across the top the dessert', '14:  Slice and serve']

ingredients: ['Veggies', '2 eggplants', '6 roma tomatoes', '2 yellow squashes', '2 zucchinis', 'Sauce', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion diced', '4 cloves garlic minced', '1 red bell pepper diced', '1 yellow bell pepper diced', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '28 oz can of crushed tomatoes (795 g)', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil from 8-10 leaves', 'Herb Seasoning', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil from 8-10 leaves', '1 teaspoon garlic minced', '2 tablespoons Chopped fresh parsley', '2 teaspoons fresh thyme', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '4 tablespoons olive oil']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven for 375˚F (190˚C)', '2: Slice the eggplant, 6 roma 28 oz can of 28 oz can of crushed tomatoes, squash, and zucchini into approximately ¹⁄₁₆-inch (1-mm) rounds, then set aside', '3: Make the sauce: Heat the olive oil in a 12-inch (30-cm) oven-safe pan over medium-high heat', '4:  Sauté the 1 onion, garlic, and bell peppers until soft, about 10 minutes', '5:  Season with salt and pepper, then add the 28 oz can of crushed 6 roma 28 oz can of 28 oz can of crushed tomatoes', '6:  Stir until the ingredients are fully incorporated', '7:  Remove from heat, then add the basil', '8:  Stir once more, then smooth the surface of the sauce with a spatula', '9: Arrange the sliced veggies in alternating patterns, (for example, eggplant, tomato, squash, zucchini) on top of the sauce from the outer edge to the middle of the pan', '10:  Season with salt and pepper', '11:  Make the herb seasoning: In a small bowl, mix together the basil, garlic, 2 tablespoons Chopped fresh parsley, 2 teaspoons fresh thyme, salt, pepper, and olive oil', '12:  Spoon the herb seasoning over the vegetables', '13: Cover the pan with foil and bake for 40 minutes', '14:  Uncover, then bake for another 20 minutes, until the vegetables are softened', '15: Serve while hot as a main dish or side', '16:  The ratatouille is also excellent the next day--cover with foil and reheat in a 350˚F (180˚C) oven for 15 minutes, or simply microwave to desired temperature']

ingredients: ['5 flour tortillas', '½ red bell pepper sliced', '½ green bell pepper sliced', '½ orange bell pepper sliced', '½ red onion sliced', '1 lb shrimp (455 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 lime juiced', 'Topping', 'salsa', 'guacamole', 'fresh cilantro', 'lime wedge']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Wrap the 5 flour tortillas in foil and place on the corner of a baking sheet', '3: Add the bell ½ red bell ½ green bell ½ orange bell ½ teaspoon peppers, red onion, and 1 lb shrimp to the sheet and season with olive oil, 1 teaspoon salt, ½ red bell ½ green bell ½ orange bell ½ teaspoon pepper, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, 1 teaspoon cumin, and lime', '4: Toss to coat', '5: Place in the oven and bake for 10 minutes, flipping the 1 lb shrimp halfway through', '6: Serve with warm 5 flour tortillas, salsa, guacamole, fresh cilantro, and lime']

ingredients: ['1 cup all-purpose flour (125 g)', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '½ teaspoon sea salt', '1 cup almond milk (240 mL)', '2 tablespoons maple syrup', '3 tablespoons vegan margarine or refined coconut oil at room temperature', '5 tablespoons light brown sugar', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', 'vegetable oil for greasing', 'Glaze', '2 cups confectioners sugar (240 g)', '¼ cup water (60 mL)', 'Preparation', '1 cup all-purpose flour (125 g)', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '½ teaspoon sea salt', '1 cup almond milk (240 mL)', '2 tablespoons maple syrup', '3 tablespoons vegan margarine or refined coconut oil at room temperature', '5 tablespoons light brown sugar', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', 'vegetable oil for greasing', 'Glaze', '2 cups confectioners sugar (240 g)', '¼ cup water (60 mL)', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and salt', '2:  In a small bowl or measuring cup, whisk together the almond milk and maple syrup', '3: Add the wet ingredient to the dry and whisk to combine', '4:  Do not overmix', '5: In a small bowl, mix together the margarine, brown sugar, and cinnamon', '6:  Transfer to a pastry bag or plastic zip-top bag and snip off one corner', '7: Lightly grease a large nonstick skillet or griddle and heat over medium heat', '8:  When the pan shimmers, measure out ¼ cup (35 g) of the batter (or eyeball it) and pour it onto the skillet', '9:  Pipe a circular swirl of the cinnamon mixture into the batter', '10:  Repeat to fill the skillet', '11: When small bubbles appear in the center of the pancakes, after about 4 minutes, flip', '12: Cook on the other side for about 1 minute more, until lightly browned and cooked through', '13:  Repeat with the remaining batter, adding more oil to the skillet between batches as needed', '14: In a small bowl, combine the confectioners’ sugar and water and whisk until smooth', '15: Drizzle the pancakes with the glaze and serve']

ingredients: ['nonstick cooking spray for greasing', 'Black Bean & Corn', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 medium yellow onion diced', '3 cloves garlic minced', '2 medium carrots shredded', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '½ teaspoon chili powder', '½ teaspoon ground coriander', '¼ teaspoon cayenne', '¾ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '30 oz black beans (850 g) 2 cans drained and rinsed', '½ cup quick-cook oats (50 g)', '½ cup corn (85 g)', 'Chickpea Quinoa & Sun-Dried Tomato', '15 oz chickpeas (425 g) 1 can drained and rinsed', '1 cup quinoa (170 g)', '½ cup bread crumbs (55 g)', '⅓ cup sundried tomato (65 g)', '2 tablespoons tahini', '1 tablespoon fresh parsley chopped', '2 cloves garlic minced', '¾ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon dried basil', 'Sweet Potato & White Bean', '15 oz white bean (425 g) 1 can drained and rinsed', '1 medium sweet potato roasted and peeled', '1 small yellow onion finely chopped', '½ cup bread crumbs (55 g)', '⅓ cup nutritional yeast (45 g)', '⅓ cup fresh parsley (10 g) chopped', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 teaspoon red chili flakes', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'Mushroom Lentil', '1 tablespoon flax meal', '3 tablespoons water', '3 tablespoons olive oil divided', '8 oz mushroom (225 g) finely chopped', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '½ teaspoon smoked paprika', '1 small yellow onion diced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 ½ cups lentils (300 g) cooked', '1 cup oats (100 g)', 'Special Sauce', '⅓ cup vegan mayonnaise (85 g)', '¼ cup ketchup (60 g)', '2 tablespoons yellow mustard', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'For Assembly', '1 giant round loaf of your choice', '6 slices vegan provolone cheese', '1 cup avocado crema (230 g)', 'lettuce', 'tomato sliced', 'red onion sliced']
instructions: ['1: Make the Black Bean & Corn burger mix: Heat the 1 tablespoon 3 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat', '2:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the onion and cook for 3-4 minutes, until semi-translucent', '3:  Add the garlic and carrots and cook for 2-3 minutes, until the carrots are partially tender', '4: Add the 1 teaspoon ground cumin, ½ teaspoon 1 teaspoon red chili powder, ½ teaspoon ground coriander, ¼ teaspoon cayenne, salt, pepper, and soy sauce', '5:  Cook for 2-3 minutes more, until the carrots are tender', '6:  Remove from the heat and set aside', '7: Add the 30 oz black beans to a large bowl, and mash with a potato masher until mostly', '8:  Add the oats, ½ cup corn, and carrot mixture and mix until well-combined', '9: Grease a large baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray', '10:  Using a spoon and your hands, shape the 30 oz black bean burger mix into a quarter circle shape', '11: Make the Chickpea, Quinoa, & Sun-Dried Tomato burger mix: In a food processor, combine the 15 oz chickpeas, 1 cup quinoa, bread crumbs, sun-dried tomatoes, 2 tablespoons tahini, 1 tablespoon fresh ⅓ cup fresh parsley, garlic, salt, pepper, oregano, and basil', '12:  Pulse until smooth', '13:  Shape the chickpea, 1 cup quinoa burger mix into a quarter circle next to the 30 oz black bean burger mix', '14:  Add to the baking sheet with the other burger mix', '15: Make the Sweet Potato & White Bean burger mix: In a large bowl, combine the 15 oz white beans and sweet potato, and mash with a potato masher until smooth', '16:  Add the onion, bread crumbs, ⅓ cup nutritional yeast, 1 tablespoon fresh ⅓ cup fresh parsley, lemon juice, red chile flakes, garlic powder, salt, and pepper, and mix until well-combined', '17:  Add to the baking sheet with the other burger mixes', '18: Make the Mushroom Lentil burger mix: In a small bowl, combine the flax meal and 3 tablespoons water to make a flax egg', '19:  Set aside', '20: Heat 1 tablespoon of 1 tablespoon 3 tablespoons olive oil in a large pan over medium heat', '21:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the 8 oz mushrooms and cook until most of the juices have evaporated, 7-8 minutes', '22:  Add the soy sauce and ½ teaspoon smoked paprika and cook for 2-3 more minutes', '23:  Transfer to a large bowl and set aside', '24: Heat another tablespoon of 1 tablespoon 3 tablespoons olive oil in the pan over medium heat', '25:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the onion and cook for 3-5 minutes, until semi-translucent', '26:  Add the garlic and cook for 2 minutes, until fragrant', '27:  Add the salt and pepper, and cook for another 2 minutes', '28: Transfer the onion mixture to a food processor and add the 1 ½ cups lentils, oats, and flax egg', '29:  Pulse until a chunky paste forms', '30: Transfer the lentil mixture to the bowl with the 8 oz mushrooms and mix until well-combined', '31:  Add to the baking sheet', '32: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '33: Shape the burger mixes to match the size of your loaf of bread', '34:  Press the borders together to create one cohesive patty', '35: Bake the patty for 20 minutes', '36: Make the special sauce: In a small bowl, combine the vegan mayo, ¼ cup ketchup, 2 tablespoons yellow mustard, salt, and pepper, and stir until combined', '37:  Transfer to a squeeze bottle', '38: Remove the patty from the oven ,and top the Mushroom Lentil and Black Bean & Corn sections with the vegan provolone cheese', '39: Broil for 5 minutes, or until the cheese has melted', '40: With a large bread knife, slice the loaf of bread in half to make a 1 giant bun', '41: With large spatulas or bench scrapers, transfer the veggie burger patty onto the bottom half of the bun', '42: Spread the 1 cup avocado crema on top of the the Chickpea Quinoa, Sweet Potato & White Bean sections', '43:  Squeeze the special sauce onto the Black Bean & Corn and 8 oz mushroom Lentil sections', '44: Layer on the lettuce, tomatoes, and red onion, and top with the top bun']

ingredients: ['Spice Rub', '1 teaspoon Schwartz ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon Schwartz paprika', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon salt', 'Tagine', '3 lb chicken thighs (1.3 kg)', '4 tablespoons olive oil divided', '1 lb baby potato (450 g) quartered', '1 cup cherry tomato (200 g) halved', '½ cup shallot (50 g) chopped', '10 dried apricots roughly chopped', 'salt', 'black pepper', '1 lemon sliced', '1 tablespoon fresh parsley chopped', '¼ cup almond (35 g) silvered toasted']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 190ºC (375ºF)', '2: Place all of the ingredients for the spice rub in a small bowl and mix to combine', '3: Place 3 lb chicken thighs in a large bowl and coat with the spice rub', '4: Heat a very large cast iron skillet and drizzle in 2 4 tablespoons of olive oil', '5:  5', '6:  Place seasoned 3 lb chicken thighs skin-side down and cook until the skin is brown and crispy, about 4–5 minutes', '7:  Then flip the thighs over and brown the other side for 4 minutes', '8:  Remove 3 lb chicken from the pan', '9: In a large bowl, add 1 lb baby potatoes, 1 cup cherry tomatoes, shallots, and 10 dried apricots', '10:  Drizzle with the remaining 2 4 tablespoons of olive oil and season to taste with salt and pepper', '11:  Mix until evenly coated', '12: Place the vegetables into the bottom of the tagine and arrange the 3 lb chicken, skin-side up, around the top, wedging a slice of 1 lemon between each piece of 3 lb chicken', '13: Place the lid on the tagine and place in the oven for 1 hour and 40 minutes, or until 3 lb chicken is 165ºF (75ºC) and falls off the bone', '14: Garnish with 1 tablespoon fresh parsley and toasted ¼ cup almond slivers', '15: ENJOY!']

ingredients: ['1 cup Great Value® Nonfat Milk (240 mL)', '1 ½ cups Great Value® Berry Medley (260 g)', '¼ cup dried apricot (50 g) diced', '¼ cup coconut chips (20 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a blender, combine the milk, berries, apricots, and ¼ cup coconut chips', '2:  Blend on high speed until smooth']

ingredients: ['3 cups sugar (600 g)', '1 ¾ cups unsweetened cocoa powder (210 g)', '14 cups whole milk (3 ¾ L)', '8 oz peppermint schnapps (225 g)', '16 large marshmallows', 'whipped cream for garnish', 'peppermint candy crushed for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Add the 3 cups sugar and 1 ¾ cups unsweetened cocoa powder to a slow cooker and whisk to combine', '2: Add the 14 cups whole milk and whisk to incorporate', '3:  Turn the heat setting to high, cover, and warm for 30-60 minutes, until steaming', '4:  Once steaming, reduce the heat setting to warm', '5: Add the peppermint schnapps', '6:  Whisk to combine and to ensure the 3 cups sugar and 1 ¾ cups unsweetened cocoa powder are fully dissolved', '7:  Add the 16 large marshmallows', '8: Ladle into mugs and top with whipped cream and crushed peppermint candies']

ingredients: ['1 cup self-rising flour (125 g)', '1 tablespoon sugar', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '2 eggs', '¼ cup butter (50 g) melted', '1 cup milk (240 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Melt ¼ cup butter in the microwave in 15-second intervals', '2: Sift 1 cup self-rising flour, 1 tablespoon sugar and 1 teaspoon baking soda together into a large bowl', '3: Mix 2 eggs, 1 cup milk and ¼ cup butter in a separate bowl and add to dry ingredients', '4: Cook pancakes in a frying pan on medium heat', '5: Serve with whipped cream and maple syrup']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 medium onion chopped', '2 stalks celery chopped', '2 carrots chopped', '3 cloves garlic chopped', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 cup green beans (360 g) diced', '3 cups tomato sauce (675 g)', '5 cups water (1.18 L)', '16 oz kidney bean (425 g) 1 can', '1 lb macaroni (455 g)', 'parmesan cheese for serving', 'fresh basil for serving']
instructions: ['1: In a heavy bottom pot, combine the 1 tablespoon olive oil, onion, 2 stalks celery, and 2 carrots over 1 medium heat', '2:  Cook until the 2 carrots soften and the onions become slightly translucent', '3: Add the 3 cloves garlic and 2 teaspoons salt, and cook for an additional 2 minutes', '4: Add the 1 cup green beans, 3 cups tomato sauce, and 5 cups water, and bring to a boil', '5: Add the beans and 1 lb macaroni and cook for about 9-10 minutes until the 1 lb macaroni is al dente', '6: Serve warm with Parmesan and fresh basil']

ingredients: ['unsalted butter softened for greasing', 'Option 1: Prepared Mix', '18 oz brownie mix (510 g) prepare according to package instructions', 'Option 2: From Scratch', '2 ¼ cups granulated sugar (450 g)', '1 ¼ cups dutch processed cocoa  powder (150 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 ½ cups all-purpose flour (190 g)', '1 cup vegetable oil (240 mL)', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '3 large eggs', '¼ cup water (60 mL)', 'Additions', '1 cup toasted walnuts (100 g)', '½ cup creamy peanut butter (240 g)', 'vanilla ice cream for serving', 'rainbow sprinkle for topping']
instructions: ['1: Position a rack in the center of the oven and preheat to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Grease a 9-by-13-inch (23-by-33-cm) dark metal pan with softened unsalted ½ cup creamy ½ cup creamy peanut butter, then line with parchment paper, leaving overhang on all sides', '3:  Grease the parchment with more unsalted ½ cup creamy ½ cup creamy peanut butter', '4: OPTION 1: If using prepared mix, make the 18 oz brownie batter according to the package instructions', '5: OPTION 2: If making the 18 oz brownie batter from scratch, in a 3 large bowl, whisk together the 2 ¼ cups granulated sugar, 1 ¼ cups dutch processed cocoa powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon baking powder, and 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '6:  Add the 1 cup vegetable oil, vanilla, eggs, and ¼ cup water and whisk to combine', '7: Stir in the 1 cup toasted walnuts', '8: Pour the 18 oz brownie batter into the prepared 1 teaspoon baking pan and smooth the top with a spatula', '9: Pour the ½ cup creamy peanut unsalted ½ cup creamy ½ cup creamy peanut butter over the top and swirl into the batter with a knife or skewer', '10: Bake until lightly puffed on top, about 20 minutes', '11:  Transfer the 18 oz brownie pan to a wire rack and let cool completely, about 30 minutes', '12: Use the parchment paper to lift the cooled 18 oz brownies out of the pan and cut into 12 bars', '13: Serve with a scoop of ice cream and a pinch of sprinkles']

ingredients: ['4 bell peppers various colors', '1 onion chopped', '4 cloves garlic chopped', '½ lb ground beef (225 g)', '½ lb sweet italian sausage (225 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '28 oz diced tomato (795 g) 1 can', '28 oz tomato sauce (795 g) 1 can', '15 oz whole milk ricotta cheese (425 g)', '1 cup grated parmesan cheese (110 g)', '½ cup fresh basil (20 g) chopped', '1 egg', '4 lasagna noodles cooked and quartered', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese (100 g)', '2 tablespoons oil']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: Cut the top off of each 4 bell 1 teaspoon pepper and remove the seeds', '3:  Transfer to a square baking dish', '4:  Bake for 20 minutes, to soften', '5: Heat 2 2 tablespoons of oil in a large pot, or dutch oven, over medium high heat', '6:  Add the 1 onion and 4 cloves garlic, cook until softened', '7: Add the ½ lb ground beef, ½ lb sweet italian sausage, 1 teaspoon salt, and 4 bell 1 teaspoon pepper', '8:  Cook until the meat has browned on all sides', '9: Add the 28 oz diced 28 oz diced 28 oz tomatoes and 28 oz diced 28 oz tomato sauce', '10:  Bring the mixture to a light simmer', '11:  Simmer for 5-10 minutes, remove from heat and set aside', '12: In a small bowl, combine 15 oz whole milk ricotta, 1 cup grated parmesan, ½ cup fresh basil, and 1 egg', '13:  Mix together with a fork, set aside', '14: Remove the 4 bell 4 bell 1 teaspoon peppers from the oven, drain any excess water that accumulated inside', '15: Cut the 4 lasagna noodles into quarters and set aside', '16: Assemble the 4 lasagna in each 4 bell 1 teaspoon pepper', '17:  Alternate 2 2 tablespoons of sauce, 1 4 lasagna noodle, 2 2 tablespoons 15 oz whole milk ricotta mixture, and 1 4 lasagna noodle until the 4 bell 4 bell 1 teaspoon peppers are full', '18:  Top with 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '19: Bake in preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, until the cheese is melted and slightly browned', '20: Rest for 10 minutes before serving']

ingredients: ['2 medium zucchinis', 'olive oil to taste', '2 cloves garlic minced', '2 cups fresh spinach (80 g) chopped', '1 cup ricotta cheese (250 g)', '2 tablespoons fresh basil finely sliced', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 cup marinara sauce (260 g)', '½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese (50 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C)', '2: Cut off the end of each zucchini then using a vegetable peeler, peel each zucchini into wide strips', '3: Transfer the zucchini strips to a plate then layer two strips vertically and two strips horizontally to make a cross', '4:  Repeat process with remaining strips', '5: Heat a pan over 2 medium-high heat', '6: Add olive oil then 2 cloves garlic and sauté for 30 seconds to 1 minute', '7: Add spinach, salt, and pepper', '8:  Sauté for 1-2 minutes, until wilted down', '9: Remove from heat and allow to cool for 10 minutes', '10: In a large bowl, add the spinach and 2 cloves garlic', '11:  Add the 1 cup ricotta, basil, salt, and pepper', '12:  Mix until well combined', '13: Using a spoon or cookie scoop, scoop approximately 1 tablespoon of the mixture and place in the middle of each zucchini noodle cross', '14: Fold each side to seal the 1 cup ricotta mixture then flip over the ravioli so the seam side is on the bottom', '15: In a baking dish pour the 1 cup marinara sauce then smooth with a spatula', '16: Evenly place the zucchini raviolis then top with ½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '17: Bake for 15-20 minutes', '18: Serve with fresh basil']

ingredients: ['unsalted butter softened for greasing', 'Option 1: Prepared Mix', '18 oz brownie mix (510 g) prepared according to package instructions', 'Option 2: From Scratch', '2 ¼ cups granulated sugar (450 g)', '1 ¼ cups dutch processed cocoa  powder (150 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 ½ cups all-purpose flour (190 g)', '1 cup vegetable oil (240 mL)', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '3 large eggs', '¼ cup water (60 mL)', 'Additions', '1 cup toasted walnuts (100 g)', '½ cup creamy peanut butter (120 g)', 'vanilla ice cream for serving', 'caramel sauce for drizzling']
instructions: ['1: Position a rack in the center of the oven and preheat to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Grease a 9-by-13-inch (23-by-33-cm) dark metal pan with softened unsalted ½ cup creamy ½ cup creamy peanut butter, then line with parchment paper, leaving overhang on all sides', '3:  Grease the parchment with more unsalted ½ cup creamy ½ cup creamy peanut butter', '4: OPTION 1: If using prepared mix, make the 18 oz brownie batter according to the package instructions', '5: OPTION 2: If making the 18 oz brownie batter from scratch, in a 3 large bowl, whisk together the 2 ¼ cups granulated sugar, 1 ¼ cups dutch processed cocoa powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon baking powder, and 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '6:  Add the 1 cup vegetable oil, vanilla, eggs, and ¼ cup water and whisk to combine', '7: Stir in the 1 cup toasted walnuts', '8: Pour the 18 oz brownie batter into the prepared 1 teaspoon baking pan and smooth the top with a spatula', '9: Pour the ½ cup creamy peanut unsalted ½ cup creamy ½ cup creamy peanut butter over the top and swirl into the batter with a knife or skewer', '10: Bake until lightly puffed on top, about 20 minutes', '11:  Transfer the 18 oz brownie pan to a wire rack and let cool completely, about 30 minutes', '12: Use the parchment paper to lift the cooled 18 oz brownies out of the pan and cut into 12 bars', '13: Serve with a scoop of ice cream and a drizzle of caramel']
