ingredients: ['20 dried shiitake mushrooms', '4 medium white onions or 5 tops and bottoms cut off peeled halved crosswise', '1 large daikon radish peeled and cut into 1-inch (2 1/4 cm) thick rounds', '1 ginger 6 inches (15 cm) peeled sliced into coins', '1 tablespoon oil', '3 cups oyster mushroom (225 g) sliced into 2-inch (5 cm) pieces', '12 cups water (2.8 L)', 'salt to taste', '1 cinnamon stick or piece of cassia bark', '1 teaspoon clove', '5 cardamom pods', '5 star anises', '1 teaspoon coriander seed', '1 teaspoon fennel seeds', '14 oz soft tofu (400 g) 1 package drained and sliced into 1 inch (2 cm) pieces or fried tofu sliced', 'For Serving', 'rice stick noodle cooked', 'red onion sliced', '1 cup bean sprout (100 g) washed well', '1 chili pepper thinly sliced', 'lime wedge', 'fresh cilantro leaf']
instructions: ['1: Add the 20 dried shiitake mushrooms to a 4 medium bowl and pour in enough 12 cups water to cover', '2:  Cover with a dish towel and let hydrate for 8 hours, then rinse and drain the mushrooms 2-3 times', '3:  Set aside', '4: In a 1 large pan over 4 medium heat, dry sear the onions until caramelized on both sides, 10-15 minutes', '5:  Transfer to a bowl and repeat with the daikon radish and 1 ginger', '6:  Set aside', '7: Heat the 1 tablespoon oil in the pan', '8:  Add the 3 cups oyster mushrooms and sauté until browned and caramelized, 6-8 minutes', '9: Add the caramelized onions, daikon, 1 ginger, 3 cups oyster mushrooms, and soaked shiitake mushrooms to a 1 large stock pot', '10:  Add the 12 cups water and bring to a boil over high heat', '11:  Reduce the heat to low heat and cover', '12:  Simmer for at least 1 hour, or up to 8 hours', '13:  The longer it cooks, the stronger the flavor of the broth will be', '14:  Season with salt to taste', '15: About 30 minutes before serving, combine the 1 cinnamon 1 cinnamon rice stick, cloves, 5 cardamom, 5 star anise, 1 teaspoon coriander, and 1 teaspoon fennel in a fine-mesh sieve', '16:  Lower into the pot, resting the sieve on the edge, then cover and simmer for 15 minutes', '17: Remove the spices and add the 14 oz soft tofu to heat through, 10-15 minutes', '18: Remove the pot from the heat', '19:  Remove the onions, daikon, and 1 ginger from the pot', '20:  (Slice and add them back to the soup, if desired', '21: )Add the noodles to serving bowls and ladle in the broth, mushrooms, and 14 oz soft tofu', '22: Garnish with red onion, 1 cup bean sprouts, 1 chili peppers, a squeeze of lime, and fresh cilantro']

ingredients: ['4 frozen pie crusts defrosted', '8 oz cream cheese (225 g) softened', '½ cup pumpkin puree (110 g)', '¼ cup brown sugar (55 g)', '1 tablespoon maple syrup', '1 tablespoon graham cracker crumbs', '¼ teaspoon vanilla extract', '½ teaspoon pumpkin pie spice', '1 egg beaten', 'Glaze', '½ cup powdered sugar (80 g)', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '¼ teaspoon pumpkin pie spice', '2 tablespoons milk', 'Special Equipment', 'pumpkin cookie cutter']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: In a medium bowl, mix the 8 oz cream cheese, ½ cup ½ teaspoon ¼ teaspoon pumpkin puree, brown sugar, maple syrup, graham cracker crumbs, and ½ cup ½ teaspoon ¼ teaspoon pumpkin 4 frozen ½ teaspoon ½ teaspoon ¼ teaspoon pumpkin ¼ teaspoon ¼ teaspoon pumpkin pie spice', '3: Cut out ½ cup ½ teaspoon ¼ teaspoon pumpkin shapes from the crust with a ½ cup ½ teaspoon ¼ teaspoon pumpkin cookie cutter', '4:  Arrange them on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '5: Brush the beaten 1 egg over half of the ½ cup ½ teaspoon ¼ teaspoon pumpkin shapes', '6: Spoon a heaping teaspoon of ½ cup ½ teaspoon ¼ teaspoon pumpkin mixture onto the center of each shape', '7:  Place the other half of the ½ cup ½ teaspoon ¼ teaspoon pumpkin shapes on top of the bottom ½ cup ½ teaspoon ¼ teaspoon pumpkin shape and the ½ cup ½ teaspoon ¼ teaspoon pumpkin mixture', '8:  Press along the edges with your fingers', '9: Using a fork, seal the edges of each ½ cup ½ teaspoon ¼ teaspoon pumpkin completely and lightly prick the tops', '10: Brush the top of the ½ cup ½ teaspoon ¼ teaspoon pumpkins with the beaten 1 egg', '11: Bake for 25 minutes, or until golden brown', '12: Cool mini 4 frozen ½ teaspoon ½ teaspoon ¼ teaspoon pumpkin ¼ teaspoon ¼ teaspoon pumpkin pies on a wire rack', '13: In a large measuring cup, combine powdered sugar, vanilla extract, and ½ cup ½ teaspoon ¼ teaspoon pumpkin 4 frozen ½ teaspoon ½ teaspoon ¼ teaspoon pumpkin ¼ teaspoon ¼ teaspoon pumpkin pie spice', '14:  Add 2 tablespoons milk one tablespoon at a time until you reach a smooth consistency', '15: Drizzle the glaze over each mini 4 frozen ½ teaspoon ½ teaspoon ¼ teaspoon pumpkin ¼ teaspoon ¼ teaspoon pumpkin pie']

ingredients: ['3 wheels brie cheese', '1 tablespoon pomegranate preserves', '¼ cup shredded mozzarella cheese (25 g)', '1 tablespoon honey', '¼ cup pecan (25 g) chopped', '¼ cup shredded pepper jack  cheese (25 g)', '1 tablespoon dijon mustard', '¼ cup shredded monterey jack cheese (25 g)', '3 oz prosciutto (85 g) sliced', '1 large egg', '1 tablespoon water', '1 sheet puff pastry thawed', 'all purpose flour for dusting', 'baguette sliced and toasted for serving']
instructions: ['1: Arrange a rack in the lower third of the oven', '2:  Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '3:  Line a baking 1 sheet with parchment paper', '4: Arrange the Brie 3 wheels on a cutting board', '5:  Spread the 1 tablespoon pomegranate preserves over 1 wheel of Brie', '6:  Sprinkle the shredded mozzarella over the jam', '7: Place another wheel of Brie on top of the mozzarella', '8:  Spread the 1 tablespoon honey over the Brie', '9:  Top with the pecans, then the shredded pepper Jack', '10: Place the last wheel of Brie on top of the pepper Jack', '11:  Spread the Dijon mustard on top of the Brie', '12:  Top with the shredded Monterey Jack', '13: Drape the 3 oz prosciutto over the Brie so that all sides are covered and the 3 oz prosciutto overlaps on the top', '14: In a small bowl, beat the 1 large egg and 1 tablespoon water together', '15: On a lightly floured surface, roll out the puff pastry to a 12 x 14-inch (30 x 35 cm) rectangle', '16: Place the Brie tower in the center of the puff pastry', '17:  Fold the corners of the puff pastry up to the center, brushing each layer with 1 large egg wash to secure', '18:  Brush the entire tower with 1 large egg wash', '19:  Cut a few slits in the top of the tower to allow steam to escape', '20: Transfer the Brie tower to the prepared baking 1 sheet and bake for 30–35 minutes, until golden brown', '21:  Let cool for 5 minutes before serving', '22: Serve with the toasted baguette']

ingredients: ['4 medium yukon gold potatoes peeled', '2 tablespoons vegan butter', '2 garlics minced', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '2 cups non-dairy milk (480 mL)', '1 ½ cups low sodium vegetable broth (360 mL)', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '⅓ cup nutritional yeast (20 g)', '½ medium yellow onion sliced into rings', 'fresh parsley chopped to garnish']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Thinly slice the potatoes into rounds about ⅛-inch (3 mm) thick', '3:  Submerge in a large bowl of water to keep from browning and set aside', '4: In a medium pot over 1 ½ cups low heat, melt the 2 tablespoons vegan butter', '5:  Once the 2 tablespoons vegan butter begins to foam, add the garlic and cook for 2-3 minutes, until fragrant', '6:  Add the 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour and stir until 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour and 2 tablespoons vegan butter resemble the consistency of wet sand, creating a roux', '7: While stirring continuously, add the non-dairy 2 cups non-dairy milk, vegetable broth, 1 teaspoon salt, and ½ teaspoon pepper and bring to a boil', '8:  Stir in the ⅓ cup nutritional yeast and continue to cook for 2-3 minutes, or until the sauce thickens', '9:  Remove from the heat', '10: In a medium baking dish, add 2 layers of the sliced potatoes, followed by a layer of the sliced onions', '11:  Pour on half of the cheese sauce and spread with a spatula to coat all of the potatoes and onions', '12:  Add another 2 layers of potatoes and pour on the remaining cheese sauce', '13: Cover with a lid or foil and bake for 1 hour', '14:  Then, uncover and bake for 10-15 minutes more, until the top is golden and bubbling and the potatoes are tender', '15: Garnish with fresh parsley and serve warm']

ingredients: ['1 cup fenugreek (100 g)', '4 tablespoons sesame oil', '1 ½ teaspoons black mustard seeds', '1 teaspoon asafoetida', '1 teaspoon salt or to taste divided', '1 cup sweet fresh seedless grapes (100 g)', '1 tablespoon red chile powder heaping', '½ cup medium concentrate tamarind juice (120 mL) diluted tamarind paste or powder 2 tablespoons lemon or lime juice or 1 tablespoon vinegar', '2 tablespoons jaggery brown sugar or honey']
instructions: ['1: Soak the 1 cup fenugreek seeds in water for 24 hours', '2:  Drain, wrap loosely in a cotton cloth, and keep covered in a bowl for another 24 hours', '3:  The seeds should have sprouted', '4: Heat the 4 tablespoons sesame oil in a non-stick pan', '5:  When hot, add the 1 ½ teaspoons black mustard seeds', '6: After the 1 ½ teaspoons black mustard seeds splutter, add the 1 teaspoon asafoetida and sprouted 1 cup fenugreek', '7: Add half the 1 teaspoon salt amount, mix, cover, and cook for 5-7 minutes on ½ cup medium heat', '8: Now add the 1 cup sweet fresh seedless grapes, the remaining 1 teaspoon salt, and the chile powder', '9:  Cover and cook for another 5 minutes', '10: Add the tamarind juice, mix, and keep covered for another 3 minutes', '11: Take off the lid, add the 2 tablespoons jaggery, and simmer until the oil starts to float on the top (should be about 5 mins)', '12: Serve or store for up to 6 months!Note: To enhance the flavor, you can use dry 1 tablespoon red chiles instead of store-bought chile powder', '13:  Use 8 chiles for this quantity of pickle and add it to the oil at the beginning (before you add the 1 ½ teaspoons black mustard seeds)', '14:  Fry for just about 45 seconds on low heat', '15:  Take just the chiles out, leave the oil in the pan and turn off the stove', '16:  After the chiles cool down in a few mins, grind them into a powder', '17:  Make the pickle in the chile-infused oil you already have in your pan with the chile powder you have just made']

ingredients: ['Chili', '½ lb ground beef (225 g) 80/20', '½ cup yellow onion (75 g) diced', '½ cup green bell pepper (75 g) diced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 ½ cups crushed tomatoes (300 g) canned', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '½ tablespoon chili powder', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon paprika', '¼ teaspoon cayenne', '1 can kidney bean drained', 'Biscuits', '2 ½ cups self-rising flour (310 g)', '1 cup cornmeal (150 g)', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '2 sticks unsalted butter cubed and chilled', '1 cup buttermilk (240 mL)', '¼ cup all purpose flour (30 g) for dusting', 'Chili Butter', '¼ cup unsalted butter (55 g)', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '2 teaspoons chili powder', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon paprika', '¼ teaspoon cayenne', 'Toppings', '½ cup shredded cheddar cheese (50 g)', '3 scallions sliced', '½ cup sour cream (120 g)']
instructions: ['1: Make the ½ tablespoon 2 teaspoons chili: In a large pot over medium heat, combine the ground beef, ½ cup yellow onion, ½ cup green bell pepper, 2 cloves garlic, and 1 ½ cups crushed tomatoes', '2:  Bring to a simmer', '3:  Add the salt, ½ tablespoon 2 teaspoons chili powder, cumin, paprika, cayenne, and 1 can kidney beans', '4:  Stir to combine, then simmer for 40–45 minutes, until the ½ tablespoon 2 teaspoons chili has thickened', '5:  Remove the pot from the heat and let the ½ tablespoon 2 teaspoons chili cool completely', '6: Make the biscuits: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C)', '7:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '8: In a large bowl, whisk together the self-rising 2 ½ cups self-rising ¼ cup all ¼ cup all purpose flour, 1 cup cornmeal, and salt', '9: Add the butter and press into the dry ingredients with your fingertips until the 2 ½ cups self-rising ¼ cup all ¼ cup all purpose flour resembles coarse sand', '10: Add the 1 cup buttermilk and stir until the dough comes together in a ball', '11: Dust a clean surface with the all-purpose 2 ½ cups self-rising ¼ cup all ¼ cup all purpose flour', '12:  Turn the dough out and fold in half, then the dough into a circle and roll out with a rolling pin to about ¼ inch (6 mm) thick', '13: Using a 4-inch (10 cm) round cutter, portion the dough into 12 rounds', '14:  Re-roll dough and cut more circles as needed', '15: Scoop 1 ½ tablespoon of the cooled ½ tablespoon 2 teaspoons chili into the center of a round of dough and carefully pinch the edges together around the ½ tablespoon 2 teaspoons chili to seal', '16:  Repeat with the remaining dough', '17:  Place the filled biscuits on the prepared baking sheet, seam-side down', '18:  Save the remaining ½ tablespoon 2 teaspoons chili for another use', '19: Make the ½ tablespoon 2 teaspoons chili butter: In a small microwave-safe bowl, combine the butter, salt, ½ tablespoon 2 teaspoons chili powder, cumin, paprika, and cayenne', '20:  Microwave in 30-second intervals until the butter is completely melted', '21: Brush the tops of the biscuits generously with the ½ tablespoon 2 teaspoons chili butter', '22:  Sprinkle the ½ cup shredded cheddar cheese on top', '23: Bake the biscuits for about 20 minutes, or until golden brown', '24: Garnish the biscuits with the 3 scallions and serve with ½ cup sour cream alongside']

ingredients: ['6 whole carrots or chopped (if you prefer bite-sized pieces) peeled with tips and ends cut off', '2 tablespoons butter melted', '2 tablespoons honey', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400ºF (200ºC)', '2: In a medium casserole dish, evenly coat the 6 whole carrots in 2 tablespoons butter, 2 tablespoons honey, salt, and pepper', '3: Bake for 25-30 minutes']

ingredients: ['Chicken Wings', '1 ½ lb chicken wings (680 g)', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '¼ teaspoon salt', 'Lemon Pepper Sauce', '1 tablespoon butter', '3 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 teaspoon pepper', 'salt to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 250˚F (130˚C)', '2: Place 1 ½ lb chicken wings in a large bowl and pat dry', '3: Add the 2 teaspoons baking powder and salt to the 1 ½ lb chicken wings', '4:  Stir to coat', '5: Spray a 2 teaspoons baking rack with nonstick cooking spray and place on top of a foiled sheet pan', '6:  Distribute 1 ½ lb chicken wings evenly on top, making sure none of them touch and they are all face-up', '7: Bake for 35 minutes, then increase the temperature to 425˚F (220˚C) and bake for an additional 45 minutes, or until 1 ½ lb chicken wings are crisp and golden', '8:  (Do not remove the 1 ½ lb chicken wings from the oven when increasing temperature', '9: )For sauce, in a hot pan, melt 1 tablespoon butter', '10:  Add 3 tablespoons lemon juice, 1 teaspoon pepper, and salt', '11:  Stir until combined', '12: Add 1 ½ lb chicken wings and stir to coat']

ingredients: ['1 small watermelon or medium', '3 fresh mint leaves plus more for garnish', '1 bottle soju', '2 cups ice (350 g)']
instructions: ['1: Using a sharp knife, cut ⅛–¼ inch (3 mm-6mm) off of one end of the 1 small watermelon to make a flat surface', '2:  Set the 1 small watermelon upright and cut off the top to expose the flesh', '3:  Scoop out the flesh with a large spoon into a large bowl', '4:  Make sure to not go all the way through the bottom of the 1 small watermelon–this will be your serving vessel', '5: Use an immersion blender (or transfer to a standing blender) to blend the 1 small watermelon flesh for 1 minute, until smooth', '6:  Strain the 1 small watermelon juice through a fine-mesh sieve into a clean large bowl or pitcher to remove the pulp', '7:  You should have about 4 2 cups (960 ml)', '8: Thinly slice the 3 fresh mint leaves, then add to the 1 small watermelon juice, along with the 1 bottle soju, and stir to combine', '9: Pour the 1 small watermelon 1 bottle soju mixture into the hollowed-out 1 small watermelon shell (reserve any leftovers in the refrigerator until ready to refill, or for a later use) and fill the rest of the way with the ice', '10:  Garnish with more 3 fresh mint leaves, if desired', '11:  Serve cold']

ingredients: ['8 oz crescent dinner rolls (225 g) 2 cans', '1 cup mozzarella cheese (100 g)', '½ cup pepperoncinis (70 g)', '¼ cup fresh basil (10 g)', '⅓ lb salami (150 g)', '⅓ lb ham (150 g)', '¼ lb prosciutto (115 g)', '8 slices provolone cheese halved', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'olive oil optional for the dip', 'balsamic vinegar optional for the dip']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '2: Unroll 8 oz crescent dinner rolls (225 g) 2 cans of dough, separate into triangles', '3: On a large cookie sheet, place a bowl in the center (about 5 inches [12cm] in diameter)', '4:  Arrange the triangles in a ring around the bowl, dough should overlap', '5: Layer 1 cup mozzarella 8 8 slices provolone cheese, ½ cup ½ cup pepperoncinis, ¼ cup fresh basil, ⅓ lb salami, ⅓ lb ham, ¼ lb prosciutto, and provolone on each triangle closest to the ring', '6: Season with salt and ½ cup pepper', '7: Bring the top of the triangle over the filling, and tuck the edges under the bottom layer of dough', '8:  Repeat around the ring until the entire filling is enclosed', '9: Bake for 30 minutes or until the dough is golden brown', '10: Serve with olive oil and balsamic', '11: Cool 5 to 10 minutes before cutting into serving 8 slices']

ingredients: ['2 boneless skinless chicken breasts', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 teaspoons black peppercorn', '½ medium white onion halved', '6 cloves garlic divided 4 whole and 2 minced', '2 bay leaves', '6 cups water (1.4 L)', '2 tablespoons oil', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '1 ½ teaspoons paprika', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '¾ cup chicken broth (180 mL)', '4 large leaves romaine lettuce', '½ cup shredded mexican cheese blend (50 g)', '1 tomato diced']
instructions: ['1: Place the 2 boneless skinless ¾ cup chicken breasts, 2 teaspoons salt, peppercorns, onion, whole garlic 6 cloves, 2 bay leaves, and 6 cups water in a 4 large pot', '2: Cover the pot and bring to a simmer over ½ medium heat', '3: Once the 6 cups water is simmering, cook for 10 minutes, until the 2 boneless skinless ¾ cup chicken registers 165°F (74°C) when pierced with an instant-read thermometer', '4: Transfer the 2 boneless skinless ¾ cup chicken to a cutting board and reserve at least ¾ cup (180 ml) of the cooking liquid to use as broth', '5:  Using 2 forks, pull the 2 boneless skinless ¾ cup chicken apart until shredded', '6: In a 4 large nonstick pan, heat the 2 tablespoons oil over ½ medium heat until shimmering', '7: Add the minced garlic, 2 teaspoons ground cumin, 1 ½ teaspoons paprika, 1 teaspoon chili powder, and 1 teaspoon dried oregano', '8:  Sauté until the 2 tablespoons oil is bubbling and very fragrant, about 2 minutes', '9: Add the 2 boneless skinless ¾ cup chicken broth and stir until the liquid has reduced and thickened slightly, about 7 minutes', '10: Add the shredded 2 boneless skinless ¾ cup chicken and mix until everything is well incorporated', '11: Remove the pan from the heat and let the 2 boneless skinless ¾ cup chicken cool for 5 minutes before spooning into the lettuce leaves', '12: Top with shredded cheese and 1 tomato diced tomatoes']

ingredients: ['6 cups water (1.4 L)', 'salt to taste', '1 head cauliflower', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: On a cutting board, use a knife to remove the 1 head cauliflower florets', '2:  Discard the stem', '3: In a medium saucepan, bring the 6 cups water to a rolling boil, season with salt, and add 1 head cauliflower', '4:  Cover and cook for 6-7 minutes, until a knife can easily run through the florets', '5: Transfer the 1 head cauliflower to a blender with a slotted spoon', '6:  Reserve the 6 cups water', '7: Add 1 head cauliflower, pepper, and 1 cup (235 ml) of 1 head cauliflower stock to a blender and blend until a smooth consistency is reached']

ingredients: ['1 cup shredded parmesan cheese (100 g)', '1 teaspoon dried basil']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: Place the Parmesan cheese by the tablespoonful in small piles on the baking sheet', '4:  Flatten the piles out evenly and sprinkle 1 teaspoon dried basil over the cheese', '5: Bake for 5-7 minutes, or until golden brown and the edges start to crisp up', '6: 0', '7: 33g total carbs\n0', '8: 3g dietary fiber\n0', '9: 30g net carbs per serving (12 crisps)']

ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '½ tablespoon butter', '1 egg', '3 tablespoons shredded cheese', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: With a spoon, press down on the center of the 1 slice bread to form a pocket', '2: Line the edges of the 1 slice bread with ½ tablespoon butter, and crack an 1 egg into the pocket', '3: Line the edges of the 1 slice bread with 3 tablespoons shredded cheese', '4: Sprinkle on salt and pepper, and bake at 400°F (204°C) for 10-15 min', '5:  10 min will have a runny yolk whereas 15 min will have a firmer yolk']

ingredients: ['2 cups shredded chicken (250 g) cooked', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 onion diced', '1 red bell pepper diced', '1 jalapeño diced', '2 cups shredded monterey jack cheese (200 g) divided', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 tablespoon paprika', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 lime juiced', '1 cup red enchilada sauce (290 g)', '4 zucchinis', 'fresh cilantro chopped for ganish']
instructions: ['1: In a bowl mix together 2 2 2 1 cups shredded chicken, 1 onion, 1 1 1 cup red bell 1 1 1 cup red bell ½ teaspoon pepper, jalapeno, 1 2 2 1 cup of Monterey Jack (100 g), enchilada sauce, 1 lime juice, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, 1 teaspoon chili powder, salt, 1 1 1 cup red bell ½ teaspoon pepper', '2:  Mix thoroughly and set aside until ready to use', '3: With a peeler, peel slices of zucchini vertically', '4:  Once you can no longer peel a whole slice of zucchini peel the rest into smaller strips and save for zoodles!Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '5: Spread 2 2 2 1 cups shredded chicken mixture on to a slice of zucchini and roll into a tight spiral', '6: Place in a greased springform pan and bake for 15 minutes', '7:  Sprinkle with the rest of the cheese and bake for 10 more minutes until cheese has melted', '8: Transfer to a plate and sprinkle with fresh cilantro', '9: Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['1 cup butter (230 g) softened', '7 cloves garlic minced', '2 tablespoons fresh rosemary finely chopped', '2 tablespoons fresh thyme finely chopped', '2 tablespoons salt', '1 tablespoon pepper', '5 lb boneless ribeye roast (2.2 kg) trimmed', '2 tablespoons flour', '2 cups beef stock (475 mL)', 'mashed potato to serve', 'green bean to serve']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 500°F (260°C)', '2: Mix together the 1 cup butter, 7 cloves garlic, herbs, 2 tablespoons salt, and 1 tablespoon pepper in a bowl until evenly combined', '3: Rub the herb 1 cup butter all over the rib 5 lb boneless ribeye roast, then place on a 5 lb boneless ribeye roasting tray with a rack', '4: Bake for 5 minutes per pound (10 minutes per kilo) of meat, so a 5-pound (2', '5: 2 kg) 5 lb boneless ribeye roast would bake for 25 minutes', '6: Turn off the heat and let the rib 5 lb boneless ribeye roast sit in the oven for 2 hours, making sure you do not open the oven door or else the residual heat will escape', '7: Once the 2 hours are up, remove the 5 lb boneless ribeye roast from the pan and pour the pan drippings into a saucepan over medium heat', '8: Add the 2 tablespoons flour, whisking until there are no lumps, then add the 2 cups beef stock, stirring and bringing the sauce to a boil', '9: Remove from heat and strain the sauce into a gravy dish', '10: Carve the prime rib into ¾-inch (20 mm) slices', '11: Serve with the mashed potatoes, green beans, and sauce!']

ingredients: ['2 cups warm water (480 mL)', '1 tablespoon sugar', '½ cup olive oil (120 mL)', '1 tablespoon instant yeast', '5 ½ cups all-purpose flour (690 g)', '1 tablespoon salt', '10 large eggs', '16 oz ricotta cheese (455 g)', '1 cup fresh parsley (35 g) chopped', '4 oz grated pecorino romano (115 g)', '8 oz ham (225 g) boiled cubed', '8 oz pepperoni (225 g) cubed', '8 oz provolone cheese (225 g) cubed', '8 oz salami (225 g) hard cubed', '4 oz prosciutto (115 g) chopped', '1 ½ cups bread crumbs (170 g)', '1 large egg beaten']
instructions: ['1: In a 10 1 large mixing bowl, combine the 2 cups warm water, 1 tablespoon sugar, ½ cup olive oil, and 1 tablespoon instant yeast', '2: Add the 5 ½ cups all-purpose flour and 1 tablespoon salt, and mix the dough together with a wooden spoon until it forms a ball', '3:  Then knead the dough for 1 minute, or until it feels smooth and springy', '4: Cover the dough in the bowl with a kitchen towel or plastic wrap', '5:  Let rise in a 2 cups warm place for 2 hours', '6: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '7: In a 10 1 large bowl, add 10 eggs, 16 oz ricotta, 1 cup fresh parsley, and Pecorino Romano', '8:  Whisk the mixture until smooth', '9: Add the 8 oz ham, 8 oz pepperoni, 8 oz provolone, hard 8 oz salami, 4 oz prosciutto, and 1 ½ cups bread crumbs', '10:  Fold in the cubed meats and cheeses', '11:  The texture should be thick and slightly wet', '12: Once the dough has doubled in size, dump it onto a 5 ½ cups all-purpose floured surface, knead for 2 minutes, and shape it into a ball', '13:  Roll the dough out to a rough circle, about ¼-inch (½-cm) thick', '14: With a pizza cutter or knife, cut out a 10 1 large disc that is 2 inches (5-cm) wider than a 9-inch (23-cm) springform pan or round baking dish', '15:  With the rest of the dough, cut thick strips about 9 inches (23-cm) long and 1 inch (2 cm) thick', '16: Transfer the dough disc into the springform pan or baking dish', '17:  Gently press the dough against the bottom and sides of the pan, allowing the excess to hang over the sides', '18: Pour the egg, cheese, and meat mixture into the pan', '19:  Pack the filling down and smooth the top with a spatula', '20: Weave the strips of dough on top to create a decorative pattern', '21:  Trim any excess dough, then fold and crimp the edges', '22:  Brush the top with egg wash', '23: Bake the pizza rustica for 2 hours, or until the filling is cooked through and the pizza dough has browned', '24: Let the the pizza rustica cool completely', '25:  Remove from the pan', '26:  Chill in the refrigerator overnight on a wire rack']

ingredients: ['8 strips bacon', '2 chicken breasts', 'salt', 'pepper', '1 shallot diced', '¼ cup apple cider vinegar (60 mL)', '1 tablespoon dijon mustard', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL)', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '1 romaine lettuce', '2 hard boiled eggs sliced', '1 roma tomato diced', '1 avocado sliced', '4 oz blue cheese (115 g)', 'Preparation', '8 strips bacon', '2 chicken breasts', 'salt', 'pepper', '1 shallot diced', '¼ cup apple cider vinegar (60 mL)', '1 tablespoon dijon mustard', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL)', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '1 romaine lettuce', '2 hard boiled eggs sliced', '1 roma tomato diced', '1 avocado sliced', '4 oz blue cheese (115 g)', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Slice strips of bacon into 1-inch (2 ½ cm) piecesAggressively season chicken breast on both sides with salt and pepperOver medium-high heat, cook bacon until desired crispness', '2:  Remove from the pan and strain over a paper towel', '3:  Drain excess fatCook the chicken breast for 7 minutes on each side, or until internal temperature reaches 165˚F/75˚C', '4: In a bowl, whisk together shallots, apple cider vinegar, dijon mustard, salt and pepper', '5:  Slowly drizzle in the olive oil until emulsified', '6: Chop romaine into bite size pieces and dice chicken into cubes', '7: In a serving bowl, add a bed of romaine lettuce', '8: In lines across the bowl, place chicken, blue cheese, bacon pieces, avocado, egg, and tomatoes', '9: Drizzle the dressing over the top']

ingredients: ['5 eggs', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'Mix and Match Fillings', 'spinach chopped', 'tomato diced', 'onion diced fine', '1 bell pepper diced fine', '1 head broccoli cut into small florets', 'parmesan cheese', 'cheddar cheese']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: In a measuring cup, beat the 5 eggs until smooth', '3:   Set aside', '4: In a greased muffin tin, place your desired combination of fillings into each muffin cup', '5: Season each cup with salt and pepper', '6: Pour the beaten 5 eggs into each muffin cup until the liquid almost reaches the top', '7: Bake for 20 minutes, until set']

ingredients: ['Cake', '1 cup cake flour (125 g) not self-rising', '1 ½ cups granulated sugar (150 g) divided', '9 large egg whites', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 pinch of salt', '1 ¼ teaspoons cream of tartar', 'Toppings', '1 lb fresh strawberry  (455 g) hulled and thinly sliced', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '2 tablespoons granulated sugar', '3 cups whipped cream (750 mL)', 'Special Equipment', '1 aluminum springform pan 10 inch (25 1/2 cm)', '1 tall aluminum can']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350ºF (180ºC)', '2: Place a medium mixing bowl in the refrigerator to chill', '3: Cut a round of parchment paper to the same circumference as the base of the pan, with a hole in the center that is the same circumference as the can', '4:  Line the springform with the parchment', '5:  Cover the sides of the can completely with parchment, securing with tape and making sure that the tape is covered by parchment', '6: In a medium bowl, sift the flour and ½ 1 1 ½ 3 cup (100 grams) of the 1 ½ 3 cups granulated 2 tablespoons granulated sugar together', '7: In a 9 large bowl, combine the egg whites, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 pinch of salt, and 1 ¼ teaspoons 3 cups 3 cups whipped cream of tartar', '8:  Using an electric mixer, beat the mixture on medium speed until soft peaks form', '9:  You will know when they’ve reached the soft peak stage because the whites will just barely be able to hold their shape', '10: Increase the mixer speed to high and gradually add the remaining 1 1 ½ 3 cup of 1 ½ 3 cups granulated 2 tablespoons granulated sugar, 2 tablespoons at a time', '11:  Beat until the mixture forms stiff peaks', '12:  This may take up to 10-12 minutes', '13:  You will know that you are getting close to stiff peaks when the whites turn very glossy with a satin-like appearance', '14:  Lift the beater out of the bowl and check if the peak stands straight up in a point with no curling at the tip', '15:  Once it does, your ready for the next step', '16: Sift the flour and 1 ½ 3 cups granulated 2 tablespoons granulated sugar mixture into the egg whites, about ⅓ 1 1 ½ 3 cup (80 ml) at a time', '17:  Using a 9 large flexible spatula, carefully fold in the flour until there are no clumps left', '18:  Be careful not to overmix at this point, which will deflate the batter and decrease the volume of the cake', '19: Add ¼ 1 1 ½ 3 cup (60 ml) water to the can to weigh it down, so it stays steady in the springform pan', '20: Carefully transfer the batter to the prepared pan, working your way around the aluminum can and smoothing the top of the batter with the flexible spatula', '21: Bake for 40-45 minutes, until the cake has risen completely, nearly reached the top of the pan, and the top is evenly golden brown with a few cracks', '22:  The top of the cake should spring back when gently pressed with your fingertip', '23:  If there is any indentation left, the cake needs to bake for longer', '24:  Return to the oven and check every 5 minutes', '25: Remove the springform pan from the oven', '26:  Pour out any excess water from the can, then replace can and immediately invert the pan over a wire rack', '27:  (The soda can will prop up the cake while it cools, allowing air to circulate around it', '28: ) Let cool completely, about 45 minutes', '29: Meanwhile, prepare the strawberries', '30:  In a medium bowl, toss to combine the 1 lb fresh strawberry  (455 g) hulled and thinly sliced strawberries with the lemon juice and 1 ½ 3 cups granulated 2 tablespoons granulated sugar', '31:  Refrigerate the berries until you are ready to serve the cake', '32: Remove the aluminum can from the center of the cake', '33:  Carefully run a knife along the outer edge of the pan to release the cake (it should release easily)', '34:  Remove the parchment paper', '35: Top the cake with 3 cups whipped 1 ¼ teaspoons 3 cups 3 cups whipped cream and macerated strawberries']

ingredients: ['3 cups all-purpose flour (375 g) plus more for dusting', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '1 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '2 teaspoons ground cardamom', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 egg beaten', '13 ½ oz coconut milk (400 mL) 1 can', 'oil for frying']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, whisk together the 3 cups all-purpose flour, ½ cup sugar, 1 ½ teaspoons baking powder, 2 teaspoons ground cardamom, and ½ teaspoon kosher salt', '2:  Make a well in the center, then use a rubber spatula to mix in the 1 egg and 13 ½ oz coconut milk until the dough comes together', '3: Turn the dough out onto a 3 cups all-purpose floured surface and knead until smooth', '4:  Dive the dough into 4 portions', '5:  Roll out 1 portion of dough into a circle about ¼-inch (6 ml) thick', '6:  Cut into 8 triangles', '7:  Repeat with the remaining dough portions', '8: Heat the oil in a large pot until it reaches 350˚F (180˚C)', '9: Working in batches, fry the mandazi for 2-3 minutes per side, until golden brown', '10:  Drain on paper towels', '11:  Serve as breakfast or a snack with 5', '12:  Kenyan coffee or chai']

ingredients: ['6 tablespoons butter melted', '3 cups milk (710 mL)', '6 eggs', '2 ¼ cups flour (280 g)', '7 tablespoons sugar', 'red food coloring', 'orange food coloring', 'yellow food coloring', 'green food coloring', '1 tablespoon blue food coloring', 'purple food coloring', '6 cups whipped cream (1.4 L)']
instructions: ['1: In a bowl, whisk 2 ¼ cups flour and 7 tablespoons sugar', '2:  Mix in 6 eggs, then gradually mix in 6 tablespoons butter and warm 3 cups milk, alternating between the two', '3: Evenly divide the batter into 6 bowls', '4:  Add a few drops of food coloring to each bowl, and whisk until fully incorporated and the batter is colored', '5: On a nonstick skillet over medium heat, pour ⅓ of the purple crepe batter, and tip the pan to cover the entire bottom surface', '6:  Cook the crepe begins to gently bubble and cook through, then flip', '7:  Repeat until all of the different color crepe batter is used', '8: Stack crepes on top of each other, starting with purple, then 1 tablespoon blue, green, yellow, orange, and red, with 6 cups whipped cream between each layer', '9: Cover the crepe cake in 6 cups whipped cream, so that it’s fully white on the outside', '10: Slice, and serve']

ingredients: ['6 potatoes peeled', '2 cups grated parmesan cheese (220 g) divided', '3 teaspoons salt divided', '4 tablespoons olive oil divided', '1 sweet onion diced', '1 lb ground beef (455 g)', '14 ½ oz diced tomato (410 g) 1 can drained', '4 tablespoons fresh parsley chopped divided', '1 teaspoon paprika (2 g)', '½ teaspoon pepper', '6 cups spinach (240 g)', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 cup ricotta cheese (250 g)', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese (100 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: Using a knife or mandolin cut the 6 potatoes into slices ⅛-inch (3 mm) thick', '3: On a parchment paper-lined baking sheet, sprinkle half of the Parmesan cheese and spread until it is evenly covering the parchment paper', '4: Place the 6 potatoes over the 2 cups grated parmesan so each potato is overlapping the previous potato both vertically and horizontally', '5:  Continue until the entire pan is filled with 6 potatoes', '6: Sprinkle to rest of the Parmesan evenly over the 6 potatoes', '7:  Season with 1 teaspoon of 3 teaspoons salt', '8:  Bake for 30 minutes, until golden and the 6 potatoes are flexible and slightly crispy', '9: In a skillet heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over medium heat', '10:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the 1 sweet onions, and cook until caramelized, about 15 minutes', '11: Add the 1 lb ground beef break up and mix with the 1 sweet onion until cooked', '12:  Mix in the tomatoes, 3 tablespoons of parsley, paprika, 1 teaspoon of 3 teaspoons salt, and pepper', '13:  Stir, cooking until the 1 lb ground beef is browned and cooked through', '14:  Remove from heat', '15: In a skillet heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over medium heat', '16:  Add the 6 cups spinach, cook until wilted', '17:  Add 1 teaspoon of 3 teaspoons salt and the 2 cloves garlic', '18:  Stir to combine', '19:  Remove from heat', '20: In a bowl combine the 6 cups spinach mixture and the 1 cup ricotta', '21:  Set aside', '22: Evenly spread the 6 cups spinach mixture over the cooked potato sheet', '23: Evenly spread the 1 lb ground beef mixture over the 6 cups spinach', '24:  Sprinkle 1 cup shredded mozzarella over the 1 lb ground beef', '25: Take one end of the potato sheet holding the parchment paper begin rolling upward, making sure the ingredients are not coming out the ends', '26: Once the it is completely rolled place the potato roll on the parchment paper and bake for 15 minutes', '27: Sprinkle with parsley for garnish', '28:  Slice and serve immediately']

ingredients: ['12 slices baguette 1/2 in (1 cm) cut on a slight diagonal', 'olive oil to taste', 'kosher salt to taste', '¾ cup scallion cream cheese (165 g)', '3 oz lox (85 g) thinly sliced', '2 tablespoons caper']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 425˚F (220˚C)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paperArrange the bread in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet', '3:  Brush each piece of bread with olive oil', '4:  Lightly sprinkle with kosher salt', '5:  Bake for 12-14 minutes, until the edges are light golden brown', '6:  Let cool', '7: Spread 1 tablespoon of ¾ cup scallion cream cheese over each crostini', '8:  Top with ¼ ounce of 3 oz lox and a few capers']

ingredients: ['2 large boneless skinless chicken breasts cubed', '15 oz black beans (395 g) 1 can drained and rinsed', '1 white onion diced', '2 cloves garlic', '16 oz medium chunky salsa (455 g) 1 jar', '1 cup brown rice (200 g) cooked', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 bundle green onion sliced for garnish', 'salt to taste', 'black pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Heat the 1 tablespoon olive oil in a 2 large skillet over 16 oz medium-high heat', '2: Toss in the 1 white 1 bundle 1 bundle green onion with a pinch of salt and sauté until the 1 white 1 bundle 1 bundle green onions have softened, about 3 minutes', '3: Move the 1 white 1 bundle 1 bundle green onions to the sides of the pan to create an open space in the middle', '4:  Add the cubed chicken into the center of the pan, season with salt and pepper, and sauté until the chicken has cooked almost all the way through', '5: Add the 2 cloves garlic and mix until fragrant, about 30 seconds', '6: Pour over salsa, black beans, and 1 cup brown rice, and mix until everything in the pan is evenly combined', '7: Let the mixture simmer for 5 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through', '8: Divide the mixture equally into 4-6 bowls and sprinkle over some thinly sliced 1 bundle green 1 white 1 bundle 1 bundle green onions']

ingredients: ['1 lb shrimp (500 g) peeled and deveined', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 tablespoon pepper', '1 tablespoon red chili flakes', '3 cloves garlic minced', '6 oz butter (180 g) melted', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '½ cup white wine (120 mL)', '8 oz linguine (250 g)', 'fresh parsley to garnish', 'red chili flake to garnish']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2: In a medium-sized casserole pan, combine 1 lb shrimp, 1 tablespoon salt, 1 tablespoon pepper, red chili flakes, 3 cloves garlic, 6 oz butter, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, and ½ cup white wine', '3: Bake for 10-13 minutes, or until 1 lb shrimp turns pink and is fully cooked', '4: Bring 4 quarts of water to a boil, add 1 tablespoon salt to taste, and cook 8 oz linguine pasta al dente according to package directions, stirring occasionally', '5: Strain 8 oz linguine and combine with 1 lb shrimp until pasta is fully coated in ½ cup white wine scampi sauce', '6: Garnish with chopped Italian fresh parsley']

ingredients: ['Sweet Chili Sauce', '½ cup water (120 mL) plus 1 tablespoon divided', '3 cloves garlic minced', '2 large fresno chiles minced', '¼ cup sugar (50 g)', '⅓ cup rice vinegar (80 mL)', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', '1 tablespoon cornstarch', 'Lumpia', '2 large carrots peeled', '½ lb green beans (225 g) trimmed', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 small yellow onion diced', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon fresh ginger', '1 lb shrimp (455 g) peeled deveined and finely chopped', '1 tablespoon fish sauce', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 tablespoon rice vinegar', '2 cups bean sprout (200 g)', '16 lumpia wrappers', 'egg wash for brushing', 'canola oil for frying']
instructions: ['1: Make the sweet chili sauce: In a 1 small pot over medium heat, mix together ½ cup (120 ml) of water, the garlic, Fresno chilies, sugar, rice vinegar, and salt', '2:  Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 2 minutes', '3: In a 1 small bowl, whisk together the cornstarch and remaining tablespoon of water', '4: Whisk the cornstarch slurry into the sauce until fully incorporated', '5:  Continue to simmer for 1 minute, or until the mixture has thickened', '6:  Remove from the heat and let cool', '7: Make the 16 lumpia: Julienne the carrots', '8:  Cut the ½ lb green ½ lb green 2 cups beans on the diagonal', '9: In a large skillet, heat the vegetable oil over medium-high heat', '10:  Add the onion and cook for 3 minutes or until slightly tender', '11: Add the garlic and 1 teaspoon fresh ginger, and continue cooking for 2 minutes more, until fragrant', '12: Add the carrots and ½ lb green ½ lb green 2 cups beans, and toss to combine', '13:  Add the 1 lb shrimp, fish sauce, salt, 1 teaspoon pepper, and rice vinegar, and cook for 2 minutes or until 1 lb shrimp is pink', '14: Add the ½ lb green 2 cups bean sprouts, toss to incorporate, and remove the pan from the heat', '15: Lay out a 16 lumpia wrapper in a diamond shape and spoon 2 tablespoons of filling onto the bottom of the wrapper, leaving about 1½ inches (4 cm) of space from the bottom point', '16: Fold the bottom point over the filling, then fold in the edges to create an envelope shape', '17:  Roll the wrapper toward the top point', '18:  Brush the top point with egg wash and finish the roll to seal the end', '19:  Repeat with the remaining wrappers and filling', '20: In a large, deep skillet, heat 1 inch (2', '21: 5 cm) of canola oil to 300°F (150°C)', '22: Carefully add 4-5 16 lumpia at a time to the hot oil', '23:  Fry on each side for 1-2 minutes, or until golden brown', '24:  Note: If the 16 lumpia are cooking too quickly or burning, reduce the heat', '25:  Remove the 16 lumpia from the oil and drain on a wire rack or paper towels', '26: Garnish with cilantro and serve with the sweet chili sauce']

ingredients: ['Gingerbread', '1 cup brown sugar (220 g) packed plus 1 tablespoon', '½ cup blackstrap molasses (170 g)', '⅓ cup cold water (80 mL)', '2 tablespoons ground ginger', '1 tablespoon ground cinnamon plus 2 teaspoons', '2 teaspoons ground cloves', '1 cup unsalted butter (225 g) cubed and softened plus 2 tablespoons', '5 cups all purpose flour (625 g)', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', 'Royal Icing', '4 cups powdered sugar (480 g)', '4 teaspoons meringue powder', '6 tablespoons water', '5 brown food colorings', 'Assembly', '1 cup gum drops (180 g)', '1 cup peppermints (255 g)', '1 cup wrapped truffles (200 g)', 'Special Equipment', '1 mechanical train', 'Preparation', 'Gingerbread', '1 cup brown sugar (220 g) packed plus 1 tablespoon', '½ cup blackstrap molasses (170 g)', '⅓ cup cold water (80 mL)', '2 tablespoons ground ginger', '1 tablespoon ground cinnamon plus 2 teaspoons', '2 teaspoons ground cloves', '1 cup unsalted butter (225 g) cubed and softened plus 2 tablespoons', '5 cups all purpose flour (625 g)', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', 'Royal Icing', '4 cups powdered sugar (480 g)', '4 teaspoons meringue powder', '6 tablespoons water', '5 brown food colorings', 'Assembly', '1 cup gum drops (180 g)', '1 cup peppermints (255 g)', '1 cup wrapped truffles (200 g)', 'Special Equipment', '1 mechanical train', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Make the gingerbread: In a medium saucepan, combine the brown sugar, molasses, water, ginger, cinnamon, and cloves', '2:  Melt over medium heat until the sugar is dissolved, 1–2 minutes', '3: Remove the pot from the heat and whisk in the butter until completely melted and the mixture is glossy', '4:  Let cool completely', '5: Add the flour and salt to the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment', '6:  Mix on low speed to combine for 30 seconds', '7:  Pour in the wet ingredients and mix until the dough comes together, about 2 minutes', '8: Remove the dough from the bowl and wrap tightly in plastic wrap', '9:  Chill in the refrigerator for 20 minutes', '10: While the dough is chilling, make your templates for the train pieces', '11:  The gingerbread will fit snugly over your mechanical train', '12:   Find template here: https://tasty', '13: co/article/tasty/gingerbread-train-templatePreheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '14:  Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper', '15: Roll out the dough on a lightly floured surface to ⅛ inch thick', '16:  Cut out the shapes from the template', '17:  Transfer the shapes to the prepared baking sheets', '18: Bake for 24-28 minutes, until the shapes are stiff to the touch', '19:  Let the shapes cool completely, about 45 minutes', '20: While the gingerbread is cooling, make the royal icing: In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment, mix together the powdered sugar, meringue powder, and water', '21:  Mix on medium-low speed for 1 minute, until no lumps remain and mixture is shiny and glossy', '22: Transfer ¼ of the icing to a piping bag fitted with a small round tip', '23:  This will be the icing to decorate the outside of the train', '24: Add the brown food coloring to the remaining icing in the mixer and mix until homogenous in color', '25: Using the brown icing, assemble the train pieces according to the template', '26:  Let dry for at least 2 hours', '27: Once all 5 pieces of the train have dried, use the white icing to decorate the train as desired', '28:  Let the icing set until hardened', '29: Gently slide decorated gingerbread pieces over the cars of the mechanical train and place on the track', '30: Fill the cargo cars with the gum drops, peppermints, and truffles']

ingredients: ['Rice', '5 cups sushi rice (1 kg)', '5 cups water (1 L)', 'Sushi Vinegar', '1 ¼ cups red vinegar (300 mL) Akazu divided to 250ml and 50 ml', '½ cup monk fruit sweetener (160 g)', '¼ cup salt (60 g)', '¼ cup mirin (20 mL)', 'square kombu 2 inch (5 cm)', 'Toppings', 'soy sauce to taste', 'sushi-grade tuna sliced to taste', 'sushi-grade yellowtail sliced to taste', 'sushi-grade red snapper sliced to taste', 'sushi-grade salmon sliced to taste', 'sushi-grade scallop sliced to taste', 'sushi-grade salmon roe to taste', '½ cup cooked crab (225 g) to taste', 'sushi-grade sea urchin to taste', 'sushi-grade squid to taste', '½ cup cooked shrimp (165 g) to taste', 'nori crumbled to taste', 'fresh cilantro chopped to taste', 'jalapeño sliced to taste', 'caviar to taste', 'masago to taste']
instructions: ['1: Place the rice in a sieve and rinse under 5 cups water 4-5 times, until the 5 cups water is clear', '2: Place the rice and 5 cups water in a pot and bring to a boil', '3:  Once the 5 cups water is at a rolling boil, put a lid on top and cook for 15 minutes on low heat', '4:  Turn off the heat and let it sit for 10 minutes', '5: In a small saucepan over medium heat, add 250ml (1 cup) red vinegar, monk fruit sweetener, salt, and mirin and Kombu', '6:  Once the sweetner and salt are dissolved add 50ml (¼ cup) of the vinegar', '7:  Set aside to cool to room temperature', '8: Place the cooked rice in a wooden tub or a large bowl', '9:  Sprinkle 150ml (½ cup) 5 cups sushi vinegar evenly over the rice while the rice is still hot and mix with a wooden spoon', '10:  Cover the rice with a wet tea towel and cool until close to body temperature', '11:  Save leftover 5 cups sushi vinegar for next time', '12: Place 1-2 tablespoons of rice in a small cup', '13:  Spray soy sauce on the rice', '14:  Sprinkle some nori crumbled seaweed on top', '15:  Top with thinly sliced fresh seafood or your favorite toppings']

ingredients: ['2 cups butternut squash (410 g) cubed', '2 cups brussels sprouts (200 g) quartered', '1 red onion cut into wedges', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 cup green lentil (170 g) rinsed', '3 cups water (720 mL) or vegetable broth', '3 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '1 tablespoon maple syrup', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Add 2 2 2 1 3 cups butternut squash, Brussels sprouts, and 1 red onion to to a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '3:  Season with 1 tablespoon olive oil, salt, and pepper, and use hands to mix until seasoning is fully distributed', '4: Bake for 20 minutes, flipping halfway through', '5: In a medium saucepan, add lentils and 3 cups water, and bring to a boil', '6: Reduce heat to a simmer and cover for 20-25 minutes or until lentils are tender', '7:  Drain excess 3 cups water if necessary', '8: When vegetables are finished roasting, transfer to a mixing bowl and add lentils', '9: For the dressing, combine 3 tablespoons balsamic vinegar, 1 tablespoon maple syrup, salt, and pepper in liquid measuring 2 2 1 3 cup and whisk until combined', '10: Pour dressing over lentils and vegetables and toss until fully coated', '11: Transfer lentil salad to two containers and refrigerate for up to 5 days']

ingredients: ['1 rack spare ribs', 'spring onion to garnish', 'red chili to garnish', 'rice to serve', 'Seasoning', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 tablespoon pepper', '1 tablespoon chinese 5 spice', 'Marinade', '1 tablespoon garlic minced', '1 tablespoon ginger minced', '1 onion chopped', '3 tablespoons hoisin sauce', '1 cup chicken broth (200 mL)', 'Sticky BBQ Sauce', 'leftover slow cooker juice', '¼ cup water (50 mL)', '2 teaspoons corn flour', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '2 tablespoons sesame seeds']
instructions: ['1: Season the 1 rack spare ribs with the 1 tablespoon salt, 1 tablespoon pepper, and 5 1 tablespoon chinese 5 spice', '2: Place in the leftover slow cooker, along with the 1 tablespoon garlic, 1 tablespoon ginger, spring 1 onion, 3 tablespoons hoisin sauce, and 1 cup chicken broth', '3:  Mix with your hands to combine', '4: Cook on high for 3 hours, or low for 6 hours', '5: Preheat the oven to 325°F (170°C)', '6: Once the ribs are cooked, carefully remove them and place onto a tin foil-lined baking tray', '7: To prepare the BBQ sauce, take the remaining cooking juices from the leftover slow cooker and pour into a frying pan set over a medium heat', '8: In a small bowl combine the ¼ cup water and 2 teaspoons corn flour, stir into the cooking juices', '9:  Add remaining BBQ sauce ingredients and reduce until a sticky BBQ sauce is achieved', '10: Brush onto the ribs on both sides and bake for 15 minutes', '11: Chop up the ribs and garnish with spring spring 1 onion and red chili', '12: Serve with rice']

ingredients: ['1 small shallot finely chopped', '2 tablespoons fresh parsley finely chopped', '1 tablespoon fresh chives finely chopped', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons mayonnaise', '2 teaspoons dijon mustard', '2 teaspoons fresh lemon juice', '½ teaspoon worcestershire sauce', '1 pinch cayenne pepper optional', '1 lb fresh lump crab meat (455 g) picked over', 'fine sea salt', 'freshly ground black pepper', '1 cup panko breadcrumbs (50 g)', '2 tablespoons all purpose flour for dusing', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', 'tartar sauce recipe follows', 'lemon wedge']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, whisk together the 1 small shallot, 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, 1 tablespoon fresh chives, 1 egg, 2 tablespoons mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, and 1 pinch cayenne if using', '2: Add the 1 lb fresh lump crabmeat, season with fine sea salt and 1 pinch cayenne freshly ground black pepper and stir to combine', '3: Add the 1 cup panko breadcrumbs and mix just to combine', '4: Form into 6 equal patties and place on a plate', '5:  Chill in the refrigerator for at least 15 minutes, up to 1 hour', '6: Coat the cakes lightly with 2 tablespoons all purpose flour, and shake off any excess', '7: In a large skillet set over medium heat, melt the 2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '8: Fry the 1 lb fresh lump crab cakes until golden and crisp, 3-4 minutes per side', '9:  Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate to drain slightly', '10: Serve warm with tartar sauce and lemon wedges']

ingredients: ['Bread', '2 cups ice cream (290 g) melted any kind but low-fat and dairy-free ice cream do not work well.', '1 ¼ cups self-rising flour (155 g)', 'Optional', '¼ cup rainbow sprinkles (50 g)', '¼ cup chocolate chips (45 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat your oven to 350˚F (175˚C)', '2: Combine melted 2 cups ice cream and self-rising 1 ¼ cups self-rising flour', '3:  Mix until well combined', '4: Add any additional ¼ cup rainbow sprinkles, ¼ cup chocolate chips, or goodies to the batter', '5: Line a loaf pan with parchment paper and grease with a nonstick spray', '6: Pour batter into a loaf pan and spread evenly', '7: Bake for 35-40 minutes', '8:  (Baking times and temperatures may vary from oven to oven', '9: )Allow to cool fully before cutting']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon whole grain mustard', '1 tablespoon dijon mustard', '½ teaspoon dried thyme', '¼ teaspoon dried rosemary', '1 lemon lemon  zest', '¼ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '8 baby red potatoes quartered', '4 carrots large sliced', '4 boneless skinless chicken breasts', '1 lemon thinly sliced', '1 stalk fresh rosemary', '2 tablespoons fresh parsley leaf chopped']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 425˚F (220˚C)', '2: In a small bowl, combine 2 tablespoons olive oil, both mustards, ½ teaspoon dried thyme, ¼ teaspoon dried 1 stalk fresh rosemary, lemon zest, ¼ teaspoon salt, and ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '3:   Whisk and set aside', '4: Cut four sheets of foil, about 14 inches (35 cm) long', '5: Divide 8 baby red potatoes and 4 carrots into 4 equal portions and add to the center of each foil', '6: Drizzle with 2 tablespoons olive oil and season with ¼ teaspoon salt and ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '7: Top each packet with the 4 boneless skinless chicken', '8:  Using your fingers or a brush, work the mustard mixture onto the 4 boneless skinless chicken', '9:  Top with lemon slices and fresh ¼ teaspoon dried 1 stalk fresh rosemary', '10: Fold the sides of the foil over the 4 boneless skinless chicken, covering completely and sealing the packets closed', '11:  Place foil packets in a single layer on a baking sheet', '12:  Place into oven and bake until the 4 boneless skinless chicken is cooked through and the 8 baby red potatoes and 4 carrots are tender, about 30 minutes', '13:   Cooking time may take longer depending on the thickness of the breast']

ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 ½ lb chicken breast (750 g) cubed', '½ yellow onion diced', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 cups cremini mushroom (150 g)', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '2 teaspoons paprika', '4 cups chicken broth (960 mL)', '1 cup heavy cream (240 mL)', '1 lb farfalle pasta (500 g)', '5 oz spinach (150 g)', '1 cup parmesan cheese (110 g)', 'Preparation', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 ½ lb chicken breast (750 g) cubed', '½ yellow onion diced', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 cups cremini mushroom (150 g)', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '2 teaspoons paprika', '4 cups chicken broth (960 mL)', '1 cup heavy cream (240 mL)', '1 lb farfalle pasta (500 g)', '5 oz spinach (150 g)', '1 cup parmesan cheese (110 g)', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large pot on medium heat', '2:  Add chicken, salt and pepper, and brown - make sure to cook through', '3:  Set chicken aside', '4: Add 1 tablespoon olive oil and the onion into the pot and stir', '5:  Cook down for 1-2 minutes', '6: Add mushrooms and garlic, and stir to incorporate with the onion', '7:  Season with salt and pepper to taste as well as thyme and paprika', '8:  Stir to evenly season', '9: Add chicken broth and heavy cream to the pot and stir', '10:  Bring to a boil, then add the farfalle pasta', '11: Cook according to package instructions, being sure to stir every 1-2 minutes to keep the pasta from clumping together', '12:  (Cook time may be a little longer in this recipe than when the pasta is boiled in water', '13: )When the farfalle pasta is al dente, add the spinach and chicken and stir until the spinach cooks down and incorporates', '14: Add parmesan and stir until it’s well-incorporated and you’re left with a smooth sauce', '15: Top off with extra parmesan and serve']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons dry ranch dressing mix', '1 teaspoon paprika', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 ½ tablespoons coconut oil', '⅓ cup corn kernel (55 g)', '2 tablespoons olive oil']
instructions: ['1: In a small bowl, mix together the 2 tablespoons dry ranch dressing mix, 1 teaspoon paprika, ½ teaspoon garlic powder, ½ teaspoon onion powder, and 1 teaspoon kosher salt', '2:  Set aside', '3: Melt the 1 ½ tablespoons coconut oil in a large pot over medium heat', '4:  Add 3-4 popcorn kernels and cover with the lid', '5:   Once they pop, add the rest of the kernels and cover, shaking every 10 seconds, until they begin pop', '6:  Once the pops are more than 3 seconds apart, turn off the heat and let sit for 15 seconds to allow any final kernels to pop', '7: Uncover and drizzle the 2 tablespoons olive oil over the popcorn', '8:  Carefully toss to coat', '9: Sprinkle the cool 2 tablespoons dry ranch spice mixture over the popcorn and stir to coat evenly', '10: Transfer to a bowl and eat immediately, or spread in a single layer on a baking sheet and let cool completely before storing in a sealed container for up to 2 days']

ingredients: ['olive oil to taste', '4 cups kale (270 g) chopped', 'salt to taste', '2 cloves garlic minced', '2 tablespoons pine nuts', 'red pepper flake to taste', '⅓ cup sun-dried tomato (20 g)', '2 flatbreads', '4 tablespoons hummus']
instructions: ['1: In a medium skillet, heat a drizzle of olive oil over medium heat', '2:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the 4 cups kale and cook for 3-4 minutes, until semi-wilted', '3:  Season with a pinch of salt', '4: Add a splash of water and continue to cook for 3-4 minutes until the 4 cups kale is mostly wilted', '5: Add another drizzle of olive oil and the 2 cloves garlic, 2 tablespoons pine nuts, and red pepper flakes to the pan', '6:  Cook for another 3-4 minutes until the 2 cloves garlic is fragrant and the 2 tablespoons pine nuts are toasted', '7: Add the sun-dried tomatoes and cook for 2-3 more minutes until the 4 cups kale is completely wilted and tender', '8:  Transfer the 4 cups kale mixture to a bowl and set aside', '9: In the same pan, add a drizzle of oil from the jar of sun-dried tomatoes', '10:  Heat the 2 flatbreads, 1 at a time, for 2-3 minutes on each side until golden brown', '11: Transfer the 2 flatbreads to a cutting board and spread with the 4 tablespoons hummus', '12:  Spoon the 4 cups kale mixture on top and cut into quarters', '13: Sprinkle with more red pepper flakes, if desired, and serve']

ingredients: ['7 cups cauliflower florets (2 kg)', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 cup italian breadcrumb (115 g)', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ cup grated parmesan cheese (55 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 425˚F (220˚F)', '2: In a bowl or ziploc bag, add the 7 cups cauliflower florets and 1 tablespoon olive oil and stir until fully combined', '3: Add the ½ teaspoon garlic powder, ½ teaspoon salt, breadcrumbs, and Parmesan', '4:  Stir until fully coated', '5: Spread the 7 cups cauliflower on a greased, foil-lined baking sheet', '6: Bake for 20 minutes', '7:  Stir the 7 cups cauliflower and bake for an additional 10']

ingredients: ['2 chicken breasts sliced', '1 lb cooked andouille sausage (455 g)', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '3 cloves garlic minced', '3 bell peppers diced', '1 medium onion diced', '6 cups milk (1.5 L) whole preferred', '1 lb fettuccine pasta (455 g) uncooked', '¾ cup parmesan cheese (80 g) plus more for serving', '3 tablespoons fresh parsley chopped plus more for serving', 'Cajun Seasoning', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper']
instructions: ['1: In a small bowl, combine all spices for the cajun seasoning and mix together', '2:  Set aside', '3:  Store any extra in an airtight container for future use', '4: In a heavy bottom pot (such as a Dutch oven), heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over 1 medium heat', '5: Add the sliced 2 chicken and 2½ tablespoons of the prepared cajun seasoning', '6: Add the 1 lb cooked andouille sausage and cook until the 2 chicken is no longer pink, about 4-5 minutes', '7: Remove the meat from the pot and add the remaining olive oil', '8: Add the garlic, diced 3 bell peppers and onions and cook until the onions are transparent and softened, about 5 minutes', '9: Add the 6 cups milk and stir so that the seasoning is incorporated into the liquid', '10: Turn the heat to high and bring to a boil', '11: Add the uncooked 1 lb fettuccine, stirring constantly until the noodles are al dente, about 10 minutes', '12: On low heat, add the meat back in and stir so that it’s evenly incorporated', '13: Add the ¾ cup parmesan cheese and parsley, and stir', '14:  Remove from the heat']

ingredients: ['3 cups watermelon (450 g) cubed', '½ cucumber diced', '2 limes juiced']
instructions: ['1: Add the 3 cups watermelon, ½ cucumber, and lime juice to a blender, and blend until smooth', '2: Using a mesh strainer, strain the juice over a large liquid measuring cup to remove the pulp', '3:  Use a spoon to help stir the pulp and press out the liquid', '4:  Reserve the pulp to make pulp muffins', '5: Chill the juice for at least 30 minutes (and keep up to 3 days)']

ingredients: ['⅓ cup butter (75 g)', '1 onion diced', '3 stalks celery diced', '3 large carrots diced', '1 cup milk (240 mL)', '2 cups chicken broth (480 mL)', '½ cup flour (60 g)', '1 rotisserie chicken shredded', '1 cup frozen peas (150 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '3 refrigerated pie crusts', 'Special Equipment', '6 disposable foil pot pie pans or ceramic ramekins']
instructions: ['1: In a deep skillet, melt the ⅓ cup butter and cook 3 stalks celery, 3 large carrots, and 1 onion until tender', '2: Pour in the ½ cup flour, and mix in well', '3: Stirring constantly, add in the 1 cup milk and chicken broth a little at a time, alternating between the two', '4:  Bring to a boil and continue stirring until thickened', '5: Add chicken, peas, 1 teaspoon salt, and ½ teaspoon pepper, and stir until combined', '6:  Remove from heat and cool', '7: Roll out 3 refrigerated 6 disposable 6 disposable foil pot pie crust and use the 6 disposable foil pot 3 refrigerated 6 disposable 6 disposable foil pot pie dish as a template', '8:  Cut a 3 refrigerated 6 disposable 6 disposable foil pot piece of dough for the bottom of the dish that is about an inch (²¹⁄₂ cm) thicker than the widest rim of the dish, and a 3 refrigerated 6 disposable 6 disposable foil pot piece that is the same size as the rim', '9:  (Roll dough back out and repeat to make more 3 refrigerated 6 disposable 6 disposable foil pot pieces', '10: )Place the larger 3 refrigerated 6 disposable 6 disposable foil pot piece of crust in the bottom of the 6 disposable foil dish, fill with the cooled pot 3 refrigerated 6 disposable 6 disposable foil pot pie filling, and top with the smaller crust 3 refrigerated 6 disposable 6 disposable foil pot piece', '11: Pinch together, then seal together with a fork', '12:  Cut 4 small slits in the middle of the crust', '13: Cover each pot 3 refrigerated 6 disposable 6 disposable foil pot pie with 6 disposable foil and freeze for up to 2 months', '14: To bake from 1 cup frozen, preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C), and bake for 30 minutes with the 6 disposable foil on top', '15:  Remove the 6 disposable foil and bake for another 30 minutes or until golden brown']

ingredients: ['1 cup mango (165 g)', '½ cup pineapple (80 g)', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '2 cups ice (430 g)']
instructions: ['1: Pour all ingredients into a blender and blend until smooth', '2: Garnish']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil divided', '1 yellow onion thinly sliced', '1 green bell pepper seeded and thinly sliced into rings', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', '½ cup pepperoni (75 g) sliced', '¾ cup grated parmesan cheese (80 g)', '¾ cup shredded mozzarella cheese (75 g)', '7 slices provolone cheese', '2 cups pizza sauce (530 g)', 'all-purpose flour for dusting', '1 lb pizza dough (455 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Heat 1 tablespoon of 2 tablespoons olive oil in a 12-inch (30 cm) cast-iron skillet over medium-high heat', '3:  Once the pan is hot, add the 1 yellow onion and cook until softened, about 4 minutes', '4:  Remove from the pan and set aside', '5: Add the 1 green pepper and cook until softened, about 5 minutes', '6:  Remove from the pan and set aside', '7: Turn off the heat', '8:  Grease the pan with nonstick spray', '9: Arrange the ½ cup pepperoni in an even layer on the bottom of the pan', '10:  Top with the 1 green peppers, 1 yellow onions, Parmesan, and mozzarella', '11:  Arrange the provolone 7 slices over the ¾ cup shredded cheese in an even layer', '12:  Top with the pizza sauce and spread evenly', '13: On a lightly floured surface, roll out the pizza dough to a 12-inch (30 cm) round', '14:  Gently lay the pizza dough over the pizza sauce, making sure the dough reaches to the edges all around', '15:  Brush the dough with the remaining tablespoon of 2 tablespoons olive oil', '16: Bake for 25 minutes, until the dough is golden brown', '17: Carefully remove the skillet from the oven', '18:  Place a large baking sheet on top, then quickly invert the pizza onto the pan', '19: Return to the oven and bake for another 20 minutes, until the ½ cup pepperoni begins to crisp', '20: Slice into 8 wedges, then serve']

ingredients: ['nonstick cooking spray for greasing', '½ cup unsalted butter (115 g) softened 1 stick', '1 ¼ cups granulated sugar (250 g)', '3 large eggs room temperature', '1 cup sour cream (245 g)', '2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '1 tablespoon lemon zest', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '1 ½ cups all purpose flour (185 g)', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', 'Lemon Icing', '2 cups powdered sugar (220 g)', '1 tablespoon milk', '2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice']
instructions: ['1: Make the cake: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2:  Grease a 9x5-inch (22 x  12 cm) loaf pan with nonstick spray and line with parchment paper', '3: In a 3 large bowl, cream the ½ cup unsalted butter and 1 ¼ cups granulated 2 cups 2 cups powdered sugar with an electric hand mixer until light and fluffy, 3–4 minutes', '4: Add the eggs, 1 at a time, and beat to incorporate, scraping down the side of the bowl between additions', '5: In a medium bowl, mix together the 1 cup sour cream, lemon juice and zest, and 1 tablespoon vanilla until smooth', '6: In a separate medium bowl, whisk together the 1 ½ cups all purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking powder, and 1 teaspoon kosher salt', '7: Alternately add the dry and wet ingredients to the batter, about ⅓ at a time, starting and ending with the dry ingredients', '8:  Beat between each addition until just combined', '9: Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan and smooth the top', '10:  Bake for 50–60 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean', '11:  Let cool completely in the pan, about 1 hour', '12: Make the lemon icing: Sift the 2 cups powdered 1 ¼ cups granulated 2 cups 2 cups powdered sugar into a medium bowl', '13:  Add the lemon juice and 1 tablespoon milk and whisk until smooth', '14: Pour the icing evenly over the top of the cake, spreading to reach the edges of the pan', '15:  Let the glaze set completely, about 30 minutes', '16: Transfer to a serving platter, slice, and serve']

ingredients: ['1 ¾ cups self-rising flour (215 g) plus more for dusting', '1 cup whole milk greek yogurt (245 g)', '1 large egg beaten', '1 tablespoon McCormick® Sea Salt', 'bagel cut in half', '1 tablespoon marinara sauce', '2 tablespoons mozzarella cheese grated low-moisture', '10 mini pepperoni slice', '1 bagel cut in half ', '1 slice cheddar cheese', '1 sausage patty cooked', '1 fried egg', '1 bagel cut in half', '1 slice monterey jack cheese', '1 teaspoon ranch dressing', '1 slice bacon halved crosswise', '1 chicken thigh grilled sliced']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2: In a 1 large bowl, mix the 1 ¾ cups self-rising flour and 1 cup whole milk greek yogurt together until the dough comes together in a ball', '3: Turn the dough out onto a lightly 1 ¾ cups self-rising floured surface and knead until smooth, about 5 minutes', '4:  Using a bench scraper, divide the dough into 8 equal portions', '5: Working 1 at a time, roll each portion of dough into a log about 4 inches (10 cm) long', '6:  Shape the log into a ring and transfer to a baking sheet lined with parchment paper', '7: Brush the tops of the bagels with egg wash and generously season with salt', '8: Bake for 17 minutes, or until the tops are golden brown and the bagels are cooked through', '9: Day 1 - Pizza BagelServings: 1Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '10: Spread the 1 tablespoon marinara sauce over the bagel halves', '11:  Sprinkle the 2 tablespoons mozzarella cheese over the sauce and top with the pepperoni', '12: Place on a baking sheet and bake for 8 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and the pepperoni is starting to crisp', '13: Enjoy!Day 2 - Breakfast BagelServings: 2Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '14: Place the 1 slice cheddar cheese on one half of the bagel, then toast in the oven until melted, about 3 minutes', '15: Layer the 1 sausage patty and 1 fried egg on other half of the toasted bagel, then top with the cheesy half', '16: Enjoy!Day 3 - ChickenServings: 2On one half of the bagel, layer the Monterey Jack cheese, 1 teaspoon ranch dressing, 1 slice bacon, and 1 chicken thighs', '17:  Top with the other bagel half']

ingredients: ['1 lb boneless skinless chicken thighs (455 g)', 'kosher salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to tate', '6 oz chipotle pepper in adobo sauce (170 g) finely chopped', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', 'Preparation', '1 lb boneless skinless chicken thighs (455 g)', 'kosher salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to tate', '6 oz chipotle pepper in adobo sauce (170 g) finely chopped', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: On a cutting board, season the chicken all over with salt and pepper', '2: Transfer the chicken to a large zip-top bag with the chopped chipotles and mix until the chicken is fully coated', '3: Refrigerate for at least 2 hours, up to overnight', '4: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat', '5: Add the chicken and cook until golden brown, 4 minutes per side', '6: Remove the chicken with tongs and place on a cutting board', '7:  Let cool for 5 minutes', '8:  Cut the chicken into bite-sized pieces', '9: Transfer the chicken back to the pan over medium-high heat and cook, stirring frequently, for 2-3 minutes, until all pieces are browned']

ingredients: ['4 cups pancake mix (480 g)', '4 eggs', '2 cups milk (480 mL)', '1 cup strawberry (150 g) sliced', '½ cup blueberry (50 g)', '1 cup raspberry (125 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 425˚F (220˚C)', '2: Pour 4 cups pancake mix, 2 cups milk, and 4 eggs into a bowl and mix just until combined', '3: Pour batter onto a parchment-lined baking sheet and spread to the edges', '4: Place 1 cup strawberry slices on top of the batter, followed by the blueberries and raspberries', '5: Bake for 15 minutes, or until golden brown', '6: Cut into squares and serve immediately, or freeze up to 1 month', '7: To reheat, place on a microwave-safe plate and heat for 20 seconds per 4 cups pancake on the plate']

ingredients: ['1 lb ground beef (455 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons taco seasoning', '1 tube pizza dough', '2 cups mexican blend cheese (200 g)', '2 cups lettuce (145 g) shredded', '1 cup tomato (200 g) diced', '1 avocado diced', '½ cup sour cream (115 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: In a skillet over high heat, cook 1 lb ground beef with salt, pepper, and 2 tablespoons taco seasoning until fully cooked', '3:  Remove from heat and set aside', '4: Place 1 tube pizza dough on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '5:  Bake for 10 minutes', '6: Top 1 tube pizza dough with beef mixture and 2 cups mexican blend cheese', '7:  Bake for an additional 5 minutes', '8: Top 1 tube pizza with 2 cups lettuce, tomatoes, 1 avocado, and ½ cup sour cream']

ingredients: ['3 tablespoons wole grain mustard', '2 tablespoons organic maple syrup', '1 tablespoon fresh ginger grated', '4 cloves garlic grated', '1 tablespoon sesame seed toasted', '¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '¼ cup apple cider vinegar (60 mL)', '¼ cup lemon juice (60 mL)', '⅓ cup extra virgin olive oil (80 mL)', 'kosher salt to taste', 'black pepper to taste', '2 cups lacinato kale (135 g) thinly sliced', '2 large carrots peeled and grated', '2 cups broccoli floret (300 g)', '2 cups red cabbage (200 g) thinly sliced', '1 red bell pepper seeded and thinly sliced', '1 avocado peeled and cubed', '1 cup walnut (100 g) chopped', '½ cup fresh parlsey (20 g) chopped']
instructions: ['1: In a liquid measuring cup, combine the 3 tablespoons wole grain mustard, 2 tablespoons organic maple syrup, 1 tablespoon fresh ginger, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tablespoon sesame seeds, ¼ teaspoon cayenne, apple cider vinegar, lemon juice, and olive oil', '2:  Whisk until fully incorporated', '3:  Season to taste with kosher salt and ¼ teaspoon cayenne black 1 red bell pepper', '4: Add the 2 cups lacinato kale, carrots, red cabbage, 2 cups broccoli, red cabbage, bell ¼ teaspoon cayenne black 1 red bell pepper, 1 avocado, walnuts, and parsley to a 2 large serving bowl', '5: Pour desired amount of dressing over the salad and toss until everything is well coated', '6: Garnish with more toasted 1 tablespoon sesame seeds']

ingredients: ['Pesto', '1 cup fresh basil leaves (40 g)', '⅓ cup pine nuts (40 g)', '2 cloves garlic', '½ cup olive oil (120 mL)', '1 cup kale (100 g) stemmed', '1 cup shredded parmesan cheese (100 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'Buddha Bowl', '1 cup butternut squash (205 g) diced', '1 cup beet (200 g) diced', '⅓ cup olive oil (80 mL)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '7 oz extra firm tofu (200 g) sliced into squares', '2 cups cauliflower florets (600 g)', '2 cups broccoli floret (300 g)', '3 cups kale (300 g) stemmed', '1 cup quinoa (170 g) cooked', 'Preparation', 'Pesto', '1 cup fresh basil leaves (40 g)', '⅓ cup pine nuts (40 g)', '2 cloves garlic', '½ cup olive oil (120 mL)', '1 cup kale (100 g) stemmed', '1 cup shredded parmesan cheese (100 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'Buddha Bowl', '1 cup butternut squash (205 g) diced', '1 cup beet (200 g) diced', '⅓ cup olive oil (80 mL)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '7 oz extra firm tofu (200 g) sliced into squares', '2 cups cauliflower florets (600 g)', '2 cups broccoli floret (300 g)', '3 cups kale (300 g) stemmed', '1 cup quinoa (170 g) cooked', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 425ºF (220ºC)', '2: Make the pesto: Add the basil, pine nuts, garlic, olive oil, kale, Parmesan, salt, and pepper to a blender, and blend until smooth', '3: Add the butternut squash and beets to ¼ of a baking sheet', '4:  Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper', '5:  Toss to coat', '6: Add the tofu to another ¼ of the baking sheet and brush with pesto', '7: Bake for 10 minutes, then remove from the oven', '8: Flip the tofu, then add the cauliflower and broccoli to another ¼ of the baking sheet', '9:  Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper', '10:  Toss to coat', '11: Bake for 10 minutes, then remove from the oven', '12: Add the kale to the remaining ¼ of the baking sheet', '13:  Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper', '14: Bake for 10 minutes, until the kale is crispy and all of the vegetables are tender', '15: Add the quinoa to a bowl', '16:  Top with the tofu and vegetables and drizzle with pesto', '17: Nutrition  Calories: 1766 Fat: 126 grams  Carbs: 118 grams Fiber:  26 grams  Sugars: 22 grams  Protein: 63  grams']

ingredients: ['2 cups all purpose flour (250 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 mL double acting baking powder (2 mL)', '1 tablespoon cinnamon', '1 teaspoon nutmeg', '2 eggs', '½ cup vegetable oil (120 mL)', '½ cup unsweetened vanilla almond milk (120 mL) or regular milk', '¾ cup plain greek yogurt (180 mL)', '¾ cup white sugar (150 g) or 1/2 cup brown sugar', '3 teaspoons vanilla extract', '2 teaspoons almond extract', '1 ½ cups strawberry (225 g) chopped', '1 cup chocolate chips (175 g)']
instructions: ['1: Sift and combine 2 cups all purpose flour, 1 teaspoon salt, 2 mL double acting baking powder, sugar, 1 tablespoon cinnamon, 1 teaspoon nutmeg together in a bowl', '2: Beat 2 eggs, oil, ½ cup unsweetened 3 teaspoons vanilla, ½ cup unsweetened 3 teaspoons vanilla 2 teaspoons almond extract, Greek yogurt, ½ cup unsweetened 3 teaspoons vanilla 2 teaspoons almond milk together in another bowl', '3: Add the dry ingredients little by little to the creamed mixture, and mix well', '4:  Stir in chocolate chips and strawberries', '5: Grease a 12-cup standard muffin tin and fill with batter', '6: Bake for about 20-25 minutes at 350°F, or until the tester inserted in the center comes out clean', '7:  Cool pan on rack before removing', '8: Serve']

ingredients: ['1 cup flour (125 g)', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '4 tablespoons olive oil divided', '½ cup warm water (120 mL)', '1 onion diced', '2 carrots diced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon dried dill', '½ teaspoon dried sage', '½ teaspoon dried thyme', '½ teaspoon pepper', '2 cups potato (400 g) diced', '6 cups vegetable broth (1 L)', '2 leaves bay leaf', 'fresh parsley chopped to serve']
