instructions: ['1: Make the pesto: Add the basil, 1 cup fresh parsley, ½ cup fresh chives, ¼ cup pine nuts, 1 small garlic, lemon juice, and salt to a high-powered blender or food processor', '2:  Blend on high speed, scraping down the sides with a rubber spatula as needed, until well combined, 1–2 minutes', '3: Make the zucchini pasta salad: Heat the ½ cup vegetable oil in a large, high-walled skillet over high heat', '4:  Working in batches, fry the zucchini 2 Walmart Zucchinis medium sliced in 1/4 in (6 mm) in rounds in a single layer for 1–1½ minutes per side, until the outside is golden brown but the zucchini is still slightly crisp', '5:  Transfer to a paper towel–lined plate to drain, blotting away any excess oil', '6: Transfer the zucchini to a large serving bowl', '7:  Add the 1 cup spinach and 1 tablespoon red wine vinegar, and toss gently to combine', '8:  Add the 1 lb penne, pesto, lemon zest, capers, and 6 oz fresh mozzarella, and fold gently until well combined', '9:  Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '10: Garnish with the basil leaves and serve slightly warm, or refrigerate until ready to serve']

ingredients: ['½ lb top sirloin steak (225 g)', 'pico de gallo or salsa of your choice', '4 corn tortillas', 'Avocado Cilantro Lime Sauce', '1 ripe avocado', '⅓ cup fresh cilantro (15 g)', '3 tablespoons lime juice', '⅔ cup water (160 mL)', 'salt to taste', 'Chili Lime Rub', '1 ½ teaspoons chili powder', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '1 clove garlic minced', '2 tablespoons lime juice or 1 lime']
instructions: ['1: Place the 1 ripe avocado, ⅓ cup fresh cilantro, lime juice, ⅔ cup water, and salt in a blender or food processor', '2:  Blend until smooth and set aside', '3: In a small bowl, combine the 1 ½ teaspoons chili powder, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, salt, ½ teaspoon black pepper, 1 clove garlic, and lime juice', '4: Rub the 1 ½ teaspoons chili lime rub all over the ½ lb top sirloin steak in a thin, even layer', '5: Grill the ½ lb top sirloin steak on either a grill or stove-top grill pan', '6:  To get the “X” grill marks, sear the ½ lb top sirloin steak for 1 minute, then adjust about 90 degrees and grill for another minute', '7:  Flip the ½ lb top sirloin steak when you’ve achieved desired grill marks and repeat the process on the other side', '8: Allow the ½ lb top sirloin steak to rest for 5-10 minutes once taken off the heat', '9: Slice the ½ lb top sirloin steak thinly, against the grain of the meat', '10: Prepare the tacos by topping the 4 corn tortillas with a few strips of meat, pico de gallo or salsa, the 1 ripe avocado ⅓ cup fresh cilantro lime sauce, and ⅓ cup fresh cilantro, and serve']

ingredients: ['10 oz goat cheese (290 g) room temperature', '8 oz cream cheese (225 g) room temperature', '½ bunch fresh flat-leaf parsley', '½ cup fresh chives (20 g) thinly sliced', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '4 string cheeses', '8 slices prosciutto', '3 tablespoons pesto chilled', '2 large green olives pitted', 'For Serving', 'Crudité', 'cracker']
instructions: ['1: In a 2 large bowl, combine the 10 oz goat cheese, 8 oz cream cheese, ½ bunch fresh flat-leaf parsley, ½ cup fresh chives, and ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '2:  Mix with an electric hand mixer or a spatula until the herbs are evenly distributed', '3:  Cover and refrigerate until ready to use', '4: Tape a piece of parchment paper to a cutting board and trace your hand and 3 inches down your wrist', '5:  Lay a sheet of plastic wrap over the parchment', '6: Cut 1 4 string cheese in half crosswise; these pieces will be the thumb and pinky', '7:  Trim 2 of the 4 string cheeses to be about 2 inches long; these will be the index and ring fingers', '8:  Keep the remaining 4 string cheese whole', '9:  Wrap each piece of 4 string cheese in prosciutto, making sure to cover the ends that will be the fingertips', '10: Using a 1-ounce scoop, scoop 6 portions of the 10 oz goat cheese mixture onto the wrist area of the traced arm', '11:  Add another 4 scoops to the back of the hand area', '12:  Use an offset spatula to smooth out the scoops to make a smooth surface', '13:  Use the tip of the spatula or the back of a spoon to create a ½-inch-deep divot down the center of the wrist and a well in the center of the hand', '14:  Spread some of the 10 oz goat cheese mixture down each finger tracing', '15:  This will help secure the 4 string cheese fingers and create a smoother look', '16:  Fill the divot and well with the 3 tablespoons pesto, being careful not to spill over the sides', '17:  If the cheese is becoming too warm at this point, lightly cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 30 minutes before proceeding', '18: Place each prosciutto-wrapped 4 string cheese on their respective finger tracing, pressing down onto the 10 oz goat cheese to secure', '19: Add 3 scoops of the 10 oz goat cheese mixture to the wrist area in a single line and 3 more scoops to the back of the hand area', '20:  Smooth with the offset spatula to create the wrist and arm, covering the 3 tablespoons pesto', '21:  Make sure to spread the 10 oz goat cheese mixture over where the 4 string cheeses attach to the hand to create a smooth look, using your fingers as needed', '22:  You may have some excess cheese mixture leftover, depending on the size of your tracing', '23:  Fill in any patches with more of the 10 oz goat cheese mixture and shape the cheese to create a realistic hand shape', '24: Cover the entire hand and wrist with the remaining prosciutto', '25:  You may want to tear the prosciutto into smaller pieces for a more realistic effect', '26: Cut the olives into quarters', '27:  Square off one end of each quarter and leave the other end pointy to resemble a fingernail', '28:  Trim each “fingernail” to fit the respective finger you will be placing it on (for example, make the thumbnail slightly 2 larger than the index fingernail, and so on)', '29:  You will only need 5 pieces total', '30: Cut ½-inch divots into each fingertip', '31:  Add a tiny bit of the remaining 10 oz goat cheese mixture to each divot, then press the olive fingernails into their respective fingers', '32: Cover the arm with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 1 hour, or up to 5 days', '33: Just before serving, remove the plastic wrap, then transfer the arm to a serving platter', '34:  Cut 2 8 slices off the back of the wrist', '35:  Serve with crudités and crackers']

ingredients: ['2 lb pork shoulder (905 g) diced', '1 tablespoon seasoned salt', '1 tablespoon cumin', '1 can kidney bean drained', '½ cup tomato (100 g) diced', '½ onion diced', '½ cup red enchilada sauce (120 mL)', '1 box cornbread mix prepared according to instructions', 'cheddar cheese to top optional']
instructions: ['1: Place the 2 lb pork shoulder, 1 tablespoon seasoned salt, 1 tablespoon cumin, 1 can kidney beans, ½ cup tomato, ½ onion, and ½ cup red enchilada sauce in a 7-quart (6 ½ liters) slow cooker', '2:  Mix thoroughly', '3: Cook on high for 3 hours', '4: Dollop prepared 1 box cornbread evenly over mixture', '5:  Cook an additional hour', '6: Serve and top with cheddar cheese if desired', '7: Enjoy! ']

ingredients: ['42 oz peach pie filling (1 kg) about 2 cans', '1 box vanilla cake mix', '8 oz unsalted butter (225 g) cut into small chunks', '⅓ cup walnuts (35 g) optional', 'vanilla ice cream optional for serving']
instructions: ['1: Put 42 oz peach pie filling in slow cooker', '2:  Then top with cake mix, 8 oz unsalted butter, and ⅓ cup walnuts', '3: Cook on high for 2-2', '4: 5 hours or until the cake part reaches desired consistency', '5: Server a la mode with vanilla ice cream or your favorite whipped cream']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '14 oz sweetened condensed milk (400 g)', '½ cup coconut milk (120 mL)', 'coconut flake as needed']
instructions: ['1: In a pot over low heat, melt the 1 tablespoon butter, 14 oz sweetened condensed milk, and coconut milk, stirring continuously until you can see the bottom of the pot for 2-3 seconds when dragging a spatula through', '2: Pour onto a greased plate, then chill for 1 hour', '3: Shape and roll the chilled mixture into balls', '4: Roll the balls in coconut flakes']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '1 tablespoon sugar', '¼ teaspoon baking powder', '⅛ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon vanilla extract', '3 tablespoons flour', '2 tablespoons chocolate chips', '½ cup ice cream (75 g) optional']
instructions: ['1: Add 2 tbsp 2 tablespoons butter, 1 tbsp 1 tablespoon brown 1 tablespoon brown 1 tablespoon sugar, 1 tbsp 1 tablespoon brown 1 tablespoon sugar, ¼ tsp ¼ teaspoon baking powder, ⅛ tsp ⅛ teaspoon salt and ¼ tsp ¼ teaspoon vanilla in a bowl and mix', '2: Next, add 3 tbsp 3 tablespoons flour and 2 tbsp 2 tablespoons chocolate chips and mix thoroughly', '3:  Transfer the mix to a microwave-friendly bowl and heat for 60 seconds', '4:  Top with ½ cup ice cream']

ingredients: ['Lemongrass Simple Syrup', '½ cup cold water (120 mL)', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '4 large stalks lemongrass bruised and cut into 3 in (7 cm) pieces', 'Cocktail', '6 cups soju (1.5 L)', '2 cups pomegranate juice (480 mL)', '6 tablespoons fresh lime juice', '4 cups ice (560 g) plus more for serving']
instructions: ['1: Make the lemongrass simple syrup: In a small saucepan over medium heat, combine the ½ cup cold water, ½ cup sugar, and lemongrass 4 large stalks', '2:  Bring to a simmer and cook until the ½ cup sugar is dissolved, 5–7 minutes', '3:  Remove the pot from the heat and let the syrup cool completely', '4:  Transfer to an airtight container and refrigerate for at least 6 hours, or overnight, to let the lemongrass infuse the syrup', '5:  After infusing, remove the lemongrass 4 large stalks and discard', '6: To make the cocktail, combine the 6 cups soju, 2 cups pomegranate juice, 6 tablespoons fresh lime juice, and lemongrass simple syrup in a 3-quart pitcher', '7:  Stir well to combine', '8: Add the 4 cups ice to the pitcher just before serving', '9:  Stir well', '10: Pour the cocktail into glasses filled with more 4 cups ice and serve']

ingredients: ['3 chicken breasts diced', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 cups broccoli floret (300 g)', '2 cups baby carrot (240 g) diced', '21 oz condensed cream of chicken soup (595 mL)', '1 can refrigerated biscuit']
instructions: ['1: Place the 3 21 oz 21 oz condensed cream of chicken in a 7-quart (6 ½ liters) slow cooker', '2:  Sprinkle on salt & pepper', '3: Add the veggies and 21 oz condensed soup, and mix thoroughly', '4: Cook on high for 3 hours', '5: Rip 1 can refrigerated biscuit dough into small pieces, and drop evenly over 3 21 oz 21 oz condensed cream of chicken', '6:  Cook an additional hour']

ingredients: ['Spring Roll Bowl', '1 large carrot', '1 large cucumber', '1 red bell pepper', '¼ cup fresh basil leaves (10 g)', '¼ cup fresh mint leaf (10 g)', '¼ cup fresh cilantro leaves (10 g)', '1 jalapeño', '7 oz fine rice vermicelli noodles (200 g)', '1 avocado', '½ cup bean sprout (100 g)', 'Rice Paper Chips', 'canola oil or vegetable oil for frying', '4 round rice paper wrappers 6 in (15 cm) wrappers', 'Sauce', '4 cloves garlic', '2 tablespoons rice vinegar', '2 tablespoons sesame oil', '¼ cup brown sugar (50 g)', '¼ cup warm water (60 mL)', '¼ cup tamari (60 mL)', '⅓ cup lime juice (80 mL)', '1 tablespoon chili sauce such as Huy Fong Foods (optional)']
instructions: ['1: Prep the vegetables: Julienne the carrot, cucumber, and 1 red bell pepper', '2:  Chop the ¼ cup fresh basil, ¼ cup fresh mint, and ¼ cup fresh cilantro', '3:  Slice the 1 jalapeño into rings', '4: Make the rice paper chips: Heat 1 inch of vegetable canola 2 tablespoons sesame oil in a large, high-sided skillet over medium heat until hot (test by inserting chopsticks into the canola 2 tablespoons sesame oil; if bubbles form around them, the canola 2 tablespoons sesame oil is hot enough)', '5: Using scissors, cut the rice paper wrappers into quarters', '6: Working 1 or 2 at a time, gently drop the rice paper quarters into the hot canola 2 tablespoons sesame oil and fry for just 1–2 seconds, until they are white and puffed', '7:  Use a slotted spoon to transfer to a paper towel-lined plate to drain', '8:  Repeat with the remaining rice paper wedges', '9:  Set aside until ready to use', '10: Make the sauce: Add the 4 cloves garlic, rice vinegar, sesame canola 2 tablespoons sesame oil, ¼ cup brown sugar, ¼ cup warm water, ¼ cup tamari, ⅓ cup lime juice, and 1 tablespoon chili sauce, if using, to a blender and blend until fully combined', '11:  Transfer to a bowl and set aside until ready to use', '12:  The sauce will keep in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks', '13: Bring a medium pot of water to a rolling boil over medium-high heat', '14:  Add the rice noodles and stir to separate', '15:  Cook until barely tender, 2–3 minutes', "16:  Drain and rinse thoroughly with cool water to stop the cooking process and so the noodles don't stick together (toss a little bit of sesame canola 2 tablespoons sesame oil if they start to stick)", '17: Build the bowls: Thinly slice the 1 avocado', '18:  Divide the ½ cup bean sprouts and rice noodles among 4 bowls', '19:  Add some of the chopped herbs', '20:  Arrange the carrot, cucumber, bell pepper, 1 jalapeño, 1 avocado, and tofu, if using, on top', '21:  Drizzle each bowl with 3 tablespoons of the sauce', '22:  Serve with the rice paper chips and more sauce alongside']

ingredients: ['Meatballs', '1 lb ground chicken (455 g)', '½ cup panko breadcrumbs (25 g)', '1 egg', '½ cup blue cheese (70 g)', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', "¼ cup Frank's Red Hot (60 mL) plus extra for dipping", '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'Batter', '¾ cup cornmeal (110 g)', '1 ¼ cups flour (155 g)', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '⅓ cup sugar (65 g)', '4 teaspoons baking powder', '1 egg', '1 ¼ cups milk (300 mL)', 'vegetable oil for frying', 'ranch dressing for dripping']
instructions: ['1: Meatballs: In a medium bowl, mix together 1 lb ground chicken, bread crumbs, egg, ½ cup blue cheese, salt, ½ teaspoon pepper, and Frank’s Red Hot until evenly combined', '2:  Be careful not to overmix', '3:  Roll into golf-size balls', '4: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a skillet over medium heat', '5:  Add meatballs and cook until brown on all sides, about 3–4 minutes per side', '6:  Remove meatballs from the pan (they will not be fully cooked at this time)', '7: Batter: Whisk together ¾ cup cornmeal, 1 ¼ cups flour, salt, ⅓ cup sugar, and 4 teaspoons baking powder', '8:  Add in egg and 1 ¼ cups milk, then whisk until a smooth batter forms', '9: Heat 3 inches of vegetable oil in a pot until temperature is 350ºF (175ºC)', '10: Place the meatballs on skewers, lollipop-style', '11:  Holding onto the skewer, dip the meatball into the batter', '12:  Use a spoon to help fully coat each meatball in batter', '13: Lower the meatballs into the oil and cook for 3–4 minutes, until the meatballs are cooked through and the outsides are a deep golden brown', '14:  Drain on paper towels', '15:  Serve with more Frank’s and ranch dressing for dipping']

ingredients: ['½ cup panko breadcrumbs (25 g)', '1 lb chorizo (455 g)', '½ cup beef stock (120 mL) or veal stock divided', '¼ cup poblano pepper (25 g) roasted diced', '½ cup carrot (60 g) minced', '½ cup white onion (75 g) or yellow onion chopped divided', '6 tablespoons cotija cheese grated', '1 large egg', '1 large egg yolk', '¼ cup fresh cilantro (10 g) chopped', '¼ cup fresh parsley leaf (10 g) chopped', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '6 cloves garlic chopped', '28 oz crushed tomato (400 g) 1 can', '3 chipotles in adobo', '12 slider buns split horizontally', 'cotija cheese to garnish', 'Jalapeño Aioli', '1 cup mayonnaise (230 g)', '6 tablespoons green jalapeño sauce or more to taste', '10 leaves mint', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: In a pan over medium heat, lightly brown the 1 lb chorizo for about 5-7 minutes to cook out excess fat (it does not have to be cooked through)', '3: Remove the 1 lb chorizo from heat and drain any excess 3 tablespoons olive oil', '4: In a medium bowl, mix the 1 lb chorizo, ½ cup panko breadcrumbs, half of ½ cup beef stock, ¼ cup poblano peppers, carrots, half of onions, Cotija cheese, egg, egg yolk, ¼ cup fresh cilantro, ¼ cup fresh parsley, salt and pepper', '5: Use your hands to roll the mixture into approximately 12-16 golf ball-sized meatballs', '6: Transfer the meatballs to a baking sheet and bake for about 20 minutes', '7: In a dutch oven or heavy-bottomed pan over medium heat, add 3 tablespoons olive oil and sauté remaining onions and 6 cloves garlic until fragrant and translucent, about 5 minutes', '8: Add the can of 28 oz crushed tomatoes and remaining ½ cup beef stock', '9:  Tip: Adding the ½ cup beef stock into the empty can will ensure you don’t waste any 28 oz crushed tomatoes that may be left behind', '10: Add the 3 chipotles in adobo and simmer about 5 minutes', '11: Add the meatballs, cover with lid slightly ajar, and simmer for about 30 minutes until the meatballs are cooked through', '12: While simmering, combine 1 cup mayonnaise, 6 tablespoons green jalapeño sauce, 10 leaves mint, salt, and pepper in a blender or food processor', '13:  Pulse until combined', '14: Cut the slider buns in half', '15:  Spread the Jalapeño Aioli on the top half', '16: Remove meatballs from skillet and place one on the bottom halves of each roll, then drizzle with some of the 28 oz crushed tomato sauce and sprinkle cheese on top', '17: Sandwich the tops onto the meatballs and serve immediately']

ingredients: ['5 oz tuna (140 g) 2 cans drained', '1 large avocado diced', '1 cup carrot (110 g) finely chopped', '2 ribs celery finely chopped', '¼ cup red onion (35 g) finely chopped', '¼ cup dijon mustard (60 g)', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '4 whole wheat tortillas', '4 leaves green leaf lettuce', '1 cup cherry tomatoes (200 g) halved']
instructions: ['1: In a 1 large bowl, add the 5 oz tuna and avocado', '2:  Use a fork to smash the avocado and 5 oz tuna together', '3: Add the carrots, 2 ribs celery, ¼ cup red onion, Dijon mustard, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, ½ teaspoon garlic powder, salt, and pepper', '4:  Stir to combine', '5: Lay a tortilla flat on a plate', '6:  Lay a lettuce 4 leaves green leaf on the tortilla', '7:  Scoop ¼ of the 5 oz tuna mixture into the center of the lettuce and spread down the middle', '8:   Top with 1 cup cherry tomatoes and carefully roll the the tortilla to create a wrap', '9:  Repeat with the remaining ingredients']

ingredients: ['2 cups frozen mango (330 g)', '1 pt mango sorbet (390 g)', '1 ½ cups lemonade (355 mL)']
instructions: ['1: To a blender add the mangos, mango sorbet, and 1 ½ cups lemonade', '2: Blend until smoothServe immediately to drink or freeze for 30 minutes to eat with a spoon!']

ingredients: ['3 white peaches sliced', '2 cups raspberry (250 g)', '1 bottle rosé', '1 cup white rum (240 mL)', '4 cups peach nectar (960 mL)', '1 cup champagne (240 mL)', 'peach sliced for garnish']
instructions: ['1: In a large pitcher, combine the 3 white peaches, raspberries, 1 bottle rosé, 1 cup white rum, and peach nectar', '2:  Stir until mixed', '3: Chill for at least 4 hours', '4: Add the 1 cup champagne, then serve with a peach slice on each glass']

ingredients: ['1 cup milk of choice (240 mL)', '1 tablespoon cocoa powder', '½ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '¼ cup mini marshmallows (15 g)', '1 peppermint stick']
instructions: ['1: Over low heat, add 1 cup milk and 1 tablespoon cocoa powder to a small saucepan', '2: Stir until 1 cup milk and 1 tablespoon cocoa powder are combined (approximately 10 minutes)', '3: Pour the hot chocolate mixture into a mug', '4: Add ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon, ¼ cup mini marshmallows, and 1 peppermint stick']

ingredients: ['6 pieces whole wheat chappati indian flatbread', '1 cup flour (125 g)', '½ teaspoon red chili powder', '½ teaspoon turmeric', '½ teaspoon cumin', '2 teaspoons ground coriander', '½ teaspoon chaat masala', '½ teaspoon garam masala', '½ teaspoon cumin seed', '½ teaspoon mustard seed', '½ teaspoon fennel seeds', '½ teaspoon carom seeds', '1 pinch asadetida', '2 tablespoons cooking oil', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon sugar', '3 green chilli peppers finely chopped', 'fresh coriander leaves and curry leaf to taste', 'salt to taste', '½ water']
instructions: ['1: In a bowl add gram 1 cup flour, spices, 2 tablespoons cooking oil, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 1 tablespoon sugar, and salt', '2:  Mix well', '3: Slowly add ½ water until the batter is thick but lump-freeAdd 2 teaspoons ground fresh coriander and 3 green chilis and mix well', '4: Set up steamer pot over ½ waterArrange chapatti on a working surface', '5:  Work in batches ½ inch (1 ¼ cm) thick', '6:  Place one chappati over the next and repeat 3 times', '7: ', '8: Make 2 rolls, each of which should have 3 chapati', '9:  Cover all sides of the roll with thick batter', '10: Put 2 tablespoons cooking oil on the surface of the steamer and place the rolls in the steamer', '11:  Cook until it seems and you can remove a knife from the batter cleanly', '12: Remove the rolls from the steamer and allow to cool down completely', '13:  Cut the rolls into 1- inch (2 ½ cm) 6 pieces', '14: Add 1 Tbsp 2 tablespoons cooking oil to a  heated pan', '15:  Add 1 tsp ½ teaspoon mustard seeds, 2 chopped 3 green chillies, fresh curry leaves, and salt to taste', '16: Add all the 6 pieces of chapatti to the pan and stir over high heat until it crispy and coated with spices, about five minutes', '17: Serve hot with fresh onion thin flakes and 3 green chutney', '18: RECIPE VARIATIONYou can use Maize, millet 1 cup flour, buckwheat 1 cup flour, or sorghum 1 cup flour in place of Gram 1 cup flour', '19:  Make sure to add more or less ½ water accordingly', '20:  You may also skip the frying step']

ingredients: ['⅓ cup canola oil (80 mL)', '⅓ cup distilled white vinegar (80 mL)', '⅓ cup fresh lime juice (80 mL)', '⅓ cup fresh orange juice (80 mL)', '4 teaspoons garlic minced', '3 tablespoons jalapeño minced', '¼ cup fresh cilantro (10 g) finely chopped plus whole leaves for serving', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '½ teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '1 lb flank steak (455 g)', '8 white corn tortillas 5 inch (12.5 cm)', 'pico de gallo for serving', 'guacamole for serving', 'sour cream for serving', 'cotija cheese for serving']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, whisk together the oil, vinegar, lime juice, orange juice, 4 teaspoons garlic, 3 tablespoons jalapeño, chopped cilantro, 2 teaspoons kosher salt, 1 teaspoon ground coriander, ½ teaspoon ground cumin, 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, and 1 teaspoon chili powder', '2: Place the 1 lb flank steak in a gallon-size resealable bag', '3:  Pour in 1 cup (240 ml) of the marinade and set the rest aside', '4:  Seal the bag and shake to evenly coat the 1 lb flank steak in the marinade', '5:  Refrigerate for at least 1 hour, or up to 4 hours', '6: In a small saucepan, bring the reserved ½ cup (120 ml) of marinade to a boil over medium-high heat', '7:  Cook until thickened and reduced by half, about 5 minutes', '8:  Remove from the heat and set aside', '9: Heat a large grill pan over high heat until very hot', '10:  Remove the 1 lb flank steak from the bag and discard the marinade', '11:  Cook the 1 lb flank steak on 1 side until there are dark grill marks and it is beginning to caramelize around the edges, about 6 minutes', '12:  Flip and cook on the other side for 5 minutes for medium rare, or 7 minutes for medium', '13:  Transfer to a cutting board and let rest for 5 minutes', '14: Working in batches, heat the 8 white corn tortillas in a pan over medium-high heat, turning with tongs, until softened and just beginning to brown in spots, about 1 minute per side', '15:  Wrap the toasted tortillas in foil to keep warm', '16: Thinly slice the 1 lb flank steak against the grain, then cut the slices in half', '17:  Transfer to a large bowl and toss with the reduced marinade to coat', '18: Serve the 1 lb flank steak with the warm tortillas, pico de gallo, guacamole, sour cream, cotija cheese, and cilantro leaves, if desired']

ingredients: ['6 tablespoons Kroger® Unsalted Butter plus more for greasing', '¾ cup shallot (30 g) finely chopped', '3 tablespoons fresh parsley chopped plus more for garnish', '3 teaspoons fresh sage finely chopped', '3 teaspoons fresh thyme leaf finely chopped', '1 bag frozen corn kernels', '1 cup yellow cornmeal (150 g)', '½ cup all purpose flour (125 g)', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '1 tablespoon sugar', '2 teaspoons kosher salt plus more to taste', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '5 large eggs', '1 ½ cups milk (360 mL)', '½ cup heavy cream (120 mL)', '¾ cup sour cream (180 g)', '1 ½ cups Murray’s parmigiano reggiano cheese (185 g) divided', 'hot water for baking', 'fresh parsley for garnish', 'Preparation', '6 tablespoons Kroger® Unsalted Butter plus more for greasing', '¾ cup shallot (30 g) finely chopped', '3 tablespoons fresh parsley chopped plus more for garnish', '3 teaspoons fresh sage finely chopped', '3 teaspoons fresh thyme leaf finely chopped', '1 bag frozen corn kernels', '1 cup yellow cornmeal (150 g)', '½ cup all purpose flour (125 g)', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '1 tablespoon sugar', '2 teaspoons kosher salt plus more to taste', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '5 large eggs', '1 ½ cups milk (360 mL)', '½ cup heavy cream (120 mL)', '¾ cup sour cream (180 g)', '1 ½ cups Murray’s parmigiano reggiano cheese (185 g) divided', 'hot water for baking', 'fresh parsley for garnish', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Arrange an oven rack in the center position', '2:  Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C)', '3:  Grease a 9 x 13-inch glass or metal baking dish with Kroger® Unsalted Butter', '4: Melt the Kroger® Unsalted Butter in a large, deep skillet or pot over medium-high heat', '5:  Continue cooking for 2–4 minutes more, stirring occasionally, until the butter has turned deep golden brown in color', '6:  Turn off the heat and immediately add the shallots, parsley, sage, and thyme to the hot brown butter, stirring as they sizzle for 30 seconds', '7: Add the corn to the skillet and stir to coat evenly with the butter mixture', '8:  Set aside to cool while you prepare the pudding', '9: In a medium bowl, whisk together the cornmeal, flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, and pepper', '10: Add the eggs, milk, heavy cream, and sour cream to a very large bowl and whisk until smooth', '11:  Slowly add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, whisking constantly, until the mixture is smooth, then fold in the corn mixture and 1 cup of  Murray’s parmigiano reggiano until evenly distributed', '12: Pour the pudding into the prepared baking dish', '13:  Smooth the top, then sprinkle evenly with the remaining ½ cup Murray’s parmigiano reggiano', '14: Place the baking dish inside another larger baking dish', '15:  Fill the larger baking dish with hot water halfway up the sides of the baking dish with the pudding', '16: Carefully transfer the pudding to the oven and bake for 1 hour, or until the top is golden brown and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean', '17:  Remove from the oven and carefully remove the baking dish with the pudding from the water bath', '18:  Let cool for 5 minutes', '19: Garnish the pudding with parsley, then serve']

ingredients: ['1 ½ cups lentils (255 g)', '1 carrot sliced', '½ cup corn (85 g)', '½ cup pea (75 g)', '1 cup shredded cheddar cheese (115 g) we used vegan', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 clove garlic']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, soak the 1 ½ cups lentils in cold water for 3 hours', '2: Preheat the oven to 400ºF (200ºC)', '3:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '4: In a food processor, combine the soaked 1 ½ cups lentils, 1 carrot, ½ cup corn, peas, vegan 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon ½ teaspoon ½ teaspoon red pepper, ½ teaspoon red 1 teaspoon ½ teaspoon ½ teaspoon red pepper flakes, and 1 clove garlic, and pulse until well mixed', '5: Take about 1 tablespoon worth of mixture and form it into a nugget with your hands', '6: Bake for 20 minutes, flipping halfway, until golden brown', '7: Or, pan fry with a small drizzle of oil over medium-high heat until both sides are golden brown, about 10 minutes', '8: Allow to cool 5 minutes']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '4 salmon fillets', 'Cajun Spice Rub', '2 tablespoons paprika', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', 'Avocado and Mango Salsa', '2 avocados diced', '1 mango diced', '1 red onion finely diced', '1 red chili finely diced', '¾ cup fresh parsley (25 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons lime juice']
instructions: ['1: In a small bowl, combine all the Cajun spice rub ingredients and stir', '2: Place the 4 salmon fillets on a cutting board and rub the olive oil over all sides of the 4 salmon fillets', '3: Sprinkle the spice rub over the 4 salmon, using your hands to ensure all sides are covered', '4: Cook on a BBQ over a medium to high heat for 2 minutes per side', '5:  The outside should start to blacken and crisp, leaving the 4 salmon juicy inside', '6: Once the 4 salmon is cooked set aside', '7: In a large bowl, add all of the salsa ingredients and stir well', '8: Serve the 4 salmon with an extra sprinkling of ¾ cup fresh parsley alongside the salsa']

ingredients: ['Slaw', '10 oz coleslaw mix (250 g)', '2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '2 teaspoons dijon mustard', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', 'Sloppy Joe Mixture', '1 tablespoon high heat oil of choice', '1 medium yellow onion diced', '3 garlics minced', '1 teaspoon chilli powder', '1 teaspoon sweet paprika', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '2 tablespoons tomato', '3 medjool dates pitted and minced ', '1 lb lean ground turkey (455 g)', '1 cup tomato sauce (260 g)', '2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '1 tablespoon worcestershire sauce', '2 medium carrots shredded', '2 zucchinis shredded', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '2 dashes hot sauce optional', '8 buns of choice toasted', 'Preparation', 'Slaw', '10 oz coleslaw mix (250 g)', '2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '2 teaspoons dijon mustard', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', 'Sloppy Joe Mixture', '1 tablespoon high heat oil of choice', '1 medium yellow onion diced', '3 garlics minced', '1 teaspoon chilli powder', '1 teaspoon sweet paprika', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '2 tablespoons tomato', '3 medjool dates pitted and minced ', '1 lb lean ground turkey (455 g)', '1 cup tomato sauce (260 g)', '2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '1 tablespoon worcestershire sauce', '2 medium carrots shredded', '2 zucchinis shredded', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '2 dashes hot sauce optional', '8 buns of choice toasted', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Make the slaw: In a medium bowl, combine the coleslaw mix, apple cider vinegar, olive oil, mustard, salt, and pepper', '2:  Toss well, then cover and refrigerate until ready to use', '3: Make the sloppy joes: Heat the oil in a large, high-walled pan over medium heat', '4:  When the oil is shimmering, add the onion and sauté for 2–3 minutes, or until translucent', '5:  Add the garlic, chili powder, paprika, thyme, tomato paste, and dates', '6:  Stir to combine and cook for 2–3 minutes, until the tomato paste begins to brown', '7: Add the turkey and sauté until cooked through, about 3–5 minutes, stirring throughout', '8:  Add the tomato sauce, apple cider vinegar, and Worcestershire sauce', '9:  Stir to combine', '10: Add the shredded carrots and zucchini and cook down into the sauce, about 3–5 minutes', '11:  Season with salt, pepper, and hot sauce, if using', '12: Scoop the sloppy joe mixture onto toasted buns and top with the slaw']

ingredients: ['8 king prawns de-shelled', '1 tablespoon palm sugar', '1 tablespoon fish sauce', '1 ¼ cups coconut milk (400 mL)', '¼ lb tofu puffs (100 g) tau pok halved', '2 tablespoons cooking oil', 'Prawn Stock:', '8 king prawns head and shells', '5 cups water (1.2 mL)', '2 cups chicken stock (480 mL)', '2 tablespoons cooking oil', 'Laksa Paste:', '15 dried chillies', '2 red chillis', '3 tablespoons dried shrimp soaked', '1 teaspoon shrimp paste belacan', '8 cloves garlic', '1 shallot', '1 ginger 1 in (2.5 cm)', '1 blue ginger galangal - 1in (2.5 cm)', 'turmeric root 2 in (5 cm)', '¼ cup candle nuts (30 g)', '1 stalk lemongrass', 'To serve:', '2 cups vermicelli rice noodle (200 g) cooked', '1 cup bean sprout (100 g) blanched', '1 fish cake sliced heated', '8 cockles', '1 bunch laksa leaves', '2 tablespoons chilli paste', 'Preparation', '8 king prawns de-shelled', '1 tablespoon palm sugar', '1 tablespoon fish sauce', '1 ¼ cups coconut milk (400 mL)', '¼ lb tofu puffs (100 g) tau pok halved', '2 tablespoons cooking oil', 'Prawn Stock:', '8 king prawns head and shells', '5 cups water (1.2 mL)', '2 cups chicken stock (480 mL)', '2 tablespoons cooking oil', 'Laksa Paste:', '15 dried chillies', '2 red chillis', '3 tablespoons dried shrimp soaked', '1 teaspoon shrimp paste belacan', '8 cloves garlic', '1 shallot', '1 ginger 1 in (2.5 cm)', '1 blue ginger galangal - 1in (2.5 cm)', 'turmeric root 2 in (5 cm)', '¼ cup candle nuts (30 g)', '1 stalk lemongrass', 'To serve:', '2 cups vermicelli rice noodle (200 g) cooked', '1 cup bean sprout (100 g) blanched', '1 fish cake sliced heated', '8 cockles', '1 bunch laksa leaves', '2 tablespoons chilli paste', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Remove the heads and shells from prawns and set aside in a bowl, then devein and set the prawn meat aside in a separate bowl', '2: To make the prawn stock, add cooking oil to a large saucepan on medium-high heat', '3:  Add prawn heads and shells then stir for 5 minutes, crushing the heads to release the flavour', '4: Add water and chicken stock, then simmer for 45 minutes allowing the stock to reduce', '5: Remove prawn shells then strain the broth into a bowl through a sieve', '6: In a food processor, add dried chilli, red chilli, dried shrimp, shrimp paste (belacan), garlic, shallot, ginger, blue ginger (galangal), turmeric root, candle nuts and lemongrass stalk, then pulse for 5 minutes until a thick paste forms', '7: Add cooking oil to a large saucepan then add the laksa paste and cook for 5 minutes until fragrant', '8:  Add palm sugar, fish sauce, coconut milk and prawn stock stirring to combine', '9:  Simmer the mixture for 15 minutes then add the prawns and tofu puffs, cooking for 3 minutes to finish', '10: To serve, add vermicelli noodles to a bowl then top with bean sprouts, cockles and slices of fish cake', '11:  Ladle in scoops of the laksa making sure to include tofu puffs and prawns', '12:  Top with a handful of finely chopped laksa leaves and optional chilli paste']

ingredients: ['2 slices sourdough bread', '3 eggs scrambled', '1 tablespoon fresh chives chopped', '2 slices ham', '3 slices provolone cheese']
instructions: ['1: Place a slice of 2 slices sourdough bread in a preheated, greased waffle iron', '2:  Spread the 3 eggs evenly on top', '3: Sprinkle the 1 tablespoon fresh chives over the 3 eggs', '4:  Top with the 2 slices ham, followed by the 3 slices provolone cheese', '5: Place the second slice of 2 slices sourdough bread on top', '6: Cook for 3-5 minutes, until 3 slices provolone cheese is melted and the 2 slices sourdough bread is golden brown, then serve']

ingredients: ['6 oz skinless salmon fillet (170 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'peppercorn to taste', '1 lemon sliced', 'fresh thyme to taste']
instructions: ['1: Fill a pan with enough water to submerge a fillet', '2:  Bring the water to a simmer', '3: Add salt, peppercorns, sliced 1 lemon, and thyme to water', '4: Add 6 oz skinless salmon, cover the pan, and cook for 20 minutes', '5: Remove 6 oz skinless salmon from pan, and season with salt, pepper, and fresh 1 lemon']

ingredients: ['1 cup almond milk (240 mL)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon agave nectar', '2 ½ tablespoons organic cacao powder', '¼ cup chia seeds (35 g)', '2 tablespoons almond butter 1 per serving', 'sea salt to taste', 'coconut flake to taste', 'fresh raspberry to taste']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, whisk together the almond milk, 1 teaspoon vanilla, agave, and 2 ½ 2 tablespoons organic cacao powder until well combined', '2:  Add the ¼ cup chia seeds and whisk to incorporate', '3: Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 3 hours, or up to overnight, until the ¼ cup chia seeds have absorbed the liquid and the mixture has a pudding-like consistency', '4: Divide the pudding between 2 small bowls and top each serving with 1 1 2 ½ 2 tablespoon of almond butter and sea salt, coconut flakes, and raspberries to sea salt to coconut flake to fresh raspberry to taste']

ingredients: ['Cake', '1 ½ cups finely ground polenta (145 g)', '1 ½ cups finely ground almond flour (145 g)', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '1 pinch kosher salt', '1 large orange washed', '4 large eggs beaten', '1 cup olive oil (240 mL) plus more for greasing', '½ cup maple syrup (170 g) plus 2 tablespoons ', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon ground cardamom', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '½ teaspoon nutmeg', '½ teaspoon ground cloves', '2 plums pitted and diced plus 1 sliced into 1/2 inch (1 cm) wedges divided', 'whipped cream for serving', 'orange zest for serving']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180˚C)', '2:  Grease a 9-inch (23-cm) round cake pan with 1 cup olive oil, using a paper towel to spread evenly', '3: In a large bowl, combine the 1 ½ cups finely ground polenta, 1 ½ cups finely ground almond flour, baking powder, baking soda, and 1 pinch kosher salt', '4:  Stir well', '5: Zest and juice the 1 large orange', '6: Add the 1 large orange zest and juice to a separate large bowl with the eggs, 1 cup olive oil, ½ cup maple syrup, 1 teaspoon vanilla, 1 teaspoon ground cardamom, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, ½ teaspoon nutmeg, and ½ teaspoon ground cloves', '7:  Whisk well to combine', '8: Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients and gently fold with a rubber spatula until fully incorporated', '9: Fold in the diced 2 plums', '10: Pour the batter into the prepared pan', '11: Arrange the sliced plum decoratively on top of the cake in a circular pattern', '12: Bake the cake for 50-55 minutes, until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean', '13: Let cool for 20 minutes, then remove from the cake pan', '14: Slice and serve with whipped cream and more 1 large orange zest, if desired', '15: Enjoy!Nutrition per serving, Not including whipped cream - Calories: 519, Total fat: 42 grams, Sodium: 334 mg, Total carbs: 30 grams, Dietary Fiber: 4 grams, Sugars: 19 grams, Protein: 9 grams']

ingredients: ['1 medium beet greens trimmed', '1 large russet potato', '1 large egg', '½ cup grated parmesan cheese (55 g) plus more for serving', '1 teaspoon kosher salt plus more for boiling', '1 ½ cups whole wheat flour (190 g) plus more for dusting', '½ cup salted butter (115 g) 1/2 stick divided', '2 tablespoons fresh sage chopped divided']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C)', '2: Add the beet to an oven-safe dish and pour in enough water to come ¾ of the way up the beet', '3:  Cover the dish tightly with foil and set aside', '4: Poke the potato all over with a fork and place in the center of a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '5: Place both the beet and potato in the oven and roast for 45 minutes, until fork tender', '6:  Remove from the oven and let cool until safe to handle', '7: Gently rub the beet to remove the skin', '8:  (If you’d like, wear rubber gloves to protect your hands from being dyed by the beet juice', '9: ) Trim any remaining stem from the beet after peeling, then roughly chop', '10: Transfer the beet to a food processor, along with the egg, Parmesan, and 1 teaspoon kosher ½ cup salt', '11:  Puree until completely smooth', '12:  Set aside', '13: Peel the skin from potato and grate through the small holes of a box grater, or press through a potato ricer, if you have one', '14: In a large bowl, combine the potato and the beet mixture', '15:  Fold gently to combine, being careful not to over mix', '16: Add the flour, ½ cup (60 grams) at a time, and fold until the dough comes together', '17:  You may not need to use the full 2 1 ½ cups', '18: Turn the dough out onto a lightly floured surface and knead gently until a pliable dough is formed that is tender but not sticky when handled', '19:  Divide into 8 portions', '20:  Roll a dough portion into a ½-inch (1 ¼ cm) thick rope', '21:  Cut the rope into 1-inch (2', '22: 5 cm) pieces', '23:  Repeat with the remaining dough', '24: If desired, roll each piece of gnocchi over the tines of a fork to create ridges', '25: Bring a 1 medium pot of well-salted water to a boil over high heat', '26: Working in batches, drop 8-10 gnocchi into the boiling water and cook until they begin to float', '27:  Once they start floating at the surface, let cook for 30 seconds more, then transfer from the water with a slotted spoon to a plate and set aside', '28: In a 1 medium pan, melt 2 2 tablespoons of butter until just beginning to bubble', '29:  Add 1 tablespoon of sage and half of the gnocchi, to avoid overcrowding the pan', '30:  Sauté for about 1 minute per side until the gnocchi are lightly toasted and well coated with butter and sage', '31:  Repeat with the remaining butter, sage, and gnocchi', '32: Serve immediately with Parmesan cheese for garnish']

ingredients: ['blueberry', 'raspberry', '1 ½ cups vanilla greek yogurt (370 g)', 'Preparation', 'blueberry', 'raspberry', '1 ½ cups vanilla greek yogurt (370 g)', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Arrange 12 cupcake liners in a muffin tin', '2: Using a spoon, dollop two tablespoons of yogurt into the bottom of each liner', '3: Top with blueberries and raspberries', '4: Freeze for at least two hours', '5: Remove cupcake liners before serving']

ingredients: ['1 mango', '1 tablespoon sugar', '1 cup milk (240 mL)', '1 cup plain yogurt (245 g)']
instructions: ['1: Cut the 1 mango in half lengthwise, around the pit', '2: Press the 1 mango halves down along the edge of glass to separate the flesh from the skin', '3: Add the 1 mango to a blender, along with the 1 tablespoon sugar, 1 cup milk, and 1 cup plain yogurt', '4:  Blend until smooth', '5: Pour the 1 mango lassi into a glass']

ingredients: ['Cake', '1 cup sour cream (240 mL) room temperature', '3 large eggs room temperature', '3 large egg whites room temperature', '2 tablespoons vanilla extract', '1 cup whole milk (240 mL) room temperature', '2 ¼ cups granulated sugar (450 g)', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '3 ½ cups cake flour (435 g)', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '3 sticks unsalted butter room temperature', '½ cup rainbow sprinkles (70 g)', 'Frosting', '6 sticks unsalted butter room temperature', '3 lb powdered sugar (330 g)', '⅓ cup heavy cream (80 mL)', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', 'rainbow sprinkle for decorating', 'Special Equipment', '1 cardboard cake round 8-inch', 'cake turntable', 'Preparation', 'Cake', '1 cup sour cream (240 mL) room temperature', '3 large eggs room temperature', '3 large egg whites room temperature', '2 tablespoons vanilla extract', '1 cup whole milk (240 mL) room temperature', '2 ¼ cups granulated sugar (450 g)', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '3 ½ cups cake flour (435 g)', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '3 sticks unsalted butter room temperature', '½ cup rainbow sprinkles (70 g)', 'Frosting', '6 sticks unsalted butter room temperature', '3 lb powdered sugar (330 g)', '⅓ cup heavy cream (80 mL)', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', 'rainbow sprinkle for decorating', 'Special Equipment', '1 cardboard cake round 8-inch', 'cake turntable', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Make the cake: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2:  Lightly spray three 8-inch cake pans with nonstick spray', '3:  Line the bottoms with parchment paper rounds and spray again', '4: In a large bowl, whisk together the sour cream, eggs, and egg whites until evenly combined', '5:  Add the vanilla and milk and whisk until incorporated', '6: In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with a paddle attachment, combine the granulated sugar and salt', '7:  Sift in the cake flour, baking soda, and baking powder', '8:  Mix on low speed to incorporate', '9: Cut the butter into tablespoon-sized pieces', '10:  With the mixer running on low speed, add the butter to the dry ingredients, one piece at a time', '11:  Continue mixing until a sandy, coarse meal forms, 3–4 minutes', '12: With the mixer running on low speed, pour in one-quarter of the wet ingredients at a time and mix to incorporate, scraping down the sides of the bowl between each addition', '13:  Continue mixing until the batter is smooth', '14: Remove the bowl from the stand mixer and gently fold in the sprinkles with a rubber spatula', '15: Divide the batter evenly between the prepared cake pans, tapping the pans on the counter a couple of times to release any large air bubbles', '16: Bake the cakes for 25–30 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into the center of a cake comes out clean', '17:  8', '18:  Set the pans on a wire rack and let the cakes cool completely, about 1 hour', '19:  Once cooled, run an offset spatula around the edges of the pans to loosen the cakes, then invert onto the rack and remove the parchment rounds', '20: Meanwhile, make the frosting: In a large bowl with an electric hand mixer (or in a stand mixer fitted with the whisk attachment), whip the butter on medium speed until creamy, about 3 minutes', '21: With the mixer running on low speed, add the powdered sugar, about 1 cup at a time', '22:  Once incorporated, add the cream, vanilla, and salt', '23:  Increase the mixer speed to high and beat for 3 minutes, until the frosting is fluffy', '24: Assemble the cake: Using a large serrated knife, slice a thin layer off the top of each cake to create a flat surface', '25:  Discard the scraps', '26: Smear a bit of frosting onto an 8-inch cake round set on top of a cake stand, then place a cake layer on the round', '27:  Use a large offset spatula to spread an even layer of frosting over the cake', '28:  Place another cake layer on top and frost', '29:  Place the last cake layer, bottom-side up, on top and spread a thin layer of frosting over the top and sides of the cake to make the crumb coat', '30:  Refrigerate for 15 minutes, until the frosting is set', '31: Generously spread a thick, even layer of frosting over the top and sides of the cake', '32:  Decorate the cake with the remaining frosting and sprinkles as desired', '33: Slice and serve', '34:  Cake can be kept at room temperature for 2 hrs and refrigerated for 3 days']

ingredients: ['16 oz pizza dough (455 g)', '8 slices ham', '4 slices swiss cheese cut in half', '8 slices pineapple', '8 tablespoons ricotta cheese', '4 tablespoons green onion', 'poppy seed for topping', 'Egg Wash', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon water']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2: Cut 16 oz pizza dough into 8 sections on a floured surface', '3: With one section, roll out dough until flat and circular', '4: Layer 8 slices ham, 4 slices swiss, 8 slices pineapple, 1 8 4 1 tablespoon 8 8 4 1 tablespoons ricotta, and ½ 8 4 1 tablespoon 4 4 1 tablespoons green onion', '5: Fold one side of dough up and over ingredients, and seal calzone by crimping the edges together', '6: Place on a parchment-lined baking sheet', '7:  Apply 1 egg wash to outside of calzone and sprinkle with poppy seeds', '8: Bake calzones at 400°F (200°C) for 15-20 minutes or until golden brown']

ingredients: ['flat rice noodle', '5 green onions', '1 block tofu sliced', 'bean sprout', 'fresh cilantro', '2 cloves garlic', '¼ cup fish sauce (60 mL)', '⅓ cup soy sauce (80 mL)', '2 tablespoons rice vinegar', '2 tablespoons sugar', '⅓ cup tamarind paste (75 g)', '1 tablespoon  sriracha', '⅓ cup organic peanut butter (80 g)']
instructions: ['1: Sear 1 block tofu in a pan', '2:  Once seared on both sides, add remaining ingredients and let simmer until sauce thickensServe warm']

ingredients: ['3 zucchinis ends trimmed', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 boneless skinless chicken breasts thinly sliced', '1 teaspoon kosher salt plus more to taste', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper plus more to taste', '3 cloves garlic minced', '¾ cup cream (180 mL)', '1 cup shredded parmesan cheese (110 g) plus more for serving', '2 tablespoons fresh parsley chopped plus more for serving']
instructions: ['1: Using a spiralizer, mandoline, or vegetable peeler, turn the zucchini into thin noodles', '2:  Microwave the noodles for 1-2 minutes, then drain any liquid', '3: Melt the 2 tablespoons butter in a large pan over medium heat', '4:  Add the 2 boneless skinless chicken, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, and 3 cloves garlic and cook until the 3 cloves garlic is beginning to brown and 2 boneless skinless chicken is cooked through, about 7 minutes', '5:  Remove the 2 boneless skinless chicken from the pan', '6: Add the ¾ cup cream, Parmesan, and 2 tablespoons fresh parsley to the pan, stirring until evenly combined', '7:  Bring to a boil, then stir until the sauce has reduced by about half, 3-5 minutes', '8:  Put the 2 boneless skinless chicken back in the sauce and stir to coat', '9:  Remove from the heat and season to taste with 1 teaspoon kosher salt and 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '10: Bring to a boil, then stir until the sauce has reduced by about half', '11:  Remove from heat', '12: Toss the zucchini noodles in with the 2 boneless skinless chicken mixture and stir until the noodles are coated evenly', '13:  Serve with more Parmesan and 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, if desired']

ingredients: ['nonstick cooking spray for greasing', 'all purpose flour for dusting', '2 sheets puff pastry thawed', '¼ cup fig jam (40 g)', '24 brie cheeses rind removed', '¼ cup crumbled bacon (55 g)', '1 large egg beaten with 1 tablespoon water', 'fresh thyme for garnish', 'Preparation', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', 'all purpose flour for dusting', '2 sheets puff pastry thawed', '¼ cup fig jam (40 g)', '24 brie cheeses rind removed', '¼ cup crumbled bacon (55 g)', '1 large egg beaten with 1 tablespoon water', 'fresh thyme for garnish', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2:  Grease a mini muffin tin with nonstick spray', '3: On a lightly floured surface, roll out the sheets of puff pastry and cut into 24 2-inch squares', '4:  Place each pastry square in a muffin cup, pressing down so the pastry is flush with the bottom', '5: Fill each pastry cup with ½ teaspoon fig jam, 1 square of Brie, and ½ teaspoon bacon', '6: Brush the edges of the pastry cups with the egg wash', '7: Bake the pastry cups until golden brown and cheese is melted, 10–12 minutes', '8: Garnish the bites with thyme, then let cool slightly before serving']

ingredients: ['1 avocado diced', '1 cup cherry tomato (200 g) finely chopped', '¼ medium red onion thinly sliced', '½ lime juiced', 'salt to taste', '2 tablespoons fresh parsley chopped']
instructions: ['1: Combine all ingredients in a bowl and gently stir to combine', '2: Cover, and store in the refrigerator until ready to serve']

ingredients: ['Rice', '2 cups white rice (400 g) rinsed', '4 cups water (960 g)', '1 tablespoon coconut oil melted', 'salt to taste', 'Curry', '¼ cup vegetable oil (60 mL) divided', '2 small yellow onions diced', '2 cups idaho potato (450 g) cubed', '1 tablespoon tomato paste', '2 tablespoons fresh ginger minced', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 ½ teaspoons garam masala', '2 tablespoons curry powder', '1 head cauliflower cut into small florets', '15 oz diced tomato (425 g) 1 can', '15 oz chickpeas (425 g) 1 can drained', '1 ¼ cups water (360 mL)', 'salt to taste', '¾ cup coconut milk (180 mL)', '1 ¼ cups frozen peas (190 g)', 'Garlic Naan', '2 cups all-purpose flour (250 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon sugar', '2 tablespoons ghee melted divided plus more as needed', '4 tablespoons whole-fat yogurt', '2 tablespoons skim milk', '6 tablespoons water', '1 clove garlic minced']
instructions: ['1: In a medium pot, combine the 2 cups white rice, water, 1 tablespoon ¾ cup coconut oil, and salt', '2:  Bring to a boil, then cover and simmer over low heat for 15-20 minutes, until the water is absorbed', '3:  Once finished cooking, remove the 2 cups white rice from the heat and fluff', '4: Heat 3 tablespoons of ¼ cup vegetable oil in a large Dutch oven over medium-high heat until shimmering', '5:  Add the onions and potatoes and cook, stirring occasionally, until the onions are caramelized and potatoes are golden brown around the edges, about 10 minutes', '6: Reduce the heat to medium', '7:  Add the remaining tablespoon of oil, the tomato paste, ginger, and garlic', '8:  Cook, stirring constantly, until fragrant, about 30 seconds', '9:  Add the 1 ½ teaspoons garam masala and curry powder and cook, stirring constantly, about 1 minute longer', '10: Add 1 head cauliflower and cook, stirring constantly, until the spices coat the florets, about 2 minutes longer', '11: Add the tomatoes, chickpeas, water, and salt and stir to combine', '12:  Increase the heat to medium-high and bring the mixture to a boil', '13:  Reduce the heat to medium', '14:  Simmer, stirring occasionally, until the ¼ cup vegetables are tender, 10-15 minutes', '15: Stir in the 1 tablespoon ¾ cup coconut milk and 1 ¼ cups frozen peas', '16:  Cook until heated through, about 2 minutes longer', '17:  Remove from the heat', '18: Meanwhile, in a large bowl, stir together the 2 cups all-purpose flour, salt, 1 teaspoon baking powder, and 1 teaspoon sugar', '19:  Create a well in the middle of the dry ingredients and pour in 1 tablespoon of melted ghee, the yogurt, skim milk, and a bit of the water', '20:  Mix until combined, adding more water as needed until the dough comes together', '21: Transfer the dough to a lightly 2 cups all-purpose floured surface and knead until no longer sticky, then shape into a ball and divide into quarters', '22:  Roll out the dough portions to ¼ inch (6 mm) thick', '23: In a 2 1 head 1 head cauliflower cut into small bowl, combine the remaining tablespoon of melted ghee with the garlic', '24: Heat a bit of ghee in a medium nonstick pan over medium-high heat', '25:  Add a dough round and brush with the ghee and garlic mixture', '26:  Cook for 3-4 minutes, until the dough bubbles up and forms a nice brown crust, then flip and cook on the other side', '27:  Repeat with the remaining dough', '28: Serve the curry over the 2 cups white rice with the naan on the side']

ingredients: ['1 ⅔ cups all purpose flour (85 g)', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '½ teaspoon cornstarch corn flour', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '10 tablespoons butter melted and cooled', '⅔ cup light brown sugar (135 g)', '¼ cup granulated sugar (50 g)', '1 large egg @ room temperature', '1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract', '¼ teaspoon almond extract', '½ cup whole almonds (60 g) (lightly toasted and chopped)', '½ cup almond (65 g) slivered - lightly toasted and roughly chopped', '⅔ cup white chocolate chip (95 g) white chocolate chunks or white baking chips']
instructions: ['1: Place butter in a heatproof bowl and melt in the microwave on the lowest heat setting in 10-second increments until completely melted; set aside to cool completely', '2: In another bowl, add the 1 ⅔ cups all purpose ½ teaspoon ½ teaspoon cornstarch corn flour, ½ teaspoon ⅔ cup ⅔ cup white chocolate chip (95 g) ⅔ cup white chocolate chunks or ⅔ cup white baking soda, ½ teaspoon cornstarch (corn 1 ⅔ cups all purpose ½ teaspoon ½ teaspoon cornstarch corn flour), and ½ teaspoon kosher salt, and mix until well combined; set aside', '3: Once the butter has cooled down, add the ⅔ cup light brown sugar, ¼ cup granulated sugar, 1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract, and almond extract; whisk until the mixture has thickened, about 1-2 minutes', '4:  Next add the 1 large egg and mix until smooth and homogenous', '5: Add the 1 ⅔ cups all purpose ½ teaspoon ½ teaspoon cornstarch corn flour mixture to the butter mixture and mix until well combined and a dough forms; add the chopped ½ cup whole almonds and the ⅔ cup white chocolate chips and mix until thoroughly distributed', '6: Cover the dough with plastic wrap, or foil and place in the fridge for AT LEAST 30 minutes', '7: Preheat the oven to 350℉ (175 C), and line two cookie sheets with parchment paper, or silicone place mats', '8: Portion the dough into 2 tablespoons/1 oz', '9:  balls and place on a lined ½ teaspoon ⅔ cup ⅔ cup white chocolate chip (95 g) ⅔ cup white chocolate chunks or ⅔ cup white baking sheet', '10: Bake cookies for 10-12 minutes, rotating cookie sheet halfway through ½ teaspoon ⅔ cup ⅔ cup white chocolate chip (95 g) ⅔ cup white chocolate chunks or ⅔ cup white baking time to ensure even ⅔ cup light browning', '11:  Let the cookies sit on the tray for minutes, then transfer to a cooling rack, store in an airtight container']

ingredients: ['Cauliflower', '2 large heads cauliflower', '6 tablespoons olive oil', '1 ¼ teaspoons kosher salt \n', '¼ teaspoon black pepper', "1 tablespoon za'atar", '1 teaspoon ground cumin', 'Tahini Yogurt Sauce', '1 cup full-fat greek yogurt (245 g)', '3 tablespoons tahini', '1 lemon zested', '1 lemon juiced', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil good-quality', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '¼ teaspoon black pepper', 'Assembly', '¼ cup fresh mint leaf (10 g) torn if large', '½ cup pomegranate seeds (85 g)', '¼ cup pine nuts (30 g) toasted', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C)', '2: Remove the 2 ¼ cup fresh ¼ cup fresh mint leaf (10 g) torn if large, tough outer leaves from cauliflower, and reserve any smaller, tender leaves', '3:  Cut cauliflower into medium florets', '4: In a 2 ¼ cup fresh ¼ cup fresh mint leaf (10 g) torn if large bowl, toss the cauliflower florets with the olive oil, salt, pepper, za’atar, and 1 teaspoon ground cumin', '5:  Spread in an even layer on 2 baking sheets, making sure the florets have some space between them', '6: Roast the cauliflower for 18–22 minutes, until crisp, tender, and browned in spots', '7:  Set aside', '8: While cauliflower roasts, make the 3 tablespoons tahini 1 cup full-fat greek yogurt sauce: Combine the 1 cup full-fat greek yogurt, 3 tablespoons tahini, lemon zest, lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper in a medium bowl and mix well', '9:  Set aside or refrigerate until ready to use', '10:  The 3 tablespoons tahini 1 cup full-fat greek yogurt will keep in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 5 days', '11: To assemble, spread the 3 tablespoons tahini 1 cup full-fat greek yogurt almost all the way to the edges of a serving platter', '12:  Arrange the cauliflower on top of the 1 cup full-fat greek yogurt, letting the 1 cup full-fat greek yogurt peek out on the sides', '13:  Scatter the ¼ cup fresh mint, ½ cup pomegranate seeds, and ¼ cup pine nuts over the cauliflower', '14:  Drizzle the olive oil over the cauliflower and serve immediately']

ingredients: ['Curry:', '2 lb boneless skinless chicken thighs (910 g)', '2 shallots diced', '2 teaspoons garlic minced', '3 tablespoons red curry paste', '1 tablespoon chili powder (can be adjusted according to desired spice level)', '1 tablespoon fish sauce', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '2 tablespoons palm sugar (or Brown Sugar)', '4 teaspoons freshly grated ginger  (or 2 Tbsp Ginger Paste)', '1 stalk lemongrass bruised and chopped into 1-2in pieces', '3 cups chicken stock (720 g)', '1 can full fat coconut milk', '1 jar roasted red pepper', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'Noodles:', '3 servings egg noodle  (Chow-Mein Lo-Mein Ramen)', 'Toppings:', '1 shallot julienned or crispy', 'lime juice (to taste recommend fresh-squeezed)', 'fresh cilantro leaf to taste', 'bean sprout to taste', 'chili oil to taste', 'Preparation', 'Curry:', '2 lb boneless skinless chicken thighs (910 g)', '2 shallots diced', '2 teaspoons garlic minced', '3 tablespoons red curry paste', '1 tablespoon chili powder (can be adjusted according to desired spice level)', '1 tablespoon fish sauce', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '2 tablespoons palm sugar (or Brown Sugar)', '4 teaspoons freshly grated ginger  (or 2 Tbsp Ginger Paste)', '1 stalk lemongrass bruised and chopped into 1-2in pieces', '3 cups chicken stock (720 g)', '1 can full fat coconut milk', '1 jar roasted red pepper', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'Noodles:', '3 servings egg noodle  (Chow-Mein Lo-Mein Ramen)', 'Toppings:', '1 shallot julienned or crispy', 'lime juice (to taste recommend fresh-squeezed)', 'fresh cilantro leaf to taste', 'bean sprout to taste', 'chili oil to taste', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: First, puree coconut milk and roasted red peppers in blenderCut chicken thighs into small (about 1in) chunks and season with salt and pepper', '2:  On high-heat, brown chicken in a pan without cooking all the way through', '3: In a separate large stockpot, heat olive/canola oil over medium heat', '4:  Add diced shallots and cook until tender (about 3 minutes) About halfway through cooking the shallots, add in the garlic', '5:  Stir in red-curry paste, ginger, and chili powder and cook for about 1 minute', '6: Stir in chicken stock and coconut milk/red-pepper puree', '7:  Be sure to scrape up any fond (browned bits) from the bottom of the pot', '8: Stir in fish sauce, soy sauce, lime juice, lemongrass, and brown sugar', '9: After stock has reduced for 5 minutes, add browned chicken', '10: Cook noodles in a separate pot/saucepan according to package instructions', '11: Serve chicken stock soup immediately with noodles; garnish with shallots (julienned or crispy), bean sprouts, cilantro, chili oil, and lime juice (if desired)']

ingredients: ['¾ cup rolled oats (75 g)', '1 ½ cups almond milk (360 mL)', 'salt to taste', '2 tablespoons peanut butter', '1 banana sliced', 'cinnamon to taste']
instructions: ['1: In a small saucepan, bring 1 ½ cups almond milk to a boil', '2:  Stir in ¾ cup rolled oats and reduce heat to a simmer', '3:  Cook uncovered until liquid is absorbed, about 5 minutes', '4:  2', '5:  Add salt to taste', '6: Transfer oatmeal into bowl and stir in 2 tablespoons peanut butter', '7:  Top with sliced 1 banana and cinnamon']

ingredients: ['1 cup panko bread crumbs (50 g)', '½ cup vegetarian parmesan cheese (60 g)', '½ cup salted butter (125 mL) 1 stick melted', '15 oz canned artichoke heart (425 g) 2 cans drained rinsed and patted dry', 'fresh parsley chopped for serving', 'Garlic Aioli', '½ cup mayonnaise (115 g)', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon garlic minced', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '¼ teaspoon salt', '¼ cup fresh parsley (10 g) chopped']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200ºC)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and set a wire rack inside', '3: Drain and rinse the artichokes', '4:  Pat them dry', '5: In a medium bowl, combine the 1 cup panko bread crumbs and ½ cup vegetarian Parmesan cheese', '6: Dip the artichoke hearts in the melted ½ cup ½ cup ¼ teaspoon salted butter, making sure they are evenly coated', '7:  Then coat well with the 1 cup panko bread crumb mixture', '8: Place the artichoke bites on the wire rack', '9: Bake for 15 minutes, then reduce the oven temperature to 350ºF (175ºC), flip the artichokes, and bake for 15 minutes more, until the artichoke hearts are warmed through and the 1 cup panko bread crumb mixture is toasted', '10: Meanwhile, make the 1 teaspoon garlic aioli', '11:  In a small bowl, combine the ½ cup mayonnaise, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 teaspoon garlic, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, ½ cup ¼ teaspoon salt, and parsley', '12:  Stir to combine', '13: Sprinkle the artichoke bites with parsley before serving with aioli alongside']

ingredients: ['1 ¼ cups oats (125 g)', '⅖ cup walnuts (40 g)', '1 teaspoon almond', '¾ cup peanut butter (190 g)', '3 teaspoons honey', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '⅗ cup carrot (40 g) grated', '⅓ cup raisin (50 g)']
instructions: ['1: Add 1 ¼ cups oats, ⅖ cup walnuts and ground almonds to a large bowl and mix together', '2: Add ¾ cup peanut butter, 3 teaspoons honey and 1 teaspoon cinnamon and mix', '3: Add ⅗ cup carrot and raisins to the mixture and mix until a everything has stuck together', '4: Form into 12 balls and place on baking paper', '5: Refrigerate for 1 hour']

ingredients: ['10 slices sandwich bread', 'cream cheese softened', 'strawberry sliced', '3 eggs', '1 tablespoon milk', '½ teaspoon cinnamon', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract']
instructions: ['1: Roll each slice of 10 slices sandwich bread flat with a rolling pin', '2:  Carefully cut off the crusts', '3: Spread desired amount of cream cheese and strawberries along the edge of the 10 slices sandwich bread, and roll up', '4: In a bowl, combine 3 eggs, 1 tablespoon milk, ½ teaspoon cinnamon, and ½ teaspoon vanilla', '5: Dip each roll-up in egg mixture, and pan fry in a buttered skillet until all sides are golden brown']

ingredients: ['1 lb flank steak (455 g) sliced into strips', '¼ cup soy sauce plus 3 tablespoons divided', '2 tablespoons sesame oil divided', '2 tablespoons minced garlic divided', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '1 tablespoon cornstarch', '2 teaspoons oil', '½ cup onion (75 g)', '1 cup broccoli floret', '3 eggs beaten', '2 cups cooked white rice', 'pepper to taste', 'sliced scallions for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Pour ¼ cup soy sauce, 1 tablespoon sesame 2 tablespoons sesame 2 teaspoons oil, 1 tablespoon of garlic, the brown sugar, water, and cornstarch over the 1 lb flank steak (455 g) sliced 1 lb flank steak', '2:  Mix well, then let marinate in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour', '3: In a wok or deep skillet, cook the beef and marinade thoroughly, then set aside', '4: In the same pan, heat the 2 tablespoons sesame 2 teaspoons oil over medium heat', '5:  Sauté the onion, remaining tablespoon of garlic, and broccoli until the onion is translucent', '6:  Push the 2 cups cooked vegetables to the side of the pan', '7: Beat the 3 eggs and pour into the empty half of the pan', '8:  Scramble the 3 eggs and mix with the rest of the vegetables', '9: Add the rice, remaining 3 tablespoons of soy sauce, remaining tablespoon of sesame 2 tablespoons sesame 2 teaspoons oil, pepper, and the 2 cups cooked beef', '10:  Mix well and let the rice cook until slightly crispy', '11: Serve garnished with scallions']

ingredients: ['4 cups potato (900 g) cubed', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'whole spice 4 cloves 6 black peppercorns 2 cardamom 1 star anise 1 inch cinnamon 1 teaspoon black cumin seeds', '1 sprig curry leaves', '1 cup onion (175 g) chopped', '1 tablespoon ginger garlic paste', '½ cup tomato (100 g) chopped', '2 green chiles chopped', '12 cashews', '2 tablespoons poppy seeds', '2 tablespoons coconut powder (fresh or dried)', '1 tablespoon garam masala', '1 tablespoon red chili powder', 'water', 'salt', '1 teaspoon turmeric powder', '1 handful coriander leaves chopped']
instructions: ['1: Add 12 cashews, 2 tablespoons poppy whole spice 4 cloves 6 black peppercorns 2 cardamom 1 star anise 1 inch cinnamon 1 teaspoon black cumin 2 tablespoons 2 tablespoons poppy seeds, 2 tablespoons coconut powder, and a little water in a blender and grind into a fine paste', '2: Heat a pan on medium-high heat and add 2 tablespoons olive oil', '3: Add in the whole spices and 1 sprig curry leaves, after a minute add in the 1 cup onion (175 g) ½ cup tomato (100 g) 2 2 green chiles 1 handful 1 handful coriander leaves chopped 1 cup onion, 2 green chilies, little salt, 1 teaspoon turmeric powder, mix and cook until the 1 cup onions are translucent', '4: Add the 1 tablespoon ginger garlic paste and mix well', '5:  Let cook for 2 minutes', '6: Add 1 cup onion (175 g) ½ cup tomato (100 g) 2 2 green chiles 1 handful 1 handful coriander leaves chopped tomatoes and a little salt and cook until tomatoes are done', '7: Add in the cubed 4 cups potatoes, 1 tablespoon red chili powder, 1 tablespoon garam masala, salt according to taste, and ground spices mixture and mix well', '8:  Then, add water, level until the whole mixture is just immersed and mix well', '9: Cover and cook on medium heat for about 15 - 20 minutes or longer if the 4 cups potato is not cooked, stirring in betweenTurn off the heat, garnish with 1 handful coriander leaves and serve with naan or rice']

ingredients: ['Chickpea Bowl', '1 tablespoon oil', '16 oz chickpeas (455 g) 1 can drained and rinsed', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon cumin', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon turmeric', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes', '2 sweet potatoes', 'oil to taste', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 cup quinoa (170 g) cooked', '1 cup mixed greens (40 g)', '½ avocado sliced', '1 tablespoon pumpkin seeds', 'Sauce', '2 tablespoons hummus', '1 tablespoon water', '½ lemon juiced', 'Tofu Bowl', '½ package extra firm tofu sliced in thirds', '½ teaspoon ginger powder', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 cups broccoli floret (300 g)', 'oil to taste', '1 cup brown rice (230 g) cooked', '½ cup edamame (75 g)', '½ cup shredded carrot (55 g)', '2 teaspoons sesame seed', 'Sauce', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '1 teaspoon honey', '½ teaspoon  sriracha']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 450°F (230°C)', '2: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat', '3:  Add 16 oz chickpeas, salt, pepper, 1 teaspoon cumin, garlic powder, ½ teaspoon turmeric, and chili flakes, and stir until toasted', '4:  Remove from pan', '5: Heat sesame oil in a skillet over medium heat', '6:  Add ½ package extra firm tofu, and sprinkle with ½ teaspoon ginger powder, garlic powder, salt, and pepper', '7:  Sear until a golden crust forms, then flip and do the same for the other side', '8:  Set aside', '9: On a baking sheet, toss 2 sweet potatoes and 2 cups broccoli in oil, salt, and pepper', '10:  Bake for 30 minutes', '11: In a bowl, combine ingredients for each 2 tablespoons soy sauce', '12:  Divide into 4 small tupperware containers', '13: To build the bowls, fill four tupperwares half with 1 cup quinoa, half with 1 cup brown rice', '14:  Layer the ingredients of each bowl on top', '15: When ready to eat, pour on dressing']

ingredients: ['2 juice boxes or water bottles', '1 apple', '3 cups water (720 mL)', '1 lemon fresh lemon juice', '4 slices cheddar cheese', '2 slices bread', '1 cup cherry tomatoes (200 g)', '1 cup grapes (170 g)', '8 slices turkey breast', 'cracker of choice', 'kid-safe skewer', 'Preparation', '2 juice boxes or water bottles', '1 apple', '3 cups water (720 mL)', '1 lemon fresh lemon juice', '4 slices cheddar cheese', '2 slices bread', '1 cup cherry tomatoes (200 g)', '1 cup grapes (170 g)', '8 slices turkey breast', 'cracker of choice', 'kid-safe skewer', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Freeze the juice boxes or water bottles to use as lunch-box cool packs', '2: Thinly slice the apple and place in a medium bowl with the water and lemon juice to prevent browning', '3: Cut the cheese slices into thirds', '4:  Cut the bread slices into quarters', '5:  To quickly cut the tomatoes and grapes, place between the bottoms of two plates and slice horizontally', '6: Lay out 4 slices of turkey breast', '7:  Place a piece of cheese and an apple slice on the upper half of each one, then wrap the turkey around them, tucking the ends underneath', '8:  Serve with half the grapes, half the cherry tomatoes, and crackers', '9: Slice the 4 remaining turkey slices into quarters', '10:  Layer the bread, turkey, cheese, and remaining cherry tomatoes on the skewers', '11:  Serve with remaining grapes and apple slices']

ingredients: ['Pilau Masala', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '1 tablespoon paprika', '1 teaspoon ground cardamom', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '¼ teaspoon ground cloves', 'Pilau', '¼ cup vegetable oil (60 mL)', '2 medium red onions thinly sliced', '4 cloves garlic minced', '2 tablespoons ginger minced', '1 serrano chile finely chopped', '1 tablespoon pilau masala', '2 beef stock cubes', '1 cinnamon stick', '¼ cup fresh cilantro (10 g) roughly chopped', '1 lb beef sirloin (455 g) cubed', '3 roma tomatoes diced', '1 lb potato (455 g) waxy peeled and cut into 1 inch (2 cm) chunks', '4 cups water (960 mL)', '2 cups basmati rice (400 g)']
instructions: ['1: Make the 1 tablespoon pilau masala: In a 2 medium bowl, combine the 2 teaspoons ground cumin, 1 tablespoon paprika, 1 teaspoon ground cardamom, 1 teaspoon black pepper, and cloves', '2:  Set aside', '3: Heat a large pot over 2 medium-high heat', '4:  Add the ¼ cup vegetable oil and red onion and sauté for 10-15 minutes, until dark brown', '5: Add the garlic, 2 tablespoons ginger, 1 serrano chile, 1 tablespoon pilau masala, beef stock cubes, 1 cinnamon stick, and ¼ cup fresh cilantro', '6:  Cook for 1-2 minutes, until fragrant', '7: Add the beef and cook until browned, about 8 minutes', '8: Add the 3 roma tomatoes and cook for 4-5 minutes, until the 3 roma tomatoes have released their liquid', '9: Add the potatoes and the 4 cups water', '10:  Bring to a boil and cook for 10 minutes', '11: Add the 2 cups basmati rice, stir, and cover', '12:  Reduce the heat to 2 medium-low and cook for 20 minutes, until the 2 cups basmati rice is cooked and the liquid is absorbed']

ingredients: ['1 lb cremini mushroom (455 g) sliced', '1 lb shiitake mushroom (455 g) sliced', '⅓ cup extra virgin olive oil (80 mL) divided (plus 1/2 cup (120 ml)', 'kosher salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 teaspoons dijon mustard', '1 tablespoon honey', '¼ cup lemon juice (60 mL)', '1 cup frozen peas (150 g)', '1 small shallot thinly sliced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 lemon zested', '1 cup fresh parsley leaves (40 g) loosely packed roughly chopped', '5 oz arugula (140 g)', '½ cup parmesan cheese (50 g) shaved']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C)', '2:  Line 2 baking sheets with reusable baking mats or parchment paper', '3: Spread the 1 lb cremini mushrooms in an even layer on 1 baking sheet and the 1 lb shiitake mushrooms on the other', '4:  Drizzle ⅓ cup (80 ml) olive oil over the mushrooms, dividing evenly', '5:  Season with kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '6:  Toss well to coat evenly', '7: Roast the mushrooms for 20-25 minutes, stirring halfway through, until crisp and tender', '8:  Remove from the oven and set aside', '9:  Leave the oven on', '10: Meanwhile, make the dressing: In a 1 small bowl, whisk together the 2 teaspoons dijon mustard, 1 tablespoon honey, and ¼ cup 1 lemon juice', '11:  Slowly drizzle in the remaining ½ cup (120 ml) olive oil, whisking constantly, until the dressing is emulsified and thickened', '12:  Season with kosher salt to taste', '13:  Set aside', '14: Scatter the peas, shallot, 2 cloves garlic, and ¼ cup 1 lemon zest over the baking sheets with the mushrooms', '15:  Season with kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '16: Return the baking sheets to the oven for 5 minutes, until the peas are warmed through and the shallots are softened', '17: Sprinkle the roasted vegetables with parsley and set aside to cool slightly', '18: Place the 5 oz arugula in a large serving bowl', '19:  Add the vegetables and half of the dressing and toss well', '20:  Top with the shaved Parmesan and serve with the remaining dressing on the side']

ingredients: ['2 ripe mangoes', '2 cups natural yogurt (500 g)', '20 ice cubes', '½ cup milk (100 mL)', '½ cup water (100 mL)', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cardamom', '1 pinch saffron to serve']
instructions: ['1: Remove the skin and cores of the 2 ripe mangoes and add the flesh to a blender', '2: Add in all the ingredients apart from saffron', '3:  Blend till smooth', '4: Serve with a 1 pinch of saffron']

ingredients: ['Cabbage Slaw', '½ head green cabbage finely shredded', '½ medium red onion small diced', '2 roma tomatoes diced', '¼ cup fresh cilantro (10 g) chopped', '1 small jalapeño diced', '2 tablespoons lime juice', 'salt to taste', 'Crispy Fish', '1 cup all-purpose flour (125 g)', '1 tablespoon old bay seasoning', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '1 cup lager beer (240 mL)', 'vegetable oil for frying', '1 lb fresh cod (455 g) cut into 1-inch (2-cm) thick strips', 'Avocado Crema', '2 medium avocados', '1 cup sour cream (230 g)', '¼ cup lime juice (60 mL)', 'salt to taste', 'Assembly', 'corn tortilla warmed', 'radish thinly sliced for serving optional']
instructions: ['1: Make the ½ head green cabbage slaw: Combine the ½ head green cabbage, ½ medium red onion, tomato, ¼ cup fresh cilantro, 1 small jalapeño, lime juice, and salt in a large bowl', '2:  Toss well, then set aside', '3: Make the crispy fish: In a large bowl, combine the 1 cup all-purpose flour, Old Bay, and ½ teaspoon baking powder', '4:  Add the 1 cup lager beer and whisk until smooth', '5:  Let sit for 15 minutes', '6: Heat the vegetable oil in a large pot until it reaches 350°F (180°C)', '7: Coat the fish in the batter, then transfer to the oil and fry until golden on the outside and cooked through, 5-7 minutes', '8:  Drain the fish on a wire rack set over a ½ teaspoon baking sheet lined with paper towels', '9: Make the avocado crema: Add the 2 medium avocados, 1 cup sour cream, lime juice, and salt to a blender and blend until smooth', '10: To assemble the tacos, add a bit of the ½ head green cabbage slaw to a warmed corn tortilla', '11:  Top with a piece of fried fish, avocado crema, and sliced radish']
