half and use tongs to hold the folded edge in the hot oil for 20 seconds, or until golden brown', '6:  Lay the tortilla in the oil and fry on each side for 30–60 seconds, until golden brown and crunchy', '7:  Transfer to a paper towel–lined plate to drain and repeat with the remaining tortillas', '8:  Set aside until ready to assemble the tacos', '9: Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a clean medium pan over medium-low heat', '10:  Add the red onion and sauté for 6 minutes, or until softened and lightly charred', '11:  Add the 1 ½ cups shredded chicken, 1 teaspoon 2 teaspoons kosher ½ teaspoon kosher salt, and the black pepper, and cook for 2 minutes, or until the chicken is well incorporated', '12:  Transfer the chicken mixture to a bowl and wipe out the pan', '13: Using the palm of your hand, gently smash each potato, leaving the potatoes mostly intact', '14:  Transfer the potatoes to a medium bowl and gently toss with the cumin, chipotle powder, paprika, cinnamon, and remaining teaspoon of 2 teaspoons kosher ½ teaspoon kosher salt until well coated', '15: In the same medium pan, heat the remaining 3 tablespoons of olive oil over medium-high heat', '16:  Working in batches to avoid overcrowding the pan, lightly fry the seasoned potatoes until crispy and golden brown, 2 minutes per side', '17:  Transfer to a paper towel–lined plate to drain', '18: Make the elote-style salsa: In a medium bowl, combine the fire-roasted 10 1 can fire-roasted whole corn, ⅓ cup roma tomato, ¼ cup crema, fresh 2 tablespoons fresh cilantro, lime zest, ¼ cup crumbled queso fresco, 2 teaspoons kosher ½ teaspoon kosher salt, and pepper, and mix well', '19: Assemble the tacos: Fill a taco shell with the chicken mixture and crispy potatoes', '20:  Top with the elote-style salsa and garnish with fresh 2 tablespoons fresh cilantro leaves and lime zest', '21:  Repeat with the remaining ingredients']

ingredients: ['1 cup butter (230 g) softened plus more for pans', '1 cup sugar (200 g)', '4 eggs', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '3 cups flour (375 g) plus more for pans', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 ½ cups milk (360 mL)', '1 pt heavy cream (480 mL)', '1 pt strawberry (300 g) thinly sliced', '3 kiwis sliced', '½ cup blackberry (75 g)', '½ cup blueberry (50 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: In a large bowl, cream the 1 cup butter and 1 cup sugar', '3: Add 4 eggs, one at a time, and mix thoroughly', '4: Add 1 tablespoon vanilla and mix thoroughly', '5: Add dry ingredients and 1 ½ cups milk', '6:  Mix thoroughly', '7: Generously 1 cup butter and 3 cups flour two 9-inch (23 cm) 1 tablespoon baking pans', '8:  Divide batter between both, and bake for 35 minutes', '9: Remove cake from oven, cool completely, and transfer to wire rack', '10: In a bowl, beat 1 pt heavy cream until stiff peaks form when removing the beaters', '11: Top bottom layer of cake with whipped cream, then kiwi and 1 pt strawberry, then more whipped cream', '12:  Place the top layer of cake', '13:  Cover entire cake with whipped cream and fruit']

ingredients: ['2 bell peppers', '½ teaspoon mixed herbs', 'salt to taste', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '1 tablespoon flour', '2 tablespoons butter', '3 tablespoons onion chopped', '3 tablespoons zucchini chopped', '½ cup broccoli floret (75 g)', '½ cup corn kernel (100 g)', '¼ cup pizza cheese (30 g)', '1 cup milk (200 mL)', '1 oz mixed green lettuce (100 g)', '1 lemon', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon garlic chopped']
instructions: ['1: In a nonstick pan, melt 1 tbsp 2 tablespoons butter and add refined 1 tablespoon flour', '2:  Cook on low heat until golden brown', '3:  Then, add 1 cup milk and cook until 1 tablespoon flour is cooked', '4:  Add salt and 2 bell ½ teaspoon black pepper and cook until mixture reaches the consistency of a thick sauce', '5:  Remove from heat', '6: In a second saucepan, heat water and blanch all vegetables except 3 tablespoons onions', '7:  Once blanched, transfer to an ice bath', '8: Heat 2 tablespoons butter in a pan and brown', '9:  To this, add 3 tablespoons onion 3 tablespoons zucchini 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon garlic chopped 1 tablespoon garlic and 3 tablespoons onion and cook until translucent', '10:  Then, add blanched vegetables, toss well, and add salt, 2 bell ½ teaspoon black pepper, and herbs', '11: Add the white sauce and cook well', '12:  Then, add half of your allotted ¼ cup pizza cheese', '13: Cut open the caps of the 2 bell 2 bell ½ teaspoon black peppers and de-seed', '14:  Coat with a little 2 tablespoons butter mixed with seasonings', '15: Preheat oven to 350°F', '16: Stuff the 2 bell ½ teaspoon black peppers and top with remaining ¼ cup pizza cheese', '17:  Bake for 15 minutes or until 2 bell ½ teaspoon black peppers are cooked through but not mushy', '18: In a bowl on the side, mix together 1 lemon juice, 1 tablespoon olive oil, salt and 2 bell ½ teaspoon black pepper to make a dressing and dress the greens with it', '19: Serve the roasted 2 bell ½ teaspoon black peppers directly out of the oven with greens on-side']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegan butter to coat the foil pan', 'Dough', '2 cups almond milk (480 mL) at room temperature', '½ cup vegan butter (115 g) melted', '¼ cup organic sugar (50 g)', '1 packet active dry yeast', '5 ½ cups flour (690 g) divided', '1 teaspoon salt', 'Filling', '¾ cup vegan butter (170 g)', '¾ cup brown sugar (165 g)', '2 tablespoons ground cinnamon', 'Icing', '1 cup powdered sugar (160 g)', '2 tablespoons almond milk', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract']
instructions: ['1: Generously rub two disposable foil pie pans with 2 tablespoons ½ cup ¾ cup vegan butter', '2: In a large bowl, whisk together the 2 cups 2 tablespoons almond milk, melted butter, and sugar', '3:  The mixture should be just warm, registering between 100-110˚F (37-43˚C)', '4:  If it is hotter, allow to cool slightly', '5: Sprinkle the 1 packet active dry yeast evenly over the warm mixture and let set for 1 minute', '6: Add 5 cups flour and 1 teaspoon of salt to the milk mixture and mix with a wooden spoon until just combined', '7: Cover the bowl with a towel or plastic wrap and set in a warm place to rise for 1 hour', '8: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '9: After 1 hour, the dough should have nearly doubled in size', '10: Remove the towel and add an additional ½ cup (95g) of flour and salt', '11:  Stir well, then turn out onto a well-floured surface', '12: Knead the dough lightly, adding additional flour as necessary, until the dough just loses its stickiness and does not stick to the surface', '13: Roll the dough out into a large rectangle, about ½-inch (1 cm) thick', '14:  Fix corners to make sure they are sharp and even', '15: Spread the softened 2 tablespoons ½ cup ¾ cup vegan butter evenly over the dough', '16: Sprinkle evenly with brown sugar and 2 tablespoons ground cinnamon', '17: Roll up the dough, forming a log, and pinch the seam closed', '18:  Place seam-side down', '19:  Trim off any unevenness on either end', '20: Cut the log in half, then divide each half into 7 evenly sized pieces', '21:  About 1½ inches (8 cm) thick each', '22: Place 7 2 tablespoons ground cinnamon rolls in each cake pan, one in the center, six around the sides', '23:  Cover with plastic wrap and place in a warm place to rise for 30 minutes', '24: To prepare the frosting', '25:  In a medium-size mixing bowl, whisk together powdered sugar, 2 cups 2 tablespoons almond milk, and vanilla until smooth', '26: Remove plastic wrap', '27:  Bake the 2 tablespoons ground cinnamon rolls in a preheated oven at 350˚F (180˚C) for 25-30 minutes, until golden brown', '28: While still warm, drizzle evenly with frosting']

ingredients: ['6 oz skinless salmon (170 g)', '2 zucchinis sliced', 'olive oil to taste', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '10 cherry tomatoes halved', '3 tablespoons pesto']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2: On a baking sheet, lay down zucchini', '3:  Drizzle on olive oil and sprinkle on salt and pepper', '4: Lay the 6 oz skinless salmon on the zucchini, and spread the 3 tablespoons pesto on top of the 6 oz skinless salmon', '5:  Top with tomatoes', '6: Bake for 10-12 minutes']

ingredients: ['1 cup simple syrup (336 g)', '3 whole star anises', '2 cinnamon sticks', '1 cup brandy (240 mL)', '2 cups orange juice (480 mL)', '1 orange sliced', '1 lemon sliced', '1 lime sliced plus more for garnish', '1 bottle red wine spanish red wine such as Rioja']
instructions: ['1: In a large pot over medium-low heat or a slow cooker, combine the 1 cup simple syrup, 3 whole star anise, 2 cinnamon sticks, 1 cup brandy, orange juice, orange, 1 lemon, 1 lime, and 1 bottle red wine', '2: Stir well, cover, and simmer over low heat for at least 20 minutes, until warmed through', '3: Ladle the sangria into mugs and garnish with 1 lime wedges']

ingredients: ['8 oz cremini mushroom (225 g) finely chopped', '15 oz cannellini bean (425 g) 1 can drained and rinsed', '1 small yellow onion finely chopped', '1 ¼ cups bread crumbs (145 g)', '½ cup fresh parsley (20 g) finely chopped divided plus 1 teaspoon', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon dried rosemary', '1 teaspoon vegan worcestershire sauce', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '½ teaspoon liquid smoke', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 tablespoon canola oil', '1 cup marinara sauce (260 g)', '12 dinner rolls or hawaiian sweet rolls', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese (100 g)', '2 tablespoons melted butter', '1 teaspoon shredded vegetarian parmesan cheese']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, combine the 8 oz cremini mushrooms, cannellini beans, onion, 1 ¼ cups bread crumbs, ½ cup (15 grams) of parsley, 3 3 cloves of minced garlic, the dried rosemary, Worcestershire sauce, soy sauce, nutmeg, liquid smoke, salt, and pepper and mix well', '2: Roll the 8 oz cremini mushroom mixture into golf ball-sized balls', '3: Heat the canola oil in a large pot over medium-high heat until shimmering', '4:  Place the balls in the pot and cook for 1 minute on each side until browned all over, 3-4 minutes total', '5: Add the marinara sauce and stir to coat the balls', '6: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '7: Slice the 12 dinner rolls in half lengthwise', '8:  Place the bottom half on a 9x13-inch (23x33-cm) rimmed baking sheet', '9:  Place the meatballs on top, followed by any remaining marinara sauce in the pot, then the mozzarella', '10:  Top with the top half of the 12 dinner rolls', '11: Mix the 2 tablespoons melted butter in a 1 small bowl with the remaining tablespoon of minced garlic, the Parmesan, and remaining teaspoon of parsley', '12:  Brush the tops of the 12 dinner rolls with the butter mixture', '13: Bake for 15 minutes, or until the 1 ¼ cups bread is golden brown', '14: Slice into individual sliders, then serve']

ingredients: ['Oven-Baked French Fries', '2 russet potatoes', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon paprika', 'Carne Asada', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '2 cloves garlic minced', '2 tablespoons fresh cilantro minced', '½ cup fresh orange juice (120 mL)', '¼ cup fresh lime juice (60 mL)', '½ lb flank steak (225 g)', '1 tablespoon canola oil', '½ cup shredded Pepper Jack cheese (50 g)', 'For Serving', 'sour cream', 'guacamole', '1 tomato diced', 'fresh cilantro leaf', 'cotija cheese grated']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 450°F (230°C)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: Cut the 2 russet potatoes into wedges', '4:  In a large bowl, combine the 2 russet potatoes, 2 tablespoons olive oil, salt, garlic powder, and 1 teaspoon paprika until each fry is fully coated', '5: Place the fries on the baking sheet and bake for 30-35 minutes, or until the fries are crispy and golden brown', '6: In a medium bowl, combine the salt, ½ teaspoon pepper, 1 teaspoon chili powder, ½ teaspoon dried oregano, garlic, cilantro, ½ cup fresh orange juice, and ¼ cup fresh lime juice', '7:  Add the ½ lb flank steak and marinate for 20 minutes', '8: Heat a cast-iron skillet with the 1 tablespoon canola oil over medium heat', '9:  Cook the steak for 3 minutes on both sides for medium-cooked steak', '10:  Remove the steak and let it rest for 10 minutes', '11: After 10 minutes dice the steak', '12: In an ovenproof skillet, place the baked french fries, Pepper Jack ½ cup shredded Pepper Jack cotija cheese, and 1 tomato diced carne asada, then broil until the ½ cup shredded Pepper Jack cotija cheese is melted', '13: Before serving, top with sour cream, guacamole, 1 tomato diced tomatoes, cilantro, and grated cotija ½ cup shredded Pepper Jack cotija cheese']

ingredients: ['Cream Cheese Filling', '4 oz cream cheese (110 g) softened', '1 ¾ cups powdered sugar (210 g)', '1 tablespoon all purpose flour', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'Cookies', '2 cups all purpose flour (250 g)', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '12 tablespoons unsalted butter', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '1 cup brown sugar (220 g) packed', '2 large eggs', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 cup carrot (110 g) shredded', '1 cup raisin (150 g)', '½ cup pecan (60 g) chopped']
instructions: ['1: Make the 4 oz cream cheese filling: In a medium bowl, combine the 4 oz cream cheese, 1 ¾ cups powdered 1 ¾ cups powdered ½ cup 1 cup 1 cup brown sugar, flour, and 1 teaspoon 1 tablespoon vanilla', '2:  Mix with a fork until smooth', '3: Scoop 16 teaspoon-sized balls of icing onto a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '4:  Freeze for at least 1 hour', '5: Make the cookies: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180˚C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '6:  (Do not use a silicone mat--if the bottoms of the cookies are too thin, the silicone will stick to the cookies and the icing centers will fall through when removed from the pan', '7: )In a medium bowl, mix together the flour, baking soda, and salt', '8:  Set aside', '9: In a 2 large bowl, combine the butter, granulated 1 ¾ cups powdered ½ cup 1 cup 1 cup brown sugar, and 1 cup brown 1 ¾ cups powdered ½ cup 1 cup 1 cup brown sugar, and beat with an electric hand mixer or whisk for 1-2 minutes, or until well combined', '10: Add the eggs, 1 at a time, then the 1 teaspoon 1 tablespoon vanilla and cinnamon and beat until combined', '11: Add the flour mixture and beat until just incorporated', '12: Fold in the carrots, raisins, and pecans with a rubber spatula', '13: Scoop 16 heaping 12 tablespoons of dough onto 2 prepared baking sheets, spacing at least 3 inches apart', '14:  Flatten each scoop with moistened fingers', '15: Place a frozen icing ball in the center of each dough round', '16: Top the filling with another scoop of dough and use moistened fingers to flatten and seal the edges so the filling is completely encased', '17: Bake for 15-18 minutes, or until the edges are light 1 cup brown', '18:  Be careful not to overbake or the filling will ooze out', '19: Let the cookies cool completely', '20:  This is important! If you try to lift the cookies before they are cool and the icing is still warm, it could fall through the cookies']

ingredients: ['2 lb chicken wings (910 g)', '1 teaspoon salt \n', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '1 tablespoon italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '⅓ cup grated parmesan cheese (35 g)', '4 cloves garlic finely minced', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL)', '¼ cup fresh parsley (10 g) chopped']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 300ºF (150°C)', '2: In a large bowl, mix together the 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon black pepper, Italian seasoning, and 1 teaspoon ground cumin', '3:  Pour 2 lb chicken wings into the bowl and coat with the spice mixture', '4: Transfer wings on to a baking sheet, bake for 20 minutes', '5:  Then increase the oven temperature to 425ºF (220°C) bake for 15 more minutes', '6: While the 2 lb chicken is baking, mix together the ⅓ cup grated parmesan cheese, 4 cloves garlic, oil, and ¼ cup fresh chopped parsley', '7: When the 2 lb chicken is cooked through, toss the wings with the 4 cloves garlic/cheese/olive oil mixture', '8:  Serve immediately ']

ingredients: ['1 onion', '3 cloves garlic', '1 red chili', '1 red pepper diced', '¼ lb chorizo (100 g)', '½ teaspoon turmeric', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 ¼ cups long grain rice (250 g)', '1 ¾ cups water (400 mL)', '⅔ cup pea (100 g)', '⅓ lb prawn (150 g)']
instructions: ['1: Fry the onions, 3 cloves garlic, chilli, and red 1 red ½ teaspoon pepper with a little olive oil', '2: Add the ¼ lb chorizo after a minute', '3: Stir in the ½ teaspoon turmeric, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 red ½ teaspoon pepper, and 1 ¼ cups long grain rice', '4: Pour in the 1 ¾ cups water and simmer for 20 minutes', '5: Stir in the peas and prawns until prawns are pink and no 1 ¼ cups longer translucent, about 3-4 minutes']

ingredients: ['1 sweet potato large thinly sliced', 'salt to taste']
instructions: ['1: Working in batches, place the sliced 1 sweet potatoes on a piece of parchment paper and sprinkle with salt', '2: Microwave for 2 minutes and 30 seconds, flipping halfway, until the chips begin to brown', '3:  Continue to microwave at 30 second intervals if necessary', '4: Allow to cool']

ingredients: ['1 cup blueberry (100 g)', '1 cup baby spinach (40 g)', '1 banana chopped', '1 ½ cups ice (225 g)']
instructions: ['1: Place the blueberries, 1 cup baby spinach, and 1 banana in a blender or food processor and blend until just combined', '2: Add in the 1 ½ cups ice and continue to blend until the mixture is smooth', '3: Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['4 cups frozen blueberry (400 g)', '1 cup Welch’s Grape Juice (240 mL)', '3 tablespoons lemon juice']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 150ºF (125ºF for convection ovens)', '2: Line two 14x10-inch (35x25 cm) rimmed baking sheets with parchment paper, making sure the paper is a little bit bigger than the pans', '3: In a small saucepan, bring the blueberries and Welch’s grape juice to a low boil', '4: Add the 3 tablespoons lemon juice, stir, and simmer for 10–15 minutes or until mixture thickens', '5:  Let cool slightly', '6: Place all the ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth, about 20 seconds', '7:  Carefully remove the lid from the blender as contents will be hot', '8: Pour the mixture evenly over the two parchment paper–lined sheet trays and use a rubber spatula to make sure it is spread evenly', '9: Place the pans in the oven for 4–5 hours', '10:  The desired texture should be smooth to the touch and not sticky', '11: Cool for 20 minutes', '12:  Cut into 2-inch (5 cm) strips, and roll up']

ingredients: ['12 strips bacon', '12 brussels sprouts', 'maple syrup', 'black pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Lay out stips of 12 strips bacon on a clean cutting board or other clean flat surface', '2: Lightly brush each strip of 12 strips bacon with maple syrup making sure to coat the entire surface of the meat', '3:  Lightly sprinkle with black pepper', '4: Take a 12 brussels sprouts and starting from the bottom, roll up each piece of 12 strips bacon so that it evenly wraps the vegetable', '5: Lightly brush the tops of each wrapped 12 brussels sprout with more maple syrup and sprinkle on additional pepper', '6:  Transfer the pieces to a baking sheet making sure to place each piece of rolled-up 12 strips bacon with the seam side down', '7: Bake at 350˚F (180˚C) for 20-25 minutes or until 12 strips bacon is done and thoroughly cooked', '8: Remove from baking tray and place on paper towels to remove excess 12 strips bacon fat']

ingredients: ['3 chicken breasts', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '6 tablespoons ranch dressing', '6 slices bacon', '4 oz cheddar cheese (115 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2: Place 3 chicken breast in a baking dish', '3:  Season 3 chicken with salt and pepper, to taste', '4: Spread 1-2 Tbsp', '5:  6 tablespoons ranch on each 3 chicken breast', '6: Layer two 6 slices of bacon on top of each 3 chicken breast', '7: Top with 4 oz cheddar cheese', '8: Bake for 40 minutes']

ingredients: ['Black Tea', '2 cups water (480 mL)', '4 black tea bags', 'mint simple syrup', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '¼ cup fresh mint leaf (10 g)', 'Assembly', '2 cups sparkling lemonade (480 mL)', '12 oz bourbon (340 mL) optional', 'ice for serving']
instructions: ['1: Make the 4 black tea: In a small saucepan, bring the 2 cups ½ cup water to a boil', '2:  Once boiling, remove the pot from the heat and add the tea bags', '3:  Steep for 5 minutes, then remove the tea bags', '4:  Transfer the tea to the refrigerator and let cool completely', '5: Make the ¼ cup fresh mint simple syrup: In a small saucepan, bring the 2 cups ½ cup water and sugar to a simmer, stirring to dissolve the sugar completely', '6:  Remove the pot from the heat and add the ¼ cup fresh mint leaves', '7:  Steep for 15 minutes, then strain the syrup into a glass jar or liquid measuring cup', '8:  Discard the ¼ cup fresh mint leaves', '9:  Transfer to the refrigerator and let the syrup cool completely', '10: To assemble, in a large, resealable carafe, combine the 4 black tea, 2 cups sparkling lemonade, ¼ cup fresh mint simple syrup, and 12 oz bourbon, if using', '11:  Gently swirl the bottle to combine', '12:  Chill in the refrigerator until ready to serve', '13: When ready to serve, pour the sweet tea over ice']

ingredients: ['oil of your preference to taste', '1 lb boneless skinless chicken breast (455 g) cubed', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 lime juiced', '⅓ cup fresh cilantro (15 g) minced', '1 red bell pepper diced', '½ red onion diced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 bag riced cauliflower', '1 cup corn (175 g) steamed', '½ teaspoon chili powder optional', '1 can black beans rinsed and drained optional', 'lime cut into wedges optional']
instructions: ['1: Heat preferred cooking oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat', '2:  Add 1 lb boneless skinless chicken, season with salt and 1 red bell pepper, and cook until cooked through and no longer pink', '3: Add lime juice and ⅓ cup fresh cilantro', '4:  Stir to combine', '5:  Remove 1 lb boneless skinless chicken from pan, place on a plate, and set aside', '6: Add a little more oil to pan if needed, then add red onion, bell 1 red bell pepper, and 2 cloves garlic', '7:  Stir to combine', '8:  Allow to cook until onion begins to turn transparent, stirring occasionally', '9: Add 1 bag riced cauliflower, 1 cup corn, and ½ teaspoon chili powder', '10:  Cook until cauliflower is soft and remove from heat', '11: Distribute 1 can black beans, 1 lb boneless skinless chicken, and cauliflower mixture evenly between 4 containers', '12:  Top with a wedge of lime', '13: This meal prep can be refrigerated for up to 4 days']

ingredients: ['1 oz fresh raspberry (30 g)', '¼ cup oat flour (20 g)', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '2 tablespoons honey', '1 egg white', '½ teaspoon raspberry jam']
instructions: ['1: Mix together 1 egg white, 2 tablespoons honey, and 1 oz fresh ½ teaspoon raspberry jam in a greased coffee mug', '2: Add ¼ cup oat flour and ½ teaspoon baking powder and mix until combined', '3: Add in 1 oz fresh raspberries', '4: Microwave on high for 90 seconds (times may vary)']

ingredients: ['2 pieces sourdough bread', '1 ½ tablespoons unsalted butter', '1 ½ tablespoons mayonnaise', '3 slices cheddar cheese']
instructions: ['1: On a cutting board, 1 ½ tablespoons unsalted butter each piece of 2 pieces sourdough bread with 1 ½ tablespoons unsalted butter on one side', '2: Flip the 2 pieces sourdough bread over and spread each piece of 2 pieces sourdough bread with 1 ½ tablespoons mayonnaise', '3: Place the 3 slices cheddar cheese on the 1 ½ tablespoons unsalted buttered side of one piece of 2 pieces sourdough bread', '4:  Top it with the second piece of 2 pieces sourdough bread, 1 ½ tablespoons mayonnaise side out', '5: Heat a nonstick pan over medium low heat', '6: Place the sandwich on the pan, 1 ½ tablespoons mayonnaise side down', '7: Cook for 3-4 minutes, until golden brown', '8: Using a spatula, flip the sandwich over and continue cooking until golden brown, about 2-3 minutes']

ingredients: ['3 ripe bananas', '2 eggs', '½ cup 2% plain greek yogurt (120 g)', '⅓ cup honey (115 g)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 ½ cups wheat flour (195 g)', '1 cup blueberry (100 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: In a medium bowl, mash 3 ripe bananas', '3:  Mix 2 eggs, ½ cup 2% plain greek yogurt, ⅓ cup honey, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, and 1 teaspoon baking soda into mixture', '4: Add 1 ½ cups wheat flour and mix', '5: Add blueberries and gently fold into mixture', '6: Pour the batter into a greased 9 x 5-inch (23 x 13 cm) bread pan', '7:  Bake for about 50 mins, or until a toothpick comes out clean from the middle of the bread', '8:  (Baking times may vary, so keep an eye on the bread', '9: )Allow to cool for 15 minutes before serving']

ingredients: ['1 cup milk of choice (240 mL)', '2 tablespoons semi-sweet chocolate chips', 'whipped cream topping', '¼ cup mini marshmallows (15 g)', '1 peppermint stick']
instructions: ['1: Over low heat, add 1 cup milk and 2 tablespoons semi-sweet chocolate chips to a small saucepan', '2: Stir until 1 cup milk and 2 tablespoons semi-sweet chocolate chips are combined (approximately 10-15 minutes)', '3: Pour the hot 2 tablespoons semi-sweet chocolate mixture into a mug', '4: Add whipped cream, ¼ cup mini marshmallows, and 1 peppermint stick']

ingredients: ['Sauce', '¼ cup rice vinegar (60 mL)', '⅓ cup soy sauce (80 mL)', '⅓ cup brown sugar (75 g)', '¼ cup vegan worcestershire (60 mL)', '¼ cup tamarind paste (55 g)', 'Pad Thai', '8 oz dried rice noodles (225 g)', '2 tablespoons peanut oil', '½ bunch green onion or chinese chives. sliced plus more for serving', '2 red thai chiles sliced plus more for serving', '2 cloves garlic minced', '2 carrots peeled into ribbons', '½ cup bean sprout (50 g)', '¼ cup roasted unsalted peanut (30 g)', '8 oz tofu (110 g) cooked cubed']
instructions: ['1: Soak the rice noodles in room-temperature water for 30 minutes prior to cooking', '2: Make the sauce: in a small saucepan over medium-high heat, whisk together the rice vinegar, ⅓ cup soy sauce, ⅓ cup brown sugar, Worcestershire sauce, and ¼ cup tamarind paste', '3: Bring to a boil, then 2 reduce the heat to low', '4:  Simmer for 5 minutes, stirring constantly, until the sauce thickens and coats the back of a wooden spoon', '5:  Remove the sauce from the heat and set aside', '6: Heat a large cast-iron pan or wok over high heat', '7:  Add the peanut oil, scallions, chiles, and 2 cloves garlic', '8:  Stir, and cook for about 2 minutes until scallions soften', '9: Add the 2 carrots, stir to incorporate, and cook for about 1 minute', '10:  Add the ½ cup bean sprouts and stir to incorporate', '11: Add soaked rice noodles and stir to evenly distribute all ingredients, then stir for 1-2 minutes to heat the noodles through', '12: Add the sauce and stir to combine', '13: Add the 8 oz tofu, stir to incorporate, and remove the pan from the heat', '14: Serve immediately with peanuts, ½ cup bean sprouts, scallions, and 2 red chiles, if desired']

ingredients: ['2 cups raspberry (250 g) plus more for garnish', '2 cups blackberry (300 g) plus more for garnish', '2 cups blueberry (400 g) plus more for garnish', '1 cup sugar (200 g)', '20 white breads', '2 cups whipped cream (100 g) lightly sweetened', 'fresh mint for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Add the raspberries, blackberries, blueberries, and sugar to a medium saucepan over medium heat', '2:  Cook for 8-10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the berries have softened but are still mostly intact and the sugar just dissolves', '3:  Remove the pan from the heat', '4: Strain the berries through a fine-mesh sieve set over a liquid measuring 2 2 2 1 2 cup', '5:  Add water as needed so you have 1½ 2 2 2 1 2 cups (360  ml) of liquid total', '6:  Pour the liquid into a shallow dish', '7:  Reserve the fruit and the liquid', '8: Trim the crusts off the bread', '9:  Cut the bread in half down the middle', '10: Line a 2-quart bowl with enough plastic wrap to hang over the edges at least 4 inches (10 cm) all around', '11: Dip a half slice of bread at a time in the reserved berry juice, then line the sides of the wrapped bowl, overlapping slightly', '12:  Some slices can hang over the side of the bowl', '13:  Line the center of the bowl once the sides are covered', '14: Spoon the reserved berries into the center of the lined bowl', '15:  Fold the bread over the berries, then dip the remaining bread in the berry juice and cover the center, overlapping slightly', '16:  Pour any remaining juice over the pudding', '17: Cover the pudding with the plastic wrap', '18:  Place a small plate on top and weigh down with a can', '19:  Refrigerate for at least 6 hours, up to overnight', '20: When ready to serve, remove the plate and the can and peel back the plastic', '21:  Place a serving platter over the bowl and quickly flip both the bowl and platter over to invert the pudding', '22:  Remove the bowl and plastic wrap', '23: Top the pudding with the whipped cream, more berries, and fresh mint leaves', '24:  Slice and serve']

ingredients: ['½ cup soy sauce (120 mL)', '¼ cup rice wine vinegar (60 mL)', '3 tablespoons light brown sugar', '2 cloves garlic minced', '2 teaspoons cornstarch', '1 tablespoon oil plus more for frying', '4 oz vermicelli rice noodle (115 g)', '1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken thighs (680 g) cut into 1 inch (2 cm) pieces', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 ½ cups snap peas (150 g) blanched', '1 radish thinly sliced', '2 scallions thinly sliced', 'fresh cilantro chopped to taste', '2 teaspoons sesame seeds']
instructions: ['1: In a small bowl or liquid measuring cup, add the soy sauce, ¼ cup 4 oz vermicelli rice wine vinegar, 3 3 1 tablespoons light brown sugar, 2 cloves garlic, and 2 teaspoons cornstarch', '2:  Whisk to combine', '3:  Set aside', '4: Heat a wok or large skillet with 3 inches (7 cm) of oil to 400˚F (200˚C)', '5: Pull the ¼ cup 4 oz vermicelli rice noodles apart into eight portions', '6: Place one portion of noodles on a slotted spoon and carefully dip into the oil', '7:  The noodles will immediately fry', '8:  Once puffed up, remove the noodles and transfer to a wire rack to drain', '9:  Repeat with the remaining noodles', '10: Season the 1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken with salt and pepper', '11: Heat a wok or large skillet with 1 3 1 tablespoon of oil over medium-high heat', '12:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the 1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken and cook, stirring occasionally, until 3 3 1 tablespoons light browned and cooked through, about 5 minutes', '13: Add the teriyaki sauce to the 1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken and bring to a boil', '14:  Cook until the sauce has reduced by one third and the 1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken is fully coated', '15: Serve the 1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken over the ¼ cup 4 oz vermicelli rice noodles with 1 ½ cups snap peas, 1 radish slices, 2 scallions, fresh cilantro, and 2 teaspoons sesame seeds']

ingredients: ['3 cloves garlic minced divided', '2 teaspoons fresh ginger minced', '2 scallions thinly sliced plus 1 bunch sliced on the bias divided', '¼ cup soy sauce (60 mL)', '4 tablespoons sesame oil plus 2 tablespoons divided', '1 tablespoon mirin', '1 tablespoon light brown sugar', '1 lb boneless skinless chicken thighs (455 g) sliced into 1/2 inch (1 1/4 cm) strips', '4 cups fresh spinach (160 g)', 'kosher salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 large carrots julienned', '8 oz shiitake mushroom (150 g) stems removed thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon unsalted butter', '2 large eggs', 'For Serving', 'sushi rice cooked', '1 cup cabbage kimchi (150 g)', 'persian cucumber thinly sliced']
instructions: ['1: In a shallow dish, combine 2 3 cloves of garlic, the 2 teaspoons fresh ginger, 2 thinly sliced 2 scallions, the ¼ cup soy sauce, 2 4 tablespoons sesame oil, the mirin, and brown sugar, and whisk to combine', '2: Add the 1 lb boneless skinless chicken and toss to coat', '3:  Cover with plastic wrap and let marinate in the refrigerator for 30 minutes', '4: Bring a large pot of water to boil over high heat and season generously with kosher salt', '5:  Prepare an ice bath in a large bowl', '6:  Blanch the 4 cups fresh spinach in the boiling water for 30 seconds, then transfer to the ice bath to shock, then drain', '7:  Transfer to a small bowl and season with 1 teaspoon of sesame oil, kosher salt, and freshly ground black pepper', '8: In a medium skillet, heat 1 teaspoon of sesame oil over medium heat', '9:  Add the carrots and cook until softened, 2-3 minutes', '10:  Remove from the pan and set aside', '11:  Season with kosher salt', '12: In the same skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of sesame oil over medium-high heat', '13:  Add the remaining clove of garlic and cook for 30 seconds, until fragrant', '14:  Add the mushrooms and cook, stirring frequently, until softened, about 2 minutes', '15:  Season with kosher salt, then remove from the pan and set aside', '16: In the same skillet, heat the remaining tablespoon of sesame oil over medium-high heat', '17:  Add the marinated 1 lb boneless skinless chicken and sauté, stirring occasionally, until cooked through, about 5 minutes', '18: Heat a nonstick pan over medium-high heat', '19:  Melt the butter in the pan', '20:  Once the foaming subsides, crack the eggs into the pan and cook until the whites are firm and golden brown around the edges and the yolks are still runny, or to your desired doneness', '21: To assemble the bibimbap bowls, top the sushi rice with the 1 lb boneless skinless chicken, 1 cup cabbage kimchi, sliced 2 scallions, carrots, 4 cups fresh spinach, mushrooms, cucumbers, and fried eggs']

ingredients: ['2 small acorn squashes or 1 large', '1 onion chopped', '2 stalks celery chopped', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon fresh rosemary', '3 cloves garlic chopped', '½ lb sausage (225 g)', '1 apple chopped', '1 cup panko breadcrumbs (50 g)', '½ cup parmesan cheese (55 g)']
instructions: ['1: Using a sharp knife cut off the very top and bottom of each squash to create a flat base on each side (being careful not to cut through the center cavity)', '2: Slice the squash in half, scrape out seeds to create individual bowls for the stuffing', '3: Drizzle each squash half with 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1 teaspoon pepper', '4: Roast in a preheated oven at 400˚F (200˚C) for 40-50 minutes - or until fork tender', '5: While squash is roasting - in a 2 small acorn squashes or 1 large fry pan over medium heat - heat oil and add Onion, Celery, Salt, Pepper, and Rosemary', '6:  Cook until 1 onions begin to soften', '7: Add Garlic and Sausage, until ½ lb sausage is browned on all sides', '8: Add Apple until slightly softened', '9:  Finally mix in Bread Crumbs and Parmesan cheese just until incorporated', '10:  Remove from heat', '11: Once Squash has finished roasting (when you can easily poke it with a fork) remove from oven and fill each with prepared stuffing mixture', '12: Return to Oven for 20 minutes - adding a sprinkle of Parmesan cheese to the top for the final 5 minutes']

ingredients: ['4 granny smith apples sliced', '4 red delicious apples sliced', '1 orange sliced', '1 ½ tablespoons whole allspice', '1 ½ tablespoons whole clove', '3 cinnamon sticks', '8 cups water (1.9 L)']
instructions: ['1: Place fruit and spices into a slow cooker', '2: Add 8 8 cups of water', '3: Cook on high heat for 3-4 hours', '4: Uncover the slow cooker, and mash the softened fruit with a potato masher', '5: Cover again and cook on low for 1-2 hours', '6: Strain out fruit and spices from the slow cooker into a cheesecloth in a bowl', '7: Wait about 20-30 minutes for the cheesecloth to cool', '8:  Squeeze out cider from cheesecloth into the bowl', '9:  Pour the cider back into the slow cooker', '10: Serve warm']

ingredients: ['1 head cauliflower', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'Batter', '½ cup flour (65 g)', '1 teaspoon garlic salt', '½ cup whole milk (120 mL)', '1 teaspoon hot sauce']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 450˚F (230˚C)', '2: Cut the 1 head of cauliflower in half', '3:  Pluck bite-sized florets from each half', '4:  Trim bottoms of florets as necessary', '5: In a medium bowl, mix the batter ingredients', '6: Add cauliflower to the batter', '7:  Stir so each floret is fully coated', '8: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '9:  Spread cauliflower florets on the baking sheet and drizzle with 1 tablespoon olive oil', '10: Bake for 20 minutes', '11: Remove the cauliflower from the oven and toss with buffalo 1 teaspoon hot sauce', '12: Return cauliflower to oven and bake for an additional 10 minutes until browned to your liking']

ingredients: ['1 cup bread flour (125 g)', '¾ cup all-purpose flour (95 g)', '2 teaspoons kosher salt or 1½ teaspoons table salt', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 cup unsalted butter (225 g) 2 sticks', '2 tablespoons water room temperature', '1 cup dark brown sugar (220 g)', '½ cup white sugar (100 g)', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon espresso powder', '1 large egg', '1 large egg yolk', '½ cup semi-sweet chocolate chips (85 g)', '5 oz dark chocolate (130 g) chopped']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, sift together the flours, 2 teaspoons kosher salt, and 1 teaspoon baking soda', '2:  Set aside', '3: In a medium or large saucepan, add the butter and melt over medium heat', '4:  The larger the pan you use, the quicker the process will be!Bring the butter to a boil, stirring frequently', '5:  As the water begins to boil out of the butter, the milk solids in the butter will separate, sink to the bottom, and begin to toast and brown', '6:  As this begins to happen, make sure to stir constantly so the butter browns evenly', '7:  It may become quite foamy, splatter a bit, and be difficult to see, so keep a close eye on it, removing from heat and continuing to stir if it starts to foam over', '8: Once the butter has turned a nice nutty brown, remove from the heat and pour into a large liquid measuring cup to stop the cooking', '9:  Allow it to cool down for a minute or two, give it a stir, and carefully add 2-3 2 tablespoons of water to the butter to bring it back up to 1 cup (240 ml) of liquid', '10: Set aside to cool to room temperature', '11:  To help speed this process up, you can place in the fridge for 10-15 minutes', '12:  You want to make sure the butter is still liquid when you’re adding it to the dough later on, so make sure to remove after 15 minutes', '13: In a large bowl, add the sugars, 2 teaspoons vanilla, 1 teaspoon espresso powder, and cooled brown butter', '14:  Cream together with an electric hand mixer until light and fluffy, 1-2 minutes', '15: Add the egg and yolk and beat until incorporated', '16: Add the dry ingredients, about ⅓ of the mixture at a time, and beat between additions until just incorporated', '17:  It’s okay for there to be a bit of unmixed flour on the edge of bowl, this will be incorporated in the next step', '18: Using a wooden spoon, fold the ½ cup semi-sweet 5 oz dark chocolate chips and chunks into the doughScoop the cookies onto a parchment paper-lined 1 teaspoon baking sheet in 3-tablespoon-sized mounds', '19: For optimal flavor, cover and refrigerate for 1 hour or, even better, overnight', '20: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '21: Evenly space the dough 3 inches (8 cm) apart from one another on a parchment paper-lined 1 teaspoon baking sheet', '22: Bake in a preheated oven for 12-14 minutes', '23: Let the cookies cool on the 1 teaspoon baking sheet for 2-3 minutes before transferring to a cooling rack to cool completely']

ingredients: ['4 teaspoons vegetable oil', '4 large flour tortillas', '2 romaine lettuce hearts', '2 tomatoes', '½ red onion', '2 avocados', '1 cup corn (175 g) canned rinsed and drained', '1 cup black beans (170 g) canned rinsed and drained', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL)', '¼ cup lime juice (60 mL)', '1 clove garlic minced', '⅛ teaspoon cumin', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '3 tablespoons fresh cilantro chopped', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Pour the 4 teaspoons vegetable oil (1 teaspoon per bowl) into medium (1', '3: 2 quart) oven-proof bowls and rub around to coat the surface', '4:  Press each tortilla into a greased bowl', '5: Bake for about 10 minutes, until golden brown', '6:  Let the tortilla bowls cool', '7: Make 3 cuts lengthwise on each of the 2 romaine hearts, remove the stems, and chop into smaller pieces', '8:  Rinse, drain, and place in a 4 large salad bowl', '9: Dice the 2 tomatoes and add them to the bowl with the 2 romaine', '10: Dice the onion and add it to the salad', '11: Cut the 2 avocados in half, remove the pits, and dice', '12:  Add to the salad', '13: Add the corn and black beans', '14: In a small bowl or liquid measuring cup, combine the olive oil, lime juice, 1 clove garlic, cumin, ½ ½ teaspoon red pepper flakes, 3 tablespoons fresh cilantro, salt, and pepper', '15:  Mix well', '16: Pour the dressing over the salad and toss well', '17: Fill each tortilla bowl with the salad']

ingredients: ['Ponzu Sauce', '2 ½ tablespoons soy sauce', '¼ cup mirin (60 mL)', '1 lemon zested', '1 lemon juiced', '½ grapefruit juiced', '½ orange juiced', '1 tablespoon dried bonito flakes', '2 tablespoons dried kelp', 'Lime Crema', '4 tablespoons sour cream', '½ lime zested', '½ lime juiced', '½ teaspoon garlic minced', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', 'Tuna Roll', '2 ½ sticks imitation crab cut into ¼-inch-wide strips', '3 tablespoons japanese mayonnaise', '1 teaspoon sriracha sauce', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', '1 teaspoon togarashi', 'kosher salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon unsalted butter', '4 spears asparagus tops removed', '½ teaspoon garlic minced', '2 tablespoons red quinoa cooked for 5–10 minutes and drained', '½ lb sashimi grade yellowfin tuna (225 g)', '2 tablespoons tobiko', '2 slices avocado', 'Special Equipment', 'sushi mat']
instructions: ['1: Make the ponzu sauce: In a small bowl, combine the 2 ½ tablespoons soy sauce, ¼ cup mirin, lemon zest and juice, ½ grapefruit juice, ½ orange juice, 1 tablespoon dried bonito flakes, and 2 tablespoons dried kelp', '2:  Mix until well combined, then cover and let steep in the refrigerator overnight', '3: Make the lime crema: In a small bowl, mix together the 4 tablespoons sour cream, lime zest and juice, garlic, and salt until smooth', '4:  Refrigerate until ready to use', '5: Prep the roll: In a medium bowl, combine the 2 ½ sticks imitation crab, mayo, Sriracha, 1 teaspoon sesame oil, and 1 teaspoon togarashi', '6:  Mix until well combined, then season with salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '7:  Refrigerate until ready to use', '8: Melt the 1 teaspoon unsalted butter in a small pan over medium-low heat', '9:  Add the 4 spears asparagus and garlic and sauté until the 4 spears asparagus is tender, 2–3 minutes', '10: In a separate small pan over medium heat, toast the cooked 2 tablespoons red quinoa until darkened in color and crispy, 4–5 minutes', '11: Assemble the roll: Slice the ½ lb sashimi grade yellowfin tuna about ⅛ inch thick', '12: Lay a sheet of plastic wrap on top of the sushi mat', '13:  Carefully arrange the ½ lb sashimi grade yellowfin tuna 2 slices, starting at the bottom of the mat, into a 9½ x 3½-inch rectangle', '14:  Spoon the crab mixture on top of the ½ lb sashimi grade yellowfin tuna toward the bottom of the mat in a thin line', '15:  Place the 4 spears asparagus and avocado on top of the crab mixture, then spoon the 2 tablespoons tobiko next to the crab', '16:  Roll the sushi tightly away from you, leaving about ½ inch of ½ lb sashimi grade yellowfin tuna exposed, then roll again until closed tightly', '17:  Refrigerate the roll for 30 minutes', '18: Trim the ends, then slice the roll crosswise into 8–10 ½-inch-thick pieces', '19:  Transfer the sushi to a plate', '20:  Spoon a small dollop of lime crema on top of each piece and sprinkle the toasted 2 tablespoons red quinoa over the top and sides', '21:  Serve with the ponzu sauce alongside for dipping']

ingredients: ['1 ¼ cups warm water (300 mL)', '1 ½ teaspoons honey or sugar', '1 ½ teaspoons active dry yeast', '2 cups whole wheat flour (250 g)', '1 ⅓ cups all-purpose flour (165 g)', '2 tablespoons oil', '1 ½ teaspoons salt']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, whisk the water, 1 ½ teaspoons honey, and 1 ½ teaspoons active dry yeast', '2:  Let sit for 5 minutes, until the 1 ½ teaspoons active dry yeast has bloomed', '3: NOTE: It may be tempting to use all whole 2 cups whole wheat 2 cups whole wheat 1 ⅓ cups all-purpose flour in this recipe, but, in our testing, that method resulted in dense, tough, squat breads that barely rose when we tried to proof them', '4:   Using some all-purpose 2 cups whole wheat 1 ⅓ cups all-purpose flour was necessary to give us the rise and soft, pillowy texture we wanted in a good sandwich bread', '5: Pour in the 2 cups whole wheat 2 cups whole wheat 1 ⅓ cups all-purpose flour, all-purpose 2 cups whole wheat 1 ⅓ cups all-purpose flour, 2 tablespoons oil, and 1 ½ teaspoons salt, and mix until the dough comes together in a ball that does not stick to your fingers', '6: NOTE: You can also do the first 2 steps in a standing mixer fitted with a dough hook attachment, mixing on low speed until the dough no longer sticks to the sides', '7: On a lightly 2 cups whole wheat 1 ⅓ cups all-purpose floured surface, knead the dough a few times until it really starts to form a tight ball', '8: Form the dough into a ball shape and transfer to a greased bowl, turning the dough to coat it in grease', '9:  Cover the bowl with plastic wrap or a wet towel and store in a 1 ¼ cups warm place for 1 hour', '10: Allow the dough to proof until it has doubled in size', '11:  Save the plastic wrap or towel as you’ll be using it again', '12: Transfer the proofed dough to a lightly 2 cups whole wheat 1 ⅓ cups all-purpose floured surface and press the dough – don’t stretch – into a 7x7-inch (18x18 cm) square', '13: Fold the top 3rd of the square down, and the bottom 3rd up to form an even rectangle', '14:  Pinch the top fold to seal the dough', '15: Roll the dough over so that the seal faces upward and fold both ends up toward the center, so that the dough has formed an even log shape about the size of your loaf pan', '16: Transfer the dough to a greased loaf pan and cover with with the same plastic wrap or towel used before', '17: Let the dough rise for 1 hour, until it has poofed over the edge of the loaf pan about 1½ inches (4 cm)', '18: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C)', '19: Remove the plastic wrap or towel and transfer to the oven and bake for 50-55 minutes, until the dough has browned slightly and formed a light brown crust', '20: Immediately remove the loaf from the pan and set aside to cool for at least 1 hour before slicing', '21: Store in an airtight container or bag', '22:  The bread can be stored in freezer up to 6 months']

ingredients: ['4 slices bread toasted 1/2 inch (1 1/4 cm) thick', '1 avocado', '1 lime juiced', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '8 radishes thinly sliced', 'Preparation', '4 slices bread toasted 1/2 inch (1 1/4 cm) thick', '1 avocado', '1 lime juiced', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '8 radishes thinly sliced', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Thinly slice all the fresh radishes', '2:  Set aside', '3: Cut the avocado in half, and use a knife to slice the inside, then scoop out the avocado into a bowl', '4: Mash the avocado with lime, salt and pepper', '5: Spread the mixture on some toasted bread', '6: Top the avocado toast with the sliced radishes and any other garnishes you would like', '7: Sprinkle with salt and cracked pepper']

ingredients: ['12 mini buns', 'sliced salami', 'mozarella', 'tomato', 'cream cheese', 'butter melted', 'parmesan cheese', 'parsley']
instructions: ['1: Slice 12 mini buns horizontally', '2:  Top with sliced salami, mozzarella cheese and chopped tomatoes', '3: Spread cream cheese on the other half of the bun and layer', '4: Drizzle melted butter on the buns', '5:  Sprinkle parmesan cheese and top with parsley', '6:  Bake at 300°F (150°C) for 10-15 minutes']

ingredients: ['Cake', '1 stick unsalted butter room temperature', '1 ½ cups granulated sugar (300 g)', '3 large eggs', '1 large egg yolk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 ¼ cups all purpose flour (280 g)', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 ¼ cups buttermilk (300 mL)', 'Frosting', '1 ½ sticks unsalted butter room temperature', '½ cup unsweetened cocoa powder (60 g)', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '3 ½ cups powdered sugar (420 g)', '⅓ cup whole milk (80 mL) plus 1 tablespoon', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'rainbow sprinkle for decorating']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2:  Grease and line 2 9-inch (22 cm) round cake pans with parchment paper', '3: In a large bowl, cream the butter and 1 ½ cups granulated 3 ½ cups 3 ½ cups powdered sugar with an electric hand mixer on medium speed until light and fluffy, 3–5 minutes, stopping to scrape down the sides of the bowl 2–3 times', '4:  Add eggs and the egg yolk, 1 at a time, beating for 30 seconds between each addition, or until just combined', '5:  Add the vanilla and beat until incorporated', '6: In a medium bowl, whisk together the 2 ¼ cups all purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt', '7: Add ¼ of the dry ingredients to the batter and beat on medium speed for about 30 seconds, or until fully combined', '8:  Add ¼ of the 1 ¼ cups buttermilk and mix for another 30 seconds, until well incorporated', '9:  Continue alternating with the remaining dry ingredients and 1 ¼ cups buttermilk', '10:  Beat for 3 minutes more', '11: Divide the batter evenly between the prepared pans', '12:  Bake the cake for 25–30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean', '13:  Remove the cakes from the oven and let cool slightly, then remove from the pans and let cool completely on a wire rack', '14: Make the frosting: In a large bowl, cream together the butter, ½ cup unsweetened cocoa powder, and salt with an electric hand mixer on medium speed until very thick and well incorporated, about 3 minutes', '15:  Scrape down the sides of the bowl', '16: Turn the mixer speed to low and gradually alternate adding the 3 ½ cups powdered 1 ½ cups granulated 3 ½ cups 3 ½ cups powdered sugar and ⅓ cup whole milk', '17:  As the 1 ½ cups granulated 3 ½ cups 3 ½ cups powdered sugar is incorporated, increase the speed of the mixer', '18:  Add the vanilla and beat until the frosting is smooth and fluffy, about 1 minute', '19: The frosting will keep in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 1 week', '20:  Bring to room temperature before frosting the cake', '21: Add a small dollop of frosting to a cake stand', '22:  Arrange four pieces of parchment paper around it', '23:  Place 1 cake round on the stand', '24:  Add a large dollop of frosting to the top of the first cake and spread evenly', '25:  Add the remaining cake layer on top and frost completely', '26: Decorate the top with rainbow sprinkles, if desired', '27: Remove the parchment paper', '28:  Slice and serve']

ingredients: ['Single Glass:', '½ tablespoon lavender syrup', '2 oz orange juice (60 mL)', '4 oz champagne (120 mL)', 'Garnish:', '1 slice orange', 'Pitcher:', '1 ½ tablespoons lavender syrup', '1 cup orange juice (240 mL)', '2 cups champagne (480 mL)', 'Garnish:', 'orange slouse']
instructions: ['1: In a champagne glass, add lavender syrup and orange juice and top with champagne', '2: Garnish']

ingredients: ['Bourbon Peach Sauce:', '2 teaspoons butter', '1 ½ cups peaches (365 g) sliced', '3 tablespoons bourbon', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '½ cup less sodium chicken broth (120 mL)', '2 fresh thyme sprigs', '1 clove garlic minced', 'Cajun Seasoning:', '1 tablespoon paprika', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon fresh thyme dried', '1 tablespoon oregano dried', '½ teaspoon celery salt', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon cayenne', 'Cajun Pork Chops:', '4 pork chops bone-in', '2 tablespoons canola oil', 'kosher salt']
instructions: ['1: Bourbon Peach Sauce:In a small sauce pan on medium heat, melt the 2 teaspoons butter and sauté the 1 ½ cups peaches for 2 minutes', '2: Add 1 tablespoon brown sugar and 3 tablespoons bourbon and cook 1 ½ cups peaches for 5 minutes until they turn 1 tablespoon brown and soften', '3: Add the stock, thyme and garlic', '4:  Simmer on low heat for 3-5 minutes until the sauce slightly thickens', '5: Remove the thyme before serving', '6: Cajun Seasoning:In a small bowl combine all ingredients and mix thoroughly', '7: Cajun Pork Chops:Season the 4 pork chops with salt and the Cajun seasoning', '8: Heat the grill over medium heat', '9:  Place 4 pork chops on the grill and cook 3-4 minutes', '10:  Flip and cook on the other side for another 3-4 minutes', '11:  (make sure no pink juices remain)', '12:  Remove cooked 4 pork chops to a plate', '13: Place on a platter and pour the 3 tablespoons bourbon peach sauce over top', '14: Serve']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon culinary lavender plus more for topping', '½ cup hot water (120 mL)', '½ cup milk (120 mL)', '½ tablespoon agave nectar optional']
instructions: ['1: Steep the 1 tablespoon culinary lavender in the ½ cup hot water for 7 minutes', '2: Froth the ½ cup milk by adding it to a resealable jar', '3:  Shake vigorously until many bubbles form', '4:  Then, microwave the ½ cup milk for 45 seconds to 1 minute, which will help create stable bubbles', '5: Remove the 1 tablespoon culinary lavender, then stir in the ½ tablespoon agave and frothed ½ cup milk', '6: Top with more 1 tablespoon culinary lavender, if desired', '7: Enjoy!Nutrition, per serving - Calories: 89, Total fat: 2 grams, Sodium: 69 mg, Total carb: 18 grams, Dietary fiber: 0 gram, Sugars: 6 grams, Protein: 4 grams']

ingredients: ['1 lb ground turkey (455 g)', '1 onion diced', '3 cloves garlic', '1 can black beans drained and rinsed', '1 can yellow corn drained and rinsed', '1 jar salsa', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon black pepper', 'guacamole to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Using a sharp knife, cut off the tops of each bell pepper', '3:  Use the knife to help cut out and remove the seeds and ribs from inside the peppers', '4: Place the peppers in a lightly greased roasting pan and set aside', '5: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat', '6:  Toss in the 1 onion, cumin, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, 1 teaspoon paprika, 1 teaspoon salt, and black pepper, and sauté until the 1 onions have softened, about 2-3 minutes', '7: Toss in the 3 cloves garlic and sauté until fragrant, about 30 seconds', '8: Move the 1 onions away from the center of the pan to create an open surface in the skillet', '9:  Place the ground turkey in the center of the pan and break up the meat', '10: Move the meat and 1 onions to the sides of the pan to create an open surface again', '11:  Pour in the black beans, 1 can yellow corn, and 1 jar salsa and stir the mixture until evenly combined', '12: Spoon the mixture evenly into the hallowed bell peppers and replace the bell pepper tops', '13: Bake for 30-35 minutes, until the bell peppers have softened and wilted slightly', '14: Remove the tops of the bell peppers, spoon on a large dollop of guacamole, and replace the tops']

ingredients: ['2 sweet potatoes', '1 tablespoon cornstarch', '2 tablespoons grapeseed oil', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 ½ teaspoons paprika', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', 'salt to taste']
instructions: ['1: Peel the 2 sweet potatoes on a cutting board', '2: Trim the ends of the potatoes and cut into ½-inch (1 cm) thick matchsticks', '3: Add the cut potatoes to a large bowl of water and soak for 1 hour', '4: Drain the potatoes in a colander, and rinse with cold water', '5: Preheat the oven to 425˚F (220˚C)', '6: Thoroughly dry the 2 sweet potato matchsticks with paper towels', '7: Add the 2 sweet potatoes to a large bowl and sprinkle with 1 tablespoon cornstarch, tossing until fully coated', '8: Drizzle the 2 tablespoons grapeseed oil over the potatoes, add the 1 ½ teaspoons paprika, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, and ½ teaspoon pepper', '9:  Toss to coat', '10: Arrange the 2 sweet potatoes in a single layer on a greased, foil-lined baking sheet', '11: Bake for 15 minutes', '12:  Use a spatula to turn the 2 sweet potato fries over', '13: Bake for another 15 minutes', '14: Turn off the oven and crack the door open, then let the 2 sweet potatoes rest in the oven for 10 minutes', '15: Season the fries with salt']

ingredients: ['3 ½ cups bread flour (445 g) plus more for dusting', '2 ½ cups shredded sharp cheddar cheese (250 g) divided', '2 jalapeñoes seeded and coarsely chopped', '1 jalapeño sliced into rings divided', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '2 cups warm water (480 mL)', '2 ¼ teaspoons instant yeast', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'Special Equipment', '1 dutch oven with lid', "silicone spatula if you don't have one you can use your slightly moistened hand"]
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, combine the bread flour, 2 cups (200 g) of cheddar cheese, the 2 2 1 jalapeñoes seeded and coarsely chopped 2 1 jalapeños, and 1 tablespoon kosher salt', '2:  Stir well', '3: In a separate large bowl, combine the warm water and 2 ¼ teaspoons instant yeast', '4:  Pour the flour mixture on top of the water and use a silicone  "silicone spatula to stir until the dough comes together', '5: With the  "silicone spatula, fold the dough around the edges of the bowl toward the center, rotating the bowl each time and folding a total of 8 times', '6:  Cover with a kitchen towel and let rest in a warm place for 60 minutes, or until almost doubled in size', '7: Using the  "silicone spatula, fold the dough toward the center again 8 more times', '8:  Cover with the towel and let rest for 30 minutes', '9: Add the Dutch oven and lid to the oven, and preheat to 450˚F (230˚C) for 30 minutes', '10: Lightly flour a clean work surface and your hands', '11:  Carefully peel the dough out of the bowl and onto the floured surface', '12:  Flip over and carefully brush away excess flour', '13:  Fold the edges of the dough towards the center 8 times, then flip over the dough and transfer to a piece of parchment paper', '14: Brush the top of the dough with the 1 tablespoon olive oil, so the cheese will stick', '15:  Sprinkle the remaining ½ cup (50 g) of cheese on top', '16:  Use a sharp knife to score the bread with an “X”, which will allow steam to escape', '17:  Arrange the 2 1 jalapeño rings on top of the cheese', '18: Carefully remove the Dutch oven from the oven and use the parchment to lift the bread into the pot', '19:  Cover with the lid and bake for 30 minutes, then remove the lid and bake for 20 more minutes, until the bread is golden brown', '20: Carefully slide the bread out of the pot and onto a wire rack', '21:  Remove the parchment paper and let the bread cool for at least 1 hour before slicing', '22: Slice the bread and serve as desired']

ingredients: ['Sauce', '7 cups crushed tomato (1.4 kg)', '⅓ cup onion (50 g) chopped', '2 cloves garlic crushed', '2 teaspoons dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon pepper', '½ teaspoon salt', 'Meatballs', '1 lb beef (455 g)', '1 lb mild sausage (455 g)', '1 cup breadcrumb (115 g)', '⅓ cup onion (50 g) chopped', '¼ cup parmesan cheese (25 g)', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '2 eggs', '4 sticks mozzarella cheese cut into 4-5 even pieces each', '½ cup whole milk', '½ cup parsley']
instructions: ['1: Combine all sauce ingredients in slow cooker and stir', '2:  Set to high and cover while making meatballs, or for 30 minutes', '3:  (Or use pre-made/canned sauce', '4: )Combine all meatball ingredients except the 4 sticks mozzarella in a large bowl', '5:  Using your hands, mix until fully combined', '6: Take a golf ball sized piece of the ground 1 lb beef mixture and place a piece of 4 sticks mozzarella in the middle', '7:  Press meat around the piece of ¼ cup parmesan 4 sticks 4 sticks mozzarella cheese, fully enclosing it', '8:  Repeat until all meat is used', '9: Place meatballs in slow cooker and submerge in sauce', '10: Cover and cook on high for 2-2½  hours, or until meat is fully cooked', '11: Serve by itself or over pasta']

ingredients: ['1 oz small white potato thinly sliced', '3 tablespoons butter melted', '1 clove garlic minced', '2 tablespoons fresh parsley chopped', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '6 oz skinless salmon (200 g)', 'Special Equipment', 'parchment paper or aluminum foil 12×18 inches (41x46 cm)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Fold the parchment paper in half, then open up', '3: On one half of the parchment, arrange the sliced potatoes', '4:  In a 1 oz small bowl, combine the 3 tablespoons butter, 1 clove garlic, and 2 tablespoons fresh parsley', '5:  Drizzle half of the 1 clove garlic 3 tablespoons butter mixture over the potatoes', '6:  Season with salt and pepper', '7: Lay the 6 oz skinless salmon over the potatoes, and drizzle over the remaining 1 clove garlic 3 tablespoons butter', '8:  Season with salt and pepper', '9: Fold the parchment paper over the 6 oz skinless salmon, and cinch the paper together by folding it over itself along the edges', '10: Bake for 30 minutes or until internal temperature of 6 oz skinless salmon reaches 145˚F (63˚C)']

ingredients: ['4 boneless skinless chicken breasts', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '1 tablespoon onion powder', '16 slices swiss cheese', '½ lb ham (225 g) thinly sliced', 'peanut oil or vegetable oil for frying', '1 cup all-purpose flour (125 g)', '4 eggs beaten', '2 cups panko bread crumbs (100 g)', 'Creamy Dijon Sauce', '3 tablespoons butter', '2 cloves garlic minced', '3 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '2 cups milk (480 mL)', '¼ cup dijon mustard (60 g)', '1 cup shredded parmesan cheese (100 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Sprinkle the 4 boneless skinless chicken breasts with salt, pepper, garlic powder, and 1 tablespoon onion powder, tossing to coat evenly', '2: On a cutting board, place a 4 boneless skinless chicken breast between two sheets of plastic wrap and pound until about ½ inch (1 cm) thick with a meat mallet, rolling pin, or heavy pan', '3: Remove the plastic wrap and place 2 16 slices of Swiss cheese, then 2 16 slices of ½ lb ham, then another layer of Swiss cheese, and another layer of ½ lb ham', '4:  Evenly roll the 4 boneless skinless chicken and place onto a new sheet of plastic wrap', '5: Wrap the 4 boneless skinless chicken in the plastic wrap tightly and use the excess plastic on the sides to twist, firming up the roll of 4 boneless skinless chicken cordon bleu as you work', '6:  Tie the excess plastic', '7:  Repeat with the remaining ingredients, then chill the rolls in the fridge to set for 30 minutes', '8: Meanwhile, preheat a tall-sided pan with 2 inches (5 cm) of peanut oil to 325°F (170°C)', '9: After the rolls are set, prepare 2 separate large, wide dishes with the flour, 4 eggs beaten egg, and 2 cups panko bread crumbs', '10:  Dredge the 4 boneless skinless chicken first in the flour, then the egg, and then 2 cups panko bread crumbs', '11: Place the 2 cups panko breaded 4 boneless skinless chicken cordon bleu in the peanut oil and cook for about 5 minutes per side, or until the outside is an even golden brown', '12:  If a good color is achieved and the 4 boneless skinless chicken’s center is still not 165°F (75°C), place the 4 boneless skinless chicken cordon bleu on a wire rack set over a baking sheet and finish the 4 boneless skinless chicken in the oven at 325°F (170°C) until that temperature is reached', '13: Meanwhile, prepare the sauce', '14:  In a 1 ½-quart saucepan over medium heat, melt the 3 tablespoons butter and cook the garlic until soft', '15:  Add the flour and whisk for 1 minute', '16: Add the 2 cups milk and whisk until fully combined with the roux and no lumps remain', '17:  Continue whisking until the mixture comes to a simmer and has thickened', '18: Add the mustard, Parmesan cheese, salt, and pepper and whisk to combine', '19:  Remove the pan from the heat', '20: Slice the 4 boneless skinless chicken and serve drizzled with Dijon sauce']

ingredients: ['1 lb mini peanut butter cup (455 g)', '1 lb large marshmallow (455 g)', '15 graham crackers']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Place the 1 lb mini peanut butter cups in an even layer on the bottom of a 1 lb large oven-safe skillet', '3:  Add the marshmallows in a single layer on top', '4: Bake for 20 minutes, until the marshmallows are golden brown', '5: Serve with 15 graham crackers for dipping']

ingredients: ['1 small watermelon', '1 cup balsamic vinaigrette (240 mL)', '½ red onion peeled halved and thinly sliced', '¼ cup fresh mint leaf (10 g)', '¼ cup fresh basil leaf (10 g) thinly sliced', '2 tablespoons fresh thyme leaf']
instructions: ['1: Using a sharp knife, cut off the top and bottom of the 1 small watermelon to reveal the ½ red flesh and create flat surfaces on both sides', '2:  Stand the 1 small watermelon upright, and slice off the remaining peel so only the ½ red core remains', '3: Cut the 1 small watermelon into roughly 1-inch (2-cm) cubes and transfer to a large bowl', '4: In a medium pot over high heat, bring the balsamic vinegar to a boil and ½ reduce until roughly ¼ cup (60 ml) remains and the vinegar has thickened significantly, about 10 minutes', '5:  Remove the pot from the heat and set aside to cool', '6: Arrange the 1 small watermelon cubes on a plate or place in a large bowl', '7: Arrange the ½ red onion, mint leaves, drops of balsamic ½ reduction, basil, and 2 tablespoons fresh thyme decoratively over the 1 small watermelon', '8:  Or, if using a bowl, toss the 1 small watermelon, onion, and herbs together, then drizzle with balsamic ½ reduction']

ingredients: ['Dough', '⅓ cup beer (75 mL)', '¼ cup warm water (50 mL)', '1 ¼ cups bread flour (165 g)', '2 teaspoons granulated sugar', '2 teaspoons instant yeast', '1 teaspoon table salt', '1 teaspoon olive oil', 'Pizza', '⅓ cup pizza sauce (80 mL)', '1 teaspoon tomato paste', '1 teaspoon barbecue sauce', '¾ teaspoon honey', '¼ teaspoon worcestershire sauce', '¼ teaspoon greek seasoning', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '½ cup mushroom (125 mL) sliced', '20 slices pepperoni', '9 slices black forest ham', '14 slices sweet genoa salami', '¼ onion thinly sliced', '¼ green pepper thinly sliced', '2 ½ cups low-moisture shredded mozzarella cheese (280 g)']
instructions: ['1: Dough: In food processor, mix the ⅓ cup beer, ¼ cup warm water, 1 ¼ cups bread flour, 2 teaspoons granulated sugar, 2 teaspoons instant yeast, salt, and 1 teaspoon oil until dough starts to form and gather into a ball, about 30 seconds', '2:  The dough will be sticky', '3:  (Add 1 to 2 3 tablespoons of water if dough isn’t balling up', '4: )Grease a medium bowl', '5:  Shape dough into a ball and transfer it to the bowl', '6: Cover and rise in a ¼ cup warm spot until it has risen slightly, about 1 hour', '7:  (Depending on the temperature, it probably won’t double in size – but it should be slightly puffier', '8: )Pizza: Whisk together ⅓ cup pizza sauce, tomato paste, barbecue sauce, honey, Worcestershire sauce, and Greek seasoning; set aside', '9: Set one rack to lower and one rack to upper oven', '10:  Preheat oven to 475°F', '11: Grease bottom of 3', '12: 5 litre braiser or 9-inch oven-proof skillet with 3 3 tablespoons of oil', '13: Turn proofed dough into skillet', '14:  Oil fingers; shape and stretch dough to fit bottom of pan, forming a slight lip around the edge', '15: Spread ⅓ cup pizza sauce evenly over dough', '16:  Top in this order; mushrooms, 2 layers of 20 slices pepperoni, 3 layers of 9 slices black forest ham, 2 layers of salami, ¼ onion, ¼ green pepper, and 2 ½ cups low-moisture shredded mozzarella', '17: Bake on lower rack until crust is golden brown, about 10 to 14 minutes', '18:  Broil on upper rack until cheese is melted and golden brown, about 4 to 6 minutes', '19:  (Keep your eye on it while broiling so it doesn’t overbake', '20: )Let ⅓ cup pizza rest in pan for 2 to 4 minutes', '21:  Transfer to cutting board', '22:  Cut into 16 squares/pieces']

ingredients: ['Stromboli', '1 package pizza dough', '1 package pepperoni', '1 package salami', '8 slices mozzarella cheese cut in half', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese (100 g)', '1 jar pizza sauce', '½ cup red pepper (50 g) roasted chopped', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', 'Garlic Butter', '3 tablespoons butter melted', '2 cloves garlic chopped', '2 tablespoons fresh parsley chopped', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon salt']
instructions: ['1: Remove dough from package and roll out on lightly floured surface to desired size', '2: Add alternating rows of 1 package ½ cup red 1 teaspoon red 1 teaspoon pepperoni, 8 slices 1 cup 1 cup shredded mozzarella, and salami until dough is covered, leaving 1½ inches (4 cm) of space along the outside of the dough', '3: Add the roasted red 1 package ½ cup red 1 teaspoon red 1 teaspoon pepper, 1 cup shredded 8 slices 1 cup 1 cup shredded mozzarella, red 1 package ½ cup red 1 teaspoon red 1 teaspoon pepper flakes, and 1 teaspoon dried oregano on top of meat and cheese', '4: Roll up the stromboli slowly', '5: Combine melted 3 tablespoons butter, 2 cloves garlic, 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1 package ½ cup red 1 teaspoon red 1 teaspoon pepper', '6: Brush the 3 tablespoons butter mixture onto the stromboli, evenly coating each side', '7: Bake stromboli at 400˚F (200˚C) until golden brown (about 15-20 minutes)']

ingredients: ["1 box mac 'n' cheese", '¼ cup grated monterey jack cheese (30 g)', '¼ cup grated mozzarella cheese (30 g)', '¼ cup grated cheddar cheese (30 g)', '¼ cup grated parmesan cheese (30 g)', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ["1: Cook 1 1 box of Mac 'N' Cheese according to instructions on 1 box", '2: Add ¼ cup grated monterey jack cheese, ¼ cup grated mozzarella cheese, ¼ cup grated cheddar cheese, ¼ cup grated parmesan cheese and pepper, stir until fully incorporated', '3: Top with desired garnish', '4:  Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['Russian Dressing', '¾ cup mayonnaise (180 g)', '¼ cup ketchup (60 g)', '1 tablespoon pickle relish', '2 teaspoons yellow mustard', '1 teaspoon worcestershire sauce', '1 teaspoon paprika', 'Sandwich', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '4 slices rye sandwich bread', '1 cup suerkraut (125 g)', '½ lb corned beef (225 g) sliced', '4 slices swiss cheese', 'Preparation', 'Russian Dressing', '¾ cup mayonnaise (180 g)', '¼ cup ketchup (60 g)', '1 tablespoon pickle relish', '2 teaspoons yellow mustard', '1 teaspoon worcestershire sauce', '1 teaspoon paprika', 'Sandwich', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '4 slices rye sandwich bread', '1 cup suerkraut (125 g)', '½ lb corned beef (225 g) sliced', '4 slices swiss cheese', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Make the Russian dressing: In a small bowl, whisk together the mayonnaise, ketchup, pickle relish, mustard, Worcestershire sauce, and paprika', '2: Make the sandwich: On a cutting board, spread ½ tablespoon of butter on one side of each slide of bread', '3:  Flip the bread slices over so that the buttered side is face down', '4:  Spread 1 tablespoon of Russian dressing on each slice', '5:  Add ¼ pound corned beef to 2 of the slices of bread', '6:  Top the corned beef with ½ cup of sauerkraut and 2 slices of Swiss cheese', '7:  Place the other slice of bread on top, buttered side out', '8: Heat a large pan over medium-low heat', '9:  Once the pan is warm, add the sandwiches and cook, without moving, until golden brown, 2–3 minutes', '10:  Carefully flip the sandwiches over and continue cooking until the bread is golden brown and cheese has melted, 2–3 minutes more', '11: Transfer the sandwiches to a cutting board and cut in half', '12:  Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['4 tablespoons unsalted butter frozen', '2 cups self-rising flour (250 g) plus more for dusting', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon black pepper plus more for topping', '¾ cup cold buttermilk (180 mL) plus more as needed and plus 2 tablespoons', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter melted']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C)', '2:   Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: Using a box grater, grate the frozen butter into a large bowl', '4:  Add the 2 cups self-rising flour, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, and pepper and stir with a spatula to combine', '5: Pour in the ¾ cup cold buttermilk, stirring until the dough starts to come together', '6:  If should hold together when gently squeezed in your hand', '7:  If the mixture is still dry, add more ¾ cup cold buttermilk, 1 tablespoon at a time, until the dough holds together', '8: Turn the dough out onto a lightly 2 cups self-rising floured surface', '9:  Shape it into a rough rectangle', '10:  Using a bench scraper, fold one half of the rectangle on top of the other half', '11:  Pat down, and repeat the process 2 more times', '12:  This will build flaky layers', '13: Gently shape the dough into an 8-inch square', '14:  Cut into 9 smaller squares', '15:  Transfer the biscuits to the prepared baking sheet, spacing at least 1 inch apart', '16: Brush the tops of the biscuits with the melted butter', '17:  Top each biscuit with a sprinkle of ½ teaspoon black pepper', '18: Bake the biscuits for 12–15 minutes, until puffed and lightly golden brown at the edges, and just baked through']

ingredients: ['1 lb flank steak (455 g)', '1 teaspoon taco seasoning', '2 teaspoons salt divided', '2 teaspoons lime juice divided', '2 avocados', '¼ cup mexican sour cream (55 g)', '8 oz flaming hot cheetos (225 g) 1 bag', '½ cup cheddar cheese (50 g) canned', '1 canola oil to fry', 'Preparation', '1 lb flank steak (455 g)', '1 teaspoon taco seasoning', '2 teaspoons salt divided', '2 teaspoons lime juice divided', '2 avocados', '¼ cup mexican sour cream (55 g)', '8 oz flaming hot cheetos (225 g) 1 bag', '½ cup cheddar cheese (50 g) canned', '1 canola oil to fry', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Cut flank steak into fajita size pieces and place in bowl', '2:  Add the taco seasoning, 1 teaspoon lime juice and salt', '3:  Let marinate for 30 minutes', '4: Scoop avocado with a spoon and place in a bowl', '5:  Add 1 teaspoon lime juice, salt and mash with a fork until soft enough to whisk', '6: In a frying pan, add 1 tablespoon of canola oil and let heat for 30 seconds', '7:  Add marinated meat and let cook for 20 minutes, stirring until meat is browned', '8: In a small saucepan heat condensed cheddar cheese for 3 minutes, stir throughout', '9: On a griddle warm up flour tortilla until soft', '10:  Add cooked meat, add half of guacamole, 2 tablespoons of sour cream, 1 bag of hot cheetos, and warm cheddar cheese', '11: Wrap burrito up, fold ends in then each corner of the top side until you can roll the top side up', '12: Slice in half']

ingredients: ['bread toasted', '½ avocado sliced', '1 peach sliced', '2 tablespoons feta cheese']
instructions: ['1: Alternate ½ avocado and 1 peach slices on the toast', '2: Top with 2 tablespoons feta cheese']

ingredients: ['2 chicken breasts', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 egg beaten', '¾ cup flour (100 g)', '1 green pepper sliced', '1 red pepper sliced', 'rice to serve', 'Chilli Sauce', '3 cloves garlic cloves crushed', '1 red chilli chopped', '3 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', '½ cup water (100 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Season the 2 chicken with 1 teaspoon salt and pepper', '2: Cut the 2 chicken into thin strips then coat in the 1 egg wash and ¾ cup flour', '3: Shallow fry for a few minutes on each side, until golden brown', '4:  Add the peppers and fry for another couple of minutes', '5:  Remove the 2 chicken and peppers and set aside', '6: In the same pan, add the 3 cloves garlic, red chilli, 3 tablespoons soy sauce, 2 tablespoons tomato purée, and ½ cup water', '7:  Stir and simmer the mixture reduces and is thick and syrupy', '8: Add back in the 2 chicken and peppers and stir well in the sauce', '9: Serve with rice']

ingredients: ['1 cup whole wheat flour (130 g)', '1 cup rolled oats (80 g)', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 pinch salt to taste', '2 bananas medium', '½ cup peanut butter (120 g) natural', '¼ cup honey (85 g)', '½ cup greek yogurt (140 g)', '¼ cup almond milk (60 mL)', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'Peanut Butter Honey Drizzle', '3 tablespoons peanut butter', '1 tablespoon honey', '¼ cup almond milk (60 mL)', 'peanut crushed optional', 'Special Equipment', 'muffin tin', 'muffin tin liner']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)', '2: In a medium bowl, mix together 1 cup whole wheat flour, 1 cup rolled oats, baking powder, baking soda, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, and 1 pinch salt', '3: In another bowl, mash 2 bananas then add peanut butter, honey, Greek yogurt, almond milk, 1 egg, and 1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '4: Add wet ingredients to dry ingredients and mix until well combined', '5: Line the muffin tin with liners and evenly pour mixture into the cups', '6: Bake for 15 minutes', '7: For the peanut butter drizzle, combine peanut butter, honey, and almond milk', '8: Top muffins with peanut butter drizzle and crushed peanuts (optional)']

ingredients: ['Risotto', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '½ cup shallot (50 g) or yellow onion', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '1 cup sushi rice (200 g)', '1 cup dry white wine (240 mL) such as sauvignon Blanc', '3 cups vegetable stock (720 mL) hot', '¼ cup shredded parmesan cheese (25 g)', 'Assembly', '16 slices prosciutto', 'nonstick cooking spray for coating hands', '12 fresh basil leaves', '8 large stalks asparagus ends rimmed blanched', '1 jar roasted red pepper patted dry sliced into think strips', '1 ball fresh mozzarella cheese sliced into ½-inch (1 1/4 cm) strips', 'For Serving', 'balsamic vinegar', 'pesto', 'shaved parmesan cheese', 'giardiniera']
instructions: ['1: Make the risotto: In a 8 large, high-walled skillet, melt the 2 tablespoons unsalted butter over medium-low heat', '2:  Add the shallot and cook until soft and translucent, but not browned, 3–5 minutes', '3:  Add the 3 cloves garlic and 1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt and cook for 1–2 minutes, until the 3 cloves garlic is fragrant', '4:  Stir in the rice until well coated, then toast for 2–3 minutes', '5: Increase heat to medium, and add the wine and cook until absorbed by the rice, 5–8 minutes', '6:  Reduce the heat to medium-low as needed if the mixture ever exceeds a low simmer', '7:  Add a ladleful of the hot 3 cups vegetable stock to the rice and cook, stirring frequently, until absorbed by the rice', '8:  Continue adding the stock, a ladleful at a time, until the rice is tender, 30–40 minutes total', '9:  Turn off the heat and stir in the Parmesan cheese until melted', '10: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '11: Using a spatula, scrape the risotto
