onto the prepared baking sheet and spread in an even layer', '12:  Let cool for 10 minutes, then transfer to the refrigerator to chill completely, about 30 minutes', '13: Once risotto has cooled, assemble the sushi: Wrap a sushi mat with plastic wrap', '14: On the flat side of the mat, lay out 4 16 slices of prosciutto so that they overlap slightly, forming a square', '15:  Scoop about ½ cup of the cooled risotto onto the bottom half of the prosciutto square', '16:  Lightly grease your hands with nonstick spray (so the risotto doesn’t stick) and gently spread the risotto at the bottom of the mat into an even layer, leaving the top 2 inches of prosciutto empty', '17:  At the bottom of the roll, lay out 3 12 fresh basil leaves in a single layer', '18:  Place 2 stalks of asparagus, 3 strips of 1 jar roasted red pepper, and 3 strips of 1 ball fresh mozzarella on top', '19:  Working from the bottom, tightly roll in an upward direction and seal the roll with the overhanging prosciutto', '20:  Set the roll aside on a cutting board and repeat with the remaining ingredients', '21: Once the rolls are assembled, use a very sharp knife to trim the ends, then cut each roll into 8 pieces', '22:  Wipe the knife with the damp cloth as needed to ensure clean 16 slices', '23: Serve the sushi with the balsamic vinegar, pesto, shaved Parmesan, and giardiniera']

ingredients: ['¼ cup vegetable oil (60 mL)', '2 plum tomatoes cored seeded and finely chopped', '2 jalapeñoes finely chopped', '1 white onion finely chopped', 'kosher salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '12 large eggs lightly beaten', '¼ cup fresh cilantro (10 g) plus more for serving', '8 tostadas', '1 ½ cups refried black bean (270 g)', '½ cup shredded pepper jack  cheese (50 g)', 'sour cream for serving', 'guacamole for serving']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the broiler', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: In a large nonstick skillet, heat the ¼ cup vegetable oil over medium-high heat', '4:  Add the 2 plum tomatoes, jalapeños, and 1 white onion, and cook, stirring, until soft and beginning to turn brown, about 8 minutes', '5:  Season with kosher salt and pepper,Add the eggs, reduce the heat to medium, and cook, stirring occasionally, until cooked through, 12–15 minutes', '6:  Remove the pan from the heat and stir in the ¼ cup fresh cilantro', '7: Arrange the 8 tostadas on the prepared baking sheet and broil, flipping halfway through, until lightly golden and fragrant, about 1 minute total', '8: Spread 3 tablespoons of the beans evenly over each tostada', '9:  Divide the scrambled eggs among the 8 tostadas, piling them in the center of the beans, then sprinkle evenly with the pepper Jack cheese', '10:  Broil until the cheese is just melted, 1–2 minutes', '11: Transfer the 8 tostadas to plates and garnish with more ¼ cup fresh cilantro', '12:  Serve hot with sour cream and guacamole on the side']

ingredients: ['Meatballs', '8 oz cremini mushroom (225 g) finely chopped', '15 oz cannellini bean (425 g) 1 can drained and rinsed', '1 small yellow onion finely chopped', '1 ¼ cups panko breadcrumbs (60 g)', '½ cup fresh parsley (20 g) finely chopped', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon dried rosemary', '1 teaspoon vegan worcestershire', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '½ teaspoon liquid smoke', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', 'Gravy', '3 tablespoons canola oil', '3 cups vegetable broth (720 mL)', '14 oz full-fat coconut milk (395 mL) 1 can', '1 tablespoon vegan worcestershire', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '¼ cup all-purpose flour (30 g)', '4 cups bow tie pasta (400 g) or pasta of choice', 'fresh parsley for ganish']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, combine the mushrooms, beans, 1 small yellow onion, bread crumbs, parsley, 3 cloves garlic, 1 teaspoon dried rosemary, Worcestershire sauce, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, ¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg, ½ teaspoon liquid smoke, salt, and pepper', '2:  Mix well with a fork, mashing the beans a bit to form a paste', '3: Heat the 3 tablespoons canola oil in a large pot over medium-high heat', '4: Roll the “meatball” mixture and into golf ball-sized balls', '5:  Place the balls in the pot and cook for 1 minute on each side until browned', '6: Add the 3 cups vegetable broth, 14 oz full-fat coconut milk, Worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper, and ¼ cup all-purpose flour, and gently stir until evenly combined', '7: Bring the ½ teaspoon liquid to a boil, then add the 4 cups bow tie pasta', '8:  Stir constantly until the 4 cups bow tie pasta is cooked and the ½ teaspoon liquid has reduced to a sauce that coats the noodles and meatballs, 7-8 minutes', '9: Garnish with parsley']

ingredients: ['1 yellow bell pepper seeded and sliced', '1 green bell pepper seeded and sliced', '1 red bell pepper seeded and sliced', '2 ½ cups mushroom (185 g) sliced', '1 medium yellow onion diced', '1 tablespoon chili powder', '1 tablespoon paprika', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '1 tablespoon cumin', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '4 cups penne pasta (400 g) uncooked', '1 ½ cups sour cream (345 g)', '3 cups shredded pepper jack  cheese (300 g)', 'fresh parsley chopped. for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: In a nonstick baking dish, add the bell peppers, mushrooms, and 1 medium yellow onion', '3: In a small bowl, combine the 1 tablespoon chili powder, 1 tablespoon paprika, 1 tablespoon garlic powder, 1 tablespoon cumin, 1 teaspoon salt, and pepper', '4: Pour the 3 tablespoons olive oil and half of the spice mix over the vegetables and toss well to coat', '5: Bake the vegetables for about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally, until tender', '6: In a large pot of boiling water, cook the 4 cups penne pasta according to the package instructions, until tender', '7: Drain the 4 cups penne pasta, reserving about 1 cup (240 ml) of cooking water', '8: Return the drained 4 cups penne pasta to the pot and add the roasted vegetables', '9:  Add the rest of the spice mix, the reserved 4 cups penne pasta water, and the 1 ½ cups sour cream and mix to combine', '10: Transfer the 4 cups penne pasta mixture to the baking dish used for roasting the vegetables and spread evenly', '11:  Sprinkle the cheese over the top', '12: Bake for about 15 minutes, until the cheese is golden brown', '13: Let cool for about 5 minutes, then serve', '14:  Garnish with fresh parsley, if desired']

ingredients: ['1 ½ cups milk (360 mL)', '1 cup greek yogurt (285 g)', '1 ½ cups frozen strawberry (225 g)', '1 ½ cups frozen blueberry (150 g)']
instructions: ['1: Combine 1 ½ cups milk, 1 cup greek yogurt, and frozen fruit into a blender and mix until consistency is smooth']

ingredients: ['1 lb ball tip sirloin (455 g)', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon taco seasoning', '1 teaspoon salt', '16 corn tortillas', '1 ½ cups shredded monterey jack cheese (150 g)', '½ cup white onion (75 g) diced', '½ cup fresh cilantro (20 g) chopped', 'Guacamole', '4 avocados', '3 serrano peppers', '1 tablespoon fresh cilantro', '3 cloves garlic', '½ tablespoon salt', '½ cup water (120 mL)', 'Red Sauce', '1 cup dried red chili (150 g)', '4 stewed tomatilloes plus 2 cups (480 ml) stewing liquid', '1 stewed tomato plus ½ cup (120 ml) stewing liquid', '2 cloves garlic', '¼ cup salt (60 g)']
instructions: ['1: To make the guacamole, add the 4 avocados, 3 serrano peppers, cilantro, garlic, salt, and a bit of water to a blender', '2:  Blend until smooth, adding water as needed to thin it down', '3:  Transfer to a bowl and set aside', '4: To make the red sauce, add the dried chilies, stewed tomatillos in 2 1 ½ 4 stewed tomatilloes plus 2 cups (480 ml) of their stewing liquid, stewed tomato in ½ cup (120 ml) of its stewing liquid, garlic, and bit of salt in a blender', '5:  Blend until everything is well incorporated, adding more salt to taste', '6: Mix 1 1 teaspoon of salt into 1 tablespoon of taco seasoning and rub the seasoning onto both sides of the steak', '7: Cut the steak into thin strips, then cut into small pieces', '8: Add 1 tablespoon of 2 tablespoons vegetable oil to a large griddle or cast iron pan over high heat', '9:  Once the 2 tablespoons vegetable oil is hot, add the steak and cook for 6-8 minutes or until the steak has browned on all sides', '10:  Move to the side of the griddle to keep warm', '11: Reduce the heat to medium/medium-high and add a bit more 2 tablespoons vegetable oil to the griddle', '12:  Place the 16 corn tortillas on the griddle and top with a generous amount of cheese', '13:  On half of the 16 corn tortillas, add some of the cooked steak, diced onion, cilantro, red sauce, and guacamole', '14: Place the other tortilla (cheese-side down) on top of the fillings', '15:  Serve']

ingredients: ['10 lb mixed beef leg bones (4.5 kg) shin knuckle and marrow bones', '12 oz ginger (340 g) 2 large hands halved lengthwise', '1 head large garlic halved crosswise', '4 kg medium yellow onion (4 kg) halved lengthwise', '8 sticks cinnamon', '¼ cup whole black peppercorn', '6 pods whole star anise', '1 lb beef brisket (455 g)', 'kosher salt', '¼ cup fish sauce (60 mL) plus more to taste', '1 lb boneless sirloin steak (455 g)', '1 lb flat rice noodle (455 g) cooked according to package instructions', 'For Serving', '2 cups fresh mung bean sprouts (200 g)', '1 small red onion very thinly sliced lengthwise', '1 jalapeño sliced into thin rounds', '1 large bunch fresh thai basil', '1 lime cut into wedges', 'hoisin sauce', 'siracha', 'Preparation', '10 lb mixed beef leg bones (4.5 kg) shin knuckle and marrow bones', '12 oz ginger (340 g) 2 large hands halved lengthwise', '1 head large garlic halved crosswise', '4 kg medium yellow onion (4 kg) halved lengthwise', '8 sticks cinnamon', '¼ cup whole black peppercorn', '6 pods whole star anise', '1 lb beef brisket (455 g)', 'kosher salt', '¼ cup fish sauce (60 mL) plus more to taste', '1 lb boneless sirloin steak (455 g)', '1 lb flat rice noodle (455 g) cooked according to package instructions', 'For Serving', '2 cups fresh mung bean sprouts (200 g)', '1 small red onion very thinly sliced lengthwise', '1 jalapeño sliced into thin rounds', '1 large bunch fresh thai basil', '1 lime cut into wedges', 'hoisin sauce', 'siracha', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Place the beef bones in a large stock pot, then add enough cold water to cover by 2 inches (5 cm)', '2:  Bring the mixture to a boil over high heat and cook for 10 minutes to blanch the bones and remove any impurities', '3: Set a rack in the upper third of the oven and preheat the broiler', '4: Drain the bones in a colander and rinse under cold running water', '5:  Return the blanched bones to the stockpot', '6: Meanwhile, arrange the ginger, garlic, and onions cut-side up on a rimmed baking sheet and broil on high until the aromatics are deeply charred in spots, 5 minutes', '7:  Remove from the oven and add to the stockpot with the bones', '8: Meanwhile, combine the cinnamon sticks, peppercorns, and star anise in a medium skillet over medium-high heat and toast, shaking the pan occasionally, until the spices are darkened in spots and extremely fragrant, about 5 minutes', '9:  Add the toasted spices to the stockpot', '10: Season the brisket liberally with salt and add it to the stockpot', '11: Fill the pot with enough cold water to cover everything by 1 inch (2 cm)', '12:  Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce the heat to medium to maintain a gentle simmer, skimming off and discarding any fat that floats to the top as needed, until the brisket is fork-tender, 2-3 hours', '13: Using tongs, transfer the brisket to a plate and let cool completely', '14:  Refrigerate the brisket until ready to serve', '15: Continue to simmer the broth to get as much flavor out of the bones as possible, 3-4 hours more', '16: Using tongs, remove and discard the bones and aromatics', '17:  Slowly strain the broth through a fine mesh strainer set over a large pot', '18:  Skim and discard the fat from the broth, then stir in the fish sauce', '19:  Taste and add more as desired', '20: Thinly slice the brisket', '21:  Very thinly slice the raw sirloin steak against the grain', '22: Divide the noodles among 6-8 large bowls, then top with the brisket and raw steak', '23:  Ladle the hot broth over the noodles and meat and serve immediately with the bean sprouts, onion, jalapeño, Thai basil, lime wedges, hoisin sauce, and Sriracha alongside']

ingredients: ['1 lb boneless skinless chicken breast (455 g) cubed', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 yellow onion diced', '2 poblano peppers chopped', '2 cloves garlic cloves minced', '2 ½ cups low-sodium chicken broth (600 mL)', '1 lime juiced', '14 ½ oz canned cooked black beans (410 g) rinsed and drained', '2 diced tomatoes', '1 ½ cups jasmine rice (300 g) uncooked rinsed', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '3 tablespoons cilantro chopped']
instructions: ['1: In a skillet, heat a small amount of oil on medium–high heat', '2:  Add chicken and season with ½ teaspoon salt and 2 poblano ¼ teaspoon pepper', '3: Cook the chicken thoroughly, about 6-8 minutes', '4:  Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside', '5: Add remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil to the skillet', '6:  Add 1 yellow onion and 2 poblano 2 poblano ¼ teaspoon peppers and sauté for 5-7 minutes', '7: Add 2 cloves garlic and cook for an additional minute', '8: Add the chicken broth, 1 lime juice, black beans, 2 diced tomatoes, 1 ½ cups jasmine rice, ½ teaspoon salt, and 2 poblano ¼ teaspoon pepper and stir to combine', '9: Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 15-20 minutes or until 1 ½ cups jasmine rice is 14 ½ oz canned cooked through', '10: Add chicken back to the pot', '11:  Add 3 tablespoons cilantro and combine', '12: Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['⅔ cup heavy cream (160 mL)', '1 large egg lightly beaten', '1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract', '1 ¾ cups all purpose flour (220 g)', '¼ cup unsweetened dutch process cocoa powder (30 g)', '½ cup granulated sugar (100 g)', '2 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '¼ teaspoon salt', '5 tablespoons unsalted butter cold cut into small pieces', '⅔ cup dark chocolate chip (115 g)', 'Glaze', '¼ cup cocoa powder (30 g)', '½ cup powdered sugar (55 g)', '3 tablespoons milk']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C) and place rack in center of oven', '2: In a small bowl whisk together ⅔ cup heavy cream, egg, and 1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract', '3: In a 1 large bowl, whisk together 1 ¾ cups all purpose flour, cocoa powder, sugar, 2 ½ teaspoons baking powder and ¼ teaspoon salt', '4: Using a pastry blender or two knives, cut the 5 tablespoons unsalted butter into the 1 ¾ cups all purpose flour mixture until it resembles coarse crumbs', '5:  Stir in the ⅔ cup dark chocolate chips', '6:  Add the cream mixture and stir just until the dough comes together (add more cream and/or 1 ¾ cups all purpose flour as necessary)', '7: Transfer the dough to a lightly 1 ¾ cups all purpose floured surface and knead a few times', '8:  Shape the dough into a 7-inch (18 cm) round and cut into eight wedges', '9:  Place them on the 2 ½ teaspoons baking sheet', '10: Bake for about 20 minutes or until they are firm around the edges but a bit soft in the center', '11:  A toothpick inserted into the center of a scone will come out clean', '12:  Cool on a wire rack', '13: Mix the glaze ingredients together in a bowl', '14:  Drizzle on top of the scones (optional)']

ingredients: ['Chicken Wings', '1 ½ lb chicken wings (680 g)', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '¼ teaspoon salt', 'Cajun BBQ Sauce', '¾ cup BBQ sauce (215 g)', '1 tablespoon cajun seasoning or spice mix']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 250˚F (130˚C)', '2: Place 1 ½ lb chicken wings in a large bowl and pat dry', '3: Add the 2 teaspoons baking powder and ¼ teaspoon salt to the 1 ½ lb chicken wings', '4:  Stir to coat', '5: Spray a 2 teaspoons baking rack with nonstick cooking spray and place on top of a foiled sheet pan', '6:  Distribute 1 ½ lb chicken wings evenly on top, making sure none of them touch and they are all face-up', '7: Bake for 35 minutes, then increase the temperature to 425˚F (220˚C) and bake for an additional 45 minutes, or until 1 ½ lb chicken wings are crisp and golden', '8:  (Do not remove the 1 ½ lb chicken wings from the oven when increasing temperature', '9: )For ¾ cup BBQ sauce, combine BBQ ¾ cup BBQ sauce and Cajun seasoning in a hot pan', '10: Bring to a boil and add 1 ½ lb chicken wings', '11:  Stir to coat the 1 ½ lb chicken wings']

ingredients: ['3 chicken breasts', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 cup corn flour (100 g)', '6 cups oil (1.4 L) for frying', '1 onion', '2 bell peppers', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '2 tablespoons sugar', '½ cup chicken stock (100 mL)', '1 ¼ cups pineapple (200 g)', 'Cornflour Paste', '¼ cup water (50 mL)', '¼ cup cornflour (50 mL) as needed', 'Egg Wash', '2 egg yolks', 'milk', 'Preparation', '3 chicken breasts', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 cup corn flour (100 g)', '6 cups oil (1.4 L) for frying', '1 onion', '2 bell peppers', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '2 tablespoons sugar', '½ cup chicken stock (100 mL)', '1 ¼ cups pineapple (200 g)', 'Cornflour Paste', '¼ cup water (50 mL)', '¼ cup cornflour (50 mL) as needed', 'Egg Wash', '2 egg yolks', 'milk', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Season the chicken with salt and pepper', '2: Cut into bite-size chunks', '3: Dunk each chicken piece in the egg yolk, followed by the cornflour', '4:  Set aside', '5: Heat the oil in a deep saucepan until it reaches 190°C (375°F)', '6: Carefully fry the chicken pieces for around 5-6 minutes, until crispy, slightly golden in colour and cooked throughout', '7: Drain onto a plate covered in kitchen roll', '8: In a large saucepan over a medium heat, add 1 tablespoon of oil and fry the onions and peppers for 2-3 minutes', '9: Stir in the soy sauce, red wine vinegar, tomato paste, sugar, and chicken stock', '10:  Cook for a further 2 minutes', '11: Add in cornflour paste', '12: Mix until the sauce has thickened', '13: Stir in the pineapple and chicken until evenly coated with the sauce', '14: Serve with rice']

ingredients: ['1 lb hot italian sausage (455 g)', '1 large onion sliced thin', '5 cloves garlic sliced', '1 fennel bulb sliced thin', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '6 oz tomato paste (170 g)', '14 ½ oz canned chopped tomato (410 g)', '1 lb orecchiette pasta (455 g) cooked', '½ cup shaved paresan cheese (55 g)', '1 cup mozzarella pearl (115 g)']
instructions: ['1: Add the 1 lb hot italian sausage to a 1 large pot on medium high', '2:  Cook until browned', '3:  Remove temporarily from the pot', '4: Add sliced 1 fennel, onion, 5 cloves garlic, 1 tablespoon dried oregano, salt and pepper', '5:  Cook until the onions and 1 fennel are golden and caramelized', '6: Add the 6 oz 14 ½ oz canned 14 ½ oz canned chopped tomato paste, 14 ½ oz canned chopped 6 oz 14 ½ oz canned 14 ½ oz canned chopped tomatoes, and meat', '7:  Stir and cook until the 6 oz 14 ½ oz canned 14 ½ oz canned chopped tomato paste has darkened and is aromatic', '8: Bring to a boil, reduce to simmer, and cook until the sauce thickens slightly', '9: Add the cooked 1 lb orecchiette pasta, the grated parmesan, and the 1 cup mozzarella pearls', '10:  Stir until well combined and heated through', '11: Garnish with 1 fennel fronds, (the green leaves of the 1 fennel bulb)']

ingredients: ['tortilla', 'Scramble', '1 tablespoon oil', '5 cloves garlic minced', '14 oz tofu (395 g) broken up', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '1 teaspoon paprika', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '¼ cup nutritional yeast (35 g)', '¼ cup vegetable stock (60 mL)', 'hot sauce optional', 'Optional fillings', 'onion diced and cooked', 'fresh spinach cooked', 'tomato sliced and cooked', 'black bean optional', 'bell pepper chopped and cooked', 'mushroom chopped and cooked', 'plant based meat alternative cooked', 'pinto bean', 'potato chopped and cooked', 'sweet potato chopped and cooked', '2 cups corn (350 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a medium pan, add 1 tablespoon oil and 5 cloves garlic and cook until 5 cloves garlic is lightly browned', '2:  Add 14 oz tofu by pulling pieces off to produce the full “scramble” effect', '3: Add the 1 teaspoon turmeric, 1 teaspoon paprika, ½ teaspoon red ½ teaspoon red bell pepper flakes, and ¼ cup nutritional yeast and stir to combine', '4: Add the ¼ cup vegetable stock and cook until absorbed in the 14 oz tofu', '5: Drizzle with hot sauce if you desire', '6: Spoon some of the scramble in the center of a tortilla and add any Optional fillings you would like', "7: NOTE: Leave plenty of room on the ends otherwise food will spill out once it's folded up", '8: Fold the left and right sides of the tortilla in toward the center, then roll the bottom (the end nearest you) up towards the top', '9: Dampen a paper towel and wrap it around the burrito, mimicking the fold of the burrito itself', '10:  Do the same with parchment paper', '11: Place your burritos in a plastic bag and freeze until breakfast', '12: NOTE: Save for up to 1 month', '13: When you are ready to eat, take one of the burritos out, remove parchment paper and microwave burrito (still in paper towel) in the microwave for 3 minutes', '14: Allow to cool for 1 minute']

ingredients: ['2 ripe bananas', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '½ cup quick-cook oats (70 g)', '1 teaspoon cinnamon']
instructions: ['1: Mash 2 ripe bananas in a large bowl until smooth', '2:  Mix in 2 eggs and 1 teaspoon vanilla until well combined, then mix in oats and 1 teaspoon cinnamon', '3: Heat a skillet to medium and add in a scoop* of the pancake batter', '4:  Smooth out to form an even layer', '5:  Cook for about 2-3 minutes until you start to see bubbles releasing from the top of the batter', '6:  Flip and cook until the other side is golden brown, about 1-2 minutes', '7: Garnish your pancakes with your favorite toppings! We used banana slices, chopped walnuts & maple syrup', '8: *Note: Use ½ ½ cup (65) for scooping the batter to yield 4 thicker pancakes; Use ⅓ ½ cup (40 g) to yield 6 smaller pancakes']

ingredients: ['4 medium yukon  potatoes', '2 medium eggplants chopped', '2 red bell peppers seeded and chopped', '5 tablespoons olive oil divided', '1 teaspoon salt plus more to taste divided', '¾ teaspoon pepper plus more to taste divided', '1 medium yellow onion diced', '1 tablespoon tomato paste', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon smoked paprika', '15 oz chickpeas (425 g) 1 can drained and rinsed', '3 medium beefsteak tomatoes diced', '1 ½ cups low sodium vegetable broth (360 mL)', 'fresh parsley for serving']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400ºF (200ºC)', '2: With a sharp knife, score a ring around each potato, just deep enough to break the skin', '3:  Place the potatoes in a medium pot of cold water', '4:  Bring to a boil and cook for about 8 minutes, until about halfway cooked', '5: Drain the potatoes, and rinse with cold water', '6:  Peel off the skin', '7: Cut the potatoes into ½-inch (1 cm) pieces and set aside', '8: Divide the eggplant and 2 red bell peppers between 2 baking sheets and spread in an even layer', '9:  Drizzle with 4 5 5 1 tablespoons of olive oil, and season with salt and pepper to taste', '10:  Toss with your hands to coat', '11: Bake for 25 minutes, flipping halfway through', '12: Heat the remaining 5 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large pot over medium heat', '13:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the onion and cook for 3-4 minutes, until semi-translucent', '14: Add the tomato paste and stir until well distributed, then add the 3 cloves garlic, paprika, 1 teaspoon salt, and ¾ teaspoon pepper, and cook for another 2-3 minutes, until fragrant', '15: Add the potatoes, 15 oz chickpeas, and tomatoes, and stir to incorporate', '16: Stir in the vegetable broth and cover', '17:  Reduce the heat to 1 ½ cups low and cook for 20 minutes, until the potatoes are tender', '18: Add the roasted eggplant and 2 red bell pepper, and stir to combine', '19:  Cook for another 5-10 minutes, until the tomatoes have mostly broken down', '20: Ladle into bowls, garnish with fresh parsley, and serve', '21:  Or, transfer the stew to resealable containers and store in the fridge for up to 5 days or freezer for up to 3 months']

ingredients: ['1 can chickpeas drained (liquid reserved) and rinsed', '¼ cup peanut butter (60 g)', '2 tablespoons honey', '2 teaspoons vanilla', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ cup chickpea water (60 mL)', '½ cup oats (50 g)', '½ cup raisin (75 g)', '1 teaspoon cinnamon']
instructions: ['1: Spread drained 1 can 1 can ¼ cup chickpeas onto a towel and pat dry', '2: Remove 1 can ¼ cup chickpea shells', '3: Place 1 can 1 can ¼ cup chickpeas, ¼ cup peanut butter, 2 teaspoons vanilla, 2 tablespoons honey, and ½ teaspoon salt into food processor', '4: Mix halfway then add 1 can ¼ cup chickpea water to help consistency', '5: Add ½ cup oats, raisins, and 1 teaspoon cinnamon to mixed dough']

ingredients: ['¼ cup sugar (50 g)', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 cup rice vinegar (240 mL)', '4 cups short grain rice (920 g) cooked hot', '8 sheets nori divided', '½ lb shrimp (225 g) peeled and deveined', '¾ cup all-purpose flour (95 g)', '¼ cup cornstarch (30 g)', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 egg', '¾ cup ice water (180 mL)', 'canola oil for frying', 'salt to taste', '1 avocado sliced divided', '6 oz imitation crab (170 g) 1 can', '1 english cucumber thinly sliced divided', '½ cup whipped cream cheese (60 g)', '4 oz smoked salmon (115 g) 1 package', 'To Serve', 'teriyaki sauce', 'spicy mayonnaise', 'soy sauce']
instructions: ['1: In a bowl, add the ¼ cup sugar, salt, and vinegar, and stir to combine', '2:  Microwave for 2 minutes, or until the ¼ cup sugar has dissolved', '3: Transfer the rice onto a serving bowl and pour the vinegar mixture over the rice', '4: Using a spatula fold in the vinegar into the rice', '5:  Have another person fan the rice while mixing to get it down to room temperature', '6: Lay 4 8 sheets of nori onto two sheet pans', '7:  Spread half the rice mixture onto the nori on one sheet pan in an even layer', '8:  Repeat with the remaining sheet pan', '9: Refrigerate uncovered for 30 minutes to an hour', '10: In a bowl, whisk the ¾ cup all-purpose flour, ¼ cup cornstarch, 1 teaspoon baking powder, salt, and 1 egg until smooth', '11: Slowly add the ¾ cup ice water in a steady stream whisking until just mixed', '12: Dip the ½ lb shrimp in the batter until fully coated', '13: Heat a large pot of canola oil to 350˚F (180˚C)', '14: Add ½ lb shrimp to the pot and fry until golden brown, about 2 minutes', '15:  Transfer the ½ lb shrimp to a wire rack to drain', '16:  Repeat with remaining ½ lb shrimp', '17: Once cool, season the ½ lb shrimp with salt to taste', '18: Remove the sheet pans with rice from the refrigerator', '19:  Place the first sheet of nori and rice onto a cutting board', '20: Mentally divide the rice sheet into fourths', '21:  On one fourth, place a layer of 1 english cucumber, a layer of 1 avocado, and top with the 6 oz imitation crab', '22: On another fourth, place the sliced 1 avocado and top with the ½ lb shrimp tempura', '23: On another fourth, spread a layer of the ½ cup whipped cream cheese, then top with 4 oz smoked salmon and a layer of 1 avocado', '24: On the last fourth add a layer of 1 english cucumber and 1 avocado', '25: Gently invert the other sheet tray with rice onto the sheet tray with toppings, so that the edges are even', '26: Cut the sushi into 16 even squares', '27: Serve with teriyaki sauce, spicy mayonnaise, and soy sauce']

ingredients: ['1 cup rolled oats (100 g)', 'salt to taste', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract optional', '2 dates pitted optional', '4 cups water (1 L)']
instructions: ['1: Place the 1 cup rolled oats in a blender', '2: Add salt to taste', '3:  For sweetness, add the 1 teaspoon vanilla extract and/or the pitted 2 dates, if you’d like', '4: Add the 4 cups water and blend on high for 1 minute', '5: Double strain the liquid into a medium-sized container using a cheesecloth-lined strainer', '6: Serve immediately or refrigerate in a sealed container for up to 3 days']

ingredients: ['1 russet potato', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt to taste']
instructions: ['1: On a cutting board, slice the 1 russet potato into ⅛-inch (3 mm) slices', '2: Dry the 1 russet potato slices with a paper towel until there is no more moisture', '3: Transfer the sliced 1 russet potatoes to a bowl and coat in 2 tablespoons olive oil', '4: Wipe down a large flat microwavable-safe plate with 2 tablespoons olive oil to prevent the chips from sticking', '5: Place the chips on the plate in an even layer and sprinkle with salt', '6: Microwave the chips on high for 6-7 minutes or until the chips just start to brown', '7:  When the chips develop some color remove them from the microwave and slowly peel from the plate', '8:  If chips are sticking, they can also be flipped halfway through!Repeat this process until all the 1 russet potato slices are cooked']

ingredients: ['5 tablespoons olive oil divided', '1 medium yellow onion thinly sliced', '1 clove garlic minced', '1 green pepper sliced into long strips', '2 teaspoons vegan butter', '10 oz oyster mushroom (285 g)', '¼ teaspoon paprika', '1 ¼ teaspoons onion powder divided', '1 ¼ teaspoons garlic powder divided', '1 teaspoon black pepper divided', '1 teaspoon salt divided', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 tablespoon vegan worcestershire', '1 carrot cooked peeled and cut into large chunks', '1 cup vegetable broth (240 mL) or more depending on consistency wanted', '½ tablespoon lemon juice', '¼ cup nutritional yeast (10 g)', '½ teaspoon tomato paste', '1 large potato cooked peeled and cut into large chunks', '2 large hoagie rolls', 'fresh parsley for garnish optional']
instructions: ['1: In a large pan, heat 2 5 tablespoons of olive oil over 1 medium heat', '2: Add the 1 medium yellow 1 ¼ teaspoons onion and sauté for about 3 minutes until translucent', '3: Add the garlic and cook for about 2 minutes, until fragrant', '4: Add the 1 green pepper', '5:  Stir and sauté for about 5 minutes until tender', '6: Transfer the sautéed 1 cup vegetables to a bowl and set aside', '7: Melt the vegan butter in the pan', '8: Add the 10 oz oyster mushrooms and stir to coat in the butter', '9: Add the paprika, ¼ teaspoon 1 medium yellow 1 ¼ teaspoons onion powder,  ¼ teaspoon garlic powder, ½ teaspoon black pepper, and ½ teaspoon salt', '10:  Stir well', '11:  Sauté for about 7 minutes until the 10 oz oyster mushrooms are dark brown and reduce in size by half', '12: Add the 1 green pepper, 1 medium yellow 1 ¼ teaspoons onion, and garlic mixture back to the pan and stir', '13: Add the 1 tablespoon soy sauce and Worcestershire sauce', '14:  Stir well', '15:  Continue to sauté for about 7 minutes until the liquid has thickened', '16: In the meantime, place the 1 carrot, 1 cup vegetable broth, remaining 3 5 tablespoons of olive oil, the ½ tablespoon lemon juice, ¼ cup nutritional yeast, remaining teaspoon of 1 medium yellow 1 ¼ teaspoons onion powder, remaining teaspoon of garlic powder, the tomato paste, remaining ½ teaspoon of salt, and remaining ½ teaspoon of pepper in a food processor', '17:  Blend until it forms a smooth and homogenous sauce', '18: Add the potato and blend until homogenous', '19: Fill the hoagies with the 10 oz oyster mushroom mixture', '20: Top the 10 oz oyster mushroom mixture with the vegan “cheese”, and fresh parsley', '21:  Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['Dough', '2 cups bread flour (250 g) plus more for dusting', '¼ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 cup water (240 mL) room temperature', 'Filling', '½ lb ground pork (225 g)', '½ cup green onion (50 g) sliced', '1 large egg', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '¼ teaspoon ground five spice', '½ teaspoon ground suchuan pepper', '1 tablespoon fresh ginger minced', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '½ tablespoon sesame oil', '7 oz raw shrimp (195 g) chopped', '¾ cup wood ear mushrooms (55 g) minced', '3 cups napa cabbage (300 g) minced']
instructions: ['1: Make the dough: Combine the 2 cups bread flour and salt in a medium bowl', '2:  Gradually pour in the 1 cup water, stirring with chopsticks to incorporate', '3:  Once the dough comes together in a ball, knead in the bowl for 5-8 minutes, until smooth', '4:  Cover with a damp towel and let rest in the bowl for 30 minutesMake the filling: In a medium bowl, combine the ½ lb ground pork, ½ cup green onion, egg, salt, five ¼ teaspoon ground five spice, Sichuan ½ teaspoon ground suchuan pepper, ginger, soy sauce, and sesame oil', '5:  Using chopsticks, mix until well combined', '6: Add the 7 oz raw shrimp, ¾ cup wood ear mushrooms, and Napa cabbage', '7:  Mix well', '8: On a lightly 2 cups bread floured surface, turn out the dough and knead a few times', '9:  Stretch the dough into a 1-inch (2', '10: 5 cm) thick ring, then cut to make a rope', '11: Divide the dough into 2-ounce (55 G) pieces, turning the rope 90 degrees after each cut to make triangle shapes', '12:  Lightly 2 cups bread flour the dough portions', '13: Working 1 at a time, pat each dough portion into a flat circle, then, using a small rolling pin, roll out into a thin circle', '14: Add 1 tablespoon of the filling to the center of a dumpling wrapper', '15:  Fold the wrapper in half', '16:  Using your fingertips, make pleats to seal the dumpling', '17:  Press the edges firmly to fully seal the dumpling', '18:  Repeat with the remaining wrappers and filling', '19: Bring a 1 large pot of salted 1 cup water to a boil', '20:  Add the dumplings and cook for 10 minutes, or until the filling is cooked throughServe immediately with dipping sauce']

ingredients: ['Garlic and Ginger Shrimp', '1 lb shrimp (455 g) 16/20-count peeled and deveined', '2 teaspoons sesame oil', '1 tablespoon Gourmet Gardens™ Garlic Paste', '1 tablespoon Gourmet Gardens™ Ginger Paste', 'Sweet Ginger Chili Sauce', '5 tablespoons sweet chili sauce', '2 teaspoons soy sauce', '2 teaspoons rice wine vinegar', '1 tablespoon Gourmet Gardens™ Ginger Paste', 'Stir Fry', '2 tablespoons canola oil divided', '1 teaspoon sesame oil divided', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt to taste', '½ yellow onion thinly sliced', '1 head broccoli cut into small florets including leaves', '1 red bell pepper seeded and thinly sliced', '2 scallions cut into 1-inch (2 1/2 cm) pieces', '8 oz mushroom (225 g) such as cremini or shiitake stemmed thinly sliced', '1 medium carrot peeled and thinly sliced', '½ head baby bok choy bottom removed and larger leaves halved lengthwise', 'kosher salt to taste', 'For Serving', '2 tablespoons salted peanut chopped', '2 scallions thinly sliced']
instructions: ['1: In a 1 medium bowl, toss the 1 lb shrimp with 2 teaspoons 1 teaspoon sesame oil and the Gourmet Gardens™ Garlic and Ginger Pastes', '2:  Let marinate for 10 minutes', '3: Make the 5 tablespoons sweet ginger chili sauce: In a small bowl, whisk together the chili sauce, 2 teaspoons soy sauce, 2 teaspoons rice wine vinegar and the  Gourmet Garden™ Ginger Paste', '4:  Set aside', '5: In a wok or large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon 2 tablespoons canola oil and ½ teaspoon 2 teaspoons 1 teaspoon sesame oil over 1 medium-high heat', '6:  Add the 1 lb shrimp to the pan in a single layer and season with salt and the ½ teaspoon 1 red pepper flakes', '7:  Cook the 1 lb shrimp for about 2 minutes per side, until just cooked through', '8:  Transfer to a plate and set aside', '9: Add the remaining tablespoon of 2 tablespoons canola oil and ½ teaspoon 2 teaspoons 1 teaspoon sesame oil to the pan and ½ teaspoon 1 reduce the heat to 1 medium', '10:  Add the ½ yellow onion and sauté for about 3 minutes, until softened', '11:  Add the 1 head broccoli and cook for about 5 minutes, until starting to soften', '12:  Add the bell pepper and scallions and continue to cook until the peppers start to soften, about 3 minutes', '13:  Add the mushrooms and cook until soft, about 3 minutes more', '14:  Add the ½ head baby bok choy and carrots and cook until the ½ head baby bok choy is wilted, 2–3 minutes', '15:  Season with the salt', '16: Return the 1 lb shrimp to the pan and add the 5 tablespoons sweet ginger chili sauce, tossing to combine', '17: Divide the stir fry between 2 bowls and garnish with the peanuts and ½ yellow onion 1 red bell pepper seeded and 8 oz mushroom (225 g) such as cremini or shiitake stemmed 1 1 medium carrot peeled and 2 scallions thinly sliced scallions', '18:  Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['Meat Marinade', '8 oz ribeye steak (225 g) thinly sliced', '2 green onions chopped', '½ red chili thinly sliced', '1 clove garlic thinly sliced', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '2 teaspoons sugar', '1 teaspoon mirin', 'Bibimbap', '1 cup fresh spinach (40 g)', '½ cup sesame oil (120 mL) divided plus 1 tablespoon', '3 tablespoons salt divided', '¼ cup bean sprout (25 g)', '½ yellow squash julienned', '½ zucchini julienned', '¼ cup daikon radish (35 g) julienned', '¼ cup water (60 mL)', '½ carrot julienned', '¼ cup dried shiitake mushroom (20 g)', '½ cup hot water (120 mL)', '2 cloves garlic minced divided', '1 tablespoon gochugaru', '2 teaspoons sesame seeds plus more for garnish', '1 cucumber halved lengthwise seeded and sliced', '4 cups purple rice (920 g) cooked - equal portions of white black and brown rice', '4 fried eggs', '2 green onions cut into 2-inch (5-cm) pieces thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon nori seaweed thinly sliced', '¼ cup kimchi (20 g) thinly sliced for serving', '¼ cup gochujang (20 g) for serving']
instructions: ['1: To marinate the meat, add the 8 oz ribeye to a medium bowl with the green onion, ½ red chili, 1 2 clove 2 cloves garlic, soy sauce, sesame oil, sugar, and mirin', '2:  Mix until the meat is well-coated', '3:  Marinate in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes', '4: Bring a large pot of water to boil over high heat and season generously with salt', '5:  Blanch the spinach for 30 seconds, transfer to an ice bath to shock, and drain', '6:  Transfer to a small bowl and season with 1 2 1 2 teaspoon of sesame oil, a pinch of salt, and pepper', '7: Blanch the bean sprouts for 1-2 minutes, then shock the ice bath', '8:  Strain and pat dry with a paper towel', '9:  Transfer to a small bowl and season with 1 2 1 2 teaspoon sesame oil, a pinch of salt, and pepper', '10: In a medium skillet over medium heat, add 1 tablespoon of sesame oil, the ½ yellow squash, and 1 2 1 2 teaspoon salt', '11:  Sauté for 2-3 minutes, until the squash is softened', '12:  Set the squash aside in a small bowl', '13: In the same skillet over medium heat, add another tablespoon of sesame oil, the ½ zucchini, and 1 2 1 2 teaspoon of salt', '14:  Sauté for 2-3 minutes, until the ½ zucchini is softened', '15:  Set aside in a small bowl', '16: Add another tablespoon of sesame oil, the daikon, and a 2 1 2 teaspoon of salt to the same skillet and for sauté over medium heat for 30 seconds', '17:  Add ¼ cup (60 ml) of water and cook until liquid has evaporated, 4-5 minutes', '18:  Set aside in a small bowl', '19: In the same skillet over medium heat, add another tablespoons of sesame oil, the carrots, and 1 2 1 2 teaspoon of salt and sauté for 2-3 minutes, until softened', '20:  Set aside in a small bowl', '21: In a small bowl, pour the hot water over the dried mushrooms and soak for 5 minutes, or until the mushrooms have softened', '22:  Wring out excess moisture from the mushrooms and thinly slice', '23: In the skillet over medium heat, add 1 tablespoon of sesame oil and sauté 1 minced 1 2 clove of 1 2 clove 2 cloves garlic for 30 seconds, or until fragrant', '24:  Add the mushrooms and sauté for 2-3 minutes more', '25:  Set aside in a small bowl', '26: Add the remaining ¼ cup (60 ml) of sesame oil to a liquid measuring cup or small bowl', '27:  Add 2 2 1 2 teaspoons of salt, the remaining minced 1 2 clove 2 cloves garlic 1 2 clove, the gochugaru, and sesame seeds and whisk to combine', '28: Pour a bit of the seasoned oil over the sautéed beans sprouts, sliced 1 cucumber, and blanched spinach, tossing with your fingers to coat', '29: Heat a large skillet over high heat, then add the 8 oz ribeye and marinade and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, until the beef is browned', '30:  Remove the pan from the heat', '31: Assemble the bibimbap: Place the 4 cups purple rice in the center of a shallow dish', '32:  Add the 1 cucumber, mushrooms, ½ zucchini, carrots, daikon, spinach, bean sprouts, and ½ yellow squash around the sides of the 4 cups purple rice', '33:  Scoop the beef into the center of the 4 cups purple rice and top with the 4 fried egg', '34:  Garnish with thinly sliced green onions and nori and a sprinkle of sesame seeds', '35: Serve the bibimbap with kimchi and gochujang', '36:  To eat, mix everything together']

ingredients: ['Shrimp Marinade', '2 lemons zested and juiced', '½ cup serrano pepper (50 g) chopped', '1 clove garlic', '1 cup fresh parsley (40 g)', '1 ¼ cups olive oil (300 mL)', '1 ¼ cups canola oil (300 mL)', 'salt', '10 large shrimps shells on deveined', 'Herb Paste', '1 clove garlic', '1 shallot', '1 tablespoon ginger', '½ teaspoon turmeric', '1 teaspoon fresh lemongrass', '½ cup fresh cilantro (20 g)', '2 serrano peppers', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', '1 tablespoon sugar', 'Seafood Pot', '1 ½ lb clams (680 g)', '1 lb mussels (455 g)', '1 lb king crab legs (455 g)', '4 ears corn halved', '1 bottle light beer', '3 cups chicken stock (720 mL)', '½ lb ground chorizo (225 g)', '¼ cup lemon juice (60 mL)', '1 cup fresh cilantro leaves (50 g)', 'olive oil', 'salt to taste', 'Preparation', 'Shrimp Marinade', '2 lemons zested and juiced', '½ cup serrano pepper (50 g) chopped', '1 clove garlic', '1 cup fresh parsley (40 g)', '1 ¼ cups olive oil (300 mL)', '1 ¼ cups canola oil (300 mL)', 'salt', '10 large shrimps shells on deveined', 'Herb Paste', '1 clove garlic', '1 shallot', '1 tablespoon ginger', '½ teaspoon turmeric', '1 teaspoon fresh lemongrass', '½ cup fresh cilantro (20 g)', '2 serrano peppers', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', '1 tablespoon sugar', 'Seafood Pot', '1 ½ lb clams (680 g)', '1 lb mussels (455 g)', '1 lb king crab legs (455 g)', '4 ears corn halved', '1 bottle light beer', '3 cups chicken stock (720 mL)', '½ lb ground chorizo (225 g)', '¼ cup lemon juice (60 mL)', '1 cup fresh cilantro leaves (50 g)', 'olive oil', 'salt to taste', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: To make the shrimp marinade, combine all ingredients in a food processor and blend until chopped and well combined', '2: Pour over the shrimp, cover and place in the refrigerator to marinate for 30 minutes', '3: To make herb paste, place all ingredients in a food processor and blend until finely chopped', '4: Clean all the shellfish', '5:  Discard any dead mussels or clams', '6:  Soak the clams in cold water for 30 minutes and then scrub clean, then remove the beard of the mussels and scrub clean', '7:   Rinse the crab legs and break apart at the joint for smaller pieces', '8: In a large pot, heat a drizzle of olive oil and then add chorizo and cook until browned', '9: Add the herb paste and cook for 2 minutes', '10: Add beer to the pan and bring to a simmer', '11:  Cook until the liquid is reduced by half', '12:  Then add chicken stock and bring back to a simmer', '13:  Add lemon juice and season to taste with salt', '14: Add the mussels, clams and crab legs to the broth, and place the corn on top', '15:  Cook until mussels and clams have opened and crab legs are steamed through, about 10 minutes', '16: While the seafood cooks, heat a large pan and fry the shrimp until pink and cooked through', '17: Serve the shellfish and corn in a warmed cast iron pot, with some of the broth, garnished with cilantro sprigs']

ingredients: ['Mushroom Stock', '2 cups dried shiitake mushroom (150 g)', '2 qt filtered water (2 L)', 'Risotto', '1 tablespoon grapeseed oil', '8 oz oyster mushroom (225 g) torn into pieces', '1 sprig fresh thyme', '1 clove garlic skin on smashed', '1 tablespoon butter', 'salt to taste', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 ½ cups shallot (150 g) minced', '¼ cup butter (55 g)', '1 ½ cups sushi rice (300 g)', '1 bay leaf', '1 clove garlic', '⅔ cup dry white wine (155 mL)', '8 cups mushroom stock (2 L)', '1 cup frozen peas (150 g)', 'salt to taste', '¼ cup butter (60 g)', '1 drop white truffle oil', '1 teaspoon rayu oil korean garlic chili oil', '¼ cup pine nuts (35 g)', '⅔ cup grated parmesan cheese (75 g) use vegetarian parmesan to make the dish vegetarian', 'Garnish', 'pine nut', 'wood sorrel', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'olive oil']
instructions: ['1: Blend dried shiitake in blender until it becomes a fine powder', '2: Pour into a pot filled with 2 qt filtered water, bring to a boil, then lower the heat and simmer for 20 minutes', '3:  Keep broth warm while preparing the risotto', '4: Sauté 8 oz oyster mushrooms in grapeseed oil until brown edges have formed', '5: Add 1 sprig fresh thyme, garlic, and 1 tablespoon of butter to help caramelize', '6:  Once they have caramelized, salt, to taste, and reserve', '7: Sweat the shallots in olive oil until tender, about 5 minutes, then add butter and sushi rice', '8:  Toast rice while stirring frequently', '9: Add 1 bay leaf, garlic clove, and pour ⅔ cup dry 1 drop white wine over toasted rice and cook until the wine has been absorbed, then continue stirring', '10: Over medium heat, add 2 cups (470 ml) of warm mushroom stock at a time, stirring occasionally and adding more stock as it gets absorbed by the rice', '11:  The rice should absorb 6-8 cups (1', '12: 4-1', '13: 9 liters) of stock', '14:  Taste the rice throughout to make sure it cooks just until it is tender, or al dente', '15: Add frozen peas and stir', '16:  Salt the risotto, to taste, and remove the garlic clove and 1 bay leaf', '17: Add ¼ cup (60g) butter, truffle oil, 1 teaspoon rayu oil, sautéed mushrooms (optional: save some for garnish), ¼ cup pine nuts, and Parmesan', '18:  Stir until well incorporated', '19: Garnish with reserved mushrooms, ¼ cup pine nuts, wood sorrel, Parmesan, and drizzle with olive oil']

ingredients: ['3 lb pumpkin (1.5 kg)', '2 tablespoons olive oil divided', '1 pinch salt', '½ cup white onion (75 g) chopped', '1 clove garlic minced', '½ lb lean ground beef (225 g)', '1 cup kidney bean (170 g)', '½ cup canned diced tomato (100 g)', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 teaspoons chilli powder', '½ teaspoon paprika', '½ teaspoon cinnamon', '½ teaspoon cumin', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '8 oz cream cheese (225 g)', '2 cups shredded monterey jack cheese (200 g) divided', 'fresh chive chopped for garnish', 'chip for serving', 'vegetable crudité for serving']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: Cut off the top third of 3 lb pumpkin', '4:  Remove the 3 lb pumpkin seeds and pulp (reserve the seeds for another use)', '5: Drizzle the inside of the 3 lb pumpkin with 1 tablespoon of 2 tablespoons olive and sprinkle with a 1 pinch of 1 pinch 1 teaspoon salt', '6: Place the 3 lb pumpkin on the baking sheet and bake for 20 minutes until slightly softened', '7: While the 3 lb pumpkin is baking, make the chili: Heat the remaining tablespoon of 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet with a lid over medium heat, until shimmering', '8:  Add the onion and 1 clove garlic, and sauté for 2 minutes, until translucent', '9: Add the ground beef and cook until browned, 7-10 minutes', '10: Add the kidney beans, ½ cup canned diced 2 tablespoons tomatoes, ½ cup canned diced 2 tablespoons tomato paste, 1 pinch 1 teaspoon salt, pepper, chili 2 teaspoons chilli powder, ½ teaspoon paprika, ½ teaspoon cinnamon, ½ teaspoon cumin, and water, and stir to combine', '11:  Cook for 5 minutes', '12: Reduce the heat to low, add the 8 oz cream cheese and 1 cup of Monterey Jack, and stir until incorporated', '13:  Remove from the heat', '14: Once the 3 lb pumpkin is done baking, remove from the oven and turn the oven to broil', '15: Carefully pour the chili cheese dip into the 3 lb pumpkin', '16:  Sprinkle the remaining cup of Monterey Jack cheese on top, all the way to the edge of the 3 lb pumpkin', '17: Return to the oven and broil for 2-4 minutes, until the cheese is golden brown', '18:  Watch carefully to make sure it doesn’t burn', '19: Remove the 3 lb pumpkin from the oven and let cool for 5 minutes', '20:  Using oven mitts or kitchen towels, carefully move the 3 lb pumpkin to a serving platter', '21: Top with ½ cup white onion (75 g) fresh chive chopped chives and serve with chips and crudités for dipping']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 lb spicy italian sausage (455 g) casing removed', '1 lb broccoli florets (455 g)', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 lb rigatoni (455 g)', '4 cups chicken stock (960 mL)', '½ cup grated parmesan cheese (60 g) plus more garnish']
instructions: ['1: Heat the 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large Dutch oven or heavy-bottomed pot over medium-high heat', '2:  Add the 1 lb spicy italian sausage and cook until browned, breaking up with a wooden spoon, about 8 minutes', '3: Add the 1 lb broccoli, ½ teaspoon red ½ teaspoon red ½ teaspoon ground black pepper flakes, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, and ½ teaspoon red ½ teaspoon ground black pepper and stir to combine', '4: Add the pasta and 4 cups chicken stock and bring to a boil', '5:  Cook for 10–12 minutes, stirring constantly, until the liquid is absorbed and the pasta is tender', '6:  Add the Parmesan and stir to incorporate', '7: Divide the pasta between serving bowls and garnish with more Parmesan']

ingredients: ['oil', '1 teaspoon bonito powder to taste', '⅔ cup cabbage (60 g) julienned', '¼ cup bean sprout (25 g)', 'tempura bit to taste', '1 tablespoon scallions finely sliced', '4 slices pork belly thinly sliced', '1 package yakisoba noodle', '1 egg', 'Batter Mixture', '½ cup flour (60 g)', '⅔ cup water (160 mL)', '1 teaspoon mirin', 'To Serve', 'okonomi sauce', 'mayonnaise', 'nori flake', '2 tablespoons bonito flakes', 'Special Equipment', 'okonomi spatula']
instructions: ['1: Combine the ½ cup flour, ⅔ cup water, and 1 teaspoon mirin in a bowl and whisk until combined', '2: Brush oil on an electric griddle heated to 350˚F (180℃)', '3: Pour the batter onto the griddle into a paper-thin circle 8 inches (20 cm) wide', '4: Place ⅔ cup cabbage, tempura, ¼ cup bean sprouts, and 1 tablespoon scallions on top of the batter to fully cover it', '5: Top with 4 4 slices of pork belly and drizzle a little batter on top', '6: Gently flip the pancake using two okonomiyaki spatulas, and press down', '7: Add oil to the griddle and add the 1 package yakisoba noodles', '8: Drizzle with okonomi sauce and stir to coat all the noodles', '9: Put cooked pancake with the ⅔ cup cabbage on the noodles', '10: Crack an 1 egg on the griddle and scramble with the okonomi spatulas', '11: Place the 1 egg onto the 1 package yakisoba noodles and drizzle with okonomi sauce', '12: Drizzle with mayonnaise, nori flakes, and bonito flakes', '13: Nutrition  Calories: 5228 Fat: 544 grams  Carbs: 77 grams Fiber: 8 grams  Sugars: 22 grams  Protein: 22 grams']

ingredients: ['1 cup frozen strawberry (150 g)', '¾ cup rum (175 mL)', '½ cup lime juice (120 mL)', '¼ cup sugar (50 g)', '1 bottle rosé frozen', '4 strawberries to serve']
instructions: ['1: Add the 1 cup 1 bottle 1 bottle rosé frozen 4 strawberries, ½ cup lime juice, ¾ cup rum, ¼ cup sugar, and 1 cup 1 bottle 1 bottle rosé frozen 1 bottle rosé to a blender and blend until fully mixed', '2:  You may have to do this in two batches', '3: Divide between four glasses, and garnish with a strawberry']

ingredients: ['⅔ cup rolled oats (65 g)', '⅔ cup milk (160 mL) of your choice', '½ cup vanilla greek yogurt (120 g)', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon chia seed optional', '½ teaspoon cinnamon', '2 teaspoons honey', 'blueberry', '⅓ cup graham cracker (30 g) crushed']
instructions: ['1: In a mason jar or sealable container, add the ⅔ cup rolled oats, ⅔ cup milk, yogurt, vanilla extract, 1 teaspoon chia seeds, ½ teaspoon cinnamon, blueberries, and ⅓ cup graham crackers, and stir together', '2: Seal and place in the refrigerator overnight for up to five days', '3: Top with additional blueberries, if desired']

ingredients: ['1 spaghetti squash', 'olive oil', 'sea salt to taste', 'black pepper to taste', '2 chicken breasts cut into 1-2 in (2-5 cm) pieces', 'Sauce', '1 medium yellow onion diced', '4 cloves garlic minced', '½ teaspoon sea salt', '¼ teaspoon black pepper', '3 cups cherry tomato (600 g) halved', '½ lemon juiced', '1 cup chicken broth (240 mL)', '8 oz baby spinach (225 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2: Poke several holes in the 1 spaghetti squash around the lengthwise center of the squash', '3:  Microwave on high for 5 minutes', '4: Cut the squash in half along the holes', '5:  Remove the seeds and pulp with a spoon', '6:  Drizzle the squash with olive oil, and season with salt and pepper', '7: Place the squash cut-side down on baking sheet and bake for 40 minutes, until tender', '8:  Let cool', '9: Heat a bit of olive oil in a 1 medium skillet over 1 medium high heat', '10:  Add the chicken breast and cook for 6-8 minutes, until the chicken is golden brown and cooked through', '11:  Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside', '12: Add a bit more oil and the onion and sauté for a few minutes, until starting to brown', '13:  Add the 4 cloves garlic and cook for 1 minute, until fragrant', '14: Add the salt, pepper, and tomatoes and cook for a couple minutes, until the tomatoes start to release their juices', '15: Add the ½ lemon juice and chicken broth and cook until the liquid reduces by about half, 20 minutes', '16: Add the chicken and cook for 2 minutes, then add the 8 oz baby spinach and cook for 2 minutes, until wilted', '17:  Remove the pan from the heat', '18: Using 2 forks, shred the 1 spaghetti squash and scoop out onto serving plates', '19: Pour the sauce over the squash', '20:  Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['Grits', '4 cups chicken stock (945 mL)', '4 cups whole milk (945 mL)', '½ cup butter (115 g)', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 cups cornmeal (280 g)', 'Pepper Pot Shrimp', '2 tablespoons oil', '4 cloves garlic minced', '1 red bell pepper diced', '1 yellow bell pepper diced', '1 green bell pepper diced', '½ large red onion diced', '½ scotch bonnet pepper', '12 spears okra chopped', '1 large tomato diced', '½ cup chicken stock (120 mL)', '2 tablespoons jerk seasoning', '10 jumbo shrimps peeled and deveined', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon sugar', '2 bunches fresh italian parsley chopped to serve']
instructions: ['1: In a heavy pot, add the chicken stock, ½ cup butter, and 4 cups whole milk, and bring to a simmer over medium heat', '2:  Gradually add in the grits a little at a time, stirring until creamy', '3:  Remove from the heat', '4: Add 2 tablespoons oil to a large pan over medium-high heat', '5: Once the 2 tablespoons oil begins to shimmer, add the 4 cloves garlic and cook until aromatic, about 30 seconds', '6: Add in the 1 ½ large red bell pepper, 1 yellow bell pepper, 1 green bell pepper, 1 ½ large red onion, and Scotch bonnet pepper, and cook until onions are translucent', '7: Add in the 12 spears okra and cook for 1 minute', '8: Add in the diced tomatoes and juices, 2 tablespoons jerk spice, and chicken stock, and simmer on low heat for 10 minutes', '9: Season the stew with salt and 1 teaspoon sugar', '10: Place shrimp on top of the 12 spears okra stew', '11:  After two minutes, flip the shrimp and cook for 1-2 minutes, until cooked through', '12:  Sprinkle the stew with chopped 2 bunches fresh italian parsley', '13: Serve the shrimp stew over the grits']

ingredients: ['1 ¼ cups lukewarm water (300 mL)', '1 teaspoon sugar', '1 packet active dry yeast about 2 1/4 teaspoons', '1 teaspoon salt plus more for sprinkling', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons fresh rosemary chopped plus more for sprinkling', '3 ¾ cups all-purpose flour (470 g) plus more for dusting']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, mix together the 1 ¼ cups lukewarm water and 1 teaspoon sugar', '2:  Sprinkle the yeast over the 1 ¼ cups lukewarm water and stir', '3:  Let sit for 15 minutes, until the surface is foamy', '4: Add the 1 teaspoon salt, 3 tablespoons olive oil, and 2 tablespoons fresh rosemary', '5:  Mix well', '6: Slowly add the 3 ¾ cups all-purpose flour and mix with a wooden spoon until well combined', '7: Knead the dough for at least 10 minutes, until it is no longer sticky', '8: Set the dough in the middle of a piece of parchment paper large enough to line the slow cooker', '9: Place the parchment paper with the dough in the slow cooker', '10:  Drape a kitchen towel over the top and cover with the lid', '11:  Set the slow cooker to warm and let the dough proof for about 30 minutes, until doubled in size', '12:  Check occasionally to make sure the dough is not cooking', '13: Lift the parchment paper to remove the dough from the slow cooker', '14: Sprinkle a bit of 3 ¾ cups all-purpose flour on a clean surface', '15:  Knead the dough for about 5 minutes, then shape it into a ball that will fit in the slow cooker', '16: Place the dough back on the parchment paper and return to the slow cooker', '17:  Sprinkle the top with 1 teaspoon salt and 2 tablespoons fresh rosemary', '18: Cover the slow cooker with the towel and the lid and cook on high heat for 1½-2 hours, until the bread has a thick, 1 packet active dry, white crust, or a thermometer inserted in the loaf reaches 190°F (90°C)', '19: Preheat the oven to 500°F (260°C)', '20: Using the parchment paper, transfer the bread to a baking sheet', '21:  Trim the excess parchment', '22: Bake for 5-10 minutes, until the crust is golden brown', '23: Let cool for about 15 minutes, then slice']

ingredients: ['3 cups fresh basil (120 g)', '¾ cup pine nuts (100 g)', '¾ cup vegetarian parmesan cheese (80 g)', '3 cloves garlic', '¾ cup olive oil (180 mL) divided', '½ cup ricotta cheese (125 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 medium zucchinis', '2 medium yellow squashes', '4 large carrots', '1 large eggplant', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 sheet puff pastry thawed', '2 cups rice (200 g) uncooked', '½ teaspoon dried oregano']
instructions: ['1: Combine the 3 cups fresh basil, pine nuts, Parmesan, 3 cloves garlic, ½ cup (120 ml) of olive oil, ricotta, salt, and pepper in a food processor and puree until blended and smooth', '2:  Set aside', '3: Using a vegetable peeler, peel the zucchini, 2 medium yellow squash and 4 large carrots into ribbons', '4: Cut the 1 large eggplant lengthwise into thin slices, then slice in half lengthwise', '5: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '6: Grease a 9-inch (23 cm) tart dish with 1 tablespoon butter using a piece of parchment paper', '7: Lay the 1 sheet puff pastry in the tart dish and delicately press it flat against the bottom and up the sides', '8:  Crimp any dough hanging over the edges and prick the bottom all over with a fork', '9: Lay a piece of parchment paper over the pastry and pour the 2 cups rice evenly on top', '10:  The 2 cups rice helps keep the bottom of the crust from rising while baking', '11: Parbake the crust for about 15 minutes, until the 1 sheet puff pastry starts to cook', '12: Carefully lift the parchment paper to remove the 2 cups rice (save for using in other recipes or discard)', '13:  Increase the oven temperature to 400°F (200°C)', '14: Spread the ricotta pesto mixture evenly on the bottom of the tart', '15: Starting from the outside, line the walls of the tart with the veggie ribbons, alternating veggies, until the entire shell is filled', '16: Sprinkle the ½ teaspoon dried oregano on top and brush with olive oil', '17:  Season with salt and pepper to taste', '18: Bake for 35-40 minutes, until the veggies are tender', '19: Let cool for a few minutes', '20: Slice and serve']

ingredients: ['2 stalks lemongrass', '2 thai red chili peppers sliced', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 tablespoon galangal minced', '1 tablespoon refined coconut oil', '5 cups vegetable broth (1.2 L)', '1 large tomato diced', '5 lime leaves', '1 cup coconut milk (240 mL)', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '7 oz extra firm tofu (200 g) cubed', '6 oz cremini mushroom (165 g) sliced', '¼ cup lime juice', '1 tablespoon agave', 'salt to taste', 'fresh cilantro leaf for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Trim off the top third and very bottom of the lemongrass 2 stalks', '2:  Using the side of a knife, press down across the 2 stalks to bruise the lemongrass and release the oils', '3:  Chop each stalk into 4 pieces and set aside', '4: Add the 2 thai red chili peppers, 3 cloves garlic, and 1 tablespoon galangal to a mortar and pestle and grind into a paste', '5:  Set aside', '6: Melt the coconut oil in a 1 large pot over medium heat', '7:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the lemongrass and cook for 3-4 minutes, until fragrant', '8:  Add the 2 thai red chili pepper paste and cook for another 3-4 minutes, until fragrant', '9: Add the 5 cups vegetable broth, tomato, lime leaves, coconut milk, and 2 tablespoons soy sauce and stir to combine', '10:  Bring to a boil', '11:  Cover, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 20 minutes, until broth has reduced slightly', '12: Add the 7 oz extra firm tofu and mushrooms and stir to combine', '13:  Cook for 5 minutes, until the mushrooms are tender', '14: Add the lime juice and 1 tablespoon agave and stir to combine', '15:  Season with salt to taste', '16: Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon avocado oil', '2 whole dry chili peppers', '2 whole bay leaves', '½ cinnamon stick broken into pieces', '4 whole cloves', '½ teaspoon whole cumin seeds jeeru', '1 zucchini thinly sliced', '1 medium onion sliced', '1 small eggplant thinly sliced', '1 cup mixed vegetable (150 g)', '2 green chiles sliced', '4 cloves garlic finely chopped', '2 teaspoons ginger minced', '2 teaspoons paprika', '1 teaspoon red chili powder', '½ teaspoon turmeric hardar', '1 teaspoon salt (adjust based on taste preference)', '2 teaspoons biryani masala pack', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '4 cups cooked quinoa (680 g)']
instructions: ['1: Heat 1 tablespoon avocado oil in a pan', '2:  To this, add whole spices like 2 whole bay leaves, ½ cinnamon sticks, 2 whole dry 2 whole dry 1 teaspoon red chili peppers, cloves and whole ½ teaspoon whole cumin seeds', '3: Once the spices start to sizzle, add the chopped veggies and garlic and 2 teaspoons ginger', '4: Add the remainder of the spices and ½ cup water and mix well', '5: Cook for about 5 minutes, until veggies have softened and the flavors have incorporated', '6: In a separate pan, alternate with a bed of quinoa layered with the 4 cups cooked veggies', '7: Garnish with chopped cilantro and serve']

ingredients: ['Batter', '1 cup cake flour (100 g) sifted plus more for dusting', '1 cup ice cold water (240 mL)', '1 large egg cold', 'For Frying', '4 jumbo shrimps peeled and deveined tail-on', '2 japanese eggplants', 'canola oil for frying', '3 oz kabocha squash (85 g) sliced into wedges']
instructions: ['1: Make the tempura batter: Sift the 1 cup cake flour into a 1 large bowl', '2:  Set aside', '3: In a medium bowl, whisk together the egg and 1 cup ice cold water until lightly frothy', '4:  Add the 1 cup cake flour in 3 additions, stirring with chopsticks just to combine', '5:  Refrigerate until ready to use', '6: Prepare the shrimp: Trim the tails, then use your knife to scrape the dirt and 1 cup ice cold water from the remaining tail shell', '7:  Cut small incisions crosswise on both the top and bottom of the shrimp', '8:  This will prevent the shrimp from curling up as it cooks', '9:  Do not cut too deep, or the shrimp will fall apart', '10:  Pat the shrimp dry between paper towels, then refrigerate until ready to fry', '11: Prepare the eggplant: Trim the stem, then cut in half lengthwise', '12:  Leaving the top ½ inch (1 ¼ cm) intact, cut 5-6 ½-inch (¼ cm) thick slices down the length of the eggplant', '13: Fry the 3 oz kabocha squash: Fill a medium pot about halfway with canola oil', '14:  Heat over medium heat until it reaches 320°F (160°C)', '15: Coat the 3 oz kabocha wedges lightly with 1 cup cake flour, dusting off any excess', '16:  Dip the wedges in the tempura batter', '17:  Fry in the hot canola oil for 4-5 minutes, or until tender', '18:  Let any excess canola oil drip off, then transfer to a wire rack set over a paper towel-lined baking sheet to drain', '19: Fry the eggplant: Increase the canola oil temperature to 340°F (170°C)', '20: Coat the eggplant lightly with 1 cup cake flour, dusting off any excess', '21:  Dip in the tempura batter', '22:  Fry in the hot canola oil for 2-3 minutes, or until tender', '23:  Transfer to the wire rack to drain', '24: Fry the shrimp: Increase the canola oil temperature to 350°F (180°C)', '25: Lightly coat the shrimp with 1 cup cake flour, dusting off any excess', '26:  Dip in the tempura batter', '27:  Add the shrimp to the hot canola oil', '28:  Dip your fingers into the tempura batter and drizzle over the shrimp', '29:  This will make them extra crunchy', '30:  Fry the shrimp for 3-4 minutes, or until cooked through', '31:  Transfer to the wire rack to drain', '32: Serve the tempura immediately with dipping sauce or seasoned salt alongside']

ingredients: ['Squash Filling', '2 cups butternut squash (410 g)  peeled and chopped', '½ onion chopped', '3 cloves garlic peeled', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '2 oz grated parmesan cheese (55 g)', 'Fresh Pasta', '2 cups flour (250 g)', '4 eggs', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'Hazelnut Brown Butter Sauce', '5 tablespoons unsalted butter', '¼ cup roasted hazelnut (30 g) chopped', '10 leaves fresh sage', 'salt to taste', '1 lemon juiced', '1 oz grated parmesan cheese (30 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 425˚F (220˚C)', '2: Add the diced 2 2 2 ¼ cups butternut squash, chopped ½ onion, whole garlic 3 cloves, olive oil, salt, and pepper to a baking sheet, tossing until fully coated', '3: Bake until the squash is golden brown and tender, about 30 minutes', '4: While the squash is in the oven, make the dough', '5: When the squash is finished cooking, add it to the food processor along with the brown sugar and Parmesan cheese', '6:  Pulse until it becomes smooth', '7:  Set aside to chill', '8: Rinse the bowl of the food processor', '9: To the bowl of a food processor, add the 2 2 ¼ cups flour, 4 eggs, and olive oil, and pulse until the dough comes together into a large ball and swirls around the processor', '10: Remove the dough, wrap in plastic wrap, and rest it the refrigerator for 30 minutes', '11: Cut 2 ounces (55 g) of pasta dough from the ball and roll out into large, wide, thin sheets of pasta', '12: Lay a sheet over an empty ice cube tray, and press the dough down gently into each of the holes', '13: Fill each hole with a tablespoon of the 2 2 2 ¼ cups butternut squash filling', '14:  Place a second sheet on top of the ice cube tray', '15:  Press down on all the sides of the raviolis', '16:  Flip the ice 2 2 ¼ cup tray over to release the pasta and cut off any excess dough', '17: Separate each ravioli with a knife or cutting tool', '18: Gently place a few raviolis into boiling salted water and cook until the raviolis float and firm up slightly, 2-3 minutes', '19:  Scoop out the ravioli and set aside briefly to cook a new batch or dump out the water and start the hazelnut brown butter sauce', '20: In a pan, add 3 5 tablespoons of the butter, sage 10 leaves, and hazelnuts', '21:  Cook until the butter browns deeply, the nuts are heated through, and the sage is fried and crispy', '22:  Turn off the heat and add the 1 lemon juice and season to taste', '23: Swirl in 2 more 5 tablespoons more of chilled butter, to thicken the sauce', '24:  Add the cooked raviolis back in and toss gently to coat the pasta', '25: Serve the pasta with brown butter sauce']

ingredients: ['1 box chocolate cake mix prepared according to package instructions', '2 cups heavy cream (480 mL)', '16 oz dark chocolate (455 g)', 'cocoa powder for dusting to serve']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: In a large bowl, prepare the cake mix according to the package instructions', '3: Pour the batter into a well-greased bundt pan', '4: Bake for 35-45 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center of the cake comes out clean', '5: Heat the 2 cups heavy cream in a small saucepan until just boiling', '6: Add the 16 oz dark 1 box 16 oz 16 oz dark chocolate to a medium bowl and pour the hot cream over', '7:  Mix until the 1 box 16 oz 16 oz dark chocolate is melted and smooth', '8: Invert the bundt cake onto a serving plate', '9: Pour the 1 box 16 oz 16 oz dark chocolate ganache in the center hole, allowing it to overflow and cover the cake', '10: Dust the cake with cocoa powder and let sit for 30 minutes before slicing']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '14 oz sweetened condensed milk (395 g)', '¼ cup cocoa powder (30 g)', '1 cup chocolate sprinkle (160 g) as needed']
instructions: ['1: In a pot over low heat, melt the 1 tablespoon butter, 14 oz sweetened condensed milk, and ¼ cup cocoa powder, stirring continuously until you can see the bottom of the pot for 2-3 seconds when dragging a spatula through', '2: Pour onto a greased plate, then chill for 1 hour', '3: Shape and roll the chilled mixture into balls', '4: Roll the balls in 1 cup chocolate sprinkles']

ingredients: ['1 sprig fresh mint', '3 slices lime', '1 tablespoon agave nectar or honey', 'ice', '6 oz soda (180 mL) or seltzer water']
instructions: ['1: Add 1 sprig fresh mint leaves and 3 slices lime to a tall glass', '2: Using a muddler or a spoon, mash the 3 slices lime and 1 sprig fresh mint well', '3: Add sweetener, ice, and 6 oz soda water', '4:  Stir to combine', '5: Garnish with 3 slices lime and 1 sprig fresh mint']

ingredients: ['2 slices whole grain bread', 'nut butter to taste', 'jelly to taste', '8 pretzel sticks', '2 raisins']
instructions: ['1: Using the lid of a wide mouth mason jar, carve out rounds into both 2 slices of bread, remove the crusts', '2: Spread peanut nut butter evenly across one side of one of the rounds and spread jelly evenly across one side of the other round', '3: Place peanut nut butter round and jelly round together to create the “body” of the spider', '4: Place 4 8 pretzel sticks into the left side of the sandwich and 4 8 pretzel sticks into the right side, creating the “spider legs', '5: ”Place 2 raisins on the sandwich to create the “eyes']

ingredients: ['1 golden delicious apple thinly sliced', '¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 pinch salt']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 250˚F (120˚C)', '2: Place 1 golden delicious apple slices on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet and sprinkle with ¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon and 1 pinch salt', '3: Bake for 40 minutes, until the 1 golden delicious apples are slightly browned', '4: Cool completely before serving']

ingredients: ['2 eggplants', '2 cups ricotta cheese (500 g)', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese (100 g)', '½ cup shredded parmesan cheese (55 g)', '¼ cup fresh basil (10 g) chopped', '1 egg', 'salt', 'pepper', '1 cup marinara sauce (260 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350ºF (175ºC)', '2: Slice the ends the 2 2 1 eggplants and slice them into ¼ -inch (½ cm) slices and lay them out on a baking sheet covered in parchment paper', '3: Season with a pinch of salt on both sides of the 2 1 eggplant slices and let them sweat for 20 minutes, then dry them with a paper towel', '4:  Once dried; add a pinch of pepper', '5: Bake for 20 minutes, or until soft', '6: Meanwhile, in a medium-size bowl, mix 2 cups ricotta cheese, 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, ½ cup shredded parmesan cheese, ¼ cup fresh basil, and 2 1 egg', '7: Remove 2 1 eggplant slices from the oven and  turn oven to 400ºF (200ºC)', '8: Spoon about 2 tablespoons of the mixture onto 2 1 eggplant slice then roll it up, repeating for all slices', '9: In a 11x17-inch (28 x 43cm) baking sheet, pour ½ of the 1 cup marinara sauce, then add all the roll-ups seam down', '10:  Pour remaining ½ of 1 cup marinara sauce, and top with ¼ cup fresh basil and ½ cup shredded parmesan', '11: Bake for 25 minutes, or until cheese is melted and golden brown']

ingredients: ['1 dough enough for 2 pizzas', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '1 cup warm water (240 mL)', '2 teaspoons active dry yeast', '4 small beets roasted peeled and pureed', '3 tablespoons olive oil divided', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', '4 cups all-purpose flour (500 g)', 'your choice of toppings enough for 1 pizza', '1 ½ tablespoons olive oil', '1 ½ cups pizza sauce (390 g)', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese (100 g)', '1 pt cherry tomato (400 g)', '1 orange bell pepper diced', '1 yellow bell pepper diced', '1 cup fresh spinach (40 g) chopped', '1 cup purple sweet potato (200 g) diced and roasted', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', 'fresh basil sliced for serving']
instructions: ['1: In a 4 small bowl, combine half of the 1 cup warm water and the brown sugar', '2: Add the 2 teaspoons active dry yeast and let foam without stirring for about 8 minutes', '3: In a large bowl, combine the pureed beets, 2 1 3 1 ½ tablespoons of olive oil, salt, 2 cups (250 g) of flour, and the yeast mixture', '4: Rinse the yeast mixture bowl with the remaining 1 cup warm water to get all the yeast, and pour into the large bowl', '5: Mix with your hands and gradually add in the reamining flour until the 1 dough comes together in a ball and is not moist to the touch', '6: Transfer the 1 dough to a floured surface and knead for about 5 minutes, until it becomes smooth and bouncy and does not stick to the surface', '7:  Add flour as needed', '8: Pour the remaining 1 3 1 ½ tablespoon of olive oil in a clean large bowl and rub around with your fingers', '9: Place the 1 dough in the bowl and turn to coat with the oil', '10: Cover with a kitchen towel or a plastic wrap and let rise for at least 1 hour at room temperature (preferably 1 cup warm)', '11:  The 1 dough should double in size', '12: Preheat the oven to 500°F (260°C)', '13: Grease a nonstick baking sheet with the olive oil', '14: Place the 1 dough on a floured surface and divide in half', '15: Save one 1 dough half for later', '16:  It will keep in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks in a bowl covered tightly with plastic wrap', '17: Using a rolling pin, flatten the remaining ball of 1 dough into a rectangular shape that will approximately fit on the baking sheet', '18: Transfer the 1 dough to baking sheet and stretch as needed to cover the pan', '19: Leaving a 1-inch (2 cm) border all around the sides, spread the 1 dough enough for 2 your choice of toppings enough for 1 1 ½ cups pizza sauce over the 1 dough and sprinkle with 1 cup shredded mozzarella', '20: Add strips of 1 pt cherry tomatoes, 1 orange bell 1 orange bell 1 yellow bell pepper, 1 yellow bell 1 orange bell 1 yellow bell pepper, spinach, and roasted 1 cup purple sweet potatoes', '21: Season with salt, 1 orange bell 1 yellow bell pepper, and 1 teaspoon dried oregano', '22: Bake for 7-10 minutes, until the veggies are tender and the crust is cooked', '23: Sprinkle with fresh basil, then slice and serve']

ingredients: ['2 cups lukewarm water (480 mL) between 90˚-110˚F (30˚-40˚C)', '1 envelope active dry yeast', '4 cups all-purpose flour (500 g) lightly packed and leveled off plus more for dusting', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '1 teaspoon olive oil']
instructions: ['1: Stir the yeast into the 2 cups lukewarm water and allow the yeast to bloom until foamy', '2: In a large bowl, mix together the 4 cups all-purpose flour and 1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt by hand', '3:  Once incorporated, create a small well in the middle and pour in the 2 cups lukewarm water and yeast mixture', '4: Mix by hand, wetting your working hand before mixing so the dough doesn’t stick to your fingers', '5:  The 2 cups lukewarm water and 4 cups all-purpose flour should come together and a form rough dough that pulls away from the sides of the bowl', '6:  If the dough is too sticky, add more 4 cups all-purpose flour in small increments, about 1 tablespoon at a time', '7:  If the dough is too 1 envelope active dry, add more 2 cups lukewarm water, 1 tablespoon at a time', '8: Once the dough comes together, cover and let rise until doubled in size (about 1 ½-2 hours)', '9: Uncover the dough and give it a few pokes with your finger', '10:  If the dough has risen properly, it should indent under the pressure of your finger and slowly deflate', '11: Using your hand or a rubber spatula, start from the rim of the bowl to work the dough loose from the sides and fold it up and towards the center of the bowl', '12:  Turn the bowl 90 degrees, and repeat until all the dough has been pulled from the sides and folded towards the center', '13: Once finished, cover and let the dough rise again for another 1 ½-2 hours', '14: Once the dough has doubled in size again, gently transfer it from the bowl to a lightly 4 cups all-purpose floured surface', '15: Sprinkle a bit of 4 cups all-purpose flour on top of the dough', '16:  Using your hands, begin to shape it into a loaf', '17:  Fold the dough under itself several times to form a ball, then pinch together the seams of dough underneath', '18: Place the dough seam-side down in a clean bowl that has been lightly coated with 1 teaspoon olive oil and dusted with 4 cups all-purpose flour', '19: Cover and let rise for 1 hour', '20: Meanwhile, place a 6-quart Dutch oven (or heavy cooking pot with oven-safe lid) inside the oven', '21:  Preheat the oven to 450˚F (230˚C) with the pot inside for 45 minutes-1 hour', '22: Carefully remove the pot from the oven and place it on a trivet or heat-safe surface', '23:  (Be careful! It’ll be VERY HOT', '24: )Turn the proofed dough over onto a lightly 4 cups all-purpose floured surface and carefully place it inside the pot', '25: Cover with the lid and return the pot to the oven', '26: Bake for 45 minutes, removing the lid for the last 15 minutes', '27: Remove bread from pot, cover, and let cool for 10 minutes before slicing']

ingredients: ['bread toasted', '2 tablespoons goat cheese', '½ avocado sliced', '4 strawberries sliced', 'balsamic vinegar']
instructions: ['1: Spread the 2 tablespoons goat cheese on toast', '2: Add ½ avocado 4 4 strawberries sliced avocados, 4 strawberries, and drizzle with balsamic vinegar']

ingredients: ['Base Dough', '2 cups flour (250 g)', '1 cup brown sugar (220 g)', '1 cup butter (225 g) softened', '2 tablespoons milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '1 teaspoon salt', 'Chocolate Chip', '¼ cup chocolate chips (45 g)', '¼ cup mini chocolate chips (45 g)', 'Cookies and Cream', '5 sandwich cookies', 'Peanut Butter Chocolate', '¼ cup peanut butter (60 g)', '3 peanut butter cups', '¼ cup chocolate candy (50 g)', 'Triple Chocolate Chunk', '⅓ cup chocolate (55 g) melted', '¼ cup white chocolate chip (45 g)', '¼ cup chocolate chips (45 g)']
