instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: For the Base Dough, evenly spread flour out on a baking tray and bake for 5 minutes', '3: In a large bowl, mix flour, 1 cup brown sugar, 1 cup ¼ cup peanut 3 peanut butter, 1 teaspoon vanilla, 2 tablespoons milk, and 1 teaspoon salt until combined evenly', '4: Refrigerate mix for 30 minutes', '5: Separate dough into 4 sectionsFor the Chocolate Chips, add one section of dough in a large bowl, mix in the chocolate chips and ¼ cup mini chocolate chips until combined', '6: For the Cookies and Cream, crush 5 sandwich cookies in plastic bag until evenly separated', '7: Place crushed 5 sandwich cookies into a large bowl, and add in one section of dough mixing until combined', '8: For the Peanut Butter Chocolate, add chocolate candies, chocolate peanut 1 cup ¼ cup peanut 3 peanut butter 2 3 peanut 3 peanut butter cups, and peanut 1 cup ¼ cup peanut 3 peanut butter, into a large bowl with one section of dough and mix until combined', '9: For the Triple Chocolate Chunk, add melted chocolate into a large bowl with the last section of dough and mix until evenly combined and consistent color', '10: Add the chocolate chips and ¼ cup white chocolate chips, then mix until combined']

ingredients: ['1 cup mango (165 g) chopped', '½ cup fresh raspberry (60 g) divided plus 24 raspberries', '2 cups rosé wine (480 mL)', '1 cup lemon-lime soda (240 mL)', '2 oz triple sec (60 mL)', 'Special Equipment', 'ice pop mold', 'ice pop stick']
instructions: ['1: In a blender, combine the mango, ½ cup (60 g) raspberries, the 2 cups rosé, lemon-lime soda, and 2 oz triple sec and blend until smooth', '2: Place 2 raspberries in each ice pop mold', '3: Pour the mixture into the ice pop molds, seal with the lids, and add the ice pop sticks', '4: Freeze until solid, at least 4 hours, or overnight', '5: Carefully remove the ice pops from the molds']

ingredients: ['Cake Pops', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', '1 box yellow cake mix', '3 large eggs', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '½ cup vegetable oil (120 mL)', '1 ½ teaspoons McCormick® Pure Almond Extract divided', '½ cup vanilla buttercream frosting (55 g) plus more as needed', 'For Decorating', '16 oz yellow candy melts (450 g)', 'yellow and orange circular sprinkle', 'yellow candy', 'black cookie icing', 'Special Equipment', '20 cake pop sticks', 'glas', 'dried white rice', 'Preparation', 'Cake Pops', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', '1 box yellow cake mix', '3 large eggs', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '½ cup vegetable oil (120 mL)', '1 ½ teaspoons McCormick® Pure Almond Extract divided', '½ cup vanilla buttercream frosting (55 g) plus more as needed', 'For Decorating', '16 oz yellow candy melts (450 g)', 'yellow and orange circular sprinkle', 'yellow candy', 'black cookie icing', 'Special Equipment', '20 cake pop sticks', 'glas', 'dried white rice', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2:  Grease a 9x13-inch baking pan with nonstick spray', '3:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '4: In a large bowl, whisk together the cake mix, eggs, water, vegetable oil, and 1 teaspoon McCormick® Pure Almond Extract until smooth', '5:  Pour the batter into the prepared pan', '6: Bake the cake for 25 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean', '7:  Remove from the oven and let cool completely, about 20 minutes', '8: Break apart the cake into a large bowl until finely crumbled', '9:  Add the buttercream and remaining ½ teaspoon McCormick® Pure Almond Extract, and mix until the crumbs hold together when pressed between your hands', '10:  Divide the mixture into approximately 20 2-inch balls and place on the prepared baking sheet', '11: Dip the cake pop sticks in the buttercream, then stick in the center of each ball', '12:  Freeze the cake pops for at least 2 hours, or overnight', '13: Decorate the cake pops: Fill a glass to the top with dried rice', '14: Add the yellow candy melts to a medium bowl and melt according to the package instructions', '15: Working in batches, dip the frozen cake pops in the melted candy, coating completely all the way to where the cake and stick meet', '16:  Place the sticks in the glass of dried rice and let the chocolate harden completely, 3–5 minutes', '17: Once the candy melts have hardened, dip a toothpick in the melted candy and stick the orange and yellow sprinkles and yellow candies onto the pops to look like beaks, feathers, and feet', '18:  Dip another toothpick into the black icing and dollop small eyes onto the cake pops', '19:  Let harden for another 3–5 minutes', '20: Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['1 ½ lb ribeye steak (700 g) or any other well-marbled tender cut', '1 onion 1/2 roughly chopped and 1/2 thinly sliced', '3 cloves garlic cloves', '½ pear peeled and roughly chopped', '3 spring onions 1 cut into pieces and 2 sliced into 1/4-inch rounds', '3 tablespoons brown sugar', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '⅓ cup soy sauce (80 g)', '3 tablespoons sesame oil', '1 tablespoon canola oil', '1 teaspoon sesame seed for serving', '2 cups cooked rice (400 g) for serving', 'Banchan (Korean side dishes) for serving (optional)']
instructions: ['1: Slice the beef as thinly as you can, then set aside in a large bowl', '2:  Using frozen or cold beef will make the slicing easier', '3: In a blender or food processor, blend the 1 3 spring onion chunks, 3 cloves garlic, ½ pear, green 1 3 spring onion pieces, 3 tablespoons brown sugar, 1 teaspoon black pepper, ⅓ cup soy sauce, and sesame oil until smooth', '4: Pour the marinade over the beef, add the thinly sliced 1 3 spring onion, then mix to coat evenly', '5:  Cover with plastic wrap and marinate in the fridge for at least 30 minutes, or overnight', '6: Heat the 1 tablespoon canola oil in a large skillet over high heat', '7:  Pat the meat dry', '8: Being careful not to crowd the pan, sear the marinated beef and 1 3 spring 3 spring onions until 3 tablespoons browned', '9:  Sprinkle with the sliced green 1 3 spring 3 spring onions and sesame seeds', '10: Serve with 2 cups cooked rice and side dishes']

ingredients: ['2 boneless skinless chicken breasts', '1 teaspoon salt divided', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '6 tablespoons lemon juice divided', '6 strips bacon', '12 stalks asparagus ends trimmed', '1 cup greek yogurt (285 g)', '3 tablespoons fresh parsley chopped', '1 tablespoon fresh dill chopped']
instructions: ['1: On a cutting board, slice 2 boneless skinless chicken lengthwise into 1-inch (2 cm) thick slices', '2:  Take each slice of 2 boneless skinless chicken and cut it in half lengthwise leaving about 1 inch (2 cm) uncut on one end of the strip', '3: Cut off part of the uncut end of the 2 boneless skinless chicken so you do not have a thick spot in the middle of your longer 2 boneless skinless chicken strip', '4: Place 2 boneless skinless chicken 6 strips in a bowl', '5:  Add ½ teaspoon salt, pepper, onion powder, garlic powder, and 3 tablespoons lemon juice and mix to combine', '6: Transfer to the refrigerator', '7: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '8: On a cutting board, slice each piece of bacon lengthwise creating 12 6 strips in total', '9: Wrap the cut strip of bacon around the asparagus', '10: Wrap a marinated 2 boneless skinless chicken strip around the bacon-wrapped asparagus', '11:  Repeat with remaining ingredients', '12: Place each bacon 2 boneless skinless chicken asparagus twist on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '13: Bake for 10 minutes', '14: Turn up the heat to broil, and broil for 10 minutes', '15:  Flip the twists over, and broil for an additional ten minutes', '16: In a bowl add the Greek yogurt parsley, 1 tablespoon fresh dill, ½ teaspoon salt, and 3 tablespoons lemon juice', '17:  Stir until well combined', '18: Remove bacon asparagus twists from baking sheet, and let cool', '19:  Serve with herb yogurt dipping sauce']

ingredients: ['4 tablespoons flour', '3 tablespoons sugar', '2 tablespoons cocoa powder', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '3 tablespoons milk', '1 tablespoon oil vegetable or canola', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon chocolate  hazelnut spread plus more for topping', 'powdered sugar for topping optional']
instructions: ['1: In a 12-ounce (375 ml) mug or larger, mix all ingredients (except the 1 tablespoon chocolate hazelnut spread) until just combined', '2: Once combined, spoon the 1 tablespoon chocolate hazelnut spread on top of the batter', '3: Microwave on high for 90 seconds to 2 minutes, watching to make sure it doesn’t spill over (depending on the size of the mug)', '4: Let cool one minute before eating', '5:  Top with additional 1 tablespoon chocolate hazelnut spread and powdered 3 tablespoons powdered sugar (optional)']

ingredients: ['Clams', '2 lb littleneck clam (910 g) or manila clams scrubbed', 'cold water for soaking', '3 tablespoons sea salt', 'Grilled Bread', '1 sourdough baguette', 'olive oil for brushing', 'sea salt to taste', 'Coconut Broth', '1 tablespoon coconut oil', '½ medium red onion thinly sliced', '2 large stalks lemongrass', '3 tablespoons fresh ginger minced', '4 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes or 2 minced thai chilies ', '1 cup dry white wine (240 mL)', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '1 tablespoon fish sauce or low sodium soy sauce', '2 cups vegetable broth (480 mL) or chicken broth', '13 oz full-fat coconut milk (370 mL) 1 can', 'For Garnish', 'scallion thinly sliced', 'fresh cilantro chopped']
instructions: ['1: Pick through the 2 lb littleneck clam (910 g) or manila clams and discard any that are open and do not close when firmly tapped–these 2 lb littleneck clam (910 g) or manila clams are dead and should not be eaten', '2:  Add the rest to a colander', '3: Rinse and scrub the remaining live 2 lb littleneck clam (910 g) or manila clams to remove any sand or barnacles from the shells', '4: Fill a bowl 2 large enough to fit the colander with cold water and 3-4 tablespoons of 3 tablespoons sea sea salt for every 6 2 cups (1', '5: 5 liters) of water', '6:  Place the colander in the bowl of 3 tablespoons sea sea salt water and soak the 2 lb littleneck clam (910 g) or manila clams for at least 1 hour, up to overnight, so they release any grit and sand', '7:  The colander allows the grit to fall to the bottom of the bowl', '8:  Live 2 lb littleneck clam (910 g) or manila clams will filter the water while they push out any impurities in the process', '9: Transfer the 2 lb littleneck clam (910 g) or manila clams in the colander to another 2 large bowl of 3 tablespoons fresh water to desalt for 15-30 minutes', '10: Grill the bread: Slice the 1 sourdough baguette into ½-inch (1 cm) pieces', '11: Brush each slice with olive oil and sprinkle with 3 tablespoons sea sea salt', '12: Toast the bread on a grill pan over ½ medium-high heat until golden 1 tablespoon brown and crusty, about 2 minutes per side', '13:  Set aside', '14: Make the coconut broth: Melt the coconut oil in a wok or 2 large pan over ½ medium heat', '15:  Add the ½ medium 1 teaspoon red onion and cook until it starts to become translucent, about 3 minutes', '16: Firmly tap the lemongrass stalks with a wooden spoon to bruise, which helps release aroma and flavor during cooking', '17:  Trim the ends, then slice into approximately 4-inch (10 cm) pieces', '18: Add the lemongrass to the wok, along with the ginger, 4 cloves garlic, and ½ medium 1 teaspoon red pepper flakes', '19:  Cook until fragrant, about 3 minutes', '20: Carefully pour in the 1 cup dry white wine and stir to deglaze the pan', '21:  Bring to a simmer and cook until ½ medium 1 teaspoon reduced by half, about 5 minutes', '22: Add the 1 tablespoon brown sugar, 1 tablespoon fish sauce, vegetable broth, and coconut milk', '23:  Bring to a boil', '24: Add the 2 lb littleneck clam (910 g) or manila clams, return to a boil, and cook for 5-8 minutes, or until all of the 2 lb littleneck clam (910 g) or manila clams are fully opened', '25:  If any 2 lb littleneck clam (910 g) or manila clams remain closed, discard them', '26: Discard the lemongrass stalks and divide the 2 lb littleneck clam (910 g) or manila clams and broth between serving bowls', '27:  Garnish with scallions and cilantro and serve with the grilled bread for dipping']

ingredients: ['Crust', '1 egg', '½ cup butter (115 g) softened and cut into 1-inch (2 1/2 cm) cubes', '⅔ cup sugar (135 g)', '2 cups flour (250 g)', 'Filling', '2 mangoes', '2 oz cream cheese (55 g) softened', '⅓ cup greek yogurt (95 g)', '½ teaspoon orange zest', '2 tablespoons sugar', '2 tablespoons orange juice', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '2: In a large bowl, beat the 1 egg', '3: Add the ½ cup butter and sugar, and mix', '4: Add the 2 cups flour and mix until combined', '5:  The dough will be crumbly in your hand', '6: Transfer the crust mixture into a greased 8-inch (20 cm) tart pan one handful at a time, pressing it down to create an even, thin layer over the entire pan, about ¼ inch (6 mm)', '7: NOTE: Freeze and save remaining pie crust crumble for later', '8: Prick the crust with a fork to prevent it from puffing up in the oven', '9: Bake the crust for 30-40 minutes, or until golden brown', '10: On a cutting board, cut a half inch (1 cm) off the bottom and top off the mango to give it a flat base', '11:  Standing it upright, make exterior slices from the top to bottom to take the skin off', '12: Remove the meat from the sides and thinly slice', '13: In a medium bowl, combine the 2 oz cream cheese, Greek yogurt, orange zest, sugar, orange juice, and 1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '14:  Mix thoroughly', '15: Transfer the yogurt mixture to the cooled tart crust', '16: Starting from the outer edge, place mango slices in a circular pattern, making full rotations all the way to the center', '17: Chill the fruit tart for at least an hour']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '4 cloves garlic minced', '1 lb baby carrot (455 g)', '8 boneless skinless chicken thighs', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '½ cup balsamic vinegar (120 mL)', '1 onion sliced', '1 lb green beans (455 g)', 'fresh parsley chopped for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Pour 1 tablespoon olive oil and garlic in the bottom of a 6-qt slow cooker', '2:  Line the bottom with 1 lb baby carrots, then place the 8 boneless skinless chicken thighs over the carrots', '3: Season the 8 boneless skinless chicken thighs with 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon pepper, garlic powder, 1 teaspoon dried basil and ½ cup balsamic vinegar', '4:  Top with sliced 1 onion', '5: Cover and cook on low heat for 8 hours or high for 4 hours', '6:  Add 1 lb green beans during the last 30 minutes of cooking time', '7: Sprinkle with fresh chopped parsley and serve immediately']

ingredients: ['1 small bunch fresh cilantro', '1 small bunch fresh culantro', '1 red bell pepper small  roughly chopped', '1 small green bell pepper seeded and roughly chopped', '1 medium head garlic cloves seperated and peeled', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon ground cumin', '1 ¼ cups canola oil (300 mL) divided', '5 pimento-stuffed spanish olives thinly sliced into rounds', '1 lb ground beef (455 g)', '½ teaspoon kosher salt plus more to taste', '2 teaspoons dried adobo seasoning divided', '1 ¼ teaspoons sazon goya seasoning powder with saffron', '1 can tomato sauce', '4 very ripe plantains', '3 cups shredded mozzarella cheese (300 g) divided', '2 large eggs']
instructions: ['1: To the bowl of a food processor, add the 1 small bunch fresh cilantro, 1 small bunch fresh culantro, onion, 1 red and 1 small green bell peppers, garlic, oregano, and cumin', '2:  Pulse until combined', '3:  The sofrito should have the consistency of a tapenade', '4: Heat ¼ cup (60 ml) of 1 ¼ cups canola oil in a 2 large pan over 1 medium heat', '5:  Once the oil is shimmering, add the sofrito and fry, stirring constantly, until deepened in color but not brown, about 3 minutes', '6:  Add the 5 pimento-stuffed spanish olives to the pan and stir to combine', '7: Add the ½ teaspoon 1 lb ground beef to the pan and cook until no longer pink, about 7 minutes', '8:  Season with the ½ teaspoon salt', '9: Add 1 teaspoon of 2 teaspoons dried adobo 2 teaspoons dried adobo 1 ¼ teaspoons sazon goya seasoning, the Sazón 2 teaspoons dried adobo 1 ¼ teaspoons sazon goya seasoning, and the 1 can tomato sauce and stir to combine', '10:  Cook, stirring occasionally, until most of the liquid is absorbed into the meat, about 7 minutes', '11:  Transfer the beef mixture to a 1 medium bowl with a slotted spoon, discarding any excess liquid', '12:  Wipe out the pan with a paper towel and set aside', '13: Peel the 4 very ripe plantains, cut in half crosswise, then slice each half lengthwise to get 4 thin slices', '14: Heat the remaining cup of 1 ¼ cups canola oil in the same pan over 1 medium-high heat until the oil starts to shimmer', '15:  Test one plantain slice in the oil--if it bubbles and sizzles, the oil is ready', '16: Fry the 4 very ripe plantains in batches until they are lightly browned on the edges and tender in the centers, 4–5 minutes, turning occasionally with a fork', '17:  Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate to drain', '18:  Season on both sides with salt', '19: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '20: Arrange a single layer of 4 very ripe plantains in the bottom of an 8-inch square baking dish', '21:  Using a slotted spoon, top with about half of the meat mixture', '22:  Sprinkle 1 cup of 3 cups shredded mozzarella over the meat sauce', '23:  Repeat with more 4 very ripe plantains, the remaining meat sauce, and another cup of 3 cups shredded mozzarella', '24:  Finish with the remaining 4 very ripe plantains', '25: In a 1 medium bowl, beat the eggs with the remaining teaspoon of 2 teaspoons dried adobo 2 teaspoons dried adobo 1 ¼ teaspoons sazon goya seasoning', '26: Pour the egg mixture over the 4 very ripe plantains, then cover the baking dish with foil', '27: Bake the pastelón until the eggs are set and the cheese is bubbly, about 25 minutes', '28:  Remove from oven and turn the oven to broil', '29:  Uncover the dish and sprinkle the remaining cup of 3 cups shredded mozzarella over the top', '30:  Broil for 5 minutes, or until cheese on top is golden brown', '31:  Let rest for 10 minutes before serving']

ingredients: ['1 ½ cups thai tea (360 mL) brewed cooled', '½ cup whole milk (120 mL)', '¼ cup sweetened condensed milk (75 g)', 'whipped cream for topping', '2 whole star anises for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Pour the Thai tea into an ice cube tray', '2:  Freeze for at least 4 hours, or overnight', '3: Add the Thai tea ice cubes, ½ cup whole ¼ cup ¼ cup sweetened condensed milk, and ¼ cup sweetened condensed ½ cup whole ¼ cup ¼ cup sweetened condensed milk to a blender and blend until smooth', '4: Pour into glasses and top with whipped cream', '5:  Garnish with 2 whole star anise']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons pesto', '½ cup cheese tortellini (75 g) cooked', '2 tablespoons salami chopped', '½ small tomato chopped', '½ cup fresh basil (20 g) chopped', '1 tablespoon shredded parmesan cheese']
instructions: ['1: Add the 2 tablespoons pesto to the bottom of a 16-ounce (480 ml) mason jar', '2: Add the ½ cup cheese tortellini, 2 tablespoons salami, ½ small tomato, ½ cup fresh basil, and Parmesan', '3: Store in the refrigerator for 2-3 days', '4: When ready to eat, shake well to combine']

ingredients: ['Scallion pancake', 'pizza dough', 'scallion', 'sesame oil', 'salt to taste', 'white pepper to taste', 'Dipping sauce', '⅓ cup soy sauce (80 mL)', '2 tablespoons rice vinegar', '1 teaspoon sriracha sauce', '1 tablespoon garlic', '1 tablespoon ginger', '1 tablespoon sugar', 'scallion chopped']
instructions: ['1: Brush pizza dough with sesame oil', '2:  Liberally spread scallions', '3:  Salt and white pepper the pizza dough', '4: Cut pizza dough into 6 x 10 inch (15 x 25 cm) pieces', '5:  Roll and coil', '6:  Rest covered with a damp towel for an hour', '7: After an hour, flatten each coil of dough, roll out as flat as possible', '8:  Fry on medium heat until both sides are golden brown (5 minutes)', '9:  Then cut into quarters', '10: \x7fMix the ingredients for the dipping sauce into a small bowl', '11:  Serve']

ingredients: ['1 lb ground beef (455 g)', '2 tablespoons taco seasoning', '6 flour tortillas', '16 oz refried bean (455 g) 1 can', '1 cup shredded mexican cheese blend (100 g)']
instructions: ['1: Add 1 lb ground beef to a large skillet over high heat and sprinkle with 2 tablespoons taco seasoning', '2:  Cook, breaking up the meat, until browned', '3:  Drain the fat and set aside to cool', '4: Assemble the burritos by microwaving the 6 flour tortilla for 20 seconds, and begin to layer burrito starting with 16 oz refried beans, followed by the cooked beef and 1 cup shredded mexican cheese', '5: Fold in the left and right sides of the tortilla and roll it up from the bottom, tucking the bottom edge under the filling', '6:  Wrap in parchment paper and label', '7:  Freeze up to 1 month', '8: To reheat from frozen, wrap the burrito in a damp paper towel and microwave for 2-3 minutes, flipping halfway or until the center is hot', '9:  Let stand 1 minute before eating']

ingredients: ['Dressing', '2 tablespoons blue cheese dressing', '⅛ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', 'Filling', '½ small tomato chopped', '½ cup shredded rotisserie chicken (60 g)', '½ tablespoon bacon bits', '1 hard-boiled egg chopped', '½ cup romaine lettuce (30 g)']
instructions: ['1: Make the dressing: Combine 2 tablespoons blue cheese dressing, ⅛ teaspoon salt, and ½ teaspoon pepper in a 16-ounce (480 ml) mason jar', '2:   Stir with a fork until well-combined', '3: Add the ½ small tomato, ½ cup shredded rotisserie chicken, ½ tablespoon bacon bits, hard boiled 1 hard-boiled egg, and ½ cup romaine lettuce', '4: Store in the refrigerator for 2-3 days', '5: When ready to eat, shake well to combine']

ingredients: ['4 cucumbers', '½ cup guacamole (235 g)', '4 slices turkey', '8 slices bacon']
instructions: ['1: Use a vegetable peeler to peel the 4 cucumbers', '2: On a cutting board, cut off the ends and cut the 4 cucumbers in half', '3:  Scoop out the seeds and discard', '4: Spread ½ cup guacamole on both sides of the prepared cucumber', '5: Layer the 4 slices turkey on one half of the cucumber and 8 slices bacon on the other half, and close the sandwich']

ingredients: ['2 cups nut butter (480 g) of preference', '1 cup pumpkin puree (225 g)', '½ cup coconut  oil (120 mL)', '¼ cup maple syrup (55 g)', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '½ teaspoon pumpkin pie spice or ¼ teaspoon cinnamon and ¼ teaspoon nutmeg', '¼ teaspoon flaky sea salt plus more for garnish']
instructions: ['1: In a medium sauce pot over medium heat, combine 2 cups ½ teaspoon pumpkin pie spice or ¼ teaspoon cinnamon and ¼ teaspoon nut butter, pumpkin, ½ cup coconut oil, ¼ cup maple syrup, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract, pumpkin pie spice, and salt', '2:  Stir until smooth', '3: Pour onto a parchment paper-lined 8x8-inch (20x20cm) baking dish and smooth out evenly', '4: Sprinkle with ¼ teaspoon flaky sea salt for garnish (optional), cover and freeze for at least 2 hours, then switch to refrigerator for storage', '5: Cut into squares', '6:  Serve chilled']

ingredients: ['Crust', '1 ½ cups all-purpose flour (185 g)', '½ cup powdered sugar (60 g)', '½ teaspoon salt', '¾ cup unsalted butter (165 g) 1 1/2 sticks cubed room temperature', 'Lemon Filling', '3 large eggs', '1 egg yolk reserve white for meringue', '1 cup granulated sugar (200 g)', '½ cup lemon juice (120 mL)', '1 tablespoon lemon  zest', '¼ cup all-purpose flour (30 g)', 'Meringue', '1 egg white', '1 pinch salt', '⅓ cup granulated sugar (65 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 325˚F (170˚C)', '2:  Grease and line a 9-inch (23 cm) square baking dish with parchment paper and place on a baking sheet', '3: Make the crust: combine the flour, ½ cup powdered sugar, ½ teaspoon 1 1 pinch salt, and ¾ cup unsalted butter in a medium bowl, and use your hands to mix until a crumbly dough forms', '4: Transfer the dough to the prepared pan, and use your hands to press it against the bottom and about 1 inch (2 cm) up the sides', '5:  Poke the bottom all over with a fork', '6: Bake for 20 minutes, until light golden brown', '7: While the crust is baking, make the lemon filling: In a 3 large bowl, whisk together the eggs and egg yolk', '8:  Add the granulated sugar, lemon juice, zest, and a 1 pinch of ½ teaspoon 1 1 pinch salt, and whisk to combine', '9:  Whisk in the flour until just combined', '10: When the crust is done baking, remove it from the oven', '11:  Pour the lemon filling over the crust and carefully return it to the oven for 25 minutes, until the filling no longer jiggles and the center is mostly set', '12: While the filling bakes, make the meringue: In a clean, dry medium bowl, use an electric hand mixer to beat the egg white until stiff peaks form', '13:  Add about half of the sugar, whip for 30 seconds, then add the rest of the sugar and whip until combined', '14:  Transfer the meringue to a pastry bag fitted with a 3 large tip or zip-top bag with a corner snipped off', '15: Pipe 9 evenly-spaced dollops of meringue on top of the lemon bars', '16: Return to the oven for 10-12 minutes, until the meringues are lightly browned', '17: Let cool completely, then refrigerate for 1-2 hours', '18: Slice into 9 bars', '19:  Serve chilled or at room temperature']

ingredients: ['Dough', '7 cups flour (875 g)', '4 teaspoons kosher salt', '½ teaspoon active dry yeast', '3 cups water (750 mL) at room temperature (plus an additional 1-2 tablespoons of water as needed)', '4 tablespoons cornmeal or semolina for the pizza peel', 'flour extra for shaping', 'Sauce', '6 oz tomato paste (170 g)', '1 cup hot water (240 mL)', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '2 teaspoons maple syrup or honey', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '3 cloves garlic minced', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon dried basil', '½ teaspoon dried marjoram', '¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper']
instructions: ['1: In a very large bowl, whisk together the ½ teaspoon active dry ingredients', '2: Make a divot in the middle of the flour mixture and add a few tablespoons of water', '3:  Stir with a wooden spoon, gradually adding more and more water until the dough starts to come together', '4:  You may need a tablespoon more or less water, depending on the consistency of the dough as it forms', '5: Using your hands, ensure the dough is well incorporated, but do not knead', '6:  Be careful not to overwork the dough', '7: Cover with plastic wrap and store at room temperature overnight, or for at least 12 hours,  until doubled in size and porous', '8: Make the sauce by combining 6 oz tomato paste, water, vinegar, 2 teaspoons maple syrup, salt, ½ teaspoon ¼ teaspoon ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper, 3 cloves garlic, ½ teaspoon dried oregano, ½ teaspoon dried basil, ½ teaspoon dried marjoram, and ¼ teaspoon cayenne ½ teaspoon ¼ teaspoon ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper in a medium bowl', '9:  Let sit at room temperature for an hour before canning or jarring', '10:  Refrigerate as necessary up to 2 weeks', '11: Once the dough has risen, transfer to a clean, floured work surface and form into a large ball', '12:  Cut the dough into 6 equal parts and form dough balls by folding the corners into themselves', '13: Place the dough balls on a floured sheet pan, sprinkle with flour, and cover with a damp towel for about 30 minutes to an hour', '14: Preheat oven with a pizza stone in it to 500ªF (260ºC) or a low broil', '15: Work each dough into a disk on a floured work surface', '16:  Knuckling the edges of the dough and tossing it gently will help thin it out', '17:  Be careful not to rip the dough', '18: Place the dough disk onto a pizza peel generously floured with semolina or cornmeal', '19:  This will prevent sticking', '20:  Top with desired sauce, cheese, and toppings', '21: Slide the pizza onto the stone and bake for about 9 minutes, watching carefully to make sure it doesn’t burn', '22:  Look for the edges to become charred and crispy and the cheese to bubble', '23: Let the pizza cool for 5 to 10 minutes before cutting and serving']

ingredients: ['1.25 oz yeast (7 g)', '½ cup granulated sugar (110 g) plus 1 pinch granulated sugar divided', '1 cup warm water (245 mL) plus 3 tablespoons warm water divided', '6 tablespoons coconut oil melted divided plus more for greasing bowl', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '3 cups all-purpose flour (375 g) plus more as needed', '1 ½ teaspoons salt']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, combine the 1', '2: 25 oz yeast and a pinch of sugar', '3:  Pour 1 cup (240 ml) of warm water over the 1', '4: 25 oz yeast mixture while turning the bowl so it stirs itself', '5:  Rest for 5 minutes, or until the 1', '6: 25 oz yeast has bloomed and is bubbly, then add 2 1 cup warm water (245 mL) plus 3 6 tablespoons of melted coconut oil', '7: In a separate medium bowl, mix 3 1 cup warm water (245 mL) plus 3 6 tablespoons of melted coconut oil, the remaining 3 1 cup warm water (245 mL) plus 3 6 tablespoons of warm water, and the 2 teaspoons baking powder', '8: In a large bowl, whisk together 3 3 cups (385 g) of flour, the table 1 ½ teaspoons salt, and remaining ½ cup (110 g) of granulated sugar', '9:  While stirring, add the coconut oil and 1', '10: 25 oz yeast mixtures to the dry ingredients and combine with a spoon', '11:  Once the dough is smooth, gradually add up to 1 cup (125 g) of flour and incorporate by kneading the dough with your hands (you may not need all of the flour)', '12: Knead until the dough isn’t sticking to the sides of the bowl, then transfer to a large bowl greased with coconut oil', '13:  Cover with a damp towel and let rest on the counter for 2 hours, or until the dough has doubled in size', '14: Punch down the dough and turn out onto a floured workspace', '15:  Knead gently to get out any large air bubbles, and form into a log shape', '16:  Depending on the braid you are planning to do, cut the dough into the appropriate amount of even pieces', '17: Braid into desired shape (braiding options below) and transfer to a 2 teaspoons baking sheet lined with parchment paper', '18:  Cover with a damp towel and let rise again for 1 hour', '19: Preheat the oven to 325˚F (165˚C)', '20: Lightly brush the challah with melted coconut oil for a nice shine and bake for 25-30 minutes, brushing with more coconut oil halfway through, until golden brown', '21:  To check for doneness try knocking on the bottom of the bread', '22:  If it sounds hollow, it’s done!Cool completely on a wire rack before slicing']

ingredients: ['Filling', 'unsalted butter for greasing', '1 medium butternut squash', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '2 teaspoons freshly ground black pepper', '1 cup granulated sugar (200 g)', '2 large eggs room temperature', '½ cup milk (120 mL)', '½ stick unsalted butter melted and cooled', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon five spice', 'Topping', '1 cup light brown sugar (200 g)', '½ stick unsalted butter melted and cooled', '½ cup self-rising flour (65 g) such as white lily', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 cup pecan halves (125 g)']
instructions: ['1: Make the filling: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C)', '2:  Grease a 9-inch-wide, 2-inch-deep pie dish with butter', '3: Cut the butternut squash in half lengthwise and scoop out the seeds', '4:  Place the squash on an unlined baking sheet with the cut side up and drizzle the 3 tablespoons olive oil over each half', '5:  Sprinkle the squash with the salt and 2 teaspoons freshly ground black pepper, making sure to cover completely', '6:  Roast the squash until tender and beginning to 1 cup light brown, about 30 minutes', '7: Remove the squash from the oven and let sit until cool enough to handle, about 15 minutes', '8:  Reduce the oven temperature to 350°F (180°C)', '9: Peel the skin from the squash and transfer the flesh to a 2 large bowl', '10:  Use your hands to gently crush the squash into bite-size pieces', '11:  Add the 1 cup granulated 1 cup light 1 cup light brown sugar, eggs, ½ cup milk, melted butter, 1 teaspoon vanilla and five-spice', '12:  Use a wooden spoon to bring the mixture together, then pour into the prepared pie dish', '13: Make the topping: In a 1 medium bowl, stir together the 1 cup light brown 1 cup granulated 1 cup light 1 cup light brown sugar and melted butter with a wooden spoon', '14:  Add the ½ cup self-rising flour and salt and use your hands to mix until the texture resembles coarse sand', '15: Sprinkle the topping over the squash, covering completely', '16:  Arrange the pecans 1 cup pecan halves on top in concentric circles', '17: Bake until the top is golden 1 cup light brown and the squash begins to bubble underneath, about 30 minutes', '18:  Let cool slightly before serving']

ingredients: ['2 large russet potatoes', '¾ cup sour cream (170 g)', '2 cloves garlic minced', '½ teaspoon cumin', 'salt to taste', '½ teaspoon oregano', '8 corn tortillas', 'oil for frying', 'Optional Toppings:', 'sour cream to taste', 'salsa to taste', 'cotija cheese to taste', '¼ cup fresh cilantro (10 g) to taste']
instructions: ['1: Thoroughly wash the potatoes and peel the skin off', '2:  Cut into smaller pieces and place in a pot of cold water', '3: Bring to a boil over medium high heat and allow potatoes to cook until they are soft', '4: Place softened potatoes into a 2 large bowl', '5:  Mix in sour cream, 2 cloves garlic, ½ teaspoon cumin, salt pepper and ½ teaspoon oregano, and mash until well combined', '6: Wrap the 8 corn tortillas in a damp towel or paper towel and microwave for 15-20 seconds, so they don’t break', '7: On half of the tortilla, place about one Tbsp', '8:  of the potato mixture and spread it around', '9:  Fold the tortilla in half and repeat with the rest of the 8 corn tortillas', '10: Heat one inch of vegetable oil in a pan', '11:  Carefully, place the potato tacos in the pan, allowing them to cook for about two minutes on each side', '12: Once they have developed a golden color, remove from oil and strain excess oil off on a paper towel', '13: Serve with your favorite toppings']

ingredients: ['3 ⅓ cups sticky rice (1.3 kg) thai rice divided', 'cold water for soaking rice', '⅔ cup low sodium chicken broth (160 mL)', '2 lb lean ground pork (910 g)', '4 cloves garlic minced', '2 large shallots thinly sliced', '2 stalks lemongrass green tops discarded and pale yellow stalks minced', '⅓ cup galangal (50 g) 1 1/2 in (3 cm) peeled and finely grated', '⅓ cup fish sauce (80 g) plus more to taste', '½ cup fresh lime juice (120 mL)', '3 thai bird chiles minced', '4 scallions thinly sliced', '1 ½ cups fresh mint leaf (75 g) loosely packed chopped', '1 ½ cups fresh cilantro (60 g) leaves and soft stems roughly chopped', 'red cabbage or green cabbage for serving', 'english cucumber thinly sliced for serving', 'bean sprout for serving', 'lime wedge for serving', 'Special Equipment', 'large pot with tight-fitting lid and steamer insert']
instructions: ['1: Place 3 cups (690 G) Thai sticky rice in a medium bowl and cover with cold water by at least 1 inch (2 ½ cm)', '2:  Cover with plastic wrap and soak overnight at room temperature', '3:  After the rice has soaked, drain and set aside', '4: Fill the large pot with 3 inches (7 cm) of water and bring to a steady simmer over medium-high heat', '5: Cut out a circle of parchment paper large enough to line the steamer insert and come 2 inches (5 cm) up the sides', '6: Place the parchment in the insert, add the rice, and spread in an even layer', '7:  Place the insert in the pot, cover with the lid, and steam until the rice is translucent and tender, 20-30 minutes', '8:  Turn off the heat, but keep the rice covered so it stays warm while you prepare the larb', '9: Toast the remaining ⅓ cup (75 G) rice in a small pan over medium-high heat, stirring constantly, until light golden brown, about 5 minutes', '10:  Immediately pour the rice into a small bowl and let cool completely', '11: Grind the toasted rice in a spice grinder or mortar and pestle until finely 2 lb lean ground', '12:  Set aside', '13: Heat the chicken stock in a wok or large pan over medium heat', '14:  Once the stock is steaming, add the pork', '15:  Break up the meat with a wooden spoon and cook gently, stirring occasionally, until just cooked through and no longer pink, 8-10 minutes', '16:  Turn off the heat and stir in the 4 cloves garlic, shallots, 2 stalks lemongrass, and galangal', '17: Add the fish sauce, ½ cup fresh lime juice, chiles, 4 scallions, mint, cilantro, and toasted rice to the pork mixture and stir to combine', '18:  Season with more fish sauce, if desired', '19: Serve the larb with the sticky rice, red cabbage leaves, cucumbers, bean sprouts, and ½ cup fresh lime wedges']

ingredients: ['1 cup granulated sugar (200 g)', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '½ teaspoon ground cardamom', '1 teaspoon nutmeg', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '¼ teaspoon ground cloves', '4 medium bosc pears', '1 premade pie crust', '1 large egg', '1 teaspoon coarse brown sugar for sprinkling', 'ice cream for serving']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: In a small bowl, combine the 1 cup granulated 1 teaspoon 1 teaspoon coarse brown sugar, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, ½ teaspoon ground cardamom, 1 teaspoon nutmeg, 1 teaspoon ground ginger, and ¼ teaspoon ground cloves', '4: On a cutting board, cut the 4 medium bosc pears lengthwise in 2 halves, removing the cores', '5:  Slice into ¹⁄₁₆-inch (1 mm) thick slices', '6:  Slice all the way through, but keep the pear halves together', '7: Lay the 1 premade pie crust on the prepared baking sheet and arrange the pear halves on top, separating the slices to cover the center of the crust, leaving a 1-inch (2 cm) border around the edge', '8: Sprinkle the 1 cup granulated 1 teaspoon 1 teaspoon coarse brown sugar spice mix over and between the pear slices', '9: Fold the edge of the crust over the 4 medium bosc pears', '10: Beat the 1 large egg in a small bowl, then brush over the crust', '11:  Sprinkle 1 teaspoon coarse 1 cup granulated 1 teaspoon 1 teaspoon coarse brown sugar on top of the 1 large egg wash', '12: Bake for 25 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown', '13: Serve warm, with ice cream if desired', '14: Enjoy']

ingredients: ['Smoky Sweet Chili Sauce', '¼ cup sweet chili sauce (60 mL) such as mae ploy divided plus 2 tablespoons divided', '1 tablespoon honey', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 tablespoon fresh lime juice', '1 ½ teaspoons liquid smoke', '2 cloves garlic grated', 'Mango Shrimp Skewers', '1 red bell pepper cut into 16 1 in (2 cm) pieces', '1 medium red onion cut in to 1 in (2 cm) pieces', '16 large shrimps peeled deveined and tails removed', '1 large mango peeled and cut into 16 1-inch (2 cm) pieces', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon fresh cilantro for garnish', 'Lime wedge for serving', 'Special Equipment', 'wooden skewer 10 in (25 cm)']
instructions: ['1: Soak the wooden skewers in cold water for at least 30 minutes before using', '2: Arrange one rack in the center and one rack in the upper third of the oven', '3:  Preheat the oven to 450°F (230°C)', '4: Make the sauce: Add ¼ ¼ cup (60 ml) sweet chili sauce, the 1 tablespoon honey, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, 1 tablespoon fresh lime juice, 1 ½ teaspoons liquid smoke, and 2 cloves garlic to a small bowl and whisk to combine', '5:  Set aside', '6: Build the skewers: Onto each wooden skewer, thread 1 piece of bell 1 red bell ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, 2–3 pieces of red onion, 1 shrimp, and 1 piece of 1 large mango', '7:  Repeat to make a second layer', '8:  Continue with the remaining ingredients and skewers', '9: Arrange the skewers on a rimmed baking sheet and season on both sides with the 1 teaspoon kosher salt and 1 red bell ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '10:  Brush both sides of the skewers with the smoky sweet chili sauce', '11: Transfer to the center oven rack and bake for 5 minutes', '12:  Turn the oven to broil and move the pan to the upper rack', '13:  Broil for 3–5 minutes, until lightly charred in spots', '14: Remove the skewers from the oven and brush with the remaining 2 tablespoons of sweet chili sauce', '15:  Transfer to a platter, sprinkle with the 1 tablespoon fresh cilantro, and serve with 1 tablespoon fresh lime wedges alongside']

ingredients: ['1 cup cornmeal (150 g)', '1 cup flour (125 g)', '¼ cup sugar (50 g)', '4 teaspoons baking powder', '¼ teaspoon salt', '⅛ teaspoon pepper', '1 egg', '1 cup milk (240 mL)', '5 hot dogs', '1 tablespoon flour', '1 qt vegetable oil (945 mL) for frying']
instructions: ['1: In a medium sized mixing bowl, whisk together dry ingredients', '2: Then add the 1 egg and 1 cup milk', '3:  Stir until batter is smooth with no lumps and chill in refrigerator for 25 minutes', '4: Cut the 5 hot dogs into ⅓ pieces and coat in flour to help batter to stick to the dogs', '5: Preheat 1 qt vegetable oil to 350ºF (180ºC)', '6: Dunk flour battered 5 hot dogs into corn dog batter by using a fork', '7:  Make sure to fully coat the dogs before frying in the 1 qt vegetable oil', '8: Fry at 350ºF (180ºC) for 3-4 minutes or until golden brown', '9:  For even cooking use a slotted steel spoon or a pair of tongs to rotate the floating corn dogs', '10: Dry off excess 1 qt vegetable oil with paper towels', '11: Serve with side of veggies or fruit']

ingredients: ['Dressing', '1 avocado halved', '1 clove garlic', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL)', '1 tablespoon fresh cilantro', '1 lime juiced', 'Salad', '1 head lettuce chopped', '1 cup bell pepper (100 g) chopped', '¼ cup fresh cilantro (10 g)', '15 oz black beans (425 g) 1 can', '½ cup red onion (75 g) chopped', '15 oz corn (425 g) 1 can', '¼ cup scallion (35 g)', '¾ cup tomato (150 g) chopped']
instructions: ['1: Add all dressing ingredients to a blender, blend until smooth', '2: In a large bowl add 1 head lettuce, peppers, cilantro, 15 oz black beans, ½ cup red onion, 15 oz corn, green ½ cup red onion, and tomatoes', '3: Top with prepared dressing; toss to coat']

ingredients: ['1 pork tenderloin', '1 cup flour (125 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '2 eggs', '1 cup plain breadcrumbs (115 g)', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 sweet onions sliced', '1 cup beer (235 mL)', '2 lemons juiced', '4 slices cheese quartered we used swiss', '½ head red cabbage thinly sliced', 'oil for frying']
instructions: ['1: Slice the 1 pork tenderloin into equal medallions, roughly ¼ inch (6 mm)', '2: Pound the cutlets thin', '3:  Slice into slider size, roughly 3 square inches (7 ½ cm)', '4: Mix 1 cup flour, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1 teaspoon pepper in one bowl', '5:  Whisk two 2 eggs in another bowl', '6:  Pour bread crumbs in the third bowl', '7: Dredge each cutlet in the 1 cup flour mix, then egg mix, then 1 cup plain breadcrumbs', '8: Heat up cooking oil in a large pan', '9:  Fry the cutlets until they are golden brown', '10: Set cutlets on a paper towel to remove excess grease', '11: Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a skillet over medium heat', '12:  Add sliced 2 sweet onions and cook until starting to brown', '13:  Pour 1 cup beer and stir occasionally', '14:  When the liquid is gone, the 2 sweet onions are ready', '15: Stack your sliders: 1 pork, lemon juice, 4 slices cheese, onion, sliced ½ head red cabbage, 1 pork, and insert a toothpick to hold the slider together', '16: Serve with dressing of choice (optional)']

ingredients: ['1 lb fresh strawberry  (455 g) quartered', '4 kiwis peeled and diced', '2 mangoes diced', '2 bananas sliced', '12 oz fresh blurberry (340 g)', '2 tablespoons honey', '1 lime juiced']
instructions: ['1: Quarter the strawberries and place into a large bowl', '2: Dice the mango and place on top of the strawberries', '3: Peel and dice the kiwi', '4:  Add into the bowl', '5: Slice 2 bananas and place in the bowl', '6:  Add in the blueberries', '7: In a small bowl mix 2 tablespoons honey and 1 lime juice', '8: Pour syrup over the fruit and mix', '9:  Mix well']

ingredients: ['2 teaspoons oil', '½ cup carrot (60 g) diced', '1 tablespoon garlic minced', '½ cup onion (75 g) diced', '½ cup bell pepper (50 g) diced', '½ cup broccoli floret (75 g)', '½ cup pea (75 g)', '⅓ cup corn', '3 eggs beaten', '3 cups white rice (600 g) cooked', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: In a wok or deep skillet, heat up the 2 teaspoons 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon sesame oil over high heat and cook carrots, onions, and 1 tablespoon garlic until onions are translucent', '2: Add ½ cup bell ½ cup bell peppers and ½ cup broccoli and cook an additional 3-4 minutes', '3:  Push all of the cooked vegetables to the side of the pan', '4: Beat the 3 eggs and pour into the cleared half of the pan', '5:  Scramble the 3 eggs and mix with the rest of the vegetables', '6: Add peas, ⅓ cup corn, 3 cups white rice, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 tablespoon sesame 2 teaspoons 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon sesame oil, and ½ cup bell pepper', '7:  Mix well and let the 3 cups white rice cook until slightly crispy']

ingredients: ['6 cups canola oil (1.5 L) for frying', '2 ¾ cups cake flour (345 g)', '¼ cup light brown sugar (55 g)', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon divided', '¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '⅛ teaspoon ground allspice', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '½ tablespoon baking powder', '⅔ cup unsweetened almond milk (160 mL) or non-dairy milk of choice', '¼ cup unsweetened almond milk (60 mL) or non-dairy milk of choice', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 granny smith apples peeled and finely chopped', '4 tablespoons margarine or vegan butter substitute melted', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 cups powdered sugar (240 g)', 'Preparation', '6 cups canola oil (1.5 L) for frying', '2 ¾ cups cake flour (345 g)', '¼ cup light brown sugar (55 g)', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon divided', '¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '⅛ teaspoon ground allspice', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '½ tablespoon baking powder', '⅔ cup unsweetened almond milk (160 mL) or non-dairy milk of choice', '¼ cup unsweetened almond milk (60 mL) or non-dairy milk of choice', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 granny smith apples peeled and finely chopped', '4 tablespoons margarine or vegan butter substitute melted', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 cups powdered sugar (240 g)', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Heat the canola oil in a large heavy-bottomed pot over medium heat until it reaches 350°F (180°C)', '2:  Set a wire rack inside a rimmed baking sheet', '3: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, brown sugar, ½ teaspoon cinnamon, the nutmeg, allspice, salt, and baking powder', '4: In a separate large bowl, whisk together ⅔ cup (160 ml) almond milk, the vegetable oil, apple, melted margarine, and vanilla', '5: Slowly add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients and stir until smooth', '6: Working in batches, scoop the batter in ¼-cup (60 ml) increments into the hot oil and fry until golden brown and cooked through, 4–5 minutes', '7:  Transfer the fritters to the wire rack with a slotted spoon and let cool', '8: Meanwhile, add the powdered sugar, remaining ½ teaspoon cinnamon, and remaining ¼ cup (60 ml) almond milk to a medium bowl and whisk until smooth', '9: Drizzle the glaze over the fritters and let set for 5 minutes before serving']

ingredients: ['Thai Curried Coconut Dressing', '1 tablespoon thai red curry paste', '2 tablespoons lime juice', '2 tablespoons fish sauce', '½ cup full fat canned coconut milk (120 mL)', '2 tablespoons dark agave nectar', 'Fried Shallots', 'neutral oil such as canola or vegetable for frying', '¼ cup shallot (10 g) thinly sliced', 'kosher salt to taste', 'corn starch or all-purpose flour for dusting', 'Grapefruit Salad', '2 cups grapefruit (450 g)', '1 cup green beans (150 g) thinly sliced', '1 fresno chilie thinly sliced', '1 cup bean sprout (100 g)', '1 cup red cabbage (100 g) thinly sliced', '3 oz sunflower greens (85 g)', '1 sprig fresh dill fronds', '8 fresh mint leaves torn', '10 fresh cilantro leaves', '¼ cup unsweetened shredded coconut (25 g) toasted', '¼ cup roasted peanut (30 g)']
instructions: ['1: Make the dressing: In a medium bowl, whisk together the 1 tablespoon thai red curry paste, 2 tablespoons lime juice, 2 tablespoons fish sauce, coconut milk, and 2 tablespoons dark agave until smooth', '2:  Refrigerate until ready to use', '3: Make the crispy shallots: Heat about ½ inch of neutral oil in a small saucepan over medium heat until it reaches 325°F (160°C)', '4: Lightly sprinkle the shallots with kosher salt and let stand for about 5 minutes to draw out the moisture', '5:   Place the shallots on a paper towel and pat to dry out and remove any excess liquid', '6:  Lightly dust the shallots with cornstarch', '7: Fry the shallots in the hot neutral oil until lightly browned, about 10 minutes', '8:  Remove from the neutral oil with a slotted spoon and place on a paper towel to drain any excess neutral oil', '9:  Set aside until ready to use', '10: Assemble the salad: In a large bowl, combine the 2 cups grapefruit segments, 1 cup 3 oz 3 oz sunflower green 1 cup 3 oz 3 oz sunflower green 1 cup beans, Fresno chiles, 1 cup 3 oz 3 oz sunflower green 1 cup bean sprouts, 1 cup red cabbage, 3 oz sunflower 1 cup 3 oz 3 oz sunflower greens, 1 sprig fresh dill, 8 fresh mint, cilantro, and crispy shallots', '11:  Drizzle in half of the dressing and lightly fold everything together, adding more dressing as desired', '12:  Add the toasted coconut and ¼ cup roasted peanuts', '13: Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['4 cups all-purpose flour (500 g)', '2 teaspoons salt divided', '1 ¼ cups warm water (300 mL)', '2 cups red cabbage (200 g)', '2 cups green onion (300 g) sliced', '6 cloves garlic minced', '4 tablespoons ginger minced', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 tablespoons sesame oil', '½ lb ground pork (225 g)', '½ teaspoon pepper', '¾ cup mushroom (55 g) diced', '¾ cup carrot (90 g) diced', '½ lb shrimp (225 g) peeled and deveined', 'Dipping Sauce', '¼ cup soy sauce (60 mL)', '¼ cup rice wine vinegar (60 mL)', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', '1 teaspoon crushed red pepper flake']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, combine the 4 cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon of 2 teaspoons salt, and the 1 ¼ cups warm water and mix until well-combined', '2: Roll out dough on a 4 cups all-purpose floured surface and knead until smooth', '3: Divide the dough into 4 equal parts', '4: Roll out 1 piece of dough into a thin log and divide into 6 or 8 pieces, depending on the size of dumplings you want', '5:  Repeat with the remaining dough portions', '6: Lightly 4 cups all-purpose flour the dough pieces and roll out 1 piece into a thin circle roughly 4-inches (10 cm) in diameter', '7: Keep the dumpling wrappers separated with a small piece of parchment paper and repeat with the remaining dough', '8: Combine the 2 cups red cabbage, 2 cups green onions, 6 cloves garlic, 4 tablespoons ginger, 2 tablespoons ¼ cup soy sauce, and 2 tablespoons 1 teaspoon sesame oil in a medium bowl and mix until well-incorporated', '9: For the pork filling, combine the ½ lb ground pork with the remaining teaspoon of 2 teaspoons salt, the pepper and 1 cup (125g) of the 2 cups red cabbage mixture and stir until well-incorporated', '10: For the veggie filling, combine the mushrooms and carrot and microwave for 3 minutes, until soft', '11:  Add 1 cup (125g) of the 2 cups red cabbage mixture and stir until well-incorporated', '12: For the ½ lb shrimp filling, combine the ½ lb shrimp with 1 cup (125g) of the 2 cups red cabbage mixture and stir until well-incorporated', '13: To assemble the dumplings, add roughly 1 heaping tablespoon of filling to the center of a dumpling wrapper', '14:  With your finger, lightly coat half of the outside of the wrapper with water', '15:  Fold the moistened half of the wrapper over the filling and, using your fingers, pleat the edges to seal', '16:  Repeat with the remaining fillings and wrappers', '17: Heat the oil over medium high in a large skillet and add a few dumplings, cooking them in batches', '18:  Once the bottoms of the dumplings start to brown, add a splash of water and cover with a lid', '19:  Steam for about 5 minutes, or until the dumplings are cooked and the water has evaporated', '20:  Transfer the cooked dumplings to a paper towel-lined plate to remove any excess moisture or grease', '21: In a small bowl, combine the 2 tablespoons ¼ cup soy sauce, rice vinegar, 2 tablespoons 1 teaspoon sesame oil, and pepper flakes and stir to combine', '22:  Serve the dumplings immediately with the dipping sauce']

ingredients: ['Candied Lemons', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '1 cup granulated sugar (200 g)', '1 lemon thinly sliced about 9 slices', 'Cake', '8 tablespoons unsalted butter room temperature divided plus 1 tablespoon', '1 cup flour (125 g) divided plus 3 tablespoons', '1 ¼ cups granulated sugar (250 g)', '4 large eggs room temperature', '½ teaspoon lemon extract', '2 teaspoons lemon zest packed divided', '½ cup stone ground yellow cornmeal (75 g)', '2 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 cup whole milk ricotta cheese (250 g) room temperature', '2 tablespoons powdered sugar', '4 strawberries thinly sliced', '¼ cup blueberry (25 g)']
instructions: ['1: Line a 2 ½ teaspoons baking sheet with parchment paper', '2: Make the candied lemons: In a high-walled, wide pan, combine the 1 cup granulated 1 ¼ cups granulated 2 tablespoons powdered sugar and water', '3:  Bring to a boil over medium-high heat, stirring to dissolve the 1 cup granulated 1 ¼ cups granulated 2 tablespoons powdered sugar', '4: Add the lemon slices to the pan, making sure they are submerged in the syrup', '5:   Reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer until the lemons have softened and have started to caramelize, about 35 minutes', '6: Gently transfer the lemon slices to the prepared 2 ½ teaspoons baking sheet and let cool completely, about 20 minutes', '7:  The candied lemons can be made up to 2 days in advance', '8:  Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator and bring to room temperature before using', '9:  (The syrup can be strained, cooled, and kept in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks', '10:  Try adding it to cocktails and desserts!)Make the cake: Arrange a rack in the center of the oven', '11:  Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '12:  Grease a 9-inch (23 cm) nonstick springform pan with 1 tablespoon of butter', '13:  Add 3 tablespoons of flour to the greased pan and tilt to coat completely', '14:  Turn the pan over and tap out any excess flour', '15:  Set aside', '16: In a 4 large bowl, beat the remaining butter with an electric hand mixer on high speed until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes', '17:  With the mixer running, add the 1 cup granulated 1 ¼ cups granulated 2 tablespoons powdered sugar and beat until evenly incorporated, about 3 minutes', '18:  Reduce the mixer speed to medium-low and add the eggs, 1 at a time, making sure to fully incorporate each before adding the next', '19:  Stir in the lemon extract and 1 teaspoon of lemon zest', '20:  Set aside', '21: In a medium bowl, whisk together the remaining cup of flour, the cornmeal, 2 ½ teaspoons baking powder, and salt', '22: Add the wet ingredients to the flour mixture and whisk until the batter is smooth,  scraping down the sides of the bowl as needed', '23:  Add the ricotta and stir just until combined, but do not overmix', '24: Set the prepared pan on a 2 ½ teaspoons baking sheet', '25:  Pour the batter into the pan and use a spatula to smooth the top', '26: Bake for 45 minutes, or until the sides and top of the cake are golden brown and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean', '27: Transfer the cake to a wire rack and let cool for at least 45 minutes', '28:  Once the cake begins to pull away from the sides of the pan, release the springform', '29:  With a wide metal spatula, gently transfer the cooled cake to a cake platter', '30: Dust the top of the cake with the powdered 1 cup granulated 1 ¼ cups granulated 2 tablespoons powdered sugar', '31:  Top with the 4 strawberries, blueberries, and lemon slices and sprinkle with the remaining teaspoon of lemon zest']

ingredients: ['1 lb penne pasta (455 g)', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL) plus 2 tablespoons', '4 cloves garlic cloves diced', '1 lb chicken breast (455 g) cubed', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '½ cup chicken broth (120 mL)', '1 lb aspargus (455 g)', '1 cup grated parmesan cheese (110 g)', '2 cups cherry tomatoes (400 g) or grape tomatoes']
instructions: ['1: In a pot, cook pasta according to package instructions, drain, then set aside', '2: In the same pot, heat 2 tablespoons ¼ cup olive oil and sauté 2 garlic 4 cloves', '3: Add chicken breasts, season with salt and pepper, and fully cook', '4:  Remove cooked chicken from pot and set aside', '5: In the same pot, pour the chicken broth, then add asparagus, salt, pepper, and the remaining garlic and stir', '6:  Cover and reduce heat to a simmer for 5 minutes', '7: Add cooked chicken, 1 lb penne, remaining ¼ cup olive oil, 1 cup grated parmesan, and 2 cups cherry tomatoes, and stir until fully incorporated and the cheese has melted', '8: Serve while hot']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon canola oil', '1 lb ground beef (455 g)', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 cloves garlic finely chopped', '1 medium onion chopped', '2 cups marinara sauce (520 g) divided', '6 lasagna sheets', '1 cup ricotta cheese (250 g)', '1 cup mozzarella cheese (115 g)', '2 tablespoons fresh basil chopped']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350° F (180°C)', '2: Heat the 1 tablespoon canola oil in a cast-iron skillet over high heat', '3: Cook the 1 lb ground beef, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, and 1 teaspoon ground black pepper until the moisture has evaporated and the 1 lb ground beef is starting to brown', '4: Add the 2 cloves garlic and 1 medium onion and cook until 1 medium onions are starting to become translucent', '5: Add one cup (260 g) of the 2 cups marinara sauce and cook until the sauce has reduced to a paste', '6: Using a large spoon or a spatula, push some of the 1 lb ground beef mixture toward the side of the pan, creating a gap that allows you to slide 6 lasagna sheets underneath the 1 lb ground beef', '7:  Break about two 6 lasagna sheets in order to fill in the cracks', '8: Top the 1 lb ground beef mixture with the rest of the 6 lasagna sheets', '9:  Spread the rest of the 2 cups marinara sauce on top of the sheets', '10:  Dollop the ricotta on top of the sauce and spread evenly', '11: Sprinkle the mozzarella cheese over the ricotta, and top with the 2 tablespoons fresh basil', '12: Bake for 25 minutes until cheese is bubbly and golden brown', '13: Cool, slice, then serve']

ingredients: ['1 cup unsweetened almond milk (240 mL)', '1 cup frozen pineapple (245 g)', '1 banana sliced', '½ cup frozen peas (75 g)', '2 tablespoons pumpkin seeds', '1 cup kale (100 g) chopped']
instructions: ['1: In a blender, combine the 1 cup unsweetened almond milk, 1 cup frozen pineapple, 1 banana, ½ cup frozen peas, 2 tablespoons pumpkin seeds, and 1 cup kale', '2:  Blend until smooth']

ingredients: ['¼ cup extra virgin olive oil (60 mL) plus 6 tablespoons divided', '2 yellow onions thinly sliced', 'fine sea salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 cloves garlic finely chopped', '1 leek thinly sliced', '1 bunch asparagus thinly sliced', '4 scallions thinly sliced', '¾ cup frozen peas (110 g) or fresh peas', '1 lemon zested divided', '2 large eggs', '1 cup ricotta cheese (250 g)', '¼ cup grated parmesan cheese (30 g)', '6 tablespoons unsalted butter melted', '10 sheets frozen phyllo thawed', 'flaky sea salt for sprinkling']
instructions: ['1: In a 2 large skillet over medium heat, sauté the 2 yellow onions in ¼ cup (60 ml) of olive oil, stirring often, for 15 minutes', '2: Season with fine sea flaky sea salt and freshly ground black pepper, reduce the heat to medium-low, and add the 2 cloves garlic and 1 leek', '3:  Continue to cook, stirring often, until the 2 yellow onions are very golden and tender, 15 minutes', '4: Stir in the 1 bunch asparagus and 4 scallions and continue to sauté for 5 minutes', '5:  Stir in the peas and half of the 1 lemon zest and cook 1 minute', '6:  Remove the pan from the heat, and set aside to cool completely', '7: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C)', '8: In a 2 large bowl, whisk together the eggs, ricotta, Parmesan, and remaining 1 lemon zest', '9:  Season with fine sea flaky sea salt and freshly ground black pepper', '10:  Fold in the cooled vegetable mixture', '11: In a small bowl, whisk together the remaining 6 ¼ cup extra virgin olive oil (60 mL) plus 6 6 tablespoons of olive oil and the melted butter', '12:  Place one phyllo sheet on a work surface (make sure to cover the remaining phyllo 10 sheets with a slightly damp paper towel to prevent them from drying out)', '13: Use a pastry brush to lightly brush the sheet with the oil-butter mixture', '14:  Top with another sheet and brush again', '15:  Repeat until you have 5 10 sheets stacked, finishing with the butter-oil mixture', '16: Cut the stack of phyllo into four equal rectangles', '17: Repeat the stacking and cutting with the remaining phyllo 10 sheets', '18: Brush eight 8-ounce (225 g) ramekins with the oil-butter mixture', '19: Press a rectangle of phyllo into each of prepared ramekins (it’s okay if they break a bit), and divide the vegetable mixture among the prepared cups', '20:  Fold the edges over the filling, leaving the center slightly exposed', '21:  Brush lightly with the oil-butter mixture and sprinkle with flaky fine sea flaky sea salt', '22: Transfer the ramekins to a baking sheet and bake until the phyllo is golden brown and crisp, 30-35 minutes']

ingredients: ['olive oil drizzle', '1 cup yellow onion (150 g) diced', '1 orange bell pepper diced', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '½ teaspoon cumin', '½ teaspoon paprika', '3 cloves garlic chopped', '28 oz crushed tomatoes (795 g) 1 can', '1 bay leaf', '1 ½ cups fresh baby kale (100 g)', '4 large eggs', '¼ cup feta cheese (25 g) crumble', 'bread toasted for serving']
instructions: ['1: Heat a 4 large cast iron skillet over medium-low heat', '2: Once the pan is hot, add the olive oil and swirl to coat the pan', '3:  Add the 1 cup yellow onion, 1 orange bell 1 orange bell pepper, salt, and 1 orange bell pepper', '4:  Sauté 5 minutes, or until the 1 cup yellow onion is almost translucent', '5: Add the ½ teaspoon cumin, ½ teaspoon paprika, and 3 cloves garlic', '6:  Sauté 2-3 minutes, or until the 3 cloves garlic is slightly brown', '7: Pour in the 28 oz crushed tomatoes and add the 1 bay leaf', '8:  Simmer for 10-15 minutes, or until the mixture has thickened', '9: Stir in the 1 ½ cups fresh baby kale until wilted', '10: Reduce the heat to low, then carefully crack the eggs into the sauce', '11:  Cover and simmer until the egg whites are set, about 10-12 minutes', '12: Top with the ¼ cup feta cheese and remove the pan from the heat']

ingredients: ['2 tubes cinnamon roll refrigerated with icing', '4 tablespoons butter melted', '6 eggs', '½ cup milk (120 mL)', '2 teaspoons cinnamon', '2 teaspoons vanilla', '1 cup maple syrup (220 g)']
instructions: ['1: Cut each cinnamon roll into 8 pieces', '2: In a separate bowl, whisk the 6 eggs, milk, 2 teaspoons vanilla, and cinnamon', '3:  Set it aside', '4: Pour the 4 tablespoons butter on the bottom of a 9 X 13 inch (22cm x 33cm) glass baking dish', '5:  Spread the cinnamon roll pieces evenly over the 4 tablespoons butter', '6:   Then pour the mixture over the cinnamon rolls', '7:   Pour 1 cup of maple syrup over the mixture', '8: Bake at 375°F(190°C) for 25 min', '9: Top with the icing from the cinnamon rolls']

ingredients: ['Kaiserschmarren', '8 large eggs separated', '½ cup dark raisins (75 g)', 'vanilla bean', '6 tablespoons rum', '2 cups crème fraîche (480 g)', '4 tablespoons all-purpose flour', 'kosher salt pinch', '¼ teaspoon cream of tartar', '1 ½ cups granulated sugar (300 g)', '4 tablespoons unsalted butter at room temperature for brushing', 'sugar for coating', 'Strawberry Sauce', '1 ½ lb strawberry (630 g) small strawberries hulled or hulled and halved large berries 4 cups total', '½ vanilla bean or 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '¼ cup orange juice (60 mL)', '¼ cup granulated sugar (50 g)', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', 'star anise whole as desired', '1 cup confectioners sugar (120 g) for serving']
instructions: ['1: Position a rack in the center of the oven', '2:  Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C)', '3: Separate egg yolk and egg whites into 2 bowls', '4: Meanwhile, put the raisins and 6 6 4 4 1 tablespoons rum in a 1 ½ lb strawberry (630 g) small bowl and steep for about 10 minutes', '5: Put the 2 cups crème fraîche, ½ cup sugar (100 G), egg yolks, raisins, and 1 6 4 4 1 tablespoon of the 6 6 4 4 1 tablespoons rum in a mixing bowl', '6:  Whisk until blended', '7:  Stir in the 4 4 4 1 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '8: Put the egg whites in a 8 1 ½ lb strawberry (630 g) 1 ½ lb strawberry (630 g) small strawberries hulled or hulled and halved large, clean mixing bowl', '9:  Add the ¼ teaspoon cream of tartar and kosher salt', '10:  With a hand-held electric mixer on medium speed, beat until thick and foamy', '11:  Then, still beating, gradually add 1 cup (200 G) of sugar', '12:  Continue beating until soft peaks form when the beaters are lifted out', '13: Drop a 8 1 ½ lb strawberry (630 g) 1 ½ lb strawberry (630 g) small strawberries hulled or hulled and halved large scoop of the meringue onto the egg yolk batter', '14:  With a flexible rubber spatula, gently fold the whites into the batter to lighten it', '15:  Scoop the remaining meringue over the batter and gently fold it in', '16: Coat a medium ovenproof skillet with the 4 4 1 tablespoons unsalted butter', '17:  Sprinkle in sugar and shake and rotate to coat the 4 4 1 tablespoons unsalted butter', '18:  Tap out any excess', '19: Gently scrape the batter into the prepared skillet', '20:  Smooth the top', '21:  Bake in the preheated oven until puffed, golden brown on top, and springy to a gentle touch at its center, 10 to 12 minutes', '22: While the batter bakes, in a nonreactive skillet stir together the berries, lemon juice, ¼ cup (50 G) sugar, orange juice and zest, vanilla, and star anise', '23:  Cook over medium-low heat, stirring to help the sugar dissolve and mashing a few of the berries to help thicken the sauce', '24: Divide the compote among serving plates', '25:  With a 8 1 ½ lb strawberry (630 g) 1 ½ lb strawberry (630 g) small strawberries hulled or hulled and halved large serving spoon, scoop up 8 1 ½ lb strawberry (630 g) 1 ½ lb strawberry (630 g) small strawberries hulled or hulled and halved large dollops of the Kaiserschmarren, distributing them evenly on top of the compote', '26:  Dust generously with confectioners sugar', '27:  Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['1 small onion diced', '1 tablespoon garlic minced', '1 lb ground beef (455 g)', '2 tablespoons taco seasoning', '1 lb pizza dough (455 g) rolled out into a rectangle', '1 cup mexican cheese blend (100 g)', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'salsa for dipping', 'guacamole for dipping']
instructions: ['1: Sauté onions and 1 tablespoon garlic until transparent', '2:  Add the 1 lb ground beef and 2 tablespoons taco seasoning', '3:  Cook until browned', '4:  Remove from heat and set aside', '5: Preheat oven to 425˚F (220˚C)', '6: On a floured surface, cut the 1 lb pizza dough into 5 strips and place spoonfuls of the beef mixture into the middle of each strip, followed by the Mexican cheese blend', '7: Fold and pinch the dough around the cheese and meat along the entire strip, ensuring to close off the ends', '8: Brush each breadstick with 1 tablespoon olive oil and transfer to a baking sheet', '9: Bake for 10 minutes', '10: Remove from the oven and top each breadstick with more cheese', '11: Bake for another 5 minutes or until the cheese is golden brown']

ingredients: ['2 ripe bananas', '1 cup sugar (200 g)', '½ cup unsalted butter (130 g) melted plus 1 tablespoon', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '¾ cup flour (95 g)', '¼ cup cocoa powder (40 g) plus 1 tablespoon', '⅛ teaspoon salt', '½ cup creamy peanut butter (120 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: In a bowl, use a fork to mash the 2 ripe bananas', '3:  Add the sugar, ½ cup (115 g) of butter, and 1 teaspoon vanilla, and whisk until combined', '4: Add the flour, ⅛ teaspoon salt, and cocoa powder, and whisk until fully incorporated', '5: Use the remaining 1 tablespoon of butter to grease a 9x9-inch (23x23 cm) baking tray', '6: Use the remaining 1 tablespoon of cocoa powder to dust every side of the baking tray', '7: Pour batter into prepared baking dish', '8: Use a spoon to add dollops of peanut butter on top of the batter', '9:  Use a butter knife to swirl the peanut butter into the brownie batter', '10: Bake for 25-30 minutes, until center no longer jiggles when pan is shaken', '11: Allow brownies to cool completely before cutting']

ingredients: ['1 lb ground beef (455 g)', '1 cup onion (150 g) diced', '1 tablespoon garlic minced', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '2 tablespoons worcestershire sauce', '2 tablespoons ketchup', '4 cups beef broth (945 mL)', '16 oz fusilli pasta (455 g)', '3 cups shredded cheddar cheese (300 g)', '½ cup milk (120 mL)', 'green onion sliced to serve']
instructions: ['1: In a large pot over a medium-high heat, add 1 lb ground 1 lb ground 4 cups beef, onions, 1 tablespoon garlic, 1 teaspoon salt, ½ teaspoon pepper, 2 tablespoons worcestershire sauce, and 2 tablespoons ketchup', '2:  Break up the 1 lb ground 4 cups beef to incorporate the seasonings and cook until browned, about 6-7 minutes', '3: Pour in the 1 lb ground 4 cups beef broth and one cup of water and bring to a simmer', '4: Add the 16 oz fusilli pasta and simmer for 20 minutes or until the 16 oz fusilli pasta is cooked throughout and the broth has cooked down, stirring occasionally', '5: Pour in the milk and 3 cups shredded cheddar cheese', '6:  Stir until the 3 cups shredded cheddar cheese has melted', '7: Serve garnished with some sliced green onions']

ingredients: ['16 tablespoons unsalted butter room temperature', '1 ½ cups sugar (300 g)', '1 large egg', '2 large egg yolks divided', '2 teaspoons almond extract', '3 cups all-purpose flour (375 g)', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon water', '1 teaspoon red food coloring']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, cream the 16 tablespoons unsalted butter and 1 ½ cups sugar together with an electric hand mixer for 5 minutes, or until light and fluffy', '2: Add the egg, then 1 egg yolk, beating to incorporate after each addition', '3: Add the 2 teaspoons almond extract and beat to combine', '4: Sift the 3 cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking soda, and ½ teaspoon kosher salt into the bowl and beat for 3 minutes, or until a crumbly dough forms', '5: Turn out the dough onto a sheet of plastic wrap and fold the wrap over the dough on all 4 sides to create a square dough block about ½ inch (1 ¼ cm) thick', '6:  Refrigerate the dough for 2 hours', '7: Preheat the oven to 325˚F (165˚C)', '8:  Line a 1 teaspoon baking sheet with parchment paper', '9: Unwrap the dough on a cutting board and cut into 25 cubes', '10: Roll the dough cubes into balls, then flatten slightly and place on the prepared 1 teaspoon baking sheet', '11: In a small bowl, beat the remaining egg yolk with the 1 teaspoon water', '12: Brush a thick layer of egg wash onto the cookies', '13: Add the 1 teaspoon red food coloring to a small bowl', '14:  Dip the thicker end of a wooden chopstick into the food coloring and make a dot in the center of each cookie', '15: Bake for 35 minutes, or until the cookies are golden', '16: Let the cookies cool on a wire rack for 30 minutes before serving']

ingredients: ['½ cup oil (100 mL)', '4 eggs', '1 pinch salt', '½ lb boneless skinless chicken breast (200 g) sliced', '1 ¾ cups rice (400 g) cooked', '5 oz mixed vegetable (150 g)', '¼ cup light soy sauce (50 mL)', '1 oz spring onion (30 g)']
instructions: ['1: Heat a wok over medium-high heat for 5 minutes', '2:  Add the ½ cup oil then stir in 4 eggs and fry until just cooked', '3:  Once cooked, remove 4 eggs from the wok and set aside', '4: Heat up the wok until smoking hot and pour in the ½ cup oil', '5: Add the ½ lb boneless skinless chicken breast and fry until they are just cooked', '6: Add the 1 ¾ cups rice and keep frying until they turn slightly brown', '7: Add the vegetables and fry everything together until they are thoroughly cooked', '8: Pour in the ¼ cup light soy sauce and stir', '9: Add the cooked 4 eggs back in and toss them around until they break into pieces', '10: Add in the 1 oz spring onions and serve']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons canola oil', '1 ½ tablespoons garlic minced', '1 fresh ginger peeled and thinly sliced', '1 shallot thinly sliced', '½ cup cherry tomato (100 g)', '1 lb mussels (425 g) scubbed and debearded', '2 serrano peppers', '3 long red peppers', '½ cup chinese long beans (100 g) cut into 2 in (5 cm) pieces', '2 cups vegetable broth (480 mL)', '2 tablespoons tamarind paste', '1 tablespoon fish sauce plus more to taste', '2 cups baby spinach (80 g)', 'For Serving', '1 radish thinly sliced', '1 scallion thinly sliced', 'jasmine rice cooked', 'Preparation', '2 tablespoons canola oil', '1 ½ tablespoons garlic minced', '1 fresh ginger peeled and thinly sliced', '1 shallot thinly sliced', '½ cup cherry tomato (100 g)', '1 lb mussels (425 g) scubbed and debearded', '2 serrano peppers', '3 long red peppers', '½ cup chinese long beans (100 g) cut into 2 in (5 cm) pieces', '2 cups vegetable broth (480 mL)', '2 tablespoons tamarind paste', '1 tablespoon fish sauce plus more to taste', '2 cups baby spinach (80 g)', 'For Serving', '1 radish thinly sliced', '1 scallion thinly sliced', 'jasmine rice cooked', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Heat the canola oil in a large pan with a lid over medium-high heat', '2:  Add the garlic, ginger, and shallot and sweat until starting to soften, 2–3 minutes', '3: Add the cherry tomatoes', '4:  Sauté until the tomatoes begin to pop and release some of their juices, 2–3 minutes', '5: Add the mussels, serrano peppers, long red peppers, and Chinese long beans', '6:  Cook for 1 minute, then pour in the fish stock', '7:  Cover and steam until the mussels open, 2–3 minutes', '8: Add the tamarind paste, fish sauce, and water spinach', '9:  Cook until the spinach is wilted, 2 minutes', '10:  Discard any mussels that have not opened', '11: Ladle the soup into bowls and garnish with the radish and scallion', '12:  Serve hot with jasmine rice']

ingredients: ['10 oz farfalle pasta (285 g) "bow-tie" pasta', '3 breasts chicken', '3 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste ', '2 heads romaine lettuce cut into 1-2 inch (3cm - 5cm) pieces', '1 cup grape tomatoes (200 g) cut in half', '1 cup crouton (30 g)', 'parmesan cheese to taste', '¾ cup caesar dressing (190 g)']
instructions: ['1: Boil water, add the 10 oz farfalle pasta, and cook according to package instructions', '2:  Drain water, and let the 10 oz farfalle pasta chill', '3: Meanwhile, season each of the chicken 3 breasts with 1 Tbsp', '4:  3 tablespoons olive oil, salt, and pepper', '5: Grill for six to eight minutes on each side', '6:  Cut the chicken into bite-size pieces', '7: In a large bowl combine 10 oz farfalle pasta, 2 heads romaine lettuce, 1 cup grape tomatoes, chicken, croutons, parmesan, and Caesar dressing', '8:  Toss gently', '9: Nutrition  Calories: 3059 Fat: 110 grams  Carbs: 267 grams Fiber: 22 grams  Sugars: 22 grams  Protein: 242 grams']

ingredients: ['Dry Rub and Ribs', '3 tablespoons light brown sugar', '1 ½ teaspoons cumin', '1 ½ teaspoons garlic powder', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '2 teaspoons mustard powder', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '1 tablespoon paprika', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '2 lb baby back ribs (910 g) membrane removed', '3 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '1 cup water (240 mL)', 'Barbecue Sauce', '3 tablespoons dijon mustard', '½ teaspoon cayenne', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '3 tablespoons honey', '1 ½ tablespoons fresh ginger grated', '3 cloves garlic grated', '¼ cup ketchup (60 g) plus 2 tablespoons', '1 tablespoon worcestershire sauce', '1 tablespoon molasses', '3 tablespoons apple cider vinegar']
instructions: ['1: Make the dry rub: In a medium bowl, combine the 3 tablespoons light brown sugar, 1 ½ teaspoons cumin, garlic powder, 1 teaspoon onion powder, ginger, mustard powder, salt, 1 teaspoon chili powder, 1 tablespoon paprika, and ½ teaspoon red ½ teaspoon red ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper flakes', '2:  Mix well with a fork', '3: Place the 2 lb baby back ribs on a cutting board and generously coat on all sides with the dry rub, pressing it into the meat', '4: Add the apple cider vinegar and 1 cup water to the basin of the Instant Pot', '5: Place the rack insert in the bottom and set the 2 lb baby back ribs on the rack on their side, spiraling around the inside of the pot', '6:  Close the lid to the Instant Pot, making sure the vent is set to sealing', '7:  Select manual pressure and set the pressure to high', '8:  Set the timer for 28 minutes', '9:  Allow natural release for 5 minutes, then set to venting to release the remaining pressure', '10: While the 2 lb baby back ribs are cooking, make the barbecue sauce: In a medium bowl, combine the mustard, ½ teaspoon cayenne, salt, ½ teaspoon red ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, 3 tablespoons honey, ginger, garlic, ¼ cup ketchup, Worcestershire sauce, and apple cider vinegar and mix well', '11: When the 2 lb baby back ribs have about 10 minutes of cooking time left, arrange an oven rack in the upper third of the oven and turn the broiler on high', '12:  Line a baking sheet with foil', '13: Transfer the 2 lb baby back ribs to the prepared baking sheet', '14:  Brush liberally with the barbecue sauce', '15: Broil the 2 lb baby back ribs for 2–4 minutes, until the sauce begins to caramelize', '16: Remove the 2 lb baby back ribs from the oven and brush with another coat of sauce', '17: Slice into individual 2 lb baby back ribs and serve immediately with the remaining barbecue sauce alongside']

ingredients: ['1 cup blueberry (100 g)', '1 cup raspberry (125 g)', '1 cup strawberry (150 g)', '2 cups milk (480 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Mix fruits together in a plastic bag', '2: Seal bag and place in freezer for up to 6 months', '3: When ready, mix 2 cups milk and fruit in a blender until consistency is smooth']

ingredients: ['Frozen Yogurt', '1 lb greek yogurt (500 g)', '2 tablespoons honey', '1 stalk vanilla bean scraped', 'Chocolate Chip Cookies', '1 ½ cups rolled oats (180 g)', '½ cup coconut oil (100 g) melted', '¼ cup honey (85 g)', '2 teaspoons vanilla', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 pinch salt', '¼ cup chocolate chips (80 g)']
