instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 375 ̊F/190 ̊C', '2: Combine the Greek yogurt, honey, and vanilla in a bowl', '3:  Transfer to a freezer-safe container and freeze for 2 hours, or until consistency is thick and creamy but still scoopable', '4: Add the 1 ½ cups rolled oats to a bowl of a food processor and pulse until it becomes a flour-like consistency', '5: Combine ½ cup coconut oil, honey, vanilla, and 1 egg in a large bowl', '6:  Add in oats, 1 teaspoon baking soda, and a 1 pinch of salt and mix until thoroughly incorporated', '7:  Fold in ¼ cup chocolate chips', '8:  5', '9:  Using an ice cream scoop or a tablespoon, form 8 balls of cookie dough and place onto a 1 teaspoon baking sheet lined with parchment paper', '10: Using your hands or the back of a spoon, press down firmly on each ball to form a cookie shape', '11:  Bake for 8-10 minutes, or until golden brown on the edges', '12: Let cool for about 10 minutes', '13:  While the cookies are cooling, you may want to remove ice cream from the freezer and let sit out to soften', '14: Flip cookies over so the flat sides are facing up', '15:  Add one scoop of frozen yogurt to 4 of the cookies', '16:  Use the remaining 4 cookies to form sandwiches by placing on top of the ice cream scoop and pressing down very gently to slowly spread out the ice cream', '17:  Feel free to use a spoon to smooth out the ice cream instead', '18: Freeze for 1 hour, or to your liking', '19: Serve and enjoy!']

ingredients: ['2 lb medium butternut squash (910 g) peeled seeded roughly chopped', '1 medium yellow onion roughly chopped', '4 cloves garlic', 'olive oil to taste', '3 cups vegetable broth (720 mL)', '½ teaspoon ground ginger', '½ teaspoon ground cumin', '½ teaspoon ground coriander', '½ teaspoon paprika', '⅛ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 ½ teaspoons sea salt', '¼ teaspoon black pepper', '½ teaspoon fresh thyme', '¼ cup coconut milk (60 mL)', 'Optional Garnishes', 'pumpkin seed', 'fresh chive chopped']
instructions: ['1: Add the 2 lb medium butternut squash, 1 medium yellow onion, and 4 cloves garlic to a slow cooker', '2:  Drizzle with olive oil and add 3 cups vegetable broth, ½ teaspoon ground ginger, ½ teaspoon ground cumin, ½ teaspoon ground coriander, ½ teaspoon paprika, ⅛ teaspoon cayenne, 1 ½ teaspoons sea salt, and ⅛ teaspoon cayenne ¼ teaspoon black pepper', '3: Cover and cook on high heat for 4 hours', '4: Using a hand blender, blend the ingredients until smooth, or transfer to a standard blender or food processor and carefully puree', '5: Add the ½ teaspoon fresh thyme and ¼ cup coconut milk and blend to incorporate', '6: Garnish with pumpkin seeds and chives, if desired']

ingredients: ['Apple Cider Vinaigrette', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '1 teaspoon honey', '½ teaspoon dijon mustard', '¼ teaspoon salt', '1 pinch ground black pepper', 'Salad', '1 boneless skinless chicken breast sliced into 1/2-inch (1 cm) pieces', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ teaspoon paprika', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 pear sliced', '2 cups baby spinach (80 g)', '1 tablespoon dried cranberry', '2 tablespoons toasted unsalted walnut chopped']
instructions: ['1: Add the olive oil, 2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar, 1 teaspoon honey, Dijon mustard, salt, and pepper together in a small bowl', '2:  Set aside', '3: On a cutting board, season the 1 boneless skinless chicken with salt, pepper, and ¼ teaspoon paprika', '4: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat', '5:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the 1 boneless skinless chicken and cook until browned on all sides, about 4 minutes', '6: In a large bowl, add the sliced 1 pear, 2 cups baby spinach, cranberries, walnuts, and cooked 1 boneless skinless chicken, and dress with the vinaigrette']

ingredients: ['Fish Fingers', '1 cod fillet', '1 cup flour (100 g)', '2 eggs whisked', '2 cups panko breadcrumbs (100 g)', '⅓ cup grated parmesan cheese (30 g)', 'Homemade Tartar Sauce', '½ cup mayonnaise (100 g)', '1 pickled gherkin diced', '1 tablespoon caper diced', '1 teaspoon whole grain mustard', '½ lemon juiced', 'Sandwich', '4 slices white bread', 'rocket leaf', 'romaine lettuce', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'ketchup', 'lemon']
instructions: ['1: Cut the 1 cod fillet into 6-7 big finger shapes', '2: Mix the Parmesan with the 2 cups panko 2 cups panko 4 slices white breadcrumbs', '3: Coat the fish fingers with 1 cup flour, then egg, then 2 cups panko 4 slices white breadcrumbs', '4: Deep fry the fish fingers in 170˚C (325˚F) hot oil for about 2-3 minutes or until they turn golden brown and are cooked through', '5:  Set aside', '6: Mix all the sauce ingredients well, set aside', '7: Spread a thick layer of the tartar sauce onto a soft and fluffy slice of 2 cups panko 4 slices white bread', '8: Place some rocket leaves, romaine lettuce, and three chunky fish fingers, then flavour with a squeeze of lemon, salt, and pepper', '9:  Finish with a drizzle of ketchup and more Tartar', '10: Top with another slice of 2 cups panko 4 slices white bread and serve']

ingredients: ['1 artichoke', '½ lemon', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon garlic minced', '2 tablespoons fresh parsley', '½ cup parmesan cheese']
instructions: ['1: Remove the stem of the 1 artichoke', '2:  Cut about 1 inch (2 cm) off the top of the 1 artichoke', '3:  Take a pair of kitchen scissors and snip off the thorns on the tip of the 1 artichoke petals', '4: Take half a ½ lemon and rub ½ lemon juice over the cut portion of the 1 artichoke to prevent it from browning', '5:  Drizzle with 2 tablespoons olive oil and season with salt and pepper', '6: Spread open the petals and rub minced 1 tablespoon garlic all over', '7:  Add the 2 tablespoons fresh parsley and Parmesan; make sure to get it in between the petals', '8:  Top with more pepper if desired', '9: Wrap the 1 artichoke in aluminum foil', '10:  Bake at 425°F (220°C) for 1 hour and 20 minutes', '11: When done, serve with extra 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, ½ lemon wedge and your favorite dipping sauce']

ingredients: ['1 avocado', '1 egg yolk', '½ cup heavy cream (120 mL)', '1 clove garlic', '½ lemon juiced', '½ cup parmesan cheese (55 g) grated', '3 strips bacon', '½ lb spaghetti (225 g)', '1 tablespoon olive oil']
instructions: ['1: Blend 1 avocado, 1 egg yolk, 1 clove garlic, and ½ lemon juice in a powerful blender or food processor', '2: Pulse to blend and add ½ cup heavy cream gradually', '3:  Blend the sauce until smooth and set aside', '4: Cut up 3 strips of bacon and cook in a large pan', '5:  Set aside', '6: In a large pot, bring water to a boil and cook the ½ lb spaghetti according to the package instructions', '7: Drain and coat with 1 tablespoon olive oil', '8: Add sauce, bacon, ½ cup parmesan, salt and pepper, stirring until well-combined', '9: Serve and sprinkle with ½ cup parmesan']

ingredients: ['Dough', '1 ½ cups water (350 g) plus more for folding', '2 teaspoons olive oil', '2 ½ teaspoons maple syrup', '½ cup mature active sourdough starter (100 g)', '3 cups bread flour (400 g)', '⅔ cup white whole wheat flour (100 g)', '1 tablespoon kosher salt plus 1 1/2 teaspoons', '1 tablespoon dried minced onion plus 1 1/2 teaspoons', '2 teaspoons dried minced garlic', 'Everything Seasoning Mix', '⅓ cup sesame seeds (45 g)', '⅓ cup poppy seeds (45 g)', '1 tablespoon whole fennel seeds', '1 teaspoon whole caraway seeds', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 teaspoon coarse salt']
instructions: ['1: Make the dough: Add the 1 ½ cups water, 2 teaspoons olive oil, 2 ½ teaspoons maple syrup, and ½ cup mature active sourdough starter to a medium bowl', '2:  Use clean hands or a rubber spatula to stir until the starter is dissolved', '3: Add the 3 cups bread flour, ⅔ cup white whole wheat flour, 1 tablespoon kosher 1 teaspoon 1 teaspoon coarse salt, dried onion, and dried garlic and mix with your hands until there are no dry spots', '4:  Continue to vigorously mix for 3–4 more minutes, until cohesive', '5: Set a bowl of 1 ½ cups water nearby', '6:  Dip your hand in the 1 ½ cups water to prevent sticking', '7:  Use your wet hand to stretch the dough from the edge of the bowl upwards, then fold toward the center', '8:  Repeat a total of 8–10 times, rotating the bowl slightly after each fold', '9: After the folds, carefully lift the dough up, flip it over, place it back in the bowl, and tuck the edges underneath', '10:  Scrape down the edges of the bowl, then cover with the kitchen towel and let rest in a warm place for 45 minutes', '11:  Repeat the stretching and folding process 2 more times, waiting 45 minutes after each folding session before beginning again', '12:  After finishing the folds, let the dough rest at room temperature for 2½ hours', '13:  You should see signs of fermentation in the form of an increase in volume and a soft, pillowy feel to the dough', '14:  Cover the bowl and place the dough in the refrigerator for 12–18 hours', '15: Make the everything seasoning mix: Combine the ⅓ cup sesame seeds, ⅓ cup poppy seeds, 1 tablespoon whole fennel seeds, 1 teaspoon whole caraway seeds, 1 teaspoon red pepper flakes, and 1 teaspoon coarse 1 tablespoon kosher 1 teaspoon 1 teaspoon coarse salt in a wide, shallow bowl', '16:  Mix until evenly distributed', '17: After the dough has rested overnight, lightly flour a work surface', '18:  Carefully turn the dough out on the surface and arrange into a rough rectangle, being careful not to flatten the dough and lose the trapped gas', '19:  Cut into 4 equal pieces', '20: Use floured hands to shape each piece of dough by folding the top two corners toward the center, then rolling into a tight log', '21:  Pinch the ends closed', '22: Place the everything seasoning mixture and a baking sheet lined with parchment paper nearby', '23:  Wet a clean kitchen towel and place on a plate', '24:  Carefully roll a dough log on the wet towel, then in the everything seasoning mix to coat entirely, then place on the baking sheet', '25:  Repeat with the remaining dough, spacing the loaves at least 2 inches apart', '26: Let the dough proof for 1½–3 hours (depending on temperature), until puffed and a finger poked into the dough slowly pops back', '27: Place a Dutch oven or a cast iron combo cooker in the oven', '28:  Preheat the oven to 500°F (260°C)', '29: Once the oven is preheated, carefully remove the pan from the oven', '30:  Use a 3 cups bread lame, razor blade, or sharp knife to score the top of 2 of the dough logs to allow steam to escape while baking', '31:  Use a spatula to carefully transfer the scored mini loaves to the hot pan', '32:  Cover and return to the oven', '33:  Bake for 15 minutes, then uncover, 1 teaspoon reduce the oven temperature to 475°F (245°F), and bake for another 15–20 minutes, until amber brown', '34:  Increase the oven temperature to 500°F (260°C) and repeat the process with the remaining 2 loaves', '35:  Note: If you don’t have a Dutch oven or a combo cooker, preheat the oven to 450°F (230°C)', '36:  Score all 4 loaves, then bake on the baking sheet for 30–35 minutes, until golden brown', '37: Transfer the loaves to a wire rack and let cool completely before slicing']

ingredients: ['Beer-Braised Chicken', '3 lb whole chicken (1 kg)', '2 tablespoons worcestershire sauce', '3 tablespoons canola oil divided', '3 tablespoons kosher salt', '2 tablespoons coarsely ground black pepper', '1 red onion chopped', '3 celery stalks sliced', '2 green chiles sliced', '3 cloves garlic sliced', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '24 oz lager beer (705 mL)', '10 oz chicken stock (295 mL)', '1 fresh flat-leaf parsley chopped', 'Pico De Gallo', '5 roma tomatoes chopped', '2 red onions chopped', '1 jalapeño chopped', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '¼ cup fresh cilantro (10 g) finely chopped', '1 lime zested', '1 lime juiced', 'Avocado Yogurt', '1 cup plain yogurt (245 g)', '2 avocados pitted', '1 lemon juiced', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL)', 'Nachos', '10 oz plantain chips (200 g)', '15 oz black beans (425 g) drained and rinsed', '1 cup shredded cheddar cheese (100 g)', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese (100 g)', '1 cup shredded pepper jack  cheese (100 g)', '¼ cup pickled jalapenos (25 g)', '2 tablespoons fresh cilantro finely chopped']
instructions: ['1: Break down the 3 lb whole 10 oz chicken into 6 parts--2 thighs, 2 breasts, and 2 wings', '2: Add the 3 lb whole 10 oz chicken pieces to large bowl with the Worcestershire sauce, 2 tablespoons of canola oil, the salt, and pepper and toss to coat', '3: In a large pan over medium-high heat, add the 3 lb whole 10 oz chicken, skin-side down, and the remaining tablespoon of oil', '4:  Sear the 3 lb whole 10 oz chicken until browned on both sides and the skin is crispy, about 5-8 minutes per side', '5:  Remove the 3 lb whole 10 oz chicken from the pan and set aside', '6: To the hot pan, add the 1 red 2 red onion, 3 celery, 2 green chiles, 3 cloves garlic, and tomato paste, stirring to combine after each ingredient is added', '7:  Sweat until fragrant and the 1 red 2 red 2 red onions are translucent, about 5 minutes', '8: Deglaze the pan with the 24 oz lager beer and 3 lb whole 10 oz chicken stock', '9:  Return the 3 lb whole 10 oz chicken to pan, cover, reduce the heat to medium-low, and braise for 1 hour', '10: Make the pico de gallo: In a large bowl, combine the 5 roma tomatoes, 1 red 2 red 2 red onions, 1 jalapeño, salt, cilantro, and the lime zest and juice', '11:  Stir to combine', '12: Make the avocado yogurt: In a large bowl, combine the yogurt, 2 avocados, 1 lemon juice, salt, pepper, and olive oil', '13:  Mash with 2 forks until mostly smooth and well combined', '14: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '15: Remove the 3 lb whole 10 oz chicken from the braising liquid', '16:  Increase the heat to high and cook the braising liquid until reduced by half, about 30 minutes', '17: Using forks, shred the 3 lb whole 10 oz chicken and place the meat in a large bowl', '18:  Discard the bones or save for another use', '19: Add 1 cup (240 ML) of the reduced braising liquid to the 3 lb whole 10 oz chicken and stir to combine', '20: Assemble the nachos: Spread the plantain chips on a baking sheet in an even layer', '21:  Top with half of the 2 tablespoons coarsely ground 1 teaspoon ground 15 oz black beans and all of the 3 lb whole 10 oz chicken, then the remaining 2 tablespoons coarsely ground 1 teaspoon ground 15 oz black beans', '22:  Cover with the cheddar, mozzarella, and pepper Jack cheeses and finish with the pickled 1 jalapeños', '23: Bake for 10-15 minutes, or until the cheese is melted', '24: Top the nachos with the pico de gallo, avocado yogurt, and cilantro']

ingredients: ['4 sweet potatoes', '2 tablespoons butter (30 g)', '¼ cup heavy cream (60 mL)', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper']
instructions: ['1: Add 4 sweet potatoes to a large pot of salted water', '2:  Place over medium/high heat and bring to a boil', '3:  Cook until fork tender, about 15-20 minutes', '4: Drain, peel, and mash 4 sweet potatoes until they reach a smooth consistency', '5: Add remaining ingredients to mash and mix to incorporate']

ingredients: ['½ avocado', '1 slice multigrain toast', '1 tablespoon pomegranate seeds']
instructions: ['1: Peel the ½ avocado half, then 1 slice crosswise very thinly, keeping the ½ avocado shape intact as you go', '2:  Starting from one end, fan out the 1 sliced ½ avocado in straight line, then curl into a rose shape', '3: Carefully transfer the ½ avocado rose to the 1 slice of toast', '4:  Top with the 1 tablespoon pomegranate seeds']

ingredients: ['1 chicken breast butterflied pounded and divided into 2', 'flour as needed', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 ½ cups mushroom (110 g)', '1 cup marsala wine (235 mL)', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 clove garlic minced', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 tablespoon parsley']
instructions: ['1: Butterfly, pound and divide one 1 chicken breast into 2 pieces', '2: Combine flour, salt and pepper and dredge 1 chicken breast in the seasoned flour', '3:  Dust off any excess', '4: Fry the 1 chicken in a little bit of oil on a hot skillet/pan', '5:  Fry 3 minutes per side', '6: In the same skillet or pan, add the mushrooms', '7:  Cook until soft', '8: Add the 1 cup marsala wine, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, minced 1 clove garlic, 1 chicken breast 1 tablespoon butter and 1 tablespoon parsley', '9:  Cook until sauce has slightly thickened', '10: Serve 1 chicken on top of or with pasta/ rice and spoon sauce over']

ingredients: ['3 slices bread', '3 slices cheddar cheese', '1 tablespoon butter', 'tomato soup to taste optional']
instructions: ['1: Cut crust off the slices of bread', '2:  This makes the bread easier to roll and will hold the shape better', '3: Flatten slices of bread with a rolling pin', '4: Layer the slices of cheese on top of each slice of bread so that the cheese is offset from the bread by about 1 inch (2 ½ cm) vertically', '5:  Other fillings can be added here if desired', '6: Roll each slice of bread with cheese vertically as tightly as possible without cracking the bread', '7:  Gently squeeze each roll to maintain its shape and set down on its seam', '8: Melt the 1 tablespoon butter in a pan', '9:  Grill each roll starting with the  seam side down on the hot pan', '10: Rotate so that all sides are evenly golden brown']

ingredients: ['3 medium carrots', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '¼ cup low sodium soy sauce (60 mL) or tamari', '2 tablespoons caper drained', '2 tablespoons caper brine', '¼ cup rice vinegar (60 mL)', '½ cup canola oil (120 mL)', '1 teaspoon smoked paprika', '1 ½ teaspoons garlic powder', '1 sheet nori seaweed 7.5 x 8.25 inch (19 x 21 cm) torn', 'cracker for serving', 'vegan cream cheese for serving']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Set the 3 medium carrots on a baking 1 sheet and season all over with the salt', '3: Bake the 3 medium carrots for 40 minutes, until soft and tender', '4:  Remove from the oven and let cool', '5: Meanwhile, in a food processor, combine the 1 cup water, ¼ cup low sodium soy sauce, capers, caper brine, ¼ cup rice vinegar, ½ cup canola oil, paprika, 1 ½ teaspoons garlic powder, and remaining ½ teaspoon salt', '6:  Process until the capers are broken down', '7:  Add the nori and pulse to incorporate', '8:  Transfer the marinade to a resealable container', '9: Use a vegetable peeler to shave the 3 medium carrots lengthwise into ribbons', '10:  Massage with salt', '11: Add the carrot ribbons to the marinade, cover, and refrigerate for 24 hoursRemove the carrot lox from the marinade and serve as desired, such as on crackers with vegan cream cheese, can be stored in refrigerator in marinade for up to 4 days']

ingredients: ['Squash', '1 spaghetti squash', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', 'Filling', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon garlic', '½ cup onion (75 g) diced', '1 cup mushroom (75 g) sliced', '1 cup broccoli florets (150 g)', '1 cup asparagus (125 g) chopped', '½ cup squash (100 g) sliced', '½ cup cherry tomato (100 g) halved', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '½ cup milk (120 mL) or milk alternative', '¼ cup vegetarian parmesan cheese (25 g)', '2 tablespoons lemon juice']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400ºF (200ºC)', '2: With a sharp knife, slice the 1 spaghetti ½ cup squash in half', '3:  If the 1 spaghetti ½ cup squash is too tough, puncture in several places forming a dotted line around the 1 spaghetti ½ cup squash', '4:  Microwave for 3-5 minutes to soften', '5:  Allow to cool before cutting in half', '6: Scoop out the seeds, brush with oil, and sprinkle with salt, and pepper', '7:  Bake for 40-45 minutes, or until a fork can easily pierce the skin', '8: Meanwhile, in a pan combine oil, 1 tablespoon garlic, and ½ cup onion over medium heat, and sautè until ½ cup onions are translucent', '9: Add mushrooms and cook for 3 minutes', '10:  Add the 1 cup broccoli, 1 cup asparagus, 1 spaghetti ½ cup squash, tomatoes, salt, and pepper and cook until almost cooked through', '11: Add the ½ cup milk/ ½ cup milk alternative until warmed through', '12:  Add the ¼ cup vegetarian Parmesan and mix until evenly spread throughout vegetables', '13:  Add the 2 tablespoons lemon juice and stir to combine', '14: Remove 1 spaghetti ½ cup squash from the oven, with a fork pull at the edges to produce that stringy “spaghetti” quality', '15: In the pan combine “spaghetti” with vegetables', '16:  Return to the 1 spaghetti ½ cup squash and top with Parmesan']

ingredients: ['2 lb boneless skinless chicken thighs (910 g) pounded flat', '½ large yellow onion peeled and root side removed', '1 wooden skewer sturdy roughly 10 inches (25 cm)', 'Marinade', '2 cups greek yogurt (570 g)', '¼ cup lemon juice (60 mL)', '¾ cup olive oil (180 mL)', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '1 tablespoon garlic minced', '1 tablespoon coriander powder', '1 tablespoon paprika', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 teaspoon black pepper', 'Tzatziki Sauce', '1 large cucumber shredded', '2 cups greek yogurt (570 g)', '1 tablespoon garlic minced', '¼ cup lemon juice (60 mL)', '2 tablespoons fresh dill finely chopped', '2 tablespoons fresh parsley finely chopped', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '8 pita breads', 'onion sliced', 'tomato sliced']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, combine marinade ingredients and stir well', '2: On a cutting board, place a piece of plastic wrap over the 2 lb boneless skinless chicken thighs and pound until about ½ inch (1 cm) thick with a meat mallet, rolling pin, or heavy pan', '3: In another large bowl or gallon plastic bag, combine 2 lb boneless skinless chicken thighs and marinade, stirring well to coat', '4:  Cover and refrigerate for at least one hour and up to one day', '5: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '6: Shred the cucumber, be sure to squeeze out any excess liquid', '7: In a medium bowl, combine tzatziki ingredients and stir well', '8:  Cover and refrigerate at least 30 minutes', '9: On a baking sheet or a large cast-iron skillet, use the ½ large yellow onion half as a base and position the 1 wooden skewer vertically like a spit', '10:  Skewer the 2 lb boneless skinless chicken thighs individually, rotating each one 90 degrees', '11: Bake for 1', '12: 5 to 2 hours, until internal temperature reaches 165°F (75°C)', '13:  Let cool for 10 minutes', '14: Carve off slices of 2 lb boneless skinless chicken to fill a 8 pita', '15:  Top with ½ large yellow onion slices, tomato slices, and tzatziki sauce']

ingredients: ['Dressing', '1 medium garlic clove minced', '2 teaspoons dijon mustard', '2 teaspoons lemon zest', '3 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 tablespoon honey', '½ teaspoon kosher salt plus more to taste', '¼ cup neutral oil (60 mL) such as canola or avocado oil', 'Salad', '3 cups farro (600 g) cooked', '1 teaspoon kosher salt divided plus more to taste', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '2 medium honeycrisp apples thinly sliced', '½ cup toasted hazelnuts (75 g) roughly chopped', '⅓ cup fresh mint leaf (15 g) torn', '4 oz goat cheese (130 g) crumbled']
instructions: ['1: Make the dressing: In a medium bowl whisk together the garlic, 2 teaspoons dijon mustard, 2 teaspoons 3 3 tablespoons lemon zest, 2 teaspoons 3 3 tablespoons lemon juice, 1 tablespoon 2 medium honey, and salt', '2:  Starting with a few drops and steadily increasing the stream, slowly drizzle in the ¼ cup neutral oil, whisking continuously, until the dressing is thickened and emulsified', '3: Make the salad: Add the 3 cups farro and remaining ½ teaspoon salt and black pepper to a large bowl', '4:  Add 3 3 tablespoons of dressing, then toss to coat', '5:  Add the apples, ½ cup toasted hazelnuts, ⅓ cup fresh mint, and 4 oz goat cheese and toss to combine', '6:  Dress with an additional 1-2 3 tablespoons of dressing and toss to coat', '7:  Season to taste with salt and pepper', '8: Serve the salad with the remaining dressing alongside']

ingredients: ['Pumpkin Bread', '1 ¾ cups pumpkin puree (340 g)', '2 eggs', '1 cup sugar (200 g)', '¾ cup vegetable oil (180 mL)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 ½ cups flour (310 g)', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 tablespoon pumpkin pie spice', '1 teaspoon salt', 'Cheesecake', '24 oz cream cheese (675 g) at room temperature', '1 cup sugar (200 g)', '1 teaspoon pumpkin spice', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 cup heavy whipping cream (240 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: In a large mixing bowl, whisk together pumpkin puree, 2 eggs, sugar, ¾ cup vegetable oil, and vanilla until combined', '3: Sift in the 2 ½ cups flour, baking powder, baking soda, pumpkin pie spice, and 1 teaspoon salt', '4:  Using a wooden spoon, mix together until just combined', '5:  Be careful to not overmix', '6: Lightly coat a spring form pan with nonstick cooking spray, and pour batter into the pan, spreading an even layer', '7: Bake for 35-45 minutes until center comes out clean when tested', '8:  Allow to cool completely in the pan', '9: In a large mixing bowl, whisk together 24 oz 1 cup heavy 1 cup heavy whipping cream cheese, sugar, pumpkin spice, and vanilla extract', '10: Add in 1 cup heavy whipping 24 oz 1 cup heavy 1 cup heavy whipping cream and beat for an additional 2-3 minutes', '11: Spread cheesecake mixture onto the cooled pumpkin bread, spreading evenly', '12:  Cover and chill in the fridge for at least 4 hours before serving', '13: Cut and serve']

ingredients: ['1 cup skin-on hazelnuts (120 g)', '1 cup buckwheat flour (120 g)', '1 large sprig fresh rosemary', '4 tablespoons maple syrup divided', '1 pinch kosher salt', '¼ cup unsalted butter (55 g) 1/2 stick cubed and chilled', '3 tablespoons orange marmalade', '4 oz brie cheese (115 g) thinly sliced', '4 pears cored and very thinly sliced']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '2: Spread the 1 cup skin-on hazelnuts on a baking sheet and toast for about 8 minutes, until fragrant and browned', '3:  Let cool, then remove the skins by gently rubbing with a kitchen towel', '4: Increase the oven temperature to 400˚F (200˚C)', '5: In a food processor, combine the 1 cup buckwheat flour, 1 cup skin-on hazelnuts, rosemary leaves, 3 tablespoons of maple syrup, and the 1 pinch kosher salt', '6:  Pulse until the 1 cup skin-on hazelnuts break down and the mixture resembles a coarse meal', '7: Add the ¼ cup unsalted butter and pulse to combine, until no 1 large chunks of ¼ cup unsalted butter remain', '8: Press the crust into a 10-inch (25-cm) tart pan', '9:  Poke holes all over the bottom of the crust with a fork', '10: Bake the crust for 10 minutes', '11: Reduce the oven temperature to 375˚F (190˚C)', '12: Spread the orange marmalade over the bottom of the warm crust', '13:  Arrange the 4 oz brie slices evenly over the marmalade', '14: Shingle the pear slices neatly around the outside edge of the tart, packing them close together', '15:  Add a second layer around the outside edge, on top of the first layer', '16:  There should be a circle left in the center of the tart', '17:  Begin tucking pear slices horizontally, skin-side up, around the edge of the inner circle', '18:  Work toward the center, using smaller slices as the circle gets smaller (the thinner the better here, they will bend and not break!)', '19:  Once you get to the very middle, tuck a few small slices into the center to fill in', '20: Using a pastry brush, lightly brush the remaining tablespoon of maple syrup over the pear slices', '21: Bake for 40 minutes, until the 4 pears have softened', '22: Let cool for 10 minutes before slicing']

ingredients: ['20 oz jackfruit (565 g) 1 can rinsed and drained', 'oil of choice to taste', '1 small white onion diced', '3 garlics minced', '8 oz mushrooms (225 g) sliced', '1 cup vegetable broth (240 mL)', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 teaspoon dijon mustard', '¼ teaspoon dried thyme', '¼ teaspoon paprika', 'kosher salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 cup dairy-free milk (240 mL) of choice', '2 tablespoons arrowroot powder', 'egg noodle cooked for serving', 'fresh chive chopped for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Break the 20 oz jackfruit into smaller pieces, discarding the core and any seeds', '2:  Place in a bowl and set aside', '3: Heat a drizzle of oil in a large pan over medium heat', '4:  Add the 1 small white onion and cook for 5 minutes, until softened', '5: Add the garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute', '6: Add the 8 oz mushrooms and 20 oz jackfruit and cook for 5-8 minutes, until softened', '7: Add the 1 cup vegetable broth, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, Dijon mustard, ¼ teaspoon dried thyme, ¼ teaspoon paprika, kosher salt, and pepper', '8:  Stir to combine and bring to a boil', '9: Add the 2 tablespoons arrowroot powder to the dairy-free 1 cup dairy-free milk and stir until dissolved', '10:  Add the mixture to the boiling stroganoff', '11:  Reduce the heat to medium-low and cook for 10 minutes, or until thickened, stirring occasionally', '12: Serve the stroganoff over egg noodles and fresh chive chopped for garnish with chives']

ingredients: ['2 cups graham cracker crumbs (170 g)', '⅓ cup butter (75 g) melted', '16 oz cream cheese (450 g) at room temperature', '¾ cup sugar (150 g)', '¼ cup milk (60 mL)', '½ cup sour cream (115 g)', '2 tablespoons flour', '3 teaspoons bourbon whiskey divided', '2 eggs', '1 cup dark brown sugar (220 g)', '¼ cup cornstarch (30 g)', '½ teaspoon salt', '4 egg yolks', '⅔ cup maple syrup (220 g) or dark corn syrup', '½ cup cream (120 mL) warm to the touch', '4 tablespoons butter cold', '2 cups roasted pecan (250 g) chopped', 'whole roasted pecan to serve']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 325°F (170°C)', '2: In a bowl, combine the 2 cups graham cracker crumbs and melted butter', '3:  Stir to combine', '4: Pour the mixture into a 9-inch (23 cm) springform pan and press it evenly into the bottom and halfway up the sides', '5:  Transfer to the refrigerator to chill', '6: In a large bowl add the cream cheese, ¾ cup 1 cup dark 1 cup dark brown sugar, and ¼ cup milk', '7:  With a hand mixer, beat until fluffy and fully incorporated', '8: Add in the ½ cup sour cream, 2 tablespoons flour, 2 3 3 ½ teaspoons of the bourbon, and the two 2 2 4 eggs and gently continue to mix until the cream cheese filling is smooth', '9: Pour the mixture into the springform pan with the 2 cups graham cracker crust and bake for 1 hour, or until the cheesecake no longer jiggles', '10: While the cheesecake is cooking, prepare the stove-top pecan pie filling', '11: In a bowl combine the 1 cup dark brown ¾ cup 1 cup dark 1 cup dark brown sugar, ¼ cup cornstarch, and salt, stir together and pour into a medium saucepan on low heat', '12: Pour in the 2 4 egg yolks, ⅔ cup maple syrup, and warm cream and whisk until smooth', '13: Cook on low heat until the mixture thickens like a pudding, 5-10 minutes', '14:  Remove from the heat', '15: Stir in the cold butter and the final 3 ½ teaspoon of bourbon and whisk until fully emulsified', '16:  The pudding-like mixture should be around room temperature', '17: Fold in the roasted, chopped pecans and then pour the mixture over the cooked cheesecake and spread it out as an even layer', '18: If you like, sprinkle with extra chopped pecans or garnish with whole pecans', '19: Let the cheesecake chill in the refrigerator until completely set', '20: Slice and serve cold or at room temperature']

ingredients: ['2 cups sushi rice (460 g) cooked', '¼ cup seasoned rice vinegar (60 mL)', '4 half sheets sushi grade nori', '1 teaspoon sesame seed optional', '8 pieces imitation crab', '1 small cucumber cut into matchsticks', '1 avocado thinly sliced']
instructions: ['1: Season the sushi 2 cups sushi ¼ cup seasoned rice with the 2 cups sushi ¼ cup seasoned rice vinegar, fanning and stirring until room temperature', '2: On a rolling mat, place one sheet of nori with the rough side facing upwards', '3: Wet your hands and grab a handful of 2 cups sushi ¼ cup seasoned rice and place it on the nori', '4:  Spread the 2 cups sushi ¼ cup seasoned rice evenly throughout the nori without mashing the 2 cups sushi ¼ cup seasoned rice down', '5:  Season 2 cups sushi ¼ cup seasoned rice with a pinch of 1 teaspoon sesame seeds, if using, then flip it over so the nori is facing upwards', '6: Arrange, in a horizontal row 1 inch (2', '7: 5 cm) from the bottom, the 8 pieces imitation crab followed by a row of 1 avocado and a row of 1 small cucumber', '8: Grabbing both nori and the mat, roll the mat over the filling so the extra space at the bottom touches the other side, squeezing down to make a nice tight roll', '9:  Squeeze down along the way to keep the roll from holding its shape', '10: Transfer the roll onto a cutting board', '11:  Rub a knife on a damp paper towel before slicing the roll into six equal portions']

ingredients: ['olive oil to taste', '½ small white onion', '1 green bell pepper seeded and diced', '1 red bell pepper seeded and diced', '1 cup cremini mushroom (75 g) sliced', 'kosher salt to taste', '1 cup kale (70 g) roughly chopped', '8 large eggs', '⅓ cup whole milk (85 g)', 'pepper to taste', '8 whole wheat tortillas', '16 oz pinto bean (455 g)', '¼ cup shredded cheddar cheese (25 g)', '¼ cup shredded monterey jack cheese (25 g)', 'salsa for serving']
instructions:
['1: Heat a 8 large skillet over medium heat with a drizzle of olive oil', '2:  Add the ½ small white onion and cook for 3 minutes, or until translucent', '3:  Add the bell 1 green bell 1 red bell peppers and mushrooms and season with kosher salt', '4:  Sauté for 1-2 minutes, then cover and cook for 5 minutes, until the 1 green bell 1 red bell peppers and mushrooms are softened', '5: Add the 1 cup kale and cook until wilted', '6:   Remove the veggies from the pan and set aside', '7:  Wipe out the pan', '8: In a bowl, combine the eggs, ⅓ cup whole milk, kosher salt, and 1 green bell 1 red bell pepper', '9:  Whisk to combine', '10:  Set aside', '11: Heat another drizzle of olive oil in the clean pan', '12:  Add the eggs and cook until scrambled to your liking', '13:  Remove from the heat', '14: Lay a tortilla on a clean work surface', '15:  Add about ⅛ of the eggs and cooked vegetables, 2 ounces of beans, and ½ tablespoon each of the ¼ cup shredded cheddar and Monterey Jack cheeses to the center', '16:  Fold in the sides of the tortilla, then roll into a burrito', '17:  Repeat with the remaining ingredients', '18: Heat a clean skillet over medium-high heat', '19:  Sear the burritos on both sides, starting with the seam side, until the tortilla is brown and crisp', '20: Wrap the burritos individually in foil or reusable beeswax wraps', '21:  They will keep in the freezer for up to 3 weeks', '22: When ready to eat, unwrap a burrito and microwave for 3 minutes', '23:  Serve with salsa', '24: Calories: 345
Total fat: 12 grams
Total carbs: 41 grams
Dietary fiber: 10 grams
Sugars: 4 grams
Protein: 20 grams']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons unsalted butter for greasing', '1 cup cornmeal (150 g)', '1 cup almond flour (125 g)', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '2 eggs beaten', '⅔ cup greek yogurt (165 g)', '⅓ cup milk (80 mL)', '1 can corn kernel optional', '1 jalapeño finely diced (optional)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F', '2:  Grease a cast iron skillet with 2 tablespoons unsalted butter and set aside', '3: Mix together all dry ingredients', '4: Add the beaten 2 eggs, ⅔ cup greek yogurt and ⅓ cup milk', '5:  Mix thoroughly', '6: Mix in the 1 cup 1 can corn and jalapeno if using', '7: Bake for 18-20 minutes', '8:  Transfer to a plate or cutting board and slice into eight pieces', '9:  Serve with 2 tablespoons unsalted butter']

ingredients: ['½ medium cucumber diced', '1 green apple cored and diced', '2 celeries diced', '½ lemon juiced', '1 teaspoon ginger minced', '3 cups kale (300 g) chopped']
instructions: ['1: Add the ½ medium cucumber, 1 green apple, celery, ½ lemon juice, 1 teaspoon ginger, and 3 cups kale to a blender, and blend until smooth', '2: Using a mesh strainer, strain the juice over a large liquid measuring cup to remove the pulp', '3:  Use a spoon to help stir the pulp and press out the liquid', '4:  Reserve the pulp to make pulp muffins', '5: Chill the juice for at least 30 minutes (and keep up to 3 days)']

ingredients: ['2 teaspoons McCormick ® Ground Cumin', '2 teaspoons garlic powder', '2 teaspoons paprika', '2 teaspoons chili powder', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '2 teaspoons kosher salt plus 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt divided 1⁄2 teaspoon pepper', '1 lb shrimp peeled and deveined', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '½ cup sour cream (115 g)', '1 ½ limes juiced', '8 flour tortillas warmed', 'red cabbage shredded', 'scallion sliced', 'cilantro minced']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, stir together McCormick Cumin, garlic powder, paprika, chili powder, dried oregano, 2 teaspoons salt, and pepper', '2:  Add in 1 lb shrimp and toss to coat evenly with the spices', '3: Heat 1 tablespoon vegetable oil in a cast-iron skillet over high heat', '4:  Add in 1 lb shrimp', '5:  Cook until slightly blackened, about 2 minutes', '6:  Flip and cook on the other side, another 2 minutes, until fully cooked through', '7:  Remove 1 lb shrimp from pan', '8: Whisk together ½ cup sour cream, lime juice, and 1⁄2 teaspoon salt', '9: Place 1 lb shrimp on 8 flour tortillas', '10:  Drizzle with lime ½ cup sour cream', '11:  Top with red cabbage, scallions, and cilantro']

ingredients: ['Pizza Dough', '7 ½ cups pizza flour (1000 g) plus 2½ tablespoons plus more for dusting', '¼ teaspoon instant yeast', '1 teaspoon sugar', '¾ teaspoon extra virgin olive oil plus more to taste', '2 ¾ cups water (660 mL)', '3 ½ teaspoons salt', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', 'semolina flour for dusting', 'Italian Sausage', '1 teaspoon fennel seeds', '1 ¼ lb fatty pork butt (570 g) cut into ½-inch (1 1/4 cm) cubes', '⅓ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 teaspoon fresh rosemary chopped', '1 tablespoon fresh italian parsley chopped', '1 tablespoon garlic', '1 teaspoon sweet paprika', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon red wine', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', 'Toppings', '28 oz crushed tomatoes (795 g)', '8 oz low moisture mozzarella cheese ball (225 g) torn', '24 fresh basil leaves', 'olive oil to taste', 'flaky sea salt to taste']
instructions: ['1: In a stand mixer fitted with the dough hook, combine the flour, ¼ teaspoon instant yeast, and 1 teaspoon sugar', '2:  Mix on 8 oz low speed, streaming in the olive oil and 2 ¾ cups water until combined', '3:  Increase the speed to medium-low and continue mixing for 5 minutes, until the dough comes together', '4: Pull the dough off the hook into the bowl', '5:  Cover the bowl with a kitchen towel and let rest for 30 minutes', '6: Sprinkle the salt evenly over the dough', '7: Return the bowl to the stand mixer and mix on medium-low speed for another 5 minutes', '8: Lightly grease a large bowl with olive oil', '9:  Transfer the dough to the bowl and cover with plastic wrap', '10:  Refrigerate for 24 hours', '11: Grease a clean surface, kitchen scale, and baking sheet with nonstick spray', '12: Turn the dough out onto the greased surface and divide into 240-gram portions', '13:  Shape each portion into a ball, twisting the bottom to keep the top taut', '14:  Place seam-side down on the greased baking sheet', '15:  Wrap the baking sheet in plastic wrap  and return to the refrigerator for 24 hours', '16: While the dough proofs for the second time, make the Italian sausage: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '17: Sprinkle the 1 teaspoon fennel seeds on a baking sheet', '18:  Toast for 5 minutes, until fragrant and toasted', '19: Transfer the 1 teaspoon fennel seeds to a mortar and pestle and grind until coarsely cracked', '20: In a large bowl, combine the 1 ¼ lb fatty pork butt, 1 teaspoon fennel seeds, red ⅓ teaspoon red 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper flakes, 1 teaspoon fresh rosemary, parsley, 1 tablespoon garlic, 1 teaspoon sweet paprika, and ⅓ teaspoon red 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '21:  Stir well', '22:  Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and chill overnight', '23: Uncover the meat and season with the salt', '24: In a stand mixer fitted with the meat grinder attachment, grind the 1 ¼ lb fatty pork mixture on the medium-size die into the stand mixer bowl', '25: Remove the meat grinder attachment and fit the mixer with the paddle attachment', '26:  Mix the meat on medium speed and slowly drizzle in the red wine', '27:  Mix until the meat emulsifies and starts to stick to the sides of the bowl', '28:  Evenly spread the meat on a lightly greased baking sheet, creating one large patty, about 7 inches long by 5 inches (17', '29: 5 by 12', '30: 5 cm) wide', '31: Turn the oven to broil', '32: Broil the sausage patty for 3–4 minutes, until top is browned', '33:  The sausage will not be cooked through, as it will finish cooking on top of the 7 ½ cups pizza', '34:  Let cool, then crumble into large chunks', '35: Remove the 7 ½ cups pizza dough from the refrigerator and let sit at room temperature for 3 hours', '36:  The dough should be supple and expanded, but not bubbly', '37: Set an oven rack 6–8 inches beneath the broiler for a gas oven or 4-6 inches for an electric oven', '38:  Set a cast iron pan on the rack', '39:  Preheat the oven to its highest temperature for 45–60 minutes', '40: Dust a clean surface with 7 ½ cups pizza flour', '41:  Working with one dough portion at a time, gently press the dough out to a round, keeping the edge a bit thicker than the center to form a crust', '42:  Transfer the dough to the back of your hands and stretch to your desired size', '43:  Transfer the dough to a 7 ½ cups pizza peel dusted with semolina flour', '44: Carefully remove the heated cast iron skillet from the oven', '45: Slide the dough from the 7 ½ cups pizza peel into the pan', '46:  Quickly top with the 28 oz crushed tomatoes, mozzarella, sausage, and basil', '47: Cook the 7 ½ cups pizza in the oven until the crust puffs, browns, and chars in spots, 5–7 minutes, rotating the pan as needed', '48:  Broil for the last minute to brown the mozzarella', '49: Transfer the 7 ½ cups pizza to a cutting board', '50:  Brush the crust with olive oil and sprinkle the 7 ½ cups pizza with flaky salt', '51: Slice and serve']

ingredients: ['1 block paneer cheese 14 ounce (395 G)', '2 tablespoons ghee', '½ teaspoon cumin seed', '½ teaspoon fresh ginger grated', '1 serrano chile seeded and diced', '1 medium tomato diced', 'kosher salt to taste', '1 teaspoon fresh cilantro chopped', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', '4 large eggs', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '4 slices bread toasted', '2 ripe avocados smashed']
instructions: ['1: Remove the 1 block paneer from the refrigerator 1–2 hours before prepping', '2:  This will allow it to soften, making it easier to work with', '3:  Crumble or cut the 1 block paneer into smaller pieces, then add to a 1 medium bowl and mash with a fork into small crumbles', '4:  Use your hands to massage the 1 block paneer until dough-like in texture', '5:  Cover the bowl with a damp paper towel, pressing directly against the surface of the cheese', '6:  Set aside', '7: Melt the 2 tablespoons ghee in a 1 medium skillet over 1 medium heat', '8:  Add the ½ teaspoon cumin seeds, ½ teaspoon fresh ginger, 1 serrano chiles, and tomato', '9:  Cook until the tomato has softened slightly, about 2 minutes', '10: Add the crumbled 1 block paneer and season with kosher salt to taste', '11:  Stir to incorporate, then remove the pan from the heat and sprinkle in the 1 teaspoon fresh cilantro', '12:  Stir to combine', '13: Wipe out the pan, then grease with nonstick spray', '14:  Crack the 4 large eggs in the pan and season with kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper', '15:  Fry the 4 large eggs sunny-side up to your desired doneness', '16: Smear the 2 ripe avocados smashed avocado over the toasted 4 slices bread', '17:  Spoon ¼ of the 1 block paneer bhurji over each slice, then top each with a sunny-side up egg and serve', '18:  Any leftover 1 block paneer will keep in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 1 week']

ingredients: ['3 lb chuck roast (1.5 kg)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 oz dried onion soup mix (30 g)', '1 onion diced', '3 gold potatoes diced', '3 large carrots chopped', '½ cup water (120 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Place the 3 lb chuck roast in a 7-quart (6 ½ liters) slow cooker and season with salt and pepper', '2: Sprinkle the onion soup pack and top with vegetables and ½ cup water', '3: Cook on low for 8 hours, or high for 4-5 hours']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon sunflower oil', '1 tablespoon ginger purée', '1 onion roughly chopped medium size', '1 clove garlic roughly chopped', '1 yellow bell pepper roughly chopped', '1 stalk lemongrass smashed', '1 can coconut milk', '1 can pumpkin puree', '2 tablespoons red thai curry paste', '1 teaspoon sugar', '1 teaspoon fish sauce optional', '1 teaspoon lime juice', '½ lb frozen peas (200 g)', '1 bird’s eye chile optional']
instructions: ['1: Heat 1 tablespoon sunflower oil in a pot, add 1 stalk lemongrass and 1 tablespoon ginger cooking until fragrant', '2: Add onions and 1 clove garlic, stir, cook till translucent', '3:  Then, add 1 onion roughly 1 clove 1 clove garlic roughly 1 yellow 1 yellow bell pepper roughly chopped 1 yellow bell pepper and saute well', '4: Reduce to low heat and add 2 tablespoons red Thai curry paste and stir quickly to coat all ingredients', '5:  Cook for another 2 minutes', '6: Add 1 can pumpkin purée, stir well and then cover the pot', '7:  Let it cook through for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally', '8: Add the 1 teaspoon sugar and 1 can coconut milk then stir into 1 can pumpkin mixture till evenly combined', '9: Bring to a boil and then leave on a low; simmer for another 10 minutes', '10: Remove 1 stalk lemongrass stalks', '11: Blend in batches (or use a hand held immersion blender) till smooth', '12: Add 1 teaspoon fish sauce, 1 teaspoon lime juice, and ½ lb frozen peas as desired', '13:  If adding ½ lb frozen peas, cook on low heat for 5 more minutes', '14: Serve']

ingredients: ['3 tablespoons goat cheese soft', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '4 small ciabatta rolls halved', '½ cup roasted garlic hummus (125 g)', '1 large seedless cucumber sliced', '2 large roma tomatoes thinly sliced', '¼ small red onion thinly sliced', '1 cup fresh arugula (20 g)']
instructions: ['1: In small bowl, combine the goat cheese and balsamic vinegar and mix until well combined', '2: Spread about 1 tablespoon of the goat cheese mixture on the top half of each ciabatta roll', '3: Spread about 2 tablespoons of ½ cup roasted garlic hummus on the bottom half of each roll', '4: On bottom half of each roll, layer 4 1 large seedless cucumber slices, 2 tomato slices, onion slices, and a handful of 1 cup fresh arugula', '5: Cover with the top halves of rolls', '6:  Insert a toothpick into each sandwich to secure', '7: Serve with chicken and wild rice soup']

ingredients: ['Pickles', '1 ½ lb persian cucumber (700 g) sliced into ½-inch-thick rounds', '¼ medium sweet onion sliced into thin strips', '3 pickling salts', '3 whole cinnamon sticks broken in half', '3 habanero peppers slit cut lengthwise down the center of each pepper', '1 bunch fresh dill', '9 cloves garlic smashed', '2 cups water (480 mL)', '¾ cup apple cider vinegar (80 mL)', '¾ cup white vinegar (80 mL)', '1 cup sugar (200 g)', 'Pickling Spice Mix', '½ tablespoon yellow mustard seeds', '1 teaspoon brown mustard seeds', '2 tablespoons whole black peppercorn', '1 tablespoon red pepper flakes', '1 teaspoon celery seed', 'Comeback Sauce', '1 cup mayonnaise (240 g)', '¼ cup chili sauce (60 g)', '2 tablespoons ketchup', '1 tablespoon Louisiana-style hot sauce', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 teaspoon worcestershire sauce', '1 teaspoon McCormick® Paprika', '1 teaspoon english mustard', '½ teaspoon McCormick® Garlic Powder', '¼ teaspoon McCormick® freshly ground black pepper', 'Nashville Spice Mix', '3 tablespoons McCormick® Paprika', '2 tablespoons McCormick® cayenne', '1 tablespoon McCormick® Garlic Powder', '1 tablespoon McCormick® Onion Powder', '1 tablespoon McCormick® mustard powder', '1 tablespoon McCormick® freshly ground black pepper', 'Fried Pickles', '7 cups neutral oil (1.5 L)', '1 ½ cups buttermilk (360 mL)', '1 tablespoon Louisiana-style hot sauce', '2 cups panko breadcrumbs (225 g)', '1 tablespoon dark brown sugar', 'kosher salt to taste', 'Special Equipment', '3 mason jars', 'deep fry thermometer', 'Preparation', 'Pickles', '1 ½ lb persian cucumber (700 g) sliced into ½-inch-thick rounds', '¼ medium sweet onion sliced into thin strips', '3 pickling salts', '3 whole cinnamon sticks broken in half', '3 habanero peppers slit cut lengthwise down the center of each pepper', '1 bunch fresh dill', '9 cloves garlic smashed', '2 cups water (480 mL)', '¾ cup apple cider vinegar (80 mL)', '¾ cup white vinegar (80 mL)', '1 cup sugar seed', 'Comeback Sauce', '1 cup mayonnaise (240 g)', '¼ cup chili sauce (60 g)', '2 tablespoons ketchup', '1 tablespoon Louisiana-style hot sauce', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 teaspoon worcestershire sauce', '1 teaspoon McCormick® Paprika', '1 teaspoon english mustard', '½ teaspoon McCormick® Garlic Powder', '¼ teaspoon McCormick® freshly ground black pepper', 'Nashville Spice Mix', '3 tablespoons McCormick® Paprika', '2 tablespoons McCormick® cayenne', '1 tablespoon McCormick® Garlic Powder', '1 tablespoon McCormick® Onion Powder', '1 tablespoon McCormick® mustard powder', '1 tablespoon McCormick® freshly ground black pepper', 'Fried Pickles', '7 cups neutral oil (1.5 L)', '1 ½ cups buttermilk (360 mL)', '1 tablespoon Louisiana-style hot sauce', '2 cups panko breadcrumbs (225 g)', '1 tablespoon dark brown sugar', 'kosher salt to taste', 'Special Equipment', '3 mason jars', 'deep fry thermometer', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, toss the cucumbers and onion with the pickling salt, making sure every piece is well coated', '2:  Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 2 hours', '3: After 2 hours, thoroughly rinse the cucumbers and onion to remove any excess salt', '4:  Transfer to a clean large bowl', '5: Make the pickling spice mix: In a small bowl, mix together the yellow and brown mustard seeds, black peppercorns, red pepper flakes, and celery seeds', '6: Make the pickles: Scoop 2 tablespoons of the pickling spice mix into each of 3 16-ounce mason jars', '7:  Add 2 cinnamon stick halves, 1 habanero, 2 sprigs of dill, and 3 cloves of garlic to each jar', '8:  Divide the cucumbers and onion between the jars, packing tightly', '9: In a small pot, combine the water, apple cider vinegar, white vinegar, and sugar', '10:  Bring to a boil over medium-high heat and cook until the sugar has dissolved, 5–7 minutes', '11:  Transfer the pickling liquid to a heatproof measuring cup', '12: Carefully pour the pickling liquid into each jar, leaving ½ inch of headspace at the top', '13:  Use the back of a spoon to press down on the cucumbers and onion until completely submerged', '14: Tightly screw the lids onto the jars and let sit at room temperature for 2 hours, then transfer to the refrigerator overnight, or up to 2 weeks', '15: Make the comeback sauce: In a medium bowl, whisk together the mayonnaise, chili sauce, ketchup, hot sauce, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, paprika, mustard, garlic powder, and black pepper', '16:  Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until ready to use, up to 1 week', '17: Make the Nashville spice mix: In a small bowl, whisk together the paprika, cayenne, garlic powder, onion powder, mustard powder, and black pepper', '18:  Transfer to an airtight container and store at room temperature until ready to use', '19:  The spice mixture will keep for up to 6 months', '20: Fry the pickles: In a medium pan fitted with a deep fry thermometer, heat the canola oil over medium-high heat until the temperature reaches 350°F (180°C)', '21:  Set a wire rack over a baking sheet or paper towels', '22: Drain the pickles, discarding the pickling liquid and removing any lingering pickling spices, onion, and garlic', '23: In a shallow dish, whisk together the buttermilk, hot sauce, and 1 tablespoon of the Nashville spice mix', '24: In a separate shallow dish, stir together the bread crumbs and ½ tablespoon of the Nashville spice mix', '25: Dip the pickles in the buttermilk mixture, then transfer to the bread crumbs, using your hands to pat the crumbs into each slice until fully coated', '26: Working in batches, fry the pickles in the hot oil for 3–4 minutes, until golden brown all over', '27:  Transfer to the wire rack and season with kosher salt', '28:  Reserve 1 cup of the frying oil', '29: In a medium, heatproof bowl, combine 2 teaspoons of the Nashville spice mix, 1 tablespoon brown sugar, and the reserved frying oil', '30:  Whisk until the sugar dissolves', '31: Brush the hot oil mixture over the fried pickles', '32:  Transfer to a platter and serve with the comeback sauce for dipping']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 small yellow onion diced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon fresh thyme', '1 ½ cups arborio rice (345 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', 'pepper to taste', '½ cup dry white wine (120 mL)', '4 cups butternut squash (820 g) cubed', '4 cups vegetable broth (945 mL)', 'fresh parsley chopped to serve']
instructions: ['1: To prep cut off both ends of the 4 cups butternut squash and poke 10-15 air vents with a fork', '2:  Microwave on high for 3-4 minutes', '3: Peel the skin off of the squash', '4:  The skin should peel right off! Once peeled, cut into 1x1-inch (2x2-cm) cubes', '5: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)', '6: In a large dutch oven or oven-safe pot, sauté 1 small yellow onion in 2 tablespoons olive oil for 3-4 minutes or until semi-translucent', '7:  Add 2 cloves garlic and sauté for 2 more minutes', '8: Add the 1 teaspoon fresh thyme and cook for 2 minutes, until fragrant', '9: Add 1 ½ cups arborio rice and sauté until lightly toasted, then stir in 1 teaspoon salt, pepper and ½ cup dry white wine', '10: Stir in 4 cups butternut squash and and 4 cups vegetable broth and bring to a boil', '11: Cover pot and transfer to oven', '12:  Bake for 15-20 minutes, until liquid is absorbed', '13: Garnish with fresh parsley and serve immediately']

ingredients: ['1 cup all-purpose flour (125 g)', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 pinch baking soda', '3 tablespoons plain yogurt', '½ teaspoon ground cardamom divided', '1 cup water (240 mL) plus 1 tablespoon divided', '¼ teaspoon turmeric powder optional or 2 drops of orange food coloring', '1 cup sugar (200 g)', '3 strands saffron', '½ teaspoon lemon juice', 'oil for frying', 'rabri for serving']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, 1 teaspoon 1 pinch baking powder, and 1 teaspoon 1 pinch baking soda', '2: Add the 3 tablespoons plain yogurt and ¼ teaspoon of cardamom', '3: Add ½ cup (120 ml) of water and the orange food coloring', '4:  The batter should have the consistency of a thick pancake batter', '5:  Add more water if needed', '6: Cover and let rest in a warm place for 10-12 hours to ferment, or until small bubbles develop on top of the batter', '7: Once the batter has fermented, add the sugar and ½ cup (120 ml) of water to a small saucepan', '8:  Bring to a boil over medium heat', '9: Add the remaining ¼ teaspoon of cardamom, the saffron 3 strands, and lemon juice', '10: Simmer until a sticky syrup develops, about 5 minutes', '11: Whisk the batter and add a tablespoon of water if the batter looks too thick', '12:  Transfer to a squeeze bottle or piping bag', '13: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-low until it reaches 350°F (180°C)', '14: Squeeze the batter into the hot oil, making small circular spiral shapes', '15: Increase the heat to medium-high', '16: Fry the dough shapes until they are crispy on both sides, about 5 minutes', '17: Remove and immediately dip in the syrup mixture', '18: Serve with rabri, if desired']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '½ white onion sliced', '1 package refrigerated pizza dough', '½ wheel of brie cut into thin flat squares', '3 slices swiss cheese cut into thin flat squares', '5 slices Castle Wood Reserve® Uncured Honey Ham sliced into thin flat squares', '2 eggs', '2 tablespoons fresh parsley chopped fine for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400ºF', '2:  Coat a sheet tray with nonstick spray', '3: Melt 2 tablespoons unsalted butter in a medium saute pan over medium heat', '4:  Add onions and cook for 5 minutes or until golden brown', '5: Roll out canned 1 package refrigerated pizza dough and cut it half lengthwise (and save the other half for another flatbread)', '6:  Place 1 package refrigerated pizza dough on the sheet pan and use your fingers to stretch and shape into an oval shape', '7: Top flatbread with caramelized onions, ½ wheel of brie, Swiss cheese, and Castle Wood Reserve®  Uncured Honey Ham', '8:  Carefully make two wells in the flatbread toppings and crack an egg into each one', '9: Bake in the oven for 10–15 minutes — or until crust is golden brown and egg whites are cooked', '10: Top with 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, slice into 8 pieces, and serve']

ingredients: ['4 oz salmon (115 g) 3 fillets', '½ cup chili sauce (130 g)', '¼ cup fresh scallions (25 g) chopped']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200˚C)', '2: In a bowl, mix together the 4 oz salmon, ½ cup chili sauce, and the ¼ cup fresh scallions', '3: Place the fillets on a baking tray lined with parchment paper', '4:  Spoon any leftover sauce on top of the 4 oz salmon', '5: Bake for 12-15 minutes, until the 4 oz salmon is cooked but still tender']

ingredients: ['Berbere Braised Lamb', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 lb boneless lamb shoulder (910 g) cut into 2-inch (5-cm) cubes', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 medium red onions finely minced', '¼ cup ghee (60 g) clarified butter', '4 cloves garlic sliced', '1 tablespoon ginger minced', '1 tablespoon paprika', '1 teaspoon cayenne', '½ teaspoon ground fenugreek', '¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '½ teaspoon ground cardamom', '¼ teaspoon ground cloves', '¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '¼ teaspoon allspice', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '2 cups beef broth (480 mL)', 'Jeweled Vegetable Pilau', '¼ cup ghee (60 g) clarified butter', '2 medium red onions sliced', '½ green cabbage core removed and shredded', '2 cups shredded carrot (220 g)', '4 cloves garlic minced', '1 tablespoon grated ginger', 'salt to taste', 'black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '1 tablespoon curry powder', '1 teaspoon ground cardamom', '2 cups basmati rice (460 g)', '3 cups water (720 mL)', '1 bay leaf', '1 cinnamon stick', '1 star anise', '2 scallions sliced', '½ cup cashews (65 g)', '¼ cup pomegranate seeds (45 g)']
instructions: ['1: To make the Berbere Braised Lamb, heat the 2 tablespoons vegetable oil in a large pan over medium-high heat until oil is lightly shimmering', '2:  Add the 2 lb boneless lamb to the pot, season with salt and pepper, and brown on all sides, for about 10 minutes', '3:  Remove the 2 lb boneless lamb from the pot', '4: To the same pot, add the red onions and cook until brown, for about 15-20 minutes', '5:  Stir in the ghee, garlic, ginger, 1 tablespoon paprika, 1 teaspoon cayenne, fenugreek, nutmeg, cardamom, cloves, ¼ teaspoon ground 1 cinnamon, ¼ teaspoon allspice, and 2 tablespoons tomato paste', '6: Pour in the 2 cups beef stock, stirring well to incorporate', '7:  Bring the sauce to a boil and return the 2 lb boneless lamb to the pot', '8:  Reduce heat to medium-low, so the sauce is at a gentle simmer, and cover and cook for 1 hour, stirring occasionally until the 2 lb boneless lamb is tender', '9: To make the Jeweled Vegetable Pilau, use a separate large, shallow pot, melt the ghee over medium heat', '10:  Add the sliced red onions and cook until soft and slightly caramelized, for about 20 minutes', '11: Add the ½ green cabbage, carrots, garlic, and ginger, and sauté until 2 tablespoons vegetables have softened and cooked down', '12: Season with salt, pepper, ground cumin, 1 tablespoon curry powder, and cardamom', '13: Stir in the 2 cups basmati rice and add the 3 cups water', '14:  Add the 1 bay leaf, ¼ teaspoon ground 1 cinnamon stick, and 1 star anise', '15:  Reduce the heat to low and cook for 20-25 minutes until 3 cups water is absorbed and 2 cups basmati rice is slightly fluffy', '16: Discard the 1 bay leaf, ¼ teaspoon ground 1 cinnamon stick, and 1 star anise', '17:  Stir the 2 cups basmati rice well before transferring to a large serving platter', '18:  Create a small well in the middle of the 2 cups basmati rice, and spoon the 2 lb boneless lamb over the top', '19: Serve garnished with 2 scallions, ½ cup cashews, and ¼ cup pomegranate seeds']

ingredients: ['½ lb ground sausage (225 g)', '½ onion diced', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '2 cups marinara sauce (500 g)', '1 cup milk (240 mL)', '½ cup fresh basil (20 g) chopped', '½ lb spaghetti (225 g) cooked']
instructions: ['1: Heat pot to medium-high heat', '2: Cook the ½ lb ground sausage in the pot', '3: Add the onions, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1 teaspoon pepper, cooking until the onions are translucent and ½ lb ground sausage is starting to brown', '4: Add the 2 cups marinara, 1 cup milk, and ½ cup fresh basil, cooking until sauce has thickened slightly', '5: Add the ½ lb spaghetti, and toss until evenly coated and sauce sticks to the noodles']

ingredients: ['7 peaches peeled and sliced', '1 tablespoon cornstarch', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '2 tablespoons water', '1 ½ cups sugar (300 g) divided ', '1 cup flour (125 g)', '¼ teaspoon cinnamon', '½ teaspoon nutmeg', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '¾ cup milk (180 mL)', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '¼ teaspoon almond extract', '¼ cup butter (60 g) plus 1 tablespoon']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: In a medium saucepan over low heat combine 7 peaches, cornstarch, 2 ¼ cup butter (60 g) plus 1 tablespoons water, lemon zest, lemon juice, and ½ cup 1 ½ cups sugar in a medium saucepan', '3:  Raise the heat to medium and cook until thick and bubbly, stirring often', '4: Add the flour, ¼ teaspoon cinnamon, ½ teaspoon nutmeg, and 1 teaspoon baking powder to a sieve and sift into a large bowl', '5: In a small bowl, combine 1 ½ cups sugar, milk, ½ teaspoon vanilla extract, ¼ teaspoon almond extract, and 1 1 2 ¼ cup butter (60 g) plus 1 tablespoon of melted butter and stir to combine', '6: Pour the wet ingredients into the dry and mix well', '7: Grease a 12x8 inch (30x20 cm) (4', '8: 8 quart) 1 teaspoon baking dish with the remaining butter', '9: Pour the batter into the bottom of the greased 1 teaspoon baking dish and smooth into an even layer with a spatula', '10: Transfer the 7 peaches gently by placing them on top of the batter', '11:  Do not stir', '12: Bake for 50 minutes to 1 hour or until golden brown', '13: Serve warm and enjoy!']

ingredients: ['4 ears corn', '48 oz watermelon (1.3 kg) diced small', '½ cup fresh cilantro (10 g) chopped', '2 limes juiced', '1 cup red onion (150 g) minced', '1 large jalapeño minced', '1 tablespoon cumin toasted & ground', '½ tablespoon coriander seed toasted and ground', '2 teaspoons sea salt', '2 tablespoons cider vinegar optional']
instructions: ['1: Shuck the 4 ears corn and place on the grill, allowing each side to be blistered with grill marks before rotating until all areas are uniformly grilled with dark brown spots', '2: Using a sharp chef’s or kitchen knife, cut the kernels off the cob', '3: Place all ingredients in a mixing bowl, taste and adjust seasoning', '4:  Add a splash of 2 tablespoons cider vinegar if you like your salsa to have a punchServe alongside tortilla chips']

ingredients: ['4 boneless skinless chicken breasts about 1 inch (2.5 cm) thick', '3 ½ teaspoons kosher salt divided plus more to taste', '2 ½ teaspoons freshly ground black pepper divided', '5 tablespoons olive oil divded', '¾ lb fettuccine pasta (340 g) uncooked', '1 large shallot minced', '6 garlics minced', '3 tablespoons all purpose flour', '13.5 oz coconut milk (400 mL)', '1 cup chicken stock (240 mL) or vegetable stock', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', 'fresh parsley minced to taste']
instructions: ['1: Season the chicken all over with 1½ teaspoons salt and 1 teaspoon pepper', '2: Heat 1 5 3 1 tablespoon olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat', '3:  Once the oil is shimmering, add the chicken breasts, 2 at a time, and cook for 4-5 minutes, until golden brown', '4:  Add more olive oil, if needed, and Flip and cook on the other side for 4-5 minutes more, until golden brown and the internal temperature reads 165ºF (75˚C)', '5:  Remove from the pan, set aside, and cover to keep warm while you repeat with the remaining chicken', '6: Fill a 1 large pot with water and bring to a boil over high heat', '7:  Once at a rolling boil, generously salt the water then add the ¾ lb fettuccine', '8:  Cook according to the package instructions', '9:  Drain and return to the pot', '10: Meanwhile, heat the remaining 3 5 3 1 tablespoons of olive oil in a 1 large pan over medium heat', '11:  Once the oil is hot, add the shallots and garlic, season with a pinch of salt, and cook until the shallot is translucent, 3-4 minutes', '12: Stir in the flour and whisk for 3-4 minutes, until golden brown', '13:  Add the 13', '14: 5 oz coconut milk and chicken stock', '15:  Bring up to a low boil and cook for about 1 minute, then reduce the heat to low-medium and cook, stirring frequently, until thickened, about 10 minutes', '16:  Stir in the lemon juice and season with the remaining 2 teaspoons salt and 1½ teaspoons pepper', '17: Pour the sauce over the ¾ lb fettuccine and toss well to coat', '18:  Slice the chicken', '19: Divide the pasta between bowls and top with the chicken', '20:  Garnish with fresh parsley and serve']

ingredients: ['8 sheets phyllo dough', '½ stick unsalted butter melted', '1 cup shredded Cabot Habanero Cheese (100 g)', '1 cup shredded Cabot Seriously Sharp Cheddar Cheese (100 g)', '8 oz cream cheese (225 g) softened', '3 cloves garlic minced (about 1 tablespoon)', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 bunch scallions sliced white and green parts separated', '3 jalapeñoes seeded and diced']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Place a sheet of phyllo dough on a clean, flat surface and brush with melted ½ stick unsalted butter', '3:  Place another sheet of phyllo on top of the ½ stick unsalted buttered sheet and brush with more ½ stick unsalted butter', '4:  Repeat with another sheet of phyllo, then stack a final sheet of phyllo on top and press to flatten', '5:  Repeat with the remaining 4 8 sheets of phyllo and melted ½ stick unsalted butter', '6: Using a 4-inch round cutter, cut 6 circles from each layered phyllo square for a total of 12 rounds', '7:  Press each round into a cavity of a 12-cup muffin tin', '8: Par-bake the phyllo cups until beginning to turn golden brown, about 5 minutes', '9: In a medium bowl, combine the Cabot Habanero Cheese, Cabot Seriously Sharp Cheddar Cheese, 8 oz cream cheese, 3 cloves garlic, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, scallion whites, and the jalapeños', '10:  Mix well', '11: Evenly distribute the filling between the phyllo cups, about 1 heaping tablespoon per cup', '12: Bake until the cheese is melted and bubbly, about 10 minutes', '13:  Remove from the oven and let the cups cool slightly, about 2 minutes', '14: Garnish with the scallion greens, then serve']

ingredients: ['Dressing', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL)', '2 teaspoons red wine vinegar', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '2 cloves garlic', '1 teaspoon pepper', '½ teaspoon salt', 'Salad', '½ cup yellow bell pepper (50 g) chopped', '½ cup chickpeas (100 g)', '½ cup cucumber (65 g) chopped', '½ cup cherry tomato (100 g) halved', '½ cup lentils (100 g) cooked', '½ cup fresh parsley (20 g) chopped']
instructions: ['1: In a large mason jar, add the ¼ cup olive oil, 2 teaspoons red wine vinegar, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 2 cloves garlic, 1 teaspoon ½ cup yellow ½ cup yellow bell pepper, and ½ teaspoon salt', '2:  Stir or swirl to combine', '3: Add the ½ cup yellow bell 1 teaspoon ½ cup yellow ½ cup yellow bell pepper, ½ cup chickpeas, ½ cup cucumber, ½ cup cherry tomatoes, ½ cup lentils, and ½ cup fresh parsley and screw on the lid', '4: Store in the refrigerator until ready to eat, up to 5 daysGive the mason jar a good shake to mix and use a fork or spoon to stir as needed']

ingredients: ['½ cup flour (60 g)', '½ teaspoon chili powder', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon pepper', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 lb chicken wing (455 g)', '1 mango', '3 habanero peppers optional seeded or unseeded', '2 cloves garlic', '½ teaspoon paprika', '¼ cup apple cider vinegar (60 mL)', '2 tablespoons lime juice', '¼ cup honey (85 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 425ºF (220ºC)', '2: In a small mixing bowl, combine ½ cup flour, ½ teaspoon chili powder, garlic powder, ½ teaspoon 3 3 habanero pepper, and ½ teaspoon salt', '3: Pat the 1 lb chicken wings dry using a paper towel', '4: Batter them in the ½ cup flour mixture and place 1 lb chicken wings on a wired baking sheet', '5: Bake at 425ºF (220ºC) for 45 minutes, flipping halfway for even cooking', '6: In a food processor or blender, mix together the 1 mango, 3 habanero ½ teaspoon 3 3 habanero peppers, garlic, ½ teaspoon paprika, ¼ cup apple cider vinegar, and 2 tablespoons lime juice', '7:  Blend until fully combined', '8:  The mixture should be a bright orange vibrant color', '9: In a saucepan, combine ¼ cup honey with your 1 mango 3 habanero mixture at medium heat', '10:  Stir occasionally to prevent sticking and simmer for 5-10 minutes or until your sauce reaches a prefered consistency', '11: Fully coat your cooked wings in the sauce then place on a parchment-lined baking sheet', '12: Bake at 450ºF (230ºC) for 8-10 minutes or until sauce has slightly caramelized']

ingredients: ['White Chocolate Dip', '12 oz white chocolate (340 g) chopped', '1 tablespoon coconut oil', '1 teaspoon red gel food coloring', '1 teaspoon green food coloring', 'Assembly', '2 ice cream sugar cones', '1 gal peppermint ice cream (3 kg)', 'crushed peppermint candy for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Make the 12 oz white chocolate dip: In a medium microwave-safe bowl, combine the 12 oz white chocolate and 1 tablespoon coconut oil', '2:  Microwave in 30-second intervals, stirring between, for 2–3 minutes, or until the chocolate is completely melted and shiny', '3:   Immediately pour two thirds of the melted chocolate into a tall, narrow container, leaving the remaining third in the original bowl', '4:  Add the 1 teaspoon red food coloring gel to the tall container and mix well to combine', '5: Set a wire rack inside a baking sheet', '6: Make the cones: Dip the sugar cones, points down, into the 1 teaspoon red chocolate, the place on the wire rack, points up', '7:  Freeze the dipped cones for 30 minutes, or until no longer sticky and the chocolate has hardened', '8: Add the 1 teaspoon green food coloring gel to the bowl with the remaining 12 oz white chocolate and mix well to combine (if the chocolate has set, microwave in 30-second intervals to re-melt)', '9: Dip ½ inch (1 ¼ cm) of the open end of each cone into the 1 teaspoon green chocolate, then return to the wire rack', '10:  Freeze for at least 30 minutes, until no longer sticky and the chocolate has hardened, or until ready to serve', '11: To serve, scoop the peppermint 2 1 gal peppermint ice cream in large balls onto a serving platter or individual bowls', '12:  Top each scoop with an elf hat', '13:  Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['15 oz frozen fry (400 g) thawed', '3 tablespoons olive oil for frying', '1 tablespoon butter for frying', '1 tablespoon ginger garlic paste', '½ onion diced', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon coriander powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ tablespoon lemon juiced', '½ cup tomato (100 g) chopped', 'natural yogurt to garnish', 'fresh coriander to garnish']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Spread out the fries on a baking tray and bake for 20 minutes', '3: While the fries are baking, prepare the masala', '4: Heat a large skillet over medium heat and add the 3 tablespoons olive oil and 1 tablespoon butter', '5: Stir in the 1 tablespoon ginger garlic paste and 15 oz frozen 3 tablespoons olive 3 tablespoons olive oil for 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon butter for fry for a couple of minutes', '6: Add the ½ onion and 15 oz frozen 3 tablespoons olive 3 tablespoons olive oil for 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon butter for fry for a few minutes until soft', '7: Sprinkle in the 1 teaspoon chili powder, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 1 teaspoon ground 1 teaspoon fresh coriander, ½ teaspoon salt, and ½ tablespoon lemon juice and stir continuously for another minute', '8: Pour in the ½ cup tomato (100 g) chopped tomatoes and 15 oz frozen 3 tablespoons olive 3 tablespoons olive oil for 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon butter for fry for several more minutes, until the sauce has thickened', '9: Add the fries to the pan and stir until evenly coated', '10: Drizzle some natural yogurt on top and garnish with fresh 1 teaspoon fresh coriander']

ingredients: ['Ice Cream', '1 pt vanilla ice cream (425 g) softened', '2 pt strawberry ice cream (850 g) softened', '2 pt chocolate ice cream (850 g) softened', 'Cake (Can Sub Boxed Yellow Cake)', '1 cup butter (230 g) at room temperature', '2 cups sugar (400 g)', '4 eggs at room temperature', '3 cups cake flour (375 g) sifted', '1 cup milk (240 mL)', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'Swiss Meringue', '4 egg whites at room temperature', '1 cup sugar (200 g)', '1 teaspoon cream of tartar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
instructions: ['1: Wrap a 10-inch (25 cm) freezer-safe bowl in plastic wrap', '2:  Scoop the vanilla ice 1 pt vanilla ice 2 pt strawberry ice 2 pt chocolate ice 1 teaspoon cream into the bowl, and using a spatula smooth the ice 1 pt vanilla ice 2 pt strawberry ice 2 pt chocolate ice 1 teaspoon cream to form an even layer', '3:  Freeze for 1 hour, or until frozen', '4: Remove the bowl from the freezer, and scoop the 2 pt strawberry ice 1 pt vanilla ice 2 pt strawberry ice 2 pt chocolate ice 1 teaspoon cream onto the frozen vanilla layer', '5:  Using a spatula, smooth the 2 pt strawberry ice 1 pt vanilla ice 2 pt strawberry ice 2 pt chocolate ice 1 teaspoon cream to form an even layer', '6:  Freeze for 1 hour, or until frozen', '7:  After the 2 pt strawberry layer is frozen, repeat with 2 pt chocolate ice 1 pt vanilla ice 2 pt strawberry ice 2 pt chocolate ice 1 teaspoon cream', '8: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '9: In a bowl, add the 4 4 4 eggs and sugar and whisk until well combined', '10:  Add 1 4 4 egg and mix until combined', '11:  Repeat with remaining 4 4 4 eggs, mixing after each 4 4 egg is added', '12: Alternate adding a little bit of flour and 1 cup milk, whisking after each addition until combined', '13:  Repeat until the flour and 1 cup milk have been used up', '14:  The batter should be smooth and 1 pt vanilla ice 2 pt strawberry ice 2 pt chocolate ice 1 teaspoon creamy', '15: Add the 1 teaspoon baking powder, ½ teaspoon salt, and vanilla extract and whisk until well combined', '16: Pour the batter into a greased and floured 10-inch 3 cups cake tin and bake for 50 minutes to 1 hour, until the top is golden brown and a toothpick comes out clean', '17: Let the 3 cups cake cool completely', '18:  Once cool, invert the 3 cups cake onto a plate and set aside', '19: Bring a pan of water to a simmer over medium heat', '20: Place a heatproof bowl over the simmering water, and add the 4 4 egg whites, sugar, and 1 pt vanilla ice 2 pt strawberry ice 2 pt chocolate ice 1 teaspoon cream of tartar', '21:  Whisk constantly until the sugar has dissolved and the 4 4 egg white mixture is warm, about 3 minutes', '22: Remove the bowl from the pan', '23:  Using a hand mixer, beat the 4 4 egg white mixture until stiff, glossy peaks form, about 10 minutes', '24:  Add the vanilla extract and mix until just combined', '25: Remove the bowl of ice 1 pt vanilla ice 2 pt strawberry ice 2 pt chocolate ice 1 teaspoon cream from the freezer and gently invert it onto the 3 cups cake, creating a dome shape', '26:  Remove the plastic wrap from the ice 1 pt vanilla ice 2 pt strawberry ice 2 pt chocolate ice 1 teaspoon cream', '27: Working quickly, use a spatula to spread a layer of meringue over the entire 3 cups cake and ice 1 pt vanilla ice 2 pt strawberry ice 2 pt chocolate ice 1 teaspoon cream dome so that it’s fully coated', '28: Using a kitchen torch, brown the peaks of meringue', '29: Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['8 oz cream cheese (225 g)', '1 cup vanilla yogurt (245 g)', '3 tablespoons honey', '1 teaspoon almond extract', '½ cup rainbow sprinkles (80 g)']
instructions: ['1: Combine all ingredients in a food processor until smooth', '2:  Stir in ½ cup rainbow sprinkles', '3: Transfer to an 8x8-inch (20x20 cm) glass dish', '4: Freeze for at least 2 hours']

ingredients: ['1 box brownie mix prepared according to package instructions', '24 oz cream cheese (675 g) softened', '¾ cup sugar (150 g)', '2 eggs beaten', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '36 chocolate sandwich cookies']
instructions: ['1: Prepare the 1 box brownie mix in a bowl', '2: In a separate bowl, mix together the cream cheese and the ¾ cup sugar until there are no lumps', '3: Add the egg and 1 tablespoon vanilla, stirring until evenly combined', '4: Spread the 1 box brownie batter in an even layer on the bottom of the pan', '5: Preheat oven to 325°F (165°C) and grease a 9x13 (23x33 cm) baking pan', '6: Place 24 of the 36 chocolate sandwich cookies in a single layer on top of the 1 box brownie batter', '7:  To fill in the edges, cut 6 of the cookies in half and nudge those in', '8: Pour the cheesecake batter on top, spreading it evenly over the cookies', '9: Crush the remaining 6 cookies and sprinkle on top of the cheesecake batter', '10: Bake for about 45 minutes, until the edges are slightly golden brown and the middle is slightly jiggly', '11: Cool and chill for at least 2 hours', '12: Slice and serve!']

ingredients: ['2 ripe avocados', '4 large eggs', 'Optional Toppings', 'tomato diced', 'fresh basil chopped', 'feta cheese crumbled', 'bell pepper diced', 'onion diced', 'turkey bacon chopped', 'chive chopped', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C)', '2: Cut the 2 ripe avocados in half and carefully remove the pits', '3: Scoop out 1-2 tablespoons of avocado from the center of each half (save it for another meal!)', '4: Transfer the avocado halves to a baking sheet and carefully crack an egg into each avocado cup', '5:  If the divot is too small, it may be easier to separate the egg yolks and whites before placing them in the avocado', '6: Add your favorite topping combo, such as tomato and fresh basil, feta cheese, bell bell pepper and onion, and turkey bacon and chives', '7:  Season with salt and bell pepper to tasteBake for 18 minutes, or until the egg whites have cooked completely']
