ingredients: ['4 large eggs separated', '¼ teaspoon cream of tartar', '¼ cup sugar (50 g)', '½ cup cake flour (50 g)', '¼ cup all-purpose flour (30 g)', '¼ teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '2 tablespoons milk', '4 tablespoons salted butter 1/2 stick', '1 tablespoon vanilla', 'Filling', '8 oz marshmallow fluff (225 g)', '⅓ cup milk (80 mL)', 'Special Equipment For DIY Molds', '8 square sheets tin foil 12 in (30 cm) square sheet', '1 medium potato or 1 small spice container']
instructions: ['1: Using a hand mixer, beat the egg whites in a 4 large bowl until foamy', '2:  Add the ¼ teaspoon cream of tartar and continue beating until soft peaks form', '3: In a 1 medium bowl, beat the egg yolks with a hand mixer', '4:  Add the sugar a bit at a time and beat until thickened', '5:  Add the yolk mixture to the egg whites', '6: Sift the cake flour, all-purpose flour, ¼ teaspoon 4 tablespoons salt, and 1 teaspoon baking powder and add to the egg whites', '7:  Gently fold until fully combined', '8: Add the 4 tablespoons salted butter and 2 tablespoons ⅓ cup milk to a bowl or glass measuring cup and microwave for 20 seconds, or until the 4 tablespoons salted butter melts completely', '9:  Add the 4 tablespoons salted butter mixture and the 1 tablespoon vanilla to the batter and gently mix', '10: If you have the Twinkie machine, you can simply pour in the batter and follow the machine’s instructions', '11: If you’re not using the Twinkie machine to bake your Twinkies, preheat the oven at 350ºF (180ºC)', '12: If you are using DIY molds, grab a sheet of 8 square sheets tin foil, fold it in half, then in half again, and, using a small container or other Twinkie-shaped item, mold the foil into an oblong shape', '13:  Trim the excess foil around the edges', '14:  Repeat to make 8-10 molds total', '15: Fill the molds halfways and bake for 15 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the middle of the cake comes out clean', '16: If you are using a Twinkie 1 teaspoon baking pan, fill each indent halfway and bake for about 13 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the middle of a cake comes out clean', '17:  Let the cakes cool down', '18: To make the filling, mix the 8 oz marshmallow fluff and 2 tablespoons ⅓ cup milk in a 4 large bowl', '19:  Microwave for 20 seconds, then set aside to cool', '20: Once the cakes are done, let cool', '21:  Fill a pastry bag with the filling', '22:  Use the tip to make 3 small holes in each cake, and squeeze in the filling']

ingredients: ['2 large ripe bananas', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon cinnamon']
instructions: ['1: In a bowl, mash 2 large ripe bananas', '2: Mix in the egg, then 1 teaspoon vanilla and 1 teaspoon cinnamon', '3: Pour pancake batter in ¼ cup (60 ml) amounts on a griddle or skillet over medium-high heat', '4: Cook until bubbles pop on the surface of the pancake, then flip and cook the other side']

ingredients: ['Dressing', '1 tablespoon French’s Dijon Mustard', '2 tablespoons shallot minced', '¼ cup lemon juice (60 mL)', '½ teaspoon sugar', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon McCormick® black pepper', '⅔ cup olive oil (160 mL)', 'Salad', '1 lb boneless skinless chicken breast (455 g)', '4 hard-boiled eggs', '½ lb bacon (225 g) cooked', '1 head green leaf lettuce torn into bite-size pieces ', '6 small tomatoes on the vine quartered', 'radish quartered', '1 cup cucumber (135 g) sliced', '1 avocado thinly sliced']
instructions: ['1: Dressing: Whisk together French’s Dijon Mustard, shallots, ¼ cup lemon juice, ½ teaspoon sugar, ½ teaspoon salt, and ¼ teaspoon McCormick® black pepper', '2:  Gradually whisk in the ⅔ cup olive oil until dressing is fully emulsified', '3:  Set aside', '4: Rub 1 lb boneless skinless chicken breasts with ⅔ cup olive oil', '5:  Sprinkle generously with ½ teaspoon salt and ¼ teaspoon McCormick® black pepper', '6: Heat up an oiled skillet over medium-high heat', '7:  Cook 1 lb boneless skinless chicken until seared on the first side, 3–4 minutes, then flip the 1 lb boneless skinless chicken', '8:  Cover with a lid to allow the 1 lb boneless skinless chicken to cook through, 7–10 minutes', '9:  Once the 1 lb boneless skinless chicken is cooked through, remove from pan and let rest for 5–10 minutes, then cut into slices', '10: Cut the hard-boiled 4 hard-boiled eggs into quarters', '11:  Cut the ½ lb bacon into 1-inch (2 ½ cm) pieces', '12: Arrange the 1 head green leaf lettuce on a large platter', '13:  On top of the 1 head green leaf lettuce, place 6 small piles of the 1 lb boneless skinless chicken, 4 hard-boiled eggs, ½ lb bacon, tomatoes, radishes, cucumbers, and 1 avocado']

ingredients: ['1 lb skirt steak (455 g)', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL) divided', '1 tablespoon McCormick® Jazzy Spice Blend', '2 teaspoons kosher salt divided plus more to taste', '6 cloves garlic thinly sliced', '12 oz green beans (340 g)', '2 cups grape tomato (300 g)', '2 yellow bell peppers seeded cut into 1 in (2 1/2 cm) wide strips', '1 large shallot thinly sliced', '3 tablespoons cornstarch', 'canola oil for frying', '1 head red leaf lettuce chopped', 'Dressing', '½ cup whole greek yogurt (140 g)', '¼ cup sour cream (55 g)', '2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '1 tablespoon McCormick® Jazzy Spice Blend', '1 teaspoon dijon mustard', '1 tablespoon cold water if necessary', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: Rub the 1 lb skirt steak with 2 tablespoons of ¼ cup olive ¼ cup olive canola oil, the Jazzy spice blend, and 1 teaspoon 2 teaspoons kosher 1 teaspoon kosher salt', '4:  Let marinate in the refrigerator until ready to grill', '5: In a medium bowl, toss together the remaining 2 tablespoons ¼ cup olive ¼ cup olive canola oil, the 6 cloves garlic, 12 oz green beans, tomatoes, 2 yellow bell 2 yellow bell freshly ground black peppers, and remaining teaspoon of 2 teaspoons kosher 1 teaspoon kosher salt', '6:  Spread the vegetables on the prepared baking sheet and bake for 15 minutes, until the tomatoes are just beginning to burst', '7: Add the sliced shallot to a medium bowl', '8:  Break up the shallots with your fingers so you are left with individual rings', '9:  Sift the cornstarch over the shallots and toss to coat', '10: Heat 2 inches (5 cm) of ¼ cup olive canola oil in a 1 large skillet until it reaches 350˚F (180˚C)', '11: Working in batches, fry the shallots for 2 minutes, flipping halfway through, until golden brown', '12:  Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate to drain and season with 2 teaspoons kosher 1 teaspoon kosher salt', '13: Heat a griddle pan over medium-high heat', '14:  Sear the 1 lb skirt steak for 2-3 minutes on each side, depending on thickness, until medium-rare or cooked to your desired temperature', '15:  Let rest while you prepare the dressing, then slice', '16: Make the dressing: In a medium bowl, mix together the ½ cup whole greek yogurt, ¼ cup sour cream, lemon juice, Jazzy spice blend, mustard', '17:  Thin with 1 tablespoon cold water if necessary', '18:  Season with 2 teaspoons kosher 1 teaspoon kosher salt and 2 yellow bell freshly ground black pepper', '19: Assemble the salad: In a 1 large bowl, toss the roasted vegetables with the 1 head red leaf lettuce', '20:  Top with the sliced 1 lb skirt steak and fried shallots', '21:  Drizzle with the dressing', '22:  Divide between bowls and serve with more dressing on the side']

ingredients: ['3 eggs', '½ cup greek yogurt', '½ cup maple syrup (168 g)', '¼ cup milk (60 mL)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 carrots shredded', '1 ½ cups whole wheat flour (195 g)', '1 ¾ teaspoons baking powder', '1 ½ teaspoons ground cinnamon', 'Frosting', '8 oz light cream cheese (225 g) softened', '¼ cup maple syrup (84 g)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C)', '2: In a large bowl, whisk the 3 eggs until 8 oz light and fluffy', '3: Add in the Greek yogurt and whisk again until the mixture is smooth and fluffy', '4: Pour in the maple syrup, milk, and vanilla extract', '5:  Beat the mixture again until smooth', '6: Add the shredded 2 carrots, whole 1 ½ cups whole wheat flour, 1 ¾ teaspoons baking powder, and 1 ½ teaspoons ground cinnamon over the wet  ingredients', '7:  Using a rubber spatula, fold the wet and dry ingredients together just until combined', '8: Using a medium ice cream scoop, portion the batter into a greased 12-cup muffin tin', '9: Bake for 20 minutes, until the muffins have risen and set', '10: For the frosting, beat the cream cheese in a small bowl until smooth', '11: Add in the maple syrup and vanilla and beat again until the mixture is well combined', '12: Once the muffins have cooled, use a small ice cream scoop to spoon a bit of the frosting on top of the muffins', '13:  Gently tap the muffins on the counter to smooth out the layer of frosting on top']

ingredients: ['Ganache Filling', '1 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips (175 g)', '½ cup heavy cream (120 mL)', 'Macarons', '1 ¾ cups powdered sugar (210 g)', '1 cup finely ground almond flour (95 g)', '1 teaspoon kosher salt divided', '3 large egg whites room temperature', '¼ cup granulated sugar (50 g)', '¼ teaspoon peppermint extract', 'red gel food coloring', 'For Garnish', '8 candy canes crushed']
instructions: ['1: Make the ganache filling: In a medium bowl, combine the 1 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips and ½ cup heavy cream', '2:  Microwave in 30-second intervals, stirring between, until melted and smooth, about 1 minute total', '3:  Set aside to cool for at least 1 hour', '4: Make the macarons: In the bowl of a food processor, combine the 1 ¾ cups powdered sugar, almond flour, and ½ teaspoon of salt', '5:  Process on low speed until very 1 cup finely ground', '6:  Sift the almond flour mixture through a fine-mesh sieve into a 3 large bowl', '7:  Set aside', '8: In a separate 3 large bowl, beat the egg whites and the remaining ½ teaspoon of salt with an electric hand mixer until soft peaks form', '9:  Gradually add the ¼ cup granulated sugar until fully incorporated', '10:  Continue to beat until stiff peaks form (you should be able to turn the bowl upside down without anything falling out)', '11: Add about ⅓ of the sifted almond flour mixture at a time to the beaten egg whites and use a rubber spatula to gently fold until combined', '12:  After the last addition of almond flour, add the peppermint extract', '13:  Continue to fold slowly until the batter falls into ribbons and you can make a figure 8 while holding the spatula up', '14: Set a piping bag or zip-top bag fitted with a round tip in a tall drinking glass', '15:  Dip a skewer or toothpick in the red gel food coloring and paint 2 stripes on opposite sides of the inside of the piping bag', '16:  Transfer the macaron batter to the bag', '17: Pipe 4 small dollops of batter in each corner of a rimmed baking sheet, then lay a piece of parchment paper over it, using the batter to help adhere the parchment to the baking sheet', '18: Pipe the macarons onto the parchment paper in 2-inch (5-cm) circles, spacing at least 1-inch (2', '19: 5-cm) apart', '20: Tap the baking sheet on a flat surface 5 times to release any air bubbles', '21:  If there are any points on the top of the macarons, let sit for 5 minutes after tapping the pan, then, with a slightly moistened finger, lightly pat down the peaks', '22: Let the macarons sit at room temperature for 30–60 minutes, until dry to the touch', '23: Preheat the oven to 300˚F (150˚C)', '24: Bake the macarons for 20 minutes, until the feet are well risen and the macarons don’t stick to the parchment paper', '25:  Transfer the macarons to a wire rack to cool completely before filling', '26: Transfer the cooled ganache to a piping bag or zip-top bag fitted with a round tip', '27: Pipe a dollop of ganache onto a macaron shell', '28:  Top with another macaron shell to create a sandwich', '29:  Repeat with remaining macarons and ganache', '30: Roll the edges of the macarons in the crushed 8 candy canes', '31: If desired, place the macarons in an airtight container for 24 hours to “bloom” before serving, or serve immediately']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '1 cup onion (150 g) diced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 cup celery (225 g) diced', '1 cup carrot (120 g) diced', '½ lb cooked chicken (225 g) shredded', '4 cans chicken broth', '2 cups egg noodle (300 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '2 leaves dried bay leaf']
instructions: ['1: In a large pot, melt 2 tablespoons butter and add onions and 2 cloves garlic', '2:  Cook until onions have begun to soften', '3: Add 1 cup celery, carrots, and ½ lb cooked shredded ½ lb cooked 4 cans chicken', '4: Add the ½ lb cooked 4 cans chicken broth, 2 cups egg noodles, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon pepper and bay 2 leaves', '5: Bring to a boil and then reduce heat, cover and simmer for 20 minutes', '6: Remove bay 2 leaves from the soup']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '¾ cup chorizo (100 g) chopped into 1/4 in pieces', '1 medium onion chopped', '2 cloves garlic chopped', 'red bell pepper chopped into 1/2 in (1 1/4 cm) pieces', '1 tablespoon paprika', '½ teaspoon ground cumin', '¼ teaspoon ground pepper', '1 pinch sea salt', '5 lb tomato (2.4 g) chopped', '4 eggs', '½ cup feta cheese (50 g) crumbled', '¼ cup fresh parsley (15 g)']
instructions: ['1: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a frying pan over 1 medium heat', '2: Add ¾ cup chorizo, onion, 2 cloves garlic, and red bell pepper, cooking for 2–-3 minutes, or until fragrant', '3: Add 1 tablespoon paprika, ground cumin, pepper, and 1 pinch sea salt', '4:  Stir to combine, cooking for 6–-8 minutes, or until the vegetables begin to soften', '5: Pour tinned 5 lb tomatoes into the skillet, reduce heat, and let simmer for 20–-25 minutes, or until the sauce begins to thicken', '6: Using the back of a spoon, make 4 wells in the 5 lb tomato sauce', '7:  Crack an egg into each well', '8: Cover the skillet with a lid, and cook for 6–-8 minutes, or until 4 eggs are cooked', '9: Top with crumbled ½ cup feta and chopped ¼ cup fresh parsley']

ingredients: ['4 cups green beans (1.4 kg) trimmed and halved crosswise', '2 tablespoons olive oil plus more for drizzling', '½ medium yellow onion diced', '12 oz mushroom (340 g) chopped', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '3 tablespoons all-purpose flour', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 cups non-dairy milk (480 mL)', '1 ¼ cups fried onion (180 g) divided']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C)', '2: Bring a small pot of water to a boil, then place a strainer over the top', '3:  Add the 4 cups green beans to the strainer, cover, and steam for 10-15 minutes, or until fork-tender', '4:  Set aside', '5: Heat a drizzle of olive oil in a ½ medium pot over ½ medium heat', '6:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the onion', '7:  Cook for 2 minutes, or until semi-translucent', '8: Add the mushrooms and cook for 5-6 minutes, until they have released the majority of their juices', '9:  Add 2 tablespoons of olive oil, the 2 cloves garlic, and 1 tablespoon soy sauce', '10:  Cook for 2-3 minutes, until the 2 cloves garlic is fragrant', '11: Stir in the flour to make a roux, then season with salt and pepper', '12: While stirring continuously, pour in the non-dairy 2 cups non-dairy milk and bring to a boil', '13:  Cook for 4-5 minutes, until the sauce has thickened', '14: Stir in the 4 cups green beans and ½ cup (75 g) of the 1 ¼ cups fried onions, until combined', '15:  Transfer to a ½ medium baking dish and sprinkle on the remaining cup of 1 ¼ cups fried onions', '16: Bake for 20 minutes, or until bubbling', '17: Serve warm']

ingredients: ['6 qt water plus more as needed', '2 lb beef shank (910 g)', '6 scallions halved crosswise divided', '8 slices fresh ginger divided', '6 pods star anise divided', '½ cup vegetable oil (120 g)', '6 cloves garlic', '2 red chiles halved lengthwise', '1 medium white onion sliced', '1 piece rock sugar', '3 tablespoons spicy bean paste or regular bean paste', '½ cup dark soy sauce (120 mL)', '½ cup rice wine (120 mL)', '½ cup light soy sauce (120 mL)', '2 medium tomatoes quartered', '1 teaspoon white pepper', '1 teaspoon salt', 'dried bay leaf', '2 bundles flour noodle', '2 cups bok choy (50 g)', 'For Garnish', 'scallion sliced', 'fresh cilantro chopped', 'red chile finely diced']
instructions: ['1: Fill a large pot with about 6 quarts (5 ½ L) of 6 qt water and add the 2 lb beef shank, 3 6 scallions, 5 8 slices of ginger, and 3 star anise 6 pods', '2:  Cover, bring to a boil over high heat, and cook for 5 minutes', '3: Remove the meat from the pot, rinse in cold 6 qt water, and cut into thick 8 slices', '4:  Discard the cooking liquid', '5: In a wok or large pan over medium-high heat, pour in the ½ cup vegetable oil and add the remaining 3 6 scallions, 3 ginger 8 slices, the 6 cloves garlic, red chiles, remaining 3 star anise 6 pods, the onion, 1 piece rock sugar, and 3 tablespoons spicy bean paste', '6:  Cook until the onions start to become translucent', '7: Add the 1 medium 1 teaspoon white onion scallion sliced 2 lb beef', '8: Add the ½ cup dark soy sauce, for color, stir, then add the ½ cup rice wine', '9: Pour in the ½ cup light soy sauce, for flavor, then add the tomatoes', '10:  Stir fry for 8-10 minutes', '11: Fill the same large pot about a quarter of the way with 6 qt water and heat over medium-high heat', '12:  Add the stir-fried meat, ½ cup vegetables, and cooking liquid', '13: Add more 6 qt water until the meat is just covered, then add the 1 medium 1 teaspoon white pepper, 1 teaspoon salt, and dried bay leaves', '14:  Cover and reduce the heat to low and simmer for at least 2 hours, until the meat becomes tender', '15:  Remove the dried bay leaves and star anise before serving', '16: Bring a large pot of 6 qt water to boil over high heat and cook the 2 bundles flour noodles according to the package instructions', '17:  Remove the noodles from the 6 qt water', '18: Add the 2 cups bok choy to the boiling 6 qt water', '19:  Cook for 3 minutes, then remove', '20: To assemble the soup, place a generous amount of noodles in the bottom of a bowl', '21:  Then, add 2 cups bok choy, meat, and broth', '22:  Garnish with 6 scallions, fresh cilantro, and red chilies']

ingredients: ['1 lb lean ground beef (455 g)', '3 tablespoons taco seasoning 1 envenlope', '6 oz diced tomato (170 g)', '4 oz diced green chilies (115 g) 1 can', '1 ½ cups shredded sharp cheddar cheese (150 g)', '6 large flour tortillas']
instructions: ['1: In a 6 large skillet, brown the 1 lb lean ground beef and drain any remaining fat', '2:  Transfer to a bowl', '3: Add taco seasoning, tomatoes and 4 oz diced green chiles to the 1 lb lean ground beef and stir to combine', '4: Preheat oven to 375ºF (190ºC)', '5: Cut flour tortillas into a square shape and cut each into 4 smaller equally sized square pieces', '6: Generously coat a standard size muffin tin with nonstick cooking spray', '7: Line each cup of prepared muffin tin with a tortilla sheet', '8: Add 1', '9: 5 3 tablespoons taco mixture', '10:  Top with 1 tablespoon of cheese', '11:  Press down and add another layer of tortilla sheet, taco mixture, and a final layer of cheese', '12: Lightly brush the top edges of the tortilla with cooking oil', '13: Bake 18-20 minutes until 1 ½ cups are heated through and edges are golden brown']

ingredients: ['Chili Dipping Sauce', '2 tablespoons rice vinegar', '2 tablespoons sugar', '1 clove garlic grated', '¼ cup korean chili paste (55 g)', 'Sesame Soy Garlic Dipping Sauce', '6 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 teaspoons toasted sesame oil', '2 ½ teaspoons rice vinegar', '1 tablespoon sugar', '2 scallions white and light green parts very thinly sliced', '2 cloves garlic grated', '1 teaspoon sesame seed', 'Pancakes', '1 cup cake flour (125 g)', '¼ teaspoon baking powder', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt divided', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '1 cup ice water (240 mL) plus 2 tablespoons', '20 scallions about 2 bunches root trimmed', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil plus 2-4 teaspoons', '¼ lb shrimp (105 g) peeled deveined and halved lengthwise (butterflied)', '¼ lb calamari bodies (105 g) sliced into ¼-inch rings rinsed and patted dry', '2 large eggs', '1 red chili thinly sliced']
instructions: ['1: Make the chili dipping sauce: In a medium bowl, whisk together 2 2 2 6 1 1 cup ice water (240 mL) plus 2 2 tablespoons 2 ½ teaspoons rice vinegar, 2 2 6 1 1 cup ice water (240 mL) plus 2 2 tablespoons 1 1 1 cup ice water (240 mL) plus 2 2 tablespoon sugar, garlic, and gochujang until smooth', '2:  Set aside until ready to use', '3:  The sauce will keep in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 1 week', '4: Make the sesame 6 6 1 1 cup ice water (240 mL) plus 2 2 tablespoons soy garlic dipping sauce: In a medium bowl, whisk together the 6 6 1 1 cup ice water (240 mL) plus 2 2 tablespoons soy sauce, sesame oil, 2 2 2 6 1 1 cup ice water (240 mL) plus 2 2 tablespoons 2 ½ teaspoons rice vinegar, and 2 2 6 1 1 cup ice water (240 mL) plus 2 2 tablespoons 1 1 1 cup ice water (240 mL) plus 2 2 tablespoon sugar until the 2 2 6 1 1 cup ice water (240 mL) plus 2 2 tablespoons 1 1 1 cup ice water (240 mL) plus 2 2 tablespoon sugar dissolves', '5:  Add the scallions, garlic, and sesame seeds and whisk until well combined', '6:  Set aside until ready to use', '7:  The sauce will keep in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 1 week', '8: Make the pancake batter: In a 2 large bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, 1 teaspoon salt, garlic powder, onion powder, and black pepper', '9:  Stream in the ice water and whisk until the batter is smooth, about 1 minute', '10: Place the scallions in a 2 large nonstick skillet to measure, then remove from the pan and trim so the scallions will lie flat in the bottom of the pan', '11: Add 1 2 2 6 1 1 cup ice water (240 mL) plus 2 2 tablespoon 2 tablespoons vegetable oil to the skillet and heat over medium-low heat for 1–2 minutes', '12:  Arrange half of the trimmed scallions in a single layer in the skillet and cook for 1–2 minutes, until softened', '13:  Slowly pour about ½ cup batter over the scallions, ensuring that the batter gets between each scallion and to hold everything together', '14: Immediately arrange half of the ¼ lb shrimp and half of the squid over the batter, distributing evenly', '15:  Pour another ¼ cup of the batter over the seafood, and let cook for 2–5 minutes, until the batter is starting to set', '16:  Carefully slide a spatula under the edge of the pancake and lift up to see if the underside of the pancake is turning golden brown', '17:  If it is starting to burn, 1 reduce the heat to low', '18: Add each egg to a small bowl with ¼ teaspoon salt each', '19:  Whisk with a fork to combine', '20: When the pancake is mostly set on top, sprinkle with half of the 1 red chile, then pour 1 beaten egg over the pancake', '21:  Cook for 2–4 minutes more, until the egg is mostly set', '22: Quickly flip the pancake, then drizzle 1–2 teaspoons of 2 tablespoons vegetable oil around the edges of the pan to prevent sticking', '23:  Cook the pancake for 2–3 minutes more, until the egg is fully cooked and the bottom of the pancake is golden brown and crispy', '24:  Set a plate over the skillet and quickly invert the pancake onto the plate', '25:  Repeat with the remaining ingredients to make another pancake', '26: Slice the pancakes and serve with the dipping sauces']

ingredients: ['½ cup chocolate  hazelnut spread (150 g)', '2 eggs']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '2: Separate the egg yolks from the egg whites and place into two bowls', '3: Mix the ½ cup chocolate hazelnut spread into the bowl with the egg yolks', '4: In the second bowl, whisk 2 egg whites until stiff peaks form', '5: Fold ⅓ of the whipped egg whites into the ½ cup chocolate/egg yolk mixture until fully incorporated', '6:  Add the remaining egg whites to the mixture and fold gently, but thoroughly, until the mixture is smooth', '7: Pour the mixture into a greased ramekin', '8:  Clean the rims so the soufflé rises evenly, and bake for 15-17 minutes', '9: Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon oil', '1 teaspoon black mustard seeds', '1 teaspoon fenugreek seeds', 'curry leaf', '6 shallots sliced', '5 cloves garlic minced', '1 large onion diced and ground into a paste', '1 tomato diced and pureed', '2 chicken drumsticks vegetables', '2 tablespoons tamarind soaked in warm water', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 teaspoons chili powder', '2 teaspoons coriander powder', '1 cup coconut milk (240 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Add 1 tablespoon oil in a pan on medium heat', '2:  To this, add 1 teaspoon black mustard seeds, 1 teaspoon fenugreek seeds, curry leaves, and 6 shallots', '3:  Saute until 1 teaspoon black mustard seeds pop', '4: Add 5 cloves garlic, 1 large onion paste and 1 tomato puree and cook well', '5:  Once the raw 1 large onion is cooked, add seasonings (chili powder and 2 teaspoons coriander powder) and cook well until spices are no longer raw (5-7 minutes)', '6: Add 2 chicken drumsticks and 2 teaspoons salt and cook on low heat', '7:  To this, add 2 tablespoons tamarind paste and boil for 10 minutes until the 2 chicken drumsticks are cooked', '8: Finally, add 1 cup coconut milk and simmer for 10 minutes', '9: Serve with hot dosas (lentil-rice crepes) or steamed white rice']

ingredients: ['Sugar Cookies', '24 tablespoons unsalted butter softened', '1 ½ cups granulated sugar (300 g)', '3 tablespoons cream cheese softened', '1 large egg', '2 large egg yolks', '1 teaspoon McCormick® vanilla extract', '½ teaspoon McCormick® almond extract', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '3 ½ cups all purpose flour (440 g) plus more for dusting', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '2 teaspoons cream of tartar', 'Royal Icing', '4 cups powdered sugar (480 g)', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'gel food coloring of your choice', 'water as needed', '¼ cup pasteurized egg white']
instructions: ['1: Make the cookie dough: In a large bowl, 3 tablespoons 2 teaspoons cream together the butter, 1 ½ cups granulated 4 cups 4 cups powdered sugar, and 3 tablespoons 2 teaspoons cream cheese with an electric hand mixer on high speed for about 5 minutes, until fluffy and the 1 ½ cups granulated 4 cups 4 cups powdered sugar is mostly dissolved', '2:  Scrape down the bowl as needed to evenly beat the mixture', '3: Add the 1 large 2 large ¼ cup pasteurized egg, 1 large 2 large ¼ cup pasteurized egg yolks, vanilla, and ½ teaspoon McCormick® almond extract and mix well, scraping down the sides of the bowl', '4: Add the salt, then sift the 3 ½ cups all purpose flour, ½ teaspoon baking powder, and 3 tablespoons 2 teaspoons cream of tartar into the bowl and fold to incorporate some of the 3 ½ cups all purpose flour', '5:  Then beat on low speed, just until incorporated and the dough comes together', '6: Shape the dough into a flat disc and wrap tightly in plastic wrap', '7:   Chill in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours, or up to 3-4 days', '8: When ready to bake the cookies, preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '9:   Line a ½ teaspoon baking sheet with parchment paper', '10: Remove the dough from the fridge and let sit at room temperature for a few minutes to soften slightly', '11: On a lightly 3 ½ cups all purpose floured surface, roll out the cookie dough with a rolling pin to ¼-inch (6mm) thick', '12: Dip cookie cutters of your choice in some extra 3 ½ cups all purpose flour and cut out shapes from the dough', '13:  Gather any excess dough into a ball and chill in the fridge to firm, then re-roll and cut out more cookies', '14:  Place the cookies on the prepared ½ teaspoon baking sheet and chill for at least 20 minutes to ensure they hold their shapes', '15: Bake the cookies for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges just barely start to turn golden brown', '16:  Cool completely on a wire rack before decorating with royal icing or frosting', '17: To make the royal icing, sift the 4 cups powdered 1 ½ cups granulated 4 cups 4 cups powdered sugar into a large bowl and add the salt', '18:  On one side of the bowl, add the vanilla and 1 large 2 large ¼ cup pasteurized egg whites', '19: Where you added the liquids, begin whisking the 4 cups powdered 1 ½ cups granulated 4 cups 4 cups powdered sugar into the liquids, gathering a bit more as you whisk to prevent lumps from forming, until all of the 4 cups powdered 1 ½ cups granulated 4 cups 4 cups powdered sugar is incorporated', '20:  Add gel food coloring, if desired, and whisk to incorporate', '21:  You can divide the icing into smaller bowls to make more than one color', '22:  At this point, the icing should be a good consistency for piping borders', '23:  If you’d like the frosting to be looser to flood or dip your cookies, add a few tablespoons of water, 1 tablespoon at a time, until it reaches your desired consistency', '24: Decorate the cookies as desired']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '15 oz chickpeas (425 g) 1 can', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '1 pinch salt', '¼ cup buffalo sauce (75 g)', '⅓ cup hummus (45 g)', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon water', '2 large tortillas', 'romaine lettuce', 'tomato sliced', 'red onion sliced']
instructions: ['1: In a 2 large saucepan, heat the 1 tablespoon olive oil over medium heat', '2:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the 15 oz chickpeas and cook until lightly browned, 2-3 minutes', '3: Add the ½ teaspoon garlic powder, 1 pinch salt, and buffalo sauce and cook for 2 more minutes, until the sauce thickens and the 15 oz chickpeas have browned', '4:  Set aside', '5: In a small bowl or liquid measuring cup, combine the hummus, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, and 1 tablespoon water and whisk thoroughly', '6: To assemble a wrap, top a tortilla with romaine, 15 oz chickpeas, tomatoes, and red onion, then pour on the dressing', '7: Fold in the sides of the wrap and roll up like a burrito', '8:  Cut in half']

ingredients: ['1 can chickpeas drained and rinsed', '1 cup red lentils (170 g) cooked', '½ cup fresh parsley leaf (20 g)', "1 tablespoon Frank's Red Hot Original Sauce", '1 lemon zest', '1 ½ teaspoons garlic powder', '1 teaspoon paprika', '½ teaspoon cumin', '2 teaspoons salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 cup panko bread crumbs (50 g)', 'Spicy Aioli', '½ cup mayonnaise (120 g)', "2 tablespoons Frank's Red Hot Original", 'Assembly', 'brioche  bun', 'red onion sliced', 'small tomato slice', 'avocado sliced', 'green leaf lettuce']
instructions: ['1: Burger: Preheat oven to 425ºF', '2:  Spread cauliflower florets on a sheet tray', '3:  Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with 2 teaspoons salt', '4:  Toss to combine', '5:  Roast for 20–25 minutes, until golden brown and tender', '6:  Let cool', '7: Combine cauliflower, 1 can chickpeas, red lentils, ½ cup fresh parsley, Frank’s Red Hot Original, 1 lemon zest, 1 ½ teaspoons garlic powder, 1 teaspoon paprika, ½ teaspoon cumin, 2 teaspoons salt, and ½ teaspoon pepper in a food processor', '8:  Process until everything is broken down and combined', '9:  (You will need to scrape down the sides and mix ingredients together with a spatula in between pulses', '10: ) Transfer to a bowl and stir in 1 cup panko bread crumbs', '11:  Chill mixture for at least 30 minutes', '12: Once mixture is chilled, shape into patties', '13: Heat a large skillet over medium-low heat', '14:  Add in a generous drizzle of vegetable oil', '15:  Add in patties and cook until browned, about 4 minutes', '16:  Flip and cook the other side until browned, about 3 minutes more', '17:  Remove from pan', '18: Spicy Aioli: Whisk together ½ cup mayonnaise and Frank’s Red Hot Original', '19: Assembly: Spread aioli on bottom brioche  bun', '20:  Place a veggie burger patty on the brioche  bun', '21:  Layer on the red onion slice, small tomato slice, a few avocado slices, and green leaf lettuce', '22:  Add the top brioche  bun']

ingredients: ['1 ½ cups pineapple (365 g) diced', '1 ½ cups mango (250 g) diced', 'Simple Syrup', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '1 cup sugar (200 g)', '1 ½ cups mango (250 g) diced']
instructions: ['1: Combine 1 cup water, 1 cup sugar, and mangoes in a pot over medium heat', '2:  Once the 1 cup sugar has dissolved, simmer for 30 minutes and reduce', '3: Pour simple syrup through a strainer and remove excess liquid, then let it cool to room temperature', '4: In a blender, combine simple syrup, 1 ½ cups pineapple, and the remaining mango', '5:  Blend until well-combined', '6: Pour into an 8×8 inch (20x20 cm) baking dish and freeze for at least 12 hours', '7: Take out of the freezer and let sit for 5-10 minutes before scooping', '8: Serve']

ingredients: ['unsalted butter for greasing', 'Option 1: Prepared Mix', '18 oz brownie mix (510 g) prepared according to package instructions', 'Option 2: From Scratch', '2 ¼ cups granulated sugar (450 g)', '1 ¼ cups dutch processed cocoa  powder (150 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 ½ cups all-purpose flour (190 g)', '1 cup vegetable oil (240 mL)', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '3 large eggs', '¼ cup water (60 mL)', 'Additions', '1 cup toasted walnuts (100 g)', '½ cup creamy peanut butter (240 g)', 'whipped cream for serving', 'caramel sauce for drizzling']
instructions: ['1: Position a rack in the center of the oven and preheat to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Grease a 9-by-13-inch (23-by-33-cm) dark metal pan with softened unsalted ½ cup creamy ½ cup creamy peanut butter, then line with parchment paper, leaving overhang on all sides', '3:  Grease the parchment with more unsalted ½ cup creamy ½ cup creamy peanut butter', '4: OPTION 1: If using prepared mix, make the 18 oz brownie batter according to the package instructions', '5: OPTION 2: If making the 18 oz brownie batter from scratch, in a 3 large bowl, whisk together the 2 ¼ cups granulated sugar, 1 ¼ cups dutch processed cocoa powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon baking powder, and 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '6:  Add the 1 cup vegetable oil, 1 tablespoon vanilla, eggs, and ¼ cup water and whisk to combine', '7: Stir in the 1 cup toasted walnuts', '8: Pour the 18 oz brownie batter into the prepared 1 teaspoon baking pan and smooth the top with a spatula', '9: Pour the ½ cup creamy peanut unsalted ½ cup creamy ½ cup creamy peanut butter over the top and swirl into the batter with a knife or skewer', '10: Bake until lightly puffed on top, about 20 minutes', '11:  Transfer the 18 oz brownie pan to a wire rack and let cool completely, about 30 minutes', '12: Use the parchment paper to lift the cooled 18 oz brownies out of the pan and cut into 12 bars', '13: Serve with a dollop of whipped cream and a drizzle of caramel sauce']

ingredients: ['1 oz chocolate chips (90 g)', '¼ cup oat flour (20 g)', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '2 tablespoons honey', '1 egg white', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract']
instructions: ['1: Mix together 1 egg white, 2 tablespoons honey, and ½ teaspoon vanilla extract  in a greased coffee mug', '2: Add ¼ cup oat flour and ½ teaspoon baking powder and mix until combined', '3: Add in 1 oz chocolate chips', '4: Microwave on high for 90 seconds (times may vary)']

ingredients: ['1 cup all purpose flour (125 g)', '⅓ cup cocoa powder (35 g)', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 eggs', '1 cup brown sugar (200 g)', '½ cup vegetable oil (240 mL)', '½ cup buttermilk (120 mL)', '1 tablespoon tamarind paste', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '⅓ cup dark chocolate (65 g) chopped', 'Meringue topping:', '4 egg whites', '¾ cup sugar (150 g)', '¼ teaspoon cream of tartar (or xanthan gum) optional', 'Garnish:', 'dark chocolate for grating', 'cinnamon stick for grating', 'Red and green sprinkle']
instructions: ['1: Preheat your oven to 350 degrees', '2:  Begin by making your cupcakes', '3:  In a mixing bowl, whisk together the 1 cup all purpose flour, ⅓ cup cocoa powder, cinnamon, 1 teaspoon baking powder, and 1 teaspoon salt to evenly combine', '4:  In a separate bowl, whisk together the 2 2 4 eggs, sugar, ½ cup vegetable oil, ½ cup buttermilk, 1 tablespoon tamarind, and 1 teaspoon vanilla extract to evenly combine', '5:  Then, add the dry ingredients to the wet bowl and whisk just until the mixture comes together evenly', '6:  Fold in the chopped chocolate, then divide the mixture evenly amongst 12 paper-lined muffin tins', '7:  Place the filled 1 teaspoon baking cups into muffin tins or onto a sheet tray, then place in the oven to bake for 19 - 21 minutes, or until a sharp knife comes out clean when testing the cupcake', '8:  Remove cooked cupcakes and allow them to cool completely', '9: While the cupcakes cool, make your meringue', '10:  In a heatproof bowl, whisk the 2 4 egg whites, sugar, and ¼ teaspoon cream of tartar together evenly', '11:  Place the bowl over a pot of gently simmering water and whisk well for 2 minutes to fully dissolve the sugar into the mixture', '12:  Remove from the heat then start to whip the 2 4 egg white mixture', '13:  Using a hand mixer (or transfer to a stand mixer with the whisk attachment) whisk the 2 4 egg white mixture on high for 9 - 10 minutes, or until glossy and stiff peaks form', '14:  Transfer the whipped meringue to a piping bag fitted with your choice of shaped tip', '15:  When the cupcakes have cooled, begin piping your cupcakes', '16:  Garnish with extra shaved chocolate on top, freshly grated cinnamon, and some red or Red and green sprinkles']

ingredients: ['2 sheets puff pastry thawed', '8 oz cream cheese (225 g) softened', '14 oz artichoke heart (400 g) 1 can drained and chopped', '¾ cup fresh spinach (30 g) cooked and drained of excess water or frozen and thawed', '¼ cup sour cream (60 g)', '½ cup grated parmesan cheese (55 g)', '½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese (60 g)', '2 teaspoons garlic powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 egg beaten']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, combine 8 oz ¼ cup ¼ cup sour cream cheese, 14 oz artichoke hearts, ¾ cup fresh spinach, ¼ cup sour 8 oz ¼ cup ¼ cup sour cream, ½ cup grated parmesan, ½ cup shredded mozzarella, 2 teaspoons garlic powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon ½ teaspoon ½ teaspoon red pepper, and ½ teaspoon red 1 teaspoon ½ teaspoon ½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '2: Preheat oven to 400ºF (200ºC)', '3: Place the two 2 sheets of puff pastry on a parchment paper-lined baking tray', '4:  Using a dinner plate as a guide, cut out equal size circles from both 2 sheets', '5: Remove the top sheet', '6: On the bottom sheet, spread ¾ cup fresh spinach 14 oz artichoke mixture and lay the other sheet of puff pastry on top', '7: Take a glass and place it in the center of the circle', '8:  Using a knife, cut away from the edge of the glass to create 12 equally spaced strips', '9: Take each strip and twist then brush with beaten 1 egg', '10: Bake at 400°F (200°C) for 30 minutes, or until golden']

ingredients: ['Tandoori Spice Blend', '4 cinnamon sticks broekn into 1in (2.54 cm) pieces', '¼ cup whole coriander (10 g)', '3 tablespoons whole cumin seeds', '3 whole mace blades', '1 ½ tablespoons whole fenugreek seeds', '1 tablespoon whole black cardamom pod', '1 tablespoon whole green cardamom pods', '1 tablespoon whole black peppercorn', '1 tablespoon whole clove', '3 tablespoons kashmiri chile powder', '1 tablespoon ground ginger', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '2 teaspoons freshly grated nutmeg', 'Yogurt Marinade', '32 oz plain full-fat greek yogurt (955 g)', '¼ cup lemon juice (60 mL)', '¼ cup kosher salt (30 g)', '1 tablespoon grated fresh ginger', '1 tablespoon grated garlic', 'Turkey', '1 turkey thawed', 'Tandoori Ghee', '1 ½ cups ghee (325 g) clarified butter', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', 'For Roasting', '2 lemons quartered', '1 head garlic halved crosswise', '4 fresh bay leaves', '1 piece fresh ginger sliced into 1/2 in thick rounds', '½ bunch fresh cilantro', '3 cups chicken stock (720 mL)', 'Gravy', '¼ cup all purpose flour (25 g) plus 2 tablespoons', '3 cups reserved turkey drippings (720 mL) fat separated and discarded warmed or chicken stock', 'For Serving', 'fresh cilantro chopped', 'lime quartered', 'Traditional Tandoori side dish such as rice pulao raita aaan kachumber and/or aloo bhaji']
instructions: ['1: \u200b\u200bMake the tandoori spice blend: Set a medium skillet over medium-low heat and let the pan warm for a few minutes', '2:  Working one spice group at a time, toast the 4 cinnamon sticks, coriander seeds, cumin seeds, 3 whole mace blades (if using), fenugreek seeds, black and green cardamom pods, black peppercorns, and cloves in the warm skillet until each spice is fragrant and lightly browned, a few minutes per spice', '3:  Transfer the toasted spices to a plate or small tray while you toast the remaining spices', '4:  Let cool to room temperature', '5: Set a mesh strainer over a medium bowl', '6:  Once all of the whole spices have cooled, transfer to a high-powered blender or spice grinder (working in batches, if needed) and grind the spices into a fine powder', '7:  Pour the ground spices into the strainer and sift into the bowl below', '8:  Return any larger pieces to the blender and re-grind and sift into the bowl', '9: Add the Kashmiri chile powder, ground 1 tablespoon ground 1 tablespoon grated fresh 1 piece fresh ginger, 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon grated 1 head garlic powder, and 2 teaspoons freshly grated nutmeg to the bowl with the ground spices and mix well to combine (if using ground 3 whole mace, add here)', '10:  Transfer the mixture to an airtight container and store in a cool, dry place until ready to use', '11:  The spice mixture will keep for up to 2 weeks', '12: Make the 32 oz plain full-fat greek yogurt marinade: In a medium bowl, whisk together the 32 oz plain full-fat greek yogurt, ¾ cup of the tandoori spice blend, the lemon juice, ¼ cup kosher 2 teaspoons kosher salt, 1 tablespoon ground 1 tablespoon grated fresh 1 piece fresh ginger, and 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon grated 1 head garlic until smooth', '13: Remove the innards from the 1 3 cups reserved turkey and discard (or save for another use)', '14:  Pat the 1 3 cups reserved turkey dry all over with paper towels', '15:  Place the 1 3 cups reserved turkey in a bowl large enough to fit the bird, then pour the 32 oz plain full-fat greek yogurt marinade all over the 1 3 cups reserved turkey', '16:  Use your fingers to gently loosen the 1 3 cups reserved turkey skin, starting from the top of the cavity and working your way toward the breasts and down toward the legs, being careful not to tear the skin', '17:  Use your hands to work the marinade underneath the skin and all over the entire bird', '18:  Once well-coated, cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 3 hours, preferably overnight', '19: While the 1 3 cups reserved turkey is marinating, make the tandoori ghee: Add the ghee to a small saucepan and cook over medium heat for 2–3 minutes, until hot', '20:  Add 2 tablespoons of the tandoori spice blend (it should sizzle lightly once it touches the ghee), then stir to incorporate and remove the pot from the heat', '21:  Stir in the ¼ cup kosher 2 teaspoons kosher salt', '22:  Transfer ¼ cup of the ghee to a small bowl and set aside to use for the gravy', '23:  Carefully pour the remaining 1¼ cups of ghee into a heat-proof container', '24: After marinating, remove the 1 3 cups reserved turkey from the refrigerator and let sit at room temperature for 2–3 hours before cooking', '25: Arrange a rack in the lower-middle section of the oven', '26:  Preheat the oven to 450°F (230°C)', '27:  Set a V-shaped rack inside a roasting pan', '28: Once ready to cook, remove the 1 3 cups reserved turkey from the 32 oz plain full-fat greek yogurt marinade and wipe off as much as possible', '29:  Squeeze out as much marinade as possible from underneath the 1 3 cups reserved turkey skin as well', '30: Grab the 1 3 cups reserved turkey by the legs and carefully transfer to the prepared roasting pan with the breast side up', '31:  With your hands, rub about a third of the tandoori ghee over the bird, then rub another third underneath the skin', '32:  Reserve the remaining ghee for basting the 1 3 cups reserved turkey', '33: Stuff the cavity with the 2 lemons, 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon grated 1 head garlic, 1 tablespoon ground 1 tablespoon grated fresh 1 piece fresh ginger, and cilantro', '34:  Tuck the wings underneath the 1 3 cups reserved turkey, then tie the legs together with kitchen twine, wrapping around the bird to secure', '35:  Pour 3 cups of chicken stock into the bottom of the roasting pan', '36: Roast the 1 3 cups reserved turkey for 30 minutes, rotating halfway, until the skin is mostly golden brown', '37:  While the 1 3 cups reserved turkey roasts, melt the remaining third of tandoori ghee in a small saucepan over low heat, or in a small bowl in the microwave', '38: After roasting for 30 minutes, baste the 1 3 cups reserved turkey with the melted ghee', '39:  Reduce the oven temperature to 300°F (150°C)', '40:  If the bottom of the pan looks dry, pour in 1–2 more cups of stock', '41:  Continue roasting, basting and rotating the 1 3 cups reserved turkey every 30 minutes, until a meat thermometer inserted in the thickest part of the leg reaches 165°F (75°C), 120–150 minutes more', '42:  The skin should be shiny, crisp, and golden brown–if the skin begins to get too dark, lightly tend the bird with aluminum foil', '43:  Remove the 1 3 cups reserved turkey from the oven and baste once more', '44:  Let rest for 30–60 minutes', '45:  Reserve the drippings, discarding the fat, for making the gravy', '46: Make the tandoori gravy: Add the reserved ¼ cup tandoori ghee to a medium saucepan over medium heat', '47:  Add the flour and cook, whisking frequently, for 3–5 minutes, until the roux is darker in color and smells fragrant and toasted', '48:  Add 1 tablespoon of the tandoori spice blend and whisk to combine, letting toast for another minute, until fragrant', '49:  Gradually whisk in the 1 3 cups reserved turkey drippings (adding chicken stock as needed for a total of 3 cups)', '50:  Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer for 10–15 minutes, until thickened slightly', '51:  Remove the gravy from heat', '52: To serve, set the whole 1 3 cups reserved turkey in the center of a large platter for a classic presentation, or carve the bird and arrange the cut pieces on the platter and garnish with cilantro and 2 lemons lime quartered limes', '53:  Serve immediately with the hot gravy alongside, as well as any traditional tandoori sides of choice']

ingredients: ['¾ cup pizza sauce (180 mL)', "1 ½ tablespoons Frank's Red Hot Original plus more for drizzling", '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 ½ teaspoons cornmeal', '1 lb pizza dough (455 g)', '1 ½ cups shredded mozzarella cheese (150 g)', '1 ½ cups shredded chicken (190 g)', '3 pieces bacon torn into ½-inch (1 1/4 cm) pieces', '1 small handful fresh baby spinach', '¾ cup cherry tomato (150 g) halved', '2 tablespoons red onion minced', 'ranch dressing for drizzling']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 450ºF (230ºC)', '2: In a 1 small bowl, whisk together pizza sauce with Frank’s Red Hot Original', '3:  Set aside', '4: Drizzle a 12-inch (30 ½ cm) cast iron skillet with 1 tablespoon olive oil', '5:  Use your hand or a paper towel to evenly coat the pan with oil', '6:  Sprinkle pan with 1 ½ teaspoons cornmeal', '7: Press pizza dough into the pan so that it covers the whole surface evenly', '8: Spread spicy pizza sauce on the dough', '9:  Top with 1 ½ cups shredded mozzarella, 1 ½ cups shredded chicken, and 3 pieces bacon', '10:  Scatter spinach, ¾ cup cherry tomatoes, and 2 tablespoons red onion on top', '11: Bake pizza for 14–16 minutes until edges are browned and crisp', '12: Remove from oven and let cool for 5 minutes, then drizzle with Frank’s Red Hot Original and ranch dressing', '13:  Slice and serve']

ingredients: ['Cookie', '1 cup unsalted butter (225 g) softened', '1 cup white sugar (200 g)', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 large eggs', '2 cups all-purpose flour (250 g)', '1 ¼ cups dark cocoa powder (150 g)', '½ teaspoon baking soda', 'Cream Filling', '½ cup butter (115 g) softened', '2 cups powdered sugar (240 g)', '1 teaspoon vanilla']
instructions: ['1: In a 2 large bowl, cream together 1 cup (225 grams) of softened butter with the white sugar and 2 teaspoons salt, until light and fluffy', '2: Beat in eggs until fully incorporated', '3: Sieve together the 2 cups all-purpose flour, cocoa powder, and ½ teaspoon baking soda into the mix', '4:  Blend well', '5: Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, and mix together until combined', '6: Turn the dough out onto your surface and push together into a flat square', '7:  Wrap the dough in plastic wrap and refrigerate for 1 hour', '8: Preheat oven to 325˚F (160˚C)', '9: Remove the dough from the fridge, and for ease of rolling out, divide the dough into 4 (this way the dough stays cool longer and prevents the need of re-chilling later on)', '10: To roll out the dough, place a quarter of the dough between two sheets of parchment paper (alternatively the dough can be rolled out on a lightly 2 cups all-purpose floured surface - though the parchment is preferred as it prevents any additional 2 cups all-purpose flour from altering the color/appearance of the 1 ¼ cups dark cookies)', '11:  Roll the dough between the two sheets of parchment to ¼-inch (½ cm) thickness', '12: Using a small round cookie cutter (alternatively, we found the rim of a champagne glass to be a perfect size!) cut the dough into individual rounds and place on a 2 large parchment-lined ½ teaspoon baking sheet, leaving at least ½-inch (1¼ cm) between each cookie', '13: Pack together and re-roll out any scraps to cut additional cookies', '14:  Repeat with this process with each remaining ¼ of the dough', '15: Bake in a preheated oven for 15 minutes', '16:  If ½ teaspoon baking multiple trays at the same time, be sure to rotate the pans in the oven halfway through', '17:  Remove and transfer cookies to a cooling rack to cool completely', '18: To make the filling, combine ½ cup (115 grams) butter, 2 cups powdered sugar, and 1 teaspoon vanilla in a medium mixing bowl', '19:  Beat together until light and fluffy', '20: Assemble the cookies by spreading a generous scoop of the icing onto one of the cookies and sandwiching it with another', '21:  Give it a light squeeze and scrape any excess off to clear and even out the sides', '22: Serve with a glass of milk']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon cooking oil of preference', '1 clove garlic minced', '¼ cup white onion (35 g) diced', '1 carrot sliced', '¼ cup frozen corn (45 g)', '¼ cup frozen peas (35 g)', '1 cup brown rice (230 g) cooked', '1 cup rotisserie chicken (125 g) shredded', '1 egg scrambled', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '½ tablespoon sesame oil', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'green onion for garnish', 'sesame seed for garnish']
instructions: ['1: In a large skillet heat 1 tablespoon cooking ½ tablespoon sesame oil over medium heat', '2:  Add 1 clove garlic, ¼ cup white green onion, 1 carrot, ¼ cup frozen corn, and ¼ cup frozen peas', '3:  Cook until 1 carrots are tender, stirring occasionally', '4: Add 1 cup brown rice, 1 cup rotisserie chicken, 1 egg, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, sesame 1 tablespoon cooking ½ tablespoon sesame oil, salt, and pepper to taste, and stir', '5:  Cook for another minute, or until everything is heated thoroughly', '6: Serve with a sprinkle of sesame seeds and green ¼ cup white green onion']

ingredients: ['1 cup strawberry (150 g)', '1 ½ cups romaine lettuce (115 g)', '½ red beet peeled diced', '1 piece ginger 1-inch (2 1/2 cm) peeled', '1 ½ cups ice (210 g)']
instructions: ['1: Place the strawberries, 1 ½ cups romaine lettuce, ½ red beet, and 1 piece ginger in a blender or food processor and blend until just combined', '2: Add in the 1 ½ cups ice and continue to blend until the mixture is smooth', '3: Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['2 lb boneless skinless chicken thighs (910 g) or breasts', '3 serrano peppers', '2 cups chicken stock (480 mL)', '2 tablespoons oil', '1 small yellow onion diced', '½ jar Doña Maria MOLÈ Sauce', '1 can Rotel Chillies', '1 can chipotle peppers in adobo', '4 cloves garlic minced', 'salt', 'pepper', 'small tortilla', 'Toppings (optional):', 'fresh cilantro', 'queso fresco', 'pickled red onion']
instructions: ['1: Roast the 3 serrano 3 serrano 3 serrano 1 can chipotle 1 can chipotle peppers until charred- once charred, remove skin and rough chop', '2:  Then, season 2 lb boneless skinless 2 2 cups chicken with salt and 3 serrano 1 can chipotle pepper', '3: In an enameled Dutch oven, heat 2 tablespoons oil over medium high heat and sear the 2 lb boneless skinless 2 2 cups chicken, 3-4 minutes per side', '4:  Remove and set aside on a clean plate', '5: Add diced 1 small yellow 1 small yellow pickled red onion, chopped Serrano, and 4 cloves garlic to pot and lightly caramelize', '6:  Then, add ½ ½ jar MOLÈ sauce & 2 2 cups (480 ml) 2 lb boneless skinless 2 2 cups chicken stock', '7:  Stir thoroughly to combine', '8: Return 2 lb boneless skinless 2 2 cups chicken to pot, submerging in sauce', '9:  Add more stock if needed', '10: Cover and Place in a preheated oven at 325°F or simmer on a stove for 45 minutes', '11: Remove the pot from the oven', '12:  Remove the 2 lb boneless skinless 2 2 cups chicken and let rest', '13: Ladle Sauce and all remaining contents into a blender and pulse until smooth and creamy', '14:  Do not liquify', '15: Assemble tacos, topping as desired', '16:  Serve']

ingredients: ['1 head cauliflower', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '1 tablespoon garlic', '½ lb ground beef (225 g) can substitute chicken pork shrimp or tofu', '1 cup carrot (120 g) diced', '1 cup frozen peas (150 g)', '2 eggs', 'white pepper to taste', '3 tablespoons soy sauce', 'green onion chopped for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Break down a 1 head of cauliflower in a food processor until it’s the size of rice', '2: Heat 1 tablespoon sesame oil over high', '3:  Add 1 tablespoon garlic and fry until fragrant', '4: Add the ½ lb ground beef, chicken, pork, shrimp or tofu and cook until 80% done', '5: Add carrots and cauliflower, stir until thoroughly incorporated', '6:  Mix in 1 cup frozen peas', '7: Push ingredients to the sides of the pan to create a well', '8:  Pour in 2 whisked 2 eggs and let it set for 15 seconds', '9:  Scramble 2 eggs and fold into the cauliflower rice', '10: Season with white pepper and stir in 3 tablespoons soy sauce', '11: Garnish with chopped green onions and serve']

ingredients: ['1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese (100 g)', '1 egg yolk']
instructions: ['1: Add the 1 cup shredded mozzarella to a bowl and microwave for 1-2 minutes, until melted', '2: Allow the 1 cup shredded mozzarella to cool for 30 seconds', '3: With a spatula, gently fold the 1 egg yolk into the cheese', '4: Turn the mixture out onto a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '5: Place another piece of parchment paper on top of the dough and press down with your hand until thin', '6: Remove the top piece of parchment and cut the dough into thin strips', '7: Place the “pasta” on a rack and refrigerate for four hours or overnight', '8: Place the “pasta” in boiling water for one minute', '9: Drain into a colander and run cool water over the pasta to prevent sticking', '10: Serve with your favorite sauce and toppings']

ingredients: ['1 ½ lb brussels sprouts (680 g) halved', '2 pears cored and sliced into wedges', '½ cup yellow onion (75 g) finely chopped', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '4 lemon wedges', '1 tablespoon honey', '¼ cup dried cranberry (30 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 450°F (230˚C)', '2: In a large bowl, add the Brussels sprouts, ½ cup yellow onion, 2 tablespoons olive oil, salt, and pepper, and mix to combine', '3: Transfer to a parchment paper-lined baking sheet and add 2 pears', '4: Bake for 15 minutes', '5:  Stir once, then back for an additional 10-15 minutes, until the Brussels sprouts are golden brown and have started to crisp and the 2 pears have caramelized', '6: Squeeze the 4 lemon over the Brussels sprouts and drizzle with the 1 tablespoon honey', '7: Add the ¼ cup dried cranberries and stir to combine', '8: Bake for an additional 25-35 minutes']

ingredients: ['1 box brownie mix prepared according to package instructions', 'cooking spray', '4 chocolate truffles', 'mixed berry to serve', 'mint to garnish', 'ice cream to serve', 'chocolate sauce to serve optional', 'Preparation', '1 box brownie mix prepared according to package instructions', 'cooking spray', '4 chocolate truffles', 'mixed berry to serve', 'mint to garnish', 'ice cream to serve', 'chocolate sauce to serve optional', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, prepare the brownie mix', '2: Spray 2 ramekins with the cooking spray', '3: Place a spoonful of the brownie batter into each ramekin, then place two chocolate truffles in each dish', '4: Spoon more brownie batter over the top of the truffles, until the ramekin is about ¾-full', '5:  Smooth the batter evenly over the truffles', '6: Bake for 25 minutes, then cool for another 25 minutes', '7: On the serving plate, place the berries and the mint in a corner', '8: To ensure that the brownie comes loose, run a knife around the edges of each ramekin before inverting the dish onto the center of each plate', '9: Serve with ice cream and a drizzle of chocolate sauce']

ingredients: ['3 ½ cups pineapple juice (840 mL) divided', '¾ cup granulated sugar (150 g)', '4 cups frozen pineapple (980 g) in chunks', '13.5 oz coconut milk (420 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Freeze the canister of an ice cream maker according to the manufacturer’s instructions', '2: Make the simple syrup: In a medium saucepan over medium heat, combine ½ 3 ½ ¾ 4 cup (120 ml) 3 ½ 3 ½ ¾ 4 cups 4 4 cups 4 cups frozen pineapple juice and the sugar and bring to a boil', '3:  Stir to dissolve the sugar, then remove from the heat and let cool completely', '4: In a high speed blender, combine the 3 ½ 3 ½ ¾ 4 cups 4 4 cups 4 cups frozen pineapple chunks, 13', '5: 5 oz coconut milk, and cooled 3 ½ 3 ½ ¾ 4 cups 4 4 cups 4 cups frozen pineapple simple syrup', '6:  Blend until very smooth, 3-5 minutes', '7: Transfer the mixture to the ice cream maker and churn for 25-30 minutes, or until it is the consistency of soft serve', '8: Fill 4-6 glasses with ½ 3 ½ ¾ 4 cup (120 ml) 3 ½ 3 ½ ¾ 4 cups 4 4 cups 4 cups frozen pineapple juice', '9: Transfer the 4 cups frozen 3 ½ 3 ½ ¾ 4 cups 4 4 cups 4 cups frozen pineapple mixture to a piping bag fitted with a large star tip and pipe evenly into the glasses, swirling in a circular motion', '10:  The 4 cups frozen 3 ½ 3 ½ ¾ 4 cups 4 4 cups 4 cups frozen pineapple mixture will float in the liquid, but keep piping until you reach the top of the glass', '11:  Top with a fun straw or decorative skewer and serve immediately']

ingredients: ['16 oz tofu (455 g)', '1 bell pepper', '½ onion', '2 teaspoons oil', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '½ teaspoon onion powder', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ teaspoon turmeric', '1 tablespoon lemon juice']
instructions: ['1: Drain 16 oz tofu from container, wrap it in a paper towel, and place it on a plate', '2:  Rest another plate on top of the 16 oz tofu and microwave for 3-5 minutes', '3: Unwrap the 16 oz tofu and cut into cubes', '4: Place the 16 oz tofu in a bowl and mash with a fork', '5: Cut the top off a 1 bell 1 bell ½ teaspoon black pepper and remove all the seeds and thinly slice', '6: Chop the onion', '7: Heat 2 teaspoons oil in a pan over medium heat', '8:  Add the onions and 1 bell ½ teaspoon black peppers, and cook until softened', '9: Add in the 16 oz tofu and cook on medium heat until most of the water has evaporated', '10: Add the ½ teaspoon salt, 1 bell ½ teaspoon black pepper, onion powder, ½ teaspoon garlic powder, and cumin, and mix well, until all the seasonings are evenly distributed', '11: Add the 1 tablespoon lemon juice to the 16 oz tofu and mix until evenly combined', '12: Remove the 16 oz tofu from the heat and serve']

ingredients: ['1 cup whole wheat flour (115 g)', '1 ¼ teaspoons baking powder', '¼ teaspoon salt', '1 cup strawberry (175 g) diced', '2 eggs room temperature', '⅓ cup honey (115 g)', '½ cup greek yogurt (140 g) room temperature', '3 tablespoons coconut oil melted plus more for greasing']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)', '2: In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the 2 eggs, ½ cup greek yogurt, ⅓ cup honey, strawberries, and 3 tablespoons coconut oil until well combined', '3: Add the 1 cup whole wheat flour, 1 ¼ teaspoons baking powder, and ¼ teaspoon salt, and fold the batter together using a rubber spatula', '4:  Stop folding once all of the dry ingredients have disappeared into the batter', '5: Using a medium ice cream scoop, pour one scoop full of batter into each well of a greased muffin tin', '6: Bake for for 20-25 minutes, until a toothpick inserted in the center of a muffin comes out clean']

ingredients: ['Dressing', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '¼ cup lime juice (60 mL)', '2 teaspoons cumin', '2 teaspoons chili powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '¼ cup fresh cilantro (10 g) chopped', 'Salad', '2 cans chickpeas drained rinsed', '1 cucumber chopped quartered', '20 cherry tomatoes halved', '1 onion chopped', '1 avocado diced', '⅓ cup carrot (35 g) shredded']
instructions: ['1: For the dressing, combine dressing ingredients in a small bowl', '2:  Whisk together until mixed thoroughly', '3: In a large bowl, combine 2 cans chickpeas, 1 cucumber, 20 cherry tomatoes, 1 onion, 1 avocado, carrots, and dressing', '4:  Toss together until evenly combined', '5: Serve and garnish']

ingredients: ['2 teaspoons butter', '3 cloves garlic minced', '½ cup onion (75 g) chopped', '1 potato peeled and cubed', '1 stalk celery chopped', '1 carrot sliced', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 lb butternut squash (905 g) peeled seeded and cubed', '6 cups vegetable broth (1.5 L)', '2 cups water (480 mL)', '1 bay leaf', '2 sprigs fresh thyme']
instructions: ['1: Melt the 2 teaspoons 2 lb butter in a large pot over medium heat, then add the 3 cloves garlic and ½ cup onion and sauté for 1-2 minutes, until the ½ cup onion is translucent', '2: Add the 1 potato, 1 stalk celery, 1 carrot, salt, and pepper', '3:  Sauté for 3 minutes', '4: Add the 2 teaspoons 2 lb 2 lb butternut squash, 6 cups vegetable broth, 2 cups water, 1 bay leaf, and 2 sprigs fresh thyme and stir', '5:  Bring to a boil', '6: Cover and reduce the heat to low', '7:  Simmer for 25-30 minutes', '8: Remove the 2 sprigs fresh thyme stems and 1 bay leaf', '9: Use an immersion or countertop blender to blend the soup until smooth', '10: Let cool for 2 minutes, then serve']

ingredients: ['2 romaine hearts thinly sliceds', '1 small head of radicchio thinly sliced', '1 cup thinly sliced hard salami (225 g)', '½ cup thinly sliced Provolone cheese (50 g)', '1 cup cherry tomatoes halved (200 g)', '15 oz 1 can of chickpeas drained and rinsed (450 g)', '½ red onion thinly sliced', '½ cup thinly sliced pepperoncini (115 g)', '4 garlic cloves minceds', '2 teaspoons dijon mustard', '½ cup finely grated parmesan cheese', '¼ cup red wine vinegar (60 mL)', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '½ cup olive oil (120 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Make the salad: In a large bowl, toss together the 2 romaine, radicchio, salami, Provolone, tomatoes, 15 oz 1 can of chickpeas, ½ ¼ cup red onion, and ½ cup thinly sliced 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepperoncini', '2: Make the vinaigrette: In a 1 small bowl or glass measuring cup, whisk together the 4 garlic, 2 teaspoons dijon mustard, Parmesan, vinegar, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, ½ cup thinly sliced 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, and 2 teaspoons dried oregano', '3:  Slowly pour in the olive oil, whisking until smooth and emulsified', '4: Pour the vinaigrette over the salad and toss to coat']

ingredients: ['2 large sweet potatoes', '4 large eggs', 'salt to taste', 'black pepper to taste', 'Assorted Fillings And Toppings', 'spinach', 'tomato diced', '1 head broccoli floret', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'white onion diced', 'red bell pepper diced', 'bacon cooked and crumbled', 'sriracha sauce', 'avocado']
instructions: ['1: Use a fork to pierce holes all over the 2 large sweet potatoes', '2: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '3: Microwave the potatoes for 7 minutes until they have softened significantly', '4: Slice the potatoes in half and use a spoon to scrape out the inner flesh, making sure to leave at least a ¼-inch (6 mm) thick border on each side, saving the scooped out potato parts to use for side dishes', '5: Transfer the potatoes to a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '6: Fill each of the potatoes with 1 egg and an assortment of fillings for whatever flavor combinations you’d like', '7:  Season each potatoes with salt and pepper', '8: Bake for 8-12 minutes, until the egg has bacon cooked to preferred doneness', '9: Top the potatoes and side dishes with your choice of topping and garnishes and serve']

ingredients: ['Espresso Simple Syrup', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '½ cup granulated sugar (100 g)', '1 tablespoon instant espresso', 'Coffee-Yogurt Custard', '2 tablespoons vanilla-flavored Greek yogurt such as Chobani', '1 teaspoon instant espresso powder', '1 large egg', 'Toast', '1 small grapefruit', '1 croissant sliced in half lengthwise', '1 teaspoon granulated sugar', 'SPECIAL EQUIPMENT', 'air fryer', 'kitchen torch optional', 'Preparation', 'Espresso Simple Syrup', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '½ cup granulated sugar (100 g)', '1 tablespoon instant espresso', 'Coffee-Yogurt Custard', '2 tablespoons vanilla-flavored Greek yogurt such as Chobani', '1 teaspoon instant espresso powder', '1 large egg', 'Toast', '1 small grapefruit', '1 croissant sliced in half lengthwise', '1 teaspoon granulated sugar', 'SPECIAL EQUIPMENT', 'air fryer', 'kitchen torch optional', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Preheat an air fryer to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Make the espresso simple syrup: In a small saucepan, combine the water, sugar, and espresso powder and bring to a boil over medium-high heat', '3:  Let the mixture simmer for 5 minutes, then remove the pot from the heat and set aside until ready to use', '4:  The syrup will keep in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 1 week', '5: Make the coffee-yogurt custard: In a small bowl, whisk together the yogurt, espresso powder, and egg', '6: Assemble the toast: Set the grapefruit on a cutting board and use a sharp knife to cut off the top and bottom so the flesh is exposed and the fruit can sit upright', '7:  Use the knife to remove the rind from around the fruit, following the contours of the fruit and cutting carefully to remove all of the pith, but leaving as much flesh intact as possible', '8:  Holding the fruit in your non-dominant hand, use the knife to cut between the membranes to release the segments', '9: Place the croissant halves, cut-side up, on a flat surface and use your fingertips to gently press down the centers to create wells', '10:  Brush each croissant half with the espresso syrup, then spoon a couple of tablespoons of custard into each well and lightly spread to fill evenly', '11:  Arrange the grapefruit segments on top of the custard and sprinkle with the sugar', '12: Carefully transfer the filled croissants to the air fryer and cook until the edges of the pastry are golden brown and the custard has set in the center, 5–7 minutes', '13:  Remove from the air fryer and transfer to a plate', '14:  If you want a little more color and crunch, use a kitchen torch to caramelize the sugar on the grapefruit', '15: Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['12 eggs', '½ cup mayonnaise (115 g)', '1 tablespoon yellow mustard', '1 tablespoon relish', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', 'For Serving', 'paprika', '1 tablespoon fresh parsley leaves']
instructions: ['1: Place the eggs in a pot and fill with cold water until the eggs are just covered', '2:  Bring the pot to a boil, then cover, remove from heat, and let sit for about 12 minutes', '3: Transfer the eggs to a bowl of ice water for about 3 minutes, then peel them and cut them in half', '4:  Transfer the egg yolks to a bowl, and set the cooked egg whites aside', '5: Mix the ½ cup mayonnaise, 1 tablespoon yellow mustard, 1 tablespoon relish, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1 teaspoon pepper with the yolks and transfer to a piping bag', '6:  (Alternatively, use a zip-top bag with a corner cut off', '7: )Pipe the mixture into the egg whites, garnish with paprika and 1 tablespoon fresh parsley, and serve chilled']

ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 avocado', '2 cherry tomatoes sliced', '1 egg', 'Preparation', '1 slice bread', '1 avocado', '2 cherry tomatoes sliced', '1 egg', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Sliced two cherry tomatoes', '2: Mash ½ of 1 avocado with salt', '3:  (Use the other half for another toast', '4: )Prepare bread in a toaster to desired crispiness', '5: In a pan, fry an egg sunny side up', '6: Assemble the toast by spreading avocado on the toast, then the tomatoes and topping everything with the egg']

ingredients: ['5 apples', '30 pitted dates', '½ cup water (120 mL) hot', '¼ cup almond milk (60 mL)', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '½ teaspoon salt', 'topping of your choice if desired', 'Special Equipment', 'popsicle stick as needed']
instructions: ['1: In a small bowl, pour the hot ½ cup water over the dates', '2:  Allow the dates to soak for 10-15 mins', '3:   This makes them easier to blend', '4: Add the date and the ½ cup water to a food processor and blend until smooth', '5: NOTE: If your date puree is looking thick and chunky, add a few splashes of ½ cup water while the food processor is running until the mixture thins out', '6: Add the date mixture to a sauce pan over medium-low heat', '7:  Add the ¼ cup almond milk, ½ teaspoon vanilla extract, and ½ teaspoon salt, and mix to combine', '8:  Stir often for 8-10 minutes until thick', '9: Use a melon baller to scoop out apple balls', '10: While the caramel cools, stick the apple balls onto the popsicle sticks', '11:  Dip the apple sticks into the caramel, roll in toppings (if topping of your choice if desired), and allow to set in the fridge for 30 minutes']

ingredients: ['1 loaf sourdough bread', '1 ½ lb ground beef (680 g)', '1 teaspoon garlic powder divided', '1 teaspoon onion powder divided', '1 teaspoon black pepper divided', '1 teaspoon salt divided', '1 tomato sliced', '1 onion sliced and sauteed', '8 oz mushroom (225 g) 1 package sliced and sauteed', '½ cup spinach (20 g) packed', '8 pieces bacon cooked', '3 slices cheddar cheese cut in half', '3 slices swiss cheese cut in half']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚F)', '2: In a circular cake pan, add half of the 1 ½ lb ground beef and season with half of the 1 teaspoon garlic powder, half of the onion powder, half of the 1 teaspoon black pepper, and half of the 1 teaspoon salt', '3:  Mix to combine then press the beef into patty form', '4: Bake for 12 minutes', '5: Repeat this process for the second patty', '6: Slice off the top of the sourdough 1 loaf and scoop out the inside', '7: Begin by laying down slices of cheese at the bottom, then add your first burger patty', '8: Layer more cheese on top of the patty and continue by adding 8 pieces bacon, 1 onion sliced and 8 oz mushroom (225 g) 1 package sliced and sauteed mushrooms & onions, ½ cup spinach, and 1 tomato', '9: Add a second burger patty and repeat step 7', '10: Place the top of the 1 loaf back on the bread and wrap in aluminum foil', '11: On a level surface, use a heavy object to press the sandwich down for at least 30 minutes', '12: Remove aluminum foil', '13: Bake for 25 minutes', '14: Slice and serve']

ingredients: ['Beef Shawarma:', '1 lb flank steak (455 g)', '1 tablespoon tahini', '1 tablespoon yogurt', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 ½ teaspoons 7 spice', '1 dash cinnamon', '1 tablespoon sumac', 'Tahini yogurt sauce:', '2 tablespoons tahini', '2 tablespoons yogurt', 'salt and lemon to taste', '¼ cup water (60 mL)', 'To serve:', 'frozen french fry or 4 large russet potatoes fried', 'onion rubbed with sumac for garnish', 'pickled turnips and parsley for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Cut the 1 lb flank steak into thin slices, about 3 inches in length', '2:  Add the spices, tahini and yogurt and mix', '3:  Cover and marinate in the fridge for at least 30 minutes', '4: Mix the yogurt, tahini, salt, lemon and ¼ cup water to make the sauce', '5:  Set aside', "6: Once it's time to cook the meat, start frying your frozen french fry or 4 large russet potatoes", '7:  Cook the 1 lb flank steak for 8- minutes with 2 tbsp of oil on medium high', '8: For layering, add your fries, beef, 1 tablespoon onion onion rubbed with sumac onion rubbed onions, pickled turnips and then sauce', '9: Serve and enjoy!']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons refined coconut oil', '1 small onion diced', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon ginger minced', '1 tablespoon sweet paprika', '½ teaspoon cumin', '¼ teaspoon dried coriander', '⅛ teaspoon cayenne', '15 oz chickpeas (425 g) 1 can drained and rinsed', '2 cups sweet potato (400 g) peeled and diced', '15 oz fire roasted crushed tomato (425 g) 1 can', '3 cups vegetable broth (720 mL)', '5 oz fresh spinach (140 g)']
instructions: ['1: In large pot or Dutch oven, heat the 2 tablespoons refined coconut oil over medium heat', '2:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the 1 small onion and cook for 4-5 minutes, or until the 1 small onion is semi-translucent', '3: Add the 3 cloves garlic and 1 teaspoon ginger, and cook for 2-3 more minutes, until fragrant', '4:  Then add the sweet paprika, ½ teaspoon cumin, ¼ teaspoon dried coriander, and ⅛ teaspoon cayenne and cook for 2 more minutes, until fragrant', '5: Add the chickpeas, sweet potatoes, crushed tomatoes, and 3 cups vegetable broth, and bring to a boil', '6:  Reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until the sweet potatoes are tender', '7: Add the 5 oz fresh spinach and stir until wilted', '8: Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['4 cups rolled oats (320 g)', '1 cup raisin (150 g)', '1 cup peanuts (125 g) chopped', '½ cup sunflower seeds (70 g)', '2 tablespoons chia seeds optional', '1 teaspoon cinnamon optiona']
instructions: ['1: Combine the 4 cups rolled oats, raisins, 1 cup peanuts, ½ cup sunflower seeds, 2 tablespoons chia seeds, and 1 teaspoon cinnamon in a large bowl until evenly mixed', '2: Store in airtight container for up to 6 months', '3: Serve as desired', '4: Enjoy! ']

ingredients: ['2 grapefruits quartered and squeezed juice reserved for another use', '1 cup sugar (200 g)', 'ice', '2 oz tequila (60 mL)', '1 oz lime juice (30 mL)', '1 oz grapefruit peel simple syrup (30 mL)', '¼ cup club soda (60 mL) to taste', '1 wedge grapefruit', 'Preparation', '2 grapefruits quartered and squeezed juice reserved for another use', '1 cup sugar (200 g)', 'ice', '2 oz tequila (60 mL)', '1 oz lime juice (30 mL)', '1 oz grapefruit peel simple syrup (30 mL)', '¼ cup club soda (60 mL) to taste', '1 wedge grapefruit', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, combine the grapefruit rinds and sugar', '2:  Toss to coat the rinds with the sugar, then cover', '3:  Let sit, stirring every 45 minutes, for about 4 hours, or until the sugar is completely dissolved and there’s syrup in the bottom of the bowl', '4: Strain the syrup through a fine-mesh sieve or cheesecloth, pushing to extract as much syrup as possible', '5:  Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 3 weeks', '6: In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, combine the tequila, lime juice, and simple syrup', '7:  Shake vigorously for 20 seconds', '8: Strain into a glass filled with ice and top with club soda', '9: Garnish with the grapefruit wedge']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons refined coconut oil', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 tablespoon ginger minced', '2 ½ tablespoons red curry paste', '15 oz coconut milk (440 mL) 1 can', '3 cups vegetable broth (720 mL)', '1 tablespoon agave', '8 oz rice noodle (225 g)', '7 oz tofu (200 g) cubed', '2 cups broccoli floret (300 g)', '1 red bell pepper thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon lime juice', 'salt to taste', 'fresh cilantro to serve']
instructions: ['1: In a large pot, melt the coconut oil over medium heat', '2:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the 3 cloves garlic and 1 tablespoon ginger and cook for 2-3 minutes, until fragrant', '3: Add the red curry paste and cook another 2-3 minutes', '4: Add the coconut milk and stir well until the curry paste is evenly distributed', '5:  Add the 3 cups vegetable broth and bring to a boil', '6: Once boiling, add the 1 tablespoon agave and 8 oz rice noodles, and cook for 2 minutes, stirring frequently to prevent the noodles from sticking together', '7: Add the 7 oz tofu, 2 cups broccoli, and bell pepper, and stir to combine', '8:  Cook for 3-5 more minutes, until the noodles are cooked and the 2 cups broccoli is tender', '9: Stir in the 1 tablespoon lime juice and add salt to taste', '10: Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve immediately']

ingredients: ['1 cup fresh basil (40 g) packed', '1 cup fresh arugula (40 g) packed', '½ lemon lemon juice', '⅓ cup olive oil (80 mL)', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '2 cloves garlic peeled', '1 teaspoon pepper', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', '1 ¼ cups almond meal (125 g)', '1 lb vegan spaghetti (455 g)', "⅓ cup pasta water (80 mL) if you're using this as a dip omit the pasta water"]
instructions: ['1: Combine basil, arugula, ½ lemon juice, water, and olive oil to a blender and blend for 5-10 seconds', '2: Add 2 cloves garlic, 2 teaspoons kosher salt, 1 teaspoon pepper, and 1 ¼ cups almond meal to the blender and blend until completely incorporated', '3: Boil 2 teaspoons kosher salted water and cook 1 lb vegan spaghetti according to packaging instructions', '4: When draining the pasta, reserve ⅓ to 1 cup (80 to 235 ml) of water', '5: Once drained, return the pasta to the pot, and stir in the pesto, adding reserved pasta water until the sauce reaches desired consistency']

ingredients: ['2 zucchinis', '1 cup panko breadcrumbs (50 g)', '½ cup grated parmesan cheese (55 g)', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '1 tablespoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '2 eggs', 'Greek Yogurt Chive Dip', '1 cup plain greek yogurt (285 g)', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '2 tablespoons fresh chives', '¼ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C)', '2: Cut zucchini into fries and set aside', '3: In a large bowl combine 1 cup panko, ½ cup grated parmesan, 1 tablespoon garlic powder, 1 tablespoon dried basil, salt, and pepper', '4: Whisk 2 eggs in a shallow bowl or dish', '5: Dip zucchini in 2 eggs, coating evenly, and then toss in bread crumb mixture', '6: Place on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper', '7:  Bake for 15-20 minutes, flipping halfway', '8: Prepare dip while fries are baking', '9:  Combine all dip ingredients in a small bowl and set aside in the refrigerator until ready to use']
