ingredients: ['½ cup whole milk (120 mL) room temperature', '1 cup warm water (240 mL)', '1 large egg room temperature', '1 ½ tablespoons ube flavoring', '4 cups bread flour (500 g)', '1 tablespoon instant yeast', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '3 tablespoons unsalted butter softened', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', '14 oz easy melt processed cheese (415 g) cut into ½-inch (1.24 cm) pieces room temperature', '1 cup fine plain bread crumbs (115 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a 4-cup spouted measuring cup or medium bowl, whisk together the milk, warm water, and egg', '2:  Whisk in the 1 ½ tablespoons ube flavoring', '3: In a 1 large bowl, combine the flour, 1 tablespoon instant yeast, sugar, and ½ teaspoon kosher salt and mix well', '4: Make a well in the center of the dry ingredients, then pour the wet ingredients into the well', '5:  Slowly mix together using a whisk or your hands until all of the moisture is absorbed by the dry ingredients and a dough begins to form, about 3 minutes', '6:  Add the 3 tablespoons unsalted butter to the dough and knead until incorporated, about 5 minutes', '7: Spray a clean surface with nonstick spray', '8:  Transfer the dough to the surface', '9:  The dough will be sticky, but resist adding more flour as it will make the finished product tough and dry', '10:  Knead the dough by picking up from the center with both hands on either side of the dough and slapping the bottom end onto the countertop, then folding the top end forward', '11:  Rotate your hands 90 degrees and pick up the dough from the center again and repeat the slap and fold motion', '12:  Repeat until the dough is more elastic and has a significantly smoother texture, 8–10 minutes', '13: Transfer the dough to a clean 1 large bowl greased with nonstick spray and spray the top of the dough with more nonstick spray', '14:  Cover and let rise in a warm place for 30–60 minutes, or until doubled in size', '15: Once the dough has risen, grease your hands with nonstick spray and portion the dough into 24–25 pieces, about 50 grams each, then roll into balls', '16:  Cover the portioned dough with a kitchen towel to prevent a crust from forming while you shape each pandesal', '17: Flatten a piece of dough evenly in your palm to create a disc about 3 inches in diameter', '18:  Place a cube of the 14 oz easy-melt cheese in the center, gather the edges of the dough around the cheese and pinch to seal, then roll into a smooth ball', '19:   Immediately roll the finished pandesal in the 4 cups 1 cup fine plain bread crumbs to coat completely', '20:  Repeat with the remaining dough', '21: Place 8–12 pandesal on each of 2–3 baking sheets lined with parchment paper and lightly cover with plastic wrap', '22:  Let proof at room temperature until doubled in size, 60–90 minutes', '23: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '24: Remove the plastic wrap from the baking sheets', '25:  Bake the pandesal, working in batches if needed, for 18–20 minutes, until puffed and lightly golden on the bottoms', '26:  Let cool for 10 minutes before serving']

ingredients: ['½ small red onion finely chopped', '4 scallions roughly chopped', '4 cloves garlic minced', '1 tablespoon fresh ginger minced', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 stalk fresh lemongrass chopped', '2 tablespoons lime juice', '½ cup coconut milk', '1 tablespoon peanut oil', '½ cup peanut butter all-natural', '¼ cup peanuts chopped', '1 lb beef cubed']
instructions: ['1: In a food processor, combine the red onion, 4 scallions, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tablespoon fresh ginger, 1 teaspoon curry powder, 1 teaspoon ground turmeric, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, 1 stalk fresh lemongrass, 2 tablespoons lime juice, ½ cup coconut milk, peanut oil, and peanut butter', '2:  Purée until smooth', '3: Divide the sauce between 2 ½ small bowls', '4:  Add the chopped ¼ cup peanuts to one of the bowls and stir to combine', '5:  Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate until ready to use', '6: Pour the remaining sauce over the cubed 1 lb beef in a medium bowl', '7:  Toss well to coat', '8:  Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and let marinate in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours, up 6 hours', '9: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C)', '10:  Line a 9-inch (23 cm) square baking dish with parchment paper', '11: Thread the 1 lb beef cubes onto skewers and set over the baking dish', '12: Bake for 20 minutes, until the 1 lb beef is seared and juicy', '13: Serve the satay 1 lb beef with the reserved sauce alongside']

ingredients: ['5 eggs', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'Mix and Match Fillings', 'spinach', 'tomato diced', 'broccoli cut into small florets', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'bell pepper diced', 'onion diced', 'mushroom sliced', '½ bunch asparagus diced', 'bacon cooked and chopped']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: Fill a greased muffin tin with your favorite combination of fillings or use the ones we did!Whisk 5 eggs in measuring cup and fill up each tin', '3: Sprinkle with salt and pepper', '4: Bake for about 30 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean']

ingredients: ['1 lb brussels sprouts (455 g) halved', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ cup bread crumbs (30 g)', '¼ cup grated parmesan cheese (30 g)']
instructions: ['1: Remove the stem from each sprout and cut in half', '2:  Place the 1 lb brussels sprouts in a large bowl', '3: Add the rest of the ingredients to the bowl and toss to cover', '4: Spread the sprouts onto a baking sheet', '5: Bake in a 400˚F (200˚C) oven for 20 minutes', '6: Flip the sprouts, then bake for an additional 20 minutes or until the sprouts are fork-tender and golden']

ingredients: ['4 large red bell peppers', '½ small red onion minced', '½ lb ground beef (225 g) 90% lean', '3 oz feta cheese crumbled', '6 kalamata olives pitted and roughly chopped', '¼ cup fresh parsley leaf (10 g) chopped', '¼ cup fresh mint leaf (10 g) chopped', 'kosher salt', 'black pepper freshly ground']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (205°C)', '2: Cut the tops off of the 4 large red bell 4 large red bell black peppers, then scrape out the seeds and white pith', '3:  Save the 4 large red bell black pepper tops and set them aside', '4: In a medium mixing bowl, combine all the remaining ingredients, season with kosher salt and 4 large red bell black pepper, and stir together so that everything is thoroughly mixed', '5: Divide the ½ lb ground beef mixture in half and stuff it into the 4 large red bell black peppers, then place the tops of the 4 large red bell black peppers back on top', '6: Transfer the 4 large red bell black peppers to a baking sheet or oven-safe skillet, then bake in the preheated oven until the meat is cooked through and the 4 large red bell black peppers are soft and starting to shrivel, 40 to 45 minutes', '7: Cool for 5 minutes, then serve']

ingredients: ['2 lb acorn squash (910 g) seeded and chopped', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons maple syrup', '¼ cup olive oil (60 g) divided', '1 large white onion chopped', '4 stalks celery chopped', '1 small fennel bulb chopped', '5 cloves garlic minced', '2 lb breakfast sausage (910 g) casing removed', '2 tablespoons fresh sage chopped', '1 lb bread (455 g) day-old cubed', '½ cup dried cranberries (60 g)', '½ cup hazelnut (60 g) toasted chopped', '5 large eggs beaten', '1 cup chicken broth (240 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Add the 2 lb acorn squash to a baking sheet and season with salt, pepper, maple syrup, and two tablespoons of olive oil', '3:  Toss to coat, then spread in a single layer', '4: Bake for one hour, or until the squash is tender and golden brown', '5: Heat the remaining two tablespoons of olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat', '6:  Add the onion, 4 stalks celery, fennel, and 5 cloves garlic and season with salt and pepper', '7:  Cook until soft, about 10 minutes', '8: Add the 2 lb breakfast sausage and sage, stir, and cook until the vegetables are fully softened and the meat is browned', '9: Transfer the 2 lb breakfast sausage and vegetable mixture to a large rectangle baking dish', '10:  Add the roasted squash, cubed 1 lb bread, cranberries, and hazelnuts', '11:  Toss to combine', '12: In a liquid measuring cup or 1 small bowl, whisk together the eggs, chicken broth, pepper, and salt', '13:  Pour the egg mixture over the stuffing, then toss well to distribute and coat everything evenly', '14: Bake for 1 hour, or until the stuffing puffs up, browns, and dries slightly', '15:  Let sit for 10 minutes before serving', '16: Enjoy! ']

ingredients: ['Pie Crust', '2 cups all purpose flour (250 g) plus more for dusting', '1 kosher salt', '1 ¼ sticks unsalted butter cubed and chilled', '2 large egg yolks', '4 tablespoons ice water', 'Filling', '2 cups pecan (250 g) halves divided', '¾ cup light corn syrup (180 g)', '3 large eggs', '1 cup granulated sugar (200 g)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter melted', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', 'Special Equipment', 'dried bean']
instructions: ['1: Make the crust: Sift the flour and salt together into a large bowl', '2: Using only your fingertips, pinch the cubes of butter into the flour, breaking up the butter as you go, until no large lumps remain', '3:  Shake the bowl to coax the large chunks of butter to the surface', '4: Mix the egg yolks and 4 tablespoons ice water together in a small bowl with a fork until evenly combined', '5: Add the liquid to the flour mixture, reserving ¼ or so in case you don’t need all of it--you don’t want the pastry to be too wet', '6:  Quickly mix everything together with a fork until the dough just starts to come together', '7:  Add more liquid to the driest parts of the dough if needed', '8:  The dough is ready when it holds together in a ball when squeezed in your palm', '9: Transfer the dough to a clean surface and bring together in a disc', '10:  Wrap the dough disc in plastic wrap and chill in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes, or up to 4 days', '11: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '12: Lightly flour a clean surface and unwrap the disc of chilled dough', '13:  Flour the top of the dough', '14:  Start to roll out the dough, turning every few rolls', '15: ', '16:  If any cracks form, smush them back together', '17:  Roll out the dough to a circle about ⅛-inch (3 mm) thick and place into a 9-inch (22 cm) pie dish', '18:  Trim any excess dough around the sides, then crimp the edges in a decorative pattern', '19: Place a piece of parchment in the center of the pie crust and add the pie weights or dried beans', '20:  9', '21:  Bake for 15 minutes, until lightly golden brown', '22: Make the filling: In a large bowl, whisk together 1½ cups (185 G) pecans, corn syrup, eggs, sugar, 1 teaspoon vanilla, melted butter, and salt', '23: Carefully lift the parchment with the pie weights from the par-baked pie crust, then pour in the filling', '24:  Arrange the remaining ½ cup (62 G) pecans in concentric circles on top', '25: Return the pie to the oven for 20 minutes, then cover with a piece of foil and continue baking for 40 minutes, until the filling is completely set', '26:  Let the pie cool completely', '27: Slice and serve the pie chilled or at room temperature']

ingredients: ['Lemongrass Chili Oil', '1 lb lemongrass (455 g)', '2 ½ cups canola oil (600 mL)', '¾ cup garlic (100 g) minced', '½ cup shallot (50 g) minced', '½ cup red pepper flakes (55 g)', '3 tablespoons fish sauce', '3 tablespoons granulated sugar plus more to taste', '½ cup water (120 mL)', 'Nuoc Cham', '¾ cup water (180 mL)', '7 tablespoons granulated sugar', '1 garlic smashed', '3 ½ tablespoons fish sauce', '1 tablespoon white distilled vinegar', 'Steak', '1 lb hanger steak (455 g) or bavette steak', '1 tablespoon rice bran oil', '1 teaspoon fish sauce salt or kosher salt', 'Pickles', '½ lb daikon radish (225 g) peeled and thinly sliced', '½ lb carrot (225 g) peeled and thinly sliced', '1 cup granulated sugar (100 g)', '½ cup white distilled vinegar (120 mL)', '¼ cup water (60 mL)', '1 tablespoon kosher salt plus 1 teaspoon', 'For Serving', '14 oz fine rice vermicelli noodles (420 g) cooked according to package instructions', '1 small head red leaf lettuce thinly sliced', '½ cup fresh thai basil (20 g) torn', '½ cup fresh mint leaf (20 g) torn', '½ cup store bought crispy fried shallots (70 g)', '½ cup roasted peanut (60 g)', 'Preparation', 'Lemongrass Chili Oil', '1 lb lemongrass (455 g)', '2 ½ cups canola oil (600 mL)', '¾ cup garlic (100 g) minced', '½ cup shallot (50 g) minced', '½ cup red pepper flakes (55 g)', '3 tablespoons fish sauce', '3 tablespoons granulated sugar plus more to taste', '½ cup water (120 mL)', 'Nuoc Cham', '¾ cup water (180 mL)', '7 tablespoons granulated sugar', '1 garlic smashed', '3 ½ tablespoons fish sauce', '1 tablespoon white distilled vinegar', 'Steak', '1 lb hanger steak (455 g) or bavette steak', '1 tablespoon rice bran oil', '1 teaspoon fish sauce salt or kosher salt', 'Pickles', '½ lb daikon radish (225 g) peeled and thinly sliced', '½ lb carrot (225 g) peeled and thinly sliced', '1 cup granulated sugar (100 g)', '½ cup white distilled vinegar (120 mL)', '¼ cup water (60 mL)', '1 tablespoon kosher salt plus 1 teaspoon', 'For Serving', '14 oz fine rice vermicelli noodles (420 g) cooked according to package instructions', '1 small head red leaf lettuce thinly sliced', '½ cup fresh thai basil (20 g) torn', '½ cup fresh mint leaf (20 g) torn', '½ cup store bought crispy fried shallots (70 g)', '½ cup roasted peanut (60 g)', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Make the lemongrass chili oil: Chop the bottom 4 inches (10 cm) from the lemongrass stalks and discard the tops', '2:  Peel off any tough outer layers and discard, then thinly slice the remaining lemongrass', '3:  Process the sliced lemongrass in a food processor until very finely minced', '4:  You should have about 1 cup (130 g) total', '5: In a large enameled Dutch oven, heat the canola oil over high heat until it reaches 300°F (150°C)', '6:  Add the garlic and lemongrass to the hot oil and cook until the garlic is golden brown and aromatic, about 10 minutes', '7:  Add the shallots', '8:  Reduce the heat to very low and add the red pepper flakes', '9:  Cook until extremely aromatic, about 2 minutes', '10:  Add the fish sauce, sugar, and water', '11:  Continue cooking for 2 hours, stirring occasionally to prevent the garlic from scorching at the bottom, until the oil has turned red', '12:  Remove the pot from the heat and let the chili oil cool, then transfer to an airtight container and refrigerate until ready to use, up to 3 weeks', '13: Make the pickles: Place the daikon and carrots in a deep bowl', '14: In a small pot, combine the sugar, vinegar, water, garlic and salt', '15:  Bring to a simmer over medium heat and stir until the sugar dissolves', '16: Pour the brine over the vegetables and let sit for at least 1 hour', '17:  The pickles can be stored in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 3 weeks', '18: Make the nuoc cham: In a small pot, bring the water and sugar to a simmer over medium heat', '19:  Add the garlic and stir until the sugar dissolves', '20:  Stir in the vinegar and fish sauce', '21:  Remove the pot from the heat and let the nuoc cham cool, then transfer to an airtight container and refrigerate until ready to use, up to 3 weeks', '22: Make the steak: Rub the steak with the rice bran oil and sprinkle salt on both sides', '23: Heat a large cast iron skillet over medium-high heat until smoking', '24:  Sear the steak in the hot skillet until the internal temperature reaches 130–135°F (54–57°C) for medium-rare, 6–10 minutes, turning the steak as needed to ensure even cooking', '25:  The timing of the steak will depend largely on the thickness of the meat', '26:  Remove the steak from the skillet and let rest for 10 minutes, then slice thinly against the grain', '27: To serve, add the rice noodles to a wide, shallow dish', '28:  Arrange the lettuce, basil, mint, pickles, fried shallots, and peanuts on top', '29:  Arrange the beef on top and spoon over some nuoc cham and lemongrass chili oil', '30: "']

ingredients: ['2 boneless skinless chicken breasts', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 cup flour (125 g)', '1 ½ tablespoons butter', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 ¼ cups chicken stock (295 mL)', '1 cup heavy cream (235 mL)', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 lemon juiced', '1 lemon sliced', 'fresh parsley for garnish']
instructions: ['1: On a cutting board, cut the chicken breasts in half, widthwise', '2: Lay chicken flat and season both sides with salt and pepper', '3: Gently coat the chicken pieces in the flour, shaking off any excess', '4: Heat a skillet on medium-high heat and add the 1 ½ tablespoons butter and 1 tablespoon olive oil, swirling together to coat the pan', '5: Place the chicken breasts into the pan and cook for 3-5 minutes or until golden brown', '6: Flip the chicken and cook the other side, another 3-5 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through', '7: Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside', '8: Pour ¼ cup (60 ml) of the chicken stock in the pan and scrape up any bits that may have stuck to the bottom of the pan', '9: Add the rest of the stock and the cream and stir', '10: Season with salt and pepper, and add the lemon juice', '11: Simmer for 5 minutes', '12:  Add the chicken back to the pan and top with sliced lemons', '13: Spoon the sauce over the chicken', '14: Remove from heat', '15:  Sauce will thicken as it cools', '16: Serve with fresh parsley and extra sauce']

ingredients: ['Banana Custard', '2 bananas mashed', '3 large eggs', '1 cup whole milk (240 mL)', '½ cup heavy cream (120 mL)', '¾ cup sugar (150 g)', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '½ teaspoon nutmeg', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', 'Assembly', '12 cups brioche bread (420 g) 1 loaf (day old bread)', '1 cup chocolate chips (175 g)', '¼ cup pecan (30 g) chopped', 'Caramel Base', '8 tablespoons unsalted butter 1 stick', '1 cup brown sugar (220 g)', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 tablespoons pecan chopped', '3 bananas halved lengthwise and crosswise']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: Make the banana custard: In a 3 large bowl, mash the bananas', '3:  Add the eggs, 1 cup whole milk, and ½ cup heavy cream and stir to combine', '4: In a medium bowl, combine the ¾ cup 1 cup 1 cup brown sugar, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, ½ teaspoon nutmeg, and vanilla and mix with a fork', '5: Add the ¾ cup 1 cup 1 cup brown sugar mixture to the custard mixture and stir to combine', '6: Add the cubed bread, 1 cup chocolate chips, and pecans to the custard mixture and toss well to coat', '7:  Let soak for 10 minutes', '8: While the bread is soaking, make the caramel base: In a medium microwave-safe bowl, microwave the 8 tablespoons unsalted butter for about 2 minutes, stirring every 30 seconds, until melted and hot', '9: Add the 1 cup brown ¾ cup 1 cup 1 cup brown sugar and stir to combine', '10:  Microwave for another minute, stirring halfway, until the ¾ cup 1 cup 1 cup brown sugar is mostly dissolved', '11: Add the ½ teaspoon kosher salt, vanilla, and pecans and stir to combine', '12: Pour the caramel into the bottom of a 9 (22 cm) x 13-inch (33 cm) baking dish and spread evenly', '13:  Arrange the bananas, cut side down, over the caramel', '14: Spoon the 12 cups brioche-custard mixture evenly over the bananas', '15: Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes, then uncover and bake for 40-45 minutes longer, until the custard is set', '16:  Remove from the oven and let cool for 5 minutes', '17: Run a knife around the edges of the baking dish to loosen the bake, then invert onto a rectangular serving dish', '18:  Do not wait any longer than 5 minutes or the bake will stick to the pan', '19: Slice and serve']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion diced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 carrot diced', '2 potatoes diced', '15 oz diced tomato (425 g) 1 can', '2 cups dried lentil (400 g)', '8 cups vegetable broth (1.8 L)', '1 bay leaf', '½ teaspoon cumin', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'Preparation', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion diced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 carrot diced', '2 potatoes diced', '15 oz diced tomato (425 g) 1 can', '2 cups dried lentil (400 g)', '8 cups vegetable broth (1.8 L)', '1 bay leaf', '½ teaspoon cumin', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: In a large pot, add the oil and onion and cook over medium heat until semi-translucent, about 3-5 minutes', '2:  Add garlic and cook for 2 minutes', '3: Add carrots and potatoes, and sauté for 3 minutes', '4: Add lentils, vegetable broth, diced tomatoes, bay leaf, and cumin, and bring to a boil', '5: Reduce heat to a simmer and cook for 35-40 minutes, or until lentils are tender', '6: Remove bay leaf and add salt and pepper to taste']

ingredients: ['For Dumpling', '4 potatoes boiled', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 cup flour (125 g)', '5 apricots', '1 teaspoon sugar', 'For Sauce', '1 stick butter', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 cup bread crumbs (115 g)']
instructions: ['1: Grate 4 4 potatoesTake a bowl add 1 1 egg, 1 tsp 1 teaspoon salt, 2 tbsp 2 tablespoons 1 1 stick butter, grated 4 potatoes and I cup of flour', '2:  Mix all the ingredients well and create a dough-like consistency', '3:  Create small, equally-sized balls with the dough', '4: Start by rolling a dough ball into a circle', '5:  Add half the apricot on top of the ball and sprinkle 1 tsp 1 teaspoon ½ cup sugar', '6:  Finally, add the remaining half of the apricot on below', '7: Wrap the dough around to the apricot to form a perfect dumpling', "8: Steam the dumpling in hot water for 10 minutes, or till it's cooked", '9: Add 1 1 stick of 2 tablespoons 1 1 stick butter onto a pan and wait for it to melt', '10:  Add ½ a cup of 1 teaspoon ½ cup sugar with 1 tsp 1 teaspoon cinnamon and 1 cup of bread crumbs to this mix', '11:  Stir thoroughly', '12: Gently place the dumpling onto the pan and coat completely', '13: Serve hot!']

ingredients: ['Brownies', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', '1 ½ sticks unsalted butter', '3 oz dark chocolate (90 g) chopped', '1 ¼ cups granulated sugar (250 g)', '2 tablespoons light brown sugar', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '3 large eggs', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '¾ cup dutch processed cocoa  powder (90 g)', '½ cup all purpose flour (120 mL)', '1 teaspoon instant espresso powder optional', 'Frosting', '2 oz dark chocolate (60 g) chopped', '5 oz milk chocolate (150 mL) chopped', '½ cup heavy cream (120 mL)', '1 tablespoon unsalted butter', '¼ cup rainbow chips (40 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2:  Grease a 9 x 13-inch rimmed baking sheet or pan with nonstick spray', '3:  Line with parchment paper, leaving overhang on all sides', '4:  Grease the parchment with more nonstick spray', '5: In a medium saucepan over medium heat, melt the butter and bring to a boil, stirring frequently with a heat-safe rubber spatula', '6:  As the water begins to boil out of the butter, the 5 oz milk solids in the butter will separate, sink to the bottom, and begin to toast and 2 tablespoons light brown', '7:  Stir constantly until the butter turns nutty 2 tablespoons light brown, about 10 minutes total', '8:  Turn off the heat, add the chocolate, and stir to melt and combine with the 2 tablespoons light browned butter', '9:  Let cool slightly, about 5 minutes', '10: In a 3 large bowl, combine the 1 ¼ cups granulated and 2 tablespoons light brown sugars, 1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt, and the butter-chocolate mixture', '11:  Mix with an electric mixer on medium speed until thick and creamy, about 3 minutes', '12:  Add the eggs and continue mixing until smooth, about 3 minutes more', '13:  Add the 2 teaspoons vanilla and mix just to combine', '14: Sift in the ¾ cup dutch processed cocoa powder, ½ cup all purpose flour and 1 teaspoon instant espresso powder, if using', '15:  Mix on medium-low speed until the dry ingredients are fully incorporated', '16: Pour the batter into the prepared pan, using an offset spatula to spread evenly', '17: Bake the 2 tablespoons light brownies until slightly puffed and a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 15 minutes', '18: While the 2 tablespoons light brownies are baking, make the frosting: Add the dark and 5 oz milk chocolate to a medium heat-proof bowl', '19: Add the ½ cup heavy cream and butter to a small saucepan over medium heat', '20:  Once the butter is melted completely, pour the mixture over the chocolate and let sit for 1 minute', '21:  Stir together until smooth and creamy', '22: While the 2 tablespoons light brownies are still hot, pour the frosting over the top', '23:  Use an offset spatula to spread evenly, covering the 2 tablespoons light brownies completely', '24:  Sprinkle the ¼ cup rainbow chips evenly across the frosting', '25: Let the 2 tablespoons light brownies cool at room temperature for 2 hours to set the frosting and the 2 tablespoons light brownie crumb', '26:  Transfer the 2 tablespoons light brownies to the refrigerator for at least 2 hours to chill completely for the ultimate fudgy texture', '27: Cut the chilled 2 tablespoons light brownies into 12 pieces']

ingredients: ['Pork Belly:', '1 lb pork belly (455 g)', '2 cloves garlic minced', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 teaspoons sesame oil', '2 tablespoons red pepper powder', '1 tablespoon honey', '⅓ cup kimchi juice (80 mL)', 'Nachos:', '2 cups tortilla chips (200 g)', '1 cup cheddar cheese (100 g)', '1 cup monterey jack cheese (100 g)', '1 cup kimchi (70 g) chopped', '½ cup red onion (75 g) chopped', '⅓ cup sour cream (75 g)', '¼ cup kimchi juice (60 mL)', '¼ cup tomato (50 g) diced', '¼ cup scallion (25 g) minced']
instructions: ['1: Combine 1 lb pork belly slices with 2 cloves garlic, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 2 tablespoons ½ cup red pepper powder, 1 tablespoon honey, and ⅓ cup (80 ml) kimchi juice', '2:  Mix until the 1 lb pork belly is coated in 2 tablespoons ½ cup red', '3: Pan-fry 1 lb pork belly until fat has rendered and crispy', '4: Assemble your nachos', '5:  In a skillet, lay down a layer of 2 cups tortilla chips, sprinkle on the cheeses, add chopped kimchi, toss on the cooked 1 lb pork belly, top with some chopped 2 tablespoons ½ cup red onions', '6:  Repeat', '7: Melt the cheeses under the broiler until crispy and bubbly', '8: Mix together the sour cream and remaining ¼ cup (60 ml) kimchi juice and drizzle on top of the nachos']

ingredients: ['½ lb bacon (225 g) sliced', '5 cloves garlic minced', '2 cups panko breadcrumbs (100 g)', '½ cup fresh chives (20 g) chopped', '½ cup fresh parsley (20 g) chopped', '4 tablespoons butter', '¼ cup flour (30 g)', '3 cups evaporated milk (720 mL)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 teaspoons dry mustard powder', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 lb macaroni (455 g) cooked', '½ cup cheddar cheese (65 g) cubed', '½ cup gruyère cheese (50 g) shredded', '½ cup colby jack cheese (65 g) cubed', '½ cup smoked gouda cheese (50 g) shredded', '½ cup provolone cheese (65 g) cubed', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese (100 g)', '1 cup shredded cheddar cheese (100 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: In a large pot over medium heat, cook the ½ lb bacon crispy and the fat has rendered', '3: Add the 5 cloves garlic, bread crumbs, ½ cup fresh chives, and ½ cup fresh parsley', '4:  Stir and cook until the bread crumbs are toasted, about 5 minutes', '5:  Remove from the pot', '6: In the same pot on medium heat, melt the 4 tablespoons butter', '7:  Sprinkle in the ¼ cup flour and stir until combined', '8: Add the 3 cups evaporated milk and bring to a simmer', '9:  Season with salt, ½ teaspoon ½ teaspoon cayenne pepper, mustard powder, and ½ teaspoon cayenne', '10:  Whisk to incorporate and smooth any lumps', '11:  The sauce should be thick enough to coat the back of the spoon', '12: Add the pasta to the sauce and stir to combine', '13: Add the ½ cup 1 cup shredded cheddar, Gruyère, Colby Jack, Gouda, and ½ cup provolone cheese, then fold the cheeses into the pasta', '14:  If it seems too 2 teaspoons dry, add more milk to your liking', '15: Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and top with the shredded mozzarella and ½ cup 1 cup shredded cheddar', '16: Bake for 45 minutes, or until the mac ‘n’ cheese is bubbly, melted, and golden brown on top', '17: Serve with a sprinkle of the bread crumb mixture for added flavor!']

ingredients: ['1 ⅔ cups beetroot (250 g) grated', '1 cup sweet potato (200 g) grated', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '½ teaspoon garlic granules', '1 teaspoon smoked paprika', '1 lemon zested', '1 tablespoon fresh coriander chopped', '3 tablespoons tahini', '1 cup feta cheese (115 g)', '2 eggs', '⅓ cup breadcrumb (40 g)', 'oil for frying', 'Tzatziki', '½ cup greek yogurt (100 g)', '½ cucumber grated', '1 clove garlic crushed', '1 tablespoon fresh mint chopped', '½ lemon juiced', '¼ teaspoon black pepper', '½ teaspoon salt', 'To serve', 'burger bun', 'rocket salad']
instructions: ['1: To a large bowl, add the 1 ⅔ cups beetroot, 1 cup sweet potato, salt, black pepper, garlic granules, 1 teaspoon smoked paprika, lemon zest, 1 tablespoon fresh coriander, 3 tablespoons tahini, 1 cup feta, 2 eggs, and breadcrumbs', '2:  Mix until thoroughly combined', '3:  You should achieve a wet, sticky mixture that should just about come together when formed into a burger', '4: Next place a large frying pan over a low-medium heat and add around 1 cm (½ in) of oil', '5:  You need enough oil so the burgers are at least halfway covered with the oil when they are in the pan', '6: Once the oil is warm, cook the burgers for around 5 minutes per side or until cooked through and golden brown on the outside', '7:  Remove from the pan and drain excess oil on kitchen paper', '8: To prepare the tzatziki, add the Greek yoghurt, ½ cucumber, garlic, 1 tablespoon fresh mint, lemon juice, black pepper, and salt to a bowl and mix thoroughly', '9:  Refrigerate until ready to To serve', '10: Place your 1 ⅔ cups beetroot patty onto a burger bun, top with tzatziki and rocket salad']

ingredients: ['2 sausage links', '2 eggs', '1 flour tortilla burrito-sized', 'shredded cheddar cheese']
instructions: ['1: In a skillet thoroughly cook the 2 sausage and 2 eggs', '2: Place mixture in the center of a 1 flour tortilla', '3:  Top with shredded cheddar cheese, and fold the edges inward to form a sealed pocket', '4: Heat on a skillet, seam-side down', '5:  Flip and cook until golden brown', '6: You can freeze up to a month']

ingredients: ['1 medium medium yellow onion sliced', '1 red bell pepper sliced', '1 yellow bell pepper sliced', '1 green bell pepper sliced', '2 cups chicken sausage (275 g) sliced into coins', 'olive oil to taste', '1 ¼ tablespoons creole seasoning divided', '1 lb raw shrimp (455 g) peeled and deveined', '½ teaspoon paprika', '1 ½ cups tomato (300 g) diced', '4 cups rice (920 g) cooked we used brown rice', 'scallion sliced for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C)', '2: On a large baking sheet, arrange the 1 medium medium yellow onion, bell peppers, and 2 cups chicken sausage', '3:  Drizzle with olive oil and season with 1 tablespoon Creole seasoning, or to taste', '4:  Using your hands, mix everything together well', '5: Bake for 8 minutes, or until 2 cups chicken sausage begins to brown', '6: While the vegetables and 2 cups chicken sausage are cooking, place the 1 lb raw shrimp in a small bowl', '7:  Season with 1 ½ teaspoon Creole seasoning and ½ ½ teaspoon paprika', '8:  Stir to coat', '9: Remove the vegetables and sausage from the oven, and add the seasoned 1 lb raw shrimp and 1 ½ cups tomato (300 g) diced tomatoes', '10:  Mix everything together', '11: Return everything to the oven for 6 minutes, or until the 1 lb raw shrimp is just done', '12: Remove from the oven and add the cooked 4 cups rice, mixing everything together well', '13: Garnish with 1 medium medium yellow onion 1 red bell pepper 1 yellow bell pepper 1 green bell pepper 2 cups chicken sausage (275 g) scallion sliced scallions and serve immediately']

ingredients: ['2 carrots diced', '1 cup butternut squash (125 g) diced', '1 ½ cups broccoli floret (225 g)', '2 tablespoons oil', '4 lb small whole chicken (2 kg)', 'salt to taste', 'black pepper to taste', '1 leaf fresh thyme leaf to taste', '3 sprigs fresh thyme sprigs for garnish', "butcher's twine"]
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C)', '2: In a large, ovenproof skillet or frying pan, mix together the 2 carrots, 1 cup butternut squash, and 1 ½ cups broccoli, and coat with the 2 tablespoons oil', '3:  Spread the veggies into 1 even layer', '4: Place the 4 lb small whole chicken on top of the veggies', '5: Season the bird on all sides and in the cavity with salt, black pepper, and 1 leaf 3 3 sprigs fresh thyme leaves', '6:  While seasoning the bird, make sure that enough seasoning has fallen onto the veggies below to give them good flavor', '7: To truss the 4 lb small whole chicken, fold the wingtips underneath the breasts so that they fit snugly', '8:  Using a piece of butcher’s  "butchers twine, tie the legs together so the bird holds a nice shape', '9: Bake for 1 hour, or until a thermometer inserted into the thickest part of the breast reads 160°F (70°C)', '10: NOTE: Once resting out of the oven, the temperature will continue to rise to a safe 165°F (75°C)', '11: Let the 4 lb small whole chicken rest for at least 15 minutes once out of the oven, so that all of the juices in the meat can settle and the internal temperature has time to finish rising', '12: Carve the bird as desired', '13: Serve on a plate with the veggies, and 1 leaf 3 3 sprigs fresh thyme 3 sprigs for garnish']

ingredients: ['Pickled Tomato Salsa', '1 lb tomato (455 g)', '½ bunch scallions white and green parts thinly sliced', '2 serrano chiles with seeds thinly sliced in rounds', '½ cup white vinegar (120 mL)', '2 ½ tablespoons brown sugar', '2 teaspoons salt', '½ cup olive oil (120 mL)', '4 teaspoons ginger freshly grated', '1 tablespoon garlic minced', '2 teaspoons yellow mustard seeds', '1 teaspoon cayenne', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '½ teaspoon turmeric', '2 teaspoons cracked black peppercorn', 'Chicken', '4 skin-on boneless chicken thighs', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', 'Cilantro Sauce', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '4 shallots diced', 'salt to taste', '6 large mushrooms thinly sliced', '2 bunches fresh cilantro stems and leaves seperated chopped', '1 ½ jalapeñoes chopped with seeds', '2 tablespoons ground cumin', '2 cups chicken stock (480 mL)', '¾ cup heavy cream (180 mL) divided', '3 egg yolks', '3 tablespoons brown sugar', '¼ cup red wine vinegar (60 mL)', '3 cups cooked rice (690 g) for serving', 'fresh cilantro leaf for garnish', 'scallion chopped for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Make the pickled 1 lb tomato salsa: Bring a medium pot of water to boil and set an ice bath nearby', '2:  Remove the cores from the 1 lb tomatoes and score an “X” on the undersides', '3:  Blanch for 15 seconds in the boiling water, then immediately transfer to the ice bath to stop the cooking', '4:  Peel the skins with a paring knife, then seed and chop the 1 lb tomatoes', '5: In a 6 large bowl, toss the 1 lb tomatoes with the scallions and 2 serrano chiles', '6: In a medium saucepan, bring the vinegar to a boil', '7:   Add the sugar and salt and cook until dissolved, about 1 minute', '8:   Remove the pan from the heat and set aside', '9: Heat the olive ½ cup olive 2 tablespoons vegetable oil in a separate medium saucepan over medium heat until just smoking', '10:  Add the 4 teaspoons ginger, 1 tablespoon garlic, 2 teaspoons yellow mustard 2 serrano chiles with 2 teaspoons yellow mustard 1 ½ jalapeñoes chopped with seeds, 1 teaspoon cayenne, cumin, ½ teaspoon turmeric, and 2 teaspoons cracked black 1 teaspoon ground black peppercorns and cook, stirring constantly with a wooden spoon, until fragrant, about 2 minutes', '11: Pour the spice mixture over the 1 lb tomatoes, followed by the vinegar mixture', '12:   Stir to combine, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate for 3-4 hours or several days', '13: Make the chicken: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '14: Season the chicken all over with salt and 2 teaspoons cracked black 1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '15: Heat the ½ cup olive 2 tablespoons vegetable oil in a 6 large cast iron pan over high heat', '16:  Add the chicken skin-side down and cook for about 9 minutes, until the skin is golden brown and releases easily from the pan', '17:  Flip the chicken and finish cooking in the oven for 10 minutes, until 3 cups cooked through', '18: Make the cilantro sauce', '19:  Melt the 2 tablespoons unsalted butter in a medium skillet over medium heat', '20:   Add the 4 shallots and season with salt, then cook until starting to brown', '21:  Add the mushrooms and cook until soft and golden, about 10 minutes', '22: Add the cilantro stems and leaves, reserving about ½ a ½ 2 bunch of leaves for later on', '23:  Add the cumin and jalapeños, reduce the heat to low, and cook for 5 minutes', '24:  Add the chicken stock', '25:   Increase the heat to high and cook until the liquid is reduced by half', '26:    Add the cream and return to a boil', '27:   Remove the pan from the heat', '28:   Transfer the sauce to a blender with the reserved cilantro leaves and puree', '29:  Return the sauce to the pan', '30: Whisk the 3 egg yolks, sugar, and vinegar together in a small bowl', '31:   While continuing to whisk, pour 1 cup (290 G) of the sauce into the 3 egg mixture to temper', '32:   Add the 3 egg mixture to the pan and cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until the sauce is thick and smooth', '33: Arrange the chicken over a bed of your favorite rice and spoon the cilantro sauce over', '34:   Garnish with the Pickled Tomato Salsa, scallions, and cilantro leaves', '35:   Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['1 cup chickpea liquid (240 mL) aquafaba', '1 cup powdered sugar (120 g)', '1 ½ cups almond meal (145 g)', '1 tablespoon dark cocoa powder', '½ tablespoon cream of tartar', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '½ cup creamy peanut butter (120 g) refrigerated']
instructions: ['1: Pour 1 cup (240 ml) aquafaba into a pot and reduce to ⅓ cup (80 ml) over low heat', '2: Refrigerate aquafaba overnight', '3: Preheat oven to 250°F (120°C)', '4: In a bowl, add the powdered sugar, 1 ½ cups almond meal, and 1 tablespoon dark cocoa powder, and whisk to combine', '5: Add the chilled aquafaba to another bowl and beat until soft peaks begin to form', '6: Add the ½ tablespoon ½ cup cream of tartar and sugar to the whipped aquafaba and beat until soft peaks form', '7: Sift powdered sugar, 1 ½ cups almond meal, and 1 tablespoon dark cocoa powder into the whipped aquafaba, and gently fold ingredients together', '8: Transfer the batter to a piping bag and pipe directly onto a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '9: Let the tray rest at room temperature for 2 hours until the surface does not stick to fingertips', '10: Bake for 30 minutes', '11: Let the macarons cool for 15 minutes', '12: Pipe the peanut butter onto the macarons', '13: Refrigerate macarons for another 2 hours before serving']

ingredients: ['1 medium yellow onion thinly sliced', '6 medium carrots cut on the bias into 1/2 inch (12MM) slices', '1 package tuscan kale about 1/2 bunch stem removed', '3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil divided', 'kosher salt to taste', 'black pepper to taste', '½ cup white wine (120 mL) such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', '3 lb whole chicken (1.5 kg) giblets removed patted dry', '8 sprigs fresh rosemary', '8 sprigs fresh thyme', '1 lemon halved', 'Special Equipment', 'cast iron pan 12 inch (30 cm)', 'kitchen twine']
instructions: ['1: Arrange an oven rack in the center of the oven, then preheat to 425˚F (220˚C)', '2: Toss the 1 medium yellow onion, 6 medium carrots, and 1 package tuscan kale in a 12-inch (30 cm) cast iron skillet with 2 3 tablespoons of olive oil, kosher salt, and black pepper until well coated', '3:  Pour the ½ cup white wine over the vegetables', '4: Season the 3 lb whole chicken all over with kosher salt and black pepper, then brush with the remaining tablespoon of olive oil', '5:  Stuff the 8 sprigs fresh rosemary, 8 sprigs fresh thyme, and 1 lemon inside the cavity, tie the legs closed with kitchen twine, and tuck the wings underneath the bird', '6:  Place the 3 lb whole chicken, breast-side up, on top of the vegetables in the skillet', '7: Roast the 3 lb whole chicken for 1 hour, rotating the pan halfway through cooking', '8:  The 3 lb whole chicken is done when it is golden brown, the skin is crispy, and an instant-read thermometer inserted into the thigh registers 165˚F (70˚C)', '9:  Remove from the oven and let the 3 lb whole chicken rest for 15 minutes', '10: Carve the 3 lb whole chicken, then plate alongside the vegetables', '11:  Pour the pan drippings over the top and serve immediately']

ingredients: ['1 lb flank steak (455 g) or skirt steak', '½ cup soy sauce (120 mL)', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 tablespoon ginger grated', '2 tablespoons honey', '1 lime juiced', '1 teaspoon sriracha sauce optional', '1 bell pepper cut into matchsticks', '1 carrot cut into matchsticks', '½ zucchini cut into matchsticks', '16 stalks asparagus halved', '1 red onion sliced', 'sesame seed for serving to taste', 'toothpick to skewer']
instructions: ['1: In a baking dish with the 1 lb flank steak, mix the ½ cup soy sauce, 3 cloves garlic, 1 tablespoon ginger, 2 tablespoons honey, 1 lime juice, and Sriracha sauce (optional)', '2: Lightly massage the marinade into the 1 lb flank steak and cover', '3:  Refrigerate 1-4 hours', '4: Place toothpicks in a bowl and pour water over toothpicks until completely submerged', '5:  Water will prevent toothpicks from burning', '6: Once marinated, cut the 1 lb flank steak into 8 equal rectangles', '7:  You may need to pound the 1 lb flank steak thinner if using a thicker cut', '8: Place a few slices of each of the vegetables on a slice of 1 lb flank steak, making sure they are all about the same length', '9: Roll the 1 lb flank steak up over the vegetables and secure it with a toothpick', '10: In a small saucepan over medium heat, pour in the leftover marinade and bring to a boil', '11: Boil for about one minute, take off the heat, and set aside to use as a glaze', '12: In a grill pan or on the grill over medium high heat, place your 1 lb flank steak roll-ups and cook for 2-3 minutes', '13: Flip the roll over and use a heat-safe brush to brush the glaze on each roll', '14: Cook for about one minute longer and remove from heat', '15:  Top with sesame seeds']

ingredients: ['1 can navy beans', '1 can pinto bean', '½ cup yellow pepper (50 g) chopped', '½ onion chopped', '2 garlics minced', '1 cup vegetable stock (240 mL)', '½ cup hominy (75 g)', '1 can green chilli', '1 tablespoon cumin', '1 tablespoon oregano', '1 tablespoon smoked paprika', '1 teaspoon cayenne or to taste', 'salt to taste']
instructions: ['1: Sauté ½ onion, peppers, and garlic in oil until softened', '2: Add spices and toast them for a minute', '3:  Then, add all other ingredients', '4: Bring to boil, then simmer, covered, for ½ hour', '5: Salt to 1 teaspoon cayenne or to salt to taste', '6: Garnish with avocado or cilantro if desired', '7:  Serve']

ingredients: ['½ cup carrot (55 g) from 1 small peeled carrot', '⅓ cup rolled oats (35 g)', '1 tablespoon raisin', '1 cup unsweetened almond milk (240 mL) divided', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon honey', '10 raw almonds chopped men: 20 almonds', '½ cup 2% greek yogurt (140 g) plain for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Stir together ⅓ cup rolled oats, grated ½ cup carrot, raisins, and ½ of the 1 cup unsweetened 10 raw almond milk', '2: Store in an airtight container in the fridge overnight', '3:  (If you’re following the Clean Eating Challenge, you already did this!)Combine the ½ cup carrot-oat mixture, the remaining ½ of the 1 cup unsweetened 10 raw almond milk, 1 teaspoon honey, ½ teaspoon vanilla, and ¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon in a small pot over medium heat', '4: Bring the mixture to a simmer and cook, stirring occasionally, until the mixture is thick and the oats are cooked, 4 to 5 minutes', '5: Serve immediately, with 1 cup unsweetened 10 raw 10 raw almonds and Greek yogurt on top']

ingredients: ['nonstick cooking spray for greasing', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '2 tablespoons all purpose flour', '1 ½ cups whole milk (360 mL)', '2 cups shredded mild cheddar cheese (200 g)', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '4 ½ cups macaroni (500 g) cooked for 2 minutes less than the package instructs', '2 cups shredded sharp cheddar cheese (200 g)', '4 cups shredded rotisserie chicken (500 g)', '½ cup Frank’s® RedHot® Buffalo Wings Sauce (120 mL) plus more for serving', 'For Serving', '2 stalks celery', '2 tablespoons ranch dressing', '⅓ cup crumbled blue cheese (35 g)', '¼ cup red onion (35 g) finely diced', '¼ cup scallion (10 g) sliced green part only']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2:  Grease a 10-inch cast-iron skillet with nonstick spray', '3: Melt the 2 tablespoons unsalted butter in a medium saucepan over medium-high heat', '4:  Add the 2 tablespoons all purpose flour and cook, stirring frequently to break up any clumps, for 5 minutes, or until the roux is light golden brown', '5:  Reduce the heat to medium, then slowly pour in the 1 ½ cups whole milk and cook, whisking constantly, until thickened, about 8 minutes', '6:  Do not let the mixture come to a boil', '7: Remove the pot from the heat, add the mild cheddar cheese, and whisk until melted and smooth', '8:  Stir in the 1 teaspoon kosher salt', '9:  Add the cooked 4 ½ cups macaroni to the cheese sauce and toss to coat well', '10: Transfer half of the mac and cheese mixture to the prepared skillet', '11:  Top with 1 cup sharp cheddar cheese, then the remaining mac and cheese and remaining cup of sharp cheddar', '12: In a medium bowl, mix together the shredded rotisserie chicken and Frank’s® RedHot® Buffalo Wings Sauce', '13:  Spoon on top of the mac and cheese', '14: Bake the mac and cheese for 30–35 minutes or until the cheese is bubbling around the edges of the pan', '15:  Remove from the oven and let cool for at least 5 minutes', '16: While the mac and cheese bakes, make the celery ribbons: Using a vegetable peeler, peel the backs of the celery 2 stalks lengthwise into ribbons', '17:  Transfer the ribbons to a large bowl filled with ice water and let sit for at least 30 minutes or up to 1 hour', '18: Drizzle the mac and cheese with more Frank’s® RedHot® Buffalo Wings Sauce and the 2 tablespoons ranch dressing, then top with the crumbled blue cheese, red onion, scallions, and celery ribbons']

ingredients: ['1 medium leek', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '5 oz pancetta (140 g)', '2 cups carrot (220 g) diced', '3 stalks celery stalk sliced', '8 oz cremini mushroom (225 g) sliced', '3 cloves garlic minced', 'kosher salt to taste', '4 sprigs fresh thyme sprigs', '14.5 oz diced tomato (410 g)', '4 cups great northern beans (680 g) cooked or canned', '6 cups low sodium vegetable broth (1.4 L)', 'parmesan cheese freshly grated for serving', 'bread crusty for serving']
instructions: ['1: Trim the root end and the tough, dark green top of the leek and remove any thick outer layers', '2:  Cut the leek in half lengthwise, then slice into ¼-inch (6-mm) thick half moons', '3: Transfer to a bowl of water and shake around with your fingers to loosen any dirt or grit', '4:  Let the leeks sit in the water for a couple minutes to let any grit to sink to the bottom of the bowl', '5:  Carefully remove the cleaned leeks from the bowl, leaving the dirty water behind', '6: Heat the 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large, heavy-bottomed pot over 1 medium heat', '7:  Add the 5 oz pancetta and cook until crispy and most of the fat has rendered, about 8 minutes', '8: Add the leeks, carrots, 3 stalks celery, mushrooms, and 3 cloves garlic', '9:  Season with kosher salt', '10:  Cook for 5-6 minutes, until the 6 cups low sodium vegetables have released their juices and begin to soften', '11: Add the 4 sprigs fresh thyme leaves, tomatoes, 4 cups great northern beans, and 6 cups low sodium vegetable stock', '12:  Stir to combine, then bring to a boil, cover, and cook, stirring occasionally, for 20 minutes until slightly reduced and hot throughout', '13:  Season with more kosher salt, to taste', '14: Ladle into bowls and top with freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '15:  Serve with crusty bread']

ingredients: ['1 cup Great Value® Nonfat Milk (240 mL)', '1 ½ cups Great Value® Berry Medley (260 g)', '¼ cup dried apricot (50 g) diced', '½ teaspoon fresh ginger']
instructions: ['1: In a blender, combine the milk, berries, apricots, and ½ teaspoon fresh ginger', '2:  Blend on high speed until smooth']

ingredients: ['3 bulbs beetroot', '4 ¼ cups oil (1 L) for frying', 'salt to taste', 'Preparation', '3 bulbs beetroot', '4 ¼ cups oil (1 L) for frying', 'salt to taste', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Start by preparing your beetroot', '2:  Wash thoroughly under water and remove the stems and root', '3:  Next, peel the beetroot and cut each bulb in half', '4: Next, slice your beetroot as thinly as you can', '5:  For ease and speed, it is useful to use a food processor with the slicing attachment; if you don’t have one, just do your best to cut the beetroot as thinly as you can', '6: Take a baking tray and cover with kitchen paper', '7:  Lay out the beetroot slices in one even layer, cover with more kitchen paper, and press down', '8:  Dry the beetroot overnight', '9:  (If you can’t wait this long, you can remove the kitchen paper and place the beetroot slices into an oven preheated to 210˚F (100˚C) for 15 minutes or until you can see the slices starting to dehydrate', '10: )Place a deep saucepan over a medium heat and fill halfway with oil', '11:  Preheat the oil to 350˚F (180˚C)', '12: Once the oil is up to temperature, cook the beetroot in small batches for around 1 minute or until crispy', '13: Carefully remove crisps from the oil and drain onto kitchen paper', '14:  Season with salt']

ingredients: ['nonstick cooking spray for greasing', '1 small head green cabbage cut into 2-inch (5 cm) pieces', '1 medium fennel bulb thinly sliced', '2 medium gala apples cut into wedges', '¾ cup Club House La Grille Honey & Dijon Marinade (180 mL) divided', '2 bones in pork chops about 1 in (2.5 cm) thick', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C) and grease a baking sheet with nonstick spray', '2: In a large bowl, toss the 1 small head green cabbage, 1 medium fennel, and 2 medium gala apples with ½ ¾ cup (120 ml) Club House La Grille Honey & Dijon 30 Minute Marinade', '3:  Spread in an even layer on the prepared baking sheet', '4: Season the 2 bones in pork chops on both sides with the 1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt and 1 teaspoon black pepper', '5:  Using a pastry brush, brush the remaining ¼ ¾ cup (60 ml) marinade over both sides of the 2 bones in pork chops', '6:  Transfer to the baking sheet with the 1 small head green cabbage mixture', '7: Roast for 28–30 minutes, tossing the vegetables halfway through, until the 2 bones in pork reaches an internal temperature of 145°F (63°C) and the vegetables are crisp-tender', '8:  Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['1 slice bread toasted', 'ricotta cheese to taste', '¼ apple sliced', 'honey to taste']
instructions: ['1: Spread ricotta over toast, and top with ¼ apple sliced apples and a drizzle of honey']

ingredients: ['2 cups all purpose flour (250 g)', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 cup whole milk (240 mL)', '½ cup buttermilk (120 mL)', '4 tablespoons unsalted butter melted and cooled', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 large eggs separated', '⅓ cup sugar (65 g)', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', 'butter for serving', 'maple syrup for serving']
instructions: ['1: Preheat a waffle iron to medium-high', '2: In a 2 large bowl, whisk together the 2 cups all purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking powder, and 1 teaspoon kosher salt', '3:  Make a well in the center and pour in the 1 cup whole milk, ½ cup buttermilk, melted butter, ½ teaspoon vanilla, and egg yolks', '4:  Whisk until the batter just comes together (there will be some lumps)', '5: Add the egg whites to a medium bowl and beat with an electric hand mixer until foamy', '6:  With the mixer running, gradually add the ⅓ cup sugar and continue beating until stiff peaks form', '7:  Gently fold the egg whites into the batter until just combined', '8: Spray the heated waffle iron with nonstick cooking spray', '9:  Ladle the batter into the waffle iron, close the lid, and cook according to manufacturer’s instructions until the waffle is golden brown and crisp, 5–6 minutes', '10:  Transfer the waffle to a plate and repeat with the remaining batter', '11: Serve the waffles hot, with butter and maple syrup alongside']

ingredients: ['Edible Snow Globes', '1 ½ cups cold water (360 mL)', '12 packages gelatin powder', '6 tablespoons sugar', '3 drops peppermint extract', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', 'Chocolate Cupcakes', '1 ½ cups all purpose flour (190 g)', '⅓ cup dark cocoa powder (40 g)', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '¼ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 cup brown sugar (220 g)', '1 cup hot water (240 mL)', '½ cup canola oil (120 mL)', '1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', 'Topping', '1 jar vanilla frosting', '½ cup sweetened coconut flakes (50 g)', '12 holiday themed lollipops sticks trimmed to 2 in (5 cm)', 'powdered sugar for dusting', 'Special Equipment', '12 small balloons inflated to 3 in (7 cm) in diameter', '12 skewers']
instructions: ['1: Make the edible snow globes: In a small bowl, whisk together the 1 ½ cups cold water and gelatin', '2:  Let the gelatin bloom for 5 minutes, until the water is mostly absorbed', '3:  Microwave for 20–30 seconds, or until the gelatin is melted', '4: Add the 6 tablespoons 1 cup brown powdered sugar and 3 drops peppermint extract and stir until dissolved', '5:  Let cool for 10 minutes', '6:  If any foam rises to the top, skim off and discard', '7: Spray the balloons with nonstick spray', '8:  Wipe gently with a paper towel to distribute', '9: Dip each balloon in the gelatin until ¾ of the way submerged', '10:  Use tape or poke a small hole above the knot to attach the balloon to a skewer and stand it upright in a tall glass for 1-2 minutes', '11:  Dip in gelatin again, then stand it upright in a tall glass again', '12:  If the gelatin begins to set, microwave in 10-second intervals and continue until all of the balloons are coated', '13:  Let the balloons for at least 12 hours, until no longer tacky to the touch', '14: Make the cupcakes: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '15:  Line a 12-cup cupcake tin with cupcake liners', '16: In a medium bowl, sift together the 1 ½ cups all purpose flour, cocoa powder,  1 teaspoon baking soda, and ¼ teaspoon kosher salt', '17:  Add the brown 6 tablespoons 1 cup brown powdered sugar and whisk to combine', '18: Add the hot water, canola oil, 1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar, and vanilla and mix until combined', '19: Divide the batter evenly between the cupcake liners', '20: Bake the cupcakes for 14–16 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center of a cupcake comes out clean', '21: Let the cupcakes cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack and let cool completely', '22: Finish the edible snow globes: Carefully remove one of the balloons from the skewer', '23:  Pinch a bit of the balloon near the knot, and carefully snip a small hole', '24:  Let the air slowly release from the balloon, then pull out of the gelatin snow globe and discard the balloon', '25:  Trim the edges of the snow globe if uneven', '26:  Repeat with remaining coated balloons', '27:  Set the snow globes upright on a 1 teaspoon baking sheet until ready to top the cupcakes', '28: Assemble the cupcakes: Frost the cupcakes with a dollop of vanilla frosting onto each cupcake, spreading evenly over the top', '29: Sprinkle the shredded coconut on top of the frosting, dividing evenly between the cupcakes', '30: Top each cupcake with a holiday lollipop, inserting the stick into the cupcake', '31:  Place the snow globes on top, and dust with powdered 6 tablespoons 1 cup brown powdered sugar']

ingredients: ['1 cup oats (100 g)', '2 bananas']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: In a large mixing bowl combine the 1 cup oats and banana and mash banana and mix until well incorporated', '3: Add additional ingredients should you desire', '4: Bake for 12 minutes']

ingredients: ['1 large globe eggplant', 'salt to taste', 'olive oil', '2 cups mozzarella cheese (200 g)', '1 cup cheddar cheese (100 g)', 'Pizza Sauce', '1 jar marinara sauce', '½ cup parmesan cheese (55 g)', '¼ cup fresh basil (10 g)', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes']
instructions: ['1: Slice the 1 large globe eggplant into ½-inch (1 cm) pieces', '2: Salt the slices and leave them to “sweat” for 20 minutes then wipe them off', '3: Preheat oven to 350°F (180˚C)', '4: Slather each slice with olive  oil', '5: Bake for 25 minutes', '6: In a medium bowl, combine all pizza 1 jar marinara sauce ingredients and stir until homogenous', '7: Remove 1 large globe eggplant slices from the oven and pour about 2 tablespoons of the 1 jar marinara sauce mixture onto each one', '8: Sprinkle 2 cups mozzarella and 1 cup cheddar on each slice', '9: Put the slices back in the oven for 1-2 minutes to melt the 2 cups mozzarella 1 cup cheddar ½ cup parmesan cheese', '10: Allow to cool before serving']

ingredients: ['1 ¾ cups self-rising flour (220 g) plus more for dusting', '1 cup greek yogurt (245 g)', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL)', '4 cloves garlic minced', '2 tablespoons fresh parsley finely chopped', 'salt to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F(200°C)', '2: In a large bowl, mix the self-rising 1 ¾ cups self-rising flour and 1 cup greek yogurt until it comes together to form a ball', '3: Transfer the dough ball to a lightly 1 ¾ cups self-rising floured work surface and use your hands to begin flattening and shaping the rough into a roughly 8-inch (20 cm) disk', '4: Using a bench scraper or knife, cut the dough into 8 equal pieces', '5: One at a time, roll each piece out into a roughly 12 inch (30 cm) log and set aside', '6: Transfer the dough logs to a parchment paper-lined baking sheet and shape individual knots', '7:  Repeat with remaining logs', '8: In a small bowl, mix together the ¼ cup olive oil, 4 cloves garlic, 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, and salt', '9: Brush each knot with 4 cloves garlic oil mixture', '10: Bake for 20 minutes, until the 4 cloves garlic knots have begun to turn golden brown']

ingredients: ['Spice Blend', '1 tablespoon cinnamon', '1 ½ teaspoons ground nutmeg', '1 teaspoon ground cloves', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '¼ teaspoon ground cardamom', '¼ teaspoon white pepper', '¼ teaspoon ground anise', 'Cookies', '1 ½ cups flour (185 g)', '¼ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '3 ½ teaspoons spice blend', '½ cup butter (115 g)', '½ cup dark brown sugar (110 g)', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '1 egg', 'Cookie Butter', '20 cookies crushed', '⅛ cup evaporated milk (30 mL)', '¼ cup sweetened condensed milk (75 g)', '¼ cup butter (55 g)']
instructions: ['1: To make the splice blend, combine 3 ½ teaspoons spices in a small bowl and mix until evenly distributed', '2: To make the 20 cookies, combine 1 ½ cups flour, ¼ teaspoon salt, ½ teaspoon baking powder, and 3 ½ teaspoons spice blend in a large mixing bowl,', '3:  Mix until blended', '4: In a new large bowl, mix together the butter, ½ cup dark brown ½ cup sugar, and ½ cup dark brown ½ cup dark brown ½ cup sugar', '5:  Mix in the 1 egg', '6: Add the 1 ½ cups flour mixture and combine until well mixed and dough forms', '7: Remove dough from bowl and wrap with plastic wrap', '8:  Refrigerate for 2-6 hours', '9: On a 1 ½ cups floured surface, roll out the dough to a ⅛- to ¼-inch (3mm - 6mm) thickness', '10: Cut the dough into desired cookie shape', '11: Optional: use speculoos style cookie molds to shape 20 cookies', '12: Place 20 cookies on parchment covered ½ teaspoon baking tray and bake at 350°F (175°C) for 12-14 minutes', '13: To make the cookie butter, combine 20 cookies, ¼ cup sweetened condensed milk, ⅛ cup evaporated milk, and butter in a food processor', '14: Blend until peanut butter texture forms']

ingredients: ['12 balls frozen dinner rolls', '8 oz cream cheese (225 g) softened', '½ cup grated parmesan cheese (55 g)', '½ cup grated romano (55 g)', '½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese (60 g)', '¼ cup sour cream (60 g)', '14 oz artichoke heart (395 g) drained and chopped', '¾ cup frozen chopped spinach (115 g) thawed and drained of excess water', '2 cloves garlic chopped', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '½ teaspoon crushed red pepper', 'olive oil']
instructions: ['1: Coat a 10 inch (25cm) oven-safe skillet with olive oil', '2:  Place the dinner roll dough 12 balls in a ring around the skillet', '3:  Cover and let rise until thawed and doubled in size', '4: In a medium bowl, combine 8 oz ¼ cup ¼ cup sour cream cheese, ½ cup grated parmesan, ½ cup grated romano, ½ cup shredded mozzarella, ¼ cup sour 8 oz ¼ cup ¼ cup sour cream, 14 oz artichoke hearts, ¾ cup frozen chopped spinach, 2 cloves garlic, 1 teaspoon dried basil, and ½ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes', '5: Once the dough has thawed, uncover and scoop the dip into the center of the skillet', '6: Brush the rolls with olive oil, and top with an additional sprinkle of cheese (optional)', '7: Bake in a preheated oven at 375˚F (190˚C) for 25 minutes', '8: (If the bread browns too quickly, lower oven temperature to 350˚F (180˚C) or cover the bread with a ring of foil)', '9:  Remove and let cool slightly before serving']

ingredients: ['4 boneless skinless chicken breasts trimmed', '1 cup all-purpose flour (125 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon onion powder', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '4 tablespoons butter divided', '2 cloves garlic minced', '½ cup shallot (75 g) minced', '1 lb cremini mushroom (455 g) trimmed and thinly sliced', '2 cups dry Marsala wine (470 mL)', '2 cups chicken stock (470 mL)', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', 'fresh parsley for serving', '1 lb Cooked pasta potatoes or rice (455 g) for serving']
instructions: ['1: Cut each chicken breast in half crosswise, then cut the larger, thicker half again horizontally, creating 3 equally thick cutlets', '2:  Place the 1 cup all-purpose flour, salt, pepper, 1 tablespoon onion powder, and garlic powder in a wide, shallow dish and stir to combine', '3:  Dredge the chicken pieces in the 1 cup all-purpose flour mixture, shaking gently to remove any excess 1 cup all-purpose flour, and set aside', '4: Heat the oil and 2 tablespoons of butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat', '5:  Add the chicken in batches to prevent overcrowding', '6:  Cook the chicken until golden brown, about 3 minutes', '7:  Flip and cook the other side, another 3 minutes', '8:  Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside', '9: To the same, now empt pan with leftover oil and butter, add the garlic, shallots, and 1 lb cremini mushrooms, stirring occasionally and scraping the bottom of the pan until the mushrooms are soft and most of the liquid has evaporated, about 8 minutes', '10: Deglaze the pan with the Marsala 2 cups dry Marsala wine and scrape all the caramelized bits from the bottom of the pan', '11:  Add the chicken stock and 1 tablespoon lemon juice, and allow mixture to come to a boil', '12:  Reduce to a simmer, and cook until the liquid has reduced by half', '13: Turn off the heat', '14:  Add 2 tablespoons of cold butter and stir until the sauce is smooth and creamy', '15:  Add the cooked chicken to the sauce, and simmer for 5 more minutes, flipping halfway through', '16: Sprinkle with fresh parsley and serve with 1 lb Cooked pasta, potatoes, or rice']

ingredients: ['2 cups rice (460 g) cooked', '3 cups milk (710 mL) divided', '¼ cup sugar (50 g)', 'salt to taste', '1 egg', '¼ teaspoon nutmeg', '¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon']
instructions: ['1: In a medium sauce pot, combine the rice, 2 cups (470 ml) of milk, ¼ cup sugar, and a pinch of salt', '2:  Bring to a gentle simmer over medium heat', '3:  Cook for 15 minutes, or until thick and creamy', '4: In a small bowl, combine remaining milk and the 1 egg', '5:  Whisk well', '6: Add the 1 egg mixture to the pot of rice', '7:  Stir well and cook for 3 minutes', '8: Add the ¼ teaspoon nutmeg and ¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon, and mix well']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '¾ lb brussel sprout (340 g) trimmed and halved', '4 cloves garlic minced', '1 lemon lemon  zest', '⅔ cup full-fat goat milk (160 mL)', '2 oz goat cheese (60 g)', '1 teaspoon dijon mustard', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 pinch red pepper flakes', '¼ cup fresh basil (10 g) chopped plus more for garnish', '⅓ cup grated parmesan cheese (40 g)', '⅓ cup raw almond (50 g) coarsely chopped', 'flaky sea salt to taste', 'black pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400ºF (200˚C)', '2: In a 12-in (30-cm) oven-safe skillet, add the 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil over medium heat', '3:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the Brussels sprouts and cook, stirring occasionally, until crisp and lightly caramelized, 3 to 4 minutes', '4: Add the 4 cloves garlic, ginger, and lemon zest', '5:  Cook until fragrant about 30 seconds', '6: Transfer the skillet to the oven and roast for 10 minutes, or until tender', '7:  Remove from the oven', '8: Preheat oven to broil', '9: In a blender or food processor, add the goat’s milk, goat cheese, 1 teaspoon dijon mustard, and lemon juice, and pulse until smooth', '10:  Stir in the 1 pinch red 1 pinch red black pepper flakes', '11: Add the ¼ cup fresh basil to the skillet with the Brussels sprouts', '12:  Add the goat’s milk mixture and stir to combine', '13: Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and almonds', '14: Broil for 2 to 3 minutes, or until the cheese has melted', '15: Season with flaky sea salt and 1 pinch red black pepper, and top with additional ¼ cup fresh basil']

ingredients: ['9 whole green cardamom pods', '1 cup water (240 mL) room temperature', '2 tablespoons kashmiri tea leaves or any non-bitter green tea', '4 whole star anises', '4 whole cloves', '2 whole cinnamon sticks', '¼ teaspoon baking soda', '1 cup ice water (240 mL)', '¾ cup whole milk (180 mL) or non-dairy milk of choice', '¾ cup half & half (180 mL) or thick non-dairy creamer of choice', '2 tablespoons granulated sugar to taste', '¼ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 ½ teaspoons unsalted raw pistachios crushed with a mortar and pestle', '½ tablespoon raw almonds crushed with a mortar and pestle']
instructions: ['1: Add the 9 whole green cardamom pods to a mortar and crush with a pestle into small pieces', '2: Add the room temperature water, Kashmiri tea leaves, crushed 9 whole green cardamom, 4 whole star anise pods, 4 whole cloves, and 2 whole cinnamon sticks to a small saucepan', '3:  Bring to a boil over medium-high heat', '4:  Once boiling, add the ¼ teaspoon baking soda (it will fizz and bubble) and reduce the heat to medium', '5:  While boiling, use a ladle to scoop some liquid from the pot and pour it back in from as high as you can without splattering (the aeration of the liquid helps give the tea its pink hue)', '6:  Continue until the liquid is reduced by half, 7–10 minutes', '7: Add the ice water and continue to aerate the tea with the ladle for another 2 minutes', '8:  Add the milk, half-and-half, 2 tablespoons granulated sugar, and ¼ teaspoon kosher salt and bring to a gentle simmer', '9:  Once simmering, remove the pot from the heat and steep for another 3 minutes', '10: Strain the chai through a fine-mesh sieve into a heatproof spouted measuring cup, making sure to squeeze out all the liquid', '11:  Discard the solids', '12: Divide the chai between 3 mugs and top with the crushed 1 ½ teaspoons unsalted raw pistachios and ½ tablespoon raw almonds', '13:  Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['2 cloves garlic minced', '10 oz spinach (285 g)', '1 cup artichoke heart (170 g) chopped', '2 oz cream cheese (55 g) softened', '½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese (50 g)', '⅔ cup grated parmesan cheese (75 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '4 boneless skinless chicken breasts', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '½ teaspoon onion powder', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '1 ⅓ cups riced cauliflower (135 g) to serve', '2 cups broccoli (300 g) cooked to serve']
instructions: ['1: Add a tablespoon of olive oil to a skillet over medium-high heat', '2:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add garlic and cook for 30 seconds, stirring constantly', '3: Add the 10 oz spinach and 1 cup artichoke, and stir', '4: Mix in 2 oz cream cheese, ½ cup shredded mozzarella, and Parmesan cheese, and stir until the cheeses are well incorporated', '5:  Remove from the heat and set aside', '6: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '7: Sprinkle the 4 boneless skinless chicken breasts with salt, pepper, ½ teaspoon onion powder, and garlic powder until evenly coated', '8: To pound out the 4 boneless skinless chicken, take a 4 boneless skinless chicken breast and butterfly it by slicing half way into it to open like a book, making sure not to slice all the way through', '9:  Cover the breast with parchment paper or plastic wrap', '10:  Gently pound the meat with a mallet or rolling pin until it is evenly flattened, about ¼ inch (6 mm) in thickness', '11: Onto each pounded 4 boneless skinless chicken breast, evenly add ¼ of the 10 oz spinach-artichoke mixture, but making sure to not overfill the 4 boneless skinless chicken', '12: Carefully roll the 4 boneless skinless chicken breast until the ends overlap and then place the 4 boneless skinless chicken into a greased baking dish', '13: Bake for 20 minutes or until the 4 boneless skinless chicken is fully opaque and reaches at least 165°F (75°C)', '14: Serve with 1 ⅓ cups riced cauliflower, 2 cups broccoli, or other low carb vegetables of your choice', '15: Eat right away or refrigerate until ready to eat']

ingredients: ['½ cup melted butter (114 g) melted', '1 ½ cups peanut butter (360 g)', '2 ½ cups powdered sugar (400 g)', '1 cup chocolate chips (175 g) enough for dipping']
instructions: ['1: Mix ½ cup melted 1 ½ cups 1 ½ cups peanut butter, 1 ½ cups peanut ½ cup melted 1 ½ cups 1 ½ cups peanut butter, and 2 ½ cups powdered sugar until well blended', '2:  More or less 2 ½ cups powdered sugar can be used to make mixture more or less dry', '3: Make 1 inch balls and freeze for about 20 minutes or until firm', '4: Microwave 1 cup chocolate chips for 60 seconds, stopping every 15 seconds to check and stir', '5:  Adding some vegetable shortening can make the 1 cup chocolate thinner and easier work with', '6: Remove balls from freezer and dip most of the way into the 1 cup chocolate, coating all but a small circle on top', '7:  Using a toothpick for this works well but simply dipping it in and pulling it out with a fork also works', '8:  Place completed buckeyes on wax paper and allow to harden', '9:  Refrigerate if needed']

ingredients: ['½ cup zucchini (75 g) cubed', '½ cup sweet potato (100 g) cubed', '1 cup cherry tomato (200 g) halved', '½ red onion diced', '½ cup corn (85 g) fresh or canned', '½ lemon for juice', '4 tablespoons olive oil divided', '1 teaspoon garlic salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '4 cups quinoa (680 g) cooked', '1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar', '¼ cup fresh parsley (10 g) chopped']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: Add the ½ cup zucchini, ½ cup sweet potato, tomatoes, ½ red onion, and ½ cup corn to the baking sheet', '4: Drizzle with the ½ lemon juice and 2 4 tablespoons of olive oil, then season with 1 teaspoon garlic salt and pepper', '5:  Toss to coat evenly, keeping the vegetables separate on the pan', '6: Roast for 15-20 minutes, or until fork tender', '7: Transfer the roasted vegetables to a large bowl, and add the 4 cups quinoa', '8:  Toss well', '9: In a small bowl, mix together the remaining 2 4 tablespoons of olive oil and 1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar', '10:  Pour over the veggies and 4 cups quinoa, and toss to coat', '11: Garnish with ¼ cup fresh parsley']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons oil', '4 cloves garlic cloves chopped', '2 lb shrimp (910 g)', '3 cups spinach (120 g)', '½ onion chopped', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '2 cups heavy cream (480 mL)', '1 lb fettuccine pasta (455 g) cooked', '6 slices bacon cooked and chopped', '1 cup parmesan cheese (110 g)', '½ cup fresh parsley (20 g) chopped']
instructions: ['1: Heat 2 tablespoons oil over medium heat in a large pot', '2: Cook the 4 cloves garlic and the 2 lb shrimp until the 2 lb shrimp is pink, then remove the 2 lb shrimp', '3: Add the 3 cups spinach, onions, 2 teaspoons salt, and 1 teaspoon black pepper, cooking until the onions are translucent', '4: Pour in the 2 cups heavy cream and bring to a boil', '5: Add the 1 lb fettuccine, stir until the pasta is evenly cooked', '6: Mix in the cooked 2 lb shrimp, 6 slices bacon, 1 cup parmesan, and ½ cup fresh parsley until the cheese is melted']

ingredients: ['Filling', '1 cup toasted pecans (125 g) chopped', '⅓ cup brown sugar (65 g)', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', 'Cake', '3 sticks unsalted butter softened plus more for greasing', '2 ½ cups granulated sugar (500 g)', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '6 large eggs room temperature', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '3 ⅓ cups cake flour (415 g)', '1 cup sour cream (240 g) room temperature', 'Glaze', '2 cups powdered sugar (210 g)', '3 tablespoons milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'pecan half for garnish', 'SPECIAL EQUIPMENT', 'bundt pan 10-cup fluted']
instructions: ['1: Make the filling: In a small bowl, stir together the 1 cup toasted pecans, brown sugar, and 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '2: Make the 3 ⅓ cups cake: Preheat the oven to 325°F (160°C)', '3:  Grease a 10-cup Bundt pan with 3 sticks unsalted butter', '4: In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment, cream the 3 sticks unsalted butter on medium speed until smooth, about 1 minute', '5:  Add the 2 ½ cups granulated sugar, 1 teaspoon baking powder, and 1 teaspoon kosher salt', '6:  Continue mixing on medium speed, scraping down the sides of the bowl occasionally, until light and fluffy, about 8 minutes', '7: Add the 6 large eggs, 1 at a time, and mix on medium speed, making sure each egg is fully incorporated before adding the next', '8:  Scrape down the sides and bottom of the bowl', '9:  Add the vanilla and mix until combined', '10: Add one third of the flour and mix on medium speed until just combined, then add half of the sour cream and continue mixing until just combined', '11:  Scrape down the sides and bottom of the bowl, then continue alternating additions of flour and sour cream', '12:  Use the rubber spatula to bring the batter together', '13: Pour half of the batter into the prepared Bundt pan and tap the pan against the counter to settle the batter and release any air bubbles', '14:  Sprinkle the filling evenly over the batter', '15:  Spoon the remaining batter on top and carefully spread in an even layer to cover the filling', '16: Bake the 3 ⅓ cups cake until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, 60–70 minutes', '17:  Remove from the oven and let cool for 10 minutes', '18: While the 3 ⅓ cups cake cools, make the icing: In a small bowl, whisk together the 2 cups powdered sugar, 3 tablespoons milk, and vanilla until smooth', '19: Invert the 3 ⅓ cups cake onto a serving plate and remove the Bundt pan', '20:  Pour the glaze over the 3 ⅓ cups cake to cover completely', '21:  Garnish with 1 cup toasted pecan halves', '22: Slice and serve']

ingredients: ['Caramelized Onions', '1 medium red onion thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'Lentils and Rice', '3 ½ cups water (840 mL)', '½ medium red onion diced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 cup green lentil (200 g)', '1 cup long grain rice (200 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon cumin', '½ teaspoon cinnamon', '1 bay leaf', 'Garnish', '1 bunch fresh parsley', '1 lemon', '½ cup greek yogurt (120 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a large pot, sauté the diced red onion and minced 2 cloves garlic in 1 tablespoon of olive oil until translucent, about 5 minutes', '2: Add the 3 ½ cups water, 1 cup green lentils, and 1 teaspoon salt to the large pot', '3:  Bring to a boil', '4: Cover with lid and simmer for 10 minutes', '5: To make the caramelized onions, heat a tablespoon of olive oil over low heat and add the onion slices, stirring occasionally until completely soft, dark brown, and caramelized', '6: NOTE: This will take about 30 minutes', '7:  The onions should become very dark and tacky when finished', '8:  Stir often to avoid burning', '9: Add the 1 cup long grain rice, 1 teaspoon cumin, ½ teaspoon cinnamon, and bayleaf to the lentils', '10:  Stir', '11: Cook covered for about 15 minutes, or until 1 cup long grain rice is cooked', '12: Serve lentils and 1 cup long grain rice topped with the caramelized onions, chopped 1 bunch fresh parsley, 1 lemon wedges, and Greek yogurt if desired']

ingredients: ['6 russet potatoes', 'olive oil', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '10 slices bacon cooked and crumbled', '3 cups sour cream (690 g)', '4 cups shredded cheddar cheese (400 g)', 'fresh chive for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Place 6 russet potatoes on a baking sheet and poke holes in two sides with a fork', '2: Coat 6 russet potatoes with olive oil, and sprinkle with salt and pepper', '3: Bake for at 425°F (220°C) for 45 minutes', '4: Remove 6 russet potatoes from oven, and let cool', '5:  Chop into 1-inch (2 ½ cm) pieces', '6: Lay half of the 6 russet potatoes on the bottom of a greased 9x13 inch (23x33 cm) baking dish', '7: Sprinkle on half of the 10 slices bacon, spread half of the 3 cups sour cream, and sprinkle on half of the 4 cups shredded cheddar cheese', '8: Repeat for a second layer', '9: Bake for 20 minutes at reduced temp of 350°F (180°C), or until 4 cups shredded cheddar cheese is golden brown and the edges start crisping up', '10: Sprinkle with chives']

ingredients: ['1 cup pumpkin puree (235 g)', '1 banana mashed', '2 eggs', '1 ½ cups whole wheat flour (185 g)', '¼ cup oat flour (35 g)', '½ cup unsweetened applesauce (115 g)', '3 tablespoons maple syrup', '¼ cup almond milk (60 mL)', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '½ cup dark chocolate chip (85 g)', '3 teaspoons pumpkin pie spice', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
