instructions: ['1: Preheat your oven to 35°0F or 18°0C', '2: Whisk together 1 banana, 2 eggs, apple sauce, ¼ cup almond milk, 3 tablespoons maple syrup, pumpkin puree, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract and 2 tablespoons olive oil', '3:  Then mix in the dry ingredients', '4:  Fold in the ½ cup dark chocolate chips', '5: Pour into a lined 9x5 dish and bake for 55-60 minutes or until cooked through', '6: Slice and serve']

ingredients: ['Chicken Karaage', '1 teaspoon fresh ginger grated', '1 teaspoon garlic grated', '½ teaspoon tamari or soy sauce', '2 ½ teaspoons Japanese seasoning salt divided', '1 large egg beaten ', '2 tablespoons potato starch', '16 oz boneless skinless chicken thighs (455 g)', '4 cups rice bran oil (960 mL) for  frying', '2 cups gluten-free flour blend (250 g)', 'For Serving', '2 teaspoons red miso', '2 teaspoons honey', '2 hot dog buns halved lengthwise toasted 7 in (17 cm)', '12 slices daikon or pickles of choice', '10 slices pickled jalapenos', '2 tablespoons mayonnaise', '⅔ cup watercress (20 g)', '½ cup alfalfa sprouts (15 g)', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', 'Preparation', 'Chicken Karaage', '1 teaspoon fresh ginger grated', '1 teaspoon garlic grated', '½ teaspoon tamari or soy sauce', '2 ½ teaspoons Japanese seasoning salt divided', '1 large egg beaten ', '2 tablespoons potato starch', '16 oz boneless skinless chicken thighs (455 g)', '4 cups rice bran oil (960 mL) for  frying', '2 cups gluten-free flour blend (250 g)', 'For Serving', '2 teaspoons red miso', '2 teaspoons honey', '2 hot dog buns halved lengthwise toasted 7 in (17 cm)', '12 slices daikon or pickles of choice', '10 slices pickled jalapenos', '2 tablespoons mayonnaise', '⅔ cup watercress (20 g)', '½ cup alfalfa sprouts (15 g)', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Marinate the chicken: In a medium bowl, whisk together the ginger, garlic, tamari, ½ teaspoon Japanese seasoning salt, egg, and potato starch', '2:  Add the chicken thighs and turn to coat', '3:  Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and marinate the chicken in the refrigerator for 15 minutes', '4: Fill a medium pot halfway with rice bran oil and heat over medium heat until it reaches 375°F (190°C)', '5: Add the gluten-free flour and remaining 2 teaspoons of seasoning salt to a shallow dish and whisk to combine', '6: Coat the marinated chicken thighs in the flour mixture', '7: Fry the chicken thighs, one at a time, in the hot oil for 6–7 minutes, until golden brown and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (75°C)', '8:  Remove from oil and let drain on a wire rack', '9: In a small bowl, mix together the miso and honey', '10: Spread the miso jam over the bottoms of the toasted hot dog buns', '11:  Lay the pickled daikon and jalapeño slices over the miso jam, then place the chicken karaage on top', '12:  Spread the mayonnaise over the top bun and place the watercress on top', '13:  Arrange the alfalfa sprouts over the chicken and drizzle with the olive oil and lemon juice', '14: Close the sandwich and secure each side with a wooden skewer', '15:  Cut in half, then serve alongside the cole slaw']

ingredients: ['3 green plantains', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '4 slices mozzarella cheese', '4 hot dogs or other preferred sausage', 'oil for frying']
instructions: ['1: Grate the 3 green plantains into a large mixing bowl', '2: Add 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon pepper, and 1 teaspoon chili powder, and mix to combine', '3: Wrap one slice of cheese around a 4 hot dog link and cut into fifths', '4: Take one tablespoon of your plantain mixture and encase one slice of the cheese-wrapped 4 hot dog, shaping into a cylindrical “tot', '5: ”Repeat until all 4 slices are covered and shaped, and place on a parchment-lined baking sheet', '6:  Freeze one hour', '7: In a large pot over medium-high heat, heat your oil to 375ºF (190ºC)', '8: Drop four to five tots into the oil and fry until golden brown, about one to two minutes', '9: Place on a paper towel to drain excess oil', '10: Serve warm with your favorite dipping sauce!']

ingredients: ['Chili', '2 cups onion (300 g) diced', '2 cups celery (450 g) diced', '2 cups red pepper (200 g) diced', '2 cups carrot (245 g) diced', '15 oz fire-roasted tomato (120 g)', '15 oz red kidney bean (420 g)', '15 oz chickpeas (420 g)', '15 oz black beans (425 g)', '15 oz corn (425 g)', '1 package taco seasoning', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'Cornbread', '1 box cornbread mix prepared', '2 cups mexican blend cheese (200 g)', 'Garnish', 'fresh cilantro', 'sour cream']
instructions: ['1: Saute onions, 2 cups celery, 2 cups 15 oz red 2 cups 15 oz red peppers, and carrots in a pan', '2:  Salt and 2 cups 15 oz red pepper to taste', '3: Mix in 1 package of taco seasoning', '4: Add fire-roasted tomatoes, kidney beans, chickpeas, black beans, and corn', '5: Simmer for 15 minutes', '6: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '7: Prepare 1 boxed cornbread mix according to 1 box instructions, then fold in the 2 cups mexican blend cheese', '8: Spread cheesy cornbread batter over chili', '9: Bake at 375˚F (190˚C) for 20 minutes', '10: Let cool for a few minutes, then garnish with sour cream and fresh cilantro']

ingredients: ['all purpose flour for dusting', '4 unbaked canned biscuits', '4 teaspoons creamy peanut butter', '2 teaspoons jelly of choice', 'water for brushing', '2 tablespoons ghee', 'powdered sugar for garnish', 'Preparation', 'all purpose flour for dusting', '4 unbaked canned biscuits', '4 teaspoons creamy peanut butter', '2 teaspoons jelly of choice', 'water for brushing', '2 tablespoons ghee', 'powdered sugar for garnish', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: On a lightly floured surface, roll each biscuit into a 5-inch (12', '2: 7 cm) circle', '3: Spread the peanut butter in the center of 2 biscuits and add the jelly to the center of the remaining 2 biscuits', '4: Use a pastry brush or your fingers to lightly dampen the edges of the biscuits with water; then fold the peanut butter biscuits over the jelly biscuits and press the edges together to seal well', '5: Use a 4-inch cutter to punch out the center of the biscuit sandwiches, making sure the edges are still sealed well', '6:  Discard the dough scraps', '7: Refrigerate the sandwiches for 30 minutes', '8: Melt 1 tablespoon of ghee in a medium nonstick skillet over medium-low heat', '9:  Add the sandwiches and cook for 4–5 minutes, until golden brown and crusty', '10:  Flip, add the remaining butter, and cook for 3–4 minutes more, until golden brown and crusty', '11: Dust with powdered sugar before serving']

ingredients: ['3 russet potatoes cut into bite-size pieces', '1 red bell pepper diced', '1 small white onion diced', 'olive oil to taste', '1 tablespoon dried rosemary', '1 tablespoon garlic minced', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 500˚F (260˚C)', '2: Dice potato, 1 red bell 1 red bell 1 teaspoon pepper, and 1 small white onion', '3:  Place on a baking sheet', '4: Drizzle olive oil over everything and season with 1 tablespoon dried rosemary, 1 tablespoon garlic, 1 teaspoon paprika, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1 red bell 1 teaspoon pepper', '5:  Mix until evenly coated and spread into an even layer', '6: Bake for 30 minutes, stirring every 10-15 minutes', '7: Serve with your favorite breakfast sides']

ingredients: ['1 cup walnuts (100 g)', '8 oz cremini mushroom (225 g)', '2 tablespoons olive oil divided', '2 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce', '½ teaspoon cumin', '1 yellow onion diced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon red bell pepper', '1 tablespoon tomato paste', '1 cup black beans (170 g) cooked', '3 tablespoons beet grated', '1 cup brown rice (230 g) cooked', '1 tablespoon vegan mayonnaise', '1 teaspoon vegan worcestershire', '1 teaspoon liquid smoke', '½ cup vital wheat gluten (65 g)', 'vegan bbq sauce for basting', '4 slices vegan cheese', '4 burger buns', 'vegan mayonnaise to serve', 'lettuce to serve', 'sliced tomato to serve', 'red onion sliced to serve']
instructions: ['1: Add 1 cup walnuts to the bowl of a food processor and pulse until crumbly', '2: Add 8 oz cremini mushrooms and blend until finely chopped', '3: In a large skillet over medium heat, add 1 tablespoon 2 tablespoons olive oil and add the 8 oz cremini mushroom walnut mixture, cooking for 5-8 minutes or until all moisture has evaporated', '4: Add 2 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce and ½ teaspoon cumin and cook, stirring occasionally, until dry', '5:  Transfer mixture to a bowl', '6: Add 1 tablespoon of 2 tablespoons olive oil to skillet', '7:  Add the 1 yellow red onion and cook, stirring occasionally, until semi-translucent, about 3 minutes', '8: Add 2 cloves garlic, 1 teaspoon salt, pepper, and 1 tablespoon sliced tomato paste, and cook for for another 3-5 minutes until fragrant', '9:  Set aside', '10: Add 1 cup black beans and 1 yellow red onion mixture to food processor, and blend until mostly smooth', '11: Transfer mixture to bowl and add beets, 1 cup brown rice, vegan mayo, worcestershire sauce, and 1 teaspoon liquid smoke, and stir until combined', '12: Add in ½ cup vital wheat gluten and use hands to knead 4 burger mixture together until all wheat gluten is fully incorporated', '13: Form 4 burgers into 4 patties about 3-inches (7 cm) in diameter and 1-inch (2 cm) thick', '14: In large cast-iron pan, over medium-high heat cook patties about 5 minutes on each side', '15: Add on vegan cheese 4 slices and melt', '16: Assemble 4 burger with vegan mayo, lettuce, 1 tablespoon sliced tomato, and red 1 yellow red onion']

ingredients: ['2 cups frozen pineapple (280 g)', '1 frozen banana', '3 scoops dairy-free vanilla ice cream', '½ cup coconut flakes (40 g)', '⅔ cup dairy-free milk (160 mL)', '¼ cup ice cube (50 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a blender, combine frozen pineapples, frozen bananas, dairy-free ice cream, ½ cup coconut flakes, dairy-free ⅔ cup dairy-free milk, and ice cubes', '2: Blend until combined']

ingredients: ['1 large tortilla', '2 tablespoons mustard', '2 ½ slices cheese your choice', '3 slices turkey']
instructions: ['1: Spread the 2 tablespoons mustard on the 1 large tortilla, and lay down the cheese and turkey', '2: Tightly roll up the 1 large tortilla, and cut into slices', '3: Serve with a clementine and sliced bell pepper']

ingredients: ['3 lb chicken wings (1.3 g) divided', 'Lemon Pepper Marinade', '¼ cup vegetable oil (60 mL)', '2 lemons zested about 2 tablespoons', '2 lemons juiced', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', 'Hawaiian BBQ Marinade', '½ cup unsweetened pineapple juice (120 mL)', '¼ cup soy sauce (60 mL)', '1 tablespoon light brown sugar', '1 teaspoon grated ginger', '1 teaspoon grated garlic', '1 teaspoon  sriracha', '1 tablespoon scallions sliced for garnish', 'Buffalo Sauce', '5 tablespoons unsalted butter melted', '¼ cup hot sauce (60 mL)', 'Blue Cheese Dipping Sauce', '4 oz blue cheese (110 g) crumbled', '¼ cup mayonnaise (60 g)', '⅓ cup sour cream (80 g)', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', 'Ranch', '½ cup mayonnaise (120 g)', '½ cup buttermilk (120 mL)', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon fresh dill chopped', '2 tablespoons fresh chives minced', '¾ teaspoon worcestershire sauce', '1 large clove garlic grated', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', 'Assembly', 'carrot stick', 'celery stick', 'cherry tomato', 'lemon wedge', 'tortilla chip', 'guacamole', 'salsa', 'Onion Ring', 'Waffle Fry']
instructions: ['1: Make the lemon pepper marinade: In a 1 large bowl, whisk together the ¼ cup vegetable oil, lemon zest and juice, and black pepper', '2:  Add 1 pound (455 G) of 3 lb chicken wings and toss to coat, then let marinate for 30 minutes', '3: Make the Hawaiian BBQ marinade: In a separate 1 large bowl, whisk together the ½ cup unsweetened pineapple juice, ¼ cup soy sauce, 1 tablespoon light brown sugar, 1 teaspoon grated ginger, 1 teaspoon grated 1 1 large clove garlic, and 1 teaspoon  sriracha', '4:  Add 1 pound of 3 lb chicken wings and toss to coat, then let marinate for 30 minutes', '5: Make the buffalo sauce: In a medium bowl, whisk together the melted 5 tablespoons unsalted ½ cup butter and ¼ cup hot sauce', '6:  Set aside', '7: Make the 4 oz blue cheese sauce: In a separate medium bowl, whisk together the crumbled 4 oz blue cheese, mayonnaise, ⅓ cup sour cream, and lemon juice', '8:  Refrigerate until ready to serve', '9: Make the ranch: In a separate medium bowl, whisk together the mayonnaise, 5 tablespoons unsalted ½ cup ½ cup buttermilk, pepper, 1 tablespoon fresh dill, 2 tablespoons fresh chives, Worcestershire sauce, 1 teaspoon grated 1 1 large clove garlic, and ½ teaspoon kosher salt', '10:  Refrigerate until ready to serve', '11: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C)', '12: Arrange a cooling rack on a 1 large baking sheet', '13:  Arrange the lemon pepper wings in a single layer', '14:  Arrange the Hawaiian BBQ wings in a single layer', '15:  Add the remaining pound of wings in a single layer', '16: Bake the wings until cooked through, about 45 minutes', '17: Remove the wings from the oven and pour the buffalo sauce over the naked wings, tossing to coat completely', '18: Assemble the board: Pour the 4 oz blue cheese and ranch sauces into small serving bowls and place on the board', '19:  Arrange the wings around the sauces, sprinkling the 1 tablespoon scallions over the Hawaiian BBQ wings', '20:  Fill in the board with carrot sticks, celery sticks, cherry tomatoes, lemon wedges, tortilla chips, onion rings, waffle fries, and small bowls of guacamole and salsa']

ingredients: ['Lychee Eyeballs', '40 oz lychees in syrup (1 kg) 2 cans about 20 lychees peeled and pitted strained liquid reserved', '40 blueberries', 'red food coloring', 'Punch', '12 cups cranberry juice (3 L)', '3 cups ginger ale (720 mL)', '2 cups reserved lychee juice (480 mL)', '2 cups vodka (480 mL) optional', 'Special Equipment', '3 food-safe gloves powder-free nitrile or latex gloves']
instructions: ['1: Fill each plastic glove with water until about 2 inches (5 cm) from the opening of the glove', '2:  Twist the opening and tie into a knot', '3: Place in a tray, draping some 3 food-safe gloves over others if you want some of the fingers to appear bent', '4:  Freeze for at least 4 hours, or overnight, until solid', '5: Make the lychee eyeballs: Place a blueberry inside each lychee', '6: Use a toothpick to paint a bit of red food coloring on the outside of the 40 oz lychees to mimic veins on an eyeball', '7:  Add the 40 oz lychees to a large punch bowl', '8: Pour in the 12 cups cranberry juice, 3 cups ginger ale, 40 oz lychees in syrup (1 kg) 2 cans about 20 lychees peeled and pitted strained liquid 2 cups reserved lychee juice, and 2 cups vodka, if using', '9: Remove the 3 food-safe gloves from the freezer and run under warm water for 15 seconds', '10:  Use scissors to cut off the knot and then slide the ice out of each glove and into the punch', '11: To serve, ladle punch and a couple eyeballs into glasses']

ingredients: ['1 lb medium tomatillo (455 g) husks removed', '½ medium white onion halved', '1 serrano pepper stemmed', '3 cloves garlic', 'water as needed', '½ bunch fresh cilantro leaves and soft stems roughly chopped plus more leaves for garnish - about 1 cup (40 G)', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '½ cup low sodium chicken stock (120 mL)', '¼ cup vegetable oil (60 mL) divided', '12 thick slices corn tortilla', '3 cups shredded rotisserie chicken (375 g)', '5 oz queso fresco (150 g) crumbled', '¼ medium white onion finely chopped for garnish', '2 tablespoons mexican crema for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Add the tomatillos, onion, 1 serrano peppers, and 3 cloves garlic to a medium saucepan', '2:  Pour in enough water to just cover', '3:  Bring to a boil over medium-high heat and cook until the vegetables are very tender and the tomatillos have changed color, 8–10 minutes', '4: Use a slotted spoon to transfer the cooked vegetables to a blender and discard the cooking liquid', '5:  Purée the vegetables until broken down', '6:  Add the chopped ½ bunch fresh cilantro, 1 tablespoon kosher salt, and chicken stock', '7:  Blend the salsa until smooth', '8:  It should be speckled and thick', '9: Heat 2 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil in a large pan over medium-high heat', '10:  When the oil is shimmering, add the salsa verde to the pan', '11:  Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to maintain a strong simmer', '12:  Cook until the salsa deepens in color and thickens slightly, about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally', '13:  Pour the salsa into a medium bowl and set aside', '14:  Wipe out the pan with a paper towel', '15: Heat the remaining 2 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil in the same pan over medium-high heat', '16:  Working 2 at a time, fry the 12 thick slices corn tortillas for 1 minute per side, until starting to brown but not completely fried', '17:  They should be crisp around the edges but still pliable enough to roll', '18:  Transfer the 12 thick slices corn tortillas to a paper towel-lined baking sheet to drain', '19: Set a rack in the center of the oven and turn on the broiler', '20: Spread ½ cup of the salsa verde over the bottom of a 9 x 13-inch (22 x 33 cm) baking dish', '21: Assemble the enchiladas: Dip a 12 thick slices corn tortilla in the remaining salsa verde so both sides are coated', '22:  Place the 12 thick slices corn tortilla on a flat surface and add about 4 2 tablespoons of 3 cups shredded chicken to the center', '23:  Roll tightly', '24:  Place the filled 12 thick slices corn tortilla, seam-side down, in the baking dish', '25:  Repeat with the remaining ingredients', '26: Pour any remaining salsa over the top of the enchiladas, then sprinkle with the 5 oz queso fresco', '27: Broil the enchiladas until the cheese is just melted, 2–4 minutes', '28: Serve the enchiladas warm with the diced onion, Mexican crema, and ½ bunch fresh cilantro leaves for topping']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '3 bell peppers thinly sliced', '1 onion thinly sliced', '1 teaspoon italian seasoning', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 lb hot italian sausage (455 g)', '1 lb pizza dough (455 g)', '4 slices deli ham', '6 slices salami', '3 slices provolone cheese', '½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese (50 g)', '1 egg beaten', '1 cup marinara sauce (260 g) optional']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '2: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a pan and add 3 bell peppers thinly 1 onion thinly sliced 3 bell peppers and onions', '3: Stir and add Italian seasoning and 2 cloves garlic', '4:  Cook until 3 bell peppers and onions are soft and set aside to cool', '5: In the same pan, brown the sausage until it’s fully cooked and remove from heat to cool', '6: Roll out 1 lb pizza dough into an oval about 14 inches (35 cm) wide and about 8 inches (20 cm) long', '7:  Place rolled-out dough on a piece of parchment paper', '8: Along the center of the dough, layer the sausage, 3 bell peppers, 4 slices deli ham, 6 slices salami, 3 slices provolone, and ½ cup shredded mozzarella', '9: Fold the longer sides in first, one at a time, and pinch the edges to seal', '10: Cut off any excess dough and pinch together', '11: Flip it over and apply an 1 egg wash to the outside of the dough', '12: Carefully, make two to three inch slits on the top for ventilation', '13: Bake for 30 minutes, or until golden (times & temperatures may vary depending on the oven)', '14: Cut into 2 inch (5 cm) pieces & serve with 1 cup marinara sauce for dipping']

ingredients: ['1 cup brewed coffee (240 mL)', '1 cup almond milk (240 mL)', '2 tablespoons pumpkin puree', '2 tablespoons maple syrup or sweetener of choice', '¼ teaspoon vanilla extract', '½ teaspoon pumpkin pie spice or ¼ teaspoon cinnamon plus ¼ teaspoon nutmeg', 'whipped cream optional']
instructions: ['1: Combine all ingredients in a medium sauce pot and heat through, making sure not to boil, stirring occasionally', '2: Serve hot, or over ice!Top with whipped cream (optional)']

ingredients: ['4 cups cauliflower rice (400 g)', '2 cups broccoli floret (300 g)', '2 cups chicken (300 g) cooked cubed', '½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese (50 g)', '1 cup shredded cheddar cheese (100 g) divided', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon onion powder', 'salt to taste', 'fresh parsley optional to serve']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: In a large bowl, mix together the 4 cups cauliflower rice, 2 cups broccoli, 2 cups chicken, mozzarella, ½ cup cheddar, the 1 teaspoon garlic powder, 1 teaspoon onion powder, and salt until well combined', '3: Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and cover with aluminum foil', '4:  Bake for 40 minutes', '5: Uncover the pan and top with the remaining ½ cup cheddar cheese', '6:  Bake for 10 minutes more, until the cheese is melted', '7:  Let cool for 5–10 minutes before serving']

ingredients: ['3 ½ cups pork belly (1.6 kg) cubed', '1 large onion sliced', '1 green bell pepper chopped', '6 cloves garlic minced', '1 carrot sliced', '3 slices green onion for garnish', '4 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 lemon squeezed and zested', '2 tablespoons Ssamjang Korean paste', '1 teaspoon dark soy sauce', '1 cup potato starch (125 g)', '2 cups flour (250 g)', '1 teaspoon cayenne', '1 teaspoon paprika', '2 teaspoons onion powder', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon white pepper', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons brown sugar']
instructions: ['1: In a bowl, mix together 2 cups flour, 1 cup potato starch, and seasonings (paprika, onion powder, garlic powder, 1 teaspoon cayenne, and 1 teaspoon white pepper)', '2:  Add in 3 ½ cups pork belly cubes and stir to coat', '3: Heat vegetable oil in a wok and, on medium heat, deep fry 3 ½ cups pork belly cubes until 2 tablespoons brown and crispy', '4:  Remove and set aside', '5: Remove oil from wok and in the same pan, add minced garlic , Ssamjang, 4 tablespoons 1 teaspoon 1 teaspoon dark soy sauce, 1 teaspoon dark 4 tablespoons 1 teaspoon 1 teaspoon dark soy, 1 lemon juice, and 1 lemon zest', '6:  Add 2 tablespoons brown sugar and reduce sauce (evaporate water) for 2 minutes on medium-high heat', '7: Add 3 ½ cups pork belly to pan and toss to coat 3 ½ cups pork with sauce', '8:  Stir for 2 minutes and add 1 large onion 1 carrot sliced onions, cooking for 2 minutes to slightly soften the onions', '9: Then, add bell pepper and carrots and combine, allowing sauce to marinate 3 ½ cups pork and vegetables thoroughly', '10: Plate 3 ½ cups pork belly and top with green onions and a spritz of 1 lemon juice', '11: Serve warm']

ingredients: ['8 cups canola oil (1.9 L) for frying', '4 tablespoons granulated sugar', '1 tablespoon cinnamon', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon ground szechuan peppercorn', 'all purpose flour for dusting', '1 can can of biscuit dough', 'Preparation', '8 cups canola oil (1.9 L) for frying', '4 tablespoons granulated sugar', '1 tablespoon cinnamon', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon ground szechuan peppercorn', 'all purpose flour for dusting', '1 can can of biscuit dough', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Fill a large pot with 2 inches (5 cm) of canola oil', '2:  Heat over medium-high heat until the oil reaches 350°F (180°C)', '3: In a medium bowl, mix together the sugar, cinnamon, salt, and ground Szechuan peppercorns', '4:  Set aside', '5: On a lightly floured surface, use a rolling pin to roll out the biscuits to ¼-inch (6 mm) thick', '6:  Using a 2-inch (5 cm) round cutter, punch a mini donut hole out of each biscuit', '7:  Discard the remaining dough or save for another use', '8: Working in batches, add the donut holes to the hot oil and fry for 3 minutes on one side, until golden brown', '9:  Flip and cook on the other side for 1–2 minutes more, until cooked through and golden brown all over', '10:  Use a wire skimmer to transfer the donut holes to a wire rack set over a baking sheet', '11:  Let drain for a minute, then transfer the warm donuts to the sugar mixture and toss well to coat']

ingredients: ['6 oz salmon (170 g) 1 fillet', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '3 cups spinach (130 g) roughly chopped', '1 clove garlic minced', '1 lemon cut into wedges', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 325°F (160°C)', '2: Pour 1 tablespoon olive oil into a small, oven-safe skillet', '3:  Place the 3 cups spinach and 1 clove garlic in the skillet, season with a pinch of salt and pepper, and mix well so that everything is evenly coated', '4: Place the 6 oz salmon on 1 side of the pan, then form a well on the other side and crack an 1 egg, making sure it stays intact', '5: Season the tops of the 6 oz salmon and the 1 egg with another pinch of salt and pepper', '6: Bake for 20-25 minutes, until the 6 oz salmon reaches an internal temperature of 140°F (60°C)', '7:  (The temperature will continue to rise once it rests out of the oven', '8: )Squeeze a bit of fresh 1 lemon juice over the 6 oz salmon fillet for more flavor and let the 6 oz salmon rest for 5 minutes before serving', '9: NOTE: If you want a runny 1 egg yolk, follow steps 1-3, then place the skillet in the preheated oven', '10:  Halfway through the cooking process (about 10 minutes in), crack a cold 1 egg into the well of the 3 cups spinach and replace the skillet in the oven for another 10-15 minutes', '11:   The 6 oz salmon will be cooked through, the 1 egg white will show color, and the yolk will be gloriously runny']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '½ cup celery (110 g) sliced', '½ cup leek (45 g) julienned', '½ cup carrot (60 g) julienned', 'salt to taste', 'white pepper to taste', '1 cup heavy cream (240 mL)', '1 whole sea bas cleaned', 'black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons fresh tarragon chopped', '2 sheets puff pastry', '2 eggs beaten', 'fresh parsley for serving', 'lemon wedge for serving', 'Chive Butter Sauce', '1 cup white wine (250 mL)', 'lemon juice', '4 shallots minced', '½ bunch fresh tarragon', '1 cup heavy cream (240 mL)', '18 tablespoons butter sliced 2 1/4 sticks', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'chive minced', 'Preparation', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '½ cup celery (110 g) sliced', '½ cup leek (45 g) julienned', '½ cup carrot (60 g) julienned', 'salt to taste', 'white pepper to taste', '1 cup heavy cream (240 mL)', '1 whole sea bas cleaned', 'black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons fresh tarragon chopped', '2 sheets puff pastry', '2 eggs beaten', 'fresh parsley for serving', 'lemon wedge for serving', 'Chive Butter Sauce', '1 cup white wine (250 mL)', 'lemon juice', '4 shallots minced', '½ bunch fresh tarragon', '1 cup heavy cream (240 mL)', '18 tablespoons butter sliced 2 1/4 sticks', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'chive minced', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Heat the olive oil in a medium pan over medium heat', '2: Add the celery, leeks, carrots, and a pinch of salt and white pepper, and sauté until the vegetables start to cook down', '3: Add the cream and stir to coat the vegetables', '4:  Cook until the cream is thickened', '5: Remove the pan from the heat', '6: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '7:  Roll out both sheets of puff pastry until they are ⅓-inch thick', '8:  Transfer one sheet of puff pastry to the baking sheet', '9: Cut the sea bass along the back to remove the spine, then butterfly open', '10:  Season with salt, pepper, and the tarragon', '11: Scoop the cooked vegetables onto one side of the fish, then fold over the other fillet', '12: Transfer the fish to the center of the sheet of puff pastry', '13: Brush egg wash around the fish, then lay on the second sheet of puff pastry, pressing around the fish to seal', '14:  Use a paring knife to cut away the excess puff pastry in the shape of a fish', '15: Brush the top of the puff pastry with egg wash and use the leftover pastry scraps to decorate the fish with an eye and gills', '16:  Use the tip of the knife or the large opening of a pastry tip to draw scales on the body and tail', '17: Chill in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes', '18: Make the Chive Butter Sauce: In a medium saucepan over medium heat, combine the wine, lemon juice, shallots, and tarragon', '19:  Reduce until only a ¼ cup (60 ml) of liquid remains', '20:  Add the cream and reduce until the mixture thickens slightly', '21: Slowly whisk in the butter, 1 piece at a time, until the sauce is glossy and thickened', '22: Remove the tarragon stem and season with salt and pepper', '23:  Stir in the chives', '24: Preheat the oven to 375℉ (190℃)', '25:  When the oven is heated', '26:  Bake the fish for 15 to 20 minutes, or until the pastry is golden brown', '27: Transfer the fish to a platter and garnish with fresh parsley and lemon wedges', '28: To serve, cut the fish into individual portions and plate with a drizzle of Chive Butter Sauce']

ingredients: ['Brioche Buns', '¾ cup milk (180 mL) warm to the touch', '¼ cup warm water (60 mL) divided plus 1 teaspoon', '2 teaspoons active dry yeast', '¼ cup sugar (50 g)', '4 cups bread flour (500 g)', '3 teaspoons kosher salt', '3 large eggs divided', '8 tablespoons unsalted butter room temperature', 'Caramelized Onions', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '4 yellow onions thinly sliced through the root end', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '½ cup water (120 mL) divided', '½ cup dry red wine (120 mL) divided', 'Aioli', '2 large egg yolks', '1 garlic grated', '1 teaspoon dijon mustard', '½ cup grapeseed oil (120 mL)', '¼ cup extra virgin olive oil (60 mL)', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 lemon juice', 'Burger', '¾ lb sirloin (340 g) cubed and frozen for 30 minutes', '¾ lb beef chuck (340 g) cubed and frozen for 30 minutes', '¾ lb boneless short ribs (340 g) cubed and frozen for 30 minutes', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper freshly ground', '4 slices gruyère cheese', '1 cup fresh arugula (30 g) for serving', 'french fry for serving', 'Special Equipment', '1 meat grinder frozen for 30 minutes', 'Preparation', 'Brioche Buns', '¾ cup milk (180 mL) warm to the touch', '¼ cup warm water (60 mL) divided plus 1 teaspoon', '2 teaspoons active dry yeast', '¼ cup sugar (50 g)', '4 cups bread flour (500 g)', '3 teaspoons kosher salt', '3 large eggs divided', '8 tablespoons unsalted butter room temperature', 'Caramelized Onions', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '4 yellow onions thinly sliced through the root end', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '½ cup water (120 mL) divided', '½ cup dry red wine (120 mL) divided', 'Aioli', '2 large egg yolks', '1 garlic grated', '1 teaspoon dijon mustard', '½ cup grapeseed oil (120 mL)', '¼ cup extra virgin olive oil (60 mL)', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 lemon juice', 'Burger', '¾ lb sirloin (340 g) cubed and frozen for 30 minutes', '¾ lb beef chuck (340 g) cubed and frozen for 30 minutes', '¾ lb boneless short ribs (340 g) cubed and frozen for 30 minutes', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper freshly ground', '4 slices gruyère cheese', '1 cup fresh arugula (30 g) for serving', 'french fry for serving', 'Special Equipment', '1 meat grinder frozen for 30 minutes', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Make the brioche buns: In a liquid measuring cup, combine the milk, ¼ cup (60 ml) water, yeast, and sugar, and let stand until foamy, about 5 minutes', '2: In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the dough hook, add the flour and salt, and mix on low speed', '3: With the mixer running on medium-low speed, add the yeast mixture and mix until just combined', '4: Add 2 of the eggs and mix until the eggs are combined and the dough looks sticky, about 1 minute', '5: Add the butter 1 tablespoon at a time, and mix until incorporated into the dough', '6:  Continue mixing on medium speed for 8 minutes, until the dough is smooth and comes together in a taught ball', '7: Transfer the dough to a greased bowl and covered with plastic wrap', '8:  Let rise for 1 hour, or until doubled in size', '9: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '10:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '11: Divide the dough into eight equal portions and roll into even balls', '12:  Flatten the balls into 3-inch discs and place on the prepared baking sheet', '13:  Cover with a kitchen towel and let rise for 30 minutes', '14: In a small bowl, whisk together the remaining egg and teaspoon of water', '15:  Brush the egg wash over the buns', '16: Bake for 15-17 minutes, until the buns are deep golden brown', '17:  Let cool to room temperature before serving', '18: Make the caramelized onions: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat', '19:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the onions and stir until well coated', '20:  Cook the onions for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally, and season with salt', '21:  Add ¼ cup (60 ml) of water and scrape up any brown bits on the bottom of the pan', '22:  Continue cooking for 30 minutes, until the onions are golden brown, then add the remaining ¼ cup (60 ml) water, scraping up any brown bits', '23:  Cook for 30 minutes more, then add ¼ cup (60 ml) of wine, scraping up any brown bits', '24:  Cook for another 15 minutes, then add the remaining ¼ cup (60 ml) of wine', '25:  Cook for a final 15 minutes, until the onions are deeply caramelized', '26: Make the aioli: In a medium bowl, whisk together the egg yolks, garlic, and mustard until smooth', '27: Add a drop of grapeseed oil and whisk to combine', '28:  Continue adding the grapeseed oil, drop by drop, until the mixture begins to thicken and emulsify', '29:  Once thickened, add the remaining grapeseed oil in a slow and steady stream, whisking until combined', '30:  The mixture should be thick and glossy', '31: Add the olive oil in a slow and steady stream while continuing to whisk', '32: Add the salt and pepper and whisk to combine', '33: Add the lemon juice in 1-teaspoon increments until the aioli is thick and pale yellow', '34:  Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate until serving', '35: Grind the burger meat: Freeze the meat grinder parts before using', '36:  Attach the meat grinder to a stand mixture', '37:  Working in batches, add the frozen cubed meat and process through the grinder', '38: Divide the beef into 4 8 ounce (225 grams) portions and form into patties', '39:  Place on a cutting board', '40:  Use your thumb to press a divot into the center of each burger', '41: Heat the grapeseed oil in a cast iron or stainless steel skillet over medium-high heat until nearly smoking', '42:  Add the formed burger patties to the pan and cook for 3-4 minutes, without disturbing', '43: Use a spatula to flip the burgers over and place a slice of Gruyère on each one', '44:  Cook for another 3-4 minutes, until the burger is cooked through and cheese has melted', '45: Place the burgers on the brioche buns, along with the aioli, caramelized onions, and arugula', '46:  Serve with fries']

ingredients: ['4 apples', '1 lemon juiced', '½ cup granulated sugar (100 g)', '½ cup brown sugar (110 g)', '¼ teaspoon cinnamon', '¼ teaspoon nutmeg', '1 prepared pie dough', '¼ cup heavy cream (60 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Peel the 4 apples and place them in a large bowl with enough water to cover', '2:  Squeeze 1 lemon juice in the water to prevent the 4 apples from ½ cup browning', '3:  Working with 1 apple at a time, cut around the core, discarding the core and removing the "cheeks', '4: " Slice the cheeks very thin', '5: In a large bowl, combine the ½ cup granulated sugar, ½ cup brown sugar, ¼ teaspoon cinnamon and ¼ teaspoon nutmeg', '6:  Stir to combine', '7:  Add the sliced 4 apples, stir to coat, and let sit for 30 minutes', '8: Line a 1 prepared pie dough in a 9-inch (23-cm) cast-iron pan, and prick the dough with a fork all around', '9:  Chill in the fridge until very firm, 20-30 minutes', '10: Working in batches, remove the 4 apples from the ¼ teaspoon cinnamon-sugar mixture by taking a handful at a time and carefully squeezing them with your hands to remove the excess moisture', '11:  Place the drained 4 apples in a separate large bowl, reserving the liquid to make the caramel sauce', '12: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '13: Working from the outside in, line the apple slices on the 1 prepared pie dough by overlapping each slice to create a rose shape', '14:  Roll up 1 apple slice tightly and place it in the center, creating a bud shape', '15:  Cover the pan with foil and bake for 30 minutes', '16:  Uncover and bake for 10 minutes more, or until golden ½ cup brown', '17:  Remove from the oven and let cool for 10 minutes', '18: In a saucepan, bring the reserved ¼ teaspoon cinnamon-sugar liquid to a boil', '19:  Once the liquid is reduced by half, 10-15 minutes, add the ¼ cup heavy cream and stir well', '20: To serve, pour the caramel sauce over the apple 1 prepared pie']

ingredients: ['Olive Salad', '1 cup kalamata olive (180 g) drained pitted', '½ cup roasted red pepper (50 g) roughly chopped', '2 tablespoons caper drained', '¼ teaspoon black pepper', '½ teaspoon italian seasoning', '¼ teaspoon celery seed', '¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 jar italian giardiniera drained', '⅓ cup extra virgin olive oil (80 mL)', 'Muffalettas', '2 mini French boules', '8 slices salami', '8 slices mortadella', '8 slices sopressata', '4 slices provolone cheese']
instructions: ['1: Make the olive salad: Add the olives, red ½ cup roasted red ¼ teaspoon black ¼ teaspoon red peppers, capers, ½ cup roasted red ¼ teaspoon black ¼ teaspoon red pepper, Italian seasoning, ¼ teaspoon celery seeds, red ½ cup roasted red ¼ teaspoon black ¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes, and giardiniera to a food processor and pulse until coarsely chopped', '2:  Transfer to a medium bowl and whisk in the olive oil', '3:  Cover and set aside', '4: Make the muffalettas: Cut off the top ⅓ of each boule and set aside', '5:  Carefully remove the inside of the loaf, leaving about a ½-inch-thick (1 ¼ cm) layer of bread behind', '6:  Reserve the bread scraps for another use', '7: Add a large spoonful of olive salad to the bottom of the bread bowls and spread evenly', '8:  Layer 4 slices of salami, 4 slices of mortadella, 4 slices of sopressata, and 2 slices of provolone in each loaf', '9:  Top with another layer of olive salad and spread evenly', '10:  Cover with the bread tops', '11:  Cover tightly with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 4 hours, up to overnight', '12: When ready to serve, slice the muffalettas into quarters']

ingredients: ['28 oz extra firm tofu (795 g) drained', 'Tofu Cutlets', '2 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce', '¾ teaspoon garlic powder divided', '½ cup all-purpose flour (60 g)', '1 tablespoon corn starch', '½ cup unsweetened non-dairy milk (120 mL)', '½ cup panko bread crumbs (25 g)', '1 tablespoon nutritional yeast', '1 teaspoon paprika', '¼ teaspoon cayenne', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', 'olive oil to taste', 'Teriyaki Tofu', 'vegan teriyaki sauce to taste', 'BBQ Tofu', 'vegan bbq sauce to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Slice the blocks of 28 oz extra firm tofu in half so you have 4 thin blocks', '3:  Place between 2 clean dish towels and stack a baking sheet and books or other heavy items on top to press out the excess liquid', '4:  Let sit for at least 20 minutes, or up to 1 hour', '5: Transfer 2 of the 28 oz extra firm tofu blocks to a small baking dish or container and drizzle the 2 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce evenly over both sides', '6:  Sprinkle ¼ teaspoon garlic powder onto both sides', '7:  Let marinate for at least 10 minutes, or refrigerate for up to 2 hours, until almost all the liquid has been absorbed', '8: Add the ½ cup all-purpose flour and cornstarch to a small bowl and mix to combine', '9:  Add the non-dairy ½ cup unsweetened non-dairy milk to another small bowl', '10:  In a third small bowl, combine the ½ cup panko bread crumbs, 1 tablespoon nutritional yeast, paprika, remaining ½ teaspoon garlic powder, cayenne, salt, and pepper and mix to combine', '11: Coat a marinated 28 oz extra firm tofu block in the ½ cup all-purpose flour mixture, then the non-dairy ½ cup unsweetened non-dairy milk', '12:  Repeat coating in the ½ cup all-purpose flour and non-dairy ½ cup unsweetened non-dairy milk, then coat with the ½ cup panko bread crumb mixture', '13:  Repeat with the other 28 oz extra firm tofu block', '14: Lay the ½ cup panko breaded 28 oz extra firm tofu cutlets and the 2 non-breaded blocks on a non-stick baking sheet', '15:  Brush both sides of the ½ cup panko breaded 28 oz extra firm tofu cutlets with olive oil', '16:  Brush vegan teriyaki sauce over both sides of 1 non-breaded block and vegan BBQ sauce over both sides of the other non-breaded block', '17: Bake for 25-30 minutes, flipping halfway, until the ½ cup panko breaded 28 oz extra firm tofu cutlets are golden brown', '18: Serve the 28 oz extra firm tofu blocks sliced, cubed, or whole in salads, wraps, stir-frys, or sandwiches', '19:  Store up to 5 days in an airtight container']

ingredients: ['2 slices white bread', '¼ cup creamy peanut butter (60 g)', '2 tablespoons grape jelly']
instructions: ['1: Spread the ¼ cup creamy peanut butter evenly across 1 slice of bread', '2:  Spread the 2 tablespoons grape jelly evenly across the other slice', '3: Sandwich the 2 slices together', '4:  Cut the sandwich diagonally']

ingredients: ['1 lb flank steak (455 g)', '1 green bell pepper sliced', '1 yellow bell pepper sliced', '1 red bell pepper sliced', '½ red onion sliced', 'olive oil to taste', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'chili powder to taste', 'garlic powder to taste', '1 teaspoon cumin to taste', '½ lime juiced', 'fresh cilantro chopped for garnish', '8 whole grain tortillas warmed']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 450°F (230°C)', '2: Lay the 1 lb flank steak in the middle of a baking sheet', '3:  Arrange the bell 1 green bell 1 yellow bell 1 red bell peppers and red onion around it', '4:  Drizzle everything with olive oil and season with salt, 1 green bell 1 yellow bell 1 red bell pepper, chili powder, garlic powder, and 1 teaspoon cumin', '5: Using your hands, rub the seasoning into the vegetables, then into the steak', '6:  Flip the steak and season the other side', '7: Squeeze the ½ lime juice over the top of the steak and veggies', '8: Cook for 12 minutes, or until the meat has reached your desired doneness', '9: Transfer the steak to a cutting board and let it rest for 10 minutes, then slice it into pieces, going against the 8 whole grain', '10: Fill up a warm tortilla with the steak, bell 1 green bell 1 yellow bell 1 red bell peppers, and onion', '11: Garnish with fresh cilantro, and serve']

ingredients: ['1 red apple cored and diced', '2 tablespoons gluten-free oats', '¼ teaspoon cinnamon', '¼ teaspoon nutmeg', '½ tablespoon maple syrup', '1 cup milk (240 mL) of choice']
instructions: ['1: In a blender, combine the 1 red apple, 2 tablespoons gluten-free oats, ¼ teaspoon cinnamon, ¼ teaspoon nutmeg, ½ tablespoon maple syrup, and 1 cup milk', '2:  Blend on high speed for 3 minutes, or until completely smooth', '3: Transfer the 1 red apple mixture to a small saucepan and heat over medium-low heat until just warmed through', '4:  Do not boil', '5: Pour into a mug and serve immediately', '6: Enjoy!Nutrition - Calories: 403, Total fat: 8 grams, Sodium: 133 mg, Total carbs: 72 grams, Dietary fiber: 9 grams, Sugars: 25 grams, Protein: 14 grams']

ingredients: ['2 ½ cups all-purpose flour (310 g)', '¼ cup brown sugar (50 g)', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', '1 ¾ teaspoons McCormick® Ground Cinnamon', '¼ teaspoon McCormick® allspice', '½ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '2 cups buttermilk (480 mL)', '1 stick unsalted butter melted', '2 large eggs', '1 ½ cups carrot (165 g)', '5 tablespoons unsalted butter', '¼ cup walnuts (25 g) chopped', '10 tablespoons cream cheese', '10 teaspoons maple syrup']
instructions: ['1: In a 2 large bowl, whisk together the 2 ½ cups all-purpose flour,  brown sugar, 2 teaspoons kosher salt, cinnamon, ¼ teaspoon McCormick® allspice, baking powder, and baking soda', '2: In a medium bowl or liquid measuring cup, whisk together the 2 cups buttermilk, melted butter, and eggs', '3: Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and fold with a rubber spatula until just combined', '4:  4', '5:  Gently fold in the grated carrots', '6: Let the batter rest for 15-30 minutes at room temperature', '7: Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a medium skillet over medium-low heat', '8:  Once the butter is bubbling add ⅓ cup (75 g) of batter to the pan', '9:  Cook for 2-3 minutes, until bubbles start to appear on the surface', '10:  Flip the pancake over and cook for another 1-2 minutes, until golden brown and cooked through', '11:  Repeat with the remaining batter, adding more butter as needed', '12:  As you cook the pancakes, keep them warm in a low oven or cover with foil', '13: Serve the pancakes with a pat of 10 tablespoons cream cheese, a drizzle of 10 teaspoons maple syrup, and a sprinkling of walnuts']

ingredients: ['Squash', '1 spaghetti squash', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', 'Filling', '1 cup diced cucumbers (135 g)', '1 cup sliced carrot (120 g)', '1 cup diced bell pepper (100 g)', '½ cup chopped green onions (75 g)', '½ cup diced onion (75 g)', '½ cup roasted peanut (60 g)', '¼ cup fresh cilantro (10 g) chopped', 'Peanut Sauce', '¼ cup warm water (60 mL)', '3 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '2 tablespoons honey or agave', '2 tablespoons fresh lime juice', '1 tablespoon  sriracha', '½ cup creamy peanut butter (120 g)', '1 tablespoon fresh ginger peeled and minced', '1 tablespoon garlic minced']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400ºF (200ºC)', '2: With a sharp knife, slice the squash in half', '3:  If the squash is too tough, puncture in several places forming a dotted line around the squash', '4:  Microwave for 3-5 minutes to soften', '5:  Allow to cool before cutting in half', '6: Scoop out the seeds, brush with 2 tablespoons olive 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon sesame oil, and sprinkle with 1 teaspoon salt, and 1 teaspoon 1 cup diced bell pepper', '7:  Bake for 40-45 minutes, or until a fork can easily pierce the skin', '8: Meanwhile, make the peanut sauce: combine the water, 3 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 tablespoon sesame 2 tablespoons olive 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon sesame oil, 2 tablespoons honey, 2 tablespoons fresh lime juice, Sriracha, peanut butter, 1 tablespoon fresh ginger, and 1 tablespoon garlic in a liquid measuring cup or medium bowl, stirring to combine', '9: Remove the squash from the oven and, with a fork, pull at the edges to produce that stringy “spaghetti” quality', '10: In a large bowl combine the “spaghetti” with the cucumber, carrots, bell 1 teaspoon 1 cup diced bell pepper, green onion, onions, peanuts, cilantro, and the sauce', '11:  Add mixture back to the hollowed out 1 spaghetti squash halves']

ingredients: ['Custard', '6 cups milk (1 ½ L)', '2 vanilla beans scraped', '18 egg yolks', '2 ¼ cups sugar (450 g)', '¾ cup cornstarch (95 g)', '3 tablespoons butter', 'Puffs', '4 cups water (945 mL)', '4 sticks butter', '2 teaspoons salt', '6 tablespoons sugar', '4 cups flour (500 g)', '12 eggs', 'egg wash', 'Caramel', '2 cups sugar (400 g)', '2 tablespoons dark corn syrup', '⅔ cup water (160 mL)', '⅔ cup heavy cream (160 mL)']
instructions: ['1: In a pot, heat the 6 cups milk and 2 vanilla bean pod and seeds over medium heat, bringing it to a boil', '2:  Once it begins to boil, turn off the heat and let steep for 15 minutes', '3: Using a hand mixer, beat the egg yolks and sugar until light and fluffy, about 2 minutes', '4: Add the ¾ cup 2 tablespoons dark cornstarch and mix until fully incorporated', '5: Remove the 2 vanilla bean pod from the 6 cups milk', '6:  Add ½ cup (120 ml) of the 6 cups milk to the egg yolk mixture and mix until well combined', '7:  Add the remaining 6 cups milk mixture and beat until fully incorporated', '8: Over medium heat, whisk the mixture constantly until thickened, about 7-10 minutes', '9: Remove from the heat and add the butter, whisking to combine', '10: Strain the custard into a bowl to ensure a creamy custard (optional)', '11:  Cover the custard with plastic wrap, making sure that the plastic touches the custard, and chill for at least 2 hour', '12: Preheat oven to 425˚F (220˚C)', '13: In a large pot, bring the 4 cups ⅔ cup water, butter, 2 teaspoons salt, and sugar to a boil over high heat', '14: Once the 4 cups ⅔ cup water begins to boil, remove the pot from the heat and immediately add the 4 cups flour, stirring constantly with a wooden spoon until the liquid is absorbed and the mixture begins to form a ball', '15: Return the pot to the heat and cook for another 30 seconds to remove excess moisture', '16:  Remove the pot from the heat', '17: Working quickly, add the 12 eggs, one at a time, stirring until fully incorporated', '18:  Continue stirring until the dough starts to pull away from the sides of the pan and is thick and glossy', '19:  Alternatively, you can use a stand mixer with the paddle attachment', '20: Using a piping bag with a standard round tip, fill the bag with the batter', '21: Place 1-inch (2 cm) dollops on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet, spaced at least 1-inch (2 cm) apart', '22: Use a wet fingertip to gently press down any points on the puffs', '23:  Brush the egg wash over the the puffs', '24: Bake for 15 minutes', '25:  Reduce heat to 375˚F (190˚C), and bake for 15 minutes', '26: Let puffs cool completely', '27: Use the bottom of a wooden skewer to create an opening in the bottom of the cream puff shells, just big enough for a piping tip to insert', '28: Fill a piping bag fitting with a small round tip with the custard', '29:  Gently fill the puff shells with the custard', '30: Add the sugar, ¾ cup 2 tablespoons dark corn syrup, and 4 cups ⅔ cup water to a pan over medium heat', '31:  Bring to a boil and put the lid on, cooking for 5 minutes without moving', '32:  Remove the lid and cook for an additional 7-10 minutes, until the caramel is a deep amber color and reaches 300˚F (150˚C)', '33: Remove the pan from the heat and add the heavy cream, stirring vigorously', '34: Working quickly, dip the cream puffs into the caramel and arrange on a serving platter in a circular pattern', '35: Continue to stack caramel-dipped cream puffs in a tower shape', '36: Once your tower is completed, dip a fork into the caramel sauce and drizzle it around the tower']

ingredients: ['1 lb pork spareribs (500 g)', 'Pork Seasoning:', '½ teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons oyster sauce', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', '½ teaspoon bicarbonate of soda baking soda', '5 tablespoons corn flour', '3 tablespoons water', '1 egg beaten', 'oil for deep-frying', 'Sauce:', '2 tablespoons instant coffee granules', '3 tablespoons brown sugar', '2 tablespoons white sugar', '2 cloves garlic finely sliced', '3 tablespoons BBQ sauce', '1 tablespoon rice wine', '1 tablespoon dark soy sauce', '5 tablespoons water', '1 cinnamon stick', '3 dried chillies', 'To Garnish:', '1 spring onion finely chopped', '1 bunch coriander picked', '1 teaspoon sesame seed', '1 fresh red chilli julienned']
instructions: ['1: Mix all the 1 lb pork seasoning ingredients together and toss with the 1 lb pork spare rib cubes', '2: Set aside and let it marinade in the fridge for 30-60 minutes', '3: Heat the 1 teaspoon sesame oil to about 165C and fry the 1 lb pork rib cubes until a deep golden colour', '4: Combine all the sauce ingredients in a frying pan and bring to a simmer', '5: Reduce until the sauce thickens and thinly coats the back of a spoon', '6: Add the 1 lb pork spare rib cubes into the pan and toss to coat evenly', '7:  Reduce further until the sauce becomes a sticky glaze', '8: Remove the 3 dried chillies and 1 cinnamon stick before serving', '9: Arrange the 1 lb pork spare rib cubes on a plate and garnish with sesame seeds, 1 spring onion, 1 bunch coriander and thin strips of 1 fresh red chilli']

ingredients: ['1 premade pie crust rolled out to  ⅛-inch (3 mm) thick', 'Filling', '2 ½ lb sugar pumpkin (1.1 kg)', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '⅛ teaspoon allspice', '⅛ teaspoon cloves', '¼ teaspoon ginger', '¼ teaspoon nutmeg', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '½ cup granulated sugar (100 g)', '½ cup brown sugar (110 g)', '3 large eggs', '1 large egg yolk', '1 ¼ cups half & half (300 mL)', 'egg wash']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: Gently lay the rolled-out 1 premade pie crust in a 1 premade pie dish', '4:  Trim the excess dough around the sides', '5: Tuck the dough under the edge, and crimp the edges using the index finger knuckle on one hand and the thumb and index finger on your other hand', '6:  Chill in the refrigerator for 14-20 minutes', '7: After chilling the crust, crumple a 1 premade piece of parchment paper, then spread it out in the center of the crust', '8:  Add dried chickpeas or baking beans to the center and spread toward the sides of the crust--this will add weight to keep the crust from puffing up and hold up the walls', '9: Bake the crust for 15-20 minutes, until slightly golden and there are no raw doughy spots', '10: Cut the 2 ½ lb ½ cup ½ cup granulated ½ cup ½ cup brown sugar pumpkin into 8 wedges', '11:  Use a paring knife or spoon remove all of the seeds and pulp', '12: Place the pumpkin on the prepared baking sheet and dry roast for 15-20 minutes, until tender', '13: Let the pumpkin cool slightly, then peel off the skin using your hands or a spoon', '14: Increase the oven temperature to 425˚F (220˚C)', '15: Add 16 ounces (455 g) of the pumpkin to a food processor, along with the 1 teaspoon cinnamon, ⅛ teaspoon allspice, ⅛ teaspoon cloves, ¼ teaspoon ginger, ¼ teaspoon nutmeg, ½ teaspoon kosher salt, 1 teaspoon vanilla, ½ cup granulated 2 ½ lb ½ cup ½ cup granulated ½ cup ½ cup brown sugar, ½ cup brown 2 ½ lb ½ cup ½ cup granulated ½ cup ½ cup brown sugar, 3 large eggs, egg yolk, and 1 ¼ cups half-and-half', '16:  Puree until very smooth, 6-8 minutes', '17: Pour the filling into the prebaked crust', '18:  Brush the edges of the crust with egg wash', '19: Bake the 1 premade pie for 15 minutes, then reduce the oven temperature to 350˚F (180˚C) and continue to bake for 30-35 minutes more, until the edges are set but the center still jiggles slightly when shaken', '20: Let cool at room temp for at least 2 hours, or in the fridge overnightSlice and serve']

ingredients: ['16 oz salsa (455 g)', '2 limes juiced', '1 package taco seasoning', '3 tablespoons fresh cilantro chopped', '3 lb chicken breast (1.3 kg)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: In your slow cooker, mix the 16 oz salsa, lime juice, 1 package taco seasoning, and 3 tablespoons fresh cilantro', '2: Salt and pepper the 3 lb chicken to taste, then mix into the sauce', '3:  Cover and cook on high for four hours or low for seven to eight hours', '4: Remove the 3 lb chicken, shred with two forks, and return to the slow cooker and stir', '5: Freeze leftovers in an airtight bag for up to six months!']

ingredients: ['1 cup plain yogurt (285 g)', '½ tablespoon red chili powder', '½ tablespoon ground coriander', '½ tablespoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground tumeric', '½ teaspoon garam masala', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '½ teaspoon dried fenugreek leaves', '1 bunch fresh cilantro stem crushed', '½ tablespoon salt', '1 ½ tablespoons ginger garlic paste', '2 red food colorings', '4 chicken leg quarters cut into two']
instructions: ['1: Combine all ingredients in a bowl except 4 chicken', '2: Make long slits on 4 chicken with a knife', '3: Put the 4 chicken in the marinade overnight', '4: Bake at 450°F (230°C) for 50 minutes', '5: ']

ingredients: ['4 tablespoons unsalted butter divided', '1 large leek white and light green parts only halved lengthwise and sliced into half-moons', '1 lb mixed mushroom (455 g) cleaned stemmed and sliced into ¼-inch (6 mm) pieces', '3 cloves garlic minced', '½ cup Holland House® Sherry Cooking Wine (120 mL)', '1 cup arborio rice (200 g)', '2 ½ cups vegetable stock (360 mL)', '2 sprigs fresh thyme', '½ teaspoon kosher salt plus more to taste', '¼ cup freshly grated parmesan cheese (25 g) plus more for serving', '1 tablespoon lemon zest', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon fresh parsley chopped']
instructions: ['1: Turn on the Crock-Pot® Express, select Brown/Sauté mode and high heat, and add 2 4 tablespoons of butter to the pot', '2:  When the butter has melted, add the 1 large leek, mushrooms, and 3 cloves garlic, and sauté, stirring frequently for 5–7 minutes, or until the mushrooms are browned and most of the liquid is evaporated', '3: Stir in the Holland House® Sherry Cooking Wine and cook until the wine is reduced to only a few 4 tablespoons, 3–4 minutes', '4: Add the 1 cup arborio rice and toast for 1 minute, then press Stop on the Crock-Pot® Express to turn off the heat', '5: Mix in the 2 ½ cups vegetable stock, thyme, and ½ ½ teaspoon salt', '6: Place the lid on the Crock-Pot® Express, lock into place, and turn the vent to the seal position', '7: Press the Rice/Grains button, and then Start', '8:  It will set the cook timer to 12 minutes', '9:  After 12 minutes, let the Crock-Pot® Express release naturally for 10 minutes, then release the steam valve and open the lid', '10:  The risotto should be creamy and slightly al dente', '11:  Remove the thyme 2 sprigs', '12: Stir the Parmesan, lemon zest, and lemon juice, and season to taste with salt and freshly ground black pepper', '13: Serve immediately, garnished with the 1 tablespoon fresh parsley']

ingredients: ['1 lb ground beef (455 g)', '1 medium onion chopped', '1 green bell pepper chopped', '3 cloves garlic minced', '3 cups tomato sauce (675 g)', '1 tablespoon chili powder', '2 teaspoons cumin', '2 teaspoons paprika', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper optional', '16 oz kidney bean (425 g) 1 can', '12 oz black beans (375 g) 1 can', 'sour cream for serving', 'cheddar cheese for serving']
instructions: ['1: In a heavy bottom pot, brown the 1 lb ground beef with the onions, pepper, and 3 cloves garlic on 1 medium heat', '2: Add the 3 cups tomato sauce and spices and bring to a simmer', '3: Add the 12 oz black beans and simmer, covered, for 30 to 45 minutes', '4: Serve warm with sour cream and cheddar cheese']

ingredients: ['6 strips bacon chopped', '2 chicken breasts sliced', '5 oz spinach (140 g)', '4 cloves garlic', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '5 cups milk (1 ¼ L)', '1 lb penne pasta (455 g) dry', '1 cup parmesan cheese (110 g) grated']
instructions: ['1: Cook the 6 strips bacon in a large pot over medium-high heat until crispy', '2: Add the 2 chicken and cook until no pink is showing', '3:  Remove the 2 chicken', '4: Cook the 5 oz spinach, 4 cloves garlic, 2 teaspoons salt, and 1 teaspoon pepper with the 6 strips bacon until the 5 oz spinach has wilted', '5: Put the 2 chicken back in, add the 5 cups milk, then stir', '6: Bring the 5 cups milk to a boil, then add the 1 lb penne pasta', '7: Stir constantly for about 10 minutes until the 1 lb penne pasta is cooked', '8: Add the 1 cup parmesan, then mix until the cheese has melted', '9:  Serve!']

ingredients: ['1 banana mashed extra to garnish', '½ cup applesauce (130 g)', '2 cups almond milk (480 mL)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 cup whole wheat flour (130 g)', '3 teaspoons baking powder', '1 pinch salt', 'Egg Substitute Options (choose one)', '1 tablespoon chia seed', '1 tablespoon ground flaxseed mixed with 3 tablespoons of water', '½ banana mashed']
instructions: ['1: Mash one banana to substitute for egg', '2: For 1 tablespoon chia or 1 tablespoon ground flax seeds, mix with water and let rest for 5-10 minutes', '3: Add to the other wet ingredients', '4:  Mix well', '5: Add flour, 3 teaspoons baking powder, and 1 pinch salt to wet ingredients until well combined', '6: Measure out ¼ cup (60 ml) of batter and add to a skillet over low heat', '7: When bubbles start to form and edges start to come off the pan, flip the pancake', '8: Cook an additional 2-3 minutes', '9:  Repeat with remaining batter']

ingredients: ['1 ripe plantain', 'canola oil for frying', 'kosher salt to taste', '¼ medium yellow onion sliced', '1 red bell pepper seeded and sliced', '2 cups arugula (80 g)', '1 avocado sliced', '2 green onions sliced on the bias', '3 tablespoons pistachio chopped', '¼ cup fresh cilantro (10 g) chopped', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'Honey Dressing', '2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '1 teaspoon honey', '1 teaspoon dijon mustard', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '¼ cup neutral oil (60 mL) such as canola or avocado']
instructions: ['1: Trim the ends of the 1 ripe plantain, then peel and slice on the bias into ½-inch (1', '2: 24) pieces', '3: In a large skillet, heat about ⅛ inch (3 mm) ¼ cup neutral ¼ cup neutral oil (60 mL) such as canola ¼ cup neutral ¼ cup neutral oil (60 mL) such as canola ¼ cup neutral oil over ¼ medium-high heat', '4: Add the 1 ripe plantains and fry until golden brown, 2–3 minutes per side', '5:  Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate and season with salt', '6: Remove all but 1 tablespoon of ¼ cup neutral ¼ cup neutral oil (60 mL) such as canola ¼ cup neutral oil from the skillet', '7:  Add the onion and 1 red bell 1 red bell freshly ground black pepper and cook until they are slightly softened, but still have some crunch, 3–4 minutes', '8:  Remove the pan from the heat', '9: Make the 1 teaspoon honey dressing: In a small bowl, whisk together the 2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar, 1 teaspoon honey, Dijon, and salt', '10:  While whisking, slowly drizzle in the ¼ cup neutral ¼ cup neutral oil (60 mL) such as canola ¼ cup neutral oil until the dressing is emulsified', '11: When ready to serve, divide the 2 cups arugula between 2 bowls', '12:  Top with the sautéed 1 red bell freshly ground black peppers and onions, fried 1 ripe plantains, sliced 1 ¼ cup neutral ¼ cup neutral oil (60 mL) such as canola or avocado, 2 green onions, pistachios, and ¼ cup fresh cilantro', '13:  Season with salt and 1 red bell freshly ground black pepper', '14:  Drizzle the dressing over the salad']

ingredients: ['Cabbage Slaw', '3 cups green cabbage (300 g) shredded', '½ cup red onion (75 g) diced', '1 cup sour cream (230 g)', '1 lime juiced', '¼ teaspoon salt', 'Tacos', '4 tilapia fillets', '¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper ground', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon cumin', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '16 corn tortillas', 'Garnish', 'cilantro to taste', 'lime to taste']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, combine 3 cups green cabbage, ½ cup red onion, 1 cup sour cream, lime juice, and salt', '2:  Chill until ready to serve', '3: In a bowl, mix ¼ teaspoon cayenne, ½ teaspoon garlic powder, ½ teaspoon cumin, salt, and ¼ teaspoon cayenne ½ teaspoon pepper', '4:  Season each 4 tilapia fillet on both sides with the seasoning mix', '5: Over medium-high heat, cook 2 fillets at a time for 8 minutes, flipping halfway', '6:  Repeat for the remaining fillets', '7: Using a fork, break apart the fillets into bite-size pieces', '8: Right before serving, heat the 16 corn tortillas in the pan over high heat', '9:  Remove from the pan and assemble the tacos with the cabbage slaw and 4 tilapia', '10: Garnish with cilantro and lime juice']

ingredients: ['Pav Bhaji Masala', '3 tablespoons coriander seed', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds', '½ teaspoon whole clove', '1 cinnamon stick 2 in (5 cm)', '1 teaspoon whole black peppercorn', '1 tablespoon fennel seeds', '3 cardamom pods', 'Pav Bhaji', '1 fresh ginger grated or minced', '4 garlic cloves grated or minced', '6 yukon gold potatoes (about 1¾ pounds 795 grams ) peeled and cut into ½-inch cubes (5 cups)', '3 beefsteak tomatoes (about 1½ pounds 680 grams) cored and cut into 1-inch (2.5 cm) pieces (4 cups)', '1 cup frozen english peas (150 g)', '½ teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 ½ tablespoons chile powder divided', '1 cup cold water (240 mL) divided plus more as needed', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt divided plus more to taste', '1 teaspoon paprika', '¼ teaspoon cayenne', '1 stick unsalted butter plus more for serving', '1 cup red onion (150 g) minced plus more serving', '3 jalapeñoes seeds and ribs removed minced (about ½ cup)', '¼ cup tomato paste (55 g)', '½ cup fresh cilantro (20 g) plus more for serving', '6 soft buns toasted and buttered for serving', 'lemon wedge for serving', 'Special Equipment', 'spice grinder or mortar and pestle', 'potato masher']
instructions: ['1: Make the pav bhaji masala: Add the coriander 1 teaspoon cumin 1 1 ½ tablespoon fennel 3 jalapeñoes seeds, cumin 1 teaspoon cumin 1 1 ½ tablespoon fennel 3 jalapeñoes seeds, cloves, 1 cinnamon 1 cinnamon 1 stick, peppercorns, fennel 1 teaspoon cumin 1 1 ½ tablespoon fennel 3 jalapeñoes seeds, and 3 cardamom pods to a medium skillet', '2:  Turn the heat to medium and toast the spices for 3–5 minutes, stirring frequently, until fragrant', '3:  Remove from the pan and set aside to cool for 10 minutes', '4: Transfer the toasted spices to a spice grinder and grind into a fine powder', '5:  Alternatively, use a mortar and pestle to grind the spices', '6:  Transfer the masala to an airtight container', '7:  It will keep for up to 6 months in a cool, dark place', '8: Make the pav bhaji: In a small bowl, mix together the 1 fresh ginger and 4 garlic', '9: In a large pot or Dutch oven, combine the 6 yukon gold 6 yukon gold potatoes, 3 beefsteak tomatoes, peas, the 1 fresh ginger-garlic paste, 1½ 3 1 1 ½ tablespoons pav bhaji masala, the turmeric, 1 3 1 1 ½ tablespoon chile powder, ½ cup (120 ml) water, and 1 teaspoon 1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt and stir well', '10:  Add the paprika and cayenne and stir to combine', '11:  Turn the head to medium and cover the pot', '12:  Cook for 25–30 minutes, until the 6 yukon gold 6 yukon gold potatoes are tender', '13: Uncover the pan and use a 6 yukon gold potato masher to mash the vegetables into a paste', '14:  The mixture will not be completely smooth, but all of the vegetables should be broken down as much as possible', '15:  Transfer the mixture to a medium bowl and set aside', '16: Melt the butter in the same pot (no need to wipe out)', '17:  Add the red onion, jalapeños, the tomato paste, cilantro, ½ 3 1 1 ½ tablespoon pav bhaji masala, remaining ½ 3 1 1 ½ tablespoon chile powder, and remaining ½ teaspoon 1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '18:  Cook for 5–8 minutes, until the onion is translucent and spices are fragrant', '19: Return the 6 yukon gold potato mixture to the pot and stir well to combine', '20:  Continue mashing, adding the remaining ½ cup water, plus more as needed, until the mixture is thick, but pourable', '21:  Season with more 1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt to taste', '22: Serve the pav bhaji with buttered, toasted 6 soft buns, minced red onion, minced cilantro, lemon wedges, and more butter on top']

ingredients: ['Base', '1 cup instant oatmeal (100 g)', '¼ cup ground flaxseed (40 g)', '1 tablespoon chia seeds', '¼ cup honey (85 g)', 'Mix-Ins', 'Peanut Butter “Monster”', '¼ cup pretzel (15 g) crushed', '¼ cup m&m (50 g)', '¼ cup peanut butter (60 g)', 'Chocolate Hazelnut', '¼ cup hazelnuts (30 g) chopped', '¼ cup hazelnut spread (75 g)', 'Almond Berry', '¼ cup dried cranberries (30 g)', '¼ cup almond butter (60 g)', 'Coconut Cookie', '¼ cup cashews (30 g) chopped', '¼ cup coconut flakes (25 g)', '¼ cup cookie butter (60 g)']
instructions: ['1: Add the 1 cup instant oatmeal, ¼ cup ground flaxseed, chia seeds, and ¼ cup honey to a medium bowl and mix until thoroughly combined', '2:  Add your favorite mix-ins', '3:  To make the Peanut Butter “Monster”, add in the ¼ cup pretzel (15 g) crushed pretzels, M&M’s, and ¼ cup peanut butter', '4:  Stir to combine', '5: To make the Chocolate Hazelnut, add in the chopped ¼ cup ¼ cup ¼ cup hazelnuts and ¼ cup ¼ cup hazelnut spread', '6:  Stir to combine', '7: To make the Almond Berry, add in the ¼ cup dried cranberries and ¼ cup almond butter', '8:  Stir to combine', '9: To make the Coconut Cookie add in the chopped ¼ cup cashews, ¼ cup coconut flakes, and ¼ cup cookie butter', '10:  Stir to combine', '11:  Roll the mixture into 1 tablespoon-sized balls', '12: Let sit at room temperature for 2-4 hours', '13: Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 1 week']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon oil', '1 tablespoon garlic ginger paste', '1 red chili diced', '1 onion diced', '1 tomato chopped', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '1 tablespoon garam masala', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '3 ¼ cups chicken (400 g) cooked and shredded', '1 bunch fresh coriander small bunch chopped', '10 parathas defrosted']
instructions: ['1: Heat the 1 tablespoon oil in a large saucepan over a medium heat', '2: Fry the 1 tablespoon garlic and ginger paste for a couple of minutes', '3: Stir in the chili and 1 onion and fry for about 5 minutes, until soft', '4: Add the 1 tomato, followed by the chili powder, 1 teaspoon turmeric, 1 tablespoon garam masala, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1 teaspoon pepper', '5: Fry for another few minutes stirring continuously', '6: Stir in the 3 ¼ cups chicken and 1 bunch fresh coriander and mix until evenly coated', '7: Set the pan aside', '8: In a smaller pan over medium heat, place on a paratha', '9:  Spoon on some of the 3 ¼ cups chicken mix and place another paratha on top', '10: Carefully seal the sides with your fingers, being careful not to touch the pan', '11: Cook for a few minutes on each side until crisp and golden brown', '12: Slice the 10 parathas in half and serve with chutneys, raitas, or any other dips of your choice']

ingredients: ['Waffles', '2 eggs', '1 ⅓ cups whole milk (320 mL)', '1 container Oikos Greek Yogurt Key Lime (5.3-ounce)', '1 tablespoon sugar (15 g)', '1 tablespoon baking powder (12 g)', '½ teaspoon kosher salt (2.5 g)', '2 cups flour (250 g)', 'Topping', '1 container Oikos Greek Yogurt Key Lime (5.3-ounce)', '2 teaspoons lime zest (2 g)', '1 tablespoon maple syrup (21 g)', 'Lime slice for garnish']
instructions: ['1: In a bowl, whisk together 2 eggs, whole 1 ⅓ cups whole milk, and Oikos Greek Yogurt Key Lime', '2:  Add in 1 tablespoon sugar, 1 tablespoon baking powder, ½ teaspoon kosher salt, and 2 cups flour', '3:  Whisk until all the dry ingredients are incorporated', '4: Coat waffle iron with nonstick spray', '5:  Heat up iron', '6:  Pour a heaping ½ cup of batter in the center of the iron', '7:  Close and cook for 3–4 minutes, or until golden brown and cooked through', '8:  Repeat with the rest of the batter', '9: In a small bowl, whisk together Oikos Greek Yogurt Key Lime, 2 teaspoons lime zest, and 1 tablespoon maple syrup', '10:  Top waffles with a dollop and garnish with a 2 teaspoons lime Lime slice', '11: Serve and enjoy! ']

ingredients: ['2 cups chicken (250 g) cooked shredded', '1 large yellow onion chopped', '1 red bell pepper seeded chopped', '1 jalepeno seeded chopped', '2 cups shredded monterey jack cheese (200 g) divided', '2 cups shredded cheddar cheese (200 g) divided', '¼ cup lime juice (60 mL)', '3 tablespoons taco seasoning', '18 flour tortillas', 'fresh cilantro chopped for garnish', 'guacamole for serving', 'salsa for serving']
instructions: ['1: In a 1 large bowl, combine the 2 2 2 2 ¼ cups chicken, onion, 1 red bell pepper, jalapeño, ½ 2 2 2 ¼ cup (50 g) of Monterey Jack cheese, ½ 2 2 2 ¼ cup (50 g) of 2 2 ¼ cups shredded cheddar cheese, the lime juice, and taco seasoning', '2:  Mix thoroughly', '3: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '4:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '5: Place one of the 18 flour tortillas on a cutting board', '6:  Scoop 2 3 tablespoons of the 2 2 2 2 ¼ cups chicken mixture onto the bottom edge of the tortilla', '7:  Roll up the tortilla tightly, leaving the edges untucked, and cut in half crosswise', '8:  Repeat with the rest of the 18 flour tortillas and filling', '9: Arrange the flautas in a circle on the baking sheet', '10:  Sprinkle with half of the remaining 2 2 ¼ cups shredded cheddar and Monterey Jack cheese', '11:  Place a second layer of flautas on top of the first so they are overlapping', '12:  Sprinkle with the rest of the cheese', '13:  Place the rest of the flautas on top for a third layer', '14: Bake for 30 minutes until golden brown and crisp', '15: Sprinkle with fresh cilantro and serve immediately with guacamole and salsa for dipping']

ingredients: ['1 lb flank steak (455 g)', 'Marinade', '½ cup soy sauce (120 mL)', '4 cloves garlic sliced', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL)', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon oregano', '4 packages corn tortillas', '3 cups shredded cheddar cheese (300 g)', 'Sauce', '⅔ cup mayonnaise (160 g)', '3 cloves garlic finely minced', '2 chipotle peppers finely chopped', '2 tablespoons lime juice', '½ teaspoon salt', 'To Assemble', '1 cup guacamole (150 g)', '1 cup pico de gallo (240 g)', '½ cup queso fresco (55 g) cotija cheese', '1 cup fresh cilantro leaves (40 g) optional', 'Preparation', '1 lb flank steak (455 g)', 'Marinade', '½ cup soy sauce (120 mL)', '4 cloves garlic sliced', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL)', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon oregano', '4 packages corn tortillas', '3 cups shredded cheddar cheese (300 g)', 'Sauce', '⅔ cup mayonnaise (160 g)', '3 cloves garlic finely minced', '2 chipotle peppers finely chopped', '2 tablespoons lime juice', '½ teaspoon salt', 'To Assemble', '1 cup guacamole (150 g)', '1 cup pico de gallo (240 g)', '½ cup queso fresco (55 g) cotija cheese', '1 cup fresh cilantro leaves (40 g) optional', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Combine steak and all marinade ingredients in a large plastic storage bag or bowl', '2:   Toss to coat', '3:   Marinade at least 1 hour or up to 24', '4: Remove meat from marinade, discard', '5: Heat a grill, grill pan or large saute pan to high heat', '6:   Cook to desired doneness', '7:   Allow the meat to rest at least 10 minutes before thinly slicing against the grain', '8: To prepare the sauce, combine mayo, chipotles, lime juice and salt', '9:   Stir to combine', '10: Heat a saute pan to medium heat', '11: Place one corn tortilla in the pan, sprinkle about ¼ cup (25 G) cheddar cheese on top', '12:   Cover with a second corn tortilla', '13:   Cook just until the cheese is melted, flipping once', '14:   The tortillas should be soft and pliable, not crispy', '15: To assemble the tacos, top the corn tortillas with a spoonful of guacamole', '16: Add few slices of steak, then top with pico de gallo, cotija cheese and some of the sauce', '17:   Garnish with cilantro if desired']

ingredients: ['4 tablespoons olive oil divided', '1 lb chicken breast (455 g) diced', '2 carrots sliced', '1 zucchini sliced', '1 yellow squash sliced', '4 cups fresh kale (270 g) chopped', '2 cloves garlic minced', '3 cups whole grain whole wheat rotini pasta (600 g) cooked al dente according to package instructions', '2 teaspoons dried oregano divided', '2 teaspoons salt divided', '2 teaspoons pepper divided']
instructions: ['1: Heat a large skillet with 2 4 tablespoons of olive oil on medium-high heat', '2: Add in diced 1 lb chicken breast, followed by 1 teaspoon 2 teaspoons salt, 1 teaspoon 2 teaspoons pepper, and 1 teaspoon 2 teaspoons dried oregano', '3:  Cook until no longer pink', '4:  Remove 1 lb chicken from skillet and set aside', '5: Add 2 carrots to skillet and sauté for 2-3 minutes until tender', '6: Add in 1 zucchini and 1 yellow squash, and sauté for an additional minute until they become slightly translucent', '7: Add in the 4 cups fresh kale, followed by 2 4 tablespoons olive oil, 1 teaspoon 2 teaspoons salt, and 1 teaspoon 2 teaspoons pepper', '8:  Sauté until 4 cups fresh kale begins to wilt', '9: Move veggies aside with spatula and add in 2 cloves garlic', '10:  Sauté for about 30 seconds and then combine with the veggies', '11:  (This works best if you add 2 cloves garlic to the center of the skillet where there is more heat', '12: )Add in the cooked 3 cups whole grain whole wheat rotini pasta and 1 lb chicken, followed by 1 teaspoon 2 teaspoons dried oregano and mix until evenly incorporated', '13:  Remove skillet from heat', '14: If using plastic tupperware for your weekday meal prep, allow pasta to cool for about 10 minutes before filling the containers', '15:  Refrigerate up to 4 days', '16: Or serve immediately for a family dinner']

ingredients: ['Garlic Sauce', '½ cup olive oil (120 mL)', '4 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon chili flakes', 'Pizza', '1 crust pizza crust', '2 packets fresh mozzarella cheese', '2 cups chicken breast (280 g) cooked cut into slices', '½ cup onion (75 g) diced', '3 avocados', '7 grape tomatoes', 'oil spray']
instructions: ['1: In a small/medium jar, mix ½ cup olive ½ cup olive oil, minced 4 cloves garlic, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon black pepper, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, and 1 teaspoon chili flakes together', '2: Shake it well, and save it in refrigerator for later', '3: NOTE: Refrigerate left over 4 cloves garlic sauce', '4:  It lasts for up to one weekPre-heat the oven at 425ºF (220ºC)', '5: Oil spray the flat baking pan, roll out the pre-made pizza 1 crust, if it’s needed, use a rolling pan to make the 1 crust equally flat on the pan', '6: Spread 4 cloves garlic sauce on pizza 1 crust, place down sliced 2 packets fresh mozzarella, sliced 2 cups chicken breasts (cooked) and sprinkle ½ cup onion (75 g) diced onions', '7: Bake it in the oven for 25-30 minutes until the cheese melts and the 1 crust become golden brown', '8: Take the pizza out and place down sliced 3 avocados, and some 7 grape tomatoes']

ingredients: ['2 slices white bread', '2 tablespoons marinara sauce', '½ cup mozzarella cheese (50 g)', '6 pieces pepperoni', '2 tablespoons butter']
instructions: ['1: Top one piece of bread with 2 tablespoons marinara sauce, ½ cup mozzarella cheese, and 6 pieces pepperoni', '2: Cover with a second piece of bread and 2 tablespoons butter both 2 slices of bread from edge to edge', '3: Place in preheated toastie machine and cook until bread is golden brown', '4:  (If the toastie is not browning evenly, flip half way through)', '5: Remove from toastie and slice in half']

ingredients: ['6 strips bacon sliced', '2 boneless skinless chicken breasts sliced', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '2 onions sliced', '4 cloves garlic minced', '5 oz spinach (140 g)', '5 cups milk (1.2 L)', '1 lb fettuccine (455 g)', '½ cup pesto (110 g)', '1 cup parmesan cheese (110 g) plus more for serving', 'fresh parsley chopped for serving']
