instructions: ['1: In a large pot, heat 2 1 2 2 tablespoons of olive oil over 1 ½ lb medium heat', '2:  Once the oil is shimmering, add the riced cauliflower, leeks, 5 cloves garlic, and 1 teaspoon of salt', '3:  Sauté for 2 minutes, until the leeks just begin to soften', '4: Pour in the vegetable stock and 2 cups (480 ml) of non-dairy milk', '5:  Increase the heat to 1 ½ lb medium-high and bring to a boil', '6:  Reduce the heat to 1 ½ lb medium, cover, and simmer for 15-20 minutes, until the cauliflower is completely broken down and tender', '7: Meanwhile, in a large pan, heat 2 1 2 2 tablespoons of olive oil over 1 ½ lb medium heat', '8:  Add the asparagus, peas, and 1 teaspoon of salt', '9:  Sauté for 2 minutes, until the vegetables are bright 5 oz leek (140 g) tough green with some crunch', '10:  Remove the pan from the heat and stir in the 1 2 2 tablespoons fresh lemon zest and basil', '11:  Transfer to a bowl and set aside', '12: Wipe out the pan and add the potatoes and enough cold water to cover by 1 inch (1 ¼ cm)', '13:  Season with 1 1 2 tablespoon of salt', '14:  Bring to a boil', '15:  Once boiling, reduce the heat to 1 ½ lb medium-low and simmer for 8-10 minutes, until the potatoes are easily pierced with a fork but not mushy', '16:  Drain and set aside', '17: Remove the pot with the cauliflower from the heat', '18:  Blend with an immersion blender until completely smooth and creamy', '19:  Add up to 1 cup (240 ml) non-dairy milk or water if needed to thin to your desired consistency', '20: Stir in the reserved asparagus, peas, potatoes, and the 1 2 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '21:  Season to taste with salt', '22: Ladle into bowls and garnish with fresh basil, a drizzle of olive oil, and freshly ground black pepper']

ingredients: ['15 oz chickpeas (425 g) 1 can drained and rinsed', '1 sweet potato medium-sized cooked', '1 clove garlic minced', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ cup BBQ sauce (70 g) recipe below', '¼ cup cornmeal (35 g)', '¼ cup scallions (25 g) chopped', 'Barbecue Sauce', '6 oz tomato paste (170 g)', '¼ cup water (60 mL)', '2 tablespoons pure maple syrup', '2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '½ teaspoon chili powder', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ teaspoon salt']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '2: In a large bowl, microwave 15 oz chickpeas for 1 minute, or until softened', '3: Peel the cooked 1 sweet potato, and add it to the bowl of 15 oz chickpeas, along with the garlic, chili powder, and salt', '4:  Mash until 15 oz chickpeas are finely mashed', '5:  Add cornmeal and scallions, and set aside', '6: For the barbecue sauce: In a medium-size bowl, combine 6 oz tomato paste, water, 2 tablespoons pure maple syrup, 2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar, chili powder, garlic powder, and salt', '7:  Mix to combine', '8: Add barbecue sauce to the mashed chickpea mixture and mix until thoroughly combined', '9: Using a ½ cup (120 ml) measuring cup, portion 5 patties from the mixture', '10:  Place onto a lightly greased parchment-lined sheet pan', '11: Bake for 40 minutes, or until firm and browned, flipping over halfway through', '12: Serve with the remaining barbecue sauce and favorite fixins']

ingredients: ['3 eggs', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '1 ½ cups water (360 mL)', '1 pie crust prepared', '1 teaspoon peppermint extract', '8 oz chocolate (225 g) melted', '½ cup butter (115 g) cubed', '½ cup whipped cream (120 mL) plus more for garnish', 'shaved chocolate to serve', '⅔ cup crushed peppermint candies (85 g) for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 425˚F (220˚C)', '2: In a medium heat-proof bowl, beat the 3 eggs and ½ cup sugar with an electric hand mixer until combined', '3: Add the 1 ½ cups water to a small pot over low heat and rest the bowl on top', '4:  Constantly beat the egg mixture on low speed until it reaches 160˚F (71˚C)', '5:  Remove the bowl from the heat and stir as it cools', '6: Lay a prepared 1 pie crust in a 9-inch (23 cm) 1 pie dish', '7:  Lay a sheet of parchment paper over crust and place 4 spoons or dried beans in the center, weighing down the crust', '8: Bake for 15 minutes, until golden brown', '9:  Let cool', '10: Add the 1 teaspoon ⅔ cup ⅔ cup crushed peppermint extract and melted 8 oz shaved chocolate to the egg mixture', '11:  Stir until combined', '12: Gradually beat in the ½ cup butter until well combined', '13: Gradually fold in the ½ cup whipped cream until just incorporated', '14: Carefully spoon the filling into the prepared 1 pie crust and chill for at least 2 hours', '15: Garnish with ½ cup whipped cream, shaved 8 oz shaved chocolate, and ⅔ cup crushed 1 teaspoon ⅔ cup ⅔ cup crushed peppermint candies']

ingredients: ['1 ⅓ cups almond meal (130 g) super fine', '1 ¾ cups powdered sugar (210 g)', '4 egg whites cold', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '2 teaspoons cocoa powder', '2 teaspoons raspberry jam strained', '¼ teaspoon red food coloring', '1 cup white chocolate chip (175 g) melted', '4 oz cream cheese (115 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 300˚F (150˚C)', '2: Add 1 ⅓ cups almond meal and 1 ¾ cups powdered 1 ¾ cups powdered ½ cup sugar to a bowl and mix to combine', '3: Using a hand mixer, beat the 4 egg 4 egg 1 cup whites until they stick to the bowl', '4: Add the 1 ¾ cups powdered ½ cup sugar to the whipped 4 egg 4 egg 1 cup whites and beat until stiff peaks form', '5: Gently fold the 1 ¾ cups powdered 1 ¾ cups powdered ½ cup sugar with 1 ⅓ cups almond meal into the whipped 4 egg 4 egg 1 cup whites', '6: Divide the batter in half', '7:  In one bowl, gently fold in 2 teaspoons cocoa powder', '8:  In the other bowl, add in the strained 2 teaspoons raspberry jam and ¼ teaspoon red liquid food coloring and stir to combine', '9: Transfer the batters into separate piping bags and pipe directly onto a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '10: Bake for 20 minutes', '11: In a bowl, add the melted 4 egg 1 cup white chocolate chips and 4 oz cream cheese and stir to combine', '12: Put the chocolate filling in a piping bag and pipe filling onto the macaron shells', '13: Sandwich the macarons together', '14: Refrigerate macarons for another 2 hours before serving']

ingredients: ['⅔ cup creamy peanut butter (160 g)', '1 cup old fashion oat (100 g) plus extra for rolling', '1 ½ tablespoons honey', '¼ cup mini chocolate chips (40 g) plus extra for rolling', '¼ cup flax seed (40 g) optional']
instructions: ['1: Mix all ingredients in a bowl until well-combined', '2: Cover with plastic wrap and chill in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes', '3: Once done chilling, roll into approximately 1 inch (2', '4: 5 cm) balls', '5:  (Cover hands in a light layer of ⅔ cup creamy peanut butter or oil to facilitate 1 cup old fashion oat (100 g) plus extra for ¼ cup mini ¼ cup mini chocolate chips (40 g) plus extra for rolling and avoid getting sticky hands', '6: )Lay out a thin layer of oats and ¼ cup mini chocolate chips on a cutting board or work surface and roll the balls in the mixture', '7:  Finish off by 1 cup old fashion oat (100 g) plus extra for ¼ cup mini ¼ cup mini chocolate chips (40 g) plus extra for rolling each ball between your hands to pack in the oats and ¼ cup mini chocolate chips']

ingredients: ['2 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken thighs (1.1 kg) trimmed', 'Marinade', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon ground cardamom', '1 tablespoon paprika', '½ teaspoon cinnamon', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 tablespoon sumac', '¼ teaspoon cayenne', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon fresh ground black pepper', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', '3 cloves garlic sliced', 'White Sauce', '1 cup whole milk greek yogurt (245 g)', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 clove garlic minced', '1 teaspoon sumac', '⅛ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '¼ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon black pepper', 'For serving', 'pita bread warmed', 'cucumber sliced', 'tomato sliced', 'pickle']
instructions: ['1: Combine all marinade ingredients in a large bowl and whisk together', '2: Add the 2 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken thighs and coat evenly', '3: Cover and chill for at least 1 hour and up to 12 hoursPrepare the sauce by adding all sauce ingredients to a small bowl', '4:  Mix together and chill until ready to serve', '5: Adjust the oven rack about 6 inches (15 cm) from the top heat source in your oven, then preheat the broiler', '6: Line a baking sheet with foil and a wire rack', '7: Place 2 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken in single layer on prepared wire rack, with the smooth sides down', '8:  Broil until 2 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken is well browned and registers at least 165˚F (74˚C), about 16-20 minutes', '9:  You may need to rotate the sheet pan halfway through if your broiler heats unevenly', '10:  Remove and rest the 2 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken for 5 minutes before handling, and turn off the oven', '11: While 2 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken rests, warm your pitas in the still-warm oven for a few minutes', '12: Slice the 2 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken into thin strips and transfer to platter', '13: Serve with sliced cucumbers, tomatoes, pickles, prepared 1 cup whole milk greek yogurt sauce, and warm pita']

ingredients: ['Chicken Marinade', '3 boneless skinless chicken breasts', '½ cup plain yogurt (125 g)', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '6 cloves garlic minced', '1 tablespoon minced ginger', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '2 teaspoons garam masala', '2 teaspoons paprika', 'Sauce', '3 tablespoons oil', '1 large onion finely chopped', '2 tablespoons minced ginger', '8 cloves garlic minced', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '2 teaspoons ground turmeric', '2 teaspoons ground coriander', '2 teaspoons paprika', '2 teaspoons chili powder', '2 teaspoons garam masala', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', '3 ½ cups tomato sauce (800 g)', '1 ¼ cups water (300 mL)', '1 cup heavy cream (250 mL)', '¼ cup fresh cilantro (10 g) for garnish', 'cooked rice for serving', 'naan bread for serving', 'Special Equipment', 'Bamboo or wooden skewer']
instructions: ['1: Slice the 3 boneless skinless chicken into bite-sized chunks', '2:  Combine the cubed 3 boneless skinless chicken with the ½ cup plain yogurt, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, garlic, ginger, 2 teaspoons salt, cumin, garam masala, and paprika and stir until well-coated', '3: Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour, or overnight', '4: Preheat the oven to 500°F (260°C)', '5:  Line a high-sided baking pan or roasting tray with parchment paper', '6: Place the marinated 3 boneless skinless chicken pieces on bamboo or Bamboo or wooden skewers, then set them over the prepared baking pan, making sure there is space underneath the 3 boneless skinless chicken to help distribute the heat more evenly', '7:  Bake for about 15 minutes, until slightly dark brown on the edges', '8: Make the sauce: Heat the 3 tablespoons oil in a 1 large pot over medium heat, then sauté the onions, ginger, and garlic until tender but not browned', '9:  Add the cumin, 2 teaspoons ground turmeric, 2 teaspoons ground coriander, paprika, 2 teaspoons chili powder, and garam masala and stir constantly for about 30 seconds, until the spices are fragrant', '10:  Stir in the 1 tablespoon 3 ½ cups tomato puree, 1 tablespoon 3 ½ cups tomato sauce, and 1 ¼ cups of water, then bring to a boil and cook for about 5 minutes', '11:  Pour in the 1 cup heavy cream', '12: Remove the 3 boneless skinless chicken from the skewers and add to the sauce, cooking for another 1-2 minutes', '13:  Garnish with ¼ cup fresh cilantro and serve over cooked rice or alongside naan bread']

ingredients: ['1 lb potato (500 g)', '3 ¼ cups chickpea flour (300 g)', '½ teaspoon turmeric', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '2 green chillis chopped and deseeded', '½ cup fresh coriander (20 g) chopped', '2 cups water (500 mL)', 'Spicy Ketchup', '1 bottle ketchup', '1 teaspoon fresh coriander to taste', '1 tablespoon chili powder', '1 tablespoon cumin', '4 cloves garlic crushed']
instructions: ['1: Peel and chop the 1 lb potatoes very finely', '2: Place in a bowl, cover with cold 2 cups water, and leave until ready to fry', '3: To make the batter, mix the 3 ¼ cups chickpea flour, ½ teaspoon turmeric, chili powder, 1 teaspoon pepper, 1 teaspoon salt 1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda, chillies, and coriander', '4: Gradually add the 2 cups water while whisking to form a smooth batter', '5: Heat a pot of oil to 320°F (160˚C', '6: )Drain the 1 lb potato slices and dip in the batter', '7: Fry in vegetable oil until golden brown (around 3-4 minutes)', '8: Serve with spicy 1 bottle ketchup']

ingredients: ['3 chicken breasts', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '4 tablespoons basil pesto', '1 roma tomato sliced', '1 cup mozzarella cheese (120 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2: Place 3 chicken breast in a baking dish', '3:  Season 3 chicken with salt and pepper, to taste', '4: Spread 4 tablespoons basil pesto on each 3 chicken breast', '5: Layer tomatoes on top of the 3 chicken', '6: Top with 1 cup mozzarella cheese', '7: Bake for 40 minutes']

ingredients: ['3 chicken breasts', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '24 oz alfredo sauce (680 g) or more to preference', '1 lb broccoli head (455 g)', '1 cup parmesan cheese (110 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2: Spread a layer of 24 oz alfredo sauce on the baking dish', '3:  Place 3 chicken breast over sauce', '4:  Season 3 chicken with salt and pepper, to taste', '5: Spread 1 lb broccoli over 3 chicken', '6: Pour remaining 24 oz alfredo over 3 chicken and 1 lb broccoli', '7: Top with Parmesan cheese', '8: Bake for 40 minutes']

ingredients: ['3 lb red potato (1.3 kg) quartered', 'water for boiling potatoes', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '5 tablespoons curry powder divided', '4 lb boneless skinless chicken breast (1.8 kg) cut into 3 inch (7.5 cm) cubes', '1 onion finely chopped', '10 oz frozen peas (285 g) 1 bag', '2 red bell peppers chopped', '1 lb green beans (455 g) ends trimmed', '4 carrots chopped', '1 jalepeno chopped', '1 tablespoon black pepper', '1 tablespoon salt', 'jasmine rice cooked for serving', 'fresh parsley chopped for serving']
instructions: ['1: In a bowl, add the potatoes, and fill the bowl with water until the potatoes are covered', '2:  Microwave on the potato setting for 10 minutes', '3:   The potatoes are done when you can pierce through them with a fork', '4:  Leave in water, and set aside until ready to use', '5: In a large pot over medium heat, add the olive oil and 3 tablespoons of curry powder, and mix thoroughly', '6: Add the cubed 4 lb boneless skinless chicken and the onions to the pot, and mix thoroughly until 4 lb boneless skinless chicken is cooked through, about 5 minutes', '7: Add the peas, red bell 2 red bell 1 tablespoon black peppers, 1 lb green beans, 4 carrots, and jalapeño 2 red bell 1 tablespoon black pepper, and mix thoroughly', '8: Add the reserved potatoes, along with 6 cups (1', '9: 4 L) of the water the potatoes were cooked in to the pot, and mix thoroughly', '10: Add the 1 tablespoon salt, 2 red bell 1 tablespoon black pepper, and the rest of the curry powder, and mix thoroughly', '11: Bring the curry to a boil, cover, and reduce heat to low', '12:  Simmer the curry for one hour on low heat', '13:  Remove from heat', '14: Serve with jasmine rice garnished with fresh parsley']

ingredients: ['Chili', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 medium yellow onion chopped', '1 large carrot peeled and chopped', '1 large red bell pepper chopped', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '2 teaspoons cumin', '2 tablespoons chili powder', '1 ½ teaspoons smoked paprika', '¼ teaspoon cinnamon', '4 cloves garlic minced', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '28 oz diced tomato (795 g) 1 can with juices', '15 oz black beans (425 g) 1 can rinsed and drained', '15 oz kidney bean (425 g) 1 can rinsed and drained', '15 oz pinto bean (425 g) 1 can rinsed and drained', '1 cup frozen corn (175 g)', '1 tablespoon lime juice', '2 cups vegetable broth (480 g)', 'Cornbread', '1 large egg', '1 ½ cups milk (360 mL)', '1 ½ cups yellow cornmeal (225 g)', '1 cup all-purpose flour (125 g)', '2 tablespoons brown sugar granulated', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '5 tablespoons unsalted butter melted', '1 jalapeño small chopped', 'Garnish', '1 jalapeño sliced', '2 tablespoons fresh cilantro chopped']
instructions: ['1: In a large Dutch oven, heat the 2 tablespoons olive oil over 1 medium heat until shimmering', '2:  Add the onion, carrot, and bell 1 large red bell pepper and stir', '3:  Cook for about 8 minutes, until the 2 cups vegetables are tender', '4: Add the 1 teaspoon dried oregano, 2 teaspoons cumin, 2 tablespoons chili powder, 1 ½ teaspoons smoked paprika, ¼ teaspoon cinnamon, 4 cloves garlic, salt, and 1 large red bell pepper', '5:  Stir and cook for about 2 minutes, until fragrant', '6: Add the tomatoes, 15 oz black beans, 15 oz kidney beans, 15 oz pinto beans, and 1 cup frozen 1 ½ cups yellow corn and stir to combine', '7: Add the 1 tablespoon lime juice and 2 cups vegetable broth and stir', '8:  Increase the heat to high and bring the 2 tablespoons chili to a boil, then reduce the heat to 1 medium-low and simmer uncovered for about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally', '9: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '10: In the meantime, prepare the 1 cup frozen 1 ½ cups yellow cornbread batter: In a 1 medium bowl, whisk the egg and 1 ½ cups milk until well-combined', '11: In a large bowl, combine the 1 cup frozen 1 ½ cups yellow 1 ½ cups yellow cornmeal, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 2 tablespoons brown sugar, salt, baking powder, and baking soda', '12: Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and whisk until smooth', '13:  Add the melted 5 tablespoons unsalted butter and stir to combine', '14:  Add the jalapeño and stir to incorporate', '15: Remove the 2 tablespoons chili from the heat', '16:  Pour the 1 cup frozen 1 ½ cups yellow cornbread batter over the 2 tablespoons chili and use a spatula to smooth the top and make sure it covers the 2 tablespoons chili completely', '17: Bake for 25-30 minutes, until the 1 cup frozen 1 ½ cups yellow cornbread is fully cooked and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean', '18:  Let cool for about 10 minutes', '19: Garnish the 1 cup frozen 1 ½ cups yellow cornbread with sliced jalapeño and chopped 2 tablespoons fresh cilantro']

ingredients: ['1 cup flour (125 g)', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper freshly ground', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '20 chicken wings or drumettes', '1 cup BBQ sauce (290 g)', '½ cup honey (170 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C)', '2: In a bowl, combine 1 cup flour, 1 teaspoon chili powder, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, 1 teaspoon black pepper, 1 teaspoon paprika, and 1 teaspoon garlic powder', '3:  Coat the 20 chicken wings in the 1 cup flour evenly, shaking off any excess', '4: Place the 1 cup floured 20 chicken wings on a parchment paper–lined baking sheet and spread them out in a single layer', '5: Bake for 45 minutes, flipping halfway through, until skin is crispy and golden brown', '6: Preheat oven to 500°F (250°C)', '7: In a separate bowl, combine the BBQ 1 cup BBQ sauce and the ½ cup honey', '8:  Stir the cooked 20 chicken wings in the 1 cup BBQ sauce and coat them evenly', '9: Place the coated 20 chicken wings back onto the baking sheet and spread them in a single layer', '10: Bake for 8 to 10 minutes, until 1 cup BBQ sauce is bubbly and caramelized', '11:  Cool, then serve']

ingredients: ['½ tablespoon olive oil', '2 chicken breasts sliced', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 tablespoon garlic minced', '4 oz asparagus (100 g)', '½ lemon zested', '½ lemon juiced', '3 tablespoons soy sauce', 'lemon zested to garnish', 'rice to serve']
instructions: ['1: Season the 2 chicken with the 1 teaspoon salt and ½ teaspoon pepper and fry with the ½ tablespoon olive oil', '2:  After a few minutes, add the 1 tablespoon garlic', '3: Fry the 2 chicken with the 1 tablespoon garlic for another few minutes, then add the 4 oz asparagus, lemon zest, and lemon juice', '4: Stir again, before mixing in the 3 tablespoons soy sauce', '5: Serve with rice and sprinkle with lemon zest on top']

ingredients: ['1 package strawberry cake mix', '½ cup strawberry (75 g) chopped', '½ cup cream cheese (115 g)', '⅓ cup oil (80 mL)', '2 eggs']
instructions: ['1: Combine 1 package strawberry cake mix, strawberries, ⅓ cup oil, and 2 eggs in a mixing bowl', '2: Add in ½ cup cream cheese and lightly mix allowing the ½ cup cream cheese to still be visible and not all the way mixed in', '3: Using an ice ½ cup cream scoop or your hand, form golf ball-sized balls of cookie dough and transfer to a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '4: Bake at 350°F (180°C) for 10-12 minutes']

ingredients: ['For the cookies', '2 cups brown sugar (440 g)', '1 cup vegetable oil (240 mL)', '2 eggs', '1 ½ cups canned pumpkin (340 g)', '3 cups flour (375 g)', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice', '1 tablespoon cinnamon', '1 cup chocolate chips (175 g)', 'For the filling', '8 oz cream cheese (225 g) softened', '½ cup butter (115 g) softened', '1 cup powdered sugar (160 g)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
instructions: ['1: Mix the 2 cups brown sugar and 1 cup vegetable oil', '2: Add 2 eggs and pumpkin, and mix', '3: Add 3 cups flour, baking soda, baking powder, 1 teaspoon salt, pumpkin pie spice, 1 tablespoon cinnamon, and mix', '4: Stir in 1 cup chocolate chips and scoop (or pipe) 2 tbsp at a time onto a baking sheet', '5: Beat the 8 oz cream cheese and ½ cup butter until smooth', '6: Mix in 1 cup powdered sugar and 1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '7: Spread onto half of the cooled For the cookies, and top with the rest of the For the cookies']

ingredients: ['Dough', '½ cup unsalted butter (115 g) melted', '2 cups whole milk (480 mL) warm to the touch', '½ cup granulated sugar (100 g)', '2 ¼ teaspoons active dry yeast', '5 cups flour (625 g) divided', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '2 teaspoons salt', 'Filling', '¾ cup butter (170 g) softened', '¾ cup light brown sugar (165 g)', '2 tablespoons ground cinnamon', 'Frosting', '4 oz cream cheese (55 g) softened', '2 tablespoons butter melted', '2 tablespoons whole milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 cup powdered sugar (120 g)']
instructions: ['1: Generously ½ cup unsalted ¾ cup 2 tablespoons butter two disposable foil pie/cake pans', '2: In a large bowl, whisk together warm 2 cups whole 2 tablespoons whole milk, melted ½ cup unsalted ¾ cup 2 tablespoons butter, and granulated sugar', '3:  The mixture should be just warm, registering between 100-110˚F (37-43˚C)', '4:  If it is hotter, allow to cool slightly', '5: Sprinkle the 2 ¼ teaspoons active dry yeast evenly over the warm mixture and let set for 1 minute', '6: Add 4 cups (500g) of all-purpose flour to the 2 cups whole 2 tablespoons whole milk mixture and mix with a wooden spoon until just combined', '7: Cover the bowl with a towel or plastic wrap and set in a warm place to rise for 1 hour', '8: After 1 hour, the dough should have nearly doubled in size', '9: Remove the towel and add an additional ¾ cup (95g) of flour, the 1 teaspoon baking powder, and 2 teaspoons salt', '10:  Stir well, then turn out onto a well-floured surface', '11: Knead the dough lightly, adding additional flour as necessary, until the dough just loses its stickiness and does not stick to the surface', '12: Roll the dough out into a large rectangle, about ½-inch (1 cm) thick', '13:  Fix corners to make sure they are sharp and even', '14: Spread the softened ½ cup unsalted ¾ cup 2 tablespoons butter evenly over the dough', '15: Sprinkle evenly with brown sugar and a generous sprinkling of 2 tablespoons ground cinnamon', '16: Press the mixture into the ½ cup unsalted ¾ cup 2 tablespoons butter', '17: Roll up the dough, forming a log, and pinch the seam closed', '18:  Place seam-side down', '19:  Trim off any unevenness on either end', '20: Cut the log in half, then divide each half into 7 evenly sized pieces', '21:  About 1½ inches (8cm) thick each', '22: Place 7 2 tablespoons ground cinnamon rolls in each cake pan, one in the center, six around the sides', '23:  Cover with plastic wrap and place in a warm place to rise for 30 minutes', '24: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '25: To prepare the frosting', '26:  In a medium-size mixing bowl, whisk together 4 oz cream cheese, ½ cup unsalted ¾ cup 2 tablespoons butter, whole 2 cups whole 2 tablespoons whole milk, 1 teaspoon vanilla, and powdered sugar, until smooth', '27: Remove plastic wrap', '28:  Bake the 2 tablespoons ground cinnamon rolls in a preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, until golden brown', '29: While still warm, drizzle evenly with frosting']

ingredients: ['½ cup peanut butter (120 g)', '3 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce', '2 tablespoons sesame oil', '2 tablespoons rice vinegar', '3 tablespoons water', '2 ½ teaspoons brown sugar', '1 clove garlic', '½ tablespoon fresh ginger minced', '8 oz spaghetti (240 g) cooked according to package instructions', '½ cup shredded carrot (55 g)', '½ cup shredded red cabbage (50 g)', '¾ cup edamame (115 g) shelled', 'peanut for garnish', '1 tablespoon black sesame seeds for garnish', 'scallion sliced for garnish']
instructions: ['1: In a blender, combine the peanut butter, 3 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce, 2 tablespoons 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon black sesame oil, 2 tablespoons rice vinegar, 3 tablespoons water, 2 ½ teaspoons brown sugar, 1 clove garlic, and ½ tablespoon fresh ginger and blend until smooth', '2: In a large bowl, add the 8 oz spaghetti, carrots, ½ cup shredded red cabbage, and ¾ cup edamame and pour over the peanut sauce', '3:  Use tongs to mix well, until sauce is fully incorporated', '4: Transfer to bowls and top with peanuts, 1 tablespoon black 2 tablespoons 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon black sesame seeds, and scallion']

ingredients: ['1 ½ tablespoons oil', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 small onion chopped', '2 cups crushed tomato (485 g)', '1 tablespoon worcestershire sauce', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '½ teaspoon cumin', '½ teaspoon paprika', '1 tomato diced', '¼ cup fresh parsley (10 g)', '3 eggs room temperature', 'parsley chopped to garnish', 'feta cheese to garnish']
instructions: ['1: Heat 1 ½ tablespoons oil over medium heat, add 3 cloves garlic and onions and cook until onions have softened and 3 cloves garlic is fragrant', '2: Add the 2 cups crushed 2 cups crushed 1 tomatoes, Worcestershire sauce, ½ teaspoon cayenne pepper, ½ teaspoon cumin and ½ teaspoon paprika', '3:  Stir to incorporate', '4: Add dice 2 cups crushed 1 tomato and cook until sauce has thickened', '5: Using a spoon, create wells for the 3 eggs, crack an egg into each well', '6: Cover and cook for another 5-8 minutes, until the egg whites are cooked but the yolk is still a bit runny', '7:  Garnish with parsley and feta cheese']

ingredients: ['1 lb shrimp (455 g) pelled and deveined', '2 tablespoons olive oil divided', '3 tablespoons McCormick® Zesty Spice Blend divided', '¾ cup grape tomatoes (150 g) halved lengthwise', '3 cups chicken broth (720 mL)', '½ cup heavy cream (120 mL)', '1 cup medium-grind polenta (160 g)', '½ cup grated parmesan cheese (60 g)', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '2 cups baby spinach (80 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, toss the 1 lb shrimp with 1 tablespoon olive oil and 2 tablespoons McCormick® Zesty Spice Blend until well coated', '2: Heat a 9-inch cast iron skillet over medium-high heat', '3:  Working in batches of 5–6, cook the 1 lb shrimp for 45 seconds on each side, until starting to turn golden and opaque', '4:  Transfer to a clean medium bowl and repeat with the remaining 1 lb shrimp', '5: Add the remaining tablespoon olive oil, remaining tablespoon McCormick® Zesty Spice Blend, and the ¾ cup grape tomatoes to the bowl with the 1 lb shrimp and toss to combine', '6: Remove the skillet from the heat and wipe out any crispy bits', '7:  Let the skillet cool for about 10 minutes', '8: Return the skillet to medium heat and add the 3 cups chicken broth and ½ cup heavy cream, whisking to combine', '9:  Cook until the liquid begins to steam, about 5 minutes', '10: Slowly pour in the 1 cup medium-grind polenta, whisking well to prevent clumps from forming', '11:  Cook for 12–15 minutes, until the 1 cup medium-grind polenta is thick and the grains are tender, whisking constantly to prevent the 1 cup medium-grind polenta at the bottom of the pan from burning or clumping', '12:  Remove the pan from the heat', '13: Whisk in the Parmesan cheese and butter, then fold in the 2 cups baby spinach', '14:  It will wilt from the residual heat', '15: Set an oven rack 3 inches from the broiler and turn the broiler on high', '16: Arrange the 1 lb shrimp on top of the 1 cup medium-grind polenta in the pan and top with the ¾ cup grape tomatoes and any remaining marinade from the bowl', '17: Broil the skillet for 3 minutes, checking occasionally to avoid burning, until the 1 cup medium-grind polenta is golden brown and the ¾ cup grape tomatoes soften']

ingredients: ['1 green apple cored and sliced', '1 red apple cored and sliced', '1 lemon sliced plus more for garnish', '⅔ cup simple syrup (225 g)', '1 cup rye whiskey (240 mL)', '1 cup apple cider (240 mL)', '1 bottle rosé wine', '1 ½ cups apple cider (360 mL) sparkling']
instructions: ['1: In a large pitcher, combine the 1 green apple, 1 red apple, 1 lemon, ⅔ cup simple syrup, 1 cup rye whiskey, apple cider, and 1 bottle rosé', '2:  Stir well, then chill until ready to serve, up to 2 days', '3: Immediately before serving, add the sparkling apple cider and stir to incorporate', '4: Pour into glasses and garnish with 1 lemon wedges']

ingredients: ['15 oz chickpeas (425 g) drained and rinsed 1 can', '15 oz hearts of palm (425 g) drained rinsed and cut into large chunks 1 can', '15 oz artichoke heart (425 g) drained and rinsed', '1 ½ cups panko breadcrumbs (75 g) divided', '¾ cup vegan mayonnaise (170 g) divided', '1 teaspoon dijon mustard', '2 teaspoons lemon juice divided', '¼ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '1 tablespoon old bay seasoning', 'oil for frying', '1 tablespoon sweet pickle relish', 'fresh dill to serve']
instructions: ['1: Add 15 oz chickpeas, 15 oz hearts of palm, and 15 oz artichoke 15 oz hearts to food processor', '2:  Pulse until mixture is chopped, yet still slightly chunky', '3: Transfer mixture to large mixing bowl and add 1 1 ½ ¾ cup (50 g) of bread crumbs, ¼ 1 ½ ¾ cup (55 g) vegan mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, 1 teaspoon 2 teaspoons lemon juice, salt, pepper, and Old Bay seasoning', '4:  Mix well', '5: Form the mixture into 6 1-inch (2 cm) thick patties', '6: Dip each patty in remaining bread crumbs', '7: Heat a pan of oil to 350˚F (180˚C)', '8:  Fry each patty for 3-6 minutes per side, until golden brown', '9: Transfer to paper towel-lined plate to absorb excess oil', '10: For tartar sauce, combine remaining vegan mayo, 1 tablespoon sweet pickle relish, and 1 teaspoon 2 teaspoons lemon juice in mixing bowl', '11: Top the patties with tartar sauce, fresh dill, and 2 teaspoons lemon juice']

ingredients: ['Dough', '¾ cup warm water (180 mL)', '1 ½ teaspoons instant yeast (1/2 packet)', '2 cups all-purpose flour (250 g) plus more for dusting', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'Filling', '3 links Italian sausage casings removed and sausage crumbled', '½ yellow onion diced', '½ teaspoon kosher salt plus a pinch', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '½ cup marinara sauce (130 g) plus more for dipping', '8 slices deli ham', '20 slices pepperoni', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese (100 g)', '1 large egg']
instructions: ['1: Make the dough: In a medium bowl, combine the warm water, 1 ½ teaspoons instant yeast, 2 cups all-purpose flour, and salt', '2:  Mix with a rubber spatula until well-combined and the dough comes together into a ball', '3: Lightly 2 cups all-purpose flour a clean surface, then turn the dough out and knead for 1-2 minutes to smooth and encourage gluten development', '4:  Shape the dough into a ball', '5: Drizzle the 1 tablespoon olive oil in a clean 1 large bowl', '6:  Add the dough ball and turn to coat in the oil', '7:  Cover with a kitchen towel and let rise for 1 hour, or until doubled in size', '8: Preheat the oven to 425˚F (220˚C)', '9:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '10: While the dough is rising, make the filling: Add the 3 links Italian sausage to a medium nonstick pan over medium heat and cook until no longer pink, 5-6 minutes', '11:  Add the ½ yellow onion, salt, and ½ teaspoon black 20 slices pepper and continue to cook until the 3 links Italian sausage is browned, about 5 minutes more', '12:  Remove from the heat and let cool', '13: After the dough has risen, turn it out onto a lightly 2 cups all-purpose floured surface', '14:  Divide the dough into 4 portions, then roll each into and round about ¼-inch (½ cm) thick', '15: Spread ¼ of the sauce over one half of each dough round, leaving a ½-inch (1 cm) border along the edge', '16:  Top each one with 2 slices of ham, 5 ½ teaspoon black 20 slices pepperoni, ¼ of the 3 links Italian sausage and ½ yellow onion mixture, and ¼ cup (25 G) of mozzarella cheese', '17: Lightly beat the egg with a pinch of salt', '18:  Brush the egg wash on the border of the dough, fold the other half over, and press the edges together', '19:  Starting from one corner, fold the dough over itself in a twist', '20:  Tuck the other corner underneath', '21:  Transfer the calzones to the prepared baking sheet', '22:  Brush lightly with egg wash and score the tops with a knife to allow steam to escape', '23: Bake for 15-17 minutes, until golden brown', '24:  Let cool for 5 minutes', '25: Serve the calzones with marinara sauce for dipping, if desired']

ingredients: ['Sweet ‘n’ Spicy BBQ Sauce', '1 cup ketchup (240 g)', '¼ cup yellow mustard (60 g)', '⅓ cup apricot preserve (80 g)', '½ cup chipotle pepper (50 g) canned and diced', '6 cloves garlic diced', '1 tablespoon ginger diced', '1 tablespoon worcestershire sauce', '2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', 'Protein', '2 lb pork shoulder (910 g) or pork butt', '1 lb sausage link (455 g)', '½ lb baby back ribs (225 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, mix all ingredients for the sweet ‘n’ spicy 1 tablespoon worcestershire sauce', '2: In a slow cooker, place all protein and pour 1 tablespoon worcestershire sauce over until evenly coated', '3: On high, cook for 4 hours, or on low for 8 hours', '4: Portion any meat with a side of veggies and the spicy 1 tablespoon worcestershire sauce']

ingredients: ['¾ cup lukewarm water (180 mL)', '3 ½ teaspoons active dry yeast', '2 large eggs', '½ cup whole milk (120 mL)', '3 tablespoons unsalted butter melted', '¼ cup granulated sugar (50 g) plus 2 tablespoons', '4 cups bread flour (500 g) plus more for dusting', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '8 cups canola oil (1.9 L) for frying plus more for greasing', 'powdered sugar for topping']
instructions: ['1: Pour the water into a medium bowl or 2 large liquid measuring cup and sprinkle the yeast over the top', '2:  Let stand for about 5 minutes, until foamy', '3: Add the eggs, milk, melted 3 tablespoons unsalted butter, and sugar, and whisk to combine', '4: In a 2 large bowl, whisk together the 4 cups bread flour and ½ teaspoon kosher salt', '5: Pour the wet ingredients into the 3 ½ teaspoons active dry ingredients, stirring with a flexible spatula to form a shaggy dough', '6:  Turn the dough out onto a clean surface and use your hands to knead until it comes together in a smooth ball, about 2 minutes', '7: Grease a clean 2 large bowl with 8 cups canola oil', '8:  Transfer the dough to the greased bowl and cover tightly with plastic wrap', '9:  Let the dough rise in a warm place until doubled in size, about 1 hour', '10: Punch the dough down with your fist, then turn it out onto a lightly 4 cups bread floured surface', '11: Roll the dough into a 2 large rectangle, about ¼ inch (6 mm) thick', '12:  With a sharp knife, cut the dough into 2-inch (5 cm) squares, then transfer the squares to a baking sheet lined with parchment paper', '13: Heat the 8 cups canola oil in a 2 large pot over medium-high heat until it reaches 350˚F (180˚C)', '14: Lower the dough squares, 3-4 at a time, into the hot oil', '15:  As soon as the beignets puff up, use tongs or a kitchen spider to gently flip them over', '16:  Fry until golden brown on both sides, flipping as needed, 2-3 minutes more', '17:  Transfer the beignets to a wire rack to drain', '18: Dust the beignets with powdered sugar and serve warm']

ingredients: ['3 large eggs', '8 oz bacon (225 g)', '1 medium onion', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '5 cups rice (1 kg) cooked', 'salt to taste', 'black pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon sugar', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', 'Garnish', 'green onion chopped as desired']
instructions: ['1: Beat three 3 large eggs in an empty bowl and add a bit of salt until well-combined', '2: Cut 8 oz bacon into 1-inch (2 ½ cm) pieces and finely dice the onion', '3: Heat 1 tablespoon vegetable oil in either a wok or nonstick frying pan over 1 medium heat and add beaten 3 large eggs', '4:  Gently scramble the 3 large eggs; when they are almost done, remove from wok and set aside', '5: Add 8 oz bacon to the wok and allow it to render down and become crisp', '6:  Once the 8 oz bacon is done, take it out of the wok and set aside, along with the scrambled 3 large eggs', '7: Add the diced onion to the wok and stir-fry until translucent', '8:  Then add the cooked 5 cups rice, make sure the 5 cups rice is fluffed and cooled, and stir-fry for 2 to 5 minutes', '9:  Use spatula to break up any clumps', '10: Add the salt, black pepper, 1 teaspoon sugar, and 2 tablespoons soy sauce', '11:  Stir for another minute or so', '12: Once there is steam coming off the 5 cups rice and it is completely heated through, add scrambled 3 large eggs and cooked 8 oz bacon', '13: Sprinkle with green onion, as desired']

ingredients: ['Panini', '4 slices sourdough bread or crusty artisan bread', '4 tablespoons pesto', '3 oz brie cheese (90 g) sliced', '1 large peach pitted and thinly sliced', '1 ½ teaspoons aged balsamic vinegar divided', '4 tablespoons unsalted butter room temperature', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', 'Arugula Peach Salad', '1 large peach pitted and cut into ½-inch (1.24 cm) wedges', '8 oz arugula (225 g)', 'olive oil for drizzling', 'aged balsamic vinegar for drizzling']
instructions: ['1: Make the panini: Heat a panini press to high heat', '2: Spread 1 tablespoon of 4 tablespoons pesto on each slice of bread', '3:  Layer 3–4 Brie 4 slices, 4–5 peach 4 slices, and a drizzle of aged balsamic on 2 4 slices of bread', '4:  Place the other 4 slices of bread, 4 tablespoons pesto-side down, on top', '5: Spread 1 tablespoon of 4 tablespoons unsalted butter on one side of each sandwich', '6: Grease the panini press lightly with nonstick spray', '7:  Place a sandwich on the panini press, 4 tablespoons unsalted buttered-side down', '8:  Butter the top slice bread, then close the panini press', '9:  Cook until the cheese is melted, 2–3 minutes', '10:  Remove the panini from the press and repeat with the remaining sandwich', '11: Make the salad: Arrange the peach wedges on the panini press and cook until grill marks appear, 2–3 minutes', '12:  Remove from the press', '13: In a medium bowl, drizzle the 8 oz arugula with olive oil and aged balsamic vinegar', '14:  Toss well', '15:  Add the grilled peaches', '16: Serve the panini with the salad alongside']

ingredients: ['1 large sweet potato cubed', '1 lb brussels sprouts (455 g) halved', '2 apples sliced', '4 skins on chicken thigh', '4 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 tablespoon fresh rosemary', '2 tablespoons fresh thyme']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2: On a baking sheet, toss the 1 large sweet potato, Brussels sprouts, and sliced 2 apples so they’re evenly distributed', '3: Lay the 4 skins on chicken thighs on top', '4: Drizzle the 4 tablespoons olive oil over the 4 skins on chicken, fruit, and veggies, and season with salt and pepper', '5: Sprinkle with the 3 cloves garlic, 1 tablespoon fresh rosemary, and 2 tablespoons fresh thyme', '6: Turn the 4 skins on chicken over and season on the other side, then return to skin-side up', '7: Bake for 30 minutes, then broil for 5 - 10 minutes so the 4 skins on chicken skin gets golden brown and crispy']

ingredients: ['2 lb yukon gold potato (905 g) peeled', '½ yellow onion', '3 eggs', '2 tablespoons garlic minced', '1 tablespoon cornstarch', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '½ cup cheddar cheese (55 g) grated', '½ cup monterey jack cheese (55 g) grated', '⅓ cup breadcrumb meal (30 g)', '¼ cup olive oil (78 mL) for frying', '1 sour cream to serve', '1 green onion chopped to serve']
instructions: ['1: Using a box grater, shred the 2 lb yukon gold potatoes into a towel in a bowl and squeeze out as much liquid as possible', '2: Set aside and grate the ½ yellow 1 1 green onion', '3: Add the grated 2 lb yukon gold potatoes and grated ½ yellow 1 1 green onion ½ yellow 1 1 green onion to a large bowl', '4:  Add in the 3 eggs, 2 tablespoons garlic, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, 1 teaspoon salt, ½ teaspoon pepper, cheddar cheese, monterey jack, and breadcrumbs and mix until combined', '5: Take ½ cup of the 2 lb yukon gold potato mixture and form into a thin patty, about ⅓-inch thick', '6: Heat cooking oil over medium-high heat and place 2 lb yukon gold potato patty into the skillet', '7:  Cook for 3-5 minutes on each side, or until golden brown and crispy on the outside', '8:  Repeat with remaining patties', '9: Serve with 1 sour cream and 1 green ½ yellow 1 1 green onions on top, and enjoy!']

ingredients: ['4 oz cream cheese (115 g)', '¼ cup hot sauce (60 mL)', '2 ½ cups chicken (350 g) cooked', '1 cup shredded monterey jack cheese (100 g)', '1 cup mozzarella cheese (100 g)', '8 oz refrigerated crescent dinner roll (225 g) 2 cans']
instructions: ['1: In a bowl, mix 4 oz cream cheese and ¼ cup hot sauce until smooth', '2: Mix in 2 ½ cups chicken and Monterey Jack cheese', '3: Unroll 8 oz refrigerated crescent dinner roll (225 g) 2 cans of dough, separate into triangles', '4:  On a large cookie sheet, arrange the triangles in ring, dough should overlap, leaving around 5 inches (12 ¾ cm) in the center', '5: Layer half of the Mozzarella on each triangle closest to the ring', '6: Spoon mixture on top of the Mozzarella', '7:  Top with the rest of the Mozzarella', '8: Bring the top of the triangle over the filling and tuck the edges under the bottom layer of dough', '9:  Repeat around the ring until the entire filling is enclosed', '10: Bake at 375˚F (190˚C) for 35 minutes or until the dough is golden brown', '11: Cool 5 to 10 minutes before cutting into serving slices', '12:  Serve with choice dressing']

ingredients: ['Mushroom Burger', '1 slice american cheese', '1 slice swiss cheese', '2 portobello mushrooms de-stemmed', '½ cup bread crumbs (60 g)', '1 egg beaten', '½ cup flour (60 g)', 'vegetable oil for deep frying', 'Sauce', '2 tablespoons mayonnaise', '1 tablespoon ketchup', '1 teaspoon worcestershire sauce', '1 teaspoon garlic salt', '¼ tablespoon hot chili sauce', 'Garnish', 'lettuce', 'tomato sliced', 'onion sliced', 'pickle sliced optional', 'burger bun']
instructions: ['1: Line a plate with two paper towels', '2:  Place two small 2 portobello mushroom caps on the paper towels, then cover with two more paper towels', '3:  Top with another plate', '4: Meanwhile, in a small bowl, mix together 2 tablespoons mayonnaise, 1 tablespoon ketchup, 1 teaspoon worcestershire sauce, 1 teaspoon garlic salt, and ¼ tablespoon hot chili sauce', '5: Place a slice of Swiss cheese down on a counter top, then place a slice of American cheese on top, folding the corners of the American cheese in towards the center', '6:  Do the same with Swiss cheese, forming a ball shape', '7: Place the cheese ball on one mushroom cap and then sandwich the other on top of it, pressing down to make the mushroom edges touch', '8:  Take a piece of clear plastic wrap and wrap it around the mushroom burger, twisting the sides like a piece of candy to release all of the air', '9:  Tuck the plastic wrap under the mushroom and refrigerate for 10-15 minutes', '10: Put the 1 egg, ½ cup flour, and ½ cup bread crumbs into 3 separate bowls', '11: Remove plastic and coat mushroom burger in ½ cup flour, 1 egg, then ½ cup bread crumbs', '12:  Dip in 1 egg wash and ½ cup bread crumbs one more time', '13: Heat vegetable oil in a large pan until it is 375ºF (190ºC) and fry mushroom burger for 1-2 minutes or until golden brown', '14: Remove burger onto paper towel to drain excess oil and let cool 1-2 minutes', '15: Assemble burger, spread special sauce on buns', '16: Nutrition  Calories: 5830 Fat: 540 grams  Carbs: 215 grams Fiber: 15 grams  Sugars: 46 grams  Protein: 43 grams']

ingredients: ['2 cups old fashioned rolled oat (200 g) pulsed in food processor x10', '2 cups flour (250 g)', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '2 teaspoons cinnamon', '½ teaspoon nutmeg', '1 cup unsalted butter (230 g) room temperature and softened', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '1 cup brown sugar (220 g)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 eggs', '½ cup raisin (75 g)', 'Icing', '2 cups powdered sugar (220 g)', '1 ½ tablespoons milk', '1 tablespoon warm water']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C)Pulse oats in a food processor or blender 10 times', '2: Add 2 cups old fashioned rolled oat (200 g) pulsed oats, 2 cups flour, ½ teaspoon baking powder, 2 teaspoons cinnamon, and ½ teaspoon nutmeg into a bowl', '3: In a large bowl, beat softened 1 cup unsalted butter with a hand mixer until creamy, add 1 cup brown and white ½ cup 1 cup 1 cup brown 2 cups 2 cups powdered sugars, then beat until fluffy', '4:  Next beat in 1 teaspoon vanilla and 2 eggs 1 at a time', '5: Pour the dry ingredients into the wet ingredients ⅓ at a time until it’s gone and dough forms', '6: Fold in raisins or chocolate chunks', '7: Take 1 1 ½ 1 tablespoon of dough and roll it into a ball', '8:  Then flatten into a cookie shape and put on a well-greased parchment-lined ½ teaspoon baking sheet', '9: Bake 12-15 minutes', '10:  (Top rack = no 1 cup brown bottoms, bottom rack = 1 cup browned bottoms and a little more crispy)', '11: Cool completely and make the icing in the meantime', '12:  Combine 2 cups powdered ½ cup 1 cup 1 cup brown 2 cups 2 cups powdered sugar, 1 ½ 1 ½ 1 tablespoons milk, and warm water in a shallow bowl', '13:  Once the cookies have cooled, dip into the icing or dab icing on with a pastry brush', '14:  Dry for 10 minutes or until icing has hardened']

ingredients: ['9 oz tortilla chips (255 g)', '1 lb ground beef (455 g) cooked and drained', '½ cup BBQ sauce (145 g)', '2 cups cheddar cheese (200 g)', '1 cup mozzarella cheese (100 g)', '½ tomato diced', '½ red onion sliced thinly', '8 strips bacon cooked and crumbled', '½ cup fresh parsley (20 g) chopped']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C)', '2: In a large pan or skillet, lay down half of the 9 oz tortilla chips, followed by half of the 1 lb ground beef, bbq ½ cup BBQ sauce, 2 cups cheddar, 1 cup mozzarella, ½ tomato, ½ red onion, 8 strips bacon, and ½ cup fresh parsley', '3:  Repeat with the remaining half of the ingredients, followed by a drizzle of BBQ ½ cup BBQ sauce on top', '4: Bake for 15 minutes, until cheese is melted']

ingredients: ['3 premade frozen pie crusts thawed', 'Broccoli Cheddar', '2 eggs', '⅓ cup milk (80 mL)', '¼ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '⅔ cup shredded cheddar cheese (65 g)', '¾ cup small broccoli floret (130 g)', 'Pepper and Onion', '2 eggs', '⅓ cup milk (80 mL)', '⅔ cup shredded mozzarella cheese (65 g)', '¼ cup bell pepper (25 g) cooked', '¼ cup onion (35 g) cooked', 'Tomato and Goat Cheese', '2 eggs', '⅓ cup milk (80 mL)', '¼ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '⅓ cup shredded mozzarella cheese (35 g)', '⅓ cup crumbled goat cheese (50 g)', '⅓ cup tomato (65 g) chopped']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375ºF (190ºC), and lightly grease a 12-cup nonstick muffin tin', '2: Cut the 3 premade frozen pie crusts into 12 circles, 4½ inches (12 cm) in diameter', '3: Press 3 premade frozen pie crust circles into the muffin tin cups', '4: Bake for 10 minutes', '5: Mix the ingredients for the broccoli cheddar', '6: Mix the ingredients for the onion and pepper', '7: Mix the ingredients for the tomato and goat cheese', '8: Pour each filling over their own row of 4 crusts', '9: Bake for 20-30 minutes, or until filling is fully cooked and no longer runny', '10: After removing from the oven, run a butter knife or thin spatula around each cup to prevent crust from sticking to the sides', '11: Eat while still warm, or cool, then freeze in an airtight container for up to 1 month', '12:  To reheat, microwave for 60-90 seconds']

ingredients: ['5 granny smith apples sliced', '2 cans cinnamon roll', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 tablespoon cornstarch']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C) and spray a pie dish with nonstick oil', '2: Peel and cut the 5 granny smith apples into thin slices and place in a bowl', '3: Add ½ cup sugar, cinnamon and 1 tablespoon cornstarch to 5 granny smith apples and stir', '4: Cut each cinnamon roll in half and roll out with flour until thin', '5: Layer the bottom of the pie dish with the flattened cinnamon rolls to create a bottom crust', '6: Add the 5 granny smith apples and layer the rest of the rolls on top to create a closed crust, pinch any holes together with your fingers', '7: Cover with foil and bake for 35 minutes', '8: Remove the foil and bake for another 10 minutes uncovered', '9: Allow the pie to cool and drizzle with icing']

ingredients: ['1 ½ lb sirloin steak (680 g) cut into 1-inch (2 cm) cubes', 'kosher salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'oil to taste', '1 medium white onion', '1 lb mushroom (455 g) sliced', '1 cup beef broth (240 mL)', '½ cup sour cream (115 g)', '1 large zucchini', 'thinly sliced chive for garnish']
instructions: ['1: In a 1 large bowl, season the 1 ½ lb sirloin liberally with kosher salt and pepper', '2:  Toss to coat', '3: Heat a bit of oil in a 1 large pot over 1 medium-high heat until shimmering', '4:  Place half of the cubed meat in the pan, spacing out to avoid overcrowding', '5:  Sear on each side for 1 minute, until well-browned', '6:  Transfer the seared 1 cup beef to a bowl and repeat with the remaining meat', '7: Reduce the heat to 1 medium', '8:  Add the onion, mushrooms, and a pinch of kosher salt', '9:  Sauté until all of moisture has been release from the mushrooms and evaporated and the onions have caramelized, about 12 minutes', '10: Add the 1 cup beef broth and scrape up any browned bits from the bottom of the pan', '11: Once the liquid has thickened slightly, mix a few tablespoons of the hot broth with the ½ cup sour cream in a small bowl--this will temper the ½ cup sour cream and keep it from curdling', '12:  Add the ½ cup sour cream mixture to the broth and mix until incorporated', '13: Once the liquid has thickened slightly, add the seasoned 1 ½ lb sirloin and any juices that have collected in the bowl', '14: Stir the the contents of the pot until the meat has cooked through, about 5 minutes', '15: Use a vegetable peeler to slice the zucchini into ribbons', '16: Heat a drizzle of oil in a 1 medium pan over 1 medium-high heat', '17: Add the zucchini ribbons and a pinch of kosher salt and toss until the zucchini has wilted slightly, about 1 minute', '18:  Immediately transfer the zucchini to serving dishes to stop cooking', '19: Top the zucchini with the stroganoff and a sprinkle of chives']

ingredients: ['2 cans black beans drained and rinsed', '2 cans chickpeas drained and rinsed', '½ red onion chopped', '20 cherry tomatoes halved', '½ cup fresh parsley (20 g) chopped', '½ cup fresh mint (15 g) chopped', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL)', '¼ cup apple cider vinegar (60 mL)', '¼ cup lemon juice (60 mL)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'feta cheese crumbled to taste']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, combine the 2 cans chickpeas, 2 cans black beans, ½ red onion, 20 cherry tomatoes, fresh parsley, and fresh mint', '2: In a small bowl, mix together ¼ cup olive oil, ¼ cup apple cider vinegar, ¼ cup lemon juice, salt, and pepper', '3: Pour over the salad and toss to coat', '4: Top with crumbled feta cheese']

ingredients: ['Filling', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '1 leek white and light green parts only chopped', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 ½ cups butternut squash (300 g) cut into 1/2 (1.2 cm)', '½ cup carrot (60 g) diced', '½ cup gold potato (100 g) cut into 1/2 (1.2 cm) cubes', '½ teaspoon kosher salt plus more to taste', '¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper plus more to taste', '1 ½ cups chicken broth (360 mL)', '½ cup brussels sprouts (50 g)', '1 can Campbell’s® Cream of Chicken Soup', '1 tablespoon fresh thyme chopped', '½ tablespoon fresh sage chopped', '¼ cup heavy cream (60 mL)', '1 ½ tablespoons parmesan cheese finely grated', '1 cup cooked chicken (200 g) cut into 1/2 in cubes', 'Crust', '1 sheet puff pastry thawed', '1 large egg', '1 teaspoon water']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Melt the 2 tablespoons unsalted 1 ½ cups butter in a 10-inch (25 cm) cast iron skillet over medium heat', '3:  Add the 1 leek and 2 cloves garlic, and sauté for 5 minutes, or until the 1 leek is tender and just beginning to brown', '4: Add the 2 tablespoons unsalted 1 ½ cups 1 ½ cups butternut squash, carrots, potatoes, ½ teaspoon kosher salt, and ¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '5:  Sauté for 1–2 minutes, until ½ teaspoon kosher salt is dissolved and everything is combined', '6: Pour in the chicken broth and simmer for 8–10 minutes, or until the vegetables are starting to soften and the liquid has reduced by half', '7:  Stir in the Brussels sprouts', '8: Add the Campbell’s® Cream of Chicken Soup, 1 tablespoon fresh thyme, ½ tablespoon fresh sage, ¼ cup heavy cream, Parmesan cheese, and chicken, and stir to incorporate', '9:  Bring to a simmer', '10:  Season with more ½ teaspoon kosher salt and ¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper if desired, then remove the pan from the heat', '11: Roll the 1 sheet puff pastry out slightly if needed to fit over the pan, then place over the skillet', '12:  Using a sharp knife, trim off any overhanging edges and reserve the excess dough', '13: Tuck the pastry down around the inner edge of the skillet', '14:  Using a fork, press gently around the edges of the pastry to seal and crimp', '15:  Cut 4 vent holes in the center of the crust to release steam', '16: Cut out 4 leaf shapes from the excess dough', '17: In a small bowl, whisk together the 1 large egg and 1 teaspoon water, then brush evenly over the crust', '18:  Arrange the leaves on top and brush with the 1 large egg wash', '19: Bake the pot pie for 30–35 minutes, or until the pastry is golden brown and the filling is bubbling', '20:  Remove from the oven and let rest for 10 minutes before serving']

ingredients: ['Marinade', '½ cup soy sauce (120 g)', '2 tablespoons rice vinegar', '2 tablespoons sesame oil', '2 tablespoons red pepper powder', '8 cloves garlic minced', '1 tablespoon grated ginger', '1 cup onion (150 g)', '3 lb baby back ribs (1.3 kg)', 'Glaze', '¼ cup honey (85 g)', 'Garnish', 'sesame seed for garnish', 'scallion chopped for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Combine marinade ingredients in a bowl', '2: Pour marinade over 3 lb baby back ribs and let them marinate for at least four hours', '3: After marinating, place 3 lb baby back ribs on baking dish', '4:  Reserve the marinade for later', '5: Bake 3 lb baby back ribs at 325°F (160°C) for two and a half to three hours', '6: Pour the leftover marinade into a saucepan, add the ¼ cup honey, and bring to a boil to form a glaze', '7:  Set aside', '8: After two and half to three hours, remove the 3 lb baby back ribs from the oven', '9:  Pour the glaze over the 3 lb baby back ribs and broil for 5 to 10 minutes', '10: Cut up the 3 lb baby back ribs, sprinkle sesame seeds over, and sesame seed for scallion chopped for garnish with scallions']

ingredients: ['Frozen Yogurt', '2 cups greek yogurt (570 g)', '2 tablespoons honey', '1 stalk vanilla bean scraped', 'Chocolate Chip Cookies', '2 cups rolled oats (200 g) or 1 1/2 cups (150 grams) oat flour', '½ cup coconut oil (100 g) melted', '¼ cup honey (85 g)', '2 teaspoons vanilla', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 pinch salt', '½ cup dark chocolate chips (90 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C', '2: )Combine the Greek yogurt, honey, and vanilla in a bowl', '3:  Transfer to a freezer-safe container and freeze for 2 hours, or until consistency is thick and creamy but still scoopable', '4: Add the 2 cups rolled oats to a bowl of a food processor and pulse until it becomes a flour-like consistency', '5: Combine ½ cup coconut oil, honey, vanilla, and 1 egg in a large bowl', '6:  Add in oats, 1 teaspoon baking soda, and a 1 pinch of salt and mix until thoroughly incorporated', '7:  Fold in ½ cup dark chocolate chips', '8: Using an ice cream scoop or a tablespoon, form 8 balls of cookie dough and place onto a 1 teaspoon baking sheet lined with parchment paper', '9: Using your hands or the back of a spoon, press down firmly on each ball to form a cookie shape', '10:  Bake for 8-10 minutes, or until golden brown on the edges', '11: Let cool for about 10 minutes', '12:  While the cookies are cooling, you may want to remove ice cream from the freezer and let sit out to soften', '13: Flip cookies over so the flat sides are facing up', '14:  Add one scoop of frozen yogurt to 4 of the cookies', '15:  Use the remaining 4 cookies to form sandwiches by placing on top of the ice cream scoop and pressing down very gently to slowly spread out the ice cream', '16:  Feel free to use a spoon to smooth out the ice cream instead', '17: Freeze for 1 hour, or to your liking']

ingredients: ['2 ½ tablespoons olive oil', '2 cloves garlic minced', '½ teaspoon onion powder', '½ teaspoon cumin', '½ teaspoon paprika', '1 cup butternut squash (205 g) peeled diced', '1 cup mushroom (75 g) diced', '1 cup brussel sprout (100 g) halved', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '⅓ cup tahini (75 g)', '1 tablespoon maple syrup', '1 tablespoon apple cider', '1 tablespoon fresh orange juice', '2 tablespoons water', '3 cups quinoa (510 g) cooked', '2 cups kale (135 g)', '1 cup lentils (200 g) cooked', '½ cup red cabbage (50 g) diced', '½ cup beet (100 g) cooked diced', '½ cup walnut (50 g)', '¼ cup fresh parsley (10 g) minced']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: In a small bowl, combine the 2 ½ tablespoons olive oil, 2 cloves garlic, ½ teaspoon onion powder, ½ teaspoon cumin and ½ teaspoon paprika', '3:  Mix well', '4: Arrange the 1 cup butternut squash, mushrooms and Brussels sprouts in separate piles on a baking sheet', '5: Season the vegetables with salt and pepper and drizzle with the seasoned oil', '6:  Mix well with your hands', '7: Bake for about 20-25 minutes, until tender', '8: To make the dressing, combine the ⅓ cup tahini, 1 tablespoon maple syrup, 1 tablespoon apple cider, 1 tablespoon fresh orange juice, 2 tablespoons water, and a pinch of salt and pepper in a small bowl', '9:  Mix well with a fork', '10: Combine the 3 cups quinoa, 2 cups kale, 1 cup butternut squash, mushrooms, brussels sprouts, 1 cup lentils, ½ cup red cabbage, beets, and walnuts in a large bowl and top with the ⅓ cup tahini dressing and ¼ cup fresh parsley', '11: Nutrition  Calories: 1855 Fat: 84 grams  Carbs: 231 grams Fiber: 36 grams  Sugars: 20 grams  Protein: 64 grams']

ingredients: ['4 oz brewed espresso (115 mL)', '1 cup whole milk (240 mL)', '¼ teaspoon peppermint extract', '1 tablespoon Vanilla Simple Syrup', 'chocolate syrup for topping', 'chocolate shaving for topping ', '1 sprig of fresh mint for garnish', 'Special Equipment', 'espresso machine', 'milk frother']
instructions: ['1: Add the espresso to a 12-ounce mug', '2: In a milk frother, combine the milk ¼ teaspoon peppermint extract, and vanilla simple syrup and froth', '3:  Pour into the mug with the espresso', '4: Top with chocolate syrup, chocolate shavings, and the mint 1 sprig', '5: Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['1 onion diced', '1 jalapeño diced', '3 cloves garlic chopped', '3 chicken breasts', '1 can black beans drained', '1 can corn drained', '1 can diced tomato', '1 can red enchilada sauce', '4 cups chicken stock (945 mL)', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon ground pepper', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 pack large flour tortilla', 'vegetable oil for frying', 'Toppings (optional)', 'fresh cilantro', 'monterey jack cheese', 'lime wedged', 'avocado sliced']
instructions: ['1: Place diced 1 onion, jalapeno and 3 cloves garlic in the bottom of a slow cooker', '2: Place the chicken breasts on top of the veggies', '3: Add all canned ingredients and seasonings to the chicken in the slow cooker', '4:  Top with the chicken stock', '5: Set slow cooker to high and cook for 3 hours', '6: Fill a 1 pack large pot ⅔ full with vegetable oil and heat until it reaches 350°F (180°C)', '7: Carefully place the tortilla on top of the oil and gently press the tortilla down with a ladle', '8:  Fry tortilla until golden brown', '9:  Drain on a cooling rack', '10: When soup is done, remove chicken and dice it on a cutting board', '11:   Return diced chicken to the soup', '12: Place fried tortilla bowl in a soup bowl and fill it with the soup', '13: Top it off with monterey jack cheese, avocado, fresh cilantro and garnish with a lime wedge', '14: Enjoy!!']

ingredients: ['½ avocado', 'kosher salt to taste', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '1 slice multigrain toast', '6 slices smoked salmon', '1 teaspoon caper', '1 tablespoon fresh dill']
instructions: ['1: Scoop the ½ avocado into a medium bowl', '2:  Season with kosher salt and add the 1 teaspoon lemon juice', '3:  Mash until smooth', '4: Spread the ½ avocado on the 1 6 slice of toast', '5:  Top with the 6 slices smoked salmon, capers, and 1 tablespoon fresh dill']

ingredients: ['3 lb center-cut beef tenderloin (1 ½ kg)', 'kosher salt to taste', 'black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons canola oil', '¼ cup english mustard (60 g)', '1 tablespoon butter', '2 shallots minced', '2 lb cremini mushroom (910 g) minced', '5 cloves garlic minced', '½ lb prosciutto (225 g) thinly sliced or ham', '1 sheet puff pastry', '2 eggs beaten']
instructions: ['1: Let the 3 lb center-cut beef tenderloin come to room temperature', '2:  Season with kosher salt and black pepper on all sides', '3: Add 2 tablespoons canola oil to a large pan on high heat', '4:  Once the oil is hot, add the tenderloin', '5:  Without moving the tenderloin, cook until a dark brown crust forms, about 3 minutes per side', '6:  Repeat searing on all sides, including the tenderloin ends', '7: Remove the tenderloin from the pan and transfer to a cutting board or wire rack and remove ties', '8: Brush the ¼ cup english mustard on all sides of the meat while it’s still warm', '9:  Let the meat rest for while making the duxelle (mushrooms cooked and reduced until dry)', '10: To the same pan, add the 1 tablespoon butter, 2 lb cremini mushrooms, 2 shallots 2 lb cremini 2 lb cremini mushroom (910 g) 5 cloves 5 cloves garlic minced shallot, and 2 shallots 2 lb cremini 2 lb cremini mushroom (910 g) 5 cloves 5 cloves garlic minced 5 cloves garlic over medium-high heat', '11:  Cook, stirring occasionally, until all the liquid evaporates and the 2 lb cremini mushroom mixture becomes a thick 25-30 minutes, dry-like paste', '12:  Season with salt and black pepper to taste', '13: Remove the 2 lb cremini mushrooms from the pan and let cool completely', '14: Place a large layer of overlapping 1 sheets of plastic wrap on your work surface that is twice the length and width of the tenderloin', '15: Lay overlapping strips of ½ lb prosciutto on the plastic into an even square layer', '16: Spread a layer of the 2 lb cremini mushrooms evenly over the ½ lb prosciutto', '17: Tightly and evenly wrap the tenderloin with the ½ lb prosciutto, using the plastic wrap to wrap it even tighter and seal ends', '18:  Tie the ends of the plastic wrap together to hold the Wellington’s shape', '19:  Place in the refrigerator for 15 minutes', '20: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '21: Place a new layer of plastic wrap on the work surface and lay a 1 sheet of puff pastry over it', '22:  Unwrap the ½ lb prosciutto-wrapped 3 lb center-cut beef tenderloin onto the puff pastry, wrapping until the ends meet', '23:  Cut off any extra puff pastry, making sure there is no overlap', '24: Wrap the puff pastry in plastic wrap, tying the ends together to form a log shape', '25:  Place in the refrigerator for 15 minutes', '26: Place the 3 lb center-cut beef Wellington on a greased, parchment paper-lined baking 1 sheet', '27:  Brush the surface with the beaten 2 eggs', '28:  With a fork, score a decorative design onto the surface of the puff pastry', '29: Decorate with additional pastry (optional)', '30:  Sprinkle with kosher salt', '31: Bake for 40 minutes or until the puff pastry is a dark golden brown and the internal temperature of the 3 lb center-cut beef is 135°F (57°C) for medium-rare']

ingredients: ['½ spaghetti squash halved vertically and seeded', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 cloves garlic minced', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '4 oz shrimp (115 g) peeled deveined', '¾ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 lemon zested', '1 lemon juiced', '2 tablespoons fresh parsley chopped']
instructions: ['1: Microwave ½ spaghetti squash on high until tender, about 10 minutes', '2:  Shred the flesh of the ½ spaghetti squash and discard the skin', '3: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a pan over medium heat', '4:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the 2 cloves garlic, ½ teaspoon red ½ teaspoon red ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper flakes, and 4 oz shrimp, and cook until 4 oz shrimp are pink and start to curl, about 2 minutes', '5: Add the lemon zest, ¾ teaspoon salt, ½ teaspoon red ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper, and lemon juice, and cook for 1 minute', '6: Remove from heat, add 2 tablespoons fresh parsley and shredded ½ spaghetti squash, and stir to combine']

ingredients: ['Marinade', '¾ cup plain yogurt (185 g)', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 tablespoon ginger', '1 tablespoon Schwartz® garlic granules', '1 tablespoon garam masala', '½ teaspoon cayenne', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken thighs (680 g)', 'Rice', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 yellow onion thinly sliced', '2 bay leaves', '1 ½ cups basmati rice (300 g) rinsed', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon saffron stirred into 1 tablespoon hot water (optional)', '1 cup water (240 mL)', 'Garnishes', 'fresh cilantro', 'fresh mint', 'jalapeño thinly sliced']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, mix together the ¾ cup plain yogurt, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 1 tablespoon ginger, 1 tablespoon Schwartz® garlic granules, 1 tablespoon garam masala, ½ teaspoon cayenne, 1 teaspoon turmeric, and salt', '2:  Add the 1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken thighs and toss to coat', '3: On the Instant Pot Sauté setting, melt the 2 tablespoons butter', '4:  Add the 1 yellow onion and cook until caramelized, stirring occasionally, 15–17 minutes', '5:  Remove half the 1 yellow onion and set aside for garnish', '6:  Push the CANCEL button to turn off Sauté mode', '7: Add the 1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken and the marinade to the Instant Pot, then toss to combine with the 1 yellow onions', '8:  Add the 2 bay leaves, 1 ½ cups basmati rice, salt, ½ teaspoon saffron, and ½ teaspoon saffron stirred into 1 tablespoon hot 1 cup water', '9:  Gently stir to combine', '10:  Make sure all ingredients are submerged below the liquid', '11: Put the cover on the Instant Pot', '12:  Be sure the pressure valve is set to “Sealing', '13: ” Use the manual setting to set the timer for 8 minutes', '14: When the timer goes off, turn pressure valve to “Venting” to release pressure quickly', '15:  \n(Be sure to read all Instant Pot instructions carefully for safety', '16:  Be sure Instant Pot is turned off and unplugged before carefully removing the cover', '17: )Using a silicone spatula, fluff up the 1 ½ cups basmati rice and fold to carefully combine', '18:  Serve garnishes with the reserved caramelized 1 yellow onions, fresh cilantro, fresh mint, and sliced jalapeño']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons dark soy sauce', '3 tablespoons vegetarian mushroom oyster sauce', '1 tablespoon light brown sugar', '1 teaspoon thai bird chile powder', '16 oz extra firm tofu (455 g) cut into 1 inch (2 cm) cubes', '1 lb rice noodle (455 g) fresh wide', '3 tablespoons canola oil divided', '⅓ cup shallot (35 g)', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 tablespoon water', '12 oz broccoli (340 g) Chinese broccoli cut diagonally into 2 in (5 cm) pieces', '2 large eggs beaten']
instructions: ['1: In a small bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, vegetarian oyster sauce, brown sugar, and 1 teaspoon thai bird chile powder', '2: Add the 16 oz extra firm tofu to a medium bowl and drizzle with 1 tablespoon of the sauce', '3:  Gently toss to coat', '4:  Reserve the rest of the sauce', '5: Using your hands, break up the sheets of noodles into individual noodles', '6:  Set aside', '7: Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a 2 large nonstick wok or skillet over high heat, swirling the pan to coat', '8:  Working in batches, add the 16 oz extra firm tofu to the pan in a single layer and cook for 1-2 minutes on each side, until browned', '9:  Flip and brown on the other side, 1-2 minutes more', '10:  Remove from the pan and set aside', '11: Add the remaining tablespoon of canola oil to the pan', '12:  Add the ⅓ cup shallot to the pan and cook until tender and lightly browned, about 2 minutes', '13:  Add the 2 cloves garlic and water and cook for 30 seconds, until fragrant', '14:  Add the Chinese 12 oz broccoli and cook, tossing occasionally, until crispy and tender, 2-3 minutes', '15:  Add the reserved 1 lb rice noodles, 16 oz extra firm tofu, and sauce and toss to combine', '16:  Cook until the noodles are warmed through and coated in the sauce, 1-2 minutes', '17: Push the noodles to one side of the pan and pour the eggs into the empty space', '18:  Cook for 30 seconds, stirring constantly, until the eggs are scrambled', '19:  Toss to incorporate the eggs into the rest of the dish', '20: Divide between 4 serving plates']

ingredients: ['Marinated Chicken', '1 cup full fat greek yogurt (245 g)', '1 tablespoon lemon zest', '1 teaspoon garlic', '1 tablespoon ground turmeric', '1 tablespoon black pepper', '1 teaspoon fresh ginger', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken breast (680 g)', 'Yogurt Rice', '4 cups water (960 mL)', '2 ¼ cups basmati rice (450 g) rinsed', '¼ teaspoon saffron thread optional', '1 tablespoon warm water optional', '¾ cup plain full-fat greek yogurt (185 g)', '2 large egg yolks', '1 tablespoon ground turmeric', '½ teaspoon ground cumin', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon black pepper', 'Chicken And Onions', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 medium white onion sliced', '1 teaspoon fresh ginger minced', '1 tablespoon garlic minced', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', 'Assembly', '2 tablespoons softened butter', '3 tablespoons olive oil divided', '½ cup barberries (50 g) sultanas or currants', '1 pinch kosher salt', 'Yogurt Sauce', '1 cup plain full-fat greek yogurt (245 g)', '1 tablespoon fresh mint leaf', '1 tablespoon fresh parsley chopped', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '¼ teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon fresh ginger minced', '½ teaspoon garlic minced', '½ teaspoon lemon zest', '½ lemon juiced']
instructions: ['1: Make the marinade: In a 2 large bowl, mix together the yogurt, lemon zest, garlic, turmeric, pepper, ginger, and salt', '2:  Add the 1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken and toss to coat', '3:  Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and marinate the 1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour, or overnight', '4: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '5: Make the yogurt 2 ¼ cups basmati rice: Add the 4 cups 1 tablespoon warm water to a 1 medium pot and bring to a boil over high heat', '6:  Add the 2 ¼ cups basmati rice and simmer for 3 minutes', '7:  Drain the 2 ¼ cups basmati rice and rinse with cold 4 cups 1 tablespoon warm water to stop the cooking process', '8:  The 2 ¼ cups basmati rice should be slightly translucent with a completely opaque center', '9:  Set aside to drain completely', '10: If using the ¼ teaspoon saffron, combine with the warm 4 cups 1 tablespoon warm water in a small bowl', '11:  Cover with plastic wrap or a lid and let bloom for about 5 minutes, until the 4 cups 1 tablespoon warm water has cooled', '12: In a 1 medium bowl, mix together the yogurt, egg yolks, turmeric, cumin, salt, pepper, and bloomed ¼ teaspoon saffron, if using, until bright orange-yellow', '13:  Add half of the 2 ¼ cups basmati rice and stir to incorporate', '14:  Set aside', '15: Cook the 1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken and onions: Wipe the marinade off the 1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken, then cut into bite-size pieces', '16: Heat the olive oil in a 1 medium pan over 1 medium heat', '17:  When the oil is shimmering, add the onion and cook until just translucent, about 5 minutes', '18:  Add the ginger, garlic, cumin, and salt', '19:  Cook for 1 minute, until the garlic and ginger are fragrant, then add the 1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken and cook until just cooked through, about 7 minutes', '20:  Remove the pan from the heat', '21: Grease a 2½-quart ovenproof glass bowl or a 5-inch square casserole dish with the butter and 2 tablespoons of olive oil', '22: Add the yogurt 2 ¼ cups basmati rice to the prepared bowl and pack down with a spatula', '23:  Evenly distribute 1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken and onion mixture over the yogurt 2 ¼ cups basmati rice and pack down', '24:  Add the remaining cooked 2 ¼ cups basmati rice on top in an even layer', '25:  Cut a piece of parchment paper to cover the bowl and then wrap tightly with foil', '26: Bake for 45 minutes, until the 2 ¼ cups basmati rice on the bottom is crispy and browned', '27: Meanwhile, make the yogurt sauce: In a 1 medium bowl, mix together the yogurt, mint, parsley, salt, pepper, cumin, ginger, garlic, lemon zest, and lemon juice', '28: In a small pan, heat the remaining tablespoon of olive oil over 1 medium heat until shimmering', '29:  Add the ½ cup barberries and sauté for 3 minutes, until warmed', '30:  Remove the pan from the heat and season with a 1 pinch of salt', '31: To serve, carefully invert the bowl onto a serving platter or cutting board', '32:  If it does not release, take a spatula and run it along the sides, then try again', '33:  Spoon some of the yogurt sauce over the top and sprinkle with the ½ cup barberries', '34:  Serve with the remaining yogurt sauce alongside']

ingredients: ['2 cucumbers', '4 tomatoes', '1 red onion', '½ cup feta cheese (75 g)', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', 'salt to taste', 'black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 cup kalamata olive (200 g)']
instructions: ['1: Peel the 2 cucumbers', '2:  Cut into discs, and then quarter the discs', '3:  Place in a large salad bowl', '4: Cut 4 tomatoes into quarters, lengthwise, and then rotate and cut into large chunks', '5:  Add to the salad bowl', '6: Cut the red onion in half, removing the skin, stem, and bottom', '7:  Thinly slice and add to the bowl', '8: Add the ½ cup feta cheese, olive oil, red wine vinegar, salt, black pepper, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, and olives to the salad bowl and toss gently']

ingredients: ['bread toasted', '½ avocado mashed', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 egg fried to preference', '½ teaspoon Sriracha']
instructions: ['1: Mash half of an ½ avocado', '2:  Add salt and pepper, to taste', '3:  Mix until well combined', '4: Spread the mashed ½ avocado evenly across toast', '5: Top with the fried 1 egg, and drizzle with Sriracha']

ingredients: ['Pie Dough', '2 cups all-purpose flour (250 g) plus more for dusting', '2 teaspoons cinnamon', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '¾ cup shortening (170 g) cubed', '6 tablespoons ice water', 'Filling', '1 cup sugar (200 g) plus 2 tablespoons', '1 tablespoon ground cinnamon plus a pinch', '1 ½ teaspoons ground ginger', '½ teaspoon ground cloves', '¾ teaspoon kosher salt', '3 large eggs', '15 oz canned pumpkin puree (425 g)', '1 cup evaporated milk (240 mL) plus 2 tablespoons', 'whipped cream or ice cream for serving']
instructions: ['1: Make the pie dough: In a 3 large bowl, whisk together 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons 1 1 1 cup 1 cup evaporated milk (240 mL) plus 2 tablespoon ground cinnamon, and salt', '2:  Using a pastry blender or two knives, cut ¾ cup shortening into the 2 cups all-purpose flour until the ¾ cup shortening breaks down into pea-sized pieces', '3: Add the 6 6 1 cup sugar (200 g) plus 2 1 1 cup 1 cup evaporated milk (240 mL) plus 2 tablespoons whipped cream or ice water, 1 6 1 cup sugar (200 g) plus 2 1 1 cup 1 cup evaporated milk (240 mL) plus 2 tablespoon at a time, and stir gentle until the dough starts to come together', '4: Dump the dough onto a work surface lined with 2 3 large pieces of plastic wrap', '5:  Shape dough into a disc and wrap tightly with the plastic wrap', '6:  Chill the dough in the refrigerator for about 30 minutes', '7: Preheat the oven to 425˚F (220˚C)Make the filling: In a small bowl, mix together the 1 cup sugar, 2 teaspoons 1 1 1 cup 1 cup evaporated milk (240 mL) plus 2 tablespoon ground cinnamon, 1 ½ teaspoons ground ginger, ½ teaspoon ground cloves, and salt', '8: In a 3 large bowl, whisk the eggs', '9:  Add the pumpkin and 1 cup sugar-spice mix and whisk to combine', '10:  Slowly whisk in the 1 cup evaporated milk until incorporated', '11: Once the dough has chilled, lightly 2 cups all-purpose flour a clean surface', '12:  Roll out the dough to a ¼-inch (6 mm)-thick round', '13:  Keep the surface and rolling pin 2 cups all-purpose floured as needed so the dough doesn’t stick', '14:  Transfer the dough to a 9½-inch pie pan (24 cm)', '15:  Tuck the edges under and crimp', '16:  Note: The key to flaky pie crust is to handle it as little and as gently as possible', '17:  Handle it only as much as is absolutely necessary to mix, shape, and roll out', '18: Pour the filling into the pie shell', '19: Bake the pie for 15 minutes, then reduce the oven temperature to 350˚F (180˚C) and bake for another 40 minutes, or until the center jiggles slightly', '20: Cool the pie on a wire rack for 2 hours', '21: Slice and serve with whipped cream or 6 6 1 cup sugar (200 g) plus 2 1 1 cup 1 cup evaporated milk (240 mL) plus 2 tablespoons whipped cream or ice cream']
