ingredients: ['Charred Poblano Butter', '4 large poblano chiles cleaned and dried', '1 ½ sticks unsalted butter room temperature', '½ cup crumbled cotija cheese (75 g)', '½ cup fresh cilantro (20 g) chopped', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt plus more to taste', '1 lime zested', 'fresh lime juice squeezed', 'Pepita Pan de Elote', '1 can corn kernel drained', '½ cup crema Mexicana (120 g)', '1 cup masa harina (125 g) (preferably amarillo or yellow)', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', '1 stick unsalted butter room temperature', '3 large eggs yolks and egg whites separated', '¼ cup granulated sugar (50 g)', '½ cup pepitas (35 g) toasted']
instructions: ['1: Make the charred poblano butter: Preheat the oven to 450˚F (230˚C)', '2:  Line a 1 tablespoon baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil', '3: Place the poblanos on the prepared 1 tablespoon baking sheet, spacing evenly', '4:  Roast the peppers, using tongs to rotate every 10 minutes, until the peppers are well-charred and browned all over, about 30 minutes total', '5:  Immediately transfer the poblanos to a medium bowl and cover with plastic wrap', '6:  Let the peppers steam for 10–15 minutes to loosen the skins', '7: Remove a pepper from the bowl and re-cover the remaining peppers', '8:  Use your hands (wear gloves if you have sensitive skin) to peel off the charred skin and discard, along with the seeds', '9:  Place the pepper flesh into a separate bowl and repeat with the remaining peppers', '10:  Do not rinse the peppers to remove the seeds or skin; it will wash away that charred flavor', '11:  Let the peppers cool', '12: Transfer the poblanos to a food processor, along with the butter, Cotija cheese, ½ cup fresh cilantro, salt, lime zest, and lime juice', '13:  Process on high speed until completely smooth', '14:  Season with more salt and lime juice to taste if needed, then transfer to an airtight container and cover', '15:  Set aside at room temperature if using the same day, or refrigerate for up to 2 weeks', '16: Make the pepita pan de elote: Reduce the oven temperature 350˚F (180˚C)', '17:  Line an 8-inch round cake pan with parchment paper and grease with nonstick spray', '18: Add the 1 can corn kernels and ½ cup crema Mexicana to a food processor and process on high speed until creamy, yet chunky in texture, about 30 seconds', '19: In a medium bowl, whisk together the 1 cup masa harina, 1 tablespoon baking powder, and salt', '20: In a large bowl, use an electric hand mixer on high speed to cream the butter until soft, about 30 seconds', '21:  Add the ¼ cup granulated sugar and egg yolks and continue beating until fluffy, about 1 minute', '22:  Add the 1 can corn mixture and beat to combine', '23:  Add the dry ingredients and mix on low speed until just combined, then mix in the ½ cup pepitas until just incorporated', '24: In a separate medium bowl, use the hand mixer with clean, dry beaters to whip the egg whites until they hold stiff, glossy peaks, 1–2 minutes', '25: Add about ¼ of the egg whites at a time to the 1 can corn batter and gently fold with a rubber spatula, taking care not to deflate the egg whites, until just incorporated', '26: Pour the batter into the prepared pan and use a spatula to smooth the top', '27: Bake the pan de elote for about 40 minutes, until a wooden toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean and the edges of the cake are golden brown', '28:  Remove from the oven and let cool completely', '29: Serve the pepita pan de elote with the charred poblano butter alongside']

ingredients: ['15 oz chickpeas (425 g) 3 cans drained and rinsed', '5 tablespoons buffalo sauce', '4 tablespoons vegan mayonnaise', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '1 tablespoon onion powder', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', 'Ranch Dressing', '¾ cup vegan mayonnaise (185 g)', '1 ½ tablespoons unsweetened almond milk', '1 ½ teaspoons apple cider vinegar', '½ teaspoon lemon juice', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon onion powder', '⅛ teaspoon paprika', '¼ teaspoon salt', '⅛ teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon fresh parsley chopped', '½ teaspoon fresh dill chopped', '12 slider buns', '6 leaves romaine lettuce', '12 slices tomato', '12 slices red onion']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, combine the 15 oz chickpeas, 5 tablespoons buffalo sauce, 4 tablespoons ¾ ¾ cup vegan mayonnaise, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper and mash well with a fork or potato masher until the mixture has a chunky consistency', '2: To make the ranch dressing, combine 4 tablespoons ¾ ¾ cup vegan mayonnaise, 1 ½ tablespoons unsweetened almond milk, 1 ½ teaspoons apple cider vinegar, ½ teaspoon lemon juice, garlic powder, onion powder, ⅛ teaspoon paprika, salt, pepper, 1 teaspoon fresh parsley, and ½ teaspoon fresh dill to a liquid measuring ¾ cup and whisk until smooth', '3: Use a large bread knife to cut the whole sheet of slider buns in half crosswise', '4:  Remove the top and set aside', '5:  Spread the 5 tablespoons buffalo chickpea mixture on the bottom half of the slider buns, then top with 6 leaves romaine lettuce, tomato, and red onion', '6:  Drizzle the ranch dressing over the top', '7: Place the top half of the slider buns back on top', '8:  Then slice between the buns to make 12 sliders']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '¼ medium red onion finely chopped', '1 medium tomato diced', '1 serrano chile seeded and finely chopped', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 ½ teaspoons garam masala', '¼ teaspoon turmeric', '½ teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '2 tablespoons fresh cilantro finely chopped', '1 lb french fries (455 g) cooked hot', 'salt to taste']
instructions: ['1: Heat the 2 tablespoons vegetable oil in a large pan over medium-high heat, then add the red onion and cook for 5 minutes, until browned', '2: Add the tomato, 1 serrano, and 2 cloves garlic', '3:  Stir well, cover, and cook for 5 minutes, until the tomatoes have softened', '4: Add the 1 ½ teaspoons garam masala, ¼ teaspoon turmeric, and ½ teaspoon ground cumin', '5:  Stir, reduce the heat to medium, and cook for another 10 minutes, or until the sauce clings to the potatoes and they soften slightly', '6: Stir in the 1 teaspoon lemon juice and 2 tablespoons fresh cilantro, then add the 1 lb french fries and salt', '7:  Toss well to coat', '8:  Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon oil', '2 carrots chopped', '2 stalks celery chopped', '1 onion chopped', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '1 potato peeled and cubed', '3 cloves garlic minced', '28 oz diced tomato (795 g) 1 can', '8 cups vegetable stock (1.8 L)', '2 zucchinis diced', '15 oz cannellini bean (425 g) 1 can rinsed and drained ', '3 cups spinach (120 g)', '2 cups elbow pasta (200 g)', 'Preparation', '1 tablespoon oil', '2 carrots chopped', '2 stalks celery chopped', '1 onion chopped', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '1 potato peeled and cubed', '3 cloves garlic minced', '28 oz diced tomato (795 g) 1 can', '8 cups vegetable stock (1.8 L)', '2 zucchinis diced', '15 oz cannellini bean (425 g) 1 can rinsed and drained ', '3 cups spinach (120 g)', '2 cups elbow pasta (200 g)', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Combine oil, carrots, celery, onion, salt, pepper, and potato in a large pot over medium heat for 3 minutes', '2: Add garlic and stir for one minute', '3:  Mix in diced tomatoes, vegetable stock, and zucchini', '4: Bring to a boil', '5: Place the lid on the pot, and simmer for 45 minutes', '6: Add cannellini beans, spinach, and pasta', '7:  Cover and simmer 10 minutes', '8: Allow to cool before serving', '9: Enjoy']

ingredients: ['3 eggs separated', '⅛ teaspoon cream of tartar', '3 tablespoons cream cheese softened or greek yogurt']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 300°F (150°C)', '2: Separate the 3 eggs into two bowls', '3: Add the cream of tartar to the egg whites and whip into stiff peaks', '4: Add the cream cheese or yogurt into the yolks and mix until combined', '5: Fold half of the egg whites into the yolks until just combined', '6:  Add the rest and fold again until incorporated', '7: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and place six dollops of the mixture on the tray', '8: Spread out the circles with a spatula to about ½ inch (1 cm) thick', '9: Bake for 30 minutes or until golden', '10: Allow to cool for at least 1 hour']

ingredients: ['4 oz whole wheat spaghetti (115 g)', '1 boneless skinless chicken breast cubed', '5 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '2 cloves garlic minced', '¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '2 cups curly kale (135 g) chopped ribs removed', '1 lemon lemon  zest', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', 'kosher salt to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Boil kosher salted water and cook the pasta for 1 minute less than the time indicated on the package', '2:  When the pasta is finished cooking, reserve ¼ cup (60 ml) of pasta water', '3: Meanwhile, heat two 5 tablespoons of olive oil in a cast-iron skillet', '4:  Season cubed 1 boneless skinless chicken with kosher salt and ¼ teaspoon red ground black pepper, add it to the skillet, and brown it on each side', '5:  Once cooked through — about 2 to 4 minutes — remove from skillet and reserve', '6: Heat remaining three 5 tablespoons of olive oil in skillet and add 2 cloves garlic and ¼ teaspoon red ¼ teaspoon red ground black pepper flakes', '7:  Cook until fragrant, about 1 minutes', '8: Add 2 cups curly kale, lemon zest, lemon juice, kosher salt, and reserved pasta water', '9:  Cook until 2 cups curly kale is tender, about 3 minutes', '10: Add cooked 1 boneless skinless chicken, and pasta', '11:  Stir to coat, and serve immediately']

ingredients: ['6 large poblano chiles', '1 tablespoon olive oil plus more for greasing', '½ medium red onion diced', 'kosher salt to taste', '3 cloves garlic minced', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '½ teaspoon cayenne', '2 cups cooked quinoa (340 g)', '¾ cup canned black bean (125 g) drained and rinsed', '¾ cup fresh corn kernels (130 g)', '⅔ cup tomato sauce (140 g)', '1 tablespoon lime juice', '¼ cup fresh cilantro (10 g) chopped plus whole leaves for garnish', '¾ cup monterey jack cheese (75 g)', 'avocado for serving sliced', 'Lime wedge for serving sliced']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with a reusable baking mat or parchment paper', '3: Arrange poblanos on the prepared baking sheet and roast for 20 minutes, turning occasionally, until the skins begin to turn brown and pull away from the flesh', '4: Meanwhile, make the filling: Heat the 1 tablespoon olive oil in a 6 large pan over ½ medium heat', '5:  Add the red onion, season with kosher salt, and sauté for 3 minutes, until beginning to soften', '6:  Add the 3 cloves garlic and sauté for 1 minute, until fragrant', '7:  Add the 2 teaspoons ground cumin, 1 teaspoon ground coriander, and ½ teaspoon cayenne and stir to coat the vegetables with the spices', '8: Add the 2 cups cooked quinoa, beans, corn, tomato sauce, and 1 tablespoon lime juice and season with kosher salt', '9:  Stir to combine, then cook until heated through, about 5 minutes', '10:  Remove the pan from the heat and stir in the chopped cilantro', '11: Transfer the roasted poblanos to a bowl and cover with a plate or plastic wrap', '12:  Steam for 15 minutes', '13: Reduce the oven temperature to 375°F (190°C)', '14: Peel the skins off the poblanos', '15:  Leaving the stem intact, cut a slit lengthwise down each pepper to form a pouch', '16:  With a small spoon, carefully remove the seeds', '17:  The poblano flesh will be delicate—it’s fine if it tears a bit', '18: Lay the peeled poblanos side by side in a greased 9-x13-inch (22 cm x 33 cm) baking dish', '19:  Stuff each pepper with about ½ cup of the filling', '20:  Top each pepper with 2 tablespoons of Monterey Jack cheese', '21: Bake the stuffed peppers for 15-20 minutes, until the filling is completely warmed through and the cheese is melted and beginning to brown', '22: Serve the peppers garnished with cilantro leaves and serve with avocado slices and 1 tablespoon lime wedges']

ingredients: ['4 cups water (1 L)', '1 lemon', '1 piece ginger 2-3 inch (5-7 cm)', '2 teaspoons honey or preferred sweetener']
instructions: ['1: Bring 4 cups water to a boil and remove from heat', '2: Cut 1 lemon and 1 piece ginger into thin slices', '3:  Add to the hot 4 cups water', '4: Steep for 5-10 minutes', '5: Strain and pour tea into mug', '6: Add 2 teaspoons honey, stir, and serve']

ingredients: ['2 heads broccoli chopped', '¼ cup butter (60 g)', '½ onion diced', '¼ cup flour (40 g)', '2 cups half & half (480 mL)', '2 cups vegetable stock (480 mL)', '½ cup shredded carrots (55 g)', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '¼ teaspoon nutmeg', '2 cups grated cheddar cheese (200 g)']
instructions: ['1: Trim the stems off the broccoli 2 heads and chop into small florets', '2: In a large pot over medium heat, combine the ¼ cup butter and ½ onion and sauté until translucent', '3:  Add the ¼ cup flour and stir until the mixture lightly browns', '4:  Stir in the 2 cups half-and-half and mix until the contents reach a simmer', '5:  Turn the heat to low and add the 2 cups vegetable stock', '6:  Simmer for 5-10 minutes', '7: Mix in the broccoli, ½ cup shredded carrots, 2 teaspoons salt, 1 teaspoon pepper, and ¼ teaspoon nutmeg', '8:  Simmer for 10-15 minutes', '9:  Add the 2 cups grated cheddar cheese and stir until it melts and combines with the other ingredients']

ingredients: ['2 medium zucchinis', '1 cup light brown sugar (220 g)', '½ cup granulated sugar (100 g)', '4 large eggs', '1 cup canola oil (240 mL)', '1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar', '2 teaspoons McCormick® vanilla extract', '2 ½ cups all-purpose flour (310 g) divided', '½ cup Dutch-process cocoa powder (60 g)', '2 teaspoons baking soda divided', '1 teaspoon kosher salt divided', '½ cup semisweet chocolate chip (85 g)', '1 teaspoon McCormick® Ground Cinnamon', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: Trim the ends of the zucchini, then grate on the 4 large holes of a box grater', '3:  You should have about 3 2 ½ cups (450 G) total', '4: In a 4 large bowl, whisk together the brown and granulated sugars, eggs, canola oil, 1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar, and 2 teaspoons McCormick® vanilla', '5:  Fold in the shredded zucchini', '6: Pour half of the wet ingredients, about 2 2 ½ cups, into a 2 medium bowl', '7: In a 2 medium bowl, whisk together 1 cup (125 G)flour, the cocoa powder, 1 teaspoon 2 teaspoons baking soda, and ½ teaspoon salt', '8:  Add the cocoa mixture the bowl with half of the zucchini mixture and mix well', '9:  Fold in the chocolate chips', '10:  Set aside', '11: In a separate 2 medium bowl, whisk together the remaining 1½ 2 ½ cups (185 G) flour, 1 teaspoon 2 teaspoons baking soda, ½ teaspoon salt, and the cinnamon', '12: Fold the dry ingredients into the remaining bowl of wet ingredients', '13: Grease a 9x5-inch (6 x 12 cm) loaf pan with nonstick spray', '14: Using 2 ¼-cup measures, alternate scooping the batters to the prepared pan to create a marbled effect', '15: Bake until a cake tester inserted in the center of the cake comes out clean, 70–80 minutes', '16: Let the bread cool for 15 minutes in the pan, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely, about 30 minutes', '17:  Slice and serve']

ingredients: ['Buns', '1 cup warm water (240 mL)', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons honey', '2 teaspoons salt', '3 ⅓ cups flour (415 g)', '1 ½ teaspoons yeast', 'Topping', '1 stick butter softened', '½ cup brown sugar (110 g)', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '3 tablespoons honey', '1 pinch salt', '¼ cup chopped pecan (60 g)']
instructions: ['1: Combine the water, 2 tablespoons olive oil, honey, salt, 3 ⅓ cups flour, water and 1 ½ teaspoons yeast in a large bowl', '2: Mix well and knead for 10 -15 minutes, until the dough is elastic', '3: Transfer the dough into a well-oiled bowl', '4: Cover with a towel or plastic wrap and let rise for 1 hour in a 1 cup warm place, until the dough has doubled in size', '5: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '6: Cut the dough into 8 portions and shape into balls', '7:  Cover with a towel or plastic wrap', '8:  Set aside', '9: Combine the 1 stick butter, ½ cup brown sugar, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, honey and salt in a small bowl and mix well', '10: Spread the ½ cup brown sugar mixture onto the bottom and sides of a cast iron pan', '11:  Line pecans on top of the mixture, and place the dough balls on top', '12: Bake for 20-30 minutesRemove the sticky buns from the oven and allow to cool for 10-15 minutes before inverting onto a plate']

ingredients: ['¼ cup italian salad dressing (250 mL)', '3 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '1 ½ tablespoons honey', '⅛ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 lb chicken breast (455 g)', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 lb fresh asparagus (455 g) trimmed of tough ends chopped into 2-inch / 5cm pieces', '1 ½ cups carrot (185 g)', '1 cup grape tomatoes (200 g) halved']
instructions: ['1: In a mixing bowl, mix ¼ cup italian salad dressing, 3 tablespoons balsamic vinegar, 1 ½ tablespoons honey and ⅛ teaspoon red ⅛ teaspoon red pepper flakes, set aside', '2: Season 1 lb chicken with salt and ⅛ teaspoon red pepper', '3: Cook 1 lb chicken breasts on one side for 10 minutes, then turn', '4:  Add half of the dressing mixture, and cook for another 10 minutes', '5:  Chicken juices should run clear', '6:  Set 1 lb chicken aside', '7: Add 1 lb fresh asparagus, carrots, and 1 cup grape tomatoes to the same skillet, season with salt and ⅛ teaspoon red pepper, stir frequently until the veggies are tender, about 4 minutes', '8:  Plate veggies and 1 lb chicken', '9: Add remaining dressing mixture to skillet and ⅛ teaspoon reduce for about a minute, until the sauce is thickened', '10:  Dress the 1 lb chicken and veggies with the sauce']

ingredients: ['3 chicken drumsticks bone-in', '3 chicken thighs', 'Marinade', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon oregano', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon white pepper', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '2 cups buttermilk (480 mL)', 'Breading', '2 cups all-purpose flour (250 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', 'oil for frying']
instructions: ['1: Combine the chicken with all the marinade ingredients in a large bowl', '2:  Stir to make sure each piece of chicken is coated evenly, then cover with cling film and chill for about an hour', '3: Combine all of the breading ingredients in a large bowl, then roll the marinated chicken pieces in the 2 cups all-purpose flour, shaking off excess', '4:  Repeat with the rest of the chicken', '5: Heat oil in a skillet over high heat to about 350°F', '6: Fry 3-4 pieces at a time for about 15-20 minutes until the breading is dark golden brown, flipping several times to ensure the breading cooks evenly and does not burn', '7:  The heat of the oil should drop to about 320°F', '8: Drain the chicken on paper towels or on a wire rack, resting for about 10-15 minutes']

ingredients: ['1 cup greek yogurt (285 g)', '1 cup almond milk (240 mL)', '2 tablespoons honey', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '¼ cup chia seeds (40 g)', '1 tablespoon matcha powder', 'chocolate shaving for topping']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, mix the 1 cup greek yogurt, 1 cup almond milk, 1 teaspoon vanilla, 2 tablespoons honey, ¼ cup chia seeds, and 1 tablespoon matcha powder together until well combined', '2: Pour the mixture into an airtight container and refrigerate, covered for 4 hours', '3: Spoon the pudding into desired serving dish and top with chocolate shavings and a dusting of 1 tablespoon matcha powder']

ingredients: ['18 oz white chocolate (510 g)', '14 oz sweetened condensed milk (400 g)', '12 sandwich cookies chopped']
instructions: ['1: In a mixing bowl, combine 18 oz white chocolate with 14 oz sweetened condensed milk and melt in the microwave in 15-second increments', '2: Once 18 oz white chocolate is fully melted, add in chopped 12 sandwich cookies and stir until combined', '3: Pour 18 oz white chocolate mixture into a parchment paper-lined 8x8 inch (20x20 cm) baking tin', '4: Chill for 2 hours or until the fudge is firm', '5: Cut into bite-sized pieces']

ingredients: ['Dressing', '1 tablespoon peanut butter', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '½ teaspoon  sriracha', 'Salad', '½ cup cabbage (50 g) chopped', '½ cup broccoli floret (75 g) broken up', '½ red bell pepper chopped', '½ cup fresh chives (20 g) chopped', '½ cup carrot (55 g) shredded', '¼ cup peanuts (30 g) chopped', '1 cup lettuce (75 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a large mason jar, add the 1 tablespoon ¼ cup peanut butter, 1 tablespoon soy sauce and ½ teaspoon  sriracha and stir to combine', '2: Add the ½ cup cabbage, ½ cup broccoli florets, ½ red bell pepper, ½ cup fresh chives, carrots, 1 tablespoon ¼ cup ¼ cup peanuts, and 1 cup lettuce and screw on the lid', '3: Store in the refrigerator until ready to eat, up to 5 days', '4: Give the mason jar a good shake to mix and use a fork or spoon to stir as needed']

ingredients: ['Spice Mix', '2 tablespoons coriander seed', '2 tablespoons mustard seed', '1 tablespoon red pepper flakes', '1 tablespoon dill weed', '1 tablespoon allspice', '1 tablespoon salt', '3 dried bay leaves', 'Boil', '3 qt water (3 L)', '8 small red skin potatoes', '3 ears corn cut into thirds', '4 smoked sausages such as kielbasa cut into rounds', '2 lb shell-on shrimp (905 g)', 'Juice of 1 lemon', 'For Serving', 'fresh parsley chopped', '1 cup cocktail sauce (240 g) to serve', 'butter melted to serve']
instructions: ['1: In a 8 small bowl, combine the 2 tablespoons coriander seeds, 2 tablespoons mustard seeds, 1 tablespoon 8 8 small red pepper flakes, 1 tablespoon dill weed, 1 tablespoon allspice, 1 tablespoon salt, and 3 dried bay leaves', '2: Add the spice mix to a large pot with 3 quarts of 3 qt water, then add the potatoes', '3:  Bring to a boil and cook for 15 minutes', '4: Add the 3 ears corn and boil for 10 minutes', '5:  Add the sausage and cook for another 5 minutes', "6: Remove a potato from the pot and check to see if it's fully cooked", '7:  If not, continue to cook them until the potatoes are done', '8: Stir in the 2 lb shell-on shrimp and Juice of 1 lemon juice', '9:  Place the lid on the pot and cook for 3 minutes, or until the 2 lb shell-on shrimp are pink and cooked through', '10: Drain the ingredients from the pot', '11:  Serve the 2 lb shell-on shrimp boil on a newspaper-lined table, sprinkled all over with fresh parsley, with 1 cup cocktail sauce and garlic butter on the side']

ingredients: ['1 cup dry oat (100 g)', '¼ cup almond butter (60 g)', '¼ cup honey (85 g)', '¼ cup raisin (35 g)', '¼ cup chopped pecan (30 g)', '½ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '½ teaspoon vanilla', 'salt to taste optional']
instructions: ['1: Mix oats, ¼ cup almond butter and ¼ cup honey in a large bowl', '2: Add raisins, pecans, ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon, ½ teaspoon vanilla and salt', '3:  Mix', '4: Place bowl in the refrigerator for 30-60 minutes, or until the mixture has solidified', '5: Mold mixture into bite-sized balls', '6: Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['2 cans black beans rinsed and drained', '1 onion minced', '3 cloves garlic minced', '2 carrots shredded', '½ cup quick-cook oats (50 g)', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon cumin', '½ teaspoon coriander', '½ teaspoon chili powder', '¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '4 buns we did not use vegan buns but you can']
instructions: ['1: Heat one tablespoon of olive oil in a pan', '2:  Combine onions, 3 cloves garlic, salt, and ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper and cook until onions are translucent', '3: Add 2 carrots, 1 teaspoon cumin, ½ teaspoon coriander, ½ teaspoon chili powder, and ¼ teaspoon cayenne ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper until 2 carrots are tender', '4:  Remove pan from heat', '5: In a bowl, mash the 2 cans black beans and then add the contents of the pan along with the soy sauce and quick ½ cup quick-cook oats', '6: Mix and form four patties', '7:  Place in freezer for 30 minutes to set', '8: Cook patties on a pan coated in cooking spray over medium heat, flipping halfway', '9: Use patties to create your dream veggie burger']

ingredients: ['2 cups prepared cornbread (230 g) crumbled', '⅔ cup red pepper (65 g) finely diced', '½ cup green onion (75 g) sliced', '⅓ cup mayonnaise (80 g)', '1 tablespoon sour cream', '¼ cup fresh parsley (10 g) chopped', '2 teaspoons fresh cilantro chopped', '1 clove garlic minced', '2 large eggs beaten', '1 teaspoon old bay seasoning', '2 teaspoons olive oil', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 lb fresh lump crab meat (455 g)', 'vegetable oil for frying']
instructions: ['1: Over a 2 large bowl, crumble the cornbread into fine crumbs until you have about 2 2 cups (200 g) worth', '2: Add the ⅔ cup red ⅔ cup red pepper, ½ cup green onion, ⅓ cup mayonnaise, 1 tablespoon sour cream, ¼ cup fresh parsley, 2 teaspoons fresh cilantro, 1 clove garlic, beaten eggs, Old Bay seasoning, 2 teaspoons olive oil, salt, ⅔ cup red pepper, and 1 lb fresh lump crab meat to the bowl', '3: Break up the 1 lb fresh lump crab meat into fine pieces until it is all uniform in size', '4: Mix all the ingredients together with your hands or a wooden spoon until evenly combined', '5: Form the mixture into small patties, about 2', '6: 5 inches (6 cm) in diameter and ¾-inch (2 cm) thick and set aside', '7: Add enough vegetable oil to a 2 large skillet to come about ¼-inch (6 mm) up the sides', '8:  Heat the oil over medium-high heat until it reaches 350˚F (180˚C)', '9: Fry the 1 lb fresh lump crab cakes in batches, about 3-4 at a time', '10:  Cook on each side until golden brown, about 2-3 minutes', '11: Transfer to a paper-towel lined plate to drain', '12: Serve with your choice of dipping sauce, or they’re great just on their own!']

ingredients: ['3 pears peeled and steamed', '6 oz raspberry (170 g) washed well']
instructions: ['1: Steam 3 pears and allow to cool', '2: Add 3 pears and raspberries to a blender or food processor', '3:  Blend very well, until seeds are broken down', '4: Refrigerate up to 3 days or freeze up to 1 month', '5: NOTE: Check with your pediatrician before introducing new foods to children under 12 months']

ingredients: ['1 yellow bell pepper', '1 red bell pepper', '1 green bell pepper', '1 teaspoon salt divided', '½ teaspoon cumin divided', '1 teaspoon smoked paprika divided', '1 ½ teaspoons chili powder divided', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes divided', '4 portobello mushrooms', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 large white onion', '3 cloves garlic minced', '3 cups brown rice (675 g) cooked', '1 cup pico de gallo (240 g)', '1 cup black beans (60 g) drained and rinsed', '1 cup corn (165 g)', '1 cup shredded cheddar cheese (100 g)', '1 avocado sliced', '1 lime sliced into wedges', 'fresh cilantro for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Slice the stem off of the peppers so that they will stand steadily when flipped upside down', '2:  Slice the peppers into quarters from the bottom to the top around the core and seeds', '3:  Slice each quarter into 1-inch (2 ½ cm) thick slices', '4:  Transfer to a 1 large bowl', '5: Add ½ teaspoon salt, ¼ teaspoon cumin, ½ teaspoon smoked paprika, 1 teaspoon 1 ½ teaspoons chili powder, and ½ teaspoon 1 1 teaspoon red pepper flakes', '6:  Toss to coat the peppers evenly in the spices and set aside', '7: Remove the stems from the 4 portobello mushrooms and slice into 1-inch-wide (2 cm) pieces, then transfer a 1 large bowl', '8: Add the remaining ½ teaspoon salt, ½ teaspoon 1 ½ teaspoons chili powder, ½ teaspoon smoked paprika, ¼ teaspoon cumin, and ½ teaspoon 1 1 teaspoon red pepper flakes', '9:  Toss to coat the mushrooms evenly in the spices and set aside', '10: Thinly slice the onion', '11: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a 1 large cast-iron pan over medium-high heat', '12:  Add the onion and cook, stirring occasionally, until translucent, about 3 minutes', '13:  Add the 3 cloves garlic and bell peppers, and cook for about 5 more minutes, stirring constantly until peppers are tender', '14:  Remove the pepper and onion mixture from the pan and set aside', '15: Add the mushrooms to the skillet and cook until the mushrooms are tender, stirring constantly, about 5 minutesDivide the 3 cups brown rice between 4 food storage containers', '16:  Top each container with 1 cup pico de gallo, 1 cup black beans, 1 cup corn, 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese, the cooked bell peppers and onions, and the sliced 4 portobello', '17:  Garnish with an 1 avocado slice, a 1 lime wedge, and fresh cilantro', '18: Store in the refrigerator for up to 4 days']

ingredients: ['7 medium sized red tomatoes roughly chopped', '1 medium sized onion roughly chopped', '1 medium carrot roughly chopped', '6 cloves garlic', '2 tablespoons grated ginger', '½ lemon', '8 black peppercorns', '2 teaspoons coriander seed', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds', 'cinnamon stick 1.5 cm (1/2 in)', '4 cloves', '2 cardamom pods', '2 teaspoons oil', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 tablespoons sugar', '¼ teaspoon red chilli powder', '¼ cup coriander (10 g)', '4 cups water (960 mL)', 'fresh cilantro']
instructions: ['1: In a large saucepan, roast the spices (peppercorns, coriander seeds , 1 teaspoon cumin , cinnamon sticks , cloves , 2 cardamom pods) in 2 teaspoons oil until slightly golden brown and aromatic ', '2: To the saucepan, add 2 tablespoons grated ginger and garlic until the raw smell goes off for 3-4 min on medium heat', '3:  To this, add onions and carrots', '4:  Saute until onions turn translucent', '5: Add tomatoes and coriander / fresh cilantro stems', '6:  Mix them well', '7:  Then, add 1', '8: 5 4 cups water - simmer the mixture until tomatoes are completely cooked and mushy- about 10 minutes on medium flame', '9: Add the remaining 2', '10: 5 4 cups of water and let simmer for 10 more minutes', '11:  Then, let the mixture cool', '12:  Once cooled, grind mixture into a fine paste and pass through a sieve to collect the liquid, which is the soup', '13: Boil the soup until hot', '14: Serve hot with garlic bread']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '2 cloves garlic minced', '5 oz spinach (145 g)', '1 cup artichoke heart (170 g) drained', '3 cups milk (720 mL)', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', '2 teaspoons black pepper freshly ground', '2 cups elbow macaroni (200 g)', '¾ cup shredded cheddar cheese (75 g)', '3 cups shredded mozzarella cheese (300 g) divided']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 450°F (230°C)', '2: In a large pan, melt the 2 tablespoons butter', '3:  Add 2 cloves garlic, and 5 oz spinach cooking until 5 oz spinach is wilted', '4:  Add 1 cup artichoke hearts', '5: Slowly add the milk, 2 teaspoons kosher salt, and 2 teaspoons black pepper', '6:  Stir until milk is boiling', '7: Add the macaroni, cooking until the milk coats the macaroni like a glaze', '8: Add the ¾ cup shredded cheddar and 2 cups (200g) of mozzarella, stirring until the cheese is completely melted', '9: Sprinkle the remaining mozzarella on top', '10: Bake for 7 minutes, until cheese is bubbly and golden brown']

ingredients: ['3 baby bok choys (approximately 1.25 lbs)', '2 teaspoons salt separated and 1 teaspoon (Seperated)', '⅓ cup rice (65 g) cooked', '⅓ cup water (65 mL)', '2 scallions chopped in 2-inch (5 cm) lengths', '2 tablespoons garlic', '3 tablespoons gochugaru', '3 teaspoons fish sauce', '2 ½ tablespoons sugar (500 g)']
instructions: ['1: Rinse and cut the 3 baby bok choy into fourths', '2:  Place bok choy in a large mixing bowl and sprinkle 2 tsp 2 teaspoons salt', '3:  Toss to evenly coat', '4:  Wait 30 minutes, then rinse and drain the bok  choy', '5:  Return to the mixing bowl', '6: In a small blender, blend together the ⅓ cup rice and ⅓ cup water until it forms a smooth paste', '7:  Pour over the bok choy and mix together', '8: Add the rest of the ingredients and continue mixing gently, making sure all the ingredients get mixed thoroughly', '9: Store in an airtight container and let sit in the fridge for 1-2 hours to help flavors meld together', '10:  Eat']

ingredients: ['4 cups self-rising flour (500 g)', '2 ½ cups butter (575 g) cubed']
instructions: ['1: Pre-heat oven to 350°F and grease a sheet pan', '2: Combine 4 cups self-rising flour and 2 ½ cups butter in a food processor: pulse until it forms a soft, pastry dough (somewhat crumbly)', '3: Scoop mixture with a cookie scooper onto a sheet pan and bake for 15 minutes', '4: Serve warm']

ingredients: ['2 carrots', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon fresh parsley chopped', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', 'Greek Yogurt Chive Dip', '1 cup plain greek yogurt (285 g)', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '2 tablespoons chives', '¼ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C)', '2: Cut 2 carrots into fries and combine in a large bowl with 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 tablespoon fresh parsley, 1 teaspoon paprika, salt, and pepper', '3: Place on baking sheet lined with parchment paper in a single layer', '4:  Bake for 20-25 minutes, flipping halfway', '5: Prepare dip while fries are baking', '6:  Combine all dip ingredients in a small bowl and set aside in the refrigerator until ready to use']

ingredients: ['1 medium spaghetti squash about 2 1/3 or 3 pounds (1.1 or 1.3 grams)', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '1 cup grated parmesan cheese (110 g)', 'kosher salt to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste', '4 large eggs', 'olive oil cooking spray', '2 tablespoons fresh herb such as chives thyme or parsley - minced']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: Using a fork, poke holes lengthwise around the center of the spaghetti squash', '4: Microwave for 2 minutes', '5: Cut the ends off of the squash, then slice in half lengthwise', '6:  Remove the seeds and pulp', '7: Place half of the squash flesh-side down in a microwave-safe dish with high sides', '8:  Pour ½ cup (120 ML) of water over the top of the squash and microwave on high for 3 minutes, or when a fork easily pulls the squash away from the skin in long strands that look like spaghetti', '9:  Repeat with second half— there will still be water left over from the first half', '10:  Cool the squash until it can be safely handled, about 10 minutes', '11: Use a fork to remove all of the squash from the skin, breaking it up into small strands', '12:  You should have approximately 4 cups of squash (820 G)', '13:  Transfer to a 1 medium bowl and stir in the Parmesan cheese, kosher salt, and ground black pepper', '14: Divide the squash into 4 1-cup (205 G each cup) (2 portions and place on the prepared baking sheet', '15:  Shape into nests, creating a well 4 large enough to fit an egg in the center of each', '16: Bake for 10 minutes, until the squash is starting to brown', '17:  Remove from the oven and let cool for 5 minutes', '18: Crack the eggs into a small bowl, 1 at a time, then pour into the wells of the squash nests', '19:  Season with kosher salt and ground black pepper', '20: Bake for 12-15 minutes, depending on your preferred doneness for the eggs', '21: Garnish each nest with 2 tablespoons fresh herbs and serve']

ingredients: ['10 slices sandwich bread', '3 tablespoons butter melted', '3 tablespoons brown sugar', '2 tablespoons cinnamon', '3 eggs', '1 tablespoon milk', '½ teaspoon cinnamon', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract']
instructions: ['1: Roll each slice of 10 slices sandwich bread flat with a rolling pin', '2:  Carefully cut off crustsIn a bowl, combine melted butter, brown sugar, and 2 tablespoons cinnamon', '3:  Spread onto each 10 slices sandwich bread slice, and roll up', '4: In a bowl, combine 3 eggs, 1 tablespoon milk, ½ teaspoon cinnamon, and vanilla', '5: Dip each roll-up in egg mixture, and pan fry in a buttered skillet until all sides are golden brown']

ingredients: ['1 spaghetti squash', '1 tablespoon oil plus more for drizzling', 'salt to taste', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '4 boneless skinless chicken thighs', '½ lb green beans (225 g) trimmed', '1 cup basil pesto (230 g)', '2 cups cherry tomatoes (400 g) halved']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Using a fork, pierce holes along one side of the 1 spaghetti squash', '3: Microwave the squash for 5 minutes to make it easier to cut open', '4: Using a sharp knife, cut the squash in half lengthwise and scrape out the seeds with a spoon', '5: Transfer the squash to a roasting pan and drizzle with oil', '6:  Season the flesh with salt and ½ teaspoon black pepper, and flip the squash so that the cavity faces down on the pan', '7: Bake for 40 minutes until the squash is easily pierced with a knife', '8: Once out of the oven, use a fork to pull the threads out of the 1 spaghetti squash', '9: Heat 1 1 tablespoon of oil over medium-high heat in a large, nonstick skillet', '10:  Season the 4 boneless skinless chicken thighs with salt and ½ teaspoon black pepper and sear them on each side for about 4 minutes', '11: Remove the 4 boneless skinless chicken from the pan and allow it to rest for 5 minutes before slicing into cubes', '12: Toss the ½ lb green beans into the pan and sauté until they’ve started to soften', '13: Add in the 1 spaghetti squash, 1 cup basil pesto, and 4 boneless skinless chicken, and toss until well combined', '14: After the mixture is heated through, toss in the 2 cups cherry tomatoes and give the pan one last toss to help everything come together', '15: Remove from heat and serve']

ingredients: ['1 cup dry oat (100 g)', '¼ cup almond butter (60 g)', '¼ cup honey (85 g)', '½ cup almond (70 g)', '½ teaspoon vanilla']
instructions: ['1: Mix oats, almond butter and ¼ cup honey in a large bowl', '2: Add almonds and ½ teaspoon vanilla', '3:  Mix', '4: Place bowl in the refrigerator for 30-60 minutes, or until the mixture has solidified', '5: Mold mixture into bite-sized balls', '6: Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['Sauce', '1 cup tomato sauce (225 g)', '1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar', '1 tablespoon honey', 'Meatloaf', '1 lb lean ground turkey (455 g)', '1 cup zucchini (150 g) shredded squeezed gently of excess moisture with kitchen towels', '1 cup yellow onion (150 g) finely diced', '2 cloves garlic cloves minced', '1 egg whisked', '1 tablespoon dijon mustard', '1 tablespoon honey', '2 tablespoons Sauce', '½ cup panko bread crumbs', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '2 tablespoons fresh parsley chopped', '2 slices mozzarella cheese', 'Garnish', 'parsley to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '2: Make the sauce: In a medium bowl, stir together the 1 cup tomato sauce, 1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar, and honey', '3:  Set aside', '4: Make the meatloaf: In a large bowl, combine the 1 lb lean ground turkey, 1 cup zucchini, 1 cup yellow onion, 2 cloves garlic, 1 egg, Dijon mustard, honey, 2 tablespoons of the 1 cup tomato sauce, ½ cup panko bread crumbs, ½ teaspoon salt, ½ teaspoon pepper, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, 1 teaspoon dried basil, and 2 tablespoons fresh parsley', '5:  Mix well', '6: Add half of the meatloaf mixture to a greased loaf pan and flatten to form an even layer', '7: Layer the 2 slices mozzarella cheese over the meatloaf layer', '8:  Top with the rest of the meatloaf and smooth the top', '9: Top the meatloaf with half of the 1 cup tomato sauce mixture, using a spoon or rubber spatula to spread evenly', '10:  Reserve the rest of the 1 cup tomato sauce', '11: Bake the meatloaf for 1 hour, or until the internal temperature reads 160˚F (70˚C) when tested with a meat thermometer', '12: When the meatloaf is cooked through, warm the reserved 1 cup tomato sauce in the microwave or a skillet, then drizzle on top of the meatloaf', '13: Garnish with fresh 2 tablespoons fresh parsley and serve with your favorite sides', '14:  (We used mashed sweet potatoes and asparagus']

ingredients: ['4 lb boneless pork butt (1.8 kg) or shoulder cut into six equal pieces', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon cumin', '8 cloves garlic crushed', '1 medium onion quartered', '3 leaves bay leaf', '1 lime juiced', '1 large orange juiced save the spent halves', 'Optional Toppings', 'tortilla taco shell', 'rice', '1 can black beans', 'salsa', 'guacamole', 'sour cream', 'fresh cilantro', '1 cup cheese (100 g)']
instructions: ['1: Cut 4 lb boneless pork into 6 equal pieces', '2:  Add it to the slow cooker', '3: Add 2 teaspoons salt, 1 teaspoon pepper, 1 tablespoon dried oregano, 1 tablespoon cumin, 8 cloves garlic, 1 medium onion, bay 3 leaves, 1 lime juice and juice the 1 large orange', '4:  Add 1 large orange to the cooker as well', '5:  Mix together until the meat is well-coated', '6: Cover and cook on low for 8-10 hours, or until the meat pulls apart easily', '7: Remove the 4 lb boneless pork and transfer to a foil-lined baking sheet', '8:  Shred the 4 lb boneless pork and spread across the baking sheet in a single layer', '9: Pour about 1 1 cup (235 ml) of the liquid remaining in the slow cooker over the shredded 4 lb boneless pork', '10:  Broil for 5-10 minutes until the meat browns and crisps along the edges', '11: Serve immediately', '12:  Great as a filling in tacos, burritos, salads, or nachos!']

ingredients: ['Sriracha Aioli', '½ cup mayonnaise (120 g)', '1 tablespoon sriracha hot sauce', 'Carrot and Daikon Pickles', '1 large carrot peeled cut into matchstick strips', '1 medium daikon radish peeled cut into matchstick strips', '¼ cup sugar (50 g)', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '½ cup rice wine vinegar (120 mL)', 'Burger', '1 lb ground pork (455 g)', '4 cloves garlic minced', '3 scallions thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon fish sauce', '1 tablespoon sambal oelek', '1 tablespoon sugar', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon coarse kosher salt', '1 cucumber sliced', '1 jalapeño de-seeded and thinly sliced', '¼ cup fresh cilantro leaves (10 g)', '1 baguette toasted sliced in half lengthwise and cut into 4-inch (10-cm) buns']
instructions: ['1: Sriracha aioli: Combine both ingredients in a small bowl and set aside', '2: Carrot and daikon pickles: Combine carrots, radish, ¼ cup 1 tablespoon sugar, and 1 tablespoon kosher 1 teaspoon coarse kosher salt in a 1 large bowl', '3:  Using fingertips, massage 1 tablespoon kosher 1 teaspoon coarse kosher salt and ¼ cup 1 tablespoon sugar into vegetables until dissolved', '4:  Add 1 cup water and ½ cup rice vinegar', '5:  Set aside', '6: Burgers: Combine the 1 lb ground pork, 4 cloves garlic, 3 scallions, fish sauce, chili sauce, ¼ cup 1 tablespoon sugar, 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, and 1 tablespoon kosher 1 teaspoon coarse kosher salt in a 1 large bowl', '7:  Mix gently until spices are evenly distributed, but don’t overwork meat', '8:  Form into four balls', '9: Heat a pan with a tablespoon of oil over 1 medium-high heat', '10:  Place burgers on pan and use a wide, stiff spatula to gently smash the balls into flat patties, about 3⁄4-inch (2-cm) thick', '11: Cook until the bottom of each burger has formed a brown crust, about 3–4 minutes', '12:  Flip each patty and cook through, approximately 3–4 minutes', '13: Assembly: Spread about 1 tablespoon sriracha aioli on the bottom of each 1 baguette quarter', '14:  Place a burger on each 1 baguette, topping with carrot and daikon pickles, 3 scallions thinly 1 cucumber 1 jalapeño de-seeded and thinly 1 1 baguette toasted sliced 1 cucumber, jalapeños, and ¼ cup fresh cilantro leaves']

ingredients: ['Dressing', '½ avocado', '1 lime juiced', '2 cloves garlic', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ cup water (120 mL)', 'Salad', '½ green bell pepper chopped', '½ cup corn (85 g)', '½ cup cherry tomato (100 g) halved', '¼ cup quinoa (40 g) cooked', '½ cup black beans (85 g)', '1 cup spinach (40 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a food processor, combine the ½ avocado, 1 lime juice, 2 cloves garlic, ½ teaspoon salt, and ½ cup water', '2:  Pulse until smooth, then transfer to a large mason jar', '3: Add the ½ green bell pepper, ½ cup corn, ½ cup cherry tomatoes, ¼ cup quinoa, ½ cup black beans, and 1 cup spinach and screw on the lid', '4: Store in the refrigerator until ready to eat, up to 5 days', '5: Give the mason jar a good shake to mix and use a fork or spoon to stir as needed']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 lb ground beef (455 g)', '½ cup yellow onion (75 g) diced', '4 ½ tablespoons taco seasoning or 1 package', '1 tablespoon tomato paste', '10 oz tomato (285 g) diced 1 can', '8 oz spaghetti (225 g)', '3 cups water (710 mL)', '½ cup cheddar cheese (50 g) shredded', '½ cup mozzarella cheese (50 g) shredded', '1 roma tomato diced', '2 tablespoons fresh cilantro chopped']
instructions: ['1: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large stockpot over medium-high heat', '2:  Add 1 lb ground beef, ½ cup yellow onions, and 4 ½ tablespoons taco seasoning', '3:   Cook until beef has browned, about 3-5 minutes, making sure to crumble the beef as it cooks', '4: Stir in tomato paste and diced tomatoes, then stir', '5: Add 8 oz spaghetti and 3 cups water', '6:  Bring to a boil; cover, reduce heat, and simmer until pasta is cooked through, about 15 minutes', '7: Remove from heat and top with ½ cup cheddar cheese, ½ cup mozzarella cheese, Roma tomato, and 2 tablespoons fresh cilantro', '8:  Mix until cheese is melted', '9: Serve immediately', '10:  Garnish with additional tomato and 2 tablespoons fresh cilantro, if desired']

ingredients: ['Spiced Sugar Syrup', '1 cup sugar (185 g)', '¾ cup water (180 mL) plus more as needed', '¼ teaspoon safron threads', '¼ teaspoon McCormick® Ground Cardamom', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', 'Jalebi', '1 cup all purpose flour (125 g)', '2 tablespoons corn flour', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '¼ teaspoon McCormick® Ground Turmeric', '½ cup unsweetened full fat yogurt (125 g)', '½ cup water (120 mL) plus more as needed', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '1 ½ cups vegetable oil (360 mL) plus more as needed', '½ cup ghee (105 g)']
instructions: ['1: Make the spiced 1 cup sugar syrup: In a medium saucepan, stir together the 1 cup sugar and water over medium heat until the 1 cup sugar is dissolved and the mixture comes to a low simmer', '2:  Reduce the heat to medium-low and continue cooking for 8–10 minutes, until the syrup starts to thicken slightly', '3:  (To test if the syrup has the right consistency, dip a spoon into the syrup and, after letting it cool slightly, place a droplet of the syrup between your thumb and forefinger', '4:  Pull your fingers apart very slightly; if the syrup is ready, there should be a single strand that stretches between the fingers', '5:  If not, continue cooking, checking every minute or 2, until the syrup is ready', '6: )Once the syrup reaches the right consistency, stir in the saffron ¼ teaspoon safron threads, McCormick® cardamom, and lemon juice, then remove the pot from heat and cover to keep warm until ready to use', '7:  The syrup should be very warm when using; if it cools down and over-thickens, sprinkle in a small amount of water and heat over low heat until warmed again', '8: Make the batter: In a large bowl, whisk together 1 cup all purpose 2 2 tablespoons corn flour, corn 1 cup all purpose 2 2 tablespoons corn flour, ½ teaspoon baking soda, and McCormick® turmeric', '9:  Add the ½ cup unsweetened full fat yogurt, water, and lemon juice, and whisk in one direction for 4 minutes, until very smooth with a texture close to pancake batter — thick but pourable', '10:  Add more water or 1 cup all purpose 2 2 tablespoons corn flour, 1 tablespoon at a time, as needed to reach the desired consistency', '11: Heat the 1 ½ cups vegetable oil and ½ cup ghee together in a medium heavy-bottom pot over medium-high heat until the temperature reaches 350–360°F(180°C)', '12:  The oil level should be 2½–3 inches deep; add more 1 ½ cups vegetable oil if needed', '13: Set a wire rack over paper towels', '14: When ready to fry, test the oil temperature by transferring 2 2 tablespoons of batter to a squeeze bottle and squeezing into the hot oil in a spiral pattern', '15:  The batter should start bubbling and rise to the surface immediately, without browning', '16:  If the jalebi appears thin and stringy, the batter is too thin', '17:  If it browns immediately, the oil is too hot', '18:  The batter should puff slightly and brown over the course of 1–2 minutes', '19:  Adjust the oil temperature and batter as needed, then transfer the rest of the batter to the squeeze bottle', '20: Make the jalebi: Working in batches to avoid overcrowding the pan, squeeze 3 to 4 2 tablespoons of the batter at a time into the hot oil in spiral shapes, starting from the center and going outward to 3–4 inches in diameter', '21:  Cook for 45–60 seconds per side, or until golden brown and crispy on the outside and cooked through and soft on the inside', '22:  Gently remove the jalebi from the hot oil with a slotted spoon, letting the excess oil drip off, then immediately dunk in the warm 1 cup sugar syrup', '23:  Let soak for 1 minute on each side, then transfer to the wire rack and let rest for 2 minutes, or until ready to serve', '24: Serve the jalebi warm']

ingredients: ['1 ½ cups uncooked farro (255 g)', '1 english cucumber seeded and chopped', 'salt to taste', '3 plum tomatoes', '½ cup scallions (50 g) chopped', 'fresh parsley minced for garnish', 'Yogurt-Dill Dressing', '¾ cup greek yogurt (215 g)', '½ lemon juiced', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon fresh parsley minced', '1 teaspoon fresh dill minced']
instructions: ['1: Rinse the 1 ½ cups uncooked farro and add it to a medium saucepan', '2:  Add water until the 1 ½ cups uncooked farro is covered', '3:  Bring to a boil over medium-high heat', '4:  Once boiling, reduce the heat to medium, cover, and cook for 25 minutes, until the 1 ½ cups uncooked farro is tenderWhile the 1 ½ cups uncooked farro cooks, seed and chop the 1 english cucumber', '5:  Add it to a large bowl and sprinkle with salt', '6:  Let sit for 15-20 minutes', '7:  Rinse the 1 english cucumbers in cold water and drain well', '8: Dice the 3 plum tomatoes', '9: Make the dressing: Add the ¾ cup greek yogurt, ½ lemon juice, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 teaspoon pepper, parsley, and 1 teaspoon fresh dill to a large bowl and stir to combine', '10: Add the 1 ½ cups uncooked farro, 1 english cucumbers, 3 plum tomatoes, and ½ cup scallions to the bowl with the dressing and toss to coat', '11:  Sprinkle with parsley']

ingredients: ['½ cup almond milk (120 mL) or milk of choice', '½ cup coffee (120 mL) cold', '1 ½ tablespoons dark cocoa powder', '1 banana frozen', '1 cup ice (140 g)', 'Garnish (Optional)', 'whipped cream', 'dark cocoa powder']
instructions: ['1: Put all ingredients into a blender and mix until smooth', '2: Serve in a glass and garnish with toppings (optional)']

ingredients: ['6 oz skinless salmon (170 g)', '7 oz asparagus (200 g)', 'olive oil to taste', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 egg', 'Parmesan Crust', '¼ cup panko breadcrumbs (12 g)', '¼ cup grated parmesan cheese (30 g)', '1 tablespoon fresh parsley chopped', 'salt to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2: In a medium bowl, mix the ¼ cup grated parmesan crust ingredients', '3: In a separate bowl, whisk 1 egg', '4:  Dredge the 6 oz skinless salmon in the 1 egg, then ¼ cup grated parmesan', '5: Lay the 6 oz skinless salmon on a baking sheet', '6:  Lay 7 oz asparagus beside the 6 oz skinless salmon', '7:  Drizzle with olive oil, then season with salt and pepper', '8: Bake for 10-12 minutes']

ingredients: ['1 cup warm milk (240 g) of choice', '2 bags chai tea', '1 pear cored and diced', '1 tablespoon honey', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '¼ teaspoon cinnamon']
instructions: ['1: Steep the chai tea 2 bags in the 1 cup warm milk for 3-5 minutes', '2: In a blender, combine the chai tea milk, 1 pear, 1 tablespoon honey, ½ teaspoon vanilla, and ¼ teaspoon cinnamon', '3:  Blend on high speed for 3 minutes, or until completely smooth', '4: Transfer the chai 1 pear mixture to a small saucepan and heat over medium-low heat until just 1 cup warmed through', '5:  Do not boil', '6: Pour into a mug and serve immediately', '7: Enjoy!Nutrition - Calories: 308, Total fat: 5 grams, Sodium: 132 mg, Total carbs: 60 grams, Dietary fiber: 7 grams, Sugars: 35 grams, Protein: 9 grams']

ingredients: ['Blue Ice', '3 cups water (710 mL)', '3 oz red cabbage (85 g) julienned', '1 cup sugar (200 g)', 'Lime Ice', '½ cup lime juice (120 mL)', '1 ½ cups water (360 mL)', '10 mint leaves', '2 tablespoons white rum']
instructions: ['1: Add water and 3 oz red cabbage to a medium-size pot', '2:  Bring the water to a boil, then strain the cabbage in a sieve over a bowl to reserve the blue liquid', '3: Pour the strained blue water into an ice tray', '4:  You will be left with 1 cup (235 ml) of blue water', '5:  Reserve the water and freeze the ice tray for 6 hours, or overnight', '6: Add the reserved blue water to a pot with the sugar and bring to a boil until the sugar has dissolved', '7:  Set aside', '8: Combine the lime juice with 1½ (355 ml) cups of water and stir to combine', '9:  Pour the lime mixture into an ice tray and freeze for 6 hours, up to overnight', '10: Add the blue ice cubes to a blender and blend until finely crushed', '11:  Put the crushed blue ice in a glass', '12: Wash the blender well', '13: Add the lime ice cubes and 8 10 mint leaves', '14:  Blend until finely crushed', '15:  Put the crushed lime and 10 mint ice on top of the blue ice', '16: Slowly pour the 2 tablespoons white rum and blue simple syrup', '17:  Top with a sprig of 10 mint']

ingredients: ['Mushroom Mixture', '8 oz mushrooms (225 g)', '1 clove garlic', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon black pepper', 'fresh thyme to taste', '12 oz beef tenderloin (340 g) 2 tenderloins', '2 tablespoons oil for searing', '2 tablespoons english mustard to taste', '¼ lb sliced ham (115 g)', '1 sheet puff pastry thawed rolled-out and cut into 2 - 7x7in (18x18cm) squares', 'egg wash 1 egg beaten with 1 tablespoon water']
instructions: ['1: In a food processor, place 8 oz mushrooms, 1 clove garlic, ½ teaspoon salt, ½ teaspoon black pepper, and fresh thyme and blend into a fine paste (about 30-60 seconds)', '2: Transfer to a medium-sized frying pan, being sure to spread it evenly across the bottom of the pan', '3: Cook the 8 oz mushrooms over medium-low heat while stirring frequently', '4:  After about 7-10 minutes the mushroom mixture should shrink to half the original volume and begin to form a paste', '5: NOTE: The goal here is to cook off the bulk of the water inside the 8 oz mushrooms', '6:  This’ll keep the 1 sheet puff pastry from being too mushy at the end', '7: At this point, remove the mushroom mixture from the heat and set it aside', '8: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '9: Liberally season the outside of the tenderloin pieces with ½ teaspoon salt and ½ teaspoon black pepper', '10: In another medium-sized frying pan, heat 2 tablespoons of neutral oil over high heat', '11:  Once the oil has begun to smoke, quickly sear the tenderloin pieces on both sides (45-60 seconds per-side)', '12: Once seared, transfer the meat to a plate or cutting board to rest', '13: Using a basting brush, generously paint the mustard over the resting pieces of 12 oz beef, making sure to coat both sides', '14: To assemble the Wellingtons, lay out a piece of 1 sheet puff pastry on a lightly floured surface', '15:  Place a piece of ¼ lb sliced ham in the center of the pasty', '16: Next, layer about 1 tablespoon of the mushroom mixture on the center of the ¼ lb sliced ham using the back of a spoon to flatten the paste to about the size of the tenderloin pieces', '17: Place one of the mustard-coated 12 oz beef fillet on top of the mushroom mixture, then top the piece of 12 oz beef with another spoonful of the mushroom mixture, making sure to pat it down flat across the top of the meat', '18: Layer with another piece of ¼ lb sliced ham and close the the Wellington by folding the 1 sheet puff pastry over the center of the meat', '19: Using your hands, carefully seal the edges of the pastry then transfer SEAM-SIDE DOWN to a baking tray lined with parchment paper', '20: Lightly brush the outside of each Wellington with egg wash', '21: Using the back of a paring knife, lightly score the tops of the pasty in a checkered pattern, being careful not to pierce the pastry', '22: Bake the Wellingtons in a 400˚F (200˚C) oven until the pastry is fully cooked and golden brown (about 20 minutes)', '23: Allow each Wellington to rest at least 10 minutes before cutting into it']

ingredients: ['Filling', '½ cup olive oil (120 mL)', '1 tablespoon bijol seasoning', '1 small red onion diced', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 lb ground beef (455 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '1 cup tomato sauce (260 g)', '¼ cup raisin (40 g)', 'Plantain Dough', '10 unripe plantains peeled and grated', '1 lb yucca (455 g) or yuatía peeled and grated', '2 chicken broth cubes ground', 'sazon goya seasoning powder to taste', '2 lime juices', 'milk as needed', 'bijol seasoning as needed', 'For Wrapping', '24 banana leaves cut into 10x12- inch (25x30 cm) rectangles heated over the stove until pliable', "butcher's twine", 'For Serving', 'ketchup', 'hot sauce']
instructions: ['1: Heat the ½ cup olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat', '2:  Add the Bijol seasoning and cook for 3 minutes or until the ½ cup olive oil turns 1 small reddish-orange and is aromatic', '3:  Set aside all but 2 tablespoons of the seasoned ½ cup olive oil and return the pan to the heat', '4: Add the 1 small red onion, 3 cloves garlic, 1 lb ground beef, 1 teaspoon salt, ½ teaspoon pepper, and ½ teaspoon dried oregano and stir to combine', '5:  Cook until the meat is well browned, around 15 minutes', '6: Add the 1 cup tomato sauce and raisins', '7:  Bring to a boil, then cover and 1 small reduce the heat to low', '8:  Simmer for 30 minutes, or until all of the liquid evaporates and the meat is tender', '9:  Remove from the heat and let cool', '10: Make the plantain dough: In a deep bowl, add the 10 unripe plantains, 1 lb yucca (455 g) or yuatía, 2 chicken broth cubes, Sazón Goya powder, 2 lime juice, some of the milk, Bijol seasoning, and reserved Bijol ½ cup olive oil', '11:  Stir to combine, adding more milk as needed until the dough is seasoned to your taste, soft, tacky, and light orange in color', '12: Lay a 24 banana leaf on a clean work surface and brush the center with Bijol ½ cup olive oil', '13:  Scoop 3 tablespoons of the plantain dough into the center of the square and top with 2 tablespoons of the 1 lb ground beef filling', '14:  Fold the 24 banana leaf in half, then roll up and tuck in the ends to seal', '15:  Tie tightly with twine to secure', '16:  Repeat with the remaining ingredients', '17: Bring a large pot of water to boil over medium heat and season with 1 teaspoon salt', '18:  Add the pasteles, cover, and cook for 40 minutes', '19:  Remove the pasteles from the pot', '20: Unwrap and serve with ketchup and hot sauce']

ingredients: ['1 cup heavy cream (240 mL)', '3 tablespoons sugar', '2 oz chocolate (60 g) milk or dark broken into small pieces ', '¼ cup heavy cream (60 mL) hot', '6 raspberries to garnish', '2 sprigs mint to garnish', '2 tubes tube cookie to garnish', 'Preparation', '1 cup heavy cream (240 mL)', '3 tablespoons sugar', '2 oz chocolate (60 g) milk or dark broken into small pieces ', '¼ cup heavy cream (60 mL) hot', '6 raspberries to garnish', '2 sprigs mint to garnish', '2 tubes tube cookie to garnish', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, combine the heavy cream and the sugar, beating with an electric mixer until soft peaks form when lifted from the bowl', '2:  Set aside two large spoonfuls of the whipped cream to garnish with at the end', '3: Whisk the chocolate and hot cream in a separate bowl until smooth, then fold in the mixture into the cream with a spatula until no streaks remain', '4: Split the chocolate cream mixture evenly between two martini glasses or your serving dish of choice, then chill for at least 1 hour', '5: Garnish with a spoonful of whipped cream, raspberries, mint, and the chocolate cookie']

ingredients: ['bread toasted', '2 tablespoons hummus', '½ avocado sliced', 'cucumber sliced', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Spread 2 tablespoons hummus on toast', '2: Top with ½ avocado cucumber sliced cucumbers and ½ avocado', '3: Sprinkle with salt and pepper']

ingredients: ['3 ½ cups farro (350 g) cooked', '1 ½ cups lentils (300 g) cooked', '1 cup grape tomato (150 g) halved', '1 cup cucumber (135 g) diced', '½ cup yellow bell pepper (50 g) diced', '½ cup red bell pepper (50 g)', '⅓ cup fresh parsley (15 g) chopped', '⅓ cup olive oil (80 mL)', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 teaspoon dijon mustard', '1 clove garlic minced', '1 teaspoon italian seasoning', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', 'fresh arugula to taste optional']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, combine the 3 ½ cups farro, 1 ½ cups lentils, tomatoes, cucumber, yellow ½ cup yellow bell ½ cup 2 tablespoons red bell ¼ teaspoon pepper, ½ cup 2 tablespoons red ½ cup yellow bell ½ cup 2 tablespoons red bell ¼ teaspoon pepper, and parsley', '2: In a liquid measuring cup or small bowl, combine the olive oil, ½ cup 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, Dijon mustard, 1 clove garlic, Italian seasoning, ½ teaspoon salt, and ½ cup yellow bell ½ cup 2 tablespoons red bell ¼ teaspoon pepper, and whisk until well-combined', '3: Pour the vinaigrette over the 3 ½ cups farro salad and toss until well-combined', '4: Distribute the 3 ½ cups farro salad into airtight containers with the fresh arugula, if using', '5:  Refrigerate for up to 5 days']

ingredients: ['3 medium eggplants', '1 teaspoon cumin', '½ teaspoon chili powder', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon smoked paprika', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 ½ cups vegetarian barbecue sauce (435 g)', '6 buns', 'coleslaw for serving optional']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Place the eggplant on a non-stick baking sheet and prick all over with a fork', '3:  Bake for 20 minutes, until the skin is wrinkled', '4:  Reduce the oven temperature to 180°F (80°C)', '5: Transfer the eggplant to a large bowl and cover', '6:  Let cool and sweat for 10-15 minutes, until the skin peels off easily, and they are cool enough to handle', '7: Trim the stems from the eggplant and remove the skin completely', '8:  Tear the eggplant flesh into thin strips and set aside', '9: In a small bowl, combine the 1 teaspoon cumin, ½ teaspoon chili powder, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, 1 teaspoon 1 teaspoon 1 teaspoon smoked paprika, 1 teaspoon smoked 1 teaspoon 1 teaspoon 1 teaspoon smoked paprika, ½ teaspoon cayenne, 1 tablespoon brown sugar, 1 teaspoon salt, and ½ teaspoon cayenne 1 teaspoon pepper and mix well', '10: Add the eggplant strips to a non-stick baking sheet and sprinkle with the spice mix', '11:  Mix well with your hands to coat', '12: Bake for 45-50 minutes, until the ends of the eggplant strips start to dry out', '13: Increase the oven temperature to 250°F (120°C)Pour the 1 ½ cups vegetarian barbecue sauce over the eggplant and toss well to coat', '14: Bake for 15 minutes more, until the sauce has been absorbed by the eggplant', '15: Pile the eggplant on the 6 buns and top with coleslaw, if desired']

ingredients: ['6 fl oz champagne (180 mL)', '½ fl oz pomegranate juice (15 mL)', '1 tablespoon pomegranate seeds', '½ oz orange juice (15 mL)', '2 slices orange']
instructions: ['1: Pour the 6 fl oz champagne into an 8-ounce (240 ml) 6 fl oz champagne flute', '2: Add the pomegranate juice, pomegranate seeds, and orange juice to the glass', '3:  Drop in a slice of orange', '4: Garnish with another slice of orange and serve']

ingredients: ['⅔ cup greek yogurt (190 g) plain', '1 tablespoon lime juice', 'pepper to taste', '⅛ teaspoon chili powder', '1 avocado cubed divided', '2 chicken breasts cooked and shredded', '1 stalk celery diced', '2 tablespoons red onion diced', 'kosher salt to taste', 'bread low-carb for serving optional', 'fresh cilantro leaf for garnish']
instructions: ['1: In a blender or food processor, combine the ⅔ cup greek yogurt, 1 tablespoon lime juice, pepper, and ⅛ teaspoon chili powder and pulse to combine', '2:  Add ½ of the 1 avocado and blend until creamy', '3: In a medium bowl, combine the 2 chicken, ⅔ cup greek yogurt sauce, 1 stalk celery, the remaining ½ 1 avocado, 2 tablespoons red onion, and kosher salt', '4:  Mix until well combined', '5: Serve on low-carb bread and garnish with fresh cilantro, or as desired']

ingredients: ['8 eggs boiled and halved', '1 tablespoon avocado oil', '1 onion finely chopped', '2 small tomatoes finely chopped', '2 cloves garlic crushed and finely chopped', '1 tablespoon ginger finely grated', '1 ½ cups water (360 mL) adjust as needed', '1 ½ teaspoons paprika', '½ teaspoon red chili powder', '½ teaspoon turmeric', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon garam masala']
instructions: ['1: Heat 1 tablespoon avocado oil in a pan, and saute onions until translucent', '2: Add 2 small tomatoes and saute until soft', '3:  Then, add 2 cloves garlic, 1 tablespoon ginger, spices and 1 ½ cups water', '4:  Mix and let simmer for approximately 5 minutes', '5: Gently place the 8 eggs boiled egg halves into the gravy and simmer on low heat for approximately 5 min', '6: To serve, garnish with a sprig of cilantro and a sprinkle of ½ teaspoon garam masala']

ingredients: ['1 stick unsalted butter', '2 cups large yellow onion (300 g) diced', '3 carrots diced', '3 stalks celery diced', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 cup buffalo sauce (260 g)', '4 cups low sodium chicken broth (960 mL)', '½ cup heavy cream (120 mL)', '3 cups rotisserie chicken (375 g) shredded', '4 small bread bowls for serving', '½ cup crumbled blue cheese (55 g) for garnish', '2 scallions thinly sliced for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Melt the 1 stick unsalted butter in a 2 cups large stock pot over medium heat', '2:  Add the onion, 3 carrots, and 3 stalks celery', '3:  Cook, stirring occasionally, until the onions are translucent, about 3 minutes', '4:  Season with the ½ teaspoon kosher salt', '5: Add the 1 cup buffalo sauce and cook until the liquid is reduced and thickened, about 8 minutes', '6: Add the 4 cups low sodium 3 cups rotisserie chicken stock and bring the soup to a boil', '7:  Reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer until thickened, about 30 minutes', '8:   Remove the pot from the heat and stir in the ½ cup heavy cream and shredded 4 cups low sodium 3 cups rotisserie chicken', '9: Ladle the soup into the 4 small bread bowls and garnish with the ½ cup crumbled blue cheese and 2 scallions', '10:  Serve warm']

ingredients: ['Cookies', '½ cup organic sugar (100 g)', '¾ cup refined coconut oil (150 g) solid but not cold', '1 ½ teaspoons vanilla extract', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '2 cups all-purpose flour (250 g) plus more for dusting', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '5 tablespoons unsweetened non-dairy milk', 'Royal Icing', '3 cups organic powdered sugar (360 g)', '¼ teaspoon vanilla extract', '4 tablespoons water', 'blue gel food coloring', 'sprinkles of your choice for decorating']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2:  Line 2 ½ teaspoon baking sheets with parchment paper', '3: In a large bowl, cream together the ½ cup organic 3 cups organic 3 cups organic powdered sugar and ¾ cup refined coconut oil with an electric hand mixer until fluffy', '4: Add the vanilla and ½ teaspoon kosher salt, and stir with a rubber spatula to combine', '5:  Set aside', '6: Sift the 2 cups all-purpose flour and ½ teaspoon baking powder into a medium bowl', '7: Gradually add the 2 cups all-purpose flour mixture to the ¾ cup refined coconut oil mixture and stir to combine', '8: Gradually add the non-dairy 5 tablespoons unsweetened non-dairy milk and stir until a crumbly dough forms', '9:  Using your hands, knead the dough into a ball', '10: On a lightly 2 cups all-purpose floured surface, roll out the dough to about ¼-inch (½ cm) thick', '11: Use snowflake cookie cutters to cut out shapes and transfer to the prepared ½ teaspoon baking sheets about 2 inches (5 cm) apart', '12:  Re-roll excess dough to cut out more shapes', '13: Bake for 10-12 minutes, until slightly golden around the edges ', '14: Make the royal icing: Sift the 3 cups organic powdered ½ cup organic 3 cups organic 3 cups organic powdered sugar into a large bowl', '15:  Add the vanilla and some of the 4 tablespoons water', '16:  Whisk until smooth, adding more 4 tablespoons water as needed to reach your desired consistency', '17: Transfer half of the icing to another bowl and add blue gel food coloring to one', '18:  Immediately transfer the icing to piping bags, or cover with plastic wrap', '19:  Do not leave the icing uncovered, as it will develop a film', '20:  If this happens, add a small amount of 4 tablespoons water and whisk to incorporate until the icing returns to your desired consistency', '21: Decorate the cookies with the royal icing and sprinkles', '22:  Let dry completely, at least 3-4 hours or overnight']

ingredients: ['1 cup unsweetened almond milk (240 mL)', '½ cup frozen strawberry (75 g)', '½ cup frozen mango (80 g)', '1 banana sliced', '¾ cup cauliflower florets (225 g)', '1 tablespoon chia seeds', '1 tablespoon hemp seeds']
instructions: ['1: In a blender, combine the 1 cup unsweetened almond milk, strawberries, ½ cup frozen mango, 1 banana, ¾ cup cauliflower, 1 tablespoon chia seeds, and 1 tablespoon hemp seeds', '2:  Blend until smooth']

ingredients: ['1 ear corn husked', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'kosher salt to taste', '1 tablespoon sour cream', '1 tablespoon mayonnaise', '1 teaspoon fresh lime juice', '¼ teaspoon chili powder plus more for garnish', '1 tablespoon grated Cotija cheese', '1 tablespoon fresh cilantro']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C)', '2: Add the 1 ear corn to a medium cast iron skillet', '3:  Drizzle with the 1 tablespoon olive oil and season with kosher salt', '4: Roast for 15–20 minutes, until charred on the outside and tender on the inside', '5: In a small bowl, mix together the 1 tablespoon sour cream, 1 tablespoon mayonnaise, 1 teaspoon fresh lime juice, kosher salt, and ¼ teaspoon chili powder', '6: Remove 1 ear corn from the oven and let cool slightly', '7:  Brush all over with the 1 tablespoon mayonnaise mixture, then sprinkle with the Cotija, 1 tablespoon fresh cilantro, and more ¼ teaspoon chili powder']

ingredients: ['3 guajillo chiles stems removed and seeded', '2 ancho chilies stems removed and seeded', '3 chiles de árbol stems removed and seeded', '1 tomato halved', '3 cups water (720 mL)', '½ onion chopped', '3 cloves garlic', 'salt to taste', '16 corn tortillas cut into triangles', 'canola oil for frying', '4 large eggs', '½ cup queso fresco (55 g) crumbled for serving', '¼ cup red onion (35 g) diced for serving', '1 avocado sliced for serving', '2 tablespoons fresh cilantro chopped for serving']
instructions: ['1: In a small pot, combine the guajillos, anchos, chiles de árbol, halved 1 tomato, and water', '2:  Bring to a boil over [level] heat', '3:  Cover cover and cook for 10 minutes, or until the peppers are rehydrated and softened', '4: Using a slotted spoon, transfer the peppers and 1 tomato to a blender', '5:  Add the ½ ¼ cup red onion, 3 cloves garlic, salt, and about ½ cup (60 g) of the pepper cooking liquid', '6:  Blend until smooth, adding more liquid as needed if the sauce is too thick', '7: Cut the 16 corn tortillas into triangles', '8:  Add to a cast iron with around 2 3 cups (480 ml) of heated canola oil', '9: Fry the tortilla triangles until golden and crispy', '10:  Leaving the chips in the pan, remove all but 2 2 tablespoons of the hot canola oil', '11: Add the 4 large eggs to the pan and stir around with the chips', '12:  Once the 4 large eggs are almost set, pour in the chile sauce and stir until well-combined', '13: Top the chilaquiles with queso fresco, red ½ ¼ cup red onion, 1 avocado, and cilantro', '14: Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['1 small seedless watermelon scooped into balls', '1 small cantaloupe seeded and scooped into balls', '1 small honeydew melon seeded and scooped into balls', '1 bottle moscato wine (750 ml)', '2 limes juiced', '2 tablespoons honey', '1 bottle sparkling wine such as Prosecco or Brut (750 ml)', '2 limes sliced into wheels', 'Special Equipment', '1 melon baller', '1 large pitcher or punch bowl for serving']
instructions: ['1: In a 1 large pitcher or punch bowl, combine the 1 small seedless watermelon, 1 small cantaloupe, and 1 small 1 small 2 tablespoons honeydew balls, Moscato wine, lime juice, and 1 small 2 tablespoons honey and stir well', '2:  Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 6 hours, up to overnight', '3: Before serving, pour in the 1 bottle sparkling wine and add the lime 2 limes sliced into wheels', '4: Ladle the sangria and fruit into glasses and serve', '5: Enjoy! ']

ingredients: ['Roasted Pork', '1 head garlic separated and peeled', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '2 teaspoons freshly ground black pepper', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', '⅓ cup fresh oregano (15 g)', '⅓ cup fresh orange juice (80 mL) from about 1 large orange', '¼ cup fresh lime juice (60 mL) about 3 limes', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL)', '1 lb pork tenderloin (455 g)', 'Sliders', '12 slider rolls', '6 slices baked ham', '12 slices roasted pork', '12 slices salami', '4 slices swiss cheese', '3 kosher pickles thinly sliced lengthwise', '3 tablespoons yellow mustard', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter melted']
instructions: ['1: In a blender, combine the 1 head garlic cloves, 2 teaspoons ground cumin, 2 teaspoons freshly ground black pepper, 2 teaspoons kosher salt, ⅓ cup fresh oregano, ⅓ cup fresh orange juice, and ¼ cup fresh lime juice', '2:  Blend on high speed until smooth', '3: Pour the marinade into a large zip top plastic bag and add the 1 lb 12 slices roasted pork tenderloin, massaging to coat well', '4:  Seal the bag and marinate in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours, up to overnight', '5: Preheat the oven to 500°F (260°C)', '6: Transfer the 1 lb 12 slices roasted pork to a roasting pan and roast until a crust begins to form and the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C) , about 20 minutes', '7:  Remove from the oven and let the 1 lb 12 slices roasted pork rest for at least 10 minutes before carving (if you have time, you can refrigerate the 1 lb 12 slices roasted pork overnight so it’s easier to slice)', '8: Cut 15 slices from the 1 lb 12 slices roasted pork tenderloin, reserving any leftovers for another use', '9: Make the 12 sliders: Reduce the oven temperature to 350°F (180°C)', '10:  Line a baking sheet with parchment', '11: Place the bottom halves of the 12 slider rolls on the baking sheet and layer with the ham, 1 lb 12 slices roasted pork, salami, Swiss cheese, and 3 kosher pickles', '12: Slather the inside of the top halves of the rolls with the 3 tablespoons yellow mustard, then place on top of the 12 sliders', '13:  Brush the tops with melted 2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '14: Bake the 12 sliders until the top turns golden brown and the cheese is completely melted, about 10 minutes', '15: Pull the sandwiches apart and serve']

ingredients: ['3 chicken breasts boneless and skinless', 'salt to taste', '1 cup mozzarella cheese (100 g)', '2 cups flour (250 g)', '6 eggs beaten', '2 cups bread crumbs (230 g)', '1 cup oil (240 g) for frying', '3 cups tomato sauce (780 g)', '½ cup grated parmesan cheese (55 g)', '2 tablespoons fresh basil', 'Preparation', '3 chicken breasts boneless and skinless', 'salt to taste', '1 cup mozzarella cheese (100 g)', '2 cups flour (250 g)', '6 eggs beaten', '2 cups bread crumbs (230 g)', '1 cup oil (240 g) for frying', '3 cups tomato sauce (780 g)', '½ cup grated parmesan cheese (55 g)', '2 tablespoons fresh basil', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Season chicken with salt', '2: Cut a pocket into each chicken breast', '3: Stuff the pockets evenly with the mozzarella cheese', '4: Press the edges of the chicken together to seal the pocket', '5: Separate the flour, eggs, and bread crumbs into 3 separate bowls', '6: Being careful to keep the chicken from opening, dip the stuffed chicken in the flour, shaking off the excess', '7: Dip the floured chicken into the egg, then the bread crumbs, coating it evenly', '8: Heat the oil in a large pan over medium heat', '9:  Preheat oven to 180°C', '10: Fry the chicken until golden brown on both sides', '11: Place ⅔ of the tomato sauce evenly on the bottom of a baking dish', '12:  Place the chicken on top', '13: Top with the rest of the tomato sauce, then sprinkle the parmesan and basil on top', '14: Bake for 20 minutes']

ingredients: ['1 cup flour (125 g)', '2 tablespoons organic sugar', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 cup non-dairy milk (240 mL)', '1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar', '1 teaspoon vanilla', 'maple syrup to serve']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, add the flour, 2 tablespoons organic sugar, 1 tablespoon baking powder, and ½ teaspoon salt, and stir to combine', '2: In a medium bowl or liquid measuring cup, add almond milk, 1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar, and 1 teaspoon vanilla, and stir to combinePour the liquid mixture into the dry mixture and whisk until smooth', '3: Let batter rest for 5 minutes', '4: Pour about ½ cup (65 grams) of batter onto a nonstick pan or griddle over medium heat', '5: When the top begins to bubble, flip the pancake and cook until golden', '6: Serve warm with maple syrup']

ingredients: ['2 cups almond flour (190 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ cup grated parmesan cheese (30 g)', '2 tablespoons avocado oil or olive oil', '3 tablespoons ice water']
