instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: Combine the 2 cups almond flour, 1 teaspoon salt, ½ teaspoon pepper, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, and Parmesan in a large bowl', '3: Add the 2 tablespoons avocado oil and mix thoroughly with a fork', '4: Add the 3 tablespoons ice water, 1 tablespoon at a time, and mix thoroughly, until small clumps form and the dough holds together when squeezed', '5: Form the dough into a round, flattening the top and bottom as evenly as possible', '6: Place the dough on a sheet of parchment paper and add another piece of parchment on top', '7:  Roll out the dough as evenly as possible, to between ¼- and ⅛-inch (6- and 3-mm) thick', '8: Remove the top layer of parchment paper and place on a baking sheet', '9:  You may need to press the edges of the dough to form an even rectangle', '10: Using a cookie cutter or pizza cutter, slice the dough to desired size', '11:  If using a cookie cutter, re-roll the excess dough and cut out more crackers', '12: If desired, use the blunt end of a skewer to poke holes in each of the crackers', '13: Carefully place the crackers on the baking sheet', '14:  If the dough is too warm, the crackers will break as you attempt to transfer them', '15:  Chill in the freezer for 10 minutes before proceeding if this happens', '16: Bake for 15-20 minutes, flipping halfway, until golden brown', '17: Let the crackers cool completely and serve as desired', '18:  Store up to 1 week at room temperature in an airtight container']

ingredients: ['½ large watermelon diced', '1 cucumber diced', '1 red onion chopped', 'salt to taste', 'feta cheese to taste', '⅓ cup balsamic vinegar (80 g)']
instructions: ['1: Cut a ½ large watermelon in half lengthwise', '2: Dice half of the watermelon and save the rind for later', '3: Place watermelon, 1 cucumber, 1 red onion, salt, and ⅓ cup balsamic vinegar into ½ large bowl and mix together', '4: Pour salad into hollowed out watermelon rind (optional)']

ingredients: ['14 oz new york strip steak (400 g) or other steak of good quality', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', '2 tablespoons coarsely ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '2 tablespoons butter divided', '1 cup cream (240 mL)', '⅓ cup brandy or cognac (80 mL)', '1 tablespoon dijon mustard']
instructions: ['1: Liberally season 14 oz new york strip steak with 2 teaspoons kosher salt and 2 tablespoons coarsely ground black pepper, being sure to coat the entire surface of the meat', '2:  Using your hands, press the seasoning into the meat to create an even coating', '3: Heat the vegetable oil and 1 tablespoon of 2 tablespoons butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat until just smoking', '4:  Add the 14 oz new york strip steak to the pan and sear for 4 minutes', '5:  Turn and sear the other side for another 4 minutes, for medium-rare', '6:  If 14 oz new york strip steak has a fat-cap on its side, be sure to sear it as well for 30 seconds to 1 minute', '7:  Once cooked to desired doneness, transfer the 14 oz new york strip steak to a cutting board to rest', '8: Reduce the heat to medium and add the ⅓ cup brandy to the skillet', '9:  Allow the ⅓ cup brandy to cook down for about 1 minute while using a whisk to scrape off any browned bits in the bottom of the pan', '10:  Once the ⅓ cup brandy has reduced by half, add the 1 cup cream and continue to whisk until combined', '11:  Add the Dijon mustard and remaining tablespoon of 2 tablespoons butter and continue to cook until mixture begins to reduce and thicken, 5-7 minutes', '12:  The final pan sauce should have a rich consistency and coat the back of a spoon', '13:  Reduce the heat to low', '14: Slice the 14 oz new york strip steak into ½-inch (1', '15: 5cm) pieces', '16:  Pour 1 cup cream sauce over the top and serve']

ingredients: ['¼ cup balsamic vinegar (60 mL)', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '¼ cup honey (85 g)', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '4 peaches', '2 boneless skinless chicken breasts', 'oil to taste', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '5 oz mixed greens (140 g)', '1 cup grape tomatoes (200 g) halved', '½ cucumber chopped', '½ red onion sliced', '½ cup pecan (60 g)']
instructions: ['1: Add the ¼ cup balsamic vinegar, 2 tablespoons olive 2 tablespoons olive oil, ¼ cup honey, salt, and pepper to a bowl and mix until well combined', '2:  Reserve half for salad dressing', '3: Halve the 4 peaches and remove the pit', '4:  Lightly brush the cut side with ¼ cup balsamic vinaigrette', '5: Grill for 5 minutes over medium high heat, or until browned', '6: On a cutting board, sprinkle the 2 boneless skinless chicken with 2 tablespoons olive oil, salt, and pepper', '7: Grill the 2 boneless skinless chicken until browned on one side and flip', '8:  Brush with vinaigrette on cooked side and repeat once other side is browned', '9: Prepare the 4 peaches and 2 boneless skinless chicken for the salad by slicing both', '10: Add the grilled 4 peaches and 2 boneless skinless chicken to a bowl with the 5 oz mixed greens, 1 cup grape tomatoes, ½ cucumber, ½ red onion, and pecans, and drizzle with the remaining ¼ cup balsamic vinaigrette', '11:  Mix thoroughly']

ingredients: ['2 sausage patties', '2 slices ham quartered', '5 eggs', '1 splash milk', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 bacons sliced in half width-wise', '5 english muffins halved', '5 slices cheddar cheese', 'fresh spinach']
instructions: ['1: On a large plate, arrange the 2 sausage and the 2 slices ham in a circle, then place a microwaveable mug in the center', '2: Crack the 5 eggs into the mug, season with salt, pepper, and add a 1 splash of milk', '3:  Stir until evenly mixed', '4: Microwave the entire plate for about 2 minutes until the egg is cooked through, making sure it does not bubble over', '5: Remove the plate and microwave the bacon strips on a separate plate for about 4-7 minutes', '6:  Check the bacon at 4 minutes, then every minute or so to make sure it doesn’t burn', '7: Drain the bacon of its fat, then set aside', '8: Invert the mug with the egg, then slice the egg cylinder into 5 equal rounds', '9:  You may have to run a knife around the mug first to ensure that the egg comes loose in one solid piece', '10: To assemble, layer your sandwich as you’d like with the meat, egg, 5 slices cheddar cheese, and fresh spinach', '11: Wrap each sandwich in a damp paper towel, then with parchment paper', '12:  Place the sandwiches in a large zip top bag, then freeze for up until 1 month', '13: When ready to eat, remove a sandwich from the freezer, unwrap the parchment, and microwave for about 2 minutes', '14:  Cool for 1 minute, then unwrap the paper towel']

ingredients: ['1 ½ cups raspberry (190 g)', '½ cup lemon juice (120 mL)', 'Simple Syrup', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '1 cup sugar (200 g)', '2 cups raspberry (250 g)']
instructions: ['1: Combine 1 cup water, 1 cup sugar, and raspberries in a pot over medium heat', '2:  Once the 1 cup sugar has dissolved, simmer for 30 minutes and reduce', '3: Pour simple syrup through a strainer and remove excess liquid, then let it cool to room temperature', '4: In a blender, combine simple syrup, the remaining raspberries, and ½ cup lemon juice', '5:  Blend until well-combined', '6: Pour into an 8×8 inch (20x20 cm) baking dish and freeze for at least 12 hours', '7: Take out of the freezer and let sit for 5-10 minutes before scooping then serve']

ingredients: ['1 lb boneless skinless chicken thighs (454 g)', 'olive oil to drizzle', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '8 oz green beans (225 g) trimmed', '2 carrots sliced', '8 oz cherry tomatoes (234 g)', 'Sauce', '⅓ cup lemon juice (78 mL)', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '3 tablespoons honey', '1 clove garlic minced']
instructions: ['1: In a small bowl, combine ⅓ cup lemon juice, olive oil, 3 tablespoons honey, and 1 clove garlic', '2:  Set aside', '3: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '4: In a cast-iron skillet, brown 1 lb boneless skinless chicken for 2-3 minutes on each side', '5:  Add olive oil, salt, and pepper', '6:  Remove from pan and set aside', '7: Add the 8 oz green beans, 8 oz cherry tomatoes, and 2 carrots to the pan', '8:  Return 1 lb boneless skinless chicken to pan on top of the vegetables', '9: Pour the sauce on top of the 1 lb boneless skinless chicken and veggies', '10: Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the internal temperature of the 1 lb boneless skinless chicken reaches 165˚F (75˚C)', '11: Serve immediately and enjoy!']

ingredients: ['1 lemon', '½ cup almond milk (120 mL) plus 1-2 teaspoons', '2 ½ cups whole wheat pastry flour (240 g) plus more for dusting', '½ cup organic cane sugar (100 g)', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons poppy seeds', '1 tablespoon food-grade lavender', '½ cup coconut oil (100 g) solid', '1 large egg', '1 cup powdered sugar (120 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C) and line a 1 tablespoon baking sheet with parchment paper', '2: Zest the 1 lemon into a small bowl and set aside', '3: Juice the 1 lemon and set aside 1 ½ cup almond milk (120 mL) plus 1-2 ½ teaspoon for the glaze', '4:  Combine the rest with ½ cup (120 ml) of almond milk and set aside for 5-10 minutes while you make the rest of the dough', '5:  (The almond milk will curdle, that’s okay! This creates a dairy-free substitute for buttermilk', '6: )In a 1 large bowl, combine the flour, sugar, 1 tablespoon baking powder, salt, 2 tablespoons poppy seeds, and 1 tablespoon food-grade lavender', '7:  Whisk well', '8: Add the coconut oil and cut it into the flour mixture with a 2 ½ cups whole wheat pastry cutter, a fork, or your fingers until the flour mixture is crumbly and there are no 1 large chunks left', '9: Add the 1 lemon zest, curdled almond milk, and egg', '10:  Fold the ingredients until the dough forms', '11: Transfer the dough to a lightly floured surface', '12:  Sprinkle with just enough flour to keep the dough from sticking as you form it into a disc about 1½-2 inches (4-5 cm) thick', '13: Cut the dough into 8 triangular scones', '14:  Transfer the scones to the prepared 1 tablespoon baking sheet, spacing evenly', '15: Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until golden brown', '16:  Let cool', '17: Make the glaze: In a small bowl, combine powdered sugar, remaining 1-2 ½ cup almond milk (120 mL) plus 1-2 ½ teaspoons of almond milk, and the reserved ½ cup almond milk (120 mL) plus 1-2 ½ teaspoon of 1 lemon juice', '18:  Whisk until smooth', '19: Drizzle the glaze over the cooled scones and let it harden, 5-10 minutes', '20: Serve with hot tea']

ingredients: ['1 stick butter 1 stick softened', '4 cloves garlic minced', '⅓ cup parmesan cheese (35 g)', '⅓ cup shredded monterey jack cheese (35 g)', '⅓ cup shredded cheddar cheese (35 g)', '⅓ cup fresh green onion (50 g) sliced', '1 baguette 8 inch (20 cm)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: In a bowl, combine all of the ingredients except the 1 baguette, and mix until smooth', '3: Slice the 1 baguette in half lengthwise, then spread the 1 stick butter mixture evenly on both sides of the 1 baguette', '4: Place on a tray lined with parchment paper and bake for about 15 minutes, until cheese is bubbly and starting to brown on the edges', '5: Slice, cool, then serve']

ingredients: ['For the sauce:', '3 tablespoons sesame oil', '2 teaspoons rice wine vinegar', '3 tablespoons dark soy sauce', '4 tablespoons honey', '30 mL bourbon whiskey (30 mL)', '15 mL fresh lime juice (15 mL)', '4 medium cloves garlic cloves finely chopped', '2 teaspoons smoked paprika', '4 tablespoons dark muscovado sugar', '1 teaspoon red chili flakes', '2 teaspoons corn flour', '1 teaspoon sesame seeds', 'For the ribs:', '1 whole rack of pork ribs', 'For the rub:', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '1 tablespoon pepper', '1 tablespoon dark muscovado sugar']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 150 degrees celsius', '2: Mix together the 1 tablespoon kosher salt, 1 tablespoon pepper and sugar for the rub and apply liberally over the For the 1 whole rack of pork ribs', '3: Wrap entirely in foil and bake in the oven for 2 hours at 150 degrees celsius / 300 degrees Fahrenheit', '4: In a For the 3 tablespoons dark soy saucepan, combine all of the For the 3 tablespoons dark soy sauce ingredients and bring to a boil then immediately reduce the heat until the For the 3 tablespoons dark soy sauce thickens and then set aside', '5: Remove the For the 1 whole rack of pork ribs from the oven and unwrap from the foil', '6:  Brush a generous amount of the BBQ For the 3 tablespoons dark soy sauce over both sides of the For the 1 whole rack of pork ribs and place back in the oven for a further 10 minutes', '7: Remove from the oven, brush more bbq For the 3 tablespoons dark soy sauce on and sprinkle with sesame seeds']

ingredients: ['1 slice bread toasted', '4 slices cantaloupe', '1 piece prosciutto', 'feta cheese to taste']
instructions: ['1: Top toast with 4 slices cantaloupe, 1 piece prosciutto, and a sprinkle of feta']

ingredients: ['Pork Loin', '1 Kroger® Boneless Whole Pork Tenderloin', '2 dried bay leaves', '4 tablespoons kosher salt', '1 teaspoon whole black peppercorn', '1 teaspoon whole fennel seeds', '2 teaspoons whole anise seeds', '1 teaspoon garlic minced', '1 ½ teaspoons ground cinnamon', '3 cups apple cider (720 mL)', '½ cup maple syrup (165 g)', 'Rub', '2 ½ tablespoons fresh sage minced', '2 ½ tablespoons fresh rosemary minced', '2 ½ tablespoons fresh thyme minced', '1 teaspoon garlic minced', '¼ cup maple syrup (85 g)', '½ cup apple cider (120 mL)', '1 ½ teaspoons olive oil', 'Gravy', '½ cup white wine (120 mL)', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '½ cup apple cider (120 mL)', '1 cup chicken stock (240 mL) divided plus 2 teaspoons', '¾ cup heavy cream (180 mL)', '2 teaspoons cornstarch', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', 'Preparation', 'Pork Loin', '1 Kroger® Boneless Whole Pork Tenderloin', '2 dried bay leaves', '4 tablespoons kosher salt', '1 teaspoon whole black peppercorn', '1 teaspoon whole fennel seeds', '2 teaspoons whole anise seeds', '1 teaspoon garlic minced', '1 ½ teaspoons ground cinnamon', '3 cups apple cider (720 mL)', '½ cup maple syrup (165 g)', 'Rub', '2 ½ tablespoons fresh sage minced', '2 ½ tablespoons fresh rosemary minced', '2 ½ tablespoons fresh thyme minced', '1 teaspoon garlic minced', '¼ cup maple syrup (85 g)', '½ cup apple cider (120 mL)', '1 ½ teaspoons olive oil', 'Gravy', '½ cup white wine (120 mL)', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '½ cup apple cider (120 mL)', '1 cup chicken stock (240 mL) divided plus 2 teaspoons', '¾ cup heavy cream (180 mL)', '2 teaspoons cornstarch', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Place the Kroger® Boneless Whole Pork Tenderloin in a gallon-size resealable bag', '2:  Add the bay leaves, salt, black peppercorns, fennel seeds, anise seeds, garlic, cinnamon, apple cider, and maple syrup to the bag', '3:  Shake the bag until the pork loin is well coated', '4:  Seal the bag and transfer to the refrigerator to marinate for 2 hours, or overnight', '5: Meanwhile, make the rub: In a small bowl, whisk together the sage, rosemary, thyme, garlic, maple syrup, and apple cider', '6: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '7: Transfer the pork loin from the bag to a cutting board and pat dry with paper towels', '8:  Spoon the rub all over the pork loin', '9: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat', '10:  Starting with the fattiest side, sear the pork loin on all sides until light golden brown, 2–3 minutes per side', '11: Transfer the seared pork loin to a 9x13” baking dish and cover with aluminum foil', '12:  Bake for 40 minutes, then remove the foil and bake for 5 minutes more, until the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C)', '13: Meanwhile make the gravy: Place the skillet used to sear the pork loin over medium heat', '14:  Deglaze with the white wine, scraping up any browned bits from the bottom of the pan', '15:  Cook until the wine is reduced by half, about 1 minute', '16:  Add the balsamic vinegar, apple cider, 1 cup of chicken stock, and the heavy cream', '17:  Simmer for about 3 minutes', '18: In a small bowl, whisk together the cornstarch and remaining 2 teaspoons of chicken stock until smooth', '19:  Pour the slurry into the gravy and stir to combine', '20:  Simmer for another 3 minutes, or until the gravy thickens', '21:  Stir in the salt', '22:  Strain the gravy through a fine-mesh sieve into a gravy boat or medium bowl', '23:  Keep warm until ready to serve', '24: Serve the pork roast warm with the apple cider gravy and holiday vegetables of choice alongside']

ingredients: ['Seafood Gumbo Stock', '1 tablespoon canola oil', '3 blue crabs wasged and halved crosswise', '2 lb shrimp shells and heads (910 g)', 'Bell pepper onion and celery scrap', '1 green onion halved crosswise', '3 sprigs fresh italian parsley', '3 sprigs fresh thyme', '2 cloves garlic', '2 dried bay leaves', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '13 cups water (3 L)', 'Creole Seasoning', '1 ½ tablespoons kosher salt', '1 tablespoon ground white pepper', '2 tablespoons freshly ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon cayenne', '1 tablespoon paprika', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '1 tablespoon onion powder', '¾ teaspoon dried thyme', '¾ teaspoon dried oregano', 'Gumbo', '8 tablespoons canola oil divided', '2 cups okra (200 g) sliced', '½ cup all purpose flour (60 g)', '1 medium yellow onion chopped', '1 medium bell pepper seeded and chopped', '2 stalks celery chopped', '4 cloves garlic minced', '2 dried bay leaves', '1 lb smoked sausage (425 g) sliced into 1/4 in (6 mm) thick rounds', '6 blue crabs washed and halved crosswise', '5 sprigs fresh thyme', '1 tablespoon worcestershire sauce', 'kosher salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 lb shrimp (910 g) peeled deveined and rinsed', '6 cups rice (1.2 kg) cooked', '3 tablespoons fresh italian parsley chopped', '¼ cup green onion (10 g) sliced', '1 teaspoon filé powder', 'Preparation', 'Seafood Gumbo Stock', '1 tablespoon canola oil', '3 blue crabs wasged and halved crosswise', '2 lb shrimp shells and heads (910 g)', 'Bell pepper onion and celery scrap', '1 green onion halved crosswise', '3 sprigs fresh italian parsley', '3 sprigs fresh thyme', '2 cloves garlic', '2 dried bay leaves', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '13 cups water (3 L)', 'Creole Seasoning', '1 ½ tablespoons kosher salt', '1 tablespoon ground white pepper', '2 tablespoons freshly ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon cayenne', '1 tablespoon paprika', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '1 tablespoon onion powder', '¾ teaspoon dried thyme', '¾ teaspoon dried oregano', 'Gumbo', '8 tablespoons canola oil divided', '2 cups okra (200 g) sliced', '½ cup all purpose flour (60 g)', '1 medium yellow onion chopped', '1 medium bell pepper seeded and chopped', '2 stalks celery chopped', '4 cloves garlic minced', '2 dried bay leaves', '1 lb smoked sausage (425 g) sliced into 1/4 in (6 mm) thick rounds', '6 blue crabs washed and halved crosswise', '5 sprigs fresh thyme', '1 tablespoon worcestershire sauce', 'kosher salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 lb shrimp (910 g) peeled deveined and rinsed', '6 cups rice (1.2 kg) cooked', '3 tablespoons fresh italian parsley chopped', '¼ cup green onion (10 g) sliced', '1 teaspoon filé powder', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Make the seafood gumbo stock: In a heavy-bottomed 5-quart pot, heat the canola oil over medium heat', '2:  Once the oil is shimmering, add the crabs and cook until the shells turn bright orange, 2–3 minutes', '3:  Add the shrimp shells and heads and cook until the shells turn pink, 2–3 minutes more', '4:  Smash the crab and shrimp shells, similar to mashing potatoes, to release any juices', '5: Add the bell pepper, onion, and celery scraps, green onion, parsley, thyme, garlic, bay leaves, black pepper, and water', '6:  Bring to a gentle boil, then reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer for 30–35 minutes', '7: Strain the stock through a large fine-mesh sieve into a large bowl', '8:  You should have 12 cups', '9:  Set aside until ready to use in the gumbo (if not using immediately, the stock can be cooled, then stored in an airtight container in the refrigerator for 1–3 days)', '10: Make the Creole seasoning: In a small bowl, whisk together the salt, white pepper, black pepper, cayenne, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, thyme, and oregano until well combined', '11: Make the gumbo: Heat 6 tablespoons canola oil in a heavy-bottomed 6-quart pot over medium-high heat until faint wisps of white smoke come off the oil (if thicker, darker smoke appears, remove the pot from the heat and let cool for 3 minutes)', '12:  Add the okra and fry for 2 minutes, until army-green in color', '13:  Use a slotted spoon to transfer the okra to a paper towel-lined plate to drain, leaving any remaining oil behind in the pot', '14: Add the remaining 2 tablespoons of oil to the same pot', '15:  Heat the oil over medium-high heat until faintly smoking again (do not let it overheat, or the flour will burn)', '16:  Whisk in the flour to make a roux and cook, whisking constantly, until it turns a dark cocoa brown, 5–6 minutes', '17:  (If the roux is browning too quickly, remove the pot from the heat while continuing to stir and reduce the heat to medium-low', '18: )Reduce the heat to medium, then add the onion, bell pepper, celery, and 2 tablespoons of the Creole seasoning', '19:  Cook, stirring, for 2–3 minutes, until onions have softened', '20:  Add the garlic, bay leaves, and remaining Creole seasoning', '21: Increase the heat to medium-high heat', '22:  While whisking or stirring constantly to prevent lumps from forming, add the seafood gumbo stock, 4 cups at a time', '23:  Add the okra, smoked sausage, crabs, thyme, and Worcestershire sauce', '24:  Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer uncovered for 1 hour, skimming off any foamy flour residue that rises to the surface', '25:  The gumbo should thicken and reduce by one quarter', '26: Season the gumbo with the salt and pepper to taste, then add the shrimp', '27:  Remove the pot from the heat, cover, and let the residual heat cook the shrimp for 10 minutes', '28: Ladle the hot gumbo into bowls', '29:  Serve with rice and garnish with parsley, green onions, and filé powder, if using', '30: It’s important to properly cool and store leftover seafood gumbo, otherwise it will spoil', '31:  Fill a clean 2-liter bottle or plastic juice jug with water and freeze until solid', '32:  Once finished eating, place the ice bottle in the pot of gumbo and let cool, stirring occasionally to release heat', '33:  Transfer the gumbo to an airtight container and refrigerate for up to 5 days', '34:  11', '35:  The gumbo can also be frozen for up to 3 months']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '1 cup kimchi (230 g) drained and roughly chopped', '2 flour tortillas 8-inch (20cm)', '2 tablespoons sesame seed toasted', '1 cup sharp cheddar cheese (110 g) grated', '1 cup monterey jack cheese (110 g) grated', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil or oil of your choice', '1 bunch green onion diced']
instructions: ['1: Drain 1 cup kimchi and roughly chop', '2: Add 2 tablespoons butter to a large skillet over medium-high heat', '3:  When melted, add 1 cup kimchi', '4: Cook and stir for about 6 minutes until the edges of the 1 cup kimchi start to turn a golden brown', '5:  Transfer to a bowl and let it cool down', '6: Add the 1 cup kimchi, cheese, and 2 tablespoons sesame seeds to a tortilla', '7:  Fold the tortilla in half', '8: Pour 1 tablespoon vegetable oil into a large skillet over medium heat', '9:  Fry the quesadilla for about two minutes on each side, or until the tortilla has turned a golden brown and the cheese has melted', '10: Serve with a garnish of diced 1 bunch green onions and 2 tablespoons sesame seeds', '11:  Slice into quarters', '12: NOTE: Experiment with proteins by adding beef, pork, or chicken to the quesadillas', '13:  For even more of a Korean influence, try adding Korean BBQ-style proteins!']

ingredients: ['Farro Salad', '1 medium delicata squash cleaned', '3 tablespoons olive oil divided', '1 ½ teaspoons salt plus a pinch divided', '1 large fennel bulb', '½ teaspoon smoked paprika', '1 bunch lacinato kale woody stems removed roughly chopped', '4 ½ cups farro (750 g) cooked', '1 cup canned chickpea (200 g) drained and rinsed', '⅓ cup creamy goat cheese (75 g) crumbled', 'Apple Cider Vinaigrette', '½ cup apple cider vinegar (120 mL)', '¼ cup fresh lemon juice (60 mL)', '3 tablespoons honey', '1 tablespoon dijon mustard', '4 cloves garlic minced', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '½ cup extra virgin olive oil (120 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190˚C)', '2: Prepare the 1 medium delicata squash', '3:  Using a long, sharp knife, remove the ends of the squash, then cut in half lengthwise', '4:  Scoop out the seeds and pulp', '5:  Rinse and reserve the seeds', '6:  Lay each half of the squash down on its cut side and cut into ½-inch (1-cm) thick slices', '7: Place the squash in the 3 quart prep bowl along with 1 3 3 1 tablespoon of 3 3 1 tablespoons ½ cup extra virgin olive oil and 1 1 ½ ½ teaspoon of salt', '8:  Cover the bowl with the lid and shake to fully coat the squash', '9: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '10:  Transfer the squash to the baking sheet, spread in a single layer, and roast for 20 minutes', '11: While the squash is roasting, remove the fennel fronds and bottom end and thinly slice the bulb', '12:  Add to the bowl with 1 3 3 1 tablespoon of 3 3 1 tablespoons ½ cup extra virgin olive oil and ½ 1 ½ ½ teaspoon of salt', '13:  Cover and shake well to coat', '14: After 20 minutes, remove the baking sheet with the squash from the oven and add the fennel, spreading evenly', '15:  Return to the oven for another 20 minutes, until the squash is tender and slightly browned and the fennel is tender and caramelized', '16: Add the 1 medium delicata seeds to the 1½ quart prep bowl', '17:  Depending on how many seeds there are, add the remaining 3 3 1 tablespoon of 3 3 1 tablespoons ½ cup extra virgin olive oil, a pinch of salt, and ½-1 1 ½ ½ teaspoon smoked paprika', '18:  Cover the bowl with the lid and shake to coat the seeds well', '19: Line a small baking sheet with parchment paper', '20:  Spread the seeds in a single layer and add to the oven for the last 10 minutes while the squash and fennel finish roasting, until golden brown', '21: Make the vinaigrette: In a small bowl, add the ½ cup apple cider vinegar, ¼ cup fresh lemon juice, honey, Dijon, and 4 cloves garlic', '22:  Whisk to combine, then season with salt and pepper', '23:  Slowly stream in the 3 3 1 tablespoons ½ cup extra virgin olive oil, whisking to emulsify', '24:  Season with more salt, if needed', '25: In a 1 large bowl, assemble the salad', '26:  Add the 1 bunch lacinato kale, 4 ½ cups farro, and chickpeas, then the roasted 1 medium delicata and fennel, and finally the ⅓ cup creamy goat cheese', '27:  Toss to combine', '28:  Top with the roasted squash seeds', '29: Add the salad to a serving bowl and drizzle with the vinaigrette', '30: Leftover salad will keep in the fridge for up to 4 days', '31: Enjoy!Nutrition (without dressing) per serving - Calories: 275, Total fat: 10 grams, Total carbs: 40 grams, Dietary fiber: 10 grams, Sugars: 8 grams, Protein: 11 gramsNutrition – Apple Cider Vinaigrette per serving - Serving size: 2 3 3 1 tablespoons - Calories: 122, Total fat: 11 grams, Total carbs: 6 grams, Dietary fiber: 0 grams, Sugars: 5 grams, Protein: 0 grams']

ingredients: ['Crust', '10 sheets graham cracker', '6 tablespoons melted butter melted', 'Peppermint Cream', '½ cup coconut oil (120 g)', '½ cup heavy cream (120 mL)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '3 teaspoons peppermint extract', '2 tablespoons powdered sugar', 'Chocolate coating', '4 oz dark chocolate (115 g)', '2 tablespoons coconut oil']
instructions: ['1: Place 10 sheets graham crackers in a gallon-sized re-sealable plastic bag', '2:  Crush crackers with rolling pin until fine in texture', '3: In a bowl, combine crushed 10 sheets graham cracker with 6 tablespoons melted butter and mix well', '4: Line a 9×9 inch (23x23 cm) pan with parchment paper', '5:  Fill pan with 10 sheets graham cracker crumbs and pat down to create one even, compressed crust', '6:  Place in freezer', '7: In a large bowl, combine ingredients for 3 teaspoons peppermint ½ cup heavy cream with hand mixer until a thick, uniform ½ cup heavy cream is formed', '8: Remove pan from freezer and layer the 3 teaspoons peppermint ½ cup heavy cream on crust in one even layer', '9:  Freeze for at least 1 hour', '10: Remove pan from freezer and cut the sheet sheet of 3 teaspoons peppermint ½ cup heavy cream and 10 sheets graham cracker into 36 squares (i', '11: e', '12:  6 lengthwise cuts and 6 crosswise cuts)', '13:  Place squares on a metal cooling rack', '14: In a small bowl, combine 4 oz dark chocolate and coconut oil (the exact amount of coconut oil needed may vary based on the 4 oz dark chocolate used)', '15:  Microwave in 20-second intervals, stirring between each, until 4 oz dark chocolate is fully 6 tablespoons melted', '16: Top squares with 6 tablespoons melted 4 oz dark chocolate', '17: Chill squares in fridge or freezer until ready to eat']

ingredients: ['Roasted Pork', '1 head garlic cloves seperated and peeled', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '2 teaspoons freshly ground black pepper', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', '⅓ cup fresh oregano (10 g)', '⅓ cup fresh orange juice (80 mL) (from about 1 large orange)', '¼ cup fresh lime juice (60 mL) from about 3 limes', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL)', '2 lb boneless pork shoulder (910 g)', 'Sandwiches', '2 loaves cuban bread halved crosswise and lengthwise', '16 slices sweet ham baked', '8 slices salami', '8 slices swiss cheese', '4 kosher pickles thinly sliced lengthwise', '4 tablespoons yellow mustard', '4 tablespoons unsalted butter melted']
instructions: ['1: Make the roasted 2 lb boneless pork: In a blender, combine the 1 head garlic cloves, 2 teaspoons ground cumin, 2 teaspoons freshly ground black pepper, 2 teaspoons kosher salt, ⅓ cup fresh oregano, ⅓ cup fresh orange juice, and ¼ cup fresh lime juice', '2:  Blend on high speed until smooth', '3: Pour the marinade into a large zip-top plastic bag and add the 2 lb boneless pork shoulder, rubbing to coat well', '4:  Seal the bag and marinate in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours, up to overnight', '5: Preheat the oven to 325°F (160°C)', '6: Transfer the 2 lb boneless pork and its marinade to a roasting pan', '7:  Roast until a crust begins to form and the internal temperature reaches 190–195°F (85-90°C), about 3 hours', '8:  Remove from the oven and let the 2 lb boneless pork rest for at least 15 minutes before carving (if you have time, you can refrigerate the 2 lb boneless pork overnight so it’s easier to slice)', '9: Cut 12 slices of 2 lb boneless pork for the sandwiches and reserve the rest for another use', '10: Make the sandwiches: Heat a 10-inch (25 cm) cast iron skillet over medium heat', '11: Set the bottom halves of the Cuban bread on a cutting board and layer each piece with 4 slices of ham, 3 slices of 2 lb boneless pork, 2 slices of salami, 2 slices of Swiss cheese, and 4 pickle slices', '12: Slather 1 tablespoon of 4 tablespoons yellow mustard on the inside of each top half of bread, then place on top of each sandwich', '13: Brush the tops of the sandwiches with melted 4 tablespoons unsalted butter, then place in the hot skillet, top side down', '14:  Place a small pan on top of sandwiches and weigh down with a heavy can', '15:  Cook until the bread begins to crisp, about 2 minutes', '16:  Uncover and flip the sandwiches, then press again and cook until the bottom is crisp and the cheese is completely melted, about 2 minutes more', '17: Slice the sandwiches in half and serve']

ingredients: ['4 sheets puff pastry chilled', '2 eggs beaten', '25 hot dogs', 'spinach artichoke dip to serve', '1 cup chili dip (245 g) to serve', 'queso dip to serve']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Roll out the 4 sheets puff pastry into a square shape and brush the surface with egg wash', '3: Cut the 4 sheets puff pastry sheet into 6 equal rectangles', '4: Place a 25 hot dog on the bottom of each pastry rectangle, then roll it up tightly', '5: Slice each rolled 25 hot dog into 3 equal segments', '6: Repeat with the remaining 4 sheets puff pastry and 25 hot dogs', '7: In a large springform pan, place a circular wall of the 25 hot dog pieces around the circumference of the edge', '8:  Stack a second row of rolled 25 hot dogs on top, so that they go up the entire side of the pan', '9: Build a 3-way wall with more 25 hot dogs that all meet in the center to create 3 holes for the dips', '10: Carefully place each dip into each open space, spreading them out evenly and making sure the walls don’t move', '11: Cover with foil and bake for 1 hour and 45 minutes', '12: Remove the foil and bake uncovered for another 30 minutes until the pastry is crispy', '13: Cool until warm to the touch', '14:  Unclasp the springform pan']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons canola oil divided', '3 tablespoons garlic chopped', '2 sweet onions like Vidalia chopped', '2 cups mushrooms (150 g) thinly sliced', '½ tablespoon kosher salt', '½ tablespoon freshly ground black pepper', '2 lb flank steak (910 g)', '4 oz fresh baby spinach (115 g) 1 package', '9 slices provolone cheese']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C)', '2: Heat one tablespoon of the 2 tablespoons canola oil in a pan over medium-high heat', '3:  Combine the 3 tablespoons garlic, 2 sweet onions, 2 cups mushrooms, salt, and pepper in the pan and cook until almost all of the moisture has evaporated and the 2 sweet onions are caramelizing, 15–20 minutes', '4:  Remove from heat and set aside', '5: Lay the 2 lb flank steak on a cutting board', '6:  Add salt and pepper on both sides, to taste', '7: Spoon the mushroom and onion mixture on top, spreading it evenly across the steak', '8:  Sprinkle the 4 oz fresh baby spinach on top, followed by the 9 slices of provolone', '9:  Press down lightly to compress the 4 oz fresh baby spinach', '10: Starting at the bottom of the 2 lb flank steak, roll it up tightly, making sure the grain of the meat is running horizontally', '11:  Use six toothpicks to secure the steak roll', '12:  Slice the steak roll into six equal rolls', '13: Heat the remaining 2 tablespoons canola oil in a pan over high heat', '14:  Sear the steak rolls on one side for one to two minutes, then flip', '15:  Sear the second side for about one minute, then bake for 10–15 minutes, until medium rare', '16: Remove the toothpicks, then serve!']

ingredients: ['Artichokes', '2 artichokes', '1 lemon juiced', 'salt to taste', 'Stuffing', '¼ cup butter (60 g)', '3 tablespoons garlic', '1 lemon juiced', '2 cups bread crumbs (230 g)', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '¼ cup fresh parsley (10 g)', 'grated parmesan cheese for topping', 'mayonnaise or butter for dipping']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Trim the stem off the artichoke to create a base and also one inch (2 ½ cm) from the top', '3: Remove the leaves from the center of the artichoke and use a spoon to scrape out the hairs on the heart of the artichoke', '4: Squeeze the juice of one small lemon on top', '5: In a saucepan, boil two inches (5 cm) of salted water', '6:  Place the 2 artichokes in the pot cover and boil for 20 minutes, or until tender', '7: In a separate pan, melt the butter and saute the 3 tablespoons garlic until fragrant, about 2 minutes', '8: Squeeze in the juice of one lemon', '9:  Add in the 2 cups bread crumbs, salt, ¼ teaspoon pepper, and ¼ cup fresh parsley', '10:  Stir until combined', '11: Place the 2 artichokes on a pan and fill with 2 cups bread crumb mixture and top with grated parmesan', '12: Bake for 15-20 minutes or until golden brown', '13: Serve with dipping sauce of choice']

ingredients: ['For chicken marination:', '2 lb chicken breast (910 g) cut into medium-sized pieces', '⅓ cup greek yogurt (80 g)', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', 'salt as per taste', '1 tablespoon ginger and garlic paste', '1 teaspoon red chili powder', '¼ teaspoon black pepper', '¼ teaspoon roasted cumin powder', '¼ teaspoon coriander powder', 'For rice:', '2 cups basmati rice (400 g) soaked for 2 hrs', '3 cups chicken stock (720 mL)', '1 teaspoon garlic crushed', '1 teaspoon jalapeño chopped', 'salt as per taste', '4 tablespoons vegetable oil', 'Veggies:', '1 cup carrot (150 g) julienned', '1 cup green bell pepper (100 g) julienned', '1 cup cabbage (100 g) julienned', '1 bunch green onion chopped', '1 tablespoon garlic chopped', '½ teaspoon jalapeño chopped', '1 teaspoon soy sauce', '1 teaspoon white vinegar', '1 tablespoon oil', 'Sauce:', '2 tablespoons mayonnaise', '1 teaspoon ketchup', '1 teaspoon sriracha sauce', '1 piece coal smokiness']
instructions: ['1: Mix together ingredients listed for marinade (outside of chicken) well', '2:  Then, coat chicken pieces in marinade and refrigerate for minimum 1 hour (maximum overnight)', '3: In a pan on medium flame, add 1 tbsp oil, 1 tbsp garlic, and ½ tsp jalapenos', '4:  Once slightly sauteed, add 1 cup green bell peppers and carrots and stir fry for 4 minutes on medium heat', '5:  Then, add 1 cup cabbage, spring 1 bunch green onion, 1 teaspoon soy 1 teaspoon soy 1 teaspoon sriracha sauce, and 1 teaspoon white vinegar and saute', '6: In a separate pan, roast marinated chicken pieces between medium and high heat', '7:  While this is cooking, in a third pan, add oil, garlic, and jalapenos (from For 2 cups basmati rice ingredients) and saute for a few minutes without burning', '8:  Then, add For 2 cups basmati rice, chicken stock, and salt to taste', '9:  Cook on medium flame', '10:  Simultaneously, ensure that chicken pieces don’t burn', '11: Cover the pan with the chicken in it, cooking on low', '12:  Then, reduce the heat of the For 2 cups basmati rice to low and cook until soft but not mushy', '13: Combine 1 teaspoon soy 1 teaspoon sriracha sauce ingredients in a separate bowl and set aside', '14: To assemble, layer For 2 cups basmati rice, vegetables, chicken, and garnish with 1 teaspoon soy 1 teaspoon sriracha sauce', '15: Serve warm']

ingredients: ['1 rack baby back ribs', '2 tablespoons paprika', '1 ½ tablespoons kosher salt', '1 tablespoon cumin', '1 tablespoon granulated garlic', '1 tablespoon chilli powder', '1 teaspoon brown sugar', '¹⁄₂₁ tablespoon black pepper', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 tablespoon granulated onion']
instructions: ['1: Place 1 1 rack of baby ribs on foil paper', '2: In a bowl, add 1 tbsp 2 tablespoons paprika, 1 ½ tbsp 1 ½ tablespoons kosher salt, 1 tbsp 1 tablespoon cumin, 1 tbsp granulated garlic, 1 tbsp chili 1 tablespoon chilli powder ,1 tsp 1 teaspoon brown sugar, ½ tbsp ¹⁄₂₁ tablespoon black pepper, ½ tsp ½ teaspoon cayenne pepper and 1 tbsp granulated onion and mix them well', '3: Sprinkle this mixture onto our ribs, thoroughly coating both sides', '4: Cover the rib with your foil paper and bake it for 300 degrees Fahrenheit (150 degree Celsius) for 3-3', '5: 5 hours', '6: Unwrap your cooked ribs and carefully remove the bones', '7: Chop the ribs into hot-dog sized bites and place them on your hot dog breads', '8: Add a variety of seasoning, relishes and sauces as per your liking', "9:  Here's a few options we love!a) Season with barbecue sauce, coleslaw and red onionb) Use caramelised onion", '10:  sauerkraut and Dijon mustardc) Top with chipotle sauce, avocado pickled red onion and quest frescod) Or, use mayonnaise, sriracha pickled vegetables and jalapeño cilantroServe hot']

ingredients: ['10 slices sandwich bread', 'sausage link cooked', '3 eggs', '1 tablespoon milk', '½ teaspoon cinnamon', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract']
instructions: ['1: Roll each slice of 10 slices sandwich bread flat with a rolling pin', '2:  Carefully cut off the crusts', '3: Place sausage at the edge of the 10 slices sandwich bread, and roll up', '4: In a bowl, combine 3 eggs, 1 tablespoon milk, ½ teaspoon cinnamon, and ½ teaspoon vanilla', '5: Dip each roll-up in egg mixture, and pan fry in a buttered skillet until all sides are golden brown']

ingredients: ['½ cup heavy cream (120 mL)', '¾ cup condensed milk (225 mL)', '2 cups milk chocolate chips (350 g)', '1 teaspoon peppermint extract', '¼ cup crushed peppermint (20 g) candies', '20 popsicle sticks']
instructions: ['1: In a saucepan set over medium heat, warm the ½ cup heavy cream, ¾ cup condensed ¾ cup condensed 2 cups milk, and 1 teaspoon ¼ cup ¼ cup crushed peppermint extract and bring to a simmer', '2: Place chocolate chips in a heat-proof bowl, and pour on top the top cream mixture', '3:  Allow to stand for 1 minute before stirring to combine', '4: Using a cookie scoop, spoon the mixture into a silicone mini muffin pan', '5:  Garnish each with ¼ cup crushed 1 teaspoon ¼ cup ¼ cup crushed peppermint candies', '6: Allow to sit at room temperature for 20 minutes, then insert a popsicle stick into the middle of each', '7: Freeze for 2 hours, or refrigerate for 4 hours', '8: To serve, dissolve a stick into a mug of hot ¾ cup condensed 2 cups milk']

ingredients: ['½ avocado', '1 banana', '1 cup chocolate milk (240 mL) of choice']
instructions: ['1: Add ½ avocado, 1 banana, and 1 cup chocolate milk to blender and blend until smooth', '2: Pour into a glass, and enjoy!']

ingredients: ['1 butternut squash peeled and cubed', '1 medium white onion quartered', '½ cup raw cashews (65 g)', '¼ cup nutritional yeast (35 g)', '1 clove garlic', '1 teaspoon dried rosemary', '½ teaspoon nutmeg', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon mustard', '1 tablespoon salt', '2 cups vegetable stock (480 mL)', '1 lb elbow macaroni (455 g) cooked according to package instructions', '1 tablespoon fresh parlsey for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Cut off both ends of the 1 butternut squash and poke all over with a fork', '2:  Microwave on high for 3-4 minutes', '3: Peel the skin off of the squash', '4:  It should come right off! Slice the squash in half lengthwise, scoop out seeds, and cut into 1-inch (2-cm) cubes', '5:  You should have about 5 2 cups (1 kg)', '6: In a slow cooker, combine the squash, 1 medium white onion, ½ cup raw cashews, ¼ cup nutritional yeast, 1 clove garlic, 1 teaspoon dried rosemary, ½ teaspoon nutmeg, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 teaspoon mustard, 1 tablespoon salt, and vegetable stock', '7:  Stir to combine', '8: Cover and cook on high for 4 hours or low for 8 hours, until the vegetables are soft enough to be easily mashed with a fork', '9: Transfer the squash mixture to a blender, or use an immersion blender, and puree for 5 minutes, until there are no chunks and the sauce develops a creamy texture', '10: Pour the sauce over the cooked 1 lb elbow macaroni and stir well', '11: Serve garnished with parsley']

ingredients: ['coconut oil for greasing', 'Crust', '1 cup almond (140 g)', '½ cup cashews (65 g)', '1 cup pitted dates (170 g)', '¼ cup shredded coconut (25 g) plus more for garnish', '2 tablespoons coconut milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 pinch salt', 'Filling', '2 ripe avocados', '¾ cup coconut butter (165 g)', '2 tablespoons cornstarch', '1 key lime zested', '1 cup key lime juice (240 mL)', '½ cup maple syrup (170 g)', '⅓ cup coconut milk (80 mL)', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '¼ teaspoon salt']
instructions: ['1: Grease an 8-inch (20 cm) tart pan generously with coconut oil', '2: Add the almonds, ½ cup cashews, 1 cup pitted dates, coconut, coconut milk, vanilla, and salt to a food processor and pulse until the nuts are finely ground and the crust starts to clump together', '3: Transfer the crust to the tart pan and use your hands to press it into an even layer', '4:  Chill in the refrigerator while making the filling', '5: Add the 2 ripe avocados, coconut butter, 2 tablespoons cornstarch, key lime zest, key lime juice, ½ cup maple syrup, coconut milk, vanilla, and salt to a food processor and blend until smooth and fully combined', '6: Pour the filling into the crust and spread into an even layer', '7:  Garnish with ¼ cup shredded coconut, if desired', '8: Chill for at least 3 hours, or overnight, until the filling has fully set']

ingredients: ['French Toast', '6 large eggs', '¾ cup whole milk (180 mL)', '¾ cup heavy cream (180 mL)', '2 tablespoons light brown sugar', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon vanilla bean paste or extract', '1 loaf challah bread', 'unsalted butter or ghee for greasing', 'For Serving', 'softened butter', 'pure maple syrup warmed', 'flaky sea salt', 'fresh berry']
instructions: ['1: Preheat a nonstick electric griddle to 300°F (150°C)', '2:  (Alternatively, heat a 6 large nonstick skillet over medium-low heat', '3: )In a 6 large bowl, whisk the eggs until well combined', '4:  Add the ¾ cup whole milk, ¾ cup heavy cream, 2 tablespoons light brown sugar, ½ teaspoon kosher flaky sea salt, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, and 1 teaspoon vanilla bean paste and whisk until completely combined', '5: Working in batches, dip each slice of 1 loaf challah in the custard, letting soak for 20–60 seconds on each side, until fully saturated but not soggy', '6: Lightly grease the griddle with butter', '7:  Once melted, add the soaked 1 loaf challah on the griddle and cook, without disturbing, until golden 2 tablespoons light brown and crispy, about 2 minutes', '8:  Use a flat spatula to flip the bread and continue cooking until the other side is golden 2 tablespoons light brown, 2 minutes more', '9:  Wipe the pan clean between batches and add more butter as needed', '10: Serve the French toast with a pat of butter, a drizzle of warm pure maple syrup, a sprinkle of flaky ½ teaspoon kosher flaky sea salt, and berries']

ingredients: ['1 lb frozen peach (450 g) frozen', '¼ cup honey (85 g)']
instructions: ['1: Add the peaches and ¼ cup honey to a food processor and combine until evenly mixed', '2: Transfer to a loaf pan and transfer to freezer until completely 1 lb frozen']

ingredients: ['24 oz sirloin steak (680 g) or top loin steak', 'kosher salt', 'fresh ground black pepper', '¼ cup vegetable oil (60 mL) plus 2 tablespoons divided', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '½ large yellow onion chopped', '2 cups button mushroom (150 g) chopped', '1 sourdough bread large', '6 slices cheddar cheese', '1 cup fresh baby spinach (40 g)', '6 strips bacon cooked', '6 slices provolone cheese or swiss cheese']
instructions: ['1: Season each 24 oz sirloin steak generously with kosher salt and fresh ground black pepper, making sure to rub the kosher salt and fresh ground black pepper into the sides of the 24 oz sirloin steak', '2: In a cast iron skillet, heat the ¼ cup vegetable over high heat until smoking hot', '3:  Lay the 24 oz sirloin steaks in the pan and cook for about 2 minutes', '4:  Flip the 24 oz sirloin steaks, then add the butter, swirling it around the pan', '5:  Using a ½ 1 sourdough 1 sourdough bread large spoon, scoop the melted butter over the tops of the 24 oz sirloin steak, basting them continuously', '6:  Cook for about 2 minutes to get medium rare', '7:  (Check the 24 oz sirloin steaks with an instant read thermometer if you have one; you want an internal temperature of about 135˚F (55°C)', '8: ) Set the 24 oz sirloin steaks aside on a cutting board to rest', '9: Wipe out the skillet and heat the remaining 2 ¼ cup vegetable oil (60 mL) plus 2 2 tablespoons of oil over medium-high heat', '10:  Add the onion and mushrooms and sauté, stirring constantly, until caramelized, about 20 minutes', '11: Using a serrated knife, slice the top off the 1 sourdough bread and scoop out the insides to create a 1 sourdough bread bowl', '12:  Nestle one 24 oz sirloin steak into the bottom of the 1 sourdough bread bowl', '13:  Layer the 6 slices cheddar 6 slices cheddar 6 slices provolone cheese evenly on top', '14:  Add the caramelized onions and mushrooms and use a spoon to spread them evenly over the 6 slices cheddar 6 slices provolone cheese', '15:  Top with the 1 cup fresh baby spinach, then the 6 strips bacon, then the Swiss 6 slices cheddar 6 slices provolone cheese', '16:  Finally, put the second 24 oz sirloin steak on top, tucking it under the lip of the 1 sourdough bread bowl', '17:  Cover with the 1 sourdough bread lid and wrap the entire loaf in foil', '18: Place the wrapped sandwich in the fridge and put a cutting board on top of it', '19:  Stack books on the cutting board to compress the sandwich', '20:  Chill in the fridge for at least 5 hours', '21: Preheat the oven to 250˚F (120°C)', '22:  Remove the foil from the sandwich and place it on a baking sheet', '23:  Bake for 20 minutes, until the 1 sourdough bread is slightly crisp']

ingredients: ['Aparagus', '14 oz asparagus (395 g) trimmed', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '3 cloves garlic minced', 'Salmon', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '4 teaspoons honey', '4 cloves garlic minced', '6 oz salmon (170 g) 4 fillets']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Add the 14 oz asparagus onto a baking tray and coat with olive oil, salt, pepper, and garlic', '3: Place 6 oz salmon fillets in the middle of the baking tray', '4: In a small bowl, add the olive oil, 4 teaspoons honey, and garlic', '5:  Mix until well combined', '6:  Coat 6 oz salmon with mixture', '7: Bake for 12-15 minutes', '8: Serve now or refrigerate in airtight container up to 3-4 days']

ingredients: ['3 tablespoons fresh blueberry', '¼ cup oat flour (25 g)', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '2 tablespoons honey', '1 egg white', '½ teaspoon nutmeg']
instructions: ['1: Mix together 1 egg white and 2 tablespoons honey in a greased coffee mug', '2: Add ¼ cup oat flour, ½ teaspoon baking powder, and ½ teaspoon nutmeg, and mix until combined', '3: Add in 3 tablespoons fresh blueberries', '4: Microwave on high for 90 seconds (times may vary)']

ingredients: ['2 ½ tablespoons coconut oil melted divided', '2 cups cranberry (250 g) divided', '1 ¾ cups old fashioned rolled oat (175 g)', '½ cup walnuts (50 g) chopped', '¼ cup unsweetened coconut flake (20 g) plus 2 tablespoons divided', '1 ½ teaspoons cinnamon', '½ teaspoon ground ginger', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 cups milk (480 mL)', '¼ cup maple syrup (55 g) plus more to serving', '1 egg', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', 'milk or yogurt for serving', 'flaky sea salt for serving ']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180˚C)', '2: Oil a 9x9-inch (22x22-cm) baking dish with ½ tablespoon of the coconut oil and add 1½ cups (190 g) of the cranberries in a single layer', '3: In a large bowl, mix together the rolled oats, walnuts, ¼ cup (20 g) coconut flakes, 1 ½ teaspoons cinnamon, ½ teaspoon ground ginger, and 1 teaspoon flaky sea salt', '4: In a separate bowl, whisk together the remaining 2 2 ½ ¼ cup unsweetened coconut flake (20 g) plus 2 tablespoons coconut oil, 2 cups milk, maple syrup, 1 egg, and 2 teaspoons vanilla', '5:  Pour the wet mixture into the dry mixture and stir just to combine', '6: Pour the oat mixture over the cranberry layer in the baking dish and sprinkle with the remaining cranberries and coconut flakes', '7: Bake until the top of the oatmeal is set, 30-40 minutes', '8: Serve warm with 2 cups milk or yogurt, flaky 1 teaspoon flaky sea salt, and maple syrup, if desired']

ingredients: ['20 medium sized mushrooms', '1 tablespoon butter', '2 cloves garlic minced', '4 cups fresh spinach (160 g)', '8 oz cream cheese (225 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '¼ cup breadcrumb (30 g)', '¼ cup parmesan cheese']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '2: Remove the stems from the 20 medium sized mushrooms', '3:  Place the top half on a baking sheet', '4: Mince the stems', '5: Melt the 1 tablespoon butter in a pan and add the minced stems and minced 2 cloves garlic', '6:  Stir and cook for 2 minutes', '7: Add the 4 cups fresh spinach, cook until it wilts', '8: Add the 8 oz cream cheese, salt, and pepper', '9:  Stir until the 8 oz cream cheese is melted and everything is well-combined', '10: Take a spoonful of the 4 cups fresh spinach mixture and fill each mushroom top', '11: Mix bread crumbs and Parmesan cheese in a bowl and sprinkle the mixture on top of the dip stuffed 20 medium sized mushrooms', '12: Bake for 12-15 minutes or until golden brown']

ingredients: ['¼ cup vegetable oil (60 mL) or palm oil divided plus 1 tablespoon', '1 lb boneless chicken breast (450 g) or thighs pork beef or tofu cut into 1 in cubes', '1 medium yellow onion diced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 cup creamy peanut butter (240 g)', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '1 tablespoon paprika', '1 tablespoon adobo seasoning', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '2 cups tomato sauce (360 g)', '2 cups water (480 mL)', '2 cups pumpkin (480 g) or butternut squash cut into 1 in (2.5 cm) pieces', '1 baking potato cut into 1 in (2.5 cm) pieces', '1 large carrot sliced into 1/4 in (6 mm) rounds ', '1 habanero pepper', 'jasmine rice for serving', 'Preparation', '¼ cup vegetable oil (60 mL) or palm oil divided plus 1 tablespoon', '1 lb boneless chicken breast (450 g) or thighs pork beef or tofu cut into 1 in cubes', '1 medium yellow onion diced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 cup creamy peanut butter (240 g)', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '1 tablespoon paprika', '1 tablespoon adobo seasoning', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '2 cups tomato sauce (360 g)', '2 cups water (480 mL)', '2 cups pumpkin (480 g) or butternut squash cut into 1 in (2.5 cm) pieces', '1 baking potato cut into 1 in (2.5 cm) pieces', '1 large carrot sliced into 1/4 in (6 mm) rounds ', '1 habanero pepper', 'jasmine rice for serving', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Heat 1 tablespoon vegetable oil in a large Dutch oven over medium-high heat until shimmering', '2:  Add the chicken and brown on all sides, 8–10 minutes', '3:  Remove from the pot and set aside', '4: Add the onion and garlic to the pot and cook for 4–6 minutes, until softened and the onion is translucent and the garlic is beginning to brown', '5: Stir in the peanut butter until melted, about 1 minute', '6: Add the salt, paprika, adobo seasoning, black pepper, cayenne pepper, remaining ¼ cup vegetable oil and tomato sauce', '7:  Mix well to combine with the peanut butter', '8: Add the water, pumpkin, potato, carrot, the browned chicken, and the habanero and stir to combine', '9:  Cover the pot, reduce the heat to medium, and cook for 10 minutes', '10:  Stir, then reduce the heat to low and cook for 35 minutes more, until the vegetables are tender and the stew is thickened', '11: Remove the pot from the heat and remove the habanero pepper', '12: Serve the stew hot over jasmine rice']

ingredients: ['4 skin-on chicken leg quarters', '1 tablespoon kosher salt plus more to taste', 'pepper to taste', '10 cloves garlic minced divided', '1 tablespoon fresh thyme leaf chopped', '1 tablespoon fresh rosemary chopped', '1 tablespoon fresh oregano chopped', '4 tablespoons olive oil divided', '2 bunches rainbow swiss chard', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '1 cinnamon stick', '4 whole cloves', '2 teaspoons mustard seed', '1 teaspoon whole allspice', '2 bay leaves crushed', '1 teaspoon whole black peppercorn', '2 teaspoons coriander seed', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 cup white wine vinegar (240 mL)', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '1 large yellow onion chopped', '¼ cup lemon juice (60 mL)', '2 cups israeli couscous (340 g)', '3 cups chicken stock (720 mL)', '2 tablespoons caper', '4 tablespoons crumbled feta cheese fresh for serving', 'fresh parsley chopped for serving']
instructions: ['1: In a 1 large bowl, season the chicken legs with salt, 1 teaspoon whole black ½ teaspoon ½ teaspoon red pepper, 5 10 4 whole cloves of minced garlic, the thyme, rosemary, oregano, and 2 tablespoons of olive oil', '2:  Toss to fully coat the chicken, then cover with plastic wrap and marinate in the refrigerator for 30 minutes', '3: Prepare the Swiss chard', '4:  Cut out the thick stems', '5:  Stack the leaves, roll up, then thinly slice into ribbons', '6:  Slice the roll in half', '7:  Transfer to a bowl and set aside', '8:  Slice the chard stems on the bias', '9:  Transfer to a medium glass or nonreactive metal bowl and set aside', '10: In a 1 large skillet, combine the ½ cup sugar, 1 tablespoon of salt, the 1 cinnamon stick, 10 4 whole cloves, 2 teaspoons mustard seeds, 1 teaspoon whole allspice, 2 bay leaves, 1 teaspoon whole black ½ teaspoon ½ teaspoon red peppercorns, 2 teaspoons coriander seeds, and ½ teaspoon red 1 teaspoon whole black ½ teaspoon ½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '11:  Add the 1 cup white wine vinegar and ½ cup water, and stir well', '12:  Heat the pan over high heat, bring to a boil, and cook for 5 minutes', '13: Place a strainer over the bowl of sliced chard stems', '14:  Pour the boiling pickling liquid over the stems and discard the solids', '15:  Let the stems pickle until the liquid has cooled and the stems have softened, about 30 minutes', '16: Wipe out the skillet, then heat over medium-high heat with the remaining 2 tablespoons of olive oil until the oil is shimmering', '17:  Sear the chicken, skin-side down, until the skin is dark golden brown, 5-7 minutes', '18:  Flip and cook on the other side for another 5-7 minutes', '19:  Transfer to a plate and set aside', '20: Add the onion, remaining 5 10 4 whole cloves of minced garlic, salt, and 1 teaspoon whole black ½ teaspoon ½ teaspoon red pepper', '21:  Cook, stirring, until the onion is softened and golden brown, about 10 minutes', '22: Add the ¼ cup lemon juice, Swiss chard leaves, and 2 cups israeli couscous', '23:  Cook until the greens wilt, about 2 minutes', '24: Add the chicken stock and bring to a boil', '25:  Sprinkle in the capers and return the chicken to the pan, submerging in the cooking liquid', '26:  Cover, ½ teaspoon reduce the heat to low, and simmer for about 15 minutes, until the 2 cups israeli couscous has puffed up and become tender', '27:  Remove the pan from the heat', '28: Serve with the pickled chard stems, feta cheese, and fresh parsley']

ingredients: ['Cake', '1 box white cake batter prepared according to package instructions', 'Filling', '6 peaches peeled and chopped', '6 tablespoons sweetened condensed milk', '1 tablespoon heavy cream', 'Topping', '2 cups whipped cream (120 g)', '2 peaches thinly sliced']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Grease a 9x13-inch (23x33cm) baking dish with nonstick spray', '3:  Pour the 1 box white cake batter into the baking dish', '4: Bake for 25 minutes, or until the center is cooked through', '5: In a medium bowl, whisk together the peaches, 6 tablespoons sweetened condensed milk, and 1 tablespoon heavy cream', '6:  Use the whisk to break up the peaches', '7: Remove cake from oven and let cool for 30 minutes or until room temperature', '8: Once the cake is cool, use the rounded end of a wooden spoon to poke 6 rows of 5 holes in the cake', '9:  Tip: Clean off the end of the wooden spoon after every other hole to prevent making cracks in the cake', '10: Pour the peach mixture over the cake and use a spatula to spread it, filling all of the holes', '11:  Some of the mixture will stay on top of the cake', '12:  Chill in the fridge for 1 hour', '13: Remove the cake from the fridge and use a spatula to cover the cake in 2 cups whipped cream', '14:  Then, arrange the peach slices on top in 5 rows of 11 slices', '15: Pairs well with Chardonnay']

ingredients: ['2 cloves garlic minced', '1 tablespoon fresh ginger minced', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '1 tablespoon honey', '¼ cup soy sauce (60 mL)', '1 chicken breast', '½ cup quinoa (85 g)', '1 ½ cups chicken stock (360 mL)', '½ cup sliced carrot (55 g)', '½ cup snap pea (50 g)', '½ cup shredded red cabbage (50 g)', '½ cup bell pepper (50 g) sliced', '½ cup broccoli floret (75 g)', '1 egg', 'salt to taste', '½ avocado sliced', 'scallion sliced for garnish', 'toasted sesame seed for garnish']
instructions: ['1: In a small measuring cup, mix together the 2 cloves garlic, ginger, sesame oil, honey, and soy sauce', '2:  Whisk to combine', '3: Pour about 2 tablespoons of the sauce over the chicken in a small bowl and set the rest aside for serving', '4:  Toss the chicken in the sauce to coat', '5: Heat a tablespoon of oil in a small pot over medium heat', '6:  Cook the chicken until golden brown on one side, then flip and cook the other side until the chicken reaches an internal temperature of at least 165°F (75°C), about 10 minutes total', '7:  Remove the chicken breast from the pan', '8:  Let rest for 5 minutes, then slice', '9: Add the quinoa and chicken stock to the same pot', '10:  Stir the quinoa and bring to a boil on high heat', '11:  Then, reduce the heat to low and place a strainer over the simmering quinoa', '12: To the strainer, add the carrot, snap peas, red cabbage, bell pepper, broccoli, and the 1 egg', '13:  Sprinkle with salt', '14: Cover the pot and cook for 20 minutes', '15: Remove the food from the heat, fluff the quinoa and add the chicken and veggies', '16:  Top with the ½ cup ½ cup bell pepper (50 g) ½ avocado scallion sliced ½ avocado and the cooked 1 egg', '17:  Pour on the rest of the reserved sauce, and garnish with scallions and toasted sesame seeds']

ingredients: ['1 lb grass-fed organic ground beef (455 g)', '½ white onion chopped', '2 cups organic white mushroom (300 g) sliced', '2 cups organic baby spinach (80 g) rough chop', '1 cup miyokos vegan cheddar cheese (100 g) (you may also opt for regular cheddar cheese)', '1 pack siete foods taco seasoning mild or spicy', '1 box Jovial Foods gluten free elbow macaroni', '1 tablespoon avocado oil', '1 teaspoon salt']
instructions: ['1: Heat 1 tablespoon avocado oil in a large skillet on medium heat', '2:  Add onions and sauté for about 5 minutes', '3: To this, add 1 lb grass-fed organic ground beef and cook until browned', '4:  Once browned, add in mushrooms and 2 2 1 cups organic baby spinach', '5: Sauté all ingredients together for another 5 minutes or so until beef is completely cooked, mushrooms are tender and 2 2 1 cups organic baby spinach has wilted', '6: Add 1 pack siete foods taco seasoning and ⅓ 2 2 1 cup water', '7:  Once combined, add in vegan cheese and mix everything together', '8: Cover and stir frequently until the cheese has completely melted', '9: Cook pasta according to directions on the 1 box', '10:  Once done add pasta directly into the skillet and mix everything together', '11:  Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['½ tablespoon unsalted butter', '1 ½ tablespoons all purpose flour', '32 oz half & half (960 mL)', '¾ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 ½ tablespoons onion powder', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '½ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '½ teaspoon celery salt', '½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese (55 g)', '1 ¾ cups shredded cheddar cheese (175 g) divided', '2 cups Kroger® Brand Frozen Broccoli Florets (150 g) frozen thawed divided', '1 ¾ cups Kroger® Brand Grilled Chicken Breast Dices (350 g) divided', '1 box Kroger® Brand 100% Whole Grain Salad Rotini Pasta cooked according to package instructions', 'Kroger® Brand Italian Herb Focaccia baked according to package instructions for serving', 'Preparation', '½ tablespoon unsalted butter', '1 ½ tablespoons all purpose flour', '32 oz half & half (960 mL)', '¾ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 ½ tablespoons onion powder', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '½ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '½ teaspoon celery salt', '½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese (55 g)', '1 ¾ cups shredded cheddar cheese (175 g) divided', '2 cups Kroger® Brand Frozen Broccoli Florets (150 g) frozen thawed divided', '1 ¾ cups Kroger® Brand Grilled Chicken Breast Dices (350 g) divided', '1 box Kroger® Brand 100% Whole Grain Salad Rotini Pasta cooked according to package instructions', 'Kroger® Brand Italian Herb Focaccia baked according to package instructions for serving', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the broiler to high', '2: Melt the butter in a medium pot over medium-high heat', '3:  Whisk in the flour until fully incorporated, then toast for about 30 seconds, or until slightly darkened in color', '4: Add the half-and-half and whisk until the flour mixture has completely dissolved', '5:  Reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer for 3–4 minutes, or until the liquid has thickened lightly', '6: Stir in the kosher salt, onion powder, black pepper, nutmeg, and celery salt', '7:  Add the shredded mozzarella and 1 cup of the shredded cheddar, and whisk until completely melted and smooth, 2–3 minutes', '8: Remove the pot from the heat and fold in 1½ cups Kroger® Brand Frozen Broccoli Florets, 1¼ cups Kroger® Brand Grilled Chicken Breast Dices, and the cooked Kroger® Brand 100% Whole Grain Salad Rotini Pasta', '9: Transfer the pasta to an 8”x13” baking dish and spread in an even layer', '10:  Sprinkle the remaining ½ cup Kroger® Brand Frozen Broccoli Florets, remaining ½ cup Kroger® Brand Grilled Chicken Breast Dices, and remaining ¾ cup shredded cheddar cheese on top', '11: Place the dish under the broiler for 3–6 minutes, or until the cheese on top has melted and is lightly browned and crispy', '12: Serve immediately with Kroger® Brand Italian Herb Focaccia']

ingredients: ['8 oz linguine (225 g)', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '8 tablespoons unsalted butter 1 stick', '4 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 ¼ lb large shrimp (570 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '4 cups baby spinach (160 g)', '¼ cup parmesan cheese (25 g) grated', '2 tablespoons fresh parsley chopped', '1 tablespoon lemon juice']
instructions: ['1: In a 1 ¼ lb large pot, boil water and add pasta', '2:  Cook (stirring frequently) until al dente', '3: Drain and set pasta aside', '4: In the same pan, heat olive oil and 2 tablespoons of butter', '5:  Add 4 cloves garlic and crushed 1 teaspoon red 1 teaspoon red pepper, cook until fragrant', '6: Toss in shrimp, salt and 1 teaspoon red pepper to taste, and stir until shrimp start to turn pink, but are not fully cooked', '7: Add 1 teaspoon dried oregano and 4 cups baby spinach, cook until wilted', '8: Return cooked pasta to the pot, add remaining butter, ¼ cup parmesan, and parsley', '9:  Stir until well mixed and the butter is melted', '10: When the shrimp are cooked, add 1 tablespoon lemon juice, mix once more, then serve while hot']

ingredients: ['Caesar Dressing', '1 large free-range egg', '2 teaspoons dijon mustard', '3 fillets anchovies', '2 cloves garlic', '1 cup extra virgin olive oil (240 mL)', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice to taste', 'kosher salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'Croutons', '6 oz whole grain wheat bread (170 g) 1 loaf cut into bite-size cubes', 'olive oil to taste', '1 teaspoon italian seasoning', '1 pinch kosher salt', 'Shrimp', '1 lb wild-caught shrimp (455 g) (about 21 or 25) peeled and deveined', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 lemon zested', 'kosher salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'Salad', '12 cups kale (120 g) mixed stemmed and sliced into ribbons', 'kosher salt to taste', '1 avocado pitted and thinly sliced', '¾ cup pomegranate seeds (130 g)', '½ cup parmesan cheese (50 g) shaved']
instructions: ['1: Make the dressing: Add the egg, Dijon mustard, anchovy 3 fillets, and garlic to a blender', '2:  Blend for about 1 minute, until smooth and creamy', '3:  With the blender running, slowly pour in the olive oil and blend until thick and emulsified', '4:  Season the dressing to taste with lemon juice, salt, and pepper, and quickly pulse to incorporate', '5:  Set aside', '6:  The dressing can be made ahead', '7:  Store in the fridge in an airtight container for up to 4 days', '8: Make the croutons: In a 3-quart (3 L) mixing bowl, combine the 6 oz whole grain wheat bread, olive oil, and Italian seasoning', '9:  Toss to coat the 6 oz whole grain wheat bread cubes', '10: Heat a medium pan over medium heat', '11:  Add the 6 oz whole grain wheat bread cubes, in batches if necessary to keep from overcrowding the pan', '12:  Toast, tossing occasionally, until crispy and golden brown, about 5 minutes', '13:  Remove from the pan and season with salt', '14:  Set aside', '15:  The croutons can be made ahead', '16:  Store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place for up to 4 days', '17: Make the 1 lb wild-caught shrimp: In a medium bowl, combine the 1 lb wild-caught shrimp, olive oil, garlic, lemon zest, salt, and pepper', '18:  Toss to coat the 1 lb wild-caught shrimp', '19: Heat a medium skillet over medium-high heat', '20:  Working in batches, cook the 1 lb wild-caught shrimp for 2 minutes on each side, until pink and opaque', '21:  Remove from the pan', '22: Thoroughly wash and dry the 12 cups kale', '23:  Add to a 1 large bowl and season with salt', '24:  Gently massage the 12 cups kale to break down some of the fibrous texture', '25:  Toss with a bit of dressing to coat the leaves, then add more to taste', '26: Add the croutons, 1 lb wild-caught shrimp, 1 avocado, ¾ cup pomegranate seeds, and Parmesan', '27:  Toss well', '28: Divide between bowls and serve immediately']

ingredients: ['1 large eggplant', 'salt to taste', '1 ½ cups almond meal (145 g)', '1 tablespoon italian seasoning', '3 large eggs', 'water splash', '1 cup rice flour (125 g)', 'olive oil to taste', '3 cloves garlic minced', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '28 oz crushed san marzano tomato (895 g) 1 can', '6 large leaves fresh basil chopped plus more for garnish', '1 ½ cups shredded mozzarella cheese (150 g)', '¾ cup shredded parmesan cheese (85 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190˚C)', '2: Trim the ends off the 1 large eggplant, then slice into ½-inch (2-cm) thick rounds', '3:  Transfer the rounds to a baking sheet lined with paper towels and sprinkle with salt on both sides', '4:  Let sit for 10 minutes for the salt to draw out excess moisture from the 1 large eggplant', '5: In a medium bowl, whisk together the 1 ½ cups almond meal, Italian seasoning, and a pinch of salt', '6:  Beat the 3 large eggs in another medium bowl with a splash of water', '7:  Add the 1 cup rice flour to another medium bowl', '8: Coat the salted 1 large eggplant rounds in the 1 cup rice flour, then in the egg, letting any excess drip off, then in the seasoned 1 ½ cups almond meal', '9:  Set the rounds on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper', '10:  Lightly drizzle on both sides with olive oil', '11: Bake the 1 large eggplant, flipping halfway through for even browning, for 30 minutes, or until golden brown', '12: While the 1 large eggplant is baking, make the sauce: Heat a drizzle of olive oil in a medium saucepan over medium-low heat', '13:  Add the 3 cloves garlic and ½ teaspoon red pepper flakes and cook for 3-4 minutes, until the 3 cloves garlic is fragrant', '14:  Reduce the heat if the 3 cloves garlic is browning too quickly', '15:  Add the 28 oz crushed tomatoes and stir to combine', '16:  Cover and simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent the bottom from scorching', '17:  Add the 6 large leaves fresh basil and stir to incorporate', '18: To assemble, spread a bit of sauce in the bottom of a 9x13-inch (23x33-cm) baking dish, then add a layer of baked 1 large eggplant', '19:  Top with more sauce and sprinkle with the 1 ½ cups shredded mozzarella and Parmesan cheese', '20:  Repeat with the remaining ingredients, using another baking dish if needed to make another single layer of 1 large eggplant', '21: Bake for 10 minutes, then turn the broiler on high and cook for another 3 minutes, until the cheese is browned and bubbling', '22: Serve garnished with more 6 large leaves fresh basil', '23: Enjoy!Nutrition, per serving - Calories: 424, Total fat: 21 grams, Sodium: 666 mg, Total carbs: 41 grams, Dietary fiber: 9 grams, Net carbs: 32 grams, Sugars: 12 grams, Protein: 22 grams']

ingredients: ['½ cup frozen spinach (20 g) thawed and squeezed dry', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese (100 g)', '3 cloves garlic minced divided', 'kosher salt to taste', 'freshly ground pepper to taste', '4 large boneless skinless chicken thighs', '8 slices prosciutto', '1 red bell pepper', '2 tablespoons olive oil plus more for drizzling', '8 oz dried fettuccine noodles (225 g)', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 ½ cups chicken broth (360 mL)', '6 tablespoons unsalted butter', 'fresh italian parsley for garnish chopped']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, mix together the spinach, mozzarella, and 1 clove minced garlic', '2:  Season with kosher salt and freshly ground 1 1 red bell pepper', '3:  Set aside', '4: Place a 4 large boneless skinless 1 ½ cups chicken thigh between 2 sheets of plastic wrap and pound with a meat mallet, rolling pin, or heavy pan until about ¼ inch (6 mm) thick', '5:  Season on both sides with kosher salt and freshly ground 1 1 red bell pepper and repeat with remaining thighs', '6: On a clean sheet of plastic wrap, lay 2 8 slices of prosciutto vertically, overlapping slightly', '7:  Lay a 4 large boneless skinless 1 ½ cups chicken thigh on top', '8:  Spread a quarter of the spinach filling evenly over the 4 large boneless skinless 1 ½ cups chicken', '9:  Starting from the bottom, tightly roll up', '10:  Wrap the 4 large boneless skinless 1 ½ cups chicken roll tightly in plastic wrap to secure', '11:  Repeat with the remaining ingredients', '12:  Chill in the refrigerator for 30–60 minutes, until firm', '13: Meanwhile, turn the broiler to high', '14: Cut the bell freshly ground 1 1 red bell pepper in half and remove the seeds and membranes', '15:  Place cut-side down on a prepared baking sheet', '16: Broil until the freshly ground 1 1 red bell pepper starts to char and turn black, 2–3 minutes', '17:  Transfer to a bowl, cover with plastic wrap, and let sit for 5 minutes to soften', '18:  Use a paper towel to gently rub off the charred bits and skin, then roughly chop', '19:  Set aside', '20: Turn the oven temperature to 400°F (200°C)', '21: Heat the 2 tablespoons olive oil in a 4 large skillet over medium-high heat', '22:  Add the 4 large boneless skinless 1 ½ cups chicken rolls and cook for 2–3 minutes per side, until the prosciutto is evenly browned, securing with toothpicks if needed', '23:  Transfer the 4 large boneless skinless 1 ½ cups chicken rolls to a baking sheet', '24: Bake the 4 large boneless skinless 1 ½ cups chicken rolls for 15–20 minutes, until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (75°C)', '25:  Remove from the oven and let rest for 5 minutes', '26: Bring a 4 large pot of kosher salted water to a boil', '27:  Add the fettucine and cook according to the package directions until al dente', '28:  Reserve 1 cup (240 ml) of pasta water, then drain and set aside until ready to serve', '29: Heat the skillet used to cook the 4 large boneless skinless 1 ½ cups chicken over medium-low heat', '30:  Add the roasted 1 red freshly ground 1 1 red bell pepper and remaining 2 3 cloves minced garlic and cook until fragrant, 1–2 minutes', '31: Add the 2 tablespoons lemon juice and stir to scrape up any browned bits from the bottom of the pan', '32:  Add the 4 large boneless skinless 1 ½ cups chicken stock and bring to boil', '33: Transfer the 1 red freshly ground 1 1 red bell pepper mixture to a high-speed blender and blend until smooth', '34: Pour the sauce back into the pan and bring to a boil over medium heat', '35:  Reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer until 1 reduced by about half, about 5 minutes', '36: Whisk in the cold 6 tablespoons unsalted butter, 1 tablespoon at a time, until the sauce is emulsified', '37:  Season with kosher salt and freshly ground 1 1 red bell pepper to taste', '38: Add the cooked 8 oz dried fettuccine to the sauce and toss to coat, adding some of the reserved pasta water as needed to loosen the sauce', '39: Thinly slice the 4 large boneless skinless 1 ½ cups chicken rolls', '40: Divide the 8 oz dried fettuccine between serving plates, top with the 4 large boneless skinless 1 ½ cups chicken, and garnish with fresh italian parsley and freshly ground 1 1 red bell pepper']

ingredients: ['10 oz delicata squash (285 g)', '1 cup panko breadcrumbs (50 g) or whole wheat bread crumbs', '½ cup parmesan cheese grated', '2 teaspoons garlic powder', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '3 large eggs', '1 cup all-purpose flour (125 g)', 'Honey Mustard Dipping Sauce', '¼ cup dijon mustard (60 g)', '1 tablespoon whole grain mustard', '1 tablespoon honey']
instructions:
['1: Preheat oven to 425˚F (220˚C)', '2: Cut 1 inch (2', '3: 5 cm) off the top and bottom of each 10 oz delicata squash, so you reach the seeds', '4:  Discard the top and bottom pieces', '5:  Slice the remaining 10 oz delicata squash into ¼-inch (½ cm) thick rounds', '6: Use a metal teaspoon to scoop out the seeds from the rings', '7: In a medium bowl, whisk together the bread crumbs, Parmesan, 2 teaspoons garlic powder, paprika, basil, oregano, salt, and pepper', '8: In another bowl, beat the 3 large eggs', '9:  Add the 1 cup all-purpose flour to another bowl', '10: Coat each 10 oz delicata squash ring in the 1 cup all-purpose flour, tapping off any excess', '11:  Next, coat in the 3 large eggs', '12:  Finally, coat in the bread crumb mixture, making sure to press the 1 cup panko breadcrumbs into the 10 oz delicata squash to adhere', '13:  Place the coated rings on a baking sheet', '14: Bake the 10 oz delicata squash rings for 15-20 minutes, or until golden brown, flipping once halfway through cooking', '15: Make the 1 tablespoon honey mustard dipping sauce: In a small bowl, mix together the Dijon, whole-grain mustard, and 1 tablespoon honey', '16:  Use immediately or refrigerate in an airtight container until ready to serve, up to 3 days', '17: Serve the 10 oz delicata squash rings with the dipping sauce', '18: Nutrition
Calories: 180
Total fat: 6 grams
Sodium: 820 mg
Total carbs: 25 grams
Dietary fiber: 4 grams
Sugars: 4 grams
Protein: 9 grams']

ingredients: ['1 bottle rosé half frozen', '1 ½ cups peach nectar (360 g) frozen', '1 cup frozen raspberry (150 g)', '1 cup frozen peach (150 g)', '⅓ cup rum (80 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Combine all ingredients in a blender, and mix until fully blended', '2: Serve and garnish with a slice of peach']

ingredients: ['2 cups butter (460 g) melted', '2 cups brown sugar (440 g) packed', '2 cups granulated sugar (400 g)', '4 large eggs', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '5 cups all-purpose flour (625 g)', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '4 cups chocolate chips (700 g)']
