instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)', '2: In a 4 large bowl, whisk together the 2 cups brown sugar, 2 cups granulated sugar, and melted 2 cups butter, until evenly combined and light in color', '3: Add in the eggs and 1 tablespoon vanilla, mixing until smooth', '4: Add the 5 cups all-purpose flour and 2 teaspoons baking powder, folding the mixture until it forms a smooth dough', '5: Fold in the 4 cups chocolate chips until evenly combined', '6: Using an ice cream scoop, scoop 6 balls of dough onto a 2 teaspoons baking tray lined with parchment paper', '7: Bake for 12 minutes, then serve!To save cookie dough for later use, scoop the dough into balls and place them side-by-side on a 2 teaspoons baking tray lined with parchment paper', '8: Wrap the tray with cling wrap, then freeze for up to one month', '9: To bake the frozen dough balls, remove desired number from the tray and bake in a preheated oven for 15 minutes at 375°F (190°C)']

ingredients: ['3 tablespoons oil', '3 chicken breasts sliced', '1 red bell pepper sliced', '1 green bell pepper sliced', '1 yellow bell pepper sliced', '1 onion sliced', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 tablespoon chili powder', '1 tablespoon cumin', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '5 cups milk (1 ¼ L)', '4 cups penne pasta (400 g)', '1 cup pepper jack cheese (100 g) shredded']
instructions: ['1: Heat 3 tablespoons oil in a large pot over high heatAdd 3 chicken and cook until no pink is visible, about 5-6 minutes, then take the 3 chicken out', '2: Add the bell peppers and 1 onion, cooking until the 1 onion is translucent, about 6 minutes', '3: Add the 3 chicken back to the pot with 1 teaspoon salt, pepper, 1 tablespoon chili powder, 1 tablespoon cumin, and 1 tablespoon garlic powder, stirring until evenly coated, about 30 seconds', '4: Add the 5 cups milk and the 4 cups penne, stirring constantly to prevent any pasta from sticking', '5: Cook for about 20 minutes until pasta is cooked and the 5 cups milk has reduced to a thick sauce that coats the pasta', '6: Add the cheese and mix until melted', '7: Nutrition  Calories: 1958 Fat: 41 grams  Carbs: 305 grams Fiber: 16 grams  Sugars: 50 grams  Protein: 90 grams']

ingredients: ['3 tablespoons almond flour', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '¼ cup shredded parmesan cheese (30 g)', '1 teaspoon fresh rosemary chopped', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'unsalted butter melted', '1 large egg beaten']
instructions: ['1: In a microwave-safe ramekin or small bowl, combine the 3 tablespoons almond flour, ½ teaspoon baking powder, Parmesan, 1 teaspoon fresh rosemary, ½ teaspoon garlic powder, salt, pepper, melted unsalted butter, and 1 large egg', '2:  Stir everything together with a fork until smooth', '3: Microwave on high for 90 seconds, until the bread has risen', '4: Let the bread cool in the ramekin, then serve as desired']

ingredients: ['1 slice sprouted bread', '¼ avocado sliced', 'Sriracha to taste optional']
instructions: ['1: Toast 1 slice sprouted bread and top with ¼ avocado slices', '2:  Drizzle with Sriracha if desired']

ingredients: ['4 lb yukon gold potato (1.8 kg)', '2 teaspoons kosher salt plus more to taste', '½ cup unsalted butter (115 g) 1 stick melted', '1 cup heavy cream (240 mL)', '2 sprigs fresh rosemary', '1 head garlic crushed', 'butter for serving', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'chive finely chopped for serving', 'gravy for serving']
instructions: ['1: On a cutting board, peel the 4 lb yukon gold potatoes', '2:  Place the 4 lb yukon gold potatoes in a large bowl of cold water after peeling to prevent discoloration', '3: Dice the 4 lb yukon gold potatoes into 1-inch (2-cm) cubes', '4: Add the 4 lb yukon gold potatoes to a large pot of cold water, along with the 2 teaspoons kosher salt', '5:  Bring to a soft boil over high heat, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 12 minutes, until the 4 lb yukon gold potatoes are fork-tender', '6: Drain the 4 lb yukon gold potatoes in a colander, then return to the pot', '7:  Increase the heat to medium-high and stir the 4 lb yukon gold potatoes around for 2-3 minutes to evaporate any excess moisture', '8: Transfer the 4 lb yukon gold potatoes to a large bowl and mash with a 4 lb yukon gold potato masher, 4 lb yukon gold potato ricer, or by pushing through a fine mesh sieve with a spatula', '9: Add the melted butter and stir to incorporate, then season with 2 teaspoons kosher salt to taste', '10: In a small saucepan, combine the 1 cup heavy cream, 2 sprigs fresh rosemary, and 1 head garlic', '11:  Bring to a simmer over low heat, let simmer for a few minutes, then remove the pot from the heat and strain through a fine mesh sieve', '12: Gradually add the cream mixture to the 4 lb yukon gold potatoes, a little at a time, stirring until fully incorporated', '13: Top with a pat of butter, freshly ground black pepper, and a sprinkle with chives, or gravy, if desired', '14: Serve warm']

ingredients: ['6 bell peppers', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 medium onion minced', '3 cloves garlic minced', '2 zucchinis diced', '1 eggplant diced', '4 medium tomatoes diced', '½ teaspoon dried thyme', '½ teaspoon dried rosemary', '½ teaspoon dried basil', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '½ cup all purpose flour (60 g)', '½ cup vegetarian parmesan cheese (50 g) grated', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '6 tablespoons butter softened', '2 cups quinoa (340 g) cooked', 'fresh basil chopped for serving']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: Cut the top off of each 6 bell pepper and remove the seeds and ribs', '3:  Transfer to a baking dish', '4:  Bake for 20 minutes, until softened', '5: Heat the 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium-high heat', '6:  Add the onion and cook for about 2 minutes, until softened and translucent', '7: Add the 3 cloves garlic and cook for about 1 minute, until fragrant', '8: Add the zucchini, 1 eggplant, tomatoes, ½ teaspoon dried thyme, ½ teaspoon dried rosemary, ½ teaspoon dried fresh basil, salt, and 6 bell pepper and stir to combine', '9:  Cover, reduce the heat to medium, and simmer for about 30 minutes, until very tender but not mushy, stirring occasionally', '10: In a small bowl, combine the ½ cup all purpose flour, Parmesan, and 1 teaspoon dried oregano', '11:  Add the 6 tablespoons butter and mix with your fingers until the 6 tablespoons butter has broken down into small pieces and the mixture is crumbly', '12: Fill each 6 bell pepper with the 2 cups quinoa and vegetables, then top with the crumble mixture', '13: Bake for 25-30 minutes, until the tops are golden brown', '14:  Garnish with fresh ½ teaspoon dried fresh basil']

ingredients: ['1 cup rosé wine (240 mL)', '1 ½ oz gelatin powder (40 g)', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', 'strawberry diced optional', 'blueberry optional', 'rasberry optional']
instructions: ['1: Heat 1 cup rosé wine in a microwave-safe container for 1 minute, or until hot', '2: Mix ½ cup sugar and 1 ½ oz gelatin into the 1 cup rosé wine and stir with a whisk until dissolved', '3: Pour mixture into molds', '4:  Add fruit if desired', '5: Refrigerate for 1 hour']

ingredients: ['Dough', '2 ½ cups self-rising flour (350 g) plus more for dusting', '2 tablespoons granulated sugar', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', 'salt to taste', '1 cup milk (200 mL)', '½ cup butter (100 g) melted', '2 egg yolks', 'Filling', '¼ cup brown sugar (60 g)', '2 tablespoons granulated sugar', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '2 tablespoons butter melted', 'icing to serve']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F)', '2: Mix the 2 ½ cups self-rising flour, salt, sugar, and cinnamon together in a large bowl', '3: In a smaller bowl, mix the 2 egg yolks, 1 cup milk, and butter until combined', '4: Whisk into the 2 ½ cups self-rising flour mix until a dough is formed, using your hands, if necessary', '5: In a small bowl, mix together all the ingredients needed for the filling', '6: Roll the dough out on a lightly 2 ½ cups self-rising floured surface until the size of a sheet of paper', '7: Spread the filling evenly, and then roll up tightly', '8: Cut into 8 equal rolls and arrange in an ovenproof dish so that they are all tightly pushed together', '9: Bake for 35 minutes', '10: Serve with icing', '11: Enjoy! ']

ingredients: ['12 slices sandwich bread', '1 large egg beaten', '¼ cup mayonnaise (60 g)', '9 slices provolone cheese', '5 slices mortadella', '8 slices ham', '12 slices capicola', '14 slices pepperoni', '16 slices salami', '1 cup peperoncini (100 g)', '4 tablespoons unsalted butter', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon italian seasoning']
instructions: ['1: Place a slice of bread on top of a piece of plastic wrap on 1 large cutting board', '2:  Brush the right edge of the bread with egg wash and place the left edge of another slice of bread over the brushed edge, pressing together firmly', '3:  Repeat with the rest of the bread so you have a rectangle of 4 slices across and 3 slices down', '4: Using a rolling pin, roll out the bread so all of the pieces of bread are sealed together', '5: Spread ¼ cup mayonnaise over the bread, then arrange the sliced provolone across, starting about ¼ of the way up the bread', '6:  Layer on the mortadella, ham, capicola, pepperoni, salami, and 1 cup peperoncini', '7: Starting at the bottom, roll the sandwich tightly, then cover snugly with plastic wrap', '8:  Chill in the refrigerator for 30 minutes', '9: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '10:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '11: In a small bowl, melt the 4 tablespoons unsalted butter in the microwave for 1 minute, stirring every 15 seconds, or until fully melted', '12:  Mix in the ½ teaspoon garlic powder and Italian seasoning', '13: Transfer the sandwich roll to the baking sheet', '14:  Brush the outside with the ½ teaspoon garlic 4 tablespoons unsalted butter and bake for 18-20 minutes or until golden brown', '15: Let the roll sit for 5 minutes before cutting into thick slices']

ingredients: ['1 lb steak (455 g) flank skirt or flat-iron', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '½ teaspoon chili powder', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon cumin', '8 eggs beaten', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon butter', '8 small flour tortillas', '8 hard taco shells', '1 cup grated cheddar cheese (100 g) or jack cheese', 'Optional Toppings', '1 cup salsa (260 g)', '1 avocado sliced', 'queso fresco crumbled', 'fresh cilantro', 'scallion']
instructions: ['1: Combine the ½ teaspoon cumin, ½ teaspoon chili powder, ½ teaspoon garlic, ½ teaspoon dried oregano, salt, and pepper in a 8 small bowl', '2: Rub all over the 1 lb steak', '3: Heat a large sauté pan over high heat until very hot', '4:  Add a splash of vegetable oil', '5: Add the 1 lb steak to the pan and cook 3-4 minutes per side for medium, or cook to desired doneness', '6: Remove from pan and let rest at least 10 minutes', '7: Thinly slice against the grain', '8: Preheat an oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '9: Place the flour tortillas on baking sheets', '10:  Sprinkle each with a 8 small amount of shredded 1 cup grated cheddar cheese, then place one 8 hard taco shell inside', '11: Heat just until 1 cup grated cheddar cheese melts, about 3-5 minutes', '12: Heat a nonstick pan over medium heat and add 1 tablespoon butter', '13:  Scramble the 8 eggs and season with salt and pepper', '14: To assemble, fill each double-decker shell with a few spoonfuls of scrambled 8 eggs and a few slices of 1 lb steak', '15:  Top with 1 cup salsa, 1 avocado, queso fresco, fresh cilantro, and scallions']

ingredients: ['1 ¾ cups self-rising flour (220 g) plus more for dusting', '1 cup greek yogurt (245 g)', '1 egg beaten', 'coarse salt to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: In a large bowl, mix the self-rising 1 ¾ cups self-rising flour and 1 cup greek yogurt until it comes together to form a ball', '3: Transfer the dough ball to a lightly 1 ¾ cups self-rising floured work surface and use your hands to begin flattening and shaping the rough into a roughly 8-inch (20 cm) disk', '4: Using a bench scraper or knife, cut the dough into 8 equal pieces', '5: One at a time, roll each piece out into a roughly 14-inch (35 cm) log', '6: Transfer the logs to a parchment paper-lined baking sheet and shape into individual pretzels', '7: Brush the pretzels with 1 egg wash and sprinkle with coarse salt', '8: Bake for 20 minutes, until the pretzels are a deep golden brown', '9: Enjoy! ']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons whole wheat flour', '2 tablespoons sugar', '1 ripe banana mashed', '2 tablespoons semolina', '½ teaspoon fennel seeds', '¼ cup milk (60 mL)', '1 cup oil (240 mL) any kind', 'Preparation', '2 tablespoons whole wheat flour', '2 tablespoons sugar', '1 ripe banana mashed', '2 tablespoons semolina', '½ teaspoon fennel seeds', '¼ cup milk (60 mL)', '1 cup oil (240 mL) any kind', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Mix the wheat flour, sugar, semolina, mashed banana, and milk in a bowl', '2: Sprinkle the fennel seeds into the batter', '3: Warm the oil in a frying pan', '4:  Scoop out the batter and place the batter in the hot oil in any shape you desire', '5:  Fry it till golden brown', '6: Once both sides are cooked, take them out and place them on a plate', '7:  You can also line the plate with a paper towel', '8: Fry the rest of the malpoas in the same way and stack them on the plate together', '9: Let them cool for a few minutes, then serve']

ingredients: ['Eggplant Meatballs', '2 eggplants cubed', '½ onion', '3 garlic cloves minced', 'oil', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '¼ cup fresh basil (10 g) chopped', '¼ cup fresh parsley (10 g) chopped', '½ cup vegetarian parmesan cheese (55 g)', '1 cup bread crumbs (115 g)', '¼ cup whole milk ricotta cheese (65 g)', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 egg', '14 oz marinara sauce (400 g) 1 jar', 'Spaghetti Squash', '1 spaghetti squash', 'oil', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375ºF (190ºC)', '2: Combine 2 1 eggplant, ½ onion, 3 garlic, oil, salt, pepper, and oregano on a baking sheet', '3:  Bake for 30 minutes, mixing halfway', '4: In the bowl of a food processor, combine 2 1 eggplant mixture, ¼ cup fresh basil, ¼ cup fresh parsley, Parmesan, 1 cup bread crumbs, ¼ cup whole milk ricotta, oregano, and 2 1 egg, and blend until smooth', '5: Roll the mixture into golf ball-sized balls', '6:  Transfer to a cast iron pan spacing them about 2 inches apart from each other', '7:  Bake for 20 minutes', '8: On a baking sheet, cover 1 spaghetti squash with oil, salt, and pepper, add to oven and bake for 40 minutes', '9: Remove meatballs, add 14 oz marinara sauce, and return to oven for 10 minutes', '10: Remove 1 spaghetti squash from the oven and with a fork pull at the edges to produce that stringy “spaghetti” quality', '11: On a plate combine 1 spaghetti with meatballs and garnish with ½ cup vegetarian parmesan and ¼ cup fresh basil']

ingredients: ['2 cups all purpose flour (250 g)', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 stick unsalted butter room temperature', '1 ¼ cups granulated sugar (250 g) plus more for sprinkling', '1 ½ teaspoons Mccormick® lemon extract', '2 large eggs room temperature', '½ cup buttermilk (120 mL) room temperature', '6 oz fresh blueberry (170 g)', 'Special Equipment', 'muffin tin 6 cup jumbo', 'muffin tin liner']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C) and line a 6-cup jumbo muffin tin with liners', '2: In a 2 large bowl, cream the 1 stick unsalted ½ ½ muffin tin 6 cup butter and sugar with an electric hand mixer on medium speed until very fluffy, about 4 minutes', '3:  Add the 1 ½ teaspoons Mccormick® lemon extract and continue beating for another minute', '4:  Add the eggs, 1 at a time, beating on medium speed for 30 seconds after each addition', '5:  Add the 1 stick unsalted ½ ½ muffin tin 6 cup buttermilk and carefully beat to combine', '6:  The mixture will look a little grainy, but will come together once the dry ingredients are added', '7: In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and 1 teaspoon kosher salt', '8: Sift the dry ingredients into the wet ingredients and beat on medium-low speed to incorporate', '9:  Do not overmix', '10: Add the blueberries and carefully fold into the batter using a rubber spatula', '11: Divide the batter evenly between the prepared muffin 2 1 ¼ ½ muffin tin 6 cups, filling halfway, and sprinkle with more sugar', '12: Bake the muffins for 25-30 minutes, rotating halfway, or until light golden brown', '13:  Let the muffins cool for 5 minutes in the pan, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely']

ingredients: ['4 zucchinis', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 large egg', '1 cup ricotta cheese (250 g)', '1 cup bread crumbs (115 g)', '1 tablespoon italian seasoning', '3 tablespoons fresh basil chopped', '3 tablespoons fresh parsley chopped', '1 teaspoon pepper', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 medium onion diced', '2 cloves garlic chopped', 'For Serving', '4 cups cooked pasta (800 g)', 'marinara sauce']
instructions: ['1: Cut off the bottoms of each zucchini and use a cheese grater or box grater to shred into a 1 large bowl', '2:  Sprinkle 1 tablespoon salt on top, toss, and let rest in a colander in the sink for 20 minutes to pull out excess moisture', '3: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '4: Using a dish towel, squeeze out excess liquid from the shredded zucchini', '5:  Move the zucchini to a dry bowl and add the egg, 1 cup ricotta 1 cup bread crumbs, Italian seasoning, 3 tablespoons fresh basil, 3 tablespoons fresh parsley, 1 teaspoon pepper, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 medium onion, and 2 cloves garlic', '6:  Stir until evenly mixed, then form the mixture into golf ball-sized balls', '7: Bake for 30-40 minutes, or until browned, flipping halfway through', '8: Serve over 4 cups cooked pasta with marinara sauce', '9: Enoy!']

ingredients: ['nonstick cooking spray', 'Vanilla Cake', '1 ½ cups buttermilk (360 mL)', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '½ cup vegetable oil (120 mL)', '4 cups all purpose flour (500 g) or cake flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '2 cups granulated sugar (400 g)', '½ cup light brown sugar (110 g) lightly packed', '1 cup unsalted butter (225 g) 2 sticks room temperature', '4 large eggs', '4 large egg yolks', '½ cup rainbow sprinkles (80 g)', 'Vanilla Frosting', '2 cups unsalted butter (460 g) 4 sticks room temperature', '1 lb cream cheese (455 g)', 'kosher salt a pinch', '3 cups powdered sugar (360 g)', '½ cup rainbow sprinkles (80 g) for decoration']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl or liquid measuring cup, combine the 1 ½ cups 1 ½ cups 1 cup unsalted 2 cups unsalted buttermilk, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract, and vegetable oil', '2:  Set aside', '3: In a large bowl, whisk together the 4 cups all purpose flour, baking powder, salt, and baking soda', '4:  Set aside', '5: In a separate large bowl, combine the 2 cups granulated sugar, light brown sugar, and 1 ½ cups 1 cup unsalted 2 cups unsalted butter', '6:  Beat with an electric hand mixer on high speed until super light and fluffy, about 4 minutes', '7: Add the eggs and egg yolks one at a time, beating in between additions', '8:  Beat the batter until almost doubled in volume and very light and fluffy, about 5 minutes', '9: With the mixer on low, gently beat in a third of the 4 cups all purpose flour mixture', "10:  Before it's fully combined, add half of the 1 ½ cups 1 ½ cups 1 cup unsalted 2 cups unsalted buttermilk mixture", '11:  Repeat with remaining 4 cups all purpose flour and 1 ½ cups 1 ½ cups 1 cup unsalted 2 cups unsalted buttermilk until everything is well-blended and no lumps remain', '12: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '13:  Spray 3  9-inch (23 cm) round cake pans with nonstick spray', '14: Add ½ cup (80 g) of sprinkles and gently fold into the batter with a spatula until well-incorporated', '15: Divide the cake batter among the prepared pans and place 2 pans on the top oven rack and 1 pan on the middle rack', '16: Bake for 30 minutes, rotating the pan on the middle rack to the top rack, and vice versa, halfway through baking, so the cakes bake evenly', '17:  The cakes are done when they are golden brown, pull away from the sides of the pans, and the tops spring back slightly when pressed', '18: Remove the cakes from the oven and invert them onto a wire rack to cool completely', "19:  (If you don't have a wire rack, let them cool in the cake pans on the counter", '20: )Make the frosting: In a large bowl, use an electric hand mixer on high speed to beat the 1 ½ cups 1 cup unsalted 2 cups unsalted butter, 1 lb cream cheese, and salt', '21:  Mix until light and 1 lb creamy, about 4 minutes', '22: Add the 3 cups powdered sugar and beat on low speed to combine', '23:  Once the sugar is incorporated, beat on high speed until there are no lumps and the frosting is super white and fluffy, about 5 minutes', '24: Place a dab of frosting on a cake stand or an inverted plate', '25:  Place a layer of cake on the cake wheel, then evenly spread frosting on top with an offset spatula', '26:  Place the next layer of cake on top of the frosted layer, and spread frosting on top', '27:  Add the last cake layer and lightly frost the entire outside of the cake to create a thin crumb coat', '28: Chill the cake in the refrigerator for 20 minutes', '29: Remove the cake from the refrigerator and use the remaining icing to frost the cake in an even layer', '30:  Take the end of an offset spatula or knife and gently press it against the against the frosting at the bottom of the cake', '31:  Then, spin the cake and slowly raise the spatula after each rotation to create a ribbed effect', '32:  Smooth the top of the cake with the spatula', '33: Place sprinkles around the edge of the cake', '34:  Set a small cookie cutter, any shape you like, in the center of the cake and fill in with sprinkles', '35:  Gently remove the cookie cutter']

ingredients: ['4 large eggs', '½ cup milk (120 mL)', 'olive oil drizzle', '½ cup kale (35 g) chopped', '⅓ cup bell pepper (35 g) diced', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '¼ cup feta cheese (25 g) crumbled']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, whisk together the 4 large eggs and ½ cup milk', '2: Heat the olive oil in an oven-safe pan over medium-low heat', '3:  When the oil is shimmering, add the ½ cup kale, ⅓ cup bell ⅓ cup bell pepper, salt, and ⅓ cup bell pepper', '4:  Sauté until the ⅓ cup bell pepper is tender, about 10 minutes', '5: Pour the egg mixture into the pan and sprinkle the ¼ cup feta cheese on top', '6:  Continue to cook, pushing in the edges occasionally to make sure all the egg cooks evenly', '7:   Remove from the heat', '8: Place the pan in the oven and broil on high until the top is lightly browned, about 4 minutes']

ingredients: ['¼ cup fish sauce (60 mL)', '3 tablespoons tamarind concentrate', '1 tablespoon lime juice', '1 tablespoon rice vinegar', '¼ cup white sugar (50 g)', '1 tablespoon chili sauce', '1 tablespoon paprika', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '3 cloves garlic crushed and coarsely chopped', '12 oz rice noodle (360 g) soaked in water according to package instructions', '4 boneless skinless chicken thighs', '4 eggs', '½ lb medium shrimp (225 g)', '1 bundle green onion', '1 cup unsalted dry roasted peanuts (125 g)', '3 cups bean sprout (300 g)']
instructions: ['1: To prepare the sauce, mix together ¼ cup fish sauce, tamarind concentrate, 1 tablespoon lime juice, rice vinegar, ¼ cup white sugar, 1 tablespoon paprika, and 1 tablespoon chili paste until the sugar is completely dissolved', '2: Crush or blitz 1 cup unsalted dry roasted peanuts to the desired consistency', '3:  Slice the 1 bundle green onions in 1-2inch sections at a bias', '4: Slice 4 boneless skinless chicken thighs into quarter inch strips and peel ½ lb medium shrimp', '5: Heat skillet on high for a minute or two and coat the bottom with oil', '6:  Toss the 3 cloves garlic in the skillet until it is nutty and fragrant', '7: Place 4 boneless skinless chicken in the pan and sear until the outside has just changed to ¼ cup white', '8: Push the 4 boneless skinless chicken to one side, add a bit more oil to the vacant side, and crack the 4 eggs on top of the oil', '9:  Resist the urge to immediately stir them, and wait for the ¼ cup whites to start cooking', '10:  Gently fold the 4 eggs and 4 boneless skinless chicken', '11: Push the 4 boneless skinless chicken and 4 eggs to one side, add a bit more oil to the vacant side of the pan, and add ½ lb medium shrimp to the oil', '12:  Cook the ½ lb medium shrimp until it becomes opaque, flipping once', '13:  Toss to incorporate all ingredients', '14: Drain the noodles and add them to the pan, folding all ingredients together', '15:  Cook for a minute or two until the noodles have relaxed, and then add the sauce', '16: Fold all ingredients until everything is evenly coated in the sauce mixture, reduce any excess sauce, it should not be liquidly and you should no longer have a strong ¼ cup fish sauce smell', '17: Add the 3 cups bean sprouts, 1 bundle green onions, a couple tablespoons of 1 cup unsalted dry roasted peanuts, and fold a few times to lightly steam these fresh ingredients', '18: Now, immediately plate and garnish with extra 1 cup unsalted dry roasted peanuts, 1 bundle green onions, 1 tablespoon lime wedge, 1 tablespoon chili paste, and/or 3 cups bean sprouts', '19:  Serve warm']

ingredients: ['olive oil for cooking', '1 large eggplant or 2 small cubed', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 red bell pepper seeded and chopped', 'yellow bell pepper seeded and chopped', '1 small white onion chopped', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 yellow squash sliced', '1 zucchini sliced', '1 tablespoon fresh thyme chopped', '3 roma tomatoes diced', '½ lemon juiced', '1 cup white quinoa (170 g) uncooked', '2 ½ cups water (600 mL)', '1 tablespoon fresh basil chopped']
instructions: ['1: Heat a bit of olive oil in a 1 large skillet over medium heat', '2:  Add the eggplant, season with salt and 1 red 1 red yellow bell yellow yellow bell pepper, and cook, stirring occasionally, until golden brown and softened, 5-10 minutes', '3:  Remove from the pan and drain on paper towels', '4: Heat more oil in the pan, then add the 1 red yellow bell 1 red 1 red yellow bell yellow yellow bell peppers', '5:  Cook, stirring occasionally, until softened, 2-3 minutes', '6: Add the 1 small white onion and 2 cloves garlic and cook, stirring, until the 1 small white onions are soft and golden, about 3 minutes', '7:  Remove the 1 red 1 red yellow bell yellow yellow bell peppers and 1 small white onions from the pan', '8: Add the yellow squash and 1 zucchini, season with salt and 1 red 1 red yellow bell yellow yellow bell pepper, and cook squash have cooked down a bit, about 5 minutes', '9: Add the 1 tablespoon fresh thyme and 3 roma tomatoes, season with more salt, then add the ½ lemon juice', '10:  Increase the heat to high and cook until mixture is sizzling', '11:  Cook, stirring occasionally, until the 3 roma tomatoes start to release their juices, about 2 minutes', '12:  Return the eggplant and 1 red 1 red yellow bell yellow yellow bell pepper mixture to the pan, stir to combine, then remove the pan from the heat', '13: Add the 1 cup white quinoa and 2 ½ cups water to a 1 large skillet and stir to combine', '14:  Bring to a boil, then cover and reduce the heat to low', '15:  Simmer until the liquid is absorbed, about 20 minutes', '16: Spoon the vegetables over 1 cup white quinoa and sprinkle the 1 tablespoon fresh basil on top', '17:  Serve warm']

ingredients: ['2 ½ cups raw cashews (325 g)', '1 ½ cups pitted date (255 g)', '⅓ cup shredded coconut (25 g) plus more for topping', '1 pinch salt', '3 tablespoons coconut milk or water', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
instructions: ['1: Line an 8-inch (20 cm) square baking dish with parchment paper', '2: Add the 2 ½ cups raw cashews, dates, coconut, 1 pinch salt, coconut milk, and 1 teaspoon vanilla to a food processor and pulse until the mixture starts to clump together', '3: Transfer the mixture to the prepared baking dish and press into an even layer', '4:  Top with more coconut, if desired', '5: Chill for 1 hour', '6: Remove the bars from the baking dish by lifting the parchment paper', '7:  Cut into 12 individual bars', '8: Serve immediately or store in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 1 week']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 medium onion diced', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon cumin', '2 tablespoons harissa paste', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '28 oz diced tomato (795 g) 2 cans', '5 large eggs', 'fresh parsley chopped to serve', '1 loaf baguette to serve']
instructions: ['1: In a 5 large cast-iron skillet, heat the 2 tablespoons olive oil over 1 medium heat', '2: Add the 3 cloves garlic and onions, cooking until the onions are translucent and the 3 cloves garlic is starting to slightly brown', '3: Add the spices and 2 tablespoons harissa paste, cooking the spices until fragrant, about 1 minute', '4: Add the tomatoes and tomato paste and cook for about 10-15 minutes until the sauce has thickened to the point where pressing down with a spoon leaves an indent that holds its shape', '5: Taking the back of a 5 large spoon, make 5 5 large indents into the sauce, using a left-to-right wiggling motion to ensure that the “walls” of the sauce are tall enough to hold an egg', '6: Crack the eggs into each of the indents, then cook over low heat for about 15-20 minutes until the eggs are cooked to your liking', '7: NOTE: To speed the process up, cover the skillet with a 5 large lid', '8: Sprinkle with chopped fresh parsley, remove from heat, and fresh parsley chopped to 1 loaf baguette to serve with crusty bread to mop up all the sauce']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 cloves garlic minced', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '¾ cup frozen chopped spinach (30 g) thawed and drained', '14 oz artichoke heart (395 g) 1 can', '8 oz cream cheese (225 g) softened', '¾ cup sour cream (170 g)', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese (100 g) divided', '1 cup grated parmesan cheese (110 g)', 'salt to taste', 'black pepper to taste', '1 sourdough bread boule']
instructions: ['1: In a saucepan set over medium heat, add 1 tablespoon of 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 cloves garlic  and ½ teaspoon red ½ teaspoon red black pepper flakes, stirring until fragrant, about 30 seconds', '2: Stir in the ¾ cup frozen chopped spinach and 14 oz artichokes', '3: Mix in the 8 oz ¾ cup ¾ cup 1 sour cream cheese, ¾ cup 1 sour 8 oz ¾ cup ¾ cup 1 sour cream, ½ of the 1 cup shredded mozzarella and Parmesan', '4:  Stir until combined and cheese has melted', '5: Season with salt and ½ teaspoon red black pepper', '6:  Remove from heat and set aside', '7: Preheat oven to  375°F (190°C)', '8: Remove the top of the ¾ cup 1 1 sourdough boule', '9:  Cut around the inside of the bread, being careful not to cut through the sides, and scoop out the center of the boule', '10: Cut the scooped out bread into cubes, and place on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper', '11: Vertically slice into the edges of the bread bowl, cutting all the way through the bottom, leaving 1 inch (2 cm) of space between each', '12:  Place onto a baking sheet next to the cubed bread', '13: Spoon the ¾ cup frozen chopped spinach 14 oz artichoke mixture into the sliced and hollowed bread bowl', '14:  Sprinkle the remaining 1 cup shredded mozzarella along the edges of the top of the filled bread bowl', '15: Drizzle the cubed bread pieces with the remaining tablespoon of of 2 tablespoons olive oil', '16:  Place the sliced top back onto the bowl', '17: Bake for 15-20 minutes']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons canola oil', '2 boneless skinless chicken breasts diced', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '2 cloves garlic chopped', '2 cups broccoli floret (500 g)', '2 cups milk (480 mL)', '1 cup shredded parmesan cheese (110 g)', '¼ cup fresh parsley (10 g) chopped', '4 strips bacon cooked crumbled', '½ lb spaghetti (225 g) cooked', 'Preparation', '2 tablespoons canola oil', '2 boneless skinless chicken breasts diced', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '2 cloves garlic chopped', '2 cups broccoli floret (500 g)', '2 cups milk (480 mL)', '1 cup shredded parmesan cheese (110 g)', '¼ cup fresh parsley (10 g) chopped', '4 strips bacon cooked crumbled', '½ lb spaghetti (225 g) cooked', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Heat oil in a pot over medium-high heat', '2: Cook the chicken with the salt and pepper', '3: Add the garlic and broccoli, cooking for 1-2 minutes', '4: Add the milk, parmesan, parsley, and bacon, bringing to a boil', '5: Add the spaghetti, and toss until evenly coated and sauce sticks to the noodles']

ingredients: ['salt to taste', '8 oz penne pasta (225 g)', '2 cups broccoli floret (300 g)', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 boneless skinless chicken breasts cubed', 'pepper to taste', '¼ cup butter (55 g)', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 cup heavy cream (235 mL)', '1 teaspoon salt', '⅛ teaspoon nutmeg', '¼ teaspoon black pepper', '1 ½ cups grated parmesan cheese (165 g) plus extra for garnish', 'red pepper flake to garnish']
instructions: ['1: Bring a quart (950 ML) of water in a large pot to a boil over high heat, and salt to taste', '2: Cook 8 oz penne pasta for 8 minutes, or until slightly underdone', '3: Add 2 cups broccoli to 8 oz penne pasta and simmer for 4 minutes with the lid on', '4: Strain the 8 oz penne pasta and 2 cups broccoli in a colander, and run cold water over to prevent the 2 cups broccoli from over cooking', '5: Heat the 2 tablespoons olive oil in the pot over medium-high heat, and add the 2 boneless skinless chicken', '6:  Season the 2 boneless skinless chicken with season salt and pepper', '7: Once the 2 boneless skinless chicken is cooked through, remove it from the pot and set aside', '8: Add the ¼ cup butter to the pot, and melt it', '9:  Once ¼ cup butter is fully melted, add in 3 cloves garlic and stir continuously for 10 seconds', '10: Add the 1 cup heavy cream, salt, pepper, and ⅛ teaspoon nutmeg', '11:  Stir often, and cook until sauce starts to bubble slightly', '12: Once the sauce is bubbling and begins to cook down, add in Parmesan cheese and stir until the sauce thickens', '13: Add in the cooked 2 boneless skinless chicken, 8 oz penne pasta, and 2 cups broccoli, and stir until fully combined', '14: Top with Parmesan cheese or red chili flakes']

ingredients: ['½ cup elbow macaroni (50 g)', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '3 tablespoons milk', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '¼ cup shredded cheddar cheese (25 g)', 'fresh chive to garnish optional']
instructions: ['1: Mix the ½ cup elbow macaroni, ½ cup water, and salt in a microwaveable mug', '2: Microwave for 2-3 minutes, then stir', '3: Add the 3 tablespoons milk, ¼ cup shredded cheddar cheese, salt, and pepper, then stir', '4: Microwave for another 30 seconds, stir, and fresh chive to garnish with a sprinkle of chives']

ingredients: ['1 lb shrimp (455 g) deveined and peeled', 'Seasoned Flour', '1 cup flour (125 g)', '1 tablespoon cajun seasoning', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', 'Egg Mixture', '1 egg', '3 tablespoons milk', '1 teaspoon cajun seasoning']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, add seasoned 1 cup flour ingredients', '2:  Mix well', '3: Place half of the 1 cup flour mixture into a large zip lock bag, reserve the rest', '4: Add the 1 lb shrimp to the bag and shake until each 1 lb shrimp is coated with 1 cup flour', '5:  Shake off any excess 1 cup flour', '6: In a separate bowl, add 1 egg, 3 tablespoons milk, and cajun seasoning', '7:  Mix well', '8: Dredge the 1 cup floured 1 lb shrimp in the 1 egg mixture, then coat with the fresh seasoned 1 cup flour mixture', '9: Heat oil at 350°F (180°C)', '10: Fry 1 lb shrimp for a few minutes until golden brown and cooked through', '11: Serve with your favorite dipping sauce']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon unsalted butter', '¾ cup pasta shells (150 g) uncooked', '1 cup yellow corn kernels (150 g) frozen or canned (if frozen thawed if can drained)', '1 tablespoon all purpose flour', '2 cups coconut milk (480 mL) in a carton unsweetened', '3 large eggs beaten', '¼ cup grated parmesan cheese (35 g)', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese (100 g)', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'fresh cilantro for garnish chopped']
instructions: ['1: In a 9-10 inch skillet, melt 1 tablespoon unsalted butter over medium heat', '2:  Add macaroni and 1 cup yellow corn', '3:  Sauté about 30 seconds', '4:  Stir in 1 tablespoon all purpose flour and 2 cups coconut milk', '5:  Cook, stirring occasionally until macaroni are al dente or your desired doneness', '6: Stir in 3 large eggs until 3 large eggs become fluffy', '7:  Then, stir in ¼ cup grated parmesan cheese and 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese until well blended', '8:  Add salt and black pepper to taste', '9: Cover with a lid, reduce heat to low and cook until the cheese melts', '10: Turn off the heat, uncover and sprinkle fresh cilantro or parsley over the top', '11: Serve warm']

ingredients: ['2 boneless skinless chicken breasts cubed', '1 cup teriyaki sauce (240 mL)', '2 teaspoons oil', '½ cup onion (75 g) diced', '1 tablespoon garlic minced', '½ cup carrot (60 g) diced', '1 cup broccoli floret (150 g)', '3 eggs beaten', '3 cups brown rice (690 g) cooked', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Marinate the 2 boneless skinless chicken in 1 cup teriyaki sauce in the refrigerator for at least an hour', '2: In a wok or deep skillet, add the 2 boneless skinless chicken in the 1 cup teriyaki marinade and cook thoroughly over high heat', '3:  Set aside', '4: In the same pan, add the 2 teaspoons 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon sesame oil and cook onions, 1 tablespoon garlic, and carrots until onions are translucent', '5: Add 1 cup broccoli and cook an additional 3-4 minutes', '6:  Push all of the cooked vegetables to the side of the pan', '7: Beat the 3 eggs and pour into the cleared half of the pan', '8:  Scramble the 3 eggs and mix with the rest of the vegetables', '9: Add 3 cups brown rice, cooked 2 boneless skinless chicken, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 tablespoon sesame 2 teaspoons 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon sesame oil, and pepper', '10:  Mix well and let the 3 cups brown rice cook until slightly crispy']

ingredients: ['2.5 cups fresh blackberries (340 g)', '1 cup sugar (200 g)', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '2 cups lemon juice (480 mL) from about 6 lemons', '2 cups whiskey (480 mL)', '4 cups club soda (960 mL)', 'ice for serving', 'Garnish', '1 cup blackberries', '1 lemon sliced']
instructions: ['1: In a medium pot, combine the blackberries, 1 cup sugar and 1 cup water', '2:  Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to medium and cook for 1-2 minutes, until the berries break down', '3:  Remove from the heat', '4: Strain the syrup through a fine-mesh sieve to remove the pulp and seeds', '5:  Set aside to cool', '6: In a large pitcher, combine the lemon juice, blackberry simple syrup, and 2 cups whiskey', '7:  Chill until ready to serve', '8: Before serving, add the 4 cups club soda and stir to combine', '9: Serve over ice, garnished with a few blackberries and a slice of lemon']

ingredients: ['¼ cup basmati rice (53 g) broken', '2 cups unsweetened coconut milk (500 mL) or whole milk', '¼ teaspoon ground cardamom (0.5 g)', '¼ cup granulated sugar (48 g)', '¼ teaspoon saffron thread', 'golden raisin for garnish', 'pistachio chopped for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Rinse the ¼ cup basmati rice until the water runs clear', '2:  Soak the ¼ cup basmati rice in water for 20–30 minutes, then drain', '3: In a medium heavy-bottomed pot over medium heat, combine the 2 cups unsweetened coconut milk and ¼ teaspoon ground cardamom', '4:  Bring the milk to a gentle simmer, then add the drained ¼ cup basmati rice', '5:  Simmer, stirring occasionally so the ¼ cup basmati rice does not stick to the bottom, until the milk is reduced by half and the ¼ cup basmati rice is tender, about 30 minutes', '6: Add the ¼ cup granulated sugar and stir until it dissolves', '7:  Remove the pot from the heat and stir in the ¼ teaspoon saffron threads', '8: Serve the kheer topped with golden raisins and pistachios']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon avocado oil', '2 whole dry chili peppers', '4 whole cloves', '½ cinnamon stick broken into pieces', '½ teaspoon cumin seeds', '½ teaspoon black mustard seeds', '¾ cup quinoa (110 g)', '¾ cup mung (150 g) moong dal', '½ teaspoon turmeric', '1 teaspoon salt (adjust per taste)']
instructions: ['1: Wash and strain ¾ cup quinoa and ¾ cup mung dal and set aside', "2: Press 'Saute' mode on Instant Pot", '3: Add 1 tablespoon avocado oil, 2 whole dry chili pepper, ½ cinnamon stick pieces, 4 whole cloves, ½ teaspoon cumin seeds, and ½ teaspoon black mustard seeds', "4: Once heated, the ½ teaspoon black mustard seeds will 'pop", '5: ’ At this point, add the washed and strained ¾ cup quinoa and dal', '6: Add water, 1 teaspoon salt and ½ teaspoon turmeric and mix well', '7:  Once done, close the lid on the IP', "8: Press 'Cancel' and then 'Multigrain'", '9:  Set time to 12 min', "10: Move valve to 'Sealing' position and let cook", '11: Serve hot']

ingredients: ['Buttermilk Marinade', '2 cups buttermilk (480 mL)', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '8 boneless skinless chicken thighs', 'Dill Dressing', '1 ½ cups plain greek yogurt (425 g)', '3 tablespoons fresh dill chopped', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '¼ cup grated parmesan cheese (30 g)', 'Seasoned Flour', '2 cups all-purpose flour (250 g)', '1 tablespoon salt', '2 teaspoons black pepper', '1 ½ teaspoons cayenne pepper', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', 'peanut or vegetable oil for frying', 'For Serving', 'softened butter for buns', '8 brioche burger buns', '1 head butter lettuce', '2 tomatoes sliced']
instructions: ['1: Make the 2 cups buttermilk marinade: In a medium bowl, combine the 2 cups buttermilk, salt, pepper, and cayenne', '2:  Toss in the 8 boneless skinless chicken thighs in the marinade to coat', '3:  Marinate for at least 1 hour in the refrigerator, or overnight', '4: Make the 3 tablespoons fresh dill dressing: In a small bowl, combine the 1 ½ cups plain greek yogurt, 3 tablespoons fresh dill, garlic powder, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, and Parmesan cheese', '5:  Cover and let sit for at least 1 hour in the refrigerator to chill', '6: Make the seasoned 2 cups all-purpose flour: In a medium bowl, combine the 2 cups all-purpose flour, salt, pepper, cayenne, and garlic powder', '7:  Dip the marinated 8 boneless skinless chicken in the 2 cups all-purpose flour mixture until the 8 boneless skinless chicken is completely covered', '8: Heat the peanut or vegetable oil in a deep pot until it reaches 350˚F (180˚C)', '9:  Do not fill more than halfway with peanut or vegetable oil', '10:  Carefully fry the 8 boneless skinless chicken for 7 minutes, or until cooked through', '11: The internal temperature should reach 165˚F (75˚C), and the 8 boneless skinless chicken should be golden brown and crispy', '12:  Drain on a paper towel–lined plate or wire rack', '13: Heat a large skillet over medium heat', '14:  Butter the cut sides of the 8 brioche burger buns, then toast on the hot skillet until browned and crisp', '15:  Build the sandwiches with the toasted buns, lettuce, fried 8 boneless skinless chicken, tomato slices, and 3 tablespoons fresh dill dressing']

ingredients: ['Filling', '1 ¼ cups milk (300 mL)', '¼ cup cornstarch (30 g)', '⅓ cup white sugar (70 g)', '1 teaspoon honey', '½ cup heavy cream (120 mL)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'Cake', '⅓ cup white sugar (60 g)', '3 eggs', '1 tablespoon matcha green tea powder', '2 teaspoons honey', '¼ cup cake flour (25 g)']
instructions: ['1: Start with the filling', '2:  Pour the 1 ¼ cups milk into a small saucepan, and sprinkle over the ¼ cup cornstarch, whisk until combined', '3: Next, add the honey and sugar stirring continuously over a low heat', "4:  When the 1 ¼ cups milk mixture almost starts to boil it will thicken and get a bit lumpy, don't panic! Just keep stirring until it smooths out", '5:  Continue to stir the now thick 1 ¼ cups milk mixture over the heat for an additional 1-2 minutes, to cook out the ¼ cup cornstarch flavor', '6: Take off the heat and pour into a bowl or shallow dish', '7:  Cover the mixture with cling wrap, pushing it all the way to the top of the custard to prevent a film from forming and chill this in the refrigerator until cold', '8: Next, make the ¼ cup cake by combining the sugar, honey, 1 tablespoon matcha powder, and 3 eggs in a large bowl', '9:  Mix until it almost triples in size, is lighter in color, and becomes thick and fluffy', '10:  This will take about 7-10 minutes', '11:  If you dribble some of the batter on itself it should hold a "ribbon" shape for 4-5 seconds', '12: Once the batter has reached the correct consistency sift over the ¼ cup cake flour, and gently fold the flour in until all combined', '13: Heat your oven to 350˚F (175˚C) and butter your baking sheet', '14:  Place a piece of parchment paper (a few inches larger than your baking sheet) onto your baking sheet', '15:  Using a rubber scraper (or your hand) push out any bubbles', '16: Pour the batter into the prepared baking sheet and bake for 8-10 minutes', "17: NOTE: You'll know it's done when the ¼ cup cake is slightly risen, turning just a bit golden, and you can smell it", "18:  Also, if you gently press your fingertips on the surface of the ¼ cup cake, and no indentations are left, it's done", '19: In a clean bowl, whip the ½ cup heavy cream with electric beaters until it is thick and pretty stiff, little peaks should form when you lift the beaters', '20: Grab your chilled custard from the fridge', '21:  Add one tsp of 1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '22:  Take the same beaters and whisk your custard, it will look funny at first, but after a few moments it will become nice and smooth', '23: Fold the whipped cream into the custard until they are combined', '24: Cool your ¼ cup cake for 2-3 minutes on the baking sheet', '25:  Lay a fresh sheet of parchment beside your ¼ cup cake and sprinkle it with powdered sugar', '26: Lift the ¼ cup cake with the sides of the parchment onto your table', '27:  Flip the ¼ cup cake onto the sugared parchment paper', '28: Remove parchment paper from the flipped ¼ cup cake', '29: Slather the filling onto your ¼ cup cake', '30: Roll it up, using the parchment to help', '31: Wrap the whole thing in cling wrap and chill for two hours before slicing', '32: Slice into pieces of your desired thickness and serve']

ingredients: ['⅓ cup caper juice (80 mL)', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', '2 tablespoons lemon juice plus more to taste', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 cloves garlic crushed', '3 young thai coconuts meat removed', '1 ½ cups canola oil (360 mL) for frying', '1 cup all purpose flour (125 g)', '6 tablespoons semolina flour', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt plus more to taste', '1 cup non-dairy milk (240 mL) of choice', '1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar', '½ cup fresh parsley (20 g) chopped', '1 lemon cut into wedges', 'Preparation', '⅓ cup caper juice (80 mL)', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', '2 tablespoons lemon juice plus more to taste', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 cloves garlic crushed', '3 young thai coconuts meat removed', '1 ½ cups canola oil (360 mL) for frying', '1 cup all purpose flour (125 g)', '6 tablespoons semolina flour', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt plus more to taste', '1 cup non-dairy milk (240 mL) of choice', '1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar', '½ cup fresh parsley (20 g) chopped', '1 lemon cut into wedges', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Make the marinade: In a medium bowl, whisk together the caper juice, lemon zest, lemon juice, olive oil, and garlic', '2: Cut the coconut into ½-inch (1 ¼ cm) wide strips and add to the marinade', '3:  Cover and refrigerate for 2–4 hours', '4: Heat 1 inch (2 ½ cm) of canola oil in a large, high-walled skillet over medium-high heat until it reaches 375°F (190°C)', '5:  Set a wire rack inside a baking sheet or line with paper towels and set nearby', '6: In a medium bowl, whisk together the all-purpose flour, semolina flour, and salt', '7: In a second medium bowl, whisk together the non-dairy milk and apple cider vinegar', '8: Working in batches, remove the coconut meat from the marinade and transfer to the non-dairy milk mixture', '9:  Allow any excess liquid to drip off, then transfer to the flour mixture, tossing to coat', '10: Working in batches to avoid overcrowding the pan, fry the battered coconut meat for about 2 minutes, until golden brown', '11:  Transfer to the wire rack to drain and immediately season with salt and lemon juice', '12: Garnish the coconut calamari with the parsley and serve hot with warm marinara sauce and lemon wedges alongside']

ingredients: ['14 oz wide rice noodles (420 g)', 'Sauce', '4 cloves garlic minced', '1 fresh ginger minced 2 in (5 cm)', '1 thai chili thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon McCormick® white pepper', '2 tablespoons honey', '2 tablespoons light soy sauce', '2 tablespoons dark soy sauce', '3 tablespoons oyster sauce', '3 tablespoons hoisin sauce', '2 tablespoons fish sauce', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', 'Stir Fry', '¼ cup vegetable oil (60 mL) divided', '8 oz chicken breast (225 g) thinly sliced crosswise', '½ medium white onion thinly sliced', '½ medium carrot cut 1/8 in thick on the bias (3mm)', '1 red bell pepper cut into 1/4 (6 mm) strips', '1 bunch scallion cut into 2 in (5 cm) pieces', '1 can baby corn drained halved lengthwise', '20 leaves fresh thai basil', 'Special Equipment', 'wok', 'wok spatula']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, soak the 14 oz wide rice noodles in warm water (about 100°F/38°C) for 60 minutes, then drain', '2: Make the sauce: In a medium bowl, whisk together the 4 cloves garlic, 1 fresh ginger, Thai chiles, 1 tablespoon McCormick® ½ medium white pepper, honey, light and dark soy sauce, oyster sauce, hoisin sauce, fish sauce, and 1 tablespoon sesame oil', '3: Heat 2 tablespoons of ¼ cup vegetable oil in a large wok over high heat until shimmering', '4:  Add the 8 oz chicken and cook for 4 minutes, until lightly browned on the outside and no longer pink inside', '5:  Transfer the 8 oz chicken to a bowl', '6: Heat the remaining 2 tablespoons of oil in the wok over high heat until shimmering', '7:  Add the onion, carrot, 1 red bell pepper, 1 can baby corn, and scallions and sauté for 5–6 minutes, until the onion is translucent', '8: Add the 14 oz wide rice noodles and sauce and toss to coat well', '9:  Add the 8 oz chicken and Thai basil and toss to incorporate']

ingredients: ['1 ½ lb skirt steak (680 g) trimmed of excess fat and cut into 3 pieces', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', 'kosher salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '8 cloves garlic', '2 small shallots halved lengthwise', '1 jalapeño stemmed halved seeds and ribs removed', '1 cup fresh flat-leaf parsley leaves (40 g)', '¾ cup fresh cilantro (30 g)', '½ cup olive oil (120 mL)', '¼ cup fresh oregano leaf (10 g) packed', '¼ cup red wine vinegar (60 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Heat a large cast-iron skillet over high heat until it begins to smoke', '2: Brush the 1 ½ lb skirt steaks with the 1 tablespoon vegetable oil and season liberally with kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper', '3: Place the 1 ½ lb skirt steak in the skillet, working in batches as needed', '4:  Cook, flipping once halfway through, until charred on the outside and medium-rare inside, 4–8 minutes, depending on the thickness of the 1 ½ lb skirt steak', '5:  If working in batches, wipe out the skillet between batches', '6: Transfer the 1 ½ lb skirt steaks to a cutting board and let rest for 10 minutes', '7: Reduce the heat to medium-high', '8:  Add the 8 cloves garlic, 2 small shallots, and 1 jalapeño and cook, turning as needed, until blackened in spots and softened, about 8 minutes', '9: Transfer the 1 tablespoon vegetables to a food processor or blender', '10:  Add the parsley, cilantro, olive oil, oregano, and vinegar and purée until smooth', '11:  Season the chimichurri with kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper', '12:  You should have about 1 cup', '13: To serve, cut the 1 ½ lb skirt steaks against the grain into ¼-inch thick slices', '14:  Transfer to a serving platter or plates and spoon the charred chimichurri over the top']

ingredients: ['4 bone-in skin-on chicken thighs', '2 teaspoons salt for the chicken', '1 teaspoon pepper for the chicken', '1 tablespoon oil', '3 cloves garlic chopped', '½ onion diced', '1 tomato diced', '2 cups spinach (80 g)', '2 cups heavy cream (480 mL)', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '½ cup grated parmesan cheese (55 g)', '2 tablespoons fresh flat-leaf parsley chopped']
instructions: ['1: Season the 4 bone-in skin-on 2 teaspoons salt for the 1 teaspoon pepper for the chicken all over with salt and pepper', '2: Heat the 1 tablespoon oil in a skillet over medium-low heat', '3: Place the 4 bone-in skin-on 2 teaspoons salt for the 1 teaspoon pepper for the chicken thighs skin side down in the skillet and cook for about 13 minutes to crisp up the skin', '4:  Move the 4 bone-in skin-on 2 teaspoons salt for the 1 teaspoon pepper for the chicken around from time to time to ensure it cooks evenly', '5:  The skin should be hard to the touch', '6: Flip the 4 bone-in skin-on 2 teaspoons salt for the 1 teaspoon pepper for the chicken, then cook for about another 15 minutes, until the 4 bone-in skin-on 2 teaspoons salt for the 1 teaspoon pepper for the chicken is cooked through', '7:  Remove from pan', '8: Add the 3 cloves garlic and ½ onion, stirring until ½ onions are translucent', '9:  Stir in the tomatoes and 2 cups spinach until the 2 cups spinach is wilted', '10: Add the 2 cups heavy cream, salt, and pepper, bringing to a boil', '11: Add the Parmesan cheese and 2 tablespoons fresh flat-leaf parsley, stirring until the sauce has thickened slightly', '12: Place the 4 bone-in skin-on 2 teaspoons salt for the 1 teaspoon pepper for the chicken back in the pan, spooning the sauce on top of the 4 bone-in skin-on 2 teaspoons salt for the 1 teaspoon pepper for the chicken']

ingredients: ['1 cup vegetable oil (240 mL)', '5 corn tortillas cut 4 of them in half', '14 oz black beans (395 g) 1 can', '1 cup mexican blend cheese (100 g)', '1 ½ cups pico de gallo (300 g)', '6 eggs', '½ cup red enchilada sauce (120 mL)', 'For Toppings (Optional)', 'fresh cilantro to taste', 'cotija cheese to taste', '1 cup cream mexicana (230 g) or sour cream']
instructions: ['1: Preheat your oven to 375˚F (190˚C)In 1 cup vegetable oil, lightly fry your 5 corn tortillas', '2:  Drain on a paper towel', '3: In a 9 inch (25cm) cast iron skillet, arrange your lightly fried tortillas so they cover the bottom of the skillet', '4: Add 14 oz black beans evenly over tortillas', '5:  (Some will fall in-between the tortillas, thats ok!)Sprinkle Mexican blend 1 cup 1 cup cream mexican blend cotija cheese over the 14 oz black beans', '6: Add 1 ½ cups pico de gallo on top of the 1 cup 1 cup cream mexican blend cotija cheese', '7: Using the back of a large spoon, create 6 wells in the 1 ½ cups pico de gallo for the 6 eggs to rest in', '8: Crack one egg into each well (6 wells for 6 6 eggs)', '9: Pour ½ cup red enchilada sauce over everything!Bake for 20-25 minutes', '10:  Check on it often to make sure your yolks don’t overcook!Top with your favorite huevos rancheros toppings']

ingredients: ['1 large pineapple', '2 tablespoons peanut or vegetable oil', '6 boneless chicken thighs cut into bite-size cubes', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 tablespoon hoisin sauce', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '1 tablespoon garlic paste', '½ cup chicken stock (100 mL)', 'cooked rice for serving', 'sesame seed for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Using a sharp knife, carefully cut the pineapple in half lengthwise', '2:  Using the knife tip, cut around the inside edge of the pineapple, being careful not to cut through the skin', '3:  Slice down and across the pineapple flesh, then scoop out the  pineapple cubes with a spoon', '4:  Discard the core and set the flesh aside', '5: In a 1 large pan, heat the 2 tablespoons peanut or vegetable oil over medium heat', '6:  Add the chicken and season with 1 teaspoon salt and 1 teaspoon pepper', '7:  Fry for about 10 minutes, until 1 tablespoon browned and cooked through', '8:  Remove the chicken and set aside', '9: Add the cubed pineapple, 1 tablespoon hoisin sauce, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, 1 tablespoon brown sugar, and 1 tablespoon garlic paste and cook for a few minutes', '10:  Stir in the chicken stock, bring to a boil, then simmer, stirring occasionally, until the sauce has reduced and thickened', '11: Add the chicken back to the pan and stir until evenly coated with the sauce', '12:  Serve in the empty pineapple halves, along with some rice and sesame seeds']

ingredients: ['1 bottle sparkling rosé', '1 lemon sliced', '1 lime sliced', '1 grapefruit sliced', '1 cup brandy (240 mL)', '1 cup grapefruit juice (240 mL)', '¾ cup simple syrup (175 mL)']
instructions: ['1: In a large pitcher or bowl, combine fruit,  grapefruit juice, 1 cup brandy, and ¾ cup simple syrup', '2: Stir well, cover with plastic wrap, and chill for at least 1 hour', '3: Top with 1 bottle sparkling rosé, and serve with a 1 lemon slice']

ingredients: ['1 cup almond (140 g) sliced plus more for topping', '1 tablespoon all purpose flour', '⅓ cup brown sugar (75 g)', '¼ teaspoon kosher salt', '8 tablespoons unsalted butter cubed', '1 large egg', '2 teaspoons almond extract divided', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '½ cup granulated sugar (100 g)', 'croissant 6 day old', '¼ cup powdered sugar (30 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Spread the sliced almonds in a single layer on a baking sheet', '3:  Toast for about 5 minutes, or until the almonds just begin to turn golden ⅓ cup brown', '4: In the bowl of a food processor, combine the toasted almonds, flour, ⅓ cup brown sugar, and salt', '5:  Pulse until the almonds break down to medium crumbs', '6: Add the butter to the food processor and continue processing until a smooth paste forms', '7: Add the 1 large egg and 1 ¼ 2 teaspoon almond extract and continue to process until the 1 large egg is fully incorporated', '8: Transfer the almond mixture to a small bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes, up to 1 week', '9: Reduce the oven temperature to 350°F (180°C)', '10:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '11: In a small pot over medium heat, combine the ½ cup water and ½ cup granulated sugar', '12:  Cook, whisking occasionally, until the sugar is completely dissolved, about 5 minutes', '13:  Add the remaining ¼ 2 teaspoon of almond extract, then remove the pot from the heat', '14: Slice each croissant in half horizontally', '15:  Set the bottom halves of each croissant on the prepared baking sheet', '16: Brush about 1 1 8 tablespoon of the almond simple syrup over the cut side of each croissant half', '17: Spread about 2 1 8 8 tablespoons of the frangipane across the bottom half of each croissant, then cover with the top half', '18: Spread another 1 8 tablespoon of frangipane over the top of each croissant, then sprinkle with sliced almonds', '19: Bake the croissants for 12–15 minutes, or until the frangipane begins to turn golden ⅓ cup brown', '20:  Remove from the oven and let cool slightly, then dust with the ¼ cup powdered sugar']

ingredients: ['2 chicken breasts', '2 ½ cups buttermilk (600 mL)', '1 packet ranch dressing mix', '3 cups cheese cracker (185 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 425˚F (225˚C)', '2: On a cutting board, slice 2 chicken breasts against the grain into strips', '3: Place the 2 chicken strips in a bowl and add in 2 ½ cups buttermilk and ranch 1 packet', '4:  Stir until well-coated', '5: Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and place in the refrigerator for at least an hour', '6: Pour 3 cups cheese crackers into a resealable bag and crush with a rolling pin until they become finely ground', '7: Open the bag and place a marinated piece of 2 chicken in the cracker crumbs', '8:  Coat the 2 chicken with the crumbs and place on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '9: Bake for 20 minutes, flipping halfway']

ingredients: ['2 cups carrot (240 g) sliced diagonally', '2 cups baby potato (450 g) halved', '1 cup yellow squash (150 g) roughly chopped', '1 cup zucchini (150 g) roughly chopped', 'olive oil to taste', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon fresh oregano minced', '3 cloves garlic chopped', '½ cup radish (60 g) sliced', 'mixed greens salad', 'Chimichurri Dressing', '1 cup fresh cilantro (40 g)', '1 cup fresh flat-leaf parsley (40 g)', '3 cloves garlic', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL)', '1 lime juiced', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2: On a baking sheet lined with parchment paper, add carrots, potatoes, 1 cup yellow squash, and 1 cup zucchini', '3: Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt, pepper, 1 tablespoon fresh oregano, and garlic, and mix to evenly coat the coat the vegetables', '4:  *Note: You may need to quarter the potatoes if they are too thick so they roast faster', '5: Bake for 25-30 minutes, until the vegetables are golden brown', '6: Make the chimichurri dressing: combine the 1 cup fresh cilantro, 1 cup fresh flat-leaf parsley, garlic, salt, pepper, olive oil, 1 lime juice, and 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar in a food processor and blend until smooth', '7: Add a large handful of mixed greens to a large bowl', '8:  Top with the roasted vegetables and sliced radishes', '9: Pour over the chimichurri dressing and toss until evenly distributed']

ingredients: ['⅓ cup honey (115 g)', '¼ cup dijon mustard (65 g)', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 cloves garlic minced', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '4 boneless skinless chicken thighs', '¼ cup bacon (60 g) chopped', '4 cups romaine lettuce (300 g) chopped', '1 cup cherry tomatoes (200 g) halved', '¼ red onion sliced', '1 avocado pitted and sliced']
instructions: ['1: In a small bowl or liquid measuring cup, mix the honey, mustard, oil, 2 cloves garlic, 2 teaspoons salt, and 1 teaspoon pepper', '2: Place the 4 boneless skinless chicken thighs in a dish and pour the marinade over the 4 boneless skinless chicken, reserving half for later', '3: Flip the 4 boneless skinless chicken thighs over, fully covering them in the marinade', '4: Cover the dish with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 30 minutes to an hour', '5: Heat a large skillet over medium heat, and place the 4 boneless skinless chicken thighs in the pan', '6: Cook for five minutes on each side, or until the 4 boneless skinless chicken is cooked through', '7: Remove the 4 boneless skinless chicken and set aside', '8: Wipe the pan clean and place back on the heat', '9: Add the chopped bacon to the pan and cook until crispy, about ten minutes', '10: Transfer the bacon to a paper towel-lined plate to drain', '11: Add three 2 tablespoons of water to the reserved marinade and stir to combine', '12: Slice the 4 boneless skinless chicken into strips', '13: Add the 4 cups romaine, cherry tomatoes, ¼ red onion, 1 avocado, cooked bacon, and 4 boneless skinless chicken to a bowl and drizzle with the remaining honey mustard dressing']

ingredients: ['15 oz black beans (400 g) 1 can drained and rinsed', '½ cup jarred roasted red pepper (90 g) finely chopped', '1 clove garlic minced', '¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '½ teaspoon cumin', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ cup cornmeal (40 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '2: In a large bowl, microwave 15 oz black beans for 1 minute, or until softened', '3: Add roasted red peppers, 1 clove garlic, ¼ teaspoon cayenne, ½ teaspoon cumin, and ½ teaspoon salt', '4:  Mash until 15 oz black beans are finely mashed', '5: Add cornmeal and mix until thoroughly combined', '6: Using a ½ cup (120 ml) measuring cup, portion 5 patties from the mixture', '7:  Place onto a lightly greased parchment paper-lined sheet pan', '8: Bake for 30 minutes, or until firm and browned, flipping over halfway through', '9: Serve burgers with your favorite fixins']

ingredients: ['olive oil to taste', '½ large yellow onion diced', '3 cloves garlic minced', '½ tablespoon fresh rosemary minced', '1 ½ cups short-grain brown rice (300 g)', '5 ½ cups vegetable broth (1.3 L) divided', '2 cups butternut squash (410 g) diced', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 bunch fresh sage optional', '¾ cup freshly grated parmesan cheese (80 g)', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter']
instructions: ['1: Place an oven rack at the bottom of the oven and another at the top', '2:  Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C)', '3:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '4: Heat the olive oil in a Dutch oven or ½ large oven-safe pot over medium heat', '5:   Add the onion and cook for about 5 minutes, until starting to brown', '6:  Add the 3 cloves garlic and ½ tablespoon fresh rosemary, and cook for 2 minutes, until fragrant', '7: Add the rice and 4 cups (960 ml) of vegetable broth, and stir to combine', '8:  Bring to a boil, then cover', '9: Place the risotto on the bottom rack of the oven', '10:  Bake for 70 minutes, until all of the liquid has been absorbed by the rice', '11:  (It will appear dry, but you’ll be adding moisture back later in the recipe', '12: )Add the 2 cups 2 tablespoons unsalted butternut squash to the prepared baking sheet', '13:  Drizzle with olive oil, then season with salt and pepper', '14:  Toss to coat', '15: Place the squash on the top rack of the oven, above the risotto', '16:  Bake for 45 minutes, or until the edges of the squash begin to brown and caramelize', '17: Make the fried 1 bunch fresh sage garnish, if using: In a small pot or pan over medium-high heat, add enough olive oil for the 1 bunch fresh sage leaves to sit in', '18:  Once hot, carefully place a few leaves into the oil with tongs', '19:  Fry for 10-20 seconds, until the leaves are crispy but not browned', '20:  Carefully remove from the oil and drain on a paper towel-lined plate', '21:  Sprinkle with salt and set aside', '22: Remove the risotto from the oven', '23:  Add the remaining vegetable broth, the Parmesan, and 2 cups 2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '24:  Stir until creamy', '25:  (The liquid will absorb into the rice as you stir)', '26: Add the 2 cups 2 tablespoons unsalted butternut squash and stir to incorporate', '27: Serve immediately with fried 1 bunch fresh sage for garnish']

ingredients: ['Macarons', '1 ¾ cups powdered sugar (210 g)', '1 cup almond flour (95 g) finely ground', '1 teaspoon salt divided', '3 egg whites at room temperature', '¼ cup granulated sugar (50 g)', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 drops pink gel food coloring', 'Vanilla Buttercream', '1 cup unsalted butter (230 g) 2 sticks at room temperature', '3 cups powdered sugar (360 g)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '3 tablespoons heavy cream']
instructions: ['1: Make the macarons: In the bowl of a 2 drops pink gel food processor, combine the powdered sugar, 1 cup almond flour, and ½ teaspoon of salt, and process on low speed, until extra fine', '2:  Sift the 1 cup almond flour mixture through a fine-mesh sieve into a large bowl', '3: In a separate large bowl, beat the 3 egg whites and the remaining ½ teaspoon of salt with an electric hand mixer until soft peaks form', '4:  Gradually add the ¼ cup granulated sugar until fully incorporated', '5:  Continue to beat until stiff peaks form (you should be able to turn the bowl upside down without anything falling out)', '6: Add the vanilla and beat until incorporated', '7:  Add the 2 drops pink gel food coloring and beat until just combined', '8: Add about ⅓ of the sifted 1 cup almond flour mixture at a time to the beaten 3 egg whites and use a spatula to gently fold until combined', '9:  After the last addition of 1 cup almond flour, continue to fold slowly until the batter falls into ribbons and you can make a figure 8 while holding the spatula up', '10: Transfer the macaron batter into a piping bag fitted with a round tip', '11: Place 4 dots of the batter in each corner of a rimmed baking sheet, and place a piece of parchment paper over it, using the batter to help adhere the parchment to the baking sheet', '12: Pipe the macarons onto the parchment paper in 1½-inch (3-cm) circles, spacing at least 1-inch (2-cm) apart', '13: Tap the baking sheet on a flat surface 5 times to release any air bubbles', '14: Let the macarons sit at room temperature for 30 minutes to 1 hour, until dry to the touch', '15: Preheat the oven to 300˚F (150˚C)', '16: Bake the macarons for 17 minutes, until the feet are well-risen and the macarons don’t stick to the parchment paper', '17: Transfer the macarons to a wire rack to cool completely before filling', '18: Make the 1 cup unsalted buttercream: In a large bowl, add the 1 cup unsalted butter and beat with a mixer for 1 minute until light and fluffy', '19:  Sift in the powdered sugar and beat until fully incorporated', '20:  Add the vanilla and beat to combine', '21:  Add the 3 tablespoons heavy cream, 1 tablespoon at a time, and beat to combine, until desired consistency is reached', '22: Transfer the 1 cup unsalted buttercream to a piping bag fitted with a round tip', '23: Add a dollop of 1 cup unsalted buttercream to one macaron shell', '24:  Top it with another macaron shell to create a sandwich', '25:  Repeat with remaining macaron shells and 1 cup unsalted buttercream', '26: Place in an airtight container for 24 hours to “bloom”']

ingredients: ['2 lb shrimp (910 g) deveined & tails removed', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon cumin', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '½ teaspoon salt', '24 skewers bamboo or metal ', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '24 corn tortillas', 'Creamy Cilantro Sauce', '1 cup sour cream (230 g)', '3 tablespoons fresh cilantro minced', '1 teaspoon lime zest', '¼ teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons lime juice', '1 ½ cups green cabbage (150 g)', '1 ½ cups red cabbage (150 g)', '1 tablespoon jalapeño minced', 'Toppings', 'lime wedge', 'fresh cilantro']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, season 2 lb shrimp with 1 teaspoon paprika, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, ½ teaspoon dried oregano, 1 teaspoon cumin, red pepper flakes, and salt', '2:  Toss gently to combine', '3: Using 2 bamboo or metal 24 skewers, poke through the top and bottom of the 2 lb shrimp and push down to the bottom of the skewer', '4: Add 3 more 2 lb shrimp to the same skewer and repeat until all of the 2 lb shrimp are used', '5: Right before you put the 2 lb shrimp on the grill, brush each skewer with a generous amount of 4 tablespoons olive oil, to prevent sticking', '6: Grill over high heat for 3 minutes, brush the top side with more 4 tablespoons olive oil, flip, and let cook for an additional 3 minutes', '7: Remove from 24 skewers & set aside for taco assembly', '8: In a bowl, combine all creamy cilantro sauce ingredients', '9:  Stir well to combine', '10: In a large bowl, combine 1 ½ cups green cabbage, red cabbage, and minced 1 tablespoon jalapeño', '11:  Pour half of the 1 cup sour cream mixture over the cabbage, saving the other half for extra sauce to put on the tacos', '12: Assemble the tacos on 24 corn tortillas', '13:  Add the cabbage mixture, followed by the 2 lb shrimp', '14:  Top with the creamy cilantro sauce, cilantro, and a squeeze of lime juice']

ingredients: ['6 cups water (1.5 L)', '1 head cauliflower florets', '1 cup milk (240 mL)', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 clove garlic', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 lb cooked pasta (455 g)', 'vegetarian parmesan cheese to serve', 'fresh parsley to serve']
instructions: ['1: Boil the 6 cups water over medium high heat', '2:  Add a large pinch of 1 teaspoon salt', '3: Add the 1 head cauliflower florets', '4: Cover the pot and boil for 5-7 minutes, or until 1 head cauliflower is soft', '5: With a slotted spoon, add the 1 lb cooked 1 head cauliflower to a blender', '6: Add the 1 cup milk, 2 tablespoons butter, 1 clove garlic, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1 teaspoon pepper and blend until smooth', '7: Toss the 1 lb cooked pasta with 1 head cauliflower alfredo', '8: Serve topped with vegetarian parmesan, and fresh parsley']

ingredients: ['1st Filling: Chicharron', '½ cup white onion (75 g) diced', '1 cup chicharrónes (195 g) cooked cut into pieces', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2nd Filling: Chorizo and Beans', '1 lb chorizo (455 g)', '2 cups pinto bean (340 g) cooked', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'Guajillo Sauce:', '3 cups water (720 mL)', '4 guajillo chiles', 'arbol chile', '¼ white onion sliced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 small roma tomato diced', '2 pinches salt', '2 cups boiled water (480 mL)', 'Repollo Garnish:', '½ cup cabbage (50 g) chopped', '2 carrots sliced into ½-inch(1.24 cm) rounds', 'white onion sliced', '1 pinch oregano', '2 tablespoons white distilled vinegar', '2 tablespoons water', 'Tortilla assembling:', '20 tortillas', 'white onion half sliced', '½ cup olive oil (120 mL)', 'Green salsa:', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '6 tomatilloes', '2 jalapeñoes', '1 clove garlic minced', '¼ white onion chopped', '2 pinches salt', 'cilantro', '½ cup boiled water (120 mL)']
instructions: ['1: In a medium saucepan, add the 1 lb chorizo and sauté until cooked', '2:  Add olive oil and the two cups of pinto beans', '3:  Once boiling, mash the beans, cover, and set aside', '4: In a pot, add three cups of 3 cups 2 cups boiled 2 tablespoons 1 cup ½ cup boiled water', '5:  Cut ends off of 4 guajillo chiles and de-seed', '6:  Add to the pot and cover till softened and 3 cups 2 cups boiled 2 tablespoons 1 cup ½ cup boiled water is boiling', '7: In a 1 small pan, add arbol chiles and dry-pan fry until slightly brown', '8:  (Do not let burn)', '9:  Add chiles to a blender, along with garlic, onion, salt, tomato, and the two cups of 3 cups 2 cups boiled 2 tablespoons 1 cup ½ cup boiled water from the pot', '10: Once the 4 guajillo ingredients are well blended, grab another saucepan', '11:  Add in olive oil and onion, sauté for about two minutes', '12:  Incorporate the chicharron and also do the same', '13: After two minutes, add the sauce and cover until bubbles start to form, set aside', '14: Next, on a pancake griddle,, heat the tortillas four at a time  until they form slight hard lines', '15:  Repeat the process until all 20 are warmed up', '16: Grab a wok-style fry pan and heat oil until bubbles form', '17:  Then, dip each tortilla in for two seconds on each side', '18:  Once the process is complete, you will need a round pan that can be covered', '19: Cover the round pan with plenty of parchment paper, and aluminum foil', '20:  Add a spoonful of filling to each tortilla and fold in half, organizing them into the pan', '21: Place the ¼ white onion 2 carrots white onion white onion half sliced onion inside and pour the leftover hot oil and cover immediately with more foil', '22:  Place a dish towel on top and set aside', '23: While the tacos are cooking in the vapor, in a saute pan, add the olive oil, cabbage, carrot, onion, 2 tablespoons white distilled vinegar, 3 cups 2 cups boiled 2 tablespoons 1 cup ½ cup boiled water, and 1 pinch oregano', '24:  Sauté until soft and set aside', '25: Next, fill a pot with the cup of 3 cups 2 cups boiled 2 tablespoons 1 cup ½ cup boiled water, slice each tomatillo in the middle with and slice the jalapeños completely in half, taking out the seeds and tops', '26:  Let boil until the tomatillos look soft, then add them into a blender with the rest of the green salsa ingredients', '27:  Blend well', '28: Plate the tacos, add repollo garnish, salsa, and enjoy!']

ingredients: ['1 lb ready-made puff pastry (500 g)', '1 tablespoon vegan butter', '3 cups leek (300 g) thinly sliced', '3 cloves garlic sliced', '1 tablespoon fresh sage', '¼ cup dried cranberries (40 g)', '½ cup dairy-free cream cheese (50 g)', '½ lb vegan chorizo (250 g)', '1 tablespoon oat milk', '1 teaspoon poppy seeds']
instructions: ['1: To make the filling, melt the butter in a pan, when foaming add the 3 cups leek and saute for 8-10 minutes until they’re ½ cup dairy-free creamy, soft and caramelised', '2:  Season with salt  & pepper', '3: Add 3 cloves garlic & 1 tablespoon fresh sage, ¼ cup dried cranberries, ½ cup dairy-free cream cheese and vegan chorizo', '4:  Cook for 2 minutes', '5:  Remove from the heat and leave to cool', '6: Roll out your 1 lb ready-made puff pastry to 5mm thick', '7:  Cut out a Christmas tree shape', '8: Put your filling down the middle, a narrow dollop at the top and getting a little wider as you add filling to the bottom of your 1 lb ready-made puff pastry', '9: Cut 1 inch slits down the left and right sides of your 1 lb ready-made puff pastry alongside the filling and brush with 1 tablespoon oat milk', '10: Fold the 1 lb ready-made puff pastry into the middle over the filling, brush top with 1 tablespoon oat milk and sprinkle with 1 teaspoon poppy seeds', '11: Bake in a preheated oven at 200C fan for 30 minutes until your tree has puffed up and is golden brown', '12: Serve with delicious hasselback potatoes and roast sprouts!']

ingredients: ['olive oil to taste', '1 onion diced', '3 cloves garlic minced', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '1 pt grape tomato (400 g) halved', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 ½ cups vegetable broth (600 mL)', '2 ½ cups non-dairy milk (600 mL)', '16 oz dried pasta (455 g)', '5 oz fresh spinach (40 g)', '⅓ cup nutritional yeast (20 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a large pot over medium heat, add the olive oil and 1 onion and cook for 3-5 minutes until semi-translucent', '2: Add the 3 cloves garlic and tomato paste and cook for 3 more minutes, stirring occasionally', '3: Add the tomatoes and cook for 3-5 more minutes, until the skins begin to wrinkle and tomatoes begin to release liquid', '4: Season with salt and pepper, than add the 2 ½ cups vegetable broth, non-dairy 2 ½ cups non-dairy milk, and 16 oz dried pasta and stir until combined', '5: Bring to a boil, then cover, reduce heat, and let simmer for 10 minutes or until most liquid is absorbed', '6: Add the 5 oz fresh spinach and stir until wilted', '7: Add the ⅓ cup nutritional yeast and stir until combined', '8: Remove from heat and serve immediately']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil plus 1 tsp divided', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 shallot minced', '1 ½ cups green lentil (300 g) cooked', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon tomato paste', '¼ cup fresh italian parsley (10 g) chopped', '⅓ cup grated parmesan cheese (35 g)', '1 tablespoon whole wheat breadcrumbs', '1 ½ tablespoons italian seasoning', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
