instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '2: Heat a large skillet over medium heat then add 1 tablespoon of 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 shallot and 3 cloves garlic and sauté for 2-3 minutes, or until slightly golden brown then remove from heat', '3: To a food processor, add the 3 cloves garlic and 1 shallot, lentils, 1 egg, 1 teaspoon of 2 tablespoons olive oil,  tomato paste, parsley, Parmesan, bread crumbs, Italian seasonings, salt, and pepper and pulse, mixing until just combined', '4: Transfer the mixture to a medium-sized bowl', '5: Use a cookie dough scoop to scoop out balls of mixture then carefully form into balls', '6: Arrange on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '7: Bake for 10-15 minutes', '8: Remove meatballs from oven and allow to cool for 5-10 minutes', '9: Serve with spaghetti']

ingredients: ['½ small seedless watermelon', '½ small cantaloupe', 'salt to taste', '½ cup greek yogurt (140 g)', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon water', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', 'fresh mint leaf for serving']
instructions: ['1: Using a melon baller or a teaspoon, scoop out rounds of ½ small seedless 1 tablespoon watermelon and cantaloupe and place in a large bowl', '2:  Season with a pinch of salt', '3: In a liquid measuring ½ cup or small bowl, combine the Greek yogurt, 2 tablespoons olive oil, ½ small seedless 1 tablespoon water, and 2 tablespoons lemon juice', '4:  Stir until smooth', '5: Serve the melon in bowls and top with the dressing and fresh mint leaves']

ingredients: ['1 lb flank steak (455 g) sliced into thin strips', '3 cloves garlic minced', '½ teaspoon grated ginger', '2 tablespoons sesame oil', '⅓ cup low sodium soy sauce (80 mL)', '¼ cup brown sugar (55 g)', '¼ cup honey (85 g)', '1 cup beef broth (240 mL)', '4 cups broccoli floret (700 g)', '2 tablespoons cornstarch', '2 tablespoons water', 'sesame seed as desired']
instructions: ['1: In an oiled skillet over medium-high heat, sear the 1 lb flank steak until cooked all the way through', '2:  Remove from the pan', '3: Add a little more oil, then add the 3 cloves garlic and ½ teaspoon grated ginger to the pan', '4:  Sauté until soft', '5: Add the sesame oil, ⅓ cup low sodium soy sauce, ¼ cup brown sugar, ¼ cup honey, and 1 cup beef broth', '6:  Stir until combined', '7: Add the 4 cups broccoli florets', '8: In a separate bowl, combine 2 tablespoons cornstarch and 2 tablespoons water', '9:  Add to 4 cups broccoli mixture', '10:  Bring to a boil, until sauce has thickened', '11: Add the 1 cup beef back into the mixture, and serve over rice with sesame seeds, if desired']

ingredients: ['Chantilly Cream', '1 ½ cups heavy cream (360 g)', '2 tablespoons loose-leaf Rooibos tea', '3 tablespoons powdered sugar', 'Strawberries', '1 lb strawberry (425 g)', '¼ cup granulated sugar (50 g)', '½ teaspoon ground sumac', '⅛ teaspoon kosher salt', 'Biscuits', '3 cups all purpose flour (386 g)', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '1 tablespoon granulated sugar', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 ½ sticks unsalted european-style butter frozen', '1 ¼ cups buttermilk (300 g)', '¼ cup heavy cream (60 mL)', '¼ cup turbinado sugar (50 g)', '¼ cup honey (85 g)']
instructions: ['1: Steep the cream for the chantilly: In a medium bowl or liquid measuring cup, stir together the 1 ½ cups ¼ cup heavy cream and Rooibos 2 tablespoons loose-leaf Rooibos ½ ⅛ 1 ½ 1 tea', '2:  Transfer to the refrigerator to steep for at least 2 hours, up to overnightWhile the cream steeps, macerate the strawberries: Use a small paring knife to stem and hull the strawberries, then halve or quarter lengthwise', '3:  Transfer to a large glass bowl and add the sugar, ½ ⅛ 1 ½ 1 teaspoon ground sumac, and salt', '4:  Stir with a wooden spoon to coat the berries', '5:  Let sit at room temperature for 30 minutes, until the berries soften and release their juices, then refrigerate until ready to use, up to overnightMake the biscuits: Line a 9 x 13-inch baking sheet (quarter sheet pan) with parchment paper', '6: In a large glass bowl, whisk together the 3 cups all purpose flour, baking powder, ¼ cup 1 tablespoon granulated sugar, salt, and baking soda', '7: Using the large holes on a box grater, grate the frozen 1 ½ sticks unsalted european-style 1 ¼ cups butter directly into the 3 cups all purpose flour mixture', '8:  Use your fingertips to gently toss the 1 ½ sticks unsalted european-style 1 ¼ cups butter into the 3 cups all purpose flour until coated', '9:  Slowly pour the 1 ½ sticks unsalted european-style 1 ¼ cups 1 ¼ cups buttermilk into the 3 cups all purpose flour mixture and use a bowl scraper to gently mix until a shaggy mass forms', '10:  The dough will still look a little dry', '11: Turn the dough out onto a clean surface and use a bench scraper to help press into a rough rectangle', '12:  Use a rolling pin to gently roll the dough into a roughly 8 x 10-inch rectangle', '13:  Fold the dough crosswise in thirds, like a letter, then turn the dough 90° and roll out again to a rectangle', '14:  Repeat folding and rolling for a total of 4 or 5 folds', '15: Carefully transfer the dough onto the prepared baking sheet and freeze for 30 minutes (this will help the dough hydrate and bake evenly)', '16: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C)', '17: Transfer the dough rectangle to a cutting board', '18:  Use a large chef’s knife to trim the edges to make clean sides, reserving the scraps for another use', '19:  Cut the rectangle in half lengthwise and in thirds crosswise for 6 square biscuits', '20:  Place the biscuits back on the baking sheet, spacing 2 inches apart', '21:  Brush the top of each biscuit with the 1 ½ cups ¼ cup heavy cream and sprinkle with the turbinado sugar', '22: Bake the biscuits until risen and golden brown around the edges, about 20 minutes', '23:  Remove the biscuits from the oven and immediately brush the top of each biscuit with the honey', '24:  (Microwave the honey for 10 seconds for easier brushing, if needed)', '25: Make the chantilly cream: Place a fine-mesh strainer over a tall, narrow container', '26:  Pour the steeped cream through the strainer into the container and discard the 2 tablespoons loose-leaf Rooibos ½ ⅛ 1 ½ 1 tea leaves', '27: Add the 3 tablespoons powdered sugar to the strained cream', '28:  Blend with a stick blender until stiff peaks form, about 30 seconds', '29: When ready to assemble, split the biscuits in half', '30:  Place a bottom half on a plate and spoon the chantilly cream over top', '31:  Spoon a generous amount of strawberries and syrup over the cream and finish with the top of the biscuit', '32: Enjoy!RECIPE BY: Codii LopezChef’s Note: The biscuits are best eaten the same day they are baked', '33:  If you don’t think you will consume them all in one day, you can cut the dough and bake as many as you’d like, then wrap the remaining unbaked biscuits tightly in plastic wrap and freeze for up to 1 month', '34:  Unbaked biscuit dough should be stored in the freezer; storing in the refrigerator may cause the dough to oxidize and discolor']

ingredients: ['Salad', '1 bell pepper chopped', '1 lb sweet potato (455 g) skinned and chopped', '1 lb brussels sprouts (455 g) halved', '1 red onion sliced', '1 teaspoon fresh oregano', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 cup spinach (40 g) for salad base', '1 tablespoon feta cheese to garnish', 'Dressing', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinaigrette', '1 teaspoon maple syrup']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400ºF (200ºC)', '2: Combine all vegetables (except 1 cup spinach) in large bowl and stir', '3: Add 1 teaspoon salt, pepper, 1 teaspoon fresh oregano, and olive oil for the salad and stir', '4: Spread vegetables on baking sheet and bake for 40 minutes', '5: To prepare the dressing, combine olive oil, 2 tablespoons balsamic vinaigrette, and 1 teaspoon maple syrup in a small bowl and stir until well-combined', '6: In a bowl, add 1 cup spinach and any other greens you prefer', '7:  Sprinkle roasted vegetables and 1 tablespoon feta cheese over the top', '8: Drizzle dressing over salad']

ingredients: ['1 3-pound chicken', '3 scotch bonnet or habanero peppers chopped', '4 cloves garlic chopped', '1 tablespoon fresh thyme', '1 tablespoon ground allspice', '2 onions chopped', '1 tablespoon light brown sugar', '½ tablespoon nutmeg', '½ tablespoon minced ginger', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 tablespoons lime juice', '½ cup white vinegar', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Prepare the 1 3-pound chicken by removing the backbone using a pair of kitchen shears or a sharp knife', '2:  Transfer the 1 3-pound chicken to a baking sheet and and flatten it down to spread the 1 3-pound chicken out as much as possible', '3: In a blender or food processor, combine the 3 scotch bonnet or habanero 3 scotch bonnet or habanero peppers, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tablespoon fresh thyme, 1 tablespoon ground allspice, 2 onions, 1 tablespoon light brown sugar, ½ tablespoon nutmeg, ½ tablespoon minced ginger, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 2 tablespoons lime juice, ½ cup white vinegar, salt, and 3 scotch bonnet or habanero pepper', '4:  Blend until smooth', '5: Pour the marinade over the 1 3-pound chicken', '6:  Cover with foil or plastic wrap and marinate in the fridge for at least 3 hours or overnight', '7: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '8: Remove the foil or plastic wrap and roast the 1 3-pound chicken for 45-50 minutes, until cooked through', '9:  Rest for 10 minutes on a cutting board before carving and serving']

ingredients: ['8 oz shredded cheddar cheese (225 g)', '4 tablespoons unsalted butter room temperature', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 cup flour (125 g)', '2 tablespoons ice water']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: Using a hand mixer or standing mixer, combine 8 oz shredded cheddar cheese, 4 tablespoons unsalted butter, and 1 teaspoon salt in a large bowl', '3: Once combined, mix in the 1 cup flour and add the 2 tablespoons ice water one tablespoon at a time', '4: The dough should hold together but crumble apart if you break it up in your hand', '5:  If it seems too dry, add a little more 2 tablespoons ice water', '6: Separate dough into two halves and pack together into discs', '7:  Wrap in parchment paper and chill in the refrigerator for 30 minutes', '8: Roll out dough to ⅛ of an inch (½ cm), pinching the cracks on the ends', '9: Cut into 1 inch x 1 inch (2 ½ x 2 ½ cm) squares and pierce a hole in the middle of each square for ventilation during baking', '10: Place the separated crackers on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '11: Bake for 13 minutes, or until golden brown']

ingredients: ['1 box elbow macaroni', '12 oz evaporated milk (355 mL) 1 can', '3 eggs', '8 tablespoons unsalted butter', '2 cups shredded cheddar cheese (200 g) shredded and divided', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese (100 g) shredded', '2 tablespoons feta cheese crumbled', '1 cup provolone cheese (115 g) cut into small pieces', '½ cup smoked gouda cheese (50 g) shredded', '4 teaspoons salt divided', '2 teaspoons black pepper']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: In a large pot or dutch oven, cook 1 box elbow macaroni according to package directions, salting the water with 2 teaspoons of salt', '3:  Drain and return to the warm pot', '4: Add 8 tablespoons unsalted butter to warm 1 box elbow macaroni and mix until melted', '5:  Season with the remaining salt and pepper', '6: Add half of the 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1 cup shredded mozzarella, 1 cup provolone, ½ cup smoked gouda, and 2 tablespoons feta cheese', '7:  Mix well', '8: Add 3 eggs and 12 oz evaporated milk, mix until fully incorporated', '9: Transfer to a 9x13-inch (23 x 33 cm) baking dish and top with the remaining 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese', '10: Bake in a preheated oven for 40-45 minutes, until the top has nicely browned']

ingredients: ['Poori', '4 cups whole wheat flour (500 g)', '1 tablespoon oil plus more for dipping frying', '1 cup water (240 mL) or as needed', 'Aloo Sabzia', '1 tablespoon ghee', '1 teaspoon cumin seed', '1 large white onion thinly sliced', '¼ teaspoon ginger minced', '½ teaspoon turmeric', '1 large tomato finely chopped', 'salt to taste', '1 ½ tablespoons curry powder', '1 ½ lb potato (680 g) cooked and peeled', '½ cup frozen peas (75 g) thawed', '2 cups water (480 mL)', 'fresh cilantro leaf for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Add the 4 cups whole wheat flour to a large bowl', '2:  Sprinkle the 1 tablespoon oil over the 4 cups whole wheat flour and mix with your hands', '3:  The mixture should feel like sand', '4: Add a bit of water at a time and knead into the 4 cups whole wheat flour', '5:  When the dough is ready, it should form a ball and not stick to your fingers', '6: Cover the dough with damp towel so it doesn’t dry out', '7: Heat the 1 tablespoon oil in a deep pot until it reaches 350˚F (170˚C)', '8: Form the dough into ping-pong size balls', '9:  Dip the balls into a small bowl of canola 1 tablespoon oil and roll them out into flat 2-inch (5 cm) circle shapes', '10: Immediately drop the rolled dough into the 1 tablespoon oil', '11:  Use a spider to keep the dough submerged in the 1 tablespoon oil', '12:  Once it is puffed up, turn over and cook other side', '13:  Fry until golden brown, 2-3 minutes', '14: ALOO: Melt the 1 tablespoon ghee in a large pot over medium heat', '15:   Once the 1 tablespoon ghee is completely melted, add the 1 teaspoon cumin seeds and toast until aromatic, 2-3 minutes', '16: Add the onion and ¼ teaspoon ginger to the pot', '17:  Cover and cook until the onion is soft and translucent, about 5 minutes', '18: Add the ½ teaspoon turmeric and mix well', '19:  Add the chopped tomato and season with salt', '20:  Cover and cook until the tomato is very soft, about 10 minutes', '21: Add the 1 ½ tablespoons curry powder and mix well', '22:  Add the potatoes and ½ cup frozen peas, and mix well to incorporate', '23:  Add the water, cover, and cook for 10 minutes, or until the soup thickens', '24: Garnish with fresh cilantro']

ingredients: ['2 medium eggplants', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '½ lb ground turkey (225 g)', '1 onion diced', '2 cups marinara sauce (520 g)', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 cup shredded low-fat mozzarella (100 g)', '½ cup grated parmesan cheese (55 g)', 'fresh basil for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Scoop out inside of eggplant leaving about ½-inch (1 cm) border inside', '3: Chop the remaining eggplant and reserve', '4: Brush the scooped out eggplants with 2 tablespoons olive oil, sprinkle with salt and pepper', '5: Bake for 10-15 minutes', '6: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in 2 medium skillet over 2 medium heat', '7: Add 1 onions and 2 cloves garlic to the pan', '8:  Cook until translucent', '9:  Add ½ lb ground turkey and season with 2 cloves garlic powder, salt and pepper', '10:  Cook until the meat is browned', '11: Add leftover eggplant pieces to ½ lb ground turkey and 1 onion', '12:  Cook for 5-8 minutes or until tender', '13: Add 2 cups marinara sauce and cook for another 3-5 minutes', '14: Scoop meat sauce into the eggplants and sprinkle with 1 cup shredded low-fat mozzarella and ½ cup grated parmesan', '15: Bake for 10-15 minutes, or until cheese is melted', '16: Sprinkle with fresh basil and serve']

ingredients: ['2 ½ cups blanched almond flour', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon cinnamon', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '½ cup honey', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '¼ teaspoon almond extract or 1/2 teaspoon optional', '5 tablespoons melted butter', '3 large eggs beaten']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C), and put paper liners in 9 standard-sized muffin 2 ½ cups (you may end up with a bit more)', '2: Combine the 2 ½ cups blanched ¼ teaspoon almond flour, ½ teaspoon salt, 1 tablespoon cinnamon, and 2 teaspoons baking powder', '3: In a larger bowl, whisk together the ½ cup honey, 1 teaspoon vanilla and 2 ½ cups blanched ¼ teaspoon almond extracts, 5 tablespoons melted butter, and 3 large eggs', '4: Blend the wet and dry ingredients well, then divide among muffin 2 ½ cups', '5: Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until browning and just done (moist crumbs on a toothpick are okay)']

ingredients: ['½ cup orange juice (120 mL)', '¼ cup dried cranberry (30 g)', '4 oz cream cheese (115 g)', '¼ cup sugar (50 g)', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1 sheet puff pastry', '1 egg egg wash', '⅓ cup almond slices (35 g) or nuts of your choice', 'Icing', '½ cup powdered sugar (60 g)', '1 tablespoon water']
instructions: ['1: In a microwave-safe bowl, microwave ½ cup orange juice for 30 seconds until warm', '2: Add cranberries to juice and let it soak for 10 minutes', '3: In a medium bowl, combine 4 oz cream cheese, sugar, and 2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '4:  Mix until smooth', '5: Unfold 1 sheet puff pastry, and 1 inch (2 cm) from the top, fill the middle row with 4 oz cream cheese mixture, and top with the cranberries', '6:  Leave 1 inch (2 cm) at the bottom', '7: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '8: With a knife, carefully slice diagonal strips on both sides, leaving 1 inch (2 cm) from the top and bottom', '9: Cut off the top and bottom excess pieces', '10: Fold the top inch (2 cm) dough onto the filling, then lay the dough in a criss-cross pattern to form the braid', '11: Before the last couple strips, fold up the bottom and lay the remaining strips over', '12: Whisk an 1 egg and brush it over the top of the braid', '13: Add almonds or other ⅓ cup almond slices (35 g) or nuts', '14: Bake for 25 minutes', '15: Cut into desired size and drizzle the icing']

ingredients: ['1 teaspoon salt plus more for water', '6 bone-in skin-on chicken thighs', '3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 cup long grain rice (200 g)', '1 clove garlic finely minced', '½ yellow onion finely chopped', '8 oz tomato sauce (225 g) 1 can', '2 cubes chicken bouillon', '2 cups hot water (480 mL)', '6 oz peas (170 g) 1 can', '6 oz carrot (170 g) 1 can']
instructions: ['1: Add the 6 bone-in skin-on 2 2 cubes chicken thighs to a large pot, cover with water, and season with 1 teaspoon salt', '2:  Boil the 6 bone-in skin-on 2 2 cubes chicken for 40 minutes, or until cooked through', '3:  Drain', '4: Shred the 6 bone-in skin-on 2 2 cubes chicken from the bones and set aside', '5: Heat the 3 tablespoons vegetable oil in a large saucepan over medium heat, then add the 1 cup long grain rice and continually stir until the 1 cup long grain rice turns a light brown', '6: Add the 1 clove garlic, ½ yellow onion, and 1 teaspoon salt', '7:  Stir the 1 cup long grain rice until it turns golden', '8: Add the 8 oz tomato sauce, bouillon 2 cubes and 2 cups hot water', '9:  Increase the heat to medium-high', '10: Cover and simmer for 20-25 minutes, until the 1 cup long grain rice is cooked and has absorbed the liquid', '11:  Check occasionally to make sure the 1 cup long grain rice is not drying out too quickly', '12: Mix in the shredded 6 bone-in skin-on 2 2 cubes chicken, 6 oz peas, and carrots', '13: Remove the 1 cup long grain rice from the heat and fluff with fork']

ingredients: ['3 chicken breasts diced', 'Spice Marinade', '1 tablespoon chili powder', '1 tablespoon turmeric', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '2 tablespoons garlic minced', '½ lemon lemon juice', 'Spice Coating', '1 cup breadcrumb (100 g)', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon coriander', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', 'egg wash', '4 cups oil (1 L) for frying', 'Preparation', '3 chicken breasts diced', 'Spice Marinade', '1 tablespoon chili powder', '1 tablespoon turmeric', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '2 tablespoons garlic minced', '½ lemon lemon juice', 'Spice Coating', '1 cup breadcrumb (100 g)', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon coriander', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', 'egg wash', '4 cups oil (1 L) for frying', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Prepare the spice marinade by mixing all the spices together with the chicken', '2: Cover with cling film and leave to marinate for 1 hour', '3: Next, prepare the spice coating by mixing the bread crumbs, chili powder, turmeric, cumin, coriander, salt and pepper together', '4: Coat each chicken piece in egg wash, followed by the spice coating', '5: Heat the oil in a deep saucepan to 350°F (180°C)', '6: Carefully place each chicken piece in the oil using a slotted spoon and fry for about 3-4 minutes, until golden brown and cooked through', '7: Serve with salad and favourite dips of your choice']

ingredients: ['1 lb frozen raspberry (455 g)', '¼ cup honey (85 g) or preferred sweetener']
instructions: ['1: Blend all ingredients in a food processor or high-speed blender until thoroughly combined', '2: Pour into a rectangular loaf pan and smooth into an even layer', '3: Freeze for 2 hours, or until 1 lb frozen but still a little soft for scooping', '4:  (If freezing overnight, cover with a lid or plastic wrap, but let it sit out at room temperature for about 5-10 minutes before scooping', '5: )Scoop into a bowl']

ingredients: ['2 zucchinis', '1 lb shrimp (455 g) peeled and deveined', '½ yellow bell pepper sliced thin', '2 tablespoons lime juice', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '2 tablespoons olive oil']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Using a vegetable peeler, peel long strips from the zucchini', '3: In a large bowl, mix the zucchini strips, 1 lb shrimp, ½ yellow bell ½ yellow bell 1 teaspoon black pepper sliced, 2 tablespoons lime juice, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, ½ yellow bell 1 teaspoon black pepper, ½ teaspoon garlic powder, and 2 tablespoons olive oil until the mixture is evenly coated', '4: On a roasting tray, spread the mixture into one even layer and bake for 8 minutes']

ingredients: ['40 oz jackfruit (1.1 g) 2 cans in brine or water drained', '½ medium yellow onion sliced', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon fresh ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '2 bay leaves', '½ cup low sodium vegetable broth (120 mL)', '½ orange juiced', '½ lime juiced', 'corn tortilla for serving', 'guacamole for serving', 'black bean for serving', 'corn salsa for serving', 'pico de gallo for serving']
instructions: ['1: Cut each piece of 40 oz jackfruit in half, then transfer to a slow cooker', '2: Add the ½ medium yellow onion, 3 cloves garlic, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, pepper, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, 1 teaspoon chili powder, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 2 bay leaves, vegetable broth, ½ orange juice, and ½ lime juice', '3:  Mix to combine', '4: Cover and cook on high for 3 hours or ½ cup low for 6 hours', '5: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '6:  Line a rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper', '7: Uncover the slow cooker and remove the 2 bay leaves', '8:  Using 2 forks, shred the 40 oz jackfruit until it resembles the consistency of pulled pork', '9: Transfer the 40 oz jackfruit to the prepared baking sheet and bake for 15 minutes, or until the edges are slightly crisp', '10: Serve shredded 40 oz jackfruit with tortillas, guacamole, black beans, corn salsa, and pico de gallo', '11:  The 40 oz jackfruit will keep in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 5 days']

ingredients: ['4 cups peach (900 g) chopped', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '1 tablespoon cornstarch', '¼ cup lemon juice (60 mL)', '1 pinch salt', '1 box vanilla cake mix', '1 cup sliced almond (110 g)', '½ cup butter (110 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat your oven to 350ºF (180ºC)', '2: In a cast-iron skillet over medium-low heat, add the peaches, ½ cup sugar, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, ¼ cup lemon juice, and 1 pinch salt', '3: Mix to combine and stir for 5-10 minutes until the mixture starts to thicken', '4: Let simmer for 5 minutes on low heat', '5: Sprinkle the 1 box cake mix over the apple filling', '6: Add the nuts and evenly distribute the 1 cup sliced ½ cup butter over the top to ensure even baking', '7: Bake for 45 minutes to an hour, until the top is golden brown', '8: Serve warm with ice cream']

ingredients: ['Chicken', '1 lb boneless skinless chicken breast (455 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '½ cup cornstarch (60 g)', '2 eggs beaten', 'oil to fry', 'Sauce', '1 tablespoon oil', '½ tablespoon garlic minced', '1 bell pepper diced', '¾ cup cider vinegar (180 mL)', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '¼ cup ketchup (55 g)', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', 'Garnish', 'scallion chopped', 'sesame seed']
instructions: ['1: Season 1 lb boneless skinless chicken with salt and 1 1 bell pepper', '2:  Coat with ½ cup cornstarch, dip in 2 eggs beaten egg', '3: Fry until golden, crispy and cooked through', '4:  Set aside', '5:  Dab with paper towel if greasy', '6: In a large pan, heat oil and fry ½ tablespoon garlic until fragrant', '7: Add the 1 bell 1 1 bell pepper, ¾ cup cider vinegar, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, ¼ cup ketchup and ½ cup sugar', '8:  Bring to a boil', '9: When the sauce has thickened, add the fried 1 lb boneless skinless chicken', '10:  Toss to coat', '11: Garnish with scallion chopped scallions and sesame seeds', '12:  Serve with rice', '13: Nutrition  Calories: 2960 Fat: 261 grams  Carbs: 77 grams Fiber: 1 grams  Sugars: 44 grams  Protein: 75 grams']

ingredients: ['1 handful raspberry', '1 handful blueberry', '1 sprig fresh mint leaf', '1 oz lime juice (30 mL)', '1 tablespoon agave nectar or honey', 'ice', '1 splash soda water or seltzer water']
instructions: ['1: In a cocktail shaker, or a tall glass, muddle raspberries, blueberries, and 1 sprig fresh mint', '2: Add 1 oz lime juice, sweetener, and ice, and shake until well combined', '3:  If you do not have a cocktail shaker, simply pour back and forth between two glasses until combined', '4: Strain mixture over ice and top with a 1 splash of soda water', '5: Garnish with berries and 1 sprig fresh mint']

ingredients: ['Crust', '2 cups graham cracker (170 g) crumbled', '⅛ cup brown sugar (30 g)', '⅓ cup butter (75 g)', 'Filling', '16 oz cream cheese (450 g) softened', '¼ cup brown sugar (55 g)', '¼ cup white sugar (50 g)', '2 tablespoons cornstarch', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '¼ teaspoon ginger', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 green apples peeled and thinly sliced', 'Topping', '¼ cup rolled oats (25 g)', '¼ cup flour (30 g)', '¼ cup brown sugar (55 g)', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '2 tablespoons butter melted', 'caramel sauce']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: In a bowl, mix the crust ingredients', '3: Press into the bottom of a greased 8-inch (20 cm) springform pan', '4: Bake for 5 minutes', '5: In another bowl, mix all the filling ingredients except the 2 green apples', '6: In another bowl, mix all the topping ingredients except the caramel', '7: Spread the filling over the 2 cups graham cracker crust, then layer the apple slices on top', '8: Sprinkle the topping mix evenly over the apple layer', '9:  ', '10: Bake for 30 minutesDrizzle on caramel sauce']

ingredients: ['¼ cup fresh cilantro (10 g) finely chopped', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '½ cup coconut milk (120 mL)', '¼ cup lime juice (60 mL)', '1 cup avocado oil (240 mL) or olive oil']
instructions: ['1: Add ¼ cup fresh cilantro, salt, pepper, ½ cup coconut milk, ¼ cup lime juice and 1 cup avocado oil into a mason jar and secure lid tightly', '2: Shake vigorously until ingredients are mixed thoroughly', '3: Store dressing in the fridge and use within 1-2 weeks', '4:  You may need to shake up the ingredients again before each use']

ingredients: ['4 chicken breasts', '2 tablespoons coconut oil divided', '1 cup chicken broth (235 mL)', '½ cup greek yogurt (120 g)', '½ lemon juiced', '3 cloves garlic cloves minced', '2 teaspoons oregano', '6 oz spinach (170 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Heat 1 tablespoon of 2 tablespoons coconut oil in a large ovenproof skillet over high heat', '3: Liberally season both sides of the chicken breasts with salt and pepper before transferring to the hot skillet', '4: Sear the chicken 2-3 minutes per side, just until it develops a golden-brown color', '5: Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside', '6:   Allow the pan to cool slightly before heating the remaining 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat', '7: Toss in the 3 cloves garlic and sautée until fragrant, about 30 seconds', '8: Pour in the chicken broth, ½ cup greek yogurt, ½ lemon juice, and 2 teaspoons oregano and stir until the mixture is smooth', '9: Let the mixture reduce for a few minutes until it has thickened', '10: Pour in the 6 oz spinach and sprinkle over another pinch of salt', '11:   Let the greens wilt down, stirring occasionally', '12: Place the chicken breasts back into the pan and transfer the pan to the oven', '13: Bake for 15 minutes or until the chicken is fully cooked', '14: Serve chicken on a bed of the wilted 6 oz spinach and top with a drizzle of the creamy sauce']

ingredients: ['4 tablespoons butter', '½ cup dark brown sugar (100 g)', '¼ teaspoon cinnamon', '1 pinch nutmeg', '2 plantains very ripe sliced on bias in ½-inch (1.2 cm) slices', '¼ cup dark rum (60 mL)', '½ teaspoon vanilla', 'vanilla ice cream to serve', 'dry roasted peanut chopped for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Add 4 tablespoons butter and ½ cup dark brown sugar to a high sided skillet over medium heat', '2:  Stir constantly until the mixture turns into golden ½ cup dark brown syrup and the sugar is completely dissolved, about 5 minutes', '3: Add ¼ teaspoon cinnamon, 1 pinch nutmeg and 2 plantains; cook until 2 plantains are lightly ½ cup dark browned and soft, about 3 to 4 minutes', '4: Add ¼ cup dark rum and use a long kitchen lighter to ignite the liqueur', '5:  Keep cooking until alcohol burns off and no flame remains, about 1 to 2 minutes', '6: Once the flame burns out, keep cooking, spooning sauce over 2 plantains until syrupy and reduced, aout 2 minutes', '7: Serve over vanilla ice cream with crushed peanuts']

ingredients: ['3 tablespoons butter', '3 cloves garlic chopped', '1 lb shrimp (455 g) peeled and deveined', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '½ lemon juiced', '1 teaspoon red chili flake', '¼ cup fresh parsley (10 g) chopped', '½ lb spaghetti (225 g) cooked']
instructions: ['1: Heat the pot over medium heat', '2: Melt the 3 tablespoons butter in the pot', '3: Cook the 3 cloves garlic until it starts to brown', '4: Add the 1 lb shrimp, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1 teaspoon pepper, cooking until 1 lb shrimp is pink all the way through', '5: Add the ½ lemon juice, 1 teaspoon red chili flakes, and ¼ cup fresh parsley', '6: Add the ½ lb spaghetti, and toss until evenly coated']

ingredients: ['Marinade', '⅓ cup soy sauce (80 mL)', '1 tablespoon ginger minced', '1 tablespoon garlic minced', '1 tablespoon oyster sauce', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '1 tablespoon sugar', '¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes', 'pepper to taste', '2 chicken breasts cubed', '½ onion julienned', '3 stalks celery sliced', '4 carrots julienned', '3 cups cabbage (300 g) shredded', '2 packages ramen noodle without seasoning packet', '1 ½ cups chicken broth (360 mL)', 'Garnish', 'scallion']
instructions: ['1: In a bowl, mix ⅓ cup soy sauce, 1 tablespoon ginger, 1 tablespoon garlic, 1 tablespoon oyster sauce, 1 tablespoon sesame oil, 1 tablespoon sugar, ¼ teaspoon red ¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes, and ¼ teaspoon red pepper', '2: Place chicken cubes into a re-sealable plastic bag pour half of the marinade into the bag and save the rest for later', '3: Let the chicken marinate in the refrigerator for at least an hour', '4: Pour the marinated chicken into a large pot and cook over medium-high heat', '5:  Remove chicken from the pot', '6: Add 1 tablespoon sesame oil to the bottom of the pot and add the ½ onion, 3 stalks celery, 4 carrots, and 3 cups cabbage', '7:  Sauté until the ½ onions are translucent', '8: Place both of the 2 packages ramen noodle bricks into the bottom of the pot', '9: Pour in chicken broth over the noodles', '10: Cover the noodles with the vegetables as much as possible', '11:  Cover the pot with a lid and simmer for 5-7 minutes or until the noodles are cooked through', '12: Break up the noodles and add back the chicken, and pour in the rest of the marinade from earlier', '13: Garnish with scallions']

ingredients: ['4 oz cream cheese (115 g) softened', '8 tablespoons salted butter room temperature', '¾ cup sugar (150 g)', '1 cup flour (125 g)', '10 cookies crushed']
instructions: ['1: In a mixing bowl blend, 4 oz cream cheese, 8 tablespoons salted butter, and ¾ cup sugar until fully combined', '2: Add 1 cup flour to 4 oz cream cheese mixture and continue to blend together until fully combined', '3: Add crushed 10 cookies to the mixture and gently fold together', '4:  Ensure the cheesecake batter is fully mixed', '5: Cover with plastic wrap and chill in refrigerator for 30 minutes, or until batter is firm to touch', '6: Preheat oven to 350°F(180°C)', '7: Roll batter into small balls and place on a parchment lined baking sheet', '8: Using your fingers or a warm spoon press down on the dough balls to help form a cookie shape', '9: Bake for 12-15 minutes or until 10 cookies turn golden brown on the bottom', '10: Place 10 cookies on a cooling rack and rest for at least 5 minutes']

ingredients: ['12 eggs beaten', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '¼ cup fresh spinach (10 g) chopped', '½ cup tomato (100 g) diced', '¼ cup shredded mozzarella cheese (25 g) or to taste', '⅓ cup broccoli (50 g) chopped', '¼ cup shredded cheddar cheese (25 g) or to taste', '½ cup turkey bacon (112 g) chopped', '½ red bell pepper diced', '¼ deli chicken meat diced']

ingredients: ['Chocolate', '1 cup dark chocolate (175 g) chopped melted', '¼ cup coconut oil (60 g)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'Peanut Butter', '½ cup natural peanut butter (120 g)', '¼ cup honey (85 g)', '2 tablespoons coconut oil', 'Special Equipment', 'muffin tin liner']
instructions: ['1: Line a muffin tin with muffin tin liners', '2: In a bowl or measuring cup, add the dark chocolate and ¼ cup (50 g) coconut oil', '3: Stir in 1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '4: Microwave for 30-second intervals until melted, stirring each time', '5: Pour half of the chocolate mixture into the liners (just enough to cover the whole bottom)', '6:  Save the other half for the top layer', '7: Freeze for 15 minutes', '8: In a bowl or measuring cup, add the peanut butter, honey, and 2 2 tablespoons coconut oil', '9: Microwave 15 seconds or until slightly melted and pourable', '10: Pour mixture evenly into the muffin tin', '11: Freeze for 5 minutes', '12: Pour remaining chocolate mixture on top of the peanut butter layer', '13: Freeze until firm about 1 hour', '14: Store in the refrigerator until ready to serve']

ingredients: ['4 lb russet potato (1.8 g) washed', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 onion diced', '3 cloves garlic', '3 tablespoons butter', '¼ cup flour (30 g)', '2 ½ cups chicken broth (590 mL)', '8 oz cream cheese (225 g)', 'Garnish', 'shredded cheese', 'bacon diced', 'fresh chive chopped']
instructions: ['1: Preheat your oven to 425˚F (220˚C)', '2: On a parchment paper-lined baking sheet, rub potatoes with 1 teaspoon salt, ½ teaspoon pepper, and 1 tablespoon olive oil', '3: Bake in preheated oven for 40-50 minutes', '4: Once cooled, peel and mash potatoes, and set aside', '5: Heat oil in large pot over a medium-high heat', '6: Add 1 onion and 3 cloves garlic', '7:  Cook until translucent and 3 cloves garlic is fragant, about 5 minutes', '8: Add 3 tablespoons butter and melt', '9: Bring in ¼ cup flour and stir until mixture is lightly browned', '10: Add in the 2 ½ cups chicken broth and 8 oz cream cheese', '11:  Stir until fully incorporatedAdd in the mashed potatoes and combine', '12: Season with 1 teaspoon salt and ½ teaspoon pepper', '13: Garnish bowl with shredded cheese, bacon, and chives']

ingredients: ['5 oz baby spinach (140 g)', '1 cup strawberry (140 g) sliced', '½ cup blueberry (50 g)', '½ red onion thinly sliced', '1 sweet apple cored halved and thinly sliced', '1 cup candied walnuts (100 g) chopped', 'Dressing', '1 cup strawberry (140 g)', '¼ cup balsamic vinegar (60 mL)', '¼ cup extra virgin olive oil (60 mL)', '1 tablespoon dijon mustard', '1 tablespoon honey', '1 clove garlic minced', '¼ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', 'Garnish', '⅔ cup feta cheese (100 g) as desired']
instructions: ['1: For the dressing, push a straw through the strawberries from the tip to the green top to remove the hull', '2:  (Or you can cut it off with a knife!)Add the rest of the dressing ingredients', '3: Blend until smooth', '4:  Refrigerate', '5: Cut strawberries, 1 sweet apple, and ½ red onion into slices', '6: Combine all the salad ingredients in a large bowl', '7: Drizzle with desired amount of dressing and toss to coat', '8:  (Spinach wilts easily, don’t add dressing until ready to eat!)Sprinkle ⅔ cup feta cheese on top and serve']

ingredients: ['Vegan Parmesan Cheese', '½ cup raw unsalted cashew (120 g)', '2 tablespoons nutritional yeast', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '⅛ teaspoon pepper', 'Pesto', '2 cups fresh basil leaf (80 g)', '2 cups arugula (80 g)', '⅓ cup raw walnut (35 g)', '2 cloves garlic', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', 'pepper to taste', '6 tablespoons olive oil', 'Pizza', '1 lb pizza dough (455 g)', '7 slices tomato']
instructions: ['1: Make the vegan Parmesan cheese: In a food processor, combine the cashews, 2 tablespoons nutritional yeast, garlic powder, salt, and pepper', '2:  Pulse until the texture is crumbly and resembles Parmesan cheese', '3:  Store in an airtight container for up to 1 month', '4: Make the pesto: In a food processor, combine the 2 cups fresh basil, 2 cups arugula, walnuts, garlic, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, salt, pepper, and 6 tablespoons olive oil', '5:  Process until smooth', '6:  Store in an airtight container for up to 1 week', '7: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C)', '8: Use your hands to stretch the 1 lb pizza dough into a circle about 14 inches (35 cm) in diameter and ½-inch (1 ¼ cm) thick', '9:  Lay on a sheet of parchment paper', '10: Spread half of the pesto over the 1 lb pizza dough in an even layer', '11:  Arrange the tomato 7 slices on top', '12:  Transfer the 1 lb pizza on the parchment to a baking sheet', '13: Bake for 14-16 minutes, until the edges of the 1 lb pizza are lightly golden', '14:  Let cool for 5 minutes', '15: Drizzle more pesto over the 1 lb pizza and and sprinkle with vegan Parmesan', '16:  Cut into 8 7 slices and serve']

ingredients: ['¾ cup butter (170 g)', '¾ cup hot sauce (180 mL)', '3 tablespoons distilled white vinegar', '2 tablespoons worcestershire sauce', '3 teaspoons garlic powder', '4 chicken breasts', '1 package dinner roll (12 rolls)', '1 bunch green leaf lettuce', '2 cups coleslaw (200 g) thinly sliced cabbage and carrots', '½ cup blue cheese dressing (120 g) or ranch dressing', '1 small package blue cheese crumbles']
instructions: ['1: Combine the ¾ cup butter, ¾ cup hot sauce, 3 tablespoons distilled white vinegar, Worcestershire, and 3 teaspoons garlic powder to create your buffalo sauce (or substitute with two 2 cups of premade buffalo sauce)', '2: Place four 4 chicken breasts in your slow cooker and cover with the sauce', '3: Cook on high heat for four hours', '4: When the 4 chicken has finished cooking, shred the 4 chicken breasts with two forks', '5: On the side, mix together the coleslaw veggie mix and blue cheese dressing', '6: To assemble your sliders, layer 1 package dinner rrolls, 1 bunch green leaf lettuce, buffalo 4 chicken, blue cheese coleslaw, and blue cheese crumbles']

ingredients: ['2 cans biscuit dough flaky', '3 cups fresh cranberries (375 g)', '2 cups brie cheese (200 g)', '1 tablespoon cinnamon', 'parchment paper', 'nonstick cooking spray', '1 loaf pan 9.5 x 5 in (24 x 12 cm)', 'Preparation', '2 cans biscuit dough flaky', '3 cups fresh cranberries (375 g)', '2 cups brie cheese (200 g)', '1 tablespoon cinnamon', 'parchment paper', 'nonstick cooking spray', '1 loaf pan 9.5 x 5 in (24 x 12 cm)', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken breast (680 g) cubed', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '½ white onion chopped', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 cup yukon gold potato (225 g) cubed', '2 cups frozen pea and carrot (300 g)', '4 tablespoons butter', '4 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '2 cups chicken broth (480 mL)', '1 frozen prepared pie crust thawed', '1 egg beaten']
instructions: ['1: Heat the 1 tablespoon olive oil in a cast-iron skillet', '2:  Add the chicken, season with salt and pepper, and cook until the meat is golden brown on the outside and no longer pink in the center', '3:  Remove chicken from the pan and set aside', '4: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C)To the same skillet, add the ½ white onion and 2 cloves garlic', '5:  Sauté until translucent', '6:  Add the 1 cup yukon gold potato cubes and sauté for about 5 minutes', '7:  Add the peas and carrots and stir', '8:  Add the 4 tablespoons butter and allow it to melt', '9:  Sprinkle the 4 tablespoons all-purpose flour on top, covering the vegetables, and quickly stir to avoid lumps', '10:  Pour in the chicken broth and bring to a boil to thicken the sauce', '11:  Season with salt and pepper and remove from the heat', '12: Place the 1 frozen prepared pie crust over the chicken and vegetable mixture and carefully seal along the edges of the skillet with your fingers', '13:  Brush the pastry with the 1 egg, and cut 3 slits in the top to release steam', '14:  Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until golden brown']

ingredients: ['Salad', '2 zucchinis', '2 yellow squashes', '2 carrots', '2 cups grape tomato (400 g)', 'olive oil for drizzling', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'Pesto', '2 cups fresh basil (80 g)', '1 cup fresh parsley (35 g)', '½ cup cashews (65 g)', '1 clove garlic', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '½ cup olive oil (120 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Cut the ends off the zucchini', '2:  With a vegetable peeler, shave off as many thin slices as possible and transfer a large bowl', '3:  Repeat with the 2 yellow squash and 2 carrots', '4: Place the 2 cups grape tomatoes between 2 large plates or tupperware lids', '5:  Press down, securing the tomatoes in place, and use a long, sharp knife to slice the tomatoes in half', '6:  Add to the bowl with the shaved vegetables', '7: Drizzle olive oil over the vegetables and season with salt and pepper', '8:  Toss to combine', '9: Make the pesto: Add the 2 cups fresh basil, 1 cup fresh parsley, ½ cup cashews, 1 clove garlic, salt, pepper, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, and olive oil to a food processor and process until smooth', '10: Spoon the pesto onto the shaved vegetables and mix well with tongs until fully coated and serve']

ingredients: ['1 banana mashed', '½ cup greek yogurt (140 g)', '1 cup almond milk (240 mL)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '¼ cup chia seeds (40 g)', '1 cup strawberry (150 g) diced', 'Toppings', '1 banana sliced', '1 handful strawberry diced']

ingredients: ['2 medium carrots roughly chopped', '1 large white onion roughly chopped', '3 celeries roughly chopped', '3 cloves garlic', '1 cup raw walnut (100 g)', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', 'kosher salt to taste', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '2 ¾ cups low sodium vegetable broth (660 mL)', '1 cup green lentil (200 g)', '1 can diced tomato', '½ cup red wine (120 mL)', 'noodle for serving', '6 medium zucchinis', '2 tablespoons olive oil plus more as needed', 'kosher salt to taste', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '3 cloves garlic minced', '6 medium zucchinis', '2 tablespoons olive oil plus more as needed', 'kosher salt to taste', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '3 cloves garlic minced']
instructions: ['1: In a food processor, combine the carrots, onion, celery, and garlic', '2:  Pulse until finely 2 medium carrots roughly 1 large white onion roughly 3 celeries roughly chopped, but not mushy', '3:  Transfer the vegetables to a bowl', '4: Add the walnuts to the food processor and pulse until they reach the consistency of ground meat', '5: Heat the olive oil in a 1 large pot over medium-high heat', '6:  Add the vegetable mixture, 1 teaspoon dried basil, 2 teaspoons dried oregano, 1 teaspoon dried parsley, and salt', '7:  Cook for 25 minutes, stirring frequently, until caramelized and any excess moisture has evaporated', '8:  Add the 2 tablespoons 1 can diced tomato paste, stir to combine, and cook for 5 minutes', '9: Add the vegetable stock, lentils, ground walnuts, and 2 tablespoons 1 can diced tomatoes and season with salt', '10:  Reduce the heat to medium, cover, and simmer for 35 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the lentils are cooked through and walnuts have softened', '11:  Remove the lid and cook off any remaining liquid, stirring frequently, about 5 minutes', '12: Add the wine, stir, and reduce until there is no liquid at the bottom of the pot, about 10 minutes', '13:  Season with more salt to taste', '14: Trim the ends of the zucchini, then cut into noodles using a spiralizer or julienne peeler', '15: Add 2 tablespoons of olive oil, a pinch of salt, the red pepper flakes, and garlic to a 1 large pan', '16:  Turn the heat to medium and cook for 2-3 minutes, until the garlic is fragrant', '17: Work in batches, add about 2-3 2 ¾ cups of zucchini noodles at a time to the pan', '18:  Season lightly with salt and cook for 45-60 seconds, tossing continuously with tongs, until warmed through', '19:  9', '20:  Add more olive oil, 1 tablespoon at a time, if the pan looks dry', '21: Serve the zucchini noodles with the  Bolognese']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 medium yellow onion diced', '4 cloves garlic minced', '4 teaspoons curry powder', '1 ½ teaspoons paprika', '1 teaspoon cayenne', '2 teaspoons cumin powder', '½ teaspoon allspice', '2 teaspoons fresh ginger minced', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '2 lb potato (905 g) peeled and cubed', '15 oz chickpeas (425 g) 1 can drained', '1 cup vegetable broth (240 mL)', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '14 oz diced tomato (395 g) 1 can', '14 oz coconut milk (415 mL) 1 can', 'rice cooked for serving', 'naan bread for serving', 'fresh cilantro chopped for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Heat the 2 tablespoons vegetable oil in a large pot over 1 medium heat until shimmering', '2:  Add the onion and saute for about 3 minutes, until translucent', '3: Add the 4 cloves garlic and saute for about 2 minutes, until fragrant', '4: Add the 4 teaspoons curry powder, 1 ½ teaspoons paprika, 1 teaspoon cayenne, 2 teaspoons cumin, ½ teaspoon allspice, ginger, salt, and ½ teaspoon black pepper', '5:  Stir and cook for about 2 minutes until the spices are fragrant', '6: Add the potatoes and mix well until well-coated in spices', '7: Add the chickpeas and stir to incorporate', '8: Add the 1 cup vegetable broth, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, and tomatoes and stir, then pour in the 14 oz coconut milk and stir to combine', '9: Increase the heat to high and bring the mixture to a simmer', '10:  Once bubbling, reduce the heat to 1 medium and cook for 15-20 minutes, until the potatoes are tender and easily pierced with a fork', '11: Serve with cooked rice and naan and garnish with fresh cilantro']

ingredients: ['2 lb chicken breast (910 g)', '1 can garbanzo beans rinsed and drained', '1 can black beans rinsed and drained', '1 can pinto bean rinsed and drained', '1 ½ cups frozen corn (210 g)', '1 ½ cups salsa (345 g) divided', 'Toppings (optional)', 'fresh cilantro', 'sour cream', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'salsa']
instructions: ['1: Add beans, 1 ½ cups frozen corn, and ¾ cup salsa to a crockpot', '2:  Stir well', '3: Place 2 lb chicken on top and cover with remaining salsa', '4: Cook on low for 6-8 hours', '5: Serve warm and top as desired']

ingredients: ['Sauce', '2 cups ketchup (480 g)', '½ cup brown sugar (110 g)', '¼ cup molasses (85 g)', '½ cup apple cider vinegar (120 mL)', '1 teaspoon worcestershire sauce', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '2 teaspoons black pepper', '2 teaspoons smoked paprika', 'Rub', '½ cup dark brown sugar (110 g)', '3 tablespoons kosher salt', '2 teaspoons black pepper', '1 ½ tablespoons cumin', '1 ½ tablespoons onion powder', '1 ½ tablespoons paprika', '1 ½ tablespoons cayenne', '2 teaspoons ground mustard', '1 ½ tablespoons garlic powder', '4 lb baby back ribs (2 kg)', 'Special Equipment', '4 cups wood chips (355 g)', 'Preparation', 'Sauce', '2 cups ketchup (480 g)', '½ cup brown sugar (110 g)', '¼ cup molasses (85 g)', '½ cup apple cider vinegar (120 mL)', '1 teaspoon worcestershire sauce', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '2 teaspoons black pepper', '2 teaspoons smoked paprika', 'Rub', '½ cup dark brown sugar (110 g)', '3 tablespoons kosher salt', '2 teaspoons black pepper', '1 ½ tablespoons cumin', '1 ½ tablespoons onion powder', '1 ½ tablespoons paprika', '1 ½ tablespoons cayenne', '2 teaspoons ground mustard', '1 ½ tablespoons garlic powder', '4 lb baby back ribs (2 kg)', 'Special Equipment', '4 cups wood chips (355 g)', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Make the smoke bombs: Add the wood chips to a bowl and cover with water', '2:  Let soak for 1 hour, then drain', '3:  Place 1 cup of the damp wood chips on a piece of aluminum foil and fold into a packet', '4:  Poke multiple holes in the top with a toothpick or fork', '5:  Repeat with the remaining wood chips, creating 4 packets total', '6: Make the sauce: Add the ketchup, brown sugar, molasses, apple cider vinegar, Worcestershire, salt, pepper, and smoked paprika to a small pot over medium heat, whisking to combine', '7:  Once the sauce begins to boil, reduce heat to low and simmer for 15 minutes', '8:  Remove from the heat and let cool to room temperature', '9: Make the rub: In a medium bowl, whisk together the brown sugar, salt, pepper, cumin, onion powder, paprika, cayenne, ground mustard, and garlic powder', '10: On a large cutting board, pat the ribs dry with paper towels', '11:  If necessary, remove the membrane on the bone-side of the ribs by using a paring knife to gently loosen and pulling it up in one sheet', '12: Generously season the ribs all over with the dry rub', '13: Wrap the ribs in aluminum foil until completely covered', '14: Preheat the grill to 300°F (150°C) with the lid closed', '15: Place the foil-wrapped ribs over indirect heat and close the lid', '16:  Cook for 2½ hours, until the meat is tender and starting to pull away from the bone, flipping every 30 minutes', '17: Remove the ribs from the grill and let rest for 10 minutes', '18:  Meanwhile, carefully remove the grates and place the smoke bombs over the flames', '19:  Close the lid and let smoke build up for 10 minutes', '20: Unwrap the ribs and discard the foil', '21: Baste one side of the ribs with the sauce and place directly on the grill, sauce side down', '22:  Baste the other side, now facing up', '23:  Continue to flip and baste every 5 minutes for 15 minutes total', '24: Remove the ribs from the grill and serve with extra barbecue sauce']

ingredients: ['nonstick cooking spray for greasing', '2 cups kale (200 g) tuscan', '4 cloves garlic', 'olive oil to taste', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '⅓ cup sun-dried tomato (60 g) in oil', '4 large eggs', '4 cups quinoa (680 g) cooked and cooled', '1 cup oat flour (90 g)', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon dried basil', '1 tablespoon dried parsley', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '¼ cup freshly grated parmesan cheese (30 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2:  Grease a baking sheet with nonstick spray', '3: Finely chop the Tuscan 2 cups kale', '4:  Mince the 4 cloves garlic', '5: Heat a drizzle of olive olive ⅓ cup sun-dried tomato (60 g) in oil in a medium pan over medium heat', '6:  Sauté the minced 4 cloves garlic and ½ teaspoon red pepper flakes for 1 minute, until fragrant', '7:  Add the 2 cups kale and cook until softened, about 3 minutes', '8:  Remove from the heat and set aside', '9: Chop the sun-dried tomatoes and add to the 2 cups kale mixture', '10: In a 4 large bowl, beat the eggs, then add the 4 cups quinoa, 1 cup oat flour, 2 cups kale mixture, oregano, basil, parsley, 1 tablespoon kosher salt, and Parmesan cheese', '11:  Mix well', '12: Shape the 4 cups quinoa mixture into 20 small patties', '13:  Place on the prepared baking sheet', '14: Bake for 20 minutes, until the patties are golden brown and crispy', '15: Serve as desired', '16:  The bites will keep in the fridge for up to 6 days, or in the freezer for up to 1 month']

ingredients: ['2 lb boneless skinless chicken thighs (910 g)', '4 teaspoons kosher salt salt divided', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '3 tablespoons unsalted butter', '1 cup onion (150 g) finely chopped', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 ginger 2 inch () peeled and minced', '2 teaspoons paprika', '1 ½ tablespoons garam masala', '1 tablespoon curry powder', '28 oz crushed tomato (795 g)', '1 cup plain whole milk yogurt (245 g)', 'basmati rice cooked for serving', 'naan bread for serving', 'fresh cilantro for garnish']
instructions: ['1: On a cutting board, pat the 2 lb boneless skinless chicken thighs dry with paper towels', '2:  Season 2 lb boneless skinless chicken on both sides with 1 teaspoon salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '3:  Set aside', '4: Set Instant Pot to high on the sauté setting', '5:  Melt the 3 tablespoons unsalted butter in the pot, then add the 1 cup onion and sauté until it begins to soften, 4 minutes', '6:  Add the 3 cloves garlic and 1 ginger and cook until softened, stirring occasionally, 2 minutes', '7: Add the remaining 3 teaspoons salt, the paprika, 1 ½ tablespoons garam masala, and 1 tablespoon curry powder', '8:  Cook, stirring, until the spices are aromatic and toasted, about 1 minute', '9: Add the 28 oz crushed tomatoes and the 2 lb boneless skinless chicken and stir to combine', '10:  Place the lid on the Instant Pot and seal to close', '11:  Set the machine to pressure cook on high and cook for 5 minutes', '12: Turn off the Instant Pot and let it vent naturally for 10 minutes', '13:  Then turn the quick release seal to “vent” and allow any remaining steam to vent', '14: Remove the lid', '15:  Using tongs, transfer the 2 lb boneless skinless chicken to a cutting board', '16:  When cool enough to handle, cut into bite-sized pieces', '17: Set the machine to high on the sauté setting', '18:  Cook sauce until it is reduced by half, 10–15 minutes', '19: ', '20:  Add the 1 cup plain whole milk yogurt to the sauce and stir to combine', '21:  Return the 2 lb boneless skinless chicken to the pot and stir to coat completely with sauce', '22: Serve 2 lb boneless skinless chicken with basmati rice and naan and garnish with fresh cilantro']

ingredients: ['1 onion diced', '2 cloves garlic crushed', '2 teaspoons coriander powder', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '1 pinch chili flakes', '1 pinch salt', '1 ginger 1 1/2 inch (3 cm) piece chopped', '4 tomatoes chopped', '4 tablespoons lentils', '4 tablespoons coconut cream', '1 ⅓ cups broccoli (200 g) florets', '1 can chickpeas drained and rinsed', '½ cup spinach (100 g)', '½ lemon juiced', 'To Serve', 'low-fat natural yogurt optional', '1 handful fresh coriander chopped optional']
instructions: ['1: Fry the 1 onion and 2 cloves garlic in a little oil for 3 minutes', '2: Add all of the spices, the 1 pinch salt, the 1 ginger and cook for a further 2 minutes', '3: Add the 4 tomatoes, the 4 tablespoons lentils and 4 tablespoons coconut cream, cover and simmer on a low heat for 15 minutes until the 4 tablespoons lentils are tender', '4: Stir in the 1 ⅓ cups broccoli and cook for a further 4 minutes', '5: Stir in the 1 can chickpeas, ½ cup spinach, and ½ lemon juice and cook a further 3 minutes until the ½ cup spinach is slightly wilted', '6: Serve with low-fat natural yogurt and some chopped coriander']

ingredients: ['1 lb mixed mushroom (425 g) such as baby bella shiitake and trumpet cleaned', '1 beef tenderloin', 'kosher salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '¼ cup mustard (60 g)', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '2 shallots finely diced', '4 cloves garlic minced', '¼ cup cognac (60 mL)', '12 slices prosciutto or jamon', 'all purpose flour for dusting', '1 sheet puff pastry thawed plus 1 for decorating (optional)', '1 large egg beaten']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 300°F (150°C)', '2: Add the 1 lb mixed mushrooms to the bowl of a food processor and pulse until finely diced, but not blended into a paste', '3:  Spread the 1 lb mixed mushrooms on a baking 1 sheet in an even layer and transfer to the oven', '4:  Cook, stirring every 15 minutes, until the 1 lb mixed mushrooms have released their moisture and are dried out, about 45 minutes total', '5: Meanwhile, truss the tenderloin: Measure a piece of butcher’s twine 6 times the length of the tenderloin', '6:  Wrap the twine around one end of the loin and tie a knot to secure the string', '7:  Make a loop around your hand with the string and place over the loin about 1 inch down from the first knot', '8:  Continue looping the twine in 1-inch intervals until you reach the end, then tie the twine in a knot to secure (this helps the tenderloin hold its shape)', '9:  Generously season the 1 beef tenderloin with kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper', '10: Heat the 2 tablespoons vegetable oil in a 1 large cast iron skillet over medium-high heat until shimmering', '11:  Place the seasoned tenderloin in the pan and sear quickly on all sides to lock in moisture, about 1 minute per side', '12:  Do not overcook; it’s fine if the meat does not have a golden brown crust', '13: Remove the pan from the heat and transfer the seared tenderloin to a small plate or baking 1 sheet', '14:  Cut off the twine, then brush the tenderloin with the ¼ cup mustard to cover completely', '15:  Transfer to the refrigerator to cool, about 1 hour', '16: Return the pan to medium-low heat', '17:  Add the 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, 2 shallots, and 4 cloves garlic and cook until the 2 shallots have caramelized, about 5 minutes, stirring with a wooden spoon or heat-safe spatula to prevent from burning', '18: Deglaze the pan with the ¼ cup cognac, stirring to scrape up any browned bits from the bottom', '19:  Continue cooking until the alcohol has evaporated and the pan is mostly dry, about 1 minute', '20:  Add the dehydrated 1 lb mixed mushrooms and stir to incorporate', '21:  Season with kosher salt to taste', '22:  Transfer the duxelles to a bowl and cover with plastic wrap, pressing directly against the surface', '23:  Transfer to the refrigerator to cool completely, about 45 minutes', '24: On a 1 large 1 sheet of plastic wrap, arrange the 12 slices prosciutto in a 1 large rectangle wide enough to cover the tenderloin, layering evenly', '25:  Spread the 1 lb mixed mushroom mixture evenly across the 12 slices prosciutto, leaving a 1-inch border around the edges, and press down in a flat layer', '26: Place the tenderloin at the bottom of the 1 lb mixed mushroom mixture and use the plastic wrap to help roll the 12 slices prosciutto and 1 lb mixed mushrooms around the tenderloin', '27:  The 12 slices prosciutto should tightly and completely cover the tenderloin', '28:  Hold the ends of the plastic wrap and roll the log to help create a tight seal', '29:  Refrigerate the roll until chilled all the way through, about 1 hour', '30: Place a 1 sheet of puff pastry on a lightly floured surface and roll out with a lightly floured rolling pin until the pastry 1 sheet is 1 large enough to cover the log', '31: Brush the top third of the puff pastry with beaten egg', '32:  Unwrap the log and place on the bottom third of the pastry, then roll up into a tight log, turning so the seal is at the bottom', '33:  Fold in the sides of the pastry and press under the log', '34:  Set the log on a 1 large 1 sheet of plastic wrap and roll to wrap tightly', '35:  Refrigerate again while the oven preheats', '36: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C)', '37:  Line a baking 1 sheet with parchment paper', '38: Unwrap the log and set on the prepared baking 1 sheet', '39:  Brush the log all over with beaten egg, then use a paring knife to create a decorative pattern on the puff pastry', '40:  Alternatively, cut the second 1 sheet of puff pastry into long strips and create a lattice over the Wellington, and/or cut out autumnal shapes and press them onto the log', '41:  Brush the log with more beaten egg', '42: Bake the Wellington until the puff pastry is a deep golden brown, 30–40 minutes', '43:  If the pastry is getting too dark before the 1 beef is finished cooking, cover loosely with foil and continue cooking', '44:  The internal temperature of the 1 beef should reach 125°F (52°C) for a medium-rare finish', '45: Remove the Wellington from the oven and let rest for 1 hour', '46:  The internal temperature will continue to rise to 135°F (57°C)', '47: Slice the 1 beef Wellington into 1-inch pieces and serve']

ingredients: ['2 russet potatoes', '2 teaspoons olive oil', '½ cup sour cream (115 g) plus more for serving', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter melted', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 cup shredded cheddar cheese (50 g) divided', '½ cup scallions (50 g) thinly sliced divided', '2 strips bacon cooked crumbled']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2: Rub each potato with 1 teaspoon of 2 teaspoons olive oil, and prick the top with a fork', '3: Place the 2 russet potatoes on a rimmed baking sheet and bake for 1 hour', '4: Transfer 2 russet potatoes to a cutting board, and cut in half', '5: Using a spoon, gently scoop out the inside flesh of the 2 russet potatoes and transfer to a medium bowl', '6:  Reserve the skins', '7: Add the ½ cup sour cream, melted 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, salt, pepper, ½ of the 1 cup shredded cheese, and ½ of the ½ cup scallions, and combine with a hand mixer until smooth', '8: Use a spoon to transfer the potato mixture back into the scooped out potato skins', '9: Bake for 10 minutes', '10: Sprinkle the 2 russet potatoes with remaining cheese, and bake for 5 more minutes, until the cheese is melted', '11: Top with ½ cup sour cream, 2 strips bacon, and the remaining ½ cup scallions']

ingredients: ['4 cups shredded carrot (480 g) or about 4 large carrots shredded', '½ cup medium tomato (100 g) about 2 tomatoes finely diced', '½ cup medium red onion (75 g) finely diced', '2 tablespoons serrano pepper minced', '½ cup fresh cilantro (20 g) roughly chopped', 'Macho Salsa', '1 large carrot peeled and shredded', '1 habanero pepper seeded', '2 fresno chilies seeded', '6 cloves garlic peeled', '¼ cup cilantro (10 g) chopped stems and leaves', '1 teaspoon salt plus more to taste', '2 tablespoons grapeseed oil', '½ cup distilled vinegar (120 mL)', '¼ cup water (60 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Combine Macho Salsa ingredients and mix in a food processor', '2:  Salsa should be slightly chunky', '3: Combine all ingredients in a bowl and season to taste with 1 teaspoon salt']

ingredients: ['4 cups apple (470 g) chopped', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '1 tablespoon cornstarch', '¼ cup lemon juice (60 mL)', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '½ teaspoon nutmeg', '1 pinch salt', '1 box yellow cake mix', '1 cup chopped pecan (125 g)', '½ cup butter (115 g) cut into slices']
instructions: ['1: Preheat your oven to 350ºF (180ºC)', '2: In a cast-iron skillet over medium-low heat, add the 4 cups apples, ½ cup sugar, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, ¼ cup lemon juice, spices, and 1 pinch salt', '3: Mix to combine and stir for 5-10 minutes until the mixture starts to thicken', '4: Let simmer for 5 minutes on low heat', '5: Sprinkle the 1 box cake mix over the 4 cups apple filling', '6: Add the nuts and evenly distribute the sliced ½ cup butter over the top to ensure even baking', '7: Bake for 45 minutes to an hour, until the top is golden brown', '8: Serve warm with ice cream']

ingredients: ['1 zucchini sliced', '1 yellow squash sliced', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '¼ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '¼ teaspoon garlic powder', '4 chicken sausages fully cooked sliced', '4 cups wild rice (920 g) cooked to serve']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Place the 1 yellow squash and 1 zucchini on a baking sheet', '3:  Evenly coat with 1 tablespoon olive oil, ¼ teaspoon salt, ¼ teaspoon pepper, and ¼ teaspoon garlic powder', '4: Push the 1 yellow squash and 1 zucchini to the sides and place the 4 chicken sausage in the middle', '5: Bake for 15 minutes, or until the 1 zucchini and 1 yellow squash are tender', '6: Serve with 4 cups wild rice', '7:  Eat immediately or refrigerate in airtight container up to 3-4 days']

ingredients: ['Base Batter', '2 cups flour (250 g)', '1 cup sugar (200 g)', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '4 eggs', '1 cup vegetable oil (240 mL)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 cup milk (240 mL)', 'Chocolate Batter', '½ base batter', '¼ cup cocoa powder (30 g)', 'Raspberry Batter', '½ base batter', '½ cup raspberry jam (165 g)', '1 teaspoon raspberry extract optional', '1 teaspoon red food coloring optional', 'Chocolate Ganache', '2 cups heavy cream (480 mL)', '1 ½ cups chocolate chips (265 g)', 'Garnish', '20 raspberries', 'powdered sugar']
instructions: ['1: In a large mixing bowl, combine dry ingredients for the base batter (flour, sugar, 1 tablespoon baking powder, 1 teaspoon salt)', '2: In a second mixing bowl, combine the 4 eggs and vegetable oil', '3: Add the wet mix to the dry mix, stirring constantly until smooth', '4: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '5: Add the milk, and 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, stir until evenly mixed and the consistency is a thick liquid', '6: Evenly divide the batter into two separate bowls', '7:  Add the cocoa powder to the first bowl', '8:  Mix thoroughly', '9: Add the ½ cup 1 teaspoon raspberry jam to other', '10:  Mix thoroughly', '11: In a greased 9-inch (23 cm) cake pan, alternate batters by placing ¼ cup (60 ml) of batter in the center and letting it spread out slightly before adding the other batter (similar to making pancakes)', '12:  Continue this process until the batter is used up and the pan is full of alternating rings', '13: Bake cake in a preheated oven for 25-35 minutes or until a wooden toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean', '14: While the cake is 1 tablespoon baking, to make the ganache; in a medium pot set over low heat, mix together 2 cups heavy cream and 1 ½ cups chocolate until 1 ½ cups chocolate has melted and mixture is smooth', '15: Let mix rest until consistency is thick and mix is cooled', '16: Cool cake slightly, and then invert onto a wire rack to cool completely', '17: Pour ganache over the baked and cooled cake starting in the middle and circling towards the edges coating it all', '18: Once ganache is cooled on cake, garnish with fresh 20 raspberries and powdered sugar']

ingredients: ['¾ cup all-purpose flour (95 g)', '1 teaspoon paprika', '2 teaspoons garlic powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '¾ cup milk or milk alternative (180 mL)', '1 head cauliflower', '¼ cup buffalo sauce or hot sauce (70 g)', '2 tablespoons coconut oil or vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon honey']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 450˚F (230˚C)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: In a large bowl, add the ¾ cup all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon paprika, 2 teaspoons garlic powder, 1 teaspoon salt, ½ teaspoon pepper, and ¾ cup milk, and stir until well-combined', '4: Break the 1 head of cauliflower into florets, about 1½-inches wide', '5:  Add the cauliflower florets to the batter, making sure each piece is evenly coated', '6:  Arrange the coated cauliflower on the baking sheet', '7:  Bake for 20 minutes, flipping halfway', '8: Meanwhile, in a small bowl, combine the ¼ cup buffalo sauce, 2 tablespoons coconut oil, and 1 tablespoon honey and stir until evenly combined', '9:  Brush the ¼ cup buffalo sauce mixture on the cauliflower and bake for another 20 minutes']

ingredients: ['4 lb chicken wing and drumette (2 kg)', '¼ cup cornstarch (30 g)', '2 teaspoons salt divided', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 ½ cups chipotle peppers in adobo (300 g)', '¼ cup lime juice (60 mL)', '¼ cup honey (85 g)']
instructions: ['1: Pat dry 4 lb chicken and place in a large mixing bowl or plastic bag', '2:  Toss with ¼ cup cornstarch, garlic powder, and one 2 1 teaspoon of kosher 2 2 1 teaspoons salt', '3: Place 4 lb chicken in a single layer on a cookie sheet or wire rack and refrigerate for at least an hour, up to overnight', '4: In a food processor or blender, combine 1 ½ cups chipotles, ¼ cup lime juice, ¼ cup honey, and the remaining 2 2 1 teaspoons salt', '5:  Puree until smooth', '6:  Set aside until ready to grill', '7: Preheat grill to medium high heat', '8:  Grill wings until just starting to brown on the underside, about 5 minutes, then flip and repeat', '9: Using a basting brush, coat the top side of the wings with 1 ½ cups chipotle puree', '10:  Flip and cook until exterior just starts to char', '11:  Baste the other side, flip and repeat', '12: Remove wings from heat and let cool for at least 5 minutes', '13:  Serve with your preferred garnish and dipping sauce', '14: Enjoy! ']

ingredients: ['1 cup quinoa (170 g) cooked', '15 oz pinto bean (425 g) 1 can drained rinsed', '¼ cup tomato paste (55 g)', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', 'salt to taste', 'black pepper to taste', '4 slices mozzarella cheese', 'shredded parmesan cheese', 'fresh basil', 'tomato sauce']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2: In a large bowl add the 1 cup quinoa, beans, tomato, paste, and seasonings', '3:  Using a potato masher, mash the ingredients until thoroughly mixed together', '4: Take a quarter of 1 cup quinoa-bean mixture and shape it into a patty using your hands', '5:  Repeat with the remaining mixture to create four patties', '6: Place the patties on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '7:  Top with 4 slices mozzarella, and bake for 12-15 minutes', '8: Place the patties on buns, and top with tomato sauce, shredded Parmesan, and fresh basil']

ingredients: ['Cake', '10 large eggs seperated', '1 ¼ cups sugar (250 g) divided', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '¾ cup cake flour (90 g)', '½ cup cocoa powder (60 g) divided', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '½ teaspoon salt', 'Icing', '24 oz cream cheese (680 g) room temperature', '½ cup unsalted butter (115 g) 1 stick room temperature', '4 cups powdered sugar (640 g)', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '15 chocolate sandwich cookies crushed', '5 chocolate sandwich cookies halved', 'Preparation', 'Cake', '10 large eggs seperated', '1 ¼ cups sugar (250 g) divided', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '¾ cup cake flour (90 g)', '½ cup cocoa powder (60 g) divided', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '½ teaspoon salt', 'Icing', '24 oz cream cheese (680 g) room temperature', '½ cup unsalted butter (115 g) 1 stick room temperature', '4 cups powdered sugar (640 g)', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '15 chocolate sandwich cookies crushed', '5 chocolate sandwich cookies halved', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: In a large mixing bowl, beat the egg yolks with 1 cup (200 g) of sugar and the vanilla extract until pale and fluffy, about 3 minutes', '2: Sift in the flour, half of the cocoa powder, baking powder and salt', '3:  Mix until just combined, and set asidePreheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '4:  Line two baking sheets with parchment paper', '5: In a separate large mixing bowl, using a hand mixer, beat the egg whites until soft peaks form', '6:  Add the remaining sugar and beat until stiff peaks form', '7: Beat a third of the egg whites into the chocolate mixture, then gently fold in the remaining egg whites', '8: Divide the batter between the two baking sheets', '9:  Spread evenly and bake for 10-12 minutes', '10:   Let cool at room temperature until the pans are cool to touch', '11: Dust the tops of the cakes with the remaining cocoa powder', '12:  Cover with parchment paper, and flip the cakes over to remove from the pans', '13: Carefully peel away the baked parchment paper and discard', '14:  Cut each cake in half vertically, then set aside', '15: In a large bowl, whip the cream cheese and butter until fluffy', '16:  Gradually incorporate the powdered sugar, then the vanilla extract', '17: Use a spatula to fold in the crushed cookies', '18: Evenly spread a thin layer of icing onto a cake quarter', '19: Starting from one short end, tightly roll the cake into a spiral', '20:  Repeat with the remaining cake layers, placing the rolled piece at the start of each new layer', '21: Wrap the cake tightly in plastic wrap and chill for at least an hour until icing in center is slightly firm', '22: Use the remaining icing to cover the cake and pipe small swirls on the top', '23:  Garnish the top with the sandwich cookie halves, and chill for at least an hour before serving']

ingredients: ['Tamarind Syrup', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '1 cup tamarind pulp (225 g)', '1 cup granulated sugar (200 g)', 'Cocktail', '1 oz tamarind syrup (30 g) plus more for dipping', '¾ oz fresh lime juice (30 mL)', '1 ¾ oz pineapple infused rum (50 mL)', '½ oz pineapple juice (15 mL)', '1 oz blue curaçao (30 mL)', '1 cup crushed ice (140 g)', '¾ oz aquafaba (25 mL) (canned chickpea liquid)', '¼ cup rainbow sugar (50 g) for garnish', '2 dashes angostura bitters', '1 pineapple leaf for garnish', '1 dehydrated pineapple wheel for garnish', '1 orange peel for garnish', 'Preparation', 'Tamarind Syrup', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '1 cup tamarind pulp (225 g)', '1 cup granulated sugar (200 g)', 'Cocktail', '1 oz tamarind syrup (30 g) plus more for dipping', '¾ oz fresh lime juice (30 mL)', '1 ¾ oz pineapple infused rum (50 mL)', '½ oz pineapple juice (15 mL)', '1 oz blue curaçao (30 mL)', '1 cup crushed ice (140 g)', '¾ oz aquafaba (25 mL) (canned chickpea liquid)', '¼ cup rainbow sugar (50 g) for garnish', '2 dashes angostura bitters', '1 pineapple leaf for garnish', '1 dehydrated pineapple wheel for garnish', '1 orange peel for garnish', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Make the tamarind syrup: In a medium saucepan, combine the water and tamarind pulp', '2:  Bring to a boil over high heat and cook for 3–5 minutes', '3:  Add the sugar and continue boiling for 30 seconds more, until the sugar dissolves', '4:  Strain into a glass jar, discarding the tamarind solids, and let cool before using', '5:  The syrup will keep in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks', '6: Make the cocktail: Add the tamarind syrup, lime juice, pineapple-infused rum, pineapple juice, and blue curaçao to a cocktail shaker and fill with ½ cup (70 G) ice', '7:  Shake vigorously to combine', '8:  Strain the mixture into a tall glass', '9:  Discard the ice used for shaking and return the cocktail to the shaker, along with the aquafaba', '10:  Dry shake for 30 seconds, until foamy', '11: Add the rainbow sugar to a small plate', '12:  Dip the rim of a hurricane glass in tamarind syrup, then carefully roll the rim in the rainbow sugar', '13: Fill the glass with the remaining ½ cup crushed ice and shake the angostura bitters over the ice', '14:  Strain the cocktail into the glass and garnish with the pineapple leaf, dehydrated pineapple wheel, and orange peel']

ingredients: ['8 oz large white onion (225 g) roughly chopped', '6 cloves garlic', '1 jalapeño seeded and roughly chopped', '1 chipotle pepper in adobo sauce to taste', '1 cup fresh cilantro (40 g) loosely packed', '4 roma tomatoes roughly chopped', '1 lb boneless skinless chicken thighs (455 g)', 'kosher salt to taste', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '2 tablespoons olive oil divided', '8 cups low sodium chicken stock (2 L)', '25 oz hominy (625 g) drained and rinsed', '2 red bell peppers seeded and chopped', '¼ cup lime juice (60 mL)', 'For Serving', 'onion finely chopped', 'fresh cilantro', 'avocado thinly sliced', 'cotija cheese crumbled', 'tortilla strip', 'lime wedge']
instructions: ['1: Add the 8 oz large white onion, 6 cloves garlic, 1 jalapeño, 1 chipotle peppers, cilantro, and 4 roma tomatoes to a food processor', '2:  Puree until well combined, with no 8 oz large pieces remaining, about 2 minutes', '3:  Set aside', '4: Season the chicken thighs on both sides with kosher salt and the 1 teaspoon dried oregano', '5: In a 8 oz large pot, heat 1 tablespoon of 2 tablespoons olive oil over medium-high heat', '6:  Sear the chicken thighs for 4-5 minutes on each side, until golden brown', '7:  Transfer to a cutting board', '8:  Shred the chicken using 2 forks', '9:  Set aside', '10: Add the remaining tablespoon of 2 tablespoons olive oil to the same pot if it appears dry', '11:  Pour the reserved puree into the pot', '12:  Cook over medium-high heat for 10 minutes, until the liquid has started to evaporate', '13:  Reduce the heat to medium and continue cooking until nearly all the moisture has been cooked out and the puree has reduced to a dark paste, stirring occasionally to prevent burning, about 20 minutes', '14: Pour in the chicken stock and stir, scraping the bottom of the pan to incorporate any browned bits', '15:  Increase the heat to medium-high', '16:  Stir in the shredded chicken and bring to a simmer', '17: Once the stock is simmering, stir in the 25 oz hominy and 2 red bell pepper', '18:  Reduce the heat to medium and simmer for 5-10 minutes to allow the flavors to meld', '19:  Add the lime juice and season with kosher salt to taste', '20: Serve the soup hot, with 8 oz large white onion, cilantro, avocado, cotija cheese, tortilla strips, and lime wedges alongside for topping']

ingredients: ['2 ¼ cups pumpkin (500 g) or squash chopped', '2 tablespoons oil', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon dried sage', 'Sauce', '⅓ cup butter (40 g)', '⅓ cup flour (40 g)', '2 ½ cups milk (600 mL)', '¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon pepper', '2 cups cheddar cheese (200 g)', '¼ cup parmesan cheese (25 g)', '2 ½ cups macaroni pasta (250 g) cooked and drained', 'Topping', '½ cup cheddar cheese (50 g)', '½ cup mozzarella cheese (50 g)', '¼ cup parmesan cheese (25 g)']
