instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 190°C (375°F)Chop up the 2 ¼ cups pumpkin into chunks and place on a baking tray', '2: Drizzle over the 2 tablespoons oil, 1 teaspoon salt, pepper, and ¼ teaspoon ground 1 teaspoon dried sage, and coat evenly with your hands', '3: Roast in the oven for 20 minutes', '4: Once cooked leave to cool slightly and blend ⅓ of the 2 ¼ cups pumpkin, set aside', '5: For the sauce, in a large ovenproof pan, melt the ⅓ cup butter over a medium-low heat', '6: Gradually mix in the ⅓ cup flour to create a roux', '7: Add the 2 ½ cups milk in 4-5 parts stirring well in between', '8: Continue to stir and cook the sauce for a further 5-10 minutes or until the sauce is simmering and thickened', '9: Stir in the ¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, pepper, cheddar, and Parmesan', '10: Stir in the blended 2 ¼ cups pumpkin', '11: Stir in the remaining whole 2 ¼ cups pumpkin and 2 ½ cups macaroni, mix until combined', '12: Top with the cheddar, ½ cup mozzarella, and Parmesan', '13: Grill for 10 minutes at 200°C (400°F) until the cheese is brown and bubbling', '14: Serve', '15: Nutrition  Calories: 1525 Fat: 99 grams  Carbs: 110grams Fiber: 6 grams  Sugars: 49 grams  Protein: 49 grams']

ingredients: ['4 strawberries', '2 oz cotton candy (60 g)', '2 limes', '⅓ cup vodka (80 mL)', '⅔ cup rosé wine (160 mL)', '⅔ cup champagne (160 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Make 4-5 cuts along the length of the strawberry, starting from the pointed end until just before the stem end', '2:  Fan the slices apart with your fingers, and set aside', '3: Separate the 2 oz cotton candy into two balls', '4:  Cut a slit in the center and push the fanned strawberry inside, sealing up the hole afterwards', '5: Slice half of the lime into rounds, saving the other half for later', '6:  Make a single cut on each lime slice, starting from the center and cutting through the rind', '7: In a large pitcher or jug, mix the ⅓ cup vodka and rose', '8:  Squeeze the juice from reserved lime half into the mixture, then add ⅔ cup champagne', '9: Place the strawberry-stuffed 2 oz cotton candy balls into two separate martini glasses', '10: Place the lime slices on the side of the glass', '11: Pour the drink mixture around the sides of the 2 oz cotton candy in a circular motion, and watch it dissolve to reveal the strawberry inside!']

ingredients: ['1 cup carrot (100 g) chopped', '1 cup green peas (100 g)', '6 cloves garlic chopped', '½ lb shrimp (250 g) peeled and deveined', '½ lb ham (200 g) chopped in squares', '2 ½ cups rice (500 g) leftover', '3 eggs beaten', '5 tablespoons soy sauce']
instructions: ['1: In a large pan with olive or vegetable oil at medium heat, stir the 1 cup green peas and carrots until both begin to soften', '2: Add 6 cloves garlic, ½ lb shrimp, and ½ lb ham, cook until the ½ lb shrimp turns slightly pink, about 2 minutes', '3: Move the ingredients to a corner of the pan and add the 2 ½ cups rice and 3 eggs, mix well', '4: Toss all ingredients together and add 5 tablespoons soy sauce', '5: Serve and enjoy!']

ingredients: ['Chicken Wings', '2 lb chicken wings (910 g) cut at the joints', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '½ teaspoon granulated garlic', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon grapeseed oil', 'black pepper', 'Brine', '2 cups water (500 g) 100%', '1 tablespoon salt 1%', '1 teaspoon sugar', '1 teaspoon black peppercorn', '5 cloves garlic crushed', 'Sauce', '1 cup Frank’s Red Hot® Sauce (240 mL)', '4 tablespoons butter', 'Dressing', '3 oz blue cheese (85 g)', '2 tablespoons Kewpie Mayo', '½ cup yogurt (120 g)', '1 bunch chives sliced', '1 tablespoon dill dried or fresh', 'water (to consistency)', 'salt', 'black pepper', 'Preparation', 'Chicken Wings', '2 lb chicken wings (910 g) cut at the joints', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '½ teaspoon granulated garlic', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon grapeseed oil', 'black pepper', 'Brine', '2 cups water (500 g) 100%', '1 tablespoon salt 1%', '1 teaspoon sugar', '1 teaspoon black peppercorn', '5 cloves garlic crushed', 'Sauce', '1 cup Frank’s Red Hot® Sauce (240 mL)', '4 tablespoons butter', 'Dressing', '3 oz blue cheese (85 g)', '2 tablespoons Kewpie Mayo', '½ cup yogurt (120 g)', '1 bunch chives sliced', '1 tablespoon dill dried or fresh', 'water (to consistency)', 'salt', 'black pepper', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Whisk brine together and allow to dissolve', '2: Submerge wings and refrigerate for 12 hours', '3: Remove from brine and pat dry before usingToss wings with salt, pepper, garlic powder, and baking soda', '4:  Coat with oil', '5: Place on a wire rack (very important for air flow)Bake at 450F for 18-25 minutes until golden brown and crispy', '6: For the dressing, combine all and adjust consistency with water', '7:  Season to taste', '8: Toss with warmed hotsauce & butter', '9: Devour!']

ingredients: ['Salad', '3 large sweet potatoes cut into 2 inch (5 cm) wedges', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '¾ cup pomegranate seeds (130 g)', '½ cup pistachio (50 g) toasted roughly chopped', '½ cup feta cheese (75 g) crumbled', '⅓ cup fresh chives (15 g) thinly sliced for garnish', 'Dressing', '1 tablespoon orange zest', '3 tablespoons fresh orange juice', '1 tablespoon red wine vinegar', '1 garlic minced', '1 teaspoon dijon mustard', '2 teaspoons honey', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon black pepper freshly ground', '6 tablespoons olive oil']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2: In a medium bowl, toss the sweet potatoes with the 1 tablespoon 6 tablespoons olive oil and salt', '3:  Transfer to an unlined baking sheet', '4: Roast the sweet potato wedges for 20-25 minutes, until softened and golden brown on the outside', '5: While the sweet potatoes are roasting, make the dressing: In a medium bowl, whisk together the 1 tablespoon 3 tablespoons fresh orange zest, 1 tablespoon 3 tablespoons fresh orange juice, 1 tablespoon red wine vinegar, 1 garlic, 1 teaspoon dijon mustard, 2 teaspoons honey, salt, and ½ teaspoon black pepper', '6:  Starting with a few drops and steadily increasing the stream, slowly drizzle in the 1 tablespoon 6 tablespoons olive oil, whisking continuously, until the dressing is thickened and emulsified', '7: Transfer the warm sweet potatoes to a 3 large bowl', '8:  Toss with 2-3 tablespoons of the dressing until well coated', '9:  Add the ¾ cup pomegranate seeds, pistachios, ½ cup feta, salt and ½ teaspoon black pepper and gently toss to combine', '10:  Drizzle with another 1-2 tablespoons of the dressing and toss to coat', '11:   Garnish with the ⅓ cup fresh chives']

ingredients: ['Filling', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '2 tablespoons garlic minced', '1 onion diced', '3 stalks celery chopped', '2 carrots sliced', '2 cups mushrooms (150 g) sliced', '1 cup corn (175 g)', '¼ cup fresh parsley (5 g) chopped', '1 tablespoon tomato paste', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon dried sage', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 cups vegetable broth (470 mL)', '1 tablespoon flour', 'Potato Topping', '4 potatoes peeled and chopped', '1 tablespoon vegan butter', '½ cup soy milk (120 mL) or nut milk', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 220ºC (425ºF)', '2: In a medium-large pot, over medium heat, combine 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 2 tablespoons garlic, and onions', '3:  Cook for one minute, until onions start to soften', '4: Add 3 stalks celery and 2 carrots, stir until onions are translucent', '5: Add 2 cups mushrooms, corn, parsley, 1 tablespoon tomato paste, 1 teaspoon dried thyme, 1 teaspoon dried sage, salt, and pepper until well mixed', '6: Add veggie stock in half-cup (120 ml) increments, allowing it to come to a simmer before adding more', '7: Add 1 tablespoon flour, then mix', '8:  Continue mixing until the mixture thickens', '9: Once thick, remove from heat and pour into a pie dish', '10: Add 4 potatoes to a large pot and cover with lightly salted water', '11:  Set over medium-high heat and bring to a boil', '12:  Cook until 4 potatoes have softened and are fork-tender', '13: Remove from heat and drain', '14: Mash 4 potatoes then add 1 tablespoon vegan butter, milk, salt, and pepper', '15: Spoon potato mixture over the top of the veggies in the pie dish, and smooth so that it is evenly spread', '16: Optional: Using a 1 tablespoon vegan butter knife or a long, thin spatula', '17:  press into potato surface every inch (2 ½cm) to create a beautiful, undulating presentation', '18: Bake pie for 20-25 minutes', '19: Allow to cool for five minutes then serve']

ingredients: ['Mofongo', '6 green plantains', 'cold water for soaking', '2 cups canola oil (480 mL)', '10 garlics divided', '5 tablespoons olive oil', '3 tablespoons kosher salt divided plus more to taste', '½ cup bacon (110 g) chopped and grease reserved', '1 bag chicharrónes divided', '20 oz longanisa (560 g) casings removed crumbled', '4 cups white bread (460 g) day old torn loosely packed', '2 ½ cups chicken stock (600 g)', 'Sofrito', '1 medium white onion cut into 1 in (2 1/2 cm) pieces', '3 roma tomatoes quartered', '1 bunch fresh cilantro washed end trimmed', '1 jalapeño seeds and ribs removed quartered', '4 cubanelles seeds and ribs removed quartered', '10 large cloves garlic ends trimmed']
instructions: ['1: Trim both ends of the 6 green plantains', '2:  Cut a slit through the skin down the length of the 6 green plantains', '3:  Cut each plantain in half crosswise and place in a bowl of cold water', '4:  Set aside to soak for 30 minutes (this will make the 6 green plantains easier to peel)', '5: While the 6 green plantains soak, make the sofrito: In the bowl of a food processor, combine the onion, 3 roma tomatoes, 1 bunch fresh cilantro, 1 jalapeño, cubanelle peppers, and garlic', '6:  Pulse 15–20 times, until the vegetables are completely broken down and the sofrito has the consistency of chunky salsa', '7:  Set aside', '8: In a large, high-walled skillet, heat the 2 2 ½ 4 2 ½ cups canola oil over 1 medium-high heat until it reaches 350˚F (180°C)', '9:  Line a baking sheet with paper towels and set nearby', '10: After soaking, peel the 6 green plantains and cut into 1–1 ½-inch ( 2 ½ cm) pieces', '11:  Blot dry with paper towels', '12: Working in batches, fry the 6 green plantains in the hot oil for 7 minutes, until crisp and beginning to brown', '13:  Transfer the 6 green plantains to the prepared baking sheet to drain', '14: Working in batches, add 1–2 cloves of garlic, 1 tablespoon of olive oil, and about ½  teaspoon of salt to a large mortar', '15:  Using the pestle, mash the garlic until it breaks down into a paste', '16:  Add about 7–8 fried plantain pieces, then use the pestle to mash the 6 green plantains and combine with the garlic paste', '17:  Add about 1½ tablespoons of bacon, along with some of the reserved bacon grease, and mash into the 6 green plantains', '18:  7', '19:  Add about ½ 2 ½ 4 2 ½ cup (15 G) of the chicharrones and break up until evenly distributed throughout the mofongo', '20:  Transfer the mofongo to a large bowl and repeat with remaining ingredients', '21: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190°C)', '22: Heat a 1 medium skillet over 1 medium-high heat', '23:  Add the longaniza sausage to the hot pan and cook until the fat has rendered and the sausage is browned, 8–10 minutes', '24: Add the cooked sausage, along with the rendered fat, sofrito, torn 4 2 ½ cups white bread, and 2 ½ cups chicken stock to the bowl with the mofongo', '25:  Stir well to combine, making sure all of the 4 2 ½ cups white bread is moistened', '26: Transfer the mofongo stuffing to a lightly greased 9x13-inch (22 x 33 cm) baking dish and cover with foil', '27: Bake the stuffing for 30 minutes', '28: Remove the stuffing from the oven and increase the oven temperature to 400°F (200°C)', '29: Top the stuffing with the remaining chicharrones and bake, uncovered for another 20–25 minutes, until the top is golden brown and beginning to crisp', '30: Remove the stuffing from the oven and let cool for 15 minutes before serving']

ingredients: ['24 oz green beans (680 g) trimmed', '¼ cup water (60 mL)', '¾ teaspoon kosher salt divided', '4 tablespoons unsalted butter 1/2 sticks', '1 ½ tablespoons Tasty McCormick® Savory Spice Blend']
instructions: ['1: In a large pan over high heat, combine the 24 oz green beans, ¼ cup water, and ¼ ¾ teaspoon salt', '2:  Cover and steam for 5–7 minutes, until the 24 oz green beans are just barely tender', '3: Remove the lid and add the remaining ½ ¾ teaspoon salt, the 4 tablespoons unsalted butter, and Savory spice blend', '4:  Cook, tossing every 30 seconds, until the 24 oz green beans are tender and charred in a few spots, 1–2 minutes', '5: Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['1 lb ground pork (455 g)', '1 tablespoon McCormick® fresh sage minced', '1 teaspoon McCormick® fresh thyme minced', '2 tablespoons maple syrup', '2 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '½ teaspoon McCormick® ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon McCormick® Fennel Seeds ground', '1 teaspoon McCormick® Paprika', '1 teaspoon McCormick® Garlic Powder', '12 medium eggs', '1 roma tomato thinly sliced', 'flaky sea salt to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: In a large bowl, combine the ground pork, 1 tablespoon McCormick® fresh sage, 1 teaspoon McCormick® fresh thyme, 2 tablespoons maple syrup, 2 ½ teaspoons kosher flaky sea salt, pepper, fennel, paprika, and garlic powder', '3:  Mix with your hands until evenly combined', '4: Divide the sausage mixture evenly between the wells of a 12-cup muffin tin', '5:  Using your fingers, press the mixture against the bottom and up the sides of the cups in an even layer that is flush with the tops of the cups', '6: Crack 1 egg into each sausage well, then top with 1 roma tomato slice and season with flaky 2 ½ teaspoons kosher flaky sea salt', '7: Bake for 30 minutes, or until the sausage is golden brown and cooked through and the egg is set', '8:  Remove from the oven and let cool slightly', '9: Serve immediately or cool completely and freeze for up to 1 month', '10:  To reheat, microwave the cups for x minutes, until warmed through']

ingredients: ['Brussels Sprout', '1 lb brussels sprouts (455 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'Creamy Balsamic Vinaigrette', '¼ cup greek yogurt (70 g)', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '½ tablespoon dijon mustard', '1 clove garlic minced', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'Salad', '½ lb mixed greens (230 g)', '⅓ cup carrot (35 g) shredded ', '⅓ cup almond (70 g) sliced', '⅓ cup dried cranberry (60 g)', '⅓ cup shredded parmesan cheese (35 g)']
instructions: ['1: Cut the stems off the 1 lb brussels sprouts, then cut into quarters', '2: Put the 1 lb brussels sprouts into a mixing bowl and add garlic powder, olive oil, salt, and pepper', '3: Lightly grease the baking sheet with oil and spread evenly', '4: Bake for 20-25 minutes at 400°F (200°C)', '5: For the dressing, mix the Greek yogurt, 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar, olive oil, Dijon mustard, minced garlic, salt, and pepper', '6: In a large mixing bowl, add ½ lb mixed greens, shredded carrots, ⅓ cup almond (70 g) sliced almonds, ⅓ cup dried cranberries, shredded parmesan, and the roasted 1 lb brussels sprouts', '7: Pour dressing over the salad and mix well']

ingredients: ['2 cups brown rice (390 g)', '2 cups vegetable broth (475 mL)', '2 carrots diced', '1 tablespoon oil', '½ white onion diced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '½ cup frozen peas (75 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 eggs whisked', 'scallion sliced for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Add the 2 cups brown rice, 2 cups vegetable broth, and diced 2 carrots to your Instant Pot', '2:  Stir until combined', '3: Close the lid until you hear the beep', '4:  Tip: Closing the lid can be tricky', '5:  Have the pressure knob at 11 o’clock and turn right', '6: Turn pressure knob to “Sealing”', '7:  Select Manual and reduce the time to 24 minutes', '8:  It will say “On” in a few seconds', '9:  Note: the Instant Pot will need to warm up for 5-10 minutes', '10:  Steam will be released and a few minutes later, the time will start counting down', '11: Once the time goes off, carefully turn the pressure knob to “Venting”', '12:  Let all of the stream release before opening the lid', '13: Stir the rice, then transfer from the pot into a medium sized bowl and set aside', '14: Select “Saute” on the Instant Pot', '15:   Once it says “Hot”, add the 1 tablespoon oil', '16: When the 1 tablespoon oil is shimmering, add the ½ white onion', '17:  Cook for around 1 minute until slightly opaque', '18: Add the minced 2 cloves garlic, ½ cup frozen peas, salt, and pepper', '19:  Mix until incorporated', '20: Add rice mixture and stir until everything is combined', '21: Make a well in the middle of the rice for the 2 eggs', '22:  Pour the beaten 2 eggs into the well, stirring only the 2 eggs until they are cooked', '23: Mix everything together', '24:  Top with scallions']

ingredients: ['1 cup cranberry sauce (275 g)', '¼ cup orange marmalade (80 g)', '2 teaspoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 teaspoon fresh ginger grated', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '2 teaspoons kosher salt divided', '1 teaspoon black pepper divided', '4 bones in pork chops', '2 tablespoons canola oil', '1 tablespoon fresh parsley chopped for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: In a medium bowl, mix together the 1 cup cranberry sauce, ¼ cup orange marmalade, 2 teaspoons extra virgin olive oil, ginger, red pepper flakes, 1 teaspoon of 2 teaspoons kosher salt, and ½ teaspoon of pepper', '3:  Set aside', '4: Season the 4 bones in pork chops on both sides with the remaining teaspoon of 2 teaspoons kosher salt and ½ teaspoon of pepper', '5: Heat the 2 tablespoons canola oil in a large cast-iron skillet over medium-high heat', '6:  When the oil is shimmering, sear the 4 bones in pork chops in batches until golden brown on both sides, about 2 minutes per side', '7:  Sear the fat side of the 4 bones in pork chops until lightly browned and some of the fat has rendered, about 1 minute more', '8: Turn off the heat then arrange all of the 4 bones in pork chops in the pan', '9:  Spoon the 1 cup cranberry mixture over the chops, spreading in an even layer', '10: Transfer the pan to the oven and bake for 5–7 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 140°F (60°C)', '11:  Let rest for 5 minutes', '12: Transfer the 4 bones in pork chops to plates and garnish with the 1 tablespoon fresh parsley', '13:  Serve with your favorite sides']

ingredients: ['16 oz extra firm tofu (455 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '½ cup low sodium soy sauce (120 mL)', '¼ cup rice wine vinegar (60 mL)', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', '2 cloves garlic minced', '2 tablespoons ginger finely grated', '1 large cucumber', '3 small carrots', 'To Serve', 'brown rice', 'fresh cilantro', 'green onion', 'red cabbage', 'radish sliced', 'fresh mint', 'jalapeño sliced']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '2: Wrap tofu in an absorbent towel', '3:  Set cast-iron skillet or other heavy object on top for 15-20 minutes to remove 16 oz extra moisture', '4: Unwrap tofu and cut into 3 small cubes', '5:  Transfer to a baking sheet and season with a pinch of salt and pepper', '6: Bake for about 20 minutes, or until the tofu is firm to the touch and golden brown', '7: In a medium bowl, add ½ cup low sodium soy sauce, vinegar, 1 teaspoon sesame oil, 2 cloves garlic, and 2 tablespoons ginger', '8:  Stir to combine', '9: Spiralize the cucumber and carrots into a 1 large bowl', '10: Transfer veggies to a bowl and assemble with tofu, brown ¼ cup brown rice, fresh cilantro, green onions, red cabbage, radishes, fresh mint, jalapeños, and sauce']

ingredients: ['Marinade', '1 ⅓ lb boneless skinless chicken breast (600 g)', '½ cup plain yogurt (100 g)', '2 tablespoons ginger garlic paste', '2 tablespoons chili powder', '1 tablespoon garam masala', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 tablespoon turmeric', '1 tablespoon cumin', 'Sauce', '¼ cup butter (50 g)', '1 onion finely chopped', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', '2 tablespoons ginger garlic paste', '6 cardamom pods', '¼ teaspoon ground cloves', '2 tablespoons chili powder', '1 tablespoon coriander', '1 tablespoon garam masala', '1 tablespoon turmeric', '1 ¼ cups cream (300 mL)', 'naan bread for serving', 'cooked rice for serving', 'Chopped fresh parsley for serving']
instructions: ['1: On a cutting board, slice the 1 ⅓ lb boneless skinless chicken into bite size pieces', '2: Combine the 1 ⅓ lb boneless skinless chicken with the ½ cup plain yogurt, ginger garlic paste, chili powder, garam masala, 1 tablespoon salt, turmeric, and 1 tablespoon cumin and mix to coat well', '3: Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 1 hour', '4: Preheat the oven 430˚F (220˚C)', '5: Thread the marinated 1 ⅓ lb boneless skinless chicken pieces onto bamboo skewers, then place them over a baking tray lined with parchment paper, making sure there is space underneath the 1 ⅓ lb boneless skinless chicken to help distribute the heat more evenly', '6: Bake for about 15 minutes, until slightly dark brown on the edges', '7: Melt the ¼ cup butter in a large pot over medium heat, then sauté the 1 onions and 1 tablespoon tomato purée, until tender but not browned', '8: Add the garlic ginger paste, 6 cardamom pods, ¼ teaspoon ground cloves, chili powder, 1 tablespoon coriander, garam masala, and turmeric and fry for about 30 seconds to release their aromatics and flavor, stirring constantly', '9: Pour in the 1 ¼ cups cream and mix well with the 1 onion and spices', '10: When the 1 ¼ cups cream mixture is bubbling, add in the 1 ⅓ lb boneless skinless chicken and cook for another 2-3 minutes', '11: Serve with naan bread and cooked rice and garnish with Chopped fresh parsley']

ingredients: ['¼ cup whole grain mustard (60 g)', '2 tablespoons light brown sugar', '1 orange zested', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon coriander', '1 teaspoon cumin', '4 salmon cut skin-on', 'Special Equipment', '2 cedar planks']
instructions: ['1: Submerge the 2 cedar planks in a 9x13 (22 x 33 cm) glass baking dish filled with water', '2:  Soak for at least 1 hour to prevent burning while grilling', '3: In a small bowl, whisk together the ¼ cup whole grain mustard, 2 tablespoons light brown sugar, 1 orange zest, 2 teaspoons kosher salt, 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, 1 teaspoon coriander, and 1 teaspoon cumin', '4: On a cutting board, pat the 4 salmon fillets with paper towels to remove any excess moisture', '5:  Rub the ¼ cup whole grain mustard mixture evenly over the 4 salmon', '6: Preheat the grill to 350°F (180°C)', '7: Place the 2 cedar planks on the grill over indirect heat, arrange the 4 salmon fillets on top, and close the lid', '8:  Grill for 15-17 minutes, until the 4 salmon is pink in the center and easily flakes with a fork']

ingredients: ['3 sheets puff pastry', '1 ½ cups brie cheese (200 g) rind removed and cubed', '8 slices bacon cooked and diced', '12 tablespoons cranberry sauce', '1 egg beaten for egg wash']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Roll out the puff pastry 3 sheets and cut out 8-centimeter (3-in) circles for the pie base and 7-centimeter (2 ½-in) circles for the top', '3: In a greased muffin tin, place the pie bases in each hole, pressing them up against the sides', '4: Add the 8 slices bacon, 1 ½ cups brie, and 12 tablespoons cranberry sauce, then use the 1 egg wash on the sides of the bases', '5: Attach the pie tops, making sure they are properly sealed, pierce with a fork, and brush more 1 egg wash on the top', '6: Bake for 15-20 minutes or until the pastry is risen and golden brown']

ingredients: ['3 oz chopped pecans finely chopped', '¾ cup refined coconut oil melted', '¾ cup dark brown sugar', '½ cup granulated sugar', '¼ cup unsweetened non-dairy milk of choice', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '3.5 oz dark chocolate chopped', '½ cup semisweet chocolate chunks']
instructions: ['1: Add the pecans to a large, high-walled skillet', '2:  Toast over medium heat for 5–8 minutes, until fragrant and beginning to darken slightly, stirring continuously to prevent burning', '3: Pour in the melted coconut oil and stir to combine', '4:  Bring to a low simmer and steep the pecans for 8–10 minutes, until the coconut oil is tinted brown and there is a strong nutty aroma', '5:  Stir occasionally to prevent burning', '6:  Remove the pan from the heat and let cool for 5–10 minutes, until warm to the touch but cool enough to handle', '7:  Strain out the pecans and reserve for another use', '8:  You should have about ½ cup of infused coconut oil', '9: Add the warm coconut oil to a large microwave-safe bowl, along with the brown and granulated sugars, non-dairy milk, and 1 teaspoon vanilla', '10:  Whisk well to combine', '11:  Microwave for 20 seconds, just until the sugars have begun to dissolve', '12: In a medium bowl, combine the 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour, ½ teaspoon baking soda, and 1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '13:  Mix with a fork to combine', '14: Sift the 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour mixture into the wet ingredients and fold with a spatula to combine, being careful not to over-mix', '15: Fold in the 3 oz 3', '16: 5 oz dark 3', '17: 5 oz dark ½ cup semisweet chocolate chopped 3', '18: 5 oz dark ½ cup semisweet chocolate and 3', '19: 5 oz dark ½ cup semisweet chocolate chunks until evenly distributed', '20: Scoop the dough with a 2-ounce scoop onto 2 parchment-lined ½ teaspoon baking sheets, spacing at least 2 inches apart', '21:  Chill in the refrigerator for 30–60 minutes', '22: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C)', '23: Bake the cookies for 15–18 minutes, until browned', '24:  Let cool for 10 minutes on the pans, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons white miso paste', '2 tablespoons honey', '1 tablespoon rice vinegar', '1 teaspoon garlic minced', '1 teaspoon ginger grated', 'pepper to taste', '3 oz salmon (85 g) 2 fillets', '½ bunch asparagus trimmed', '1 large baby bok choy halved lengthwise', 'olive oil to taste', 'salt to taste', 'brown rice cooked for serving optional', 'sesame seed for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '2: In a small bowl, combine the 2 tablespoons white miso paste, 2 tablespoons honey, rice vinegar, 1 teaspoon garlic, 1 teaspoon ginger, and pepper', '3:  Whisk until smooth', '4: Place the 3 oz salmon fillets skin-side down in the center of the prepared baking sheet and brush generously with the 2 tablespoons white miso-honey sauce', '5: Lay the ½ bunch asparagus on one side of the 3 oz salmon and the 1 large baby bok choy on the other side', '6:  Drizzle the vegetables with olive oil and season with salt and pepper', '7:  Rub the vegetables until evenly coated', '8: Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the 3 oz salmon is cooked to your liking', '9: Divide the vegetables and 3 oz salmon between serving plates, with rice alongside if desired', '10:  Garnish the 3 oz salmon with sesame seeds and serve immediately']

ingredients: ['¾ cup granulated sugar (150 g)', '⅓ cup fresh egg white (80 g) room temperature', '1 pinch salt', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', 'gel food coloring of your choosing', '1 cup buttercream icing (115 g)', '¼ cup raspberry jam (80 g)', 'wooden skewer']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 200°F (95°C)', '2:  Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper', '3: Add the ¾ cup granulated sugar to a baking sheet and bake for 7 minutes', '4:  The edges may begin to caramelize – this is good! Remove the ¾ cup granulated sugar from the oven and leave the oven on', '5: In a large clean, dry bowl, whip the ⅓ cup fresh egg whites with an electric hand mixer on low speed until foamy, then add the 1 pinch salt', '6:  Continue whipping on high speed until medium peaks form', '7: Add the toasted ¾ cup granulated sugar to the ⅓ cup fresh egg whites 1 tablespoon at a time, increasing the mixer speed gradually as you add more ¾ cup granulated sugar', '8:  Once all of the ¾ cup granulated sugar is incorporated, continue whipping for 5-7 minutes, until the meringue is very thick and shiny', '9: Add in ½ teaspoon vanilla, just whipping until incorporated', '10: Prop open a piping bag or zip-top bag in a tall drinking glass', '11:  Using wooden skewers, lightly paint 2 thin stripes of different-colored gel food coloring on opposite sides of the bag', '12:  Paint additional bags with more colors, if desired', '13: Fill each bag with the meringue batter, dividing evenly amongst different colors, if using', '14: Pipe 1-inch (2-cm) wide “kisses” of meringue onto a baking sheet about ½ inch (1 cm) apart', '15: Bake for about 1 hour, or until you can easily lift a kiss off of the paper', '16: Cool the meringues on the baking sheet at room temperature until no longer warm', '17: To fill, pipe 1 cup buttercream icing around the edge of a cookie and place a small dollop of ¼ cup raspberry jam in the center', '18:  Sandwich with another cookie']

ingredients: ['Filling', '¾ cup granulated sugar (150 g)', '⅓ cup all purpose flour (40 g)', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 lemon juiced', 'lemon zested', '1 vanilla bean split lengthwise and seeds scraped', '4 cups blueberry (400 g)', '4 cups peach (900 g) sliced', 'Topping', '1 cup all purpose flour (125 g)', '1 cup quick-cook oats (100 g)', '⅓ cup granulated sugar (65 g)', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon cinnamon', '½ teaspoon nutmeg', '2 sticks unsalted butter cubed and chilled', 'vanilla ice cream or whipped cream for serving']
instructions: ['1: Make the filling: In a large bowl, whisk together the sugar, flour, salt, lemon juice and zest, and the vanilla bean seeds', '2: Add the blueberries and peaches and use a spatula to toss until well coated', '3: Transfer the filling to a 10-inch (25 cm) cast-iron skillet', '4:  Refrigerate until ready to top', '5: Make the topping: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, 1 cup quick-cook oats, sugar, salt, ½ teaspoon cinnamon, and ½ teaspoon nutmeg', '6: Add the 2 sticks unsalted butter and quickly work into the dry ingredients until the 2 sticks unsalted butter is broken down into pea-sized pieces', '7: Sprinkle the topping in an even layer over the filling', '8: Preheat the grill to 350°F (180°C)', '9: Place the cast-iron skillet on the grill and shut the lid', '10:  Grill the crumble for about 1½ hours, until the topping is golden brown and the fruit it bubbling', '11:  Check after about 1 hour to make sure it is not overcooking', '12:  Let cool for 30 minutes before serving', '13: Serve the crumble with ice cream']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '1 tablespoon garlic minced', '4 cups heavy cream (960 mL)', '2 cups grated parmesan cheese (220 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '½ teaspoon nutmeg grated', '30 oz spinach ricotta ravioli (850 g) 3 packages uncooked', '2 cups rotisserie chicken (250 g) shredded divided', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese (230 g) divided', '2 tablespoons fresh parsley chopped']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2: In a large sauté pan, melt the 2 tablespoons unsalted butter over medium heat', '3:  Add the 1 tablespoon garlic and sauté for 2-3 minutes, until softened', '4: Add the 4 cups heavy cream and Parmesan and stir to incorporate', '5:  Once the mixture comes to a low boil, reduce the heat to low and simmer for 10-15 minutes, until the sauce coats the back of a spoon', '6:  Season with salt, pepper, and ½ teaspoon nutmeg', '7:  Remove the sauce from the heat', '8: Pour a thin layer of sauce in a the bottom of a 9x13-inch (23x33 cm) glass baking dish', '9:  Arrange 1 package of 30 oz spinach ricotta ravioli over the sauce', '10:  Top with 1 cup of 2 cups rotisserie chicken (250 g) 2 cups shredded 2 cups rotisserie chicken and ½ cup (50 g) of mozzarella cheese', '11:  Cover with more sauce', '12: Arrange another package of ravioli over the first layer, and top with the remaining cup of 2 cups rotisserie chicken (250 g) 2 cups shredded 2 cups rotisserie chicken and another ½ cup (50 g) of mozzarella', '13:  Top with more sauce', '14:  Add the last package of ravioli and cover with remaining sauce, making sure all the ravioli are covered', '15:  Top with the remaining cup of 2 cups rotisserie chicken (250 g) 2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '16: Cover the ravioli lasagna with foil and bake for 20 minutes', '17:  Uncover and cook for another 20 minutes, until the cheese is golden brown', '18:  Let cool for 10 minutes', '19: Sprinkle with chopped 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, then serve']

ingredients: ['3 tablespoons powdered sugar sifted', '½ cup creamy peanut butter (120 g)', '1 cup chocolate (170 g) melted']
instructions: ['1: Prepare a cupcake tin with 6 liners', '2: Stir ½ cup creamy peanut butter and powdered sugar together until smooth', '3: Spread 1 to 2 3 tablespoons of 1 cup chocolate in the bottom of each cupcake liner', '4: Dollop 1 to 2 teaspoons of the ½ cup creamy peanut butter mixture on top of the 1 cup chocolate', '5: Cover each dollop of ½ cup creamy peanut butter with more 1 cup chocolate and smooth out the top', '6: Refrigerate for 1 hour or until 1 cup chocolate has hardened', '7: Remove ½ cup creamy peanut butter cups from the liners']

ingredients: ['Sauce', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 tablespoons flour', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '1 ¾ cups chicken stock', '1 tablespoon chili powder', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'Nachos', '2 cups shredded chicken (300 g)', 'tortilla chip', '2 cups shredded mexican cheese blend (200 g)', 'Garnishes', '½ cup sour cream (115 g)', '1 tomato diced', 'fresh cilantro optional', 'queso fresco optional']
instructions: ['1: Heat a small saucepan over medium heat and add the 2 tablespoons vegetable oil and 2 tablespoons flour', '2:  Whisk together and cook gently until it resembles wet sand, about 1 minute', '3: Add the tomato paste and whisk', '4:  Add 1 ¾ 1 ¾ 2 2 ½ cups 2 2 2 ½ cups shredded chicken stock, 1 tablespoon chili powder, 1 teaspoon cumin, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, ½ teaspoon dried oregano, salt and pepper', '5:  Stir', '6: Bring up to a simmer and cook about 5 minutes until sauce thickens', '7:  Remove from heat and set aside', '8:  Reserve ½ 1 ¾ 2 2 ½ cup (120 ml)', '9: Toss the shredded 1 ¾ 1 ¾ 2 2 ½ cups 2 2 2 ½ cups shredded chicken with about ½ 1 ¾ 2 2 ½ cup (120 ml) of the reserved sauce', '10: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '11: Place a layer of tortilla chips in a skillet or bake dish', '12:  Add a layer of cheese and half the 1 ¾ 1 ¾ 2 2 ½ cups 2 2 2 ½ cups shredded chicken mixture', '13:  Drizzle some enchilada sauce over the top', '14: Add a second layer of tortilla chips followed by another layer of cheese and the remaining 1 ¾ 1 ¾ 2 2 ½ cups 2 2 2 ½ cups shredded chicken', '15:  Drizzle with sauce', '16: Bake for 8-10 minutes until cheese is melted', '17: Top with sour cream, diced tomato, fresh cilantro, and crumbled queso fresco', '18:  Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 lb lean ground turkey (455 g)', 'salt to taste', 'Tasty Hearty Spice Blend one pouch', '½ medium white onion', '8 corn tortillas', '1 cup salsa (245 g)', '1 cup crumbled cotija cheese (115 g)', '1 lime sliced into wedges']
instructions: ['1: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over ½ medium heat', '2:  When the oil is shimmering, add the onion and cook until starting to soften and caramelize, about 10 minutes', '3: Increase the heat to ½ medium-high and add the 1 lb lean ground turkey', '4:  Season with the salt and hearty spice blend', '5:  Cook, stirring occasionally, allowing the turkey to brown slightly', '6:  Once the turkey is cooked through, about 8 minutes, remove the pan from the heat', '7: Heat the 8 corn tortillas in a clean skillet over ½ medium heat or directly over a ½ medium-low flame on a gas stove', '8:  Wrap the hot 8 corn tortillas in a clean kitchen towel to keep warm as you heat the remaining 8 corn tortillas', '9: Assemble the tacos: Fill the hot 8 corn tortillas with the turkey filling and garnish with 1 1 tablespoon 1 cup salsa and 1 1 tablespoon 1 cup crumbled cotija cheese', '10:  Serve with 1 lime wedges on the side']

ingredients: ['17 oz pork belly (500 g)', 'Marinade', '2 tablespoons crushed garlic', '1 tablespoon honey', '1 tablespoon cooking wine', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon oyster sauce', '1 teaspoon five spice', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '2 pieces preserved tofu optional available in local Asian supermarkets', 'Preparation', '17 oz pork belly (500 g)', 'Marinade', '2 tablespoons crushed garlic', '1 tablespoon honey', '1 tablespoon cooking wine', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon oyster sauce', '1 teaspoon five spice', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '2 pieces preserved tofu optional available in local Asian supermarkets', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Place the pork in a bowl along with all the marinade ingredients', '2:  Combine and leave to marinade for 6-8 hours', '3: Preheat the oven to 190°C (375°F)', '4: Place the pork belly on a grill tray', '5: Roast the pork belly in the oven for 20 minutes, turning halfway through', '6: Nutrition  Calories: 1599 Fat: 136 grams  Carbs: 54 grams Fiber: 2 grams  Sugars: 47 grams  Protein: 42 grams']

ingredients: ['6 oz skinless salmon fillet (170 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'olive oil as needed', '1 lemon sliced', 'fresh thyme to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2: Cover a sheet pan with foil or parchment paper', '3: Drizzle olive oil on the 6 oz skinless salmon, then season with salt and pepper', '4:  Top with 1 lemon slices and fresh thyme', '5: Bake for 10-12 minutes', '6:  (The 6 oz skinless salmon should flake easily with a fork when it’s ready']

ingredients: ['Chicken Wings', '1 ½ lb chicken wings (680 g)', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '¼ teaspoon salt', 'Garlic Herb Sauce', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 tablespoon garlic minced', '2 tablespoons dried italian herb blend', '1 tablespoon fresh parsley chopped']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 250˚F (130˚C)', '2: Place 1 ½ lb chicken wings in a large bowl and pat dry', '3: Add the 2 teaspoons baking powder and ¼ teaspoon salt to the 1 ½ lb chicken wings', '4:  Stir to coat', '5: Spray a 2 teaspoons baking rack with nonstick cooking spray and place on top of a foiled sheet pan', '6:  Distribute 1 ½ lb chicken wings evenly on top, making sure none of them touch and they are all face-up', '7: Bake for 35 minutes, then increase the temperature to 425˚F (220˚C) and bake for an additional 45 minutes, or until 1 ½ lb chicken wings are crisp and golden', '8:  (Do not remove the 1 ½ lb chicken wings from the oven when increasing temperature', '9: )For sauce, in a hot pan, melt 1 tablespoon butter', '10:  Add 1 tablespoon garlic and stir', '11:  Cook for 30 seconds, being careful not to burn the 1 tablespoon garlic', '12: Stir in Italian herb blend and ¼ teaspoon salt', '13:  Cook for an additional 20 seconds', '14: Add in 1 tablespoon fresh parsley and 1 ½ lb chicken wings', '15:  Stir to coat']

ingredients: ['1 butternut squash', '2 tablespoons olive oil divided', '½ onion diced', '2 cloves garlic', '¾ cup chickpeas (150 g)', '1 teaspoon fresh thyme', '1 teaspoon dried sage', '1 teaspoon salt', 'pepper to taste ', '½ cup quinoa (85 g) uncooked', '1 ½ cups vegetable broth (355 mL)', '2 cups kale (135 g)', '¼ cup pumpkin seeds (30 g)', '¼ cup dried cranberries (30 g)', 'Special Equipment', 'cooking twine']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Cut 1 butternut squash in half lengthwise and scoop out seeds', '3: Drizzle halves with 1-2 2 tablespoons olive oil and sprinkle with 1 teaspoon salt and pepper, to taste', '4: Bake squash for 45-50 minutes until soft enough to scoop, but not completely cooked', '5:  Set aside to let cool', '6: In pot or sauté pan over medium heat, add one tablespoon olive oil', '7:  Then add ½ onion and sauté until translucent', '8:  Add 2 cloves garlic and cook for 3 more minutes', '9: Add ¾ cup chickpeas, 1 teaspoon fresh thyme, sage, 1 teaspoon salt, and pepper', '10:  Then sauté until ¾ cup chickpeas are golden and spices are fragrant', '11: Add ½ cup quinoa to pan, stirring constantly, toast ½ cup quinoa for 2-3 minutes', '12: Add 1 ½ cups vegetable broth and bring to a boil', '13:  Then cover and reduce heat to a simmer', '14:  Let simmer for 15-20 minutes', '15: After 15-20 minutes, uncover and stir in 2 cups kale', '16:  Then cover and let simmer for five more minutes or until 2 cups kale is wilted', '17: Stir in ¼ cup pumpkin seeds and dried cranberries and sauté for 3-5 more minutes', '18:  Remove pan from heat and set aside', '19: Scoop out insides of squash leaving a 1-inch (2 cm) border around the edge', '20:  Then scoop ½ cup quinoa mixture into squash halves until full', '21: Carefully flip one squash half on top of the other', '22: Using 5 pieces of cooking twine, carefully tie the two squash halves together into 6 equally spaced sections', '23: Return stuffed squash to oven for 5-10 more minutes', '24: Remove from oven and let rest 10 minutes', '25:  To serve, Cut thick slices using twine to hold squash halves together']

ingredients: ['3 ½ cups bread flour (420 g)', '1 package instant yeast', '1 tablespoon salt plus 1 tsp', '2 tablespoons white sugar', '1 ½ cups warm water (360 mL)', '6 qt water (5.6 L)', '1 ½ tablespoons barley malt syrup', '1 egg beaten', 'Optional Toppings', 'poppy seed', 'sesame seed']
instructions: ['1: In a food processor, add the 3 ½ cups bread flour, 1 package instant yeast, 1 tablespoon salt, and 2 tablespoons white sugar', '2:  Pulse until incorporated', '3: While running, slowly add the 1 ½ cups warm 1 ½ cups warm 6 qt water until the dough balls up', '4:  You may not need all the 1 ½ cups warm 1 ½ cups warm 6 qt water', '5: Carefully push the dough back into the blade’s path and continue to process for an additional 30 seconds or until the dough is firm and stretchy, but not sticky nor squishy', '6: Gently round the dough into a ball and place in a lightly oiled bowl', '7:  Cover with a damp, 1 ½ cups warm towel for an hour or until the dough has doubled in size', '8: Add the 1 ½ tablespoons barley malt syrup to about 6 quarts of 1 ½ cups warm 6 qt water and bring to a boil', '9: Place a tray with about 2 quarts of 1 ½ cups warm 6 qt water on the bottom shelf of the oven', '10:  Preheat to 425°F (220°C)', '11: Place the dough onto a lightly 3 ½ cups bread floured surface and divide into 6 equal pieces (roughly 5 ounces (140 g) a piece if you use a scale)', '12:  Cover the pieces with a damp towel', '13: One at a time, form the dough into a ball, pinching the seams together at the bottom', '14:  Place the dough seam side down and–cupping your hand over the dough–apply gentle pressure, working the ball in circles until the seams on the bottom are smoothed out', '15:  Gently reshape the edges of the ball into a circle', '16: Using your thumb, press down into the center of the ball to the counter', '17:  Working in a circle, carefully stretch the dough into a ring until the hole at the center is about 2 inches (5 cm) in diameter', '18: Place the dough rings under a damp towel and let rise for 10 minutes', '19: Working in batches of two, place the bagels in the boiling 1 ½ cups warm 6 qt water/syrup', '20:  They should float at the surface', '21:  Let them boil for 30 seconds, then flip and boil for an additional 30 seconds', '22: Remove the bagels from the 1 ½ cups warm 6 qt water/syrup and gently pat dry with a clean towel', '23: Brush the tops with the beaten 1 egg', '24:  Optionally, if you want toppings, dip the 1 egg-washed side of the bagel into the mixture of your choice', '25: Place the bagels on a parchment paper-covered baking sheet', '26:  Bake until golden brown, about 15 to 20 minutes', '27: Transfer to a wire rack to cool']

ingredients: ['Slaw', '2 cups brussel sprout (200 g) grated about 12', '2 cups carrot (240 g) grated about 3 medium', '1 medium beet peeled and grated', '1 cup radish (115 g) sliced', '½ large red onion', '½ medium head cauliflower cut into small floret', '1 large fuji apple thinly sliced', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ cup pistachio (60 g)', 'Tahini Poppy Seed Dressing', '6 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '⅓ cup tahini (75 g)', '¼ cup maple syrup (85 g)', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '3 medium cloves garlic', '⅓ cup extra virgin olive oil (80 mL)', '1 tablespoon water', '2 tablespoons poppy seeds']
instructions: ['1: Prepare the Brussels sprouts, carrots, and beets using the grating insert or a box grater', '2:  Add to a 3-quart (2', '3: 8-liter) mixing bowl', '4: Thinly slice the radishes with the slicing insert or a sharp knife and add to the bowl with the rest of the vegetables', '5: Thinly slice the ½ large red onion and add to the bowl with the cauliflower and apple', '6:  Season with 1 teaspoon salt and toss to combine', '7: Roughly chop the pistachios', '8:  In a small sauté pan over medium heat, toast the pistachios until they are lightly browned and smell nutty, 3-5 minutes', '9: Make the dressing: In a blender, combine the apple cider vinegar, ⅓ cup tahini, ¼ cup maple syrup, ½ teaspoon cayenne, and garlic', '10:  Blend until smooth', '11:  With the blender running, drizzle in the ⅓ cup extra virgin olive oil to emulsify', '12:  Add 1 tablespoon water as needed to thin the dressing to your desired consistency', '13:  Add the 2 tablespoons poppy seeds and pulse to incorporate', '14: Toss the slaw with the dressing', '15:  Top with the toasted pistachios', '16: Serve immediately or cover with the lid and take to go', '17:  The slaw will keep for 2 hours at room temperature, or in the refrigerator for 1 day with the dressing or 3 days without', '18: Enjoy!Nutrition Information, per serving: Calories: 241, Fiber: 5 grams, Total fat: 17 grams, Total protein: 6 grams, Sugars: 11 grams, Carbs: 20 grams']

ingredients: ['3 bananas', '¾ cup peanut butter (180 g)', '1 tablespoon vanilla']
instructions: ['1: Slice up your 3 bananas into 1-inch (2 cm) slices', '2: Spread on parchment paper on a baking sheet and freeze slices for 2 hours', '3: Blend frozen slices in a powerful blender until it reaches a smooth consistency', '4: Mix in remaining ingredients', '5: Transfer to a small bowl or container and freeze for one hour, or until ready to serve', '6: Scoop out ice cream']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ lb skirt steak (225 g) sliced into thin strips', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '¼ cup onion (40 g) julienned', '¼ cup green bell pepper (25 g) julienned', '2 large flour tortillas', '4 slices provolone cheese double for 2 quesadillas', 'Garnish', 'fresh parsley', '1 cup cheese sauce (240 g)']
instructions: ['1: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a 2 large skillet and add the strips of ½ lb skirt steak', '2:  Season with salt & ¼ cup green ¼ cup green bell pepper and cook 5-7 minutes', '3:  Remove from the pan', '4: Add ¼ cup onion and ¼ cup green bell ¼ cup green ¼ cup green bell peppers to the pan and cook until slightly soft', '5:  Remove from skillet', '6: Place the tortilla in the pan and add a layer of cheese on half of the tortilla followed by the steak, ¼ cup green ¼ cup green bell peppers and ¼ cup onions', '7:  Top with more cheese and fold in half', '8: Cook for 6 minutes over medium heat, flipping half way', '9: Serve with cheese sauce and garnish fresh parsley']

ingredients: ['1 lb chicken wings (455 g)', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', 'Teriyaki Sauce', '⅓ cup low sodium soy sauce (70 mL)', '2 tablespoons honey', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '1 tablespoon sesame seed']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400˚F/200˚C', '2: Remove excess moisture from 1 lb chicken wings with a paper towel', '3: In a large bowl, stir in 2 teaspoons baking powder and 1 teaspoon salt until 1 lb chicken is thoroughly coated', '4: Bake on a 2 teaspoons baking rack for 1 hour, or until golden 2 tablespoons brown and crispy, flipping every 20 minutes', '5:  (For best results, place 2 teaspoons baking rack on a 2 teaspoons baking sheet covered with parchment paper or foil to catch drippings)', '6: In a skillet, combine ⅓ cup low sodium soy sauce, 2 tablespoons honey, and 2 tablespoons brown sugar on medium heat', '7:  Bring to a boil and add in 1 tablespoon sesame seeds', '8: Once sauce is thickened, stir in 1 lb chicken wings until fully coated', '9: Serve with your favorite side dish or dipping sauce']

ingredients: ['1 shallot', '2 cloves garlic', '5 leaves fresh basil leaf large', '¼ bunch fresh parsley', '1 pt cherry tomato', '1 teaspoon chili flake', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 lemon', '¼ cup extra virgin olive oil (60 mL) plus more for cooking', '6 oz salmon (170 g) skin off 2 fillets', '1 yellow squash', '1 zucchini', '2 carrots', '2 watermelon radishes']
instructions: ['1: Finely dice the 1 shallot and add it to a medium bowl', '2: Mince the 2 cloves garlic and add it to the bowl with the 1 shallot', '3: Chiffonade the 5 leaves fresh basil, chop the ¼ bunch fresh parsley, and add to the bowl', '4: Quarter the 1 pt cherry tomatoes and add them to the bowl with the herbs, along with the 1 teaspoon chili flakes, a pinch of salt and pepper, the juice of one 1 lemon, and the ¼ cup extra virgin olive oil', '5:  Stir to combine', '6: Heat a bit of oil in a medium skillet over medium heat', '7: Season the 6 oz salmon fillets with salt and pepper', '8:  When the oil is shimmering, sear the 6 oz salmon on one side until golden brown', '9:  Flip and cook until the other side is golden brown and the fish is cooked through', '10:  Remove the 6 oz salmon from the heat and wipe out the skillet', '11: Cut the 1 yellow squash, 1 zucchini, 2 carrots, and 2 watermelon radishes in half, if needed, then spiralize', '12: Heat a bit of oil in the pan over medium heat until simmering', '13: Add the vegetable noodles to the pan and season with salt and pepper', '14:  Saute until tender, about 2 minutes', '15: Divide the vegetable noodles between two plates', '16: Place a piece of 6 oz salmon on each bed of noodles, then top with tomato sauce']

ingredients: ['1 zucchini small cut into strips', '1 green bell pepper cut into strips', 'yellow bell pepper cut into strips', 'portobello mushroom caps cut into strips', '½ cup grape tomatoes (100 g) halved', '½ cup corn (85 g) thawed if using frozen', '1 medium yellow onion cut into wedges', '15 oz black beans (425 g) 1 can rinsed and drained', '3 cloves garlic minced plus 3 cloves halved', '1 ½ teaspoons cumin', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 ½ teaspoons smoked paprika', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper', 'salt to taste', '4 tablespoons olive oil divided', '3 red bell peppers halved and seeded', '1 avocado diced', '3 tablespoons lemon juice', 'pepper to taste', '¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '3 tablespoons fresh cilantro chopped', 'corn tortilla', '1 jalapeño sliced (optional)', 'lime cut into wedges for ganish']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200˚C)', '2: Place the 1 zucchini, 1 green and 1 1 medium yellow bell 1 green bell 1 1 medium yellow bell ¼ teaspoon cayenne 3 red bell ¼ teaspoon red peppers, mushrooms, ½ cup grape tomatoes, corn, 1 medium yellow 1 teaspoon onion, 15 oz black beans, and the minced 3 cloves 1 teaspoon garlic 3 cloves on a baking sheet', '3: In a small bowl, combine the 1 ½ teaspoons cumin, ½ teaspoon dried oregano, 3 cloves 1 teaspoon garlic powder, 1 ½ teaspoons smoked paprika, 1 medium yellow 1 teaspoon onion powder, 1 teaspoon chili powder, and ¼ teaspoon cayenne powder', '4: Sprinkle the seasoning mix over the vegetables', '5: Add salt and 2 tablespoons of olive oil and toss with your hands until the vegetables are well-coated', '6: Place the red bell 1 green bell 1 1 medium yellow bell ¼ teaspoon cayenne 3 red bell ¼ teaspoon red pepper halves, 1 zucchini small 1 green bell 1 green bell 1 1 medium yellow bell ¼ teaspoon cayenne 3 red bell ¼ teaspoon red pepper 1 1 medium yellow bell 1 1 medium yellow bell ¼ teaspoon cayenne 3 red bell ¼ teaspoon red pepper portobello mushroom caps 1 1 medium yellow 1 medium yellow 1 teaspoon onion lime cut side down, on a second baking sheet', '7: Bake the seasoned vegetables for 35 minutes, stirring halfway through, until tender', '8:  Bake the red bell 1 green bell 1 1 medium yellow bell ¼ teaspoon cayenne 3 red bell ¼ teaspoon red peppers for 25 minutes, until soft', '9: Transfer the roasted red bell 1 green bell 1 1 medium yellow bell ¼ teaspoon cayenne 3 red bell ¼ teaspoon red peppers to a 1 medium bowl and cover it with a plate to let them sweat for about 10 minutes, until the peels are easily removed from the flesh', '10: Peel the red bell 1 green bell 1 1 medium yellow bell ¼ teaspoon cayenne 3 red bell ¼ teaspoon red peppers', '11: Transfer the flesh from the red bell 1 green bell 1 1 medium yellow bell ¼ teaspoon cayenne 3 red bell ¼ teaspoon red peppers into a blender or food processor', '12: Add the 1 avocado, halved 3 cloves 1 teaspoon garlic 3 cloves, remaining 2 tablespoons of olive oil, lemon juice, a pinch of salt and 1 green bell 1 1 medium yellow bell ¼ teaspoon cayenne 3 red bell ¼ teaspoon red pepper, and the red 1 green bell 1 1 medium yellow bell ¼ teaspoon cayenne 3 red bell ¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '13:  Blend until smooth', '14: Remove the roasted vegetables from the oven and sprinkle with cilantro, if using', '15: Serve the roasted vegetables on corn tortillas with the sauce and sliced 1 jalapeño, and lime wedges alongside']

ingredients: ['nonstick cooking spray for greasing', '1 ½ cups all purpose flour (185 g)', '⅔ cup cake flour (85 g)', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '¾ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 ½ sticks unsalted butter room temperature', '1 ¼ cups granulated sugar (225 g)', '3 large eggs', '1 ½ teaspoons vanilla extract', '7 ½ oz buttermilk (225 mL)', '½ cup rainbow sprinkles (60 g)', 'Buttercream Frosting', '2 ¼ cups unsalted butter (515 g) room temperature', '3 ¼ cups powdered sugar (355 g)', '3 tablespoons heavy cream', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '¼ teaspoon kosher salt', 'For Decorating (Optional)', 'food coloring', 'rainbow sprinkle', 'edible flower']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2:  Grease a 13 x 18-inch (33 x 45 cm) rimmed baking sheet with nonstick spray and line with parchment paper', '3: In a medium bowl, whisk together the all-purpose flour, ⅔ cup cake flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt until combined', '4: Add the butter and 1 ¼ cups granulated sugar to a 3 large bowl and cream with an electric hand mixer on medium-high speed until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes', '5:  Reduce the mixer speed to medium and beat in the eggs, 1 at a time, scraping down the sides of the bowl as needed', '6:  Add the vanilla and beat until incorporated', '7: Add a third of the dry ingredients, followed by half of the 7 ½ oz buttermilk, another third of the dry ingredients, remaining 7 ½ oz buttermilk, and remaining dry ingredients, beating well after each addition', '8:  Fold in the rainbow sprinkles', '9: Pour the batter onto the prepared baking sheet and use an offset spatula to spread evenly', '10: Bake until the ⅔ cup cake is light golden on top and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, 18–22 minutes', '11:  Set the baking sheet on a wire rack and let the ⅔ cup cake cool completely before frosting', '12: While the ⅔ cup cake is cooling, make the buttercream frosting: In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment (or in a 3 large bowl with an electric hand mixer), beat the butter on medium-high speed until creamy, about 2 minutes', '13:  Add the 3 ¼ cups powdered sugar and beat on low speed for 30 seconds to incorporate', '14:  Increase the mixer speed to medium-high and beat for 3 minutes, stopping as necessary to scrape down the sides of the bowl, until fluffy', '15:  Add the 3 tablespoons heavy cream, vanilla, and salt and beat on medium speed for another 2 minutes, or until the buttercream is no longer grainy', '16:  If desired, continue mixing for another 1–2 minutes for a fluffier consistency', '17: Assemble the ⅔ cup cake: Use the parchment to lift the ⅔ cup cake from the pan onto a flat surface', '18:  Using a sharp knife, cut the ⅔ cup cake in half crosswise', '19:  Spread about half of the buttercream across one half of the ⅔ cup cake', '20:  Place the other ⅔ cup cake half on top of the buttercream, top down, and gently press down to adhere', '21:  Peel off the parchment lining', '22:  Spread the remaining buttercream evenly over the top layer of ⅔ cup cake, reserving some buttercream for food coloring, if desired', '23:  Decorate with colored buttercream, more sprinkles, or edible flowers as desired', '24: Chill the ⅔ cup cake in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes, or until the buttercream is firm', '25:  Using a very sharp knife, trim the edges of the sheet ⅔ cup cake for clean lines', '26:  Slice crosswise into 8 strips, then slice in half vertically for 16 bars, running the knife under warm water and drying between cuts if desired for cleaner lines', '27: Store the ⅔ cup cake bars in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 1 week, or in the freezer for up to 3 weeks']

ingredients: ['1 head cauliflower cut into florets', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon smoked paprika', 'fine sea salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons hot sauce', '2 tablespoons siracha', '1 tablespoon butter melted', '1 lime juiced', '8 cups tortilla chips (800 g)', '1 cup monterey jack cheese (100 g) grated', '1 cup cheddar cheese (100 g) grated', '1 avocado chopped', '3 radishes thinly sliced', '2 celery stems thinly sliced', 'sour cream to serve', 'fresh cilantro chopped to serve']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200˚C)', '2: On a large baking sheet, toss together the 1 head cauliflower florets, 3 tablespoons olive oil, 1 tablespoon smoked paprika, fine sea salt, and freshly ground black pepper', '3:  Roast until tender, 20-25 minutes', '4: In a large bowl, whisk together the 2 tablespoons hot sauce, sriracha, melted 1 tablespoon butter, and 1 lime juice', '5: Add the roasted 1 head cauliflower to the bowl and mix to coat', '6: Scatter the 8 cups tortilla chips over the baking sheet', '7:  Top with the 1 head cauliflower, Monterey Jack cheese, and 1 cup cheddar cheese', '8: Return the baking sheet to the oven and bake until cheese is melted and bubbling, about 5 minutes', '9: Top with 1 avocado, 3 radishes, 2 celery, sour cream, and fresh cilantro', '10:  Serve warm']

ingredients: ['3 cups bread flour (375 g)', '1 teaspoon sugar', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', '2 teaspoons instant yeast', '2 tablespoons olive oil plus more to taste', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '1 can crushed tomato', '1 ball mozzarella cheese torn', '8 fresh basil leaves', 'flaky sea salt to taste']
instructions: ['1: In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the dough hook, combine the 3 cups bread flour, 1 teaspoon sugar, 2 teaspoons kosher flaky sea salt, 2 teaspoons instant yeast', '2:  Start mixing on low speed', '3:  Stream in the 2 tablespoons olive oil and 1 cup water and mix for 2 minutes, until the 3 cups bread flour is incorporated', '4: Increase speed to medium, and mix for 6–8 minutes more, until the dough is smooth and elastic', '5: Lightly grease a large bowl with 2 tablespoons olive oil', '6:  Transfer the dough to the bowl, cover with a kitchen towel, and let rest for 1½ hours', '7: Turn the risen dough onto a clean surface and shape into a 1 ball, pulling the edges round and tight across the surface of the dough 1 ball', '8:  Return to the bowl, cover, and let rest for another 30 minutes', '9: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C)', '10: Drizzle the surface with oil and turn out the dough', '11:  Divide the dough into 2 equal portions', '12:  Liberally grease a baking sheet with 2 tablespoons olive oil', '13:  Place a portion of dough on the pan and stretch to fit the baking sheet', '14:  Repeat with the remaining portion of dough, or reserve for a later use', '15: Top the dough with the 1 can crushed tomatoes and mozzarella', '16: Bake the pizza for 15–20 minutes, until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly', '17: Top the pizza with flaky 2 teaspoons kosher flaky sea salt and 8 fresh basil', '18: Use scissors to cut, then serve']

ingredients: ['4 tablespoons olive oil divided', '1 yellow onion diced', '3 bell peppers seeded and chopped', '6 cloves garlic minced divided', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 lb eggplant (455 g) cut into ½-inch (1 cm) cubes', '2 yellow squashes cut into ½-inch (1 cm) cubes', '2 medium zucchinis cut into ½-inch (1 cm) cubes', '12 oz tomato paste (340 g)', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '2 tablespoons fresh thyme', '28 oz diced tomato (795 g)', '30 oz ricotta cheese (850 g)', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese (100 g)', '¼ cup fresh basil (10 g) chopped', '½ cup fresh parsley (20 g) chopped', '1 egg', '2 japanese eggplants thinly sliced', '2 zucchinis thinly sliced', '2 yellow squashes thinly sliced', '6 roma tomatoes thinly sliced', 'lasagna noodle cooked']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Add 2 4 1 2 tablespoons of olive oil to a skillet on 2 medium-high heat', '3:  Once warmed, add the onion, 3 bell 3 bell peppers, 4 minced garlic 6 cloves, salt, and 3 bell pepper', '4:  Cook, stirring occasionally, until golden brown and caramelized', '5: Add the 1 lb 1 lb 1 2 2 japanese 2 2 japanese eggplant, yellow squash, zucchini, 12 oz 28 oz 28 oz diced 6 6 roma tomato paste, dried oregano, and 1 4 1 2 tablespoon of thyme, and more salt and 3 bell pepper', '6:  Cook until the vegetables are soft and the 12 oz 28 oz 28 oz diced 6 6 roma tomato paste deepens in color and starts to stick to the bottom', '7: Add the 1 yellow onion 28 oz diced 12 oz 28 oz 28 oz diced 6 6 roma tomatoes and bring the mixture to a simmer', '8:  Cook on low for at least 30 minutes', '9:  Set aside to prepare the rest of the lasagna layers', '10: In a large bowl, mix together the ricotta, 1 cup shredded mozzarella, ¼ cup fresh basil, ½ cup fresh parsley, salt, 3 bell pepper and 1 lb 1 2 2 japanese egg', '11:  Set aside', '12: To a bowl, add the 2 japanese eggplants thinly 2 zucchinis thinly 2 yellow squashes thinly 6 6 roma tomatoes thinly sliced Japanese 1 lb 1 lb 1 2 2 japanese 2 2 japanese eggplant, yellow squash, zucchini, Roma 12 oz 28 oz 28 oz diced 6 6 roma tomatoes, garlic, 1 4 1 2 tablespoon thyme, salt, 3 bell pepper, and 2 4 1 2 tablespoons olive oil, and gently toss to combine', '13: In a 9x13-inch (23x33 cm) glass baking pan, add a layer of the ratatouille to the bottom', '14:  Top with lasagna noodles, and spread a layer of the ricotta mixture, then shingle alternating slices of the marinated vegetables', '15:  Repeat with another layer of ratatouille, noodles, ricotta, and on the top shingle the vegetables', '16: Bake for 30 minutes, or until the cheese and sauce are bubbling slightly and the 2 japanese eggplants thinly 2 zucchinis thinly 2 yellow squashes thinly 6 6 roma tomatoes thinly sliced vegetables on top have browned to your liking', '17: Slice and serve']

ingredients: ['2 lb ground beef (910 g)', '2 eggs', '1 cup breadcrumb (115 g)', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '2 teaspoons garlic powder', '4 slices ham', '8 slices cheddar cheese', '2 cups spinach (80 g)', '10 slices bacon']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: In a large bowl, mix the 2 lb ground beef, 2 eggs, bread crumbs, 2 teaspoons salt, 1 teaspoon pepper, and 2 teaspoons garlic powder', '3:  Mix until well combined', '4: Put the mixture in a medium baking tray lined with aluminum foil and distribute the meat mixture evenly', '5: Add the ham, cheese, and 2 cups spinach on top of the meat', '6: Carefully lift the meat and form a roll', '7: In another aluminum-lined baking tray, place the slices of bacon side by side, one next to the other', '8:  Place the meat roll on top of the bacon', '9: Roll up the meat with the bacon, then wrap with foil', '10: Bake the aluminum-wrapped roll for 25 minutes', '11: Increase the temperature to 500˚F (260˚C)', '12:  Remove the foil and bake for 20 more minutes until the bacon is golden brown and crispy', '13: Cool for 5 minutes, then slice and serve']

ingredients: ['1 lb ground sausage (455 g) pork chicken or turkey', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '¼ teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ teaspoon onion powder', '¼ teaspoon paprika', '¼ teaspoon dried parsley', '6 eggs', 'Suggested Fillings', 'shredded cheddar cheese to taste', 'spinach chopped', 'tomato diced']
instructions: ['1: Mix 1 lb ground sausage, salt, pepper, ¼ teaspoon garlic powder, ¼ teaspoon onion powder, ¼ teaspoon paprika, and ¼ teaspoon dried parsley in a bowl until well combined', '2: Grease a muffin tin and start to form shells with the 1 lb ground sausage mix', '3:  Cover the sides and leave room in the middle for the 6 eggs', '4: In a separate bowl, mix the 6 eggs, salt, and pepper', '5: Pour egg mixture into the middle of each cup', '6: Top with shredded cheese, tomatoes, spinach, or toppings of your choice', '7: Bake at 350°F (180°C) for 30 minutes']

ingredients: ['8 slices sandwich bread', '2 slices cheddar cheese', '2 slices swiss cheese', '4 slices ham', 'egg wash', '8 tablespoons butter', 'tomato soup for serving']
instructions: ['1: On a cutting board, cut the crusts off of the bread', '2:  Press bread flat with hands or a rolling pin', '3: Take one slice of cheddar cheese and cut it into 4 equal squares', '4:  Repeat with the Swiss cheese', '5: Cut the slices of ham into a square', '6: Place one piece of flattened bread on a surface', '7:  Place 2 squares of cheddar so they are overlapping', '8:  Place the ham on top of the cheddar', '9:  Place 2 squares of the Swiss on top of the ham so the are overlapping', '10: Brush the edges of the bread with egg wash', '11: Take the other flattened piece of bread and place it on top', '12:  Press down the edges', '13:  Using a fork press along the edges of the “ravioli” until the edges are sealed', '14: In a pan heat 1 tablespoon of 8 tablespoons butter until melted on medium heat', '15:  Place the “ravioli” in the pan', '16:  Cook for about 3 minutes on each side until golden and crispy', '17:  Remove from heat', '18: Serve immediately with hot tomato soup']

ingredients: ['4 porterhouse pork chops', '12 oz bacon (350 g) chopped', '8 oz smoked gouda cheese (225 g) grated', '1 bunch fresh cilantro chopped', '1 teaspoon fresh thyme', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon seasoned salt', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper']
instructions: ['1: Brown 12 oz bacon in a skillet', '2:  Once browned, drain and set aside', '3: Combine 12 oz bacon, 8 oz smoked gouda, and 1 bunch fresh cilantro in a bowl and mix well', '4:  Set aside', '5: Stuff 4 porterhouse pork chops with 12 oz bacon, 8 oz smoked gouda, and 1 bunch fresh cilantro stuffing', '6:  Season both sides with all seasonings and grill on medium heat for about 20 minutes, or until the middle measures 160°F', '7: Top with any remaining stuffing mixture and allow to melt', '8: Serve warm']

ingredients: ['8 oz cream cheese (225 g) softened', '¼ cup powdered sugar (30 g)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'flour to coat workstation', '2 sheets puff pastry thawed', 'strawberry stems removed and sliced', 'raspberry', 'blackberry']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400ºF (200ºC), and prepare two cookie 2 sheets with parchment paper', '2: In a bowl, mix 8 oz cream cheese, ¼ cup powdered sugar, and 1 teaspoon vanilla until fully combined', '3: Lightly flour the surface and roll out puff pastry on top to flatten', '4: Cut each sheet of puff pastry into 9 equal squares', '5: On the top right and bottom left of the pastry, cut an L shape approximately ½ inch (1 cm) from the edge', '6: NOTE: This L shape should reach all the way down and across the square, however both L shapes should not meet at the ends', '7:  Your pastry should look like a picture frame with two corners still intact', '8: Take the upper right corner and fold down towards the inner bottom corner', '9:  You will now have a diamond shape', '10: Place 1 to 2 teaspoons of the 8 oz cream cheese filling in the middle, then place berries on top', '11: Repeat with the remaining pastry squares and place them onto the parchment covered baking sheet', '12: Bake for 15-20 minutes or until pastry is golden brown and puffed']

ingredients: ['2 ripe plantains sliced on bias in ¼-inch (6 mm) slices', '10 eggs', '½ cup whole milk (120 mL)', '6 oz smoked sausage (75 g) (pork turkey chicken or beef) thinly sliced', '½ red bell pepper chopped', '½ green bell pepper chopped', '½ large yellow onion chopped', '2 roma tomatoes seeds removed and diced', '3 cloves garlic minced', 'kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper', 'olive oil', 'fresh cilantro for garnish', 'avocado for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400-degrees', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: Toss plantain 2 ripe plantains sliced on bias in ¼-inch (6 mm) slices with 2 tablespoons olive oil and 1 teaspoon kosher salt in a ½ large bowl and add to the prepared sheet in a single layer', '4:  Bake for 20 to 30 minutes until golden brown but soft on the inside', '5:  Set aside to cool', '6: In a ½ large bowl whisk together the eggs and ½ cup whole milk until evenly combined', '7:  Season with salt and pepper and set aside', '8: Meanwhile, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a 10-inch (25 cm) cast iron skillet over medium heat', '9:  Add 6 oz smoked sausage and cook until evenly browned, about 5 minutes', '10:  Remove from the pan and set aside', '11: Add peppers and onions to skillet and cook until softened, about 5 minutes', '12: Add 3 cloves garlic and 2 roma tomatoes; cook until 3 cloves garlic is fragrant, about 1 to 2 minutes', '13: Reduce heat to low and add egg mixture and cook for 1 to 2 minutes or until the edges start to set', '14: Remove from heat and top with cooked plantain 2 ripe plantains sliced on bias in ¼-inch (6 mm) slices', '15: Transfer to the oven and cook for about 15 to 20 minutes, just until the eggs are barely set', '16: Let cool for 10 to 15 minutes then garnish with fresh cilantro and avocado 2 ripe plantains sliced on bias in ¼-inch (6 mm) slices']

ingredients: ['¾ cup flour (95 g)', '3 eggs', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 cup panko breadcrumbs (50 g)', '½ cup parmesan cheese (55 g)', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '½ tablespoon lemon zest', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 ¼ lb chicken tenders (565 g) package', 'olive oil cooking spray or another preferred oil']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C)', '2: Combine the egg and the lemon juice', '3: In a separate bowl, combine the 1 cup panko bread crumbs, Parmesan, 1 tablespoon garlic powder, lemon zest, salt, and pepper', '4: Coat the 1 ¼ lb chicken tenders in ¾ cup flour and shake off any excess', '5:  Then dredge in the egg and lemon juice mixture and allow excess egg to drip off', '6:  Coat with the 1 cup panko bread crumb mixture, turning until evenly coated', '7: Lay 1 ¼ lb chicken tenders flat on a baking sheet lined with aluminum foil and sprayed with nonstick olive oil cooking spray', '8:  Spray additional olive oil cooking spray over the 1 ¼ lb chicken tenders to help them brown', '9: Bake for 20-25 minutes (or until browned and 1 ¼ lb chicken is cooked all the way through), flipping once halfway through', '10: Serve with your favorite dip and some veggies for a fun appetizer or with 1 tablespoon garlic Parmesan roasted vegetables for dinner!']

ingredients: ['Spaghetti Squash', '1 spaghetti squash halved lengthwise and seeded', '2 tablespoons canola oil', '½ teaspoon kosher salt divided', 'Sauce', '1 tablespoon cornstarch', '1 tablespoon cold water', '3 cloves garlic', '1 fresh ginger peeled and minced (2 in piece 5 cm)', '¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '⅓ cup soy sauce (80 mL)', '1 tablespoon honey or granulated sugar', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '1 tablespoon rice vinegar', '¼ cup water (60 mL)', 'Stir Fry', '2 tablespoons canola oil divided', '2 cloves garlic thinly sliced divided', '1 lb boneless skinless chicken breast (455 g) or thighs cut into 1-inch (2.5 cm) cubes', '¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes divided', '½ kosher salt plus more to taste', '2 red bell peppers seeded and thinly sliced (about 2 cups (200 G))', '½ lb broccoli (225 g) cut into 1-inch (2.5 G) florets (about 3 cups)', '2 tablespoons water', '2 carrots thinly sliced', '6 oz snow pea (175 g) ends trimmed halved crosswise (about 1½ cups)', 'scallion for garnish thinly sliced']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Place the squash halves, cut-side up, on a baking sheet', '3:  Coat the exposed flesh with the canola oil, then sprinkle with ¼ teaspoon ½ teaspoon kosher ½ kosher salt', '4:  Flip over so the cut side is down, then bake for 40–50 minutes, until the squash is just barely tender when pierced with a fork', '5:  Remove from the oven and let cool slightly', '6: Line a baking sheet with 2 clean kitchen towels', '7: Use a fork to scrape out the “spaghetti” strands from the squash onto the prepared baking sheet and season with the remaining ¼ teaspoon ½ teaspoon kosher ½ kosher salt, tossing to distribute', '8:  Let cool for 30 minutes', '9:  The 1 spaghetti squash can be made ahead and stored in the refrigerator in an airtight container for up to 2 days', '10:  If using from the cold, remove the squash from the refrigerator 30 minutes before cooking', '11: While the squash is cooling, make the sauce: In a medium bowl, whisk together the cornstarch and cold 1 tablespoon cold ¼ cup 2 tablespoons water until smooth', '12:  Grate the garlic on a microplane directly into the bowl', '13:  Add the 1 fresh ginger, ¼ teaspoon ¼ teaspoon 2 red pepper flakes, ⅓ cup soy sauce, honey, sesame oil, and rice vinegar and stir to incorporate', '14:  Whisk in the 1 tablespoon cold ¼ cup 2 tablespoons water until smooth', '15: Make the stir fry: Heat 1 tablespoon canola oil in a 12-inch skillet or wok over medium-high heat', '16:  Add 1 clove of garlic and stir for about 30 seconds, until fragrant', '17:  Add the 1 lb boneless skinless chicken, ⅛ teaspoon ¼ teaspoon ¼ teaspoon 2 red pepper flakes, and ½ teaspoon ½ teaspoon kosher ½ kosher salt and stir to coat', '18:  Cook the 1 lb boneless skinless chicken for 6–8 minutes, letting it brown without stirring, until no pink remains and the 1 lb boneless skinless chicken is cooked through', '19:  Transfer the 1 lb boneless skinless chicken to a plate or bowl', '20: Reduce the heat to medium', '21:  Without wiping out the pan, add the remaining tablespoon canola oil, remaining garlic clove, and remaining ⅛ teaspoon ¼ teaspoon ¼ teaspoon 2 red pepper flakes and cook for 30 seconds, until fragrant', '22:  Add the bell peppers and ½ lb broccoli, stir to coat, then deglaze the pan with the 1 tablespoon cold ¼ cup 2 tablespoons water, scraping up all the browned bits stuck to the bottom of the pan', '23:  Cook, stirring occasionally, until the ½ lb broccoli is starting to soften, 8–10 minutes', '24: Add the 2 carrots and cook for another 2 minutes, then add the 6 oz snow peas and season with a pinch of ½ teaspoon kosher ½ kosher salt', '25:  Cook for another 2–3 minutes, until all of the vegetables are tender', '26:  Transfer the vegetables to the plate with the 1 lb boneless skinless chicken', '27: Roll up the 1 spaghetti squash in the kitchen towels and wring to squeeze as much 1 tablespoon cold ¼ cup 2 tablespoons water as possible', '28: Add 2 tablespoons of sauce to the pan and let come to a simmer, then add the 1 spaghetti squash and stir constantly until heated through, 1–2 minutes', '29:  Divide the squash among serving bowls', '30: Pour the remaining sauce into the pan and let simmer for about 1 minute, until thickened', '31:  Return the 1 lb boneless skinless chicken and vegetables to the pan and toss to coat evenly in the sauce and heat everything through, 2-3 minutes', '32:  Divide among the bowls atop the squash', '33:  Garnish each bowl with thinly sliced scallions', '34:  Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['1 lb boneless skinless chicken breast (455 g)', 'salt to taste', 'white pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons water', '1 ½ teaspoons cornstarch', '¼ cup soy sauce (60 g)', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '1 teaspoon fresh ginger minced', '1 teaspoon garlic minced', '1 tablespoon honey', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', '1 tablespoon mirin', '2 tablespoons cooking oil', '1 cup bell pepper (100 g) julienned', '1 cup carrot (120 g) julienned', '4 cups short grain rice (800 g) cooked', '3 eggs beaten', '2 cups panko breadcrumbs (100 g)', '1 cup scallion (100 g) thinly sliced']
instructions: ['1: In a large measuring cup, combine 2 tablespoons water and 1 ½ teaspoons cornstarch', '2:  Stir until combined and add soy sauce, 2 tablespoons brown sugar, 1 teaspoon fresh ginger, 1 teaspoon garlic, honey, 1 teaspoon sesame oil, and mirin', '3:  Mix well', '4: Season sliced 1 lb boneless skinless chicken breast with salt and pepper, then pour ¼ cup (60 ml) of the sauce over the sliced 1 lb boneless skinless chicken just until covered, and set aside', '5:  Mix the sauce with the sliced 1 lb boneless skinless chicken, cover, and marinate in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes', '6: In a large skillet over medium-high heat, pour the rest of the sauce and stir occasionally as it comes to a boil', '7:  Once boiling, reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened', '8:  Set aside in a bowl', '9: In the same skillet, add 1 tablespoon 2 tablespoons cooking oil and raise heat back to medium-high', '10:  Place sliced 1 lb boneless skinless chicken pieces in the pan and cook for 3 minutes, flip, and cook an additional 3 minutes', '11:  Pour 1 tablespoon of the reduced sauce over the 1 lb boneless skinless chicken and stir', '12:  Remove from the pan and set aside', '13: Add the remaining 2 tablespoons cooking oil into the skillet and add the julienned vegetables', '14:  Season with salt and white pepper, and cook 3-4 minutes or until vegetables have softened', '15:  Add back the 1 lb boneless skinless chicken and gradually add just enough sauce to coat the 1 lb boneless skinless chicken and vegetables', '16: Take ⅓ cup (65 g) of cooked 4 cups short grain rice and flatten out on a piece of plastic wrap', '17:  Layer the cooked 1 lb boneless skinless chicken and vegetables in the center of the 4 cups short grain rice and wrap the 4 cups short grain rice around the fillings', '18:  Form into a square shape and repeat with the remainder of the 4 cups short grain rice and filling', '19:  Chill 4 cups short grain rice balls in the refrigerator for 30 minutes', '20: Dip the 4 cups short grain rice ball in beaten 3 eggs, then coat with 2 cups panko', '21:  Shake off any excess bread crumbs', '22: Heat ½ inch (1 cm) oil in a skillet to 350˚F (180˚C) and fry for 3 minutes on each side or until golden and crispy', '23:  Move to a cooling rack, and season with salt', '24: Cut in half and serve with the remaining sauce for dipping']
