ingredients: ['Sauce', '1 cup soy sauce (240 mL)', '4 cloves garlic', '2 teaspoons ginger grated', '2 tablespoons sesame oil', '2 tablespoons rice vinegar', '2 tablespoons honey', '¼ cup creamy peanut butter (60 g)', 'Stir Fry', '2 tablespoons oil divided', '1 lb boneless skinless chicken breast (455 g) cubed', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '½ red onion thinly sliced', '2 cups broccoli floret (140 g)', '¼ red cabbage thinly sliced', '2 red bell peppers thinly sliced', '1 ½ cups snap pea (165 g) sliced on the bias', '3 carrots thinly peeled', '1 lb rice noodle (455 g) cooked', '¼ cup scallion (25 g) thinly sliced on the bias', '½ cup fresh cilantro (20 g) finely chopped', '2 tablespoons sesame seed']
instructions: ['1: In a bowl, add the 1 cup soy sauce, sesame 2 tablespoons sesame 2 tablespoons oil, 2 tablespoons honey, rice vinegar, ¼ cup creamy peanut butter, 4 cloves garlic, and 2 teaspoons ginger, and whisk to combine', '2: Heat 1 tablespoon of 2 tablespoons sesame 2 tablespoons oil in a wok or large pan over high heat', '3:  Once the 2 tablespoons sesame 2 tablespoons oil begins to shimmer, add the cubed 1 lb boneless skinless chicken and sprinkle with 1 teaspoon salt and 1 teaspoon black 2 red bell pepper', '4:  Cook, stirring occasionally, until the 1 lb boneless skinless chicken is cooked through, about 5 to 7 minutes', '5: Transfer the 1 lb boneless skinless chicken to the bowl, and wipe the wok clean', '6: Heat 1 tablespoon of 2 tablespoons sesame 2 tablespoons oil in the cleaned wok over high heat', '7: Once the 2 tablespoons sesame 2 tablespoons oil begins to shimmer, add the red onion, 2 cups broccoli, and red cabbage, and cook, stirring frequently, for 3 minutes', '8: Add the red bell 1 teaspoon black 2 red bell peppers and 1 ½ cups snap peas and cook for 3 minutes, stirring frequently, until the 1 teaspoon black 2 red bell peppers begin to soften', '9: Add the 3 carrots and cook for 2 minutes, stirring frequently', '10: Add the 1 lb boneless skinless chicken, cooked rice noodles, and sauce, and stir until fully incorporated', '11: Serve with ½ cup fresh cilantro, scallions, and sesame seeds']

ingredients: ['1 ½ teaspoons active dry yeast', '4 ½ cups all-purpose flour (560 g)', '½ cup water (120 mL) warm', '12 fl oz beer (355 mL) any brand', '2 teaspoons salt', 'top sirloin steak or top round', 'carrot as desired', 'celery as desired', 'onion as desired', '1 cup beef broth (235 mL) or vegetable stock', '2 tablespoons corn meal to prevent dough sticking']
instructions: ['1: Combine 1 ½ teaspoons of dry active yeast, ½ cup (60 g) all-purpose flour, and ½ a cup (120ml) of warm water', '2:  Cover and set a warm place for 30 minutes', '3: Then add 1 12 oz bottle of beer of your preference, 2 teaspoons salt, and roughly 4 4 ½ cups of flour', '4:  Add the last cup of flour slowly to so that the 2 tablespoons corn meal to prevent dough dose not become dry', '5: Work into a ball until all the ingredients are combined', '6:  Cover with a hot damp towel and set in a warm place for 2 hours', '7: Use top round or top top sirloin cuts of beef', '8:  Salt all sides generously', '9: Sear on all sides in a very hot, heavy skillet', '10:  If a pool of fat begins to form in the skillet, remove some so that the meat sears evenly', '11: Place in a slow cooker on a bed of onion, carrot, and celery', '12:  Pour over with a cup of beef or vegetable stock', '13: Cook 2 hours on high, or until internal temperature reaches 130°F (55°C)', '14: Scrape the 2 tablespoons corn meal to prevent dough down from the sides of the bowl and onto a flowered work surface', '15: Pull the edges of the 2 tablespoons corn meal to prevent dough down underneath itself until a smooth loaf is formed', '16:  Sprinkle flour on top of the loaf', '17: Next, sprinkle cornmeal onto a baking sheet and set the loaf on top', '18:  Sprinkle flour on top of the loaf', '19:  Cover with a dry towel for 30 minutes', '20: Scar the top with a knife', '21: Bake at 425°F (220°C) for 35 minutes', '22:  Place a pan of water on the rack below the 2 tablespoons corn meal to prevent dough in the oven', '23:  Cool to room temperature before cutting', '24: Remove steak from slow cooker', '25:  Rest 20 minutes before slicing', '26:  Strain juices to use as a dip or stock in other cooking', '27:  Cool to room temperature before cutting', '28: Thinly slice steak and place between pieces of sliced bread', '29:  Serve with juices from slow cooker on the side for dipping']

ingredients: ['1 pancake', '1 cup ricotta cheese (250 g)', '1 egg yolk', '¾ cup milk (180 g)', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 tablespoons lemon zest', '1 cup flour (125 g)', '1 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '1 ½ cups blueberry compote (300 g)', '2 cups blueberry (200 g)', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '2 egg whites', '2 tablespoons sugar']
instructions: ['1: In a large mixing bowl, whisk together ricotta cheese, egg yolk, milk, ½ teaspoon vanilla extract, and lemon zest', '2:  Whisk until smooth, then add flour and 1 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '3:  Mix this until fully combined', '4: In a separate mixing bowl, beat the egg whites on high speed with an electric mixer until very white and foamy, then gradually add ½ cup 2 tablespoons sugar', '5:  Continue beating on high speed until hard peaks form', '6: Gently fold ¼ of the egg whites into the lemon ricotta mixture', '7:  Gently fold in the remaining egg whites', '8:  Be careful not to deflate the eggs!Butter up a nonstick pan and pour in about ¼ cup (25g) worth of batter for each 1 pancake', '9: Cook for 2-3 minutes on each side or until golden brown on the edges', '10: In a pot or pan, cook blueberries, ½ cup 2 tablespoons sugar, water, and lemon juice', '11:  Stir occasionally to prevent sticking and cook for about 8-10 minutes or until the 1 ½ cups blueberry compote reaches a thick consistency', '12:  (Compote will thicken once it cools, so to loosen it up just add a touch of hot water', '13: )Serve hot 1 ½ cups blueberry compote over stack of 1 pancakes and dust with powdered ½ cup 2 tablespoons sugar']

ingredients: ['2 cups purple potato (450 g) halved', '1 ½ cups brussels sprouts (150 g) halved', '1 ½ cups baby carrots (75 g)', '1 ½ cups butternut squash (300 g) diced', '1 red apple sliced', '½ large red onion diced', 'olive oil to taste', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon dried sage to taste', '¼ cup dijon mustard (60 g)', '¼ cup maple syrup (85 g)', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon fresh rosemary', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '4 chicken thighs']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400ºF (200ºC) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '2: To the baking sheet, add the 2 cups purple potatoes, Brussels sprouts, 1 ½ cups baby carrots, 1 ½ cups butternut squash, apple, and red onion', '3: In a small bowl, whisk together the Dijon mustard, ¼ cup maple syrup, 3 cloves garlic, 1 teaspoon fresh rosemary, and 1 tablespoon lemon juice', '4: Lay the 4 chicken thighs skin-side down on top of the vegetables', '5:  Season the 4 chicken with salt and pepper, then brush with about ⅓ of Dijon-maple mixture', '6: Bake for 30 minutes, or until juices from the 4 chicken run clear', '7:  Optional: Broil for 2-3 minutes to brown and crisp the 4 chicken skin', '8: Serve the 4 chicken with the vegetables']

ingredients: ['4 large eggs', '2 teaspoons sugar', '1 pinch kosher salt', '1 teaspoon light soy sauce plus more for serving', '1 teaspoon mirin or sake', '¼ cup bonito dashi stock (60 mL)', 'canola oil for cooking', 'daikon radish grated for serving']
instructions: ['1: Crack the eggs into a 4 large bowl', '2:  Gently whisk until the yolks and whites are homogeneous, without incorporating excess air', '3: Add the 2 teaspoons sugar, 1 pinch kosher salt, 1 teaspoon light soy sauce, 1 teaspoon mirin, and dashi stock and whisk to combine', '4:  Pour into a spouted liquid measuring ¼ cup for easy pouring', '5: Heat a tamagoyaki pan over medium-high heat', '6:  Use a folded paper towel and chopsticks or a silicone brush to brush a generous layer of canola oil on the pan, making sure to get the sides and corners', '7: Pour ⅙ of the egg mixture into the pan and quickly tilt to cover the bottom evenly', '8:  When the egg is mostly set, but still looks wet on top, gently roll the egg toward you', '9:  Push the rolled egg to the opposite side of the pan', '10:  Brush the pan with canola oil and pour in another ⅙ of the egg mixture', '11:  Lift up the rolled egg and let the mixture flow underneath', '12:  When the egg is almost set, roll the omelette toward you, then push to the other side of the pan', '13:  Repeat, adding ⅙ of the mixture at a time and continuing to roll the egg into a 4 large roll', '14:  If at any time the pan seems too hot, remove the pan from the heat for a few seconds to cool down instead of adjusting the heat on the stove', '15: Remove the rolled omelette from the pan and wrap in a sushi mat, then press into a rectangle, if desired', '16: Let cool slightly, then cut crosswise into 1-inch (2', '17: 54 cm) slices', '18: Serve with grated daikon radish and 1 teaspoon light soy sauce']

ingredients: ['6 cups water (1.4 L)', 'salt to taste', '3 beets chopped', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: In a medium saucepan bring the water to a rolling boil, season with salt, and add the 3 beets', '2:  Cover and cook for 7-8 minutes, until a knife easily pierces the 3 beets', '3: Use a slotted spoon to remove the 3 beets from the water and transfer to a blender', '4:  Reserve the water', '5: Blend 3 beets, pepper, and 1½-2 6 cups (355-470 ml) beet stock in a blender until a smooth consistency is reached']

ingredients: ['4 cups biscuit flour (500 g) or all-purpose flour plus more for dusting', '4 teaspoons baking powder', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 cup unsalted butter (230 g) 2 sticks cubed very cold', '1 cup buttermilk (240 mL) plus 2 tablespoons', 'butter melted for brushing']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and 1 teaspoon salt', '4: Using your hands or a pastry cutter, incorporate the butter into the dry ingredients, leaving large chunks', '5: Fold in the 1 cup buttermilk until a thick dough forms', '6: Lightly flour a clean surface and dump the dough onto it', '7:  Bring the dough together until it comes together in one large piece', '8: Roll out with a rolling pin to about 1 ½-2 inches (4-5 cm) thick', '9:  Using a 4 cups biscuit cutter or small glass, cut out 2-3-inch (5-7 cm) rounds and place them on the prepared baking sheet', '10:  It’s okay if the 4 cups biscuits are touching', '11: Bake for 18-20 minutes, or until golden brown', '12: Brush the 4 cups biscuits with melted butter', '13: Serve as desired']

ingredients: ['Cake mix', '2 ¼ cups all purpose flour (310 g)', '¼ cup cornstarch (30 g)', '2 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '¾ cup unsalted butter (170 g) room temperature', '½ cup brown sugar (100 g)', '1 cup granulated sugar (200 g)', '3 large eggs', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon almond extract optional', '1 cup sour cream (240 mL) or yogurt', 'Streusel', '⅔ cup light brown sugar (135 g) lightly packed', '1 cup all purpose flour (125 g)', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon nutmeg optional', '½ cup unsalted butter (115 g) cut into cubes kept at room temperature', 'Cinnamon filling', '¾ cup brown sugar (150 g)', '¼ cup all purpose flour (30 g)', '2 ½ teaspoons ground cinnamon', 'Extra Topping', '1 scoop vanilla ice cream']
instructions: ['1: For the cinnamon Cinnamon filling:In a bowl, whisk together brown sugar, flour, cinnamon then set aside', '2: For the streusel topping:Add brown sugar, cinnamon, flour, and 1 teaspoon nutmeg (optional) into a medium bowl', '3:  Whisk together, then add the cubed butter (room temperature is preferred)', '4: Use clean hands to break the butter into the dry Cake mixture', '5:  Once the Cake mixture is well combined into a crumble then you can set the bowl aside', '6: CakePreheat the oven to 350°F, and parchment line or grease a cake pan of your choice then set aside', '7: Sift the flour, ¼ cup cornstarch, ½ teaspoon salt, and 2 ½ teaspoons baking powder into a 3 large bowl, whisk together, then set aside', '8: Beat the butter, and the 1 cup granulated sugar in a stand Cake mixer or electric hand Cake mixer until ⅔ cup light & fluffy, add brown sugar then Cake mix on high', '9:   Pour in the vanilla extract, 1 teaspoon almond extract (optional), and the eggs one at a time while Cake mixing on low', '10:  Scrape the sides of the bowl down then Cake mix in 1 cup sour cream or yogurt until well combined', '11: Add the dry Cake mixture into the wet Cake mixture, then combine until a smooth batter forms', '12: ', '13: Pour half of the cake Cake mixture into the greased or parchment lined pan then smooth it out', '14:  Sprinkling the cinnamon Cinnamon filling on top from the edges to the center', '15:  Layer over the cinnamon topping with the leftover cake batter then top with the streusel crumble', '16:  Bake for 45-50 minutes, testing doneness with a toothpick', '17: Top cake with vanilla ice cream (optional) and serve']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '8 oz white button mushroom (225 g) sliced', '2 tablespoons butter', '½ onion diced', '1 lb ground beef (455 g)', '2 teaspoons garlic powder', '3 tablespoons flour', '1 teaspoon paprika', '¼ cup dry sherry (60 mL)', '4 cups low sodium beef broth (945 mL)', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '4 cups dry egg noodle (400 g)', '½ cup sour cream (115 g)', '2 tablespoons fresh parsley chopped']
instructions: ['1: Add 1 tablespoon olive to a large pan over medium heat', '2:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the mushrooms and cook until tender, 5 to 6 minutes', '3:  Transfer the mushrooms to a plate', '4: In the same pan, add the 2 tablespoons butter', '5:  Add the ½ onion, 1 lb ground 1 lb ground 4 cups low sodium beef, and 2 teaspoons garlic powder', '6:  Stir until the meat is browned, breaking it up as you stir', '7: Drain any excess fat and return the pan to the stove', '8: Add the 3 tablespoons flour and 1 teaspoon paprika', '9:  Stir until thick, about 1 to 2 minutes', '10: Add the ¼ cup dry sherry, and stir, scraping up any brown bits from the bottom of the pan', '11: Add the 1 lb ground 4 cups low sodium beef broth and bring the mixture to a boil', '12: Add the 4 cups dry egg noodles, 1 ½ teaspoons salt, and ½ teaspoon pepper', '13:  Reduce the heat to simmer', '14:  Cover the pan with a lid', '15: Stir often, until the noodles are tender, about 8 to 10 minutes', '16: Return the mushrooms to the pan and stir to combine', '17: Add the ½ cup sour cream and stir', '18:  Top with chopped 2 tablespoons fresh parsley']

ingredients: ['Cherry Pie Filling', '1 cup sugar (200 g)', '¼ cup cornstarch (30 g)', '⅓ cup water (80 mL)', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '40 oz canned cherry (1.1 kg) drained', '1 teaspoon almond extract', 'Cheesecake', '25 chocolate sandwich cookies crushed', '6 tablespoons unsalted butter melted', '40 oz cream cheese (1.1 kg)', '2 cups sugar (400 g)', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1 cup heavy cream (240 mL)', 'fresh berry for decoration']
instructions: ['1: Add the 1 cup 2 cups sugar and cornstarch to a large saucepan and whisk until combined', '2:  Stir in the water and 1 tablespoon lemon juice', '3:   Cook over medium heat, whisking until the 1 cup 2 cups sugar has dissolved, then reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer until a thick syrup forms and turns golden, about 5 minutes', '4: Add the cherries and cook for another 2-3 minutes until syrup has thickened', '5:  Turn off the heat and stir in the 1 teaspoon almond extract', '6:  Set aside to cool', '7: Line an 8-inch (20 cm) springform pan with plastic wrap', '8:  Transfer the 40 oz canned cherry filling to the pan and spread evenly', '9:  Freeze for 2-3 hours, until firm', '10: Combine the crushed cookies with the melted 6 tablespoons unsalted butter in a medium bowl until well-combined', '11: Transfer the cookie crumb mixture to a 10-inch (25 cm) springform pan', '12:  Use a spatula or measuring cup to press the cookie crumbs down to form an even base', '13:  Freeze for 10 minutes', '14: In a large bowl, beat the 40 oz 1 cup heavy cream cheese, 1 cup 2 cups sugar, and 2 teaspoons vanilla extract together with an electric hand mixer until combined', '15: Add the heavy 40 oz 1 cup heavy cream and beat for another 2-3 minutes until combined and fluffy', '16: Spread half the cheesecake mixture over the chilled cookie crust', '17:  Freeze for 10 minutes', '18: Unwrap the 40 oz canned cherry pie filling, and place it on top of the set cheesecake layer', '19:  Cover with the remaining cheesecake batter, spreading until smooth on top', '20: Decorate with fresh berries', '21: Chill in the fridge for at least 4 hours before slicing and serving']

ingredients: ['For the Masala Paste:', '1 tablespoon oil', '¼ cup coconut (25 g) grated', '1 medium onion chopped', '1 teaspoon coriander seed', '1 tablespoon white sesame seeds', '1 tablespoon cumin seeds', 'salt to taste', '1 tablespoon chilli powder', '½ teaspoon turmeric powder', '1 ginger 1 in (2.54 cm)', '4 cloves garlic', '1 tablespoon garam masala', '2 medium tomatoes chopped', '¼ cup fresh coriander (10 g)', 'For the Crab Curry:', '2 lb crab meat (1 kg)', '4 tablespoons oil', 'curry leaf', '2 bay leaves', '1 tablespoon cumin seeds', '1 medium onion chopped', '2 green chiles slit legthwise', '1.5 cups water (300 mL)', 'salt to taste', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 cup coriander leaves (40 g) freshly chopped']
instructions: ['1: For the Masala Paste:Heat the oil in a non stick pan', '2:  Once heated, add the chopped onion into the pan and cook until translucent', '3: Add the grated ¼ cup coconut into the pan', '4:  Roast for about 1-2 minutes until well-toasted', '5: Add the coriander seeds, 1 tablespoon white sesame seeds and cumin seeds', '6:  Roast them for 1 - 2 minutes more until aromatic', '7:  Now, empty this mixture into a bowl and let cook', '8: Once cool, transfer the contents into a blender', '9:  Add the 1 tablespoon chilli powder, ½ teaspoon turmeric powder, 1 ginger, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tablespoon garam masala powder, tomatoes and the chopped coriander with some salt', '10: Grind it into a smooth paste', '11:  Set aside', '12: For the Crab Curry:Heat oil in a nonstick wok', '13:  Once heated, add the cumin seeds, 2 bay leaves and the curry leaves and let the leaves splutter', '14: Then, add the chopped onion and cook until translucent', '15:  To this, add the 2 green 1 tablespoon chillies and masala paste', '16:  Cook and stir for 2-3 minutes', '17: Add 1', '18: 5 cups water to the mixture', '19:  Once the mixture is bubbling, gently add 2 lb crab meat and combine', '20: Add salt to taste and, if using pureed 2 lb crab legs in the mixture, add this at this time', '21: To the mixture, add 1 tablespoon lemon juice and cook covered on a medium flame for about 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally', '22:  Once 2 lb crabs turn orange in colour, they’re cooked', '23: Top with coriander leaves and serve hot with ¼ cup 1 cup coriander leaves (40 g) fresh rotis or jasmine rice']

ingredients: ['3 lb bone in beef short ribs (1.5 g) cut into 2-inch pieces', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', '1 ½ teaspoons freshly ground black pepper', '2 tablespoons avocado oil divided', '1 large white onion cut into 1 inch (2.5 cm) pieces', '4 celery stalks cut into 1/2 inch (1 1/4 cm) diagonal pieces', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '2 tablespoons all purpose flour', '2 cups dry red wine (480 mL) such as cabernet sauvignon', '1 head garlic halved crosswise', '6 small rainbow carrots peeled and ends trimmed', '10 sprigs fresh thyme', '2 cups low sodium beef broth (480 mL)', '2 lb cauliflower (910 g) cut into florets', '1 cup raw cashews (150 g)', '1 teaspoon garlic', '¼ cup fresh parsley (10 g) chopped for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Liberally season the short ribs on all sides with 1 1 2 2 2 tablespoon of 1 2 2 2 tablespoon kosher 2 2 1 ½ 1 teaspoons kosher salt and the 1 ½ 1 ½ 1 teaspoons freshly ground black pepper', '2: Heat 2 1 2 2 2 tablespoons of avocado oil in a 5-quart (5 liter) ceramic pot over medium-high heat until shimmering', '3:  Working in batches, add 6-7 pieces of short rib at a time to the pot and sear without disturbing for 2-3 minutes, until a golden brown crust forms', '4:  Turn the pieces and continue cooking until seared well on all sides', '5:  Remove the short ribs from the pan and set aside, adding another 1 2 2 2 tablespoon of avocado oil to the pot if needed, and repeat with the remaining short ribs', '6: Reduce the heat to medium and add the 1 large white onion, 4 celery, and the remaining ½ 2 1 ½ 1 teaspoon of 1 2 2 2 tablespoon kosher 2 2 1 ½ 1 teaspoons kosher salt', '7:  Sauté for 3-4 minutes, until the vegetables begin to soften and release moisture', '8: Add the tomato paste and stir to coat the vegetables, then cook for 2 minutes', '9:  Add the flour and stir to coat the vegetables, then cook for 2-3 minutes more, until deep 2 cups dry red in color', '10:  Pour in the wine and stir to release any browned bits from the bottom of the pot', '11: Nestle the short ribs on top of the vegetables in the pot', '12:  Bring to a boil, then 2 cups dry reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer until the liquid is 2 cups dry reduced by about half, 15-20 minutes', '13: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180°C)', '14: Nestle the 1 head 1 1 teaspoon garlic between the short ribs, then place the 6 small rainbow carrots and thyme 10 sprigs on top', '15:  Pour in the beef stock', '16: Cover the pot and transfer to the oven', '17:  Bake for 2½ hours, until the meat is falling off the 3 lb bone and fork tender', '18: While the short ribs are in the oven, make the 2 lb cauliflower mash: Fill a medium pot with about an inch of water and set a steamer basket inside', '19:  Cover and bring the water to a simmer over medium-high heat', '20:  Add the 2 lb cauliflower to the basket and steam for 12-15 minutes, until mashable with the back of a fork, but not overcooked', '21: Working in batches, transfer the steamed 2 lb cauliflower to a fine-mesh strainer set over a bowl', '22:  Using another bowl that is slightly smaller than the strainer, press the bowl into the 2 lb cauliflower to press excess liquid from the 2 lb cauliflower', '23:  Repeat with remaining 2 lb cauliflower', '24:  Discard the liquid and set the 2 lb cauliflower aside', '25: Add the 1 cup raw cashews to the bowl of a food processor', '26:  Blend on high speed for 2-3 minutes, until the 1 cup raw cashews are completely broken down and can be mashed into a paste between your fingers, scraping down the sides of the bowl as necessary', '27: Add the strained 2 lb cauliflower, 1 head 1 1 teaspoon garlic powder, and 1 2 2 2 tablespoon kosher 2 2 1 ½ 1 teaspoons kosher salt', '28:  Blend until smooth and well combined with the cashew paste', '29: Transfer to a serving bowl and serve warm', '30: Serve the braised short ribs and 6 small rainbow carrots with the 2 lb cauliflower mash and garnish with ¼ cup fresh parsley']

ingredients: ['1 cup water (240 mL)', '1 large head broccoli cut into florets', '15 oz organic chickpeas (425 g) drained and rinsed', '1 medium sweet potato or large peeled and cubed', '1 medium white onion diced', '¼ cup quinoa (40 g) uncooked', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon fresh ginger minced', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 tablespoon ground turmeric', '2 teaspoons tamari', '2 teaspoons salt', '28 oz canned diced tomatoes (795 g)', '30 oz coconut milk', 'cooked rice for serving', 'fresh parsley chopped for serving optional']
instructions: ['1: Add the 1 cup water, 1 large head broccoli, 15 oz organic chickpeas, 1 medium sweet potato, 1 medium white onion, ¼ cup quinoa, 2 cloves garlic, 1 teaspoon fresh ginger, 1 teaspoon red pepper flakes, 1 tablespoon ground turmeric, 2 teaspoons tamari, 2 teaspoons salt, 28 oz canned diced tomatoes, and 30 oz coconut milk to a slow cooker', '2:  Stir to combine', '3: Cover and cook for 4 hours on high or 8 hours on low, until the 1 medium sweet potatoes are tender and the curry has thickened', '4: Serve the curry warm over cooked rice', '5:  Garnish with fresh parsley, if desired']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '2 ¼ cups chicken (300 g) chopped', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'Sauce', '1 onion chopped', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '1 ¼ cups milk (300 mL)', '¼ cup butter chicken sauce (50 g)', '2 ¼ cups mozzarella cheese (250 g)', '2 ½ cups cheddar cheese (250 g)', '1 cup elbow pasta (200 g) cooked', '1 cup mozzarella cheese (100 g) grafted', 'fresh coriander to garnish']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Melt the butter in a large skillet over medium high heat until melted', '3: Add the 2 ¼ cups ¼ cup butter chicken, salt, and pepper', '4:  Fry for about 5-8 minutes or until cooked through', '5:  Take out and set aside', '6: Add the 1 onion and fry for 2 minutes', '7: Stir in the 1 tablespoon plain flour', '8: Gradually whisk in the 1 ¼ cups milk', '9: Whisk in the butter 2 ¼ cups ¼ cup butter chicken sauce', '10: Whisk in the mozzarella and 2 ½ cups cheddar cheese', '11: Once the cheese has melted into the mixture, stir in the 2 ¼ cups ¼ cup butter chicken and 1 cup elbow pasta', '12: Sprinkle on some more cheese on top', '13: Bake in the oven for 15 minutes, until the cheese is brown and bubbling on top', '14: Garnish with fresh coriander']

ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons milk', '¼ teaspoon cinnamon', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', 'blueberry to taste', 'maple syrup to drizzle']
instructions: ['1: Slice bread into cubes', '2: In a bowl, add 1 egg, 2 tablespoons milk, ¼ teaspoon cinnamon, and ½ teaspoon vanilla, and mix', '3: In a microwave-safe mug, place half of the cubed bread and desired amount of blueberries', '4: Place the rest of the bread, berries, and the 1 egg mixture into the mug', '5: Microwave for 1½ minutes or until 1 egg is fully cooked', '6: Drizzle maple syrup']

ingredients: ['1 cup Great Value® Almond Milk (240 mL)', '1 ½ cups Great Value® Mixed Fruit (260 g)', '¼ cup dried apricot (50 g) diced', '¼ cup coconut chips (20 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a blender, combine the almond milk, fruit, apricots, and ¼ cup coconut chips', '2:  Blend on high speed until smooth']

ingredients: ['1 lb shrimp (455 g) peeled and deveined', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 cup broccoli (150 g) chopped', '1 cup green beans (360 g)', '1 cup carrot (120 g) sliced', 'Stir-Fry Sauce', '½ cup soy sauce (120 mL)', '¼ cup honey (85 g)', '2 cloves garlic', '1 teaspoon ginger', '1 tablespoon sesame seed']
instructions: ['1: Mix together all ½ cup soy sauce ingredients in a small bowl', '2: Heat oil over a nonstick pan and add 1 lb shrimp stirring until cooked', '3: Pour ½ cup soy sauce in pan and stir to coat meat', '4: Once the ½ cup soy sauce is bubbling, add the veggies to the pan and stir again to coat', '5: Cook until meat is cooked through and veggies are soft', '6: Serve over rice or alone']

ingredients: ['7 scallions cut into 2 in (5 cm) pieces', '3 habanero peppers seeded', '8 cloves garlic', '1 fresh ginger peeled and thinly sliced', '⅓ cup dark brown sugar (75 g) tightly packed', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon ground allspice', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 tablespoon dried thyme', '1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken breast (680 g) cut into 1 1/2 in (3 cm) pieces', '8 oz pineapple juice (240 mL)', '¼ cup ketchup (60 g) plus 2 tablespoons of ketchup', 'kosher salt to taste', '1 large red onion cut into 1 1/2 in (3 cm) pieces', '2 red bell peppers cut into 1 1/2 in (3 cm) pieces', '2 cups pineapple (490 g) cut into 1 1/2 in (3 cm) cubes', 'lime wedge for serving', '¼ cup fresh cilantro (10 g) finely chopped for garnish', 'Special Equipment', '8 bamboo skewers soaked in warm water for 20 minutes 8 inches (20 cm)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 375ºF (190ºC)', '2:  Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper', '3: In a food processor, combine the 7 scallions, 3 habanero peppers, 8 cloves garlic, 1 fresh ginger, brown sugar, soy sauce, 1 tablespoon ground allspice, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, and 1 tablespoon dried thyme', '4:  Puree until broken down into a into a thick paste, about 1 minute', '5: In a medium bowl, toss the 1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken with 2-4 2 ¼ cup ketchup (60 g) plus 2 tablespoons of the jerk paste until well coated', '6:  Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour', '7: Meanwhile, make the jerk sauce: Combine 2-4 2 ¼ cup ketchup (60 g) plus 2 tablespoons of the jerk paste with the pineapple juice and ketchup', '8:  Season to taste with kosher salt', '9: Thread the 8 bamboo skewers with 2 pieces each of the marinated 1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken, red onion, bell pepper, and pineapple, alternating ingredients', '10: Arrange the 8 bamboo skewers on the prepared baking sheets', '11:  Season with kosher salt', '12:  Brush about ⅓ cup (85 G) of the jerk sauce over the 8 bamboo skewers', '13:  Reserve the remaining sauce', '14: Roast the 8 bamboo skewers for 22-25 minutes, turning halfway, until the 1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken is cooked to an internal temperature of 165ºF (75ºC)', '15: Remove the baking sheets from the oven and discard the parchment paper, then return the 8 bamboo skewers to the pans', '16:  Turn the broiler to high', '17: Baste the 8 bamboo skewers on all sides with the jerk sauce', '18: Broil for 3-4 minutes, until the vegetables just begin to char and the sauce is slightly caramelized', '19: Transfer the 8 bamboo skewers to a platter', '20:  Squeeze the lime wedges over the hot 8 bamboo skewers and garnish with the cilantro']

ingredients: ['6 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon hoisin sauce', '1 tablespoon rice vinegar', '2 tablespoons honey', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', '½ tablespoon ginger minced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '¾ lb chicken breast (340 g) cut into 1-inch (2 1/2 cm) pieces', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon cornstarch', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '4 cups broccoli floret (600 g)', '1 red bell pepper cut into 1-inch (2 1/2 cm) pieces', '¾ cup raw cashew (95 g)', '½ cup water (120 mL)', 'brown rice to serve']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, combine the 6 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 tablespoon hoisin sauce, 1 tablespoon brown rice vinegar, 2 tablespoons honey, sesame oil, ½ tablespoon ginger, and 2 cloves garlic', '2:  Set aside', '3: In a medium bowl, season the ¾ lb chicken with salt, 1 red 1 red bell pepper, and 1 tablespoon cornstarch', '4: Heat a 9', '5: 5" fry pan over medium-high heat and add sesame oil', '6: Add the ¾ lb chicken and cook for 5-6 minutes, or until the ¾ lb chicken begins to brown', '7: Remove ¾ lb chicken and set aside in a separate bowl', '8: Add the 4 cups broccoli and 1 red bell 1 red 1 red bell peppers, and cook for 2-3 minutes', '9: Add the ¾ lb chicken, cashews and sauce', '10:  Stir together and allow sauce to thicken', '11: Remove from heat and serve over brown 1 tablespoon brown rice']

ingredients: ['1 red onion sliced into rings', 'salt to taste', '1 cup vinegar (240 mL)', '6 plantains', '5 cups water (1 L)', '2 cups canola oil (480 mL) divided', '12 slices dominican frying cheese queso de freir', '1 cup flour (125 g)', '18 slices dominican salami salami frito', '6 tablespoons butter sliced', '6 eggs fried for serving', '1 avocado for serving', 'Preparation', '1 red onion sliced into rings', 'salt to taste', '1 cup vinegar (240 mL)', '6 plantains', '5 cups water (1 L)', '2 cups canola oil (480 mL) divided', '12 slices dominican frying cheese queso de freir', '1 cup flour (125 g)', '18 slices dominican salami salami frito', '6 tablespoons butter sliced', '6 eggs fried for serving', '1 avocado for serving', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Place the sliced onions in a medium bowl with a heavy pinch of salt and vinegar', '2:  Let soak while preparing the other ingredients, about 1 hour', '3: Peel the plantains and cut into quarters', '4:  Place the plantains in a large pot with enough water to cover them by 1 inch (2 cm)', '5:  Add salt to taste', '6:  Bring the plantains to a boil over high heat and cook until they are very tender, about 30 minutes', '7: Meanwhile, in a medium skillet, heat the canola oil to 350°F (180°C) over high heat', '8: Coat each slice of Dominican frying cheese in flour, and then place the slices in 1¾ cups (420 ML) canola oil and fry until both sides are golden brown, about 3 minutes', '9:  Remove from skillet and transfer to a paper towel-lined plate', '10: Add another tablespoon of oil to the skillet and fry the salami until brown and crispy on both sides, 4 minutes', '11:  Remove from the skillet, transfer to a paper towel-lined plate', '12: Wipe out the skillet, and add another tablespoon of oil to the pan', '13:  Pour in the onions and their soaking liquid', '14:  Sauté until the onions are soft and bright pink, about 10 minutes', '15: Once the plantains are tender, scoop them out from the water and place in a separate large bowl, and keep the starchy boiling liquid warm on the stove', '16: Add the butter and about 1 cup (240 ml) of the hot starchy plantain liquid', '17:  Mash the cooked plantains together until it is creamy and smooth', '18:  Add more liquid as needed', '19: Serve the mangú with the fried cheese, fried salami, avocado, and fried eggs', '20:  Garnish with pickled onions']

ingredients: ['1 lb ground beef (455 g)', '1 can tomato diced (15 oz - 425g)', '1 can whole kernel corn (15 oz - 425g)', '1 can tomato sauce (15 oz - 425g)', '2 cups water (480 mL)', '1 package taco seasoning', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 cups elbow macaroni (200 g) uncooked', '1 ½ cups colby jack cheese (150 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a large quart pot over medium-high heat brown the 1 lb ground beef', '2:  Drain fat and return beef to the pot', '3: Add 1 package taco seasoning, 2 cups water, diced tomatoes, 1 can whole kernel corn and tomato sauce', '4:  Bring to a boil', '5: Add uncooked 2 cups elbow macaroni and reduce heat to low', '6:  Cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes (until pasta is cooked through)', '7:  Stir occasionally', '8: Remove from heat', '9:  Sprinkle 1 ½ cups colby jack cheese on top and cover', '10: Serve once 1 ½ cups colby jack cheese is melted!']

ingredients: ['Roasted Chickpea & Veggie Brown Rice Bowl', '1 sweet potato peeled and chopped into bite-size pieces', '½ lb brussels sprouts (230 g) trimmed and halved', '1 yellow bell pepper roughly chopped', '½ red onion roughly chopped', '15 oz can of chickpeas drained and rinsed', 'olive oil to taste', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'paprika to taste', '2 cups brown rice (460 g) cooked', 'Roasted Veggie Quinoa Bowl', '2 carrots sliced', '1 head broccoli cut into florets', '1 red bell pepper roughly chopped', '½ head red cabbage sliced', '1 cup sugar snap peas (65 g)', 'olive oil to taste', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'garlic powder to taste', 'onion powder to taste', '2 cups quinoa (340 g) cooked', 'Cilantro Lime Dressing', '¼ cup plain greek yogurt (75 g)', '2 tablespoons lime juice', '1 tablespoon fresh cilantro chopped', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'Soy Maple Dressing', '¼ cup soy sauce (60 mL)', '2 tablespoons pure maple syrup', '1 teaspoon fresh ginger minced', '1 teaspoon garlic minced', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 425˚F (220˚C)', '2:  Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper', '3: On 1 baking sheet, season the vegetables and chickpeas for the Roasted Chickpea & Veggie Brown Rice Bowl with olive oil, salt, pepper, and paprika', '4: On the other baking sheet, season the vegetables for the Roasted Veggie Quinoa Bowl  with olive oil, salt, pepper, garlic powder, and onion powder', '5: Bake for 15 -20 minutes, or until the vegetables are roasted to your liking', '6: Fill 2 glass storage bowls with 1 cup cooked 2 cups brown rice each', '7:  Fill 2 more glass storage bowls with 1 cup cooked 2 cups quinoa each', '8: Fill the 2 cups brown rice bowls with the roasted chickpea and vegetables', '9:  Fill the 2 cups quinoa bowls with the other roasted vegetables', '10:  Mix the 1 tablespoon fresh cilantro-lime dressing ingredients and split the dressing between 2 small glass containers', '11:  Store in the refrigerator with the roasted vegetable and chickpea bowls for up to 4 days', '12: Mix the soy-maple dressing ingredients and split the dressing between 2 small glass containers', '13:  Store in the refrigerator with the roasted vegetable 2 cups quinoa bowls for up to 4 days', '14: To serve, remove the containers with the dressing and heat the bowls in the microwave for 1 minute', '15:  Pour the dressing on top and mix everything together']

ingredients: ['Cake', '¾ cup butter (170 g) softened', '1 ½ cups sugar (300 g)', '3 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '½ cup milk (120 mL)', '1 ½ cups all-purpose flour (190 g)', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '¼ teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon cinnamon', '4 apples peeled and cut into ¼-inch (6.3mm) thick slices recommended: granny smith or pink lady', 'Sauce', '1 cup butter (230 g) melted', '1 cup brown sugar (220 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C) and grease a 9-inch (23cm) cake pan', '2: In a bowl, cream together the butter and 1 ½ cups 1 cup 1 cup brown sugar', '3: Whisk in the 3 eggs, 1 teaspoon vanilla and ½ cup milk until fully incorporated', '4: Add the 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking powder, ¼ teaspoon salt, and 1 tablespoon cinnamon', '5:  Whisk until combined', '6: For the sauce, melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat, and stir in the 1 cup brown 1 ½ cups 1 cup 1 cup brown sugar', '7:  Bring to a boil and continue to stir for 30 seconds, or until vigorously bubbling', '8: Pour the sauce into the greased cake pan', '9: Arrange the 4 apples on top of the sauce in a circular pattern', '10:  Pour cake batter on top of 4 apples and smooth the top of the batter', '11: Bake for 45-55 minutes, or until the cake is done (the top will spring back when gently poked)', '12: Cool for 10-15 minutes and loosen the sides of the cake by running a butter knife around the edge', '13: Place a plate upside down on top of the pan, then invert the pan, flipping the cake onto the plate', '14: Garnish slices with 1 teaspoon vanilla ice cream or whipped cream']

ingredients: ['6 slices bacon chopped', '1 lb shrimp (455 g) peeled and deveined', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '½ medium yellow onion diced', '1 medium tomato diced', '3 cloves garlic minced', '2 cups heavy cream (480 mL)', '1 lb fettuccine (455 g) cooked', '1 cup grated parmesan cheese (110 g)', '½ cup fresh parlsey (20 g) chopped']
instructions: ['1: In a large pot, cook the 6 slices bacon over medium heat until crispy', '2: Add the 1 lb shrimp, 1 teaspoon salt, and ½ teaspoon black pepper and cook until the 1 lb shrimp is pink and opaque', '3:  Remove the 1 lb shrimp and 6 slices bacon from the pot, leaving any fat from cooking the 6 slices bacon behind', '4: Add the onions, tomatoes, and 3 cloves garlic to the pot and cook until the 3 cloves garlic is starting to brown', '5: Add the 2 cups heavy cream and bring to a boil', '6: Once the 2 cups heavy cream is boiling, add the 1 lb fettuccine', '7:  Return the 1 lb shrimp and 6 slices bacon to the pan, along with the Parmesan cheese and parsley', '8:  Stir until the cheese melts and the sauce coats the 1 lb shrimp and pasta nicely', '9: Nutrition  Calories: 2185 Fat: 125 grams  Carbs: 192 grams Fiber: 9 grams  Sugars: 20 grams  Protein: 103 grams']

ingredients: ['1 lb spaghetti (455 g)', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 lb shrimp (455 g) peeled and deveined', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 ½ teaspoons red pepper flakes', '1 small yellow onion', '8 cloves garlic finely chopped about 3 tablespoons', '42 oz canned diced tomato (1 ¼ kg) drained of excess water', '1 teaspoon sugar', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 cup dry white wine (240 mL)', '⅓ cup fresh parsley (10 g) chopped', '4 qt water (3 ½ L) salted']
instructions: ['1: In a 6-quart Dutch oven, bring 4 quarts of 2 teaspoons 4 qt 4 qt water (3 ½ L) salted 42 oz canned diced tomato (1 ¼ kg) drained of excess 4 qt water to a boil over medium-high heat', '2: Add 1 lb spaghetti, cooking about 6-7 minutes until al dente', '3:  Drain and set aside', '4: Return the Dutch oven to the stovetop and heat 2 3 8 cloves 8 cloves garlic finely chopped about 3 tablespoons of olive oil over medium heat', '5: Add the 1 lb shrimp, 2 teaspoons 4 qt 4 qt water (3 ½ L) salt, and ½ teaspoon of the 1 ½ teaspoons red pepper flakes', '6:  Spread evenly across the bottom of the pot and cook until the bottoms pink and slightly brown, about 45-60 seconds', '7:  Flip and repeat until 1 lb shrimp are just cooked through', '8: Remove the 1 lb shrimp and place in a 1 small bowl to the side', '9: Reduce heat to medium-low, and add additional 1 tablespoon of oil to the pot, as needed', '10: Add onion and 8 cloves garlic to the oil and cook until onions have softened, about 3-5 minutes', '11:  Stir frequently to ensure the 8 cloves garlic does not burn', '12: Add the 42 oz canned diced tomatoes, remaining 1 teaspoon of 2 teaspoons 4 qt 4 qt water (3 ½ L) salt, sugar, remaining 1 teaspoon 1 ½ teaspoons red pepper flakes, oregano, and 1 cup dry white wine', '13: Stir and bring the sauce up to a simmer', '14:  Simmer for 5-10 minutes until the sauce has thickened', '15: Return the 1 lb shrimp (and any accumulated juices) to the sauce', '16:  Add the ⅓ cup fresh parsley, stirring to incorporate', '17: Add the cooked 1 lb spaghetti back into the pot, toss until evenly coated and heated, then remove from heat', '18:  Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['oil', '1 lb lean ground turkey (455 g)', '1 oz taco seasoning (30 g) 1 packet', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '28 oz canned diced tomato (800 g) drained']
instructions: ['1: Heat a skillet over high heat', '2:  Once hot, add oil to coat the bottom of the pan', '3: Add the 1 lb lean ground turkey and break apart with a spatula', '4: Add 1 oz taco seasoning, salt, and pepper and stir, cooking until meat has browned and is fully cooked through', '5: Stir in the tomatoes', '6:  Bring to a gentle simmer for about 5 minutes and remove from heat', '7: Assemble 1 oz tacos with your favorite toppings']

ingredients: ['parchment paper or aluminium foil 12x18 inches (30.5 x 46 cm)', '1 chicken breast', '½ red pepper sliced', '½ yellow pepper', '¼ red onion sliced', '3 tablespoons salsa', '1 teaspoon taco seasoning', '1 tablespoon mexican cheese blend', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Fold the parchment paper in half, then open up', '3: Thinly slice the peppers and ¼ red onion and lay them on one half of the parchment paper', '4: Drizzle on 1 tablespoon olive oil and sprinkle on salt & pepper', '5: Lay the 1 chicken on the peppers', '6:  Season with 1 teaspoon taco seasoning, salt and pepper, and spoon on 3 tablespoons salsa', '7:  Top with 1 tablespoon mexican cheese', '8: Fold the parchment paper over the 1 chicken, and cinch the paper together by folding it over itself along the edges', '9: Bake for 25-30 minutes or until internal temperature of 1 chicken reaches 165˚F (75˚C)']

ingredients: ['1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese (100 g)', '1 cup feta cheese (115 g) crumbled', '1 lb pizza dough (450 g) divided into 3 portions', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'Egg wash', '3 eggs']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 425˚F (220˚C)', '2: In a small mixing bowl combine the 1 cup shredded mozzarella and 1 cup feta and set aside', '3: On a large floured surface, roll out the 1 lb pizza dough to an oval roughly 10 inches (25 cm) in length', '4: Transfer the dough to a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '5: Cover surface of dough with 1 tablespoon olive oil and spoon on cheese mixture leaving a 1 inch (2 cm) margin around the outside of the dough', '6: Fold in the 1 inch (2 cm) margin creating a crust around the cheese', '7: Brush the crust with egg Egg wash', '8: Bake for 10 minutes', '9: Remove the baking sheet from oven and with a knife spread out some of the melted cheese in the center of the 1 lb pizza boat and crack an egg into it', '10: Turn down heat to 400˚F (200˚C)', '11: Bake for an additional 6-8 minutes']

ingredients: ['15 oz garbanzo beans (425 g) 1 can drained and rinsed', '¾ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground cumin', '1 clove garlic minced', '1 cup canned sliced beet (200 g) drained', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons water']
instructions: ['1: Pour the rinsed chickpeas onto half the area of a kitchen towel', '2:  Fold the other half of the towel on top of the 15 oz garbanzo beans, and rub them so that the skins start to come off', '3: Place all of the peeled 15 oz garbanzo beans in the bowl of a food processor, along with the ¾ teaspoon salt, ½ teaspoon ground cumin, 1 clove garlic, and beets', '4:  Turn the processor on to break up the mixture', '5: With the food processor running, pour in the 1 tablespoon lemon juice and 1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil, and let the processor run until the mixture is smooth', '6: Serve with your choice of dipping chips or veggies']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons flax meal', '6 tablespoons water', 'olive oil to taste', '1 carrot diced', '1 stalk celery diced', '½ cup onion (75 g) diced', '2 cups cremini mushroom (150 g) diced', '3 cloves garlic minced', '½ cup red bell pepper (50 g) diced', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '1 tablespoon dried parsley', '½ teaspoon dried thyme', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 tablespoon vegan worcestershire', '2 cups lentils (300 g) cooked', '¾ cup brown rice (170 g) cooked', '¾ cup quick-cook oats (75 g)', '¼ cup ketchup (70 g)', '1 teaspoon maple syrup']
instructions: ['1: To make the 2 tablespoons flax eggs, combine the 2 tablespoons flax meal and 6 tablespoons water in a small bowl and mix well', '2:  Set aside for at least 10 minutes', '3: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C)', '4: In a large saucepan, heat a bit of olive oil over medium heat', '5:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the 1 carrot and 1 stalk celery and cook until lightly ¾ cup browned, 2-3 minutes', '6: Add the ½ cup onion and mushrooms', '7:  Cook another 3-4 minutes, until the ½ cup onions are semi-translucent', '8: Add another drizzle of olive oil to the pan, then add the 3 cloves garlic, ½ cup red bell ½ cup red bell ¼ teaspoon pepper, and 2 tablespoons tomato paste', '9:  Cook for 2 more minutes, until the 2 tablespoons tomato paste is slightly ¾ cup browned', '10: Add the ½ teaspoon salt, ½ cup red bell ¼ teaspoon pepper, 1 tablespoon dried parsley, and ½ teaspoon dried thyme, and cook for 1 more minute, until fragrant', '11: Add the 1 tablespoon soy sauce and Worcestershire sauce and cook for 2 more minutes, or until the vegetables are tender', '12:  Remove the pan from the heat', '13: In a food processor, add the 2 cups lentils, ¾ cup brown rice, ¾ cup quick-cook oats, 2 tablespoons flax eggs, and sautéed vegetables', '14:  Pulse 10-12 times until the mixture is slightly chunky', '15: Transfer the mixture to a parchment paper-lined loaf pan and smooth the top with a spatula', '16: To make the glaze, combine the ¼ cup ketchup and 1 teaspoon maple syrup in a small bowl', '17:  Brush half of glaze on top of loaf, reserving the other half for later', '18: Bake the loaf for 45-50 minutes, or until an fork inserted in the middle comes out clean', '19: Brush with the remaining glaze, then slice and serve']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion chopped', '1 lb ground beef (455 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '28 oz crushed tomato (795 g) 1 can', '½ cup vodka (120 mL)', '½ teaspoon red chili flake', '½ cup heavy cream (120 mL)', '4 cups penne pasta (400 g)', 'fresh parsley to garnish', '½ cup Parmesan (110 g) to garnish']
instructions: ['1: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large pot over high heat', '2:  Cook 1 onion until translucent', '3: Add 1 lb ground beef, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1 teaspoon pepper, cooking until all the moisture has evaporated and the 1 lb ground beef is browned', '4: Add 28 oz crushed tomatoes, ½ cup vodka, and ½ teaspoon red chili flakes, stirring and cooking until half of the liquid has evaporated and the sauce has reduced', '5: Add ½ cup heavy cream, stirring until evenly incorporated', '6: Stir in 4 cups penne pasta until evenly coated', '7: Serve with fresh parsley and parmesan', '8: Nutrition  Calories: 1753 Fat: 69 grams  Carbs: 193 grams Fiber: 13 grams  Sugars: 22 grams  Protein: 93 grams']

ingredients: ['2 small zucchinis', '1 medium sweet potato peeled', '1 daikon radish 6 inch (15 cm) peeled', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '2 tablespoons fish sauce', '2 tablespoons tamarind paste or lime juice', '6 cloves garlic minced divided', '¼ cup water (60 mL)', 'coconut oil to taste', '1 lb boneless skinless chicken thighs (455 g) sliced', '1 medium shallot thinly sliced', '2 teaspoons chili paste or 1 diced jalapeño', '⅓ cup roasted peanut (40 g) plus more for garnish', '½ cup bean sprout (50 g) plus more for garnish', '¼ cup fresh cilantro leaves (10 g) plus more for garnish', 'lime wedge for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Trim the ends of the zucchini, then use a vegetable peeler to peel into thin, flat noodles', '2:  Repeat with the sweet potato and 1 daikon radish', '3:  Set aside', '4: In a wok or large pan over medium-high heat, combine the 2 tablespoons brown sugar, 2 tablespoons fish sauce, 2 tablespoons tamarind paste, 3 6 cloves of garlic, and the ¼ cup water', '5:  Cook until the sugar has dissolved and the sauce is slightly thickened, about 3 minutes', '6:  Remove the pan from the heat and transfer the pad thai sauce to a bowl until ready to use', '7:  Wipe out the pan', '8: Heat a drizzle of coconut oil in the same pan over medium-high heat', '9:  Add the 1 lb boneless skinless chicken thighs and cook for 4 minutes on each side, until 2 tablespoons browned and cooked through', '10:  Remove the 1 lb boneless skinless chicken from the pan and set aside', '11: Add a bit more coconut oil to the pan, if needed, then add the shallot, 2 teaspoons chili paste, and remaining 3 6 cloves of garlic', '12:  Cook until the shallots are softened and the aromatics are fragrant, 2 minutes', '13: Add the peanuts and ½ cup bean sprouts, and cook for 1 minute, until the sprouts are softened', '14:  Add half of the reserved pad thai sauce and cook until thickened, 3 minutes', '15: Add the vegetable noodles and 1 lb boneless skinless chicken, and stir to coat with the sauce, adding more as needed', '16:  Add the ¼ cup fresh cilantro, toss, and cook for 30-60 seconds, until the noodles are just warmed through but not soggy', '17: Serve immediately garnished with more ¼ cup fresh cilantro, ½ cup bean sprouts, peanuts, and 2 tablespoons tamarind paste or lime wedges']

ingredients: ['1 rack baby back ribs halved', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '2 teaspoons paprika', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '¼ cup brown sugar (55 g)', '1 cup BBQ sauce (290 g)', '1 lb green beans (455 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 275˚F (140˚C)', '2: Season the 1 rack baby back ribs with 2 teaspoons salt, 1 teaspoon black pepper, 2 teaspoons paprika, 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 2 teaspoons dried oregano, and ¼ cup brown sugar', '3:  Rub in the seasonings evenly on both sides', '4: Place the 1 rack baby back ribs on a baking sheet lined with foil', '5:  Cover the 1 rack baby back ribs with foil', '6: Bake for 2 hours', '7: Increase the oven temperature to 500˚F (260˚C)', '8: Carefully uncover the 1 rack baby back ribs', '9:  Spread BBQ 1 cup BBQ sauce evenly on top of the 1 rack baby back ribs', '10: Place 1 lb green beans on the sides of the pan', '11:  Season the 1 lb green beans with 2 teaspoons salt', '12: Bake for 10 minutes', '13: Transfer the 1 rack baby back ribs to a cutting board', '14: Cut between the bones to separate into individual 1 rack baby back ribs', '15:  Serve with 1 lb green beans']

ingredients: ['yogurt', 'raspberry', 'blueberry', 'strawberry', 'granola', 'Preparation', 'yogurt', 'raspberry', 'blueberry', 'strawberry', 'granola', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: In a mason jar, layer the yogurt, berries and granola on top of one another until your desired serving is achieved']

ingredients: ['1 cup chickpeas (200 g)', '1 zucchini grated', '1 carrot grated', '2 eggs', '½ cup whole wheat panko (10 g)', '2 teaspoons fresh basil chopped', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', 'olive oil', 'Garnish', 'plain greek yogurt', 'green onion diced']
instructions: ['1: Mash 1 cup chickpeas with a fork in a large bowl', '2:  Set aside', '3: Grate 1 zucchini', '4:  Place in a clean dish towel or cloth', '5: Grate carrots', '6:  Place in a clean dish towel or cloth with 1 zucchini', '7: Squeeze out as much moisture as possible', '8: Add veggies, ½ cup whole wheat panko, egg, 2 teaspoons fresh basil, ½ teaspoon garlic powder, ½ teaspoon salt, and ½ teaspoon pepper to the bowl with the mashed 1 cup chickpeas', '9: Stir until completely combined', '10: Heat olive oil in a large skillet on medium heat', '11: Scoop 2 tablespoons of mixture into your hand press to compress it into a patty', '12: Cook for about 1-2 minutes, until the underside is golden brown then flip and repeat', '13: Serve with a dollop of plain greek yogurt and diced green onion']

ingredients: ['2 oranges juiced', '2 lemons juiced', '1 inch piece fresh turmeric peeled', '⅛ teaspoon black pepper', '⅛ teaspoon cayenne']
instructions: ['1: Combine the orange juice, lemon juice, 1 inch piece fresh turmeric, ⅛ teaspoon black pepper, and ⅛ teaspoon cayenne in a blender and blend until smooth', '2: Divide among 4 shot glasses']

ingredients: ['⅓ cup old fashion oat (35 g)', '2 teaspoons cocoa powder', '2 tablespoons nut butter of your choice', '1 ½ frozen bananas', '⅔ cup milk (160 mL) of your choice']
instructions: ['1: Add the oats, 2 tablespoons nut butter, banana, ⅔ cup milk, and 2 teaspoons cocoa powder to a blender', '2: Blend for 30 seconds', '3:  Scrape down the sides with a spoon or spatula, if needed, and blend for another 30 seconds', '4: Pour into a mason jar or tumbler', '5: Garnish with banana slices and additional oats, if desired', '6: Refrigerate until ready to serve']

ingredients: ['3 boneless skinless chicken breasts', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon lemon  zest', '9 asparagus ends trimmed', '3 slices provolone cheese', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon olive oil']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 425˚F (220˚F)', '2: On a cutting board, cut the 3 boneless skinless chicken breasts in half, lengthwise, leaving it intact on one side', '3: Season the inside of the 3 boneless skinless chicken with salt and pepper', '4: Sprinkle the 1 tablespoon lemon zest on the interior of the 3 boneless skinless chicken', '5:  Top with piece of 3 slices provolone and three stalks of 9 asparagus, then fold the 3 boneless skinless chicken over enclosing the filling', '6: Season the outside of the 3 boneless skinless chicken breasts with salt, pepper, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, and 1 teaspoon paprika', '7: Heat a large oven-safe skillet over medium-high heat, and add the 1 teaspoon olive oil', '8:  Add the 3 boneless skinless chicken to the pan, and cook for 3 to 5 minutes, until golden brown', '9: Flip the 3 boneless skinless chicken over and cook for an additional 3 to 5 minutes', '10: Cover the skillet with aluminum foil and place in the oven for 15 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 155˚F (70˚C)', '11: Remove the skillet and let sit, covered, for 5 minutes', '12: Remove the foil, and serve']

ingredients: ['1 lb ground beef (455 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '½ white onion diced', '1 clove garlic minced', '¾ cup ketchup (180 g)', '2 teaspoons mustard', '1 teaspoon worcestershire sauce', '2 teaspoons brown sugar', '1 pack dinner roll', '½ cup shredded cheddar cheese (50 g)', '2 tablespoons butter melted', 'sesame seed']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: In a saucepan over medium heat, add the 1 lb ground beef and sprinkle with 1 teaspoon salt and ½ teaspoon pepper', '3: Using a spoon, break up the meat and stir until 2 teaspoons browned', '4: Add the ½ white onion and 1 clove garlic and continue to cook until the ½ white onions are translucent', '5: Add the ¾ cup ketchup, 2 teaspoons mustard, Worcestershire, and 2 teaspoons brown sugar', '6: Stir until the meat is fully cooked and sauce is evenly combined', '7:  Set aside', '8: Cut the 1 pack dinner rolls in half and place the bottom half in a baking pan', '9: Top with meat and sprinkle with ½ cup shredded cheddar cheese', '10:  Place the top of the rolls back on top', '11: Brush the rolls with melted 2 tablespoons butter and sprinkle with sesame seeds', '12: Bake for 10 minutes, or until rolls are toasted and ½ cup shredded cheddar cheese is melted', '13: Cut into individual sliders']

ingredients: ['20 oz pork belly (500 g) lean', '4 cups water (960 mL) plus 250 milliliters divided', '4 slices of fresh ginger', '1 spring onion cut into 2-inch (5 cm) pieces', '2 cloves garlic crushed', '2 tablespoons oil', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '3 tablespoons light soy sauce', '3 tablespoons dark soy sauce', '3 tablespoons shaoxing rice wine', 'cooked rice for serving', 'sliced green onion for serving', 'Preparation', '20 oz pork belly (500 g) lean', '4 cups water (960 mL) plus 250 milliliters divided', '4 slices of fresh ginger', '1 spring onion cut into 2-inch (5 cm) pieces', '2 cloves garlic crushed', '2 tablespoons oil', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '3 tablespoons light soy sauce', '3 tablespoons dark soy sauce', '3 tablespoons shaoxing rice wine', 'cooked rice for serving', 'sliced green onion for serving', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Cut the pork belly into roughly 1-inch (2 ½ cm) cubes', '2: Bring 1 liter of water to a boil in a pot, then add the pork, ginger, onion, and garlic, and cook for 3-4 minutes', '3: Remove the pork from the water using a slotted spoon and drain on a plate lined with a paper towel', '4:  Discard the remaining water and vegetables', '5: Clean and dry the pot, then return it to high heat and add the olive oil', '6:  Return the pork to the pan and cook until browned', '7:  The oil may pop and splatter, so be careful', '8: Add the brown sugar, then reduce the heat to low', '9:  Stir continuously until the sugar has melted, caramelized, and coated the pork evenly', '10: Immediately add the soy sauces and rice wine, stirring continuously for 5-6 minutes more, or until the liquid has reduced to a thick glaze', '11: Add the remaining 250 milliliters of water', '12:  Stir, cover, and simmer for about 45 minutes', '13:  Make sure the mixture is at a low simmer, not boiling', '14:  Stir every 10 minutes or so, adding more water if the pot is getting dry', '15: Remove the lid', '16:  The sauce should coat the pork in a very thick glaze', '17:  If it is too runny, continue to stir, uncovered, until the liquid has reduced', '18: Serve immediately over a bowl of rice and sprinkle with sliced green onions', '19: Nutrition  Calories: 1704 Fat: 162 grams  Carbs: 27 grams Fiber: 1 gram  Sugars: 9 grams  Protein: 30 grams']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 chicken breasts cubed', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '3 cloves garlic minced', '2 tablespoons flour', '1 cup chicken broth (240 mL)', '1 cup skim milk (240 mL) or milk of choice', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '2 cups spinach (80 g)', '2 cups whole grain penne pasta (400 g) cooked', '¼ cup parmesan cheese (30 g) optional']
instructions: ['1: Heat the 1 tablespoon olive oil over a skillet and add chicken', '2:  Season with salt and pepper, and cook 5-8 minutes, or until no longer pink', '3: Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside', '4: In the same pan, add the 3 cloves garlic and sauté for one minute over medium heat', '5: Sprinkle the 2 tablespoons flour over the 3 cloves garlic and slowly add in the chicken stock', '6: Quickly stir to avoid lumps', '7: Add in the 1 cup skim milk, stir ,and allow to reach a boil to thicken sauce', '8:  Season with salt and pepper', '9: Once the sauce is thickened, add in the 2 cups spinach and stir until wilted', '10: Remove from heat and add in the cooked 2 cups whole grain penne, chicken, and ¼ cup parmesan', '11:  Stir to coat', '12: Top with fresh ¼ cup parmesan']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ cup onion (75 g) finely chopped', '7 oz extra firm tofu (200 g) 1/2 block', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '¾ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon cumin', '¼ teaspoon paprika', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '2 cups brown rice (460 g) cooked', '2 cups shredded lettuce (145 g)', '½ cup black beans (85 g)', '½ cup corn (90 g) fire-roasted', '⅓ cup pico de gallo (45 g)', '½ cup guacamole (65 g)', '¼ cup red onion (40 g) pickled', 'fresh cilantro for garnish']
instructions: ['1: In a large saucepan, heat the 1 tablespoon olive oil over medium heat', '2:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the onion and cook until semi-translucent, 3-4 minutes', '3: Use your hands to crumble the 7 oz extra firm tofu into the pan, then use a spatula to continue to break apart while cooking for 3-4 minutes, until slightly 2 cups browned', '4: Add the 1 tablespoon soy sauce, 1 teaspoon chili powder, ¾ teaspoon garlic powder, ½ teaspoon cumin, ¼ teaspoon paprika, and 1 pinch cayenne', '5:  Continue to cook and break the 7 oz extra firm tofu apart until 2 cups browned and crumbly', '6: To assemble, spread 2 cups brown rice on the bottom of a bowl, then layer on 2 cups shredded lettuce, ½ cup black beans, ½ cup corn, 7 oz extra firm tofu sofritas, ⅓ cup pico de gallo, ½ cup guacamole, and onions', '7: Serve topped with fresh cilantro']

ingredients: ['1 cup greek yogurt (285 g)', '1 cup almond milk (240 mL)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 tablespoons honey', '¼ cup chia seeds (40 g)', '2 tablespoons dark cocoa powder', 'Toppings', 'slivered almond', 'chocolate shaving']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, mix the 1 cup greek yogurt, 1 cup slivered almond milk, 1 teaspoon vanilla, 2 tablespoons honey, ¼ cup chia seeds, and 2 tablespoons dark cocoa powder together until well combined', '2: Pour the mixture into an airtight container and refrigerate, covered for 4 hours', '3: Spoon the pudding into desired serving dish and top with slivered 1 cup slivered almonds and chocolate shavings']

ingredients: ['3 boneless skinless chicken breasts', '2 large zucchinis sliced', '2 cartons cherry tomato', '3 cloves garlic chopped', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 jar pesto', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese (115 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2: Line a baking tray with aluminum foil', '3: Lay out the 3 3 boneless skinless chicken breasts in the middle of the baking tray', '4:  Spread the zucchini evenly on one end and the 2 cartons cherry tomatoes on the other', '5: Sprinkle the 2 tablespoons olive oil, 3 cloves garlic, salt, and pepper evenly over everything', '6:  Toss veggies to coat', '7: Pour the 1 jar of pesto evenly over the 3 boneless skinless chicken breasts and top with 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '8: Bake in a preheated oven for 25-30 minutes', '9: Rest 3 boneless skinless chicken 10 minutes before serving', '10:  Lay 3 boneless skinless chicken on bed of vegetables and sprinkle 1 cup shredded mozzarella to serve']

ingredients: ['4 ripe bananas', '3 eggs', '½ cup oil (120 mL)', '½ cup granulated sugar (100 g)', '1 tablespoon ground cinnamon', '2 cups all-purpose flour (250 g)', '½ cup butter (115 g)', '1 cup brown sugar (220 g)', '2 bananas sliced', 'vanilla ice cream']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C)', '2: In a large bowl, mash the 4 ripe 4 ripe 2 bananas', '3:  Add the 3 eggs, ½ cup oil, ½ cup granulated 1 cup 1 cup brown sugar, and 1 tablespoon ground cinnamon, mixing until evenly incorporated', '4: Add the 2 cups all-purpose flour and mix until the batter has no large pockets of 2 cups all-purpose flour', '5:  Set aside', '6: In a pot over medium-low heat, melt the ½ cup butter, then mix in the 1 cup brown ½ cup granulated 1 cup 1 cup brown sugar until dissolved', '7: Bring up the heat to medium-high, cooking until the mixture starts bubbling and the ½ cup granulated 1 cup 1 cup brown sugar has melted', '8: Remove the caramel from heat and pour into a greased 9x9-inch (23x23 cm) baking pan', '9: Lay the banana slices evenly on top of the caramel', '10: Spread the banana bread batter on top', '11: Bake 40-50 minutes', '12: Cool until the bottom is barely warm and use a knife to loosen the edges from the pan', '13: Place a plate upside-down on top of the pan, then invert the pan, flipping the banana bread onto the plate', '14: Slice, then serve with vanilla ice cream']

ingredients: ['½ cup instant oatmeal (50 g)', '2 tablespoons freeze-dried blueberry', '1 tablespoon slivered almond', '1 tablespoon chia seed', '⅛ teaspoon vanilla bean', '2 teaspoons sugar of choice', '¾ cup boiling water (175 mL) or milk']
instructions: ['1: Add the ½ cup instant oatmeal, freeze-dried blueberries, almonds, 1 tablespoon chia seeds, ⅛ teaspoon vanilla bean, and 2 teaspoons sugar into a mason jar', '2: Store in a cool, dry place for up to a month', '3: To prepare, pour ¾ cup boiling water or milk over oats', '4:  Stir to combine and let sit for 3 minutes', '5: Serve with 1 tablespoon slivered almonds and fresh blueberries']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons ground flaxseed', '6 tablespoons water', '½ cup coconut oil (120 g) melted', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '¼ cup brown sugar (55 g)', '1 teaspoon almond extract', '1 ½ cups all-purpose flour (190 g)', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '½ cup rolled oats (40 g)', '¾ cup dried cranberries (95 g) or use fresh cranberries for more tartness', '½ cup sliced almonds (35 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: To make the flax eggs, mix together the flax meal and 6 tablespoons water in a small bowl', '4:  Let sit for at least 10 minutes to set', '5: In a large bowl, whisk together the ½ cup coconut oil, granulated ½ cup ¼ cup ¼ cup brown sugar, ¼ cup brown ½ cup ¼ cup ¼ cup brown sugar, flax eggs, and 1 teaspoon ½ cup ½ cup sliced almond extract until well-combined', '6: Sift in the 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour, baking powder, and baking soda, and stir with a spatula until combined', '7: Fold in the ½ cup rolled oats, ¾ cup dried cranberries, and ½ cup sliced 1 teaspoon ½ cup ½ cup sliced almonds until incorporated', '8: Use an ice cream scoop to scoop the cookies onto the prepared baking sheet, spacing about 2 inches (5 cm) apart', '9: Bake for 20-22 minutes, until lightly golden around the edges']

ingredients: ['Raspberry Jam', '1 cup raspberry (125 g)', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', 'Cookies', '1 cup all-purpose flour (125 g) plus more for dusting', '1 cup almond flour', '8 tablespoons unsalted butter plus 2 tablespoons softened', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '1 pinch of kosher salt', '½ teaspoon lemon zest', '1 teaspoon McCormick® vanilla extract', '3 tablespoons McCormick® poppy seeds optional', '1 large egg']
instructions: ['1: Make the 1 cup raspberry jam: In a medium pot over medium heat, combine the raspberries, sugar, and 1 tablespoon ½ teaspoon lemon juice', '2:  Cook for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until thickened', '3:  Remove from the heat and refrigerate for at least 2 hours before assembling the cookies', '4: Make the cookies: In a medium bowl, mix together the all-purpose 1 cup all-purpose 1 cup 1 cup almond flour and 1 cup almond 1 cup all-purpose 1 cup 1 cup almond flour', '5:  Set aside', '6: In a 1 large bowl, cream together the 8 tablespoons unsalted butter, sugar, 1 pinch of kosher salt, 1 tablespoon ½ teaspoon lemon zest, and vanilla with an electric hand mixer until fluffy, about 3 minutes', '7: Add the 3 tablespoons McCormick® poppy seeds and beat for 1 minute to distribute evenly', '8: Add the egg and beat for 1–2 minutes, until well incorporated', '9: Pour in the 1 cup all-purpose 1 cup 1 cup almond flour mixture and fold with a spatula, just until no streaks of 1 cup all-purpose 1 cup 1 cup almond flour remain', '10:  Wrap the dough in plastic wrap and chill in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour or until firm', '11: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '12:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '13: Unwrap the dough on a 1 cup all-purpose 1 cup 1 cup almond floured surface and dust the top of the dough with more 1 cup all-purpose 1 cup 1 cup almond flour', '14:  Roll out the dough to ¼-inch (½ cm) thickness', '15: Using a 2½-inch (6 ⅓ cm) round cookie cutter with ridged edges, cut out cookies, chilling and re-rolling the dough as needed to cut out more cookies', '16:  You should have about 38 total', '17: Use a ½-inch (1 ¼ cm) cutter to cut out the centers of half of the cookies', '18:  Transfer cookies to the prepared baking sheet', '19: Bake the cookies for 12 minutes or until the edges are golden brown', '20:  Let cool completely', '21: To assemble, spread 1 teaspoon of jam onto the whole cookies', '22:  Top with the cut-out cookies']

ingredients: ['Polenta', '3 cups water (720 mL)', 'kosher salt to taste', '1 cup polenta (160 g)', '1 cup milk (240 mL) of your choice', '½ cup grated parmesan cheese (55 g)', '1 tablespoon unsalted butter', 'pepper to taste', 'Mushrooms', 'olive oil to taste', '2 medium shallots finely chopped', 'kosher salt to taste', '4 sprigs fresh thyme', '1 lb mixed mushroom (455 g) such as shiitake and cremini steams trimmed sliced', '½ cup dry sherry (120 mL)', '¼ cup vegetable stock (60 mL)', 'pepper to taste', 'Gremolata', '2 cloves garlic grated', '1 bunch fresh parsley chopped', '2 lemons lemon zest', 'kosher salt to taste']
instructions:
['1: Make the 1 cup polenta: Bring salted 3 cups water to boil in a 2 medium pot over 2 medium-high heat', '2:  Pour in the 1 cup polenta and stir for 2 minutes', '3:  Reduce the heat to low, cover, and simmer for 30 minutes, stirring every 10 minutes to make sure the 1 cup polenta isn’t sticking or burning', '4: Right before serving, stir the 1 cup milk, Parmesan, and 1 tablespoon unsalted butter into the 1 cup polenta', '5:  Season with salt and pepper to taste', '6: Meanwhile, make the mushrooms: Heat a drizzle of olive oil in a large skillet over 2 medium heat', '7:  Add the shallots and sweat until softened and slightly translucent, about 2 minutes', '8: Season with salt, then add the 4 sprigs fresh thyme leaves and mushrooms', '9:  Cook until the mushrooms are caramelized and softened, about 5 minutes', '10: Pour in the ½ cup dry sherry to deglaze the pan and stir to loosen any browned bits from the bottom', '11:  Cook off the alcohol, about 1 minute', '12:  Add the ¼ cup vegetable stock and season with salt and pepper', '13:  Bring to a boil, then let the liquid reduce for about 10 minutes', '14:  Remove from the heat', '15: Make the gremolata: In a small bowl, combine the 2 cloves garlic, 1 bunch fresh parsley, and 2 lemon zest', '16:  Season with salt to taste', '17: Divide the hot 1 cup polenta between serving bowls and top with the mushrooms and gremolata', '18: Nutrition, all included

Calories: 413
Total fat: 22 grams 
Sodium: 1351 mg
Total carbs: 42 grams
Dietary fiber: 6 grams
Sugars: 6 grams
Protein: 15 grams']

ingredients: ['Cashew Cream', '¾ cup cashews (75 g)', '6 oz goat cheese (170 g)', '½ cup cream (120 mL)', '1 cup milk (240 mL)', '4 tablespoons sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', 'Filling', '½ onion diced', '4 cloves garlic minced', '½ lb ground pork (225 g)', '½ lb ground beef (225 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 tomatoes diced', '1 pear diced', '1 apple diced', '1 peach diced', '½ plantain diced', '½ cup raisin (75 g)', '½ cup almond (70 g) sliced', '¼ cup pine nuts (35 g)', '3 poblano chiles', 'Empanada dough', '1 cup flour (125 g)', '1 tablespoon salt', '½ cup butter (115 g)', '½ cup milk (120 mL)', '1 egg beaten', 'egg wash', 'Garnish', 'fresh cilantro', 'pomegrante']
instructions: ['1: Blend all the cashew ½ cup cream ingredients in a blender until smooth', '2:  Set aside', '3: Fry ½ onion and 4 cloves garlic for a few minutes, then add the ground pork and the ground beef, seasoned with salt and pepper', '4:  Continue stirring and browning the meat until cooked through, about 3-5 minutes', '5: Add all the fruit, raisins, almonds, and ¼ cup pine nuts, stir to combine, then remove from heat and chill', '6: Poach the 3 poblano pepper, remove the skin', '7:  Open and remove the seeds and veins, then cut into strips', '8:  Set aside', '9: Preheat oven to 500˚F (250˚C) (or as high as your oven will go)', '10: For the empanada Empanada dough, mix 1 cup flour, ½ cup butter, salt and milk, kneading into a Empanada dough', '11:  Add egg, then knead until firm', '12: Pinch off a bit of Empanada dough and flatten into a circle, adding two strips of chile 3 poblano and the meat filling', '13: Put a bit of water on your finger and wet the edge of half the empanada', '14:  Close the empanada and use a fork to seal the edges', '15: Brush with an egg wash before putting on a baking sheet', '16: Bake 20-25 minutes or until golden brown', '17: Top the empanadas with cashew ½ cup cream and garnish with pomegranate and fresh cilantro']

ingredients: ['Anchovy and Kelp Broth', '2 cups water (240 mL)', '4 dried anchovies', '1 dried kelp', 'Kimchi Jjigae', '1 teaspoon vegetable oil', '¼ medium white onion thinly sliced', '4 cloves garlic thinly sliced', '3 oz pork belly (85 g) cut into 1 (2.54 cm)', '¾ cup kimchi (80 g) drained and chopped into bite-sized pieces juices reserved', '1 teaspoon korean chile flakes gochugaru', '½ teaspoon sugar', 'sea salt to taste', '8 oz firm tofu (225 g) cut into 1/2 in (1.2 cm)', '2 shiitake mushrooms stems removed thinly sliced', '1 green onion chopped', '½ teaspoon sesame oil', 'white rice steamed for serving (optional)']
instructions: ['1: Make the anchovy and kelp broth: In a ¼ medium pot, combine the 2 cups water, dried anchovies, and kelp', '2:  Bring to a low boil, then reduce the heat to ¼ medium low, cover, and simmer for 25 minutes', '3:  Strain the broth and discard the solids', '4:  Set the broth aside until ready to use', '5: Make the ¾ cup kimchi jjigae: Heat the 1 teaspoon vegetable oil in a ¼ medium pot over high heat', '6:  Add the onion, 4 cloves garlic, and 3 oz pork belly and cook until the onions soften and the 3 oz pork is lightly browned, about 5 minutes', '7: Add the drained, chopped ¾ cup kimchi and cook for 2–3 minutes, until slightly darkened', '8: Add the Korean chile flakes, ½ teaspoon sugar, sea salt, reserved ¾ cup kimchi juice, and anchovy and kelp broth and stir well to combine', '9: Lay the 8 oz firm tofu and 2 shiitake mushrooms on top of the soup and gently stir to submerge in the broth (do not break up the 8 oz firm tofu)', '10:  Cover the pot, reduce the heat to low, and simmer for 30 minutes', '11:  Remove the pot from the heat and season the soup with more sea salt to taste', '12: Ladle the soup into bowls and top with the 1 green onion and ½ teaspoon sesame oil', '13:  Serve with ¼ medium white rice, if desired']

ingredients: ['2 lb chicken wings (905 g)', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons cornstarch', '1 teaspoon pepper', '2 teaspoons salt']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 425˚F (220˚C)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: In a large bowl, combine the 2 lb chicken wings, 2 tablespoons olive oil, corn starch, 1 teaspoon pepper, and 2 teaspoons salt and toss with tongs to coat', '4: Transfer the wings to the baking sheet', '5:  Bake for 40 minutes, until golden and crispy', '6: Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['Cinnamon Roll Bites', '1 cup toasted almonds (140 g)', '1 cup toasted cashews (130 g)', '5 medjool dates pitted', '¼ cup coconut oil (60 mL) melted', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 pinch kosher salt', 'For Rolling', '¼ cup coconut sugar (50 g)', '1 tablespoon ground cinnamon']
instructions: ['1: Add the 1 cup toasted almonds and 1 cup toasted cashews to a food processor', '2:  Process until ground', '3:  Add the 5 medjool dates, melted coconut oil, and 1 teaspoon vanilla and process until smooth', '4:  Add the cinnamon and 1 pinch kosher salt and continue processing until the mixture holds together, about 1 minute', '5: Roll the nut mixture into 14 even portions using a 0', '6: 8-ounce scoop', '7:  Roll into balls', '8:  Chill in the refrigerator for 10 minutes', '9: In a small bowl, mix together the coconut sugar and cinnamon', '10: Toss the cinnamon roll bites in the coconut sugar mixture until well coated', '11: The bites will keep in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 1 week']

ingredients: ['8 lb skin on pork belly (3.6 kg)', '1 cup kosher salt (240 g) plus 2 teaspoons kosher salt divided', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '2 tablespoons fennel seeds', '½ cup fresh rosemary (35 g)', '4 lemons lemon zest', '⅓ cup fresh thyme (15 g)', '8 cloves garlic', '1 teaspoon coarsely ground black pepper', '2 ½ lb boneless pork loin (1.1 g) Not tenderloin trimmed of excess fat', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', 'Preparation', '8 lb skin on pork belly (3.6 kg)', '1 cup kosher salt (240 g) plus 2 teaspoons kosher salt divided', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '2 tablespoons fennel seeds', '½ cup fresh rosemary (35 g)', '4 lemons lemon zest', '⅓ cup fresh thyme (15 g)', '8 cloves garlic', '1 teaspoon coarsely ground black pepper', '2 ½ lb boneless pork loin (1.1 g) Not tenderloin trimmed of excess fat', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Set the pork belly on a rimmed baking sheet', '2:  Season all over with ½ cup (120 g) of salt and the sugar', '3:  Wrap tightly in plastic wrap and refrigerate for 24 hours', '4: When ready to cook the pork, preheat the oven to 250˚F (120˚C)', '5: Unwrap the pork belly and rinse off all the salt and sugar with cold water', '6:  Pat dry with paper towels, then place skin-side down on a baking sheet or large cutting board', '7: Add the fennel seeds to a food processor and pulse until finely ground', '8:  Transfer to a small bowl and wipe out the processor', '9: To the clean food processor, add the rosemary, lemon zest, thyme, garlic, 2 teaspoons of salt, and the pepper, and pulse until finely chopped and well combined', '10: Spread the garlic-herb paste evenly over the meat side of the pork belly', '11: Place the pork loin parallel along a short side of the pork belly', '12:  Roll up the belly to encase the loin and position the roll seam-side down', '13: Set a wire rack over a baking sheet and grease with nonstick spray', '14:  Arrange 8 30-inch (75 cm) long pieces of kitchen twine over the wire rack, spacing 1½ inches (4 cm) apart', '15:  Place the pork roll,
