seam-side down, across the center of the twine pieces', '16: Starting with the centermost piece, tie the twine as tightly as you can around the pork roll, using 2 double knots', '17:  Work your way from the center toward either end to tie the rest of the twine', '18:  Cut off the excess twine', '19: Add the other ½ cup (120 g) of salt to the bowl with the ground fennel seeds and stir to combine', '20:  Sprinkle over the pork roll and rub into the skin', '21: Roast the porchetta for about 3 hours, until an instant-read thermometer inserted into the center reaches 145˚F (63˚C)', '22:  Remove from the oven', '23: Increase the oven temperature to 450˚F (230˚C)', '24:  Transfer the pork roll, still on the wire rack, to a cutting board', '25:  Pour any pan juices into a small bowl and skim off any fat', '26: Set the porchetta on the wire rack over the baking sheet, then return to the oven and roast for about 30 minutes more, until the skin is bubbling, crisp, and golden', '27: Transfer the porchetta to a cutting board and let rest for 20 minutes', '28:  Removed the twine and carve into ½-inch (1 ¼ cm) thick slices', '29:  Serve hot, with pan juices spooned over']

ingredients: ['3 stalks celery diced', '1 gala apple cored and diced', '2 cups beet (400 g) diced', '3 cups spinach (120 g)']
instructions: ['1: Add the 3 stalks celery, 1 gala apple, beets, and 3 cups spinach to a blender, and blend until smooth', '2: Using a mesh strainer, strain the juice over a large liquid measuring cup to remove the pulp', '3:  Use a spoon to help stir the pulp and press out the liquid', '4:  Reserve the pulp to make pulp muffins', '5: Chill the juice for at least 30 minutes (and keep up to 3 days)']

ingredients: ['2 russet potatoes cut into 8 wedges', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '4 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon italian seasoning', '½ cup freshly grated parmesan cheese (55 g)', '4 top sirloin steaks 1-inch (2 cm) think patted dry', '2 tablespoons fresh parsley chopped', '4 tablespoons garlic butter to serve']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚F)', '2: Place 2 russet potatoes in a single layer onto one of a greased baking sheet and drizzle with 2 tablespoons olive oil, and season with salt, pepper, garlic, Italian seasoning, and Parmesan, gently tossing to combine', '3: Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until golden brown and crisp, tossing occasionally', '4: Preheat oven to broil', '5: Season 4 top sirloin steaks with salt and pepper, to taste, and place onto the opposite side of the prepared baking sheet in a single layer', '6: Place into oven and broil until the steak is browned and charred at the edges, about 4-5 minutes per side for medium-rare, or until desired doneness', '7: Serve immediately with garlic butter, and top with 2 tablespoons fresh parsley']

ingredients: ['4 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons butter', '6 cups yellow onion (900 g) thinly sliced', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon sugar', '3 tablespoons flour', '6 cups beef stock (1.4 L)', '1 cup white wine (240 mL)', '½ teaspoon ground sage', '1 leaf whole bay leaf', '1 loaf french bread or baguette', '3 tablespoons cognac optional', '12 oz swiss cheese (340 g) grated', 'pepper to taste', '4 oz parmesan cheese (110 g) grated']
instructions: ['1: In a large pot over medium-low heat, heat 4 tablespoons olive oil and add 2 tablespoons butter', '2:  Once the 2 tablespoons butter is melted, stir the onions and coat with oil and 2 tablespoons butter', '3: Cover and cook for 20 minutes, checking occasionally', '4: Turn up the heat to medium-high', '5:  Add ½ tsp 1 teaspoon salt and ½ teaspoon sugar', '6:  Stir and keep cooking until onions are brown and caramelized', '7:  (the bottom of the pan will develop some browning, it’s very important!)Stir in 3 tablespoons flour one tablespoon at a time and cook for about 30 seconds', '8: Preheat Oven To 325˚F (160˚C)', '9: Add 1 6 6 1 cup (235 ml) of the beef broth', '10:  Use a whisk to scrape up (deglaze) the browned bits stuck on the bottom of the pan', '11: Add the remaining five 6 6 1 cups of beef stock, wine, ½ teaspoon ground sage and bay 1 leaf', '12:  Bring to a boil', '13:  Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, for 40 minutes', '14: In the meantime, cut the 1 loaf french bread or baguette into ½ inch (10 mm) thick pieces', '15:  Brush with oil on both sides and bake at 325˚F (160˚C) for 30 minutes, flipping halfway', '16:  Once they are done, increase oven temperature to 350˚F (175˚C)', '17: Add 3 tablespoons cognac optional ingredients', '18: In an oven safe bowl, pour the onion soup, filling about ¾ of the way full', '19:  Top with a piece of baked 1 loaf french bread, and generously sprinkle 12 oz swiss and 4 oz parmesan on top', '20: Bake for two to three minutes or until the cheese has melted completely and become slightly golden']

ingredients: ['2 lb yuca (910 g) cut into 4 in (10 cm) pieces', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter softened', '1 large egg', '1 tablespoon sugar', '1 teaspoon anise seeds', '1 teaspoon kosher salt plus more to taste', '1 cup canola oil (240 mL) for frying']
instructions: ['1: Using a sharp knife, stand each piece upright and carefully slice off the skin', '2: Grate the 2 lb yuca on the small holes of a box grater', '3: Add the grated 2 lb yuca to a 1 large bowl, along with the softened butter, egg, 1 tablespoon sugar, 1 teaspoon anise seeds, and 1 teaspoon kosher salt', '4:  Mix until thoroughly combined', '5: In a high-walled skillet, heat the 1 cup canola oil over medium-high heat until shimmering', '6: Working in batches, scoop 2 2 tablespoons of the 2 lb yuca mixture at a time into your hand and gently press into a ½-inch (1 ¼ cm)-thick fritter', '7:  Place on the edge of a metal spatula and carefully lower into the hot oil', '8:  Fry the fritters for about 2 minutes on each side, until golden brown', '9:  Transfer the fritters to a plate lined with paper towels to drain', '10:  Sprinkle lightly with 1 teaspoon kosher salt', '11: Serve the fritters warm']

ingredients: ['Tart Dough', '1 stick unsalted butter softened', '½ cup powdered sugar (55 g)', '1 large egg room temperature', '1 ½ cups all purpose flour (185 g) plus more for dusting', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '2 tablespoons dark cocoa powder', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', 'Citrus Pastry Cream', '1 ½ cups whole milk (360 mL)', '1 vanilla bean split lengthwise', '3 large egg yolks', '⅓ cup granulated sugar (65 g)', '¼ cup cornstarch (30 g)', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter cubed and softened', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', '1 teaspoon orange zest', '½ teaspoon grapefruit zest', 'Assembly', '2 blood oranges', '1 large grapefruit', '1 navel orange', '⅓ cup granulated sugar (65 g) divided']
instructions: ['1: Make the tart dough', '2:  Add the butter to a medium bowl and sift in the ½ cup powdered sugar', '3:  Beat with an electric hand mixer on medium speed until smooth, about 1 minute', '4: In a small bowl, beat the egg', '5:  Add to the butter mixture, beating well to incorporate', '6: Sift in the 1 ½ cups all purpose flour, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, and 2 tablespoons dark cocoa powder', '7:  Use a rubber spatula to mix the dough until the 2 tablespoons dark cocoa powder is evenly distributed', '8: Using your hands, bring the dough together and shape into a disc', '9:  Wrap in plastic wrap and chill in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes, up to overnight', '10:  If chilling overnight, let the dough sit at room temperature for 15–20 minutes before rolling out', '11: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '12:  Grease a 9-inch (22 cm) tart pan with nonstick spray', '13: On a sheet of lightly 1 ½ cups all purpose floured parchment paper, roll out the dough to a 12-inch circle about ¼-inch (6 mm) ( thick', '14:  7', '15:  Using the parchment, gently invert the dough into the tart pan', '16:  Press the dough against the bottom and sides of the pan, then roll the rolling pin over the top of the tart pan to cut off any excess dough', '17:  Using a fork, prick holes into the bottom of the dough to prevent puffing', '18: Bake the crust for 18–20 minutes, until set', '19:  Remove from the oven and let cool completely on a wire rack, about 20 minutes', '20: While the crust cools, make the pastry cream: In a small saucepan over medium heat, warm the 1 ½ cups whole milk and 1 vanilla bean until the mixture reaches a low simmer, about 180°F (90°C)', '21:  Do not bring the 1 ½ cups whole milk to a boil', '22:  Remove the pot from the heat and set aside to cool slightly, about 5 minutes', '23: While the 1 ½ cups whole milk cools, add the egg yolks and sugar to a medium bowl', '24:  Using an electric hand mixer, beat on medium-high speed  for 2–3 minutes, until the mixture turns pale yellow', '25:  Add the ¼ cup cornstarch and beat until well incorporated', '26: Remove the 1 vanilla bean from the 1 ½ cups whole milk, then gradually incorporate the 1 ½ cups whole milk into the egg mixture, whisking continuously, until smooth', '27: Whisk in the butter, 1 teaspoon lemon, 1 teaspoon 2 2 blood 1 1 navel orange, and grapefruit zests', '28:  Return to the saucepan and cook, whisking constantly, until thickened, 2–3 minutes more', '29:  Let cool for 5 minutes', '30: Assemble the tart: Fill the tart crust with the citrus pastry cream and use a spatula to smooth the top', '31:  14', '32:  Transfer to the refrigerator to chill for 30–60 minutes, to set the pastry cream', '33: Using a sharp knife, carefully remove the peels and pith from the 2 blood 1 teaspoon 2 2 blood 1 1 navel oranges, grapefruit, and 1 navel 1 teaspoon 2 2 blood 1 1 navel orange', '34:  Cut each fruit into ¼-inch (6 mm) thick rounds', '35:  Arrange the fruit in a single layer on a plate', '36: Sprinkle the citrus slices with the granulated sugar', '37:  Using a culinary blow torch, caramelize the sugar', '38:  17', '39:  Transfer the citrus slices to a paper towel-lined cutting board or baking sheet to absorb any excess moisture', '40: Arrange the citrus rounds on top of the tart', '41: Slice and serve']

ingredients: ['1 can chickpea water aquafaba', '½ cup dark chocolate (85 g) vegan', '2 tablespoons sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
instructions: ['1: In a medium-sized bowl, beat 1 can chickpea water aquafaba until stiff peaks form', '2: Gently fold in melted ½ cup dark chocolate, 2 tablespoons sugar, and 1 teaspoon vanilla, being careful not to overmix', '3: Distribute mousse into 3 cups and chill for at least 3 hours, ideally overnight', '4: Garnish with fresh strawberries or fruit of choice']

ingredients: ['Beef Rogan Josh', '1 ½ lb stewing beef (680 g) cut into large cubes', '1 teaspoon garam masala', 'sea salt to taste', '2 tablespoons canola oil', '1 large red onion minced', '1 fresh ginger 2 inch (5 cm) piece peeled and minced', '5 garlic cloves minced', '5 whole black peppercorns', '4 whole green cardamom pods', '1 whole black cardamom pod optional', '4 whole cloves', '1 cinnamon stick 1 inch (2.5 cm)', '4 dried red chiles', '2 dried bay leaves', '1 teaspoon ground tumeric', '1 teaspoon mild red pepper Kashmiri chile powder or sweet paprika', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '2 teaspoons ground coriander', '1 teaspoon ground fennel', '1 tablespoon dried fenugreek leaves (kasoori methi found at most Indian grocery stores)', '¼ cup whipped greek yogurt (70 g)', 'water for cooking', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'fresh cilantro chopped for garnish', 'Whole Wheat Roti', '1 cup whole wheat flour (125 g) plus more for dusting', '½ cup lukewarm water (120 mL)', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter room temperature']
instructions: ['1: Make the rogan josh: In a medium bowl, season the 1 ½ lb stewing beef with the 1 teaspoon garam masala and salt', '2:  Toss to coat', '3: In a 1 ½ lb stewing beef (680 g) cut into 1 large, heavy-bottomed pot, heat the 2 tablespoons canola 2 tablespoons canola 1 tablespoon olive oil over medium-high heat', '4:  When the 2 tablespoons canola 1 tablespoon olive oil is shimmering, add the 1 ½ lb stewing beef in batches and brown on all sides, about 2 minutes per side', '5:  Remove from the pot and set aside', '6: To the same pot, add the onion and season with salt', '7:  Sauté for 5 minutes, until softened and starting to brown', '8:  Add the 1 fresh ginger and 5 garlic and cook for 1 minute, until fragrant', '9: Add the peppercorns, 4 whole green and black cardamom pods, 5 garlic 4 whole cloves, 1 cinnamon, red chiles, and 2 dried bay leaves', '10:  Cook for 1 minute, until fragrant', '11:  Add the turmeric, red pepper powder, 2 teaspoons ground cumin, 2 teaspoons ground coriander, 1 teaspoon ground fennel, and 1 tablespoon dried fenugreek leaves and cook for another minute, until fragrant', '12: Return the browned 1 ½ lb stewing beef to the pot and stir to coat in the spice mixture', '13:  Add the ¼ cup whipped yogurt and stir well to combine', '14:  Add enough water to cover the meat and season with salt and black pepper', '15:  Cover and cook over medium-low heat for 2½ hours, stirring every 20 minutes and adding more water as needed, until the 1 ½ lb stewing beef is cooked through and tender', '16: When the curry has an hour of cook time left, make the roti: In a medium bowl, stir together the 1 cup whole wheat flour, water, 2 tablespoons canola 1 tablespoon olive oil, and salt', '17:  Mix to combine, then knead with your hands until the mixture pulls away from the sides of the bowl and no longer sticks to your fingers', '18:   Add a bit more 1 cup whole wheat flour as needed if the dough is too sticky', '19: Cover the dough with a damp kitchen towel and let rest for 30 minutes', '20: Divide the dough into 8 equal portions', '21:  Roll each portion into a ball and cover with a damp cloth again', '22: Working 1 at a time, use a rolling pin to roll out each portion of dough on a lightly 1 cup whole wheat floured surface into a 6–8 inch (15-20 cm) round', '23: Heat a medium skillet over medium-high heat until very hot', '24:  Cook the roti in the dry skillet for about 2 minutes, until starting to puff up, then turn and cook on the other side for 30–60 seconds more, until the roti is cooked through with dark brown spots', '25:  Remove from the skillet and spread with a bit of 2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '26:  Repeat with the remaining dough', '27: Ladle the curry into bowls and garnish with fresh cilantro', '28:  Serve with the hot roti']

ingredients: ['2 frozen bananas', '3 scoops dairy-free vanilla ice cream', '⅔ cup dairy-free milk (160 mL)', '¼ cup ice cube (50 g)', '1 cup strawberry (150 g)', '1 tablespoon cocoa powder']
instructions: ['1: In a blender, combine 2 frozen bananas, dairy-free 3 scoops dairy-free vanilla ice cream, dairy-free milk, and ice cubes', '2: Blend until combined', '3: Evenly distribute mixture into 3 cups, rough ¾ cup (200 ml) each', '4:  Set one cup to the side', '5: Add one mixture back in the blender and add strawberries', '6:  Mix until well blended and set aside', '7: Add the last mixture in the blender and add 1 tablespoon cocoa powder', '8:  Mix until well blended and set aside', '9: In a cup, pour chocolate mixture first', '10:  Using a spoon, pour the strawberry mixture onto the spoon and spread it around the glass', '11:  Using a spoon, pour the 3 scoops dairy-free vanilla mixture on top']

ingredients: ['2 lb brussels sprouts (910 g) halved', '8 strips bacon chopped', '2 teaspoons salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '⅓ cup apple cider vinegar (80 mL)', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '5 cloves garlic minced', 'fresh chive chopped to serve']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)Cook 8 strips bacon in a cast iron pan over medium heat', '2:  Once 8 strips bacon fat coats the pan, add the Brussels sprouts, 2 teaspoons salt, ½ teaspoon pepper, ⅓ cup apple cider vinegar, 1 tablespoon brown sugar, 5 cloves garlic', '3:  Stir until fully coated', '4: Cook until the bottom of the Brussel sprouts begin to 1 tablespoon brown on the bottom', '5: Transfer the cast iron pan to the oven and roast for 20 minutes, or until tender, flipping the brussel sprouts over every 5 minutes or so', '6: Sprinkle Parmesan cheese evenly over the Brussels sprouts, then place the pan back in the oven and bake for other 3 to 5 minutes', '7: Sprinkle with additional 8 strips bacon and chives then fresh chive chopped to serve']

ingredients: ['2 chicken breasts', '⅓ cup plain flour (50 g)', '1 cup panko breadcrumbs (50 g)', '2 eggs beaten', 'mango chutney to serve', 'Marinade', '4 tablespoons greek yogurt', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '2 teaspoons garam masala', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '1 teaspoon fresh ginger crushed', '1 teaspoon garlic crushed', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Cut the 2 chicken breasts into thin strips', '3: In a re-sealable bag, mix the marinade ingredients together and place the 2 chicken strips inside', '4:  Make sure they are thoroughly covered and marinate in the fridge for 2 hours (or more if you want a stronger flavour)', '5: Remove the 2 chicken from the marinade and cover in ⅓ cup plain flour, then egg, then 1 cup panko breadcrumbs', '6: Bake for 25 minutes']

ingredients: ['3 bananas', '⅓ cup granulated sugar (65 g)', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1 ½ cups milk (360 mL)', '2 cups cornmeal (250 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '2 teaspoons cinnamon', '1 teaspoon butter for griddling', 'butter for serving', 'honey for serving']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, mash the 3 bananas', '2:  Add the granulated sugar, 1 tablespoon brown sugar, and 2 teaspoons vanilla and whisk until evenly incorporated', '3: Add the 1 ½ 2 cups milk and whisk to combine', '4: Sift in the 2 cups cornmeal, 1 teaspoon salt, 2 teaspoons baking powder, and 2 teaspoons cinnamon and whisk until fully incorporated', '5: In a medium pan over medium heat, melt the butter and add ⅓ ⅓ 1 ½ 2 cup (40 g) of pancake batter', '6: Cook for 3-5 minutes, or until lightly golden 1 tablespoon brown, then flip', '7:  Cook for 2-3 minutes more on the other side, then remove from the pan', '8:  Repeat with the remaining batter', '9: Serve with honey and butter']

ingredients: ['6 pears slightly firm', '5 cups water (1 ¼ L)', '2 cups sugar (400 g)', '¾ cup rum (180 mL)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'vanilla ice cream to taste', '⅓ cup dark chocolate (75 g) melted']
instructions: ['1: Peel the 6 pears and cut the bottoms out, but leave the stems intact', '2: Mix the 5 cups water, 2 cups sugar, ¾ cup rum, and vanilla in a large pot', '3:  Set to medium heat', '4: Add the 6 pears', '5:  Cover with a lid and simmer for about 40 minutes, turning occasionally', '6:  Cook until soft and golden (this can take less time depending on the ripeness of your 6 pears', '7: Scoop out the 6 pears and place upright on a dish', '8:  At this point you can cook the liquid longer until it becomes a syrup, or ladle a small amount directly onto the 6 pears right away', '9: Add optional ice cream', '10: Melt some ⅓ cup dark chocolate and spoon it onto the pear or your favorite toppings like nuts!']

ingredients: ['1 ½ cups water (360 mL) or yogurt or milk of choice', '1 scoop vanilla protein powder', '1 cup strawberry (150 g) frozen', '1 cup blueberry (100 g) frozen', '½ cup raspberry (60 g) frozen', '½ cup blackberry (75 g) frozen']
instructions: ['1: Put all ingredients into a blender and mix until smooth']

ingredients: ['Chili', '1 onion diced', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 lb ground beef (455 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '15 oz tomato sauce (425 g) 1 can', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '15 oz kidney bean (425 g) 1 can drained and rinsed', 'Garlic Butter', '¼ cup butter (55 g) melted', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 tablespoon fresh parsley chopped', '1 tablespoon grated parmesan cheese', '12 dinner rolls', '½ cup shredded cheddar cheese (50 g)', 'sour cream to serve', 'green onion sliced to serve']
instructions: ['1: Heat oil in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium heat', '2:  Add the 1 green onion and cook until translucent', '3: Add the garlic and cook for two minutes', '4: Add the 1 lb ground beef and season with 1 teaspoon salt and ½ teaspoon pepper', '5:  Break up the beef with a wooden spoon, cooking until browned', '6: Add in the 15 oz tomato sauce, 1 teaspoon cumin, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, and 1 teaspoon chili powder', '7:  Stir until combined', '8: Reduce the heat to low, cover and simmer for 1 hour', '9: Remove lid and stir in 15 oz kidney beans', '10: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '11: In a bowl, add the ¼ cup butter, garlic, 1 tablespoon fresh parsley, and Parmesan', '12:  Stir until combined', '13: Place the 12 dinner rolls in a baking dish', '14:  Use a knife to carve a circle in the top of each roll', '15:  Press down the bottom of the bun to create a denser bottom layer', '16: Brush the rolls with the garlic ¼ cup butter and bake for 5 minutes, or until lightly toasted', '17: Spoon the chilli into the holes of the toasted rolls', '18: Sprinkle with ½ cup shredded cheddar cheese and bake for another 5 minutes, or until cheese has melted', '19: Serve topped with sour cream and green 1 green onions']

ingredients: ['Strudels', '2 sheets frozen puff pastry thawed', '1 large egg beaten', 'Blueberry Peach Filling', '2 tablespoons peach jam', '2 tablespoons blueberry', 'Cranberry Orange Filling', '2 tablespoons orange marmalade', '2 tablespoons fresh cranberries', 'Ham And Swiss Filling', '2 slices swiss cheese quartered', '2 slices ham quartered', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', 'Prosciutto And Asparagus Filling', '4 slices prosciutto', '10 pieces asparagus cut into 2 in pieces (5 cm)', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: Cut the puff pastry 2 sheets into 2 x 5-inch (5 cm x  12 cm) rectangles', '4:  You should have 16 rectangles total', '5: Make the 2 tablespoons blueberry 2 tablespoons peach strudels: In a small bowl, mix together the 2 tablespoons peach jam and blueberries', '6:  Scoop 1 tablespoon of the mixture onto the bottom third of 4 pastry rectangles', '7:  Brush the exposed pastry with the beaten 1 large egg, then fold the bottom of the pastry over the filling and continue rolling to seal', '8:  Place seam-side down on the prepared baking sheet', '9:  Cut 2 diagonal slits on the top of each strudel and brush with more 1 large egg wash', '10: Make the cranberry 2 tablespoons orange strudels:  In a small bowl, mix together the 2 tablespoons orange marmalade and 2 tablespoons fresh cranberries', '11:  Scoop 1 tablespoon of the mixture onto the bottom third of 4 pastry rectangles', '12:  Brush the exposed pastry with the beaten 1 large egg, then fold the bottom of the pastry over the filling and continue rolling to seal', '13:  Place seam-side down on the prepared baking sheet', '14:  Cut 2 diagonal slits on the top of each strudel and brush with more 1 large egg wash', '15: Make the 2 slices ham and Swiss strudels: Place 2 Swiss cheese quarters and 2 2 slices ham quarters at the bottom third of 4 pastry rectangles', '16:  Brush the exposed pastry with the beaten 1 large egg, then fold the bottom of the pastry over the filling and continue rolling to seal', '17:  Place seam-side down on the prepared baking sheet', '18:  Cut 2 diagonal slits on the top of each strudel', '19:  Brush with more 1 large egg wash and top with a pinch of pepper', '20: Make the 4 slices prosciutto asparagus strudels: Wrap a slice of 4 slices prosciutto around 2 or 3 10 pieces of asparagus and place at the bottom third of 4 pastry rectangles', '21:  Brush the exposed pastry with the beaten 1 large egg, then fold the bottom of the pastry over the filling and continue rolling to seal', '22:  Place seam-side down on the prepared baking sheet', '23:  Cut 2 diagonal slits on the top of each strudel', '24:  Brush with more 1 large egg wash and top with a pinch of pepper', '25: Bake the strudels for 30 minutes, until puffed and golden brown']

ingredients: ['French Patty', '1 lb ground beef (455 g) 80% lean', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 tablespoon oil', '3 hamburger buns', 'Toppings', '3 oz comté cheese (85 g) sliced', '1 cup caramelized onion (150 g)', '1 cup fresh arugula (20 g)', 'mustard of choice to taste']
instructions: ['1: Mix together the patty ingredients until evenly combined', '2: Form the 1 lb ground beef into a round patty', '3: Repeat with the remaining 1 lb ground beef', '4: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a pan over medium heat', '5: Cook the burgers for 3 minutes on the first side, flip, and place the slice of 3 oz comté on top', '6: Cook for 6 more minutes', '7: Assemble the burgers on the 3 hamburger buns with 1 cup caramelized onions and 1 cup fresh arugula']

ingredients: ['3 sweet potatoes', '2 tablespoons oil', '1 tablespoon dried rosemary', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', 'fresh parsley chopped for serving']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200ºC)', '2: Slice the top and bottom off of the 3 sweet potatoes, and slice potatoes in half crosswise', '3:  Rest each half on the broader end, then slice 3 times vertically and horizontally', '4:  Turn the potatoes on their side and make 4 or five more slices, to form cubes', '5: Transfer the 3 sweet potatoes to a baking sheet, then add the 2 tablespoons oil, 1 tablespoon dried rosemary, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1 teaspoon pepper', '6:  Toss to coat evenly', '7: Bake for 35-40 minutes, until the 3 sweet potatoes are tender and starting to brown around the edges', '8: Let cool for 5 minutes', '9:  Garnish with chopped fresh parsley before serving']

ingredients: ['3 medium yukon  potatoes peeled and cubed', 'olive oil to taste', '½ teaspoon smoked paprika', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '3 teaspoons garlic powder divided', 'kosher salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '14 oz extra firm tofu (395 g) 1 block', '3 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce', '3 tablespoons nutritional yeast', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '½ teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 cup grape tomatoes (150 g) halved', '3 cups fresh spinach (120 g)', '4 large flour tortillas', '1 avocado for serving diced', 'hot sauce for serving']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Add the potatoes to a baking sheet with a drizzle of olive oil, the paprika, oregano, ½ teaspoon of garlic powder, kosher salt, and pepper and toss until well coated', '3: Bake for 20 minutes, flipping halfway through, until the potatoes are tender', '4: Heat a drizzle of olive oil in a 4 large saucepan over 3 medium heat', '5:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, crumble the block of 14 oz extra firm tofu into the pan until it resembles the consistency of scrambled eggs, being careful not to over-crumble because it will continue to break apart as you cook', '6:  Cook for 4-5 minutes, until the 14 oz extra firm tofu is slightly golden', '7: Add the 3 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce, 3 tablespoons nutritional yeast, the remaining 2½ 3 teaspoons garlic powder, the onion powder, turmeric, kosher salt, and pepper and stir until well combined', '8:  Add the 1 cup grape tomatoes and cook for 4-5 minutes, until the 1 cup grape tomatoes become slightly wrinkled', '9:  Add the 3 cups fresh spinach and cook until wilted, 3-4 minutes', '10: To assemble a burrito, add ¼ of the 14 oz extra firm tofu scramble, ¼ of the potatoes, some 1 avocado, and hot sauce to the center of a tortilla', '11:  Fold in the sides and roll up, keeping the filling tucked in place', '12:  Repeat with the remaining ingredients', '13:  Cut in half and serve']

ingredients: ['1 rack baby back ribs halved', '2 teaspoons cumin', '2 teaspoons chili powder', '1 teaspoon pepper', '2 teaspoons garlic powder', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 teaspoons paprika', '1 cup BBQ sauce (285 g)', '3 corns husked and halved', '10 stalks asparagus', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '2 teaspoons salt', '½ teaspoon pepper']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 275°F (140°C)', '2: Place the half racks on a baking sheet lined with foil', '3:  Sprinkle evenly with 2 teaspoons cumin, 2 teaspoons chili powder, pepper, 2 teaspoons garlic powder, salt, and 2 teaspoons paprika', '4:  Rub in the seasoning evenly on both sides', '5: Cover with the foil and bake for 2 hours', '6: Increase oven temperature to 500°F (260°C)', '7: Remove the 1 rack baby back ribs from the foil and place on baking sheet', '8:  Spread the bbq 1 cup BBQ sauce evenly on the top', '9: Place the corn on one side of the pan, and the asparagus on the other', '10:  Drizzle the 4 tablespoons olive oil, salt, and pepper evenly over the veggies, and rub the seasoning in evenly', '11: Bake for 10 minutes', '12:   Rest the 1 rack baby back ribs at least 10 minutes', '13: Slice and serve!']

ingredients: ['6 slices bacon', '6 eggs', 'salt taste', 'pepper taste', '¼ cup shredded cheddar cheese (25 g)', 'chive to taste', 'Special Equipment', 'muffin tin']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Place the 6 slices of bacon in the muffin tin, wrapping in a circle', '3: Bake the bacon for 10 minutes', '4: Remove the bacon from the oven and pour out any excess grease, if desired', '5:  Crack 1 egg into each of the ¼ cups, then sprinkle with salt, pepper, and cheddar cheese', '6: Bake for another 10 minutes, or until the egg yolks reach your desired consistency', '7: Run a knife around the edge of each ¼ cup to loosen and remove', '8:  Sprinkle with chives, if desired']

ingredients: ['3 kiwis cubed', '1 banana sliced', '2 cups spinach (60 g)', '1 cup milk (240 mL) of choice', '1 cup plain greek yogurt (285 g)']
instructions: ['1: Put fruit in a freezer bag', '2:  Seal and store in freezer for up to 8-12 months', '3: When ready to use, put 1 cup milk and 2 cups spinach into the blender first', '4:  Blend until the 2 cups spinach is fully incorporated into the 1 cup milk', '5: Then add Greek yogurt and frozen fruit and mix until consistency is smooth']

ingredients: ['1 lb chicken breast (455 g) cubed', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 lb broccoli florets (455 g)', '8 oz mushroom (225 g) sliced', '3 tablespoons oil for frying', 'Sauce', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 tablespoon ginger minced', '2 teaspoons sesame oil', '⅓ cup reduced sodium soy sauce (80 mL)', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '1 cup chicken broth (240 mL)', '¼ cup flour (30 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a large pan on medium-high heat, add 1 tablespoon of oil', '2:   Once the oil is hot, add chicken, season with salt and pepper, and sauté until cooked through and browned', '3:  Remove cooked chicken from pan and set aside', '4: In the same pan, heat 1 tablespoon of oil and add mushrooms', '5:  When the mushrooms start to soften, add 1 lb broccoli florets and stir-fry until the 1 lb broccoli is tender', '6:  Remove cooked mushrooms and 1 lb broccoli from the pan and set aside', '7: Add 1 tablespoon of oil to the pan and sauté 3 cloves garlic and ginger until fragrant', '8:  Add the remaining ⅓ cup reduced sodium soy sauce ingredients and stir until smooth', '9: Return the chicken and vegetables to the saucy pan, stir until heated through', '10: Serve with hot rice or noodles']

ingredients: ['4 red potatoes', '3 cups water (710 mL) enough to cover the potatoes', '½ cup heavy cream (120 mL)', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon italian seasoning', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '2 tablespoons butter melted', '1 sheet puff pastry defrosted', '2 cups parmesan cheese (220 g)', '4 oz goat cheese (225 g)', '1 bunch asparagus', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon lemon juice']
instructions: ['1: Thinly slice 4 red 3 cups 3 cups water (710 mL) enough to cover the potatoes', '2: Soak 4 red 3 cups 3 cups water (710 mL) enough to cover the potatoes in just enough cold 3 cups water to cover the 4 red 3 cups 3 cups water (710 mL) enough to cover the potatoes for 10 minutes', '3:  Then pat dry', '4: Preheat oven to 400ºF (200ºC)', '5: In a medium bowl, mix together ½ cup heavy cream, salt, Italian seasoning, black pepper and melted 2 tablespoons butter', '6: Add potato slices and evenly coat every piece in the cream mixture', '7: Line baking tray with parchment paper and place one 1 sheet of puff pastry', '8:  With a fork, evenly poke the entire 1 sheet', '9: Place shredded or grated 2 cups parmesan cheese on the puff pastry', '10:  Then layer each potato slice to cover the 1 sheet, leaving ½ inch (1 ¼ cm) on all sides', '11: With 2 spoons, scoop small amounts of 4 oz goat cheese on top of the 4 red 3 cups 3 cups water (710 mL) enough to cover the potatoes', '12:  Season with a pinch of salt and pepper', '13: Bake for 30 minutes or until the crust is golden brown', '14: With a peeler hold the bottom of the 1 bunch asparagus and carefully peel from bottom to the tip', '15:  Peel twice on one side, then flip over to peel the other side', '16:  It will give you a even ribbon', '17: Put all the 1 bunch asparagus ribbons into a bowl and mix in salt, pepper, 1 tablespoon olive oil and 1 tablespoon lemon juice', '18:  Toss the ribbons until evenly coated', '19: Place the 1 bunch asparagus ribbons on top of the freshly baked potato tart, then slice']

ingredients: ['2 teaspoons hibiscus tea', '¼ cup hot water (60 mL)', '¾ cup milk (180 mL)', '½ tablespoon agave nectar optional', 'Optional Garnishes', '1 teaspoon dried rose petal', 'hibiscus powder']
instructions: ['1: Steep the tea in the ¼ cup hot water for 5 minutes', '2: Froth the ¾ cup milk by adding it to a resealable jar', '3:  Shake vigorously until many bubbles form', '4:  Then, microwave the ¾ cup milk for 45 seconds to 1 minute, which will help create stable bubbles', '5: Remove the tea, then stir in the ½ tablespoon agave and frothed ¾ cup milk', '6: Dust the top with 1 teaspoon dried rose petals and hibiscus powder, if desired', '7: Nutrition, per serving - Calories: 120, Total fat: 4 grams, Sodium: 98 mg, Total carb: 16 grams, Dietary fiber: 0 gram, Sugars: 6 grams, Protein: 6 grams']

ingredients: ['1 medium sweet potato', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon fresh rosemary chopped', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 425ºF/220ºC', '2: Slice the ends off of the 1 medium sweet potato and then slice it in half', '3:  Take one half and slice it horizontally 4 times then slice vertically 4 times to cut into fries', '4: In a large bowl mix fries and ingredients until evenly spread', '5: Place fries on a prepared baking sheet and bake for 25 minutes or until fluffy inside and crunchy on the outside']

ingredients: ['15 oz chickpeas (425 g) 1 can drained and rinsed', '¼ cup red onion (40 g) diced', '½ red bell pepper diced', '3 tablespoons vegan mayonnaise', '½ teaspoon dijon mustard', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon onion powder', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon fresh dill chopped', 'leafy green to serve', 'bread sliced to serve']
instructions: ['1: In a medium mixing bowl, add 15 oz chickpeas and mash with potato masher until a chunky texture is reached', '2: Add the red ¼ cup red ½ teaspoon onion, red ½ red bell pepper, 3 tablespoons vegan mayo, Dijon mustard, ½ teaspoon garlic powder, ¼ cup red ½ teaspoon onion powder, salt, ½ red bell pepper, and 1 tablespoon fresh dill, and stir until well combined', '3: Store chickpea salad in refrigerator for up to five days', '4:  To assemble sandwich, spread mixture onto bread and top with leafy greens of choice', '5: Wrap in parchment paper and secure with rubber band']

ingredients: ['6 oz skinless salmon fillet (170 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'olive oil for cooking', '1 lemon sliced', 'fresh thyme as needed']
instructions: ['1: Heat olive oil in a nonstick skillet', '2: Season 6 oz skinless salmon with salt and pepper', '3: Lay the 6 oz skinless salmon on the skillet and watch the color rise to about two-thirds of the way up the 6 oz skinless salmon', '4:  Flip the 6 oz skinless salmon once and cook until done to taste, roughly 2-4 minutes longer', '5: Serve with 1 lemon and fresh thyme (optional)']

ingredients: ['2 cups ice (280 g) cubeddivided', '3 oz vodka (85 g)', '2 oz Ocean Spray 100% Juice Cranberry (55 g) 1 1⁄2 ounces grapefruit juice', '1 grapefruit for garnish peeled']
instructions: ['1: Add 1 cup (140 G) of cubed 2 cups ice to a tall shaker', '2: Add the 3 oz vodka, Ocean Spray 100% Juice Cranberry and grapefruit juice', '3:  Shake vigorously for 30 seconds', '4: Divide remaining 1 cup (140 G) of 2 cups ice between two rocks glasses and pour the cocktail evenly over the 2 cups ice in the glasses', '5: Using a sharp knife, carefully remove the white pith from the peel of the grapefruit', '6:  Slice  peel into four 1 1⁄2 inch (3', '7: 85 cm) strips and twist them into a corkscrew shape', '8: Skewer two of the grapefruit peel twists onto a toothpick and repeat this process with the remaining two pieces of grapefruit peel', '9: Place the grapefruit twist garnish on the cocktail and enjoy!']

ingredients: ['Dry-Rubbed Turkey Tenderloin', '1 tablespoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 tablespoon ground sage', '1 tablespoon dried thyme', '2 tablespoons packed light brown sugar', '½ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', '12 oz 2 turkey tenderloins (360 mL)', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil divided', '1 cup turkey stock (240 mL)', 'Creamy Cranberry Sauce', '1 cup fresh or frozen cranberries (125 g)', '2 orange peels', 'Juice of 1 orange', '2 light brown sugars', '1 sprig of fresh rosemary', '½ cup cold water (120 mL)', '4 teaspoons mayonnaise', '¼ teaspoon kosher salt', 'Jus', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '3 cups Chicken or Turkey Stock (720 mL)', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', 'Assembly', '4 brioche  buns', '4 tablespoons unsalted butter softened (1/2 stick)', '2 cups arugula (40 g)', "1 ⅓ cups Prepared Mac 'n' Cheese (265 g)", 'Sweet potato fry for serving', 'Preparation', 'Dry-Rubbed Turkey Tenderloin', '1 tablespoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 tablespoon ground sage', '1 tablespoon dried thyme', '2 tablespoons packed light brown sugar', '½ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', '12 oz 2 turkey tenderloins (360 mL)', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil divided', '1 cup turkey stock (240 mL)', 'Creamy Cranberry Sauce', '1 cup fresh or frozen cranberries (125 g)', '2 orange peels', 'Juice of 1 orange', '2 light brown sugars', '1 sprig of fresh rosemary', '½ cup cold water (120 mL)', '4 teaspoons mayonnaise', '¼ teaspoon kosher salt', 'Jus', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '3 cups Chicken or Turkey Stock (720 mL)', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', 'Assembly', '4 brioche  buns', '4 tablespoons unsalted butter softened (1/2 stick)', '2 cups arugula (40 g)', "1 ⅓ cups Prepared Mac 'n' Cheese (265 g)", 'Sweet potato fry for serving', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Make the turkey tenderloin: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C)', '2: In a small bowl, mix together the onion powder, garlic powder, sage, thyme, brown sugar, nutmeg, and salt', '3: Using your hands, rub each turkey tenderloin with 1 teaspoon vegetable oil, then generously coat all over with the spice rub', '4: Heat the remaining tablespoon of oil in a 12-inch cast iron or oven-safe skillet over medium-high heat until it begins to shimmer', '5:  Add the turkey tenderloins to the skillet and sear for 3 minutes on each side, until golden brown', '6:  Remove the pan from heat and pour in the chicken stock', '7: Cover the pan tightly with foil and transfer to the oven', '8:  Bake for 20–25 minutes, or until the turkey is cooked through and a thermometer inserted into the thickest part of the tenderloin registers at least 165°F (74°C)', '9:  Transfer the turkey from the pan to a cutting board, tent with foil, and let rest for at least 10 minutes, or until ready to serve', '10:  Leave any juices behind in the pan', '11: While the turkey roasts, make the creamy cranberry sauce: In a small saucepan, combine the cranberries, orange peels, orange juice, brown sugar, rosemary, and water', '12:  Bring to a boil over medium heat, then reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer for 8–10 minutes, until the cranberries have softened and burst and the liquid has thickened', '13:  Remove the pot from the heat and let cool for 10 minutes', '14:  Remove the orange peels and rosemary sprig and discard', '15: Transfer the cranberry mixture to a small food processor, along with the mayonnaise and salt', '16:  Pulse until smooth', '17:  Transfer to a small bowl and refrigerate until ready to use', '18: Make the jus: Return the skillet used to roast the turkey to the stove and melt the butter over medium heat', '19:  Add the flour and whisk to incorporate', '20:  Cook for 3–4 minutes, until bubbling and thickened', '21:  Add the chicken stock and bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer for 8–10 minutes, until thickened', '22:  Season with the saltSet a fine-mesh sieve over a measuring cup or serving bowl and strain the jus to remove any solid bits', '23: When ready to serve, thinly slice the turkey against the grain', '24: Spread about ½ tablespoon of softened butter on each side of the brioche buns', '25:  Working in batches if needed, place the buns, buttered-side down, in a clean large skillet over medium heat and toast until the buns are golden brown, about 4 minutes', '26: Assemble the sandwiches: Spread 1–2 teaspoons of creamy cranberry sauce over each side of the buns', '27:  Place ½ cup arugula, 6 ounces turkey, and ⅓ cup mac ‘n’ cheese on each bottom bun and top with the top buns', '28:  Serve with sweet potato fries, more cranberry sauce, and the hot jus for dipping']

ingredients: ['4 medium russet potatoes', '1 teaspoon salt plus more for the water', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 egg', '1 ½ cups all-purpose flour (190 g) extra to dust', '2 tablespoons butter for pan frying', 'sage leaf']
instructions: ['1: Add the potatoes to a large pot of cool 1 teaspoon salted water', '2:  Bring the water to a boil and cook for 20-25 minutes, or until a fork can easily pierce a potato', '3:  Drain the potatoes and set aside until cool enough to handle but still warm', '4: Using a peeler or your fingers, remove the skin from the potatoes', '5:  In a 4 medium bowl, mash the potatoes until all lumps are gone', '6:  Add the 1 teaspoon salt and 1 teaspoon pepper and mix well', '7:  Make a well in the center of the potatoes and crack an 1 egg into it', '8:  Whisk the 1 eggs briefly', '9:  Then, using your hands, gently mix it into the potatoes until evenly distributed', '10: Put 1 1 ½ cups of flour onto a clean surface and turn out the potato dough onto it, keeping the remaining ½ cup close by in case you need it', '11:  Working quickly and carefully, knead the dough, only incorporating as much flour as you need along the way until the dough loses stickiness and becomes more solid', '12:  Slice the dough into 4 parts', '13:  Roll out 1 part into a long rope, about 1 inch wide, cutting in half and working with 1 half at a time if the rope is becoming too long', '14:  Slice the rope into ½-inch squares and set aside on a lightly floured surface', '15:  Repeat with the remaining dough', '16: If desired, place a fork on your work surface and slide each gnocchi square from the base of the fork prongs to the top so they make a decorative shape', '17: Bring a large pot of 1 teaspoon salted water to a boil and add the gnocchi in batches, stirring gently once or twice to ensure they are not sticking', '18:  Boil until they float to the surface; after another 15-30 seconds in the water, remove', '19: In a pan over 4 medium heat, melt 2 tablespoons butter and add the sage', '20:  Add the gnocchi and toss until lightly golden']

ingredients: ['1 large cucumber peeled and sliced', '¼ cup mint leaf (10 g)', '1 green apple diced', '1 tablespoon honey', '½ avocado diced', '1 ½ cups ice (210 g)']
instructions: ['1: Place the 1 large cucumber, ¼ cup mint, 1 green apple, 1 tablespoon honey, and ½ avocado in a blender or food processor and blend until just combined', '2: Add in the 1 ½ cups ice and continue to blend until the mixture is smooth', '3: Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['Dough', '2 cups whole milk (480 mL) warm to the touch', '½ cup unsalted butter (115 g) melted', '½ cup granulated sugar (100 g)', '1 pack active dry yeast', '5 cups flour (625 g) divided', '1 teaspoon baking powder', 'salt to taste', 'Filling', '¾ cup butter (170 g) softened', '¾ cup light brown sugar (165 g)', '2 tablespoons pumpkin spice mix', 'Frosting', '1 cup powdered sugar (120 g)', '¼ cup coffee (60 mL)', '1 tablespoon whole milk']
instructions: ['1: Generously butter 2 cast-iron skillets or disposable foil cake pans', '2: In a large bowl, whisk together the warm 2 cups whole 1 tablespoon whole milk, melted butter, and sugar', '3:  The mixture should be just warm, registering between 100-110˚F (37-43˚C)', '4:  If it is hotter, allow to cool slightly', '5: Sprinkle the 1 pack active dry yeast evenly over the warm 2 cups whole 1 tablespoon whole milk mixture and let sit for 1 minute', '6: Add 4 cups (500g) of flour to the 2 cups whole 1 tablespoon whole milk mixture and mix with a wooden spoon until just combined', '7: Cover the bowl with a towel or plastic wrap and set in a warm place to rise for 1 hour', '8: After 1 hour, the dough should have nearly doubled in size', '9: Remove the towel and add an additional ¾ cup (95g) of flour, 1 teaspoon baking powder, and salt', '10:  Stir well, then turn out onto a well-floured surface', '11: Knead the dough lightly, adding additional flour as necessary, until the dough just loses its stickiness and does not stick to the surface', '12: Roll the dough out into a large rectangle, about ½-inch (1 cm) thick', '13:  Fix corners to make sure they are sharp and even', '14: In a medium bowl, combine softened butter, brown sugar, and 2 tablespoons pumpkin spice mix, and stir well', '15: Spread the mixture onto the rolled dough', '16: Roll up the dough, forming a log, and pinch the seam closed', '17:  Place seam-side down', '18:  Trim off any unevenness on either end', '19: Cut the log in half, then divide each half into 7 evenly sized pieces, about 1½ inches (4 cm) thick', '20: Place 7 cinnamon rolls in each skillet or cake pan, one in the center, six around the sides', '21:  Cover with plastic wrap and place in a warm place to rise for 30 minutes', '22: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '23: To prepare the frosting, in a medium mixing bowl, whisk together powdered sugar, coffee, and 2 cups whole 1 tablespoon whole milk until smooth', '24: Remove the plastic wrap, then bake the cinnamon rolls for 25-30 minutes, until golden brown', '25: While still warm, drizzle evenly with frosting']

ingredients: ['½ cup mayonnaise (120 g)', '½ cup sour cream (115 g)', '½ tablespoon lemon juice', '2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '2 teaspoons honey', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '3 cups green cabbage (300 g) very thinly sliced 1/2 small head', '3 cups purple cabbage (300 g) very thinly sliced 1/2 small head', '1 large carrot peeled and grated']
instructions: ['1: In a 1 large bowl, whisk together the ½ cup mayonnaise, ½ cup sour cream, ½ tablespoon lemon juice, 2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar, 2 teaspoons honey, 1 teaspoon salt, and ½ teaspoon pepper', '2: Add the 3 cups green 3 cups green 3 cups purple cabbage, red 3 cups green 3 cups purple cabbage, and carrot, and toss to coat', '3:  Cover and chill until ready to serve']

ingredients: ['1 cup strawberry (150 g) thinly sliced plus whole strawberries for garnish', '1 cup blackberry (150 g)', '1 cup raspberry (125 g)', '1 cup blueberry (100 g)', '1 bottle brut rosé', '½ cup triple sec (120 mL)', '2 cups lemon-lime soda (480 mL)', '1 qt blackberry sorbet (590 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a large pitcher, combine the strawberries, blackberries, raspberries, blueberries, 1 bottle brut rosé, and ½ cup triple sec', '2:  Stir and refrigerate for at least 3 hours, or overnight', '3: When ready to serve, remove the pitcher from the refrigerator and add the lemon lime 2 cups lemon-lime soda', '4:  Gently stir to combine', '5: Place 1-2 small scoops of blackberry sorbet in a glass', '6:  Pour the sangria over the sorbet and stir with a spoon', '7: Garnish with a fresh 1 cup strawberry']

ingredients: ['ice', '1 cup Brewed Sweetened Oolong or Green Tea (240 mL) chilled', '½ cup sweetened coconut milk or almond milk (120 mL)', '½ teaspoon almond extract', 'toasted coconut flake for topping', 'Grated almond for topping', 'chocolate syrup for topping ']
instructions: ['1: Fill a large glass with ice, then pour in the oolong tea', '2: Add the ½ cup sweetened toasted coconut milk and almond extract and stir to combine', '3: Top with toasted ½ cup sweetened toasted coconut, grated almonds, and chocolate syrup', '4: Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['olive oil', '½ cup mushroom (35 g)', '½ cup tomato (100 g)', '2 cups spinach (80 g)', '1 clove garlic', '¾ cup chickpea flour (90 g)', '1 ½ tablespoons nutritional yeast', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '¼ teaspoon turmeric', '⅛ teaspoon pepper', '⅛ teaspoon black salt', '1 teaspoon apple cider vinegar', '¾ cup almond milk (180 mL)', 'salt to taste']
instructions: ['1: Add olive oil to a heated pan', '2:  Toss in ½ 2 cups (100 G) of tomatoes and ½ cup mushroom', '3:  Add ⅛ teaspoon black salt and ⅛ teaspoon pepper to taste', '4:  Add olive oil (if required) and stir', '5:  Mix in 2 2 cups (80 G) of spinach and 1 1 clove of garlic', '6: For the batter, add 1 ½ tablespoons nutritional yeast, ¾ cup chickpea flour, ½ teaspoon baking soda, garlic powder and ¼ teaspoon turmeric', '7:  Add ⅛ teaspoon black salt and ⅛ teaspoon pepper to taste', '8:  You can also add ⅛ teaspoon black ⅛ teaspoon black salt for an eggy flavor (optional)', '9:  Next, add 1 teaspoon apple cider vinegar to ¾ cup almond milk and mix the batter thoroughly', '10:  On your heated pan, add a drizzle of olive oil and pour the freshly made batter carefully', '11: Once it has been cooked, add the sauteed veggies', '12:  Turn off the heat and let it steam for 5 minutes with the lid on']

ingredients: ['½ cup sugar (100 g)', '¾ cup dark brown sugar (165 g) packed', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ cup refined coconut oil (120 g) melted', '¼ cup non-dairy milk (60 mL)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 ½ cups flour (185 g)', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '4 oz vegan semi-sweet chocolate (115 g) chunks', '4 oz vegan dark chocolate (115 g) chunks']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, whisk together the ½ cup ¾ cup dark ¾ cup dark brown sugar, ¾ cup dark brown ½ cup ¾ cup dark ¾ cup dark brown sugar, 1 teaspoon salt, and ½ cup refined coconut oil until combined', '2: Whisk in non-dairy ¼ cup non-dairy milk and 1 teaspoon vanilla, until all ½ cup ¾ cup dark ¾ cup dark brown sugar has dissolved and the batter is smooth', '3: Sift in the 1 ½ cups flour and ½ teaspoon baking soda, then fold the mixture with a spatula, being careful not to overmix', '4: Fold in the chocolate chunks evenly', '5: Chill the dough for at least 30 minutes', '6: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C)', '7: Scoop the dough with an ice cream scoop onto a parchment paper-lined ½ teaspoon baking sheet', '8:  Be sure to leave at least 2 inches of space between cookies and the edges of the pan so cookies can spread evenly', '9: Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until cookies just begin to ¾ cup dark brown', '10: Cool completely']

ingredients: ['3 tablespoons butter for greasing the pan', '16 ½ oz can of biscuit dough (465 g) 1 can', 'marinara sauce', 'sliced pepperoni', '8 oz ball of mozzarella cheese (225 g) cut into cubes', 'butter melted', '2 cloves garlic minced', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon italian seasoning', 'shredded parmesan cheese for topping']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and grease with butter', '3: Cut each 16 ½ oz can of biscuit in half', '4:  Press each half into a circle with your thumb', '5: Place a small dollop of marinara sauce, 1 sliced sliced pepperoni, and 1 cube of 8 oz ball of mozzarella cheese in the center of each 16 ½ oz can of biscuit round', '6: Bring the edges up and over, pressing them together and being sure to leave no gaps for the filling to leak out', '7:  Lay the pizza bombs on the prepared baking sheet', '8: Combine the melted butter, 2 cloves garlic, salt, sliced pepper, and Italian seasoning in a small bowl', '9: Brush the butter mixture onto each pizza bomb and top with Parmesan', '10: Bake for 15-20 minutes, until the bombs have nicely browned', '11: Once they are cool enough to handle, serve with marinara sauce alongside']

ingredients: ['5 chicken thighs', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon paprika', '½ teaspoon dried basil', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '2 zucchinis grated', '1 cup rice (200 g)', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 ½ cups chicken broth (355 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2: Season the chicken thighs in a bowl with salt, pepper, garlic powder, ½ teaspoon paprika, dried basil, and dried oregano', '3:  Mix until thoroughly coated with the seasoning', '4: On high, heat olive oil in a ovenproof pot and place chicken thighs, skin-side down, in the hot oil', '5:  Cook 3-4 minutes or until the thighs develop brown crispy skin, and flip over', '6:  Cook an additional 2-3 minutes to brown the other side, and remove from the pot', '7: Grate both 2 zucchinis with a box grater', '8: Add the grated zucchini into the pot, along with 1 cup rice, garlic powder, salt, pepper, and chicken broth', '9:  Bring to a boil', '10: Lay the chicken on top of the 1 cup rice mixture and cover', '11:  Bake for 30 minutes or until the chicken’s internal temperature reads 165˚F (75˚C)', '12: Remove chicken and broil 1-2 minutes to crisp skin even more (optional)', '13: Serve chicken on bed of 1 cup rice mixture']

ingredients: ['8 cups flour (1 kg)', '8 teaspoons baking soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '4 cups water (960 mL)', '¾ cup ghee (170 g) clarified butter or butter of choice', 'oil for frying']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, combine the 8 cups flour, 8 teaspoons baking soda, and 1 teaspoon salt, and mix until fully incorporated', '2: Slowly add the 4 cups water until the mixture forms a dough', '3: Divide the dough into roughly 12 loyas (balls), cover with a dish towel, and let rest for about 30 minutes', '4: Sprinkle each ball with 8 cups flour and flatten or roll out into a circle roughly 5 inches (12-cm) in diameter', '5: Spread ¾ cup ghee on each round and make a cut from the center out to the edge, then roll to make a cone', '6: Press the peak and flatten the center of the cone', '7:  Let rest for another 30 minutes', '8: On a 8 cups floured surface, roll each ball into a circle roughly 8 inches (20-cm) in diameter', '9: Heat a tawah or flat frying pan over medium-high heat', '10:  Coat with oil and place a round of dough on the pan', '11: Cook the dough until light brown, watching carefully, about 5 minutes', '12:  Then flip and cook on the other side, about 3-4 minutes more', '13:  Repeat with the remaining dough rounds', '14: Break up the cooked roti with your hands or serve whole', '15: Serve the fried roti with the fillings']

ingredients: ['1 onion diced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 bell pepper diced', '1 jalapeño diced', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '4 cups rotisserie chicken (500 g) shredded', '1 cup corn (175 g)', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon paprika', '8 oz cream cheese (225 g)', '6 flour tortillas', '2 cups cheese blend (200 g)', 'oil for frying', 'sour cream for serving', 'pico de gallo for serving']
instructions: ['1: Add 1 onion, 2 cloves garlic, 1 bell 1 bell ½ teaspoon pepper, and 1 jalapeño to a lightly oiled sauté pan', '2:  Season with 1 teaspoon salt and 1 bell ½ teaspoon pepper, then cook until 1 onions are translucent', '3: Once veggies are fully cooked add in 4 cups rotisserie chicken, 1 cup corn, 1 teaspoon cumin, and 1 teaspoon paprika', '4:  Mix together until fully combined', '5: Remove 4 cups rotisserie chicken from the heat and place in a large mixing bowl', '6: Add in 8 oz sour cream 8 oz sour cream 2 cups cheese and mix until 4 cups rotisserie chicken becomes 8 oz sour creamy', '7: Using a medium-sized ice 8 oz sour cream scooper', '8:  Scoop out 2 portions of 8 oz sour creamy 4 cups rotisserie chicken and place on 6 flour tortilla', '9:  Top with 8 oz sour cream 2 cups cheese blend then roll tightly into a burrito', '10: Preheat oil to 325ºF (170ºC)', '11: Place burrito into shallow oil, flap side down to create a seal and cook for 2-3 minutes on both sides or until golden brown', '12: Top with sour 8 oz sour cream and pico de gallo']

ingredients: ['3 tablespoons rolled quaker oats', '2 tablespoons milo', '1 tablespoon sugar', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '1 tablespoon corn flour', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil']
instructions: ['1: Mix all the ingredients together in a bowl', '2: Heat 1 tablespoon vegetable oil in a shallow skillet on low heat', '3:  Once heated, dollop your batter on like mini pancakes and griddle, just as you would with pancakes', '4: Serve with powdered 1 tablespoon sugar, whipped cream, Nutella, syrup, or as is!']

ingredients: ['½ cup rolled oats (40 g)', '⅓ cup peanut butter (80 g)', '1 tablespoon honey', '1 tablespoon dark chocolate chip optional', 'salt to taste']
instructions: ['1: Combine all ingredients in a small bowl and mix until thoroughly combined', '2: Chill in the refrigerator for 30 minutes', '3: Use a spoon or tablespoon to evenly divide the mixture into 6 balls', '4:  Use your hands to form the ball', '5: Enjoy one now and save the rest for later by storing them in a sealed container in the refrigerator up to 1 week']

ingredients: ['Yogurt Sauce', '1 ½ cups plain full-fat greek yogurt (365 g)', '¼ cup fresh parsley (10 g) roughly chopped', '1 tablespoon fresh dill chopped plus more for garnish', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', 'Fries', '4 cups vegetable oil (960 mL) for frying', 'cold water for soaking', '2 cups ice (280 g)', '2 tablespoons lemon juice divided', '3 medium russet potatoes', '1 package McCormick® Zesty Spice Blend', 'Toppings', '½ cup chickpeas (100 g) drained and rinses', '½ cup cucumber (65 g) diced', '1 cup romaine lettuce (70 g) chopped', '1 plum tomato diced', '¼ cup red onion (35 g) diced', '½ cup feta cheese (55 g)', '2 tablespoons fresh dill roughly chopped', 'Preparation', 'Yogurt Sauce', '1 ½ cups plain full-fat greek yogurt (365 g)', '¼ cup fresh parsley (10 g) roughly chopped', '1 tablespoon fresh dill chopped plus more for garnish', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', 'Fries', '4 cups vegetable oil (960 mL) for frying', 'cold water for soaking', '2 cups ice (280 g)', '2 tablespoons lemon juice divided', '3 medium russet potatoes', '1 package McCormick® Zesty Spice Blend', 'Toppings', '½ cup chickpeas (100 g) drained and rinses', '½ cup cucumber (65 g) diced', '1 cup romaine lettuce (70 g) chopped', '1 plum tomato diced', '¼ cup red onion (35 g) diced', '½ cup feta cheese (55 g)', '2 tablespoons fresh dill roughly chopped', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Make the yogurt sauce: In a medium bowl, mix together the yogurt, parsley, dill, garlic, salt, and lemon juice', '2:  Cover and refrigerate until ready to use, up to 1 week', '3: In a large, heavy-bottomed pot, heat 2–3 inches (5-7', '4: 5 cm) of vegetable oil over medium-low heat until the temperature reaches 325°F (170°C)', '5: Make the fries: Fill a large bowl with cold water, the ice, and 1 tablespoon of lemon juice', '6: Peel the potatoes and slice into ¼-inch (½ cm) thick strips about 3 inches long', '7:  Transfer the potato slices to the cold water as you go', '8:  Rinse the potatoes under more cold water in the bowl until the water runs clear, rinsing off any excess starch', '9:  Add the remaining tablespoon of lemon juice and chill in the refrigerator for 30 minutes', '10: Line 2 baking sheets with thick paper, such as brown paper grocery bags', '11: Remove the potatoes from the fridge and drain, then dry completely with a clean kitchen towel', "12: Working in batches, cook the potatoes in the hot oil for 6–8 minutes, or until they're soft and light golden in color", '13:  Remove the fries from the oil using a wire mesh skimmer and transfer to the prepared baking sheets to drain', '14:  Let stand at room temperature for 15-20 minutes', '15: Increase the oil temperature to 375°F (190°C)', '16: Working in batches, return the fries to the hot oil and cook for another 2–3 minutes, or until golden brown and crispy', '17:  Drain on clean paper-lined baking sheets', '18:  Sprinkle generously with the zesty seasoningTo assemble, spread a layer of fries on a platter and top with some of the yogurt sauce, the chickpeas, cucumbers, lettuce, tomato, red onion, and feta', '19:  Top with more yogurt sauce', '20:  Sprinkle with dill']

ingredients: ['2 large sweet potatoes or 3 small scrubbed', '½ medium red onion', '15 oz chickpeas (425 g) 1 can rinsed and drained', '½ cup olive oil (120 mL)', '¼ cup lemon juice (60 mL)', '2 tablespoons garlic minced', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon paprika', '¼ teaspoon cinnamon', '¼ teaspoon cayenne', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '3 oz mixed greens (85 g)', '¼ cup fresh parsley (10 g) chopped', '¼ cup fresh cilantro (10 g) chopped', 'dried cranberry for garnish optional']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 425ºF (220ºC)', '2: Cut the sweet potatoes in small cubes and transfer on one half of a non-stick baking sheet', '3: Peel and slice the ½ medium red onion and set aside', '4: Add the 15 oz chickpeas to the other half of the baking sheet', '5: In a liquid measuring cup with a pour spout, combine the olive oil, lemon juice, 2 tablespoons garlic, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 1 teaspoon paprika, ¼ teaspoon cinnamon, ¼ teaspoon cayenne, salt, and pepper and mix well', '6: Pour half of the dressing over the sweet potatoes and 15 oz chickpeas and mix with your hands until well-coated', '7:  Keep the 15 oz chickpeas and sweet potatoes separated as much as possible', '8: Scoot the 15 oz chickpeas toward the sweet potatoes and add the ½ medium red onions to the baking sheet', '9:  Make sure everything is spread out evenly', '10: Bake for 30 minutes, until the sweet potatoes are tender', '11:  Use tongs to stir halfway through', '12:  Let cool for 20 minutes', '13: Place the 3 oz mixed greens in a 2 large bowl', '14:  Top with the roasted 15 oz chickpeas, sweet potatoes, and ½ medium red onion', '15: Add the parsley, cilantro, and remaining dressing and toss to combine', '16: Top with dried cranberries, if using']

ingredients: ['Main Ingredients :', '½ lb chicken tenderloins (225 g) cubed', '¾ lb spinach (340 g)', '1 tomato quartered', '1 medium red onion quartered', '½ teaspoon cumin seeds', '1 teaspoon coriander or cilantro leaves', '½ teaspoon fresh basil leaf', '1 tablespoon coconut milk', '½ teaspoon ginger garlic paste', 'Spices for curry:', '1 pinch turmeric', '¾ teaspoon coriander powder', '¾ teaspoon curry powder or garam masala', '¼ teaspoon chili powder', 'salt to taste', 'Spices for Chicken:', '1 pinch turmeric', '½ tablespoon chicken powder', '1 pinch salt', '1 pinch pepper']
instructions: ['1: In a bowl, mix the Spices for Chicken with chicken pieces', '2:  Marinate for 20 minutes', '3:  Then, add oil to a wok and saute marinated chicken on 1 medium heat until cooked through', '4:  Set aside in a bowl', '5: In a blender, blend together 1 tomato, onion, and ¾ lb spinach', '6:  Once combined, add ½ teaspoon cumin seeds and water and grind into a fine paste', '7: In the wok used earlier, heat oil and add ½ teaspoon ginger garlic paste', '8:  Immediately add ¾ lb spinach paste (from blender) on 1 medium heat and stir for 2 minutes', '9: Add Spices for ¾ teaspoon curry spices and stir for 2 minutes', '10:  Boil on 1 medium to low heat for 5 minutes, covering', '11:  Then, add chicken pieces, cover, and cook for 5 minutes', '12: Add the 1 tablespoon coconut milk and stir to combine', '13: Sprinkle coriander leaves and ½ teaspoon fresh basil leaves in mixture and stir again for 1 minute', '14:  Remove from wok and let rest for 5 minutes', '15: Serve alongside warm rotis or white rice']

ingredients: ['2 lb sirloin steak (905 g) or boneless beef chuck roast sliced thin', '1 cup beef broth (240 mL)', '½ cup low sodium soy sauce (120 mL)', '¼ cup brown sugar (55 g)', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '4 cloves garlic minced', '4 tablespoons cornstarch', '4 tablespoons water', '1 head broccoli cut into florets', 'white rice cooked for serving']
instructions: ['1: In the insert of the crockpot, whisk together beef broth, soy sauce, 1 tablespoon sesame oil, minced 4 cloves garlic, and ¼ cup brown sugar', '2: Place slices of beef in the liquid and toss to coat', '3: Cover with lid and cook on ½ cup low heat for 4 hours', '4: After 4 hours, whisk together 4 tablespoons cornstarch and 4 tablespoons water in small bowl', '5:  Pour into crock pot, add the 1 head broccoli and gently stir to combine', '6: Cover with lid and cook 30 minutes to cook 1 head broccoli and thicken sauce', '7: Serve with warm white rice']

ingredients: ['1 baguette', '7 oz brie cheese (200 g) sliced', '2 granny smith apples thinly sliced', '½ cup candied walnuts (50 g) chopped', 'honey for serving']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 550°F (285°C), or as high as your oven will go', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: Using a serrated knife, slice the 1 baguette crosswise on a slight diagonal into ½-inch (1 cm) slices', '4:  Transfer the 1 baguette slices to the prepared baking sheet', '5: Top each piece of bread with 1-2 slices of Brie cheese', '6: Bake for 5 minutes, or until Brie begins to bubble and the bread is toasted', '7: Top each piece of bread with 1-2 apple slices and ½ cup candied walnuts', '8:  Drizzle with honey']

ingredients: ['Marinade', '¾ cup creamy peanut butter', '¾ cup coconut milk', '4 spring onions roughly chopped', '3 cloves garlic peeled', '10 g ginger (10 g) peeled', '2 fresh Serrano chilies roughly chopped', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 lime juiced', '8 boneless skinless chicken thighs diced', 'Sauce', '⅓ cup peanuts (50 g) chopped', '½ cup coconut milk (100 mL)', 'Special Equipment', 'Bamboo or wooden skewer']
instructions: ['1: In a food processor, blend the ¾ cup creamy ⅓ cup peanut butter, coconut milk, 4 spring onions, 3 cloves garlic, ginger, 2 fresh Serrano chilies, 1 teaspoon curry powder, 1 teaspoon cumin, 1 teaspoon turmeric, 1 teaspoon salt, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, and 1 lime juice into a smooth paste; this should make about 2 cups', '2:  Reserve half of the marinade and pour the other half over the 8 boneless skinless chicken thighs', '3:  Mix and chill for 2 hours or overnight', '4: Preheat the oven to 425˚F (220˚C)', '5:  Line a baking tray with parchment paper', '6: Skewer the marinated 8 boneless skinless chicken onto bamboo Bamboo or wooden skewers, then arrange the Bamboo or wooden skewers so their ends rest on the edges of the baking tray, allowing the 8 boneless skinless chicken to be suspended', '7:  Bake the 8 boneless skinless chicken Bamboo or wooden skewers for 15-20 minutes, until slightly dark brown on the edges and cooked through', '8: With no oil in the pan, toast the chopped ¾ cup creamy ⅓ cup ⅓ cup peanuts on low to medium heat, stirring constantly until the ¾ cup creamy ⅓ cup ⅓ cup peanuts turn golden brown, 2-3 minutes', '9:  Add in the reserved marinade and the coconut milk', '10:  Stir and cook until thick and very aromatic, 5-10 minutes', '11: Serve the 8 boneless skinless chicken Bamboo or wooden skewers with the sauce on the side']

ingredients: ['Salad', '2 cups water (480 mL)', 'salt to taste', '1 cup quinoa (170 g) rinsed', '2 cups fresh spinach (80 g) roughly chopped', '1 large cucumber diced', '4 roma tomatoes diced', '2 ripe avocados pits removed and diced', '1 lemon juiced', '4 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: In a small saucepan, bring the 2 cups water and a pinch of salt to a boil', '2:  Add the 1 cup quinoa, cover, and simmer for 15 minutes, or until the 2 cups water is absorbed', '3:  Transfer to a medium bowl to cool to room temperature, then fluff the 1 cup quinoa', '4: Refrigerate the 1 cup quinoa for 20 minutes', '5: Add the 2 cups fresh spinach, 1 large cucumber, 4 roma tomatoes, and avocado to the bowl of 1 cup quinoa and mix to combine', '6: Add the 1 lemon juice, 4 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, salt, and pepper, and mix well']

ingredients: ['Bolognese', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 onion minced', '½ cup large carrot (60 g) peeled and minced', '½ cup celery stalk (110 g) minced', '1 lb ground beef (455 g)', '1 lb ground pork (455 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '½ cup can of tomato paste (110 g)', '2 cups red wine (480 mL)', '4 cups diced tomato (800 g)', 'Ricotta-Herb Mixture', '15 oz ricotta cheese (425 g)', '½ cup fresh basil (20 g) chopped', '1 cup shredded parmesan cheese (100 g) plus more to taste', '½ cup fresh parsley (20 g) chopped', '1 egg', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 lb lasagna noodle (455 g) cooked', 'shredded mozzarella cheese']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Add the 2 tablespoons olive oil and 2 tablespoons butter to a ½ cup large skillet over medium-high heat', '3:  Once warmed, add the 1 onion, carrot, ½ cup celery, and garlic', '4:  Cook, stirring occasionally, until golden brown, 10-12 minutes', '5:  Once the vegetables have caramelized, add the 1 lb ground beef, 1 lb ground pork, salt, pepper, and ½ cup can of 4 cups 4 cups diced tomato paste', '6:  Stir to combine, breaking up the pieces of meat, until the meat has browned, 15-20 minutes', '7: Once the sauce is dark brown and starting to stick slightly to the bottom of the pan, add the 2 cups red wine', '8:  Scrape the bottom of the pan with a wooden spoon to release all the 1 lb lasagna noodle (455 g) cooked brown bits', '9:  Once the wine comes to a simmer, add the 4 cups diced canned ½ cup can of 4 cups 4 cups diced tomatoes, and stir to combine', '10:  Bring the sauce to a simmer and cook for at least 30 minutes (the longer the better!) stirring occasionally', '11: In a ½ cup large bowl, mix together the ricotta, ½ cup fresh basil, Parmesan, ½ cup fresh parsley, 1 egg, salt, and pepper', '12: In a 9x13-inch (23x33 cm) glass baking dish, add a layer of bolognese to the bottom', '13:  Top with noodles, then spread a layer of the ricotta mixture on top', '14:  Repeat with another layer of bolognese, noodles, ricotta, noodles, bolognese, then top with shredded mozzarella and additional Parmesan', '15:  Cover the pan with foil and bake for 25 minutes', '16: Remove the foil and bake for another 15 minutes, until the cheese on top has browned and the bolognese is bubbling', '17:  Slice and serve']

ingredients: ['unsalted butter softened for greasing', 'Option 1: Prepared Mix', '18 oz brownie mix (510 g) prepared according to package instructions', 'Option 2: From Scratch', '2 ¼ cups granulated sugar (450 g)', '1 ¼ cups dutch processed cocoa  powder (150 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 ½ cups all-purpose flour (190 g)', '1 cup vegetable oil (240 mL)', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '3 large eggs', '¼ cup water (60 mL)', 'Additions', '1 ½ cups chocolate chips (350 g)', '8 oz cream cheese (225 g)', '⅓ cup granulated sugar (65 g)', '1 large egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'whipped cream for serving', 'caramel sauce for drizzling']
instructions: ['1: Position a rack in the center of the oven and preheat to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Grease a 9-by-13-inch (23-by-33-cm) dark metal pan with softened unsalted butter, then line with parchment paper, leaving overhang on all sides', '3:  Grease the parchment with more unsalted butter', '4: OPTION 1: If using prepared mix, make the 18 oz brownie batter according to the package instructions', '5: OPTION 2: If making the 18 oz brownie batter from scratch, in a large bowl, whisk together the sugar, 1 ¼ cups dutch processed cocoa powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon baking powder, and 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '6:  Add the 1 cup vegetable oil, vanilla, eggs, and ¼ cup water and whisk to combine', '7: Stir in the 1 ½ cups chocolate chunks', '8: In a medium bowl, whisk together the 8 oz whipped cream cheese, sugar, egg, and vanilla', '9: Pour the 18 oz brownie batter into the prepared 1 teaspoon baking pan and smooth the top with a spatula', '10: Pour the 8 oz whipped cream cheese mixture over the top and swirl into the batter with a knife or skewer', '11: Bake until lightly puffed on top, about 20 minutes', '12:  Transfer the 18 oz brownie pan to a wire rack and let cool completely, about 30 minutes', '13: Use the parchment paper to lift the cooled 18 oz brownies out of the pan and cut into 12 bars', '14: Serve with a dollop of whipped 8 oz whipped cream and a drizzle of caramel']

ingredients: ['½ cup peanut butter (120 g)', '½ cup greek yogurt (140 g)', '1 cup almond milk (240 mL)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 tablespoons honey', '½ cup chia seeds (80 g)', 'Toppings', '1 banana sliced', 'roasted peanut', '4 tablespoons crunchy granola cluster']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, mix the ½ cup roasted peanut butter and ½ cup greek yogurt together until smooth', '2: Add in the 1 cup almond milk, 1 teaspoon vanilla, 2 tablespoons honey, and ½ cup chia seeds and mix until well combined', '3: Pour the mixture into an airtight container and refrigerate, covered for 4 hours', '4: Spoon the pudding into desired serving dish and top with sliced 1 banana, roasted ½ cup roasted peanuts, and 4 tablespoons crunchy granola clusters']

ingredients: ['1 cup ice cube (140 g)', '12 oz ginger ale (350 mL)', '1 ½ oz grenadine (45 mL)', '1 teaspoon fresh lime juice', 'Garnishes', 'maraschino cherry', 'gingerbread man or cookies of choice', 'gumdrop red and green', 'Lime wedge', 'pomegranate seed']
instructions: ['1: Fill a 16-ounce glass with the 1 cup ice', '2:  Pour in the 12 oz ginger ale, 1 ½ oz grenadine, and 1 teaspoon fresh lime juice and stir to combine', '3: Garnish as desired, with maraschino cherries, a 12 oz gingerbread man, and gumdrops, or with a 1 teaspoon fresh lime Lime wedge and pomegranate seeds', '4: Serve with a reusable straw']

ingredients: ['3 large eggs', '4 oz cheddar cheese (115 g)', '9 oz ham (255 g)', '15 white breads', 'butter or vegetable oil to fry', 'ice for ice bath']
instructions: ['1: Fill a small pot two-thirds full with water and bring to a boil', '2: With a paring knife, poke a small hole into the wider end of the egg', '3:  With a spoon, gently lower 3 large eggs into the boiling water and boil for precisely 5 minutes', '4: Cut the 4 oz cheddar cheese into strips, 4 inches (10 cm) long, ¼ inch (½ cm) thick', '5: Roll out a piece of 15 white bread until flat and dense', '6: Place a slice of 9 oz ham on the bread, then top with a strip of 4 oz cheddar', '7:  Roll up the bread (like a jelly roll) until cheese and 9 oz ham are entirely covered', '8: Fry the bread rolls for about 4 minutes in a buttered sauté pan over medium-high heat', '9:  Turn halfway through when rolls are lightly browned', '10: When 3 large eggs are done, carefully transfer them to a bowl of ice water', '11: Meanwhile, use an egg carton to cut out egg holders for each egg', '12: Take 3 large eggs out of ice water', '13:   Serve with the 9 oz ham and cheese dunkers']

ingredients: ['2 lb cooked chicken (910 g)', '1 cup hot sauce (260 g)', '½ cup ranch dressing (122 g)', '9 oz tortilla chips (255 g)', '2 cups monterey jack cheese (200 g)', '½ tomato diced', '½ cup green onions (75 g) sliced']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C)', '2: In a bowl, mix the 2 lb cooked chicken with the 1 cup hot sauce and the ½ cup ranch', '3: In a large pan or skillet, lay down half of the 9 oz tortilla chips, followed by half of the buffalo 2 lb cooked chicken, Monterey Jack, ½ tomato, and ½ cup green onions', '4:  Repeat with the remaining half of the ingredients', '5: Bake for 15 minutes, until cheese is melted']

ingredients: ['2 bananas', '⅓ cup honey (100 g)', '1 teaspoon almond extract', '1 ¼ cups rolled oats (125 g)', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 pinch salt', 'Suggested toppings', 'yogurt', 'blueberry', 'raspberry']
instructions: ['1: Mash two 2 bananas in a small bowl', '2: Add the honey and 1 teaspoon almond extract', '3:  Mix well and set aside', '4: Mix the 1 ¼ cups rolled oats, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, and a 1 pinch of salt in a large bowl, then add the banana mixture to it', '5:  Mix well', '6: Transfer to muffin tin tray, pressing down on the middle and sides to form the ⅓ 1 ¼ cup', '7:  Chill for 1-2 hours', '8: Bake for 10-12 minutes at 350°F (180°C)', '9: Leave to cool for 10-20 minutes', '10: Top with yogurt, blueberries, and raspberries']

ingredients: ['Meatballs', '1 lb ground beef (455 g)', '1 lb ground pork (455 g)', '1 cup panko breadcrumbs (50 g)', '½ cup onion (75 g) finely minced', '¼ cup fresh parsley (10 g) finely chopped', '2 cloves garlic minced', '2 eggs', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'Swedish Gravy', '¼ cup butter (55 g)', '¼ cup all-purpose flour (30 g)', '2 cups beef broth (480 mL)', '½ teaspoon ground allspice', '½ teaspoon nutmeg freshly grated', '1 cup heavy cream (240 mL)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'fresh parsley chopped to serve']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C)', '2: In a medium-size bowl mix together the 1 lb ground 2 cups beef, pork, bread crumbs, ½ cup onion, parsley, 2 cloves garlic, 2 eggs, salt, and pepper until just combined', '3: Take a walnut size of the meat mixture and roll into a ball', '4:  Repeat with remaining meat and transfer to an oiled rack on a sheet tray', '5: Bake meatballs for 15 minutes, until golden brown', '6:  Set aside', '7: Melt ¼ cup butter in a pan on medium heat and allow it to brown slightly', '8:  Stir in the ¼ cup all-purpose flour completely and cook for about 1 minute creating a pale roux', '9: Add the 1 lb ground 2 cups beef broth, stir, and cook until it thickens', '10: Add in the ground allspice, ½ teaspoon nutmeg, salt, pepper, and the 1 cup heavy cream, stir, and bring to a simmer for 5 minutes', '11: Add the meatballs and coat them with the gravy', '12: Sprinkle with the parsley, poke with toothpicks, and serve!']
