ingredients: ['Carnitas', '5 lb pork shoulder (2.2 g) cut into 2-inch (5 cm) cubes', '2 large white onions chopped', '10 avocado leaves', '1 teaspoon pepper', '¼ cup kosher salt (60 g)', '6 cloves garlic grated', '2 dried bay leaves', 'cold water', '½ cup orange juice (120 mL)', '½ cup milk (120 mL)', '12 oz mexican style soda (355 mL) 1 bottle', '3 lb lard (1.3 g) cut into large cubes', 'For Serving', 'white corn tortilla', 'guacamole', 'pickled vegetable', 'fresh cilantro chopped', 'lime wedge', 'rice (made with cilantro)', 'pinto bean', 'Preparation', 'Carnitas', '5 lb pork shoulder (2.2 g) cut into 2-inch (5 cm) cubes', '2 large white onions chopped', '10 avocado leaves', '1 teaspoon pepper', '¼ cup kosher salt (60 g)', '6 cloves garlic grated', '2 dried bay leaves', 'cold water', '½ cup orange juice (120 mL)', '½ cup milk (120 mL)', '12 oz mexican style soda (355 mL) 1 bottle', '3 lb lard (1.3 g) cut into large cubes', 'For Serving', 'white corn tortilla', 'guacamole', 'pickled vegetable', 'fresh cilantro chopped', 'lime wedge', 'rice (made with cilantro)', 'pinto bean', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: To a large pot, add the cubed pork shoulder, onions, avocado leaves, pepper, salt, garlic, and bay leaves', '2:  Add enough cold water to cover all the meat', '3:  Bring to a boil over high heat, then continue to boil for 20 minutes', '4: Add the orange juice, milk, and cola, return to a boil, and simmer until the liquid has reduced by half, about 1 hour', '5: Add the lard, let it melt, then boil off the rest of the liquid until the meat begins to fry, 1 hour more', '6: Once the meat turns dark golden brown and is crispy, scoop it out of the pot and onto a paper bag or paper towel-lined baking sheet to drain', '7: Serve with corn tortillas, guacamole, pickled vegetables, cilantro, lime wedges, cilantro rice, and pinto beans']

ingredients: ['Crème Anglaise', '1 cup milk (240 mL)', '1 cup heavy cream (240 mL)', '½ cup sugar (100 g) divided', '½ pod vanilla bean slit down the middle (or 1 teaspoon vanilla extract added while cooling)', '4 large egg yolks', '1 pinch salt', 'Strawberry Soufflés', '1 cup strawberry (150 g) hulled and quartered', '⅓ cup sugar (65 g) plus 4 tablespoons sugar divided', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon butter softened', '4 large egg whites', '¼ teaspoon cream of tartar', '1 pinch salt']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C)Prepare an ice bath and place a strainer over a medium bowl', '2:  Set nearby', '3: Make the crème anglaise: In a small saucepan, heat the milk, heavy 1 cup heavy ¼ teaspoon cream, ¼ cup (50 g) of sugar, and the vanilla bean ½ pod over medium heat for 2-3 minutes, until it begins to steam', '4:  Remove the pan from the heat', '5: In a medium bowl, combine the egg yolks, remaining ¼ cup (50 g) of sugar, and the salt and whisk together', '6:  Continue whisking and ladle in the milk mixture', '7:  Once combined, return the saucepan to medium heat, begin to whisk the milk mixture, and slowly pour in the egg mixture', '8: Cook the custard, continuously whisking to ensure the egg yolks don’t cook on the bottom, for about 5 minutes, until it coats the the back of a spoon', '9: Set the bowl with the strainer in the ice bath and strain the creme into the bowl', '10:  Whisk until cooled, about 5 minutes', '11:  Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve', '12: Add the strawberries, 2 tablespoons of sugar, and the 1 teaspoon lemon juice to a small saucepan', '13:  Cook over medium heat for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the strawberries are softened but still vibrant red', '14:  Remove the pan from the heat', '15: Strain the strawberry mixture through a fine-mesh sieve into a medium bowl', '16:  Use a spatula to press the berries through, making a strawberry puree', '17:  Discard the pulp and set the puree in the refrigerator to cool', '18: Set 6 ramekins on a baking sheet and coat the insides with the softened 1 tablespoon butter', '19:  Sprinkle 2 tablespoons of sugar among the ramekins and shake each to coat the bottom and sides with sugar', '20: Add the egg whites, 1 cup heavy ¼ teaspoon cream of tartar, and salt to a large bowl', '21:  Using an electric hand mixer, beat the whites on medium-high speed until foamy', '22:  Add the remaining ⅓ cup (65 g) of sugar in small increments, continuing to beat until the whites are stiff and glossy', '23: Using a spatula, carefully fold in the strawberry puree', '24: Fill each ramekin with the strawberry-egg white mixture and level off the tops with a 1 tablespoon butter knife', '25:  Run a clean thumb around the inside edge of each ramekin to allow the soufflés to rise properly', '26: Bake the soufflés for 10-12 minutes, until the tops are light brown', '27:  Avoid opening the oven prematurely, so the soufflés don’t fall', '28: Serve the soufflés immediately with the crème anglaise poured over the top']

ingredients: ['2 grapefruits', '4 limes', '½ cup vodka (120 mL)', 'grapefruit for garnish sliced', 'lime for garnish sliced', '½ cup simple syrup (120 mL)', '1 bottle champagne chilled', 'lime wedge optional', 'granulated sugar']
instructions: ['1: Quarter the 2 2 grapefruits, then your hands or a citrus press to juice the segments into a liquid measuring cup', '2:  You should have ½ cup of 2 grapefruit juice', '3:  Halve the 4 limes, then juice into the same measuring cup; you should have 1 cup of juice total', '4: Pour the citrus juice into a pitcher', '5:  Add the vodka, sliced 2 grapefruit and lime, if using, and simple syrup', '6:  Top with the 1 bottle champagne', '7: If desired, use the lime wedge to wet the rims of 1 bottle champagne flutes, then dip in granulated sugar to coat', '8:  Pour the punch into the flutes', '9:  Serve chilled']

ingredients: ['nonstick cooking spray for greasing', '6 tablespoons unsalted butter melted plus more for greasing', '1 ½ cups milk (360 mL)', '1 tablespoon white vinegar', '1 tablespoon sugar', '1 large egg', '1 cup all-purpose flour (125 g)', '1 cup cornmeal (150 g) finely ground', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 ½ teaspoons garlic powder', '½ teaspoon paprika', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 cup shredded cheddar cheese (100 g) plus more for garrnish', '2 cups chili (485 g) prepared such as https://tasty.co/recipe/chili-from-leftover-sauce warmed', 'sour cream for serving', 'green onion chopped for serving']
instructions: ['1: Grease a waffle iron with melted 6 tablespoons unsalted butter or nonstick spray', '2:  Set the heat to medium', '3: In a 1 large bowl, whisk together the melted 6 tablespoons unsalted butter, 1 ½ cups milk, 1 tablespoon white vinegar, 1 tablespoon sugar, and egg', '4:  Add the flour, cornmeal, baking soda, baking powder, 1 ½ teaspoons garlic powder, ½ teaspoon paprika, 1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt, and ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper and whisk to incorporate', '5:  Fold in the cheddar cheese with a rubber spatula', '6: Pour 1 scant cup (260 G) of batter onto the waffle iron and cook until golden brown, about 5 minutes', '7:  Repeat with the remaining batter', '8: Serve the waffles warm and topped with 2 cups chili, more cheddar cheese, sour cream, and green onions']

ingredients: ['2 large yellow onions roughly chopped', '⅓ cup vegetable oil (80 mL) plus 2 tablespoons divided', '14 oz diced tomato (395 g) 2 cans', '6 oz tomato paste (170 g) 1 can', '1 habanero pepper', '2 teaspoons curry powder', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '½ teaspoon mixed dried herbs', '3 chicken bouillon cubes crushed', '2 ½ cups long grain rice (500 g) rinsed', '1 cup frozen mixed vegetable (150 g)', '1 ½ cups water (360 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Add onions and 2 tablespoons of oil to a blender and pulse until smooth', '2:  Transfer to a medium bowl', '3: Add the 14 oz diced 14 oz diced 6 oz tomatoes, 14 oz diced 6 oz tomato paste, and 1 habanero pepper to the blender, and pulse until smooth', '4:  Transfer to a separate medium bowl', '5: Heat the remaining ⅓ cup (80 ml) of oil in a 2 large, heavy-bottomed pot over medium heat', '6: Once the oil is shimmering, add the onion puree and cook until the 1 ½ cups water has cooked out and the puree is starting to brown, about 10 minutes', '7: Stir in the 14 oz diced 6 oz tomato puree and add the 2 teaspoons curry powder, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, 1 teaspoon ground ginger, dried herbs,  and crushed 3 chicken bouillon cubes', '8:  Cook for 20-30 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the stew has reduced by half and is deep red in color', '9: Add the 2 ½ cups long grain rice, ½ teaspoon 1 cup frozen mixed vegetables, and 1 ½ cups water', '10:  Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and cover the pot with foil and a lid', '11:  Simmer for another 30 minutes, until the 2 ½ cups long grain rice is cooked through and the liquid is absorbed']

ingredients: ['Lavender Simple Syrup', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '1 cup granulated sugar (200 g)', '2 tablespoons culinary-grade dried lavender', 'Assembly', '1 cup ice (150 g)', '2 sprigs fresh rosemary', '4 oz gin (120 mL)', '4 tablespoons Meyer lemon juice', '2 teaspoons CBD oil', '2 strips Meyer lemon peel']
instructions: ['1: Make the lavender simple syrup: In a small saucepan over medium-high heat, combine the 1 cup water and 1 cup granulated sugar', '2:  Bring to a boil', '3:  Once boiling, reduce the heat to low and add the lavender', '4:  Simmer for 5 minutes, then remove the pot from the heat', '5:  Let the lavender steep in the syrup for 10 minutes, then strain into a glass jar', '6:  Let the syrup cool completely', '7:  The syrup will keep in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 10 days', '8: While the syrup cools, place 2 coupe or martini glasses in the freezer', '9: Fill a large cocktail shaker halfway with 1 cup ice', '10:  Add the 2 sprigs fresh rosemary springs, 4 oz gin, Meyer 4 tablespoons Meyer 2 strips Meyer lemon juice, 4 tablespoons of lavender simple syrup, and the CBD 2 teaspoons CBD oil', '11: Close the shaker tightly and wrap a kitchen towel around it to prevent spilling', '12:  Shake vigorously for about 1 minute', '13: Strain the cocktail into the chilled glasses, dividing evenly', '14: Garnish each cocktail with a 4 tablespoons Meyer 2 strips Meyer lemon peel and serve immediately']

ingredients: ['1 stick unsalted butter softened', '1 cup granulated sugar (200 g)', '4 eggs', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon almond extract (optional if you don’t have almond extract use 1 tsp of vanilla)', '2 ½ cups almond flour (310 g)', '2 teaspoons baking powder', 'powdered sugar for decoration', 'Preparation', '1 stick unsalted butter softened', '1 cup granulated sugar (200 g)', '4 eggs', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon almond extract (optional if you don’t have almond extract use 1 tsp of vanilla)', '2 ½ cups almond flour (310 g)', '2 teaspoons baking powder', 'powdered sugar for decoration', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350*F and grease a 9-inch (22 cm)round pan with butter', '2: In a stand mixing bowl fitted with the paddle attachment, cream the butter andsugar until light and fluffy, 2-3 minutes', '3: Add in eggs one at time, fully incorporating after each addition and to this, beat in vanilla and almond extract', '4: Slowly add in almond flour and baking powder until fully incorporated', '5: Pour almond cake into the pan and bake for 20-25 minutes, until a toothpick comes out clean', '6: Let rest for 20 minutes, and then flip onto a cake stand', '7: Dust with powdered sugar and serve!']

ingredients: ['1 butternut squash', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon dried rosemary', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'Preparation', '1 butternut squash', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon dried rosemary', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400º F (200º C)', '2: On a cutting board, halve the squash vertically', '3:  Scoop out the seeds, and peel the squash', '4: Cut the squash into ½-inch (12 mm) half moons, then cut into ¼-inch (6 mm) fries or wedges', '5: In a bowl, toss the fries with oil, salt, and pepper, then transfer to a baking tray', '6: Bake for 20-35 minutes, flipping halfway through']

ingredients: ['⅓ cup pumpkin puree (75 g)', '⅓ cup almond butter (80 g)', '¼ cup maple syrup (85 g) or honey', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 ½ cups rolled oats (120 g)', '¼ teaspoon cinnamon', '¼ teaspoon nutmeg', '¼ teaspoon ginger', '1 salt']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, combine the ⅓ cup pumpkin puree, ⅓ cup almond butter, ¼ cup maple syrup, and 1 teaspoon vanilla, and stir until smooth', '2: Add the 1 ½ cups rolled oats, ¼ teaspoon cinnamon, ¼ teaspoon nutmeg, ¼ teaspoon ginger, and 1 salt, and mix until evenly distributed', '3: Chill in the refrigerator for 30 minutes', '4: Use a tablespoon to scoop out the mixture, then roll into balls with your hands', '5: Store in the refrigerator in an airtight container for up to 1 week']

ingredients: ['Taquito Filling', '6 cups chicken (750 g) shredded', '¼ cup jalapeño (25 g) diced', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 ½ cups crema table cream (375 g)', '24 corn tortillas', 'oil for frying', 'Garnishes', '½ cup crema table cream (115 g)', 'fresh cilantro', '½ cup cotija cheese (60 g)', 'avocado']
instructions: ['1: In a sauce pan, over medium-high heat, combine all taquito filling ingredients', '2:  Mix well and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally', '3: Wrap 24 corn tortillas in a damp towel and microwave for 15-20 seconds', '4: Place about 2 tablespoons of filling across the tortilla about ⅓ of the way up from the bottom of the tortilla, and roll the tortilla around the filling', '5: Heat about ¼ inch (½ cm) of oil over medium-high heat', '6:  Carefully, place 3-4 taquitos in the oil, and cook for 3 minutes on each side', '7:  (Frying them seam side down first helps them stay closed during frying!)Remove from the pan and drain excess oil on the taquito on a paper towel', '8: Place cooked taquitos on a bed of lettuce and garnish with crema, fresh cilantro, ½ cup cotija, and avocado']

ingredients: ['½ stick unsalted butter divided', '½ medium yellow onion thinly sliced', '6 bratwurst sausages', '24 oz pilsner-style beer (720 mL)', '¼ cup baking soda (30 g)', '16 oz premade pizza dough (480 g)', '2 tablespoons all purpose flour plus more for dusting', '6 tablespoons sauerkraut plus more for serving', '2 large egg yolks beaten', '1 tablespoon flaky sea salt', '1 cup whole milk (240 mL)', '2 tablespoons heavy cream', '2 tablespoons worcestershire sauce', '½ teaspoon McCormick® Garlic Powder', '1 pinch McCormick® cayenne pepper', '2 tablespoons whole grain mustard', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '4 oz sharp cheddar cheese (120 g) grated']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 450°F (220°C)', '2: In a 2 large pot, melt 2 2 6 1 2 2 2 tablespoons of ½ stick unsalted butter over ½ medium-high heat', '3:  Add the onion and sauté for 2–3 minutes, until beginning to soften', '4:  Add the 6 bratwurst to the pot and pour in the 24 oz pilsner-style beer', '5:  Bring to a boil, then cover and cook for 8–10 minutes, until the 6 bratwurst are white and firm, but not completely cooked through', '6:  Transfer the sausages to a paper towel-lined plate and set aside', '7:  Reserve ½ cup of the 24 oz pilsner-style beer and discard the rest', '8: Bring a 2 large pot of water to a boil over high heat', '9:  Once boiling, add the baking soda and stir to dissolve', '10: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '11: While the water is boiling, roll out the 16 oz premade pizza dough on a lightly floured surface to a 10 x 6-inch (25 x 15 cm) rectangle, about ¼ inch (6 mm) thick', '12:  Cut the dough in half horizontally, then cut each half into 3 triangles', '13: Set a dough in front of you with the short end at the bottom and roll out to flatten slightly', '14:  Place a sausage at the bottom of the triangle and scoop a heaping 2 6 1 2 2 2 tablespoon of sauerkraut above the sausage', '15:  Pull the bottom edge of the dough over the sausage and sauerkraut, tucking snugly, then roll up and over the tip of the triangle to seal', '16:  Repeat with remaining dough, 6 bratwurst, and sauerkraut', '17: Working in batches of 2–3, carefully drop the wrapped 6 bratwurst into the boiling water for 20–30 seconds', '18:  Use a slotted spoon to remove the 6 bratwurst and transfer to the prepared baking sheet', '19: Let the dough dry out for about 5 minutes, then brush with the egg yolks and sprinkle generously with flaky sea salt', '20: Bake for 20–25 minutes, turning halfway through, until the dough is deep golden brown and the 6 bratwurst begins to brown', '21: While the 6 bratwurst are baking, make the cheese sauce: In a ½ medium saucepan, melt the remaining 2 2 6 1 2 2 2 tablespoons ½ stick unsalted butter over ½ medium heat', '22:  Whisk in the flour and cook for 2–3 minutes, until golden brown', '23:  Whisk in the reserved 24 oz pilsner-style beer, milk, and cream until smooth', '24:  Add the Worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, 1 pinch McCormick® cayenne, mustard, and 1 teaspoon kosher salt', '25:  Cook until the sauce is bubbling and thick, whisking occasionally to prevent burning, 2–4 minutes', '26: Whisk in the 4 oz sharp cheddar cheese and cook for 2–3 minutes, until completely melted and smooth', '27:  Transfer the sauce to a serving bowl', '28: Serve the hot 6 bratwurst in a blanket and cheese sauce immediately, along with additional sauerkraut if desired']

ingredients: ['salt to taste', '½ lb spaghetti (225 g)', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '2 teaspoons coarsely ground black pepper', '4 oz grated parmesan cheese (115 g) or pecorino romano cheese']
instructions: ['1: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil', '2:  Cook the pasta for 1 minute less than the package instructs, until al dente', '3:  Save 1 cup (240 ml) pasta water, then drain', '4: Heat a large sauté pan over medium heat', '5:  Add the 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, and 2 teaspoons coarsely ground black pepper, and stir to combine', '6: Stir in the reserved pasta water', '7: Toss in the cooked pasta', '8:  Reduce the heat to low', '9: Add the Parmesan and toss until the cheese is melted and the pasta is well-coated', '10: Season with salt, if desired']

ingredients: ['1 head romaine lettuce', '4 slices bacon cooked and crumbled', '1 avocado diced', '½ cup crouton (15 g)', '½ cup parmesan cheese (55 g) shaved add extra for serving', '¼ cup caesar dressing (60 g)']
instructions: ['1: Slice the 1 head romaine lettuce into about 1-inch (2 ½ cm) pieces, then transfer to a large salad bowl', '2: Add the 4 slices bacon, 1 avocado, croutons, cheese, and ¼ cup caesar dressing, mixing until evenly combined', '3: Serve with additional ½ cup parmesan on top']

ingredients: ['2 cups strong bread flour (250 g) plus more for dusting', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon yeast', '⅔ cup warm water (150 mL)', '1 teaspoon extra virgin olive oil plus a tiny bit for greasing', '⅔ cup pesto (150 g)', '¼ cup shredded cheddar cheese (30 g)', '¼ cup shredded mozzarella cheese (30 g)']
instructions: ['1: Combine the 2 cups strong bread flour, salt, and yeast together, then form a well in the centre', '2:  Add the water and 1 teaspoon of the olive oil and stir until the mixture holds together', '3: Turn onto a 2 cups strong bread floured surface and knead for 7-10 minutes', '4: Put the dough into a bowl greased with olive oil, cover with cling film, and allow to rise in a ⅔ cup warm place for 1 hour', '5: Knead the dough again for another minute or so, then form the mixture into 18 even-sized balls', '6: Coat each dough ball in a generous helping of ⅔ cup pesto', '7: Place the dough balls into a large cake tin, cover and rise for another hour', '8: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C', '9: )Cover the dough balls with the ¼ cup shredded cheddar and ¼ cup shredded mozzarella', '10: Bake for 20-25 minutes']

ingredients: ['2 sweet potatoes', '2 tablespoons olive oil divided', '6 oz wild  mushroom (170 g) such as black trumpet or cremini', '7 tablespoons butter divided', '1 sprig fresh sage', '½ cup chicken stock (120 mL)', '¾ lb cooked penne (340 g) al dente', '1 teaspoon sherry wine vinegar', '½ cup grated parmesan cheese (55 g) plus more for serving', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '5 amaretti cookies crushed to serve', '½ cup fresh chives (20 g) chopped to serve']
instructions: ['1: Use a fork to poke holes into 1 2 sweet potato', '2:  Wrap the 2 sweet potato in a damp paper towel and microwave on high for 10-12 minutes, until fork-tender', '3: Peel and dice the other 2 sweet potato into 1-centimeter (½ inch) cubes', '4: Carefully scoop the pulp of the ¾ lb cooked 2 sweet potato into a food processor or blender', '5:  Add about 1 1 teaspoon each of salt and pepper and blend under smooth', '6:  Add a splash of water if the puree is too thick', '7: In a pan over medium heat, add 1 tablespoon olive oil and the mushrooms', '8:  Cook until the mushrooms start to crisp, about 3 minutes', '9: Add 1 1 teaspoon each salt and pepper to the mushrooms and remove from the heat', '10:  Drain the mushrooms of excess oil in a paper towel-lined bowl', '11: Add 6 tablespoons of the butter and 1 sprig fresh sage to the pan and cook until brown bits start to form on the bottom, being very careful to not burn the butter', '12: Once slightly brown, remove the 1 sprig fresh sage and add the cubed 2 sweet potato and 1 1 teaspoon each of salt and pepper', '13:  Cook about 5 minutes, until the potato becomes tender', '14: Stir in the reserved purée and ½ cup chicken stock', '15:  Simmer for two minutes, until the sauce thickens slightly and the mixture comes together smoothly', '16: Add the penne and mushrooms and coat evenly in the sauce', '17: Finish the pasta with 1 tablespoon butter, 1 tablespoon of olive oil, and sherry wine vinegar, stirring to combine', '18:  Remove from heat and stir in the Parmesan cheese', '19: Serve warm, garnished with ½ cup fresh chives, crushed 5 amaretti cookies, and more Parmesan']

ingredients: ['1 teaspoon almond extract', '5 cups rice cereal (125 g)', '1 cup powdered sugar (120 g)', '½ cup sprinkles (80 g)', '225 g white chocolate (225 g)', '1 teaspoon coconut oil']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, mix 1 teaspoon coconut oil and 225 g white chocolate', '2:  Melt in microwave for 60 seconds', '3:  Stir every 15 seconds until melted', '4: Place 5 cups rice cereal in large bowl and add 1 teaspoon almond extract into melted chocolate', '5: Mix in melted chocolate and ½ cup sprinkles then stir until evenly coated', '6: In a large plastic bag, add 1 cup powdered sugar and the 5 cups rice cereal mix', '7: Close and shake until each 5 cups rice cereal is coated with sugar']

ingredients: ['1 cup blueberry (100 g)', '1 cup strawberry (150 g) sliced', '½ cup blackberry (75 g)', '½ cup raspberry (65 g)', '1 ½ cups milk (350 mL) of choice', '1 cup plain greek yogurt (285 g)']
instructions: ['1: Put fruit in a freezer bag', '2:  Seal and store in freezer for up to 8-12 months', '3: When ready to use, put 1 ½ cups milk, Greek yogurt, and frozen fruit into a blender and mix until consistency is smooth']

ingredients: ['Crust', '2 cups nuts (280 g) of choice', '1 cup oat flour (90 g)', '½ cup dark cocoa powder (60 g)', '⅓ cup honey (113 g) or preferred natural sweetener', '2 tablespoons milk of choice as needed', '¼ teaspoon salt', 'Filling', '2 cups greek yogurt (570 g)', '1 ½ cups peanut butter (360 g)', '¼ cup honey (85 g) or preferred natural sweetener', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 pinch salt', '1 dark chocolate chip to taste']
instructions: ['1: Place 2 cups nuts in the bowl of a food processor and pulse until chunky', '2: Add in the 1 cup oat flour, dark cocoa powder, honey, 2 tablespoons milk, and salt', '3:  Pulse until just thoroughly mixed', '4: Add mixture to a greased pie tin and press down firmly to form the crust', '5: Chill for 1 hour', '6: In a large bowl, combine Greek yogurt, 1 ½ cups peanut butter, honey, 1 teaspoon vanilla, and salt until consistency is smooth', '7: Add filling to pie crust and smooth into an even layer', '8: Top with dark chocolate chips', '9: Chill for at least 1 hour']

ingredients: ['2 cups grape (150 g)', '1 tablespoon sugar', '6 sprigs fresh thyme', 'Graham Cracker Crust', '2 packs graham cracker', '¼ cup powdered sugar (40 g)', '6 tablespoons butter melted', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', 'Filling', '12 oz cream cheese room temperature', '2 eggs room temperature', '¾ cup sugar (150 g)', '1 teaspoon vanilla', 'Topping', '1 cup sour cream (230 g)', '3 ½ tablespoons sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: Add the grapes to a parchment paper-lined baking sheet and sprinkle with sugar and 6 sprigs fresh thyme', '3: Bake for 45-55 minutes', '4:  Cool completely', '5: In the bowl of a food processor, add the 2 packs graham crackers and pulse until finely crumbled', '6: Transfer the 2 packs graham cracker crumbs to a bowl with the ¼ cup powdered sugar,  melted 6 tablespoons butter, and 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, and stir to combine', '7: Press the 2 packs graham cracker mixture into an 8- or 9-inch (22-cm) pie dish, pressing an even layer on the bottom and sides of the dish', '8: Bake for 10 minutes', '9: Let crust cool completely before filling', '10: In a bowl, add the 12 oz 1 cup 1 cup sour cream cheese, 2 eggs, sugar, and vanilla extract, and blend until smooth with a hand mixer', '11: Pour the 12 oz 1 cup 1 cup sour cream cheese mixture into the cooled crust, and bake for 10 minutes', '12: Remove and cool for at least 5 minutes', '13: In a bowl, add the 1 cup sour 12 oz 1 cup 1 cup sour cream, sugar, and vanilla extract in a bowl and mix to combine', '14: Spread the 1 cup sour 12 oz 1 cup 1 cup sour cream mixture on top of the pie in an even layer and bake for 10 minutes', '15: Remove and cool at room temperature', '16: Refrigerate for at least 4 hours, until chilled', '17: Top with the roasted grapes']

ingredients: ['1 cup water (240 mL) warm plus 2 tbsp', '1 teaspoon instant dry yeast', '1 tablespoon malt syrup', '3 ½ cups bread flour (420 g)', '2 teaspoons salt', 'Poaching Liquid Ingredients', '2 qt water (2 L)', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 tablespoon baking soda', '2 tablespoons malt syrup', 'egg wash as needed', 'Bagel topping and filling', 'onion to taste', 'poppy seed to taste', 'sesame seed to taste', 'garlic to taste', 'cream cheese frozen in 1 tbsp. balls to taste']
instructions: ['1: Start by activating the yeast', '2:  Add yeast and malt syrup to warm water, stir until dissolved', "3:  Once the yeast mix starts bubbling, you'll know the yeast is active", '4: Combine the 1 teaspoon instant dry ingredients in a large mixing bowl', '5:  Add the activated yeast mix and form a loose dough in the bowl', '6: Turn dough out onto your surface and knead until everything comes together nicely', '7:  (If it’s too 1 teaspoon instant dry, add more water a little bit at a time', '8: ) Transfer dough to an oiled bowl, cover and let the dough rest for 45 minutes', '9: While the dough is resting, prep your cream cheese', '10:  Freeze cream cheese into 1 tbsp', '11:  balls', '12: Punch down dough after 45 minutes, knead the dough a few times', '13:  Pull a handful of dough, form into a ball then flatten and wrap around a frozen cream cheese ball', '14:  Repeat with the rest of the dough', '15:  Place bagel balls on a parchment paper, cover and let it rest for 20 minutes', '16: While the bagel balls are resting, bring your poaching liquid ingredients to a boil over medium heat', '17: Take the rested bagel balls and boil in the poaching liquid for 15-20 seconds', '18:  Remove and place on parchment paper', '19: Brush with egg wash and sprinkle desired bagel toppings', '20: Bake in 325°F (160°C) preheated oven for 20 - 30 minutes until top is golden brown']

ingredients: ['½ lb chicken breast (225 g) cut into strips', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '½ cup BBQ sauce (145 g)', '2 flour tortillas', '¼ cup red onion (35 g) julienned', '½ cup monterey jack cheese (50 g) double for 2 quesadillas', '½ cup cheddar cheese (50 g) double for 2 quesadillas', 'Garnish', 'fresh parsley', 'BBQ sauce']
instructions: ['1: In a large skillet, add ½ lb chicken breast and season both sides with salt and pepper', '2: Cook 15-18 minutes, flipping halfway and adding the onions when you flip the ½ lb chicken', '3:  (Cooking times may vary depending on thickness of the ½ lb chicken breast)', '4: Remove the ½ lb chicken from the pan and continue to stir onions', '5: Shred the ½ lb chicken while onions are cooking', '6: Return the shredded ½ lb chicken to the pan with the onions', '7:  Add the BBQ sauce and stir', '8:  Remove from the pan and set aside', '9: Place a tortilla in a pan and add a layer ½ cup monterey jack and ½ cup cheddar cheese on half of the tortilla', '10: Place cooked ½ lb chicken and onions, and top with the rest of each cheese', '11:  Fold in half and cook 6 minutes, flipping halfway', '12: Serve with extra BBQ sauce and garnish with fresh parsley']

ingredients: ['Filling', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '2 ½ tablespoons unsalted butter', '¾ cup chopped pecans (90 g)', 'Crust', '3 oz cream cheese (85 g)', '5 ½ tablespoons unsalted butter', '1 cup all-purpose flour (140 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 375ºF (190ºC)', '2: Make the filling: Add the ½ cup sugar and butter to a large bowl and 3 oz cream with an electric hand mixer until fluffy', '3: Add the ¾ cup chopped pecans and fold to combine', '4:  Set aside', '5: Make the crust: In a large bowl, 3 oz cream together the 3 oz cream cheese and butter until smooth', '6: Add 1 cup all-purpose flour and beat to incorporate, then knead the dough with your hands until smooth', '7: Roll the dough into 18 small balls and press into the cups of a mini muffin tin', '8:  Fill the shells with the pecan filling', '9: Bake for 20-25 minutes, until golden brown', '10: Let the tarts cool in the mini muffin tin for 5 – 10 minutes', '11: Remove from the pan and serve warm']

ingredients: ['4 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '3 tablespoons sugar', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '2 chocolate sandwich cookies crushed plus additional for topping', '3 tablespoons milk', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'icing for topping optional']
instructions: ['1: In a 12-ounce (375 ml) mug or larger, mix all ingredients until just combined', '2: Microwave on high for 90 seconds to 2 minutes, watching to make sure it doesn’t spill over (depending on the size of the mug)', '3: Let cool one minute before eating', '4:  Top with icing and cookie crumbs (optional)']

ingredients: ['3 breasts chicken breast', '2 tablespoons taco seasoning', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 onion sliced', '4 cloves garlic cloves sliced', '3 bell peppers sliced', '1 lime juiced', '8 tortillas', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 cups shredded cheese (220 g) mexican blend']
instructions: ['1: Slice the chicken 3 breasts into strips, about an inch apart, and coat with 2 tablespoons taco seasoning', '2:  In a large skillet, heat 1 Tbsp', '3:  2 tablespoons vegetable oil and cook chicken until no longer pink and slightly charred', '4:  Remove cooked chicken from the skillet', '5: Heat another Tbsp', '6:  oil, add 1 onion and 4 cloves garlic and cook for a couple minutes until it’s slightly translucent', '7:  Add the 3 bell peppers, and cook slightly, then mix in the cooked chicken', '8:  Remove from heat and set aside', '9: In a clean pan, melt a bit of 2 tablespoons butter', '10:  Add a tortilla and move it around until it’s 2 tablespoons buttery', '11:  Add 2 cups shredded cheese, then fajita mixture, then more 2 cups shredded cheese, then top with another tortilla and pat it down', '12: Flip the quesadilla over and cook the other side until it’s golden', '13:  Remove from pan and cut into quarters', '14:  Repeat these steps with the remaining 8 tortillas']

ingredients: ['1 lb chicken wings (455 g)', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', 'Honey Mustard Sauce', '¼ cup honey (85 g)', '¼ cup dijon mustard (60 g)', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2: Remove excess moisture from 1 lb chicken wings with a paper towel', '3: In a large bowl, stir in 2 teaspoons baking powder and salt until 1 lb chicken is thoroughly coated', '4: Bake on a 2 teaspoons baking rack for 1 hour, or until golden brown and crispy, flipping every 20 minutes', '5:  For best results, place 2 teaspoons baking rack on a 2 teaspoons baking sheet covered with parchment paper or foil to catch drippings', '6: In a skillet, combine ¼ cup honey ¼ cup dijon mustard sauce ingredients on medium heat and stir in 1 lb chicken wings until fully coated', '7: Serve with your favorite side dish or dipping sauce']

ingredients: ['12 oz skinless salmon (340 g)', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'Honey Soy Marinade', '4 cloves garlic minced', '2 teaspoons ginger minced', '½ teaspoon red pepper', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '⅓ cup less sodium soy sauce (80 mL)', '⅓ cup honey (115 g)']
instructions: ['1: Place 12 oz skinless salmon in a sealable bag or medium bowl', '2: In a small bowl or measuring cup, mix marinade ingredients', '3: Pour half of the marinade on the 12 oz skinless salmon', '4:  Save the other half for later', '5: Let the 12 oz skinless salmon marinate in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes', '6: In a medium pan, heat oil', '7:  Add 12 oz skinless salmon to the pan, but discard the used marinade', '8:  Cook 12 oz skinless salmon on one side for about 2-3 minutes, then flip over and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes', '9: Remove 12 oz skinless salmon from pan', '10:  Pour in remaining marinade and reduce', '11: Serve the 12 oz skinless salmon with sauce and a side of veggies', '12:  We used broccoli']

ingredients: ['Base', '¼ cup flax meal (40 g)', '¾ cup water (180 mL)', '6 cups rolled oats (540 g)', '6 cups quinoa (1 kg) cooked', '4 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 cup maple syrup (220 g)', '½ cup refined coconut oil (120 mL) melted', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '4 ripe bananas mashed', 'Fillings', 'Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip', '6 tablespoons peanut butter', '5 tablespoons mini chocolate chips', 'Apple Cinnamon', '¾ cup gala apple (90 g) diced', '6 tablespoons walnuts chopped', '1 ½ tablespoons cinnamon', '¼ teaspoon nutmeg', 'Carrot Cake', '¾ cup carrot (30 g) grated', '3 teaspoons cinnamon', '¼ teaspoon nutmeg', '3 tablespoons almond butter', 'Mixed Berry', '3 tablespoons almond butter', '⅓ cup Strawberries (55 g) diced', '⅓ cup raspberries (40 g)', '⅓ cup blueberries (40 g)', 'nonstick cooking spray']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C)', '2: To make the ¼ cup flax eggs, combine the ¼ cup flax meal and ¾ cup water in a small bowl and mix well', '3:  Set aside for 10 minutes to gel', '4: In a large bowl, combine the 6 cups rolled oats, 6 cups quinoa, 4 teaspoons baking powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 cup maple syrup, ½ cup refined coconut oil, 2 teaspoons vanilla, ¼ cup flax eggs, and 4 ripe bananas, and mix until well-combined', '5: Divide the base dough equally between 4 medium bowls', '6: Add the 6 tablespoons peanut butter and 5 tablespoons mini chocolate chips to 1 bowl and mix until combined', '7: Add the ¾ cup gala apple, 6 tablespoons walnuts, cinnamon, and nutmeg to another bowl and mix until combined', '8: Add the carrots, cinnamon, nutmeg, and almond butter to another bowl and mix until combined', '9: Add the almond butter, strawberries, ⅓ cup raspberries, and ⅓ cup blueberries to the last bowl and mix until combined', '10: Grease 2 9x13-inch (23x33-cm) 4 teaspoons baking pans with nonstick spray', '11:  Transfer the bar mixtures to the pans, packing each mixture into half of a pan with a spoon or spatula', '12: Bake for 25-30 minutes, until the edges are slightly golden brown', '13: Remove the pans from the oven and let the bars cool for 20 minutes, then refrigerate for at least 30 minutes, or up to 5 days', '14:  Gently cut each flavor into 6 bars, then remove from the pans with a spatula']

ingredients: ['1 lb flank steak (455 g) trimmed and sliced thin against grain into 2-inch (5 cm) pieces', '2 teaspoons lime juice', '2 teaspoons coconut amino', '2 tablespoons avocado oil or other oil divided', '3 carrots peeled and sliced ¼ -inch (6 mm) thick on the bias', '1 head small napa cabbage thinly sliced plus more for serving', '3 fresh scallions minced plus more for thinly sliced for garnish', '1 tablespoon ginger grated', '4 cloves garlic minced', 'Sauce', '6 tablespoons coconut amino', '2 tablespoons lime juice', '1 ½ teaspoons tapioca flour']
instructions: ['1: Add the 1 lb flank steak, coconut aminos, and lime juice to a bowl, and toss to combine', '2:  Set aside to marinate for 10 minutes', '3: Heat 1 2 1 6 2 tablespoon of 2 2 1 6 2 tablespoons avocado oil over medium-high heat in a large nonstick skillet', '4:  Place half the meat in the skillet and sear for 1 minute on each side', '5: Place the seared steak in a clean bowl and repeat with the second batch, draining excess liquid from the skillet as needed', '6: Once all of the meat has been seared and removed from the pan, heat the remaining 1 2 1 6 2 tablespoon of 2 2 1 6 2 tablespoons avocado oil in the pan', '7:  Add in the 3 carrots and sauté until softened, about 5 minutes', '8: Add the Napa cabbage to the pan and quickly toss with the 3 carrots', '9: Move the cabbage and 3 carrots away from the center of the pan and sprinkle in the 3 fresh scallions, ginger, and 4 cloves garlic', '10:  Stir the mixture in the center of the pan until fragrant, about 30 seconds', '11: Mix all contents of the pan together and toss in the meat', '12: Pour in the coconut aminos, lime juice, and 1 ½ teaspoons tapioca flour', '13:  Stir the contents of the pan until well combined and the sauce has thickened, about 1-2 minutes', '14:  Remove from heat', '15: Divided the mixture between bowls filled with Napa cabbage and garnish with 3 fresh scallions']

ingredients: ['Rice and Peas', '1 teaspoon coconut oil', '1 can kidney bean drained and rinsed', '2 cups long grain rice (400 g)', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon garlic salt', '4 cups water (960 mL)', 'Peach and Avocado Salsa', '1 ripe peach pitted and cubed', '1 avocado pitted and diced', '½ cup red onion (75 g) diced', '1 jalapeño seeded and minced', '1 lime juiced', '½ bunch fresh cilantro roughly chopped', 'Fried Plantains', '2 ripe plantains', 'oil for frying', 'kosher salt to taste', 'Cabbage Stew', '¼ cup shredded purple cabbage (25 g)', '¼ cup shredded green cabbage (25 g)', '¼ cup red onion (35 g) thinly sliced', '4 scallions green part only cut on the bias plus more for garnish', 'kosher salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'Jerk Jackfruit', '1 can jackfruit drained and rinsed', '⅓ cup mild jerk seasoning sauce (80 g)', 'kosher salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Make the 2 cups long grain rice and peas: add the 1 teaspoon coconut 1 teaspoon coconut oil, 1 can kidney beans, 2 cups long grain rice, 4 cups water, pepper, and 1 teaspoon garlic salt to a medium pot and stir with a wooden spoon to combine', '2:  Cover and bring to a boil over medium-high heat, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 45–50 minutes, until the liquid is absorbed and the 2 cups long grain rice still has a slight bite', '3:  Fluff with a fork and set aside uncovered until ready to serve', '4: Make the salsa: In a medium bowl, mix together the 1 ripe peach, 1 avocado, red onion, 1 jalapeño, 1 lime juice, and ½ bunch fresh cilantro until well combined', '5:  Let sit until ready to serve', '6: Make the 2 ripe plantains: Peel the 2 ripe plantains, then slice into ¼-inch (6 mm) thick rounds', '7: Heat about ½ inch (2', '8: 54 cm) of 1 teaspoon coconut oil a deep skillet over medium heat until it reaches 325°F ( 160°C)', '9:  Add the 2 ripe plantains to the hot 1 teaspoon coconut oil and fry for 1–2 minutes per side, until golden brown all over', '10:  Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate to drain, smash flat with a can or glass, and season with a pinch of salt and pepper', '11: Make the cabbage stew: In a small pot, combine the ¼ cup shredded purple and ¼ cup shredded 4 4 scallions green cabbage, red onion, and 4 scallions', '12:  Cook over medium-low heat for 10–12 minutes, or until the cabbage is soft and tender', '13:  Season with salt and pepper to taste and garnish with more 4 scallions', '14: Make the ⅓ cup mild jerk 1 can jackfruit: In a medium bowl, use your hands or 2 forks to shred the 1 can jackfruit until it has the texture of pulled pork', '15:  Add the ⅓ cup mild jerk seasoning, salt, and pepper and toss to coat well', '16: Transfer the 1 can jackfruit to a small pan and gently warm over medium-low heat for 3–5 minutes, until warmed through and starting to caramelize', '17: To serve, add a few scoops of 2 cups long grain rice and peas to a bowl', '18:  Top with a quarter to a third of the ⅓ cup mild jerk 1 can jackfruit, fried 2 ripe plantains, cabbage slaw, and 1 ripe peach and 1 avocado salsa', '19:  Garnish with more 4 scallions']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon oil', 'salt to taste', '1 lb large chicken breast (455 g) cooked and diced', '2 cups asparagus (250 g) cut into 1 1/2-in/38-mm pieces', '10 oz cherry tomatoes (285 g) halved', '⅔ cup pesto (150 g)', '2 cups whole wheat penne (200 g) measured dry', 'parsley for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Heat the 1 tablespoon oil in a 1 lb large nonstick skillet', '2:  Toss in the 2 cups asparagus, season with a bit of salt, and sautée until the begin to soften, about 3 minutes', '3: Pour on the ⅔ cup pesto, pasta, and chicken and stir to combine', '4: Toss in the 10 oz cherry tomatoes and give everything a stir to combine and warm through', '5: Distribute pasta mixture evenly between 4 tupperware containers', '6: Top with parsley for garnish', '7: Can be refrigerated up to 4 days']

ingredients: ['1 lb sirloin steak (455 g) cut into 1-inch (2 1/2 cm) chunks', '2 cups asparagus (250 g) cut into 1-inch (2 1/2 cm) pieces', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '3 tablespoons canola oil', 'Special Equipment', 'bamboo skewer 6-inch (15cm)']
instructions: ['1: Skewer 3-4 pieces of 1 lb sirloin steak and 2 cups asparagus in an alternating pattern on a bamboo skewer', '2:  Repeat with remaining 1 lb sirloin steak and 2 cups asparagus', '3: Heat 3 tablespoons canola oil in a pan over medium-high heat', '4: Sear 3-4 skewers at a time, seasoning with salt and pepper, and flip when the undersides are a dark brown', '5: Season the other side with salt and pepper, and cook for about 1 more minute', '6: Cool and serve!']

ingredients: ['½ cup salted natural peanut butter (120 g)', '¼ cup raw honey (85 g)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '¾ cup oat flour (95 g)', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '¾ cup chocolate chips (130 g)', '¾ cup rolled oats (110 g) optional']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F', '2:  Coat 1 ½ teaspoon baking sheet with cooking spray, or line with parchment paper', '3: Add ½ cup salted natural peanut butter, ¼ cup raw honey and 1 teaspoon vanilla extract to a medium bowl and mix well', '4: Whisk together ¾ cup ¾ cup rolled oat flour and ½ teaspoon baking soda in a separate bowl', '5:  Stir ¾ cup ¾ cup rolled oat flour mixture into ½ cup salted natural peanut butter mixture', '6:  Fold in ¾ cup ¾ cup rolled ¾ cup rolled oats (if using) and ¾ cup chocolate chips', '7: Shape cookie dough into 1 tbsp balls, and place 2 inches apart on prepared ½ teaspoon baking sheets', '8:  Flatten cookies with the bottom of a drinking glass, dipped in water', '9: Bake for 8 to 10 minutes, or until cookies begin to brown and tops look dry', '10:  Cool for 3 minutes on a ½ teaspoon baking sheet, then transfer to a wire rack', '11: Serve warm and enjoy']

ingredients: ['2 russet potatoes peeled and diced', '2 zucchinis diced', '2 yellow squashes diced', '1 red pepper de-seeded and diced', '½ onion diced', '2 large links sausage', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 garlic cloves minced', '14.5 oz canned diced tomato (425 g) drained', 'salt', 'pepper']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)', '2: Layer all of the veggies and sausages on one or two 9x13 baking pans, depending on the size of the vegetables you use', '3: Drizzle on 2 tablespoons olive oil, and sprinkle on the 2 garlic, diced tomato, salt, and pepper', '4: Bake uncovered for one hour']

ingredients: ['Cake', '3 cups all-purpose flour (375 g)', '2 cups sugar (400 g)', '½ cup cocoa powder (60 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '½ cup coconut oil (120 g)', '½ cup maple syrup (165 g)', '1 ½ cups almond milk (360 mL) or milk substitute', '2 teaspoons cocoa powder', 'Frosting', '1 cup vegan butter (230 g) or vegetable shortening', '2 cups powdered sugar (240 g)', '1 cup cocoa powder (120 g)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '¼ cup almond milk (60 mL) or milk substitute']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '2: Add 3 cups all-purpose flour, 2 cups 2 cups 2 cups powdered sugar, ½ cup 2 teaspoons 1 cup cocoa powder, salt, and 1 tablespoon baking powder to a large mixing bowl and whisk to thoroughly incorporate, making sure there are no lumps', '3: Once, the dry ingredients are thoroughly mixed together, create a small well in the middle and add in the coconut oil, maple syrup, and 1 ½ cups ¼ cup almond milk', '4:  Continue to whisk until a thick and lumpy batter forms', '5: Grease the inside of two 9-inch (23 cm) cake tins with coconut oil or nonstick 1 tablespoon baking spray, and add about 1 teaspoon of ½ cup 2 teaspoons 1 cup cocoa powder to dust the inside of the pan', '6: Pour half of the batter into each of the cake tins', '7: Bake them for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out clean', '8: Once cakes are finished, transfer them or a cooking rack for 5-10 minutes before removing the finished cakes from their tins', '9: While the cakes cool prepare the frosting', '10:  Add vegan butter, 2 cups powdered 2 cups 2 cups 2 cups powdered sugar, ½ cup 2 teaspoons 1 cup cocoa powder, and vanilla extract to a mixing bowl and whisk using an electric hand-mixer until a smooth and glossy frosting forms', '11: Add 1 ½ cups ¼ cup almond milk and continue to mix until incorporated', '12: Choose which of the cakes will be the bottom of your finished cake and carefully level it off', '13: Place a small amount of the icing in the middle of your serving dish and place the cake on top', '14: Using about a cup (about 115g) of the icing, generously coat the bottom layer of the cake using a spatula', '15: Once the icing is spread out evenly, place the second cake on top and continue to frost the cake using the rest of the icing', '16: Refrigerate the cake for 30 minutes before serving', '17: Slice and serve']

ingredients: ['⅓ cup chickpea flour (40 g)', '¼ cup rice flour (30 g)', '¼ cup fresh cilantro (10 g) finely chopped', '2 serrano peppers seeded and finely chopped', '2 teaspoons ginger paste', '2 teaspoons garlic paste', 'kosher salt to taste', '½ cup water (120 mL)', 'oil for frying', '1 lb yukon gold potato (455 g) peeled and sliced into 1/8 in (3 mm) thick rounds', 'tomato or other chutney for serving']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, combine the ⅓ cup chickpea flour, ¼ cup rice flour, ¼ cup fresh cilantro, 2 serrano peppers, 2 teaspoons ginger, 2 teaspoons garlic, kosher salt, and ½ cup water', '2:  Stir with a rubber spatula until smooth', '3: Heat 1 inch (2 cm) of oil in a deep skillet over medium-high heat until it reaches 350˚F (180˚C)', '4: Working in batches, add the potatoes to the batter and toss to coat', '5: In batches, transfer the battered potatoes to the hot oil and fry until golden brown, flipping occasionally', '6:  Drain the fried potatoes on paper towels', '7: Serve hot with tomato chutney or your chutney of choice']

ingredients: ['3 eggs', '1 tablespoon butter', 'spinach cooked optional', 'tomato chopped optional', 'mushroom sliced and sautéed optional', 'cheese optional', 'nira chive chopped optional']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, beat the 3 eggs', '2: Melt the 1 tablespoon butter in a medium frying pan over medium heat', '3: Pour in the beaten 3 eggs', '4:  Stir and shake the pan, moving the 3 eggs around until a few curds form', '5:  Reduce the heat to low, then flatten the 3 eggs until the still-runny egg covers the entire bottom of the pan', '6:  Add any fillings that you would like', '7: Let the omelette cook until the 3 eggs are fully set, 1-2 minutes, then gently roll the omelette and transfer to a plate', '8:  The surface should be smooth with no color', '9: Sprinkle with chives, if desired']

ingredients: ['½ lb wide rice noodle (225 g)', '¼ cup palm sugar (50 g)', '¼ cup fish sauce (65 g)', '¼ cup tamarind paste (55 g)', '6 oz pork belly (170 g) cubed', '1 teaspoon oil', '2 cloves garlic minced', '2 shallots minced', '1 teaspoon pickled turnip optional', '1 egg', '4 oz tofu (110 g) cubed optional', '½ bunch green onion or chinese chives sliced plus more for serving', '½ cup bean sprout (50 g) plus more for serving', '1 egg yolk', 'lime for serving', 'peanut for serving', 'red thai chile diced for serving optional']
instructions: ['1: Soak ½ lb wide rice noodles in room temperature water 30 minutes prior to cooking', '2: In a small saucepan over medium-high heat, whisk together ¼ cup palm sugar, ¼ cup tamarind paste, and ¼ cup fish sauce', '3:  Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and reduce for 5 minutes until the sauce thickens and coats the back of a wooden spoon', '4:  Remove sauce from heat and set aside', '5: Heat a cast-iron pan or wok over high heat', '6: Add 6 oz pork belly and sear for about 3 minutes', '7: Add 1 teaspoon oil, minced 2 cloves garlic, 2 shallots, and turnips, and stir to incorporate', '8: Move the 6 oz pork belly to the side of the pan and add the egg', '9:  Break the egg up with a spatula or wooden spoon and stir to scramble', '10: Add soaked ½ lb wide rice noodles and stir to evenly incorporate all ingredients, stirring for 1 to 2 minutes', '11: Add 2 or 3 tablespoons of the reduced sauce and stir', '12: Add 4 oz tofu, Chinese chives or ½ bunch green onions, and ½ cup bean sprouts', '13:  Stir to incorporate and remove from heat', '14: When plating, make a divot in the center of the noodles and add the egg yolk', '15: Serve immediately with lime, peanuts, more sprouts and chives, and red chiles, if desired']

ingredients: ['⅔ cup rolled oats (65 g)', '⅔ cup milk (160 mL) of your choice', '½ cup vanilla greek yogurt (120 g)', '1 ½ teaspoons cocoa powder', '½ teaspoon cinnamon', '¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 teaspoon chia seed optional', '1 banana sliced', 'mini chocolate chip', 'banana sliced to serve', 'honey to serve']
instructions: ['1: In a mason jar or sealable container, add the ⅔ cup rolled oats, ⅔ cup milk, ½ cup vanilla greek yogurt, 1 ½ teaspoons cocoa powder, ½ teaspoon cinnamon, ¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg, 1 teaspoon chia seeds, and banana', '2:  Stir together', '3: Seal and place in the refrigerator overnight for up to five days', '4: Top with additional banana slices, mini chocolate chips, and honey if desired']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 jalapeño minced', '15 oz black beans (425 g)', '15 oz corn (425 g)', '3 roma tomatoes diced', '1 cup quinoa (170 g) rinsed', '2 cups vegetable stock (480 mL)', '1 tablespoon chili powder', '2 teaspoons cumin', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 avocado cubed', '1 lime juiced', 'fresh cilantro to garnish']
instructions: ['1: Heat the oil in a large pan over medium heat', '2:  Add the 3 cloves garlic and 1 jalapeño and cook for about 2 minutes, until softened', '3: Add the black beans, corn, 3 roma tomatoes, 1 cup quinoa, vegetable stock, 1 tablespoon chili powder, 2 teaspoons cumin, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1 teaspoon pepper', '4:  Stir, then cover and cook for 15-20 minutes, until the liquid is absorbed and the 1 cup quinoa is tender', '5: Transfer the salad to a serving bowl and top with the 1 avocado, 1 lime juice, and fresh cilantro']

ingredients: ['4 thick-cut pork chops', '½ teaspoon paprika', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '½ teaspoon salt', '4 tablespoons brown sugar', 'olive oil for frying']
instructions: ['1: In a bowl, combine your spices (paprika, ½ teaspoon cayenne pepper, ½ teaspoon garlic powder, ½ teaspoon black pepper, and ½ teaspoon salt)', '2: Rub the 4 thick-cut pork chops in the spices generously', '3: Heat olive oil in an oven-safe skillet over medium/high heat', '4:  When the oil is hot, add the 4 thick-cut pork chops', '5:  Cook for about 3-5 minutes on each side or until they have a nice caramelized 4 tablespoons brownness to them', '6:  Once you feel that they are looking 4 tablespoons browned, add a Tablespoon of 4 tablespoons brown sugar to each 4 thick-cut pork chop', '7:  Turn each 4 thick-cut pork chop over, so both sides get some melted 4 tablespoons brown sugar', '8:  (Don’t add the 4 tablespoons brown sugar too early or else the sugar will burn and smoke up the room', '9: )Bake at 350˚F (175˚C) for 15 minutes, making sure the 4 thick-cut pork chops are cooked through', '10: Before serving, pour the glaze that’s formed in the pan over the chops', '11:  Serve with your vegetables of choice']

ingredients: ['Braised Pork Belly', '1 ½ lb whole skin-on pork belly (680 g)', '¼ cup kosher salt (60 g)', '2 tablespoons sugar', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 pod star anise', '2 cloves garlic', '3 bay leaves', '⅓ cup soy sauce (80 mL)', '2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '½ gal water (1.9 kg)', 'Adobo Sauce', '⅓ cup water (80 mL)', '1 cup soy sauce (240 mL)', '2 tablespoons sugar', '2 tablespoons canola oil', '½ teaspoon bay leaf powder', '1 ½ teaspoons freshly ground black pepper', '3 cloves garlic', '⅓ cup coconut vinegar (80 mL)', '⅔ cup full-fat coconut milk (160 mL)', 'oil for frying', 'Assembly', '4 poached eggs', '4 pinches ground szechuan peppercorn', '2 teaspoons scallion thinly sliced green parts only', '2 teaspoons garlic fried', '4 teaspoons fresh cilantro', 'jasmine rice cooked']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 325˚F (160˚C)', '2: Cut the 1 ½ lb whole skin-on pork belly in half crosswise and place in a Dutch oven or large oven-safe pot', '3: In a large bowl, combine the ¼ cup kosher salt, sugar, pepper, 1 pod star anise, garlic, bay leaves, soy sauce, 2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar, and water', '4:  Whisk until the ¼ cup kosher salt and sugar have dissolved', '5: Pour the braising liquid over the 1 ½ lb whole skin-on pork belly', '6:  Cover the 1 ½ lb whole skin-on pork belly with a sheet of parchment paper, then tightly cover the pot with a sheet of aluminum foil', '7:  Bake for 2-2½ hours, until the 1 ½ lb whole skin-on pork is tender but not falling apart', '8: Remove the 1 ½ lb whole skin-on pork belly from the braising liquid and transfer to a wire rack set over a baking sheet', '9:  Chill uncovered in the refrigerator overnight', '10: Make the adobo sauce: In a medium saucepan over low heat, combine the water, soy sauce, sugar, 2 tablespoons canola 2 tablespoons canola oil, bay leaf powder, black pepper, garlic, coconut vinegar, and coconut milk', '11:  Simmer for 15-20 minutes', '12:  Remove the sauce from the heat and reserve until ready to use', '13: Remove the 1 ½ lb whole skin-on pork belly from the refrigerator and cut it into approximately 8 5-ounce (140 g) pieces', '14:  Score the 1 ½ lb whole skin-on pork by slicing through the fat cap, stopping once you reach the meat, in ½-inch (1 cm) sections', '15: Fill a large pot halfway with the 2 tablespoons canola oil and heat until it reaches 375˚F (190˚C)', '16: Fry the 1 ½ lb whole skin-on pork belly until the skin is crispy and the center is hot, about 8 minutes', '17: Slice the 1 ½ lb whole skin-on pork belly between the scores', '18: To serve, ladle some adobo sauce on the bottom of a serving bowl', '19:  Arrange a portion of 1 ½ lb whole skin-on pork belly on top and garnish with a 4 poached egg, Szechuan pepper, scallions, fried garlic, and 4 teaspoons fresh cilantro', '20:  Serve with Jasmine rice alongside']

ingredients: ['crushed ice', '4 cups ice cube (560 g)', 'Cocktail', '1 oz honey (30 g)', '1 oz fresh grapefruit juice (30 mL) or orange juice', '1 oz dry vermouth (30 mL)', '2 oz rosé wine (60 mL)', '1 half grapefruit or orange peel', 'fresh thyme sprig for garnish', 'seltzer for topping']
instructions: ['1: Make the crushed ice: Add 2 4 cups (280 G) of ice to a food processor', '2:  Pulse 6–8 times, until the ice is uniformly crushed', '3:  Transfer to a large zip-top freezer bag', '4:  Repeat with the remaining 2 4 cups of ice', '5: Store the bag in the freezer and use the ice for cocktails or smoothies', '6:  If the ice has clumped together, gently drop it on the counter a few times to break it up', '7: Make the cocktail: In a small glass or measuring cup, use a chopstick or bar spoon to stir together the 1 oz honey, grapefruit juice, and 1 oz dry vermouth until the 1 oz honey is dissolved', '8:  Add the 2 oz rosé and stir briefly', '9: Pack a large wine glass with crushed ice', '10:  Pour in the 2 oz rosé mixture', '11:  Slide in the grapefruit wheel', '12:  Place the fresh thyme sprigs on your palm and slap your other hand on top', '13:  (This releases the oils in the fresh thyme', '14: ) Slide the fresh thyme into the cocktail', '15:  Top with seltzer and serve']

ingredients: ['1 cup chocolate hazelnut spread (300 g) divided', '2 large eggs', '¼ cup all-purpose flour (30 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a medium mixing bowl, whisk together ¾ cup (225 g) chocolate hazelnut spread and the 2 large eggs', '2: Fold in the flour', '3: Evenly distribute into two mugs', '4: Microwave each mug for 2 minutes', '5: Cool for 5 minutes', '6: Frost with remaining chocolate hazelnut spread and serve warm']

ingredients: ['½ cup rolled oats (40 g)', '⅓ cup almond milk (80 mL) or preferred milk', '¼ cup greek yogurt (70 g)', '1 teaspoon maple syrup', '1 teaspoon cocoa powder', '2 strawberries diced']
instructions: ['1: In a mason jar, fill with ½ cup rolled oats, ⅓ cup almond milk, Greek yogurt, 1 teaspoon cocoa powder, and 1 teaspoon maple syrup', '2:  Stir until well combined', '3: Place diced 2 strawberries on top and seal jar', '4: Soak the oats overnight', '5: Place in fridge until ready to eat']

ingredients: ['8 oz pad thai noodle (225 g) softened and set aside', '4 tablespoons tamarind concentrate', '2 tablespoons fish sauce', '3 tablespoons palm sugar or 1 tsp light brown sugar', '1 tablespoon  sriracha optional', '2 tablespoons canola oil', '8 oz fresh shrimp (225 g) uncooked', 'salt and pepper', '2 eggs beaten', '¼ cup garlic chives (10 g)', '½ cup bean sprout (50 g)', '½ cup peanuts (55 g) chopped', '¼ cup purple cabbage (25 g) sliced', 'carrot few thinly-sliced', '½ lime']
instructions: ['1: To make the sauce: Combine 4 tablespoons tamarind concentrate, 2 tablespoons fish sauce, 3 tablespoons palm sugar or light brown sugar, and 1 tablespoon  sriracha (optional)', '2:  Whisk and taste', '3: Heat 2 tablespoons canola oil in a pan', '4:  Sear 8 oz', '5:  of uncooked fresh shrimp for 1-2 minutes on each side', '6:  Season with salt and pepper', '7:  Set aside', '8: In the same pan, add a little more oil and scramble 2 beaten 2 eggs, breaking them down into small pieces with a wooden spoon', '9:  Add noodles, sauce, garlic chives sliced into 1 ¼” thick strips, ¼ cup (25 g) bean sprouts, and ¼ cup (30 g) chopped peanuts', '10:  Toss', '11: Add back cooked shrimp and give it another toss', '12:  Top with sliced purple cabbage and a few thinly-sliced carrots for color (optional), ¼ cup (25 g) bean sprouts, and ¼ cup (30 g) chopped peanuts', '13: Squeeze juice of half a ½ lime over the time and serve warm']

ingredients: ['1 pomegranate', '1 red apple cored and chopped', '1 green apple cored and chopped', '2 pears cored and chopped', '3 clementines peeled and sliced', '3 kiwis peeled and sliced', '3 tablespoons lime juice', '2 tablespoons honey']
instructions: ['1: Slice the 1 pomegranate in half crosswise', '2:  Hold the 1 pomegranate cut side down over a medium bowl and tap the back with a wooden spoon to release the seeds', '3:  Rinse and drain', '4: Add the apples, 2 pears, 3 clementines, 3 kiwis, and 1 pomegranate seeds to a large bowl', '5: In a small bowl or measuring cup, combine the 3 tablespoons lime juice and 2 tablespoons honey and stir until incorporated', '6: Drizzle the dressing over fruit and gently toss until well coated', '7: Serve chilled']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '1 cup corn (175 g)', '2 eggs soft-boiled', '2 cups fresh spinach (80 g)', '4 cups chicken stock (960 mL)', '2 cloves garlic smashed', 'thumb of ginger 3 in (8 cm) piece sliced', '3 pieces scallions chopped', '2 chicken breasts shredded', '2 tablespoons miso paste', '2 servings ramen noodle cooked', 'scallion chopped for garnish', 'nori for garnish', 'Preparation', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 cup corn (175 g)', '2 eggs soft-boiled', '2 cups fresh spinach (80 g)', '4 cups chicken stock (960 mL)', '2 cloves garlic smashed', 'thumb of ginger 3 in (8 cm) piece sliced', '3 pieces scallions chopped', '2 chicken breasts shredded', '2 tablespoons miso paste', '2 servings ramen noodle cooked', 'scallion chopped for garnish', 'nori for garnish', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Heat butter in a saucepan, fry corn until warm', '2:  Set aside', '3: Soft-boil 2 eggs and set aside', '4:  Blanch the spinach and set aside', '5: Bring chicken stock, garlic, ginger and scallions to a boil', '6:  Boil for 30 minutes', '7: Add the chicken, simmer for 20 minutes', '8:  Remove, and set aside', '9: Dissolve the miso paste in the chicken broth', '10: Shred the chicken', '11: Put everything together', '12:  Divide noodles between two bowls', '13:  Pour over chicken broth', '14:  Add the spinach, corn, shredded chicken, chopped scallions, soft-boiled egg and nori']

ingredients: ['Pickled Red Onions', '1 ½ cups water (360 mL)', '1 ½ cups apple cider vinegar (360 mL)', '1 tablespoon kosher salt plus more to taste', '1 tablespoon sugar', '5 whole black peppercorns', '¼ teaspoon coriander seeds', '1 small red onion thinly sliced', 'Thousand Island Dressing', '¾ cup mayonnaise (185 g)', '¼ cup ketchup (60 g)', '2 tablespoons pickle finely chopped', '1 clove garlic minced', '1 teaspoon white wine vinegar', 'Burger', '2 lb ground beef (910 g) 80/20', '2 teaspoons kosher salt to taste', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon grapeseed oil', '4 slices cheddar cheese', '4 sesame buns', '1 tomato sliced for serving', '4 leaves bibb lettuce for serving', 'french fry for serving']
instructions: ['1: Make the pickled red onions: In a 1 small pot, combine the 1 ½ cups water, 1 ½ cups apple cider 1 ½ cups apple cider 1 teaspoon white wine vinegar, salt, 1 tablespoon sugar, 5 whole black peppercorns, and ¼ teaspoon coriander seeds, and bring to a boil over medium-high heat, stirring until the 1 tablespoon sugar dissolves', '2: Turn off the heat and add the sliced onion, making sure they are fully submerged', '3:  Let cool to room temperature for 30 minutes before serving', '4: Make the Thousand Island Dressing: In a medium bowl, whisk together the ¾ cup mayonnaise, ¼ cup ketchup, pickles, 1 clove garlic, and 1 ½ cups apple cider 1 teaspoon white wine vinegar', '5: In a large bowl, season the ground beef generously with salt and pepper', '6:  Use your hands to mix until evenly combined', '7: Divide the beef into 4 8-ounce portions and form into patties', '8:  Place on a cutting board', '9:  Use your thumb to press a divot into the center of each burger', '10: Heat the 1 tablespoon grapeseed oil in a cast iron or stainless steel skillet over medium-high heat until nearly smoking', '11:  Add the burger patties and cook for 3-4 minutes, without disturbing, until browned', '12: Use a spatula to flip the burgers over and place a slice of 4 slices cheddar on each one', '13:  Cook for another 3-4 minutes, until the burgers are cooked through and cheese has melted', '14: Place on 4 sesame buns and top with the pickled red onions, Thousand Island Dressing, 1 tomato, and 4 leaves bibb lettuce', '15:  Serve with French fries']

ingredients: ['2 tubes crescent dough', '1 cup cranberry sauce (290 g)', '1 wheel brie cheese cut into 12 wedges', '1 large egg beaten', '1 teaspoon flaky sea salt', '1 teaspoon fresh thyme leaf']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: Arrange the 2 tubes crescent roll triangles on the prepared baking sheet with the points sticking out, overlapping the bases to form an 8-inch (20 cm) circle', '4: Spoon the 1 cup cranberry sauce onto the bases of the 2 tubes crescent dough triangles and top with the 1 wheel brie wedges', '5:  Fold the pointed ends of the dough over the 1 cup cranberry sauce and 1 wheel brie and tuck underneath to seal', '6: Brush the ring with the beaten 1 large egg and sprinkle with the 1 teaspoon flaky salt and 1 teaspoon fresh thyme', '7: Bake for 30 minutes, turning halfway through, or until dark golden brown', '8:  Transfer to a platter and serve']

ingredients: ['3 lb marbled rib eye steak (1.3 g) thinly sliced', '1 medium white onion roughly chopped plus 1 thinly sliced divided', '1 asian pear peeled cored and chopped', '10 cloves garlic', '1 piece ginger peeled', '½ cup light brown sugar (100 g)', '½ cup soy sauce (120 mL)', '⅓ cup sesame oil (80 mL)', '2 teaspoons freshly ground black pepper', '4 green onions roughly chopped plus 1 chopped divided', 'vegetable oil for cooking', '2 teaspoons toasted sesame seeds', 'white rice for serving (optional)']
instructions: ['1: Pat the 3 lb marbled rib eye steak with paper towels to absorb any excess moisture', '2:  Transfer the 3 lb marbled rib eye steak to an airtight container', '3: In a blender or food processor, combine the roughly chopped 1 medium white onion, Asian pear, 10 cloves garlic, 1 piece ginger, ½ cup brown sugar, soy sauce, sesame oil, and 2 teaspoons freshly ground black pepper and blend until smooth', '4: Pour the marinade over the beef', '5:  Add the thinly sliced 1 medium white onion and roughly chopped 4 green onions and mix well to coat evenly', '6:  Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour, or overnight', '7: Heat 1 teaspoon vegetable oil in a Korean barbecue griddle or 1 medium nonstick skillet over 1 medium-high heat', '8:  Working in batches to avoid overcrowding the pan, add the bulgogi and cook for about 3 minutes, or until browned', '9:  Flip and cook for another 1–2 minutes, until browned on the other side', '10: Transfer the bulgogi to a plate and top with the chopped 4 green onion and 2 teaspoons toasted sesame seeds', '11:  Serve with rice']

ingredients: ['1 cup unsweetened almond milk (240 mL)', '1 cup frozen raspberry (125 g)', '½ cup beet (100 g) cooked and sliced', '1 cup beet greens (40 g) chopped', '1 banana sliced', '¼ cup quinoa flakes (40 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a blender, combine the 1 cup unsweetened almond milk, raspberries, beets, beet greens, 1 banana, and ¼ cup quinoa flakes', '2:  Blend until smooth']

ingredients: ['2 cups strawberry (300 g) sliced', '1 banana sliced', '1 ½ cups milk (360 mL) of choice', '1 cup plain greek yogurt (285 g)']
instructions: ['1: Put fruit in a freezer bag', '2:  Seal and store in freezer for up to 8 -12 months', '3: When ready to use, put 1 ½ cups milk, Greek yogurt, and frozen fruit into a blender and mix until consistency is smooth']

ingredients: ['2 bananas', '2 eggs', '¼ cup peanut butter (60 g)', '½ cup oats (50 g)', '¼ cup dark chocolate chips (45 g)', '¼ teaspoon salt']
instructions: ['1: Mash 2 bananas in a large bowl until smooth', '2:  Mix in 2 eggs and ¼ cup peanut butter until well combined, then mix in remaining ingredients', '3: Heat a skillet to medium and add in a scoop of the pancake batter', '4:  Smooth out to form an even layer', '5:  Cook for about 2-3 minutes until you start to see bubbles releasing from the top of the batter', '6:  Flip and cook until the other side is golden brown, about 1-2 minutes', '7: Garnish your pancakes with your favorite toppings! We used banana slices, ¼ cup dark chocolate chips and maple syrup']

ingredients: ['1 box chocolate cake mix prepared according to package instructions', '18 chocolate peanut butter cups', '1 cup vanilla frosting (115 g)', '¾ cup peanut butter (180 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)', '2: In a large bowl, prepare the 1 box chocolate cake batter', '3: Divide the batter evenly among a lined muffin tin, filling halfway', '4: Place a 18 chocolate ¾ cup peanut butter cup in each, then top with remaining batter, filling about ¾ of the way up', '5: Bake for 20 minutes, then cool', '6: In a separate bowl, combine 18 chocolate ¾ cup peanut butter and vanilla frosting, stirring until smooth', '7: Then halve the remaining 18 chocolate ¾ cup peanut butter cups', '8: Pipe the frosting onto each cupcake, then top with the 18 chocolate ¾ cup peanut butter cup halves']

ingredients: ['2 cups full-fat greek yogurt (570 g)', '15 saffron strands', '1 tablespoon hot water', '½ cup powdered sugar (55 g)', '½ teaspoon ground cardamom', 'whipped cream for garnish (optional)', 'crushed nut for topping (optional)']
instructions: ['1: Line a fine-mesh strainer with cheesecloth and set over a deep bowl', '2: Scoop the Greek yogurt into the cheesecloth, then gather the cloth around the yogurt and twist the top so the yogurt forms a taut ball', '3:   Set in the strainer and  refrigerate for 6–8 hours, up to overnight, until the whey has drained and the yogurt is very thick', '4: Add the 15 saffron to a small bowl', '5:  Pour the 1 tablespoon hot water over the threads and let soak for 5 minutes', '6: Transfer the thick yogurt to a large bowl with the ½ cup powdered sugar, 15 saffron threads and soaking liquid, and ½ teaspoon ground cardamom', '7:  Whisk vigorously until well combined and smooth', '8: Transfer the shrikhand in the serving bowls or 2 cups and garnish with whipped cream and crushed nuts, if desired']

ingredients: ['1 onion diced', '4 stalks celery diced', '6 carrots diced', '1 clove garlic', '3 tablespoons butter', '¼ cup flour (30 g)', '2 cups chicken stock (470 mL)', '2 cups half & half (470 mL)', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '1 cup frozen corn (175 g)', '1 cup frozen peas (150 g)', '1 whole rotisserie chicken']
instructions: ['1: Heat oil in large pot on medium high heat', '2: Bring in 1 onion, 4 stalks celery, 6 carrots, and 1 clove garlic and cook until 1 onions are translucent, about 5 minutes', '3: Stir in 3 tablespoons butter and melt', '4: Add in ¼ cup flour and stir until ¼ cup flour 3 tablespoons butter mixture coats vegetables and browns lightly', '5: Add the chicken stock and 2 cups half and 2 cups half and stir to combine', '6: Season with 1 teaspoon pepper, 1 teaspoon dried thyme, and 1 pinch ground nutmeg and allow to come to a boil', '7: Reduce the heat to medium-low and add in 1 cup frozen corn, 1 cup frozen peas, and chicken and fully incorporate', '8: Season with salt', '9: Optional - garnish with cookie sized pieces of pie crust']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil (30 mL)', '5 cloves garlic minced', '4 spring onions divided ', '2 carrots cut into matchsticks ', '1 cup snap pea (100 g)', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '3 tablespoons soy sauce', '9 oz dried rice noodles (250 g) cooked']
instructions: ['1: Heat the 2 tablespoons vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat', '2:  Add the 5 cloves garlic and 3 4 spring onions and cook for 2-3 minutes', '3: Add the 2 carrots and peas, before stirring in the 2 tablespoons brown sugar and 3 tablespoons soy sauce', '4: Add the 9 oz dried rice noodles and mix together for another couple of minutes', '5: Season with salt and pepper, then slice remaining 4 spring onion and top to serve']

ingredients: ['2 avocados pitted peeled and diced', '3 strips bacon cooked and chopped', '½ red onion minced', '1 medium roma tomato seeded and diced', '½ jalapeño seeded and minced', '1 lime juiced', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'cotija cheese for garnish', 'tortilla chip for serving']
instructions: ['1: In a 1 medium bowl, combine the avocado, 3 strips bacon, ½ red onion, tomato, ½ jalapeño, 1 lime juice, salt, and pepper', '2:  Mix together until fully incorporated', '3:  Sprinkle with Cotija cheese', '4: Serve with tortilla chips']

ingredients: ['1 lb skirt steak (455 g)', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 onion sliced', '4 cloves garlic sliced', '3 bell peppers sliced', '1 jalapeño pepper sliced', '1 tablespoon butter', '4 large tortillas', '2 cups mexican blend cheese (200 g)', 'guacamole', 'sour cream', 'salsa']
instructions: ['1: Season 1 lb skirt steak with 2 tablespoons olive oil, salt, 3 3 bell 1 1 jalapeño pepper, 1 teaspoon chili powder, and 1 teaspoon cumin', '2: Cook on high heat for roughly 3 minutes each side, for medium-rare', '3: Let the steak rest for 10 minutes', '4: While the steak is resting, sauté 1 onion and 4 cloves garlic until slightly translucent', '5:  Add 3 bell 3 3 bell 1 1 jalapeño peppers, 1 jalapeño, salt, and 3 3 bell 1 1 jalapeño pepper, cook slightly', '6: Slice the steak into strips', '7: Mix the steak into the 3 3 bell 1 1 jalapeño pepper mix', '8:  Remove from heat and set aside', '9: In a clean pan, melt 1 tablespoon butter', '10:  Lay the tortilla on the 1 tablespoon buttered pan, add 2 cups mexican blend cheese, fajita mixture, more 2 cups mexican blend cheese, then top with another tortilla and pat it down', '11: Flip the quesadilla over and cook the other side until it’s golden', '12: Remove from pan and cut into quarters or eighths', '13:  Repeat these steps with the remaining 4 large tortillas', '14: Serve immediately with sour cream, salsa, and guacamole']

ingredients: ['1 head cauliflower', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '3 eggs hard-boiled chopped', '3 stalks celery diced', '½ red onion diced', 'Dressing', '½ cup greek yogurt (140 g)', '1 tablespoon dijon mustard', '1 tablespoon honey', '2 tablespoons dill chopped', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 clove garlic crushed', '½ lemon juiced']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2: Slice 1 head cauliflower into small florets', '3: Place 1 head cauliflower onto baking sheet and season with salt, pepper, and olive oil', '4: Bake in preheated oven for 25 minutes or until lightly browned and a bit crispy', '5: In a large bowl, combine all dressing ingredients', '6:  Set aside', '7: Once 1 head cauliflower is cooked, set aside and let cool slightly', '8: Dice 3 eggs, ½ red onion, and 3 stalks celery', '9: In a large bowl, combine 1 head cauliflower, 3 eggs, ½ red onion, 3 stalks celery, and dressing', '10: Garnish with more freshly chopped 2 tablespoons dill before serving']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons cooking oil divided', '1 package chow mein noodle hong kong style pan fried noodles par cooked according to package instructions', '½ cup onion (75 g) sliced', '½ cup bell pepper (50 g)', '½ cup broccoli floret (75 g)', '½ cup carrot (60 g) julienned', '1 tablespoon garlic minced', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '½ cup cabbage (50 g) chopped', '½ cup shiitake mushroom (40 g) thinly sliced', '½ cup snow pea (75 g)', '⅓ cup corn (60 g)', '2 tablespoons water', '2 teaspoons cornstarch', '2 ½ tablespoons soy sauce', '1 ½ tablespoons hoisin sauce', '1 ½ tablespoons rice wine', '2 teaspoons sugar', '1 teaspoon white pepper', '½ cup bean sprout (50 g)', 'scallion sliced for garnish']
instructions: ['1: In a wok or deep skillet over medium-high heat, heat 2 2 1 2 2 ½ 1 ½ 1 ½ tablespoons of cooking oil, then add the par-cooked 1 package chow mein noodle hong kong style pan fried noodles', '2:  Cook for 1-2 minutes, allowing the 1 package chow mein noodle hong kong style pan fried noodles to crisp, then flip and cook for another 1-2 minutes', '3:  Transfer to a plate and set aside', '4: In the same wok, heat the remaining 2 1 2 2 ½ 1 ½ 1 ½ tablespoon of cooking oil over medium-high heat and add the ½ cup onion, ½ cup bell ½ cup bell 1 teaspoon 1 teaspoon white pepper, ½ cup broccoli, and ½ cup carrot', '5:  Stir and cook for 2 minutes, then add the garlic and season with salt and ½ cup bell 1 teaspoon 1 teaspoon white pepper', '6:  Stir and continue to cook for 2 minutes, or until the ½ cup onions are translucent', '7: Add the ½ cup cabbage, ½ cup shiitake mushrooms, ½ cup snow peas, and ⅓ cup 2 teaspoons corn', '8: In a small bowl, combine the water and ⅓ cup 2 teaspoons 2 teaspoons cornstarch', '9:  Mix with a fork to dissolve the ⅓ cup 2 teaspoons 2 teaspoons cornstarch, then add the soy sauce, hoisin sauce, rice wine, 2 teaspoons sugar, and 1 teaspoon white ½ cup bell 1 teaspoon 1 teaspoon white pepper', '10:  Mix well', '11: Pour the sauce over the vegetables', '12:  Mix well and cook for 3-5 minutes, or until the vegetables have softened', '13: Add the crispy 1 package chow mein noodle hong kong style pan fried noodles to the wok, mix well and add ½ cup bean sprouts', '14:  Toss gently and cook for another 2-3 minutes, or until everything is well-combined', '15:  Garnish with ½ cup onion (75 g) ½ cup shiitake mushroom (40 g) thinly scallion sliced scallions']

ingredients: ['1 lb baby dutch yellow potato (455 g)', '3 ears corn husked and cut crosswise into 6 pieces', '¼ cup unsalted butter (55 g) melted', '4 cloves garlic minced', '1 tablespoon old bay seasoning', '1 lb medium shrimp (455 g) peeled and deveined', '12.8 oz smoked andouille sausage (360 g) 1 package thinly sliced', '1 lemon cut into wedges', '2 tablespoons fresh parsley chopped']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2: In a large pot of boiling salted water, cook potatoes until just tender and parboiled, about 10-13 minutes', '3:  Stir in 3 ears corn during the last 5 minutes of cooking time and drain well', '4: In a small bowl, combine ¼ cup unsalted butter, 4 cloves garlic, and Old Bay Seasoning', '5: Place potatoes, 3 ears corn, 1 lb medium shrimp and 12', '6: 8 oz smoked andouille sausage in a single layer onto a greased baking sheet', '7:  Gently toss with the ¼ cup unsalted butter mixture', '8: Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the 1 lb medium shrimp are opaque and 3 ears corn is tender', '9: Serve immediately with 1 lemon wedges, and sprinkle with 2 tablespoons fresh parsley']

ingredients: ['1 banana mashed', '1 egg', '¼ cup honey (85 g)', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '½ teaspoon nutmeg', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '½ cup greek yogurt (145 g)', '1 ½ cups oats (150 g)', '1 cup milk (240 mL)', 'Optional Additions', 'chopped strawberry', 'chopped apple', 'blueberry', 'blackberry', 'raspberry', 'chopped almond']
