instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350ºF (180ºC)', '2: In a medium bowl, mash the 1 banana until mostly smooth', '3:  Add the 1 egg and stir to combine', '4: Add the honey, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, ½ teaspoon nutmeg, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon vanilla and Greek yogurt and mix well', '5:  Fold in the oats, then stir in the milk', '6: Fill each cup of a greased 6-cup muffin tin ¼ of the way full', '7:  Add your additions of choice, then fill the muffin 1 ½ cups to the top with the rest of batter and top with more fruit or nuts', '8: Bake the muffins for 30 minutes, or until risen slightly and golden brown around the edges', '9: Let cool for 5 minutes']

ingredients: ['2 ½ cups graham cracker crumbs (210 g)', '½ cup butter (115 g) melted', '24 oz cream cheese (675 g) 3 packages', '1 cup heavy whipping cream (240 mL)', '1 cup powdered sugar (120 g)', '1 ½ cups pumpkin puree (340 g)', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon vanilla', 'whipped cream to serve']
instructions: ['1: In a bowl, combine the 2 ½ cups graham cracker crumbs and melted ½ cup butter', '2: Transfer the 2 ½ cups graham cracker mixture to a 9-inch (23 cm) springform pan, creating an even base that goes up 1-inch (2 cm) on the sides', '3: In a large bowl, combine the 24 oz 1 cup 1 cup heavy whipping whipped cream cheese and 1 cup heavy 24 oz 1 cup 1 cup heavy whipping whipped cream and beat until smooth, 3-4 minutes', '4: Add the 1 cup powdered sugar, 1 ½ cups pumpkin, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon and 1 teaspoon vanilla and beat until smooth and fluffy', '5: Pour the 24 oz 1 cup 1 cup heavy whipping whipped cream cheese mixture into the springform pan, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate for 6-8 hours', '6: Top with whipped 24 oz 1 cup 1 cup heavy whipping whipped cream, slice, and serve!']

ingredients: ['Cake', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', '2 lb large carrot (480 g) peeled', '1 cup buttermilk (240 mL) room temperature', '2 ½ cups all purpose flour (322 g)', '1 cup whole wheat flour (145 g)', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '1 tablespoon ground cinnamon', '2 teaspoons ground ginger', '1 ¾ teaspoons kosher salt', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 teaspoon ground cloves', '1 teaspoon ground allspice', '1 teaspoon freshly grated nutmeg', '2 cups light brown sugar (400 g)', '1 cup granulated sugar (200 g)', '4 large eggs room temperature', '1 tablespoon McCormick® vanilla extract', '1 cup vegetable oil (240 mL)', 'Frosting', '2 sticks butter softened', '16 oz cream cheese (450 g) softened', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 vanilla bean seeds scraped', '3 cups powdered sugar (330 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2:  Line the bottoms of 3 9-inch round cake pans with parchment paper and grease with nonstick spray', '3: Make the cake: Grate the carrots on the large holes of a box grater', '4:  You should have about 6 cups', '5: In a large bowl, combine the 1 teaspoon freshly grated carrots and 1 cup 2 sticks buttermilk and stir until the carrots are completely coated', '6: In a medium bowl, sift together the all-purpose and whole wheat flours, baking powder, 1 tablespoon ground cinnamon, 2 teaspoons ground ginger, salt, baking soda, 1 teaspoon ground cloves, 1 teaspoon ground allspice and nutmeg', '7: In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the whisk attachment (or in a large bowl with an electric hand mixer), combine the brown and granulated sugars, eggs, and vanilla', '8:  Beat on medium speed until the mixture drips from the whisk in ribbons, about 3 minutes', '9: With the mixer running on medium speed, slowly drizzle in the vegetable oil, scraping down the sides of the bowl halfway through, if necessary', '10:  Continue mixing until the mixture is fully emulsified, about 2 minutes', '11: Add ⅓ of the flour mixture and mix on low speed until just combined', '12:  Add ½ of the carrot mixture and continue mixing on low speed until incorporated', '13:  Continue alternating adding the flour and carrot mixture', '14:  Remove the bowl from the mixer and use a flat rubber spatula to bring the batter together', '15: Evenly divide the batter between the prepared cake pans', '16: Bake until a toothpick inserted into the center of a cake comes out clean, about 25 minutes', '17:  Let the cakes cool for about 10 minutes, then remove from the pans and let cool completely', '18: Make the frosting: In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment (or in a large bowl with an electric hand mixer), 16 oz cream together the 1 cup 2 sticks butter, 16 oz cream cheese, vanilla extract, salt, and vanilla bean seeds until 16 oz creamy, about 1 minute', '19:  Add the powdered sugar and continue mixing until silky and smooth, about 4 minutes', '20: Assemble the cake: Dab a bit of frosting on a cake board and place a cake layer on top', '21:  Scoop 1 cup of frosting onto the cake', '22:  Repeat with the remaining 2 layers', '23:  Use the remaining frosting to coat the top of the cake completely, leaving the sides naked', '24: Slice and serve']

ingredients: ['1 large sweet potato', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 pinch salt', '1 rotisserie chicken breast', '1 cup red cabbage (100 g) shredded', '⅓ cup barbecue sauce (85 g) plus more for serving', '2 tablespoons green onions thinly sliced']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C)', '2:  Line a small baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: Using a sharp knife, carve out one of the breasts from the 1 rotisserie chicken', '4:  If the chicken is particularly small, use both breasts', '5:  Chop the chicken breast into very small pieces and set aside', '6: Use a fork to poke holes all over the 1 large sweet potato', '7:  Transfer the 1 large sweet potato to the prepared baking sheet', '8: Bake for 40-50 minutes, until the 1 large sweet potato is tender when pierced with a paring knife or skewer', '9: Add the 1 cup red cabbage to a medium skillet over medium heat', '10:  Add the ⅓ cup barbecue sauce and sauté until the 1 cup red cabbage starts to soften, about 3 minutes', '11: Add the chopped chicken and stir just to incorporate', '12:  Remove the pan from the heat', '13: Once the 1 large sweet potato is cool enough to handle, slice it in half lengthwise and scoop out the flesh with a spoon until a ¼-inch (6 mm) layer remains', '14: Fill the 1 large sweet potato skins with the chicken and 1 cup red cabbage filling, drizzle with ⅓ cup barbecue sauce, and top with the sliced 2 tablespoons green onions']

ingredients: ['14 oz chickpeas (395 g) 1 can', '2 cloves garlic', '¼ cup tahini sauce (60 g)', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 teaspoon cumin', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons water', 'fresh parsley chopped to serve']
instructions: ['1: Add 14 oz chickpeas, 2 cloves garlic, ¼ cup tahini, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, and seasonings to the bowl of a 2-quart food processor', '2:  Blend until smooth', '3: While blending, slowly add in the 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil and 2 tablespoons water until hummus is creamy and smooth', '4: Garnish with additional ½ teaspoon red ½ teaspoon red ½ teaspoon black pepper flakes, chopped fresh parsley, and a drizzle of 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil']

ingredients: ['15 oz chickpeas (400 g) 1 can drained and rinsed', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ teaspoon dried thyme', '½ teaspoon dried parsley', '½ teaspoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon dried dill', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon pepper']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Carefully dry the chickpeas', '3:  Removing the skins is optional and they will come off easily', '4:  The drier you get them, the crunchier they’ll be!In a medium bowl, add dried chickpeas, 1 tablespoon olive oil, thyme, parsley, ½ teaspoon onion, dill, ½ teaspoon garlic powder and ½ teaspoon pepper', '5:  Toss well to coat evenly', '6: Spread chickpeas out on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '7: Roast for 15-20 minutes', '8: Mix around on baking sheet and roast for additional 15-20 minutes, or until golden', '9: Cool for 5-10 minutes']

ingredients: ['Garlic Steak', '1 lb skirt steak (455 g) trimmed of any excess fat cut in half crosswise', '1 tablespoon McCormick® Himalayan Pink Salt with Black Pepper and Garlic', '1 tablespoon canola oil', 'Crispy Shallots', 'vegetable oil for frying', '2 shallots sliced into thin rings', '2 tablespoons cornstarch', '¼ teaspoon kosher salt plus more for finishing', 'For Serving', '1 tablespoon Gourmet Gardens™ Lightly Dried Parsley', '1 tablespoon Gourmet Gardens™ Lightly Dried Basil', '1 tablespoon Gourmet Gardens™ Lightly Dried Cilantro', '¼ cup fresh mint (10 g) chopped', '1 large head romaine lettuce chopped', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '½ lemon juiced', 'kosher salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '½ cup cherry tomato (100 g) halved', '¼ cup fresh goat cheese (25 g) crumbled']
instructions: ['1: Season the 1 lb skirt steak: Pat the 1 lb skirt steak dry with paper towels and season on both sides with the McCormick® Himalayan Pink Salt with Black Pepper and Garlic', '2:  Rest seasoned 1 lb skirt steak for 10-15 minutes while you prepare the crispy 2 shallots', '3: Make the crispy 2 shallots: Toss the shallot rings in 2 2 tablespoons of cornstarch until well coated, shaking off the excess', '4: Heat 2 inches (5 cm) of 1 tablespoon canola vegetable 1 tablespoon extra virgin 1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil in a 1 large, high walled skillet over medium heat until it reaches 350°F (180°C)', '5:  Set a wire rack inside a baking sheet or line with paper towels', '6: Working in batches, fry the 2 shallots in the hot 1 tablespoon canola vegetable 1 tablespoon extra virgin 1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil for 2–3 minutes, stirring occasionally, until golden brown', '7:  Transfer to the wire rack to drain and season with more salt', '8:  Repeat with the remaining 2 shallots', '9:  Let cool completely', '10:  The 2 shallots will keep in a container with a loose-fitting lid for 2–3 days in a cool, dark place', '11: Make the garlic 1 lb skirt steak: Heat a 12-inch (30 cm) cast iron skillet over medium-high heat', '12:  Once the skillet is very hot, add the 1 tablespoon canola 1 tablespoon canola vegetable 1 tablespoon extra virgin 1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil and swirl to coat', '13:  Gently place a piece of 1 lb skirt steak in the pan and sear on both sides until cooked to desired doneness, 4–7 minutes per side', '14:  Remove from the pan and let rest for 5–10 minutes while you repeat with the remaining piece of 1 lb skirt steak', '15: Assemble the salad: In a small bowl, combine the Gourmet Gardens™ Lightly Dried Parsley, Basil, and Cilantro, and fresh mint', '16: In a 1 large bowl, toss the lettuce with the 1 tablespoon extra virgin olive 1 tablespoon canola vegetable 1 tablespoon extra virgin 1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil, ½ lemon juice, salt, and pepper', '17:  Add half of the herb mixture and toss to combine', '18:  Divide the lettuce between 2 bowls', '19: Top each bowl with the ½ cup cherry tomatoes, goat cheese', '20: Thinly slice the 1 lb skirt steak against the grain', '21:  Top each bowl with half of the 1 lb skirt steak slices, crispy 2 shallots, and garnish with the remaining herbs', '22:  Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['2 ½ lb ribeye steak (1 kg) room temperature', '1 teaspoon kosher salt plus more to taste', '1 teaspoon black pepper plus more to taste', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 ½ tablespoons unsalted butter divided', '1 small shallot diced', '1 ½ tablespoons capers in brine', '¼ cup dry white wine (60 mL)', '2 tablespoons dijon mustard', '2 tablespoons heavy cream', 'thinly sliced chive for garnish', 'potato roasted for serving', 'side salad for serving', 'Preparation', '2 ½ lb ribeye steak (1 kg) room temperature', '1 teaspoon kosher salt plus more to taste', '1 teaspoon black pepper plus more to taste', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 ½ tablespoons unsalted butter divided', '1 small shallot diced', '1 ½ tablespoons capers in brine', '¼ cup dry white wine (60 mL)', '2 tablespoons dijon mustard', '2 tablespoons heavy cream', 'thinly sliced chive for garnish', 'potato roasted for serving', 'side salad for serving', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Pat the steaks dry with a paper towel', '2:  Season generously on both sides with the salt and black pepper', '3: Add the olive oil and 1 tablespoon of butter to a nonstick or stainless steel pan over medium-high heat', '4:  Sear the steaks, one at a time, until a golden brown crust forms, about 5 minutes per side', '5:  If the pan gets too dry, add a bit more olive oil', '6:  Transfer the seared steaks to a cutting board to rest', '7: Add the shallots, capers, and remaining ½ tablespoon of butter to the pan', '8:  Cook for 2-3 minutes, or until the capers crisp slightly', '9: Deglaze the pan with the wine', '10:  Cook until reduced by half, about 30-60 seconds', '11:  Add the mustard and cream and adjust seasoning to taste', '12: Slice the steak into ¼-inch (6 mm) pieces and transfer to serving plates', '13:  Pour the sauce over the steak and garnish with sliced chives', '14:  Serve with roasted potatoes and a side salad']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon canola oil', '5 oz spinach (140 g)', '2 cups mushroom (150 g) sliced', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 cup pesto (225 g)', '½ cup parmesan cheese (110 g)', '½ lb spaghetti (225 g) cooked']
instructions: ['1: Heat pot over medium-high heat', '2: Add 1 tablespoon canola oil to the pot', '3: Cook the 5 oz spinach until wilted', '4: Add the mushrooms, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1 teaspoon pepper cooking until most of the water is gone', '5: Add the 1 cup pesto and ½ cup parmesan', '6: Add the ½ lb spaghetti, and toss until evenly coated, with the sauce sticking to the noodles']

ingredients: ['1 ½ cups coconut milk (360 mL)', '1 cup fresh spinach (50 g)', '1 scoop vanilla protein powder', '1 ½ cups mango (250 g) diced and frozen', '1 ½ cups pineapple (130 g) diced and frozen']
instructions: ['1: Put 1 ½ cups coconut milk and 1 cup fresh spinach into a blender and blend until 1 cup fresh spinach is fully incorporated into the 1 ½ cups coconut milk', '2: Add in remaining ingredients and blend until smooth']

ingredients: ['Cupcakes', '1 box cake mix prepared', 'Cannoli Cream', '15 oz ricotta cheese (425 g)', '8 oz mascarpone cheese (225 g) room temperature', '1 cup powdered sugar (120 g)', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '1 cup mini chocolate chips (175 g)', 'Chocolate Coating', '2 cups dark chocolate (340 g)', '3 tablespoons coconut oil']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Line a muffin tin with liners and cooking spray', '3: Prepare 1 box cake mix according to its directions', '4: Fill liners about ¾ of the way up with the cupcake batter', '5: Bake for about 20-25 minutes', '6:  A toothpick should come out dry when inserted', '7: Allow the cupcakes to cool completely', '8: In a large bowl, combine the 15 oz ricotta, 8 oz mascarpone, 1 cup powdered sugar, and 1 teaspoon vanilla', '9:  Mix until well combined', '10: Fold in the 1 cup mini chocolate chips', '11: Cut a ½ inch (1', '12: 5cm) hole on the tip of a pastry or zip top bag and fill with the cannoli cream', '13: Cut a circle in the center of each cupcake and press the center down into the bottom, creating a hole', '14: Fill the cupcake with cannoli cream and use a spiraling motion to create a swirl of the cream on top of the cupcake', '15: Put the cupcakes in the freezer for about 1 hour or until firm', '16: Melt the 2 cups dark chocolate and 3 tablespoons coconut oil together', '17: Carefully, dip the tops of the cupcakes into the melted chocolate', '18: Place in the refrigerator to firm up if need be']

ingredients: ['2 lb ground beef (910 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 teaspoons pepper', '2 teaspoons garlic powder', '½ white onion diced', '6 slices cheddar cheese', '12 dinner rolls or hawaiian sweet rolls', '2 tablespoons butter melted', '1 tablespoon sesame seeds']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C)', '2: Combine the 2 lb ground beef, 1 teaspoon salt, 2 teaspoons pepper, and 2 teaspoons garlic powder in a 9x13-inch (23x33-cm) rimmed baking dish, mixing thoroughly, then pressing into a flat, even layer', '3:  Bake for 20 minutes', '4:  Drain the liquid and set the cooked 2 lb ground beef aside', '5: Slice the 12 dinner rolls in half lengthwise', '6:  Place the bottom half in the same baking dish', '7:  Place the cooked 2 lb ground beef on the 12 dinner rolls, followed by the onions and 6 slices cheddar cheese', '8:  Top with the remaining 12 dinner rolls', '9: Brush the tops of the 12 dinner rolls with melted 2 tablespoons butter and sprinkle the 1 tablespoon sesame seeds on top', '10:  Bake for 20 minutes, or until the bread is golden brown and the 6 slices cheddar cheese is melted', '11: Slice into individual sliders, then serve']

ingredients: ['2 onions sliced', '2 cloves garlic cloves', '2 chicken breasts sliced', '2 tomatoes chopped', '2 tablespoons korma paste', '1 cup basmati rice (200 g)', '1 chicken stock cube', '2 ¼ cups water (500 mL)', '½ cup raisin (75 g)', '⅜ cup pine nuts (50 g)', '¼ cup spinach (50 g)', 'yogurt to taste', '1 tablespoon coriander to taste']
instructions: ['1: Fry sliced 2 onions and 2 cloves garlic in oil until softened', '2: Add sliced chicken breasts and fry until no longer pink', '3: Add 2 tomatoes, fry for a couple minutes', '4: Add 2 tablespoons korma pasta, stir in and cook for 30 seconds', '5: Add the 1 cup basmati rice and cook for 30 more seconds', '6: Add stock cube, raisins and 500ml (2 ¼ 2 ¼ cups) water', '7: Cover with foil and cook for 15 minutes', '8:  Check chicken, if dry 5 minutes in and add more water if necessary', '9: Uncover, stir in ⅜ cup pine nuts and ¼ cup spinach until wilted', '10: Serve with yogurt and 1 tablespoon coriander']

ingredients: ['3 russet potatoes sliced', '4 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 teaspoons garlic powder', '2 teaspoons italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon paprika', '½ cup parmesan cheese (50 g) shredded', 'fresh parsley chopped']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2: Cut 3 russet potatoes in half, then slice', '3: Place the 3 russet potatoes in a large bowl', '4:  Drizzle 4 tablespoons olive oil and toss to coat', '5: In a small bowl, mix salt, 2 teaspoons garlic powder, Italian seasoning, and 1 teaspoon paprika', '6: Sprinkle seasoning on 3 russet potatoes and toss to coat', '7: Spread the 3 russet potatoes on a baking sheet', '8: Bake for 30 minutes', '9: Remove from the oven, sprinkle with ½ cup parmesan and pepper', '10: Bake for an additional 20 minutes', '11: Sprinkle 3 russet potatoes with fresh parsley and serve while hot']

ingredients: ['1 large head cauliflower', '½ cup flour (70 g)', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '¾ cup unsweetened almond milk (180 mL)', '⅓ cup sriracha sauce (105 g)', '⅓ cup buffalo sauce (110 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C)', '2: Break the head of cauliflower into bite-sized florets', '3: In a 1 large bowl, combine ½ cup flour, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, ¾ cup unsweetened almond milk and Sriracha', '4: Add the cauliflower florets and coat well', '5: Transfer the coated florets onto a parchment-lined baking sheet and bake for 20 minutes', '6: Remove the cauliflower from the oven and allow to cool for a few minutes', '7: Once cool, transfer into a bowl, add ⅓ cup buffalo sauce and coat well', '8: Return cauliflower to the baking sheet and bake for 10 more minutes or until heated through', '9: Serve with ranch or your favorite dipping sauce']

ingredients: ['Pizza Dough', '1 ½ cups warm water (360 mL)', '1 ½ teaspoons active dry yeast', '3 ½ cups flour (435 g)', '¼ cup grated parmesan cheese (30 g)', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 teaspoons sugar', '3 tablespoons olive oil divided', 'Pizza Ring', '2 tablespoons cornmeal', '8 slices pepperoni deli style', '8 slices provolone cheese deli style', '3 cups tomato sauce (780 g) divided', '3 cups shredded mozzarella cheese (300 g)', '2 tablespoons olive oil']
instructions: ['1: In a liquid measuring 1 ½ 3 ½ ¼ 3 3 cup, sprinkle the 1 ½ teaspoons active dry yeast over the warm water', '2:  Set aside for 5 minutes to bloom', '3: In a bowl, add 3 1 ½ 3 ½ ¼ 3 3 cups (375 g) of the flour, Parmesan, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1 teaspoon salt, and 2 teaspoons sugar and stir to combine', '4: Add 2 tablespoons of the olive oil and stir to combine', '5:  Pour the 1 ½ teaspoons active dry yeast water over the flour mixture and stir until the dough forms into a ball', '6: Use ¼ 1 ½ 3 ½ ¼ 3 3 cup (30 g) of flour for dusting the surface', '7:  Scrape the dough out of the bowl onto your floured surface', '8:  Knead the dough for about 10 minutes until the dough is tight', "9:  You may need to sprinkle a little flour while you're kneading if the dough is too sticky", '10:  Form the dough into a ball', '11: Pour 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a bowl', '12:  Place the dough in the bowl', '13:  7', '14:  Cover, let rise for 1 hour in a warm area, or until the dough has doubled in size', '15: Flour the surface', '16:  Flip bowl over surface and let the dough fall out of the bowl', '17:  Divide the dough into 3 equal balls', '18: Begin forming the dough into a circle about ½-inch (1 cm) thick and 8 inches (20 cm) wide, making sure the middle of the circle is not too thin', '19:  Repeat with the other 2 balls of dough', '20: Sprinkle the cornmeal on a 1 teaspoon baking sheet', '21:  Place dough on the 1 teaspoon baking sheet', '22: Place 4 slices of pepperoni on the dough in the center', '23:  Place 4 slices of the provolone over the pepperoni', '24: Spread half of the tomato sauce around the edge of the dough', '25:  Sprinkle 1½ 1 ½ 3 ½ ¼ 3 3 cups (150 g) of mozzarella over the sauce around the edge of the circle', '26: Place the second circle of dough over the first and tuck the edges underneath the first layer of dough', '27:  Repeat with the pepperoni, provolone, tomato sauce, and mozzarella', '28:  Place the third layer of dough over the second', '29:  Tuck the edges underneath', '30: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '31: With a knife make one vertical cut in the center of the pizza, making sure you cut through all of the layers', '32:  Make another horizontal cut, then 2 diagonal cuts so you have 8 triangles to fold over', '33:  Begin folding back each layer, creating an opening in the center', '34:  Repeat 7 more times', '35: Brush the ring with olive oil and bake for 40 minutes', '36:  Cover with foil and continue to bake for 20 minutes', '37: Place a bowl filled with the rest of the tomato sauce in the center of the ring']

ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '3 cloves garlic chopped', '1 cup cooked sausage (140 g) sliced', '2 chicken breasts thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon cajun seasoning', '2 cups heavy cream (480 mL)', '4 cups penne pasta (400 g) cooked', '1 cup parmesan cheese (110 g)', '¼ cup fresh parsley (10 g)']
instructions: ['1: Heat 3 tablespoons olive oil in a large pot over high heat', '2:  Cook the 3 cloves garlic, 1 cup cooked sausage, and 2 chicken until 3 cloves garlic starts to brown and the 2 chicken is no longer pink', '3: Sprinkle over the Cajun seasoning and stir to evenly coat the 1 cup cooked sausage and 2 chicken', '4: Add the 2 cups heavy cream, and bring to a boil', '5: Add the 4 cups penne pasta, stirring until evenly mixed', '6: To finish, add 1 cup parmesan and ¼ cup fresh parsley, stirring until cheese melts and 4 cups penne pasta is coated with a thick sauce', '7: Serve']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon oil', '1 tablespoon minced garlic minced', '½ cup red onion (75 g) chopped', '1 cup bell pepper (100 g) chopped', '1 cup tomato (200 g) chopped', '3 cups water (720 mL)', '1 ½ cups rice (300 g)', '1 cup black beans (170 g)', '1 tablespoon fresh cilantro chopped', '1 cup tomato sauce (260 g)', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '½ cup shredded cheese (50 g) optional', '½ avocado cubed for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400ºF (200ºC)', '2: Put 1 tablespoon oil in a cast-iron skillet over medium heat', '3:  Add 1 tablespoon minced garlic and ½ cup red onion to skillet and stir until 1 tablespoon minced garlic is slightly golden and ½ cup red onion has softened', '4: Add pepper and sauté 2-3 minutes or until peppers have softened', '5: Add tomatoes and sauté 1 minute', '6: Remove sauteed vegetables and set aside', '7: Pour 3 cups water into the skillet and wait for it to come to a boil', '8: Add 1 ½ cups rice and stir for 12-15 minutes until 1 ½ cups rice is fluffier but still slightly tender', '9: Make a circle in the center of the 1 ½ cups rice and add your sautéed vegetables and 1 cup black beans to the skillet and mix', '10: Add 1 tablespoon fresh cilantro, tomato sauce, 1 teaspoon chili powder, 1 teaspoon cumin, 1 teaspoon salt, and pepper, and stir', '11: Add ½ cup shredded cheese on top (optional)', '12: Bake in a preheated oven for 20-25 minutes', '13: Allow to cool for 5 minutes', '14: Garnish with 1 tablespoon fresh cilantro and ½ avocado (optional)']

ingredients: ['3 cups cashews (390 g) ½ cup (65 g) if just making enough for the ice cream', '¼ cup water (60 mL)', '1 ¼ cups organic sugar (250 g)', '4 tablespoons cocoa butter', '4 tablespoons coconut oil', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 cup coconut milk (240 mL)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 vanilla bean', 'Special Equipment', 'ice cream maker']
instructions: ['1: Place the 3 cups cashews in a large bowl', '2:  Add enough room-temperature water to cover the 3 cups cashews', '3:  Cover the bowl with a kitchen towel and soak overnight', '4: Place the bowl of an 3 cups cashews (390 g) ½ cup (65 g) if just making enough for the ice cream machine in the freezer overnight', '5: Add the 3 cups cashews and soaking water to a blender', '6:  Blend, starting on low speed and increasing to high until smooth and frothy, about 40 seconds', '7:  Strain into a large bowl through a fine-mesh sieve or cheesecloth', '8: Reserve 1 cup (240 ml) of cashew milk for the 3 cups cashews (390 g) ½ cup (65 g) if just making enough for the ice cream and store the rest in the refrigerator for up to a week for another use', '9: In a small saucepan over medium heat, combine the water and 1 ¼ cups organic sugar and cook, stirring constantly, until the mixture is clear, about 2 minutes', '10:  Whisk in the 4 tablespoons cocoa butter, 4 tablespoons 1 cup coconut oil, and 1 teaspoon salt', '11:  Remove the pan from the heat and set aside', '12: In a blender, combine the cashew milk and 4 tablespoons 1 cup coconut milk', '13:  Blend on low speed', '14:  With the blender running, pour in the 1 ¼ cups organic sugar mixture to emulsify', '15:  Continue until well-blended, about 2 minutes', '16: Pour the mixture into a large metal bowl and mix in the vanilla extract', '17:  Scrape in the seeds from the vanilla bean and whisk to combine', '18: Chill the base in the refrigerator for 1 hour', '19: Add the chilled base to the 3 cups cashews (390 g) ½ cup (65 g) if just making enough for the ice cream maker and churn for 1 hour, or as long as the machine requires, until thick and creamy', '20: Transfer the 3 cups cashews (390 g) ½ cup (65 g) if just making enough for the ice cream to a loaf pan and freeze overnight', '21: Scoop and serve immediately']

ingredients: ['2 eggs', '1 yellow bell pepper', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Slice a 1 yellow bell 1 yellow bell pepper on its side to create rings', '2: Place the 2 rings in a pan and let simmer for a few seconds', '3: Crack one egg inside each of the rings', '4: Cover the pan and cook 4-5 minutes', '5:  (or to desired wellness)Serve the bell 1 yellow bell pepper egg rings with toast and fruit', '6:  (optional) Top with salt and 1 yellow bell pepper to taste']

ingredients: ['4 medium zucchinis', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 lb medium shrimp (455 g) or large shrimp peeled and deveined', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '3 cloves garlic minced', '¼ cup low-sodium chicken broth (60 mL)', '1 lemon juiced', 'fresh parsley for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Using a coarse cheese grater, slide the zucchini down the grater, shaving of long strips', '2:  Rotate the zucchini constantly, grating all sides, until you reach the seeds in the center', '3: Heat the 1 tablespoon oil over medium-high heat in a large, nonstick skillet', '4: Add the shrimp in and season with the 1 teaspoon salt, ½ teaspoon black pepper, ½ teaspoon red pepper, and 3 cloves garlic', '5:   Sauté the shrimp, until they evenly begin to show a pink color, about 3 minutes', '6: Pour in the ¼ cup low-sodium chicken broth and 1 lemon juice, and let the liquid come to a simmer', '7: Add the zucchini noodles and stir until everything is combined and the shrimp are fully cooked', '8: Sprinkle with chopped fresh parsley leaves and serve']

ingredients: ['1 lb chicken (455 g) cubed', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 cup broccoli (150 g) chopped', '1 cup bell pepper (100 g) diced', 'Stir-Fry Sauce', '½ cup soy sauce (120 mL)', '¼ cup honey (85 g)', '2 cloves garlic', '1 teaspoon ginger', '1 tablespoon sesame seed']
instructions: ['1: Mix together all ½ cup soy sauce ingredients in a small bowl', '2: Heat oil over a nonstick pan and add 1 lb chicken stirring until cooked', '3: Pour ½ cup soy sauce in pan and stir to coat meat', '4: Once the ½ cup soy sauce is bubbling, add the veggies to the pan and stir again to coat', '5: Cook until meat is cooked through and veggies are soft', '6: Serve over rice or alone']

ingredients: ['2 lb chicken thighs (910 g) sliced into chunks', '1 cup soy sauce (240 mL)', '½ cup brown sugar (110 g)']
instructions: ['1: Sear the 2 lb chicken thighs evenly in a pan, then flip', '2: Add the 1 cup soy sauce and ½ cup brown sugar, stirring and bringing to a boil', '3: Stir until the sauce has reduced and evenly glazes the 2 lb chicken', '4: Serve with rice, if desired!']

ingredients: ['1 large sweet potato', 'olive oil drizzle', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '4 large eggs', '1 ½ cups milk (350 mL)', '1 clove garlic minced', '4 oz jarred sun-dried tomato (115 g) drained', '3 oz baby spinach (85 g) chopped', '4 oz goat cheese (115 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '2: Poke a few slits through the skin of the 1 large sweet potato with the tip of a knife, then microwave on high for 1 minute', '3:  Let cool', '4: Cut off the ends of the 1 large sweet potato, then peel', '5:  Thinly slice the 1 large sweet potato into ⅛ inch (3 mm) thick slices', '6: Add the 1 large sweet potato slices to a bowl and toss with olive oil, salt, and pepper', '7: Arrange the 1 large sweet potato slices in a 9-inch (23 cm) round baking dish, slightly overlapping so they cover the sides and bottom', '8: Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the potatoes are softened', '9: In a medium bowl, beat the 4 large eggs, salt, and pepper', '10:  Add the 1 ½ cups milk, 1 clove garlic, and sun-dried tomatoes and whisk to combine', '11: Spread the 3 oz baby spinach over the 1 large sweet potato crust', '12:  Pour in the egg mixture', '13:  Top with 4 oz goat cheese crumbles', '14: Bake for 30 minutes, or until the center of the dish is set and no longer jiggles', '15: Cool for 10 minutes before slicing']

ingredients: ['2 cups flour (250 g)', '¾ cup sugar (150 g)', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '2 teaspoons pumpkin pie spice', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 ¼ cups pumpkin puree (280 g)', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons melted butter', 'oil for frying', 'Topping', '¾ cup sugar (150 g)', '3 tablespoons pumpkin pie spice']
instructions: ['1: Note: make your own 2 teaspoons 1 ¼ cups 3 tablespoons pumpkin pie spice by mixing 2 tablespoons cinnamon, 1 tablespoon ginger, 1 tablespoon nutmeg, and ½ tablespoon cloves; use 2 teaspoons in the dough, and 3 tablespoons in the topping mixture', '2: In a large bowl, mix together 2 cups flour, sugar, baking powder, 2 teaspoons 1 ¼ cups 3 tablespoons pumpkin pie spice, and 1 teaspoon salt', '3: In a separate bowl, mix together 2 teaspoons 1 ¼ cups 3 tablespoons pumpkin puree, 1 egg, and butter', '4: Pour wet mixture into dry mixture and stir together with rubber spatula until fully incorporated', '5:  Set aside', '6: Heat oil in a frying pan to 325˚F (160˚C)', '7: While oil is heating, use your hands to shape and roll the 2 teaspoons 1 ¼ cups 3 tablespoons pumpkin donut dough into balls', '8:  (Greasing your hands with oil will make this process much easier)', '9: Fry the dough balls until golden brown, about 4-5 minutes', '10:  (For best results, fry only 3-4 at a time)', '11: Drain them on a paper towel and immediately transfer to bowl of the 2 teaspoons 1 ¼ cups 3 tablespoons pumpkin pie spice-sugar mix', '12:  Gently toss to coat']

ingredients: ['2 red potatoes finely chopped', '2 large carrots finely chopped', '½ bell pepper finely chopped', '½ cup corn (90 g)', '½ cup edamame (80 g)', '½ cup oats (45 g)', '½ teaspoon ginger', '½ teaspoon turmeric', '1 teaspoon garam masala', '¼ teaspoon mustard seed', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '2 cloves garlic', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon oil']
instructions: ['1: Finely chop two 2 red potatoes, and two 2 large carrots', '2:  Sauté in a little 1 tablespoon olive 1 tablespoon oil for a few minutes', '3: Add the ½ bell ½ bell ½ teaspoon cayenne pepper, ½ cup corn, and ½ cup edamame', '4:  Continue to cook until the potatoes are soft', '5: In a food processor, grind the ½ cup oats until they are a grainy powder', '6: Add the veggies, 1 tablespoon olive 1 tablespoon olive 1 tablespoon oil, and spices', '7:  Blend', '8: Shape the mixture into patties, and fry, grill, bake, or freeze them for later!Serve with toppings of choice! (Topping in this video: Vegan mayo, ¼ teaspoon mustard, ketchup, dill pickles, onion, lettuce, tomatoes, and avocado']

ingredients: ['2 skinless salmon fillets center-cut bonesless skinless', '6 oz ricotta cheese (170 g)', '2 tablespoons pesto', '⅓ cup parmesan cheese (35 g)', '⅓ cup bread crumbs (35 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 egg']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400ºF/200ºC', '2: In a medium bowl mix together 6 oz ricotta, 2 tablespoons pesto, 1 teaspoon salt, ½ teaspoon pepper, ⅓ cup parmesan, breadcrumbs, and the 1 egg', '3: Butterfly fillet the 2 center cuts of 2 skinless salmon', '4: Stuff the mixture into the 2 skinless salmon, pushing edges of stuffing in as much as possible', '5: Spray a medium size baking sheet and lay stuffed 2 skinless salmon it', '6: Cook in the oven for 12-15 minutes or until stuffing begins to brown']

ingredients: ['1 cup rice flour (125 g) toasted', '½ cup toasted gram flour (65 g)', '1 teaspoon whole cumin seeds', '2 tablespoons white sesame seeds', '2 teaspoons red chili powder', '½ teaspoon ajwain', '½ teaspoon asafoetida', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '¼ cup water (60 mL) plus more as needed', '¼ cup ghee (55 g) or clarified butter', 'safflower oil for frying', 'Special Equipment', 'chakli maker']
instructions: ['1: Cut out 12–15 4-inch (10 cm) squares of parchment paper and set aside', '2: In a large bowl, whisk together the 1 cup rice flour, ½ cup toasted gram flour, 1 teaspoon whole cumin seeds, sesame seeds, 2 teaspoons red chile powder, turmeric, ½ teaspoon ajwain, ½ teaspoon asafoetida, and 1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '3: Add the ¼ cup water to a small pot and bring to a boil over high heat, then add the ¼ cup ghee and let melt', '4:  Remove the pot from the heat', '5: Create a well in the center of the dry ingredients with your hand', '6:  Stream the ¼ cup ghee mixture into the dry ingredients and stir to combine well, then use your hands to knead into a firm dough', '7:  If the dough is too dry or stiff, add more hot ¼ cup water, a couple 2 tablespoons at a time', '8: Cover the bowl with a plate and let the dough rest for 30 minutes', '9: Add 3 inches (7', '10: 5 cm) of safflower oil to a large, high-walled skillet and heat to 375°F (190°C) over medium-high heat', '11: While the oil heats, pipe the chakli: Prepare the chakli maker by lightly greasing the inside with safflower oil', '12:  Load the chakli maker with some of the dough', '13:  Tighten the lid, then pipe the chaklis in circular shapes onto the prepared squares of parchment paper', '14: Carefully slide 2–4 chaklis at a time into the hot oil and fry until golden brown, 3–5 minutes', '15:  Remove from the oil and drain on a paper towel-lined plate while you fry the remaining chaklis']

ingredients: ['1 cup soy sauce (240 mL)', '½ cup rice vinegar (120 mL)', '¼ cup sesame oil (60 mL) toasted', '¼ cup gochujang (60 mL) or to taste', '2 tablespoons honey', '2 lb flanken beef short ribs (910 g) 1/2 inch (1 1/4 cm) thick each rib cut in half', 'kosher salt to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon coconut oil', '1 bosc pear or D’Anjou pear finely chopped', '¼ cup shallot (40 g) finely chopped', '3 tablespoons fresh ginger minced', '1 tablespoon garlic minced', '2 tablespoons water', '1 tablespoon cornstarch', 'white rice for serving', 'sesame seed toasted for garnish', 'fresh cilantro for garnish', 'scallion thinly sliced for garnish', 'kimchi for serving']
instructions: ['1: In a liquid measuring cup or medium bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, rice vinegar, ¼ cup sesame oil, gochujang (adjust the quantity based on your preferred spice level), and 2 tablespoons honey', '2: Place the 2 lb flanken beef short ribs in a deep baking dish or large bowl and season generously on both sides with kosher salt and ground black pepper', '3:  Pour the soy sauce mixture over the ribs', '4:  Cover with plastic wrap and marinate in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour, up to overnight', '5: Preheat a 6-quart (6 Liter) Instant Pot on the high sauté setting', '6:  Once hot, add the 1 tablespoon coconut oil', '7: Remove the 2 lb flanken beef short ribs from the marinade and let any excess marinade drip off', '8:  Reserve the marinade for later', '9: Working in batches, add the 2 lb flanken beef short ribs to the Instant Pot and sear for 3-4 minutes on each side, until deeply caramelized', '10:  Transfer the 2 lb flanken beef short ribs to a baking sheet as they finish cooking and repeat with the remaining ribs', '11: After the 2 lb flanken beef short ribs are seared, add the 1 bosc pear, shallot, 3 tablespoons fresh ginger, and 1 tablespoon garlic to the Instant Pot', '12:  Season with kosher salt and ground black pepper, and sauté for 4-5 minutes, or until the mixture is golden brown', '13: Return the 2 lb flanken beef short ribs to the Instant Pot, then pour in the reserved marinade', '14:  Place the lid on the Instant Pot, make sure the lid is set to “Sealing,” and change the setting to high pressure cooker', '15:  Set the timer for 20 minutes', '16: At the end of 20 minutes, carefully release the pressure from the Instant Pot by turning the knob from “Sealing” to “Venting,” making sure your hand is not over the release switch as the hot steam will come out of the top', '17:  Wait for the pressure to release and the Instant Pot to unlock before taking off the lid', '18: Remove the 2 lb flanken beef short ribs from the pot and change the setting to high sauté', '19:  Bring the sauce to a simmer and cook for about 5 minutes, or until reduced to about 2 cups (480 ml)Add the 1 tablespoon cornstarch to the 2 tablespoons water and mix until completely dissolved', '20:  Add the slurry to the sauce and whisk continuously for another 3 minutes, or until the sauce thickens', '21:  Remove from the heat and let cool slightly', '22:  Skim off any excess oil from the top of the sauce, if desired', '23: Serve the 2 lb flanken beef short ribs over white rice', '24:  Pour about ½ cup (120 ml) of the sauce over the ribs and serve the rest on the side', '25:  Garnish with toasted ¼ cup sesame seeds, fresh cilantro, and scallions, and serve with kimchi, if desired']

ingredients: ['2 medium zucchinis washed and trimmed', '2 cups spinach (80 g)', '1 cup fresh basil leaves (40 g) plus more for garnish', '½ cup pine nuts (60 g)', '¼ cup shredded parmesan cheese (25 g) plus more for garnish', '2 cloves garlic minced', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL) plus more as needed', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 cup cherry tomatoes (200 g) halved', '2 slices prosciutto torn or cut into bite-size chuncks', 'lemon wedge for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Use a spiralizer to cut the zucchini into zoodles', '2:  Add the zoodles to a serving bowl and set aside', '3: Make the pesto: in a food processor or blender, add the 2 cups spinach, 1 cup fresh basil, ½ cup pine nuts, Parmesan, 2 cloves garlic, ¼ cup olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper', '4:  Blend to desired consistency, adding more ¼ cup olive oil as needed', '5: Scoop the pesto over the zucchini noodles, then add the 1 cup cherry tomatoes and 2 slices prosciutto', '6:  Toss until the zoodles are well-coated', '7: Sprinkle with Parmesan and garnish with 1 cup fresh basil and lemon wedges']

ingredients: ['Pork Chops', '1 lb boneless pork chop (455 g)', '½ cup French’s® Creamy Yellow Mustard (120 g) plus 1 tablespoon', '1 tablespoon honey warmed', '1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar', '1 teaspoon kosher salt plus more for sprinkling', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '½ teaspoon McCormick® Paprika', '1 large egg', '2 tablespoons milk', '⅓ cup all purpose flour (40 g)', '½ teaspoon McCormick® Garlic Powder', '1 teaspoon McCormick® Onion Powder', '1 cup panko breadcrumbs (115 g)', '¼ cup grapeseed oil (60 mL)', 'Honey Mustard Sauce', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '½ shallot minced', '¼ cup white wine (60 mL)', '1 cup chicken broth (240 mL)', '2 tablespoons French’s® Creamy Yellow Mustard', '1 tablespoon honey', '¼ cup heavy cream (60 mL)', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '½ tablespoon McCormick® Dried Parsley flakes', 'kosher salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'Crunchy Green Salad', '2 ½ cups kale (120 g) chopped', '¾ cup shredded radicchio (30 g)', '¼ cup dried cranberries (60 g)', '1 apple cored and diced', '⅓ cup grapeseed oil (80 mL)', '3 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '2 teaspoons honey', '½ lemon juiced', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'Preparation', 'Pork Chops', '1 lb boneless pork chop (455 g)', '½ cup French’s® Creamy Yellow Mustard (120 g) plus 1 tablespoon', '1 tablespoon honey warmed', '1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar', '1 teaspoon kosher salt plus more for sprinkling', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '½ teaspoon McCormick® Paprika', '1 large egg', '2 tablespoons milk', '⅓ cup all purpose flour (40 g)', '½ teaspoon McCormick® Garlic Powder', '1 teaspoon McCormick® Onion Powder', '1 cup panko breadcrumbs (115 g)', '¼ cup grapeseed oil (60 mL)', 'Honey Mustard Sauce', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '½ shallot minced', '¼ cup white wine (60 mL)', '1 cup chicken broth (240 mL)', '2 tablespoons French’s® Creamy Yellow Mustard', '1 tablespoon honey', '¼ cup heavy cream (60 mL)', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '½ tablespoon McCormick® Dried Parsley flakes', 'kosher salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'Crunchy Green Salad', '2 ½ cups kale (120 g) chopped', '¾ cup shredded radicchio (30 g)', '¼ cup dried cranberries (60 g)', '1 apple cored and diced', '⅓ cup grapeseed oil (80 mL)', '3 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '2 teaspoons honey', '½ lemon juiced', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Marinate the pork chops: Place the pork chops in a gallon-size ziplock bag', '2:  Add ½ cup French’s Creamy Yellow Mustard, warmed honey, the apple cider vinegar, salt, pepper, and McCormick® Paprika', '3:  Massage through the bag until the pork chops are completely covered, then seal the bag and refrigerate for 2 hours', '4: Make the honey mustard sauce: In a small saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat', '5:  Add the shallot and cook until fragrant and translucent, about 2 minutes', '6:  Deglaze the pot with the white wine, then whisk in the chicken broth, French’s® Creamy Yellow Mustard, honey, heavy cream, and lemon juice', '7:  Simmer until thickened, 3–5 minutes', '8:  Remove the pot from the heat and stir in the McCormick® Dried Parsley flakes', '9:  Season with salt and pepper to taste', '10: Make the crunchy green salad: In a large bowl, toss together the kale, radicchio, dried cranberries, and apple', '11: In a small bowl, whisk together the grapeseed oil, apple cider vinegar, honey, lemon juice, and red pepper flakes', '12: Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to coat, then season with salt and pepper to taste', '13: Cook the pork chops: In a shallow bowl, whisk together 1 egg, the milk, and the remaining tablespoon of French’s® Creamy Yellow Mustard', '14:  In a separate shallow bowl, stir together the flour, McCormick® Garlic Powder, and McCormick® Onion Powder', '15:  Add the panko to a third shallow bowl', '16: Dip the pork chops into the flour mixture, then the egg mixture, then into the panko, pressing the bread crumbs into both sides of the meat to coat completely', '17: Heat the grapeseed oil in a medium high-walled skillet over medium heat until the temperature reaches 350°F (180°C)', '18:  Working in batches to avoid overcrowding the pan, cook the pork chops until golden brown and the internal temperature reaches 145°F, 2–3 minutes per side', '19:  Transfer to a paper towel–lined plate to drain and sprinkle with salt', '20: Serve the crispy pork chops with the honey mustard sauce and crunchy green salad alongside']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons Frank’s Red Hot Original', '2 oranges juiced', '4 garlics', '3 chipotle peppers from a can', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '¼ cup apple cider vinegar (60 mL)', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 tablespoon paprika', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '¼ teaspoon cinnamon', '3 lb boneless pork shoulder (1.5 kg) cut into 3-inch cubes', 'Tacos', 'corn tortilla for serving', 'sliced avocado for garnish', 'radish for garnish', 'fresh cilantro for garnish', 'Nachos', 'tortilla chip', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'diced tomato', 'red onion chopped', 'fresh scallion sliced']
instructions: ['1: In a blender, add Frank’s Original Red Hot, orange juice, garlic, 3 chipotle 3 chipotle 1 teaspoon peppers, 2 tablespoons brown sugar, ¼ cup apple cider vinegar, 1 tablespoon salt, 3 chipotle 1 teaspoon pepper, 1 tablespoon paprika, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, and ¼ teaspoon cinnamon', '2:  Blend on high until smooth', '3: Place 3 lb boneless pork shoulder in Instant Pot', '4:  Pour marinade over 3 lb boneless pork and turn with tongs to coat', '5: Put the cover on the Instant Pot', '6:  Be sure the pressure valve is set to “Sealing', '7: ” Use the manual setting to set the timer for 40 minutes', '8: When the timer goes off, turn the pressure valve to “Venting” to release pressure quickly', '9:  **Be sure to read all Instant Pot instructions carefully for safety', '10: ** Be sure Instant Pot is turned off and unplugged before carefully removing the cover', '11: Transfer 3 lb boneless pork from the pot to a bowl', '12:  Use two forks to shred the 3 lb boneless pork', '13:  Pour some of the cooking liquid over the carnitas and toss to coat', '14: Serving options: Build carnitas on top of nachos or tacos']

ingredients: ['4 andouille sausages chopped', '1 lb shrimp (455 g) peeled and deveined', '4 red potatoes quartered', '2 pieces corn quartered', '2 tablespoons oil divided', '1 tablespoon butter cubed', '4 cloves garlic minced', 'Cajun Spice Mix', '2 teaspoons garlic powder', '2 ½ teaspoons paprika', '1 ¼ teaspoons dried oregano', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '1 ¼ teaspoons dried thyme', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', 'Optional', 'fresh parsley chopped', 'lemon wedge to garnish']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)', '2: In a small bowl, combine the Cajun spice mix ingredients and stir to combine', '3: In a baking dish, combine 4 red potatoes, 2 pieces corn, 2 4 cloves 2 teaspoons garlic 4 cloves, 1 2 1 tablespoon of 2 2 1 tablespoons oil, and ½ 2 1 tablespoon of the cajun spice mix', '4: Mix until the vegetables are coated evenly with the spice mix', '5:  Place butter on top', '6: Bake for 25 minutes', '7: In a medium bowl, combine the sausage, 1 lb shrimp, 4 cloves 2 teaspoons garlic, 2 2 1 tablespoons oil, and ½ 2 1 tablespoon of the spice mix', '8:  Save the remaining spice mix for future recipes', '9: Mix well', '10: Add the sausage and 1 lb shrimp into the same baking dish as the 2 pieces corn and 4 red potatoes', '11: Bake for another 15 minutes', '12: Top with fresh parsley', '13:  Serve with lemon wedges and beer!']

ingredients: ['*For Puri:', '1 cup semolina (125 g)', '2 tablespoons maida flour', '1 pinch baking soda', '¼ teaspoon salt', '2 teaspoons oil', 'water as required', 'oil for frying', '*For Green Chutney:', '1 cup mint leaf (40 g)', '1 cup coriander leaves (40 g)', '2 thai chilis', 'ginger 1/2 in  (1.2 cm)', '2 cloves garlic', '½ tablespoon cumin', 'salt (not too much as salt will be added to all the ingredients)', 'water as required', '*For Tamarind chutney:', '1 cup tamarind (250 g)', '1 cup date (170 g)', '1 cup jaggery (130 g)', 'water as needed', '1 tablespoon chili powder', '½ tablespoon chat masala', 'salt', '*For stuffing:', '2 potatoes boiled', '1 cup peas (150 g) boiled', '1 tablespoon garam masala', '1 chilli finely chopped', '2 tablespoons coriander leaves chopped', 'salt as needed', '1 cup onion (150 g) chopped', '1 cup tomato (200 g) chopped', '1 cup coriander (50 g) chopped', '*Chat Masala', '1 cup sev (130 g)', 'salt as needed']
instructions: ['1: For making the puris: First, mix all the ingredients in a large bowl and knead to make the dough soft', '2: Cover and rest the dough for 30 minutesOnce rested, take a  small portion of dough and dust it in all purpose 2 tablespoons maida flour', '3: Roll the dough using a rolling pin to ¼ -inch thickness and, with a small round cutter, cut out small circles of dough and fry them in your heated oil', '4: Drain the puris in a paper-towel-lined colander to keep them crisp and discard the excess oil', '5: For the green chutney: blend all the ingredients together and set aside', '6: For 1 cup tamarind chutney: Boil 1 cup tamarind, dates and 1 cup jaggery in water till they turn softAdd the other ingredients, allow to cool, and blend', '7:  Strain and keep aside (any extras can be refrigerated)', '8: For the stuffing: mash the 2 potatoes and 1 cup peas in a bowl', '9:  Add all the other ingredients and mix wellTo serve: Tap a hole in the center of the fried puris with your thumb and fill each hollow shell with 1 tbsp stuffing', '10: Add ½ tbsp of each of the chutneys to each puri and sprinkle each piece with ½ tablespoon chat ½ tablespoon chat 1 tablespoon garam masala, chopped 1 cup onion and chopped tomatoes', '11: Top with a generous amount of 1 cup sev and garnish with some chopped coriander', '12:  Serve and enjoy!']

ingredients: ['½ cup raspberry (60 g)', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '½ cup lemon juice (120 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Place all ingredients in a glass and muddle to infuse flavors', '2: Strain and serve']

ingredients: ['3 cups rolled oats (240 g)', '1 cup chunky peanut butter (240 g)', '¾ cup honey (250 g)', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 cup raisin (150 g)', '1 cup peanuts (125 g)', '1 cup golden raisin (150 g)']
instructions: ['1: Toast the 3 cups rolled oats in a medium nonstick skillet over medium heat for 2–3 minutes, until 1 cup golden brown and fragrant', '2:  Remove the pan from the heat and let the 3 cups rolled oats cool', '3: Melt the 1 cup chunky 1 cup peanut butter and ¾ cup honey together in a small saucepan over medium heat for about 2 minutes, until pourable and smooth', '4:  Stir in the 1 teaspoon kosher salt, then remove the pot from the heat', '5: Transfer the 1 cup chunky 1 cup peanut butter mixture to a large bowl', '6:  Add the toasted 3 cups rolled oats, raisins, 1 cup chunky 1 cup 1 cup peanuts, and 1 cup golden raisins', '7:  Stir until well coated', '8: Transfer the mixture onto a sheet of parchment paper and roll into a log, pressing together', '9:  Wrap in plastic wrap and freeze for at least 4 hours, up to overnight', '10: Remove the roll from the freezer and slice into 24 pieces', '11:  The slices will keep in the freezer for up to 1 month or in the refrigerator for up to 5 days']

ingredients: ['4 lb rack of pork rib (1.8 kg) 2 racks', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 cup red wine (240 mL)', '1 cup brown sugar (220 g)', '¼ cup apple cider vinegar (60 mL)', '¼ teaspoon ground allspice', '1 can tomato sauce', '3 tablespoons tomato paste', 'Preparation', '4 lb rack of pork rib (1.8 kg) 2 racks', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 cup red wine (240 mL)', '1 cup brown sugar (220 g)', '¼ cup apple cider vinegar (60 mL)', '¼ teaspoon ground allspice', '1 can tomato sauce', '3 tablespoons tomato paste', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 250˚F (125˚C)', '2: Clean the ribs (remove membrane or score) and pat dry', '3: Place the ribs in a foil-lined roasting pan, and season both sides with salt and pepper', '4: Add about ¼ inch (6mm) of water (about ½ cup (120 ml)) to the pan', '5: Seal the top of the roasting pan with foil and bake for 2 hours or until ribs are very tender', '6: Place wine, brown sugar, vinegar, tomato sauce, tomato paste, and allspice in a saucepan', '7: Simmer the sauce for at least 45 minutes and season to taste', '8:   The sauce should be rich and thick', '9: Raise oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '10: Remove ribs from roasting pan', '11:  Pour off all fat and water, and baste ribs with sauce', '12: Bake an additional 20-30 minutes', '13:  (You can stop and re-baste halfway through', '14: )Cut ribs and serve with additional sauce']

ingredients: ['2 lb flap steak (850 g)', '6 tablespoons olive oil', '1 ½ large lemons juiced', '2 tablespoons allspice', '1 tablespoon coriander', '1 tablespoon paprika', '1 tablespoon cumin', '1 ½ teaspoons salt to taste', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon sumac', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '¼ teaspoon turmeric', '1 dash cinnamon']
instructions: ['1: Slice the 2 lb flap steak into small, thin slices', '2:  Transfer into a bowl', '3: Add the 6 tablespoons olive oil, lemon juice, and spices to the steak', '4:  Mix to evenly marinate the steak', '5:  Cover and place in the fridge from 30 minutes up to overnight', '6: Heat a well-oiled skillet or pan over high heat', '7:  Add the meat and cook just until redness is gone and the beef turns a dark brown color', '8:  Remove from heat', '9: Serve in a wrap, in a salad, sandwich, or a shawarma quesadilla']

ingredients: ['13 oz chocolate hazelnut spread (370 g)', '2 eggs', '½ cup flour (65 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350ºF (175ºC)', '2: In a large bowl, combine ingredients', '3: Transfer mix to square baking dish', '4: Bake for 15 minutes', '5: Allow to cool for 5 minutes and then carefully cut into squares']

ingredients: ['Teriyaki Sauce', '⅔ cup brown sugar (85 g)', '1 cup soy sauce (240 mL)', '¼ cup lemon juice (60 mL)', '1 tablespoon sesame seeds', '1 teaspoon fresh ginger grated', '1 tablespoon garlic grated', 'Salad', '1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken breast (685 g)', '½ cup olive oil (120 mL)', '1 head green leaf lettuce roughly chopped', '1 mango pitted and cubed', '1 red bell pepper seeded and thinly sliced', '1 orange bell pepper seeded and thinly sliced', '10 green beans thinly sliced on the bias', '1 avocado sliced', '1 scallion greens only finely chopped']
instructions: ['1: Make the teriyaki sauce: In a liquid measuring cup or medium bowl, combine the brown sugar, soy sauce, lemon juice, 1 tablespoon sesame seeds, 1 teaspoon fresh ginger, and 1 tablespoon garlic', '2:  Whisk to combine and dissolve the sugar', '3: Butterfly the 1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken breasts, then place in a high-walled baking dish', '4:  Pour the teriyaki sauce over the 1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken, reserving ½ cup (120 ml) of the sauce', '5:  Cover the dish with plastic wrap and marinate the 1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken in the refrigerator for 20 minutes', '6: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '7:  Line a baking sheet with foil', '8: Make the dressing: While whisking, slowly drizzle the olive oil into the reserved teriyaki sauce', '9: Transfer the marinated 1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken breasts to the prepared baking sheet', '10:  Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 160˚F (70˚C)', '11:  Let cool for 10 minutes', '12: In a medium bowl, use 2 forks to shred the 1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken', '13:  Pour ¼ cup (60 ml) dressing over the 1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken and toss to coat', '14: Prepare the salad: Add the lettuce to a large bowl', '15:  Top with the 1 mango, bell peppers, 1 head 10 1 scallion green beans, 1 avocado, and shredded 1 ½ lb boneless skinless chicken', '16:  Add the remaining dressing and toss well', '17: Divide between serving bowls and top with the scallions']

ingredients: ['Squash', '1 spaghetti squash', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', 'Pesto', '2 cups fresh basil (80 g)', '½ cup extra virgin olive oil (120 mL) divided', '½ cup vegetarian parmesan cheese (55 g) grated', '2 cloves garlic', '¼ cup pine nuts (35 g)', '½ teaspoon salt', 'Filling', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 lb mushroom (455 g) sliced', '1 cup asparagus (125 g) cut in half', '1 tablespoon garlic minced', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400ºF (200ºC)', '2: With a sharp knife, slice the squash in half', '3:  If the squash is too tough, puncture in several places forming a dotted line around the squash', '4:  Microwave for 3-5 minutes to soften', '5:  Allow to cool before cutting in half', '6: Scoop out the seeds, brush with 2 tablespoons olive ½ cup extra virgin olive 1 tablespoon oil, and sprinkle with salt, and pepper', '7:  Bake for 40-45 minutes, or until a fork can easily pierce the skin', '8: Meanwhile, in a blender combine 2 cups fresh basil, olive 2 tablespoons olive ½ cup extra virgin olive 1 tablespoon oil, ½ cup vegetarian Parmesan cheese, garlic, ¼ cup pine nuts, and salt', '9:  Set aside', '10: In a pan add the olive 2 tablespoons olive ½ cup extra virgin olive 1 tablespoon oil and garlic over medium-high heat, sautè 30 seconds-1 minute, add in 1 lb mushrooms and cook for 3 minutes', '11:  Add 1 cup asparagus and stir until cooked', '12: Remove squash from the oven, with a fork pull at the edges to produce that stringy “spaghetti” quality until you’ve completed both of them', '13: In the 1 lb mushroom and 1 cup asparagus pan combine “spaghetti” and pesto and mix', '14:  Return to the squash and serve with or without plates', '15:  Garnish with parmesan']

ingredients: ['2 large flour tortillas', '¼ cup pesto (55 g) divided', '1 cup cherry tomato (200 g) halved divided', '½ lb turkey (225 g) sliced divided', '2 oz baby spinach (55 g) divided', '4 slices provolone cheese halved']
instructions: ['1: Warm the 2 large flour tortillas in the microwave in 30-second intervals, until flexible', '2:  Transfer to a clean work surface', '3: Spread on half the ¼ cup pesto on each tortilla', '4: Divide the tomatoes, ½ lb turkey, 2 oz baby spinach, and 4 slices provolone between the 2 large flour tortillas', '5: Wrap the 2 large flour tortillas tightly in plastic wrap and rest for 30 minutes', '6: Stick 6 toothpicks 1-inch (2', '7: 5 cm) apart into the wraps along the seam', '8: Slice between the toothpicks and serve']

ingredients: ['½ cup  quaker rolled oat (40 g)', '3 oz fresh pasteurized milk (100 mL)', '2 oz natural yogurt (50 g)', '¾ cup blueberry (70 g)', '½ teaspoon nutmeg']
instructions: ['1: Add all of the ingredients except for the blueberries in a clean mason jar', '2: Stir everything together', '3: Add the blueberries, whole', '4: Put a lid on the mason jar and refrigerate overnight 40°F (5°C)']

ingredients: ['12 rolls dinner rolls 1 pack', '1 ½ cups shredded mozzarella cheese (150 g)', '3 cups rotisserie chicken (375 g) shredded', '¾ cup hot sauce (175 mL)', '½ cup ranch dressing (120 g)', '2 tablespoons butter melted']
instructions: ['1: Carefully slice the pack of dinner rolls in half, being sure to keep the rolls connected as a single units as they are split into tops and bottoms', '2: Remove the top and place the bottom section in a 9x12 inch (23x30 cm) baking dish', '3: Sprinkle the bottom with about 1 cup (100 g) of the 1 ½ cups 3 cups 3 cups rotisserie chicken (375 g) shredded mozzarella cheese (make sure it is evenly coated as this will act as a barrier between the sauce and the bread, preventing the rolls from getting soggy)', '4: Top the cheese with the 1 ½ cups 3 cups 3 cups rotisserie chicken (375 g) shredded 3 cups rotisserie chicken', '5:  Drizzle the hot sauce and ranch dressing evenly over the chicken and spread out evenly with a spoon', '6:  Top with remaining mozzarella cheese', '7: Place the top half of the rolls on top and brush evenly with melted 2 tablespoons butter', '8: Bake in a preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, until the cheese is melty and the rolls have heated through', '9: Remove from oven, cool slightly before transferring to a cutting board', '10: Using a large knife, follow the lines of the rolls, cutting them into 12 individual sliders']

ingredients: ['20 slices sopressata', '20 green olives pitted drained', '10 slices prosciutto cut in half crosswise', '1 jar roasted red pepper drained and sliced into 1/2 in (1 1/4 cm) strips', '20 slices salami italian ', '20 fresh basil leaves', '8 oz provolone cheese (225 g) cut into 3/4 in ( 2 cm) cubes', '1 tablespoon aged balsamic vinegar for drizzling', '1 teaspoon flaky sea salt for sprinkling', 'Special Equipment', '20 wooden skewers 4-6 in (10-15 cm)']
instructions: ['1: Fold a slice of 20 slices sopressata into quarters, and then gently thread onto a skewer, leaving about ½–¾ (1 ¼ cm - 2 cm) inch of space from the bottom', '2:  Without packing too tightly, add a 20 green olive, a piece of 10 slices prosciutto folded into quarters, a piece of 1 jar roasted red pepper folded in half, a piece of Italian dry 20 slices salami folded into quarters, a 20 fresh basil leaf folded in half, and a cube of 8 oz provolone cheese', '3:  Repeat with the remaining ingredients and 20 wooden skewers', '4: When ready to serve, lightly drizzle 1 tablespoon aged balsamic vinegar over the 20 wooden skewers, avoiding the base', '5:  Sprinkle with 1 teaspoon flaky salt']

ingredients: ['2 cups rosé (480 mL) divided', '⅓ cup unflavored gelatin powder (50 g) (about 5 .25-ounce envelopes)', '1 cup sugar (200 g)', '1 drop pink food coloring optional', 'Special Equipment', 'gummy bear mold optional']
instructions: ['1: Place 1 cup of 2 cups rosé (240 ml) in a small saucepan over medium heat', '2:  Bring to a simmer and cook until reduced by half, about 5 minutes', '3:  Remove the pan from the heat', '4: In a liquid measuring cup or small bowl, combine the gelatin powder and remaining 2 cups rosé wine', '5:  Let sit for 5 minutes', '6:  The gelatin should give off a “blooming” effect, thickening the mixture', '7: Add the gelatin mixture to the saucepan with the concentrated 2 cups rosé', '8:  Add the sugar and return the pan to medium-low heat, whisking continuously', '9:  Do not let the mixture boil', '10:  Cook until the gelatin is dissolved, about 5 minutes', '11:  The mixture should have a syrupy consistency, similar to maple syrup', '12:  Remove the pan from the heat', '13:  Add a 1 drop of pink food coloring, if desired', '14: Use a squeeze bottle, spouted measuring cup, or 1 dropper to distribute the mixture into the gummy bear molds', '15:  If you don’t have a gummy bear mold, pour the mixture into a parchment-lined, 8-inch (20 cm), square baking pan', '16: Refrigerate for 90 minutes, or until set', '17: Carefully pop the bears out of the molds or, if using a baking pan, cut into small squares with a pizza cutter', '18: Store in airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks']

ingredients: ['Filling', 'olive oil for cooking', '½ cup cremini mushroom (35 g) sliced', '½ cup cherry tomatoes (100 g) halved', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 clove garlic minced', '2 cups fresh spinach (80 g)', 'Omelet', '¾ cup chickpea flour (90 g)', '1 ½ tablespoons nutritional yeast', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ teaspoon turmeric', '¼ teaspoon salt', '⅛ teaspoon pepper', '⅛ teaspoon black salt kala namak optional', '1 teaspoon apple cider vinegar', '¾ cup unsweetened almond milk (180 mL)', 'fresh cilantro for serving', 'salsa for serving']
instructions: ['1: In a medium nonstick saucepan, heat a drizzle of olive oil over medium heat', '2:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the mushrooms and tomatoes and cook for 3-4 minutes, until they start to release their juices', '3:  Season with salt and pepper', '4: Add a bit more olive oil to the pan, then add the garlic and cook for 2 minutes, until fragrant', '5: Add the spinach and cook for 3-4 minutes, until wilted', '6:  Remove the pan from the heat', '7: In a medium bowl, combine the chickpea flour, 1 ½ tablespoons nutritional yeast, ½ teaspoon baking soda, garlic powder, ¼ teaspoon turmeric, salt, ⅛ teaspoon black salt, 1 teaspoon apple cider vinegar, and almond milk, and whisk together until mostly smooth', '8: In a medium nonstick saucepan, heat a drizzle of olive oil over medium heat', '9:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add a ½ cup (120 ml) of the omelet batter to the pan', '10:  Let cook for 5-7 minutes, or until several bubbles have formed on the surface', '11:  Spoon half of the vegetable filling onto one side of the omelet', '12: Using a spatula, fold the omelet in half', '13:  Turn off the heat and cover the pan with a lid', '14:  Let the omelet steam for 5 minutes, until completely cooked through', '15:  Repeat with the remaining omelet batter and filling', '16: Serve the omelets with salsa and fresh cilantro']

ingredients: ['1 cup flour (125 g)', '¾ cup chickpea flour (95 g)', '¼ cup semolina flour (30 g)', '½ teaspoon ground cardamom', '⅛ teaspoon nutmeg', '¾ cup powdered sugar (80 g)', '½ cup ghee (95 g) plus 2 tablespoons', 'almond or pistachios / chopped.', '1 pinch salt']
instructions: ['1: Sift the flour and spices together in a bowl and add 1 pinch salt', '2: Cream together ½ cup ghee and ¾ cup powdered sugar', '3: Add the dry ingredients to the wet ones and mix', '4:  Add a bit of milk or melted ½ cup ghee if it won’t come together', '5: Wrap and chill the dough in the refrigerator for 30 minutes', '6: Form the dough into balls and place on a lined baking sheet', '7: Slightly flatten the dough and press an almond or chopped pistachios into the center of each', '8: Chill the dough once more for 15 minutes', '9:  While the dough chills, preheat the oven to 375°F', '10: Bake for 10-20 minutes or until slightly brownCool on a wire rack then enjoy! The cookies can stay good in an air-tight container for up to 3 weeks']

ingredients: ['¾ cup earl grey tea (5 g)', '¼ cup dried lavender (5 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, combine the ¾ cup earl grey tea leaves and ¼ cup dried lavender', '2:  Mix well', '3: Store in an airtight container for up to 1 month', '4: To brew, steep 1-2 teaspoons of the tea blend in 8 ounces (240ml) of hot water for 5 minutes', '5:  Serve warm or over ice']

ingredients: ['2 heads garlic', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL) plus 2 table spoons', '2 ½ teaspoons kosher salt divided', '2 ¼ cups bread flour (280 g) plus more for dusting', '1 ¼ cups whole wheat flour (155 g)', '3 sprigs fresh rosemary minced', '1 ½ cups warm water (360 mL)', '1 tablespoon instant yeast']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Remove the top of each 2 heads garlic bulb so just the tops of the cloves are exposed', '3:  Set the tops aside', '4:  Drizzle 1–2 tablespoons of olive oil over top of each bulb, letting the oil seep down between the cloves', '5:  Season each bulb with ¼ teaspoon of salt', '6:  Place the tops back on each bulb and set in a shallow baking dish', '7: Bake for 20–25 minutes, until the cloves are completely tender, but not mushy', '8:  Since the 2 heads garlic will continue cooking in the 2 ¼ 1 ¼ 1 ½ cups bread, you want them a little more firm so they hold their shape in the loaf', '9: Let the 2 heads garlic to cool until safe to handle', '10:  Gentle press on the bottom of each clove to pop it out of its skin', '11:  Roughly chop the 2 heads garlic cloves and set aside', '12: In a large bowl, combine the 2 ¼ 1 ¼ 1 ½ cups bread flour, whole 1 ¼ 1 ½ cups whole wheat flour, chopped 2 heads garlic, 3 sprigs fresh rosemary, and the remaining 2 2 ½ teaspoons of salt', '13:  Stir well with a rubber spatula', '14: In a separate large bowl, combine the 1 ½ cups warm water, remaining ¼ ¼ 2 ¼ 1 ¼ 1 ½ cup (60 ml) olive oil, and the 1 tablespoon instant yeast', '15: Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients and use a rubber spatula to stir until the dough just comes together', '16:  With your hands, knead the dough in the bowl until there are no dry, floury spots remaining', '17:  Cover with a kitchen towel and let rest in a 1 ½ cups warm place for 60 minutes, or until almost doubled in size', '18: Using the spatula, fold the dough toward the center again 8 more times, rotating the bowl each time', '19:  Cover with the towel and let rest for 30 minutes more', '20: Place a Dutch oven with a lid in the oven, and preheat the oven to 450°F (230°C) for 30 minutes', '21: Lightly dust a clean surface and your hands with flour', '22:  Carefully turn the dough out of the bowl onto the floured surface', '23:  Fold the edges of the dough towards the center 8 times, then flip the dough over and transfer to a piece of parchment paper', '24: Carefully remove the Dutch oven from the oven (it will be very hot) and use the parchment to lift the 2 ¼ 1 ¼ 1 ½ cups bread into the pot', '25:  Cover with the lid', '26: Bake the 2 ¼ 1 ¼ 1 ½ cups bread for 30 minutes', '27:  Remove the lid and reduce the oven temperature to 425°F (220°C)', '28:  Bake for 20 more minutes, until the 2 ¼ 1 ¼ 1 ½ cups bread is golden brown', '29: Carefully slide the 2 ¼ 1 ¼ 1 ½ cups bread out of the pot and onto a wire rack', '30:  Remove the parchment paper and let the 2 ¼ 1 ¼ 1 ½ cups bread cool for at least 1 hour before slicing', '31: Slice the 2 ¼ 1 ¼ 1 ½ cups bread and serve as desired']

ingredients: ['Cardamom Pound Cake', '2 sticks unsalted butter softened plus 1 tablespoon for greasing', '1 ⅓ cups all purpose flour (165 g)', '⅓ cup dried nonfat milk powder (35 g)', '1 cup granulated sugar (220 g)', '¾ teaspoon ground cardamom', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '4 large eggs', 'Gulab Jamun Syrup', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '1 cup granulated sugar (220 g)', '½ teaspoon saffron thread', '8 cardamom pods slightly crushed', '1 cinnamon stick', '1 teaspoon rose water', '2 teaspoons fresh lime juice', 'For Serving', '1 ¾ cups powdered sugar (190 g)', '1 tablespoon dried rose petal optional', '1 tablespoon pistachio chopped', 'Preparation', 'Cardamom Pound Cake', '2 sticks unsalted butter softened plus 1 tablespoon for greasing', '1 ⅓ cups all purpose flour (165 g)', '⅓ cup dried nonfat milk powder (35 g)', '1 cup granulated sugar (220 g)', '¾ teaspoon ground cardamom', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '4 large eggs', 'Gulab Jamun Syrup', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '1 cup granulated sugar (220 g)', '½ teaspoon saffron thread', '8 cardamom pods slightly crushed', '1 cinnamon stick', '1 teaspoon rose water', '2 teaspoons fresh lime juice', 'For Serving', '1 ¾ cups powdered sugar (190 g)', '1 tablespoon dried rose petal optional', '1 tablespoon pistachio chopped', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Make the cardamom cake: Preheat the oven to 325°F (163°C)', '2:  Grease a 10-cup Bundt pan liberally with 1 tablespoon of butter', '3:  In a medium bowl, whisk the flour and milk powder together until well combined', '4: Add the butter, sugar, and ground cardamom to a separate large bowl and mix with a hand mixer for 5-7 minutes; the butter will turn pale and fluffy', '5:  Add the salt and vanilla and stir to combine', '6:  Add 1 egg at a time, beating well between each addition', '7:  Add the flour mixture', '8:  Mix until the dry ingredients are just incorporated', '9: Spoon the batter into the Bundt pan and tap the pan on the counter 3–5 times to remove air bubbles', '10: Bake the cake for 35–40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean', '11: 10 minutes before the cake is done baking, make the syrup: Add the water, granulated sugar, saffron, cardamom pods, and cinnamon stick to a small saucepan', '12:  Bring to a boil over medium-high heat and simmer for 2 minutes', '13:  Remove the pot from the heat and whisk in the rose water and lime juice', '14:  Remove the cinnamon stick and cardamom pods from the syrup and discard', '15:  Reserve ¼ cup (60 ml) of the syrup and set aside', '16: Poke holes in the bottom of the Bundt cake with a fork', '17:  Pour the rest of the syrup over the Bundt cake while it is still warm in the pan', '18:  It will look like a lot of syrup, but the cake will soak it all up', '19:  Let the cake rest for 10 minutes, then invert it onto a serving platter', '20: In a medium bowl, whisk together the powdered sugar and reserved syrup to make a glaze', '21: Pour the glaze over the Bundt cake', '22:  Sprinkle with the dried rose petals, if using, and pistachios', '23: Slice and serve']

ingredients: ['4 chicken breasts cut into cubes', '1 egg white', '1 tablespoon salt', '½ teaspoon turmeric', '1 tablespoon ginger garlic paste', '½ teaspoon red chili powder', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '½ teaspoon garam masala powder', '1 teaspoon cumin coriander powder', '½ tablespoon lemon juice', '2 pinches red food coloring powder', '1 tablespoon coriander leaves chopped', '5 tablespoons corn flour', '2 ½ tablespoons all purpose flour', '5 tablespoons oil', '1 handful curry leaves', '3 green chillis', '¼ cup yogurt (60 g)', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 tablespoon green chili sauce', '1 tablespoon red chilli', '1 tablespoon vinegar', '1 tablespoon ketchup', '1 tablespoon hot sauce', '2 tablespoons water', '1 tablespoon coriander leaves for garnish']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, mix 4 chicken cubes, 1 egg white, 1 tablespoon ginger garlic paste, 1 tablespoon salt, ½ teaspoon turmeric, red chilli, ½ teaspoon black pepper, ½ teaspoon garam masala, 1 teaspoon cumin coriander powder, red food coloring, ½ tablespoon lemon juice, chopped coriander leaves, 5 tablespoons corn flour and all 2 ½ tablespoons all purpose flour and set aside for 20 minutes', '2: Mix ¼ cup yogurt and all the sauces in a bowl and set aside', '3: Heat 5 tablespoons oil on medium heat in a saucepan or pot', '4:  Add the green chillies and 1 handful curry leaves, then add the 4 chicken', '5:  Flip after 5-6 minutes, searing both sides', '6:  Cook for 5-6 minutes', '7: Add ¼ cup yogurt and sauces mixture and stir well', '8:  Cook for 5 minutes, then add 2 tablespoons water and cook on low flame for 10 minutes or until 5 tablespoons oil separates from the sides', '9: Garnish with coriander leaves and serve 1 tablespoon hot']

ingredients: ['Cookie Crust', '2 cups cashews (260 g)', '1 ½ cups oat flour (135 g)', '1 pinch salt', '⅓ cup pure maple syrup (110 g)', '2 tablespoons milk of choice or water', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'Topping', '1 ½ cups greek yogurt (425 g)', '2 tablespoons pure maple syrup', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'fresh fruit sliced of your choice', '1 lemon zested optional']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 325˚F (170˚C)', '2:  Grease a baking sheet with cooking spray', '3: Add the 2 cups cashews to a food processor and pulse until finely ground', '4: Add the 1 ½ cups oat flour, 1 pinch salt, maple syrup, 2 tablespoons milk, and vanilla to the food processor and blend until fully combined and the crust becomes very sticky and clumps together', '5: Transfer the crust to the prepared baking sheet and use your hands to form it into the shape of a pizza, about ¼-inch (6 mm) thick', '6: Bake for 10-15 minutes, or until the edges of the crust are just starting to turn golden brown', '7: Let the crust cool completely, then chill in the refrigerator for 30 minutes', '8: In a medium bowl, combine the Greek yogurt, maple syrup, and vanilla', '9: Top the crust with the Greek yogurt mixture and spread evenly with a rubber spatula', '10: Top with sliced fresh fruit and sprinkle with 1 lemon zest, if using', '11: Slice with a knife or pizza cutter, then serve']

ingredients: ['1 white onion finely chopped', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '1 lemon zested', '1 lemon juiced', '1 ½ teaspoons dijon mustard', 'fine sea salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil (60 mL)', '1 head broccoli cut into large florets', '1 fennel bulb trimmed cut into 1/2-inch (1 cm) wedges', '2 cloves garlic smashed', '1 pinch red pepper flakes', '2 tablespoons fennel fond finely chopped', '15 oz white bean (425 g) 1 can drained and rinsed', '4 hard-boiled eggs peeled and coarsely chopped']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220˚C)', '2: In a large bowl, add the white onion, 2 tablespoons 1 pinch red wine vinegar, lemon juice, lemon zest, and 1 ½ teaspoons dijon mustard', '3:  Season with fine sea salt and freshly ground black 1 pinch 1 pinch red pepper, and stir to combine', '4: In a large bowl, toss together 3 tablespoons of the olive oil, 1 head broccoli, 1 2 tablespoons fennel, 2 cloves garlic, and 2 tablespoons 1 pinch red freshly ground black 1 pinch 1 pinch red pepper flakes', '5: Spread the 1 head broccoli onto a large baking sheet and season with fine sea salt and freshly ground black 1 pinch 1 pinch red pepper', '6: Bake, tossing the vegetables occasionally, until tender and golden, 25 to 30 minutes', '7: Remove the 2 cloves garlic from the baking sheet, and finely chop', '8:  Add the minced 2 cloves garlic to the onion mixture', '9: Whisking constantly, slowly add the remaining ¼ ¼ cup (60 ML) of the olive oil to the onion mixture until an emulsified dressing forms', '10:  Whisk in the 1 2 tablespoons fennel fronds', '11: Add the beans and roasted vegetables, and toss to combine', '12:  Season with fine sea salt and freshly ground black 1 pinch 1 pinch red pepper to taste', '13:  Top with the chopped 4 hard-boiled eggs and serve']

ingredients: ['2 cups frozen strawberry (300 g)', '1 pt strawberry sorbet (390 g)', '1 ½ cups lemonade (355 mL)']
instructions: ['1: To a blender add the strawberries, strawberry sorbet, and 1 ½ cups lemonade', '2: Blend until smooth', '3: Serve immediately to drink or freeze for 30 minutes to eat with a spoon']

ingredients: ['2 lb chicken (910 g)', '3 dried bay leaves', '5 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 tablespoons vinegar', '3 garlics crushed', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '¼ cup cooking oil (60 mL)', '1 tablespoon white sugar', 'salt to taste', 'whole peppercorn']
