instructions: ['1: In a container or a plastic food bag, combine 5 tablespoons soy sauce and garlic then marinade the 2 lb chicken for 30 minutes', '2: Place a medium pan on medium heat and add ¼ cup cooking oil, once the ¼ cup cooking oil is hot put the marinated 2 lb chicken and brown (about five minutes)', '3: Pour in the remaining marinade and add 1 cup water, then bring to a boil', '4: Add the 3 dried bay leaves and whole whole peppercorn', '5:  Simmer for 30 minutes or until the 2 lb chicken is tender', '6: Add the 2 tablespoons vinegar, stir and simmer for 10 more minutes', '7: Add the 1 tablespoon white sugar, salt, and stir', '8:  Then remove from heat']

ingredients: ['6 oz cream cheese (175 g) room temperature', '1 ½ teaspoons sugar', '2 teaspoons light soy sauce', '1 pinch kosher salt plus more for sprinkling', '8 oz fresh lump crab meat (225 g) shredded', '⅓ cup scallions (10 g) thinly sliced', '12 square wonton wrappers', '1 large egg beaten', 'peanut oil for frying', 'sweet and sour sauce for serving', 'Preparation', '6 oz cream cheese (175 g) room temperature', '1 ½ teaspoons sugar', '2 teaspoons light soy sauce', '1 pinch kosher salt plus more for sprinkling', '8 oz fresh lump crab meat (225 g) shredded', '⅓ cup scallions (10 g) thinly sliced', '12 square wonton wrappers', '1 large egg beaten', 'peanut oil for frying', 'sweet and sour sauce for serving', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, mix together the cream cheese, a pinch of salt, soy sauce, and sugar until well combined', '2:  Gently fold in the crab meat and scallions until evenly incorporated', '3: Place a wonton wrapper on a clean surface in a diamond orientation', '4:  Brush the edges of the wrapper with the beaten egg', '5:  Scoop 3 tablespoons of the crab filling onto the center of the wrapper and flatten slightly with a spoon', '6:  Fold the sides of the wrapper inwards to cover the filling, then roll the wonton up, starting from the bottom and working upward to seal', '7:  Repeat with the remaining wrappers and filling', '8: Fill a large pot halfway with peanut oil', '9:  Heat over medium-high heat until the temperature reaches 375˚F (190˚C)', '10:  Set a wire rack over a baking sheet', '11: Working 3–4 at a time, fry the egg rolls in the hot oil until the wrappers are puffed and golden, about 2 minutes, flipping halfway to ensure even color', '12:  Transfer to the wire rack and sprinkle with salt', '13: Serve the egg rolls with your favorite dipping sauce, such as sweet and sour sauce']

ingredients: ['1 lb potato (455 g)', 'olive oil to taste', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '3 tablespoons lemon juice', '2 cloves garlic minced', '½ teaspoon onion powder', '½ teaspoon paprika', '½ teaspoon dried thyme', '½ teaspoon dried parsley', '2 tablespoons honey', '2 salmon fillets', '1 bunch asparagus', '6 slices lemon', '4 sprigs fresh thyme']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C)Add potatoes to a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '2: Season with olive oil, thyme, salt, and pepper', '3: Bake for 20 minutes', '4: To prepare 2 salmon marinade, combine 3 tablespoons 6 6 slices lemon juice, 2 cloves garlic, ½ teaspoon onion powder, ½ teaspoon paprika, thyme, ½ teaspoon dried parsley, and 2 tablespoons honey, and stir until evenly combined', '5: On the same baking tray, push the potatoes to one side of the tray and add 2 salmon and 1 bunch asparagus', '6: Season the 2 salmon and 1 bunch asparagus with olive oil, salt, and pepper', '7:  Brush the marinade on the 2 salmon', '8: Top 2 salmon with 3 tablespoons 6 6 slices lemon 6 slices and thyme springs', '9: Bake for 12-14 minutes or until 2 salmon is cooked']

ingredients: ['15 oz cannellini bean (425 g) 1 can drained and rinsed', '1 cup raw cashew (130 g)', '¾ cup hot sauce (180 mL)', '½ cup non-dairy milk (120 mL)', '½ lemon juiced', '1 tablespoon nutritional yeast', '1 teaspoon paprika', '½ teaspoon onion powder', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '15 oz chickpeas (425 g) 1 can drained and rinsed', '1 cup shredded vegan cheddar cheese (100 g)', 'fresh scallion for garnish', 'fresh parsley for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)', '2: In a food processor, add cashews and beans', '3:  Process until smooth', '4: Add ¾ cup hot sauce, ½ cup non-dairy milk, ½ lemon juice, 1 tablespoon nutritional yeast, 1 teaspoon paprika, ½ teaspoon onion powder, ½ teaspoon garlic powder, 1 teaspoon salt, and ½ teaspoon pepper', '5:  Process until smooth', '6: Transfer to greased 9x9-inch (23x23 cm) baking dish and stir in 15 oz chickpeas and 1 cup shredded vegan cheddar cheese', '7: Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes', '8: Garnish with scallions or fresh parsley, if desired', '9: Serve with pita chips or crackers']

ingredients: ['2 teaspoons pomegranate seeds dried', '2 teaspoons whole cumin seeds', '1 cup chickpea flour (90 g)', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt plus more to taste', '2 tablespoons full-fat yogurt', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '⅓ cup fresh cilantro (15 g) finely chopped', '2 small onions thinly sliced', '2 jalapeñoes seeded and thinly sliced', '4 jalapeñoes whole', '3 yukon gold potatoes peeled and sliced', '1 eggplant peeled and sliced', 'oil for frying', 'mint chutney for serving', 'tamarind sauce for serving', 'ketchup for serving']
instructions: ['1: In a mortar and pestle or a spice grinder, crush the 2 teaspoons pomegranate and 2 teaspoons whole cumin seeds, then transfer to a medium bowl', '2: Add the 1 cup chickpea flour, 1 teaspoon black pepper, 1 teaspoon cayenne, 1 teaspoon ground coriander, 1 teaspoon baking powder, and 1 teaspoon salt, and stir to combine', '3: Mix in the 2 tablespoons full-fat yogurt, 1 cup water, and ⅓ cup fresh cilantro, and stir until evenly incorporated', '4:  A few lumps are okay', '5:  Rest for 15 minutes to let the flour hydrate', '6: Heat the oil in a large pot until it reaches 350°F (180°C)', '7: Mix the 2 small onions and sliced jalapeños into the batter', '8: Dip the slices of potato, 1 eggplant, and the whole jalapenos into the batter', '9:  Try to get the 2 small onions and other bits in the batter stuck to the dipped veggies to create more texture', '10: Fry the dipped vegetables, making sure not to overcrowd the pot, until deep golden brown, about 3-4 minutes', '11: Drain on a wire rack or paper towels, then 1 teaspoon salt the pakoras while they are still hot', '12: Dip in mint chutney, tamarind sauce, and/or ketchup']

ingredients: ['12 oz refrigerated biscuit (340 g) 1 tube', '6 eggs', '½ cup milk (120 mL)', '½ teaspoon pepper', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 lb cooked sausage (455 g)', '1 cup shredded cheese (100 g)', 'Gravy', '4 tablespoons butter', '4 tablespoons flour', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 cups milk (470 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Cut each 12 oz refrigerated biscuit into 8 pieces', '2:  Set aside', '3: In a bowl, mix the 6 eggs, ½ cup 2 2 cups milk, pepper, and salt', '4:  Set aside', '5: For the gravy: melt the 4 tablespoons butter in a saucepan, over medium heat', '6:  Stir in 4 tablespoons flour, salt, and pepper, and slowly add the 2 2 cups of ½ cup 2 2 cups milk', '7:  Increase to medium-high, bring to a simmer, stirring until gravy is thickened', '8: In a greased 9x13 (22x33 cm) glass baking dish, layer the 12 oz refrigerated biscuits, sausage, 1 cup shredded cheese, egg mixture, and gravy', '9: Bake at 350°F (180°C) for 35-45 min, until the 6 eggs on the bottom are 1 lb cooked']

ingredients: ['4 chicken thighs', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '6 cloves garlic minced', '1 small onion chopped', '½ cup brown sugar (110 g)', '½ cup chicken broth (120 mL)', '1 tablespoon fresh thyme minced', '1 tablespoon fresh parsley minced']
instructions: ['1: Season the chicken thighs with salt and pepper', '2: Heat a cast-iron skillet or pan over medium-high heat, and add the chicken skin side down', '3: Cook the chicken until it has a dark ½ cup brown and crispy skin', '4:  Flip the chicken and cook until the chicken is cooked through, about 5 more minutes', '5:  Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside', '6: Add the 6 cloves garlic and 1 small onion to the remaining chicken fat and cook, stirring frequently until the 1 small onions are softened and caramelized', '7: Add the ½ cup brown sugar, chicken broth, 1 tablespoon fresh thyme, and 1 tablespoon fresh parsley and stir to combine', '8:  Bring the sauce to a boil and and cook for 1-2 minutes, until slightly reduced', '9: Add the chicken back to the pan and coat it in the 6 cloves garlic ½ cup brown sugar sauce']

ingredients: ['1 chicken breast', '7 teaspoons tomato puree', '7 slices mozzarella cheese', '7 slices salami', '1 tablespoon grated cheddar cheese', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', 'Preparation', '1 chicken breast', '7 teaspoons tomato puree', '7 slices mozzarella cheese', '7 slices salami', '1 tablespoon grated cheddar cheese', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Cut seven slits on the top of the chicken breast', '2: In each slit, spread 1 teaspoon of tomato puree, 1 mozzarella slice, and 1 salami slice', '3: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '4: Sprinkle on the cheddar cheese and oregano', '5: Bake for 20 minutes or until chicken is cooked through', '6:  It should have an internal temperature of 165˚F (75˚C)']

ingredients: ['olive oil', '1 lb ground beef (455 g)', '1 small white onion diced', '1 tablespoon garlic minced', '2 tablespoons taco seasoning divided', '½ lb small macaroni (225 g) dry', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '2 cups beef stock (480 mL)', '2 cups shredded white cheddar (200 g) yellow cheddar works as well', '1 cup tomato (200 g) diced', 'green onion diced for garnish']
instructions: ['1: In a 4-quart chicken fryer, heat approximately 1 1 2 tablespoon olive oil over medium-high heat and cook the onions until they begin to soften', '2: Add garlic and stir for 30 seconds', '3: Add the 1 lb ground 1 lb ground 2 cups beef and 1 1 2 tablespoon of 2 tablespoons taco seasoning', '4:  Using your spatula, break up the 1 lb ground 1 lb ground 2 cups beef and stir until cooked', '5:  Drain the excess liquid from the pan', '6: Add 1 cup water, 1 lb ground 2 cups beef stock, pasta, tomatoes, and 1 1 2 tablespoon of 2 tablespoons taco seasoning back to the pan', '7:  Stir to combine', '8: Cook over low heat for 15 minutes, stirring twice to keep the pasta from sticking to the bottom of the pan', '9: Increase heat to medium after 15 minutes, and stir pasta until most of the liquid is gone', '10: Turn off heat and add the 2 cups shredded cheese', '11:  Stir until cheese is completely melted', '12: Top with green onions']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 chicken breast diced', '1 cup cherry tomatoes (200 g) halved', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon dried basil', 'Zucchini “Linguini”', '2 zucchinis peeled', '1 teaspoon salt', 'Creamy Sauce', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 cloves garlic minced', '¼ cup chicken broth (60 mL)', '½ cup greek yogurt (140 g)', '½ cup parmesan cheese (55 g) grated', '½ teaspoon dried basil']
instructions: ['1: Use a peeler to thinly slice zucchini into “linguini” noodles', '2:  Set aside in a bowl and mix with salt', '3:  Let sit for 20 minutes to draw moisture out of the noodles', '4:  Drain the zucchini with a clean dish cloth or paper towels', '5: Heat olive oil in a large skillet', '6:  Add in chicken breast, salt, ½ teaspoon pepper, and ½ teaspoon 2 2 cloves garlic powder', '7:  Cook until no longer pink', '8:  Add in zucchini noodles, 1 cup cherry tomatoes, and dried basil', '9:  Cook for an additional minute and remove from heat', '10:  Set aside in a bowl', '11: Heat olive oil for for the creamy sauce in the skillet', '12:  Add in ½ teaspoon 2 2 cloves garlic 2 cloves and cook for about 30 seconds', '13:  Add in chicken broth to cool skillet, and reduce heat to low', '14:  (This step is important: if skillet is too hot, the Greek yogurt will curdle, so allow it to cool down before adding it in)', '15: Add in Greek yogurt, ½ cup parmesan, and dried basil', '16:  Mix until well combined', '17:  Add in the chicken, zoodles, and tomato mixture', '18:  Mix together and then remove from heat', '19: Serve and garnish with fresh chopped basil, as desired']

ingredients: ['1 head cauliflower', 'salt to taste', '2 tablespoons butter', '¼ cup whole milk (60 mL)', 'pepper to taste', '1 cup white cheddar cheese (100 g) plus more for garnish', 'fresh chive chopped']
instructions: ['1: Chop the 1 head of cauliflower into florets', '2: Bring a medium pot of water to boil over medium-high heat', '3:  Add a pinch of salt and the cauliflower and boil for 15 minutes, or until the cauliflower is soft', '4: Drain the cauliflower, then return to the pot', '5: Add the 2 tablespoons butter, salt, and ¼ cup whole milk to the cauliflower', '6: Mash the ingredients together until most of the ¼ cup whole milk is absorbed and the texture is creamy', '7: Add pepper and the 1 cup white cheddar cheese and stir to combine', '8: Add the chives and mix', '9: Garnish with chives and more 1 cup white cheddar cheese']

ingredients: ['1 large spaghetti squash', '2 boneless skinless chicken breasts cut into strips ', '2 eggs beaten', 'flour', 'italian bread crumb', 'marinara sauce', 'shredded mozzarella cheese', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'italian seasoning to taste', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'oil for frying']
instructions: ['1: With a sharp knife, slice the 1 large spaghetti squash in half', '2:  (If the 1 large spaghetti squash is too tough - puncture in several places forming a dotted line around the 1 large spaghetti squash', '3:  Microwave for 3-5 minutes to soften', '4:  Allow to cool before cutting in half - following the dotted line)', '5: Scoop out the seeds - brush with oil, salt, and pepper', '6: Roast face down in a preheated oven at 375˚F (190˚C) for 35-40 minutes (until a fork can easily pierce the skin)', '7: Meanwhile - Slice the 2 boneless skinless chicken breasts into strips', '8:  Season with salt and pepper', '9: Place flour, 2 eggs beaten egg, and breadcrumbs into three separate bowls', '10: Coat each strip with flour, then egg, and then roll in bread crumbs', '11: Pour oil in a cast-iron skillet to come ¼ inch up the side', '12:  Heat the oil over medium-high heat', '13: Fry the 2 boneless skinless chicken strips (in batches if necessary) until golden brown on all sides and cooked through', '14:  Transfer to paper towels and remove pan from heat', '15: Once the 1 large spaghetti squash has finished roasting - remove from the oven and let it set for a few minutes before turing over and pulling at it with a fork', '16: Shred the inside of each 1 large spaghetti squash, being careful not to poke through the skin', '17: Pour marinara sauce over shredded 1 large spaghetti squash', '18:  Top with 2 boneless skinless chicken strips, then more marinara, and finish with mozzarella and grated parmesan cheese, and a pinch of Italian seasoning', '19: Return to the oven to bake for 10-15 minutes until the cheese has melted']

ingredients: ['1 cup dry oat (100 g)', '¼ cup almond butter (60 g)', '¼ cup honey (85 g)', '1 banana', '½ cup chocolate chips (85 g)']
instructions: ['1: Mix oats, ¼ cup almond butter and ¼ cup honey in a large bowl', '2: Mash the 1 banana, then add it into the bowl of oats', '3: Add ½ cup chocolate chips', '4:  Mix', '5: Place bowl in the refrigerator for 60-90 minutes, or until the mixture has solidified', '6: Mold mixture into bite-sized balls', '7: Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 small onion diced', '1 red bell pepper seeded and diced', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 cup arborio rice (200 g)', '½ cup dry white wine (120 mL)', '2 ½ cups low sodium chicken broth (600 mL) boiling', '1 tablespoon chipotle powder', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '1 tablespoon onion powder', '1 tablespoon coriander powder', '2 teaspoons paprika', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon oregano', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '½ cup corn kernel (90 g)', '1 cup shredded cheese blend (100 g)', '2 avocados', '170 g sour cream (170 g) or plain Greek yogurt', '½ cup fresh cilantro (20 g)', '1 lime juice of', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '1 cup flour (125 g)', '1 cup bread crumbs (115 g)', '3 eggs', 'oil for frying', 'fresh cilantro for serving', 'queso fresco for serving']
instructions: ['1: In a pot, heat 1 tablespoon olive 1 tablespoon olive oil over medium heat', '2:  Add 1 small 1 tablespoon onions and peppers, and cook until translucent', '3: Add garlic and rice, and cook until fragrant', '4: Add white wine, stirring frequently', '5: Slowly add hot 2 ½ cups low sodium chicken broth ½ cup at a time, stirring frequently for about 20 minutes, or until rice is al dente', '6: In a 1 small bowl, combine 1 tablespoon chipotle powder, garlic powder, 1 small 1 tablespoon onion powder, 1 tablespoon coriander, smoked 2 teaspoons paprika, pepper, 1 teaspoon cumin, 1 teaspoon oregano, salt, and pepper', '7: Add half of spice mixture to rice', '8: Remove rice from heat', '9:  Mix in corn and cheese blend', '10: Cool until room temperature, then chill in the fridge for at least 30 minutes', '11: While mixture is chilling, place 2 avocados, Greek 170 g sour cream (170 g) or plain Greek yogurt, ½ cup fresh fresh cilantro, 1 lime juice, garlic powder, salt, and pepper in a food processor and blend until smooth', '12: Place flour, 3 eggs and bread crumbs in three separate bowls', '13:  Lightly beat 3 eggs and add remaining spice mixture to bread crumbs', '14: Drop a heaping spoonful of mixture into the flour', '15:  Coat with flour and shape it to about the size of a golf ball', '16:  Coat with egg, then dip in bread crumbs', '17: In a skillet, heat 1 tablespoon olive oil to 350°F (180˚C)', '18: Add well-coated rice balls to hot skillet', '19: Fry for about 2 minutes on each side or until golden brown', '20: Place fried rice balls on a plate lined with a paper towel to drain', '21: Serve warm with avocado dipping sauce', '22: Top with ½ cup fresh fresh cilantro and queso fresco, if desired']

ingredients: ['2 lb bone-in short ribs (900 g)', '1 lb baby potato (455 g)', '1 pinch salt', '1 onion cut in half', '4 cloves garlic large', '1 lb baby carrots (455 g)', '1 lb green beans (455 g)', 'Spice Mix', '1 cup BBQ sauce (285 g)', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon salt']
instructions: ['1: In a bowl, mix BBQ 1 cup BBQ sauce, 1 tablespoon brown sugar, cayenne pepper, cumin, oregano, and ½ teaspoon of salt until well combined', '2: Place bone-in 2 lb bone-in short ribs in the bottom of a 6-quart (6 liters) slow cooker', '3: Add the spice mix over the meat', '4: Throw in the baby potatoes and add a 1 pinch of salt, then add 1 onion, 4 cloves garlic, and baby carrots', '5: Cover and cook on low heat for 7-8 hours, or high for 3-4 hours', '6: Add 1 lb green beans during the last 30 minutes of cooking time']

ingredients: ['Brine', '4 cups water (960 mL)', '2 dried bay leaves', '4 cloves garlic crushed', '1 tablespoon black peppercorn', '⅓ cup sea salt (80 g)', '4 cups ice (560 g)', 'Pork Chops', '2 bone-in pork chops about 1-inch (2 -cm) thick', 'sea salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon high-heat cooking oil of choice such as vegetable or peanut', '2 shallots diced', '3 cups turnip (450 g) diced', '1 tablespoon dijon mustard', '1 tablespoon fresh sage chopped', '2 cups apple cider (480 mL)', '1 cup reduced sodium chicken stock (240 mL)', '1 bunch collard green stemmed and toughly chopped']
instructions: ['1: Make the brine: Combine the 4 cups water, 2 dried bay leaves, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tablespoon black peppercorns, and ⅓ cup sea sea salt in a medium pot over medium heat and stir until the ⅓ cup sea sea salt is dissolved', '2: Remove the brine from heat and stir in the 4 cups ice cubes', '3: Once the brine is cooled, add the 2 bone-in pork chops to a glass dish and pour the brine over', '4:  Chill in the refrigerator for 1-10 hours', '5: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '6: Remove the 2 bone-in pork chops from the brine and pat dry', '7:  Season generously with ⅓ cup sea sea salt and 1 tablespoon black pepper on both sides', '8: Heat the 1 tablespoon high-heat cooking oil in a large cast iron or other ovenproof skillet over medium-high heat until nearly smoking', '9:  Add the 2 bone-in pork chops and sear without disturbing until caramelized and browned on the first side, about 2 minutes, then flip and sear on the other side', '10:  Remove the 2 bone-in pork chops from the pan and set aside', '11: Add the 2 shallots to the pan and cook until they begin to soften and caramelize, stirring occasionally, about 2 minutes', '12: Add the turnips and season with ⅓ cup sea sea salt, then spread in an even layer and let caramelize, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes', '13: Stir in the 1 tablespoon dijon mustard and 1 tablespoon fresh sage', '14:  Cook for 1 minute more', '15: Pour in the 2 cups apple cider and chicken stock', '16:  Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low-medium and simmer until the liquid is reduced by half, about 7 minutes', '17: Add the 1 bunch collard greens and stir to incorporate', '18:  Nestle the 2 bone-in pork chops into the sauce, making sure that they are partly submerged', '19: Transfer the pan to the oven and cook for about 12 minutes, until the internal temperature of the 2 bone-in pork chops reaches 135˚F (57˚C)', '20: Remove from the oven and let rest for 10 minutes as the internal temperature continues to climb to 145˚F (63˚C)', '21: Divide the 2 bone-in pork chops, vegetables, and sauce between plates and serve', '22: Nutrition, Pork Chops without braising liquid: Calories: 470, Total fat: 27 grams, Sodium: 790 grams, Total carbs: 48 grams, Dietary fiber: 7 grams, Sugars: 6 grams, Protein: 48 grams\n\nBraising Liquid, ¼ cup (60 ml) serving - Calories: 20, Total fat: 0, Sodium: 48 grams, Total carbs: 5 grams, Dietary fiber: 0 grams, Sugars: 4 grams, Protein: 0 grams']

ingredients: ['8 oz dried spathetti (225 g)', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '½ large yellow onion minced', '2 medium carrots sliced', '1 stalk celery sliced', '4 cups white mushroom (300 g) sliced', '1 teaspoon salt plus more to taste', '1 teaspoon pepper plus more to taste', '½ cup red wine (120 mL)', '3 cloves garlic minced', '28 oz diced organic tomato (795 g) 1 can', '¼ cup tomato paste (55 g)', '2 cups vegetable broth (480 mL)', '1 cup dried brown lentil (200 g)', '½ teaspoon dried basil', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon dried rosemary', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '¼ cup fresh parsley (10 g) chopped for garnish']
instructions: ['1: In a ½ large pot, cook the pasta according to the package instructions', '2:  Drain and set aside', '3: Heat the 2 tablespoons olive oil in the same pot over 2 medium heat', '4:  Add the onion and sauté until translucent, about 2 minutes', '5: Stir in the carrots, 1 stalk celery, mushrooms, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1 teaspoon pepper', '6:  Sauté until mushrooms have cooked down and are turning golden, about 5 minutes', '7: Add the ½ cup red wine and simmer until most of the liquid is absorbed, about 4 minutes', '8: Add the 3 cloves garlic and stir to combine, then add the 28 oz diced 28 oz diced organic ¼ cup tomatoes, 28 oz diced organic ¼ cup tomato paste, 2 cups vegetable broth, lentils, ½ teaspoon dried basil, ½ teaspoon dried oregano, ½ teaspoon dried rosemary, and ½ teaspoon baking soda', '9:  Stir to combine', '10: Bring to a boil, then cover, reduce the heat to low, and simmer for 40 minutes, until the bolognese is thickened', '11: Serve the bolognese over the pasta, or, for a lighter option, use zucchini noodles or spaghetti squash', '12: Garnish with ¼ cup fresh parsley']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon oil', '3 cloves garlic minced', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 onion diced', '1 red bell pepper diced', '1 potato cubed', '1 ear corn kernels removed', '6 cups vegetable broth (1 ½ L)', '2 cups water (480 mL)', '1 tablespoon dried thyme', '2 tablespoons paprika', '1 bay leaf', '1 cup milk (240 mL) milk alternative']
instructions: ['1: Combine 1 tablespoon oil, 3 cloves garlic, and 1 onion, salt, and 1 1 red bell pepper in a large pot over medium heat for 3 minutes', '2: Add 1 red 1 1 red bell pepper, 1 potato, and 1 ear corn', '3:  Stir for another 2 or 3 minutes', '4: Add 6 cups vegetable broth, 2 cups water, 1 tablespoon dried thyme, 2 tablespoons paprika, and 1 bay leaf', '5:  Stir', '6: Bring to a boil, place the lid on the pot, and simmer for 10 minutes', '7: Add 1 cup milk or 1 cup milk alternative, and stir', '8:  Remove 1 bay leaf', '9: Allow to cool a little before serving']

ingredients: ['Veggies', '1 lb brussels sprouts (455 g) ends trimmed halved', '5 carrots sliced', 'olive oil', 'sea salt to taste', 'black pepper to taste', 'Pork', '1 lb pork tenderloin (455 g)', 'sea salt to taste', 'black pepper to taste', '2 sprigs fresh rosemary', 'Sauce', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '3 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '¼ cup maple syrup (55 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '2: Place Brussels sprouts and baby 5 carrots separately on a foil-lined baking sheet with room in the center for the 1 lb pork', '3: Drizzle with olive oil', '4:  Sprinkle with sea salt and pepper', '5:  Mix to combine', '6: Place 1 lb pork in center of baking sheet', '7:  Sprinkle with sea salt and pepper', '8:  Rub to combine and add the rosemary 2 sprigs on top of the 1 lb pork', '9: Bake in oven for 40 minutes, or until internal temperature of the 1 lb pork reaches 145˚F (63˚C)', '10: Let 1 lb pork rest 5-10 minutes', '11: While 1 lb pork is resting, mix olive oil, 3 tablespoons balsamic vinegar, and ¼ cup maple syrup in a small saucepan', '12: Cook on medium heat until sauce thickens and reduces by ⅓, about 3-4 minutes', '13: Immediately spoon reduced sauce on the 1 lb pork']

ingredients: ['1 cup quinoa (170 g) rinsed', '1 ½ cups water (360 mL) or vegetable broth', '1 ¼ cups salsa (325 g)', '1 tablespoon cumin', '15 oz black beans (425 g) 1 can drained and rinsed', '1 cup frozen corn (175 g) defrosted', 'salt to taste', 'olive oil to taste', '1 avocado mashed', '1 clove garlic minced', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '3 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '4 tablespoons water', 'tortilla to serve optional']
instructions: ['1: In a medium saucepan, combine quinoa and water, and bring to a boil over high heat', '2:  Reduce heat to low, cover with a lid, and simmer for 10 minutes', '3: Add in 1 ¼ cups salsa and 1 tablespoon cumin, and cover for 5 more minutes or until quinoa is fluffy', '4: Add in 15 oz black beans, corn, salt, and olive oil, and stir until combined', '5: For the 1 avocado dressing, combine 1 avocado, 1 clove garlic, 2 teaspoons lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper in liquid measuring cup and whisk until smooth', '6: Whisk in water a little bit at a time until desired consistency is reached', '7:  6', '8:  For extra smooth consistency, process all ingredients in blender or food processor', '9: Portion out into 4 containers and refrigerate for up to 5 days']

ingredients: ['10 chicken wings or drumettes', '1 cup cornstarch (125 g)', 'oil for frying', 'sesame seed to serve', 'Batter', '½ cup cornstarch (65 g)', '½ cup flour (65 g)', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 cup water (240 mL)', 'Sauce', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '¼ cup honey (85 g)', '2 tablespoons rice vinegar', '2 tablespoons gochujang (Korean chili paste)', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 tablespoon ginger grated']
instructions: ['1: Mix the ingredients for the batter in a bowl until smooth with no lumps', '2: Heat oil in a pot to 340°F (170°C)', '3: Dip a 10 chicken wing into the cornstarch, shaking off excess, then dredge the wing into the batter, dripping off excess', '4: Fry half of the wings at a time for about 5-7 minutes, until light golden', '5:  The oil will drop to about 320°F (160°C)', '6: Drain the wings and increase the heat', '7:  Heat oil to about 375°F (190°C)', '8: Fry the wings a second time until golden brown and crispy', '9:  Drain and set aside', '10: In a pan, combine all the ingredients for the 2 tablespoons soy sauce and stir until bubbling', '11:  Toss in the wings', '12: Nutrition  Calories: 2805 Fat: 254 grams  Carbs: 131 grams Fiber: 1 grams  Sugars: 49 grams  Protein: 8 grams']

ingredients: ['2 chicken breasts', '2 cups buttermilk (480 mL)', '1 packet ranch dressing mix', '2 cups cheese cracker (125 g)', 'oil for frying']
instructions: ['1: Chop 2 chicken breasts into bite-size pieces', '2: In a large bowl, combine 2 chicken, 2 cups buttermilk, and ranch 1 packet', '3: Refrigerate for 2 hours', '4: In a large zipper storage bag, crumble the 2 cups cheese crackers into desired crumbs (to replace bread crumbs)', '5: Place cracker crumbs into a medium bowl and coat each piece of 2 chicken until fully covered', '6: Heat oil to 350°F (180°C) and fry 2 chicken until crackers turn golden brown (3 minutes)', '7: Place on a paper towel to dry', '8: Serve with a side of ranch or any sauce']

ingredients: ['12 large sea scallops', 'kosher salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '½ stick unsalted butter divided', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 shallots minced', '1 garlic clove minced', '¼ cup caper (30 g) drained and rinsed', '½ cup white wine (60 mL) such as Sauvignon Blanc']
instructions: ['1: Season the scallops on both sides with kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper', '2: In a 12 large skillet, melt together 1 1 tablespoon ½ stick unsalted butter and the olive oil over high heat', '3:  When the ½ stick unsalted butter has melted, add the scallops to the pan and sear, flipping once halfway through, until golden brown on both sides and nearly opaque all the way through, 3–4 minutes total', '4:  Divide the scallops between 2 plates and return the skillet to medium-high heat', '5: Melt 2 1 tablespoons ½ stick unsalted butter in the skillet', '6:  Add the 2 shallots and 1 garlic', '7:  Cook, stirring, until softened and lightly browned, about 2 minutes', '8: Stir in the capers and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute', '9:  Pour in the ½ cup white wine and cook, stirring, until slightly reduced, about 3 minutes', '10: Remove the skillet from the heat and add the remaining 1 tablespoon of ½ stick unsalted butter, swirling the pan until it melts into the sauce', '11:  Season the sauce with kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, then spoon it over the scallops', '12:  Serve hot']

ingredients: ['Bao Dough', '1 ¼ cups all purpose flour (155 g) plus more for dusting', '1 teaspoon sugar', '1 teaspoon instant yeast', '1 teaspoon vegetable oil', '½ cup warm water (120 mL)', 'Char Siu Filling', '½ medium yellow onion', '1 cup char siu (160 g) (Chinese barbecue pork)', '¼ cup char siu sauce (55 g)', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon oyster sauce', '1 tablespoon sugar', '2 tablespoons water']
instructions: ['1: Make the bao dough: In a ½ medium bowl, combine the 1 ¼ cups all purpose flour, sugar, 1 teaspoon instant yeast, 1 teaspoon vegetable oil and ⅓ cup warm water and stir to combine', '2:  Slowly add the remaining 2 tablespoons of water, mixing constantly', '3:  Knead the dough in the bowl until smooth and well combined', '4:  Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and let the dough rise for about 1 hour, until doubled in size', '5: Make the char siu filling: Dice the onion and chop the char sui into ½-inch pieces', '6: In a ½ medium bowl, stir together the char siu sauce, soy sauce, 1 tablespoon oyster sauce, and sugar', '7: In a ½ medium nonstick pan, sauté the onion over ½ medium-low heat until translucent, 1 minute', '8:  Add the chopped char siu, sauce, and water', '9:  Stir to combine, then simmer until the sauce thickens, 2 minutes', '10:  Transfer the filling to a ½ medium bowl and chill in the refrigerator for about 1 hour, until cool', '11: After rising, punch the dough down and knead until it is back to its original size', '12:  On a lightly 1 ¼ cups all purpose floured surface, divide the dough into 5 48-gram balls', '13:  Flatten and roll out each portion, making sure the middle is thick while the sides are thin', '14:  Hold a dough round in the palm of your hand and add 36 grams of the char siu filling to the center', '15:  Use your other hand to pinch the edges of the dough together up and over the filling while rotating the bao in your hand', '16: Place each bao on a small square of parchment paper', '17:  Set in a steamer basket, cover, and let rise for about 15 minutes, until slightly puffed, before steaming', '18: Fill the bottom of a steamer or double boiler with water and bring to a boil', '19:  Add the steamer basket with the bao, cover, and steam for 15 minutes, then turn off the flame and let rest in the steamer for 5 minutes before serving']

ingredients: ['1 cup pitted date (170 g)', '¾ cup rolled oats (60 g)', '½ cup almond (70 g)', '1 pinch salt', '1 tablespoon water', '1 ½ cups cashews (195 g)', '15 oz coconut cream (445 mL) 1 can chilled', '¼ cup coconut oil (60 g)', '½ cup maple syrup (170 g) plus 2 tablespoons divided', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 cup pumpkin puree (225 g)', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '¼ teaspoon allspice', '¼ teaspoon ginger']
instructions: ['1: Line an 8-inch (20 cm) square baking dish with parchment paper', '2: Add the dates, ¾ cup rolled oats, almonds, and 1 pinch salt to a food processor and pulse until crumbly', '3:  Add the 1 tablespoon water and pulse again until the mixture is sticky enough to hold together', '4: Transfer the crust to the prepared baking dish and spread in an even layer', '5:  Freeze while you prepare the rest of the recipe', '6: Bring a medium pot of 1 tablespoon water to boil', '7:  Add the 1 ½ cups cashews and boil for 10 minutes', '8:  Remove with a slotted spoon and transfer to a food processor', '9: Process until smooth', '10: In a medium bowl, spoon out the coconut cream from the top of the can of coconut milk (making sure to take only the cream and not the liquid)', '11:  Beat with an electric hand mixer until soft peaks form', '12:  Add the coconut oil, ½ cup maple syrup, and the 1 teaspoon vanilla and beat until well combined', '13: Add the cashew paste and stir with a spatula until well combined, using a whisk if necessary to smooth out any stubborn lumps', '14:  Set aside', '15: In a separate, medium bowl, combine the 1 cup pumpkin puree, remaining 2 tablespoons of ½ cup maple syrup, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, ¼ teaspoon allspice, and ¼ teaspoon ginger and mix until well combined', '16: Remove the crust from the freezer and pour in the cashew mixture', '17:  Smooth evenly', '18: Add small dollops of the 1 cup pumpkin mixture on top of the cashew mixture', '19:  Using a wooden skewer, swirl the 1 cup pumpkin mixture into the cashew mixture', '20: Freeze for at least 2 hours, or overnight', '21: Remove from freezer and slice into 9 even bars']

ingredients: ['2 large avocados pitted peeled and diced', '1 medium roma tomato seeded and diced', '½ red onion minced', '½ jalapeño seeded and minced', '1 lime juiced', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'fresh cilantro chopped optional', 'tortilla chip for serving']
instructions: ['1: In a 1 medium bowl, combine the avocado, tomato, ½ red onion, ½ jalapeño, 1 lime juice, salt, and pepper', '2:  Mix together until fully incorporated', '3:  Top with fresh cilantro, if using', '4: Serve with tortilla chips']

ingredients: ['Stuffing', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 cups butternut squash (410 g) diced', '1 teaspoon salt', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 lb ground turkey (455 g)', '2 teaspoons italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '2 cups spinach (80 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '15 oz ricotta cheese (425 g)', '1 egg', '¼ cup parmesan cheese (25 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'Sauce', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons flour', '1 cup milk (240 mL)', '1 pinch salt', '1 pinch pepper']
instructions: ['1: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large pan', '2: Add the 2 cups 2 cups 2 tablespoons butternut squash and salt, and sauté for a few minutes', '3: Then add 3 cloves garlic, 1 lb ground turkey, Italian seasoning, pepper flakes, and 1 teaspoon black pepper, and stir until meat is fully cooked', '4: Add in 2 cups spinach and salt until the 2 cups spinach is wilted', '5: In a large bowl, add 15 oz ricotta, 1 egg, cheese, and a pinch of salt and pepper', '6:  Mix well', '7: Add the cooked squash mixture into the bowl', '8:  Mix until evenly blended', '9: Cook a box of jumbo shell pasta al dente', '10:  Set aside in a bowl covered in 1 tablespoon olive oil to prevent sticking', '11: Heat 2 cups 2 tablespoons butter in a medium pan', '12:  Once melted, add in 2 tablespoons flour', '13: Cook the 2 tablespoons flour until it turns light brown', '14: Add 1 cup milk to the pan and stir continuously until the sauce thickens', '15: Add a pinch of salt and pepper', '16: In a casserole dish, sheet the sauce on the bottom', '17: Stuff each jumbo shell pasta with the stuffing and place on top of the sauce', '18: Bake at 400°F (200°C) covered for 30 minutes', '19: Sprinkle ¼ cup parmesan cheese and bake again for 5 minutes until the cheese melts', '20: Garnish with parsley']

ingredients: ['Red Velvet Cake', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', '2 ¾ cups cake flour (345 g)', '2 tablespoons cocoa powder', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '2 teaspoons baking soda', '1 cup buttermilk (240 mL) or 1 cup whole milk mixed with 1 tablespoon lemon juice or white vinegar', '½ cup vegetable oil (120 mL)', '1 tablespoon white vinegar', '2 ½ teaspoons red food coloring', '1 ½ sticks unsalted butter softened', '1 ¾ cups granulated sugar (350 g)', '3 large eggs', '1 tablespoon McCormick® vanilla extract', '¼ cup freshly brewed coffee (60 mL)', 'Cream Cheese Frosting', '1 stick unsalted butter softened', '12 oz cream cheese (340 g) softened', '1 tablespoon heavy cream', '¼ teaspoon kosher salt', '2 teaspoons McCormick® vanilla extract', '3 cups powdered sugar (330 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2:  Grease 2 8-inch 2 ¾ cups cake pans with nonstick spray and line with parchment paper', '3: In a medium bowl, sift together the 2 ¾ cups cake flour, 2 tablespoons cocoa powder, salt, and 2 teaspoons baking soda', '4:  Whisk to combine', '5: In a 3 large liquid measuring cup, whisk together the buttermilk, vegetable oil, 1 cup buttermilk (240 mL) or 1 cup whole milk mixed with 1 tablespoon lemon juice or white 1 tablespoon white vinegar, and 2 ½ teaspoons red food coloring', '6: In a 3 large bowl, 12 oz 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon heavy cream the butter and 1 ¾ cups granulated sugar together with an electric hand mixer on high speed until light, fluffy, and homogenous, about 2 minutes', '7:  Add the eggs, 1 at a time, and beat on medium speed until incorporated', '8:  Add the vanilla and beat to incorporate', '9: Add ½ of the buttermilk mixture to the 12 oz 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon heavy creamed butter and sugar', '10:  Beat on medium speed until well combined, 1–2 minutes', '11:  Add ½ of the dry ingredients and beat until well-combined, 1–2 minutes', '12:  Repeat with the remaining buttermilk and dry ingredients', '13:  With the mixer running, slowly pour in the coffee and beat until just combined', '14: Divide the batter evenly between the prepared 2 ¾ cups cake pans and smooth the tops', '15:  Bake for 40–45 minutes, until a 2 ¾ cups cake tester or toothpick inserted into the center of the 2 ¾ cups cakes comes out clean', '16:  Let cool for 5 minutes before flipping the 2 ¾ cups cakes out onto a wire rack, then let cool completelyWhile the 2 ¾ cups cakes are cooling, make the 12 oz 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon heavy cream cheese frosting: In a 3 large bowl, beat together the butter and 12 oz 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon heavy cream cheese with an electric hand mixer on high speed until well combined and fluffy, 3–5 minutes', '17:  Add the 1 tablespoon heavy 12 oz 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon heavy cream, salt, and vanilla and mix to combine', '18:  Add the 3 cups powdered sugar, 1 cup at a time, and beat until the frosting is fluffy and smooth', '19: Once 2 ¾ cups cakes have cooled, trim off the domed tops, reserving the scraps', '20:  Cut each 2 ¾ cups cake in half so you have 4 even layers', '21: Place 1 2 ¾ cups cake layer, cut-side up, on a 2 ¾ cups cake stand', '22:  Spread an even layer of frosting over the 2 ¾ cups cake', '23:  Place another 2 ¾ cups cake layer cut-side down on top of the first layer, spreading another even layer of frosting on top', '24:  Repeat with the remaining 2 layers', '25:  Spread a thin layer of frosting all over the sides and smooth out with an offset spatula or bench scraper', '26:  Refrigerate for 20-30 minutes, until the layer of frosting has hardened', '27: Frost the outside of the 2 ¾ cups cake with a thick layer of frosting', '28:  Crumble the reserved 2 ¾ cups cake scraps, then press into the frosting around the bottom of the 2 ¾ cups cake', '29: Slice and serve', '30: Enjoy!RECIPE BY: Amanda Berrill']

ingredients: ['nonstick cooking spray for greasing', '1 cup all purpose flour (125 g)', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '¼ teaspoon salt', '6 tablespoons unsalted butter melted', '1 cup brown sugar (220 g)', '1 large egg', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1 ½ cups fresh blueberry (150 g) divided']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2:  Grease a 8-inch (20 cm) square ½ teaspoon baking dish with nonstick spray and line with parchment paper', '3:  Let the parchment hang over 2 sides of the pan for easy removal', '4: In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, ½ teaspoon baking powder, and ¼ teaspoon salt', '5: In a 1 large bowl, whisk together the 6 tablespoons unsalted butter and brown sugar until smooth', '6:  Add the egg and 2 teaspoons vanilla and whisk to combine', '7:  Stir in the dry ingredients until just combined, then fold in 1 cup of blueberries', '8: Transfer the batter to the prepared pan and smooth the top', '9:  Gently press the remaining ½ cup (50 g) blueberries into the top of the batter', '10: Bake for 30-40 minutes, until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean', '11:  Let the blondies cool for 15-20 minutes before removing from the pan and slicing']

ingredients: ['Crust', '¾ cup all purpose flour (95 g) plus more for dusting', '¾ cup whole wheat flour (95 g)', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '6 tablespoons unsalted butter cubed and chilled', '3 tablespoons cold water', 'Filling', '3 tablespoons olive oil divided', '6 cloves garlic peeled and stems removed', '1 large yellow onion thinly sliced', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt divided', '2 medium red potatoes thinly sliced', '⅓ cup water (80 mL)', '¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '2 rainbow swiss chards stem and leaves separated thinly sliced', '8 oz goat cheese (225 g) room temperature', '1 large egg beaten']
instructions: ['1: Make the crust: In a large bowl, mix together the all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, and ½ teaspoon kosher 1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '2:  Add the butter and, using a pastry cutter, work it into the flour until only pea-sized pieces remain', '3:  Add the water, starting with 3 tablespoons, and mix the dough with your fingers until it is moist enough to hold together', '4:  Add more water as needed, 1 tablespoon at a time', '5:  Turn the dough onto a clean surface, form into a disc, and wrap with plastic wrap', '6:  Refrigerate for 30-60 minutes', '7: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '8:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '9: While the dough is resting, make the filling: Add 2 tablespoons of olive oil and the garlic 6 cloves to a large, high-walled skillet over 2 medium heat', '10:  Cook for 3 minutes, until the garlic just begins to brown', '11:  Add the onion and ½ teaspoon of ½ teaspoon kosher 1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '12:  Cook for 20-25 minutes, until the onion is caramelized', '13:  Remove from the pan and set aside to cool in a bowl', '14:  To the same pan, add the potatoes, ½ teaspoon of ½ teaspoon kosher 1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt, and the water', '15:  Increase the heat to 2 medium-high, cover, and cook for 3-5 minutes, until the potatoes are almost fully cooked and the water is nearly evaporated', '16:  Remove the lid and cook for 2 minutes more to completely evaporate the water', '17:  Remove potatoes from the pan and set aside to cool', '18: To the same pan, add the remaining tablespoon of olive oil, the red pepper flakes, and chard stems', '19:  Reduce the heat to 2 medium and cook for 3 minutes, until the stems are softened', '20:  Add the chard leaves and remaining ½ teaspoon of ½ teaspoon kosher 1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt and cook for 5 minutes, until wilted and reduced in volume by half', '21:  Remove the pan from the heat', '22: Remove the garlic 6 cloves from the caramelized onions and transfer to a small bowl', '23:  Mash with the back of a fork, then add to the softened 8 oz goat cheese and stir to combine', '24: Stir the onions into the pan with the sautéed chard', '25: Assemble the crostata: Roll the dough out on a lightly floured surface into a 12-inch (30 cm) wide circle, about ⅛ inch (3 mm) thick', '26:  Transfer the dough to the prepared baking sheet', '27: Spread ½ cup (110 G) of the garlic 8 oz goat cheese over the center of the dough, leaving a 2-inch (50 cm) border around the edges', '28:  Arrange half of the potatoes, slightly overlapping, over the 8 oz goat cheese, then top with half of the Swiss chard and onion mixture', '29:  Repeat with remaining potatoes and chard mixture', '30: Fold the edges of the crust up and over the filling to create a rustic look', '31:  Brush the crust with the beaten egg', '32:  Top with dollops of the remaining 8 oz goat cheese', '33: Bake the crostata for 45-50 minutes, until the crust is golden brown', '34: Let cool for 10 minutes before slicing and serving']

ingredients: ['1 lb sirloin steak (455 g) about ½ inch (1cm) thick', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons oil', '2 hearts romaine lettuce chopped', '3 hard-boiled eggs diced', '2 avocados diced', '2 cups cherry tomato (400 g) halved', '3 tablespoons caesar dressing']
instructions: ['1: Salt and pepper the 1 lb sirloin steak on both sides, being sure to rub in the seasoning', '2: Heat the 2 tablespoons oil in a pan over high heat until slightly smoking', '3: Sear the 1 lb sirloin steak for about 2 minutes per side', '4: Rest the 1 lb sirloin steak on a cutting board for 10 minutes', '5: Slice the 1 lb sirloin steak', '6: In a large bowl, combine the 2 hearts romaine lettuce, 3 hard-boiled eggs, 2 avocados, 2 cups cherry tomatoes, 1 lb sirloin steak, and 3 tablespoons caesar dressing', '7: Toss the salad until evenly coated and serve']

ingredients: ['5 russet potatoes', '2 tablespoons avocado oil', 'salt to taste']
instructions: ['1: Peel 5 russet potatoes and cut them into sticks (french fry shape)', '2:  Place in a bowl', '3: Pour 2 tablespoons avocado oil into the same bowl and mix until 5 russet potatoes are coated in oil', '4: Sprinkle salt to taste into the same bowl and mix well', '5: Spray a baking sheet with cooking spray and cook in the oven for 10 minutes at 350°F or until golden brown', '6: Serve']

ingredients: ['4 tablespoons olive oil divided', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 tablespoon fresh thyme finely chopped', '1 tablespoon fresh rosemary finely chopped', '1 tablespoon fresh sage finely chopped', '4 boneless skinless chicken thighs', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 sweet potato cubed', '1 lb brussels sprouts (455 g) trimmed and halved', '½ red onion chopped', '4 slices bacon chopped', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: In a plastic zip-top bag add 2 4 tablespoons of olive oil, 3 cloves garlic, 1 tablespoon fresh thyme, 1 tablespoon fresh rosemary, and 1 tablespoon fresh sage', '3: Place the 4 boneless skinless chicken thighs on top and season with salt and pepper', '4: Close the bag and massage to coat the 4 boneless skinless chicken evenly', '5:  Refrigerate', '6: On a sheet pan, place the chopped 1 sweet potato, Brussels sprouts and ½ red onion', '7: Drizzle with 2 4 tablespoons of olive oil and season with salt and pepper', '8:  Toss to coat', '9: Place the 4 boneless skinless chicken thighs on top of the vegetables and sprinkle with chopped 4 slices bacon', '10: Bake for 30 minutes, or until the internal temperature of the 4 boneless skinless chicken reaches 165°F (75°C)']

ingredients: ['1 orange', '½ napa cabbage thinly sliced', '¼ red cabbage thinly sliced', '3 carrots peeled and coarsely grated', '3 green onions white and green parts thinly sliced', '3 tablespoons oil', '2 tablespoons rice vinegar', 'salt to taste', 'black pepper to taste', '4 salmon fillets', '2 tablespoons sesame seed divided plus more for garnish', '1 lemon sliced optional']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C)', '2: Using a sharp knife, cut off the top and bottom of the 1 orange, then cut away the peel from the sides', '3: Slice alongside the membrane of the 1 orange to remove each segment until the 1 orange is fully supremed', '4: In a large bowl, mix the 1 orange supremes, ½ napa cabbage, ¼ red cabbage, 3 carrots, 3 green onions, 3 tablespoons oil, 2 tablespoons rice vinegar, 1 tablespoon of the 2 tablespoons sesame seeds, and season with salt and black pepper', '5:  Set aside', '6: Season the 4 salmon fillets on both sides with salt, black pepper, and the remaining 1 tablespoon of 2 tablespoons sesame seeds', '7: Transfer the fillets to a greased rimmed baking sheet', '8: Bake for 8-12 minutes, until the 4 salmon has just started to form a golden crust', '9: Plate the 4 salmon and slaw on a plate with a few 1 lemon wedges, if desired', '10:   Sprinkle over a pinch of 2 tablespoons sesame seeds and serve']

ingredients: ['½ pomegranate', '½ lemon', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '1 bottle champagne to taste', 'Preparation', '½ pomegranate', '½ lemon', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '1 bottle champagne to taste', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Cut the pomegranate in half, and hit it over a bowl with a wooden spoon to release the seeds', '2: Squeeze half a lemon over the pomegranate seeds', '3: Pour a half cup of water over the seeds and lemon juice, and spoon the mixture into ice tray of choice', '4: Freeze the cubes for an hour or until solid', '5: In a glass, put one cube and then top with champagne', '6: Watch the drink transform while the ice cube melts']

ingredients: ['6 cups low-sodium chicken stock or vegetable stock', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 shallot finely chopped', '1 lb shiitake mushroom (455 g) stemmed and thinly sliced', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon fresh thyme finely chopped', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 ½ cups arborio rice (200 g)', '½ cup white wine (120 mL)', '1 cup grated parmesan cheese (110 g) plus more for serving', '¼ cup fresh parsley (10 g) for serving', 'Preparation', '6 cups low-sodium chicken stock or vegetable stock', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 shallot finely chopped', '1 lb shiitake mushroom (455 g) stemmed and thinly sliced', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon fresh thyme finely chopped', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 ½ cups arborio rice (200 g)', '½ cup white wine (120 mL)', '1 cup grated parmesan cheese (110 g) plus more for serving', '¼ cup fresh parsley (10 g) for serving', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Add the stock to a medium pot and bring to a boil over high heat', '2:  Once the stock is boiling, reduce the heat to low or remove the pan from the heat and keep nearby', '3: Heat the olive oil in a wide, tall pot over medium heat', '4:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the shallot and cook, stirring frequently, until translucent', '5: Add the shiitake mushrooms and butter', '6:  Cook, stirring occasionally, until the mushrooms have cooked down', '7: Add the garlic, thyme, salt, and pepper, stir, and cook for 1 minute, until the butter has melted and the garlic is aromatic', '8: Add the rice and stir until fully coated in the mushroom mixture', '9:  Let the rice toast for 1-2 minutes, until fragrant', '10: Add the white wine and cook until the wine has evaporated, stirring occasionally', '11: Add 1 cup (240 ml) of the hot stock and stir to combine', '12:  Cook, stirring frequently, until the stock is fully absorbed', '13: Continue to add the stock, ½ cup (120 ml) at a time, stirring continuously, until the broth is fully absorbed, for 15-20 minutes', '14:  Depending on how fast the rice cooks, there may be leftover stock', '15: Once the rice is al dente, remove from the heat', '16:  Add the Parmesan and stir to combine', '17: Top with parsley, Parmesan, salt, and pepper']

ingredients: ['1 small ripe banana', '1 cup oat flour (125 g)', '1 cup plant-based milk (240 mL)', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '¼ teaspoon baking soda', '1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', 'topping of your choice', '1 tablespoon coconut oil for baking']
instructions: ['1: Add ingredients to a blender and blend it till smooth', '2: Heat up a pan and add 1 tablespoon coconut oil', '3: Make pancakes', '4: Serve warm, topped with desired toppings']

ingredients: ['2 ripe bananas', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '½ cup quick-cook oats (70 g)', '½ cup blueberry (50 g)']
instructions: ['1: Mash the 2 ripe bananas in a large bowl until smooth', '2:  Mix in the 2 eggs and 1 teaspoon vanilla until well combined, then mix in the ½ cup quick-cook oats', '3:  Carefully fold in the blueberries', '4: Heat a medium nonstick skillet over medium heat', '5:  Add a scoop of the pancake batter', '6:  Smooth out to form an even layer', '7:  Cook for 2–3 minutes until you start to see bubbles forming on the surface', '8:  Flip and cook until the other side is golden brown, 1–2 minutes more', '9: Garnish your pancakes with your favorite toppings! We like Greek yogurt, granola, fresh blueberries, and/or maple syrup']

ingredients: ['1 lb skin-on chicken thigh (455 g) cubed', '1 tablespoon sake', '1 teaspoon sugar', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon ginger grated', '1 clove garlic minced', '½ egg beaten', '⅓ cup potato starch (40 g)', 'cooking oil for frying']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, combine the 1 lb skin-on chicken, 1 tablespoon sake, 1 teaspoon sugar, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 tablespoon ginger, and 1 clove garlic', '2:  Mix well', '3:  Cover with plastic and marinate for at least 15 minutes in the fridge', '4: Add the ½ egg and ⅓ cup potato starch to the 1 lb skin-on chicken', '5:  Mix well', '6: Heat the cooking oil to 340˚F (170˚C)', '7:  Fry the 1 lb skin-on chicken until golden brown and fully cooked, 5-7 minutes']

ingredients: ['2 lb pork shoulder (910 g) or pork butt', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '¼ cup green onion (25 g)', '½ cup soy sauce divided', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil plus more for frying', '3 eggs beaten', '1 ½ cups cornstarch (190 g)', '1 white onion chopped', '1 red bell pepper', '1 green bell pepper', '8 oz chopped pineapple with syrup (225 g)', '¼ cup vinegar (60 mL)', '¼ cup sugar (50 g)', '¼ cup ketchup (55 g)', '4 ½ cups cooked white rice (900 g) for serving']
instructions: ['1: Cube the 2 lb pork and place in a medium bowl', '2: Add the 2 cloves garlic, 1 teaspoon black 1 red 1 red 1 1 green bell 1 1 green 1 1 green bell pepper, ¼ cup 1 green ¼ cup ¼ cup 1 green 1 white onions, and ¼ cup soy sauce', '3:  Toss to coat the 2 lb pork', '4:  Cover with plastic wrap and marinate in the refrigerator for 1-2 hours', '5: Heat about 2 inches of vegetable oil in a large pan over medium heat until it reaches 350˚F (180˚C)', '6: Add the 3 eggs and 1 ½ cups cornstarch to 2 separate small bowls', '7:  Coat the 2 lb pork in the egg, then in the 1 ½ cups cornstarch', '8:  fry until crispy and golden (about 2 minutes)', '9: Fry the 2 lb pork in the hot oil until golden brown', '10:  Drain on paper towels', '11: Heat the remaining 2 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil in a clean large pan over medium-high heat', '12:  Add the ¼ cup ¼ cup 1 green 1 white onion and 1 red 1 1 green bell 1 teaspoon black 1 red 1 red 1 1 green bell 1 1 green 1 1 green bell peppers and sauté until tender', '13: Once the vegetables are tender, add the 8 oz chopped pineapple and syrup', '14:  Stir for 30 seconds, then add the vinegar, remaining ¼ cup soy sauce, sugar, and ketchup', '15:  Stir constantly for 3-4 minutes, until the liquid evaporates and the sauce thickens', '16: Add the 2 lb pork to the pan and toss to coat evenly', '17: Serve the 2 lb pork over 4 ½ cups cooked white rice and garnish with ¼ cup 1 green ¼ cup ¼ cup 1 green 1 white onions, if desired']

ingredients: ['2 ½ cups warm water (600 mL)', '1 teaspoon sugar', '2 teaspoons active dry yeast', '7 cups all-purpose flour (875 g) plus more for dusting', '6 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil plus more for greasing', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '¼ cup semolina flour (30 g)', 'Optional Toppings', 'Tomato Sauce', '28 oz canned whole tomatoes (795 g)', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', 'Margherita', 'tomato sauce', 'fresh mozzarella cheese torn into small pieces', 'fresh basil leaf', 'Tasty’s Bianca', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'fresh mozzarella cheese torn into small pieces', 'ricotta cheese', 'fresh basil pesto', 'dried oregano', 'Pepperoni', 'tomato sauce', 'fresh mozzarella cheese torn into small pieces', 'spicy pepperoni slice', 'freshly grated parmesan cheese']
instructions: ['1: “Bloom” the 2 teaspoons active dry yeast by sprinkling the 1 teaspoon sugar and 2 teaspoons active dry yeast in the 2 ½ cups warm water', '2:  Let sit for 10 minutes, until bubbles form on the surface', '3: In a large bowl, combine the 7 cups all-purpose ¼ cup ¼ cup semolina flour and salt', '4:  Make a well in the middle and add the olive oil and bloomed 2 teaspoons active dry yeast mixture', '5:  Using a spoon, mix until a shaggy dough begins to form', '6: Once the 7 cups all-purpose ¼ cup ¼ cup semolina flour is mostly hydrated, turn the dough out onto a clean work surface and knead for 10-15 minutes', '7:  The dough should be soft, smooth, and bouncy', '8:  Form the dough into a taut round', '9: Grease a clean, large bowl with olive oil and place the dough inside, turning to coat with the oil', '10:  Cover with plastic wrap', '11:  Let rise for at least an hour, or up to 24 hours', '12: Punch down the dough and turn it out onto a lightly 7 cups all-purpose ¼ cup ¼ cup semolina floured work surface', '13:  Knead for another minute or so, then cut into 4 equal portions and shape into rounds', '14: Lightly 7 cups all-purpose ¼ cup ¼ cup semolina flour the dough, then cover with a kitchen towel and let rest for another 30 minutes to an hour while you prepare the sauce and any other ingredients', '15: Preheat the oven as high as your oven will allow, between 450-500˚F (230-260˚C)', '16:  Place a pizza stone, heavy baking sheet (turn upside down so the surface is flat), or cast iron skillet in the oven', '17: Meanwhile, make the tomato sauce: Add the salt to the can of 28 oz canned whole tomatoes and puree with an immersion blender, or transfer to a blender or food processor, and puree until smooth', '18: Once the dough has rested, take a portion and start by poking the surface with your fingertips, until bubbles form and do not deflate', '19: Then, stretch and press the dough into a thin round', '20:  Make it thinner than you think it should be, as it will slightly shrink and puff up during baking', '21: Sprinkle ¼ cup semolina onto an upside down baking sheet and place the stretched crust onto it', '22:  Add the sauce and ingredients of your choice', '23: Slide the pizza onto the preheated pizza stone or pan', '24:  Bake for 15 minutes, or until the crust and cheese are golden brown', '25: Add any garnish of your preference', '26: Nutrition  Calories: 1691 Fat: 65 grams  Carbs: 211 grams Fiber: 12 grams  Sugars: 60 grams  Protein: 65 grams']

ingredients: ['3 tablespoons dijon mustard', '2 teaspoons fresh thyme finely chopped', '2 teaspoons fresh rosemary finely chopped', '½ teaspoon kosher salt plus more to taste', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper plus more to taste', '1 ½ lb pork tenderloin (680 g)', '3 tablespoons olive oil divided', '2 bunches broccolini woody stems removed', '8 medium carrots cute into ½-inch (1-cm) coins', '2 tablespoons honey', '1 lemon cut into 4 wedges', 'fresh parsley chopped for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190˚C)', '2: In a small bowl, stir together the mustard, 2 teaspoons fresh thyme, 2 teaspoons fresh rosemary, ½ teaspoon kosher salt, and ½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '3: Dry the 1 ½ lb pork tenderloin thoroughly with paper towels, then season with ½ teaspoon kosher salt and ½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '4: Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a square pan over 8 medium-high heat', '5:  Add the tenderloin and cook, rotating 90˚ every 3-4 minutes, until golden brown all over (the tenderloin will not be cooked through at this point), about 12 minutes total', '6:  Remove the pan from the heat and use tongs to transfer the tenderloin to a cutting board', '7: Brush the mustard mixture evenly over the top and sides of the tenderloin', '8: Add the 2 bunches broccolini to the pan, and toss with the oil until coated evenly', '9:  Push the 2 bunches broccolini to the sides of the pan, just enough to make room for the tenderloin, then return the 1 ½ lb pork to the pan', '10: Transfer the pan to the oven and roast, tossing the 2 bunches broccolini halfway through cooking, until an instant-read thermometer inserted in the thickest part of the 1 ½ lb pork reads 160°F (70˚C) and the 2 bunches broccolini is tender, 23-25 minutes', '11: While the 1 ½ lb pork cooks, heat the remaining tablespoon of olive oil in a 8 medium skillet over 8 medium-high heat', '12:  Add the carrots, season with ½ teaspoon kosher salt and ½ teaspoon ground black pepper, and cook, tossing, until barely tender, about 6 minutes', '13:  Drizzle with the honey and continue cooking, tossing often, until the honey is reduced to a thick glaze and the carrots are tender, 2 to 4 minutes more', '14:  Remove the skillet from the heat', '15: Transfer the square pan to a rack and let the 1 ½ lb pork and 2 bunches broccolini rest for 10 minutes', '16:  Place the tenderloin on a cutting board and cut into ½-inch (1-cm) thick slices', '17: Divide the 1 ½ lb pork and vegetables among 4 serving plates', '18:  Serve each with a 1 lemon wedge and sprinkle with fresh parsley']

ingredients: ['⅔ cup warm water (160 mL)', '1 tablespoon active dry yeast', '1 tablespoon honey', '2 ½ cups bread flour (310 g) divided', '1 ¾ cups room temperature water', '9 tablespoons olive oil divided plus more to taste', '3 cups all purpose flour (375 g) plus more for dusting', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', 'Toppings', '3 sprigs fresh dill', '3 sprigs fresh rosemary', '2 edible flowers', '5 spears asparagus woody ends trimmed and shaved', '4 white mushrooms cut into 1/3 in (8 mm) slices', '3 cherry tomatoes of varying colors halved', '2 tablespoons kalamata olive halved', '1 tablespoon fresno chilie thinly sliced', '1 watermelon radish thinly sliced', '6 fresh chives', '1 radish thinly sliced', 'flaky sea salt to taste', 'olive oil to taste']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, whisk together the warm water, yeast, honey, and ½ ⅔ 2 ½ 1 ¾ 3 cup (60 G) bread flour', '2:  Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and set in a warm place for 20–30 minutes, until the mixture is bubbly', '3: Add the room temperature water, 5 tablespoons of 9 tablespoons 2 tablespoons kalamata olive oil, remaining 2 ⅔ 2 ½ 1 ¾ 3 cups of bread flour, the all-purpose flour, and salt', '4:  Mix well with a rubber spatula to combine until the dough starts to come together', '5: Turn the dough out onto a surface lightly dusted with all-purpose flour and bring together', '6:  Knead for 10–15 minutes, adding flour as needed to prevent sticking', '7:  The dough should be smooth and supple and bounce back when pressed', '8: Coat a large bowl with 1 tablespoon of 9 tablespoons 2 tablespoons kalamata olive oil and transfer the dough into the bowl', '9:  Cover with plastic wrap and let rest in a warm place for 1–2 hours, until doubled in size', '10: Remove the plastic wrap and punch the dough down', '11: Grease a 18 x 13-inch (45 x 33 cm)  baking sheet with 1-2 tablespoons of 9 tablespoons 2 tablespoons kalamata olive oil and use your hands to spread the oil all around the pan to coat', '12:  Transfer the dough to the pan and cover the dough with the same piece of plastic wrap', '13:  Let rest for 10–20 minutes so it is easier to stretch', '14: Uncover the dough', '15:  With oiled hands, gently stretch the dough to fit the size of the baking sheet', '16:  Cover with plastic wrap again and let proof at room temperature for 1–2 hours, until the dough rises to fill the pan, or refrigerate overnight', '17:  Refrigerating overnight is optional, however it will result in a better final texture and flavor', '18:  If refrigerating, let the dough come to room temperature for 30–60 minutes before proceeding, until slightly puffed', '19: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '20: Use your fingers to dimple the surface of the focaccia dough', '21:  Drizzle with the remaining 2 tablespoons of 9 tablespoons 2 tablespoons kalamata olive oil', '22: Use the 3 sprigs fresh dill, 3 sprigs fresh rosemary, 2 edible flowers, 5 spears asparagus, 4 white mushrooms, 3 cherry tomatoes, Kalamata 9 tablespoons 2 tablespoons kalamata olives, Fresno chiles, 1 watermelon 1 watermelon 1 radish, 6 fresh chives, and 1 watermelon 1 radish to create a decorative gardenscape scene on the focaccia', '23:  Sprinkle all over with flaky sea salt', '24: Bake the focaccia for 15 minutes, then turn the pan and bake for another 7–10 minutes, until the bread is golden brown in the areas not covered with toppings', '25:  If the toppings are getting too dark, lightly cover the focaccia with foil for the remainder of baking', '26: Remove the focaccia from the oven and let cool in the pan for 10 minutes', '27:  Transfer to a cutting board and drizzle with more 9 tablespoons 2 tablespoons kalamata olive oil', '28: Slice and serve']

ingredients: ['Single Glass:', '½ tablespoon lavender syrup', '2 oz orange juice (60 mL)', '4 oz champagne (120 mL)', 'Sugar Rim:', 'lemon juice', 'sugar', 'Pitcher:', '1 ½ tablespoons lavender syrup', '1 cup orange juice (240 mL)', '2 cups champagne (480 mL)', 'Sugar rim:', 'lemon juice', 'sugar']
instructions: ['1: For sugar rim: Dip champagne glass in lemon juice and directly dip into sugar', '2: In a champagne glass, add lavender syrup and orange juice and top with champagne']

ingredients: ['4 oz tempeh (115 g) half a package', 'olive oil to taste', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon maple syrup', '½ teaspoon liquid smoke optional', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', 'black pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: On a cutting board, cut 4 oz tempeh ¼-inch (6 mm) thick slices', '2: Add olive oil to a pan over medium heat and add the 4 oz tempeh', '3:  Cook for 5 minutes on each side until brown and crispy', '4: Add 1 2 1 tablespoon of water to the pan and stir', '5: Add 2 2 1 tablespoons soy sauce, maple syrup, ½ teaspoon liquid smoke, ½ teaspoon garlic powder, and black pepper, and stir until 4 oz tempeh is evenly coated', '6: Let brown for 2-3 minutes']

ingredients: ['5 oz mixed greens (150 g)', '1 large cucumber diced', '10 oz cherry tomato (275 g) halved', '1 avocado diced', '30 oz chickpeas (850 g) 2 cans drained and rinsed', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 teaspoons smoked paprika', '1 ½ teaspoons garlic salt', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon black pepper']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: In a 1 large bowl, mix together the chickpeas, 2 tablespoons 2 tablespoons 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, 2 teaspoons smoked paprika, and 1 ½ teaspoons garlic 1 ½ teaspoons garlic ½ teaspoon salt', '3: Spread the chickpeas onto a baking sheet in one layer', '4:  Bake for 25-30 minutes, until the chickpeas are crisp', '5: Dice the cucumber and add to a 1 large bowl', '6: Toss in the 5 oz mixed greens, cucumber, tomatoes, 1 avocado, roasted chickpeas, 2 tablespoons extra virgin 2 tablespoons 2 tablespoons 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice, 1 ½ teaspoons garlic ½ teaspoon salt, and ½ teaspoon black pepper, and mix until well combined', '7: Divide between individual bowls and serve']

ingredients: ['5 cups milk (1 ¼ L)', '1 lb elbow macaroni (455 g) dry', '2 cups shredded cheddar cheese (200 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a large pot, bring the 5 cups milk to a boil', '2: Add the pasta and stir constantly until the pasta is cooked, about 10 minutes', '3: Turn off the heat, then add the 2 cups shredded cheddar', '4:  Stir until the cheese is melted and the pasta is evenly coated']

ingredients: ['4 lb potato (2 kg) peeled and diced', '1 ½ cups butter (345 g)', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '1 ½ cups milk (360 mL) warm', '2 tablespoons chives optional']
instructions: ['1: Place potatoes, 1 ½ cups butter, 1 tablespoon salt, 1 teaspoon pepper, and 1 cup water in a large slow cooker', '2: Cover and cook on high for 4 hours', '3: Remove lid and mash the potatoes with a masher or beaters, mixing in the 1 ½ cups milk', '4: Stir in chivesKeep the slow cooker on “warm” setting while you serve them!']

ingredients: ['onion chopped', '10 cloves garlic peeled', '¼ cup apple cider vinegar (60 mL)', '¼ cup stone ground mustard (60 g)', '1 cup orange juice (240 mL)', '10 whole cloves', '10 lb picnic ham (4 ½ kg) cured', '½ cup honey (170 g)', '½ cup dijon mustard (125 g)', '1 tablespoon worcestershire sauce', '1 cup brown sugar (220 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Add the chopped onion, garlic cloves, ¼ cup apple cider vinegar, ¼ cup stone ground ½ cup ½ cup dijon mustard, 1 cup orange juice, and cloves to a large roasting pan, stirring to combine', '3: Place the ham on the roasting rack over the liquid', '4: Trim off tough outer skin, then score the remaining fat in a crosshatch pattern', '5:  Cover the entire roasting rack with aluminum foil and bake for 1 hour', '6: Remove the ham from the oven, and remove the foil', '7:  Baste the ham with the liquid, then remove the rack from the roasting pan and set aside', '8: Remove all the whole cloves from the remaining liquid in the pan', '9:  Pour the remaining liquid into a pot, along with the ½ cup honey, Dijon ¼ cup stone ground ½ cup ½ cup dijon mustard, Worcestershire sauce, and 1 cup brown sugar', '10:  Whisk to combine', '11: Bring the mixture to a boil over medium high heat, then simmer until thick and reduced, about 10 minutes', '12: Brush the glaze on to the ham then transfer back to the roasting rack', '13: Bake the ham for 30-45 minutes, or until the glaze is caramelized and the ham reaches 145°F (65°C)', '14: Slice the ham, and serve']

ingredients: ['1 cup all purpose flour (125 g)', '⅓ cup dutch processed cocoa  powder (40 g)', '½ cup caster sugar (100 g)', '½ cup brown sugar (110 g)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '⅓ cup butter (75 g)', '1 egg', '1 egg yolk', '1 cup chocolate chips (175 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat your oven to 350°F', '2: Sift your 1 cup all purpose flour and ⅓ cup dutch processed cocoa powder together, along with 1 teaspoon baking powder, into a large bowl', '3:  Mix until well-combined', '4: Next, add ½ cup brown ½ cup caster ½ cup ½ cup brown sugar and granulated ½ cup caster ½ cup ½ cup brown sugar to a bowl and whisk together', '5: Melt ⅓ cup butter and add it to the ½ cup caster ½ cup ½ cup brown sugar', '6:  Cream together or whisk until fluffy', '7: Add in an egg and an egg yolk and whisk until air bubbles form', '8:  To this mixture, add 1 teaspoon vanilla', '9: Combine wet and dry ingredients to form a dough, and add 1 cup chocolate chips to this', '10: Use an ice cream scoop to measure the dough into balls and place them on a lined 1 teaspoon baking tray, at least two inches apart', '11: Pop into the oven for 9-11 minutes and take them out and let them cool', '12: Serve warm']

ingredients: ['3 cups whole milk (720 mL)', '3 cups heavy cream (720 mL)', '1 cup white corn grit (170 g)', '2 teaspoons salt divided', '1 teaspoon black pepper divided', '3 tablespoons unsalted butter', '½ cup shredded cheddar cheese (50 g)', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 medium white onion minced', '1 yellow bell pepper diced', '1 medium red bell pepper diced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 lb andouille sausage (455 g) sliced', '1 pinch cayenne pepper plus more to taste', '1 cup chicken stock (240 mL)', '1 lb large raw shrimp (455 g) peeled and deveined', '1 pinch cayenne pepper plus more to taste', 'scallion sliced for serving']
instructions: ['1: In a medium pot, stir together the 3 cups whole milk and 3 cups heavy cream over medium-high heat', '2: Bring to a boil', '3: Slowly whisk the grits into the pot', '4:  When mixture begins to bubble, reduce the heat to medium-low', '5:  Add 1 2 1 teaspoon 2 2 1 teaspoons salt and ½ 2 1 teaspoon 1 teaspoon black 1 yellow bell 1 medium red bell 1 pinch cayenne 1 pinch cayenne pepper', '6: Continue whisking the grits frequently for 10-15 minutes until mixture thickened', '7: Remove the grits from the heat', '8:  Add the 3 tablespoons unsalted butter and ½ cup shredded cheddar cheese, and whisk to incorporate', '9:  Set aside', '10: Heat the 2 tablespoons vegetable oil in a 1 lb large skillet on medium-high heat', '11: Add the onions, 1 teaspoon black 1 yellow bell 1 medium red bell 1 pinch cayenne 1 pinch cayenne peppers, and 2 cloves garlic', '12:  Sauté for 2 minutes until onions and 1 teaspoon black 1 yellow bell 1 medium red bell 1 pinch cayenne 1 pinch cayenne peppers have softened', '13: Add the 1 lb andouille sausage', '14:  Cook until cooked through, about 5-7 minutes', '15: Slowly add the 1 cup chicken stock', '16:  Stir until well-incorporated', '17: Add the shrimp', '18:  Cook until pink in color, about 3 minutes', '19: Add the cayenne, remaining 2 1 teaspoon 2 2 1 teaspoons salt, and remaining ½ 2 1 teaspoon black 1 teaspoon black 1 yellow bell 1 medium red bell 1 pinch cayenne 1 pinch cayenne pepper', '20:  Add additional cayenne 1 teaspoon black 1 yellow bell 1 medium red bell 1 pinch cayenne 1 pinch cayenne pepper, if desired', '21: Remove from the heat and spoon the 1 lb andouille sausage and shrimp mixture over the grits', '22: Sprinkle scallions on top, if desired']

ingredients: ['Fruit', '1 cup orange juice (240 mL)', '½ cup dried apricot (95 g) chopped', '½ cup golden raisin (75 g) chopped', '¼ cup dried cherry (30 g) chopped', '½ cup raisin (75 g) chopped', '¼ cup dried fig (35 g) chopped', '¼ cup dried cranberry (25 g)', 'Cake Batter', '16 tablespoons unsalted butter room temperature', '¼ cup dark brown sugar (55 g)', '¾ cup light brown sugar (165 g)', '3 large eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '½ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '¼ teaspoon allspice', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '2 cups all purpose flour (250 g) sifted', '2 teaspoons baking soda', '½ cup pecan (60 g) chopped', '1 tablespoon lemon zest', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', 'Icing', '2 cups powdered sugar (240 g) sifted', '4 tablespoons lemon juice']
instructions: ['1: Make the fruit: In a small pot, warm the orange juice over medium heat for 3 minutes', '2: Add the dried apricots, golden raisins, dried cherries, raisins, dried figs, and dried cranberries', '3:  Simmer for 5 minutes, until the fruit absorbs some of the liquid', '4: Transfer the fruit and their cooking liquid to a medium bowl and cover with plastic wrap', '5:  Soak and refrigerate for at least 6 hours or overnight, then drain', '6: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '7: Make the cake batter: In a 3 large bowl, cream the 16 16 1 4 tablespoons unsalted butter with an electric hand mixer until fluffy', '8: Add the light and dark brown sugars and beat for 3 minutes, or until smooth and creamy', '9: Add the eggs, 1 at a time, and beat until well combined', '10: Add the 1 teaspoon vanilla, 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon, ½ teaspoon ground nutmeg, ¼ teaspoon allspice, and ½ teaspoon kosher salt, and beat for 2 minutes, or until smooth', '11: Add the flour, 2 teaspoons baking soda, pecans, 1 4 tablespoon 4 tablespoons lemon zest, and the soaked fruit, and fold with a rubber spatula until well incorporated', '12: Grease 2 12-cup muffin tins with nonstick spray', '13: Using a 2-tablespoon ice cream scoop, add a scoop of batter to each of the muffin cups', '14: Bake for 20 minutes, or until golden brown', '15:  Let cool before icing', '16: Make the icing: In a medium bowl, whisk together the powdered sugar and 1 4 tablespoon 4 tablespoons lemon juice until smooth', '17: Drizzle the icing over the fruitcakes, then serve']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 small onion diced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '¾ cup raw cashew (100 g) soaked in water for two hours', '1 red pepper roasted ', '2 tablespoons nutritional yeast', '1 tablespoon tomato paste', '1 ½ tablespoons cornstarch', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon smoked paprika', '1 teaspoon ground mustard', '½ teaspoon turmeric', '2 cups vegetable broth (480 mL)', '8 oz dry pasta (225 g) cooked', 'smoked paprika to serve ']
instructions: ['1: In a medium-sized pot or dutch oven over medium heat, add the 1 tablespoon olive oil and 1 small onion and cook for 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally, until semi translucent', '2: Add the 2 cloves garlic and cook for 2-3 minutes', '3: Transfer 1 small onion and 2 cloves garlic to blender', '4:  Add the ¾ cup raw cashew (100 g) soaked cashews, 1 red pepper, 2 tablespoons nutritional yeast, 1 tablespoon tomato paste, 1 ½ tablespoons cornstarch, ½ teaspoon salt, paprika, 1 teaspoon ground mustard, ½ teaspoon turmeric, and 2 cups vegetable broth, and blend until smooth', '5: Transfer sauce back into pot and cook until thickened, about 5 minutes', '6: Add 8 oz dry pasta to the pot and stir until sauce is evenly distributed', '7: Top with smoked paprika and serve immediately']

ingredients: ['1 red bell pepper roughly chopped', '1 lb butternut squash (455 g)', '1 lb brussels sprouts (455 g) hulled and halved', '2 tablespoons dried oregano', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '4 oz mixed greens (115 g)', 'Avocado Dressing', '1 avocado', '1 clove garlic small', '1 lime juiced', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL)', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon black pepper']
