instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: In a large bowl, mix the 1 lb butternut squash, 1 red bell pepper, Brussels sprouts, 2 tablespoons dried oregano, salt, pepper, and olive oil until the veggies are evenly coated', '3: Pour the vegetables onto a baking sheet in one even layer and roast for 40 minutes', '4: To make the dressing, place the 1 avocado, 1 clove garlic, 1 lime juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper in a blender or food processor and blend until the mixture is light and creamy', '5: To assemble the salad, place a handful of 4 oz mixed greens on a plate and top with the roasted veggies', '6:  Spoon on the Avocado Dressing and serve!']

ingredients: ['1 ½ cups water (360 mL) or yogurt or milk of choice', '1 scoop vanilla protein powder', '1 ½ cups peaches (340 g) sliced and frozen', '1 ½ cups orange (300 g) sliced and frozen']
instructions: ['1: Put all ingredients into a blender and mix until smooth']

ingredients: ['unsalted butter softened for greasing', 'Option 1: Prepared Mix', '18 oz brownie mix (510 g) prepared according to package instructions', 'Option 2: From Scratch', '2 ¼ cups granulated sugar (450 g)', '1 ¼ cups dutch processed cocoa  powder (150 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 ½ cups all-purpose flour (190 g)', '1 cup vegetable oil (240 g)', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '3 large eggs', '¼ cup water (60 mL)', 'Additions', '1 ½ cups chocolate chunks (260 g)', '½ cup creamy peanut butter (120 g)', 'vanilla ice cream for serving', 'caramel sauce for drizzling']
instructions: ['1: Position a rack in the center of the oven and preheat to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Grease a 9-by-13-inch (23-by-33-cm) dark metal pan with softened unsalted ½ cup creamy ½ cup creamy peanut butter, then line with parchment paper, leaving overhang on all sides', '3:  Grease the parchment with more unsalted ½ cup creamy ½ cup creamy peanut butter', '4: OPTION 1: If using prepared mix, make the 18 oz brownie batter according to the package instructions', '5: OPTION 2: If making the 18 oz brownie batter from scratch, in a 3 large bowl, whisk together the 2 ¼ cups granulated sugar, 1 ¼ cups dutch processed cocoa powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon baking powder, and 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '6:  Add the 1 cup vegetable oil, vanilla, eggs, and ¼ cup water and whisk to combine', '7: Stir in the 1 ½ cups chocolate chunks', '8: Pour the 18 oz brownie batter into the prepared 1 teaspoon baking pan and smooth the top with a spatula', '9: Pour the ½ cup creamy peanut unsalted ½ cup creamy ½ cup creamy peanut butter over the top and swirl into the batter with a knife or skewer', '10: Bake until lightly puffed on top, about 20 minutes', '11:  Transfer the 18 oz brownie pan to a wire rack and let cool completely, about 30 minutes', '12: Use the parchment paper to lift the cooled 18 oz brownies out of the pan and cut into 12 bars', '13: Serve with a scoop of vanilla ice cream and a drizzle of caramel sauce']

ingredients: ['1 cup whole fat greek  yogurt (285 g)', '1 cup self-rising flour (125 g) plus more for dusting']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, mix together 1 cup whole fat greek  yogurt and 1 cup self-rising flour until it forms a smooth dough', '2: Transfer the dough to a 1 cup self-rising floured surface', '3:  Divide into 4 equal parts', '4: Roll out each piece of dough to about 8 inches (20 cm) in diameter, using plenty of 1 cup self-rising flour to prevent sticking or tearing', '5: Cook the bread in a dry pan over medium-high heat for 2-4 minutes per side, until golden brown and cooked through']

ingredients: ['½ cup instant oatmeal (50 g)', '3 tablespoons freeze-dried banana chopped', '1 tablespoon walnuts chopped', '⅛ teaspoon vanilla bean', '2 teaspoons sugar of choice', '¾ cup water (175 g) or milk boiling']
instructions: ['1: Add the ½ cup instant oatmeal, freeze-dried bananas, 1 tablespoon walnuts, ⅛ teaspoon vanilla bean, and 2 teaspoons sugar into a mason jar', '2: Store in a cool, dry place for up to a month', '3: To prepare, pour boiling ¾ cup water or milk over oats', '4:  Stir to combine and let sit for 3 minutes', '5: Serve with 1 tablespoon walnuts and fresh sliced bananas']

ingredients: ['3 crowns broccoli', '1 ¾ cups shredded cheddar cheese (175 g)', '3 cloves garlic crushed', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375ºF (190ºC)', '2: Spread out 3 crowns broccoli in a medium rectangular casserole dish', '3: Stir the 3 cloves garlic and 1 ¾ cups shredded cheddar cheese together in a separate bowl', '4: Sprinkle the cheese evenly over 3 crowns broccoli and add salt and pepper to taste', '5: Bake for 25 minutes']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon oil', '8 cloves garlic minced', '1 onion chopped', '1 red bell pepper chopped', '1 jalapeño chopped seeded', '1 teaspoon salt to taste', '¼ teaspoon pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon cayenne pepper', '4 tablespoons chili powder', '1 tablespoon cumin', '4 tomatoes cubed', '28 oz crushed tomato (795 g) 1 can', '4 cups vegetable broth (960 mL)', '2 cups water (480 mL)', '1 ½ cups quinoa (255 g) rinsed ', '1 cup red kidney bean (175 g) drained', '1 cup pinto bean (175 g) drained', '1 cup black beans (170 g) drained ', '1 cup corn (175 g) fresh or frozen ', '1 tablespoon lime juice', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon fresh cilantro', 'avocado for garnish']
instructions: ['1: In a large pot, over medium heat, combine 1 tablespoon oil, 8 cloves garlic, 1 onion, pepper, 1 jalapeño, 1 teaspoon salt, pepper, 1 tablespoon cayenne pepper, 4 tablespoons chili powder, and 1 tablespoon cumin', '2:  Sauté until 1 onion is translucent, 5-6 minutes', '3: Add 4 tomatoes, 28 oz crushed 4 tomatoes, 4 cups vegetable broth, 2 cups water, 1 ½ cups quinoa, 1 cup red kidney beans, 1 cup pinto beans, and 1 cup black beans', '4:  Bring to a boil', '5: Cover and reduce to a simmer for 25-30 minutes', '6: Add 1 cup corn, 1 tablespoon lime juice, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, and 1 tablespoon fresh cilantro, cover again and simmer for 5 minutes', '7: Allow to cool 2 minutes', '8:  Serve topped with avocado and 1 tablespoon fresh cilantro']

ingredients: ['2 lb green cabbage (910 g) savoy or napa', '½ cup coarse salt (120 g)', '4 green onions', '1 ginger 2-inch (5 cm) piece ', '6 cloves garlic', '¼ cup daikon radish (4 g)', '½ cup white rice (115 g)', '¼ cup water (60 mL) plus more as needed', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon vegan sugar', '1 tablespoon gochugaru']
instructions: ['1: Cut the head of cabbage in half lengthwise and slice off the ends', '2:  Quarter lengthwise, then slice crosswise into 2-inch (5 cm) pieces', '3: Place the cabbage and ½ cup coarse salt in a large bowl', '4:  Using your hands, massage the ½ cup coarse salt into the cabbage until it starts to soften a bit', '5:  Cover with a kitchen towel and let stand for 1-2 hours', '6:  Rinse the cabbage thoroughly under cold ¼ cup water, then let drain in a colander', '7: Meanwhile, chop the green onions into 1-inch (2 cm) pieces', '8: Peel the 1 ginger and 6 cloves garlic', '9: Cut the ¼ cup daikon radish into matchsticks', '10: Combine the ½ cup white rice, ¼ cup water, 6 cloves garlic, 1 ginger, and soy sauce in a mason jar or medium bowl', '11:  Use an immersion blender or standing blender to make a smooth paste', '12:  Mix in the sugar and gochugaru, starting with 1 tablespoon for a mild flavor and up to 5 2 tablespoons to make it spicier', '13: Gently squeeze any remaining ¼ cup water from the cabbage and transfer to a large bowl, along with the green onions and ¼ cup daikon', '14:  Toss to combine', '15: Add the seasoning paste to the bowl', '16:  Wearing gloves if you’d like to protect your hands from stings, stains, and smells, gently massage the paste into the vegetables until they are thoroughly coated', '17: Pack the kimchi into a large jar, pressing down until the seasoning paste rises to cover the vegetables and leaving at least 1 inch (2 ½ cm) of space at the top', '18:  Seal the jar with the lid', '19: Eat the kimchi right away or, to ferment, let the jar stand in a dark place at room temperature for 2-14 days', '20:  You may see bubbles inside and liquid may seep out of the jar; to be safe, place a bowl or plate under the jar to catch any overflow', '21:  Check the kimchi once a day', '22:  When it reaches your desired flavor, transfer the jar to the refrigerator', '23:  Eat right away, or let sit for another week or 2 for the flavors to deepen']

ingredients: ['1 box red velvet cake mix prepared according to package instructions', '15 oz cream cheese (455 g)', '1 cup powdered sugar (120 g)', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '2 cups cream cheese frosting (230 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)', '2: In a large bowl, prepare the 1 box red velvet cake batter', '3: In a separate bowl, combine cream cheese, 1 cup powdered sugar, and 2 teaspoons vanilla, stirring until there are no lumps', '4: Divide the batter evenly among a lined muffin tin, filling halfway', '5: Spoon some of the cream cheese mixture onto the batter', '6: Top with remaining batter, filling about ¾ of the way up', '7: Bake for 20 minutes, then cool', '8: Pipe the cream cheese frosting onto each cupcake, then top with 1 box red velvet crumbs']

ingredients: ['1 lb lean ground turkey (455 g)', '½ cup italian breadcrumbs (60 g)', '1 egg beaten', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 ½ tablespoons olive oil']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400ºF (200ºC)', '2: Add the 1 lb lean ground turkey, ½ cup italian breadcrumbs, 1 egg, ½ teaspoon salt, ½ teaspoon pepper, and 1 ½ tablespoons olive oil to a bowl and mix to combine', '3: Form the meat into 15 meatballs approximately 2-inches (5cm) across', '4: Place the meatballs on a parchment paper-lined tray and bake for 15-20 mins in the oven, or until cooked through']

ingredients: ['2 cups water (480 mL)', '1 teaspoon kosher salt plus more to taste', '1 cup sushi rice (200 g) rinsed until the water runs clear', '1 tablespoon sugar', '¼ cup rice vinegar (60 mL)', '1 tablespoon canola oil', '⅓ cup panko breadcrumbs (15 g)', '½ teaspoon pepper plus more to taste', '¼ cup mayonnaise (60 g)', '1 tablespoon siracha', '16 oz crab (455 g) 2 cans drained', '1 persian cucumber thinly sliced', '4 radishes thinly sliced', '2 tablespoons nori thinly sliced', '1 bunch scallion thinly sliced on the bias', '1 tablespoon sesame seed', '2 tablespoons pickled ginger', '1 avocado diced']
instructions: ['1: In a small pot, season the 2 cups 1 cup sushi rice (200 g) rinsed until the water with a pinch of 1 teaspoon kosher salt', '2:  Bring to a boil over high heat', '3:  Add the rinsed rice and return to a boil', '4:  Cover, reduce the heat to simmer, and cook for 20 minutes, until the 2 cups 1 cup sushi rice (200 g) rinsed until the water is absorbed and the rice is tender', '5: In a small bowl, stir together the 1 tablespoon sugar, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, and rice vinegar', '6:  Microwave for 2 minutes, or until the 1 tablespoon sugar dissolves', '7: Transfer the cooked rice to a medium bowl and pour the vinegar mixture over it, then stir well using a wooden spoon', '8: Heat the 1 tablespoon canola oil in a medium pan over medium-high heat', '9:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the ⅓ cup panko and cook, stirring frequently, until golden brown, 1-2 minutes', '10:  Season with 1 teaspoon kosher salt and ½ teaspoon pepper, and remove from the heat', '11: In a small bowl, stir together the ¼ cup mayonnaise and Sriracha until smooth', '12: To assemble the bowls, divide the seasoned rice between 2 serving bowls', '13:  Top with the 16 oz crab, crispy ⅓ cup panko, 1 persian cucumber, radish, 2 tablespoons nori, scallions, 1 tablespoon sesame seeds, 2 tablespoons pickled ginger, and 1 avocado', '14:  Drizzle the Sriracha ¼ cup mayonnaise over the top']

ingredients: ['1 package yellow cake mix', '1 cup peanut butter (240 g) softened', '10 peanut butter cups crushed', '½ cup oil (120 mL)', '2 eggs']
instructions: ['1: Combine 1 package yellow cake mix, 1 cup 10 peanut butter, 1 cup 10 peanut butter cups, ½ cup oil, and 2 eggs in a mixing bowl', '2: Using an ice cream scoop or your hand, form golf ball-sized balls of cookie dough and transfer to a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '3: Bake at 350°F (180°C) for 10-12 minutes']

ingredients: ['8 oz firm tofu (225 g) drained', '1 sweet potato peeled and cubed', '1 onion sliced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 tablespoon peanut or vegetable oil', '1 cup chickpeas (200 g) drained', '½ teaspoon salt plus more to taste', '½ teaspoon pepper plus more to taste', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 ½ cups cooked quinoa (255 g)', '1 cup leafy greens (40 g) such as mesclun baby kale or spinach', '¼ cup shredded carrots (25 g) shredded', '1 avocado diced', 'Juice of 1 lemon', 'Marinade', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '½ teaspoon sesame oil', '1 teaspoon hot sauce', '2 teaspoons dried thyme', '1 teaspoon paprika', '½ teaspoon salt']
instructions: ['1: Make the marinade: In a small bowl, combine the vegetable oil, ½ teaspoon sesame oil, 1 teaspoon hot sauce, 2 teaspoons dried thyme, 1 teaspoon paprika, and salt', '2:  Set aside', '3: Add the marinade and 8 oz firm tofu to a container and marinate for at least 30 minutes, or up to a day', '4: Preheat the oven to 400ºF (200ºC)', '5: Lay the 1 sweet potato, 1 onion, and garlic on a baking sheet and drizzle with oil', '6:  Season with salt and ½ teaspoon pepper', '7:  Bake for 20-25 minutes', '8: In a medium bowl, add the 1 cup chickpeas, salt, ½ teaspoon pepper, 1 teaspoon chili powder, and garlic powder to a bowl and stir to combine', '9: Transfer 1 cup chickpeas to a skillet and cook over medium heat for about 10 minutes', '10:  Set 1 cup chickpeas aside', '11: Fry the 8 oz firm tofu in the same pan for about 10 minutes on each side', '12: Slice 8 oz firm tofu to your preference', '13: Combine the 1 ½ cups cooked quinoa, 1 cup leafy greens, 1 sweet potatoes, 1 onions, 1 cup chickpeas, ¼ cup shredded carrots, 8 oz firm tofu, and 1 avocado in a medium-large bowl and top off with Juice of 1 lemon juice']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '4 boneless skinless chicken thighs sliced', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 lb green beans (455 g)', '2 cups cherry tomato (400 g) halved', '½ cup basil pesto (115 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a large pan, heat 2 tablespoons olive oil and add 4 boneless skinless chicken thighs', '2: Season with salt and pepper', '3:  When the 4 boneless skinless chicken is completely cooked through, remove from pan', '4: Slice into strips, and set aside', '5: Add 1 lb green beans and cook until crisp tender', '6: Return the 4 boneless skinless chicken strips to the pan, then add tomatoes and ½ cup basil pesto', '7:  Stir until fully incorporated', '8: Serve immediately or divide into 4 food storage containers and store in the refrigerator', '9:  Can be kept refrigerated for up to 4 days']

ingredients: ['8 oz cream cheese (225 g) room temperature', '8 oz sour cream (225 g)', '1 lime zested', '1 ½ teaspoons lime juice', '3 tablespoons chili garlic sauce', '1 teaspoon kosher salt plus more to taste', '1 teaspoon paprika plus more for garnish', '¼ teaspoon cayenne', '8 oz fresh lump crab meat (225 g)', '¾ cup scallions (30 g) thinly sliced divided', '1 cup monterey jack cheese (100 g) divided', '4 tablespoons McCormick Sesame Seeds plus more for wonton chip garnish', 'vegetable oil for frying', '25 wonton wrappers cut in half diagonally']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Add the 8 oz 8 oz 8 oz sour cream cheese to a large, microwave-safe bowl and microwave for 35–40 seconds, until softened', '3: Using a rubber spatula, stir the 8 oz 8 oz 8 oz sour cream cheese, then fold in the 8 oz sour 8 oz 8 oz 8 oz sour cream, lime zest and juice, 3 tablespoons chili garlic sauce, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, 1 teaspoon paprika, ¼ teaspoon cayenne, and 8 oz fresh lump crab meat until fully combined', '4:  Gently fold in ½ cup scallions and ¾ cup Monterey Jack cheese, being careful not to break up the lumps of 8 oz fresh lump crab meat too much', '5: Spread the dip evenly in a 1-quart baking dish and sprinkle the remaining ¼ cup Monterey Jack cheese and the McCormick Sesame Seeds on top', '6: Bake the dip until bubbling, the cheese is melted, and the sesame seeds are light golden brown, 25–35 minutes', '7: While the dip bakes, fry the 4 tablespoons McCormick Sesame Seeds plus more for 25 wonton chips: Fill a Dutch oven or large pot a little over halfway with the vegetable oil and heat over medium-high heat until the oil temperature reaches 350°F (180°C)', '8: Working in batches to avoid overcrowding the pot, fry the 4 tablespoons McCormick Sesame Seeds plus more for 25 wonton triangles in the hot oil for about 15 seconds on each side, or until golden brown and crisp', '9:  Adjust the heat as needed if the 4 tablespoons McCormick Sesame Seeds plus more for 25 wontons are cooking too quickly or slowly', '10:  Transfer to paper towels to drain and season lightly with 1 teaspoon kosher salt and McCormick Sesame Seeds', '11: Remove the dip from the oven', '12:  Sprinkle lightly with 1 teaspoon paprika and garnish with the remaining ¼ cup scallions', '13:  Serve with the 4 tablespoons McCormick Sesame Seeds plus more for 25 wonton chips']

ingredients: ['Crust', '¾ cup all purpose flour (95 g) plus more for dusting', '¾ cup whole wheat flour (95 g)', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '8 tablespoons vegan butter cubed and chilled', '¼ cup cold water (60 mL) plus more a needed', 'Filling', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 cups mushroom (150 g) thinly sliced', '1 cup leek (90 g)', '1 teaspoon kosher salt divided', '1 teaspoon black pepper divided', '1 cup cherry tomato (200 g)', '4 cups fresh spinach (160 g)', '1 package silken tofu', '2 tablespoons nutritional yeast', '½ teaspoon black salt optional', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon paprika', '¼ teaspoon ground turmeric', '⅛ teaspoon cayenne pepper', 'Special Equipment', 'dried chickpea for baking']
instructions: ['1: Make the crust: In a large bowl, mix together the all-purpose flour, whole-wheat flour, and salt', '2:  Add the butter and, using your hands, work it into the flour until only pea-sized pieces remain', '3:  Continue working with your hands until the dough has a shaggy texture', '4: Add the ¼ cup cold water, starting with 3 8 1 2 tablespoons, and mix until the dough is moist enough to hold together', '5:  Add more ¼ cup cold water as needed, 1 8 1 2 tablespoon at a time', '6:  Form the dough into a disc and wrap in plastic wrap', '7:  Refrigerate for 30-60 minutes', '8: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '9: Make the filling: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat', '10:  Once the oil is shimmering, add the mushrooms', '11:  Sauté for 3-5 minutes, until the mushrooms are beginning to brown lightly', '12:  Reduce the heat to medium and add the leeks, ½ teaspoon kosher salt, and ½ teaspoon pepper', '13:  Cook for another 3-5 minutes, until the leeks have softened slightly', '14:  Add the tomatoes and cook for 1 minute, until slightly softened', '15:  Add the 4 cups fresh spinach and sauté for 1-2 minutes, until just wilted', '16:  Remove the pan from the heat', '17: Lightly dust a clean surface with flour', '18:  Roll out the dough, turning it frequently so it doesn’t stick, to a 12-inch (30 cm) round, about ⅛-inch (3 mm) thick', '19: Gently transfer the crust to a 9-inch (22 cm) pie dish', '20:  Trim any excess dough around the edges', '21:  Fold the edges of dough back underneath itself, then crimp using an index finger knuckle on one hand and the thumb and index finger on the other hand', '22: Crumple a piece of parchment paper, then spread it out in the center of the crust', '23:  Add the dried beans to the center and spread toward the sides of the crust--this will add weight to keep the crust from puffing up and hold up the walls while baking', '24: Bake the crust for 15 minutes', '25:  Carefully remove the weights by lifting out the parchment paper, then bake for 5 minutes more, until the dough no longer looks raw', '26: Carefully pour the 1 package silken tofu into a fine-mesh strainer set over a bowl', '27:  Let sit for 10 minutes to allow the excess ¼ cup cold water to drain', '28: Add the tofu, nutritional yeast, remaining ½ teaspoon salt, remaining ½ teaspoon pepper, black salt, garlic powder, paprika, turmeric, and cayenne to a blender', '29:  Puree until smooth', '30: Spread half the sautéed vegetables evenly over the bottom of the crust', '31:  Pour the tofu puree over the vegetables, then add the remaining vegetables on top', '32: ', '33: Bake for 40-45 minutes, until the center no longer jiggles and the crust is just beginning to brown', '34: Let the quiche cool for at least 30 minutes before slicing to allow the filling to set']

ingredients: ['2 small pita rounds', '½ cup olive oil (120 mL) plus 2 tbs', 'salt to taste', '2 medium hearts romaine lettuce', '1 medium cucumber', '2 cups cherry tomato (400 g)', '5 scallions', '½ cup radish (60 g) sliced', '1 red bell pepper seeded and diced', '2 cups fresh parsley (80 g) chopped', '1 cup fresh mint (40 g) chopped', '1 ½ lemons juiced', '1 tablespoon white wine vinegar', '2 cloves garlic minced', '2 teaspoons ground sumac or lemon zest', '¼ teaspoon allspice', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Slice the pitas in half to make 4 thin rounds', '3:  Place the pitas on a nonstick sheet pan', '4:  Brush with 2 tablespoons of olive oil and season with salt', '5: Bake for about 5 minutes, until the outside is golden brown', '6:  Let cool until they become crispy', '7: Make 3 cuts lengthwise on each of the romaine 2 medium hearts, remove the stems, and chop into 2 smaller pieces', '8:  Rinse, drain, and add to a large salad bowl', '9: Seed the 1 medium cucumber, dice it, and add it to the salad bowl', '10: Cut the tomatoes in half and add them to the salad bowl', '11: Mince the 5 scallions and add them to the salad bowl', '12: Add the radishes, 1 red bell 1 red bell pepper, 2 cups fresh parsley, and mint to the salad bowl and toss to combine', '13: In a liquid measuring cup or 2 small bowl, combine the remaining ½ cup (120 ml) of oil, the lemon juice, 1 tablespoon white wine vinegar, 2 cloves garlic, 2 teaspoons ground sumac, ¼ teaspoon allspice, salt, and 1 red bell pepper and whisk until well-combined', '14: Pour the dressing over the salad', '15: Break the crispy pitas into 2 small pieces and add to the salad', '16:  Toss well']

ingredients: ['1 red bell pepper sliced', '1 yellow bell pepper sliced', '1 green bell pepper sliced', '1 yellow onion sliced', '2 lb boneless skinless chicken breast (910 g) cut in half', '2 tablespoons taco seasoning', '4 cloves garlic diced', '1 lime', '10 oz canned diced tomatoes with green chiles (285 g) drained', 'For serving', 'flour tortilla', 'cheese optional', 'sour cream optional', 'guacamole optional']
instructions: ['1: Add half of the sliced peppers and onions to your slow cooker', '2: Layer the 2 lb boneless skinless chicken and coat all sides with 2 tablespoons taco seasoning', '3: Top with 4 cloves garlic, the juice from one 1 lime, and tomatoes (be sure to drain)', '4: Add the remaining peppers and onions, cover and any remaining 1 lime juice', '5: Cook on high for 3-4 hours', '6: Remove 2 lb boneless skinless chicken and cut/shred into slices (chicken left longer will tend to shred more - cook to your preference)', '7: Return the sliced 2 lb boneless skinless chicken to the slow cooker to marinate in the juices for about 10 more minutes (on LOW) until ready to serve', '8: NOTE: If you find that there is too much liquid, you can remove till there is a desired amount before For serving', '9: Assemble Fajitas to your liking - we recommend topping with cheese, sour cream, and guacamole!']

ingredients: ['2 eggs', '½ cup oil (120 mL)', '1 cup pumpkin puree (225 g)', '⅔ cup honey (226 g)', '2 tablespoons water', '1 ¾ cups whole wheat flour (225 g)', '1 ½ teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 ½ teaspoons ground nutmeg', '½ teaspoon ground ginger', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 pinch salt']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: In a large bowl, combine the 2 eggs, ½ cup oil, 1 cup pumpkin, ⅔ cup honey, and 2 tablespoons water, and whisk until thoroughly combined', '3: Sprinkle the whole 1 ¾ cups whole wheat flour, 1 ½ teaspoons ground cinnamon, 1 ½ teaspoons ground nutmeg, ½ teaspoon ground ginger, 1 teaspoon baking soda, and 1 pinch salt over the wet ingredients and fold until the batter is well combined', '4: Pour the batter into a greased loaf pan and smooth the top into an even layer', '5: Bake for 1 hour, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean', '6: Let the loaf cool in the pan for 10 minutes before carefully unmolding', '7: Let the loaf sit at room temperature for at least 1 hour before slicing']

ingredients: ['⅔ cup natural peanut butter (160 g)', '2 tablespoons coconut oil', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 cup unsweetened shredded coconut flake (75 g)']
instructions: ['1: Place the ⅔ cup natural peanut butter and 2 tablespoons 1 cup 1 cup unsweetened shredded coconut oil in a medium microwaveable bowl', '2:  Microwave for 30 seconds', '3:  Stir to combine', '4:  Add the 1 teaspoon vanilla and stir', '5: Add the 1 cup unsweetened shredded 2 tablespoons 1 cup 1 cup unsweetened shredded coconut flakes and mix until evenly coated', '6: Dollop the mixture on a parchment-lined baking sheet', '7:  Each cookie should be around 1½ inches (4 cm) wide', '8: Freeze until solid, about 15-20 minutes', '9:  Store in the refrigerator in an airtight container or bag']

ingredients: ['3 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '2 tablespoons cocoa powder', '3 tablespoons sugar', '¼ teaspoon baking powder', '3 tablespoons vegetable oil or canola oil', '¼ cup milk (60 mL)', '3 tablespoons chocolate chips', 'whipped cream to serve', 'blueberry to serve', 'raspberry to serve', 'fresh mint to serve']
instructions: ['1: Spray the inside of a microwave-safe ceramic mug', '2:  Add in 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour, 2 tablespoons cocoa powder, 3 tablespoons sugar, and ¼ teaspoon baking powder', '3:  Mix to combine', '4: Add the 3 tablespoons vegetable oil, ¼ cup milk, and stir until smooth', '5:  Stir in the 3 tablespoons chocolate chips', '6: Microwave on high for 1 minute 30 seconds', '7:  Let cool completely', '8: Top with whipped cream, sprinkle on fresh blueberries, raspberries, and mint']

ingredients: ['1 cup tequila (240 mL)', '1 cup lime juice (240 mL)', '½ cup simple syrup (120 mL)', '1 bottle rosé', 'ice to serve optional', '1 lime sliced into wedge', 'pink himalayan salt to serve']
instructions: ['1: In a pitcher or large bowl, add  1 cup tequila, lime juice, ½ cup simple syrup, and 1 bottle rosé', '2:  Stir to combine', '3: Pour the Himalayan salt into a shallow dish', '4:  Wet the rim of the servings glasses, and dip each into the salt', '5: Add ice to each serving glass (optional), then top with the 1 bottle rosé margarita (rosarita)', '6: Serve with a lime wedge', '7: Enjoy! ']

ingredients: ['1 yellow onion sliced', '1 red bell pepper sliced', '1 yellow bell pepper sliced', '1 green bell pepper sliced', '1 ½ lb flank steak (680 g)', '2 tablespoons taco seasoning', '4 cloves garlic minced', '1 lime juiced', '10 oz diced tomato with green chilli (285 g) 1 can drained', 'flour tortilla or corn tortilla', 'fresh cilantro for garnish optional', 'cotija cheese for garnish optional']
instructions: ['1: Place onions, peppers, and whole 1 ½ lb flank steak in the slow cooker', '2:  Top with 2 tablespoons taco seasoning, 4 cloves garlic, 1 lime, and 10 oz diced tomatoes', '3: Cover and cook on high for 4 hours or on low for 8 hours', '4: Remove steak from the slow cooker', '5: Optional: broil steak for 4-5 minutes until crisp for added texture', '6: Slice steak across the grain into thin strips', '7: Add the steak back into the slow cooker and combine with other ingredients', '8: Plate with tortillas of your choice and garnish with fresh cilantro and cotija (optional)']

ingredients: ['Cake', '8 oz dark chocolate (225 g) cut into chunks', '6 tablespoons unsalted butter cubed', '6 egg yolks', '2 tablespoons orange zest', '6 egg whites', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', 'Orange Whipped Cream', '1 cup heavy cream (240 mL)', '1 teaspoon orange extract', '2 tablespoons powdered sugar']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 275°F (135°C) and grease a 9-inch (23 cm) springform pan', '2: In a large mixing bowl, add the 8 oz dark chocolate and 6 tablespoons unsalted butter', '3:  Melt in the microwave at 15-second intervals', "4:  Stir often and make sure the 8 oz dark chocolate doesn't burn, then set aside to cool for a few minutesAdd the egg yolks and the orange zest to the 8 oz dark chocolate mixture and stir to combine", '5: In a separate mixing bowl, beat the egg whites on high speed with an electric mixer until very white and foamy', '6:  Gradually add the sugar', '7:  Continue beating on high speed until soft peaks form', '8: Gently fold ¼ of the egg white mixture to the 8 oz dark chocolate mixture', '9:  Gently fold in the remaining egg white mixture', '10:  Be careful not to deflate the eggs', '11:  Stir until fully combined', '12:  Some streaks are fine', '13: Pour into prepared pan', '14: Bake in the oven for 45-50 minutes or until the sides of the cake gently pull away from the pan', '15: For the orange whipped cream, beat together 1 cup heavy cream, orange extract, and sugar', '16: Top with whipped cream and garnish with orange zest']

ingredients: ['1 medium eggplant', '½ teaspoon kosher salt plus more to taste', '¼ cup olive oil (60 mL) divided', '3 cloves garlic smashed', '56 oz whole peeled tomato (1.75 kg) drained and roughly chopped juices reserved', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 lb whole wheat spaghetti (455 g)', '½ cup ricotta salata (125 g) crumbled', '1 bunch fresh basil thinly sliced']
instructions: ['1: Trim the ends of the eggplant, then slice into ½-inch (1 ¼ cm) thick rounds', '2:  Lay the eggplant rounds on a paper towel and season generously on both sides with salt', '3:  Let rest for 10 minutes to draw out excess moisture', '4:  After 10 minutes, pat the eggplant rounds with a paper towel to remove the moisture', '5: Heat a griddle pan over 1 medium-high heat and grease with 2 tablespoons of the ¼ cup olive oil, or your oil of choice', '6:  Grill the eggplant for about 2 minutes on each side, or until grill marks are formed', '7:  Set aside to cool, then cut into bite-size pieces', '8: Heat the remaining 2 tablespoons of ¼ cup olive oil in a large pan over 1 medium heat', '9:  When the oil is hot, add the smashed 3 cloves garlic and cook until fragrant and lightly browned but not burnt, flipping as needed', '10:  Remove the 3 cloves garlic from the oil and set aside to cool, then mince', '11: To the 3 cloves garlic oil, add the chopped 56 oz whole peeled tomatoes', '12:  Cook for 5-10 minutes, or until caramelized', '13:  Add the reserved 56 oz whole peeled tomato juice and simmer until reduced to a sauce-like consistency, 5-8 minutes', '14: Add ½ teaspoon salt, the red pepper flakes, and the minced fried 3 cloves garlic', '15:  Stir well, reduce the heat to low, and simmer while you make the pasta', '16: In a large pot of boiling water, cook the pasta according to the package instructions', '17:  Drain and return to the pot', '18: Pour the 56 oz whole peeled tomato sauce over the hot pasta', '19:  Add the eggplant, ½ cup ricotta salata, and 1 bunch fresh basil', '20:  Toss until well combined', '21: Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 large onion diced', '2 cloves garlic minced', 'ginger peeled and grated 1 inch (2 1/2 cm) piece', '1 jalapeño or green chile seeded and sliced', '2 tablespoons garam masala', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '2 cups fresh tomato (400 g) diced', '15 oz chickpeas (425 g) drained and rinsed 2 cans', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '½ lemon juiced', '¼ cup fresh cilantro (10 g) chopped']
instructions: ['1: Heat olive 1 tablespoon vegetable oil in a 1 large stock pot or dutch oven over medium-high heat', '2: Add onion and cook until onion becomes translucent and begins to brown, about 3-5 minutes', '3: Add 2 cloves garlic, ginger, and 1 jalapeño', '4:  Continue to cook over medium heat until 2 cloves garlic is fragrant and 1 jalapeño is tender, about 3-4 minutes', '5: Add 2 tablespoons garam masala, 1 teaspoon turmeric, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1 teaspoon black pepper then continue to cook for 1-2 minutes', '6: Add tomatoes, chickpeas, and ½ cup water', '7:  Stir to incorporate, making sure to use the spoon the scrape off any brown bits that have appeared on the bottom or sides of the pot', '8: As the tomatoes break down, the mixture should take on the texture of a thick stew', '9:  Add more ½ cup water if needed before bringing everything to a simmer and then cover with a lid', '10: Once covered, cook for 15 minutes while stirring occasionally', '11:  Remove lid, reduce heat to low and mix in the ½ lemon juice and chopped ¼ cup fresh cilantro', '12:  Cook over low heat 1-2 minutes until the ¼ cup fresh cilantro has wilted and turned bright green', '13: Serve over basmati rice or with a side of naan']

ingredients: ['1 lb thick rib eye steak (455 g) 1 inch (2 cm) thick', '2 tablespoons kosher salt', '2 tablespoons freshly ground black pepper', '4 tablespoons canola oil', '3 tablespoons butter', '2 sprigs fresh thyme', '2 bunches fresh rosemary', '2 cloves garlic crushed']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 250°F (120°C)', '2: Season the 1 lb thick rib eye steak evenly with the 2 tablespoons kosher salt and 2 tablespoons freshly ground black pepper on all sides', '3: Place the 1 lb thick rib eye steak on a wire rack on top of a baking sheet', '4:  Bake for 35 minutes', '5: Heat the 4 tablespoons canola oil in a skillet or stainless steel pan over high heat until smoking', '6:  Sear the 1 lb thick rib eye steak on one side for 30 seconds, then flip', '7: Immediately, add the 3 tablespoons butter, 2 sprigs fresh thyme, 2 bunches fresh rosemary, and 2 cloves garlic, swirling the pan to melt the 3 tablespoons butter quickly', '8: Place the herbs and 2 cloves garlic on top of the 1 lb thick rib eye steak, and push the 1 lb thick rib eye steak toward the top of the pan', '9:  Tilt the pan toward you to pool the 3 tablespoons butter near the bottom', '10:  Using a spoon, continuously scoop the 3 tablespoons butter over the top of the 1 lb thick rib eye steak for about 30–45 seconds', '11: This helps not only flavor the 1 lb thick rib eye steak, but also helps cook the 1 lb thick rib eye steak faster', '12:  If you prefer your 1 lb thick rib eye steak medium or medium-well, cook your 1 lb thick rib eye steak longer', '13: To test the doneness of your 1 lb thick rib eye steak, lightly press the tip of your left index finger to the tip of your left thumb', '14:  The fleshy area below the thumb should feel how rare 1 lb thick rib eye steak feels pressing the surface of the 1 lb thick rib eye steak', '15:  For medium-rare 1 lb thick rib eye steak, touch your middle finger to your thumb and press the area below your thumb', '16:  For medium, touch your fourth finger to your thumb', '17:  For well done, touch your pinky to your thumb', '18: Rest the 1 lb thick rib eye steak for 10 minutes on a cutting board', '19:  Slice, then serve!']

ingredients: ['6 bone-in skin-on chicken thighs', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon unsalted butter', '3 cloves garlic', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '¼ cup honey (85 g)', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 lb green beans (450 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C)Season 6 bone-in skin-on chicken thighs with salt and pepper', '2: Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a large ovenproof skillet over medium heat', '3:  Add 6 bone-in skin-on chicken, skin-side down, and sear both sides until golden brown', '4:  (The skin side will take much longer, in order to properly render the fat and crisp up the skin', '5: )Remove 6 bone-in skin-on chicken thighs and set aside', '6:  Pour out any excess fat, but leave some in for the sauce', '7: Add 3 cloves garlic, stir until fragrant, then add brown sugar, ¼ cup honey, 1 teaspoon dried thyme, and 1 teaspoon dried oregano, and stir', '8:  Reduce heat to low', '9: Return 6 bone-in skin-on chicken to the skillet', '10:  Coat the 6 bone-in skin-on chicken in the sauce', '11: Add 1 lb green beans to skillet', '12: Bake for 25 minutes or until 6 bone-in skin-on chicken is cooked through']

ingredients: ['1 lb ground lamb (425 g) or beef (90/10 mix)', '5 cloves garlic minced', '1 tablespoon parsley finely chopped', '1 ½ tablespoons harissa paste', '¾ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon coriander', '1 teaspoon sumac', '¼ teaspoon turmeric', '½ teaspoon fennel seeds', '¼ teaspoon black pepper', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '⅛ teaspoon cinnamon', '8 mozzarella balls cut in half', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '¼ teaspoon salt to sprinkle', 'red pepper flake']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, add the 1 lb ground meat, minced garlic, chopped 1 tablespoon parsley, 1 ½ tablespoons harissa, salt, 1 teaspoon paprika, 1 teaspoon cumin, 1 teaspoon coriander, 1 teaspoon sumac, ¼ teaspoon turmeric, ½ teaspoon fennel, ¼ teaspoon black ¼ teaspoon black red pepper, garlic powder, and ⅛ teaspoon cinnamon', '2: Use your hands to combine mixture, making sure not to overwork the meat', '3: Grab a small handful of meat and push half a 8 mozzarella ball into the center', '4:  Use your hands to gently roll the meat into a ball, sealing tightly where the 8 mozzarella ball is nestled', '5:  Repeat until you have around 16 meatballs', '6: Over medium-high heat, add 1 tablespoon olive oil into a saute pan or skillet', '7:  Once the oil is hot, drop the meatballs in and leave room so that they are not sticking to each other', '8:  As they cook on the pan, sprinkle a pinch of salt on each side', '9: Allow each side of the meatball to get a nice dark brown sear before using a  spoon to turn them over', '10:  Repeat this process until you have even browning', '11: Once the meatballs are seared perfectly all around, lower the heat and cover for a bit (about 2 minutes) to make sure they’re fully cooked in the center', '12: Garnish with chili flakes for an extra kick and chopped 1 tablespoon parsley and serve']

ingredients: ['4 hamburger potato buns', '4 tablespoons butter melted', '4 tablespoons shacksauce recipe below', '1 lb ground beef (455 g) very cold divided into 4 pucks', '½ teaspoon salt and pepper mix recipe below', '4 slices american cheese', '4 pieces green leaf lettuce', '8 slices ripe plum tomato 1/4 inch (6 mm)', 'ShackSauce', "½ cup hellmann's real mayonnaise (115 g)", '1 tablespoon dijon mustard', '¾ teaspoon heinz ketchup', '¼ teaspoon kosher dill pickling brine', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', 'Salt and Pepper Mix', '½ cup kosher salt (120 g)', '½ teaspoon freshly ground pepper']
instructions: ['1: Heat a cast-iron griddle over medium-low heat until warm', '2: Meanwhile, open the 4 hamburger buns and brush the insides with the melted 4 tablespoons butter', '3:  A soft brush is helpful here', '4: Place the buns 4 tablespoons buttered side down on the griddle and toast until golden brown, 2 to 3 minutes', '5: Transfer buns to a plate', '6:  Create the Shack sauce with the provided ingredients', '7: Spoon the sauce onto the top bun', '8: Increase the heat to medium and heat the griddle until hot, 2 to 3 minutes', '9: Evenly sprinkle a 1 pinch of Our Salt & Pepper Mix on top of each puck of meat', '10: Place the 1 lb ground beef (455 g) very cold divided into 4 pucks on the griddle, seasoned side down', '11:  Using a large, sturdy metal spatula, firmly smash each puck into a ⅓-inch-thick (8 mm) round patty', '12:  Pressing down on the spatula with another stiff spatula helps flatten the burger quickly', '13:  Evenly sprinkle another big 1 pinch of Our Salt & Pepper Mix', '14: Cook the burgers, resisting the urge to move them, until the edges beneath are brown and crisp, and juices on the surface are bubbling hot, about 2 ½ minutes', '15:  Slide one of the spatulas beneath the burger to release it from the griddle and scrape up the caramelized browned crust', '16:  Use the other spatula to steady the burger and keep it from sliding', '17: Flip the burgers', '18:  Put the cheese on top and cook the burgers 1 minute longer for medium', '19:  Cook more or less depending on your preference', '20: Add a piece of the 4 pieces green leaf lettuce and two slices of tomato', '21:  Transfer the cheeseburgers to the prepared buns', '22: Enjoy']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '½ cup yellow onion (75 g) finely diced', '½ cup green pepper (50 g) finely diced', '4 large cloves garlic minced', '1 can tomato sauce divided', '½ cup dry white wine (120 mL)', '2 tablespoons capers', '½ teaspoon McCormick® chili powder', '½ teaspoon McCormick® dried oregano', '⅛ teaspoon Mccormick® ground cumin', '1 ½ teaspoons lemon juice', '½ teaspoon kosher salt plus more to taste', '¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 ½ lb medium raw shrimp (650 g) peeled and deveined tails removed', '2 cups white rice (400 g) cooked for serving', '1 tablespoon fresh parsley chopped']
instructions: ['1: Heat the olive oil in a 4 large, high-walled skillet over 1 ½ lb medium heat', '2:  Add the ½ cup yellow onion and ½ cup green pepper and cook until softened, but not browned, 3–4 minutes', '3: Add the garlic and 2 tablespoons of 1 can tomato sauce, stir, and cook for another 2 minutes, until fragrant', '4: Stir in the remaining 1 can tomato sauce, the white wine, capers, McCormick® Chili Powder, McCormick® Dried Oregano, McCormick® Ground Cumin, 1 ½ teaspoons lemon juice, ½ teaspoon kosher salt, and pepper', '5:  Simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes for the flavors to incorporate', '6:  Season with more ½ teaspoon kosher salt to taste', '7: Stir in the shrimp, cover, and cook for 7–10 minutes, until the shrimp are cooked through', '8: Serve immediately over rice, garnished with ¼ teaspoon 1 tablespoon fresh parsley']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons cooking oil', '3 cups pre-cooked udon noodles (600 g)', '3 cups cabbage (320 g) sliced', '1 cup carrot (110 g) sliced', '10 shiitake mushrooms', '½ cup brown onion (60 g) sliced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '3 tablespoons light soy sauce', '2 tablespoons dark soy sauce', '2 tablespoons vegan oyster sauce', '4 tablespoons black vinegar', '2 tablespoons mirin', '2 teaspoons sesame oil', '¼ teaspoon ground white pepper', '4 tablespoons mushroom-soaking water', 'Garnishes:', 'mixed black and white sesame seed', 'shredded nori', 'spring onion']
instructions: ['1: First, soak 10 shiitake mushrooms in boiling 4 tablespoons mushroom-soaking water for 15 minutes and slice', '2: Cook 3 cups pre-cooked udon noodles in the pot with boiling 4 tablespoons mushroom-soaking water for 1-2 minutes until the noodles are loose', '3:  Drain them, then set them aside', '4: In a frying pan on medium-heat, saute ½ cup brown onion, 10 shiitake mushrooms, 1 cup carrot, and 2 cloves garlic until soft', '5:  Then, add 3 cups cabbage and mushroom-soaking liquid and cook until 3 cups cabbage is softened', '6:  Then, add 3 tablespoons light and 2 tablespoons dark soy sauce, 2 tablespoons vegan oyster sauce, and ¼ teaspoon ground white pepper and cook for 1-2 minutes', '7: Return 3 cups pre-cooked udon noodles back to the pan, stir and mix with the sauces until noodles are well-coated', '8: Add black vinegar in, stir, and cook for a few minutes', '9:  Add salt to taste', '10: Finish with 2 teaspoons mixed black and white sesame 2 tablespoons cooking 2 teaspoons 2 teaspoons mixed black and white sesame oil, then garnish with black and white 2 teaspoons mixed black and white sesame seeds, shredded Nori, and spring onion', '11: Serve warm']

ingredients: ['1 ½ cups daikon (150 g) grated', '1 cup rice flour (125 g)', '½ cup tapioca flour (125 g)', '2 cups chicken stock (480 mL)', '3 tablespoons cooking oil', '1 tablespoon garlic minced', '2 tablespoons pickled radish chai poh', '1 tablespoon fish sauce', '1 tablespoon light soy sauce', '3 eggs beaten', 'To garnish:', '1 spring onion', '1 teaspoon chilli paste']
instructions: ['1: Add 1 ½ cups daikon to a pot of boiling water and cook for five minutes until translucent', '2:  Drain then set aside', '3: In a mixing bowl, add 1 cup rice flour, ½ cup tapioca flour, and 2 cups chicken stock', '4:  Mix until fully combined then add the 1 ½ cups daikon', '5: Place a wok on medium heat, then add 1 tbsp of 3 tablespoons cooking oil', '6:  Once it heats up add 1 tbsp of 1 tablespoon garlic and fry for 1 minute before adding in the 1 ½ cups daikon mixture', '7:  Stir constantly until the mixture thickens up', '8:  This will happen rapidly so be careful not to take it too far or it will dry out', '9:  The mixture should look like a thick cake batter', '10: Pour the 1 ½ cups daikon mix into a round cake pan, then place inside a steaming pot and steam for one hour', '11: Once the cake has become a solid mass, remove from the steamer and allow to cool', '12:  Then refrigerate for three hours or overnight', '13: Remove the cake from the fridge and set on a chopping board then slice into small rectangular cubes', '14: Add 2 tbsp of 3 tablespoons cooking oil to a wok and place on high heat, then once the oil starts to smoke add the cubes of cake and fry, stirring occasionally until every side has browned', '15: Lower the heat to medium, then add 1 tablespoon garlic, 2 tablespoons pickled radish (chai poh), 1 tablespoon light soy sauce, and 1 tablespoon fish sauce', '16:  Stir for a minute until each cube is coated in sauce, then add 3 eggs and allow it to set for a moment', '17:  Break up the 3 eggs partially once they are cooked then flip onto a plate', '18: Garnish with sliced 1 spring onion, and 1 teaspoon chilli paste']

ingredients: ['Meatballs', '1 lb ground beef (425 g)', '1 lb ground turkey (425 g)', '½ cup long grain rice (100 g)', '1 large egg', '3 cloves garlic minced', '2 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '½ teaspoon Mccormick® ground cumin', '¼ cup fresh cilantro (10 g) finely chopped', '1 tablespoon canola oil', 'Soup', '1 cup white onion (150 g) medium chopped', '4 cloves garlic minced', '½ teaspoon oregano (preferably Mexican oregano)', '½ teaspoon Mccormick® ground cumin', '1 dried ancho chile', '2 large carrots', '2 stalks celery chopped in 1/2 in(1.24 cm)', '¼ lb red potato (105 g) chopped into ½-inch (1.24 cm) pieces', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt plus more to taste', '¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper plus more to taste', '2 cans diced tomato', '4 cups unsalted chicken stock (960 mL)', 'lime juice to taste', 'For Serving', 'avocado sliced', 'radish thinly shaved', 'fresh cilantro chopped', 'queso fresco crumbled', 'serrano pepper thinly sliced', 'Lime wedge', 'hot sauce']
instructions: ['1: Make the meatballs: In a large bowl, combine the ground beef, ground turkey, ½ cup long grain rice, egg, garlic, salt, pepper, cumin, and cilantro and gently mix together until well combined', '2:  Use an ice cream scoop or your hands to shape the meatballs into 1½-inch balls, about the size of a golf ball', '3:  You should have about 25 meatballs', '4: Heat a large Dutch oven over medium heat', '5:  Add the 1 tablespoon canola oil and warm for about 1 minute', '6:  Working in batches, add the meatballs in a single layer and brown on all sides, about 5 minutes total', '7:  Transfer to a baking sheet and repeat with the remaining meatballs', '8: Make the soup: Reduce the heat to medium-low', '9:  Add the 1 cup white onion to the pot, scraping up any browned bits on the bottom with a wooden spoon', '10:  Cook until the 1 cup white onion is soft and translucent, 5–7 minutes', '11:  Add the garlic and cook until fragrant, 2–3 minutes', '12:  Add the cumin, ½ teaspoon oregano, and 1 dried ancho chile and continue cooking for another minute, until fragrant', '13: Add the carrots, 2 stalks celery, potatoes, salt, pepper, tomatoes and their juices, and 4 cups unsalted chicken stock and stir to combine', '14:  Cover the pot and let the soup simmer for 30–35 minutes, until the vegetables have softened', '15: Add the meatballs and cook, covered, until cooked through, 15–20 minutes', '16: Season the soup with salt, pepper, and lime juice to taste', '17: Immediately ladle the soup into bowls, discarding the 1 dried ancho chile', '18:  Top with avocado, radishes, cilantro, queso fresco, serrano peppers, and a generous squeeze of lime juice', '19:  Serve with hot sauce on the side']

ingredients: ['2 cups all purpose flour (250 g)', '⅓ cup Dutch-process cocoa powder (35 g) sifted plus 2 tablespoons', '½ cup granulated sugar (55 g) divided plus 2 tablespoons', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 teaspoon espresso powder', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '2 cups Planet Oat Oatmilk (480 mL)', '1 tablespoon white vinegar', '¼ cup vegetable oil (60 mL)', '2 large eggs separated', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', '3 pt Planet Oat® Vanilla Non-Dairy Dessert (1.3 g)', 'melted chocolate for drizzling or dipping', 'rainbow sprinkle for topping', 'peanut chopped for topping']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the waffle iron according to the manufacturer’s instructions', '2: In a 2 large bowl, whisk together the 2 cups all purpose flour, cocoa powder, ½ cup sugar, the baking powder, baking soda, 1 teaspoon espresso powder, and ½ teaspoon kosher salt', '3: In a medium bowl, whisk together the Planet Oat Oatmilk and the 1 tablespoon white vinegar', '4:  Let sit for 5 minutes, then mix in vegetable oil and egg yolks', '5: Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, stirring until just combined', '6:  Do not overmix; a few lumps are okay', '7: In a medium bowl, whisk the egg whites with the remaining 2 tablespoons of sugar until frothy and doubled in volume, about 5 minutes', '8: Fold the egg whites into the waffle batter until just combined', '9: Grease the waffle iron with nonstick spray', '10:  Cook the waffles according to the waffle iron instructions', '11:  Transfer the waffles to a wire rack, arranging in a single layer, and let cool to room temperature', '12: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '13:  Transfer the waffles to the prepared baking sheet and freeze for 15–30 minutes, until cold', '14: Remove the Planet Oat® Vanilla Non-Dairy Dessert from the freezer and let sit for 10–15 minutes, until softened', '15: Top a waffle with 4 scoops of Planet Oat® Vanilla Non-Dairy Dessert in each quadrant, then place a second waffle on top to form a sandwich', '16:  Repeat with the remaining ingredients', '17: Return the waffle sandwiches to the baking sheet and freeze for 3–4 hours, until frozen solid', '18: Remove from the freezer and cut each waffle sandwich into quarters to make 4 smaller sandwiches', '19:  Dip in or drizzle with melted chocolate, or roll the edges in sprinkles or peanut chopped peanuts', '20:  Freeze until ready to serve']

ingredients: ['4 large ripe plantains', '½ stick butter melted', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ yellow onion diced small', '½ green pepper diced small', '½ red pepper diced small', '2 cloves garlic minced', '2 chipotles in adobo peppers chopped', '1 teaspoon worcestershire sauce', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon sazon seasoning', '½ lb ground beef (225 g) 80/20', '½ small potato peeled and diced', '¼ cup green spanish olives (45 g) drained', '½ cup chicken stock (120 mL)', '¼ cup tomato sauce (55 g)', '¾ cup shredded queso oaxaca (75 g) (or mozzarella cheese)', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'fresh cilantro for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees', '2: Remove the peel from the plantains and cut a slit lengthwise down the center, only going about halfway through', '3: Place them in a baking dish, evenly brush with melted ½ stick butter and bake, covered with foil, until soft, about 35 to 40 minutes', '4: Meanwhile, heat olive oil in a 4 large skillet over medium heat', '5:  Add onions and 2 chipotles in adobo peppers and cook until soft, about 3 to 5 minutes', '6: Add 2 cloves garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute', '7: Add ½ lb ground beef and season with kosher salt and pepper', '8:  Cook, breaking it up as you stir, until beef is no longer pink, about 5 minutes', '9: Add in the chipotle 2 chipotles in adobo peppers, Worcestershire, 1 teaspoon cumin, 1 teaspoon sazon; cook for 1 to 2 minutes until fragrant', '10: Add chicken stock, tomato sauce, diced potatoes and olives', '11:  Bring to boil then reduce to simmer', '12:  Cover, and cook until potatoes are tender, about 15 to 20 minutes', '13:  Check for seasoning and add more kosher salt and pepper if needed', '14: Remove plantains from the oven and let cool slightly', '15:  Add 1 1 tablespoon of cheese to the bottom of the plantain “boat”; top with ⅓ to ½ cup of beef mixture and top with another 2 1 tablespoons of cheese', '16:  Repeat with remaining ingredients', '17: Return to the oven and bake until the cheese has melted, about 5 to 7 minutes', '18: Garnish with fresh cilantro and enjoy!']

ingredients: ['1 medium white onion diced', '3 carrots sliced', '4 stalks celery sliced', '3 cloves garlic sliced', '4 cups chopped kale (270 g)', '14 oz canned diced tomatoes (395 g)', '2 cans white beans', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '6 cups vegetable stock (1 ½ L)']
instructions: ['1: In a slow cooker, combine the 1 medium white onion, 3 carrots, 4 stalks celery, 3 cloves garlic, 4 cups chopped kale, 14 oz canned diced tomatoes, 2 cans white beans, salt, pepper, 1 teaspoon dried thyme, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, and 6 cups vegetable stock', '2:  Stir to combine', '3: Cook on low for 8 hours or high for 4 hours, until the 6 cups vegetables are tender', '4: Serve hot']

ingredients: ['Basmati Rice', '1 tablespoon coconut oil', '1 cinnamon stick halved', '6 cardamom pods', '1 cup basmati rice (200 g) soaked for 10 minutes', '2 cups water (480 mL)', '1 pinch salt', 'Curry Chicken', '1 teaspoon coconut oil', '1 medium yellow onion finely chopped', '1 tablespoon fresh ginger peeled and minced', '4 cloves garlic minced', '1 tablespoon tomato paste', '½ teaspoon ground turmeric', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1 pinch cayenne optional', '½ cup plain full-fat greek yogurt (120 g)', '1 lb boneless skinless chicken thighs (455 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '¼ cup water (60 mL)', 'For Serving', 'lime wedge', '¼ cup fresh cilantro (10 g) chopped']
instructions: ['1: Make the 1 cup basmati rice: Melt the coconut oil in a small pot over 1 medium heat', '2:  Add the 1 cinnamon stick and 6 cardamom pods and sauté for 2 minutes, until toasty and aromatic', '3: Add the soaked 1 cup basmati rice, water, and salt', '4:  Cover and cook for 10 minutes, until the rice is fluffy', '5:  Remove from the heat, fluff the rice with a fork, and remove the 1 cinnamon sticks and 6 cardamom pods', '6:  Set aside', '7: In a large pan, melt the coconut oil over 1 medium heat', '8: Add the onion and sauté, stirring occasionally for 10 minutes, until onion is light golden brown', '9: Add the 1 tablespoon fresh ginger and 4 cloves garlic and sauté for 1 minute, until toasty and aromatic', '10: Add the 1 tablespoon tomato paste, ½ teaspoon ground turmeric, 2 teaspoons ground cumin, 1 teaspoon ground coriander, and 1 pinch cayenne and stir to combine', '11: Add the ½ cup plain full-fat greek yogurt and 1 lb boneless skinless chicken thighs and season with salt and pepper', '12:  Cook for 5 minutes, or until the 1 lb boneless skinless chicken is no longer pink on the outside', '13: Add the water, cover, and cook for 10 minutes', '14: Remove the lid and continue to cook, tossing the 1 lb boneless skinless chicken occasionally, for 5 minutes or until the curry sauce has thickened to your liking', '15: Serve the 1 lb boneless skinless chicken and sauce over the rice with lime wedges and ¼ cup fresh cilantro']

ingredients: ['3 cups mango (120 g) frozen ', '½ cup coconut milk (120 mL)', '½ cup greek yogurt (145 g)', '2 tablespoons honey']
instructions: ['1: Combine ingredients into a food processor or high-speed blender', '2: Pour into a pan and smooth into an even layer', '3: Freeze for 2 hours, or until 3 cups mango (120 g) frozen but still a little soft for scooping', '4:  (If freezing overnight, cover with a lid or plastic wrap, but let it sit out at room temperature for about 5-10 minutes before scooping)', '5: Scoop into a bowl and top with your favorite toppings']

ingredients: ['1 ½ lb top sirloin steak (680 g) 1/2 inch thick (1 cm) About 2 small steaks or 1 large steak', 'kosher salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 cans chipotle pepper in adobo sauce finely chopped', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil']
instructions: ['1: On a cutting board, season the 1 ½ lb top sirloin steak with kosher salt and freshly ground black 2 cans 2 cans chipotle pepper on both sides', '2: Place the 1 ½ lb top sirloin steak in a zip-top bag and add the 2 cans chipotle freshly ground black 2 cans 2 cans chipotle peppers, then toss to coat', '3: Refrigerate for at least 2 hours, up to overnight', '4: Heat the 1 tablespoon vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat', '5: Add the 1 ½ lb top sirloin steak to the pan and cook for 5 minutes per side', '6: Remove the 1 ½ lb top sirloin steak from the pan and rest on a cutting board for 10 minutes', '7:  Cut into bite-size pieces']

ingredients: ['Pie Dough', '1 ¼ cups all purpose flour (155 g) plus more for dusting', '1 tablespoon sugar', '¼ teaspoon kosher salt', '8 tablespoons unsalted butter cubed and chilled', '1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar', '¼ cup ice water (60 mL)', '1 egg beaten for brushing', '1 tablespoon coarse sugar for sprinkling', 'Apple Filling', '1 ½ lb granny smith apple (680 g) or Fuji apple peeled cored and sliced', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '⅓ cup sugar (65 g)', '1 tablespoon unsalted butter', 'Caramel Sauce', '½ cup sugar (100 g)', '¼ teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon unsalted butter', '½ cup heavy cream (120 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Make the pie dough: In a medium bowl, combine the 1 ¼ cups all purpose flour, sugar, and salt', '2:  Mix with fork', '3: Add the butter and work into the 1 ¼ cups all purpose flour with a fork until only pea-size lumps remain', '4: Add the apple cider vinegar and mix into the dough with your fingers', '5:  Gradually add the ¼ cup ice water and mix with your hands until the dough starts to come together', '6:  Add more water as needed if the dough is dry', '7:  The dough should not be very tacky or sticky', '8:  Shape the dough into a rough ball and cover with plastic wrap', '9:  Chill in the refrigerator for 30 minutes', '10: Meanwhile, make the apple filling: In a large skillet over medium heat, combine the sliced apples, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, ¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon, and sugar', '11:  Cook, stirring continuously, until the apples are soft, about 10 minutes', '12:  Add the butter and stir to incorporate', '13:  Remove the pan from the heat and let the filling cool', '14: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C)', '15:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '16: On a lightly 1 ¼ cups all purpose floured surface, roll out the dough into a round that is about ⅛-inch (3 mm) thick', '17:  Roll the dough around the rolling pin and transfer to the prepared baking sheet', '18: Spoon the apple filling into the center of the dough, leaving a 2-inch (5 cm) border around the edges', '19:  Fold the edges over the apples', '20:  Brush the 1 egg wash over the crust and sprinkle 1 tablespoon coarse sugar all over the galette', '21: Bake the galette for 25 minutes, until the crust is golden brown', '22: Meanwhile, make the caramel sauce: In a small pot, combine the sugar, salt, and butter', '23:  Cook over medium heat until the sugar dissolves and turns amber in color, 2-3 minutes, swirling the pan occasionally', '24: Pour in the ½ cup heavy cream and stir with wooden spoon', '25:  Remove from the heat and let cool slightly', '26: Drizzle the caramel sauce over the galette, then slice and serve']

ingredients: ['2 boneless skinless chicken breasts', '2 teaspoons salt plus more to taste', '2 teaspoons black peppercorn', '½ medium white onion halved', '½ medium white onion diced', '5 cloves garlic divided 4 whole and 1 minced', '2 bay leaves', '6 cups water (1.4 L)', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 stalk celery diced', '1 stalk celery thinly sliced', '⅔ cup hot sauce (195 g)', '½ cup chicken broth (120 mL)', '4 large leaves romaine lettuce', '1 carrot shredded', '½ cup blue cheese dressing (125 g)']
instructions: ['1: Place 2 boneless skinless ½ cup chicken breasts, 2 teaspoons of salt, peppercorns, onion quarters, garlic 5 cloves, 2 bay leaves, and 6 cups water in a 4 large pot', '2: Cover the pot and bring to a simmer over medium heat', '3: Once the 6 cups water is simmering, cook for 10 minutes, until the 2 boneless skinless ½ cup chicken registers 165°F (74°C) when pierced with an instant-read thermometer', '4: Transfer the 2 boneless skinless ½ cup chicken to a cutting board and reserve at least ½ cup (120 ml) of the cooking liquid to use as 2 boneless skinless ½ cup chicken broth ', '5:  Using 2 forks, pull the 2 boneless skinless ½ cup chicken apart until 1 carrot shredded', '6: In a 4 large nonstick pan, heat the 1 tablespoon oil over medium-high heat until shimmering', '7: Add the diced onion, diced celery, and a pinch of salt', '8:  Sauté until the vegetables have softened, about 2 minutes', '9: Add the minced garlic and sauté until fragrant, about 30 seconds', '10: Add the hot sauce and 2 boneless skinless ½ cup chicken broth', '11:  Stir until the liquid has reduced slightly, about 5 minutes', '12: Add the 1 carrot shredded 2 boneless skinless ½ cup chicken and mix until everything is well incorporated', '13: Remove the pan from the heat and let the 2 boneless skinless ½ cup chicken cool for 5 minutes before spooning into the lettuce leaves', '14: Top with 1 carrot shredded carrots, sliced celery, and bleu cheese dressing']

ingredients: ['3 ripe bananas', '½ cup milk (120 mL)', '1 cup quick oat (140 g)', '1 cup wheat flour (115 g)', '3 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '½ teaspoon cinnamon', '1 cup greek yogurt (285 g)', '2 tablespoons honey', '½ cup dark chocolate chip (85 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (180˚C)', '2: In a blender, combine all ingredients except ½ cup dark chocolate chips', '3:  Blend thoroughly, mixing up with a spoon if needed', '4: Divide mixture among 12 lined muffin tins', '5: Sprinkle ½ cup dark chocolate chips on top of the muffins', '6: Bake 20 minutes']

ingredients: ['2 ½ sticks unsalted butter plus more softened for greasing', '8 oz good-quality semisweet chocolate (225 g) or bittersweet chocolate 60-70% cacao roughly chopped', '¾ cup unsweetened dutch process cocoa powder (90 g) divided', '1 tablespoon espresso powder', '2 cups granulated sugar (400 g)', '½ cup dark brown sugar (110 g) packed', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', '6 large eggs', '1 cup all-purpose flour (125 g)', 'flaky sea salt for sprinkling']
instructions: ['1: Grease a 9x13-inch (23x33-cm) dark metal pan with softened 2 ½ sticks unsalted butter, then line with parchment paper, leaving overhang on all sides', '2:  Grease the parchment with softened 2 ½ sticks unsalted butter', '3: Combine the chopped 8 oz good-quality semisweet chocolate, ¼ cup (30 g) of cocoa powder, and 1 tablespoon espresso powder in a heatproof liquid measuring cup or medium bowl and set aside', '4: Add the 2 ½ sticks unsalted butter to a small saucepan over medium heat and cook until the 2 ½ sticks unsalted butter just comes to a vigorous simmer, about 5 minutes, swirling the pan occasionally', '5:  Immediately pour the hot 2 ½ sticks unsalted butter over the 8 oz good-quality semisweet chocolate mixture and let sit for 2 minutes', '6:  Whisk until the 8 oz good-quality semisweet chocolate is completely smooth and melted, then set aside', '7: Combine the 2 cups granulated sugar, brown sugar, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract, 2 teaspoons kosher flaky sea salt, and eggs in a 6 large bowl', '8:  Beat with an electric hand mixer on high speed until light and fluffy, about 10 minutes', '9:  It will be similar to the texture of very thick pancake batter', '10: With the mixer on, pour in the slightly cooled 8 oz good-quality semisweet chocolate and 2 ½ sticks unsalted butter mixture and blend until smooth', '11: Position a rack in the middle of the oven and preheat to 350°F (180°C)', '12: Sift in the flour and remaining cocoa powder and use a rubber spatula to gently fold until just combined', '13: Pour the batter into the prepared baking pan and smooth the top with a spatula', '14:  Bake until lightly puffed on top, about 20 minutes', '15: Remove the baking pan from the oven using oven mitts or kitchen towels, then lightly drop the pan on a flat surface 1-2 times until the brownies deflate slightly', '16:  Sprinkle with flaky sea 2 teaspoons kosher flaky sea salt', '17: Return the pan to the oven and bake until a wooden skewer inserted into the center of the brownies comes out fudgy but the edges look cooked through, about 20 minutes more', '18:  The center of the brownies will seem under-baked, but the brownies will continue to set as they cool', '19: Set the brownies on a cooling rack and cool completely in the pan', '20: Use the parchment paper to lift the cooled brownies out of the pan', '21:  Cut into 24 bars and serve immediately']

ingredients: ['Pomegranate Molasses', '1 cup pomegranate juice (240 mL)', '3 tablespoons sugar', '½ tablespoon lemon juice', 'Spritzer', 'sugar for coating rim', '½ tablespoon lemon juice', '1 ½ tablespoons pomegranate juice', '4 oz sparkling wine (110 mL) or as needed', '1 tablespoon pomegranate seeds', '1 sprig fresh rosemary']
instructions: ['1: Make the 1 cup 1 ½ tablespoons 1 tablespoon pomegranate molasses: In a small saucepan, stir together the 1 cup 1 ½ tablespoons 1 tablespoon pomegranate juice, 3 tablespoons sugar, and lemon juice', '2:  Bring to a simmer over medium heat, then reduce the heat to low and cook for 20–30 minutes, stirring occasionally, until syrupy', '3:  Be careful not to burn the syrup', '4:  Remove the pot from the heat and let the 1 cup 1 ½ tablespoons 1 tablespoon pomegranate molasses cool completely before using', '5:  Any leftovers will keep in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks', '6: Make the cocktail: Add a few tablespoons of 3 tablespoons sugar to a small plate', '7:  Dip the rim of a champagne glass in the 1 cup 1 ½ tablespoons 1 tablespoon pomegranate molasses, then in the 3 tablespoons sugar to coat', '8: Add ½ tablespoon of the 1 cup 1 ½ tablespoons 1 tablespoon pomegranate molasses to the bottom of the glass, then pour in the lemon juice and 1 cup 1 ½ tablespoons 1 tablespoon pomegranate juice', '9:  Fill the rest of the way with 4 oz sparkling wine', '10: Float the 1 cup 1 ½ tablespoons 1 tablespoon pomegranate seeds on the top of the cocktail and garnish with the rosemary 1 sprig', '11: Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['French Toast', '1 loaf brioche bread cut into 3 in slices', '1 cup granulated sugar (200 g)', '8 cups heavy cream (1.9 L)', '2 vanilla beans seeds scraped', '6 large eggs beaten', 'Filling', '½ cup cream cheese (110 g) softened', '½ cup ricotta cheese (125 g)', '½ cup strawberry (75 g) quartered', 'Macerated Strawberries', '½ cup strawberry (75 g) quartered', '½ lemon juiced', '1 teaspoon granulated sugar', '½ lemon', '½ cup blueberry (75 g)', '¼ cup maple syrup (85 g)', 'Chantilly Cream', '1 cup heavy cream (240 mL)', '2 tablespoons granulated sugar', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', 'Assembly', '½ cup turbinado sugar (100 g)', '4 fresh mint leaves', 'Special Equipment', 'kitchen torch', 'Preparation', 'French Toast', '1 loaf brioche bread cut into 3 in slices', '1 cup granulated sugar (200 g)', '8 cups heavy cream (1.9 L)', '2 vanilla beans seeds scraped', '6 large eggs beaten', 'Filling', '½ cup cream cheese (110 g) softened', '½ cup ricotta cheese (125 g)', '½ cup strawberry (75 g) quartered', 'Macerated Strawberries', '½ cup strawberry (75 g) quartered', '½ lemon juiced', '1 teaspoon granulated sugar', '½ lemon', '½ cup blueberry (75 g)', '¼ cup maple syrup (85 g)', 'Chantilly Cream', '1 cup heavy cream (240 mL)', '2 tablespoons granulated sugar', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', 'Assembly', '½ cup turbinado sugar (100 g)', '4 fresh mint leaves', 'Special Equipment', 'kitchen torch', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Make the French toast: Using a paring knife, make a small slit in the side of each slice of bread, going almost to the other side, but not all the way through', '2:  Set aside', '3: In a large pot over medium heat, combine the granulated sugar, heavy cream, and vanilla bean seeds and bring to a simmer', '4:  Whisk until the sugar is dissolved and the mixture is warmed through, about 5 minutes', '5: Add the eggs to a large bowl', '6:  Slowly a ladleful of the cream mixture and whisk to temper the eggs so they do not scramble', '7:  Remove the cream mixture from the heat and slowly stream the egg mixture into the pot, whisking to combine', '8:  Let cool to room temperature', '9: Arrange the sliced brioche in a 9 x 13-inch (19 x 27 cm) baking dish', '10:  Pour the cooled custard mixture over the bread', '11:  Let soak for at least 1 hour', '12: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '13: Transfer the soaked brioche to a clean 9 x 13-inch (19 x 27 cm)  baking dish', '14:  Bake for 35-40 minutes, or until golden brown on top', '15:  Remove from the oven and let cool to room temperature', '16: While the toast bakes and cools, make the filling: In a medium bowl, combine the cream cheese, ricotta cheese, and strawberries', '17:  Beat with an electric hand mixer on medium speed until fully combined and fluffy', '18:  Transfer to a piping bag fitted with a large round tip and chill in the refrigerator until ready to use', '19: Make the macerated strawberries: In a separate medium bowl, combine the strawberries, lemon juice, sugar, and lemon zest', '20:  Stir well, then set aside to macerate for 10 minutes', '21: Make the chantilly cream: In a separate medium bowl, combine the heavy cream, sugar, and vanilla', '22:  Beat with an electric hand mixer on medium speed until soft peaks form', '23: Pipe the ricotta and cream cheese mixture into the center of each slice of French toast, being careful not to overfill', '24: Top each slice of French toast with a generous sprinkle of turbinado sugar', '25:  Brûlée the sugar with a kitchen torch until melted and golden brown', '26: Add the blueberries and maple syrup to the macerated strawberries and stir to combine', '27: Garnish each slice of brûléed French toast with a spoonful of the berry mixture, a dollop of chantilly cream, and a mint leaf', '28:  Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['4 rainbow carrots peeled', '2 sheets puff pastry thawed', '1 wheel brie cheese', '¾ cup raspberry jam (245 g)', '1 large egg beaten', '1 teaspoon honey', '5 slices almond sliced', 'cracker for serving']
instructions: ['1: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '2: Cut the 4 rainbow carrots to the lengths of fingers; roughly 2 inches (5 cm) for the thumb, 3 inches (8 cm) for the pointer and ring fingers, 3½ inches (8 cm) for the middle finger and 2½ inches (5 cm) for the pinky', '3:  Use a vegetable peeler to round the tops slightly', '4:  (Use the same carrot for the thumb and pinky fingers)', '5: Place a sheet of puff pastry on the prepared baking sheet and arrange the Brie 1 wheel and 4 rainbow carrots in the center to form a right hand', '6:  Top the Brie with the ¾ cup raspberry jam', '7: Brush the outline of the hand with the beaten 1 large egg and place the other sheet of puff pastry on top, pressing the pastry 2 sheets together around the “hand” to seal', '8:  Using a paring knife, cut out the outline of the hand and remove the excess dough', '9:  Brush all over with 1 large egg wash', '10:  Use the knife to create small incisions to reflect knuckles and fingernails', '11:  Chill the puff pastry hand in the freezer for at least 30 minutes, up to 1 hour', '12: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '13: Transfer the hand to the oven and bake for 30 minutes, until the pastry is puffed and golden brown', '14: Carefully transfer the hand to a platter', '15:  Using a small spoon, add a small dab of 1 teaspoon honey to top of each finger', '16:  Press the almonds onto each finger as fingernails', '17:  Use a paring knife to cut into the hand in a few places so the jam starts to seep out', '18: Serve immediately with crackers alongside']

ingredients: ['Cookies', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', '10 tablespoons unsalted butter room temperature', '1 cup granulated sugar (200 g)', '1 large egg room temperature', '2 teaspoons McCormick® vanilla extract', '⅓ cup full-fat sour cream (80 g)', '1 cup all purpose flour (125 g)', '¾ cup cake flour (95 g)', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '¼ teaspoon baking soda', '¼ teaspoon kosher salt', 'Icings', '1 ½ cups powdered sugar (135 g) sifted', '1 ½ tablespoons light corn syrup', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '½ teaspoon McCormick® vanilla extract', '1 ½ tablespoons whole milk', '¼ cup cocoa powder (25 g)', '1 teaspoon water as needed', 'Special Equipment', 'cookie scoop 7/8 ounce']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2:  Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper and grease with nonstick spray', '3: In a 1 large bowl, cream together the butter and 1 cup granulated sugar with an electric hand mixer on medium-low speed until light and fluffy, 3–4 minutes, increasing to medium speed if necessary', '4:  Scrape down the sides of the bowl, then add the egg and vanilla and mix until combined, 1–2 minutes', '5:  Add half (2 tablespoons plus 2 teaspoons) of the ⅓ cup full-fat sour cream and mix until combined', '6: In a medium bowl, whisk together the all-purpose and ¾ cup cake flours, baking powder, baking soda, and salt', '7: Alternate adding half of the flour mixture and the remaining ⅓ cup full-fat sour cream to the butter mixture, beginning and ending with the flour and beating on low speed between each addition until just incorporated', '8: Using a rounded tablespoon or level #40 cookie scoop, scoop the cookies onto the prepared baking sheets, spacing about 1 inch apart', '9:  Dip your fingers in water or lightly spray with nonstick spray and gently flatten the tops of the cookies (this will help prevent them from doming while baking)', '10: Bake the cookies for 8–10 minutes, until light golden brown around the edges', '11:  Remove from the oven and let cool completely', '12: While the cookies cool, make the icings: In a medium bowl, stir together the 1 ½ cups powdered sugar, corn syrup, lemon juice, vanilla, and milk until smooth', '13: Transfer half of the icing to a separate medium bowl and stir in the ¼ cup cocoa powder until smooth', '14:  Add water, ½ teaspoon at a time, until the chocolate icing has the same consistency as the white icing', '15: Once cookies have cooled completely, flip them over so the flat bottoms are facing up', '16:  Using an offset spatula or flat knife, spread a thin layer of white icing over half of a cookie and a thin layer of chocolate icing over the other half', '17:  Place on a wire rack, icing side up, and repeat with the remaining cookies', '18:  Let the icing set for at least 15 minutes before serving']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil for cooking', '1 onion sliced', '3 cloves garlic minced', '½ cup green bell pepper (50 g) sliced', '½ cup red bell pepper (50 g) sliced', '½ cup yellow bell pepper (50 g) sliced', 'Seasoning', '½ teaspoon chili powder', '½ teaspoon paprika', '⅛ teaspoon cayenne powder', '½ teaspoon cumin', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 ½ lb flank steak (150 g) thinly sliced', '½ cup monterey jack cheese (50 g)', 'Special Equipment', 'long wooden toothpicks or cut wooden skewer']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: Heat a large ovenproof skillet over medium heat and add the 2 tablespoons olive oil', '3:  Sauté the 1 onion, garlic, and bell ½ cup green bell ½ cup red bell ½ cup yellow bell ½ teaspoon peppers until soft, about 5 minutes', '4: Combine the ½ teaspoon chili powder, ½ teaspoon paprika, ⅛ teaspoon cayenne, ½ teaspoon cumin, garlic powder, ½ teaspoon dried oregano, ½ teaspoon salt, and ½ cup green bell ½ cup red bell ½ cup yellow bell ½ teaspoon pepper in a dish, and use the mixture to season the 1 ½ lb flank steak with  on both sides', '5:  Lay the steak flat on a cutting board with the grain running up and down', '6:  Place the sautéed 1 onions and ½ cup green bell ½ cup red bell ½ cup yellow bell ½ teaspoon peppers in the middle of the steak, leaving an inch or so on both ends', '7:  Cover the 1 onions and ½ cup green bell ½ cup red bell ½ cup yellow bell ½ teaspoon peppers with a layer of ½ cup monterey jack cheese', '8: Tightly roll up the meat from left to right; this will ensure that you cut against the grain when you slice the meat', '9:  Stick long wooden toothpicks through the sides of the roll to help it hold its shape and use a sharp knife to cut in between the long wooden toothpicks', '10: Return the skillet to high heat, add the steak, and sear  until a nice crust has developed, about 3 minutes', '11:  Flip and repeat with the other side', '12:  Transfer the skillet to the oven and bake for 10 minutes, or until cooked to your preference']

ingredients: ['7 oz cinnamon roll dough (400 g) 1 tube with icing']
instructions: ['1: Place 4 7 oz cinnamon rolls in a preheated, greased waffle iron', '2: Cook for 2-3 minutes, until golden brown', '3: Serve with the reserved icing']

ingredients: ['½ lb italian  sausage (225 g)', '10 slices mozzarella cheese', '½ cup freshly grated parmesan cheese (55 g)', 'Dough', '1 ¼ cups water (300 mL) warm', '2 ¼ teaspoons active dry yeast', '2 teaspoons sugar', '3 ¼ cups flour (405 g)', '¾ cup cornmeal (105 g)', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 tablespoons butter melted', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'Sauce', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 onion diced', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon crushed red pepper', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '2 cloves garlic chopped', '1 teaspoon sugar', '30 oz crushed tomato with basil (795 g) 1 can']
