instructions: ['1: For the pizza sauce, melt the butter in a small saucepan and add the 1 onion, salt, red pepper flakes, and 1 teaspoon dried oregano, and sauté until golden brown', '2: Add the 2 cloves garlic, sugar, and crushed tomatoes, and simmer for roughly 20 minutes or until sauce thickens', '3: For the dough, combine the 2 ¼ teaspoons active dry yeast, sugar, and warm 1 ¼ cups water together and let sit for one minute', '4: In a large mixing bowl, combine the 3 ¼ cups flour, ¾ cup cornmeal, and salt', '5: Add the yeast mixture and butter into the dry ingredients and stir until dough forms', '6: Bring dough to 3 ¼ cups floured surface and knead until dough forms into a ball', '7: Move dough to large bowl drizzled with 1 tablespoon olive oil', '8:  Coat dough in oil and cover', '9:  Let rest for 1 hour', '10: Remove dough and bring onto 3 ¼ cups floured surface', '11: Cut dough in half and begin working dough out, ensuring that it is at least 2 inches (5 cm) wider than your deep dish pan', '12: Double wrap the remaining dough with plastic wrap and place in a resealable freezer bag', '13:  Freeze for up to a month', '14: Preheat your oven to 425°F (215°C)', '15: Bring your dough into your oiled and 3 ¼ cups floured deep dish pan', '16: Using your hands press dough into sides of your dish making it as even as possible', '17: Lay 10 slices of mozzarella across the dough, covering the entire bottom', '18: Add pieces of uncased ½ lb italian sausage on top of the mozzarella and top with tomato sauce', '19: Bake for 20-25 minutes or until crust starts to lightly brown and the cheese is melted', '20: Garnish with ½ cup freshly grated parmesan, cut and serve']

ingredients: ['2 large white onions', '6 cups ice water (1.4 L)', '2 cups all-purpose flour (250 g) divided', '1 teaspoon coarse salt plus more for sprinkling', '¼ teaspoon white pepper', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '1 cup beer (240 mL) lager or pilsner', '2 tablespoons ice water', 'peanut oil for frying']
instructions: ['1: In a 2 large pot over medium-high heat, bring 3 inches (8 cm) of peanut oil to 375˚F (190˚C)', '2: Peel and cut onions crosswise into ½ (1 ⅓ cm) inch slices', '3: Separate into rings and place in a 2 large bowl with 6 6 2 1 cups 2 2 tablespoons ice water while you prepare the batter', '4: In a medium mixing bowl, whisk together 1 6 2 1 cup 2 2 1 cups all-purpose flour (125 g), 1 teaspoon coarse salt, 2 large ¼ teaspoon white pepper, and ½ teaspoon baking powder', '5: Whisk in beer and 2 2 tablespoons of 6 6 2 1 cups 2 2 tablespoons ice water until just combined', '6: In a separate bowl, add the remaining 1 6 2 1 cup (125 g) of 2 2 1 cups all-purpose flour', '7: Remove the rings from the 6 6 2 1 cups 2 2 tablespoons ice water bath and pat dry', '8:  Coat the rings first in the 2 2 1 cups all-purpose flour then in the batter, allowing any excess to drip off', '9: Working in batches, transfer battered rings to hot peanut oil to cook for 2 to 3 minutes, or until golden brown', '10: Transfer to a paper towel lined rack to drain', '11:  Sprinkle with 1 teaspoon coarse salt']

ingredients: ['½ lb ground beef (225 g)', '1 pinch salt', '1 pinch pepper', '1 ½ burger buns', '1 slice american cheese sliced', 'Burger Sauce', '½ cup mayonnaise (120 g)', '1 gherkin diced', '1 teaspoon white vinegar', '1 teaspoon yellow mustard', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon smoked paprika', '½ teaspoon white pepper', 'Salads', 'onion finely diced', 'lettuce finely shredded', '1 gherkin thinly sliced', 'Preparation', '½ lb ground beef (225 g)', '1 pinch salt', '1 pinch pepper', '1 ½ burger buns', '1 slice american cheese sliced', 'Burger Sauce', '½ cup mayonnaise (120 g)', '1 gherkin diced', '1 teaspoon white vinegar', '1 teaspoon yellow mustard', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon smoked paprika', '½ teaspoon white pepper', 'Salads', 'onion finely diced', 'lettuce finely shredded', '1 gherkin thinly sliced', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Roll half of the beef mince into a ball and pat it down until a finger thick, bigger than palm size patty', '2:  Repeat with remaining beef', '3: Fry both patties with salt and pepper for 2 and a half minutes a side', '4:  Add 1 cheese single to one of the patties', '5: Toast the burger buns on a dry pan on medium heat until one of the sides is golden brown', '6: Mix all the sauce ingredients and set aside', '7: Time to build this bad boy! Spread burger sauce on a bun, sprinkle diced onion, shredded lettuce, place the patty with cheese, place another slice of bun', '8: Then more sauce, more onion, shredded lettuce, gherkin slices, another patty, and the last slice of bun!Dig in and get lovin’ it!Nutrition  Calories: 1774 Fat: 131 grams  Carbs: 69 grams Fiber:  7 grams  Sugars: 17 grams  Protein: 74 grams']

ingredients: ['1 cup almond milk (235 mL) or milk of your choice', '½ cup frozen strawberry (75 g)', '1 banana frozen', '1 cup ice (140 g)', 'Garnish (Optional)', 'whipped cream', '1 strawberry sliced']
instructions: ['1: Put all ingredients into a blender and mix until smooth', '2: Serve in a glass and garnish with toppings (optional)']

ingredients: ['1 cup sugar (200 g)', '⅓ cup cocoa powder (40 g)', '3 tablespoons self-rising flour', '1 pinch kosher salt', '1 ¾ cups whole milk (420 mL)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '3 tablespoons unsalted butter', 'Serving Ideas', '8 buttermilk biscuits', 'pound cake', 'ice cream', 'strawberry']
instructions: ['1: Sift the 1 cup sugar, ⅓ cup cocoa powder, 3 tablespoons self-rising flour, and 1 pinch kosher salt into a large skillet or saucepan', '2:  Add the 1 ¾ cups whole milk and whisk to combine', '3:  Cook over medium heat, stirring frequently, until slightly thickened, 7-10 minutes', '4:  Remove from the heat', '5: Stir in the 1 teaspoon vanilla and 3 tablespoons unsalted 8 butter until the 3 tablespoons unsalted 8 butter is melted and well incorporated', '6: Serve immediately over 3 tablespoons unsalted 8 8 buttermilk biscuits, pound cake, ice cream, or as a dip for your favorite fruit']

ingredients: ['Ribs', '2 tablespoons coarse salt', '1 tablespoon black pepper', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '¼ teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ teaspoon onion powder', '½ teaspoon sugar', '½ teaspoon white pepper', '1 rack baby back ribs silverskin removed cut in half crosswise', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '¼ cup apple cider vinegar (60 mL)', '1 teaspoon liquid smoke optional', 'BBQ Sauce', '½ cup store-bought brown sugar barbecue sauce (165 g)', '1 teaspoon chipotle pepper in adobo sauce', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '1 tablespoon orange juice', 'Preparation', 'Ribs', '2 tablespoons coarse salt', '1 tablespoon black pepper', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '¼ teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ teaspoon onion powder', '½ teaspoon sugar', '½ teaspoon white pepper', '1 rack baby back ribs silverskin removed cut in half crosswise', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '¼ cup apple cider vinegar (60 mL)', '1 teaspoon liquid smoke optional', 'BBQ Sauce', '½ cup store-bought brown sugar barbecue sauce (165 g)', '1 teaspoon chipotle pepper in adobo sauce', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '1 tablespoon orange juice', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Make the ribs: In a small bowl, combine the salt, black pepper, chili powder, cayenne, garlic powder, onion powder, sugar, and white pepper', '2:  Whisk to combine', '3: Season both sides of the baby back ribs with some of the dry rub, reserving the rest for another use', '4: Add the water, liquid smoke, and apple cider vinegar to the basin of an Instant Pot', '5:  Place the rack insert in the bottom and set the ribs on the rack on their sides, spiraling around the inside of the pot', '6: Close the lid of the Instant Pot, making sure the vent is set to sealing', '7:  Select manual pressure and set the pressure to high', '8:  Set the timer for 25 minutes', '9:  When the timer goes off, turn the machine to venting to release the pressure', '10: Meanwhile, make the barbecue sauce: In a medium bowl, stir together the barbecue sauce, chipotle in adobo, chili powder and orange juice', '11:  Set aside', '12: When the ribs have about 10 minutes of cook time left, arrange an oven rack in the upper third of the oven and turn the broiler to high', '13:  Line a baking sheet with foil', '14: Transfer the ribs to the prepared baking sheet', '15:  Brush liberally with the barbecue sauce', '16: Broil the ribs for 2–4 minutes, until the sauce begins to caramelize']

ingredients: ['Chicken Katsu', '2 cups vegetable oil (480 mL) for frying', '4 boneless skinless chicken thighs', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt plus more to taste', '2 cups panko bread crumbs (230 g)', '3 large eggs beaten', '1 cup all purpose flour (125 g)', 'Tonkatsu Sauce', '¼ cup ketchup (60 g)', '2 teaspoons sugar', '¼ cup worcestershire sauce (65 g)', 'Cabbage Slaw', '½ green cabbage thinly sliced', '½ cup mayonnaise (120 g)', '1 ½ tablespoons rice vinegar', '½ teaspoon kosher salt plus more to taste', 'For Serving', '8 small flour tortillas', 'sesame seed', 'scallion thinly sliced', 'fresh cilantro leaf', 'Lime wedge', 'Preparation', 'Chicken Katsu', '2 cups vegetable oil (480 mL) for frying', '4 boneless skinless chicken thighs', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt plus more to taste', '2 cups panko bread crumbs (230 g)', '3 large eggs beaten', '1 cup all purpose flour (125 g)', 'Tonkatsu Sauce', '¼ cup ketchup (60 g)', '2 teaspoons sugar', '¼ cup worcestershire sauce (65 g)', 'Cabbage Slaw', '½ green cabbage thinly sliced', '½ cup mayonnaise (120 g)', '1 ½ tablespoons rice vinegar', '½ teaspoon kosher salt plus more to taste', 'For Serving', '8 small flour tortillas', 'sesame seed', 'scallion thinly sliced', 'fresh cilantro leaf', 'Lime wedge', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Make the chicken: Fill a heavy-bottomed, high-sided skillet with about ½ inch (1 ¼ cm) of vegetable oil', '2:  Heat over medium heat until the oil reaches 350°F (180°C)', '3: Place the chicken thighs on a cutting board and cover with plastic wrap', '4:  Pound the chicken with the flat side of a meat tenderizer until all of the thighs are between ¼ in (6 ml) and ⅓ inch (8 ml) thick', '5: On the cutting board, season the flattened chicken on both sides with the salt', '6: Add the panko, eggs, and flour to 3 separate shallow bowls', '7: Coat each piece of chicken in the flour, shaking off any excess, then in the egg, then in the panko', '8:  Gently press the panko into the chicken to ensure a thick, even coating', '9: Working in batches, carefully fry the chicken in the hot oil for about 2 minutes per side, until golden brown and cooked through', '10:  Set on paper towels to drain and immediately season lightly with salt', '11: Make the tonkatsu sauce: In a small bowl, mix together the ketchup, sugar, and Worcestershire sauce', '12:  Set aside', '13: Make the cabbage slaw: In a medium bowl, toss the cabbage, mayonnaise, vinegar, and salt until well coated', '14:  Season with additional salt if needed', '15:  Set aside', '16: Wrap the tortillas in a damp kitchen towel and microwave for 30 seconds', '17: Slice the chicken thighs into ⅓-inch (8 ml) thick pieces', '18:  Place about half of a thigh worth of meat onto a flour tortilla', '19:  Top with about ¼ cup (25 G) of cabbage slaw, a drizzle of tonkatsu sauce, sesame seeds, scallions, and cilantro', '20:  Repeat with remaining chicken to make 8 tacos total', '21:  Serve with lime wedges alongside']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 medium yellow onion chopped', '1 jalapeño seeded and sliced', '1 red bell pepper seeded and chopped', '4 tablespoons chili powder', '2 cayennes', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '28 oz crushed tomatoes (795 g)', '4 cups vegetable broth (960 mL)', '4 medium roma tomatoes diced', '1 ½ cups quinoa (255 g) rinsed', '1 cup black beans (170 g) drained and rinsed', '1 cup red kidney bean (170 g) drained and rinsed', '1 tablespoon tomato paste', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '8 bread bowls for serving']
instructions: ['1: In a large pot over medium heat, combine the 1 tablespoon olive oil, 3 cloves garlic, onion, 1 jalapeño, red bell pepper, 4 tablespoons chili powder, cayenne, 2 teaspoons ground cumin, black pepper, and 1 teaspoon kosher salt', '2:  Stir well and cook until the spices are fragrant, 3–5 minutes', '3: Add the 28 oz crushed 28 oz crushed 4 medium roma 1 tablespoon tomatoes, 4 cups vegetable broth, 28 oz crushed 4 medium roma 1 tablespoon tomatoes, 1 ½ cups quinoa, black beans, kidney beans, 28 oz crushed 4 medium roma 1 tablespoon tomato paste, and 1 teaspoon dried oregano and mix well', '4:  Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to medium heat, cover, and simmer for 25–30 minutes', '5: Let the 4 tablespoons chili cool for 2 minutes, then ladle into 8 bread bowls and serve']

ingredients: ['Chicken Wellington', '12 oz cremini mushroom (340 g) stemmed and wiped clean', '4 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil divided', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon onion powder', '½ teaspoon dried thyme', '2 teaspoons dried parsley', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt divided', '¾ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper divided', '1 boneless chicken breast large', '1 tablespoon dijon mustard', '4 slices prosciutto', '1 sheet frozen puff pastry thawed', 'large egg beaten', 'Pan Gravy', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons all purpose flour', '2 cups chicken stock (480 mL)', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 teaspoons dried parsley', 'Preparation', 'Chicken Wellington', '12 oz cremini mushroom (340 g) stemmed and wiped clean', '4 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil divided', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon onion powder', '½ teaspoon dried thyme', '2 teaspoons dried parsley', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt divided', '¾ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper divided', '1 boneless chicken breast large', '1 tablespoon dijon mustard', '4 slices prosciutto', '1 sheet frozen puff pastry thawed', 'large egg beaten', 'Pan Gravy', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons all purpose flour', '2 cups chicken stock (480 mL)', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 teaspoons dried parsley', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Add the mushrooms to the bowl of a food processor and pulse until coarsely chopped, about 18-20 pulses', '2: Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a medium skillet over medium heat', '3:  Add the mushrooms, garlic powder, onion powder, dried thyme, dried parsley, ½ teaspoon salt, and ¼ teaspoon black pepper and stir to fully combine', '4:  Cook, stirring often, until all of the liquid in the pan has evaporated, about 8 minutes', '5:  Turn off the heat and transfer the mushroom mixture to a bowl to cool', '6:  Wipe the pan clean with a paper towel', '7: Season the chicken breast on both sides with the remaining teaspoon of salt and ½ teaspoon pepper', "8:  Tie the chicken breast with 4 pieces of butcher's twine to create an even cylindrical shape", '9: Heat the remaining 2 tablespoons of oil in the skillet over medium-high heat', '10:  Once the oil is hot, add the chicken breast and cook until browned all over, about 10 minutes', '11:  Transfer the chicken breast to a plate and set the pan aside to make the pan gravy later', "12: Remove the butcher's twine using a pair of scissors and brush the chicken all over with the Dijon mustard", '13:  Allow the chicken breast to cool to room temperature', '14: On 2 overlapping sheets of plastic wrap, lay out the puff pastry sheet', '15:  Arrange overlapping strips of prosciutto over the dough in an even square, leaving a 1-inch border around the edges of the pastry', '16:  Spread the mushroom mixture evenly over the prosciutto', '17: Place the chicken breast at the bottom of the mushroom mixture and tightly and evenly wrap with the prosciutto and puff pastry, using the plastic wrap to help wrap it tightly and seal the ends', '18:  Wrap in the plastic, tying the ends together to help keep the Wellington’s shape', '19:  Chill in the refrigerator for 15 minutes', '20: Arrange a rack in the lower third of the oven', '21:  Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '22:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '23: Remove the Wellington from the plastic wrap and place seam-side down on the prepared baking sheet', '24:  Using the back of a paring knife, make a crosshatch pattern on top of the pastry, making sure not to cut all the way through', '25:  Brush the pastry all over with the beaten egg', '26: Transfer the baking sheet to the oven to bake for 25–30 minutes, or until the puff pastry is golden brown and the internal temperature of the chicken reaches 165°F (75°C)', '27:  Let the Wellington rest for 5–10 minutes before slicing into 1–1½-inch-thick slices', '28: While the Wellington rests, make the pan gravy: In the pan with the leftover chicken juices, heat the olive oil over medium heat', '29:  When the oil is warm, add the flour and cook, stirring frequently, until fragrant and toasted, about 2 minutes', '30:  Add the chicken stock and simmer until the sauce is thick enough to coat the back of a spoon, 4–5 minutes', '31:  Stir in the salt, pepper, and parsley and transfer to a bowl or gravy boat to serve', '32: Serve the Wellington warm with the pan gravy and sides of your choice']

ingredients: ['Dressing', '⅓ cup olive oil (80 mL)', '3 tablespoons lime juice', '1 bunch fresh cilantro stems chopped off', '2 teaspoons chipotle pepper in adobo sauce', '¼ teaspoon salt', 'Salad', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 tablespoons honey', '1 teaspoon Mccormick® ground cumin', '1 teaspoon McCormick® Paprika', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 lime zested', '¾ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 lb shrimp (455 g) peeled and deveined', '1 corn cob', '5 oz baby greens (140 g) mixed', '1 cup grape tomato (200 g)', '½ cup radish (50 g) quatered', 'avocado half cubed', '1 scallion thinly sliced']
instructions: ['1: Dressing: Place all the ingredients in a food processor', '2:  Process for about 1 minute until emulsified', '3:  Set aside', '4: In a large bowl, mix together olive oil, 2 tablespoons honey, McCormick® 1 teaspoon Mccormick® ground cumin, paprika, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, lime zest, salt, and pepper', '5:  Add 1 lb shrimp and toss to coat', '6:  Thread 1 lb shrimp onto soaked bamboo skewers', '7: Heat grill or grill pan to medium-high heat', '8:  Place 1 lb shrimp skewers and the 1 corn on the grill and close the lid', '9:  Grill for 4 minutes, then flip skewers', '10:  Grill for 3 minutes on the second side, then take the skewers off the grill', '11:  Rotate 1 corn to get light grill marks', '12:  (Corn will take about 5 minutes longer than the 1 lb shrimp', '13: ) Take the 1 corn off the grill', '14: Pull the 1 lb shrimp off the skewers', '15:  Slice 1 corn off the cob', '16: Assemble the salad: On a platter, arrange the mixed 5 oz baby greens', '17:  Scatter the tomatoes, radishes, and avocado on top', '18:  Add the 1 lb shrimp and 1 corn', '19:  Scatter sliced 1 scallion over the salad', '20:  Drizzle with the dressing', '21:  Serve!']

ingredients: ['3 ripe bananas mashed', '¾ cup honey (255 g)', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons almond milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 cups whole wheat flour (260 g)', '1 teaspoon baking soda', 'salt a pinch', 'Oil Substitutes (Choose One)', '¼ cup applesauce (65 mL) or Greek yogurt', '¼ cup greek yogurt (70 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 325°F (170°C)', '2: Mash 3 ripe bananas, then add ¼ cup applesauce or Greek yogurt, ¾ cup honey, 1 egg, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, and 2 tablespoons almond milk', '3:  Whisk until well combined', '4: In another bowl, mix whole 2 cups whole wheat flour, 1 teaspoon baking soda, and salt together', '5: Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients and stir well', '6: Spray loaf pan with cooking spray or wipe down with oil', '7:  Pour mix into a loaf pan', '8: Bake 50-55 minutes']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon avocado oil', '1 medium onion', '1 cup zucchini (125 g) chopped', '2 cups broccoli (300 g) chopped', '1 cup celery (100 g) chopped', '4 cloves garlic finely minced', '½ cup quinoa (100 g) rinsed uncooked', '1 can chili beans', '½ teaspoon ground cumin', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 teaspoons onion powder', '2 teaspoons paprika', 'salt to taste', 'red chili flake optional', '32 oz low sodium vegetable broth (7 L)']
instructions: ['1: Set IP to Saute mode', '2: Heat 1 tablespoon avocado oil', '3: Add chopped 4 cloves garlic, 32 oz low sodium vegetables, ½ cup quinoa, chili beans and spices', '4: Saute for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally', '5: Add 32 oz low sodium vegetable stock and stir well', '6: Shut the IP lid', "7:  Change setting to Multigrain 9 minutes with valve in 'Sealing' position", '8: When IP beeps, you can either manually vent, or allow for natural release of steam', '9:  Carefully open the lid', '10:  Taste and adjust spices accordingly']

ingredients: ['Mushrooms', '2 tablespoons oil', '1 shallot finely chopped', '2 cloves garlic chopped', '2 cups mushroom (150 g) quartered', '1 teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '4 oz cream cheese (115 g) softened', '2 egg yolks', '¼ cup fresh chives (10 g) chopped', 'Steak', '1 sirloin steak', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 teaspoons pepper', '2 tablespoons canola oil', '¼ cup grated parmesan cheese (30 g)', 'Preparation', 'Mushrooms', '2 tablespoons oil', '1 shallot finely chopped', '2 cloves garlic chopped', '2 cups mushroom (150 g) quartered', '1 teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '4 oz cream cheese (115 g) softened', '2 egg yolks', '¼ cup fresh chives (10 g) chopped', 'Steak', '1 sirloin steak', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 teaspoons pepper', '2 tablespoons canola oil', '¼ cup grated parmesan cheese (30 g)', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat', '2:  Add shallots and garlic, cooking until translucent', '3:  Add mushrooms, salt, and pepper, cooking until mushrooms are golden brown', '4:  Remove from heat', '5: In a medium bowl, combine mushrooms, cream cheese, egg yolks, and chives, stirring until evenly incorporated', '6:  Set aside', '7: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '8: On a cutting board, season both sides of the steak with salt and pepper', '9: Cut about ¾ of the way through the steak, making the incisions 1-inch (2 cm) part', '10: Pack a spoonful of the mushrooms mixture into each cut in the steak', '11: Heat the oil in a pan over high heat', '12:  Sear the steak for about 30 seconds, then bake for 10-15 minutes, depending on how you like your steak cooked', '13:  Slice and serve']

ingredients: ['nonstick cooking spray for greasing', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 medium yellow onion diced', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon paprika', '¼ teaspoon chili powder', '1 lb ground beef (425 g)', '3 teaspoons kosher salt', '1 can black beans drained and rinsed', '2 cups enchilada sauce (470 g) divided', '8 medium flour tortillas', '2 cups shredded mexican cheese blend (200 g)', '¼ cup fresh cilantro (10 g) finely chopped', 'cotija cheese for garnish - optional']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2:  Grease a 9 x 13-inch baking dish with nonstick spray', '3: Heat the 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large pan over medium-high heat', '4:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the onion and cook, stirring often, until beginning to soften, about 5 minutes', '5:  Add the 3 cloves garlic, cumin, 1 teaspoon paprika, and ¼ teaspoon chili powder and cook, stirring constantly, until aromatic, about 30 seconds', '6: Add the ground beef and cook, breaking up with a wooden spoon, until the beef is browned and cooked through, about 5 minutes', '7:  Add the 3 teaspoons kosher salt and 1 can black beans and continue cooking until warmed through, about 3 minutes', '8:  Remove the pan from the heat', '9: Add 1 2 2 ¼ cup of 2 2 2 ¼ cups enchilada sauce to the bottom of the prepared baking dish and use a spatula to spread evenly', '10: Scoop ½ 2 2 ¼ cup of the beef mixture onto the lower half of a tortilla, then roll up', '11:  Place the rolled tortilla seam side-down in the baking dish', '12:  Repeat with the remaining beef and tortillas, arranging in a row', '13: Top with the remaining 2 2 ¼ cup of 2 2 2 ¼ cups enchilada sauce', '14:  Sprinkle the 2 2 ¼ cups shredded Mexican cheese  on top', '15: Bake until the cheese has melted, about 10 minutes', '16: Top the 2 2 2 ¼ cups enchiladas with the cilantro and Cotija cheese, if desired, and serve immediately']

ingredients: ['2 cups strawberry (300 g) stems removed', '⅓ cup banana (65 g) sliced', '1 ½ cups watermelon (230 g) peeled and cubed', '¼ cup coconut water (60 mL)', '1 cup ice (215 g)', 'Toppings', 'kiwi', 'mango', 'pomegranate seed']
instructions: ['1: Add all the ingredients to a blender and mix on high', '2: Pour into a bowl or half a hollowed out small 1 ½ cups watermelon, and top with desired fruit and other toppings']

ingredients: ['3 boneless skinless chicken breasts', '1 cup low flat buttermilk (240 mL)', '¼ cup sriracha sauce (65 g)', '1 cup panko breadcrumbs (50 g)', '1 cup all-purpose flour (125 g)', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon black pepper', '1 teaspoon paprika', '½ teaspoon seasoning salt', '3 tablespoons canola oil']
instructions: ['1: On a cutting board, slice each 3 boneless skinless chicken breast into strips', '2: In a bowl, combine the 1 cup low flat buttermilk and Sriracha and mix to combine', '3:  Add the 3 boneless skinless chicken strips and submerge in the 1 cup low flat buttermilk mixture', '4:  Cover with plastic wrap', '5:  Or toss all of the ingredients into a resealable bag', '6:  Refrigerate for at least 2 hours', '7: Preheat oven to 425˚F (220˚C)', '8: In a shallow dish, add the Panko, 1 cup all-purpose flour, ½ teaspoon ½ teaspoon ½ teaspoon seasoning salt, ¼ teaspoon black pepper, 1 teaspoon paprika, and ½ teaspoon seasoning ½ teaspoon ½ teaspoon ½ teaspoon seasoning salt and mix to combine', '9: Dip the 3 boneless skinless chicken strips in the 1 cup panko mixture, ensuring they are fully coated', '10: Line a rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper and brush with 3 tablespoons canola oil', '11: Transfer the 3 boneless skinless chicken to the baking sheet, and bake for 10 minutes', '12:  Flip the 3 boneless skinless chicken over, and bake for an additional 10 minutes', '13:  If desired, broil for 2-3 minutes to crisp up at the end', '14: Transfer the 3 boneless skinless chicken to a paper towel-lined plate to remove extra grease']

ingredients: ['2 slices sourdough bread', '4 slices jalapeño to taste', '1 ¼ cups shredded Cabot Pepper Jack Cheese (125 g) divided', '2 tablespoons jalapeño finely chopped', '½ tablespoon habanero pepper optional finely chopped', '1 tablespoon green onion finely chopped', '6 jalapeño-flavored potato chips lightly crushed', 'Preparation', '2 slices sourdough bread', '4 slices jalapeño to taste', '1 ¼ cups shredded Cabot Pepper Jack Cheese (125 g) divided', '2 tablespoons jalapeño finely chopped', '½ tablespoon habanero pepper optional finely chopped', '1 tablespoon green onion finely chopped', '6 jalapeño-flavored potato chips lightly crushed', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium heat', '2:  Hold a slice of bread over the skillet to measure the space for the cheese crust', '3:  Place 2–4 jalapeño slices in the skillet where the bread will go, then top with ¼ cup Cabot Pepper Jack Cheese roughly the shape and size of the slice of bread', '4:  Place the bread on top of the cheese and press down lightly so the melting cheese sticks to the bread', '5: Top the bread with ¾ cup Cabot Pepper Jack Cheese, the chopped jalapeño, habanero (if using), green onions, and potato chips', '6:  Cover with the other slice of bread', '7:  Cook for 2–3 minutes, or until the cheese on the bottom forms a browned crust', '8: Using a spatula, lift the sandwich out of the pan and layer the remaining jalapeño slices and Cabot Pepper Jack Cheese in the skillet', '9:  Place the sandwich on top of the cheese in the pan, cheese-crust side up, and press down lightly to adhere', '10:  Cook for 3–5 minutes, or until the cheese crust is well browned and the cheese in the middle of the sandwich is completely melted', '11:  Let the sandwich rest for 1 minute before slicing']

ingredients: ['Coconut Cream Layer', '4 cups shredded coconut (400 g) unsweetened', '½ cup coconut cream (150 g)', '⅓ cup maple syrup (75 g)', '1 pinch salt optional', 'Chocolate Layer', '1 ½ cups dark chocolate chips (260 g)', '⅓ cup coconut cream (100 g)', 'Topping', 'shredded coconut unsweetened']
instructions: ['1: Combine shredded coconut, coconut cream, ⅓ cup maple syrup, and a 1 pinch of salt to a food processor and blend until mixture becomes easily moldable', '2:  You may have to press down the mixture and reblend a few times for this to happen', '3: Pour mixture into an 8x8-inch (20x20-cm) pan lined with parchment or wax paper', '4:  Press down firmly with a rubber spatula and smooth mixture into an even layer', '5: Freeze for 30 minutes', '6: Prepare chocolate layer by combining 1 ½ cups dark chocolate chips and coconut cream in a bowl', '7:  Microwave in 15-second intervals, stirring mixture thoroughly in between', '8: Pour chocolate mixture on top of the coconut cream layer and spread into an even layer with a rubber spatula', '9: Sprinkle shredded coconut on top', '10: Freeze for 1 hour, or until chocolate layer has set', '11: Cut into 16 squares']

ingredients: ['Cookie Dough:', '½ cup softened butter (115 g)', '½ cup brown sugar (125 g)', '¼ cup white sugar (60 g)', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla essense', '1 ½ cups white flour (225 g)', '1 tablespoon corn flour', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '¼ teaspoon baking soda', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', 'Sugar Mixture:', '2 tablespoons brown sugar & White sugar', '½ teaspoon cinnamon', 'Icing:', '3 cups icing sugar (600 g)', '½ cup melted butter (100 g)', '½ teaspoon cinnamon', '3 tablespoons milk']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 175 degrees celsius (351 degrees fahrenheit) and line a flat tray with parchment paper', '2: In a big bowl, mix together the butter, white sugar, brown sugar and mix until light and fluffy, then mix in the 1 egg and 1 teaspoon vanilla', '3: Sift in the dry ingredients together : 1 ½ cups white 1 tablespoon corn flour, cornflour, baking powder, baking soda and cinnamon', '4:  Mix until successfully reached cookie batter consistency', '5: In a small bowl mix the brown sugar, white sugar and cinnamon for the cookies to be rolled inShape the cookie dough into a small circle and roll in the sugar mixtureFlatten the cookies to about the size of your palm and put in the oven for 12 minutes or lightly brown on top ', '6: In a big bowl mix together the butter, 3 tablespoons milk, 3 cups icing sugar and cinnamon for the 3 cups icing', '7:  Put in a piping bag and cut off about 2cm from the tip', '8: Once cooled, ice the cookies and serve']

ingredients: ['Salmon', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon paprika', '4 salmon fillets', 'Avocado Salsa', '2 avocados', '¼ red onion', '1 lime juiced', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', 'Optional', 'cilantro chopped for garnish']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, mix oil, salt, 1 teaspoon pepper, and 1 teaspoon paprika', '2:  Coat the 4 salmon fillets with the marinade and refrigerate for 30 minutes', '3: Grill the 4 salmon on an 11 inch (28 cm) griddle pan on high heat for two minutes on each side', '4: In a separate bowl, lightly toss 2 avocados, ¼ ¼ red onion, the juice from one 1 lime, 1 tablespoon olive oil, and salt to taste', '5: Spoon avocado salsa on top of the cooked 4 salmon', '6:  Top with finely cut cilantro']

ingredients: ['2 lb chuck roast (910 g) cubed', '⅓ cup flour (40 g)', '1 tablespoon seasoned salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '3 cloves garlic diced', '1 small onion diced', '4 red potatoes peeled and diced', '3 large carrots chopped', '3 stalks celery chopped', '8 oz mushroom (220 g) quartered', '4 cups beef broth (945 mL)', '1 tablespoon paprika', '2 tablespoons worcestershire sauce', '1 bag frozen peas', 'sourdough bread bowl']
instructions: ['1: Toss the 4 cups beef in the ⅓ cup flour, 1 tablespoon seasoned salt, and 1 teaspoon pepper', '2:   Brown in batches in a skillet with oil on high heat', '3: In the same pan, cook 3 cloves garlic and 1 small onions until the 1 small onions are clear', '4: In the crockpot, layer the 4 red potatoes, 3 large carrots, 3 stalks celery, 4 cups beef and 1 small onion mixture, and mushrooms', '5:   Pour in 4 cups beef broth, 1 tablespoon paprika, and 2 tablespoons worcestershire', '6: Cover and cook on low for 7 and a half hours', '7: While the stew is cooking, hollow out sourdough bread bowl', '8:  Use the hollowed out portion and toothpicks to create ears on the bread bowl', '9: Ten minutes before serving, stir in a 1 bag of frozen peas', '10: Serve in the prepared bread bowl']

ingredients: ['2 cups pineapple (490 g) cubed', '2 cups cantaloupe (320 g) cubed', '2 cups honeydew melon (320 g) cubed', '2 cups mango (330 g) cubed', 'Dressing', '3 tablespoons lime juice', '1 tablespoon maple syrup']
instructions: ['1: Combine all the ingredients above in a large bowl', '2: Mix the dressing ingredients together and spread over fruit, mix well']

ingredients: ['20 oz jackfruit (565 g) 2 cans in brine or water', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ yellow onion sliced', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon liquid smoke', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 cup vegetable stock (240 mL)', '¾ cup vegan bbq sauce (215 g)', 'tortilla to serve']
instructions: ['1: Drain and rinse 20 oz jackfruit, then cut  20 oz jackfruit into smaller pieces, removing the core', '2: Add 1 tablespoon olive oil, onions, 3 cloves garlic, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1 teaspoon pepper to a large frying pan or skillet over medium-high heat', '3:  Sauté until onions are tender and become translucent', '4: Add 20 oz jackfruit, 1 teaspoon chili powder, 1 teaspoon paprika, 1 teaspoon cumin, 1 teaspoon liquid smoke, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon pepper, and 1 teaspoon liquid smoke, and stir', '5: Add 1 cup vegetable stock, cover, and cook another 10-15 minutes, until  20 oz jackfruit is soft enough that it can be mashed', '6: Preheat oven to 400ºF (200ºC)', '7: Mash 20 oz jackfruit with potato masher or a couple of forks, until it looks pulled or shredded', '8: Spread an even layer of pulled 20 oz jackfruit across a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '9: Bake for 25 minutes', '10: Remove from oven and pour on ¾ cup vegan BBQ sauce', '11:  Stir to combine', '12: Place back in oven for 10 more minutes', '13: Serve on warm tortillas with desired taco toppings']

ingredients: ['For ground masala:', '1 teaspoon channa dal', '3 teaspoons coriander seed', '½ teaspoon mustard seed', '½ teaspoon fenugreek seeds', '½ teaspoon sesame seed', '¼ teaspoon asafoetida', '7 dried red chilis', '¼ cup coconut (25 g) grated', 'For sambar:', '1 tamarind lemon size clump', '3 cups water (720 mL)', '1 teaspoon oil', '½ lb okra (250 g)', '2 teaspoons salt', '½ teaspoon turmeric', '2 teaspoons coriander leaves chopped for garnish', '1 cup toor dal (200 g) boiled', 'For  tempering:', '1 teaspoon ghee', '1 teaspoon mustard', '1 teaspoon urad dal', '3 curry leaves']
instructions: ['1: Soak the 1 tamarind in 3 cups water for 30 minutes', '2:  Extract the juice and set aside', '3: Roast all the ingredients mentioned above for making For ground masala (except for the grated coconut) in 1 teaspoon oil', '4: After roasting, turn off the heat and add coconut', '5:  Let cool, then grind into a powder with little 3 cups water', '6: Boil the 1 tamarind extract with 1 cup of 3 cups water and add 2 teaspoons salt, ½ teaspoon turmeric, and ¼ teaspoon asafoetida', '7:  Stir well and, in a separate pan, roast ½ lb okra in 1 tsp 1 teaspoon oil', '8:  Once roasted, add ½ lb okra to this mixture and boil for 10 minutesAdd For ground spice paste and boil the mixture again for 5 minutes', '9: Mash the boiled toor 1 teaspoon channa 1 cup toor 1 teaspoon 1 teaspoon urad dal and add this to the boiling mixture of 1 tamarind, spices and ½ lb okra', '10:  Bring to a boil for 5 minutes', '11: For tempering in a separate pan, add 1 tsp 1 teaspoon ghee, 1 tsp mustard ½ teaspoon fenugreek seeds, 1 tsp 1 teaspoon urad 1 teaspoon channa 1 cup toor 1 teaspoon 1 teaspoon urad dal, and 3 curry leaves to low heat', '12: Let the mixture sputter for a few seconds and, once done, add this tempering mix to the sambar and garnish with finely chopped coriander', '13: Serve with white rice and 1 teaspoon ghee']

ingredients: ['¼ onion finely chopped', '2 cloves garlic crushed', '½ cup baby plum tomato (100 g) halved or regular tomatoes chopped into small bits', '⅓ cup fresh basil (15 g) chopped plus a few sprigs to decorate', '⅓ cup fresh parsley (15 g) chopped', '5 oz linguine (150 g) or spaghetti', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 pinch crushed chillies', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 ½ cups cold water (600 mL)', 'parmesan cheese to garnish']
instructions: ['1: Place all of the ingredients except for the parmesan into a large pot', '2:  Cook on a high heat for 2 minutes, submerging the 5 oz linguine (150 g) or spaghetti into the 2 ½ cups cold water once it’s softened enough', '3: Lower the temperature to a medium/low heat and toss and stir continuously until the liquid reduces down into a thick sauce', '4:  serve with more fresh basil and top with parmesan']

ingredients: ['1 lb raw shrimp (455 g)', 'Marinade', '1 ½ tablespoons garlic minced', '2 teaspoons ginger minced', '½ teaspoon crushed red pepper', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '⅓ cup honey (115 g)', '⅓ cup soy sauce (80 mL)', 'Garnish', 'scallion thinly sliced']
instructions: ['1: Place 1 lb raw shrimp in a sealable bag or medium bowl', '2: In a small bowl or measuring cup, mix marinade ingredients', '3: Pour half of the marinade on the 1 lb raw shrimp', '4:  Save the other half for later', '5: Let the 1 lb raw shrimp marinate in the refrigerator for at least 15 minutes', '6: In a medium pan, heat 1 tablespoon olive oil', '7:  Add 1 lb raw shrimp to the pan, but discard the used marinade', '8:  Cook 1 lb raw shrimp on one side for about a minute, then flip over', '9: Pour in remaining marinade and cook until 1 lb raw shrimp is cooked through and just firm', '10:   Remove the 1 lb raw shrimp from the pan and let the marinade reduce', '11: Serve the 1 lb raw shrimp with sauce and garnish with green onion']

ingredients: ['Beer-Battered Sweet Potatoes', '6 tablespoons neutral oil such as canola or vegetable', '6 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 large stalks lemongrass bruised and cut into ½-inch (1 1/4 cm) pieces', '3 cloves garlic crushed', '1 lime juiced', '¼ cup rice wine vinegar (60 mL)', '2 large sweet potatoes cut into ⅛-inch (3 mm) thick planks', '2 cups canola oil (480 mL) for frying', '1 ½ cups all purpose flour (185 g) divided', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '2 cups lager beer (480 mL)', 'Quick Pickled Vegetables', '1 cup rice wine vinegar (240 mL)', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '2 tablespoons sugar', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '2 large carrots cut into matchsticks', '½ medium red onion thinly sliced', 'Mushroom Pâté', '1 lb cremini mushroom (455 g) cleaned and stemmed', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '¼ medium red onion minced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 fresh ginger peeled and minced', '2 teaspoons vegan worcestershire', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', 'Vegan Chipotle Mayonnaise', '⅓ cup vegan mayonnaise (80 mL)', '1 teaspoon chipotle powder', 'Slaw', '¼ medium purple cabbage thinly sliced', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 lime juice', 'Assembly', '4 French rolls split lengthwise and toasted (6 in - 15 cm)', '½ english cucumber peeled into ribbons', '1 large avocado thinly sliced', '1 jalapeño thinly sliced', '1 cup fresh cilantro (40 g) washed and large stems removed', 'Preparation', 'Beer-Battered Sweet Potatoes', '6 tablespoons neutral oil such as canola or vegetable', '6 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 large stalks lemongrass bruised and cut into ½-inch (1 1/4 cm) pieces', '3 cloves garlic crushed', '1 lime juiced', '¼ cup rice wine vinegar (60 mL)', '2 large sweet potatoes cut into ⅛-inch (3 mm) thick planks', '2 cups canola oil (480 mL) for frying', '1 ½ cups all purpose flour (185 g) divided', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '2 cups lager beer (480 mL)', 'Quick Pickled Vegetables', '1 cup rice wine vinegar (240 mL)', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '2 tablespoons sugar', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '2 large carrots cut into matchsticks', '½ medium red onion thinly sliced', 'Mushroom Pâté', '1 lb cremini mushroom (455 g) cleaned and stemmed', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '¼ medium red onion minced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 fresh ginger peeled and minced', '2 teaspoons vegan worcestershire', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', 'Vegan Chipotle Mayonnaise', '⅓ cup vegan mayonnaise (80 mL)', '1 teaspoon chipotle powder', 'Slaw', '¼ medium purple cabbage thinly sliced', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 lime juice', 'Assembly', '4 French rolls split lengthwise and toasted (6 in - 15 cm)', '½ english cucumber peeled into ribbons', '1 large avocado thinly sliced', '1 jalapeño thinly sliced', '1 cup fresh cilantro (40 g) washed and large stems removed', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Marinate the beer-battered sweet potatoes: In a wide, shallow dish, whisk together the oil, soy sauce, lemongrass, garlic, lime juice, and rice wine vinegar', '2:  Add the sweet potatoes to the marinade and toss to coat', '3:  Cover the dish with plastic wrap and marinate the sweet potatoes in the refrigerator for 1–2 hours', '4: Make the quick pickled vegetables: In a small pan, combine the rice wine vinegar, water, sugar, and salt', '5:  Bring to a low simmer over medium-high heat, stirring until the sugar is dissolved', '6: Add the carrots and onion to 2 separate medium bowls', '7:  Pour half of the pickle brine into each bowl', '8:  Cover each bowl with plastic wrap and transfer to the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes, or overnight', '9:  The longer the vegetables pickle, the deeper the color of the red onions and the stronger the flavor of both will be', '10: Make the mushroom pâté: Add the mushrooms to a food processor and pulse until finely chopped', '11: In a medium skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat', '12:  When the oil is shimmering, add the red onion and garlic and sauté for 2–3 minutes, until fragrant', '13:  Add the mushrooms and cook for 5–8 minutes, until most of the moisture has been released and they begin to brown', '14:  Add the ginger, vegan Worcestershire sauce, and soy sauce', '15:  Cook for 1–2 minutes, until the liquid is fully absorbed and beginning to caramelize', '16:  Remove the pan from the heat and let cool for 5–10 minutes', '17: Return the mushroom mixture to the food processor and process until nearly smooth, 20–30 seconds', '18:  Set aside until ready to assemble the sandwiches', '19: Finish the beer-battered sweet potato: In a large, high-walled skillet, heat the canola oil over medium-high heat until it reaches 375°F (190°C)', '20: While the oil is heating, prepare the beer batter: In a shallow dish with a lip, whisk together the 1 cup (125 G) flour, the salt, and beer until smooth', '21:  Add the remaining ½ cup (60 G) flour to a separate shallow dish', '22: When the oil is hot, begin dredging the sweet potatoes', '23:  Working one plank at a time, remove the sweet potato from the marinade, letting any excess drip off', '24:  Lightly dredge in the flour, then coat in the beer batter', '25: Immediately drop the sweet potato plank into the hot oil', '26:  Fry in batches of 2 or 3 planks for 2–3 minutes,  flipping halfway through, until golden brown', '27:  Drain on a wire rack or paper towel-lined baking sheet', '28:  Let cool slightly', '29: Make the vegan chipotle mayonnaise: In a small bowl, mix together the mayonnaise and chipotle powder', '30: Make the slaw: In a medium bowl, toss the cabbage with the salt and lime juice', '31: Assemble the sandwiches: Spread 2 tablespoons of the mushroom pâté onto the bottom of a toasted French roll', '32:  Top with cucumber ribbons and 3–4 slices of avocado', '33:  Add 1–2 sweet potato planks, then top with jalapeño, pickled carrots and onions, cabbage slaw, and cilantro', '34:  Spread chipotle mayonnaise on the top half of the roll, then close the sandwich']

ingredients: ['1 cup mixed dried mushroom (75 g)', '1 ½ lb small beet (680 g)', '2 tablespoons whole black peppercorn', '2 whole allspice berries', '12 garlics peeled', '2 bay leaves', '1 tablespoon canola oil', '2 leeks rinsed well and thinly sliced', '1 small yellow onion diced', '1 stalk celery diced', 'kosher salt to taste', '4 qt water (4 L)', '1 large idaho potato peeled and cubed', '2 carrots diced', '15 oz stewed tomato (425 g)', '8 oz tomato sauce (225 g)', '16 oz pickled beet (455 g) drained and julienned', 'fresh dill chopped to taste', '1 loaf dark rye bread for serving optional', 'sour cream for serving optional']
instructions: ['1: Place the 1 cup mixed dried mushrooms in a medium bowl and pour in enough 4 qt water to cover', '2:  Let soak for 20-30 minutes, or until the mushrooms are soft and plumped', '3:  Working over the bowl, squeeze any excess 4 qt water from the mushrooms', '4:  Reserve the soaking liquid, and chop the mushrooms into bite-size pieces', '5:  Set aside', '6: Trim and peel the beets, then grate on the 1 large holes of a box grater', '7:  You should have  about 8 cups grated beets', '8:  Set aside', '9: Make a bouquet garni: Place the peppercorns, 2 whole allspice, garlic, and 2 bay leaves on a double-layer square of cheesecloth', '10:  Tie the ends of the cheesecloth around the spices and set aside', '11: In a 1 large pot, heat the 1 tablespoon canola oil over medium heat', '12:  Add the 2 leeks, 1 small yellow onion, and 1 stalk celery', '13:  Season with kosher salt and cook until the vegetables have softened, 5-8 minutes', '14: Add the 4 qt water, grated beets, chopped mushrooms and reserved soaking liquid, and the bouquet garni', '15:  Bring to a boil then lower the heat and simmer for 20-30 minutes, or until the beets are tender', '16: Add the potato and season with a pinch of kosher salt', '17:  Cook until potatoes are tender, 10-15 minutes, then add the 2 carrots and cook until tender, 10 minutes more', '18: Add the 15 oz stewed 8 oz tomatoes, 15 oz stewed 8 oz tomato sauce, and 16 oz pickled beets', '19:  Cook for another 10 minutes, or until all of the vegetables are tender', '20:  Stir in the fresh dill, then remove the pot from the heat', '21: Ladle the borscht into bowls', '22:  Garnish with fresh dill and serve with 1 loaf dark rye bread and sour cream, if using']

ingredients: ['5 plum tomatoes chopped divided', '2 red bell peppers chopped', '½ red onion chopped', '½ red onion sliced', '2 habanero peppers chopped', '6 cloves garlic', '12 oz tomato paste (340 g)', '1 tablespoon salt plus 1 teaspoon salt divided', '1 ½ teaspoons black pepper divided', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '1 cup vegetable oil (240 mL)', '1 ½ lb flank steak (680 g) cut into strips', '1 teaspoon fresh rosemary', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '2 cubes beef bouillon', '1 bay leaf', 'white rice cooked for serving', 'fried plantain for serving', 'scallion for serving', 'fresh parsley for serving']
instructions: ['1: In a food processor or blender, combine 4 chopped 5 plum 5 plum 12 oz tomatoes, red bell 2 red bell 2 habanero 1 ½ teaspoons black peppers, chopped red onion, 2 habanero 2 red bell 2 habanero 1 ½ teaspoons black peppers, garlic 6 cloves, 5 plum 12 oz tomato paste, 1 1 tablespoon salt, 1 teaspoon 2 red bell 2 habanero 1 ½ teaspoons black pepper, and ½ cup water', '2:  Puree until smooth', '3: Heat 1 cup vegetable oil in a large pot over medium-high heat', '4: Add the remaining 5 plum 12 oz tomato, sliced onion, remaining salt, and remaining 2 red bell 2 habanero 1 ½ teaspoons black pepper', '5:  Sauté until fragrant', '6: Add 1 ½ lb flank steak, rosemary, paprika, curry powder, and bullion 2 cubes', '7:  Cook until the 1 ½ lb flank steak is golden brown and cooked through, about 10 minutes', '8: Add the blended 5 plum 12 oz tomato and 2 red bell 2 habanero 1 ½ teaspoons black pepper mixture and the 1 bay leaf', '9: Bring to a boil over high heat', '10:  Cover and simmer at low heat for 20 minutes, until the stew has thickened', '11: Fish out the 1 bay leaf', '12: Remove stew from heat and let sit 10 minutes', '13: Serve with white rice and fried plantains', '14:  Garnish with scallions and fresh parsley, if desired']

ingredients: ["1 box mac 'n' cheese", '½ lb ground beef (225 g) cooked', '¼ cup grated cheddar cheese (30 g)', '1 cup red kidney bean (170 g)', '4 oz green chilli (115 g) 1 can', '2 teaspoons chili powder']
instructions: ["1: Cook 1 1 box of Mac 'N' Cheese according to instructions on 1 box", '2: Add cooked ½ lb ground beef, ¼ cup grated cheddar cheese, 1 cup red kidney beans, 4 oz green 2 teaspoons chilis, and 2 teaspoons chili powder, stir until fully incorporated', '3: Top with desired garnish', '4:  Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['3 cups butternut squash (615 g) small diced', 'olive oil to taste', 'kosher salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '14 oz red kidney bean (255 g) rinsed and drained', '1 cup chestnut (145 g) shelled roasted and halved', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '1 medium shallot minced', '8 oz cremini mushroom (220 g) cleaned and finely chopped', '1 tablespoon dried thyme', '4 cloves garlic minced divided', '18 oz frozen spinach (540 g) defrosted and squeezed dry of excess liquid', 'lemon juice of 1/2 lemon', 'lemon zest of 1/2 lemon', '½ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 small white onion small diced', '1 medium carrot small diced', '2 tablespoons fresh sage chopped', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', '2 tablespoons dijon mustard', '2 cups white bread (70 g) torn loosely packed', '¼ cup vegetable stock (60 mL)', '16 oz puff pastry (490 g)', '6 red peppers whole roasted cut to lay flat and dried of any excess liquid', '1 large egg beaten']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: On a baking sheet, drizzle the 3 cups 3 cups 2 tablespoons unsalted butternut squash with olive oil, then season with kosher salt and freshly ground black 6 red pepper', '3:  Toss to coat, then spread in an even layer', '4:  Roast for 20 minutes, stirring halfway, until the squash is tender and golden brown', '5:  Remove from the oven and set aside to cool', '6: On another baking sheet, spread out the 14 oz red kidney beans and chestnuts', '7:  Bake for 10 minutes, or until the excess moisture has released and the beans begin to crack down the middle', '8:  Remove from the oven and set aside to cool', '9: Prepare the duxelle (mushroom mixture): In a 1 large pan over medium heat, melt the 3 cups 2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '10:  Once the 3 cups 2 tablespoons unsalted butter begins to foam, add the shallot, 8 oz cremini mushrooms, 1 tablespoon dried thyme, and kosher salt', '11:  Stir to combine and cook for 10-15 minutes, or until the liquid evaporates from the 8 oz cremini mushrooms and they begin to turn golden brown', '12:  Transfer the duxelle to a bowl and set aside to cool', '13: Return the pan to the stove (no need to clean), and heat a drizzle of oil over medium heat', '14:  Add 2 4 cloves of minced garlic and the 18 oz frozen spinach', '15:  Break the spinach up with a wooden spoon and sauté for 2 minutes, or until the garlic is toasted and the spinach is warmed through', '16:  Add the lemon juice, lemon zest, ½ teaspoon ground nutmeg, kosher salt, and freshly ground black 6 red pepper', '17:  Transfer to a bowl and set aside to cool', '18: Return the same pan back to the stove over medium-high heat and add a drizzle of oil', '19:  When the oil is hot, add the 1 small white onion, carrot, kosher salt, and freshly ground black 6 red pepper', '20:  Sauté for 5 minutes, or until the ¼ cup vegetables are softened and beginning to turn golden brown', '21:  Add the remaining 2 4 cloves of garlic and the 2 tablespoons fresh sage and sauté for 1 minute more, or until the garlic is just fragrant', '22:  Add the 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar, Dijon mustard, and 2 cups white bread', '23:  Stir until the 2 cups white bread is well-coated, then remove from the heat and let cool slightly', '24: Transfer the 2 cups white bread mixture to a food processor', '25:  Add in the 1 cup chestnut (145 g) shelled 6 red 6 red peppers whole roasted 14 oz red kidney beans and chestnuts and ¼ cup vegetable stock', '26:  Pulse a few times, until just combined', '27:  (The mixture should be an even consistency but still have texture to it', '28:  It should stick together when pressed in your palm)', '29:  Transfer the 2 cups white bread mixture to a 1 large bowl', '30:  Gently stir in the 1 cup chestnut (145 g) shelled 6 red 6 red peppers whole roasted 3 cups 3 cups 2 tablespoons unsalted butternut squash and season with more kosher salt and freshly ground black 6 red pepper to taste', '31: Increase the oven temperature to 425°F (220°C) and line a 1 large baking sheet with parchment paper', '32: On a lightly floured surface, roll each piece of 16 oz puff pastry into rectangle slightly smaller than the prepared baking sheet', '33:  Transfer 1 piece of the pastry to the baking sheet and set the other piece aside', '34: Assemble the Wellington: Spread the cooled duxelle lengthwise down the middle of the 16 oz puff pastry on the baking sheet, creating a rectangle the size that you want your wellington to be', '35:  Make sure to leave about a 2-inch border at both ends of the pastry', '36:  (You will be removing all excess dough and using it for decorations', '37: )Next, arrange half of the bell freshly ground black 6 red 6 red peppers over the duxelle', '38:  Make sure they lay flat, only overlap on the edges, and completely cover the 8 oz cremini mushrooms', '39: Top the bell freshly ground black 6 red pepper layer with the 1 cup chestnut (145 g) shelled 6 red 6 red peppers whole roasted squash and 2 cups white bread mixture by using your hands to pack the mixture into a loaf, making sure it doesn’t go over the edges of the freshly ground black 6 red 6 red peppers', '40: Layer the remaining 1 cup chestnut (145 g) shelled 6 red 6 red peppers whole roasted freshly ground black 6 red 6 red peppers evenly over the 2 cups white bread mixture', '41: Top the freshly ground black 6 red 6 red peppers with the spinach mixture', '42:  (This will be a bit messy, but it’s okay, it’s part of the process!)Gently roll the second piece of pastry over the spinach layer, creating a blanket over all of the ¼ cup vegetable layers', '43:  Press the pastry gently around the filling to create a log shape', '44:  Trim the pastry so that there is about a 1-inch (2', '45: 5 cm) border around the log', '46: Fold the bottom layer of the pastry over the top layer and seal the dough together with a decorative crimp', '47:  Cut decorative shapes from the dough scraps and arrange over the log', '48:  Using a paring knife, cut a few vents into your wellington to allow steam to escape', '49:  You can hide the vents along the edges of your decorations', '50: Generously brush the top and sides of the wellington with the beaten egg', '51: Bake for 30 minutes, or until the pastry is golden brown and crispy', '52: Let rest for 15 minutes before slicing and serving']

ingredients: ['8 hot dog buns', '¼ cup butter (30 g) melted', '2 cloves garlic minced', '2 tablespoons fresh parsley finely chopped plus more for garnish', '8 slices cheddar cheese', '15 oz chili (425 g) with or without beans', '8 hot dogs']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Leaving them attached, place the 8 hot dog buns in a 9 x 13-inch (22 x 33-cm) baking dish', '3:  Cut a rectangle in each hot dog bun, making sure to stay 1 centimeter from the edges', '4:  Push down on the bread cut-out to compact it tightly into the bottom of each bun, making sure to press down on the bottom edges as well', '5:  This will help create a larger space for the fillings and reduce mess', '6: Mix the ¼ cup butter, 2 cloves garlic, and parsley in a small bowl, then brush the buns and their hollowed insides with the 2 cloves garlic ¼ cup butter', '7:  Bake for 5 minutes to toast the buns as well as help the sides of the buns firm up so they don’t collapse under the weight of the fillings', '8: Place a slice of 8 slices cheddar cheese inside each bun, then spoon a bit of 15 oz chili inside each one', '9:  Slide a hot dog snugly on top of the 15 oz chili in each bun, then top with more 15 oz chili', '10: Bake for 20-25 minutes, until the cheese is golden brown and the 15 oz chili has started to brown', '11:  Top with 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, then slice the hot dog boats along their connected seams to serve']

ingredients: ['Dough', '1 ½ cups white bread flour (190 g)', '1 teaspoon instant dry yeast', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 cup warm water (240 mL)', '2 teaspoons olive oil', 'flour extra for dusting', 'Garlic Butter', '3 tablespoons butter melted', '4 cloves garlic crushed', '1 small handful fresh parsley chopped']
instructions: ['1: For the dough, mix together the flour, yeast, and salt, and make a well in the middle', '2: Pour the water and 1 teaspoon of 2 teaspoons olive oil into the well and mix together', '3: Knead for about 7-10 minutes until the dough is springy', '4: Line a bowl with the other teaspoon of 2 teaspoons olive oil, place the dough in the bowl, cover, and leave to rise in a 1 cup warm place for 1 hour (or until doubled in size)', '5: Tear the dough into 9 separate balls and then roll into long tubes, folding over to make a knot', '6: Place the knots on a baking tray', '7: Bake in a 350°F (180°C) oven for 10 minutes', '8: Prepare the 4 cloves garlic 3 tablespoons butter by mixing the 3 tablespoons butter, 4 cloves garlic, and 1 small handful fresh parsley', '9: Coat the knots with the 3 tablespoons butter mixture and bake for another 5 minutes']

ingredients: ['1 ½ lb small red potato (680 g) cleaned and unpeeled', 'fine sea salt to taste', '½ cup mayonnaise (120 g)', '½ lemon juiced', '2 teaspoons dijon mustard', '¼ cup red onion (75 g) finely chopped', '2 hard-boiled eggs coarsely chopped', '¼ teaspoon smoked paprika', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '⅓ cup dill pickle (50 g) coarsely chopped', '2 tablespoons chives finely chopped plus more for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Place the potatoes in a large pot with enough water to cover them by 2 inches (5 cm), cover, and bring to a boil over high heat', '2: Once boiling, season with fine sea salt, reduce the heat to medium, and cook until the potatoes are tender, 25-30 minutes', '3:  Drain and set aside to cool', '4: In a large bowl, whisk together the ½ cup mayonnaise, ½ lemon juice, Dijon mustard, and paprika', '5:  Season with ½ 2 ¼ teaspoon of fine sea salt and ½ 2 ¼ teaspoon of freshly ground black pepper', '6: Dice the potatoes and transfer to a separate large bowl, along with the ¼ cup red onion, 2 hard-boiled eggs, pickles, and 2 tablespoons chives', '7:  Season with fine sea salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '8:  Pour the sauce over the potatoes and toss to coat evenly', '9:  Sprinkle with ¼ cup red onion (75 g) finely 2 hard-boiled eggs coarsely ⅓ cup dill pickle (50 g) coarsely 2 tablespoons 2 tablespoons chives finely chopped 2 tablespoons chives, for garnish']

ingredients: ['2 lb small red potato (905 g) scrubbed and halved', '1 tablespoon salt', '2 ears corn', '1 tablespoon dijon mustard', '3 tablespoons pickle juice divided', '1 red bell pepper', '1 cup vegan mayonnaise (240 g) or regular', '½ teaspoon paprika', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '½ cup celery (110 g) diced', '⅓ cup dill pickle (45 g) coarsely chopped', '¼ cup red onion (35 g) chopped', '⅓ cup green onion (50 g) chopped', '2 tablespoons fresh dill minced', '2 tablespoons fresh chives chopped for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Place the potatoes in a large pot with enough water to cover by 2 inches (5 cm)', '2:  Cover and bring to a boil over high heat', '3: Once boiling, uncover, add the 1 tablespoon 1 ½ teaspoons salt and 2 ears corn, and reduce the heat to medium', '4:  Simmer for 10-15 minutes, until the potatoes and the 2 ears corn are tender', '5:  Drain', '6: Add the potatoes to a large bowl', '7:  Combine 2 tablespoons of pickle juice with the mustard and pour it over the still-warm potatoes', '8:  Toss to coat', '9:  Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes or up to an hour', '10: Dice the red bell 1 red bell 1 teaspoon pepper, removing the ribs and seeds', '11: Set a medium bowl upside down in a large bowl and stand a 2 ears corn cob on the inverted bowl', '12:  Cut the 2 ears corn kernels from the cobs, letting them fall into the larger bowl', '13: In a medium bowl, combine the 1 cup vegan mayonnaise, remaining tablespoon of pickle juice, ½ teaspoon paprika, 1 tablespoon 1 ½ teaspoons salt, and 1 red bell 1 teaspoon pepper and stir until smooth', '14: Add the bell 1 red bell 1 teaspoon pepper, 2 ears corn, ½ cup celery, pickles, red onion, ⅓ cup green onions, and ⅓ cup 2 tablespoons fresh dill to the bowl with the potatoes', '15:  Pour the sauce over and toss to coat', '16: Sprinkle the potato salad with chopped chives, for garnish']

ingredients: ['Bannock Pizza Dough', '4 cups all purpose flour (500 g) plus more for dusting', '¼ cup baking powder (30 g)', '¼ cup sugar (500 g)', '4 teaspoons kosher salt', '3 cups water (720 mL)', 'Pizza', '12 tablespoons barbecue sauce divided', '16 slices prosciutto', '20 slices fresh mozzarella cheese', '16 cherry tomatoes halved', '12 fresh basil leaves torn plus more for garnishtorn plus more for garnish', 'kosher salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Make the dough: In a large bowl, whisk together the 4 cups all purpose flour, ¼ cup baking powder, ¼ cup sugar, and salt', '2:  Slowly add the 3 cups water and mix with your hands until the dough comes together', '3:  Divide the dough into 4 pieces', '4: Working with 1 piece at a time, roll and stretch out the dough on a generously 4 cups all purpose floured surface to 6–8 inch rounds', '5: Top each dough round with 2 12 tablespoons barbeque sauce, 4 slices of prosciutto, 5 slices of 20 slices 12 fresh mozzarella, 4 halved 16 cherry tomatoes, and 3 torn basil leaves', '6: Transfer 1 pizza to a stone pizza oven heated to 900°F (480°C) and cook for 4 minutes, rotating the pizza halfway, until the cheese is melted and the crust is puffy and charred in spots', '7:  Repeat with the remaining pizza', '8:  (Alternatively, preheat a standard oven to 500°F (260°C) with a pizza stone inside while you make the pizzas', '9:  Cook the pizzas 1 at a time on the heated stone for 8 minutes, rotating halfway', '10: )Drizzle another tablespoon of barbecue sauce on top of each pizza, then garnish with more basil and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper', '11:  Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['4 eggs', '1 cup almond milk (235 mL)', '1 tablespoon vanilla', '2 teaspoons cinnamon', '12 slices whole grain bread', '½ cup strawberry (75 g) quartered', '½ cup blueberry (50 g)', '½ cup raspberry (65 g) halved', '½ cup blackberry (70 g) halved', 'Filling', '2 cups plain greek yogurt (570 g)', '¼ cup maple syrup (55 g)', '½ teaspoon cinnamon']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: Combine 4 eggs, 1 cup almond milk, 1 tablespoon vanilla, and cinnamon in a large bowl', '3: Dip bread 12 slices into egg mixture and gently press into muffin tin coated with cooking spray', '4: Bake for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown', '5: Prepare filling and fruit 12 slices while 2 cups bake', '6: Fill up the 12 slices with the filling and fruit', '7: Serve with a drizzle of ¼ cup maple syrup']

ingredients: ['neutral oil for frying', '3 medium yellow onions halved', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt plus more for sprinkling', '1 ½ teaspoons ground coriander', '1 ½ teaspoons chili powder', '1 ½ teaspoons ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 small green chile seeded if desired finely chopped', '3 tablespoons fresh cilantro leaves finely chopped', '1 ½ cups chickpea flour (185 g)', '4 tablespoons water', 'Red and green chutney for serving', 'Preparation', 'neutral oil for frying', '3 medium yellow onions halved', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt plus more for sprinkling', '1 ½ teaspoons ground coriander', '1 ½ teaspoons chili powder', '1 ½ teaspoons ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 small green chile seeded if desired finely chopped', '3 tablespoons fresh cilantro leaves finely chopped', '1 ½ cups chickpea flour (185 g)', '4 tablespoons water', 'Red and green chutney for serving', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Fill a large pot fitted with a deep fry thermometer halfway with oil', '2:  Heat over medium heat until the temperature reaches 325°F (160˚C)', '3:  Place a wire rack over a baking sheet and set nearby', '4: Set a mandoline slicer to ¼ inch and place over a large bowl', '5:  Carefully slice the onions on the mandoline, letting them fall into the bowl below (alternatively, use a sharp knife to cut the onions into ¼-inch-thick slices and add to the bowl)', '6:  Sprinkle the salt over the onions, toss to coat, and let sit for about 5 minutes to draw out excess moisture', '7: Add the coriander, chili powder, cumin, and turmeric to the onions and use tongs to toss until evenly coated, using your hands to break up any pieces of onions still stuck together', '8:  Let sit for 15–30 minutes, until the onions have softened', '9: Add the green chile and cilantro and toss to combine', '10:  Add ½ cup of the chickpea flour and toss to coat the onions', '11:  Add 2 tablespoons of water and continue to toss until the water is absorbed', '12:  Repeat with another ½ cup gram flour and 2 tablespoons water', '13:  Add the remaining ½ gram flour and toss until the onions are coated in a thick, homogeneous batter', '14:  If the batter is too clumpy, add 1–2 more tablespoons of water and toss until smooth', '15: Use your hands to grab a small clump of the onion mixture (a bit smaller than a golf ball) and very carefully drop into the hot oil (don’t compact the clump too much; the edges should be somewhat scraggly and loose)', '16:  Add 1–2 more clumps, making sure not to overcrowd the pot', '17:  The oil temperature should remain between 300-325°F (150-160˚C)', '18:  Fry the bhajis for 3–5 minutes, flipping once or twice as needed for even browning, until deep golden brown in color', '19:  Use a spider or slotted spoon to transfer to the wire rack to drain', '20:  Immediately sprinkle with a bit of salt', '21:  Repeat with the remaining batter, letting the oil return to temperature between batches', '22: Serve the onion bhajis with red and green chutney']

ingredients: ['salt to taste', '½ lb spaghetti (225 g)', '3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '4 cloves garlic sliced', '1 teaspoon red chili flakes', '2 tablespoons fresh parsley finely chopped optional']
instructions: ['1: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil', '2:   Cook the pasta according to package instructions', '3:  Save ¼ cup (60 ml) of pasta water, then drain', '4: Add the 3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil and 4 cloves garlic to a large cold sauté pan', '5:  Turn the heat to medium-low and slowly heat up until the 4 cloves garlic is fragrant and lightly colored, about 3 minutes', '6: Add the chile 1 teaspoon red chili flakes and cook for another minute', '7: Add the reserved pasta water and bring to a simmer', '8:  Add the cooked ½ lb spaghetti and 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, if using', '9:  Stir until the pasta is well-coated', '10:  Season with salt to taste']

ingredients: ['5 cups whole milk (1.25 L)', '1 box elbow macaroni', '½ cup butter (115 g)', '2 cups cheddar cheese (200 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'fresh parsley to serve']
instructions: ['1: In a large pot on medium-high heat, gently heat the 5 cups whole milk to a simmer', '2: Add in the 1 box elbow macaroni', '3:  Cook until the pasta is tender', '4: Once the noodles are cooked, turn off the heat', '5:  Add in the ½ cup butter, 2 cups cheddar, salt, and pepper', '6:  Fold these ingredients with the pasta until the cheese and ½ cup butter melt into the 5 cups whole milk to create a thick sauce', '7: Sprinkle with fresh parsley and serve!']

ingredients: ['1 eggplant roasted', '1 clove garlic minced', '1 lemon juiced', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'fresh parsley chopped to serve', 'sumac to serve', 'olive oil to serve']
instructions: ['1: Scoop out flesh of roasted 1 eggplant into a medium sized mixing bowl', '2: Add the 1 clove garlic, 1 lemon, 1 teaspoon salt, and olive oil', '3:  Mash together with a fork until loose puree forms', '4: Garnish with fresh parsley, sumac, and more olive oil']

ingredients: ['1 cup shredded chicken (125 g) leftover', '8 oz cream cheese (225 g) softened', '½ cup ranch dressing (120 g)', '½ cup buffalo sauce (120 g)', 'cheddar cheese', 'scallion to serve', 'chip to serve']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: In a bowl, mix the 1 cup shredded chicken, 8 oz cream cheese, and ½ cup buffalo sauce', '3: Pour mixture into a cast iron skillet and smooth with a spoon', '4: Cover with cheddar cheese and bake for 20 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bubbly', '5: Top with scallions and serve with your favorite chips']

ingredients: ['Cake', '3 cups flour (375 g)', '1 cup sugar (200 g)', '4 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 ½ cups milk (360 mL)', '2 eggs', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '½ cup melted butter (120 mL)', 'Cinnamon Topping', '½ cup softened butter (115 g)', '½ cup brown sugar (110 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon flour', '1 tablespoon McCormick® Ground Cinnamon', '½ cup pecan (60 g) chopped', 'Cream Cheese Frosting', '4 oz cream cheese (115 g) softened', '⅓ cup powdered sugar (35 g)', '1 tablespoon milk', '¼ teaspoon salt']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350ºF (175°C)', '2: Cake: In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, 4 teaspoons baking powder, and salt', '3:  In a separate bowl, whisk together milk, 2 eggs, and 2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '4:  Pour wet ingredients into dry ingredients and whisk until mostly incorporated but a few dry streaks remain', '5:  Whisk in ½ cup melted ½ cup melted ½ cup softened butter', '6: Cinnamon topping: Stir all ingredients together in a medium bowl', '7: Pour half of the cake batter into a greased 9x13-inch (22 x 33 cm) 4 teaspoons baking dish', '8:  Drop spoonfuls of cinnamon topping on the batter, using half of the topping', '9:  Use the tip of a ½ cup melted ½ cup softened butter knife to swirl the topping through the cake', '10:  Pour the rest of the batter on top', '11:  Spoon the rest of the topping on and swirl again', '12: Bake for 25–30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean (or with only a few crumbs attached)', '13:  Remove from oven and let cool', '14: Frosting: Whisk together 4 oz cream cheese, ⅓ cup powdered sugar, and milk', '15:  If frosting is too thick, add more milk until it becomes a pourable texture', '16:  Drizzle cake with frosting', '17:  Slice and serve!']

ingredients: ['1 can chickpeas drained (liquid reserved) and rinsed', '¼ cup peanut butter (60 g)', '2 tablespoons honey', '2 teaspoons vanilla', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ cup chickpea water (60 mL)', '½ cup chocolate chips (85 g)']
instructions: ['1: Spread drained 1 can 1 can ¼ cup chickpeas onto a towel and pat dry', '2: Remove 1 can ¼ cup chickpea shells', '3: Place 1 can 1 can ¼ cup chickpeas, ¼ cup peanut butter, 2 teaspoons vanilla, 2 tablespoons honey, and ½ teaspoon salt into food processor', '4: Mix halfway then add 1 can ¼ cup chickpea water to help consistency', '5: Add ½ cup chocolate chips to mixed dough']

ingredients: ['nonstick cooking spray for greasing', '10 oz shortbread cookie (285 g)', '6 tablespoons unsalted butter melted', '2 ripe yellow peaches quartered plus 4-5 thinly sliced', '4 packs gelatin divided', '1 cup cold water (240 mL) divided', '32 oz cream cheese (900 g) softened', '1 ¼ cups sugar (250 g) plus 2/3 cups (135 G) divided', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '½ cup heavy cream (120 mL)', '2 drops orange food coloring optional', '⅔ cup hot water (160 mL)', '1 cup prosecco (240 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Grease and line the sides of a 9-inch (20 cm) round springform pan with parchment paper', '2: Add the shortbread cookies to a food processor', '3:  Pulse until finely crushed', '4:  Add the melted 6 tablespoons unsalted butter and pulse until combined', '5: Transfer the cookie crumb mixture to the springform pan', '6:  Use a spatula or measuring cup to press the cookie crumbs down to form an even base', '7:  Freeze for 10 minutes', '8: Add 2-3 quartered 2 ripe yellow peaches (depending on size) to a food processor', '9:  Blend until smooth', '10:  Strain through a fine-mesh sieve', '11: In a small bowl, combine ½ cup (120 ml) cold water and 2 packets of 4 packs gelatin', '12:  Let the 4 packs gelatin bloom for 5 minutes, until the water is mostly absorbed', '13:  Microwave for 20–30 seconds, or until the 4 packs gelatin is melted', '14: In a large bowl, beat the 32 oz ½ cup heavy cream cheese, 1¼ 1 ¼ cups (250 G) sugar, the 1 teaspoon vanilla, and 1 teaspoon lemon juice together with an electric hand mixer until combined', '15: Add the heavy 32 oz ½ cup heavy cream and melted 4 packs gelatin and beat for another 2-3 minutes, until well combined and fluffy', '16: Spread half the cheesecake mixture over the chilled cookie crust', '17:  Freeze for 10 minutes', '18: Mix 1 cup (255 G) of the strained peach puree and 2 drops orange food coloring, if desired, into the remaining cheesecake mixture', '19:  Carefully pour the mixture over the first layer of cheesecake', '20:  Spread evenly and freeze for another 10 minutes', '21: In a small bowl, combine the remaining ½ cup (120 ML) cold water with the remaining 2 packages of 4 packs gelatin', '22:  Let the 4 packs gelatin bloom for 5 minutes, until the water is mostly absorbed', '23:  Microwave for 20–30 seconds, or until the 4 packs gelatin is melted', '24: Combine the 4 packs gelatin mixture, hot water, and the remaining ⅔ cup (135 G) sugar and whisk to dissolve the sugar', '25:  Slowly pour into the prosecco and stir to combine', '26:  Let sit for 5 minutes to cool slightly', '27:  Skim off any foam that rises to the top', '28:  Set aside', '29: Starting from the outside and working inward, arrange the sliced 2 ripe yellow peaches over the peach cheesecake layer in a circular pattern with the curved sides facing out', '30:  Begin with the larger slices, overlapping slightly, and continue until the entire surface is filled', '31: Spoon half of the prosecco 4 packs gelatin over the 2 ripe yellow peaches', '32:  Carefully transfer to the refrigerator and let set for 30 minutes', '33:  Pour the remaining prosecco 4 packs gelatin over the 2 ripe yellow peaches up to the rim of the pan', '34:  Chill in the refrigerator for at least 6 hours, or overnight', '35: Release the springform and remove the parchment, then slice and serve']

ingredients: ['1 ¾ cups self-rising flour (220 g) plus more for dusting', '1 cup greek yogurt (245 g)', '½ cup pizza sauce (130 g)', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese (100 g) part-skim', 'pepperoni slouse for topping']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F(200°C)', '2: In a large bowl, mix the self-rising 1 ¾ cups self-rising flour and Greek yogurt until it comes together to form a ball', '3: Transfer the dough ball to a lightly 1 ¾ cups self-rising floured work surface and use your hands to begin flattening and shaping the rough into about a 12-inch (30 cm) round', '4:  If at any point the dough begins to stick, sprinkle on a bit more 1 ¾ cups self-rising flour', '5: Carefully transfer the dough to a lightly 1 ¾ cups self-rising floured baking sheet', '6: Spread the ½ cup pizza sauce evenly across the dough, sprinkle on the 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, and top with pepperonis', '7: Bake for 20 minutes, until the 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese has melted and the crust has turned golden-brown', '8: Slice and serve']

ingredients: ['4 ears corn', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon chili powder', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '½ cup mayonnaise (120 g)', '1 lime juiced', '½ cup cotija cheese (55 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat a grill or grill plate to medium heat', '2: Drizzle the corn with 2 tablespoons olive oil and sprinkle with salt and ½ teaspoon ½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '3:  Mix to ensure all the 4 ears are evenly coated', '4: Place the corn on the grill', '5:  Close the lid to keep the temperature high, and let the corn cook for about 15 minutes per side, or until slightly charred on all sides', '6: Remove the corn from the heat and set aside', '7: In a small bowl mix the 1 tablespoon chili powder and ½ teaspoon cayenne together', '8:  In another small bowl, mix the 1 lime juice and mayo together in a bowl, and spread or drizzle on the 4 ears of corn', '9: Sprinkle the spices over the corn', '10: Top the corn with Cotija cheese']

ingredients: ['Soup', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 lb boneless skinless chicken breast (905 g) cubed', '1 cup diced yellow onion', '1 cup sliced carrot', '3 cloves garlic cloves minced', '1 teaspoon salt', '5 tablespoons unsalted butter', '6 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '6 cups chicken broth (1 ½ L)', '½ cup heavy cream (120 mL)', '½ teaspoon dried thyme', '2 bay leaves', '1 ½ cups frozen peas (225 g)', '4 tablespoons fresh parsley minced', 'Dumplings', '2 cups all-purpose flour (250 g)', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 ⅓ cups heavy cream (320 mL)', 'Preparation', 'Soup', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 lb boneless skinless chicken breast (905 g) cubed', '1 cup diced yellow onion', '1 cup sliced carrot', '3 cloves garlic cloves minced', '1 teaspoon salt', '5 tablespoons unsalted butter', '6 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '6 cups chicken broth (1 ½ L)', '½ cup heavy cream (120 mL)', '½ teaspoon dried thyme', '2 bay leaves', '1 ½ cups frozen peas (225 g)', '4 tablespoons fresh parsley minced', 'Dumplings', '2 cups all-purpose flour (250 g)', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 ⅓ cups heavy cream (320 mL)', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
