instructions: ['1: In a 6-quart Dutch oven, heat the vegetable oil over medium-high heat', '2:  Add the chicken and cook until browned on both sides', '3:  Remove from the pot and set aside', '4: Add carrot and onion and cook until just tender, about 3 minutes', '5: Add the garlic and stir for another minute, until fragrant', '6: Reduce the heat to medium-low and add the butter and flour, stirring constantly for 3 minutes to prevent lumps from forming', '7: Add the chicken and any accumulated juices back to the pot and stir to coat in the roux', '8: Add the chicken broth, cream, thyme, and bay leaves and bring to a simmer', '9:  Once soup is at a simmer, add the frozen peas, cover, and cook for 15 minutes', '10: Make the dumplings: In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, salt, pepper, and cream', '11:  Stir until mixture comes together into single mass of dough', '12: Using a large spoon or ice cream scoop, form the dough into small round balls about 1 inch (2 ½ cm) in diameter (the dough should yield 14-16 dumplings)', '13: Place the dough balls in the simmering soup (making sure they don’t touch), add the parsley, and cover', '14:  Let the soup simmer for 15 minutes, or until the dumplings are cooked through', '15: Ladle into bowls, giving 1-2 dumplings per serving']

ingredients: ['Spaghetti Squash', '1 spaghetti squash', 'oil to taste', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'Garlic Herb Shrimp', '1 lb raw shrimp (455 g) peeled and deveined', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon dried basil', '¼ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '1 tablespoon oil', 'parmesan cheese optional', 'fresh parsley for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Using a fork or knife, carefully poke holes along the middle of the squash', '2: Microwave for 5 minutes so the squash softens and is easier to cut', '3: Cut in half horizontally and scoop out the seeds', '4: Drizzle olive oil, salt, and pepper', '5: Place in the Instant Pot and secure the lid until you hear the beep', '6:  Tip: Closing the lid can be tricky', '7:  Have the pressure knob at 11 o’clock and turn right', '8: Set the pressure knob on the top of the lid to Sealing', '9:  Select “Manual” and reduce to 7 minutes', '10:  It will say “On” in a few seconds', '11:  Note: the Instant Pot will need to warm up for 5-10 minutes', '12:  Steam will be released and a few minutes later, the time will start counting down', '13: While the squash is cooking, prepare the 1 lb raw shrimp', '14:  Place the 1 lb raw shrimp in a bowl and add the minced 2 cloves garlic, 1 teaspoon onion powder, 1 teaspoon dried fresh parsley, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, 1 tablespoon dried basil, salt, and pepper', '15:  Mix until combined', '16:  Refrigerate until ready to cook', '17: Once the 7 minutes is up, let the squash rest in the pot for 5 minutes', '18:  It will count up and read “L 0:05”', '19: Using a towel or mit, release the pressure knob from “Sealing” to “Venting”', '20:  After the steam has been released, carefully take the squash out of the pot and let it rest in a bowl', '21: Drain the excess liquid and clean the pot', '22: To cook the 1 lb raw shrimp, select “Saute” on the Instant Pot', '23:  Once it says “Hot”, add the oil', '24:  When the oil is shimmering, add the 1 lb raw shrimp in a single layer (cook in batches if necessary)', '25:  Cook for 3-5 minutes per side or until opaque', '26: Press “Cancel” and remove the 1 lb raw shrimp', '27: Using a fork, shred the inside of the squash', '28: Serve the 1 spaghetti squash and 1 lb raw shrimp together', '29:  If desired, top with parmesan cheese and fresh 1 teaspoon dried fresh parsley']

ingredients: ['Poppy Seed Dressing', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '3 tablespoons nonfat greek yogurt', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 teaspoon honey', '1 teaspoon poppy seed', '½ teaspoon dijon mustard', '¼ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 boneless skinless chicken breast sliced into 1/2-inch (1-cm) pieces', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ teaspoon paprika', '2 teaspoons olive oil', '2 cups baby spinach (80 g)', '½ cup strawberry (75 g) hulled and sliced', '½ avocado sliced', '1 tablespoon sliced almond toasted']
instructions: ['1: In a bowl, add the olive oil, Greek yogurt, 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 1 teaspoon honey, 1 teaspoon poppy seeds, ½ teaspoon dijon mustard, salt, and pepper in a small bowl and whisk until emulsified', '2: Season the 1 boneless skinless chicken with salt, pepper, and ¼ teaspoon paprika', '3: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat', '4:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the 1 boneless skinless chicken and cook until browned on both sides, about 4 minutes per side', '5: Once cooled, slice the 1 boneless skinless chicken on a cutting board', '6: Toss 2 cups baby spinach, strawberries, ½ avocado, almonds, and sliced 1 boneless skinless chicken together in a large bowl and drizzle with 1 teaspoon poppy seed dressing']

ingredients: ['Pulled Pork', '1 ½ tablespoons black pepper', '2 tablespoons ground cumin', '2 tablespoons dried oregano', '¼ cup garlic (35 g) grated', '2 cups lime juice (480 mL)', '10 lb bone-in pork butt', 'salt to taste', 'Cuban Sandwich (per sandwich)', '⅓ loaf cuban bread halved lengthwise', '1 tablespoon mustard', '2 slices swiss cheese', '1 tablespoon garlic oil', '4 slices ham', '1 cup pulled pork (250 g)', '2 slices cucumber pickle', '8 oz pulled pork']
instructions: ['1: Make the pulled pork: In a medium bowl, mix together the 1 ½ tablespoons black pepper, 2 tablespoons ground cumin, 2 tablespoons dried oregano, garlic, and 2 cups lime juice', '2:  Set aside', '3: Make a few incisions, 1-2 inches (2-5 cm) deep, on both sides of the pork butt, cutting against the grain', '4:  Sprinkle generously with salt all over, make sure to season inside the incisions', '5: Transfer the pork butt to a roasting dish, and pour the marinade all over', '6:  Make sure the pork is well coated, including inside the incisions', '7:  Cover and marinate for 8-10 hours, or overnight', '8: Preheat the oven to 250˚F (120˚C)', '9: Roast the pork, covered, for 8-10 hours, or until the pork is tender and easily falls apart when prodded with a fork or tongs', '10: Let cool enough to handle, then remove any bones, and shred the pork with tongs', '11:  Keep in the fridge up to 5 days', '12: Make the Cuban sandwich: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '13:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '14: Set the bread open face on the prepared baking sheet and spread the 1 tablespoon mustard over one side', '15:  Top with the Swiss cheese', '16:  Brush the garlic oil on the other side of the bread', '17:  Top with the 4 slices ham', '18:  Arrange the pulled pork over the cheese', '19: Toast in the oven for 2 minutes, or until the cheese melts', '20:  Add the pickles and press the sandwich']

ingredients: ['2 large sweet potatoes', 'water for soaking', '2 tablespoons corn starch', '1 tablespoon olive oil or vegetable oil', '½ teaspoon pepper', '½ teaspoon paprika', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon brown sugar', 'salt to taste', 'shredded parmesan cheese optional', 'fresh parsley optional chopped']
instructions: ['1: Rinse and peel sweet potatoes', '2: To cut into fries, cut a small sliver off the edge of the potatoes lengthwise to create a flat side for them to rest on', '3:  Turn the potato over to lay on its flat side', '4:  Cut each slice lengthwise into three to four fries', '5: Place the fries in a bowl of water and soak for one hour', '6:  (This helps remove excess 2 tablespoons corn starch from the potatoes so your fries will be crispier', '7: ) Rinse and dry off', '8: In a 2 large bowl or gallon bag, toss the fries with cornstarch until they’re evenly coated', '9:  Then add the 1 tablespoon olive oil and toss to coat', '10: Add the ½ teaspoon pepper, ½ teaspoon paprika, ½ teaspoon garlic powder, and ½ teaspoon brown sugar and toss to evenly distribute your spices', '11:  (Hold off on adding the salt until after baking', '12:  This will help make sure the fries are crispy', '13: )Preheat the oven to 425°F  (220°C)', '14: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil and spray with nonstick cooking spray', '15:  Lay out the french fries, being sure not to overcrowd the pan', '16:  (You may need two pans, depending on how 2 large your pans are', '17:  Avoid overcrowding one pan or your fries may not crisp up', '18: )Bake for 15 minutes', '19:  Flip fries with tongs, then bake for an additional 10–15 minutes', '20:  Sprinkle on salt (to taste) and serve! Add shredded Parmesan and chopped fresh parsley for an optional garnish']

ingredients: ['Dough', '4 ½ cups all purpose flour (565 g) plus more for dusting', '1 packet active dry yeast', '½ cup granulated sugar (100 g)', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 ¼ cups water (300 mL) between 95–100°F (35–38°C) plus more as needed', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 large egg', '¼ cup vegetable oil (60 mL)', 'vegetable oil spray for greasing', 'Ganache', '1 cup unsalted hazelnuts (125 g) roasted and finely chopped', '⅔ cup unsalted butter (155 g) room temperature', '1 ½ cups dark chocolate (300 g) chopped', '½ cup cocoa powder (55 g)', '½ cup powdered sugar (55 g)', 'Syrup', '2 cups water (480 mL)', '1 cup granulated sugar (200 g)', '1 whole cinnamon stick', '2 orange peels sliced into strips', '1 whole star anise', 'Egg Wash', '1 large egg', '1 tablespoon water', 'For Garnish', 'dried rose petal optional', 'pistachio optional chopped']
instructions: ['1: Make the dough: Add the 4 ½ cups all purpose flour, yeast, sugar, and 1 teaspoon kosher salt to the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the dough hook attachment and mix on low speed', '2:  With the mixer running, add the water, 1 teaspoon vanilla, egg, and vegetable oil', '3:  Increase the mixer speed to medium and continue mixing until the dough is smooth and pulls away cleanly from the sides of the bowl, 7–10 minutes', '4:  If the dough is too 1 packet active dry, add more water, about 1 1 tablespoon at a time, if necessary', '5:  If it is too wet, add more 4 ½ cups all purpose flour, 1 1 tablespoon at a time', '6: Transfer the dough to a clean surface and knead by hand until the dough is completely smooth, elastic, and shiny, 2–3 minutes', '7:  Shape into a ball', '8:  Grease a large bowl with vegetable oil spray, then transfer the dough to the bowl, cover with plastic wrap, and let rise in a warm place for 45–60 minutes, until doubled in size', '9: Make the filling: Preheat the oven to 300°F (150°C)', '10:   Line a small baking sheet with parchment paper', '11: Spread the 1 cup unsalted hazelnuts in an even layer on the prepared baking sheet', '12:  Roast for about 8 minutes, until golden brown and fragrant', '13:  Let cool for 5 minutes then transfer the 1 cup unsalted hazelnuts to a food processor and process until finely 1 cup unsalted hazelnuts (125 g) roasted and finely 1 ½ cups dark chocolate (300 g) pistachio optional chopped, but still with some texture', '14: Melt the ⅔ cup unsalted butter in a medium saucepan over medium heat', '15:  Add the 1 ½ cups dark chocolate and cook, whisking frequently, until melted and evenly combined', '16:  Whisk in the ½ cup cocoa powder and ½ cup powdered sugar until completely smooth', '17:  The ganache should be spreadable', '18: Make the syrup: Use a paring knife to remove the peel from the 2 orange, then thinly slice the peel', '19: Bring the water to a boil in a medium saucepan over medium-high heat', '20:  Add the sugar and stir until dissolved, about 3 minutes', '21:  Add the 1 whole cinnamon and 1 whole star anise and continue cooking for about 1 minute, then add the 2 orange peel and stir to combine', '22:  Reduce the heat to low and cook for 20–25 minutes, until the syrup thickens and the 2 orange peel is tender', '23:  Remove the pot from the heat and cover to keep warm', '24: Assemble the babka: Punch down the dough, then transfer to a clean surface and slice in half', '25:  On a lightly 4 ½ cups all purpose floured surface, roll out one portion of dough into a 21 x 15-inch  (53 x 30-cm) rectangle', '26: Using a silicone spatula, spread half of the chocolate ganache evenly over the dough, all the way to the edges', '27:  Sprinkle half of the ground 1 cup unsalted hazelnuts on top', '28:  Starting from a long end, roll the dough up into a tight log', '29:  Repeat with the remaining dough, then let the logs rest for 15 minutes', '30: Preheat the oven to 365°F (185°C)', '31:  Line 2 9-inch round cake pans with parchment paper', '32: Using a serrated knife, slice a log in half lengthwise', '33:  Cross one side of the log over the other in an X shape with the cut sides facing up', '34:  Starting from the center, braid the two halves together to the bottom and top', '35:  You can leave as is, or bring the ends together to form a wreath', '36:  Transfer to a prepared pan', '37:  Repeat with the remaining babka', '38: Make the egg wash: In a small bowl, whisk together the egg and water until smooth', '39: Brush the egg wash lightly over the babka wreaths', '40: Bake the babkas for 25–30 minutes, until golden brown', '41: Meanwhile, heat the syrup to low heat until hot', '42: Remove the babkas from the oven and slowly ladle the hot syrup on top, letting it soak into the babkas', '43:  Garnish with dried rose petals and pistachios, if desired', '44: Transfer the babkas to a wire rack and let cool for about 30 minutes', '45: To serve, gently slice the babkas with a serrated bread knife']

ingredients: ['⅔ cup rolled oats (65 g)', '⅔ cup milk (160 mL) of your choice', '½ cup vanilla greek yogurt (120 g)', '1 tablespoon strawberry jam', '3 tablespoons nut butter', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon chia seed optional', 'strawberry quartered to serve']
instructions: ['1: In a mason jar or sealable container, add the ⅔ cup rolled oats, ⅔ cup milk, yogurt, 1 tablespoon strawberry jam, 3 tablespoons nut butter, vanilla extract, 1 teaspoon chia seeds, and strawberries, and stir together', '2: Seal and place in the refrigerator overnight for up to five days', '3: Top with additional strawberries, if desired']

ingredients: ['½ cup  quaker rolled oat (40 g)', '3 oz fresh pasteurized milk (100 mL)', '2 oz natural yogurt (50 g)', '½ banana sliced', '¾ teaspoon vanilla extract', '⅕ cup pecan (15 g) chopped']
instructions: ['1: Add all of the ingredients except for the ½ banana and pecans in a clean mason jar', '2: Stir everything together', '3: Add the ½ banana and pecans', '4: Put a lid on the mason jar and refrigerate overnight 40°F (≤ 5°C)']

ingredients: ['prosciutto', 'pickled olive', 'Special Equipment', 'plastic skull', 'plastic wrap', 'Preparation', 'prosciutto', 'pickled olive', 'Special Equipment', 'plastic skull', 'plastic wrap', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Cover a plastic skull with plastic food wrap', '2: Use thin slices of prosciutto to cover the plastic skull', '3:  Leave the eye sockets, nose hole and teeth uncovered', '4: Carefully make an incision on the plastic around the eye sockets', '5:  Insert pickled olives in the sockets to create the eyes', '6: Place the meathead on a platter and add cheese and crackers']

ingredients: ['1 ½ lb bone-in skin-on chicken thighs (680 g)', '1 ½ lb bone-in skin-on chicken drumsticks (680 g)', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', '1 head garlic peeled and pureed or grated', '3 tablespoons dried oregano divided', '3 red plums pitted and quartered', '¾ cup dried apricot (145 g)', '⅓ cup red wine vinegar (80 mL)', '⅓ cup olive oil (80 mL)', '1 cup green olives (180 g) such as Castelvetrano', '½ cup capers in brine (90 g)', '3 dried bay leaves', '⅔ cup light brown sugar (145 g)', '⅓ cup dry rosé wine (80 mL)', '6 cups couscous (1 ¼ kg) cooked for serving', '⅓ cup fresh basil (15 g) thinly sliced']
instructions: ['1: Season the chicken thighs and drumsticks all over with the 2 teaspoons kosher salt', '2:  Using your hands, rub the pureed 1 head garlic and 1 tablespoon of oregano all over the chicken to coat evenly', '3: In a 9x13-inch glass baking dish, mix together the plums, apricots, red wine vinegar, ⅓ cup 1 cup 1 cup green olive oil, 1 cup green ⅓ cup 1 cup 1 cup green olives, ½ cup capers, remaining 2 3 tablespoons of oregano, and 3 dried bay leaves', '4: Add the chicken to the baking dish and turn to coat, then turn so the skin side is facing up', '5:  Cover the pan with plastic wrap and marinate the chicken in the refrigerator overnight, about 12 hours', '6: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C)', '7: While the oven preheats, remove the chicken from the refrigerator and let come to room temperature, about 30 minutes', '8: Using a paper towel, pat the chicken skin to remove any excess moisture', '9: Sprinkle the chicken skin with the ⅔ cup light brown sugar', '10:  Pour the ⅓ cup dry rosé around the chicken, but avoid pouring directly onto the skin', '11: Bake the chicken for 35–40 minutes, until a thermometer inserted into a chicken thigh, near the bone, reads 160˚F (70°C) and the skin is golden ⅔ cup light brown', '12:  Remove from the oven and let rest for 10 minutes', '13:  During this time, the residual heat from cooking will bring the internal temperature of the chicken to 165˚F (75°C)', '14: Serve the chicken and sauce over 6 cups couscous and garnish with the ⅓ cup fresh basil']

ingredients: ['Marinade', '½ lb pork (200 g) chopped into bite size pieces', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon corn flour', '1 egg', 'Deep Frying', '1 cup corn flour (100 g)', '2 ½ cups oil (500 mL)', 'Sauce', '2 tablespoons oil', '2 teaspoons garlic crushed', '½ green bell pepper chopped', '½ red bell pepper chopped', '⅔ cup pineapple (150 g)', '¼ cup white caster sugar (50 g)', '¼ cup rice vinegar (50 mL)', '2 tablespoons ketchup', 'Preparation', 'Marinade', '½ lb pork (200 g) chopped into bite size pieces', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon corn flour', '1 egg', 'Deep Frying', '1 cup corn flour (100 g)', '2 ½ cups oil (500 mL)', 'Sauce', '2 tablespoons oil', '2 teaspoons garlic crushed', '½ green bell pepper chopped', '½ red bell pepper chopped', '⅔ cup pineapple (150 g)', '¼ cup white caster sugar (50 g)', '¼ cup rice vinegar (50 mL)', '2 tablespoons ketchup', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: In a bowl, combine all marinade ingredients with the pork', '2:  Cover and leave to marinade in the fridge 20 minutes', '3: Place the corn flour in a large bowl and toss the marinated pork chunks until liberally coated', '4: In a medium-sized saucepan, heat the oil to 350˚F (180°C)', '5: Deep fry the pork pieces for about 3-4 minutes until the coating is golden brown and the pork is cooked throughout', '6:  Set aside', '7: For the sauce, place a frying pan over a medium heat and add the oil', '8: Sauté the garlic until fragrant, then fry the peppers until soften', '9: Add in the pineapple and warm thorough', '10: Add the sugar, vinegar, and ketchup, stir', '11:  Bring the mixture to a boil', '12: Add the pork to the frying pan and coat everything evenly with the sauce', '13: Serve top with sesame seeds', '14: Nutrition  Calories: 2299 Fat: 220 grams  Carbs: 55 grams Fiber: 3 grams  Sugars: 44 grams  Protein: 35 grams']

ingredients: ['½ cup flour (60 g)', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon pepper', '½ teaspoon salt', '2 lb chicken winglets (910 g) and/or chicken drumlets', 'oil for frying', 'Honey Garlic Sauce', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 tablespoon garlic minced', '1 tablespoon ginger', '½ cup soy sauce (120 mL)', '5 tablespoons honey', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '1 teaspoon sesame seed', 'scallion']
instructions: ['1: Mix ½ cup flour, garlic powder, ½ teaspoon pepper, and ½ teaspoon salt in a small bowl', '2: Coat each 2 lb chicken wing with a generous layer of the ½ cup flour mixture', '3: Pour ¼ inch (6 mm) of oil into a shallow pan, and bring it to a medium high heat', '4: In small batches, fry the 2 lb chicken wings for 4 minutes on each side', '5: Remove from the oil and let rest on a paper towel', '6: Over medium-high heat, melt the 1 tablespoon butter and add the garlic and 1 tablespoon ginger', '7: Add ½ cup soy sauce, 5 tablespoons honey, and 1 tablespoon brown sugar to pan and reduce for 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally', '8: Add the fried wings directly into the sauce pan and stir until the wings are covered in the sauce, then sprinkle with 1 teaspoon sesame seeds', '9: Serve with scallions on top', '10: Nutrition  Calories: 2185 Fat: 125 grams  Carbs: 192 grams Fiber: 9 grams  Sugars: 20 grams  Protein: 103 grams']

ingredients: ['40 soda crackers', '1 cup butter (230 g)', '1 ⅛ cups light brown sugar (245 g) firmly packed', '2 cups semi-sweet chocolate chips (350 g)', '½ cup pecan (62 g) toasted chopped']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C)', '2: Place 40 soda crackers on a greased, parchment paper-lined baking sheet so that the entire surface is covered', '3: In a saucepan, melt 1 cup butter on low heat', '4:  Once melted, add 1 ⅛ cups light brown sugar and turn heat to medium', '5:  Continue stirring until boiling, then boil for 3 minutes', '6: Pour the caramel over the 40 soda crackers, spreading evenly with a spatula', '7: Bake for 5 minutes', '8: Pour the 2 cups semi-sweet chocolate chips over the 40 soda crackers and cover with tin foil for 3 minutes', '9: Remove the foil and spread the softened 2 cups semi-sweet chocolate over the top evenly', '10: Sprinkle with pecans, cover with foil, and freeze for 1 hour', '11: Break the bark up into pieces']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '5 oz spinach (140 g)', '1 cup artichoke heart (170 g) drained', '16 oz cream cheese (455 g) softened', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '2 cups milk (470 mL)', '4 cups penne pasta (400 g) cooked']
instructions: ['1: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large pot over medium heat', '2:  Add 5 oz spinach, cooking until wilted, then add 1 cup artichoke hearts, cooking for 1 minute', '3: Add 16 oz cream cheese until melted, stirring until there are no lumps', '4: Sprinkle in 1 tablespoon garlic powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon pepper, and 2 cups milk, stirring until smooth', '5: Add 4 cups penne pasta and mix until 4 cups penne pasta is evenly coated', '6: Nutrition  Calories: 1589 Fat: 71 grams  Carbs: 190 grams Fiber: 11 grams  Sugars: 20 grams  Protein: 46 grams']

ingredients: ['Salad', '1 cup water (235 mL)', '1 cup vegetable stock (235 mL)', '1 cup quinoa (170 g)', '2 carrots shredded', '1 red bell pepper diced', '1 cucumber quartered', '1 cup red cabbage (100 g) shredded', '½ small red onion diced', '½ cup edamame (75 g)', 'green onion to serve', '½ cup crushed peanut (60 g) to serve', 'Dressing', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 tablespoon ginger grated', '2 teaspoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon honey', '¼ cup peanut butter (60 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a ½ small saucepan, bring water and 1 cup vegetable stock to a boil, then add 1 cup quinoa', '2:  Cover and simmer for 12-15 minutes', '3: In a bowl, combine 1 cup quinoa, 2 carrots, red pepper, 1 cucumber, purple cabbage, and ½ cup edamame', '4: In a ½ small bowl, mix water, 1 teaspoon sesame oil, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, 1 tablespoon ginger, 2 teaspoons olive oil, 1 tablespoon honey, and ½ cup crushed ¼ cup peanut butter', '5:  Drizzle dressing over the 1 cup quinoa', '6: Top with green onions and ½ cup crushed ½ cup crushed ¼ cup peanuts']

ingredients: ['1 piece fresh ginger peeled and minced 4 in (10 cm)', '12 cloves garlic minced', '4 cinnamon sticks', '3 tablespoons whole black peppercorn', '2 jalapeñoes halved lengthwise', '2 habanero peppers halved lengthwise', '2 sprigs fresh rosemary', '1 navel orange unpeeled and cut into 1-inch (2 1/2 cm) pieces', '2 lemons unpeeled and cut into ½-inch (1 1/4 cm) pieces', '1 gala apple unpeeled and cut into ¼-inch (6 mm) pieces', '1 yellow onion diced', '2 tablespoons honey plus more to taste', '1 cup apple cider vinegar (240 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Add the ginger and 12 cloves garlic to a 64-ounce mason jar or 2 32-ounce jars', '2:  Use the back of a wooden spoon or a muddler to smash the ingredients in the bottom of the jar', '3: Add the 4 cinnamon sticks, jalapeños, habaneros, and rosemary 2 sprigs', '4: Add the 1 navel orange, lemon, apple, and 1 yellow onion, muddling between each addition', '5: Add the honey and apple cider vinegar', '6: Place a 1 1 navel 1 navel orange unpeeled and cut into 1-inch (2 1/2 cm) 2 lemons unpeeled and cut into ½-inch (1 1/4 cm) 1 gala apple unpeeled and cut into ¼-inch (6 mm) piece of parchment paper between the jar and the lid to prevent any rust or corrosion from forming on the lid from contact with the vinegar', '7:  Close the jar tightly, then shake well to combine the ingredients', '8: Store the jar in a cool, dry place for at least 3 weeks, up to 6 weeks while the tonic ferments', '9:  The longer you allow the tonic to ferment, the spicier it will be', '10: After fermenting, strain the contents of the jar to remove the solids', '11:  Transfer the liquid to a clean jar and add more honey to taste', '12: Store the tonic in the refrigerator, tightly sealed, for up to 1 month', '13: To serve, consume 1-2 tablespoons of the tonic on its own, or mix with sparkling water or tea']

ingredients: ['2 acorn squashes', '1 tablespoon olive oil plus more for brushing and drizzling', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '¾ cup wild rice (170 g) uncooked and rinsed', '1 ¼ cups vegetable broth (300 mL) plus 2 tablespoons divided', '½ teaspoon chili powder', '¼ teaspoon ground cumin', '1 ½ teaspoons maple syrup', '5 oz cremini mushroom (140 g) quartered and sliced', '5 oz shiitake mushroom (140 g) quartered and sliced', '½ medium onion chopped', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon fresh rosemary chopped', '1 teaspoon fresh thyme chopped', '¼ cup white wine (60 mL)', '2 cups kale (200 g) chopped', '2 tablespoons pomegranate seeds']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C)', '2: Place the 2 acorn squash stem-side up on a cutting board and cut in half', '3:  Scoop out the seeds and pulp, and transfer to a bowl', '4:  Separate the seeds from the pulp', '5:  Set aside', '6: Set the squash halves cut-side up on a baking sheet', '7:  Brush with 1 tablespoon olive oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper', '8:  Bake for 40 minutes, or until almost cooked through', '9: In a small pot, combine the ¾ cup wild rice and 1¼ cups (300 ml) vegetable broth, and bring to a boil', '10:  Once boiling, cover and reduce the heat to low', '11:  Simmer for 45 minutes, or until the liquid is absorbed and the rice is tender', '12: Rinse the squash seeds and dry on a dish towel (some residual moisture is okay)', '13:  Transfer to a small bowl and add the ½ teaspoon chili powder, ¼ teaspoon ground cumin, salt, and 1 ½ teaspoons maple syrup', '14:  Mix until well-coated', '15: Remove the squash from the oven and move to one side of the baking sheet', '16:  Using parchment paper, make a tray for the squash seeds', '17:  Spread the squash seeds on the tray', '18: Bake for 15 minutes, stirring halfway through, until the squash is completely tender and the seeds are crispy', '19: Heat the 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet over ½ medium heat', '20:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the mushrooms and cook for 6-8 minutes, until they’ve released a good amount of liquid', '21: Add the onion and cook for 3-4 minutes, until semi-translucent', '22:  Add a drizzle of 1 tablespoon olive oil and the 2 cloves garlic, 1 teaspoon fresh rosemary, and 1 teaspoon fresh thyme, and cook for 3-4 minutes, until fragrant', '23:  Deglaze the pan with the ¼ cup white wine and cook until most of the liquid has evaporated', '24: Add the kale, salt, and pepper, and cook until the kale wilts and reduces in volume by about ¼', '25:   Add the remaining 2 1 ¼ cups vegetable broth (300 mL) plus 2 2 tablespoons of vegetable broth and cook until kale is almost completely wilted and most of the liquid has evaporated', '26:  Stir in the ¾ cup wild rice and remove from the heat', '27: Fill each squash half with the mushroom mixture and garnish with the squash seeds and pomegranate seeds', '28:  (Save leftover squash seeds for snacking!)']

ingredients: ['15 oz chickpeas (425 g) 1 can drained and rinsed', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '½ teaspoon salt']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Carefully dry the chickpeas', '3:  Removing the skins is optional and they will come off easily', '4:  The drier you get them, the crunchier they’ll be!In a medium bowl, add dried chickpeas, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 1 teaspoon chili powder, ½ teaspoon cayenne pepper and ½ teaspoon salt', '5:  Toss well to coat evenly', '6: Spread chickpeas out on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '7: Roast for 15-20 minutes', '8: Mix around on baking sheet and roast for additional 15-20 minutes, or until browned', '9: Cool for 5-10 minutes']

ingredients: ['1 cup blueberry (100 g)', '1 lemon juiced', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '2 cups ice (430 g)']
instructions: ['1: Pour all ingredients into a blender and blend until smooth', '2: Garnish with a 1 lemon slice']

ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 teaspoon white pepper', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '2 chicken breasts cubed', '½ cup cornstarch (65 g)', '¼ cup flour (30 g)', 'vegetable oil for frying', '1 tablespoon oil', '2 teaspoons garlic minced', '1 tablespoon ginger minced', '½ teaspoon chili flakes', '1 tablespoon rice wine', '1 ½ tablespoons soy sauce', '5 tablespoons vinegar', '1 ½ tablespoons water', '3 ½ tablespoons sugar', '1 tablespoon orange zest', 'scallion chopped for garnish', 'Cornstarch Slurry', '1 tablespoon cornstarch', '1 tablespoon water']
instructions: ['1: Combine the 1 egg, 1 teaspoon white pepper and 1 ½ teaspoons salt in a mixing bowl', '2:  Add the cubed 2 chicken breast, make sure it’s coated with the 1 egg mixture', '3: In another bowl, combine corn starch and ¼ cup flour', '4:  Add the coated 2 chicken to the ¼ cup flour mixture', '5:  Stir to coat', '6: Working in batches, fry the coated 2 chicken until golden and done', '7:  Remove with a slotted spoon and set aside', '8: In a large pan or wok, add oil, 2 teaspoons garlic, 1 tablespoon ginger and red ½ teaspoon chili flakes', '9:  Stir fry until fragrant', '10: Add 1 tablespoon rice wine and stir for a few seconds', '11:  Proceed to add all of the other sauce ingredients, including 1 ½ tablespoons soy sauce, 5 tablespoons vinegar, water, 3 ½ tablespoons sugar and 1 tablespoon orange zest', '12: Add the fried 2 chicken', '13:  Stir to coat in sauce', '14:  Thicken the sauce with the cornstarch slurry', '15: Garnish with scallion chopped scallions and serve with 1 tablespoon rice']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '1 lb shrimp (455 g) peeled and deveined', 'salt to taste', 'black pepper to taste', '3 cloves garlic minced', '½ lb bacon (225 g) cooked cut into small strips', '7 oz baby spinach (195 g)', '1 ½ cups heavy cream (355 mL)', '1 lb fettuccine pasta (455 g) cooked', '¾ cup grated parmesan cheese (80 g)', '⅓ cup fresh parsley (10 g) chopped']
instructions: ['1: In a large pot, heat the 2 tablespoons butter over medium-high heat until browned', '2: Toss in the 1 lb shrimp and season with salt and black pepper', '3:  Sear just until pink on both sides', '4:  Remove the 1 lb shrimp from the pot and set aside', '5: Sauté the 3 cloves garlic and ½ lb bacon until fragrant, about 30 seconds', '6:  Add in the 7 oz baby spinach and stir until it begins to wilt', '7: Pour in the 1 ½ cups heavy cream and stir the pot to combine', '8:  Let the sauce come up to a simmer and reduce until thick and creamy, about 5 minutes', '9: Toss in the 1 lb fettuccine, sprinkle over the ¾ cup grated parmesan cheese', '10: Sprinkle in the parsley and add the 1 lb shrimp back to the pot', '11:  Toss until everything has warmed through', '12: Remove from heat and serve', '13:  Top with a sprinkle of ⅓ cup fresh parsley']

ingredients: ['6 large beef short ribs trimmed of excess fat', 'Marinade', '2 stalks celery trimmed and cut into 1-inch (2 cm) pieces', '2 medium carrots peeled trimmed and cut into 1-inch (2 cm) pieces', '1 medium leek white and light-green parts only split lengthwise thoroughly rinsed and coarsely chopped', '6 cloves garlic peeled', '1 bay leaf', '4 sprigs fresh thyme', 'whole black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 bottle cabernet sauvignon', 'Sauce', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '2 qt unsalted beef broth (2 L) or chicken broth', 'Garnish', 'mashed potato', 'italian parsley chopped']
instructions: ['1: In a 6 large bowl, add the short ribs, all vegetables, herbs and whole black whole black pepper to taste for the marinade', '2:  Add the wine to cover', '3: Marinate at least 6 hours in the fridge', '4: Remove the meat from the marinade and pat dry with a towel or paper towel', '5: Strain the veggies from the wine', '6:  Reserve both the wine and veggies for later', '7: Season the meat with a generous amount of salt and whole black pepper', '8:  Coat each side with 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour and set aside', '9: In a 6 large ovenproof pot, heat the 2 tablespoons olive oil over medium-high heat on the stovetop', '10: Preheat the oven to 350F˚(180C˚)', '11: When the oil begins smoking, carefully slip ribs into the pot and sear until well-browned, 4 to 5 minutes per side', '12:  Transfer ribs to plate', '13: In the same pot, sauté the veggies from the marinade until lightly caramelized and browned, 5 to 7 minutes', '14: Add the wine in the pot, stirring to deglaze', '15:  Add 2 tablespoons tomato paste and stir to dissolve', '16:  Bring the liquid to a boil so the alcohol from the wine evaporates', '17: Add 6 large 2 qt unsalted beef broth and bring it back to a boil', '18:  Add the ribs back to your pot', '19:  Spoon the liquid over the ribs to coat them', '20: Cover the pot and transfer to the middle rack of your oven', '21: Bake until meat is tender enough to be pierced easily with fork, about 2½ hours, opening the oven every 30 minutes and carefully skimming the fat from surface', '22: Serve with mashed potatoes, or another side of your choice, and garnish with chopped italian parsley on top']

ingredients: ['Maple Cream Cheese Filling', '8 oz vegan cream cheese (225 g) softened', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '4 tablespoons pure maple syrup', 'Pumpkin Bread', '2 ½ cups all-purpose flour (310 g)', '1 cup brown sugar (220 g)', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '⅛ teaspoon allspice', '¼ teaspoon nutmeg', '¼ teaspoon ground ginger', '⅛ teaspoon ground cloves', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '16 oz unsweetened pumpkin puree (450 g)', '¾ cup vegetable oil (180 g)', '¼ cup water (60 mL)', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: Make the 4 tablespoons pure maple 8 oz vegan cream cheese filling: In a medium bowl, combine the 8 oz vegan cream cheese, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, vanilla, and 4 tablespoons pure maple syrup', '3:  Stir until smooth and 8 oz vegan creamy', '4:  Set aside', '5: Make the 16 oz unsweetened pumpkin cake: Sift the flour into a large bowl and add the 1 cup brown sugar, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, ⅛ teaspoon allspice, ¼ teaspoon nutmeg, ¼ teaspoon ground ginger, ⅛ teaspoon ground cloves, baking soda, baking powder, and ½ teaspoon salt', '6:  Whisk to combine', '7: In a medium bowl, combine the 16 oz unsweetened pumpkin puree, ¾ cup vegetable oil, ¼ cup water, and vanilla', '8:  Whisk well', '9: Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, folding with a rubber spatula just until combined', '10:  Do not overmix the batter', '11: Generously grease a bundt pan with nonstick spray', '12: Add 3 2 ½ cups (675 G) of 16 oz unsweetened pumpkin batter to the pan and spread evenly', '13:  Then, scoop the 8 oz vegan cream cheese filling over the batter, making a ring', '14:  Top with the remaining batter and spread to cover the filling', '15: Bake for 45 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into the cake comes out clean', '16: Remove the cake from the oven and let cool for 15 minutes before inverting to remove from the pan', '17: Slice and serve']

ingredients: ['1 cup water (240 mL)', '1 cup granulated sugar (200 g)', '1 jalapeño quartered lengthwise seeds and ribs removed for a milder syrup', '2 tablespoons coarse salt', '2 tablespoons ground chile powder', '1 wedge lime', 'Ice', '3 fl oz grapefruit juice (90 mL)', '2 fl oz mezcal (60 mL)', '1 oz campari (30 mL)', 'Preparation', '1 cup water (240 mL)', '1 cup granulated sugar (200 g)', '1 jalapeño quartered lengthwise seeds and ribs removed for a milder syrup', '2 tablespoons coarse salt', '2 tablespoons ground chile powder', '1 wedge lime', 'Ice', '3 fl oz grapefruit juice (90 mL)', '2 fl oz mezcal (60 mL)', '1 oz campari (30 mL)', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: In a small saucepan over medium heat, whisk together water and sugar', '2:  Bring to a gentle simmer, just until the sugar dissolves completely', '3: Remove the pot from the heat, add the jalapeño, and cover the pot', '4:  Let infuse for at least 1 hour, or overnight in the refrigerator', '5: Pour the syrup through a fine-mesh strainer into an airtight container', '6:  Store in the refrigerator for up to 3 months', '7: On a small plate, mix together the salt and chile powder', '8: Run the lime wedge around the rim of a rocks glass', '9:  Dip the rim in the salt mixture', '10:  Fill with ice and set aside', '11: In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, combine the grapefruit juice, mezcal, Campari, and 1 ounce jalapeño simple syrup', '12:  Shake vigorously for 20 seconds', '13: Strain into the salt-rimmed glass']

ingredients: ['6 bone-in skin-on chicken thighs', '1 tablespoon paprika', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '3 tablespoons unsalted butter', '3 cloves garlic', '½ cup heavy cream (120 mL)', '¼ cup parmesan cheese (30 g)', '1 lemon juiced', '2 cups fresh baby spinach (85 g)', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 cup chicken broth (240 mL)']
instructions: ['1: Season chicken thighs with salt, pepper, and 1 tablespoon paprika', '2: Melt 2 Tbsp', '3:  3 tablespoons unsalted butter in a large oven-proof skillet over medium high heat', '4:  Add chicken, skin-side down, and sear both sides until golden brown', '5:  Drain excess fat and set aside', '6: Melt 1 Tbsp', '7:  3 tablespoons unsalted butter in the skillet', '8:  Add 3 cloves garlic, stir until fragrant, then add chicken broth, ½ cup heavy cream, Parmesan, 1 lemon juice, 1 teaspoon dried thyme, and stir', '9:  Bring to boil, then reduce heat to low', '10: Stir in 2 cups fresh baby spinach, simmer until 2 cups fresh baby spinach has wilted and the sauce has thickened', '11: Return chicken to the skillet', '12:  Bake at 400˚F (200˚C) for 25 minutes']

ingredients: ['1 sourdough bread bowl', '7 oz brie cheese (200 g) 1 wheel', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon white wine', '4 cloves garlic minced divided', '2 strips bacon cooked and chopped', 'pepper to taste', 'fresh chive chopped to taste', 'For Dipping', 'potato chip', 'mini potato', 'spaghetti', 'carrot']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Cut off the top of the 1 sourdough bread boule so the top surface is flat and without crust', '3:  Slice the crusty top into sticks and set aside', '4: Set the 7 oz brie wheel on top of the 1 sourdough bread and cut out a hole for the 7 oz brie', '5:  Set the 7 oz brie aside and remove the cut out 1 sourdough bread', '6: In a small bowl, mix the 2 2 1 tablespoons olive oil with 2 4 cloves of garlic and brush over the 1 sourdough bread', '7:  Set the boule aside', '8: Carefully cut the top rind off of the 7 oz brie wheel', '9:  Place the 7 oz brie, cut-side up, inside the 1 sourdough bread and set it on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper', '10: Scoop out about a 2 1 tablespoon of the center of the 7 oz brie and pour the white wine into the divot', '11: Top the 7 oz brie with the remaining minced garlic and 2 strips bacon cooked and fresh chive chopped 2 strips bacon, and season with pepper', '12:  Arrange the 1 sourdough bread sticks next to the 1 sourdough bread on the baking sheet', '13: Bake for 15- 20 minutes, until the 7 oz brie is completely melted', '14: Sprinkle with chives', '15: Dip the 1 sourdough bread sticks and any other dipping items you’d like in the 7 oz brie', '16: To reheat, bake the 7 oz brie at 250°F (120°C) for about 15 minutes, until melted']

ingredients: ['1 cup crunchy sunflower butter (230 g)', '1 teaspoon honey', '¼ teaspoon kosher salt', '2 tablespoons strawberry jam warmed', '½ cup blueberries (50 g)', '½ tablespoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon fresh mint finely chopped', '1 ½ cups greek yogurt (360 g)', '3 whole avocados peeled and pitted', '2 limes lime juice', '2 tablespoons sour cream', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '3 tablespoons red onion finely diced', '3 tablespoons tomato', '1 tablespoon fresh cilantro', '2 cookies Pillsbury® Soft-Baked Cookies', '2 oz sugar snap peas (60 g)', '2 oz Gala and Granny Smith apples (60 g) sliced', '2 oz toast crackers (60 g)', '2 oz rainbow carrot sticks (60 g)', '2 oz mini cheese wheels (60 g)', '2 oz sliced salami (60 g)', '2 oz halved snacking tomatoes (60 g)', '2 oz bell pepper strips (60 g)', '2 oz sliced cucumber (60 g)', '2 oz red seedless grapes (60 g) one the vine', '2 oz Granola clusters (60 g)', '2 oz fresh blueberries (60 g)']
instructions: ['1: Make the sunflower butter dip: Fill a small serving bowl ¾ of the way with the sunflower butter', '2:  Stir in the 1 teaspoon honey and salt', '3:  Dollop the 2 tablespoons strawberry jam in the center and use a toothpick or butter knife to swirl into the sunflower butter', '4: Make the blueberry 1 tablespoon fresh mint yogurt dip: Add ⅓ cup of ½ cup 2 oz fresh blueberries, the ½ tablespoon lemon juice, and 1 tablespoon fresh mint to a blender and blend on medium-low speed until pulpy, 1–2 minutes', '5: Fill a small serving bowl ¾ of the way with the Greek yogurt', '6:  Stir in the blueberry mixture until fully combined', '7:  Top with the remaining ½ cup 2 oz fresh blueberries', '8: Make the guacamole: In a medium bowl, mash together the 3 whole avocados and 2 lime juice until smooth', '9:  Stir in the 2 tablespoons sour cream and salt', '10:  Fold in the red onion, 3 tablespoons 2 oz 2 oz halved snacking tomato, and 1 tablespoon fresh cilantro', '11:  Transfer to a small serving bowl', '12: To assemble, place the dips on a board, then surround with the Pillsbury® Soft-Baked Cookies, 2 oz sugar snap peas, Gala and Granny Smith 2 oz Gala and Granny Smith apples, 2 oz toast crackers, 2 oz rainbow carrot sticks, 2 oz mini cheese wheels, sliced salami, 2 oz halved snacking 3 tablespoons 2 oz 2 oz halved snacking tomatoes, 2 oz bell pepper strips, sliced cucumber, red grapes, granola 2 oz Granola clusters, and ½ cup 2 oz fresh blueberries']

ingredients: ['3 oz green beans (85 g)', 'olive oil to taste', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '6 oz skinless salmon (170 g)', '2 tablespoons pesto', '10 cherry tomatoes halved', 'Special Equipment', 'parchment paper or aluminum foil 12×18 inches (30x47cm)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Fold the parchment paper in half, then open up', '3: On one half, lay down the 3 oz green beans', '4:  Drizzle on olive oil and sprinkle on salt & pepper', '5: Lay the 6 oz skinless salmon on the 3 oz green beans, and spread on the 2 tablespoons pesto', '6:  Top with 10 cherry tomatoes', '7: Fold the parchment paper over the 6 oz skinless salmon, and cinch the paper together by folding it over itself along the edges', '8: Bake for 20 minutes or until internal temperature of 6 oz skinless salmon reaches 145˚F (63˚C)']

ingredients: ['⅓ cup almond milk (80 g)', '¾ cup cantaloupe (130 g) peeled and cubed', '½ cup banana (150 g) sliced', '1 cup mango (165 g) peeled and cubed', '1 cup ice (215 g)']
instructions: ['1: Add all the ingredients to a blender and mix on high', '2: Pour into a bowl or half a hollowed out ¾ cup cantaloupe, and top with desired fruit and other toppings']

ingredients: ['2 medium potatoes diced', '½ onion chopped', '3 strips bacon cooked and crumbled', '¼ cup green onion (40 g) sliced', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 tablespoon taco seasoning', '1 tablespoon olive oil']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C)', '2: Combine all ingredients in a 9x9 inch (23x23 cm) square baking dish and mix evenly', '3: Bake for 30 minutes, flipping every 10 minutes and serve']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 small green bell pepper diced', '1 small yellow onion diced', '1 lb ground turkey (455 g)', '⅔ cup water (160 mL)', '1 package McCormick® Original Taco Seasoning', '1 can black beans drained and rinsed', '1 cup frozen corn kernels (175 g) thawed', '1 can fire roasted diced tomatoes undrained', '6 flour tortillas 8 in (20 cm)', '1 can refried beans', '3 cups mexican cheese blend (300 g) shredded']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C) and grease a 9 x 13-inch (22x33 cm) baking dish with cooking spray', '2: Heat the 2 tablespoons olive oil in a medium pan over medium-high heat', '3:  Add the 1 small green pepper and 1 small yellow onion and sauté until soft and the 1 small yellow onion is translucent, about 6 minutes', '4: Add the 1 lb ground turkey and break up with a wooden spoon', '5:  Cook for another 4 minutes, or until it is no longer pink', '6:  Add the water and taco seasoning and bring to a boil', '7:  Reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer for 2 minutes', '8: Stir in the 1 can black beans, corn and fire-roasted tomatoes', '9:  Continue to simmer, uncovered, for 10 minutes, until thickened, then remove the pan from the heat', '10: Place 2 6 flour tortillas in the prepared baking dish', '11:  Spread half of the 1 can refried beans and half of the turkey mixture over the 6 flour tortillas and sprinkle with 1 cup 3 cups mexican cheese', '12:  Repeat to make another layer, then top with remaining 2 6 flour tortillas and 1 cup 3 cups mexican cheese', '13: Cover the baking dish with foil and bake for 25–30 minutes, or until the lasagna is warmed through and the 3 cups mexican cheese is melted and bubbling', '14:  Broil on high for 2–3 minutes, until dark golden brown and bubbling']

ingredients: ['15 strawberries', '2 peaches', '2 cups water (470 mL)', '1 ½ cups sugar (300 g)', '1 bottle white wine chilled', '¾ cup rum (175 mL)', '1 bottle champagne or sparkling white wine chilled', 'ice cube to chill', '10 strawberries extra for serving sliced', '2 peaches extra for serving sliced']
instructions: ['1: Discard the green tops of the 15 10 strawberries and slice the peaches', '2: In a saucepan, dissolve 1 ½ cups sugar in 2 cups water', '3: Add the 15 10 strawberries and peaches', '4: Bring to a rolling boil and reduce to medium heat', '5:  Boil for approximately 15 minutes, or until the 15 10 strawberries become pale and the peaches are soft', '6: Strain the syrup and refrigerate for 2 hours, or until cooled', '7:  Discard boiled fruit', '8: In a pitcher, combine the cooled syrup, sliced extra fruit, 1 bottle 1 bottle 1 bottle champagne or sparkling white wine, and ¾ cup rum', '9: Chill for 2-4 hours', '10: Scoop fruit into glasses with ice, pour sangria, and top with 1 bottle champagne or sparkling wine']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 chicken breasts cubed', '3 cloves garlic cloves minced', '14 oz chicken broth (395 mL)', '1 cup heavy cream (235 mL)', '½ lb penne pasta (227 g) uncooked', '1 ½ cups grated parmesan cheese (165 g)', 'parsley optional for garnish']
instructions: ['1: In a pot, heat the 1 tablespoon olive oil and brown the chicken', '2: Add 3 cloves garlic, and sauté for about a minute', '3: Add broth, 1 cup heavy cream, and ½ lb penne pasta, and bring to a boil', '4: Cover and reduce the heat to a simmer for 15-20 min', '5: Turn off heat and stir in 1 ½ cups grated parmesan cheese', '6: Top with parsley if desired']

ingredients: ['2 boneless skinless chicken breasts', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '⅔ cup all-purpose flour (80 g)', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '⅓ cup dry white wine (80 mL)', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '2 cloves garlic chopped', '2 tablespoons caper', '3 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 ½ cups chicken stock (360 mL)', '⅓ cup heavy cream (80 mL)', '2 tablespoons fresh flat-leaf parsley chopped', '8 oz angel hair pasta (225 g) cooked for serving']
instructions: ['1: Butterfly each chicken breast', '2:  Lay a piece of parchment paper on top and pound to about ¼ inch (6 mm) thick', '3:  Season generously on both sides with salt and pepper', '4: Cut each breast in half lengthwise so you have 4 pieces of chicken', '5: Add the ⅔ cup all-purpose flour to a wide, shallow dish', '6:  Dredge each piece of chicken in ⅔ cup all-purpose flour, shaking off the excess', '7: Heat the 4 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat', '8:  Fry the chicken until golden brown, about 3-4 minutes per side', '9:  Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside', '10: Pour the ⅓ cup dry white wine into the pan and cook until reduced by half, about 1 minute', '11: Add the 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, 2 cloves garlic, and capers and cook until fragrant, about 2 minutes', '12: Stir in the 3 tablespoons lemon juice and chicken stock and cook for 5 minutes, until the sauce has slightly thickened', '13: Stir in the ⅓ cup heavy cream, then return the chicken to the pan', '14: Sprinkle with the 2 tablespoons fresh flat-leaf parsley and turn the chicken to coat in the sauce', '15:  Simmer for 2 minutes, until the sauce thickens slightly, then remove from the heat', '16: Serve the chicken and sauce over 8 oz angel hair pasta']

ingredients: ['6 fresh pasilla chiles', '32 oz queso fresco (955 g) crumbled', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil plus more as needed', '2 jars mexican sour cream', '1 cup whole milk (240 mL)', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper plus more to taste', '1 teaspoon kosher salt plus more to taste', 'corn tortilla warm for serving']
instructions: ['1: Turn a gas stovetop burner to high heat', '2:  Roast the 6 fresh pasilla chiles, 2 at a time, directly over the flame, turning occasionally to char evenly, until the skin has brown spots all over, 6–8 minutes', '3:  (Alternatively, preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C)', '4:  Toss the chiles with about 1 1 tablespoon of oil, place on a baking sheet, and roast for about 35 minutes, or until the skin is beginning to char and pull away from the flesh', '5: )Transfer the chiles to a medium bowl and cover with a plate', '6:  Steam for 30 minutes', '7: Once the chiles have steamed, use gloves to peel off the charred skin', '8:  Use a paring knife or kitchen shears to cut a vertical opening in each ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, being careful not to cut all the way through', '9:  Gently remove the seeds', '10: Stuff each chile with the 32 oz queso fresco', '11: Add enough vegetable oil to a large pot to just cover the bottom', '12:  Turn the heat to medium-high and add the ½ teaspoon freshly ground black peppers to the pot in a single layer with the opening face up', '13:  When the oil is hot and the ½ teaspoon freshly ground black peppers begin to sizzle, add the Mexican sour cream, 1 cup whole milk, and any remaining 32 oz queso fresco', '14:  Bring the cream sauce to a boil, occasionally moving the chiles around but not turning them all the way over', '15: Reduce the heat to medium and simmer for 8–10 minutes, until the sauce thickens slightly', '16:  Season with the ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper and 1 teaspoon kosher salt', '17: Serve immediately with warm corn tortillas alongside']

ingredients: ['2 chicken breasts', '1 cup BBQ sauce (290 g)', '6 cups barbeque chips (205 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C) and spray a baking sheet with nonstick oil', '2: Cut 2 chicken breasts into bite-size pieces and place in a bowl', '3: Add the barbecue 1 cup BBQ sauce to bowl with 2 chicken and stir', '4: In a large ziplock bag, crush the barbecue 6 cups barbeque chips into desired crumbs (to replace bread crumbs)', '5: Coat each piece of 2 chicken in chip crumbs until fully covered and place on prepared baking tray', '6: Bake 2 chicken until golden brown, about 12 minutes', '7: Serve with a side of ranch dressing or any 1 cup BBQ sauce!']

ingredients: ['3 bananas cut into coins and frozen', '½ cup strawberry (75 g) frozen', '½ cup milk (120 mL) of choice', '1 teaspoon vanilla']
instructions: ['1: Cut 3 bananas into coins and place in freezer in a sealable bag', '2:  Freeze overnight or until solid', '3: Place all ingredients into a food processor or blender and blend until smooth', '4: Pour contents into a loaf or small pan', '5: Freeze one hour or until solid']

ingredients: ['2 cups all-purpose flour (250 g)', '2 tablespoons sugar', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '2 cups buttermilk (480 mL)', '2 eggs', '3 tablespoons unsalted butter melted', '½ teaspoon unsalted butter plus more to serve', 'maple syrup to serve']
instructions: ['1: In a bowl, add the 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 tablespoons sugar, ½ teaspoon kosher salt, baking powder, and baking soda, and whisk to combine', '2: In a bowl or measuring cup, whisk the 2 cups buttermilk, 2 eggs, and melted butter until smooth', '3: Add the 2 cups buttermilk mixture to the dry ingredients, gently incorporating with a spatula', '4:  Make sure not to overmix, as that will result in dense pancakes', '5: Add the butter to a pan over medium low heat', '6:  Once the butter begins to bubble, add ⅓ cup (80 ml) of batter to the pan', '7: Cook until the top side begins to bubble and the bottom is golden brown', '8:  Flip the pancake and cook until the underside is golden brown', '9:  Repeat with the remaining batter']

ingredients: ['1 lb Chuck roll (455 g) cubed', '2 slices smoked bacon chopped', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '½ tablespoon toasted black peppercorns', '1 tablespoon fresh thyme chopped', '1 clove garlic thinly sliced', '½ cup mayonnaise (120 g)', '2 ½ tablespoons ketchup', '2 ½ tablespoons pickle relish', '1 teaspoon white wine vinegar', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'potato roll lightly toasted', 'iceberg lettuce shredded', 'tomato thinly sliced', 'onion thinly sliced', 'american cheese', 'dill pickle chip']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, combine cubed chuck 1 lb Chuck potato roll, salt, black pepper, 1 tablespoon fresh thyme, and sliced 1 clove garlic', '2:  Stir to coat', '3:  Cover and refrigerate to cure overnight', '4: Prepare the sauce: in a small mixing bowl, combine the ½ cup mayonnaise, 2 ½ tablespoons ketchup, 2 ½ tablespoons pickle relish, 1 teaspoon white wine vinegar, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, salt, and pepper', '5:  Whisk together', '6:  Refrigerate to bring flavors together', '7: Using a stand mixer fitted with meat grinder attachment, grind the cured meat, layering in pieces of chopped 2 slices smoked bacon throughout', '8:  (Ensure the meat and grinder attachments are very cold before grinding! Recommended that you place it in the freezer for a few minutes just before using', '9: )Lightly mix together the ground meat and then form into six, 3 ounce balls', '10: To a hot, oiled, cast iron skillet, over medium/high heat - add the balls and allow to cook slightly', '11:  Using two spatulas layered on top of one another, press down on the burger to form into thin patties', '12:  Continue to cook until the underside has browned and caramelized', '13: Flip the burgers and continue to cook until the second side just begins to brown', '14:  Top with american cheese and remove from the skillet', '15: To assemble: Spread the burger sauce onto both halves of a ½ tablespoon potato roll lightly toasted potato bun', '16:  On the bottom bun, layer iceberg lettuce, tomato, and a sprinkle of salt', '17:  Add one burger patty, 1 clove garlic tomato onion thinly sliced onions, then the second burger patty', '18:  Place 4 pickles onto the top bun and place on top of the burger']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon canola oil', '1 teaspoon ginger', '9 shrimps deveined and shelled', '½ carrot cut into rounds', '¼ onion sliced', '1 shiitake mushroom', '1 bok choy cut into stem and leaves', 'Flavored Broth', '½ cup water (120 mL)', '¼ cup chicken stock (60 mL)', '2 tablespoons sake', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 teaspoon oyster sauce', 'Cornstarch Slurry', '½ tablespoon cornstarch', '½ tablespoon water', 'Edible Rice Bowl', 'oil for frying', '1 cup short grain rice (100 g) cooked']
instructions: ['1: To make the soup', '2:  Add 1 tablespoon canola 1 tablespoon canola oil and heat the pan over medium heat', '3:  Add 1 teaspoon ginger and cook until fragrant', '4: Toss in shrimp and sauté both side until shrimp start to turn pink, but are not fully cooked', '5: Add the ½ carrot, ¼ onion, and 1 bok choy stems, and sauté lightly', '6:  Add 1 shiitake mushroom and stir', '7:  Add all the broth ingredients except slurry and bring it to a boil', '8: Add 1 bok choy leaves and slurry and bring to boil', '9:  Set aside', '10: Make an edible rice bowl', '11:  Place a cup of rice onto a large piece of parchment paper and spread the rice', '12: Put another piece of parchment paper on top and roll with a rolling pin', '13: Once it is flat, remove the parchment paper on top and heat it with microwave for 3 minutes in order to dry it', '14:  Place it on a cooling rack to cool to touch', '15: Once the rice sheet is cooled, put it in a mesh colander and shape it like a bowl', '16:  Fry the rice sheet in the mesh colander until golden brown', '17: Pour warmed soup over the edible bowl while it is still hot']

ingredients: ['10 oz semi-sweet chocolate chips (290 g)', '½ cup unsalted butter (115 g)', '2 tablespoons vegetable shortening', '1 ¼ cups all purpose flour (155 g)', '¼ cup dutch processed cocoa  powder (25 g)', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '¾ teaspoon fine sea salt', '1 teaspoon instant espresso powder', '1 cup granulated sugar (200 g)', '¼ cup dark brown sugar (50 g)', '2 whole eggs plus one egg yolk room temperature', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '½ cup semisweet chocolate chip (85 g)']
instructions: ['1: Using a microwave-safe bowl, melt the 10 oz semi-sweet ½ cup semisweet chocolate, ½ cup unsalted butter, and 2 tablespoons vegetable shortening in the microwave in 30-second increments until completely melted, stirring in between each increment', '2:  Set aside to cool slightly as you complete the other steps', '3: In a medium bowl, whisk the 1 ¼ cups all purpose flour, ¼ cup dutch processed cocoa powder, 1 teaspoon baking powder, ¾ teaspoon fine sea salt, and 1 teaspoon instant espresso powder until combined', '4: In a large bowl using a hand mixer or a stand mixer with a paddle attachment, whip the sugar and 2 whole eggs on high speed for a full 5 minutes', '5:  The mixture will look frothy and lighter in color', '6: Add the 2 teaspoons vanilla, followed by the mixture of melted 10 oz semi-sweet ½ cup semisweet chocolate, ½ cup unsalted butter, and 2 tablespoons vegetable shortening in a slow and steady stream on low speed until fully combined', '7: Add the dry ingredients in two additions and mix on low speed by hand until just combined', '8:  Don’t over-mix', '9:  Finally, mix in the mini 10 oz semi-sweet ½ cup semisweet chocolate chips', '10: Cover and chill the cookie dough for 1 hour in the fridge', '11: Preheat your oven to 350°F and prepare 2 half sheet trays with parchment paper', '12:  Scoop dough into balls, rolling them to make them slightly taller before you place them on the tray 2-3 inches apart, no more than 8 cookies per tray', '13:  Bake for 13-16 minutes until the edges look set', '14: Remove from the oven and let cool for at least 10 minutes before serving']

ingredients: ['2 cups frozen strawberry (300 g)', '2 frozen bananas', '3 scoops dairy-free vanilla ice cream', '⅔ cup dairy-free milk (160 mL)', '¼ cup ice cube (50 g)']
instructions: ['1: In a blender, combine frozen strawberries, frozen bananas, dairy-free ice cream, dairy-free ⅔ cup dairy-free milk, and ice cubes', '2: Blend until combined']

ingredients: ['½ large seedless watermelon', '1 ½ cups cucumber (200 g) diced', '½ cup feta cheese (55 g) crumbled', '2 tablespoons fresh mint chopped plus more for garnish', '2 teaspoons olive oil', 'salt to taste']
instructions: ['1: Cut the watermelon into 1½-inch (4 cm) cubes, removing the rind', '2: Using a teaspoon measuring spoon or a melon baller, scoop out the center of each watermelon cube, only going about halfway through', '3: In a ½ large bowl, combine the 1 ½ cups cucumber, ½ cup feta, 2 tablespoons fresh mint, 2 teaspoons olive oil, and salt', '4: Spoon the 1 ½ cups cucumber mixture into the watermelon cubes', '5: Garnish with more 2 tablespoons fresh mint', '6:  Chill until serving']

ingredients: ['1 banana', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '½ cup almond milk (120 mL)', '¼ cup maple syrup (85 g)', '½ cup greek yogurt (140 g)', '1 ½ cups rolled oats (150 g)', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', 'salt to taste', 'Optional Toppings', 'strawberry sliced', 'blueberry', 'apple sliced', 'dark chocolate chip', 'nut chopped', '½ cup dried cranberry (60 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: Mash 1 banana in a large bowl until smooth and mix in all wet ingredients', '3:  Stir in dry ingredients until thoroughly mixed', '4: Pour batter into greased muffin tin, filling each tin about ⅔ full', '5: Top each muffin with toppings', '6: Bake for about 30 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean']

ingredients: ['15 oz pumpkin puree (425 g) 1 can', '12 oz evaporated milk (355 mL) 1 can', '¾ cup sugar (150 g)', '1 teaspoon cinnamon extra for taste', '¼ teaspoon ground cloves', '½ teaspoon ground ginger', '½ teaspoon salt', '2 eggs', '2 pie crusts refrigerated', 'whipped cream', 'ice cream']
instructions: ['1: In a bowl, mix the dry ingredients thoroughly', '2: Add the 2 eggs and 15 oz pumpkin, and mix', '3: Gradually add the evaporated milk, mixing constantly', '4: Preheat oven to 350°F (180˚C)', '5: With a jar lid, cut 12 4-inch (10 cm) circles out of the 2 pie crust', '6:  Press into each of the cups of a greased muffin tin', '7: Pierce the bottoms of the crust gently with a fork', '8: Fill each 2 pie crust to the top with filling', '9: Bake for 20-30 minutes, until top of crust becomes golden brown', '10: Add your favorite ice cream or whipped cream with a pinch of 1 teaspoon cinnamon powder']

ingredients: ['1 medium white onion finely diced', '¾ lb crimini mushroom (340 g) minced', '4 cups fresh spinach (160 g) chopped', '1 ½ tablespoons garlic minced divided', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 lb boneless ribeye roast (910 g)', '3 tablespoons canola oil divided', '½ lb prosciutto (225 g) sliced', '¼ cup mayonnaise (55 g)', '½ teaspoon dried thyme', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '2 large russet potatoes washed and peeled', '2 cups grated parmesan cheese (230 g) divided plus more for sprinkling']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: Pour 1 1 ½ 3 1 tablespoon of 3 3 1 tablespoons canola oil into a 1 medium skillet over 1 medium heat and sauté the onion, ¾ lb crimini mushrooms, and 4 4 ¼ 2 cups fresh spinach for about 5-7 minutes, or until the onions begin to turn translucent', '3:  Add 1 1 ½ 3 1 tablespoon of 1 ½ 1 ½ 3 1 tablespoons garlic, salt, and pepper and cook, stirring occasionally, until all the liquid evaporates and the mixture becomes a thick paste', '4:  Remove from the pan and let cool completely', '5: Generously season the rib eye all over with salt and pepper', '6:  Heat the 3 3 1 tablespoons canola oil in a 1 medium skillet over 1 medium-high heat', '7:  Sear the meat for 3-5 minutes on all sides, until a crust has formed all over', '8:  Let rest on a wire rack for 10 minutes', '9: Arrange overlapping sheets of plastic wrap until you have a surface twice the length and width of the rib eye', '10:  Lay overlapping strips of ½ lb prosciutto on the plastic in an even layer, making sure the ½ lb prosciutto sheet is 2 large enough to cover the rib eye', '11:  Spread the cooled ¾ lb crimini mushroom mixture evenly over the ½ lb prosciutto', '12: In a small bowl, stir together the mayonnaise, remaining ½ 1 ½ 3 1 tablespoon minced 1 ½ 1 ½ 3 1 tablespoons garlic, ½ ½ teaspoon salt, the thyme, and lemon juice', '13:  Generously brush the rib eye with the 1 ½ 1 ½ 3 1 tablespoons garlic mayo, then place the rib eye in the center of the ½ lb prosciutto-mushroom sheet', '14: Keeping everything even and tight, wrap the rib eye with the ½ lb prosciutto, using the plastic wrap to help wrap it tightly and to seal the ends', '15:  Tuck the ends of the plastic wrap underneath the wrapped rib eye to keep its shape and chill in the refrigerator for 30 minutes', '16: Using a knife or mandoline, carefully cut the potatoes into slices ⅛-inch (3 mm) thick and lay on paper towels', '17:  Sprinkle the potato slices with salt and let sit for 10 minutes to draw out any excess moisture', '18:  Pat the potatoes dry', '19: Evenly sprinkle 1 4 ¼ 2 cup (115 g) of Parmesan cheese over a parchment-lined baking sheet', '20: Arrange the potato slices in overlapping rows over the Parmesan until the pan is covered', '21:  Sprinkle the remaining 4 ¼ 2 cup of Parmesan evenly over the potatoes', '22: Bake for 30 minutes, until slightly golden and the potatoes are still flexible', '23:  Remove the potatoes from the oven and increase the heat to 400˚F (200˚C)', '24: Place the chilled, ½ lb prosciutto-wrapped rib eye in the center of the potato sheet', '25:  Fold the potatoes over the rib eye and peel back the parchment', '26:  Sprinkle Parmesan under the seam (it will help seal the potato layer) and all over the top', '27: Loosely cover the pan with foil and bake for 30 minutes', '28:  Remove the foil and bake for 20 minutes more, or until the potatoes are golden brown and the internal temperature of the beef is at least 135°F (57°C) for 1 medium-rare', '29:  Rest for 10 minutes before slicing']

ingredients: ['1 box spice cake mix', '1 can pureed pumpkin 14 ounces', 'Optional', '8 oz frosting (225 g) as desired']
instructions: ['1: Mix the 1 box spice cake mix and 1 can pureed pumpkin', '2: Spread into a greased loaf pan', '3:   Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 55-60 min', '4:  Cool completely', '5: Frost to your liking!']

ingredients: ['15 oz tuna (425 g) canned drained', '1 tablespoon olive oil plus more for cooking', '¾ cup panko bread crumbs (35 g)', '1 tablespoon dried parsley', '2 teaspoons fresh chives minced', '1 tablespoon garlic minced', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 large egg beaten', 'whole wheat burger bun for serving']
instructions: ['1: Combine the 15 oz tuna, 1 tablespoon olive oil, ¾ cup panko, 1 tablespoon dried parsley, 2 teaspoons fresh chives, 1 tablespoon garlic, ½ teaspoon salt, ½ teaspoon pepper, 1 teaspoon paprika, and egg in a 1 large bowl until evenly mixed', '2: Divide the mixture into 4 portions and form patties with your hands', '3: Heat a drizzle of 1 tablespoon olive oil in a 1 large skillet over medium-high heat', '4: Place the patties in the pan and cook for 3-5 minutes on each side, until golden brown', '5: Serve on whole whole wheat buns with your preferred toppings']

ingredients: ['4 stalks lemongrass', '½ cup fresh basil (120 g)', '2 ½ shallots divided', '1 ginger roughly chopped - 1 inches (2.54 cm)', '3 cloves garlic', '2 teaspoons brown sugar', '½ teaspoon turmeric', '½ teaspoon ground coriander', '½ teaspoon cumin', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes', '2 cans reduced-fat coconut milk', '1 tablespoon coconut oil', '4 cups cooked rice (800 g)', '1 lb shrimp (455 g) optional shrimp chicken', 'Any Vegetable toppings:', 'bell pepper', 'green onion', 'broccoli']
instructions: ['1: Add chopped 4 stalks lemongrass, ½ cup fresh basil, 1 shallot, 3 cloves garlic, 1 ginger, ½ teaspoon ground coriander, ½ teaspoon cumin, ½ teaspoon turmeric, ½ teaspoon salt, pepper, 1 teaspoon 2 2 cans red pepper flakes, and 2 teaspoons brown sugar to a food processor', '2:  Blend until a paste forms', '3:  (If difficult to combine, add 1 tbsp water to the mix and blend again)', '4: Dice the remaining 2 ½ shallots and set aside', '5: Over medium heat, melt 2 cans reduced-fat 1 tablespoon coconut oil in a large pan (big enough to hold 2 2 cans of 2 cans reduced-fat 1 tablespoon coconut milk)', '6:  Once the oil is hot and melted, add the ½ cup fresh basil 4 stalks lemongrass curry paste in', '7:  Let the curry paste bloom for 1 minute', '8:  Then add in the remaining chopped 2 ½ shallots and sauté until softened (2 minutes, approximately)', '9: Pour in both 2 cans of 2 cans reduced-fat 1 tablespoon coconut milk and stir until combined', '10:  Cover and let curry 1 teaspoon 2 2 cans reduce over medium heat for 20 minutes', '11:  Stir every so often', '12:  Season with ½ teaspoon salt and pepper', '13: While the curry simmers, prepare the meat and vegetables you will be using as desired', '14: Once the 2 cans reduced-fat 1 tablespoon coconut curry has 1 teaspoon 2 2 cans reduced and become thicker, begin assembling your dish', '15:  Pour the curry over a bed of 4 cups cooked rice, and top with any proteins and vegetables', '16: Serve and enjoy!']

ingredients: ['2 cups gluten-free oat flour (250 g)', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '¼ teaspoon salt', '¼ cup melted coconut oil (60 mL)', '1 tablespoon rose water', '¼ cup coconut sugar (50 g)', '¼ cup pure maple syrup (85 g)', '2 flax-eggs (2 tablespoons ground flax + 6 tbsp water whisked together set for 15 minutes)', '2 tablespoons dried rose petal', '1 ½ cups vegan white chocolate chips (215 g)']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and set it aside', '3: Whisk together all of the dry ingredients in a mixing bowl: 2 cups gluten-free oat flour, baking soda, baking powder, and ¼ teaspoon salt', '4: In a separate, large mixing bowl, combine the wet ingredients: coconut oil, coconut sugar, ¼ cup pure maple syrup, 2 flax eggs, and rose water and mix until thoroughly combined', '5: Combine the dry and wet ingredients in a mixing bowl', '6:  Whisk until everything is well mixed', '7:  Stir in the 1 ½ cups vegan white chocolate chips and rose petals', '8: Cover the cookie dough bowl', '9:  Allow to remain at room temperature for 10 minutes to allow the dry mixture to absorb the liquid mixture', '10: Scoop about 2 teaspoons of cookie dough onto the baking sheet lined with parchment paper', '11:  Use your palm to softly flatten the cookies into a circular disc, they will not spread while baking', '12:  Chocolate chips can be pressed into the tops of the cookies if desired', '13: Bake for 8-10 minutes, or until lightly golden brown and set', '14:  With a flat, heatproof spatula, remove the cookies from the baking sheet and set them on a cooling rack to cool', '15:  Allow to thoroughly cool and serve']

ingredients: ['1 breast large chicken breast', '1 slice baby swiss cheese', '1 slice provolone cheese', '1 thin slice ham', '5 leaves baby spinach leaf', '½ cup flour (60 g)', '2 eggs beaten', '⅔ cup breadcrumb (75 g)', 'oil for frying', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
instructions: ['1: Cut a pocket into the side of the chicken 1 breast', '2: Season chicken with salt and pepper', '3: Stack the two cheeses and 5 leaves baby spinach on top of the 1 thin slice ham and roll up tightly', '4: Stuff the chicken with the roll and press the edges of the chicken together to create a seal', '5: Place the ½ cup flour, 2 eggs, and bread crumbs into 3 separate bowls', '6: Being careful to keep the chicken from opening, dip the stuffed chicken in the ½ cup flour, shaking off the excess', '7:  Then dip the ½ cup floured chicken into the egg, then breadcrumbs, then egg and breadcrumbs again', '8:  Coat evenly and shake off any excess breading', '9: Heat oil in a cast iron pan over medium heat and preheat oven to 375ºF (190°C)', '10: Fry the chicken until golden brown on both sides', '11: Once the chicken is fried, place into a baking dish and bake for 20 minutes, or until the internal temperature of the chicken reaches a minimum of 165ºF (75ºC)', '12: Enjoy!Nutrition  Calories: 5805 Fat: 524 grams  Carbs: 191 grams Fiber: 10 grams  Sugars:11 grams  Protein: 89 grams']

ingredients: ['10 slices sandwich bread', 'peanut butter', 'banana sliced', '3 eggs', '1 tablespoon milk', '½ teaspoon cinnamon', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract']
instructions: ['1: Roll each slice of 10 slices sandwich bread flat with a rolling pin', '2:  Carefully cut off the crusts', '3: Spread desired amount of peanut butter and bananas along the edge of the 10 slices sandwich bread, and roll up', '4: In a bowl, combine 3 eggs, 1 tablespoon milk, ½ teaspoon cinnamon, and ½ teaspoon vanilla', '5: Dip each roll-up in egg mixture, and pan-fry in a buttered skillet until all sides are golden brown']

ingredients: ['½ cup granulated sugar (100 g)', '¾ cup brown sugar (165 g) packed', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ cup unsalted butter (115 g) melted', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 ¼ cups all-purpose flour (155 g)', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '4 oz milk or semi-sweet chocolate chunks (110 g)', '4 oz dark chocolate chunk (110 g) or your preference']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, whisk together the sugars, 1 teaspoon salt, and ½ cup unsalted butter until a paste forms with no lumps', '2: Whisk in the 1 egg and 1 teaspoon vanilla, beating until light ribbons fall off the whisk and remain for a short while before falling back into the mixture', '3: Sift in the 1 ¼ cups all-purpose flour and ½ teaspoon baking soda, then fold the mixture with a spatula (Be careful not to overmix, which would cause the gluten in the 1 ¼ cups all-purpose flour to toughen resulting in cakier cookies)', '4: Fold in the chocolate chunks, then chill the dough for at least 30 minutes', '5:  For a more intense toffee-like flavor and deeper color, chill the dough overnight', '6:  The longer the dough rests, the more complex its flavor will be', '7: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C)', '8:  Line a ½ teaspoon baking sheet with parchment paper', '9: Scoop the dough with an ice-cream scoop onto a parchment paper-lined ½ teaspoon baking sheet, leaving at least 4 inches (10 cm) of space between cookies and 2 inches (5 cm)  of space from the edges of the pan so that the cookies can spread evenly', '10: Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the edges have started to barely ¾ cup brown', '11: Cool completely before serving']

ingredients: ['4 eggs', '2 teaspoons sugar', '1 pinch salt to taste', '1 teaspoon sake', '1 teaspoon mirin', '⅓ cup bonito dashi broth (80 mL)', 'oil to taste', '1 shiso leaf', 'japanese radish grated to serve', 'soy sauce to serve']
instructions: ['1: In a large mixing bowl, add the 4 eggs, 2 teaspoons sugar, 1 pinch salt, 1 teaspoon sake, 1 teaspoon mirin, and ⅓ cup bonito dashi broth, and mix well', '2: Heat a tamagoyaki pan at over medium heat', '3:  Brush a thin layer of oil on the pan', '4: Pour ⅙ of egg mixture into pan and quickly swirl to cover the entire pan', '5:  When the egg is set, gently roll the egg', '6: With the rolled egg still in the pan, pour in ⅙ of the egg mixture', '7:  Lift up the rolled egg and let the mixture to flow under it', '8:  When the egg is set, roll the omelette toward you', '9: Repeat, adding ⅙ of the mixture at a time, continuing to roll the egg into a large roll', '10: Cut the tamagoyaki in half and pierce with a skewer', '11: Serve with a 1 shiso leaf, grated japanese radish, and soy sauce']

ingredients: ['8 lb bone-in lamb roast with fat cap (3.8 kg)', '12 cloves garlic divided', '½ cup olive oil (120 g)', '⅓ cup whole grain mustard (80 g) plus more for serving', '1 lemon juiced', '10 sprigs fresh rosemary stemmed and leaves finely chopped plus whole sprigs for serving', '10 sprigs fresh thyme stemmed and leaves finely chopped plus whole sprigs for serving', '1 ½ tablespoons sea salt', '1 tablespoon freshly ground black pepper', '¾ cup dry white wine (180 mL)', '2 ½ lb yukon gold potato (1.2 kg) halved', 'flaky sea salt for sprinkling']
instructions: ['1: 2-3 hours before roasting, prepare the 8 lb bone-in lamb', '2:  Use a small, sharp knife to make 15 to 20 incisions, each about 2 inches (5 cm) deep, through the fat cap on top of the meat', '3:  Thinly slice 3 12 cloves of garlic and use your fingers to press the slices into the incisions', '4: In a blender, combine the remaining 9 garlic 12 cloves, the ½ cup olive oil, mustard, 1 lemon juice, rosemary leaves, thyme leaves, 1 ½ tablespoons sea flaky sea salt, and 1 tablespoon freshly ground black pepper', '5:  Blend until a paste forms', '6: Spread the paste evenly all over the 8 lb bone-in lamb', '7:  Let marinate at room temperature for 2 to 3 hours', '8: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C)', '9: Place the 8 lb bone-in lamb on a roasting rack in a roasting pan and pour the ¾ cup dry white wine into the bottom of the pan', '10:  Roast for 15 minutes', '11: Remove the pan from the oven and reduce the heat to 325°F (160°C)', '12: Arrange the potatoes, cut side down, in the roasting pan and place the 8 lb bone-in lamb on the rack on top', '13:  Roast for 2 hours, tossing the potatoes and basting the 8 lb bone-in lamb with the roasting liquid halfway through', '14: Transfer the potatoes to a platter, baste the 8 lb bone-in lamb again with the remaining pan juices, and return the 8 lb bone-in lamb to the oven', '15:  Continue to roast, basting often, until an instant-read thermometer inserted into thickest part of the leg reaches 130°F (for medium-rare), 45 minutes to 2 hours more, depending on thickness', '16:  (As a general rule, the 8 lb bone-in lamb should roast 20 minutes per pound for medium-rare)', '17: Transfer the 8 lb bone-in lamb to a platter and set aside to rest for 20 minutes', '18:  While the 8 lb bone-in lamb rests, return the potatoes to the roasting pan, season with flaky 1 ½ tablespoons sea flaky sea salt, and warm in the oven until just heated through, about 20 minutes', '19:  Return the potatoes to the serving platter', '20: Carve the 8 lb bone-in lamb into ½-inch (1 cm) thick slices and arrange on the platter with the potatoes, garnished with rosemary and thyme sprigs', '21:  Serve with whole ⅓ cup whole grain mustard alongside']

ingredients: ['½ cup instant oatmeal (50 g)', '2 tablespoons freeze-dried blueberry', '1 tablespoon slivered almond', '1 tablespoon chia seed', '⅛ teaspoon vanilla bean', '2 teaspoons sugar of choice', '¾ cup water (175 mL) or milk boiling']
instructions: ['1: Add the ½ cup instant oatmeal, freeze-dried blueberries, almonds, ⅛ teaspoon vanilla bean, 1 tablespoon chia seeds, and 2 teaspoons sugar into a mason jar', '2: Store in a cool, dry place for up to a month', '3: To prepare, pour boiling ¾ cup water or milk over oats', '4:  Stir to combine and let sit for 3 minutes', '5: Serve with 1 tablespoon slivered almonds and fresh blueberries']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '3 cloves garlic smashed', '1 ½ lb green beans (675 g) trimmed', '¾ cup chicken stock (180 mL)', '1 lemon zested', '1 lemon juiced']
