instructions: ['1: Heat the 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat', '2:  Add the 3 cloves garlic 1 ½ lb green beans and season with salt', '3:  Sauté for 2 minutes, just until the 3 cloves garlic is fragrant', '4: Add the ¾ cup chicken stock, cover, and steam for 5–7 minutes, until the 1 ½ lb green beans are tender but still bright 1 ½ lb green', '5:  Add the lemon zest and juice and toss to combine', '6:  Season with more salt to taste', '7: Transfer to a bowl and serve warm']

ingredients: ['1 lb sirloin steak (455 g) cut into 1 in pieces (2 1/2 cm)', '1 teaspoon kosher salt plus more to taste', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper plus more to taste', '8 sprigs fresh rosemary bottom 4 inches (10 cm) of leaves removed', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '4 cloves garlic gently smashed', '5 tablespoons unsalted butter divided', '1 cup red wine (240 mL) such as Cabernet Sauvignon', '1 teaspoon granulated sugar']
instructions: ['1: Heat a 12-inch (5 cm) cast iron skillet over medium-high heat for at least 10 minutes', '2: Add the 1 lb sirloin steak to a medium bowl and season with the 1 teaspoon kosher salt and ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, tossing to coat evenly', '3: Thread 2 pieces of 1 lb sirloin steak onto each rosemary sprig, sliding up the stem until the 1 lb sirloin steak meets the leaves', '4:  Using scissors, trim the bottom of the 8 sprigs so each end is about ½ inch long', '5: Add the olive oil and 4 cloves garlic to the pan, stir, and let heat for about 1 minute', '6: Once the oil begins to smoke, add 1 tablespoon of butter and stir to distribute', '7:  Place the skewers in the pan', '8:  Sear, without moving, for about 2 minutes, until a nice brown crust forms on one side', '9:  Using tongs, carefully flip each skewer over and brown on the other side, about 2 minutes more', '10:  Once cooked to your desired doneness, remove the 1 lb sirloin steak skewers from the skillet and set on a clean baking sheet to rest', '11: Without reducing the heat, carefully pour the wine into the skillet', '12:  Cook until reduced to ¼ 1 cup, 5–10 minutes', '13:  Once reduced, remove the 4 cloves garlic from the pan and discard', '14: Add the 1 teaspoon granulated sugar and remaining 4 tablespoons of butter to the red wine reduction and stir until combined, 1–2 minutes', '15: Garnish the 1 lb sirloin steak skewers lightly with 1 teaspoon kosher salt and ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, then transfer to a serving platter and spoon the sauce on top', '16: Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['1 small watermelon', '3 cups baby spinach (120 g)', '1 mango pitted peeled and diced', '½ cup slivered almonds (70 g)', 'Lemon Vinaigrette', '2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '1 tablespoon water', '1 tablespoon honey', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil']
instructions: ['1: Using a sharp knife, cut off the top and bottom of the 1 small 1 tablespoon watermelon to reveal the red flesh and create flat surfaces on both sides', '2:  Stand the 1 small 1 tablespoon watermelon upright, and slice off the remaining peel so only the red core remains', '3: Cut the 1 small 1 tablespoon watermelon into roughly 1-inch (2-cm) cubes and transfer to a large bowl', '4: In a 1 small bowl, whisk together the 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice, 1 small 1 tablespoon water, 1 tablespoon honey, salt, and pepper', '5: While whisking, gradually add the 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil in a very slow, steady stream to create an emulsification', '6:  Set aside', '7: Add the 3 cups baby spinach, 1 mango, ½ cup slivered almonds, and 2 tablespoons fresh lemon vinaigrette to the large bowl with the 1 small 1 tablespoon watermelon', '8: Toss the salad until well-combined, then divide between serving bowls']

ingredients: ['2 cups cream cheese (450 g) softened', '½ cup sour cream (145 g)', '3 cups shredded mozzarella cheese (300 g) divided', '½ cup parmesan cheese (55 g) grated', '4 cloves garlic minced', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '2 packages frozen spinach thawed and drained', '2 cans artichoke heart drained and chopped', '4 large flour tortillas']
instructions: ['1: In a 4 large bowl, mix together the 2 cups ½ cup sour cream cheese, sour 2 cups ½ cup sour cream, 1 cup (100 G) 3 cups shredded mozzarella, the Parmesan, 4 cloves garlic, ½ teaspoon red pepper flakes, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, and ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper until smooth', '2:  Fold in the 2 packages frozen spinach and 2 cans artichoke hearts', '3: Heat a 4 large nonstick skillet over medium heat', '4:  Place a tortilla in the pan', '5:  Sprinkle ¼ cup (25 G) of 3 cups shredded mozzarella over half of the tortilla', '6:  Top with ¼ of the 2 packages frozen spinach 2 cans artichoke dip, spreading evenly', '7:  Sprinkle with another ¼ cup of the 3 cups shredded mozzarella', '8:  Fold the empty side of the tortilla over the side with the cheese', '9:  Flip and cook for 1–2 minutes, or until the cheese is melted', '10:  Remove the quesadilla from the pan and slice into 4 wedges', '11:  Repeat with the remaining ingredients', '12: Serve warm']

ingredients: ['20 oz young green jackfruit (565 g) 2 cans in brine or water', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ yellow onion sliced', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon liquid smoke', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 cup vegetable stock (240 mL)', '¾ cup vegan bbq sauce (215 g)', 'red onion sliced to serve', 'tomato sliced to serve', 'lettuce to serve', '4 buns burger bun to serve']
instructions: ['1: Preheat your oven to 400ºF (200ºC)', '2: Drain and rinse the 20 oz young green jackfruit, then cut the 20 oz young green jackfruit into smaller pieces, removing the core', '3: Add the 1 tablespoon olive oil, onions, 3 cloves garlic, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1 teaspoon pepper to a large frying pan or skillet over medium-high heat', '4:  Sauté until the onions are tender and become translucent', '5: Add the 20 oz young green jackfruit, 1 teaspoon chili powder, 1 teaspoon paprika, 1 teaspoon cumin, 1 teaspoon liquid smoke, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon pepper, and 1 teaspoon liquid smoke, and stir', '6: Add the 1 cup vegetable stock, cover, and cook another 10-15 minutes, until the 20 oz young green jackfruit is soft enough that it can be mashed', '7: Mash the 20 oz young green jackfruit with potato masher or a couple of forks, until it looks pulled or shredded', '8: Spread an even layer of pulled 20 oz young green jackfruit across a parchment paper-lined baking sheet', '9: Bake for 25 minutes', '10: Remove from oven and pour over the ¾ cup vegan BBQ sauce and stir to combine', '11: Place back in the oven for 10 more minutes', '12: Build your 4 buns burger, top with dressings of your choice']

ingredients: ['3 lb large sweet potato (1.3 g) 4 potatoes', '1 cup unsalted butter (225 g) 2 sticks melted', '2 ½ cups sugar (500 g)', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '4 large eggs', '1 tablespoon self-rising flour', '¼ cup buttermilk (60 mL)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon lemon extract', '3 pies frozen prepared pie crust unbaked']
instructions: ['1: Cook the sweet potatoes in a large pot of boiling water until fork-tender, about 25-30 minutes', '2:  Drain and let cool completely', '3: Preheat the oven to 365˚F (185˚C)', '4: Peel the sweet potatoes, then transfer to a large bowl and mash thoroughly with an electric hand mixer or fork', '5: Add the melted 1 cup unsalted ¼ cup butter, 2 ½ cups sugar, 1 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, and ½ teaspoon kosher salt', '6:  Beat to combine, then scrape down the sides of the bowl with a rubber spatula', '7:  Add the eggs, 1 at a time, beating to incorporate each addition', '8:  Add the self-rising 1 tablespoon self-rising flour, 1 cup unsalted ¼ cup ¼ cup buttermilk, 1 teaspoon vanilla, and 1 teaspoon lemon extract, and beat to combine', '9: Divide the sweet potato filling between the frozen pie crusts and smooth the tops', '10: Bake for about 1 hour, until 3 pies are set in the center', '11:  Cover the crusts with foil if it is getting too dark before the 3 pies finish baking', '12: Cool the 3 pies for 2 hours on a wire rack', '13: Slice and serve']

ingredients: ['Crust', '8 digestive biscuits', '1 tablespoon sugar', '¼ cup butter (50 g) melted', 'Cheesecake', '3 large mangoes or 6 small yellow mangos peeled & diced', '32 oz cream cheese (900 g) at room temperature', '1 ¾ cups sugar (225 g)', '3 large eggs at room temperature', '2 egg yolks at room temperature', '2 lime zests', 'Topping', '1 cup sour cream (250 mL)', '2 lime juices', '1 tablespoon sugar']
instructions: ['1: Preheat your oven to 190°C (375°F)', '2: Place 8 digestive biscuits into a ziplock bag and crush using a rolling pin until crumbled', '3: Pour crumbs into a bowl, along with sugar and melted ¼ cup butter and mix until well combined', '4: Pour crust mix into a 9-inch (23 cm) springform cake pan', '5:  Use a measuring up to press into the base and partially up the sides', '6:  Bake for 8-10 minutes, until lightly golden', '7:  Set aside to cool', '8: Using a blender, puree mangos until smooth', '9:  Set aside', '10: In a large bowl, whisk together 32 oz 1 cup 1 cup sour cream cheese and sugar until smooth', '11: Add the 3 large 2 eggs and 3 large 2 egg yolk one at a time until combined', '12:  Mix in 500 milliliters (2 1 ¾ cups) mango puree, and lime zest, whisking until combined', '13: Pour cheesecake filling into cooled crust', '14:  Lower oven to 160°C (325°F) bake for 1 hour', '15: Remove cheesecake from oven and allow to rest for 15 minutes', '16:  Centre will still by jiggly', '17:  Increase temperature to 190°C (375°F)', '18: In a small bowl, combine 1 cup sour 32 oz 1 cup 1 cup sour cream, 1 tablespoon sugar, and lime juice', '19:  Spread the sweetened 1 cup sour 32 oz 1 cup 1 cup sour cream on top of the cheesecake', '20: Use remaining mango puree to decorate the top', '21:  Create your own pattern of dots, using a toothpick to swirl the pattern', '22: Return cheesecake to the oven and bake for an additional 20 minutes', '23:  Turn the oven off and allow the cheesecake to cool inside with the oven door cracked for 1 hour', '24: Cover the top of the pan with clingfilm and chill overnight in the fridge before serving']

ingredients: ['¾ cup cornstarch (95 g) divided', '2 lb chicken wings (910 g) rinsed and patted dry', '¼ cup all-purpose flour (30 g)', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '⅔ cup water (155 mL)', 'peanut or vegetable oil for frying', '½ cup buffalo sauce (155 g)', 'ranch or blue cheese dip for serving', '1 stalk celery sticks for serving cut into sticks']
instructions: ['1: In a bowl, toss ¼ cup (30 grams) of cornstarch and the 2 lb chicken wings together until fully coated', '2:  Transfer the wings to a wire rack and let rest and dry out for 20 minutes, ideally in the fridge if you have space', '3: In a medium bowl, whisk together the remaining ½ cup of cornstarch, the flour, 1 teaspoon paprika, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, 1 teaspoon cayenne, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 2 teaspoons salt, and 1 teaspoon cayenne 1 teaspoon black pepper', '4:  Gradually whisk in the water, breaking up any lumps and mixing until smooth', '5:  The batter should be slightly runny', '6: Heat the peanut or vegetable oil in a large pot until it reaches 350°F (180°C)', '7: Coat 2 lb chicken wings in the batter, shaking off any excess', '8:  Add the wings to the peanut or vegetable oil in batches, cooking for 8-10 minutes until golden brown', '9:  Transfer the 2 lb chicken wings wot a wire rack set over a paper towel-lined 2 teaspoons baking sheet', '10: Transfer the 2 lb chicken to a clean bowl and drizzle with with the buffalo sauce, tossing to coat', '11:  Transfer to a serving plate', '12:  Serve with either ranch or blue cheese dressing and 1 stalk celery sticks']

ingredients: ['3 tablespoons oil', '3 cups chicken (400 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 ⅓ cups onion (200 g) chopped', '¾ cup carrot (100 g) chopped', '1 cup potato (200 g) chopped', '4 ¼ cups water (1 L)', '⅔ cup peas (100 g)', '⅔ cup curry paste (150 g)']
instructions: ['1: Heat up 2 3 tablespoons of oil on low to medium heat', '2: Sear the 3 cups chicken until the outside turns golden brown', '3:  Season with 1 teaspoon salt and 1 teaspoon pepper', '4: Take out the 3 cups chicken, make sure you don’t clean the pot or you’d wipe away some deliciousness!Add another tablespoon of oil, fry the onions, carrots, and potatoes until soften', '5: Add the 3 cups chicken back in with the 4 ¼ cups water', '6:  Bring to a boil then simmer for 10 minutes with the lid on', '7: Add in the ⅔ cup peas and ⅔ cup curry paste, stir well', '8: Serve with rice']

ingredients: ['½ cup Split Pigeon Peas (100 g) Arhar or Toor Dal', '¼ cup Mung Lentils (40 g) Mung(Moong) Dal', '¼ cup red lentils (40 g) Masoor ki Dal', '3 cups water (720 mL) more to wash and soak the lentils', '1 teaspoon turmeric powder', '1 teaspoon coriander powder', '1 teaspoon salt', 'For Tempering:', '2 tablespoons ghee or oil', '2 tablespoons onion diced', '1 teaspoon ginger minced', '1 teaspoon garlic minced', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds jeera', '1 medium tomato diced', '½ teaspoon Kashmiri Red Chili Powder', 'To garnish:', '1 pinch garam masala', '1 handful cilantro chopped']
instructions: ['1: Combine split Pigeon peas (Arhahr dal), Mung dal-lentils, and Red lentils(Masoor dal)', '2:  Rinse the lentils 2 to 3 times until the impurity clears', '3:  Soak lentils with enough 3 cups water to cover for 15 minutes', '4: Add soaked lentils, 3 cups water, 1 teaspoon turmeric powder, 1 teaspoon cumin-coriander powder and 1 teaspoon salt to an InstantPot or a Pressure Cooker', '5:  Pressure cook in an Instant Pot on high setting for 15 minutes with natural steam release', '6: For pressure cooker cooking, cook on high heat until 2 whistles', '7:  Turn the heat down to low and cook for 8-10 minutes', '8:  Natural Pressure Release', '9: Whisk dal with a whisk or use a hand blender(if needed) until smooth', '10: Heat 2 tablespoons ghee or oil in a wok or a saucepan on 1 medium heat', '11:  Add 1 teaspoon cumin seeds', '12:  Once the 2 tablespoons ghee or oil starts to become cloudy around 1 teaspoon cumin seeds, add minced onions', '13:  Cook onions until slightly golden', '14: Now add minced 1 teaspoon ginger and 1 teaspoon garlic, sauté for a few seconds', '15:  Add 2 tablespoons onion 1 1 medium tomato diced tomatoes, whole chilis, dried fenugreek, Kashmiri chili powder and curry leaves', '16:  Cook on low -medium while stirring for about a minute or until tomatoes start to break apart', '17: Add tadka to cooked Dal', '18:  If Dal is too thick add ½ cup to a cup of hot 3 cups water to thin it down', '19:  Boil the Dal to reduce the liquid if needed', '20:  Garnish it with chopped 1 handful cilantro and Garam Masala', '21: Serve warm with plain rice or roti']

ingredients: ['Main Ingredients:', '2 tablespoons oil', '2 cups broccoli floret (300 g)', '½ tablespoon ginger grated', '½ tablespoon garlic grated', '1 carrot sliced', '½ cup bell pepper (50 g) sliced any color', '1 teaspoon red chili flakes', 'salt to taste', 'roasted sesame seed for garnishing', '2 cups rice (400 g) cooked', 'Ingredients for beef marination:', '1 lb beef strips (500 g)', '1 tablespoon corn flour', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', 'Ingredients for sauce:', '1 cup beef stock (240 mL)', '1 tablespoon cornstarch', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 tablespoon brown sugar']
instructions: ['1: To marinate beef: Add 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon corn flour and soy sauce to the beef strips', '2:  Toss together to coat and marinate well for 5 minutes', '3: To prepare sauce: Stir 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon cornstarch and beef stock together until 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon 1 tablespoon cornstarch is dissolved, then add soy sauce and 1 tablespoon brown sugar and mix well until combined', '4: In a large skillet, heat 2 tbsp of 2 tablespoons oil and add the ½ tablespoon ginger, ½ tablespoon garlic, 1 carrot ½ cup ½ cup bell pepper (50 g) sliced carrots, 2 cups broccoli florets and 1 carrot ½ cup ½ cup bell pepper (50 g) sliced ½ cup bell peppers into the skillet', '5:  Saute and set aside', '6: Add beef strips in a single layer to the same skillet and cook for 5 minutes, turning constantly to easily 1 tablespoon brown', '7: Add the sauce and bring to a boil', '8:  Cook for 2 minutes', '9: Once the sauce has thickened, toss with sauteed vegetables and garnish with roasted sesame seeds', '10: Serve hot with 2 cups rice']

ingredients: ['2 boneless skinless chicken breasts', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '½ teaspoon onion powder', '1 cup flour (125 g)', '2 eggs', '1 cup seasoned breadcrumb (115 g)', '2 cups marinara sauce (520 g)', '8 slices fresh mozzarella cheese', '½ cup grated parmesan cheese (55 g)', 'fresh basil thinly sliced to serve', 'vegetable oil for frying']
instructions: ['1: Cut the 2 boneless skinless chicken breasts in half widthwise to make 4 thin breasts', '2: Season the 2 boneless skinless chicken with 1 teaspoon salt, ½ teaspoon pepper, and ½ teaspoon onion powder', '3: Coat the 2 boneless skinless chicken in 1 cup flour, then egg, and then bread crumbs', '4: Pour vegetable oil in a cast-iron skillet to come ¼ inch (½ cm) up the side', '5:  Heat the vegetable oil over medium-high heat', '6:  Add the 2 boneless skinless chicken and fry on both sides until brown, about 4 minutes', '7: Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate to drain', '8: Preheat oven to 450°F (230°C)', '9: Place the fried 2 boneless skinless chicken breasts in a baking dish', '10:  If they don’t fit side by side, gently overlap them', '11:  Pour the 2 cups marinara over the 2 boneless skinless chicken', '12: Top with mozzarella 8 slices and Parmesan', '13: Bake for 10-15 minutes, or until the cheese is browned and bubbling', '14: Serve with freshly chopped fresh basil']

ingredients: ['Beignets', '1 ½ cups apple cider (360 mL)', '1 cup lukewarm water (280 g)', '¼ cup granulated sugar (50 g)', '1 package active dry yeast', '2 large eggs', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '1 tablespoon apple pie spice divided plus 2 teaspoons', '1 cup evaporated milk (240 mL)', '½ stick unsalted butter melted', '7 cups bread flour (885 g) plus more for dusting', 'nonstick cooking spray for greasing', '½ cup powdered sugar (60 g)', '4 qt canola oil (3 L)', 'Caramel', '2 cups apple cider (480 mL)', '½ cup brown sugar (110 g)', '¼ cup heavy cream (60 mL)', '½ stick unsalted butter cubed', '¼ teaspoon kosher salt']
instructions: ['1: Make the beignets: In a 2 large skillet over medium-high heat, bring the apple cider to a boil, then cook until reduced by half, about 10 minutes', '2:  Remove the pan from heat and let cool', '3: In a liquid measuring cup or medium bowl, whisk together the water, granulated sugar, and 1 package active dry yeast', '4:  3', '5:  Let sit for 10 minutes, until foamy', '6: In a 2 large bowl, whisk together the reduced apple cider, eggs, 1 ½ 1 1 tablespoon apple pie spice divided plus 2 teaspoons kosher ¼ teaspoon kosher salt, 2 1 ½ 1 1 tablespoon apple pie spice divided plus 2 teaspoons apple pie spice, the evaporated milk, and melted butter', '7: Add the 1 package active dry yeast mixture to the egg mixture and stir to combine', '8: Add half of the 7 cups bread flour and stir with a wooden spoon to incorporate', '9:  Add the remaining 7 cups bread flour and stir until the dough comes together in a ball', '10: Turn the dough out onto a lightly 7 cups bread floured surface', '11:  Knead until smooth, about 10 minutes', '12: Grease a clean 2 large bowl with nonstick spray and place the dough in the bowl', '13:  Cover with plastic wrap or a kitchen towel and let rise in a warm place for at least 2 hours, until the dough has doubled in size', '14: In a small mixing bowl, whisk together powdered sugar and remaining 1 tablespoon of apple pie spice', '15:  Set aside', '16: Make the caramel: In a 2 large skillet over medium-high heat, bring the apple cider to a boil and cook until reduced by half, about 10 minutes', '17: Add the brown sugar to the reduced cider and continue cooking until the sugar dissolves completely and the mixture turns a deep amber color, about 5 minutes', '18: Add the heavy cream and whisk quickly to incorporate', '19:  Gradually add the cubed butter and whisk to melt completely', '20:  Whisk in the 1 ½ 1 1 tablespoon apple pie spice divided plus 2 teaspoons kosher ¼ teaspoon kosher salt, then remove the pot from the heat', '21:  Cover with a lid to keep warm until ready to serve', '22: In a 2 large pot, heat the 4 qt canola oil over medium heat until it reaches 350°F (180°C)', '23:  Place a wire rack over a baking sheet and set nearby', '24: Turn the dough out onto a lightly 7 cups bread floured surface and roll into a 12-inch (30 cm) square', '25:  Cut the dough into 36 2-inch (5 cm) squares', '26: Working in batches, fry the dough squares in the hot oil until light golden brown, about 1 minute per side', '27:  Transfer to the wire rack and immediately dust with the apple pie spice sugar', '28: Serve the beignets warm with the cider caramel alongside for dipping']

ingredients: ['½ lb chicken breast (225 g) cut into thin strips', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '½ tablespoon chili powder', '½ teaspoon cumin', '¼ teaspoon cayenne', '¼ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ cup bell pepper (50 g) green red or yellow peppers julienned', '½ cup white onion (75 g) julienned', '2 large flour tortillas', '1 cup shredded cheddar cheese (100 g) double for 2 quesadillas', '1 cup shredded monterey jack cheese (100 g) double for 2 quesadillas', 'Garnish', 'fresh cilantro', 'guacamole', 'sour cream', 'pico de gallo or salsa']
instructions: ['1: In a 2 large skillet, coat ½ lb chicken with ½ teaspoon salt, pepper, ½ tablespoon chili powder, ½ teaspoon cumin, ¼ teaspoon cayenne, and ¼ teaspoon garlic powder', '2:  Cook 5-7 minutes', '3: Add the peppers and onions and cook for 5-7 minutes, or until they are soft', '4:  Remove ½ lb chicken, onions and peppers from the pan and set aside', '5: Place the tortilla in the skillet and add a layer of cheese on half of the tortilla', '6: Add cooked ½ lb chicken, peppers and onions', '7:  Top with more cheese and fold the tortilla in half', '8: Cook for 6 minutes over medium heat, flipping half way', '9: Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with pico de gallo, guacamole, and sour cream on the side']

ingredients: ['2 cups rotisserie chicken (250 g) shredded', '1 cup buffalo sauce (290 g)', '½ cup celery (110 g) diced', '¼ cup red onion (35 g) diced', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 leaves green leaf lettuce', '2 oz blue cheese (55 g) crumbled for garnish optional', 'green onion sliced for garnish optional', 'Greek Yogurt Ranch Dressing', '¼ cup greek yogurt (60 g)', '½ teaspoon dried parsley', '⅛ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon dried dill', '⅛ teaspoon onion powder', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '½ teaspoon lemon juice']
instructions: ['1: In a medium bowl, add the 2 cups rotisserie chicken and 1 cup buffalo sauce', '2:  Stir to combine', '3: Add the ½ cup celery, ¼ cup red ¼ cup red green ⅛ teaspoon onion, salt, and pepper', '4:  Stir to combine and set aside', '5: Make the Greek yogurt ranch dressing: in a small bowl, add the Greek yogurt, dried parsley, ⅛ teaspoon garlic powder, dried dill, ¼ cup red green ⅛ teaspoon onion powder, salt, pepper, and ½ teaspoon lemon juice', '6:  Stir to combine', '7: Lay each lettuce leaf flat on a plate and scoop the 2 cups rotisserie chicken mixture into the middle', '8:  Top with a spoonful of Greek yogurt ranch dressing', '9:  Garnish with 2 oz blue cheese crumbles and sliced green ¼ cup red green ⅛ teaspoon onion, if desired']

ingredients: ['olive oil to taste', '2 boneless skinless chicken breasts cubed', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '⅓ cup chicken broth (80 mL)', '½ yellow onion diced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '3 tablespoons green curry paste', '13 ½ oz coconut milk (400 mL) 2 cans', '2 teaspoons ground turmeric', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 salt to taste', '1 pepper to taste', '3 cups butternut squash (615 g) cubed', '1 red bell pepper sliced', '2 cups broccoli floret (300 g)', '2 cups cauliflower florets (600 g)', '4 cups riced cauliflower (400 g) to serve', 'fresh cilantro chopped to serve']
instructions: ['1: In a large pot, add olive oil and set over medium heat', '2: Once the oil begins to shimmer, add cubed 2 boneless skinless ⅓ ⅓ 3 2 2 4 cup chicken breast and season with salt and pepper', '3:  Cook the 2 boneless skinless ⅓ ⅓ 3 2 2 4 cup chicken, stirring occasionally, until sides become browned and the center is no longer pink', '4:  Remove 2 boneless skinless ⅓ ⅓ 3 2 2 4 cup chicken and set aside', '5: Add the 2 boneless skinless ⅓ ⅓ 3 2 2 4 cup chicken broth, ½ yellow onion, and 2 cloves garlic to the pot and cook, stirring occasionally, until ½ yellow onions become translucent', '6: Add the 3 tablespoons green curry paste and stir until evenly distributed', '7: Add in the 13 ½ oz coconut milk, 2 teaspoons ground turmeric, 1 teaspoon chili powder, 1 teaspoon ground coriander, 1 teaspoon ground ginger, salt and pepper and stir until thoroughly combined', '8: Add in the cooked 2 boneless skinless ⅓ ⅓ 3 2 2 4 cup chicken, 3 2 2 4 cups butternut squash, 1 red bell pepper, 2 2 4 cups broccoli and 2 4 cups 4 cups 4 cups riced cauliflower and stir, bringing to a boil', '9: Reduce heat, cover with a lid, and simmer for 10-15 minutes, or until vegetables are tender', '10: Remove from heat and allow to cool', '11: In 4 glass containers, add in 1 ⅓ 3 2 2 4 cup of 4 cups riced 2 4 cups 4 cups 4 cups riced cauliflower each', '12:  Distribute curry evenly between each container', '13: Store in the refrigerator for up to 4 days', '14: When ready to enjoy, microwave, and garnish with fresh cilantro']

ingredients: ['14 cups hot water (3.3 L)', '⅔ cup fresh lemon juice (160 mL)', '⅔ cup honey (225 g)', '5 star anises', '10 black tea bags', '2 lemons thinly sliced', '8 fl oz whiskey (235 mL)', 'lemon wedge for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Add the 14 cups hot water, lemon juice, ⅔ cup honey, and 5 star anise to a slow cooker', '2:  Stir to combine', '3: Turn the heat to high, cover, and warm until the water begins to steam, about 30 minutes', '4: Add the 10 black tea bags and let steep for about 8 minutes', '5:  Remove the tea bags and reduce the heat setting to warm', '6: Add the 2 lemons and 8 fl oz whiskey', '7:  Stir to combine', '8: Ladle into mugs and garnish with lemon wedges']

ingredients: ['2 bagels Thinly Sliced', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '8 oz lox (225 g)', '8 oz softened cream cheese (225 g)', '⅓ cup red onion (50 g) diced', '1 teaspoon dried minced garlic', '1 teaspoon sesame seeds', '1 teaspoon poppy seeds', '1 teaspoon fennel seeds', 'Optional:', '1 teaspoon caper', '1 teaspoon green onion']
instructions: ['1: Slice the 2 bagels in half, and horizontally slice each half into 3 thin pieces', '2:  On a baking sheet, lightly brush 2 tablespoons olive oil on both sides of the bagel slices', '3:  Broil for 6 minutes, flipping halfway', '4:  (Times may vary, so keep an eye on them!) Break the crispy 2 bagels up into smaller pieces for dipping', '5: Dice the 8 oz lox, and place in a medium size bowl', '6:  Add 8 oz softened cream cheese, diced onion, 1 teaspoon dried minced garlic, 1 teaspoon sesame seeds, 1 teaspoon poppy seeds, and 1 teaspoon fennel seeds', '7:  Mix until well combined', '8:  Place dip in a bowl and serve alongside the bagel chips']

ingredients: ['2 cups chicken (250 g) cooked and shredded', '8 oz cream cheese (225 g) softened', '½ cup monterey jack cheese (50 g)', '⅔ cup cheddar cheese (65 g)', '½ cup buffalo sauce (240 g)', '½ cup ranch dressing (120 g)', '2 tubes refrigerated pizza dough', '4 oz cheddar cheese (125 g) block of cheese cubed', '2 tablespoons butter melted']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: In a bowl, combine 2 cups chicken, 8 oz cream cheese, ½ cup monterey jack, cheddar, ½ cup buffalo sauce, and ½ cup ranch', '3: On a lightly floured surface, roll out 1 tube of 2 tubes refrigerated pizza dough', '4:  Cut out triangles for eyes, and a mouth', '5: Bake for 12 minutes, or until the pieces are golden brown, slightly risen and cooked through', '6: Cut the remaining dough into squares, place a cube of cheese on each one, and roll into balls', '7:  Repeat with the other tube of 2 tubes refrigerated pizza dough', '8:  Place in a ring around the edges of a greased oven-safe skillet or dish', '9: Fill the middle of the dish with the dip filling', '10: Bake for 35 minutes', '11: Coat all of the dough with melted 2 tablespoons butter', '12:  Place the dough face pieces on the dip']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon avocado oil', '4 cloves garlic minced', '1 teaspoon ginger grated', '2 green chillis sliced lengthwise', '½ cup yellow mung moong dal (80 g)', '¼ cup urad dal (40 g)', '¼ cup chana dal (40 g)', '5 cups water (1.2 L)']
instructions: ["1: Set Instant Pot to 'Saute' mode", '2: Add 1 tablespoon avocado oil, 4 cloves garlic, 1 teaspoon ginger, and 2 green chilis', '3: Wash all three dals (lentils) and add to Instant Pot', '4: Add 5 cups water, salt and turmeric and mix well', '5: Close the lid on the IP', "6:  Press 'Cancel' and then 'Bean/Chili' mode and set timer to 15 minutes", "7: Move valve to 'Sealing position'", '8: Once done, serve with steamed rice, roti, or naan']

ingredients: ['3 eggs', 'salt to taste', '1 tablespoon butter unsalted', 'fresh chive to serve']
instructions: ['1: Beat the 3 eggs with the salt until the whites and the yolks are completely combined, with no spots of egg white remaining', '2: Over medium-low heat, melt the 1 tablespoon butter in a skillet, then pour in the 3 eggs', '3: Using a rubber spatula, constantly scrape the bottom of the pan while shaking the pan in a circular motion to ensure that the 3 eggs cook slowly, forming only small curds, about 1-2 minutes', '4: Once you start to see the bottom of the pan for more than a second after scraping, push the 3 eggs into a round circular shape', '5:  Cook until the edges solidify, then tilt the pan and carefully roll the omelette on itself', '6: Invert onto a plate, then sprinkle with chives', '7: Serve immediately']

ingredients: ['20 oz diced pineapple (565 g) 1 can', '1 cup rice vinegar (240 mL)', '1 cup vegetable oil (240 mL)', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '¼ cup fresh ginger (10 g)', '1 cup ketchup (260 g)', '2 tablespoons honey', '5 cloves garlic minced', '2 tablespoons cornstarch', '3 ½ lb baby back ribs (1.5 kg) 1 rack', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 tablespoon pepper', '2 red bell peppers seeded and diced', '2 green bell peppers seeded and diced', '2 teaspoons sesame seeds', '2 tablespoons fresh scallions sliced', 'white rice cooked for serving']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 275°F (140°C)', '2: Strain the pineapple juice from the can of pineapples into a large saucepan and reserve the fruit for later', '3:  Add the rice vinegar, 1 cup vegetable oil, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, ¼ cup fresh ginger, 1 cup ketchup, 2 tablespoons honey, 5 cloves garlic, and 2 tablespoons cornstarch', '4:  Whisk to combine and cook over high heat for 10 minutes, or until the glaze is 2 reduced by half and has the consistency of 2 tablespoons honey', '5:  Remove from the heat and divide the glaze in half', '6: Place the 3 ½ lb baby back ribs on a baking sheet and season with 1 tablespoon salt and 1 tablespoon 2 2 red bell 2 2 green bell pepper on both sides', '7: Brush half of the glaze all over the ribs', '8: Cover the ribs with aluminum foil, wrapping tightly', '9: Bake for 2 hours, or until the ribs are tender', '10:  Remove the ribs from the oven and increase the oven temperature to 400°F (200°C)', '11: Remove the top piece of foil and add the 2 red and 2 green bell 1 tablespoon 2 2 red bell 2 2 green bell peppers to the baking sheet', '12:  Pour the reserved glaze over the top and toss to coat the 1 tablespoon 2 2 red bell 2 2 green bell peppers', '13:  Add the reserved pineapple over the ribs', '14: Bake for 20 minutes, until the 1 tablespoon 2 2 red bell 2 2 green bell peppers are softened', '15: Slice the ribs and garnish with 2 teaspoons sesame seeds and 2 tablespoons fresh scallions', '16:  Serve warm with rice alongside']

ingredients: ['Stew', '2 cups yellow onion (300 g) chopped', '½ cup scallions (50 g) chopped', '1 cup red bell pepper (100 g) chopped', '1 cup leek (85 g) chopped', '6 small sweet red peppers stemmed and seeded', '6 tablespoons lard', '3 lb pork shoulder (1.25 kg) diced into 1/2 in cubes', '1 can chopped tomato 28 ounce (795 G)', '¼ cup worcestershire sauce (60 mL)', '½ cup marsala cooking wine (120 mL)', '1 piloncillo', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '2 packets unflavored gelatin', 'Dough', '½ cup lard (125 g)', '1 ½ tablespoons annatto seeds', '½ cup roasted red pepper (50 g)', '2 cups pre-cooked corn flour (250 g) PAN FLOUR', '¾ cup chicken stock (180 mL)', '1 teaspoon fine sea salt', 'Assembly', '¼ cup italian giardiniera (25 g) chopped', '2 tablespoons dijon mustard', '1 cup shredded chicken (125 g)', '40 manzanilla olives', '½ cup raisin (75 g)', '½ cup golden raisin (75 g)', '½ cup slivered almonds (120 g)', 'Special Equipment', '10 banana leaves thawed if frozen', 'kitchen twine']
instructions: ['1: Make the stew: In a food processor, combine the 2 cups yellow onion, ½ cup scallions, 1 cup 6 6 small sweet ½ cup ½ cup roasted red bell pepper, leeks, and sweet 1 cup 6 6 small sweet ½ cup ½ cup roasted red peppers', '2:  Pulse until broken down to the consistency of a tapenade', '3: In a large pot over medium heat, add the 6 tablespoons ½ cup lard and pulsed vegetables', '4:  Stir to combine and cook for 1-2 minutes, until softened slightly', '5: Add the 3 lb pork shoulder, canned 1 can chopped 2 tablespoons tomatoes, and Worcestershire sauce and bring to a simmer before adding the ½ cup marsala, 1 piloncillo, salt, pepper, cumin, 1 can chopped 2 tablespoons tomato paste, and 2 packets unflavored gelatin', '6:  Cook for about 4 hours, stirring frequently, until the meat is completely cooked and shreds easily', '7:  Remove the pot from the heat, allow to cool and refrigerate the stew overnight', '8: Make the dough: In a 6 small pot, cook the 6 tablespoons ½ cup lard and annatto seeds over high heat until starting to boil', '9:  Remove the pot from the heat and let cool', '10:  Strain the 6 tablespoons ½ cup lard into a bowl and discard the annatto seeds', '11:  Set aside 2 tablespoons of the annatto-infused 6 tablespoons ½ cup lard for assembly', '12: Add the ½ cup roasted 1 cup 6 6 small sweet ½ cup ½ cup roasted red peppers to a 6 small food processor and process until liquified', '13: Transfer the puréed peppers to the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the whisk attachment, along with the 2 cups pre-cooked corn flour and ¾ cup 1 cup 1 cup shredded chicken stock', '14:  Mix on medium-low speed until the dough starts to come together', '15: Gradually add the annatto-infused 6 tablespoons ½ cup lard and continue kneading', '16:  Add the salt and continue kneading until the dough is firm despite its softness, does not stick to your hands, and has a smooth and shiny appearance when rolled into a ball', '17: Roll the dough into 10 balls, each about 2 inches (5 cm) in diameter (the size of a lemon)', '18: Assemble the hallacas: In a 6 small bowl, mix together the ¼ cup italian giardiniera and Dijon mustard', '19: Clean the banana leaves with a damp kitchen towel and remove the vein at the bottom of the leaf, then cut them into 10 sheets about 12 x 14 inches (30 x 35 cm), 10 middle wrapping sheets, about 12 x 10 inches (25 x 30 cm), and 10 6 small sheets or "belts", about 4 x 10 inches (10 x 25 cm)', '20: Toast the leaves on a flat skillet over low heat until they have darkened in color and the leaf is flexible, about 30 seconds', '21: Brush the center of a 10 x 12-inch (25 x 30 cm) banana leaf with a bit of the reserved annatto-infused 6 tablespoons ½ cup lard', '22:  Place a ball of dough on the center of the leaf and use a cutting board wrapped in plastic wrap and brushed with more annatto 6 tablespoons ½ cup lard to press flat', '23:  Place a heaping spoonful of stew in the center', '24:  Top with some 1 cup shredded ¾ cup 1 cup 1 cup shredded chicken, 4 40 manzanilla olives, a 6 small handful of raisins, ½ cup golden raisins, and ½ cup slivered almonds, and 1 teaspoon of the ¼ cup italian giardiniera-mustard mixture', '25: Carefully fold the hallaca by bringing 2 sides of the leaf together, then folding the sides downward together', '26:  Fold in the 2 remaining sides, then turn the hallaca seam-side down', '27: Place the hallaca, folds down, on the top edge of a 12 x 14-inch (30 x 35 cm) banana leaf, then roll down the length of the leaf', '28:  Fold in the sides to seal', '29: Place the hallaca, seam-side down, on the short end of a 4 x 10-inch (10 x 25 cm) leaf', '30:  Wrap the “belt” around the hallaca, then tie with twine to secure', '31:  Repeat with the remaining ingredients', '32: Bring a very large pot of water to a boil over high heat', '33: Once the water is boiling, add the hallacas', '34:  Reduce the heat to medium, cover, and cook for 50–60 minutes until the banana leaves are muted in color and the filling is fully warmed through', '35: Remove the hallacas from the pot and place them on a wire rack set over a baking sheet', '36:  Let cool slightly before serving', '37: The hallacas will keep in the refrigerator for up to 1 month', '38:  If serving at a later time, warm the hallacas in boiling water for 15 minutes']

ingredients: ['16 oz cream cheese (455 g) softened', '1 teaspoon black pepper freshly ground', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '¼ cup fresh chives (10 g) chopped', '1 cup shredded provolone cheese (100 g)', '4 strips bacon cooked and crumbled', '8 boneless pork chops', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '2 cups flour (250 g)', '3 eggs beaten', '2 cups panko breadcrumbs (100 g)', '4 tablespoons canola oil']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C)', '2: In a large bowl, combine 16 oz cream cheese, pepper, 1 tablespoon garlic powder, ¼ cup fresh chives, 1 cup shredded provolone, and 4 strips bacon, stirring until thoroughly mixed', '3:  Set aside', '4: Season all sides of the 8 boneless pork chops with salt and pepper', '5: Carefully cut a pocket through the side of the 8 boneless pork chop in order to create a cavity', '6:  Stuff the cavity with a generous spoonful of the 16 oz cream cheese mixture and press around the edges of the 8 boneless pork to seal it in', '7:  Repeat with the remaining 8 boneless pork chops', '8: Dip the stuffed 8 boneless pork chops in the 2 cups flour, shaking off excess, then the egg, then the 2 cups panko breadcrumbs', '9:  Repeat with the remaining 8 boneless pork chops', '10: Heat the 4 tablespoons canola oil in a pan over medium heat', '11:  Fry the 8 boneless pork chops for about one to two minutes, then flip', '12:  Remove from the heat and bake for 15-20 minutes, until cheese is bubbling and starting to brown']

ingredients: ['Bagel Chips', '2 bagels', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'Lox Dip', '8 oz lox (225 g) chopped', '8 oz cream cheese (225 g) softened', '⅓ cup red onion (60 g) diced', '1 teaspoon dried garlic minced', '1 teaspoon sesame seeds', '1 teaspoon poppy seeds', '1 teaspoon fennel seeds', '1 teaspoon caper', '1 teaspoon scallion sliced', 'tomato for serving']
instructions: ['1: Make the bagel chips: Set a wire rack over a baking sheet', '2: Slice the 2 bagels into ¼-inch-thick rounds', '3:  Arrange the slices in a single layer on the wire rack and brush both sides with the 2 tablespoons olive oil', '4: Broil the 2 bagels for about 6 minutes per side, until golden brown and crispy', '5: Make the 8 oz lox dip: In a medium bowl, combine the 8 oz lox, 8 oz cream cheese, ⅓ cup red onion, 1 teaspoon dried garlic, 1 teaspoon sesame seeds, 1 teaspoon poppy seeds, and 1 teaspoon fennel seeds and fold with a rubber spatula until well incorporated', '6:  Transfer to a tomato for serving bowl and top with the capers and scallions', '7: Serve the 8 oz lox dip with the bagel chips and 1 teaspoon scallion sliced tomatoes']

ingredients: ['Crumble', '½ cup butter (115 g) cold and cubed', '¼ cup brown sugar (55 g)', '¼ cup sugar (50 g)', '½ teaspoon cinnamon', '1 cup flour (125 g)', 'Blondies', '1 ¼ cups flour (155 g)', '2 teaspoons cinnamon', '½ teaspoon nutmeg', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '½ cup unsalted butter (115 g) melted', '½ cup brown sugar (110 g)', '¼ cup maple syrup (55 g)', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '2 apples cored seeded and diced', '1 tablespoon lemon juice']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C)', '2: In a bowl, add the butter, brown ¼ cup brown ¼ cup ½ cup brown sugar, ¼ cup brown ¼ cup ½ cup brown sugar, cinnamon and flour', '3:  Use a fork incorporate all of the ingredients until a coarse crumb forms', '4:  Chill until ready to use', '5: In a bowl, add the flour, cinnamon, ½ teaspoon nutmeg, ½ teaspoon salt, and ½ teaspoon baking soda, stir to combine', '6: In a large bowl, add the butter, ¼ cup brown ¼ cup ½ cup brown sugar, and ¼ cup maple syrup', '7:  Whisk until fully incorporated,Add the 1 egg and 1 tablespoon vanilla to the bowl with the butter and mix until fully incorporated', '8: Add half of the flour mixture, and mix until just combined', '9:  Add the second half of the flour mixture and mix until there are streaks of flour still showing, making sure to not overmix', '10: Pour the 1 tablespoon lemon juice over the 2 apples then gently fold the 2 apples into the batter', '11: Spread batter evenly into a greased 9-inch (23 cm) square cake pan', '12: Sprinkle crumble mixture over the top, creating different size crumble pieces by squeezing some small clumps together in your hands for varying texture', '13: Bake for 25 minutes, or until toothpick comes out clean, cover with foil the last 5 minutes to prevent the top from over ½ teaspoon baking', '14: Let cool for about 20 minutes, slice and serve']

ingredients: ['4 jalapeñoes', '8 slices bacon', '8 oz cream cheese (225 g) softened']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200˚C)', '2: Slice the jalapeños in half, then remove the seeds by scraping out the insides', '3: Spread the 8 oz cream cheese evenly among the jalapeño shells', '4: Wrap each jalapeño in 8 slices bacon', '5: Place the 8 slices bacon-wrapped jalapeños on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper', '6:  Bake for 20 minutes, until 8 slices bacon is browned and peppers are tender']

ingredients: ['Pickled Vegetables', '2 large carrots peeled and cut into large matchsticks', '12 oz daikon root (340 g) peeled and cut into large matchsticks', '3 tablespoons kosher salt plus more to taste', '2 tablespoons sugar', '¼ cup distilled white vinegar (60 mL)', 'Lemongrass Pork', '4 stalks lemongrass', '1 small white onion', '3 tablespoons soy sauce', '3 tablespoons fish sauce', '⅓ cup sugar (50 g)', '1 tablespoon dry white wine', '1 ½ teaspoons fresh ground black pepper', '2 lb pork butt (910 g) trimmed of excess fat cut into 1/2 in (1 1/4 cm) thick slices', '2 tablespoons canola oil', 'Assembly', '4 large French rolls lightly toasted', '½ cup mayonnaise (120 g)', '½ cup pâté (110 g)', 'cucumber sliced', 'white onion thinly sliced', 'jalapeño sliced', 'fresh cilantro leaf and tender stems']
instructions: ['1: Make the pickled vegetables: Set a large colander in a large bowl', '2:  Add the carrots and 12 oz daikon to the colander', '3:  Toss with the 3 tablespoons kosher salt, then add just enough water to cover the vegetables, about 6 cups (1', '4: 4 L)', '5:  Let sit at room temperature for 30 minutes', '6: Lift the colander out of the soaking liquid, then rinse the vegetables well', '7:  Shake the colander a few times to allow any excess water to drain away', '8:  Let the vegetables sit at room temperature for 30 minutes to 1 tablespoon dry out a bit', '9: Add the sugar and ¼ cup distilled white vinegar to the bowl with the vegetables', '10:  Season to taste with more 3 tablespoons kosher salt, if needed', '11:  Transfer to an airtight container and refrigerate overnight', '12: Make the lemongrass 2 lb pork: Trim the bottoms and green tops from the lemongrass 4 stalks', '13:  Slice the light parts in half lengthwise, then remove any tough outer layers', '14:  Mince and transfer to a medium bowl', '15: Finely chop the onion and add to the bowl with the lemongrass', '16: In a large bowl, whisk together the 3 tablespoons soy sauce, 3 tablespoons fish sauce, sugar, wine, and 1 ½ teaspoons fresh ground black pepper', '17: Add the sliced 2 lb pork butt to the marinade and toss to coat', '18:  Cover with plastic wrap and let marinate in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour, up to 4 hours', '19: Heat the 2 tablespoons canola oil in a large pan over medium-high heat', '20:  Add the onion and lemongrass and cook until the onion is tender and beginning to brown, stirring constantly, about 10 minutes', '21:  Transfer to a bowl and set aside', '22: Heat a large grill pan over medium-high heat', '23:  Working in batches, remove the 2 lb pork from the marinade, letting any excess liquid to drip off, then grill the 2 lb pork until lightly charred on both sides and just cooked through, about 2 minutes per side', '24:  Transfer to a cutting board and let rest for 10 minutes', '25: Cut the 2 lb pork into bite-sized pieces and transfer to a large bowl', '26:  Add the lemongrass and onion mixture and stir to combine', '27: To assemble, slice the toasted French rolls in half lengthwise almost all the way through, leaving a long end intact', '28:  Slather the bottom of the rolls with a generous amount of ½ cup mayonnaise, then spread on a layer of ½ cup pâté', '29:  Top with the 2 lb pork mixture, cucumber, sliced onion, jalapeño, the pickled vegetables, and fresh cilantro', '30: Close the sandwiches and serve']

ingredients: ['1 chicken breast', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 tablespoon fresh dill', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'Dressing', '⅓ cup greek yogurt (95 g)', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon red wine vinegar', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '2 tablespoons water', '1 clove garlic minced', '1 tablespoon fresh dill', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', 'Toppings', '1 head romaine lettuce', '½ cup cucumber (65 g) sliced and halved', '½ cup olive (90 g) halved', '½ cup red onion (75 g) thinly sliced', '½ cup cherry tomato (100 g) halved', '½ cup feta cheese (75 g) crumbled']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2: Place 1 chicken breast on a baking sheet lined with aluminum foil or parchment paper', '3:  Top with olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, dill, and salt and pepper to season', '4: Bake for 35-40 minutes until internal temperature reaches 165°F (75°C) and the juices run clear', '5: Add all dressing ingredients in a small bowl or cup and whisk until with a fork until combined', '6: Slice thinly or cube 1 chicken, cutting to your preference for topping the salad', '7: Assemble your salad, starting with a base of 1 head romaine lettuce', '8:  Then top with 1 chicken, cucumber, olives, 1 tablespoon ½ cup red onion, tomatoes, feta, and the dressing', '9:  Toss to evenly incorporate ingredients']

ingredients: ['Falafel', '6 cups vegetable oil (1.4 L) for frying', '1 small shallot halved', '¼ cup fresh parsley leaf (10 g) plus more for garnish', '6 cloves garlic', '2 cans chickpeas drained and rinsed', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 ½ teaspoons ground coriander', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '6 tablespoons all purpose flour', '¼ cup extra virgin olive oil (60 mL)', 'Red Pepper Hummus', '2 cans chickpeas drained and rinsed', '1 cup roasted red pepper (100 g) jarred', '¼ cup tahini (60 g)', '1 clove garlic', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '¼ teaspoon smoked paprika', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '2 tablespoons water as needed', 'Tzatziki', '1 persian cucumber peeled', '2 cups greek yogurt (490 g)', '1 ½ teaspoons fresh lemon juice', '1 clove garlic', '3 tablespoons fresh dill plus more for topping', '4 fresh mint leaves', 'For Serving', '4 pitas', '¼ cup red onion (35 g) thinly', '¼ cup cherry tomato (50 g) halved', '½ cup cucumber (65 g) sliced', 'Preparation', 'Falafel', '6 cups vegetable oil (1.4 L) for frying', '1 small shallot halved', '¼ cup fresh parsley leaf (10 g) plus more for garnish', '6 cloves garlic', '2 cans chickpeas drained and rinsed', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 ½ teaspoons ground coriander', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '6 tablespoons all purpose flour', '¼ cup extra virgin olive oil (60 mL)', 'Red Pepper Hummus', '2 cans chickpeas drained and rinsed', '1 cup roasted red pepper (100 g) jarred', '¼ cup tahini (60 g)', '1 clove garlic', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '¼ teaspoon smoked paprika', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '2 tablespoons water as needed', 'Tzatziki', '1 persian cucumber peeled', '2 cups greek yogurt (490 g)', '1 ½ teaspoons fresh lemon juice', '1 clove garlic', '3 tablespoons fresh dill plus more for topping', '4 fresh mint leaves', 'For Serving', '4 pitas', '¼ cup red onion (35 g) thinly', '¼ cup cherry tomato (50 g) halved', '½ cup cucumber (65 g) sliced', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Make the falafel: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '2: Heat the vegetable oil in a large pot over medium-high heat until it reaches 375°F (190°C)', '3: Add the shallot, parsley, and garlic to a blender and pulse until coarsely chopped', '4:  Add the chickpeas, cumin, coriander, pepper, salt, flour, and olive oil and blend until combined, but still slightly chunky, 15–20 pulses, scraping down the sides of the blender as needed', '5:  Transfer the mixture to a large bowl and rinse out the blender', '6: Scoop the falafel mixture into 2-tablespoon portions and gently roll into balls, then flatten slightly', '7:  Place on the prepared baking sheet', '8:  You should have about 12 balls', '9: Working in batches, fry the falafel balls in the hot oil for 2–4 minutes, until dark golden brown', '10:  Transfer to paper towel-lined plate to drain, then arrange on a serving platter, garnish with parsley, and set aside while you make the dips', '11: Make the roasted red pepper hummus: Add the chickpeas, roasted red peppers, tahini, garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, paprika, pepper, and salt to the blender', '12:  Purée until smooth, adding the water 1 tablespoon at a time until the desired consistency is reached', '13:  Transfer to a serving bowl and rinse out the blender', '14: Make the tzatziki sauce: Add the cucumber, yogurt, lemon juice, garlic, dill, mint to the blender', '15:  Purée until mostly smooth, but still with some texture', '16:  Transfer to a serving bowl and top with more dill', '17: Serve the falafel, hummus, and tzatziki with pitas, red onion, cherry tomatoes, and cucumber']

ingredients: ['1 rack baby back ribs', '⅓ cup Frank’s Red Hot Buffalo Wing Sauce (80 mL) plus extra for drizzling', '4 tablespoons butter', '¼ cup honey (60 mL)', '12 rolls Hawaiian-style rolls', '1 large onion carmelized', '5 oz blue cheese (140 g) cut into thick shards']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 275ºF (135°C)', '2: Rub ribs with a little olive oil and sprinkle generously with salt on both sides', '3: Wrap ribs in aluminum foil and cook in the oven for 2½ –3 hours, until tender', '4: While ribs are cooking, make the sauce', '5:  Place Frank’s Red Hot Buffalo Wing Sauce, 4 tablespoons butter, and ¼ cup honey in a small pot over medium heat', '6:  Bring to a simmer, whisking regularly', '7:  Let simmer until slightly reduced, 5–7 minutes', '8:  Remove from heat and set aside', '9: After cooking, unwrap ribs and let cool for a few minutes', '10:  Flip ribs over so the bones are showing', '11:  Carefully pull out each bone', '12:  Brush both sides of the now-boneless 1 rack with the buffalo 4 tablespoons butter sauce', '13:  Slice 1 rack in half', '14: Raise oven temperature to 400ºF (205°C)', '15:  Place ribs in oven and cook for 10–15 minutes, until the ribs are caramelized', '16:  Remove from oven', '17: Keeping the Hawaiian 12 rolls attached to each other, slice 12 rolls in half so that the top comes off in one sheet', '18:  Place bottom sheet of buns on a sheet tray', '19: Place the rib-rack halves onto the bun', '20:  Drizzle with more Frank’s Red Hot Buffalo Wing Sauce', '21:  Top with caramelized onions, 5 oz blue cheese, and the top sheet of buns', '22: Move tray to oven and bake for 5 minutes, until cheese has melted', '23:  Remove from oven, slice, and serve!']

ingredients: ['1 cup almond milk (235 mL) or milk of choice', '1 vanilla bean split and seeds scraped', '1 banana frozen', '1 cup ice (140 g)', 'Garnish (Optional)', 'whipped cream', '1 sprinkle chocolate shaving']
instructions: ['1: Put all ingredients into a blender and mix until smooth', '2: Serve in a glass and garnish with toppings (optional)']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons sesame oil', '3 cloves garlic minced', '2 chicken breasts diced', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 cup carrot (120 g) diced', '1 cup broccoli floret (175 g)', '2 cups brown rice (400 g) cooked', '½ cup frozen peas (75 g)', '3 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce']
instructions: ['1: Heat 2 tablespoons sesame oil in a skillet, and cook 3 cloves garlic until softened', '2: Add the 2 chicken, salt, and pepper, and sauté for 5 minutes', '3: Add the carrots and 1 cup broccoli, and sauté until tender', '4: Add the 2 cups brown rice, 3 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce, and ½ cup frozen peas, and mix thoroughly']

ingredients: ['For the sauce:', '½ avocado', '¾ cup plain yogurt (180 g)', '¼ cup mayonnaise (60 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon cumin ground', '1 teaspoon coriander ground', '½ lime (+ more to taste if needed) juiced', 'For the salad:', '2 small zucchinis spiralized (or sliced lengthwise into noodle-like strands)', '2 ears corn grilled and cut off the cob', '1 cup cherry tomato (200 g) halved', '3 scallions chopped', '½ cup crumbled queso fresco (100 g) or feta']
instructions: ['1: For the sauce:Put all of the ingredients in a food processor or blender and blend until smooth', '2: Add more ½ lime juice and 1 teaspoon salt to taste (if needed)', '3: For the salad:Toss the zucchini noodles, 2 ears corn kernels, tomatoes, 3 scallions, and cheese with the sauce', '4: Sprinkle extra cheese and 3 scallions on top', '5: Serve with grilled chicken or fish and some crunchy tortilla chips']

ingredients: ['1 sweet potato', 'spreadable brie to taste', '1 handful walnuts', 'honey to taste']
instructions: ['1: Cut 1 sweet potato into thin slices, about ¼ inch (6 mm) thick', '2: Place in toaster and set it to the maximum cook time', '3:  When it pops, flip the 1 sweet potato slices over and toast 1 more time', '4:  Depending on the strength of your toaster and your preferences, you may need to toast it 1 more time after that', '5: Remove from toaster and let cool enough to handle', '6: Spread spreadable brie evenly across 1 sweet potato toast', '7: Top with 1 handful walnuts, drizzle with honey']

ingredients: ['1 red bell pepper sliced', '1 yellow bell pepper sliced', '1 green bell pepper sliced', '1 yellow onion sliced', '2 lb chicken breast (910 g) sliced in half', '2 tablespoons taco seasoning', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '4 garlics minced', '1 lime juiced', '1 can diced tomato drained', '4 cups brown rice (920 g) cooked', 'Garnish', 'sour cream', 'guacamole', 'fresh cilantro', 'shredded cheese']
instructions: ['1: In a slow cooker, place half of the bell 1 red bell 1 yellow bell 1 green bell peppers and 1 yellow onion', '2: Lay on the 2 lb chicken, and coat both sides with 2 tablespoons taco seasoning, salt, and 1 red bell 1 yellow bell 1 green bell pepper', '3: Sprinkle on garlic, half of the 1 lime juice, and 1 can diced tomatoes', '4:  Cover with remaining 1 red bell 1 yellow bell 1 green bell peppers, 1 yellow onion, and 1 lime juice', '5: Cover and cook on high for 3 hours', '6: Remove 2 lb chicken from the slow cooker, shred, and return to slow cooker', '7: Cover until heated through', '8: Serve over 4 cups brown rice with sour cream, guacamole, shredded cheese and fresh cilantro']

ingredients: ['Marinade', '2 tablespoons honey', '¼ cup soy sauce (60 mL)', '¼ cup hoisin sauce (70 mL)', '2 tablespoons  sriracha', '2 tablespoons rice vinegar', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 tablespoon ginger minced', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '½ rack baby back ribs', 'oil for frying', 'Sticky Sauce', '¼ cup soy sauce (60 mL)', '¼ cup hoisin sauce (60 mL)', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '2 tablespoons rice vinegar', '½ cup honey (170 mL)', 'Garnish', 'toasted sesame seed to taste', 'green onion thinly sliced to taste']
instructions: ['1: In a large bowl, prepare marinade - mix soy sauce, hoisin sauce, honey, Sriracha, rice vinegar, sesame 1 tablespoon sesame 1 tablespoon sesame oil, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tablespoon ginger, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon pepper, and the ½ rack baby back ribs', '2: Marinate for at least 1 hour in the refrigerator', '3: Preheat oven to 275˚F (190˚C)', '4: Bake ½ rack baby back ribs on a baking sheet for 30 minutes', '5: Make the sticky sauce in a saucepan by combining soy sauce, hoisin sauce, sesame 1 tablespoon sesame 1 tablespoon sesame oil, rice vinegar, and honey', '6:  Bring to a low boil, reduce heat, and simmer until sauce has thickened, about 30 minutes', '7: Heat 1 tablespoon sesame 1 tablespoon sesame oil for frying to 350˚F (180˚C)', '8: Place ½ rack baby back ribs into the 1 tablespoon sesame 1 tablespoon sesame oil a few at a time and fry for 4 minutes, flipping them occasionally', '9:  Drain on a paper towel', '10: Toss fried ½ rack baby back ribs in the sticky sauce and garnish with toasted sesame seeds and green onions']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ yellow onion sliced', '3 cloves garlic minced', '40 oz jackfruit (1 kg) 2 cans drained', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon liquid smoke', '1 cup low sodium vegetable broth (240 mL)', '1 lb pizza dough (455 g)', '¾ cup vegan barbecue sauce (210 g) divided', 'red onion sliced to taste', 'vegan ranch dressing to taste', 'fresh cilantro leaf to taste']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '3: Heat the 1 tablespoon olive oil in a medium pot over medium heat', '4:  Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the ½ yellow onion and cook for 4-5 minutes, until semi-translucent', '5:  Add the 3 cloves garlic and cook for another 2-3 minutes, until fragrant', '6:  Add the 40 oz jackfruit, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, 1 teaspoon pepper, 1 teaspoon chili powder, 1 teaspoon paprika, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, and 1 teaspoon liquid smoke and stir until the 40 oz jackfruit is well coated in the spices', '7:  Add the vegetable broth, cover, and cook for 15 minutes, until the 40 oz jackfruit is tender enough to be mashed', '8: Mash the 40 oz jackfruit until mostly broken apart and stringy', '9:  Transfer to a baking sheet and spread in an even layer', '10:  Bake for 20 minutes, until lightly browned', '11: Use your hands to stretch the 1 lb pizza dough into a circle about 14 inches (35 cm) in diameter and ½-inch (1 ¼ cm) thick', '12:  Lay on a sheet of parchment paper', '13: Remove 40 oz jackfruit from oven and increase the oven temperature to 425°F (220°C)', '14: Pour ½ cup (145 g) of ¾ cup vegan barbecue sauce over the 40 oz jackfruit, then toss to coat', '15: Spread the remaining ¼ cup (72g) barbecue sauce over the 1 lb pizza dough in an even layer', '16:  Top with the 40 oz jackfruit and red onion', '17: Bake for 14-16 minutes, until the crust is lightly golden around the edges', '18: Remove the 1 lb pizza from the oven', '19:  Drizzle with the ¾ cup vegan ranch and garnish with fresh cilantro leaves', '20:  Cut into 8 slices and serve']

ingredients: ['1 ribeye steak preferably USDA Prime 2-inch (5 cm) thick', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '3 tablespoons canola oil', '3 tablespoons butter', '3 cloves garlic peeled and smashed', '2 sprigs fresh rosemary', '3 sprigs fresh thyme']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 200°F (95°C)', '2: Generously season all sides of the 1 ribeye steak with salt and pepper', '3: Transfer to a wire rack on top of a baking sheet, then bake for about 45 minutes to an hour until the internal temperature reads about 125°F (51° C) for medium-rare', '4:  Adjust the bake time based on if you like your 1 ribeye steak more rare or more well-done', '5: Heat the 3 tablespoons canola oil in a pan over high heat until smoking', '6: Sear the 1 ribeye steak for 30 seconds on the first side, then flip', '7: Add the 3 tablespoons butter, 3 cloves garlic, 2 sprigs fresh rosemary, and 3 sprigs fresh thyme, and swirl around the pan', '8: Transfer the 3 cloves garlic and herbs on top of the 1 ribeye steak and baste the 1 ribeye steak with the 3 tablespoons butter using a large spoon', '9: Baste for about 30 seconds, then flip and baste the other side for about 15 seconds', '10: Turn the 1 ribeye steak on its side and cook to render off any excess fat', '11: Rest the 1 ribeye steak on a cutting board or wire rack for about 10 minutes', '12:  Slicing the 1 ribeye steak before the resting period has finished will result in a lot of the juices leaking out, which may not be desirable', '13: Slice the 1 ribeye steak into ½ -inch (1 cm) strips, then fan out the slices and serve']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil divided', '1 lb sirloin steak (455 g) cut into strips', 'salt to taste', 'black pepper to taste', '½ red onion sliced', '1 medium tomato sliced', '2 cloves garlic minced', '1 tablespoon aji amarillo paste', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon white vinegar', '1 tablespoon fresh cilantro chopped', '1 lb french fries (455 g) cooked hot', 'white rice cooked for serving optional']
instructions: ['1: Heat 1 tablespoon of 2 tablespoons vegetable oil in a large pan over high heat', '2:  Add the 1 lb sirloin steak, season with salt and black pepper, and cook until browned, 5-6 minutes', '3:  Remove from the pan', '4: Heat the remaining tablespoon of 2 tablespoons vegetable oil in the same pan, then add the ½ red onion and cook for about 5 minutes, until softened and browned', '5:  Add the 1 medium tomato, 2 cloves garlic, and aji amarillo paste, and cook for another 5-7 minutes, until the 1 medium tomatoes have released some of their juices, but are still intact', '6: Add the 2 tablespoons soy sauce and vinegar and stir to combine, let cook for 1 minute', '7: Add the 1 lb sirloin steak, 1 lb french fries, and cilantro', '8:  Toss gently to coat the 1 lb french fries in the sauce', '9: Serve with white rice, if desired']

ingredients: ['unsalted butter softened for greasing', 'Option 1: Prepared Mix', '18 oz brownie mix (510 g) prepared according to package instructions', 'Option 2: From Scratch', '2 ¼ cups granulated sugar (450 g)', '1 ¼ cups dutch processed cocoa  powder (150 g)', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 ½ cups all-purpose flour (190 g)', '1 cup vegetable oil (240 mL)', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '3 large eggs', '¼ cup water (60 mL)', 'Additions', '1 ½ cups chocolate chips (260 g)', '8 oz cream cheese (225 g)', '⅓ cup granulated sugar (65 g)', '1 large egg', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', 'vanilla ice cream for serving', 'caramel sauce for drizzling']
instructions: ['1: Position a rack in the center of the oven and preheat to 350°F (180°C)', '2: Grease a 9-by-13-inch (23-by-33-cm) dark metal pan with softened unsalted butter, then line with parchment paper, leaving overhang on all sides', '3:  Grease the parchment with more unsalted butter', '4: OPTION 1: If using prepared mix, make the 18 oz brownie batter according to the package instructions', '5: OPTION 2: If making the 18 oz brownie batter from scratch, in a large bowl, whisk together the sugar, 1 ¼ cups dutch processed cocoa powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon baking powder, and 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '6:  Add the 1 cup vegetable oil, vanilla, eggs, and ¼ cup water and whisk to combine', '7: Stir in the 1 ½ cups chocolate chunks', '8: In a medium bowl, whisk together the 8 oz vanilla ice cream cheese, sugar, egg, and vanilla', '9: Pour the 18 oz brownie batter into the prepared 1 teaspoon baking pan and smooth the top with a spatula', '10: Pour the 8 oz vanilla ice cream cheese mixture over the top and swirl into the batter with a knife or skewer', '11: Bake until lightly puffed on top, about 20 minutes', '12:  Transfer the 18 oz brownie pan to a wire rack and let cool completely, about 30 minutes', '13: Use the parchment paper to lift the cooled 18 oz brownies out of the pan and cut into 12 bars', '14: Serve with a scoop of ice 8 oz vanilla ice cream and a drizzle of caramel']

ingredients: ['Beef Filling', '1 ½ tablespoons vegetable oil', '½ cup yellow onion (75 g) diced - about 1 small onion', '1 green bell pepper small', '3 cloves garlic minced', '½ cup fresh cilantro (10 g) plus more for garnish', '1 lb ground beef (455 g)', '¾ teaspoon adobo seasoning', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '5 tablespoons tomato sauce', 'Plantains', '3 cups vegetable oil (720 mL)', '4 ripe plantains peeled', 'kosher salt to taste', '¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', 'Assembly', '16 oz shredded mozzarella cheese (450 g)', 'fresh cilantro torn for garnish', 'Preparation', 'Beef Filling', '1 ½ tablespoons vegetable oil', '½ cup yellow onion (75 g) diced - about 1 small onion', '1 green bell pepper small', '3 cloves garlic minced', '½ cup fresh cilantro (10 g) plus more for garnish', '1 lb ground beef (455 g)', '¾ teaspoon adobo seasoning', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '5 tablespoons tomato sauce', 'Plantains', '3 cups vegetable oil (720 mL)', '4 ripe plantains peeled', 'kosher salt to taste', '¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', 'Assembly', '16 oz shredded mozzarella cheese (450 g)', 'fresh cilantro torn for garnish', 'Preparation', 'Get the Tasty App', 'Get the Tasty Newsletter']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)Make the beef filling: Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat', '2:  When the oil is shimmering, add the onion and green pepper and sauté until softened and translucent, 3–4 minutes', '3:  Add the garlic and cilantro and cook for another 1–2 minutes, or until fragrant', '4: Add the ground beef, breaking up with a spatula to incorporate into the vegetables', '5:  Season with the adobo, garlic powder, and black pepper', '6:  Increase the heat to medium-high and cook for 4–5 minutes, or until the meat is no longer pink', '7:  Drain any excess liquid', '8: Return the skillet to the stovetop over medium-low heat, stir in the tomato sauce, and cook until heated through, 2–3 minutes', '9:  Remove the pan from the heat and set aside until ready to use', '10: Make the plantains: Heat the vegetable oil in a large, high-walled skillet over medium-low heat until shimmering', '11:  Working in batches if needed, add the plantains and fry, turning every 30 seconds or so, until golden brown on sides and soft enough to be pierced with a fork, 8–10 minutes', '12:  Transfer to a paper-towel lined plate to drain until cool enough to handle', '13: Transfer the plantains to a cutting board', '14:  Cut a slit lengthwise down each plantain, being careful not to cut all the way through', '15:  Use 2 forks to gently pull each plantain open', '16:  Use a fork, flat-side down, to press the base of the “canoe” to widen', '17:  Season with salt', '18:  Transfer to an 8-inch baking dish', '19: Fill each plantain with ¼–⅓ cup of shredded mozzarella cheese, add about ½–¾ cup of the beef filling to each plantain, then top with ¼–⅓ cups more cheese', '20:  Cover the baking dish with foil', '21: Bake for 20–25 minutes', '22:  Remove the foil and broil for another 2–3 minutes, or until the cheese is brown and bubbly', '23:  Garnish with torn cilantro']

ingredients: ['2 ½ tablespoons butter', '3 tablespoons flour', '1 ½ cups milk (360 mL)', '2 rotisserie chicken breasts shredded', '½ cup frozen peas (75 g)', '½ cup frozen carrot (60 g)', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste', '1 small potato peeled and chopped', '½ cup cream (120 mL)', '1 premade pie crust']
instructions: ['1: Preheat oven to 400ºF (200ºC)', '2: Debone, remove skin, and shred 2 rotisserie chicken', '3: Melt 2 ½ tablespoons butter in a cast-iron skillet over medium-high heat', '4: Add in the 3 tablespoons flour and stir until bubbling', '5: Whisk in the 1 ½ cups milk until smooth, then add chicken, frozen peas and carrots, 1 small potato, and ½ cup cream', '6:  Stir until fully mixed and bubbling', '7: Drape 1 premade pie crust over the top of the skillet and cut 4 venting holes in the center', '8: Bake for 30-35 min, or until crust is golden brown', '9:  Carefully remove from the oven']

ingredients: ['1 whole wheat tortilla', '2 slices provolone cheese', '1 leaf romaine lettuce', '½ cup shredded chicken (125 g)', '6 cherry tomatoes sliced in half', '2 tablespoons ranch dressing']
instructions: ['1: Place two 2 slices of provolone on a whole 1 whole wheat tortilla, followed by 1 leaf romaine lettuce, ½ cup shredded chicken, sliced 6 cherry tomatoes and 2 tablespoons ranch dressing', '2: Roll into a wrap and place in a reusable container with fruits and veggies for sides']

ingredients: ['Batter', '¾ cup unsalted butter (180 g) extra for greasing', '¾ cup golden yellow sugar (150 g)', '¾ cup white sugar (150 g)', '3 large eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '¾ cup AP flour (95 g) extra for coating pan', '½ cup yellow corn flour (60 g)', '2 teaspoons fine kosher salt', 'Rhubarb Ripple', '¾ cup rhubarb jam (240 g) (or any red or light coloured jam)', '2 tablespoons maple syrup', '8 teaspoons red liquid food coloring', '2 tablespoons blondie batter']
instructions: ['1: Generously grease a 10 inch heart shaped baking pan with butter and coat in flour', '2:   Shake out excess and set aside', '3: In a 3 large saucepan, melt butter over medium heat for 5-7 minutes or until browned, remove from heat', '4:   Working in the saucepan add sugars and whisk until combined', '5:   Quickly whisk in eggs, one at a time to prevent scrambling', '6:   Add 1 teaspoon vanilla, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, flours and 2 teaspoons fine kosher salt and whisk again until smooth', '7:   Pour into the prepared heart-shaped pan, set aside', '8: To a medium bowl add jam, 2 tablespoons maple syrup and 8 teaspoons red liquid food colouring, mix', '9:   Reserve ½ cup of mixture for later', '10:   Add 2 tbsp of 2 tablespoons blondie batter to the original medium bowl and mix until combined', '11: Dollop rhubarb and batter mixture in a random pattern on top of the 2 tablespoons blondie in the heart-shaped pan', '12:   Use a butter knife to swirl in a decorative pattern vertically and horizontally, keeping your knife on the surface of the 2 tablespoons blondie', '13:   Bake at 350F for 25-30 minutes until golden brown', '14: Serve 2 tablespoons blondie with ice cream and drizzle over extra Rhubarb ripple if desired, enjoy!']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons unsalted grass-fed butter softened', '3 tablespoons white miso paste', '1 tablespoon ginger grated', '3 cloves garlic grated', '1 teaspoon toasted sesame oil', '½ lb baby potato (225 g) halved', 'kosher salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '3 tablespoons sunflower oil neutral oil of choice divided', '12 oz Chilean Sea Bass (340 g) skin on 1 in (2 1/2 cm) thick', '2 baby bok choys thinly sliced', '1 teaspoon toasted white sesame seeds for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C)', '2:  Line a baking sheet with a reusable baking mat or parchment paper', '3: In a small bowl, stir together the butter, miso, ginger, 3 cloves garlic, and sesame oil', '4:  Set aside', '5: Arrange the potatoes on the prepared baking sheet', '6:  Season with kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper and drizzle with ½ 2 3 1 3 tablespoon sunflower oil', '7:  Toss to coat', '8: Roast the potatoes until tender, 10-12 minutes', '9: While the potatoes roast, sear the sea bass', '10:  Pat each fillet dry with a clean kitchen towel or paper towel and season on both sides with kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper', '11: Heat 2 2 3 1 3 tablespoons of sunflower oil in a medium skillet over medium-high heat', '12:  Once the oil is nearly smoking, add the sea bass, skin-side down, and cook until the skin is crispy, 3-4 minutes', '13:  Flip and sear the other side until golden brown, about 3 minutes', '14:  Remove the fish from the pan', '15: Remove the potatoes from the oven, leaving the oven on', '16:  Move the potatoes to a quarter of the pan', '17:  Place the fish, skin-side down, on the other quarter and spread the 2 baby bok choy on the empty half', '18:  Brush the miso butter over each fish fillet, then flip and brush more on the skin side', '19:  Drizzle the remaining ½ 2 3 1 3 tablespoon sunflower oil over the 2 baby bok choy and season with kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper', '20:  Toss to coat', '21: Return the baking sheet to the oven and bake until the fish is completely opaque and just cooked through, 8-10 minutes', '22:  The internal temperature should reach 145°F (63°C)', '23: Divide the fish, potatoes, and 2 baby bok choy between 2 plates', '24:  Garnish with sesame seeds and serve immediately']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons all-purpose flour for dusting', '4 sheets puff pastry thawed if frozen', '1 large egg beaten', '16 slices swiss cheese', '7 slices ham']
instructions: ['1: Lightly 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour a clean work surface', '2:  Flour a rolling pin and roll out each puff pastry sheet to flatten the seams', '3:  Lay the 4 sheets 2 by 2', '4: Make a diagonal cut across the 2 bottom 4 sheets of puff pastry from the lower right corner to the midpoint on the left side of the lower left sheet', '5: Make another diagonal cut across the 2 top 4 sheets of puff pastry from the upper right corner to the midpoint on the left side of the upper left sheet', '6: Holding the bottom pieces together, rotate clockwise 180˚ and up, so that the left side of the bottom strip meets the left side of the lower middle strip', '7: Holding the top pieces together, rotate counterclockwise 180˚ and down, so that the left side of the top strip meets the left side of the up middle strip', '8: Seal the seams by brushing a bit of 1 large egg wash where the pieces of pastry meet, overlapping the pieces slightly, and pressing together', '9: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C)', '10:  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper', '11: Arrange the cheese slices in a single layer across the lower portion of the triangle', '12:  Top with a single layer of ham slices', '13: Roll up the puff pastry from the base of the triangle to the top point', '14: Place the croissant on the prepared baking sheet and cover with aluminum foil', '15: Bake for 45 minutes', '16: Remove the croissant from the oven, take off the foil, and brush the croissant with 1 large egg wash', '17: Bake for another 1 hour and 15 minutes, until the croissant is golden brown', '18: Let cool for 20 minutes, then slice and serve']

ingredients: ['4 slices prosciutto', '1 baguette sliced on the bias into 8 pieces', '1 tablespoon olive oil plus more drizzling', '1 cup whole milk ricotta cheese (250 g)', '1 lemon zested', 'kosher salt to taste', '1 small zucchini', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 cloves garlic cloves halved', '2 tablespoons fresh italian parsley chopped for garnish']
instructions: ['1: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C)', '2: Arrange the prosciutto 4 slices in a single layer on a baking sheet', '3:  Bake for about 6 minutes, flipping halfway, until crispy', '4:  Remove from the oven and let cool', '5: Add the 1 baguette 4 slices to another baking sheet and drizzle with olive oil on both sides', '6:  Toast in the oven for 7–10 minutes, flipping halfway, until golden brown', '7:  Remove from the oven and let cool', '8: Meanwhile, add the 1 cup whole milk ricotta, 1 1 2 tablespoon olive oil, the 1 lemon zest, and a pinch of kosher salt to a food processor', '9:  Blend until whipped and creamy, about 2 minutes', '10: Use a vegetable peeler to thinly slice the 1 small zucchini into ribbons', '11:  Transfer to a medium bowl and toss with freshly ground black pepper, kosher salt, and a drizzle of olive oil', '12: When ready to assemble, rub each toasted 1 baguette slice on both sides with the cut side of a 2 cloves garlic clove', '13: Spread about 2 1 2 2 tablespoons of the whipped 1 cup whole milk ricotta onto each piece of toast', '14:  Wrap the 1 small zucchini ribbons around your fingers to curl, then place on the 1 cup whole milk ricotta-topped toast', '15:  Top each piece with a crumbled half-slice of crispy prosciutto', '16:  Garnish with the parsley, kosher salt, and freshly ground black pepper']

ingredients: ['2 cups dried pinto beans (340 g)', '1 tablespoon olive oil \n', '2 cloves garlic minced or crushed', '½ teaspoon paprika', '1 tablespoon taco seasoning', 'salt to taste', '½ cup sour cream (120 g) 2 tbsp sour cream (for the spider web)', '2 medium ripe avocados', '1 medium lime (use half for avocado & half for the pico de gallo)', '¼ cup shredded mexican cheese blend (25 g)', '½ medium tomato 1/4 medium red onion both finely-diced', '1 handful black olive sliced into thin circles olive spider or plastic spider', '1 handful scallions (sliced into thin circles) or cilantro (finely chopped)']
